40001001	Gɛ Kooro Devid naa Yeesu Kristo naanar aa teŋɛ dɔŋa nɛɛ laanee nɔ. Abrahamee ɛ ba bwa nyu te.
40001002	Abraham lolɛ Aesek, Aesek lolɛ Jekɔb, Jekɔb lolɛ Juda ne o dɔɔranar ne nimanar, asɛ Juda lolɛ Pɛrɛs ne Sɛra (ba nya sɔne Taama). Pɛrɛs lolɛ Hɛsrɔn, Hɛsrɔn lolɛ Ram, Ram lolɛ Aminadab, Aminadab lolɛ Naasɔn, Naasɔn lolɛ Salmon, Salmon lolɛ Boas (o nya sɔne Rahab), Boas lolɛ Obɛd (o nya sɔne Rut), Obɛd lolɛ Jese, asɛ Jese lolɛ Kooro Devid. Kooro Devid lolɛ Solomɔn (Solomɔn nyaa haah bɛl Yuraya faa moo ka la), Solomɔn lolɛ Rehoboam, Rehoboam lolɛ Abija, Abija lolɛ Asa, Asa lolɛ Jehosafat, Jehosafat lolɛ Joram, Joram lolɛ Usaya, asɛ Usaya lolɛ Jotam. Jotam lolɛ Ahas, Ahas lolɛ Hɛsekia, Hɛsekia lolɛ Manasɛ, Manasɛ lolɛ Amon, Amon lolɛ Josia, asɛ Josia lolɛ Jekonia ne o nimanar. A gɛ saŋee Babilɔn tena pɔ Israel tena nɛɛ dɛ lag ba kaa ba harɛ la. Baa lag ba kaa Babilɔn harɛ la taa Jekonia lolɛ Sealteɛl, Sealteɛl lolɛ Sɛrubabɛl, Sɛrubabɛl lolɛ Abiud, Abiud lolɛ Eliakim, Eliakim lolɛ Asɔ, asɛ Asɔ lolɛ Sadɔk. Sadɔk lolɛ Akim, Akim lolɛ Eliud, asɛ Eliud lolɛ Eleasa, Eleasa lolɛ Matan, Matan lolɛ Jekɔb, Jekɔb gee lolɛ Josef. Gɛ Josef nɔɔ mo Mɛɛre waa lolɛ Yeesu baa dɛ yerɔ Kristo Korowii aa ŋɔa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ o nɛra la.
40001017	Le Abraham bere saŋ ka tel Kooro Devid saŋ la, naanar la lɔ fi dɛ banaarɛ. Asɛ le Kooro Devid saŋ ka tel gɛ saŋ baa lag ba kaa Babilɔn harɛ la ge, naanar la lɔ fi dɛ banaarɛ. Asɛ dɛ berɛ le gɛ saŋ baa lag ba kaa Babilɔn harɛ la ba le Kristo saŋ la, a ge jagɛ fi dɛ banaarɛ.
40001018	Kenii Yeesu Kristo lola bini waa do. Josef ne Yeesu nya Mɛɛre nɛra sɛoh ŋɔ o kpɔɔ mo. Baa wola chɔe mɔɔ la, dɛ Mɛɛre chegɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge ta dɛ kpoŋe tea.
40001019	Dɛ o jaa Josef la ɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa ɛɛ su Korowii siwi. Dɛ o fe aa nyin kɛŋɔ o do Mɛɛre sihiih nɛnfuuh baah ta, dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ o sɔh dɛ vɛoh.
40001020	Gɛ waa nɔ aa lɔ Josef liire bini la, belaa nyundua torome bɛl ba o be deera ta dɛ ba ŋɔ, "Devid Naa Josef, dɛɛ berɛ ɔma kɛŋɔ hɛɛ mo Mɛɛree. Korowii Domadɛɛgee gela o kpoŋe tea la.
40001021	Wɛɛ lolɛ bibaalee, asɛ he pa o sɔn Yeesu, o munii kɛŋɔ Lɛɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ on dɛɛ ba bala dɛ ba lɛ o nɛra ba wechɔga ta."
40001022	A gɛ waa nɔ bwa chigo dɛ gel waa Korowii aa gela o keame bol la ɛ kpela kɛŋɔ waa ŋɔa ŋɔ,
40001023	"Tolo bɛl ɛɛ kpoŋe teaa dɛ lolɛ bibaa, asɛ baa yerɔ Imanoɛl." O munii kɛŋɔ, "Korowii ne ya lole."
40001024	Josef aa ir dom ta la, o ɛ gɛ nyundua torome la aa ŋɔ o be la, dɛ kpɔ Mɛɛre ba o dem.
40001025	Kɛ o ne o ta chɔe bwa dɛ ka tel kɛŋɔ waa lolɛ o bibaa la. Waa lolɔ la, Josef pa o sɔn Yeesu.
40002001	Gɛ saŋ baa lolɛ Yeesu Bɛtlɛham waa lɔ Judia harɛ ta la, dɛ kooro bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Hɛrɔd di kora. Belaa wejerema bane baa jemɛ weweela waa le wee leebɔr harɛ bɛl ta dɛ ba Jerusalam,
40002002	dɛ ba bɔɔ bela tena ŋɔ, "Leperaa Juda tena kooro baa lolɔ taraken la dɔɔ? Ya na wewee bɛl wee leebɔr ya bwɛɛ o bagle kɛŋɔ ba lolɔ. Anee ya ba dɛ́ ba duuru."
40002003	Kooro Hɛrɔd ne Jerusalam tena bwa aa no gɛ kooro nɔ waa la, ɔmee lag ba.
40002004	Anomanta kooro la yerɛ Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema la bwa ba cheme o sie dɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Leperaa baa ba Kristo la Korowii aa ŋɔa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la lola ɔ?"
40002005	Anee ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Baa lolɔɔ Bɛtlɛham waa lɔ Judia harɛ nɔ taa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii keame la baglɔ ŋɔ,
40002006	'Judia harɛ bwɛjega Bɛtlɛham, Judia harɛ bwɛɛre bini bwɛsala laa hen, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he taa kooro ɛɛ ba lee dɛ nyiŋi n nɛra Israel tena nɛ.' "
40002007	Belaa kooro la yerɛ wejerema la le bokɛre dɛ bɔɔ ba gɛ saŋ gbagba wewee la aa lea.
40002008	Waa bɔɔ ba gɛ waa nɔ tonɛ la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé takapɔ dɛ la Bɛtlɛham dɛ ka gaage bie la bɔr kɛrɛdɛ dɛ na bela waa lole, dɛ ba ŋɔ n be ásɛ n ge ka duuru."
40002009	Wejerema la aa no kooro la wobol tonɛ la, ba chig ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ kaa. Baa dɛ kaa la, wewee la ba faa nao wee leebɔr la berɔ le ja, dɛ tɔ ba sie dɛ la Bɛtlɛham dɛ ka jagɛ che dem bela bie la aa lole la.
40002010	Baa na wewee la, ba sie lɛo kɛrɛdɛ.
40002011	Ba jo dem bela dɛ ka na bie la ne o nya Mɛɛre. Ba kaa guŋu dɛ duuru dɛ ir pili ba dakare dɛ kpɔ suugaswɛm ne daawiile ane a sɔɔh aa soma baa yera fraŋkensɛns ne mire kɛo.
40002012	Baa dɛ ba kaala la, Korowii chegɛ deera ta dɛ ja ba ŋɔ ba bɛ Hɛrɔd be la kpa, asɛ ba berɛ che ŋwɛnɛfale ta kaa ba bwɛ.
40002013	Baa le bela dɛ kaa la, nyundua torome bɛl ba Josef be deera ta dɛ ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Kooro Hɛrɔd dɛ ba gela nɛra gaage bie la bɔr dɛ́ kpoo. Anomanta ir dɛ kpɔ bie la ne o nya bwa chwa kaa Ijipt harɛ ka so bela ka tel gɛ saŋ maa berɛ ba ŋɔ hé le bela mɔɔ he le."
40002014	Asɛ Josef ir harambaŋa dɛ kpɔ bie la ne o nya bwa chwa dɛ kaa Ijipt harɛ,
40002015	dɛ ka so bela ka tel gɛ saŋ kooro la aa sewa. A gɛ waa nɔɔ chiga dɛ gel waa Korowii aa chegɛ o keame la nɛɛ bol la ɛ kasinteŋ. O ŋɔ, "N bie lɔ Ijipt harɛ, asɛ n yerɔ o ba."
40002016	Kooro la aa baa jemɛ kɛŋɔ wejerema la negro la, o bwaawee iro taeh. Dɛ o fa ta sie dɛ na kɛ gɛ saŋ wejerema la aa ŋɔa ba na wewee bɛl la, aa dɔ bene anɛɛ. Anomanta o do nɛra ŋɔ bá gaage dɛ kpoo bibaala ba taa ɛ bechasɔɔhne ka tel banɔ la baa di bene anɛ dɛ do Bɛtlɛham ne o bwɛɛre aa baro cheme la bwa ta.
40002017	A gɛ waa nɔɔ gela Korowii keame Jɛremaya waa o faa bola la ɛ kasinteŋ.
40002018	O bolɔ ŋɔ, "Nomɛl lɔ Rama dɛɛ wi. Lokua wii naate ɛɛ wi. Rechɛl dɛ wi o bii wa, ba larawo kahonɛ, dɛkalkɛ o bii bwa serewɔ."
40002019	Kooro Hɛrɔd aa sewa la, dɛ Josef ta lɔ Ijipt harɛ ta, asɛ dɛ dee dɛ na nyundua torome bɛl.
40002020	Nyundua torome la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ir dɛ kpɔ bie la ne o nya he kaa Israel harɛ ta ja, dɛkalkɛ naate waa dɛ nyin bie la dɛ́ kpo la sewɔ."
40002021	Anee Josef ir dɛ kpɔ bie la ne o nya bwa dɛ berɛ kaa Israel harɛ.
40002022	Waa noa kɛ Akelɔs chig o mɛɛ naa ta dɛ ɛ kooro Judia harɛ ta la, dɛ o fe dɛ ɔmɛ kɛ ó kaa bela. Korowii berɔ jao deera ta ŋɔ o bɛ Judia harɛ la,
40002023	asɛ o kaa Galilia harɛ ta dɛ ka so bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Nasarɛt la ta. Anee gela waa Korowii keame la faa bola ŋɔ, "Baa yerɔ Nasarɛt tee" la ɛ kasinteŋ.
40003001	A gɛ saŋ la, dɛ baa bɛl waa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee baa yerɔ Jɔn ba Judia harɛ pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo la ta dɛ baa bol Korowii Waa ŋɔ,
40003002	"Hé charɛ he liire le he wechɔga ta, dɛkalkɛ Korowii Kora tel he be tonɛ."
40003003	Jɔn nɔ waa Korowii keame Aesaya faa bol la. O fa bolɔ ŋɔ, "Nomɛl dɛ bol waa takpeg ne pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo ta, dɛ ŋɔ nɛ́ra gel ba we-ɛɛla togre, dɛ kpɔ ba te dɛɛ kpa ba Dɔɔ bala."
40003004	Gɛ Jɔn nɔ, nyogma pona nee ba sɔh o yal, asɛ o kpɔ ol tɔn ɛ kriso dɛɛ vɔwɛ o chara. O kondikwaa gee tontombɛ ne tooh.
40003005	Dɛ nɛra le Jerusalam ne Judia harɛ ta bobɛlbwa, ne bwɛɛre aa lɔ Jɔɔdan Moo la nyoa bwa dɛɛ ba o be.
40003006	Ba bol ba wechɔga chaglo waa, dɛ o sɔ ba Korowii ne.
40003007	Jɔn aa naa kɛ Farisii tena ne Saduki tena ge warɔ dɛɛ ba o be ó sɔ ba Korowii nee la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Nɛnchɔga kɛŋɔ harɛkwaa baa do nii kpɔg ta asɛ a le dɛ chwa dɛɛ kaa la! Umee ŋɔ he be ŋɔ hɛɛ wonoo chwa le Korowii bandia ta nɔ?
40003008	Hɛ́ɛ ɛ waa aa dɛ chagle kɛŋɔ he charɛ he liire le he wechɔga ta.
40003009	He bɛ dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ haa ɛ Abraham naanar la gbo ɛɛ wonoo gel he chwa Korowii bandia la. Kasinteŋ, Korowii ɛɛ wonoo gel bwea nɔ begre Abraham naanar.
40003010	He do kɛŋɔ daa. Daa bɛlbwa waa wola nɔndɛɛga nɔnɛ la, baa teŋo ta dɛ fuuh. Gɛɛ Korowii ge gɔɔ o kpanfɛ nɛra baa wola ba liire charɛ la nɛɛ dɛɛ ba ba teŋna ta dɛ kpɔ ba do nii ta bá fuh.
40003011	"N te, nee n kpɔ dɛɛ sɔ heyaa Korowii nee dɛ́ chagle kɛ he charɛ he liire le wechɔga ta. Kɛ naate waa ba n habɔɔ la te, wɛɛ kpɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge ne niinii sɔ heya. O gwaa mɛ. Maa o napaa tee kwaraa dɔ.
40003012	O kpoŋe o lukoli dɛɛ ba ó ba palɛ o mea. Wɛɛ kpɔ a bie laanee do dɔndɔŋ bini cheg, asɛ a pɛga la, o kpɔa ka ta nii aa wola dime bwa ta."
40003013	Gɛ saŋee Yeesu le Galilia harɛ dɛ ba Jɔɔdan Moo la nyoa Jɔn be ŋɔ ó sɔɔ Korowii ne.
40003014	Dɛ Jɔn fe dɛ nyin vɛɛh, dɛ ŋɔ, "Menee chɛ kɛŋɔ ń ba he be hé sɔ mɛ Korowii ne, gɛɛ he ba n be naa?"
40003015	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Taraken nɔ te, sɔ mɛ. He sɔ mɛ naa, gɛɛ yaa ba wona ɛ wedɛɛga aa dɛ su Korowii siwi la bwa." Asɛ mɔɔ Jɔn sɛh dɛ sɔɔ nee la.
40003016	Waa sɔɔ Korowii nee la tonɛ la, Yeesu le nee ta dɛ ba che baŋ. Nyundua pilo, asɛ o na Korowii Domadɛɛge o do kɛŋɔ brɔnoma ken dɛ ba ba so o nɛ.
40003017	Asɛ taa bɛl le nyundua ŋɔ, "N bie maa dɛ nyinu o wa ɛɛ su n siwii nɔ."
40004001	Belaa Korowii Domadɛɛge la kpɔ Yeesu kaa pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo ta ásɛ Bɔnsam daahno na.
40004002	Dɛ Yeesu lawɛ o nyoa vɔwɛ tɔpebire fifraanaarɛ. Dɛ lɔr dɛ kpoo.
40004003	Anee Bɔnsam ba o be dɛ ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛ henee Korowii Bie la kpela aa, gel bwea nɔ berɛ paanoo hé di."
40004004	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, 'Kondikwaa gbo laa dɛɛ tɛ nɛn mkpa. Waa Korowii aa dɛ bol la bwa ge dɛ tɛ nɛn mkpa.' "
40004005	Anee Bɔnsam kpɔɔ kaa Korowii Bwɛɛ Jerusalam la ta dɛ kpɔɔ ka cheg Korowii Dea la nyundujagla,
40004006	asɛ dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛ henee Korowii Bie la kpela aa, che bonɔ dɛ jah le harɛ, dɛkalkɛ Korowii Tɔn baglɔ kɛ, 'Korowii ɛɛ geloo o nyundua toroma ɛɛ nyiŋi he nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ. Baa lawɛɛ haa wola nakpala kwaraa lɔ.' "
40004007	Anee Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, 'Bɛ N Naa Korowii daah na.' "
40004008	Anee Bɔnsam berɛ kpɔɔ ka chɔŋɛ bobɛl waa do kɛŋɔ bwejeŋ bɛl doa dɛ baglo harɛ nɔ ta bela bwa kora dii aa lole ne kondɔɔh ne konjena aa lɔ o ta bwa,
40004009	dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛ he guŋ mɛ harɛ dɛ duu mɛ naa, mɛɛ kpɔ kwaa haa naa nɔ bwaa tɛɛ."
40004010	Anee Yeesu kɔro ŋɔ, "Le n jwɛɛh kaa, Bɔnsam! Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, 'Dɛɛ duu N Naa Korowii dɛɛ tomɛ o gbo.' "
40004011	Anee Bɔnsam gelo dɛ kaa, asɛ nyundua toroma ba chao.
40004012	Gɛ saŋ Yeesu aa noa kɛ ba lawɛ Jɔn do dea la, o berɔ kaa Galilia harɛ ta.
40004013	O la Nasarɛt, kɛ o ta bela soge, dɛ berɛ ka so bwɛɛ bɛl waa lɔ Galilia Moo la nyoa dɛ do Sebulɔn ne Naftale harɛ ta baa yerɔ Kapeeneɔm la ta.
40004014	Gɛ waa nɔɔ gela Korowii keame Aesaya waa o faa bola la ɛ kasinteŋ. O bolɔ ŋɔ,
40004015	"Nɛra baa lɔ Sebulɔn ne Naftale harɛ waa lɔ Jɔɔdan Moo la baŋ, dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ kaa moo nyoa bela la, Galilia harɛ ta bela hɔɔhra aa wara dɛ koo Juda tena bini la,
40004016	gɛ nɛra nɔ ba wechɔga aa gela ba do seo lɔga kɛ nɛra baa soge biro ta la, ba na nii bɛl o chaah kohona tɛ ba bwa."
40004017	Gɛ saŋ laanee Yeesu pa mun bol waa dɛɛ chagle nɛra ŋɔ, "Hé charɛ he liire le he wechɔga ta, dɛkalkɛ Korowii Kora la pu heyaa tonɛ."
40004018	Yeesu aa dɛ valɛ Galilia Moo la nyoa la, o na baala banɛ baa dɛ ɛ nee toma dɛɛ ta asau. Baala banɛ laanee Seemɔn baa dɛ yerɔ Pita la ne o nime Andriu.
40004019	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé gel he pɛŋa la nyina dɛ ba teŋɛ n nɛ, ásɛ n bagle heyaa gɛ baa nyin nɛra baa tɛ Korowii."
40004020	Bug la ta ba den gel ba asauri la bela dɛ kpɔ teŋɛ o nɛ.
40004021	Waa dɛ kaa sie la, o berɔ ka na Sebedii bii banɛ, Jems ne o nime Jɔn, dɛ ba ne ba mɛɛ lɔ gbera bini dɛɛ tɔɔge ba asauri, asɛ Yeesu yer ba.
40004022	Bug la ta ba den gel ba mɛɛ ne gbera la bela dɛ kpɔ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ.
40004023	Yeesu gaage Galilia harɛ ta bobɛlbwa dɛ jo cheremi deene bini dɛɛ chagle nɛra Korowii Kora la Amanesoma wa, dɛɛ chah nɛra baa dɛ we weela bwa soosiwi.
40004024	O waa perɛ Siiria harɛ bobɛlbwa, anomanta bela tena kpɔ ba weela tena baa dɛ we weela bwa soosiwi dɛ ba o be. Banɔ la kwaa aa dɛ ir ba nɛ, ne banɔ la baa dɛ we gbuŋgbuŋri, ne banɔ la ba nɔɔra ne ba nakpale aa serewa bwaa ba kpɔ ba Yeesu be o chaah ba.
40004025	Dɛ nɛnlaa tenten le Galilia harɛ ne bwɛɛre fi baa dɛ yera Dekapɔles la, ne Jerusalam, ne Judia harɛ, ne Jɔɔdan Moo baŋ bwɛɛre bwa ta dɛ kpɔ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ.
40005001	Yeesu aa na nɛnlaa la la, anee o teeh bwejen bɛl dɛ ka so, asɛ o habɔteŋra la baro cheme,
40005002	asɛ wɛɛ bag ba waa dɛɛ ŋɔ,
40005003	"Nɛra baa kpɔ ba te dawɛ Korowii nɛɛ kɛ nyaara la, ba na som, dɛkalkɛ banee dɛɛ ba nyundua koobii ɛɛ.
40005004	Nɛra baa dɛ wi taraken la, ba na som, dɛkalkɛ Korowii ɛɛ larawe ba bwaraa.
40005005	Nɛra baa dɛ pwɛr ba te la, ba na som, dɛkalkɛ Korowii nyobaga la, banee o bagɛ tɛ.
40005006	Nɛra ba sie aa begre waa aa togra dɛɛ su Korowii siwi la, ba na som, dɛkalkɛ Korowii ɛɛ cha baa a ta kɛrɛdɛ bá dɔa ba tetoora.
40005007	Nɛra baa dɛ na nɛra sum la, ba na som, dɛkalkɛ Korowii gee na ba sumii.
40005008	Nɛra ba tea bini aa toa la, ba na som, dɛkalkɛ banee dɛɛ ba Korowii nae.
40005009	Nɛra baa dɛ larawe waa dɛɛ sɔɔh waa nyoa la, ba na som, dɛkalkɛ Korowii ɛɛ yer ba o biirii.
40005010	Nɛra baa dɛ ɛ waa aa dɛ su Korowii siwi, nɛra koh a waa dɛɛ ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa la, ba na som, dɛkalkɛ banee dɛɛ ba nyundua koobii ɛɛ.
40005011	"Dɛ nɛra koh teŋa haa teŋɛ n nɛɛ nɔ waa dɛɛ chɛgre heya, dɛɛ ɛ heyaa hɔhɔrɔwa, dɛɛ teŋe nyosone, dɛ bol musu waa bɛlbwa dɛɛ dawɛ he nɛ aa, he na som.
40005012	Hé gel he sie lɛ kohona, dɛkalkɛ he kembɔr kan taeh Korowii be. Gɛɛ ba kpɔ ɛ Korowii keamere baa tɔ sie la.
40005013	"He do kɛŋɔ yar aa dɛ kwaa dɔr nɛwɛnyina bwa bini. Dɛ yar aa somɛ kpa a, ɛrɛɛ baa ba a ɛɛ á do som jaɔ? A ta wejema dɔe bá ɛ kpa. Fugaa a den chɛ kɛŋɔ he fuga ta dɛ tigri a ta.
40005014	He do kɛŋɔ nii waa dɛ chaah bɔr nɛwɛnyina bwa bini. Bwɛjen waa dawɛ deŋgare doa la aa won sɔh.
40005015	Nomɛlbwa aa kandea choŋi dɛ kpɔ kon dɛɛ pi o ta. Kɛ ba dɛ choŋu dɛ kpɔ chɔŋɛ kon ta ásɛ o chaah tɛ nɛra baa lɔ dem bela la bwa.
40005016	Gɛɛ chɛ kɛŋɔ he chaah tɛ nɛra ásɛ ba na he wedɛɛga ɛɛ dɛ duu he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la.
40005017	"He bɛ dɛɛ lii kɛ n balɔ dɛ́ ba chɔg Mosis Mmara la ne waa Korowii keamere la aa chagla la. A chɔga laa n ba. N balɔ dɛ́ ba gel a dɔ mun kɛrɛdɛ.
40005018	Kasinteŋ, nyundua ne harɛ taa lole nɔ, Mmara nɔ bini wejega bɛlbwa aa lee ba.
40005019	Anomanta naate waa berɛ Mmara la bini onjega bɛlbwa dɛ berɛ chagle bane ge ba ɛ gɛ la, waa bɔr dɔe ba Korowii Kora bini. Naate ge waa dɛ teŋɛ Mmara la ta, dɛ chagle bane ge baa ɛ gɛ la, wɛɛ dɔ nomonsoŋnibɔree Korowii Kora bini.
40005020	Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, dɛ he wedɛɛga ɛɛ ta Tɔn Jerema ne Farisii tena wedɛɛga ɛɛ gwaalaa, haa won ja Korowii Kora ta ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta.
40005021	"He noɔ kɛ ba ŋɔ saŋ la tena be ŋɔ, 'Bɛ nɛn kpo. Nomɛlbwa waa kpo nɛn la, o ɛ wechɔga kɛŋɔ bá bol o waa dɛ pa bole.'
40005022	Kɛ taraken n dɛ ŋɔ he be, nomɛlbwa o baah naa di o dɔŋ nɛɛ la, o ɛ wechɔga kɛŋɔ bá bol o waa dɛ pa bole. Nomɛlbwa ge waa yerɛ o dɔŋ nɛnsala la chɛ kɛ o che Juda tena nomonome bwa sie. Asɛ nomɛlbwa o ge aa yerɛ o dɔŋ koŋgɛne bɛl la, a chɛ kɛ ba tao Bɔnsam nii ta.
40005023	"Anomanta dɛ he kpɔ jam kwaa dɛɛ la ká tɛ Korowii bela baa dɛ fuh kwaa dɛɛ tɛo la, dɛ lii kɛ he ne he dɔŋ bɛl dɔ waane aa,
40005024	gel he kwaa la bela, dɛ la ka nyin he dɔŋ la hé ne o nyoa ka pɛ mɔɔ he ba kpɔ he kwaa la tɛ Korowii.
40005025	Dɛ he ne he dɔŋ dɔɔ, asɛ o kpɔe dɛɛ kaa kɔɔto aa, larawo hé kwaa he baah. Gɛ laa aa, o dɔɔ tel he ne bela aa, kɔɔto nomoa la ɛɛ kpɔe tɛ prosiri bá ka doe dea.
40005026	Kasinteŋ, dea belaa hɛɛ ba kae ka tel gɛ saŋ haa bɔ he kem la bwa, kapɛrɛ gba aa wola ka mɔɔ ba lee.
40005027	"He noɔ kɛ ba faa ŋɔa ŋɔ, 'Bɛ jwamane dɛɛ bɔ.'
40005028	Kɛ taraken n dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, he naate haa na haah dɛ nyiŋu he pɛla do o nɛɛ la, he bɔ jwamane he bambile bini.
40005029	Anomanta, dɛ he dig siwi ɛɛ geloo he ɛ wechɔga aa, fomo ta! He fomo ta kwaraa bɔ kɛ haa kpɔ sibie anɛ kaa Bɔnsam nii ta.
40005030	Dɛ he nɔndig ɛɛ geloo he ɛ wechɔga aa, teŋo ta! He teŋo ta kwaraa bɔ kɛ haa kpɔ nɔɔra anɛ kaa Bɔnsam nii ta.
40005031	"Ba fa ŋɔ nomɛlbwa dɛ ba o haah vɛɛh yaa, ó chwerɛ tɔn tɛo dɛ vɛoh.
40005032	Kɛ taraken te n ŋɔ baa bɛlbwa o haah naa wola baala nyine, asɛ o vɛoh la, o di bolchɔge, dɛkalkɛ o gelɔ haah la bɔ jwamane. Asɛ naate ge waa bera ka mo haah la baa vɛoh la, o ge bɔ jwamane.
40005033	"He noɔ kɛ baa ŋɔ saŋ la tena be ŋɔ, 'Bɛ waa haa bagɛ nyoa dɛ ŋwɛɛ a ta la ta koni. Ɛ waa la tɛ Korowii.'
40005034	Kɛ n dɛ ŋɔ, he be ŋɔ he bɛ ŋwɛɛ kwaraa. He bɛ nyundua ŋwɛɛ, dɛkalkɛ Korowii soŋnibɔree.
40005035	He bɛ harɛ ŋwɛɛ, o natigribɔree. He bɛ Jerusalam ŋwɛɛ, Koojen bwɛɛ bela.
40005036	He bɛ he nyu gba ŋwɛɛ. Haa won gel he nyumpon beŋkpoŋ gba to, gɛɛ haa wola won gel o bir ge.
40005037	Ba dɛ bɔɔre waa dɛ a ɛ kpela aa, sɛh ŋɔ, 'Ɔɔh,' dɛ nyosone gee yaa, ŋɔ, 'Ɔɔhɔ.' He bol waane ja a ta naa, amɔ a te le Bɔnsam be.
40005038	"He noɔ kɛ ba faa ŋɔa ŋɔ, 'Dɛ nɛn fome he siwi aa, hé ge fome o siwi. Dɛ nɛn fome he nyen aa, hé ge fome o nyen.'
40005039	Kɛ taraken te n ŋɔ, dɛ nomɛl ɛɛ wechɔga aa, bɛ wechɔga kpɔ bɔɔ kem. Dɛ nomɛlbwa kpaa he dig lwɛɛma aa, berɛ gal lwɛɛma la ge tɛo ó kpaa ja.
40005040	Dɛ nomɛl dɛ nyin kɛ o kpɔe la kɔɔto dɛ́ ka lɛ he batakaare aa, kpɔ he yal ge jao.
40005041	Dɛ kpegnɛn ge dɛ doe ŋɔ hé che o bone ka doo kwansini beŋkpoŋ naa, che ka doo kwansini anɛ.
40005042	Dɛ nomɛl soŋe komɛl aa, kpɔ tɛo. Dɛ nomɛl ge ŋɔ o dɛ nyin komɛl dɛ kemaa, kpɔ kemɔ.
40005043	"He noɔ kɛ ba faa ŋɔa ŋɔ, 'Hé nyin he daamanar dɛ hah he dɔma.'
40005044	Kɛ taraken n dɛ ŋɔ he be, hé nyin he dɔma dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛɛ ba,
40005045	ásɛ nɛra jemɛ kɛ he ɛ he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la bii, dɛkalkɛ o te gelɔ wee lɔ dɛɛ tɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra ne nɛndɛɛga bwa, dɛ nɛ bwaala ge dɛɛ tɛ nɛndɛɛga ne wechɔg-ɛɛra bwa.
40005046	Dɛ he dɛ nyin nɛra baa dɛ nyin heyaa gbo aa, kembɔr besoo hɛɛ ba dɔe le Korowii be nɔ? Wechɔg-ɛɛra gba dɛ nyin nɛra baa dɛ nyin ba wa.
40005047	Dɛ he ne he chamenetena gbo dɛ bol wa aa, dɛ amee he ɛ gwaa he bala ɔ? Hale nɛra baa wola Korowii tomɛ gba won gɛ ɛɛ!
40005048	A chɛ kɛŋɔ he we-ɛɛla bwa do kaih, gɛ he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la waa aa do kaih la.
40006001	"Hé nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ dɛɛ berɛ he wedɛɛga ɛɛ nɛwɛnyini sie ta ásɛ baa kpɛɛ heya. Dɛ he dɛ ɛ he wedɛɛga nɛwɛnyini sie ta naa, hɛɛ paŋɛ he kembɔree he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la sie.
40006002	Anomanta dɛ he dɛ ba nɛn kon kɛɛ yaa, he bɛ kpɔ lɔ dawuro dɛ́ gel nɛra jemɛ, gɛ nɛra baa na nɛra sie mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ waa yon dɛɛ ɛ cheremi deene ne fɔgbaahna la. Ba te dɛ nyin kɛ nɛra na ba wedɛɛga ɛɛ dɛ kpɛɛ ba. Kasinteŋ, ba te dɔ ba kembɔr tonɛ.
40006003	Dɛ he te dɛ ba nɛn kon kɛɛ yaa, he bɛ gel he dansom gba jemɛ.
40006004	Hé sɔh dɛ kɛo ásɛ he Mɛɛ la waa dɛ na waa haa ɛa dɛɛ sɔh bwa la bɔ heyaa kem.
40006005	"He dɛ ba Korowii soŋa aa, he bɛ he te ɛ kɛŋɔ nɛra baa dɛ na nɛra sie mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ waa la. Banee yon dɛɛ nyin cheremi deene ne fɔgbaahna chega dɛɛ soŋe Korowii ásɛ nɛra na ba. Kasinteŋ, ba te dɔ ba kembɔr tonɛ.
40006006	Dɛ he te dɛ ba Korowii soŋa aa, hé kpɔ he te sɔh mɔɔ dɛ soŋe Korowii waa ɛ he Mɛɛ baa wola on na la. Onee dɛɛ na waa haa ɛa dɛɛ sɔh bwa. Onee dɛ bɔ heyaa kem.
40006007	"He bɛ wobojaŋa aa wola mun dɔe dɛɛ bol he Korowii soŋa ta kɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la yon dɛɛ ɛ la. Ba dɛ lii kɛŋɔ ba wobojaŋa laanee dɛ gel ba voga no ba wa.
40006008	He bɛ ɛ kɛ ban. He Mɛɛ la jemɛ he wenyina bwa mɔɔ hɛɛ soŋo.
40006009	Kenii chɛ kɛ hɛɛ soŋe Korowii: Ya Mɛɛ haa lɔ nyundua, henee chɛ duura.
40006010	Bagle he kora dii harɛ nɔ ta. Gel ya ɛ he tetoowaa harɛ nɔ ta, gɛ baa dɛ ɛa nyundua la.
40006011	Tɛ yaa ya fini kondikwa,
40006012	dɛ kpɔ ya wechɔga kɛ yaa, gɛ yaa kpɔ ya dɔŋa wechɔga dɛɛ kɛ ba la.
40006013	Dɛɛ ke yaa wechɔga lugri ta. Le yaa musu ta. He kora dii, ne he kpegri, ne he jirima ta jaga dɔe bwa. Aamen.
40006014	Dɛ he kpɔ he dɔŋa wechɔga baa dɛ ɛ heyaa dɛɛ kɛ ba aa, he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la gee kpɔ he wechɔga haa dɛ ɛ laanee dɛɛ kɛ heya.
40006015	Kɛ dɛ haa he dɔŋa wechɔga kpɔe dɛɛ kɛ ba aa, he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la ge aa he kwaa kpɔ kɛ heya.
40006016	"He dɛ vɔwɛ nyoa aa, he bɛ dɛɛ ŋwe kɛ nɛra baa dɛ na nɛra sie mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ waa aa dɛ ɛ la. Dɛ ba te dɛ vɔwɛ nyoa aa, gɛɛ ba ŋwe dɛ laa ba sie bɔr chɔg ásɛ nɛra na kɛŋɔ ba dɛ vɔwɛ nyoa. Kasinteŋ, ba te dɔ ba kembɔr tonɛ.
40006017	Kɛ he te, dɛ he dɛ vɔwɛ nyoa aa, hé samɛ he sie dɛ lee he nyuune,
40006018	asɛ nɛra bɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ he dɛ vɔwɛ nyoa, nemenɛ he Mɛɛ baa wola on na la gbo. Onee dɛɛ na waa haa ɛa dɛɛ sɔh la. Onee dɛ bɔ heyaa kem.
40006019	"He bɛ gel he siwi swɛɛ harɛ nɔ ta kondɔɔh ta. Harɛ bonɔ te, kwaa won kwaa chwee, kwaa won deera dɛ chɔg, ŋwɛɛra ge won dea joe dɛ ŋwɛ.
40006020	Kɛ hé gel he siwi swɛɛ Korowii doa kondɔɔh ta. Belaa kwaa aa wola toole dɛ chwea, aa wola dee, ŋwɛɛra ge aa wola won jo dea ka ŋwɛa.
40006021	Bela he kondɔɔh aa lole laanee he liire ge do.
40006022	"Sibie do kɛ kandea dɛ tɛ nɛwɛnyini. Anomanta, dɛ he sibie wer aa, he dɛ na bɔr.
40006023	Dɛ a chɔgɔ ge aa, amɔ dɛ he lɔ biro ta. Gɛɛ a do, dɛ he sie begre Korowii waa ta naa, dɛ he wobɛlbwa chaahnɔ. Kɛ dɛ he sie begre harɛ nɔ ta kwaa ta naa, he lɔ biro tenten ta.
40006024	"Nomɛlbwa aa won tomɛ dɔɔranar banɛ. Dɛ a ba gɛ naa, wɛɛ dɛɛ nyin bɛl waa dɛ gwaa bɛl. A laa ge aa, o sie ɛɛ dɛɛ lɛ bɛl bee dɛ gwaa bɛl. Haa won tomɛ Korowii dɛ berɛ won nyin harɛ nɔ ta kondɔɔh a magre.
40006025	"Anomanta n dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, he bɛ gel he sie begre he soga bini kwaa haa di ne nee haa nyɔ, ne kwaa haa tɔ wa. Haa jemɛ kɛ mkpa gwaa kondikwa, asɛ bwadabii ge gwaa yal aa?
40006026	Hé ta sie nyiŋi jumbii na. Aa kwaa du, aa komɛ, a ta bela aa komɛ kwaa do dɔe, kɛ he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la dɛ tɛa kondikwaa aa di. He ta jumbii nɔ gwaalaa?
40006027	He bini umee dɛ won kpɔ sibegra ŋwɛnɛ bɛl dɛ kpɔ tɔpebeŋkpoŋ ja o mkpa tɔpera ta nɔ?
40006028	Ɛrɛɛ he yale bɛ dɔe waa hiah heyaa nɔɔ? Hé ta sie nyiŋi gɛ kpɔg bini koŋkwaa dɛ fe aa, a fee yon do wer la dɛ na. Aa toma ɛ dɛɛ koh, aa yabi ta.
40006029	Kɛ n dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, Kooro Solomɔn gba ne o kondɔɔh bwa, o laala ta wer doe kɛ a gɛ kwaa nɔ bwa.
40006030	Kpɔga haa naa a do wer fini asɛ kere gbo dɛ a sewɔ ba fuah nɔ, dɛ Korowii gelɔ a do wer ken naa, ɛrɛɛ waa wola won tɔ heyaa yal gwaala ɔ? He yarada aa kanɛ kwara!
40006031	He bɛ gel he sie begre hɛɛ pɛɛ ŋɔ, 'Bɔkwaa yaa ba dii yɔ, bɔkwaa yaa ba nyɔe yɔ, kɛɛ leperaa yaa ba yale dɔe dɛ tɔɔ?'
40006032	Nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ baa wola Korowii tomɛ la liiree dɛɛ do a gɛ kwaa nɔ ta. Kɛ he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la jemɔ kɛ he dɛ nyin anɔ bwa.
40006033	Anomanta hé gel he sie begre Korowii Kora la ne wedɛɛga aa dɛ su o siwi la ta, dɛ bɛ an mun dɛɛ ta, asɛ ó kpɔ anɔ haa dɛ nyin nɔ bwa tɛ heya.
40006034	He bɛ gel kere waa swɛɛ he siwi. Tɔpere te bɛlbwa dɔ o waa aa lɔ o ta. Anomanta, hé gel fini waa gbo swɛɛ he siwi.
40007001	"He bɛ he dɔŋa dɛɛ pwah, asɛ Korowii ge bɛ heyaa pwah,
40007002	dɛkalkɛ gɛ haa dɛ pwah he dɔŋa la, gɛɛ Korowii gee ba heyaa pwaeh. Kon haa kpɔa magɛ kwaa tɛ he dɔŋ la tentenee baa ba kpɔe magɛ tɛ he ge.
40007003	Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ bol he dɔŋ wechɔga tama wa, haa wola he te wechɔgdamanta dawɛ nɔɔ?
40007004	A do kɛŋɔ dabor aa lɔ he siwi ta haa wola on kpɔe, dɛ ŋɔ he dɔŋ be ŋɔ ó gel he laa dapugri kpɔ o siwi ta.
40007005	Nɛn haa dɛ nyiŋi nɛra sie mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ wa! Tɔ sie laa dabor la kpɔ he siwi ta mɔɔ dɛ won na kɛrɛdɛ dɛ laa dapugri waa lɔ he dɔŋ siwi ta la kpɔ.
40007006	"Dɛ he dɛ bol Korowii Amanesoma dɛɛ bagle nɛra, asɛ baa no dɛ ɛa kɛ wesalee yaa, hé gel ba, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he kpɔ kondɛɛga tɛ nyootena aa, aa wola a waa jemɛ la, aa gelaa dɛ ba dorome. He kpɔ kondɛɛga ta prakooni ge aa, aa tigri a taa dɛ laa chɔg.
40007007	"Hɛ́ɛ soŋe Korowii, wɛɛ tɛ heyaa. Hɛ́ɛ nyin he konnyina o be, hɛɛ dɔɔ. Hé swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ lɔ gbera, wɛɛ ya heyaa.
40007008	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ soŋo la dɛ dɔ, asɛ nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin o konnyina dɛɛ le o be la, o dɛ tɛo. Gɛɛ Korowii ɛɛ ba gbera yae dɛ tɛ nomɛlbwa waa dɛ lɔ la.
40007009	"He bini umee o biee nyin paanoo asɛ o kpɔ bwe tɛo wɔ?
40007010	Kɛɛ dɛ o dɛ nyin pɛŋe aa, o ka lawɛ harɛkon ba tɛo wɔ?
40007011	Dɛ he wechɔg-ɛɛra nɔ kwara jemɔ dɛ kpɔ kondɛɛga dɛɛ tɛ he bii raa, ɛrɛ waa he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la te aa wola kondɛɛgaa kpɔ tɛ nɛra baa dɛ soŋo wɔ?
40007012	Gɛ haa dɛ nyin kɛ nɛra ɛ dɛɛ tɛ heyaa la, hé ge ɛ gɛ tenten dɛɛ tɛɛ ba. A gɛɛ dɛɛ bagle Mosis Mmara la ne Korowii keamere la webagla la bini kɛrɛdɛ.
40007013	"Ŋwɛnɛre anɛɛ lole, bɛl do feelɔɔ ken, bɛl ge pagri. Hé kpɔ ŋwɛnɛfeelɔɔ la ta, dɛkalkɛ onɔ la waa paga la dɛ la he ne seo ta. O ta kpɔe pwɛre. Anomanta nɛra baa dɛ kpɔ o ta warɔ.
40007014	Kɛ onɔ la waa do feelɔɔ la dɛ la he ne mkpa ta. O ge ta kpɔe kpegri. Anomanta nɛra tama kenii jemɔ dɛɛ kpɔ o ta.
40007015	"Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi nyosonteŋna baa ŋɔa Korowii keameree ban la kɛrɛdɛ. He na ba aa, ba pwɛre kɛŋɔ peera ken. Kɛ ba bini te, ba sie begre kwaa kɛ gbolore ken.
40007016	Ba we-ɛɛla taa hɛɛ ba chega dɛ jem ba. Kpeele aa won nɔnɛ kɛɛ, gɛɛ sɔɔh daa ge aa wola won nɔnɛ pur nɔna.
40007017	Dadɛɛge nɔna wer, dachɔge te nɔna aa were.
40007018	Dadɛɛge aa won nɔnɛ nɔnchɔga, gɛɛ dachɔge ge aa wola won nɔnɛ nɔndɛɛga.
40007019	Daa bɛlbwa waa wola nɔndɛɛga nɔnɛ la, baa teŋo ta dɛ fuuh.
40007020	Anomanta nyosonteŋna la we-ɛɛla taa hɛɛ ba chega dɛ jemɛ kɛ Korowii keamere laa ban.
40007021	"Nɛra baa dɛ yer mɛ 'N Dɔɔ, n Dɔɔ' la bwa laa dɛɛ ba Korowii Kora la bini dɔe dɛ ja, nemenɛ banɔ la baa dɛ ɛ n Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la tetoowa.
40007022	Tɔpejen maa ba la baa tel aa, nɛra ɛɛ warɔɔ dɛ baa bol n be ŋɔ, 'N Dɔɔ, he sɔn ne laa ya bol Korowii Waa la aa? He sɔn ne laa ya doŋi kwaa nɛra nɛɛ la aa, kɛɛ he sɔn ne laa ya ɛ nyokpowa damanta la bwa la aa?'
40007023	A taa mɛɛ ba ba be ŋɔe ŋɔ, 'Maa heyaa jemɛ bwa. Hé le n sie bonɔ, wechɔg-ɛɛra bane!'
40007024	"Nomɛlbwa waa no n waa nɔ dɛ ɛ gɛ aa dɛ bagle la do kɛ wejereme bɛl waa ma o dea chɔŋɛ bwe ta.
40007025	Bwaala nɛo, nenapala suugi, asɛ peujena ta. Kɛ dea la ta chole, dɛkalkɛ dɛ o chɔŋɛ bwe ta.
40007026	Nomɛlbwa waa no n waa nɔ asɛ o ta gɛ aa dɛ bagle la ɛɛ la do kɛ gɛne bɛl waa ma o dea hɛŋle harɛ ta.
40007027	Bwaala nɛo, nenapala suugi, asɛ peujen ta, asɛ dea la chole biram!"
40007028	Yeesu aa bol waa la tonɛ la, o webagla la ɛ nɛnlaa la nyokpoa,
40007029	dɛkalkɛ a ta do kɛ gɛ Tɔn Jerema la yon dɛɛ bagle la. O te dɛ bol waa kɛ nɛn waa dɔ waa bwa kpegri ken.
40008001	Yeesu aa le bwe la doa dɛ tu harɛ la, nɛnlaa teŋɛ o nɛ.
40008002	Asɛ baa bɛl weechɔga aa ɛ o bwara ba dɛ ba guŋi o sie dɛ ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, hɛɛ sɛoh waa, hɛɛ wonoo gel n bwara kwaa."
40008003	Yeesu tɛr o nɔn dɛ lego dɛ ŋɔ, "N sɛoh. N gelɔ he bwara kwaa." Bug la ta weela la den le o nɛ.
40008004	Anee Yeesu kaoh ŋɔ, "Bɛ nomɛlbwa be ŋɔ. Pa sie kaa Sɔfo la be dɛ kpɔ he te ka baglo ó pɛne, asɛ he kpɔ kwaa ka tɛo ó kpo gɛ Mosis aa chagla la, á bagle kɛ he weela la toole he nɛɛ kpa."
40008005	Yeesu la Kapeeneɔm. Waa dɛ jo bwɛɛ la ta la, Room sooja nomoa bɛl ba dɛ ba soŋo ŋɔ,
40008006	"N Dɔɔ, n bonɔɔ bwara dɛ weo. O kuugo chɔ dea, o bwara dɛ nyɛgo taeh."
40008007	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ ka chaoh."
40008008	Sooja nomoa la ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, n ta chɛɛ kɛŋɔ he ba n dem. Kɛ he chegɛ bonɔ ŋɔ wéela la le o nɛ aa, wɛɛ gbaŋroo,
40008009	dɛkalkɛ he dɔ wobɛlbwa kpegri. N ɛ nɛn maa lɔ nomonome bane lɔga, dɛ dɔ soojare do n ge lɔga. Mɛɛ wonoo ŋɔ bɛl be ŋɔ, 'Kaa,' o kaa, dɛ berɛ ŋɔ onfale be ŋɔ, 'Ba,' o ge ba. Mɛɛ wonoo ŋɔ n bonɔɔ ge be ŋɔ, 'Ɛ ken tɛ mɛ,' asɛ o ɛ."
40008010	Yeesu aa no gɛ la, o nyoa kpoo, o ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n ta nɛn waa dɔ yarada kɛ baa nɔ nae bwa. N ta o yarada dɔŋ nae Israel tena kwaraa bini.
40008011	Kasinteŋ, nɛra ɛɛ le wee leebɔr ne wee cholibɔree ba so Korowii koobwɛ, asɛ ba ne Abraham ne Aesek ne Jekɔb pɛ di kondikwaa bela.
40008012	Asɛ nɛra Korowii koobwɛɛ la fe aa chɛ ba la, bá kpɔ ba ta biro ta, belaa wii ne weweele do."
40008013	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ sooja nomoa la be ŋɔ, "Kaa dem. Gɛ haa yaradaa nɔ, a ɛ gɛ tɛɛ." Bug la taa nomoa la bonɔɔ la dɔ bokpega.
40008014	Yeesu la Pita dem dɛ ka na kɛ Pita helahaah bwara wɔrɔbɔ o chɔ kalaŋ ta.
40008015	Yeesu lawɛ o nɔn, asɛ o bwara bini chaahno, asɛ o ir dɛ daa kondikwaa tɛo.
40008016	Bɔr aa joa la, ba kpɔ nɛra kwaa aa dɛ ir ba nɛɛ ba Yeesu be, o kpɔ o nyoa wobol doŋi kwaa la le ba nɛ, asɛ dɛ chah weela tena ge.
40008017	Anɔ nɔɔ gela Korowii keame Aesaya waa waa bola bil la ɛ kasinteŋ. O bolɔ ŋɔ, "Onee laa ya gwɛgra ne ya weela kpɔ ya nɛ."
40008018	Yeesu aa na nɛnlaa la aa baro cheme la, o ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ bá le moo la baŋ.
40008019	Tɔn Jereme bɛl balɔ dɛ ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, bobɛlbwa haa dɛ la la, mɛɛ teŋɛ he nɛɛ kaa."
40008020	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Manyajegre kwaraa dɔ bɔɔne dɛɛ chɔ a bini, asɛ jumbii aa dɛ gah nyundua ge dɔ a kɔne. Kɛ n Nɛn Bie te ta bobɛlbwa dɔe ń chɔ dɛ onɛ."
40008021	Anee o habɔteŋra la bɛl ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, gel n la, asɛ n mɛɛ baa sewaa ń hugo mɔɔ dɛ ba teŋɛ he nɛ."
40008022	Anee Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Hé te teŋɛ n nɛɛ dɛ gel nɛra baa wola Korowii mkpa dɔe la ɛɛ huge ba dɔŋa."
40008023	Yeesu jo gbera bini, o ne o habɔteŋra la ɛɛ kaa.
40008024	Bug la ta dɛ peujen bɛl dɛ ta moo la sie, asɛ nehaŋma gel ba gbera la ɛɛ ba mora. A gɛ saŋ nɔ dɛ Yeesu te chɔ dom gbera la bini.
40008025	O habɔteŋra la kaa chumu dɛ ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ, lɛ yaa! Ya dɛ ba serewa!"
40008026	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Oo! Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ɔmɛ kohona gɛ nɔɔ? Haa men yarada kwaraa!" Asɛ o den ir dɛ kɔr peujen la ne nehaŋma la ŋɔ á gel gɛ. Waa bol gɛ la, dɛ bɔr denɔ hel kerkerker ken.
40008027	A ɛ nɛra la bwa nyokpoa baa pɛɛ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Nɛn besoo siwii nɔ, peu ne nehaŋma ɛɛ no o wobol nɔɔ?"
40008028	Yeesu aa le moo la baŋ dɛ ba Gadara harɛ ta la, baala banɛ bane kwa aa dɛ ir ba nɛɛ le lala hugribɔr dɛ ba chemo. Wechɔga baa dɛ ɛ nomanta, dɛ nomɛlbwa aa won bela baa lole kpɔ.
40008029	Baa chemo la, ba den kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Bɔkwaa hɛɛ nyin ya be nɔ, Korowii Bie? He dɛ ba ba do yaa weweele mɔɔ ya weweele nae saŋ la tel kɛɛ?"
40008030	Dɛ prakooni ane lɔ ba jwɛɛh bela dɛɛ di kwa.
40008031	Anee kwaa aa dɛ ir baala la nɛɛ la soŋe Yeesu ŋɔ, "Dɛ hɛɛ doŋi yaa te naa, ya dɛ soŋe, gel ya ka so prakooni nɔ nɛ."
40008032	Yeesu kɔra ŋɔ, "Hé kaa!" Asɛ a bwa den le ka so prakooni la nɛ, asɛ a ge bwa den gbomɛ biribiribiri, dɛ wili diŋgoŋ ka le moo la ta dɛ serewe.
40008033	Nɛra baa dɛ nyiŋi prakooni la ta la aa na gɛ la, ba chwao kaa bwɛɛ la ta dɛ ka taa waa aa chig bela la bwa ne waa aa pu baala la kwaa aa dɛ ir ba nɛɛ la wa.
40008034	Anomanta nɛra baa lɔ bwɛɛ la ta la bwa chwao dɛ ba cheme Yeesu, asɛ baa baa nao la, ba soŋo ŋɔ ó le ba harɛ ta.
40009001	Yeesu jo gbera ta dɛ gale moo la kaa o gbagba bwɛɛ ta.
40009002	Belaa nɛra bane kpɔ weela te bɛl waa kuuga so fɔɔ kalaŋ ta dɛɛ chemo. Yeesu aa na gɛ baa yaradao la, o ŋɔ naate waa kuuga la be ŋɔ, "Sɔɔh bwara. Aa magroo, n bie. N kpɔ he wechɔga kɛɛ."
40009003	Anee Tɔn Jerema bane lii ba nyu bini ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ dɛ ɛ Korowii nɛnhɛla!"
40009004	Yeesu aa jemɛ waa aa lɔ ba nyu bini la, o ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ lii musu waa nɔɔ?
40009005	Maa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ n kpɔ o wechɔga kɛo nɔ, ne kɛŋɔ maa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ó ir dɛ valɛ, a bini umee kpega ɔ?
40009006	Mɛɛ chagle heyaa kɛŋɔ n Nɛn Bie dɔ kpegri harɛ nɔ ta kɛ n kpɔ nɛra wechɔga kɛ ba." Asɛ o ŋɔ naate waa kuuga la be ŋɔ, "Ir kpɔ he kalaŋ dɛ kaa dem."
40009007	Baa la den ir che dɛ kaa o dem.
40009008	Nɛnlaa la aa na a gɛ waa nɔ la, ɔmee lag ba, ba kpɛɛ Korowii kɛŋɔ waa tɛ nɛwɛnyini ge ŋwɛnɛ ŋɔ ba won ɛ a gɛ waa nɔ la.
40009009	Yeesu aa le bela dɛ valɛ dɛɛ kaa la, o kaa na baa bɛl waa dɛ lɛ lampoo baa yerɔ Maatiu, dɛ o soge o toma ta dɛɛ lɛ lampoo. Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ba teŋɛ n nɛ." Asɛ Maatiu ir dɛ teŋɛ o nɛ.
40009010	Yeesu la Maatiu dem dɛ ka so tig ta. Waa dɛ di kwaa la, lampoo lɛɛra baa dɛ bɔ apoo ne wechɔg-ɛɛra pirim baa ja o ne o habɔteŋra la nɛɛ baa di.
40009011	Farisii tena bane aa na gɛ la, ba pɛɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛ waa he dɔɔ nɔ ne a gɛ nɛra nɔ pɛ dɛɛ di kwaa nɔɔ?"
40009012	Yeesu no waa baa pɛɛra la dɛ chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Weela tenaa hiah tɛɛga te, bokpega tena laa.
40009013	Hé ka kwaa hweli waa baa chwera bil heyaa ŋɔ, 'He dɛ na he dɔŋa sum aa, anee mɛɛ nyin dɛ gwaa haa kpoo kwaa dɛɛ tɛ mɛ' la. Nɛra baa dɛ lii ba te nɛndɛɛga waa laa n ba. Wechɔg-ɛɛra waa n ba ásɛ ba charɛ ba liire."
40009014	Jɔn waa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la habɔteŋra ge baa pɛɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛ waa ya ne Farisii tena nɔ te yon dɛɛ vɔwɛ nyoa, asɛ he te habɔteŋra nɔ te aa wola nyoa vɔwɛ kwaraa nɔɔ?"
40009015	Anee Yeesu sɛg ba ŋɔ, "Baa kpɔ hanfale dɛ yerɛ o daamanar ŋɔ bá ba bá lɛ ba sie aa, baa berɔɔ so lɔr aa? Baa lɔree so. Kɛ tɔpere bɛl ɛɛ bao kɛŋɔ baa lawɛ hanfale jaa laanee le ba bini. Gɛ saŋ la te, baa vɔwɛ nyoa.
40009016	"Baa yafale yakwara kpɔe dɛɛ tɔ yabene waa hɛah bɔɔ. A ba gɛ naa, yafale yakwara la ɛɛ kɛɛroo le yabene la ta, asɛ bɔɔ la berɛ do kan kohona.
40009017	Gɛɛ baa wola senfala kpɔe dɛɛ do loŋbena aa kɔɔhna bini dɛɛ tɔ a nyoa. Gɛ laa, dɛ sen la baa peraa, aa do kpegrii dɛ pere loŋa la a chɔg, asɛ sen la fuge. Loŋfale binii baa do senfala ásɛ a bwa won do wer."
40009018	Yeesu taa dɛ bol waa nɔ la, cheremi dea nomoa bɛl baa guŋi o sie dɛ ŋɔ, "N bie sewɔ taraken. Kɛ ba kpɔ nɔn dawɛ o nɛ ásɛ o berɛ ir."
40009019	Anee Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la bwa ir teŋɛ o nɛ.
40009020	Belaa haah bɛl chal aa fugo bene fi dɛ anɛ ba kpɔ Yeesu habɔɔ dɛ ka lege o batakaare nyoa.
40009021	Dɛ o tɔ sie lii o nyu bini kɛŋɔ dɛ o lege Yeesu batakaare nyoa gbo kwaraa naa, wɛɛ gbaŋroo.
40009022	Yeesu ke nyiŋi dɛ na haah la, asɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "Tolo, sɔɔh bwara. He yarada haa yarada mɛ la gelɔ he gbaŋre." Gɛ waa nɔ taa haah la gbaŋre.
40009023	Belaa Yeesu jo cheremi dea nomoa la dem. Waa na gɛ hɛhɛla la ne nɛra baa dɛ ɛ lwe la aa dɛ do gbɔga la,
40009024	o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé bwa le dem bonɔ! Bie la ta sewɛ, domii o chɔ." Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, ba mamɔ.
40009025	Baa doŋi nɛra la bwa le dem bela tonɛ la, Yeesu jo dea bela tolo la aa chɔa la dɛ lawɛ o nɔn, asɛ tolo la ir dɛ dɔ bokpega.
40009026	Gɛ waa nɔ perɛ baah bela bwɛɛre la kɛrɛdɛ bwa ta.
40009027	Yeesu aa le bela dɛɛ kaa la, nyoŋa banɛ bane no o gbɔga dɛ ir teŋɛ o nɛɛ dɛɛ yerɔ dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Devid Naa, na ya sum!"
40009028	Yeesu aa kaa jo dem la, nyoŋa la joɔ puu, anee o pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "He dɛ yarada mɛ kɛŋɔ mɛɛ wonoo chah heya aa?" Anee ba ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh, ya Dɔɔ."
40009029	Anee Yeesu kpɔ nɔn lege ba sie dɛ ŋɔ, "Gɛ haa dɛ yarada la, a ɛ gɛ tɛ heya."
40009030	Asɛ ba bwa berɛ dɛɛ na. Anee Yeesu kah ba sibegra ne ŋɔ, "He bɛ waa nɔ taa bagle nomɛlbwa."
40009031	Kɛ ba garɔ le dɛ ka gel waa la perɛ baah bela bwɛɛre la bwa ta.
40009032	Nɛra la aa le dem bela dɛɛ kaa la, nɛra bane ge berɔ kpɔ baa bɛl kwaa aa ir o nɛɛ o bol waa kahonɛ ba Yeesu be.
40009033	Yeesu aa doŋi kwaa la le o nɛɛ la, baa la den dɛɛ bol wa, asɛ nomɛlbwa waa lɔ bela la nyoa kpo. Ba ŋɔ, "Ya ta waa nɔ dɔŋa nae Israel harɛ nɔ ta bwa!"
40009034	Anee Farisii tena la te ŋɔ, "Kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ bwa nomoaa tɛo kpegri o won kwaa doŋa nɛra nɛɛ la."
40009035	Yeesu gaage bwɛjena ne anjegre bwa ta dɛ bol Korowii Kora Amanesoma bag ba ba cheremi deene, dɛ chah nɛra baa we weela te bɛlbwa soosiwi.
40009036	Waa na nɛnlaa la gɛ la, ba waa do o sum, dɛkalkɛ ba ɛ nɛra ba bwara aa dɛ nyɛg baa wola lɛɛ dɔe kɛ peera aa wola tegre dɔe ken.
40009037	Anee o kpɔ nɛra la magɛ konduula dɛ ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "Koo kondikwaa la kan, kɛ tom-ɛɛra la lɔ tamaa ken dɛɛ ba a koma.
40009038	Anomanta hé soŋe Koo Te ásɛ o kpɔ tom-ɛɛla bane ba ja bá ka ɛ a toma."
40010001	Yeesu yerɛ o habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la cheme dɛ tɛɛ ba kpegri báa kpɔ doŋi kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛ, asɛ dɛ won chah weela bɛlbwa ge.
40010002	Yeesu toroma fi dɛ banɛ la waa kpɔ ba laanee nɔ: Seemɔn waa pa o sɔn Pita la ne o nime Andriu, Jems ne o nime Jɔn baa ɛ Sebedii bii la,
40010003	Felep ne Batolomeo, Tɔmas ne Maatiu o faa dɛ lɛ lampoo la, Jems waa ɛ Alfeɔs bie la ne Tadeɔs,
40010004	Seemɔn Keenan te la ne Judas Eskareɔt waa le Yeesu tɛ ba kpoo la.
40010005	Yeesu aa dɛ tomɛ a gɛ nɛra fi dɛ banɛ nɔ la, o do ba ŋɔ, "He bɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la harɛ ta la, he bɛ Samaria bwɛɛ bɛlbwa ta la.
40010006	Hé kaa Israel tena baa do kɛŋɔ peera aa nyogra la be,
40010007	dɛ ka bol ba be ŋɔ Korowii Kora puu ba tonɛ.
40010008	Hé chah weela tena, dɛ chum nɛra baa serewa. Hé chah weela bwa aa dɛ chɔg nɛn bwadabi, dɛ doŋi kwaa aa won dɛɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ la le ba nɛ. N kpɔ kpegri nɔ kɛ heyaa pɛɛpɛɛ. Hé ge kpɔ chaah ba pɛɛpɛɛ.
40010009	He bɛ suuga te bɛlbwa kpɔ.
40010010	Ŋwɛnɛ haa dɛ ba kaala la, he bɛ pur kpɔ, dɛ bɛ batakaani bele anɛ kpɔ, dɛ bɛ naŋgawa bele anɛ ne daŋgbala kpɔ, dɛkalkɛ tom-ɛɛ kembɔr chɛo.
40010011	"Bwɛɛ bɛlbwa haa tel o ta la, hé nyiŋi nɛndɛɛge asɛ dɛ so o be dɛ ka tel gɛ saŋ haa le bela.
40010012	He kaa jo dem bɛlbwa ta naa, hé ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, 'Kórowii tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.'
40010013	Dɛ dem bela tena lɛ heyaa silɛɛ ne naa, baa dɔ bosɔɔhna dem belaa. Kɛ dɛ ba ta heyaa lɛɛ silɛɛ ne naa, baa bosɔɔhna dɔe ba.
40010014	Dɛ dem bɛl kɛɛ bwɛɛ bɛl tena ŋɔ baa heyaa lɛ, baa he waa la gee no aa, hé jwii he nakpale teera ta bela á bagle kɛŋɔ he kpɔ Korowii Waa ba ba be ba vɛah, asɛ dɛ le bela.
40010015	Kasinteŋ, awola Korowii aa ba pa nomɛlbwa bole la, waa Sodom ne Gomoora tena aa na la gba ɛɛ bɔ a gɛ bwɛɛ la tena waa.
40010016	"Hɛ́ɛ no! N dɛ tomɛ heyaa he ka koo he dɔma baah ta. Hé gel he sie pili hɛɛ do dɛɛgɔ kɛ harɛkwa, asɛ dɛ do pwɛre dɛ man kɛ brɔnomare.
40010017	Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ, dɛkalkɛ baa lawɛ heyaa ka cheme nomonome sie, dɛ lɔɔ heyaa chweremi ne cheremi deene ta.
40010018	Baa koh n waa yerɛ heyaa cheme Abane nomonome ne kooranar sie dɛ ŋɔ hé ba bol Amanesoma la bagle ba ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la.
40010019	Dɛ ba baa lawɛ heyaa dɛ la he ne ba sie naa, he bɛ gel waa haa dɛ ba bola ne gɛ haa bol dɛ lɛ he te hiah heya. A baa tel kɛŋɔ he bol wa aa, hɛɛ jemɛ waa haa dɛ ba bolaa.
40010020	Waa haa dɛ ba bola la aa he bee le. Korowii Domadɛɛge laanee dɛɛ ba he nɛɛ chega dɛ bol wa.
40010021	"Nɛra ɛɛ le ba gbagba lolanaree tɛ bá kpoo ba, baala le ba bii tɛ bá kpoo ba, asɛ bechale ge ir che ba nyare ne ba mɛɛnanar nɛ, dɛ gel baa kpoo ba.
40010022	Nɛra bwa ɛɛ koh n waa hah heya. Kɛ naate waa dɛ ba wona dɛ lawɛ bambile ka tonɛ la, wɛɛ dɔ o nyuu.
40010023	Dɛ he la bwɛɛ bɛl ta baa ɛ heyaa hɔhɔrɔwa aa, hé chwa kaa bwɛfale ta. Kasinteŋ, haa won la Israel bwɛɛre nɔ bwa ta ka chig mɔɔ n Nɛn Bie ba.
40010024	"Nɛn waa dɛ hweli toma ta o dɔɔ gwaalɛ, bonɔɔ ge ta o nomoa gwaalɛ.
40010025	Dɛ ba dɛ yerɛ dea nomoa Bɛlsebul waa ɛ sɔnchɔge aa, dea bii la te ta pɔeh ya?
40010026	"Anomanta he bɛ nɛra dɛɛ ɔmɛ. Wobɛlbwa baa tɔ a ta la ɛɛ le baŋee, asɛ waa aa sɔah bwa ge le nɛra jemɛ.
40010027	Waa maa dɛ bol he be biro ta la, hé bola webaŋa, asɛ waa maa sɔah bol he be la, hé bola nɛnlaa baah.
40010028	He bɛ nɛra baa dɛ ba wona kpo heya, baa wola won kpo he lileo la ɔmɛ, kɛ hɛ́ɛ ɔmɛ Korowii waa dɛ ba wona chɔg bwadabii ne lileo la bwa Bɔnsam nii ta la.
40010029	He nao kɛ pɛtoprɛ ta yog dɔe, kɛ beŋkpoŋ gba aa harɛɛ le dɛ he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua aa o waa jemɛ.
40010030	He nyumpona kwara, o jemɛ a nyoa.
40010031	Anomanta he bɛ ɔmɛ. He ta pɛtoprɛre gwaalɛ wobɛlbwa ta naa?
40010032	"Nomɛlbwa waa won che nɛra baah ta dɛ sɛh ŋɔ o ja n nɛɛ la, gɛɛ n gee ba naate sɔn yera n Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la sie kɛ o ja n nɛ.
40010033	Nomɛlbwa ge waa vɛɛh mɛ nɛra baah ta dɛ ŋɔ o ta n nɛɛ jae la, gɛɛ n gee ba o vɛɛh n Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la sie dɛ ŋɔ n ne o laa.
40010034	"He bɛ dɛɛ lii kɛ n ba nyopɛo ne harɛ nɔ ta. Nyopɛo ne laa n ba, yoi nee n ba.
40010035	N balɔ ásɛ bibaala ne ba mɛɛnanar koh n waa dɔm, bihaahna ne ba nyare dɔm, asɛ haahna ne ba helahaahna ge dɔm.
40010036	Nɛn lolee dɛɛ ba o dɔm tenten ɛɛ.
40010037	"He naate haa dɛ nyin he nya ne he mɛɛ waa gwaa mɛ la ta chɛɛ kɛŋɔ he teŋɛ n nɛ, asɛ he naate ge haa dɛ nyin he bihaah ne he bibaa waa gwaa mɛ la ta chɛɛ kɛŋɔ he teŋɛ n nɛ.
40010038	He naate haa wola he te kpɔe tɛ dɛ sɛh wahala nae ne seo bwa, dɛ baa teŋɛ n nɛ kɛŋɔ nɛn waa kpɔ dagagre che bá ka kpaaro pɛl o ta la ta chɛɛ kɛŋɔ he teŋɛ n nɛ.
40010039	Nomɛlbwa o sie aa swɛɛ harɛ nɔ ta silɛɛ kwaa ta la, wɛɛ paŋɛ o nyuu, asɛ nomɛlbwa ge o sie aa wola harɛ nɔ ta silɛɛ kwaa ta lɛ la, wɛɛ dɔ o nyuu.
40010040	"Nomɛlbwa waa nyiŋi he nɛɛ la, menee o nyiŋi la. Asɛ nomɛlbwa waa nyiŋi n nɛɛ la, naate waa tom mɛ laanee o nyiŋi la.
40010041	Nomɛlbwa waa nyiŋi Korowii keame nɛɛ o keamere ɛɛ nomanta la, wɛɛ dɔ Korowii keame kembɔree. Asɛ nomɛlbwa ge waa koh nɛndɛɛge dɛgre waa dɛ nyiŋi o nɛɛ la, wɛɛ dɔ nɛndɛɛge kembɔree.
40010042	Kasinteŋ, dɛ nomɛlbwa koh kɛ he bini bechala bɛlbwa dɛ teŋɛ n nɛɛ waa dɛ tɛo nesɔna o nyɔ aa, waa o kembɔr paŋa ba bwa."
40011001	Yeesu aa bol waa nɔ bagle o habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la tonɛ la, o le bela dɛ kaa bwɛɛre aa bɛne bela la ta dɛ kaa bol Korowii Waa dɛɛ bag ba.
40011002	Dɛ ba do Jɔn waa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la dea, o chɔ bela dɛ no waa Yeesu Kristo aa dɛ ɛ la, asɛ o tomɛ o habɔteŋra bane o be
40011003	ŋɔ bá ka pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Henee nɛn Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ geloo o ba la aa, kɛɛ he laa o, asɛ yáa nyiŋi naate habɔɔ?"
40011004	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Hé berɛ kaa dɛ ka ŋɔ Jɔn be waa haa baa na dɛ no la.
40011005	Hé ŋɔ o be ŋɔ nyoŋa dɛ na bɔr, boobie ɛɛ valɛ, asɛ nɛra weechɔga aa chɔg ba bwadabii la ge bwara kwaa. Hé ŋɔ o be ŋɔ amumure dɛ no wa, lala ir seo ta, asɛ nyaara ge dɔ Amanesoma la dɛɛ no.
40011006	He naate haa wola men tɔŋle la, he na som."
40011007	Jɔn habɔteŋra la aa dɛ kaa la, Yeesu bol Jɔn waa dɛɛ bagle nɛnlaa la ŋɔ, "Haa la Jɔn be pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo la ta la, dɛ bɔkwaa he fe ɛɛ nyin kɛ he na nɔ? Kpɔg bɛl peu aa dɛ ta wɛɛ yiigi la kɛɛ?
40011008	Dɛ gɛ laa ge aa, dɛ bɔkwa tenee he ka nyiŋi ɔ? Nɛn waa do laaladɛɛgaa he ka nyiŋi kɛɛ? Nɛra baa dɛ do laaladɛɛga la, koodemii ba do.
40011009	Hé bag mɛ, bɔkwa tenee he la bela ka nyiŋi ɔ? Korowii keamee kɛɛ? Kasinteŋ, Korowii keamee he na la, kɛ o gwaa Korowii keame kwara,
40011010	dɛkalkɛ Jɔn nɔ waa ba chwerɛ ŋɔ, 'Korowii ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ tomɛ n toromee ó tɔ he sie dɛ kwaa ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ" ' la.
40011011	Kasinteŋ, ba lolɛ nɛnjena harɛ nɔ ta, kɛ Jɔn waa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee nɔ gwaa ba bwa. Kɛ nomɛlbwa waa ɛ bechala Korowii Kora la ta te berɔ gwaa Jɔn.
40011012	Dɛ le saŋ la Jɔn aa lea dɛɛ bol Korowii Kora nɔ waa la, nɛra sie begrɔ ba kpɔ sibegra dɛɛ nyin dɛ ja o Kora la ta.
40011013	Korowii keamere la bwa ne Mosis tɔ sie bol Korowii Kora la waa dɛ ba tel gɛ saŋ Jɔn aa bala.
40011014	Kɛ dɛ hɛɛ yarada n waa maa dɛ bol nɔɔ te naa, Elaeja la baa bol o waa ŋɔ wɛɛ bao la, onee a gɛ Jɔn nɔ.
40011015	Nomɛlbwa waa no la, ó no.
40011016	"Bɔkwa konee mɛɛ ba fini nɔ nɛra kpɔe dɛ magɔɔ? Ba do kɛŋɔ bechale bane aa dɛ hɛlɛ fɔgbaah, asɛ bane ŋɔ ba bala be ŋɔ,
40011017	'Ɛrɛɛ ya go silɛɛ yela, he sie ta lɛɛ hé sa, ya berɛ ta wiile ge, he loo ta kui hé wi nɔɔ?'
40011018	Jɔn aa bala la, dɛ o dɛ vɔwɛ nyoa, waa sen ge nyɔ, asɛ nomɛlbwa ŋɔ kwaa dɛ ir o nɛ.
40011019	Asɛ n Nɛn Bie la te aa bala la, n di kwa, dɛ nyɔ sen ge, asɛ nomɛlbwa berɛ ŋɔ, 'Hé na baa nɔ! Kondikondidii ne sennyɔɔree on. Lampoo lɛɛra baa dɛ bɔ nɛra apoo ne wechɔg-ɛɛraa ɛ o daamanar.' " Waa bol gɛ tonɛ la, anee o ŋɔ, "Wejereme bɛlbwa we-ɛɛla taa a che baa jemɛ kɛ o ɛ wejereme."
40011020	Bwɛɛre Yeesu aa ɛ nyokpowaa a ta warɛ la, a nɛra ta ba wechɔga ta leɛ. Anomanta o ŋɔ,
40011021	"Korasen tena, hé bwɛɛlɛ. Hɛɛ na waa taeh! Bɛtsaeda tena, hé ge bwɛɛlɛ. He gee na waa taeh! Nyokpowaa nɔ maa ɛa he bini nɔ, dɛ Taaya ne Sidonee n fee ɛa nɔ naa, ba fe charɛ ba liire le ba wechɔga ta bigri, dɛ tɔ lwe yale dɛ kpɔ tɔɔ fɔgɛ ba bwara bwa.
40011022	Kasinteŋ, awola Korowii aa ba dɛ ba bol nɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole la, wɛɛ na Taaya ne Sidon tena sumii gwaa heya.
40011023	Asɛ he Kapeeneɔm tena ge, he fe dɛ nyin kɛ he gbagba ir kaa Korowii doa kɛɛ? Baa vigri heyaa Bɔnsam nii taa. Nyokpowaa nɔ maa ɛa he bini nɔ, dɛ ba fe ɛa Sodom aa, Sodom fe ta lole ba le fini, Korowii fe ta on chɔgɛ.
40011024	Kasinteŋ, hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ awola Korowii aa ba bol nɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole la, wɛɛ na Sodom tena sumii gwaa heyaa."
40011025	Belaa Yeesu kpɛɛ Korowii ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, nyundua ne harɛ bwa Dɔɔ! N dɛ jaame kɛ haa kpɔ he waa nɔ sɔh sipila tena ne wejerema, dɛ kpɔ bagle nɛra baa wola wobɛlbwa jemɛ nɔ.
40011026	Jam, n Mɛɛ. Gɛɛ wera he be."
40011027	Bela Yeesu berɛ ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ kpɔ wobɛlbwa do n nɔn ta. Nomɛlbwa aa men Korowii Bie jemɛ, nemenɛ n Mɛɛ la gbo. Gɛɛ nomɛlbwa ge aa wola n Mɛɛ la jemɛ, nemenɛ n ne nɛra maa dɛ nyin kɛ n gel ba jemɔ la.
40011028	"He banɔ la he soga bini waa aa kana gwaa he nɛɛ la bwa, hé kpɔa ba n be ásɛ n lɛ heyaa he onɛ.
40011029	Gɛ baa kpɔ daa dawɛ nae anɛ nɛ a pɛ dɛɛ ɛ toma la, hé gel n ne heyaa ɛ gɛ, asɛ he hweli le n be, dɛkalkɛ n pwɛre, maa mbarafo ge ɛ. He ɛ gɛ naa, haa koeh ba.
40011030	N waa do toŋgboŋ ken, bone maa kpɔ dawɛ he nɛɛ la ge fɛgre."
40012001	Ona Tɔpere bɛl wee, Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra kaa kpɔ mea koo bɛl ta, dɛ lɔr dɛ kpo o habɔteŋra la, asɛ ba ɛ mea la ane dɛɛ chwe.
40012002	Farisii tena la aa na gɛ la, ba ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Nyiŋi na! He habɔteŋra la dɛ ɛ toma dɛɛ to ya Ona Tɔpere mmara la."
40012003	Anee Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "He ta kure na gɛ ya naa Devid aa ɛa gɛ saŋ lɔr aa dɛ kpo o ne o nɛra la kɛɛ?
40012004	O jo Korowii Dea dɛ kpɔ paanoo aa ɛ Korowii kwa, o ne o nɛra di. Mmara fe aa ŋwɛnɛ tɛ kɛ ba fee di gɛ paanoo la, Sɔfore gboo fe dɔ ŋwɛnɛ kɛ ba dia.
40012005	Kɛɛ he ta kure na gɛ Mosis Mmara la aa bagla kɛ Sɔfore baa ɛ toma Korowii Dea Ona Tɔpere la ta la dɛ to Ona Tɔpere mmara la, kɛ ba ge aa bolchɔge di aa?
40012006	Korowii Dea toma ɛɛ waa baa wola bolchɔge di la, kɛ kasinteŋ, nomɛl lɔ bonɔ dɛ gwaa Korowii Dea.
40012007	Korowii Tɔn dɛ bagle kɛ, 'He dɛ na he dɔŋa sum aa, anee mɛɛ nyin gwaa kɛ haa kpoo kwaa dɛɛ tɛ mɛ.' Dɛ he fe jemɛ waa nɔ mun aa, he fe aa nɛra nɛɛ nya ŋɔ ba di bolchɔge,
40012008	dɛkalkɛ n Nɛn Bie laanee dɔ Ona Tɔpere kpegri."
40012009	Yeesu le bela dɛ kaa cheremi dea bɛl ta,
40012010	dɛ baa bɛl o nɔn aa sewa lɔ bela. Dɛ nɛra bane lɔ bela dɛɛ nyin dɛ kpɔ waa dawɛ Yeesu nɛ. Anomanta ba pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Ya mmara la dɛ tɛ yaa ŋwɛnɛ kɛ ya won chah weela Ona Tɔpere aa?"
40012011	Anee Yeesu chaŋe ŋɔ, "Amɔ dɛ he bini bɛl pee le bɔluŋ bɛl bini Ona Tɔpere aa, ɛrɛɛ wɛɛ ba ɛɛ yɔ? Waa pee laanee ka lawɛ le bɔɔ la bini naa?
40012012	Nɛn ta pee gwaalaa? Anomanta ya mmara dɛ tɛ yaa ŋwɛnɛ ŋɔ ya ɛ nɛn wedɛɛga Ona Tɔpere."
40012013	Anee o ŋɔ baa la o nɔn aa sewa la be ŋɔ, "Tɛr he nɔn." Asɛ baa la tɛr o nɔnsewe la, dɛ o berɔ do kpegri gɛ o faa doa wubwa la, dɛ do kɛ o nɔn la waa wola sewɛ la.
40012014	Belaa Farisii tena la le bela dɛɛ vɔrɔwe kɛ bá kpo Yeesu.
40012015	Yeesu aa naa kɛ nɛra la dɛ nyinu dɛ́ kpo la, o le bela kaa bofale, dɛ nɛnlaa tenten teŋɛ o nɛ, asɛ o chah ba bini banɔ la ba bwara aa dɛ wee ba la bwa,
40012016	dɛ ŋɔ ba bɛ o waa taa bagle nomɛlbwa.
40012017	Gɛ Yeesu aa ɛa nɔɔ gela ba jemɛ kɛ waa Korowii keame Aesaya faa bola la ɛ kasinteŋ.
40012018	O bolɔ ŋɔ, "N bonɔɔ maa leo laanee la. O waa mɛɛ nyin, asɛ n sie gee lɛ o nɛɛ ga. Mɛɛ geloo n Doma ba so o nɛ, ásɛ o bagle nɛra baa lɔ harɛ ta bwa ge gɛ n kasinteŋ ŋwɛnɛre aa doa.
40012019	Waa waa tɔŋle dɛɛ nyɛg, waa takpeg gee kpɔ bol waa fɔgbaahna.
40012020	Nɛn do kɛŋɔ daa waa gwɛɛna dɛɛ ba kui aa, waa gel o ku. Dɛ o do kɛŋɔ kandea waa dɛ lawɛ kɛlll la ge, waa gel o dime. Wɛɛ lawɛ bambile nɛra nɛɛ dɛ yo ka tel gɛ saŋ nɛra bwa aa ba jemɛ Korowii kasinteŋ ŋwɛnɛre la,
40012021	ásɛ nɛra baa lɔ harɛ ta bwa kpɔ ba hwɛga dawɛ o nɛ."
40012022	Asɛ nɛra bane kpɔ baa bɛl kwaa aa dɛ ir o nɛɛ dɛ gel o nyoŋe waa wola won waa ge bol ba Yeesu be, asɛ o chah baa la dɛ gel wɛɛ na dɛ won waa ge bola.
40012023	Waa Yeesu aa ɛa la gelɔ nɛnlaa la bwa nyoa kpo, baa pɛɛ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Amɔ Devid Naa nɔɔ naa?"
40012024	Farisii tena la aa no waa nɛra la aa dɛ bɔɔ dɔŋa la, ba chaŋe ŋɔ, "Kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ bwa nomoa Bɛlsebulee tɛo kpegri o won kwaa doŋa nɛra nɛɛ la."
40012025	Yeesu aa jemɛ waa baa dɛ bol la, anee o ŋɔ, "Dɛ harɛ bɛl ta tena bini pere anɛ ba gbogbo ɛɛ yo aa, harɛ la dɛ pagre. Asɛ bwɛɛ bɛlbwa ge o bini aa pere anɛ bampera ne bampera ɛɛ yo la, bwɛɛ la dɛ pagre. Gɛɛ dɛ waane ba lola bɛl bini asɛ ba pere anɛ dɛ gbo ɛɛ yo aa, lola la aa won ɛ lola.
40012026	Anomanta dɛ Bɔnsam kora bini pegro baa yo aa, amɔ te kora la aa won ɛ kora.
40012027	Dɛ he ŋɔ Bɛlsebulee tɛ mɛ kpegri n won kwaa doŋa nɛra nɛɛ aa, a wer. Aah, dɛ he ge, umee tɛ he habɔteŋra nɔ kpegri ba won a doŋa ɔ? He gbagba habɔteŋra la we-ɛɛlaa dɛɛ bagle kɛŋɔ he kono kwara!
40012028	Korowii Doma kpegri nee mɛɛ doŋi kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ la. Anomanta hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii Kora dii la telo tonɛ.
40012029	"Nomɛlbwa aa won jo bokpega te dea dɛ ŋwɛ o laala bwa, nemenɛ o tɔ sie won vɔrɔwo mɔɔ dɛ won jo o dea ka pa o laala.
40012030	"Nomɛlbwa waa wola n nɛɛ jae la aa n waa nyin. Nomɛlbwa waa wola men chae dɛɛ boa n nɛra nyoa dɛɛ pɛ la lɔ ba dɛɛ pegre.
40012031	Anomanta n dɛ ŋɔ he be kɛ Korowii ɛɛ wonoo kpɔ wechɔga bɛlbwa ne wobochɔga bɛlbwa kɛ nɛn. Kɛ nomɛlbwa waa bol Korowii Domadɛɛge la te nɛnhɛlwobol la, waa kpɔ kɛo bwa.
40012032	Nomɛlbwa waa bol waa yagɛ men Nɛn Bie la, wɛɛ wonoo kpɔ kɛo. Kɛ nomɛlbwa waa bol wobochɔga yagɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la te, fini ne kere, Korowii aa kpɔ kɛo bwa.
40012033	"Dɛ daa nɔn wer aa, dɛ daa la gbabirii wera. Kɛ dɛ he ŋɔ daa nɔn aa weraa, dɛ daa la gbabir gee wola were. Daa nɔn taa ba che dɛ jemɛ o dasoo.
40012034	Nɛnchɔga kɛ harɛkwa! Wechɔga gbo aa su he bini nɔ, wobodɛɛga ɛɛ wonoo le he nyoa ta naa? Waa aa lɔ nɛn bambile ta laanee o nyoa ɛɛ bol.
40012035	Nɛndɛɛge wedɛɛga ɛɛ taa a che baa jemɛ wedɛɛga aa lɔ o bambile bini. Gɛɛ ba che nɛnchɔge ge wechɔga ɛɛ ta dɛɛ jemɛ wechɔga aa lɔ o bambile bini.
40012036	N dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, wesale bɛlbwa nomɛlbwa aa bola la, wɛɛ bagle a munii awola Korowii aa ba dɛ ba bol nɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole la.
40012037	He gbagba wobol taa Korowii ɛɛ ba chega pa heyaa bole. He wobol ɛ wobodɛɛga aa, wɛɛ pae boldɛɛgee, dɛ he wobol ɛ wobochɔga aa, wɛɛ pae bolchɔgee."
40012038	Tɔn Jerema la bane ne Farisii tena bane ba Yeesu be dɛ ba ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ya dɛ nyin kɛ he ɛ nyokpowaane yá na dɛ jemɛ kɛ kpelaa Korowii bee he le."
40012039	Anee Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ fini nɛra ɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra gbo baa wola Korowii ɔmɛ gɛ nɔɔ? Maa wobɛlbwaa ɛ hé na, nemenɛ waa aa pu Korowii keame Jona la dɔŋ gboo dɛɛ ba n ge pui ásɛ he che a ta jemɛ n nɛnsoo.
40012040	Gɛ Jona aa di tɔpebire atoro pɛŋejen la tea bini la, gɛɛ men Nɛn Bie la gee ba tɔpebire atoro dii lalbɔɔ bini.
40012041	Awola nɛra bwa aa ir seo ta dɛ ba che Korowii sie asɛ o bol ba waa dɛ pa bole la, Niniwe tena ɛɛ bol waa bɔ fini nɔ tena, dɛkalkɛ ba te no Korowii waa Jona aa bola la mun dɛ charɛ ba liire le ba wechɔga ta. Kɛ kasinteŋ, naate waa gwaa Jona lɔ bonɔ, asɛ he ŋɔ haa o bee no.
40012042	Seba kooro waa ɛ haah la gba ɛɛ bol waa bɔ fini nɔ tena, dɛkalkɛ o valɔ le o harɛ ta bojaŋ le dɛ́ ba no Kooro Solomɔn wejemwa. Kɛ kasinteŋ, naate waa gwaa Kooro Solomɔn lɔ bonɔ, asɛ he ŋɔ haa o bee no.
40012043	"Fini nɔ nɛra do kɛŋɔ nɛn Bɔnsam aa gela o torome bɛl do o nɛɛ dɛ chɔg o da. A habɔɔ la naate charɛ o liire, asɛ Bɔnsam torome la le o nɛɛ dɛ kaa ka nyin bofale dɛ́ so. O gaagaa, o ta wone dɔ bɔr dɛ́ so onɛ,
40012044	dɛ berɛ ŋɔ, 'Mɛɛ kaa n bug ta bela maa lea ba laanee,'
40012045	dɛ berɛ ka na kɛ baa la liire chaahnɔ kɛŋɔ dea baa chaaro dɛ kwaaro kɛrɛdɛ, kɛ dɛ gel o chɔ pɛɛ. Gɛɛ o won la ka kpɔ o bala anuanɛ aa gwaalo kwara, a bwa won ba so naate la nɛ, dɛ chɔg o da gwaa gɛ o faa doa wubwa la. Gɛɛ aa ba doe fini nɔ nɛra baa ɛ nɛnchɔga nɔ nɛ."
40012046	Yeesu nyoa taa lɔ waa ta o bol dɛɛ bagle nɛra la la, o nya ne o nimanar ba bela dɛ ba che buse dɛɛ nyinu dɛ́ bol waa o be.
40012047	Anomanta nɛra la bɛl ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nyiŋi na, he nya ne he nimanar chegɛ buse dɛɛ nyin he bɔr dɛ́ bol waa he be."
40012048	Yeesu pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Umee n nyaɔ? Umewaa n nimanar ɔ?"
40012049	Asɛ o tɛr o nɔn pa o habɔteŋra la nɛɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "Hé na n nya ne n nimanar.
40012050	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ waa n Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua aa dɛ nyin kɛ he ɛ laanee n nime ne n nimambie ne n nya."
40013001	Awola tenten Yeesu le dem bela dɛ ka so moo nyoa dɛɛ bagle nɛra wa.
40013002	Nɛnlaa la aa wara nomanta o jo gbera ta ka so, asɛ nɛnlaa la bwa che baŋ.
40013003	Asɛ o kpɔ sɛgla bol waa chag ba ŋɔ, "Baa bɛlee ira dɛ kaa merɛ mea o koo ta.
40013004	Waa dɛ merɛ mea la, ane lee ŋwɛnɛ nyoa, asɛ jumbii ba tɔɔ di.
40013005	Ane lee bwetala ta bela teera aa wola toole kohona. Teera la aa dawɛ bwetala la ta la aa wola warɛ la nomanta, a ta bigre bɛlbwa mea la le.
40013006	Kɛ a lune ta wone kaa bini. Anomanta wee aa lɔa la, a jwalɔ dɛ sewɛ.
40013007	Mea la ane ge lee sɔɔhne baah, asɛ sɔɔhne la kpeg dɛ lawa, a ta wone ɛ.
40013008	Kɛ anɔ la aa lee harɛdɛɛge ta la te leo, asɛ dɛ ma kohona. Ane ma lafare, ane ma fifraanumɛl, asɛ ane ge ma fifraatoro."
40013009	Yeesu aa bol a gɛ waa nɔ tonɛ la, anee o ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin dɛ no la, ó no."
40013010	Asɛ o habɔteŋra la la o be ka pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛ waa he yon kpɔ sɛgla dɛɛ bol waa nɛra nɔ be nɔɔ?"
40013011	Anee Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "He te dɔ Korowii Kora ne a wejema aa fa sɔah bwa dɛ́ jemɛ. Kɛ ba te ta dɔe.
40013012	Anomanta naate waa dɔa la, baa jao anee ó dɔ kohona. Kɛ naate waa wola komɛlbwa dɔe la, tama kwaraa waa dɔa la ɛɛ le o nɔn taa.
40013013	Waa aa bala maa kpɔ sɛgla dɛɛ bol waa ba be laanee nɔ: 'Ba dɔ sibie, kɛ baa na, dɛ dɔ deŋna, kɛ baa waa no, baa waa mun jemɛ.'
40013014	Ba waa Korowii keame Aesaya faa bol la. O bolɔ ŋɔ, 'Nɛra nɔ ɛɛ noo kohona, kɛ baa a mun jema ba. Baa nyiŋuu kohona, kɛ baa a jema ba,
40013015	dɛkalkɛ ba bambile kpegri, ba kpɔ nɔɔra tɔɔge deŋna, dɛ tɔɔge ba sibie ge. A waa laa aa, ba sie fe ɛɛ nao, asɛ ba deŋna no, asɛ ba jemɛ a mun, dɛ berɛ ba bambile dɛɛ teŋɛ n nɛɛ asɛ n lɛɛ ba.'
40013016	Kɛ he te, he nyu som taeh. He sibie dɛ na, he deŋna gee no wa.
40013017	Kasinteŋ, Korowii keamere kɛrɛdɛ ne Korowii nɛra kɛrɛdɛ fe dɛ nyin kɛ ba na anɔ haa dɛ na nɔ, ba ta dɔe na, dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin dɛ no anɔ haa dɛ no nɔ, ba ta dɔe no.
40013018	"Hé cheg deŋna dɛ no baa waa merɛ mea la waa la mun.
40013019	Nɛra baa dɛ no Korowii Kora nɔ waa baa wola a mun jemɛ laanee do kɛ mea la aa lee ŋwɛnɛ nyoa la. Bɔnsam balaa, dɛ o baa laa waa baa noa la bwa kpɔ le ba nyu bini.
40013020	Mea aa lee bwetala ta la ge chegɔ tɛ nɛra baa no waa nɔ, dɛ ba sie lɛo la.
40013021	Kɛ waa la aa wola ban jooge la gelɔ aa won ba nyu bini ka. A chegɛ Korowii waa ta waane puu ba, asɛ nɛra ge ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa aa, dɛ ba horɔ.
40013022	Mea la aa lee sɔɔhne baah la chegɔ tɛ nɛra baa no waa nɔ, asɛ harɛ nɔ soga liire ne harɛ nɔ kondɔɔh waa begre ba sie, ba ta gelɛ waa la dɔ tɔnɔ.
40013023	Asɛ mea la aa lee harɛdɛɛge ta la ge chegɔ tɛ nɛra baa no waa la dɛ lawɛ a bini, a dɔ tɔnɔ tɛɛ ba kɛŋɔ mea la aa ɛa kɛrɛdɛ, ane ma lafare, ane ma fifraanumɛl, ane ma fifraatoro la."
40013024	Yeesu kpɔ sɛgla bol waa chag ba ja dɛ ŋɔ, "Kenii Korowii Kora la do. Baa bɛlee ira dɛ ka merɛ mea o koo ta.
40013025	Jwaana bɛl nɛra bwa aa chɔa la, o dɔm bɛl ge iro dɛ ka merɛ kpɔgchɔga ane aa le mea la koo mea la ta, dɛ ir chwa.
40013026	Kwaa la bwa aa lea dɛ kpeg la, a bie ɛɛ taa ba che jemɛ kɛ kpɔgchɔga koo mea la ta.
40013027	Baa la bonɔɔna baa bɔɔro ŋɔ, 'Nomoa, kɛ mea gboo he merɛ koo nɔ ta laɔ? Lee kpɔgchɔga nɔ ge le dɛ ba koo a ta nɔɔ?'
40013028	Anee nomoa la chaŋ ba ŋɔ, 'N dɔm bɛlee ɛ gɛ la.' Asɛ o bonɔɔna la berɛ pɛɛro ŋɔ, 'He dɛ nyin kɛ ya ka parɛ kpɔgchɔga la ta kɛɛ?'
40013029	Anee baa la ŋɔ, 'Kai. Dɛ he ŋɔ he para ta taraken aa, hɛɛ parɛ mea la anee ja a ta.
40013030	Hé gel a bwa pɛ che dɛ ɛ. A koma ta la, mɛɛ ŋɔ nɛra baa dɛ ba a koma la bee bá tɔ sie kɛ kpɔgchɔga la, dɛ vɔrɔwa, dɛ che ka ta nii ta dɛ fuah, mɔɔ dɛ ba komɛ mea tenten la dɛ pa ka do mɛ n dɔndɔŋ bini.' "
40013031	Yeesu kpɔ sɛgla bol waa chag ba ja dɛ ŋɔ, "Kenii Korowii Kora la do. Baa bɛlee ira dɛ kpɔ daa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ mastad bii dɛ ka du.
40013032	Kwaa bie baa dɛ du bwa bini onjegaa. Kɛ dɛ o leɔ dɛ kpeg aa, o dɛ gwaa konduula bwa, dɛ yon kpeg dajen, asɛ jumbii gba ba sɔh a kɔne o kpala ta."
40013033	Yeesu kpɔ sɛgla bol waa chag ba ja dɛ ŋɔ, "Kenii Korowii Kora la do. O do kɛŋɔ haah bɛl aa ira dɛ kpɔ iisi tama ka koo men logbaa del ta, asɛ a won gel men la bwa uge."
40013034	Waa nɔ bwa Yeesu aa bola dɛɛ bagle nɛnlaa la bwa la, dɛ sɛgla nee wɛɛ bol. Webeŋkpoŋ gba toole o wobol waa wola sɛgla kpɔe.
40013035	Gɛ waa ɛa nɔ gelɔ waa Korowii keame la faa bola la ɛ kpela. Korowii fa kpɔ o keame la nɛɛ bol ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ kpɔ sɛglaa bol waa chag ba. Waa nomɛlbwa aa wola jemɛ bwa le harɛ nɔ mumpar la, mɛɛ bol ba bee."
40013036	Yeesu aa le nɛnlaa la baah la, o kaa jo dea, asɛ o habɔteŋra la ba o be dɛ ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Chagle yaa kpɔgchɔga baa la dɔm la aa kaa merɛ koo mea la ta la mun."
40013037	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Men Nɛn Bie laanee merɛ mea tenten la.
40013038	Harɛ ta bonɔɔ ɛ koo la. Mea tenten laanee nɛra baa ja Korowii Kora la ta la, asɛ kpɔgchɔga la ge che tɛ nɛra baa lɔ Bɔnsam be pera.
40013039	Baa la dɔm la waa kaa merɛ kpɔgchɔga koo mea tenten la ta la chegɔ tɛ Bɔnsam. Kwaa la koma la chegɔ tɛ waa bwa jaga saŋ, asɛ nɛra baa koma la chegɔ tɛ nyundua toroma la.
40013040	Gɛ baa vɔrɔwe kpɔgchɔga la dɛ che ka do nii ta a fuh la, gɛɛ waa bwa jaga saŋ ɛɛ ba doe.
40013041	Men Nɛn Bie la ɛɛ tomɛ n nyundua toromaa ba n kora nɔ ta bá ba kpɔ nomɛlbwa waa dɛ do nɛra wechɔga ta ne wechɔg-ɛɛra bwa,
40013042	dɛ kpɔ ba ka ta ninlao ta, belaa wii ne weweele do.
40013043	Asɛ name nɛra baa dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga la chaah kɛŋɔ wee ken ba Mɛɛ Koobwɛɛ bela. Nomɛlbwa waa no la, ó no.
40013044	"Korowii Kora la waa ane gee la ja. A do kɛŋɔ baa bɛl aa kaa kpaah kondɔɔh kwaane baa kpɔa sɔh harɛ bɛl ta. Asɛ o ge berɛ kwaa sɔh dɛ kpɔ kwaa la silɛɛ dɛ ka yog komɛlbwa waa dɔa dɛ kpɔ suuga la ka yawɛ a gɛ harɛ la.
40013045	"Korowii Kora la tenten berɔ do kɛŋɔ bonadii bɛl waa dɛ gaage lwedɛɛga ane a yog aa kpega dɛ́ yawɛ.
40013046	Asɛ awola bɛl o ka na lwedɛɛge tenten bɛl o yog aa kpega taeh, dɛ ka yog o kondɔɔh bwa dɛ kpɔ ka yawɛ gɛ lwee la.
40013047	"Korowii Kora la dor bɛl gee nɔ. Nɛra bane baa dɛ ɛ nee toma kaa ta dɔɔh moo ta dɛ lawɛ pɛŋe te bɛlbwa siwi.
40013048	Dɔɔh la aa su pɛŋa la, ba tɛr ba hɛŋle ta, asɛ dɛ soŋni harɛ dɛ chale a bini, dɛ pa pɛŋedɛɛga la do logbaa bini, asɛ dɛ pa anɔ la aa wola were la ka ta.
40013049	Gɛɛ waa bwa jaga saŋ ɛɛ ba doe. Nyundua toroma ɛɛ bao dɛ ba chale nɛnchɔga le nɛndɛɛga bini,
40013050	asɛ dɛ kpɔ nɛnchɔga la ka ta ninlao ta. Belaa wii ne weweele do."
40013051	Yeesu pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "He dɛ no waa nɔ mun te naa?" Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh."
40013052	Anee Yeesu berɛ ŋɔ, "Amɔ nomɛlbwa waa jemɛ Mosis Mmara la, dɛ berɛ ba hweli Korowii Kora nɔ waa la do kɛŋɔ nomɛl aa dɔ o dem, dɛ dɔ konfala ne kombena, dɛ won a bini bɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin kpɔe dɛ le bela waa dɛ cheg o kwa."
40013053	Yeesu aa kpɔ sɛgla bol waa bagle nɛra la tonɛ la, o le bela,
40013054	dɛ berɛ kaa o gbagba bwɛ. O bagle nɛra waa ba cheremi dea ta, asɛ nɛra baa no o webagla la bwa nyoa kpo, baa pɛɛ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Leperaa o le gɛ wejema nɔ ne nɔɔ? Asɛ nyokpowaa nɔ geɔ?
40013055	Kapenta te la bie la laa kɛɛ? O nya laa Mɛɛre aa? O nimanar laa Jems ne Josef ne Seemɔn ne Judas kɛɛ?
40013056	Bwɛɛ nɔ ta laa o nimambii bwa do aa? Leperaa o le a gɛ wejema nɔ ne nyokpowaa ɛɛ nɔ bwa ne nɔ?"
40013057	Anomanta ba siwi ta on sui. Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Korowii keame dɔ sɔn bobɛlbwa. Kɛ o gbagba bwɛɛ tena ne o lola gboo wola on duu."
40013058	Baa wola on yaradae nomanta, nyokpowaa waa ɛa bela ta warɛ.
40014001	Kooro Hɛrɔd waa dɛ nyiŋi Galilia harɛ ta gɛ saŋ la no Yeesu wa,
40014002	asɛ dɛ ŋɔ o bonɔɔna be ŋɔ, "Jɔn o faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee laanee la. O weero le seo ta. A waa o won nyokpowaa nɔ ɛɛ la."
40014003	Kooro Hɛrɔd nɔ fa gelɔ ba lawɛ Jɔn, dɛ doo kpɛɛ dɛ kpɔɔ ka do dea. Kooro nɔ nime Felep haah Hɛrɔdeas waa o koh ɛ Jɔn gɛ la,
40014004	dɛkalkɛ kooro la moo, asɛ Jɔn ŋɔ o be ŋɔ o ta an kɛrɛdɛ ɛɛ kɛ waa mo Hɛrɔdeas la.
40014005	Asɛ kooro la fe ɛɛ nyin Jɔn dɛ kpo. Kɛ dɛ o dɛ ɔmɛ Juda tena la, dɛkalkɛ ba te bwa ŋɔ Jɔn ɛ Korowii keame.
40014006	Awola bɛlee kooro la ɛɛ di o lola tɔpere, asɛ Hɛrɔdeas bihaah ba sa bagle nɛra la bwa. O sae la gelɔ kooro la sie lɛ.
40014007	O ŋɔ tolo la be ŋɔ, "N ŋwɛɛrɔ kɛ komɛlbwa haa dɛ nyin la, mɛɛ kpɔɔ tɛɛ."
40014008	O la ka ŋɔ o nya be. O nya gel o la dɛ ka ŋɔ kooro la be ŋɔ, "N dɛ nyin kɛ he kpɔ Jɔn waa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la nyu dawɛ korɔ ta ba tɛ mɛ taraken."
40014009	Waa nɔ we kooro la nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ, kɛ o ntam waa ŋwɛɛra la ne nɛra baa soge bela dɛ no la nomanta, waa nyin kɛ o to o ntam la, asɛ o sɛh,
40014010	dɛ gel ba la dea bela baa do Jɔn la dɛ ka teŋe o nyu,
40014011	dɛ kpɔ dawɛ korɔ ta ba tɛ tolo la, asɛ o ge kpɔ ka tɛ o nya.
40014012	Jɔn habɔteŋra balɔ dɛ ba kpɔ lale la ka huge, asɛ dɛ ka taa bagle Yeesu.
40014013	Yeesu aa no gɛ waa nɔ la, o le nɛra baah dɛ ka kpɔ gbera dɛ́ fe kaa bela nomɛlbwa aa wola toole. Nɛra no gɛ waa la dɛ le ba bwɛɛre ta dɛ kpɔ naa ta dɛ tiu.
40014014	Yeesu aa le gbera la bini, dɛ nɛnlaa tenten lɔ bela. Ba waa domɛ o tea, asɛ o chah ba bini weela tena.
40014015	Bɔr aa dɛ jo la, o habɔteŋra la baa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, bonɔ ɛ kpɔg baah, bɔr ge dɛ jo. Anomanta ŋɔ ba be bá kaa bwɛɛre nɔ aa bar bonɔ nɔ ta dɛ ka yawɛ kwaane di."
40014016	Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Ba ta chɛɛ kɛ ba kaa. Hé ge nyin kwaa tɛɛ ba bá di."
40014017	Anee ba ŋɔ, "Paanoo anue ne pɛŋa anɛ gboo ya dɔ bonɔ."
40014018	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Hé kpɔ ba tɛ mɛ."
40014019	O gel nɛra la bwa so harɛ kpɔglor la ta, asɛ dɛ kpɔ paanoo anue la ne pɛŋa anɛ la, dɛ ha sie nyiŋi nyundua dɛ jam Korowii, dɛ mɔne paanoo la do o habɔteŋra la nɔɔra ta dɛ ŋɔ bá bɔne tɛɛ ba,
40014020	asɛ nɛra la bwa di dɛ vagre. O habɔteŋra la aa tɔɔ paanoo ne pɛŋa baa dia a ka la pɛ, a su wɛgrɛjena fi dɛ anɛ.
40014021	Nɛra baa di kwaa la, ba baala gbo ɛɛ ɛ kagboŋa banue. Haahna ne bechale te ta jae.
40014022	Belaa Yeesu gel o habɔteŋra la jo gbera bini dɛ tɔ sie kaa moo la baŋ asɛ o ge gel nɛra la ɛɛ pegre.
40014023	Nɛra la aa kaala la, o teehnɔ kaa bwejen bɛl doa dɛ ka soŋe Korowii bela. Bɔr aa baa garɛ bwa, dɛ o gbo ta lɔ bela.
40014024	Gɛ saŋ nɔ bwa dɛ gbera la lɔ moo baah ta asɛ nehaŋma ɛɛ begro, dɛkalkɛ dɛ peu bɛl tao dɛɛ chem ba.
40014025	Jabal logla sii saŋ la, Yeesu valɔ kpɔ nee la sie dɛɛ kaa ba be.
40014026	Baa nao o valɛ nee sie dɛɛ ba la, ba ɔmɔ dɛ dooge lɔŋɔre ŋɔ, "Lalee yoo!"
40014027	Yeesu den ŋɔ, "Hé lawɛ bambile, menee! He bɛ ɔmɛ!"
40014028	Anee Pita ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, dɛ henee yaa, gel n ge won valɛ nee sie ba he be."
40014029	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Ba." Belaa Pita den le gbera bini tu nee sie dɛ valɛ dɛɛ kaa o be.
40014030	Waa na gɛ peu la aa dɛ ta la, o berɔ ɔmɛ dɛ den dɛɛ morɛ, asɛ dɛ do lɔŋɔ ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, lɛɛ mɛ!"
40014031	Bug la ta dɛ Yeesu tel bela dɛ lawɔ dɛ ŋɔ, "He yarada aa kanɛ kwara! Ɛrɛɛ he berɛ di tɔŋla nɔɔ?"
40014032	Baa jo gbera la bini la, peu la gel tae.
40014033	Yeesu habɔteŋra baa lɔ gbera la bini la guŋu dɛ ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, henee Korowii Bie la kpela."
40014034	Ba tawɔ ka chuge moo la baŋ bɛl Gɛnɛsarɛt harɛ ta.
40014035	Bela tena la aa jemɔ la, ba kaa yerɛ baah bela tena ba bwara aa dɛ wee ba bwa ba Yeesu be.
40014036	Ba soŋo ŋɔ ó gel weela tena la lege o batakaare nyoa gbo ásɛ dɛ gbaŋre. Asɛ banɔ baa lege o batakaare nyoa la bwa gbaŋre.
40015001	Farisii tena ne Tɔn Jerema bane le Jerusalam dɛ ba bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ,
40015002	"Ɛrɛ waa he habɔteŋra nɔ ɛɛ jo ya kii nɛɛ nɔɔ? Sama ya naanar aa bagle yaa ŋɔ yá samɛ nɔɔra mɔɔ dɛɛ di kwaa la, baa gɛ ɛ!"
40015003	Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛ waa he gee jo Korowii kii nɛɛ dɛ́ɛ teŋɛ he gbagba webagla ta nɔɔ?
40015004	Korowii ŋɔ, 'Duu he nya ne he mɛɛ,' dɛ berɛ ŋɔ, 'Nomɛlbwa waa bol o nya ne o mɛɛ bwara wechɔge la, a chɛ kɛ ba kpoo.'
40015005	Kɛ he ge dɛ bagle kɛ nomɛlbwa waa ŋɔ o mɛɛ ne o nya be ŋɔ o kpɔ kwaa waa dɔ dɛ́ kpɔ cha ba la bwa tɛ Korowii,
40015006	a ta chɛɛ kɛ o duu o mɛɛ dɛ chao kpa. Kenii hɛɛ chɔg Korowii mmarare dɛ́ɛ teŋɛ he gbagba webagla ta nɔ.
40015007	He nɛra haa nyiŋi nɛra sie mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ wa! Korowii keame Aesaya na he waa bol kɛrɛdɛ gɛ waa ŋɔa ŋɔ,
40015008	'Nɛra nɔ te, nyoa gbo nee baa duu mɛ, kɛ ba tea bini te ta toe.
40015009	Nɛwɛnyini mmarare taa baa bagle ŋɔ nɛ́ra teŋɛ. Anomanta pɛɛpɛɛ baa tom mɛ.' "
40015010	Yeesu yerɛ nɛnlaa la ba o be, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé no waa nɔ dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ
40015011	kwaa nɛn aa dɛ di laa gela o ɛ nɛnchɔge, nemenɛ anɔ la aa dɛ le o nyoa wɛɛ bol la."
40015012	Ane o habɔteŋra la ba o be dɛ ba ŋɔ, "He jemɔ kɛŋɔ he waa nɔ haa bola nɔ jo Farisii tena nɔ bini kenɛ?"
40015013	Anee Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Daa te bɛlbwa n Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la aa wola on due la, baa hugruu ta.
40015014	He bɛ ban dawɛ le! Ba ɛ nyoŋa baa dɛ tɔ nyoŋa sie. Nyoŋe lawɛ o dɔŋ nyoŋe daa aa, ba bwa dɛ le bɔɔ ta."
40015015	Asɛ Pita ŋɔ, "Chagle yaa waa nɔ mun."
40015016	Anee Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "He ge aa a mun jemaa?
40015017	Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ kwaa haa dɛ di la, tea binii aa kaa dɛ berɛ dahara aa?
40015018	Kɛ waa aa le nɛn nyoa la te, bambile binii a le. Anee yon gel nɛn ɛ nɛnchɔge.
40015019	Liichɔga, nɛŋkpoa, jwamane, ŋwɛɛ wa, nyosone teŋa, dɛ nɛra ŋwala, ne anɔ aa jaa bwa, bambile binii a le.
40015020	Anee dɛ gel nɛn ɛ nɛnchɔge. Kɛ dɛ nɛn ta nɔn samɛ gɛ he naanar aa chagle heyaa ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ ɛ mɔɔ dɛɛ di kwaa la aa, a te aa won gel o ɛ nɛnchɔge."
40015021	Yeesu le bela dɛ kaa Taaya ne Sidon pera.
40015022	Haah bɛl waa ɛ Keenan te dɛ do bela ba Yeesu be dɛ ba kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Devid Naa Yeesu, na n sum! Nomoa, kwaa dɛ ir n bihaah nɛɛ dɛɛ fiigu, a do kpegri."
40015023	Yeesu ta on chaŋɛ, asɛ o habɔteŋra la ba o be dɛ soŋo ŋɔ, "Gel haah nɔ kaa kɛ waa teŋɛ ya nɛɛ dɛɛ do yaa gbɔga la!"
40015024	Anee Yeesu chaŋe ŋɔ, "Nɛra baa do kɛŋɔ peera aa nyogra dɛ le Israel tena bini la gbo waa ba tom mɛ ŋɔ ń ba gaage ba bɔr."
40015025	Haah la den ba guŋi Yeesu sie dɛ ŋɔ, "Cha mɛ, Nomoa."
40015026	Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "A chɛ kɛ bechale di kwaa vagre mɔɔ nyootena ge di. Aa were kɛ ba kpɔ bechale kondikwaa tɛ nyootena."
40015027	Belaa haah la ge sɛh ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋii, Nomoa, kɛ nyootena aa bechale kondikompugrere aa leera la ge di aa?"
40015028	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Gɛ haa dɛ yarada mɛ la kan kɛrɛdɛ! Gɛ haa dɛ nyin la, aa ɛ gɛɛ tɛɛ." Bug la ta bie la gbaŋre.
40015029	Yeesu le bela dɛ kaa fɛrɛ Galilia Moo la nyoa, dɛ ka teeh bwejen bɛl dɛ so bela,
40015030	asɛ nɛnlaa tenten ba o be dɛ kpɔ weela tena ba peri aa serewa, nyoŋa, boobie, amumure ne nɛra baa dɛ we weela bwa soosiwi ba bil o sie, asɛ o chaah ba.
40015031	Nɛra la nyoa kpoo kɛ baa na gɛ amumure aa bera won waa bola, boobie ne nɛra ba peri aa serewa won ir che dɛɛ valɛ, asɛ nyoŋa ge berɛ won dɛɛ na la. Anomanta ba kpɛɛ ba Israel tena Korowii la.
40015032	Yeesu yerɛ o habɔteŋra la dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Nɛra nɔ waa dɛ domɛ n tea, dɛkalkɛ n ne baa soga tɔpera atoroo nɔ, taraken ba ta komɛlbwa dɔe dɛ́ di. Dɛ n gel ba gɛ ba kpɔ lɔr kaa laa, baa gwɛgre ŋwɛnɛ taa."
40015033	O habɔteŋra la pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ɛɛ dɛ́ dɔ paanoo tɛ nɛndamanta nɔ bwa dɔŋ kpɔg nɔ baah bonɔ bá di a won tel ba ɔ?"
40015034	Anee Yeesu pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Paanoo aŋwɛnɛɛ he dɔɔ?" Anee ba ŋɔ, "Anuanɛ dɛ pɛŋejegre tamaa ane."
40015035	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ nɛnlaa la be ŋɔ bá so harɛ.
40015036	Asɛ o kpɔ paanoo anuanɛ la ne pɛŋa la dɛ jam Korowii, dɛ mɔne do o habɔteŋra la nɔɔra ta, dɛ ŋɔ bá bɔne tɛ nɛnlaa la, ba ge bɔne tɛɛ ba.
40015037	Ba bwa di kwaa la dɛ vagre. O habɔteŋra la tɔɔ anɔ la baa dia a ka la pɛ, asɛ a su wɛgrɛjena anuanɛ.
40015038	Nɛra baa di kwaa la, ba bini baala ɛɛ ɛ nɛra kagboŋa banaarɛɛ. Haahna ne bechale te ta jae.
40015039	Asɛ Yeesu ta nɛra la ŋwɛnɛ dɛ jo gbera bini kaa Magadan pera.
40016001	Farisii tena bane ne Saduki tena bane ba Yeesu be dɛ ba daahno na dɛɛ nyin o ɛ nyokpowaane bá na asɛ dɛ won jemɛ kɛ Korowii bee o le kpela.
40016002	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Weswɛm saŋ he nyiŋi nyundua dɛ nyundua swɛɛraa, he yon ŋɔ bwaala aa tena ba.
40016003	Chɔmbibi ne ge he iro dɛ na kɛ nyundua swɛɛrɔ dɛ bibir aa, he yon ŋɔ nyundua aa swɛɛra dɛ bibir nɔ, bwaala ɛɛ nɛo. He won nyundua nyiŋa dɛ jemɛ waa aa dɛ ba chiga, aah ɛrɛ waa haa wola won jemɛ waa aa chig taraken nɔ mun nɔ?
40016004	Fini nɛra, nɛnchɔga ne nɛra baa vɛh Korowii la, heyaa ŋɔa ń ɛ nyokpowaa he na naa? Maa wobɛlbwaa ɛ hé na. Waa aa pu Korowii keame Jona la dɔŋa gboo dɛɛ ba n ge pui ásɛ he che a ta dɛ jemɛ n nɛnsoo." Anomanta o gel ba bela dɛ kaa.
40016005	Yeesu habɔteŋra la aa gale moo la dɛ le o baŋ la, ba soɔh, ba ta paanoo kpɔe ja.
40016006	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ Farisii tena ne Saduki tena iisi wa."
40016007	Ba ta o sɛgla la mun noɛ, dɛɛ pɛɛ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Amɔ yaa wola paanoo kpɔe waa wɛɛ bol gɛ naa?"
40016008	Yeesu aa no waa baa dɛ pɛɛ dɔŋa la, o pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛ waa hɛɛ pɛɛ dɔŋa paanoo bɛ dɔe waa nɔɔ? Haa men yarada kwara!
40016009	Saŋ la bwa haa waa mun no mɔɔ naa? Maa mɔne paanoo anue tɛ nɛra kagboŋa banue ba di ka la, a kabora haa paa la, wɛgrɛ dela aŋwɛnɛɛ he dɔ laɔ?
40016010	Paanoo anuanɛ la maa tɛ nɛra kagboŋa banaarɛ ba di la, wɛgrɛ dela aŋwɛnɛɛ gee he dɔ laɔ?
40016011	Ɛrɛ taa a che he ta wone jemɛ kɛŋɔ paanoo waa laa mɛɛ bol he be nɔɔ? Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ Farisii tena ne Saduki tena iisi la wa."
40016012	Name o habɔteŋra la ta no waa la mun kɛ iisi baa kpɔa dɛɛ ɛ paanoo waa laa wɛɛ ja ba la, kɛ Farisii tena ne Saduki tena webagla la taa wɛɛ ja ba.
40016013	Yeesu la Sisaaria Felepae bwɛɛre ane ta. Belaa o pɛɛ o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "Nɛn besoo nɛra ɛɛ lii men Nɛn Bie nɔɔ?"
40016014	Anee ba ŋɔ, "Bane ŋɔ Jɔn o faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee laanee hen, bane ŋɔ Elaejaa hen. Bane ge ŋɔ Jɛremaya laa hen aa, amɔ te, Korowii keamebena la bɛlee hen."
40016015	Anee Yeesu berɛ pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Asɛ he ge sɛ, nɛn besoo hɛɛ lii mɛ nɔ?"
40016016	Seemɔn Pita chaŋo ŋɔ, "Henee Kristo la, Korowii tenten waa lole saŋ bɛlbwa la Bie la."
40016017	Yeesu ŋɔ, "Jɔn bie Seemɔn, he na som kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa aa wola hen waa nɔ baglɛ asɛ he jemɛ nɔ. N Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua laanee bagle.
40016018	Anomanta n ŋɔ he sɔne Pita, o munii Bwe. Gɛ bwe nɔ taa mɛɛ ba n dea doe chɔŋɛ. N habɔteŋraa n dea la. Hale seo kwara aa wola won pɔ ba nɛɛ bwa.
40016019	Mɛɛ kpɔ Korowii Kora la safoaa do he nɔn ta hɛɛ nyiŋi n habɔteŋra tɛ mɛ, asɛ waa haa wola sɛɛh harɛ nɔ ta la, nyundua ge Korowii aa sɛh, kɛ anɔ haa sɛah harɛ nɔ ta la, nyundua ge Korowii ɛɛ sɛah."
40016020	Anee Yeesu kah ba ŋɔ ba bɛ o waa bol bagle nomɛlbwa kɛ onee Kristo la.
40016021	Le gɛ saŋ la, Yeesu bol waa chasee ken dɛɛ bagle o habɔteŋra la, dɛ ŋɔ, "A chɛ kɛŋɔ n kaa Jerusalam dɛ ka na wahala bela nomonome ne Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema nɔn ta, asɛ ba kpo mɛ, asɛ a tɔpera atoro la n ir seo ta."
40016022	Anee Pita lawɔ le bokɛre dɛ kaoh ŋɔ, "Aa! N Dɔɔ, Korowii ɛɛ la a ne bojaŋ. Aa he nɛɛ gɛɛ ba bwa."
40016023	Belaa Yeesu laa o te berɛ dɛ kɔr Pita ŋɔ, "Le n jwɛh, Bɔnsam! He dɛ neg mɛ ń ɛ wechɔga, dɛkalkɛ haa anɔ la Korowii aa dɛ nyin la lii, nemenɛ nɛra tetoowa."
40016024	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "Dɛ nomɛlbwa dɛ nyin kɛ o teŋɛ n nɛ aa, ó gel o tetookwaa nyina dɛ kpɔ o te kɛ wɛɛ sɛh wahala nae ne seo bwaa dɛ baa teŋɛ n nɛɛ kɛŋɔ nɛn waa kpɔ dagagre che kaa o kpobɔr,
40016025	dɛkalkɛ nomɛlbwa o sie aa swɛɛ harɛ nɔ ta silɛɛ kwaa ta la, wɛɛ paŋɛ o nyuu. Asɛ nomɛlbwa ge o sie aa wola harɛ nɔ ta silɛɛ kwaa ta swɛɛ la, wɛɛ dɔ o nyuu.
40016026	Dɛ nɛn dɔ harɛ nɔ ta kwaa bwa dɛ nyogre o nyu aa, bɔkwa tɔnɔɔ o dɔɔ? Bɔkwaa nɛwɛnyini ɛɛ ba wona kpɔ dɛ charɛ o nyuɔ?
40016027	N Nɛn Bie nɔ ɛɛ kpɔ n Mɛɛ jirima laanee, n ne n nyundua toroma le nyundua ba dɛ ba bɔ nomɛlbwa kem gɛ o toma aa doa.
40016028	Kasinteŋ, a gɛ saŋ n Nɛn Bie aa ba di kora la, dɛ he bini bane ta soge le dɛ na mɛ."
40017001	Aa di tɔpera anumɛl la, Yeesu tɔ Pita ne Jems ne o nime Jɔn sie ba ka teeh bwejen bɛl, dɛ gbo ka so o doa bobɛl.
40017002	Baa soga la, dɛ Yeesu begrɔ, o sie bɔr do kɛŋɔ wee ken, asɛ o laala waa doa la ge to dɛɛ nyɛgle al-al ken.
40017003	O habɔteŋra batoro la berɛ ŋɔ ba nyiŋi, dɛ Mosis ne Elaeja ja Yeesu nɛɛ baa bol wa.
40017004	Anee Pita ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, a wer taeh kɛ yaa lɔ bonɔ nɔ! Dɛ he dɛ nyin aa, mɛɛ do kukure atoroo cheg bonɔ ásɛ he kpɔ bɛl, Mosis kpɔ bɛl, asɛ Elaeja ge kpɔ bɛl."
40017005	O nyoa taa lɔ waa ta wɛɛ bol la, dɛ bampoŋ bɛl denɔ ba tɔ ba nɛ, asɛ ba no taa bɛl bam la bini kɛ, "N Bie maa dɛ nyinu o wa ɛɛ su n siwii nɔ. Hé cheg deŋna dɛ no o be."
40017006	Yeesu habɔteŋra la aa no taa la la, ɔmee lag ba kohona ba guŋi dɛ kpɔ ba sie piigi harɛ.
40017007	Asɛ Yeesu ba dɛ ba kpɔ nɔn lɔ ba dɛ ŋɔ, "Hé ir che. He bɛ ɔmɛ."
40017008	Baa laa ba nyuune ir dɛ nyiŋi, dɛ nomɛlbwa toole ka ja ba ne Yeesu nɛ.
40017009	Baa le bwejen la doa dɛɛ ba la, Yeesu ja ba ŋɔ, "He bɛ waa nɔ haa naa nɔ taa bagle nomɛlbwa bwa dɛ ka tel gɛ saŋ Korowii aa gel n Nɛn Bie ir seo ta mɔɔ."
40017010	Anee o habɔteŋra la pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Aah ɛrɛ waa Tɔn Jerema la ɛɛ chagle ŋɔ a chɛ kɛŋɔ Elaeja tɔ sie ba mɔɔ Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la ge ba nɔɔ?"
40017011	Asɛ Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Elaejaa dɛ tɔ sie ba kpela, dɛ́ ba kwaa ŋwɛnɛ mɔɔ.
40017012	Kɛ kasinteŋ, Elaeja balɔ dɛ kaa. Waa bala la, ba ta on jemɛ dɛ ɛo gɛ bɛlbwa aa too ba tea. Weweele la tenten baa kpɔa ɛo laanee baa ba kpɔe ɛ n Nɛn Bie nɔ ge."
40017013	Asɛ mɔɔ o habɔteŋra la ta jemɛ kɛŋɔ Jɔn o faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la waa wɛɛ bol la.
40017014	Gɛ saŋ baa le bwejen la doa dɛ tu la, ba kaa pu nɛnlaa bane. Baa bɛl den ba guŋi Yeesu sie
40017015	dɛ ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, na n bibaa nɔ sum tɛ mɛ! O dɛ chole gbuŋgbuŋri. A iraa, aa were kwaraa. Tɔpebɛla a iraa, a gelɔ wɛɛ chole nii ta, asɛ tɔpebɛla ge a gel wɛɛ chole nee ta.
40017016	N kpɔɔ ba he habɔteŋra nɔ be, kɛ ba ta wone chaoh."
40017017	Asɛ Yeesu chaŋe ŋɔ, "Oo! Fini nɔ nɛra wechɔga aa lɔ he nɛɛ nɔ, he ta yarada dɔe! Tɔpera aŋwɛnɛɛ hɛɛ nyin kɛ n lawɛ bambile dɛ so he be mɔɔ he yarada Korowii ɔ? Maa tɔpere bɛl dii ba he be kpa oo! Hé kpɔ bie la ba!"
40017018	Yeesu kɔr kwaa aa gela gbuŋgbuŋri la ɛɛ ir bie la nɛɛ la, asɛ a le o nɛɛ kaa. Bug la ta bie la den dɔ bokpega.
40017019	Anee Yeesu habɔteŋra la la o be bokɛre dɛ ka pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛ waa ya te ta wone doŋi kwaa la le bie la nɛɛ nɔɔ?"
40017020	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "He yarada aa wola kanɛ waa. Dɛ he yarada fe kan kɛŋɔ kwaa bie baa dɛ dua bwa bini onjega tenten la gba aa, he fe ɛɛ wonoo ŋɔ bwejen nɔ be ŋɔ ó hugri kaa bela haa dɛ nyin, asɛ o kaa. He fe ɛɛ wonoo ɛ komɛlbwa."
40017022	Yeesu habɔteŋra la bwa aa baa cheme Galilia harɛ la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Ba dɛ ba n Nɛn Bie lee do nɛra nɔn ta.
40017023	Baa kpo mɛɛ, asɛ tɔpera atoro n berɛ ir seo ta." A te dɛ o habɔteŋra la bwa loo kuu.
40017024	Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la la Kapeeneɔm. Asɛ Korowii Dea toɔ lɛɛra baa pɛɛ Pita ŋɔ, "He Dɔɔ nɔ dɛ bɔ Korowii Dea toɔ aa?"
40017025	Anee Pita ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh, o dɛ bɔ." Pita aa jo dem bini la, Yeesu den tɔ sie pɛɛro, "Seemɔn, bamewaa bɔ toɔ dɛɛ tɛ harɛ nɔ ta koranar ɔ? Ba gbagba bii kɛɛ hɔɔhra ɔ? Ɛrɛɛ he na nɔ?"
40017026	Anee Pita ŋɔ, "Hɔɔhraa dɛɛ bɔ." Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Gɛɛ te naa, amɔ te a ta chɛɛ kɛŋɔ ba lɛ koobii be.
40017027	Kɛ maa wola nyin kɛ ya jo ba nɛɛ nomanta, la moo ta dɛ ka ta goŋa. Pɛŋe bɛlbwa waa tɔ sie ba tɛr goŋa la, lɔɔ le baŋ dɛ nyiŋi o nyoa bini. Hɛɛ na suuga bwe waa tel n ne he bwa toɔ laanee, asɛ hé kpɔ ka bɔ tɛ ya bwa."
40018001	A gɛ saŋ la Yeesu habɔteŋra la bwa ba o be dɛ ba pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Ya bini umee gwaa ya bwa dɛ ɛ nomoa Korowii Kora la ta nɔ?"
40018002	Asɛ Yeesu yerɛ bechajega bɛl dɛ gel o ba che ba baah ta,
40018003	asɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, he ta he liire charɛ dɛ do kɛŋɔ bechajegre aa, haa won ja Korowii Kora la ta bwa.
40018004	Naate waa won pwɛr o te dɛ do kɛŋɔ bechajega nɔ la, onee gwaa nomɛlbwa Korowii Kora la ta.
40018005	Nomɛlbwa waa koh n waa dɛ nyiŋi bie nɔ dɔŋ nɛɛ la, menee o nyiŋi la.
40018006	"Nomɛlbwa waa negre bechajegre nɔ dɔŋ bɛlbwa waa dɛ yarada mɛ nɔ asɛ o ɛ wechɔga la, dɛ ba fe vɔwɛ nambwe do o baŋa dɛ kpɔɔ ka ta moo vil ta kwaraa fe bɔ.
40018007	Harɛ nɔ ta nɛra, hé bwɛɛlɛ, he dɔŋa negra dɛɛ do wechɔga ta nomanta. A gɛ waa la ɛɛ bao te, kɛ naate waa ba a ne la, ó bwɛɛlɛ.
40018008	Dɛ he nɔn kɛɛ he nakpala ɛɛ negree he ɛ wechɔga aa, teŋo ta. Haa dɔ nɔmbeŋkpoŋ kɛɛ nakpabeŋkpoŋ dɛ dɔ Korowii be kaa bɔ kɛŋɔ haa dɔ nɔɔra anɛ kɛɛ nakpale anɛ dɛ kaa Bɔnsam nii aa wola dime bwa la ta.
40018009	Dɛ he siwi gee negree he ɛ wechɔga aa, fomo ta. Haa dɔ siwi beŋkpoŋ dɛ ba dɔ Korowii mkpa bɔ kɛŋɔ haa dɔ sibie anɛ dɛ kaa Bɔnsam nii aa wola dime bwa la ta.
40018010	"Hé nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ n bechajegre nɔ bɛlbwa nyiŋi vah. N dɛ ŋɔ he be kɛŋɔ nyundua toroma baa dɛ nyiŋi ba nɛɛ la won n Mɛɛ sie laŋa saŋ te bɛlbwa.
40018011	Nɛra baa nyogra la waa n Nɛn Bie koh ba.
40018012	Dɛ nomɛl dɔ peera lafa asɛ beŋkpoŋ nyogre aa, ɛrɛɛ wɛɛ ba ɛɛ yɔ? Wɛɛ gel fifraanuanaarɛ dɛ anuanaarɛ la a dibɔr belaa tama, dɛ ka gaage beŋkpoŋ waa nyogra la bɔr.
40018013	Dɛ o nao waa, o sie ɛɛ lɛ o nɛɛ gwaa fifraanuanaarɛ dɛ anuanaarɛ la aa wola nyogrɛ la.
40018014	Gɛɛ a do he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la aa wola nyin kɛŋɔ bechale nɔ bini bɛlbwa nyogre la.
40018015	"Dɛ he dɔŋ ɛɛ wechɔga ane aa, la o be he ne o le bokɛre bela nomɛlbwa aa wola toole dɛ ka gel o jemɛ wechɔga waa kpɔa ɛɛ. Dɛ o na o wechɔga dɛ larawe naa, dɛ he berɔ dɔ he chamenate.
40018016	Kɛ dɛ o ŋɔ waa sɛh kɛ o ɛ wechɔga aa, ka nyin nɛmbeŋkpoŋ kɛɛ banɛ ja he nɛ, asɛ hé ne ba la o be, dɛkalkɛ nɛra banɛ kɛɛ batoro danseɛ ɛ kasinteŋ.
40018017	Dɛ he ne nɛra la laŋɔ o ŋɔ waa sɛh ja aa, kpɔ ka bil he bala bwa he ne ba aa dɛ cheme la sie. Dɛ o ŋɔ waa ba ge bee no aa, gel o waa tɛo kɛ nɛn waa wola Korowii tomɛ kɛɛ wechɔg-ɛɛ.
40018018	"Kasinteŋ, wobɛlbwa haa wola sɛɛh harɛ nɔ ta la, nyundua ge Korowii aa sɛh, asɛ wobɛlbwa haa sɛh harɛ nɔ ta la, nyundua ge Korowii ɛɛ sɛoh.
40018019	"N berɔ dɛɛ ŋɔ he be ja kɛ dɛ he bini banɛ gba nyoa pɛo harɛ nɔ ta hɛɛ nyin komɛl aa, n Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la ɛɛ kpɔɔ tɛ heya,
40018020	dɛkalkɛ bela nɛra banɛ kɛɛ batoro aa kpɔ nyopɛo cheme n sɔn ta la, dɛ n ja ba nɛ."
40018021	Anee Pita ba bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, kera aŋwɛnɛɛ chɛ kɛŋɔ dɛ n dɔŋ ɛɛ mɛ wechɔga aa n kpɔ kɛo wɔ? Kera anuanɛ kɛɛ?"
40018022	Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "N ta ŋɔe kera anuanɛ, kɛ kera fifraanuanɛ bele anuanɛ.
40018023	"Anomanta, Korowii Kora waa la do kɛŋɔ kooro bɛl ne o bonɔɔna wa. Kooro la iro dɛ ŋɔ ó bonɔɔna ba bagle ba toma ɛɛ bini ó na.
40018024	Waa pa mun dɛɛ nyiŋi ba toma ɛɛ bini la taa, o na kɛ bonɔɔna la bɛl di o kem suuga aa wola nyoa dɔe.
40018025	Waa naa kɛŋɔ bonɔɔ la aa won ɛ wobɛlbwa dɛ bɔ kem la la, o ŋɔ bá yog o ne o haah ne bii ne o kondɔɔh bwa dɛ́ kpɔ bɔ kem la.
40018026	"Anee bonɔɔ la guŋi kooro sie dɛ soŋo ŋɔ, 'N poori, na n sum dɛ lawɛ bambile kɛ mɛɛ bɔe he kem la bwaa.'
40018027	Asɛ kooro la na o sum kohona dɛ gelo, dɛ kpɔ kem la kɛo.
40018028	"Bonɔɔ la aa dɔ bɔr le dɛɛ kaa la, o kaa pu o dɔŋ o ge aa di o kenjegaa bɛl. Waa na o dɔŋ la, o den hamɛ o lobi dɛ ŋɔ, 'Kpɔ n suuga tɛ mɛ!'
40018029	Anee o bonɔndɔŋ la guŋi o sie dɛ soŋo ŋɔ, 'N poori, na n sum dɛ lawɛ bambile kɛ mɛɛ bɔe he kemee.'
40018030	Bonɔɔ la ta o dɔŋ la sum nae, dɛ gel ba ka doo dea dɛ́ ka tel saŋ waa bɔ kem la mɔɔ.
40018031	O bonɔndɔŋa la aa na waa aa chiga la, a we ba nɛɛ taeh, asɛ ba ka taa waa la bagle ba bwa dɔɔ kooro la.
40018032	"Kooro la yerɛ o bonɔɔ la dɛ ŋɔ, 'Nyubinikpeg te kohona! N koh soŋa haa soŋ mɛ la waa dɛ kpɔ kendamanta la bwa kɛɛ.
40018033	Amɔ a fe ta chɛɛ kɛŋɔ he ge fee na he dɔŋ nɔ sum dɛ kpɔ kem nɔ kɛo waa?'
40018034	Kooro la kpɔ bandia ŋɔ bá kpɔ bonɔɔ la ka do dea dɛ ɛo weweele ká tel gɛ saŋ waa dɛ ba wona bɔ kem la bwa."
40018035	Yeesu aa bol a gɛ waa nɔ tonɛ la, anee o ŋɔ, "Dɛ he ge ta he bambile bini leɛ dɛ kpɔ he dɔŋa wechɔga kɛ ba aa, gɛɛ n Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la gee ba heyaa ɛɛ."
40019001	Yeesu aa bol a gɛ waa nɔ tonɛ la, o le Galilia harɛ dɛ kaa Judia harɛ, Jɔɔdan Moo la baŋ.
40019002	Dɛ nɛnlaa tenten teŋɛ o nɛ, asɛ o chah weela tena bela.
40019003	Asɛ Farisii tena bane ba bela dɛ ba kpɔ webɔɔra dɛɛ hagro bela dɛ́ fe dɔɔ lawɛ. Ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Mmara dɛ tɛ yaa ŋwɛnɛ kɛŋɔ baa won che wobɛlbwa ta vɛh o haah naa?"
40019004	Anee Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "He ta Korowii Tɔn la kure na kɛɛ? Korowii waa ta kwaa bwa la, waa dɛ ba nɛwɛnyini tae la, baa ne haahnee o ta,
40019005	asɛ dɛ ŋɔ anɔ waa baa lɛɛ ba o mɛɛ ne o nya jwɛɛh lee, dɛ kpɔ o te ka pɛl o haah ásɛ ba nɛra banɛ la pɛ ɛ nɛmbeŋkpoŋ.
40019006	Anomanta baa nɛra banɛ ɛɛ ba kpa, ba pɛo ɛ beŋkpoŋ. Nɛra Korowii aa lag ba pɛ la, nɛn ta chɛɛ kɛŋɔ o laa ba pegri."
40019007	Anee ba pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Aah ɛrɛ waa Mosis Mmara la tɛ yaa ŋwɛnɛ ŋɔ dɛ baa dɛ ba o haah vɛɛh yaa, ó chwerɛ tɔn tɛo dɛ bagle kɛ o vɛoh nɔɔ?"
40019008	Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "He bambikpeg waa Mosis tɛ heyaa ŋwɛnɛ ŋɔ hé chwerɛ tɔn tɛ he haah dɛ vɛoh la. Gɛ laa a faa do wubwa.
40019009	Nomɛlbwa waa vɛh o haah la, dɛ baala laa haah la nyin mɔɔ o vɛoh, dɛ ka mo hanfale aa, dɛ o ɛ o haah la wechɔga dɛ bɔ jwamane."
40019010	Anee o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛ kenii waa nɔ chɔ tɛ baa o haah moe ta te naa, amɔ te a wer kɛ baa bɛ haah mo, asɛ haah ge bɛ yalɛ kwara."
40019011	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Nɛra bwa laa dɛ won so ŋɔ baa haahnaa mo, nemenɛ banɔ la Korowii aa kpɔ gɛ tɛɛ ba la gbosoroo.
40019012	Nɛra bane haahna bɛ moe la ne a ŋwɛnɛree. Bane le a ne Korowii doa ba. Asɛ bane ge, fɔgaa ba fɔg ba, asɛ bane ge koh Korowii Kora la waa dɛ ɛ ba te gɛ. Naate waa won teŋɛ n waa maa bagla nɔ ta la, ó takapɔ dɛ teŋɛ a ta."
40019013	Dɛ nɛra bane kpɔ ba bii ba Yeesu be ŋɔ ó kpɔ o nɔn dawɛ ba nɛɛ dɛ swee ba andɛɛga. Asɛ o habɔteŋra la kɔgre nɛra la ŋɔ bá kpɔ ba bii la le le.
40019014	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "He bɛ bechale la ŋwɛnɛ tɔ. Hé gel ba ba n be, dɛkalkɛ banɔ dɔŋa nɔɔ Korowii koobii la."
40019015	Yeesu aa kpɔ o nɔn dawɛ ba nɛɛ tonɛ la, o le ba be dɛ kaa.
40019016	Baa bɛl iro dɛ la Yeesu be dɛ ka pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Nomoa, wedɛɛga besoo chɛ kɛŋɔ n ɛ dɛ́ dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe yɔ?"
40019017	Asɛ Yeesu ge berɛ pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛ waa hɛɛ pɛɛ mɛ wedɛɛga ɛɛ waa nɔɔ? Korowii gboo ɛ nɛndɛɛge. Kɛ dɛ he dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ he dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa te naa, dɛɛ ɛ waa Korowii mmarare la aa dɛ chagle la."
