41006024	Anee bihaah la le kaa o nya be dɛ ka bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa konee ń lɛɔ?" Namee Hɛrɔdeas dɔ ŋwɛnɛ kɛ o kpo Jɔn. O ŋɔ o bie la be ŋɔ ó ka ŋɔ ó tɛo Jɔn waa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la nyu.
41006025	Tolo la berɛ ba warane dɛ ba ŋɔ kooro la be ŋɔ, "N dɛ nyin kɛ he kpɔ Jɔn waa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la nyu dawɛ korɔ ta ba tɛ mɛ taraken."
41006026	Waa nɔ we kooro la nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ, kɛ o ntam waa ŋwɛɛra la ne nɛra baa soge bela la nomanta, waa nyin kɛŋɔ o to o ntam la.
41006027	Bug la ta o tomɛ o sooja bɛl ŋɔ ó ka teŋe Jɔn nyu ba. O kpɔ o kere dɛ ka teŋe Jɔn nyu dea bela baa doo la,
41006028	dɛ kpɔ dawɛ korɔ ta, dɛ kpɔ ba tɛ tolo la. Tolo la ge kpɔ ka tɛ o nya.
41006029	Jɔn habɔteŋra la aa no waa nɔ la, ba balɔ dɛ ba kpɔɔ ka huge.
41006030	Nɛra Yeesu aa tom ba la berɔ ba o be, dɛ ba bol anla baa ɛa ne anla baa bagla dɛ chaglo.
41006031	Anee o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé ba ya kaa bobɛl nomɛlbwa aa wola toole ásɛ he ka onɛ tama," dɛkalkɛ nɛra baa bala dɛɛ kaa la warɔ, ba ta bɔr dɔe dɛ́ di kwaa kwara.
41006032	Anomanta Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la gbo jo gbera bini dɛɛ kaa bela nomɛlbwa aa wola toole.
41006033	Jaah nɛra pirim na ba kɛ baa dɛ kaa, dɛ jemɛ kɛ banee, dɛ le bwɛɛre ta chwa dɛ ti ba.
41006034	Yeesu aa le gbera la bini la, dɛ nɛnlaa tenten lɔ bela. Ba waa do o sum, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba do kɛ peera aa wola tegre dɔe ken. Anomanta o chag ba waa taeh.
41006035	Bɔr aa dɛ ɛ jɔmɔra la, o habɔteŋra la ba o be dɛ ba ŋɔ, "Nomoa, bonɔ ɛ kpɔg bini, bɔr ge dɛ jo.
41006036	Anomanta ŋɔ ba be bá kaa bwɛɛre aa bar bonɔ nɔ dɛ ka yawɛ kwaane di."
41006037	Anee Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Hé nyin kwaa tɛɛ ba bá di." Anee ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Yaa wonoo dɔ suuga damanta kɛŋɔ denaarere lafraanɛ dɛ yawɛ paanoo tɛ nɛra nɔ bwa dɔŋ bá di aa?"
41006038	Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Paanoo aŋwɛnɛɛ he dɔɔ? Hé ka nyiŋi na." Baa kaa nyiŋi na la, ba ba dɛ ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ya dɔ paanoo anue ne pɛŋa anɛ."
41006039	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ bá gel nɛra la pɛ dɛ so kpɔglor la ta.
41006040	Asɛ ba pɛ dɛ so, bane lafare, bane ge fifraanunue.
41006041	Yeesu kpɔ paanoo anue la ne pɛŋa anɛ la dɛ ha sie dɛ nyiŋi nyundua dɛ jam Korowii, dɛ mɔne paanoo la do o habɔteŋra la nɔɔra ta dɛ ŋɔ bá bɔne tɛɛ ba, dɛ mɔne pɛŋa la ge tɛɛ ba ŋɔ bá bɔne tɛɛ ba,
41006042	ba bwa di dɛ vagre.
41006043	Baa dia tonɛ la, Yeesu habɔteŋra la tɔɔ paanoo la ne pɛŋa baa dia a ka la pɛ do wɛgrɛjena fi dɛ anɛ bini, a bwa su.
41006044	Nɛra baa di paanoo la, ba baala gbo ɛɛ ɛ kagboŋa banuee.
41006045	Belaa o gel o habɔteŋra la jo gbera bini dɛ tɔ sie kaa baŋ bobɛl baa dɛ yerɛ bela Bɛtsaeda, asɛ o ge gel nɛra la pegre.
41006046	Nɛra la aa kaala la, o teehnɔ kaa bwe bɛl doa dɛ ka soŋe Korowii bela.
41006047	Bɔr aa baa garɛ bwa, dɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra la lɔ mobaah, asɛ a ka o gbo che baŋ.
41006048	O nao kɛŋɔ baa won tawɛ kɛrɛdɛ kpa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ peu tao dɛɛ chem ba. Jabal logla sii saŋ la, o valɔ kpɔ nee la sie dɛɛ kaa ba be, dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin o tel ba kɛrɛdɛ.
41006049	Ba nao kɛŋɔ waa dɛ valɛ nee sie, dɛ lii kɛŋɔ lalee, dɛɛ dooge lɔŋɔre.
41006050	Ba bwa sekwara aa nao la, ba jum jaoh. Asɛ Yeesu bol waa ba be warane ŋɔ, "Hé lawɛ bambile. Menee! He bɛ ɔmɛ."
41006051	O jo ba be gbera la bini. Waa joa la, peu la helɔ. O habɔteŋra la bwa bwara hwaoh taeh.
41006052	Ba liire aa do toŋgboŋ baa wola paanoo la waa la mun noɛ la, a gelɔ ba bwara hwah.
41006053	Ba tawɔ ka chuge moo la baŋ le Gɛnɛsarɛt harɛ ta, dɛ lawɛ gbera la vɔwɛ.
41006054	Bug la ta baa le gbera la bini la, nɛra jemɛ Yeesu.
41006055	Anomanta ba chwao jo bwɛɛre aa lɔ bela la ta, dɛ che weela tena le ba kalaŋre ta dɛ kpɔ ba ba bela baa noa kɛ Yeesu lole la.
41006056	Bobɛlbwa Yeesu aa laŋa, bwɛjegre ta, bwɛjena ne daamune ta la, ba kaa che weela tena ba bil yaware ta, dɛ soŋo ŋɔ ó gel weela tena la lege o batakaare nyoa. Banɔ la baa lego la bwa gbaŋrɔ.
41007001	Farisii tena la ne Tɔn Jerema la bini bane baa le Jerusalam la pɛ nyoa dɛ ba cheme Yeesu sie.
41007002	Farisii tena la ne ba dɔŋa Juda tena la bwa ta ba nɔɔra samɛ ŋwɛnɛ saŋ la tena la aa bagla la ta naa, baa kwaa di, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba kii.
41007003	Dɛ ba le yawa ta ba naa, ba dɔ yagla bɛl baa dɛ yagle kondikwaa baa kpɔa le yawa ta ba la, dɛɛ loo ba numoli ne polowiine ne loga gɛ saŋ la tena aa bagla la mɔɔ dɛɛ di kwa.
41007004	Farisii tena la ne Tɔn Jerema la aa cheme Yeesu sie la, ba nao kɛ o habɔteŋra la bane chɔg ba kii la. Ba ta nɔɔra samɛ gɛ, dɛ kpɔ "nɔndoŋa" dɛɛ di kwa.
41007005	Ba bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛ waa he habɔteŋra nɔ ɛɛ jo ya kii nɛɛ baa wola sama yaa naanar aa bagle yaa ŋɔ yá samɛ la samɛ mɔɔ dɛɛ di kwaa nɔɔ?"
41007006	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He nɛra haa nyiŋi nɛra sie mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ wa! Korowii keame Aesaya na he waa bol kɛrɛdɛ kɛ waa ŋɔa ŋɔ, 'Nɛra nɔ te, nyoa gbo nee baa duu mɛ, kɛ ba tea bini te ta toe.
41007007	Nɛwɛnyini mmarare taa baa bagle ŋɔ nɛ́ra teŋɛ. Anomanta pɛɛpɛɛ baa tom mɛ.'
41007008	Korowii waa he gel, dɛ berɛ lawɛ he saŋ la waa bini."
41007009	Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ ba be ja ŋɔ, "Hé na gɛ haa vɛh Korowii waa la bil dɛ lawɛ he saŋ la waa bini!
41007010	Mosis Mmara la bini o ŋɔ, 'Duu he nya ne he mɛɛ,' dɛ, 'Nomɛlbwa waa bol o nya ne o mɛɛ bwara wechɔge la, a chɛ kɛ ba kpoo.'
41007011	Kɛ he te dɛ bagle he saŋ la waane kɛŋɔ dɛ nɛn dɔ komɛl dɛ́ won kpɔ cha o nya ne o mɛɛ, dɛ ŋɔ kon la ɛ Kɔɔban aa, Kɔɔban munii kɛŋɔ Korowii konee,
41007012	amɔ haa sɛh ó kpɔ kon la cha o nya ne o mɛɛ kpa.
41007013	He kpɔ he saŋ la waa la haa dɛ bagle la dɛɛ chɔg Korowii waa la. Waa haa dɛ ɛa ken warɔ."
41007014	Yeesu yerɛ nɛra la ba o be ja dɛ ŋɔ, "Hé bwa no n be dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ
41007015	kwaa nɛn aa dɛ di la laa gela o ɛ nɛnchɔge, anɔ la aa dɛ le o nyoa wɛɛ bol la, anee gela o ɛ nɛnchɔge.
41007016	Nomɛlbwa waa dɔ deŋna dɛ no la, ó no."
41007017	Yeesu gel nɛnlaa la bela dɛ ba dem, anee o habɔteŋra la bɔɔro sɛgla la mun.
41007018	O ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He ge aa a mun jemaa? Haa jemɛ kɛ kwaa haa dɛ di aa won gel he ɛ nɛnchɔge aa?
41007019	Aa he bambile bini kaa. He teene binii aa kaa, asɛ dɛɛ berɛ dahara." Yeesu aa bol waa nɔ la, o baglɔ kɛ kondikwaa bɛlbwa wer. Aa won gel nɛn ɛ nɛnchɔge.
41007020	Dɛ ŋɔ, "Waa aa le nɛn bambile bini la, anee gela o ɛ nɛnchɔge.
41007021	Liichɔga, jwamane, ŋwɛɛ, nɛŋkpoa,
41007022	dɔŋa haahna nyina, kwaa ta sibegra, musu wa, nɛra faahra, pɛlchɔga we-ɛɛla, kayɛglɛ, dɔŋa ŋwala, karamani wa, ne liire bɛ dɔe, bambile binii a le.
41007023	Anee gela nɛn ɛ nɛnchɔge."
41007024	Yeesu berɔ ir le bela kaa Taaya pera, dɛ ka jo dem bɛl ta, dɛ fee so bela tama asɛ nomɛlbwa bɛ jemɛ, kɛ o ta wone sɔh.
41007025	Belaa haah bɛl kwaa aa dɛ ir o bihaah nɛɛ no Yeesu waa dɛ ba guŋi o sie dɛ soŋo ŋɔ ó doŋi kwaa la le o bihaah la nɛɛ tɛo.
41007026	Haah la ta Juda te ɛɛ, kɛ lola bini te, Siiria harɛ bobɛl baa dɛ yerɛ bela Finiisia tee.
41007027	Waa wola Juda te ɛɛ la, Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "A chɛ kɛ bechale di kwaa vagre mɔɔ nyootena ge di. Aa were kɛ ba kpɔ bechale kondikwaa tɛ nyootena."
41007028	Haah la wono no a mun dɛ ŋɔ, "Kpelaa he ŋɔ, Nomoa, kɛ nyootena aa bechale kondikompugrere aa leera la ge di aa?"
41007029	Yeesu ŋɔ, "Waa nɔ haa bola nɔ nomanta, kaa dem. Kwaa la le he bihaah la nɛ."
41007030	O la dem dɛ kwaa la le o bihaah la nɛ, asɛ o chɔ mpa ta.
41007031	Yeesu berɔ le Taaya harɛ dɛ kpɔ Sidon ne Dekapɔles harɛ dɛ kaa Galilia Moo la ta.
41007032	Nɛra bane kpɔ baa bɛl waa wola waa no, wobol waa do kpegri tɛo ba Yeesu be, dɛ soŋo ŋɔ ó kpɔ o nɔn dawɛ o nɛɛ ásɛ wɛɛ no waa dɛ won waa bola.
41007033	Yeesu kpɔ baa la le nɛra la baah ta, o ne o gbo ka che bokɛre, asɛ o kpɔ o nonie do baa la deŋna bini, dɛ berɛ ta nentane dɛ kpɔ lege o nyondoŋe,
41007034	dɛ ha sie nyiŋi nyundua dɛ hwee fuuu, dɛ ŋɔ baa la be ŋɔ, "Efata!" O munii kɛŋɔ, "Pili."
41007035	Bug la ta la, baa la deŋna pilo, asɛ o nyoa chaa, o won waa bola kɛrɛdɛ.
41007036	Yeesu aa chah baa la tonɛ la, o kah nɛra la ŋɔ ba bɛ nomɛlbwa be ŋɔ. Waa dɛ kah ba la, ate taa ba taa bol waa la kwara.
41007037	Belaa nɛra baa noa la nyoa kpo taeh, ba ŋɔ, "O ɛ wobɛlbwa kɛrɛdɛ, hale o gelɔ amumure ɛɛ no wa, dɛ won waa bola."
41008001	A ta bigre bɛlbwa nɛnlaa bane ba cheme Yeesu sie ja, kɛ dɛ ba ta komɛlbwa dɔe dɛ́ di. Anee Yeesu yerɛ o habɔteŋra la ba o sie dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ,
41008002	"Nɛra nɔ waa dɛ domɛ n tea, dɛkalkɛ n ne baa soga tɔpera atoroo nɔ, taraken ba ta komɛlbwa dɔe dɛ́ di.
41008003	Dɛ n gel ba gɛ ba kpɔ lɔr kaa laa, baa gwɛgre ŋwɛnɛ taa. Bane ge le bojaŋa."
41008004	Belaa o habɔteŋra la chaŋo ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ɛɛ dɛ dɔ paanoo tɛ gɛ nɛra nɔ dɔŋ bá di kpɔg nɔ baah nɔ?"
41008005	Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Paanoo aŋwɛnɛɛ he dɔɔ?" Anee ba ŋɔ anuanɛ.
41008006	Belaa o ŋɔ nɛnlaa la be ŋɔ bá so harɛ, asɛ o kpɔ paanoo anuanɛ la dɛ jam Korowii dɛ mɔne do o habɔteŋra la nɔɔra ta dɛ ŋɔ bá bɔne tɛ nɛnlaa la, ba ge bɔne tɛɛ ba.
41008007	Dɛ ba dɔ pɛŋa tama ge, asɛ o kpɔa jam Korowii dɛ ŋɔ bá bɔne a ge tɛɛ ba. Ba bɔnɔ tɛɛ ba,
41008008	asɛ ba di dɛ vagre. Anɔ la aa kaa la, ba paa a su wɛgrɛjena anuanɛ.
41008009	Nɛra baa di kwaa la ɛɛ ɛ nɛra kagboŋa banaarɛɛ.
41008010	Yeesu gelɔ ba pegre. O ne o habɔteŋra la jo gbera bini dɛ chagɛ Dalmanuta pera dɛ kaa.
41008011	Belaa Farisii tena bane ba Yeesu be dɛ ba tɔŋlo dɛ daahno na dɛɛ nyin o ɛ nyokpowaane bá na dɛ jemɛ o waa kɛŋɔ o le Korowii be kpela.
41008012	Yeesu hweero fuuu dɛ ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ fini nɔ nɛra ɛɛ nyin nyokpowaa dɛ́ na nɔɔ? Kasinteŋ, maa wobɛlbwaa ɛ fini nɔ nɛra na."
41008013	Asɛ dɛ gel Farisii tena la bela dɛ berɛ jo gbera bini kaa baŋ bɛl.
41008014	Yeesu habɔteŋra la soɔh, ba ta kondikwaa kpɔe, dɛ ba ge ta komɛlbwa dɔe ba be gbera la bini nemenɛ paanoo beŋkpoŋ.
41008015	Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ Farisii tena ne Hɛrɔd iisi wa."
41008016	Ba ta o sɛgla la mun noɛ, dɛ bol dɔŋa be ŋɔ paanoo baa wola dɔe waa o ken ɛɛ bol.
41008017	Belaa Yeesu aa no waa baa dɛ bol la, o pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛ waa hɛɛ pɛɛ dɔŋa paanoo bɛ dɔe waa nɔɔ? Saŋ la bwa haa waa mun no mɔɔ naa? Ɛrɛɛ he liire do toŋgboŋ ken?
41008018	He dɔ sibie kɛ haa na naa? He dɔ deŋna ge kɛ haa waa no aa? Haa waa lii kɛɛ?
41008019	Maa mɔne paanoo anue tɛ nɛra kagboŋa banue ba di ka la, a kabora haa paa la, wɛgrɛre aŋwɛnɛɛ he dɔɔ?" Anee ba ŋɔ fi dɛ anɛ.
41008020	O berɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Asɛ maa mɔne paanoo anuanɛ tɛ nɛra kagboŋa banaarɛ la, wɛgrɛ dela aŋwɛnɛ gee he dɔɔ?" Ba ŋɔ anuanɛ.
41008021	O ŋɔ, "He ta a mun noɛ ja aa?"
41008022	Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la Bɛtsaeda. Asɛ nɛra bane kpɔ baa bɛl waa nyoŋa ba o be, dɛ ba soŋo ŋɔ ó kpɔ nɔn lege nyoŋe la ó sie pili.
41008023	Belaa Yeesu lawɛ nyoŋe la nɔn dɛ kpɔɔ le bwɛɛ la dahara dɛ ka ta nentane do o sie ta, dɛ kpɔ nɔɔra dawɛ o nɛ, dɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, "He dɛ na bɔr aa?"
41008024	Nyoŋe la laa sie ir dɛ ŋɔ, "N na nɛra baa valɛ, kɛ n dɛ na ba kɛ daa ken."
41008025	Yeesu berɔ kpɔ nɔɔra dawɛ o sie ta ja, o nyiŋi bɔr jeiih ken, dɛ a magrɔ, name te wɛɛ na bɔr gereŋ.
41008026	Asɛ Yeesu kaoh ŋɔ ó kaa o dem dɛ bɛ a waa bol tɛ nomɛlbwa bwɛɛ bini.
41008027	Belaa Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la la bwɛɛre aa lɔ Sisaaria Felepae lɔga. Baa dɛ kaa la, o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Nɛn besoo nɛra ɛɛ lii mɛ nɔ?"
41008028	Anee ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nɛra bane ŋɔ Jɔn o faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee laanee hen. Bane ŋɔ Korowii keame Elaejaa hen. Asɛ bane ge ŋɔ Korowii keamere la bɛlee hen."
41008029	O berɔ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Nɛn besoo he gee lii mɛ nɔ?" Anee Pita ŋɔ, "Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ásɛ o ba lɛ yaa laanee hen."
41008030	Yeesu kah ba ŋɔ ba bɛ o waa bol bagle nomɛlbwa.
41008031	Belaa Yeesu pa mun dɛɛ bagle o habɔteŋra la kɛ a chɛ kɛ o Nɛn Bie la na wahala kohona waa bwa ta, asɛ nomonome ne Sɔfore ne Tɔn Jerema vɛoh, asɛ ba kpoo, asɛ a tɔpera atoro wee la o ir seo ta.
41008032	O bol gɛ waa nɔ ba be kaih ken. Anee Pita lawɔ le bokɛre dɛ kaoh ŋɔ o bɛ gɛ bol.
41008033	Belaa Yeesu ha sie dɛ nyiŋi o habɔteŋra la dɛ kah Pita dɛ ŋɔ, "Le n jwɛh, Bɔnsam! Haa anla Korowii aa dɛ nyin la lii nemenɛ nɛra tetoowa."
41008034	Belaa o yerɛ nɛnlaa ne o habɔteŋra la dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Dɛ nomɛlbwa dɛ nyin kɛ o teŋɛ n nɛ aa, ó gel o tetookwaa nyina, dɛ kpɔ o te tɛ dɛ sɛh wahala nae ne seo bwa, dɛ baa teŋɛ n nɛɛ kɛŋɔ nɛn waa kpɔ dagagre che bá ka kpaaro pɛl o ta la,
41008035	dɛkalkɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa o sie aa swɛɛ harɛ nɔ ta silɛɛ kwaa ta la, wɛɛ paŋɛ o nyuu. Asɛ nomɛlbwa ge waa koh n ne Korowii Amanesoma nɔ waa dɛ kpɔ o nyu ta la, wɛɛ dɔ o nyuu.
41008036	Dɛ nɛn dɔ harɛ nɔ ta kwaa bwa dɛ nyogre o nyu aa, dɛ bɔkwa tɔnɔɔ o dɔɔ?
41008037	Bɔkwaa nɛwɛnyini ɛɛ ba wona kpɔ dɛ charɛ o nyu ɔ?
41008038	Wechɔg-ɛɛra baa vɛh n waa fini nɔ, baa ba nyuu dɔ n bala tɔpere. Naate sihiih aa dɛ kpoe n ne waa nɔ waa taraken nɔ la, awola n Nɛn Bie ne nyundua toromedɛɛga la aa ba n Mɛɛ jirima ne la, maa he heehra ba awola tɔpere."
41009001	Asɛ o ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, Korowii ɛɛ ba di o Koraa kpegri nɛɛ harɛ nɔ ta, dɛ he bini bane ta soge le dɛ nao."
41009002	Aa di tɔpera anumɛl la, Yeesu tɔ Pita ne Jems ne Jɔn sie ba ka teeh bwejen bɛl, dɛ gbo ka pɛ so o doa bobɛl. Baa soga la, dɛ Yeesu begrɔ,
41009003	asɛ o laala bwa to dɛɛ nyɛgle al-al ken dɛ to kohona gwaa gɛ baa chɛgɛ laala a yon to la.
41009004	Ba ne ŋɔ ba nyiŋi dɛ Elaeja ne Mosis ja o nɛɛ ba ne wɛɛ bol wa.
41009005	Asɛ Pita ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, a wer taeh kɛŋɔ yaa lɔ bonɔ nɔ. Gel ya do kukure atoro ásɛ he kpɔ bɛl, Mosis kpɔ bɛl, Elaeja ge kpɔ bɛl."
41009006	Ɔmee lag ba kohona dɛ gel Pita aa dɛ bol waa kwaraa la, dɛ waa waa waa dɛ bol la mun jemɛ.
41009007	Belaa bam bɛl ba tɔ ba nɛ, asɛ ba no taa bɛl bam la bini kɛ,
41009008	"N Bie maa dɛ nyinuu nɔ. Hé cheg deŋne dɛ no o be." Ba te ne taa la noe tonɛ dɛ ke nyiŋi dɛ nomɛlbwa toole bela. Yeesu gboo ba na kɛŋɔ o ja ba nɛɛ bela.
41009009	Baa le bwe la doa dɛɛ ba la, Yeesu ja ba ŋɔ, "He bɛ waa nɔ haa naa nɔ taa bagle nomɛlbwa bwa dɛ ka tel kɛŋɔ n Nɛn Bie la aa sewɛ dɛ ir mɔɔ."
41009010	Anomanta ba ta nomɛlbwa be ŋɔe, kɛ dɛ ba te gbagba dɛ bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Seo bini ira nɔ te munii ɛrɛ te nɔ?"
41009011	Anee ba bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Aah ɛrɛ waa Tɔn Jerema la ɛɛ bagle ŋɔ a chɛ kɛŋɔ Elaeja tɔ sie ba mɔɔ Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la ge ba nɔɔ?"
41009012	Asɛ o chaŋe ŋɔ, "Elaejaa dɛ tɔ sie ba kpela, dɛ́ ba kwaa ŋwɛnɛ mɔɔ. Kɛ ɛrɛ waa Korowii Tɔn la ŋɔ Nɛn Bie la dɛ ba wahala nae kohona, kɛ nɛwɛnyini sie aa o tɔga ba laɔ?
41009013	Kasinteŋ, Elaeja balɔ dɛ kaa. Waa bala la, ba tetooraa ba ɛo. Gɛɛ ba chwerɛ o waa Korowii Tɔn bini la."
41009014	Baa baa tel o habɔteŋra la kabora la be la, dɛ nɛnlaa bar ba cheme, asɛ ba ne Tɔn Jerema bane ɛɛ tɔŋle wa.
41009015	Nɛra la aa na Yeesu la, ba bwara yɔrɔ, asɛ ba chwa dɛ ba jaamo.
41009016	Asɛ o bɔɔ o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa he ne baa tɔŋle laɔ?"
41009017	Baa bɛl le nɛra la bini dɛ ŋɔ, "Nomoa, kwaa dɛ ir n bie nɛɛ dɛ gel waa won waa bol, asɛ n kpɔɔ ba he be.
41009018	A iraa, gɛɛ a goo harɛ, asɛ fufug ɛɛ le o nyoa, dɛ o dɛ chwe o nyena, dɛ beŋri chɔ. N soŋe he habɔteŋra la ŋɔ bá doŋi kwaa la ta, asɛ ba doŋa kahonɛ."
41009019	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Oo! Ɛrɛɛ he fini nɔ nɛra aa wola yarada dɔe bwa nɔɔ? Tɔpera aŋwɛnɛɛ hɛɛ nyin kɛ ń lawɛ bambile dɛ so he be mɔɔ he yarada Korowii ɔ? Maa tɔpere bɛl dii ba he be kpa oo! Hé kpɔ bie la ba tɛ mɛ."
41009020	Asɛ ba kpɔ bie la ba tɛo. O kwaa aa dɛ ir o nɛɛ la aa na Yeesu la, a tagɔ ta, asɛ o chɔ dɛɛ yo gɛ gbuŋgbuŋri te aa dɛ ɛ la, dɛɛ gbili bɔr bwa, dɛ fufug dɛ le o nyoa.
41009021	Asɛ Yeesu bɔɔ bie la mɛɛ ŋɔ, "Saŋ besoo weela nɔ lawɔ wɔ?" Asɛ o mɛɛ la ŋɔ, "O bechale saŋ bwaa a lawɔ.
41009022	Kwaa la ir o nɛɛ aa, dɛ a dɛ nyin o kpoe. Tɔpebɛla a tagɔ dɛɛ ta nii ta, tɔpebɛla ge a tagɔ dɛɛ ta nee ta. Dɛ hɛɛ wonoo chaoh waa, na ya sum dɛ chaoh tɛ yaa."
41009023	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ wonoo chaoh waa, a lɔ he be. Nɛn waa yarada Korowii la, Korowii won wobɛlbwa ɛɛ dɛ tɛo."
41009024	Bug la ta dɛ baa la sɛoh takpeg ne ŋɔ, "N yaradao, kɛ n yarada aa kanɛ. Cha mɛ ń yaradao kohona."
41009025	Asɛ Yeesu aa baa na kɛŋɔ nɛra wuro dɛɛ ba ba tɔ ba nɛɛ la, o den kɔr kwaa aa dɛ ir bie la nɛɛ la ŋɔ, "He konchɔga haa dɛ ir bie nɔ nɛɛ waa wola waa no, waa berɛ won dɛɛ bol waa ge nɔ, n ŋɔ he be ŋɔ hé le o nɛ! He bɛ o nɛɛ ba so kpa bwa!"
41009026	Ate dɛ kwaa la sio kpegri ne dɛ tagɛ bie la ta harɛ, asɛ o chɔ dɛɛ yo kɛŋɔ gbuŋgbuŋri te ken mɔɔ a le o nɛ. Anee o chɔ kɛŋɔ waa sewa ken. Asɛ nɛra kɛrɛdɛ ŋɔ o sewɔ.
41009027	Belaa Yeesu lawɛ o nɔn o ir.
41009028	Yeesu aa ba dem a ka o ne o habɔteŋra la gbo la, ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛ waa ya te aa wola wone kɔr kwaa la á le nɔɔ?"
41009029	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Korowii soŋa gboo won a gɛ kwaa nɔ doŋa."
41009030	O ne o habɔteŋra la le bela dɛ kpɔ Galilia harɛ ta kaa. Dɛ waa nyin kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa jemɛ bela waa lole,
41009031	dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ o dɛ bagle o habɔteŋra la wa, dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Ba dɛ ba n Nɛn Bie lee do nɛra nɔn ta, asɛ ba kpo mɛ, asɛ a tɔpetooro wee la, n ir seo ta."
41009032	Dɛ ba ta Yeesu waa waa bola la mun noɛ, kɛ dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ kɛŋɔ bá bɔɔro a mun.
41009033	Asɛ ba ba Kapeeneɔm. Baa baa jo dea la, Yeesu bɔɔ o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa he tɔŋle ŋwɛnɛ ta laɔ?"
41009034	Ba ta wone chaŋo, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ ba dɛ nyin ba jemɛ ba bini onɔ la waa ɛ ba bwa nomoa, dɛɛ di a gɛ tɔŋla.
41009035	Asɛ Yeesu so harɛ dɛ yer ba dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Naate waa dɛ nyin kɛ o ɛ he bwa nomoa la, a chɛ kɛŋɔ o ɛ o te bechala dɛɛ tomɛ heya."
41009036	Anee o lawɛ bechajega bɛl ba che ba baah ta, dɛ kpɔɔ, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ,
41009037	"Nomɛlbwa waa koh n waa dɛ nyiŋi bie nɔ dɔŋ nɛɛ la, dɛ menee o nyiŋi la. Nomɛlbwa ge waa nyiŋi n nɛɛ la, dɛ n gbo laa o nyiŋi. Dɛ naate waa tom mɛ la nɛɛ o nyiŋi la."
41009038	Jɔn ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ya na baa bɛl waa kpɔ he sɔn dɛɛ doŋi kwaa nɛra nɛ, asɛ ya kaoh ŋɔ ó gel, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o ta ya bini bɛl ɛɛ."
41009039	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "He bɛ on kah ŋɔ ó gel, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa toole dɛ won che n sɔn ta ɛ a gɛ nyokpowaa nɔ dɔŋa dɛ berɛ yerɛ n sɔnchɔge kpa.
41009040	Nomɛlbwa waa wola ya nɛɛ chegɛ la, dɛ ya somee.
41009041	Kasinteŋ, nomɛlbwa waa koh kɛ he ɛ men Kristo nɛra nomanta dɛ tɛ heyaa nee hé nyɔ la, waa o kembɔr paŋa ba bwa.
41009042	"Nomɛlbwa waa negre bechajegre nɔ dɔŋ bɛlbwa waa dɛ yarada mɛ nɔ asɛ o ɛ wechɔga la, dɛ ba fe vɔwɛ nambwe do o baŋa dɛ kpɔɔ ka ta moo vil ta kwaraa fe bɔ.
41009043	Dɛ he nɔn ɛɛ negree he ɛ wechɔga aa, teŋo ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he kpoŋe nɔmbeŋkpoŋ dɛ dɔ Korowii be kaa bɔ haa kpoŋe nɔɔra anɛ dɛ kaa Bɔnsam nii aa wola dime bwa la ta.
41009045	Dɛ he nakpala gee negree he ɛ wechɔga aa, teŋo ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ he nakpale teŋno he dɔ Korowii be kaa laa, a bɔ kɛŋɔ haa dɔ nakpale anɛ dɛ kaa Bɔnsam nii ta.
41009047	Dɛ he siwi gee geloo he ɛ wechɔga aa, fomo ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he kpoŋe siwi beŋkpoŋ dɛ ja Korowii Kora ta bɔ kɛŋɔ haa kpoŋe sibie anɛ dɛ kaa Bɔnsam nii ta,
41009048	belaa dudule aa dɛ di ba ola la aa wola sewɛ bwa, nii aa dɛ fuuh ba la ge aa dime bwa.
41009049	Anomanta Korowii ɛɛ kpɔ niinii ɛ nɛra bwa kɛŋɔ ba yon kpɔ yar merɛ kwaa ta la.
41009050	"Yar wer. Kɛ dɛ aa somɛ kpa aa, ɛrɛɛ baa ba a ɛɛ a do som jaɔ? Anomanta hé ne he dɔŋa so kɛrɛdɛ dɛ do som gɛ yar aa soma la. Hé gel he nyoa pɛ."
41010001	Asɛ Yeesu le bela dɛ la Judia harɛ ta, dɛ ka le Jɔɔdan Moo la baŋ. Nɛndamanta wur dɛ ba tɔ o nɛɛ ja, asɛ o bag ba waa gɛ o yon dɛɛ ɛ la.
41010002	Farisii tena bane ba bela dɛ baa hagro bela dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin dɛ́ lawɔ. Ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Mmara dɛ tɛ ŋwɛnɛ kɛŋɔ baa vɛh o haah naa?"
41010003	Anee o ge berɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ Mosis Mmara bagle heyaa laɔ?"
41010004	Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Mosis tɛ ŋwɛnɛ kɛŋɔ baa chwerɛ tɔn dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ o vɛh o haah, dɛ vɛoh."
41010005	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He bambikpeg waa Mosis chwerɛ a gɛ mmara nɔ tɛ heyaa la.
41010006	Gɛ laa a fa do wubwa. Korowii aa ta kwaa bwa mumpar la, 'Baa ne haahnee o ta.
41010007	A waa baa ɛɛ ba o nya ne o mɛɛ jwɛɛh lee, dɛ kpɔ o te ka pɛl o haah,
41010008	ásɛ ba nɛra banɛ la pɛ ɛ nɛmbeŋkpoŋ la. Anomanta baa nɛra banɛ ɛɛ ba kpa, ba pɛo ɛ beŋkpoŋ.'
41010009	Dɛ Korowii lawɛ nɛra banɛ pɛ aa, ŋwɛnɛ toole kɛŋɔ nɛn berɛ pere ba baah kpa."
41010010	Baa la dem la, o habɔteŋra la berɔ bɔɔro a gɛ waa nɔ ja.
41010011	Asɛ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa vɛh o haah dɛ ka mo onfale la, dɛ o ɛ o haah la wechɔga dɛ bɔ jwamane.
41010012	Dɛ haah ge vɛh o jaa dɛ ka yalɛ banfale aa, dɛ o ge ɛ o jaa la wechɔga dɛ bɔ jwamane."
41010013	Dɛ nɛra bane kpɔ ba bii dɛɛ ba o be, dɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ o kpɔ o nɔɔra dawɛ ba nɛ. Asɛ o habɔteŋra la ɛɛ tɔ ba ŋwɛnɛ ŋɔ bá kpɔ ba bii le le!
41010014	Yeesu aa na gɛ baa dɛ ɛ la, o baah di ba nɛ, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He bɛ bii la ŋwɛnɛ tɔ. Hé gel ba ba n be, dɛkalkɛŋɔ banɔ dɔŋa nɔɔ Korowii koobii la.
41010015	Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, naate waa wola o te kpɔe tɛ Korowii dɛ yaradao gɛ bechala aa dɛ ɛ la, waa bɔree dɔ dɛ ba ja o Kora la ta."
41010016	Asɛ o kpɔ bii la, dɛ kpɔ o nɔɔra dawɛ ba nɛɛ dɛ swee ba andɛɛga.
41010017	Yeesu aa bera dɛɛ ba ŋwɛnɛ ta lee dɛ kaa la, baa bɛl chwao dɛ ba guŋi o sie dɛ ŋɔ, "Nomondɛɛge, ɛrɛɛ mɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ́ dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe yɔ?"
41010018	Asɛ Yeesu bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he yer mɛ nɛndɛɛge nɔɔ? Nomɛlbwa toole dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge. Korowii gbosoo ɛ nɛndɛɛge.
41010019	Kɛ he jemɛ Korowii mmarare laɔ? Anee, 'Bɛ nɛn kpo, bɛ jwamane bɔ, bɛ ŋwɛ, bɛ nyosone teŋe dawɛ he dɔŋ nɛ, bɛ he dɔŋ faah, dɛɛ duu he nya ne hɛɛh.' "
41010020	Anee o ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, n bechale saŋ bwaa n le dɛ teŋɛ anɔ bwa ta."
41010021	Yeesu nyiŋu, o sie lɛ o nɛ, dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "A ka he webeŋkpoŋ. La ka yog kwaa haa dɔa bwa, asɛ dɛ kpɔ a suuga kɛ nyaara. He ɛ gɛ naa, hɛɛ dɔ kondɔɔh cheg Korowii doa. Ka ɛ gɛ asɛ dɛ ba teŋɛ n nɛ."
41010022	Yeesu aa ŋɔ gɛ la, ate dɛ o tea bini chɔgɔ, asɛ o berɛ gure nyu su, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ o dɔ kwaa kɛrɛdɛ.
41010023	Asɛ Yeesu ke nyiŋi o habɔteŋra la dɛ ŋɔ, "Aa do kpegrii tɛ dɔɔhna kɛŋɔ bá dɔ bɔr ja Korowii Kora la ta."
41010024	A gɛ waa la Yeesu aa bola la gelɔ o habɔteŋra la bwara yɔr. O ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Biiwa, a kpegri kɛŋɔ nɛn dɔ bɔr ja Korowii Kora la ta.
41010025	Aa do pwɛree tɛ nyogma kɛŋɔ ó won jo tɔɔge bɔɔ ta gwaa kɛŋɔ dɔɔh naa wona ja Korowii Kora ta."
41010026	Yeesu aa bol gɛ la, dɛ o habɔteŋra la bwa bwara yɔrɔ, asɛ baa bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Amɔ te, umee dɛɛ ba o nyu dɔe yɔ?"
41010027	Belaa Yeesu pa sie nyiŋ ba dɛ ŋɔ, "Nɛwɛnyini bee a do kpegri, kɛ Korowii be te, wobɛlbwa aa kpege. Wobɛlbwa pwɛre Korowii be."
41010028	Belaa Pita ŋɔ, "Nyiŋi na, ya te gel komɛlbwa yaa dɔa dɛ ba teŋɛ he nɛ."
41010029	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, nomɛlbwa waa koh n ne Amanesoma nɔ waa dɛ gel o bwɛɛ tena ne o nimanar ne o dɔɔranar ne o nahaahnanar, ne o nya ne o mɛɛ, ne o bii ne o kooni la,
41010030	wɛɛ dɔ a gɛ bwɛɛre ne nimanar ne dɔɔranar ne nyawa ne bii ne kooni nɔ bɛlbwa kembɔree kera lafa harɛ nɔ ta dɛ ja hɔhɔrɔwa nɛra aa dɛ ba o haeh dɛ ɛo la ta. A bwa habɔɔ la, wɛɛ dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe gee nyundua ja.
41010031	Nɛra baa tɔ sie taraken kɛrɛdɛ ɛɛ ba ka munii, asɛ nɛra baa ka mun taraken nɔ kɛrɛdɛ ba tɔ sie."
41010032	Dɛ ba lɔ ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ kaa Jerusalam, asɛ Yeesu tɔ ba sie. Dɛ o habɔteŋra la bwara yɔrɔ, asɛ nɛra la baa teŋɛ o nɛɛ la bwa gee ɔmɛ. Asɛ Yeesu berɛ lawɛ o habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la kaa bokɛre dɛ ka taa waa aa dɛ ba o ɛɛ la bwa bag ba,
41010033	dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Yaa dɛ kaa Jerusalam nɔ, baa ka le n Nɛn Bie laanee tɛ Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema la. Baa pa mɛ bolchɔgee dɛ ŋɔ bá kpo mɛ, dɛ kpɔ mɛ do nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la nɔn ta.
41010034	Baa di n loroo, dɛ tata nentane ta n nɛ, dɛ chacha mɛ chweremi, dɛ kpaa mɛ pɛl dagagre ta dɛ kpo mɛ. Kɛ a tɔpetooro wee mɛɛ berɔɔ ir seo ta."
41010035	Asɛ Sebedii bii Jems ne Jɔn ba o be dɛ ba ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ya dɛ nyin he ɛ waane tɛ yaa."
41010036	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Bɔkwaa yɔ?"
41010037	Belaa ba chaŋe ŋɔ, "He baa di he kora waa dɔ jirima dɛ so he kookara ta naa, ya dɛ nyin kɛ he gel ya so pɛle, bɛl so he dig ta, bɛl ge so he gal ta."
41010038	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Haa waa haa dɛ bol nɔ mun jemɛ. Hɛɛ wonoo nyɔ n tɛgkpela maa dɛ ba nyɔe nɔ ane kenɛ? Hɛɛ wonoo na hɔhɔrɔwa maa dɛ ba nae nɔ dɔŋa aa?"
41010039	Anee ba sɛh ŋɔ, "Yaa wonoo." Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kpelaa! Hɛɛ nyɔ n tɛgkpela nɔ anee dɛ na n hɔhɔrɔwa nɔ dɔŋa.
41010040	Kɛ n ta kpegri dɔe dɛ́ chagle naate waa so n dig ta ne n gal ta. Korowii gboo jemɛ nɛra waa kwaa a gɛ bɔra la cheg dɛ́ kpɔ ba ka so bela."
41010041	Yeesu habɔteŋra kabora la baa no a gɛ waa nɔ la, ba baah di Jems ne Jɔn nɛ.
41010042	Anomanta Yeesu yerɛ ba bwa ba o be dɛ ŋɔ, "He jemɔ kɛŋɔ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la te, ba nomonome dɛ di kpegri ba nɛ, dɛ yon gel baa tom ba.
41010043	Kɛ gɛ laa chɛ kɛŋɔ a do he te be. Dɛ he bini bɛl dɛ nyin o ɛ he bwa nomoa aa, a chɛ kɛŋɔ o kpɔ o te ɛ bechala dɛɛ tomɛ heya.
41010044	Dɛ he bini bɛl dɛ nyin o ɛ o te sitɔɔ raa, a chɛ kɛŋɔ o sɛh dɛ berɛ o te kɛ he bwa bonɔɔ,
41010045	dɛkalkɛŋɔ n Nɛn Bie kwaraa ta balɛ kɛ nɛ́ra baa tom mɛ. N te balɔ dɛ́ ba tomɛ nɛwɛnyini, dɛ kpɔ n nyu charɛ nɛndamanta mkpa."
41010046	Ba ba Jeriko, asɛ Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la ne nɛnlaa bane aa le bela dɛɛ kaa la, dɛ Temeos binyoŋe Baatemeos o yon dɛɛ soŋe kwaa saŋ bɛlbwa la soge ŋwɛnɛ la keŋkeŋ.
41010047	Waa noa kɛŋɔ Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt laanee la, dɛ o dɛ yerɛ Yeesu takpeg ne dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Devid Naa Yeesu, na n sum!"
41010048	Asɛ nɛra kɛrɛdɛ kaoh ŋɔ ó tɔ nyoa. Kɛ o ta ban chaŋɛ. Namee o ta do lɔŋɔ kohona dɛɛ yerɛ, "Devid Naa Yeesu, na n sum!"
41010049	Asɛ Yeesu che dɛ ŋɔ, "Hé yerɔ." Asɛ ba yerɛ nyoŋe la dɛ ŋɔ, "Sɔɔh bwara dɛ ir! O dɛ yerɛ."
41010050	Asɛ o wur o yal vigri, dɛ jah ir che dɛ ba Yeesu be.
41010051	Belaa Yeesu bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Bɔkwaa he ŋɔ ń ɛ tɛɛ nɔ?" Asɛ nyoŋe la ŋɔ, "Nomoa, n dɛ nyin n won dɛɛ na."
41010052	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Kaa. He yarada haa yarada mɛ la gelɔ he dɔ bokpega." Bug la ta dɛ o wono dɛɛ na, dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ ŋwɛnɛ la ta.
41011001	Baa dɛ tel Jerusalam dɛɛ bɛne Bɛtfej ne Bɛtani la, Ɔlevere Bwe la bɔr bela la, o tomɛ o habɔteŋra la banɛ ŋɔ bá tɔ sie,
41011002	dɛ ŋɔ, "Hé la bwɛɛ nɔ waa lɔ sie le nɔ ta. Haa dɛɛ tel bela la, hɛɛ nao kɛŋɔ baa vɔwɛ keego bie bɛl nomɛlbwa aa wola on teehnɛ bwa. Hé puru dɛ kpɔ ba bonɔ.
41011003	Asɛ dɛ nomɛl bɔɔ heyaa ŋɔ bɔkwaa hɛɛ ba o ne ɛɛ yaa, hé ŋɔ he dɔɔ la dɛ nyinu dɛ́ ɛ waane, asɛ he berɛ kpɔ ba taraken."
41011004	Asɛ ba la dɛ ka na keego bie bɛl baa lawɔ vɔwɛ ŋwɛnɛ nyoa doonyoa bɛl jwɛh.
41011005	Baa dɛ puru la, nɛra baa chegɛ bela la bane bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Bɔkwaa he pur keego bie la dɛ́ɛ ɛɔ?"
41011006	Asɛ ba bol gɛ Yeesu aa ŋɔa bá bol la, asɛ nɛra la tɛɛ ba ŋwɛnɛ.
41011007	Ba kpɔ keego bie la ba tɛ Yeesu dɛ pa ba yale darawe o habɔɔ, asɛ Yeesu so o ta.
41011008	Nɛndamanta tɛo jirima dɛ pa ba yale pa ŋwɛnɛ ta, asɛ bane ge kɛ papooni bela kooni la ta dɛ pa ŋwɛnɛ la bwa ta.
41011009	Dɛ nɛra baa tɔ Yeesu sie ne banɔ la baa ka mun la bwa dɛ si, "Woowo! Korowii kwaa naate waa dɛ ba o sɔn ta nɔ kwa!
41011010	Korowii swee ya Naa Devid kora nɔ waa dɛ ba ira ja nɔ andɛɛga! Korowii jam!"
41011011	Yeesu la Jerusalam dɛ ka jo Korowii Dea bini dɛ nyinyiŋi waa aa dɛ ɛ bela la bwa. Bɔr aa dɛ jo la nomanta, o ne o habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la kaa Bɛtani.
41011012	Tɔɔ aa pera, ba le Bɛtani dɛɛ ba la, dɛ lɔr lawɛ Yeesu.
41011013	O na pur bɛl bojaŋ dɛ o mogɛ papooni sukuu ken, dɛ fe la o mun ŋɔ o ken fe ɛɛ dɔ o nɔna anee di kɛɛ? Waa tel bela la dɛ papooni gboo tɔ daa la bwa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ pure nɔna ta tele mɔɔ.
41011014	Belaa Yeesu taah pur daa la ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa aa he nɔna dii ba kpa bwa." Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, o habɔteŋra la noɔ.
41011015	Baa tel Jerusalam la, Yeesu jo Korowii Dea bobɛl dɛɛ doŋi kon-yogra ne kon-yarawa baa lɔ bela la. O berɛ nɛra baa lɔ bela dɛɛ pegri suuga la teeburre bwa piigi, dɛ tagɛ banɔ la baa dɛ yog brɔnomare la bwa kane tata.
41011016	O ta sɛɛh nomɛlbwa kpɔ bone bɛlbwa kpɔ Korowii Dea la bini.
41011017	Asɛ o bol waa dɛɛ bag ba ŋɔ, "Ba ta chwerɛ ŋɔ, 'Baa yerɛ n dea nɛwɛnyina bwa Korowii soŋebɔr' yaa? Gɛɛ he te berɛ kpɔɔ berɛ ŋwɛɛra sɔɔhbɔr aa?"
41011018	Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema la aa no a gɛ waa nɔ la, belaa ba pa mun dɛɛ nyin ŋwɛnɛ dɛ́ kpo Yeesu. Dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ o webagla dɛ kpo nɛra bwa nyoa.
41011019	Bɔr aa ba dɛ jo la, Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la le bwɛɛ la ta.
41011020	A tɔɔ aa pera chɔmbibi ne ba valɛ ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ kaa la, ba kaa le pur daa la ta, dɛ o sewɔ kwaraa le o nyundua ka le o lune bwa ta.
41011021	Belaa Pita lii gɛ aa ɛa mɔɔ daa la sewɛ la, dɛ ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, na. Pur daa la haa taahno la sewɔ!"
41011022	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé yarada Korowii.
41011023	Kasinteŋ, nomɛlbwa waa won kpɔ yarada ŋɔ bwe nɔ be ŋɔ ó ir ka le moo ta, waa wola tɔŋlɛ o bambile ta tamaa bɛlbwa, dɛ yarada kɛŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ wonoo ɛ gɛ la, aa ɛo tɛo kpela ge.
41011024	Anomanta, kasinteŋ, dɛ he dɛ soŋe Korowii komɛl aa, hé yarada kɛŋɔ he dɔɔ dɔ kon la. Dɛ he wono yarada gɛ naa, komɛlbwa haa soŋe la, Korowii ɛɛ tɛ heyaa.
41011025	Dɛ he iro che dɛɛ soŋe Korowii ge aa, wobɛlbwa he bala bane aa ɛ heyaa la, hé kpɔ kɛ ba ásɛ he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la ge kpɔ he wechɔga kɛ heya."
41011027	Asɛ Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra berɛ ba jo Jerusalam ja. Yeesu aa ba dɛ valɛ Korowii Dea la bini la, Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema ne bela nomonome la ba o be
41011028	dɛ ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Umee tɛɛ ŋwɛnɛ kɛŋɔ he ɛ gɛ waa nɔ haa dɛ ɛ nɔɔ? Umee tɛɛ kpegri kwaraa te nɔ?"
41011029	Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Ń bɔɔ heyaa webeŋkpoŋ, dɛ he wono jemaa, mɛɛ bagle heyaa naate waa tɛ mɛ ŋwɛnɛ mɛɛ ɛ gɛ waa nɔ.
41011030	Umee tɛ Jɔn kpegri wɛɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee laɔ? Korowii tɛo waa, kɛ nɛwɛnyinii tɛo wɔ? Hé bag mɛ naate."
41011031	Ate dɛ ba gbogbo dɛ tɔŋle dɔŋa dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Aah ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ŋɔe yɔ? Dɛ ya ŋɔ Korowiirii tɛo waa, wɛɛ ŋɔɔ, 'Aah ɛrɛɛ haa wola Jɔn yaradae yɔ?'
41011032	Kɛ dɛ ya ŋɔ nɛwɛnyinii tɛo ge aa, aa werii do." Dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ ba gbagba nɛra la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ nomɛlbwa yaradao kɛŋɔ Korowii keamee Jɔn.
41011033	Anomanta ba waa baa bola laanee kɛŋɔ, "Yaa jemɛ." Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Gɛ haa wola jemɛ la, gɛɛ n ge aa wola heyaa naate waa tɛ mɛ ŋwɛnɛ mɛɛ ɛ a gɛ waa nɔ maa dɛ ɛ nɔɔ bagle.
41012001	"Baa bɛlee parɛ kwaa ane baa kpɔa dɛɛ daa sen, dɛ ke a gɛ koo la, dɛ kwaa bɔr baa dɛɛ harame a nee dɛɛ do, dɛ chigri jɛŋla bela, bá so o ta dɛɛ daah koo la, dɛ kpɔ nɛra báa ɛ koo la toma, a koma telaa, ba dɔ ba bɔr. A habɔɔ la o kpɔ koo la tɛɛ ba bá nyiŋi o ta tɛo, dɛ kaa harɛ bɛl ta.
41012002	Koma saŋ aa baa tel la, o tomɛ o bonɔɔ bɛl ŋɔ ó ka lɛ o dibɔr ba tɛo.
41012003	Bonɔɔ la aa laŋa la, nɛra la lawɔ dɛ lɔɔro dɛ doŋu o kaa. Ba ta on komɛlbwa tɛɛ o kaa.
41012004	Koote la berɔ tomɛ o bonɔn-nɛɛte, asɛ ba lɔɔ o ge dɛ doo bol o nyu ta dɛ ɛo wilewile ken.
41012005	Asɛ koo te la berɛ tomɛ o bonɔɔna la bɛl ja, asɛ nɛra la lawɔ dɛ kpoo. Gɛɛ o tomɛ toroma bane ja, asɛ ba lɔɔ bane dɛ kpo bane ge.
41012006	"Dɛ nɛn waa kaa ó tomɛ bwaa o gbagba bie waa dɛ nyinu gwaa komɛlbwa. O bonɔɔna la bwa aa baa tonɛ la, o bie laanee o ka mun tomɛ dɛ ŋɔ, 'Ba na n bie nɔ te naa, baa heehroo.'
41012007	Nɛra la aa na o bie la la, ba den ŋɔ, 'Yoowa, baa la gbagba biee la. O mɛɛ toole naa, on dɛɛ ba o kapɛrɛ dii. Hé gel ya kpoo, asɛ dɛ o mɛɛ baa sewaa, dɛ kwaa la ɛ ya kwa.'
41012008	Ba lawɛ bie la dɛ kpoo dɛ kpɔɔ vigri koo la baŋ."
41012009	Asɛ Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ a gɛ koo te nɔ ɛɛ ɛo wɔ?" Dɛ ŋɔ, "Wɛɛ ba kpo a gɛ nɛra laanee dɛ kpɔ koo la do nɛnfala nɔn ta.
41012010	Ba chwerɔ do Korowii Tɔn la bini ŋɔ, 'Bwe la mamaala aa vɛoh dɛ liiru konsala laanee bera ba lawɛ dea la kpoŋe la.
41012011	Korowiirii ɛa gɛ, a ɛ nyokpowa.' He ta a gɛ waa nɔ kure ka aa?"
41012012	Yeesu aa bol a gɛ waa nɔ dɛ kpɔ sɛgle la, dɛ Juda tena nomonome la dɛ nyin bɔr dɛ́ lawɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ ba jemɔ kɛŋɔ banee o sɛgle. Kɛ dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ nɛnlaa baa lɔ bela la, dɛ gelo dɛ kaa.
41012013	Baa kaala la, ba kaa tomɛ Farisii tena ne Hɛrɔd habɔɔ tena bane ŋɔ bá ba hagre Yeesu bela webɔɔre ne dɛ lawɔ.
41012014	Asɛ ba ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ he dɛ bol kasinteŋ. He ta waa bolɛ dɛɛ ɔmɛ a habɔɔ kɛŋɔ a dɛ do bane som, kɛɛ a dɛ we bane bambile nɔ. Haa nɛra sie bɔr nyiŋi dɛɛ bol waa kɛŋɔ bɛl ɛ kooro kɛɛ nomoa kɛɛ bechala nɔ. Korowii ŋwɛnɛɛ hɛɛ bagle nɛra kasinteŋ ne. Webeŋkpoŋii yaa nyin ya jemɛ. Onee kɛŋɔ ya mmara nɔ dɛ tɛ yaa ŋwɛnɛ kɛŋɔ ya bɔ lampoo dɛɛ tɛ Room koojen Siisa la aa, kɛɛ waa yaa ŋwɛnɛ tɛ?"
41012015	Dɛ Yeesu jemɛ ba webɔɔre la mun dɛ ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ hagre mɛ bela nɔɔ? Hé kpɔ suuga bwe ba ń na."
41012016	Anee ba kpɔ bɛl tɛo, asɛ o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ume nyu ne o sɔnee dawɛ suuga nɔ ta nɔɔ?" Asɛ ba chaŋe ŋɔ koojen Siisa laanee.
41012017	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Oo. Amɔ hé kpɔ kwaa aa ɛ Siisa kwaa la tɛo, dɛ kpɔ kwaa aa ɛ Korowii kwaa la tɛ Korowii." Asɛ o waa ɛɛ ba anebɛlbwa.
41012018	Saduki tena ba Yeesu be. Dɛ baa yarada kɛŋɔ nɛn sewaa, wɛɛ berɔɔ ir ja.
41012019	Ba baa bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Nomoa, Mosis fa chwerɛ mmara bɛl tɛ yaa ŋɔ dɛ baa sewɔ gel o haah dɛ o ta bii dɔe yaa, a chɛ kɛŋɔ o nime kɛɛ o dɔɔ kpɔ haah la mo dɛ logle bii, ásɛ a gɛ bii la ɛ lale la bii.
41012020	Hahbeŋkpoŋ bibaala banuanɛɛ fa lole, asɛ o binomoa la ba mo haah dɛ ba sewɛ, dɛ o ta bie dɔe.
41012021	Asɛ onla waa teŋɛ binomoa la nɛɛ la ge kpɔ haah la mo dɛ ba sewɛ, dɛ o ge ne o ta bie lolɛ. Gɛɛ bitooro te la ge mo haah la dɛ ba sewɛ, dɛ o ta bie dɔe.
41012022	Bii la bwa mo haah la ka lɔ nyoa dɛ ba serewe, dɛ ba ta bii dɔe. A bwa habɔɔ la, haah la ge baa sewɛ.
41012023	Aah dɛ nɛra bwa seo bini ira tɔpere la baa tel asɛ bibaala la bwa ir aa, ba bini umee dɛɛ ba haah la jaa ɛɛ yɔ? Ba nɛra banuanɛ la bwa gee fa moo."
41012024	Belaa Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "He kono kwaraa! He jemɛ kon la aa gela he koni aa? Haa wola Korowii Waa baa chwera ne o kpegri waa jemɛ la waa.
41012025	Nɛra baa ir seo ta naa, baa soo kɛŋɔ Korowii toroma baa lɔ nyundua la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ baa haahna moe ba, baa jaranar ge yala ba.
41012026	Nɛra seo ta ira ge la nɔ, dɛ he dɛ lii Mosis Tɔn bini waa ane aa dɛ bagle dawii fuih la wa aa, ba chwerɛ bela gɛ Korowii aa ŋɔ Mosis be ŋɔ, 'Menee Abraham Korowii ne Aesek Korowii ne Jekɔb Korowii.'
41012027	Lala laa dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii, weeraa dɛɛ tomɔ. Anomanta he kono kwaraa!"
41012028	Dɛ Tɔn Jereme bɛl ge ba bela dɛɛ no waa baa dɛ pɛɛro wɛɛ bagle a bini la, dɛ na kɛŋɔ waa la ŋwɛnɛ taa Yeesu bola la. O ge bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Mosis Mmarare la bini umee ɛ onjen gwaa a bwa nɔ?"
41012029	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "A bwa bini onjen laanee nɔ: 'Israel tena, hé no. N Naa Korowii nɔ habɔɔ dɔɔ bɛlbwa toole kpa.
41012030	Hé nyin N Naa Korowii he bambile bwa, he hweera, he liire, ne he bokpega bwa ne.'
41012031	Onjen waa teŋa nɛɛ laanee nɔ: 'Nyin he dɔŋ kɛ he gbagba.' Mmara bɛlbwa toole dɛ ɛ onjen dɛ gwaa anɛ nɔ."
41012032	Asɛ Tɔn Jereme la ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Jam, he ɛ wa, Nomoa. He waa nɔ bwa ɛ kasinteŋ. Korowii beŋkpoŋ gboo lole. Komɛlbwa toole dɛ dɔ yaa ka ja o nɛ.
41012033	A chɛ kɛŋɔ ya nyinu ya bambile ne ya liire ne ya bokpega bwa ne, dɛ nyin ya dɔŋa kɛŋɔ yaa dɛ nyin ya gbagba la. A gɛ mmarare anɛ nɔ ta teŋaa wera gwaa gɛ bwa yaa kpoo kwaa dɛ fuah dɛɛ tɛ Korowii, dɛ che kwaa kaa tɛo."
41012034	Yeesu aa naa kɛŋɔ baa la chaŋe waa la wejema ne la, o ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He sie dɛ chaah Korowii Kora waa la ta." A habɔɔ la nomɛlbwa ta berɛ hɛlɛ waa dɛ bɔɔro waane kpa.
41012035	Yeesu aa ba dɛ bagle waa Korowii Dea la, o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Aah ɛrɛ waa Tɔn Jerema la ŋɔ Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ásɛ o ba lɛ yaa la ɛɛ ɛ Devid naa nɔɔ?
41012036	Dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge fa ir Devid nɛɛ dɛ gel o bagle Kristo waa dɛ ŋɔ, 'N Naa Korowii ŋɔ n Dɔɔ be ŋɔ ó ba so nomombɔr o dig ta ka tel kɛŋɔ waa ba o dɔma ne harɛ ásɛ o tigri ba nɛ.'
41012037	Aah Devid kwaraa faa dɛ yerɔ o dɔɔ nɔ, ɛrɛɛ a berɛ ɛ o ɛ Devid naa ɔ?" Nɛnlaa la no o wobol la silɛɛ ne.
41012038	Waa dɛ bag ba la, o ŋɔ, "Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi Tɔn Jerema la kɛrɛdɛ. Ban yon do laalajena ásɛ nɛra bwa na ba dɛɛ guŋi ba harɛ yaware.
41012039	Ba dɛ nyin nomombɔra soga kohona cheremi deene, ne nomombɔra soga tɔpejena dii cheremi bɔra la.
41012040	Ba sie begre kwa, dɛɛ kam kwaa luhaahna deremi, dɛ berɛ saah dɛɛ soŋe Korowii wobojaŋa ne nɛra sie ta. Ba kembɔr ɛɛ do kanee taeh!"
41012041	Yeesu kaa so Korowii Dea suuga tae daka bɔr dɛɛ nyiŋi nɛra baa ta suuga dɛɛ do o bini la, dɛ dɔɔhna bane dɛ do suugajena tenten.
41012042	Belaa luhaah nyaa bɛl ge ba do suuga bwea jegre anɛ.
41012043	Asɛ Yeesu yerɛ o habɔteŋra la dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, luhaah nyaa nɔ do suugajena dɛ gwaa nɛra nɔ bwa,
41012044	dɛkalkɛŋɔ o dea suuga bwaa o gbaa ba do daka nɔ bini la. Kɛ dɔɔhna la te suuga bini tama baa naa kɛŋɔ ba laa kpɔ aa, aa ba nɛɛ we la, anee ba kpɔ baa do la."
41013001	Yeesu aa dɛ le Korowii Dea la, o habɔteŋra la bɛl ŋɔ, "Nomoa, na bwea baa kpɔa ma deene nɔ aa bara gɛ. Deene la kakan bee! A wer ge laa nɔ!"
41013002	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kɛ he na dejena nɔ kenɛ? Ba ta ɛɛ pagre a bwaa kwara, asɛ a bwe beŋkpoŋ kwara aa lee do dɛ ta chɔŋɛ o dɔŋ ta kpa."
41013003	Ba le Korowii Dea dɛ kaa Ɔlevere Bwe la bɔr. Asɛ Yeesu so bwe la doa dɛɛ nyiŋi Korowii Dea la, asɛ Pita ne Jems ne Jɔn ne Andriu gbo ba o be, dɛ ba bɔɔro ŋɔ,
41013004	"Waa la haa bola la, saŋ besoo aa ba chiga ɔ? Bɔkwaa dɛɛ ba bagla kɛ gɛ waa nɔ chiga teloo?"
41013005	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ asɛ nomɛlbwa bɛ heyaa negre.
41013006	Nɛra ɛɛ warɔɔ dɛ kpɔ n sɔn ba dɛ ba ŋɔ banee men. Ba bɛlbwa ɛɛ ŋɔɔ onee Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ nɛra la dɛ negre nɛra pirim.
41013007	"Dɛ he baa no laa yoi waa ne laa gbɔga bobɛlbwa ge aa, he bɛ gel a ɛ heyaa wepigra, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a chɛ kɛŋɔ a ɛ gɛ. A gɛ waa nɔ bwa chɛ kɛŋɔ a chig, dɛ wobɛlbwa jaga la ta tele mɔɔ.
41013008	Bwɛɛre ne ba bwɛɛre dɔŋa ɛɛ yo laalee, koranar ge ne ba koranar dɔŋa ɛɛ yo dɔŋa. Harɛ ɛɛ jigri bobɛlaa, asɛ lɔr ge ba. A gɛ waa nɔ kaa chaa haah loltea wee o yon dɛɛ weo kɛ dɛ o lola ta tele mɔɔ la.
41013009	"Hé gbagba ge nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ. Baa larawe heyaa dɛ la he ne nomonome sie, dɛ lɔɔ heyaa cheremi deene bini. N nomanta hɛɛ che Abane nomonome ne koranar siinii dɛ bol Korowii Amanesoma la bag ba.
41013010	Baa bol Amanesoma laanee bagle nɛwɛnyina bwa mɔɔ wobɛlbwa jaga la ba.
41013011	Dɛ ba baa lawɛ heya, dɛ la he ne nomonome sie naa, he bɛ gel waa haa dɛ ba bola la hiah heya. A baa tel kɛŋɔ hé bol wa aa, hé bol wobɛlbwa aa le he nyoa la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ waa haa bol la aa he be lee ba. Korowii Domadɛɛge la bee aa ba lee.
41013012	"Nɛra ɛɛ le ba gbagba lolanaree tɛ ŋɔ bá kpoo ba, baala ɛɛ le ba gbagba biirii tɛ ŋɔ bá kpo, asɛ bii ge ir che ba nyare ne mɛɛnanar nɛɛ dɛ gel baa kpoo ba.
41013013	Nɛra bwa ɛɛ koh n waa hah heya. Kɛ naate waa dɛ ba wona dɛ lawɛ bambile ka tonɛ la, wɛɛ dɔ o nyuu.
41013014	"Hɛɛ na konchɔgechɔge laanee kɛŋɔ o chegɛ bela aa wola chɛɛ kɛŋɔ ba nao. (Bonɔ kpegri. Anomanta nomɛlbwa waa kuro la kwaa nyiŋu kɛrɛdɛ.) He baa na gɛ naa, a chɛ kɛŋɔ Judia harɛ tena chwa ka nyin sɔɔhbɔr ba bwea la ta.
41013015	Naate waa soge o sal dea doa la ge, o bɛ berɛ koh o te ŋɔ o dɛ tu dɛ jo dea dɛ́ kpɔ komɛl. A chɛ kɛŋɔ o chwa dɛ dɔ o nyu.
41013016	Nomɛlbwa waa lɔ koo ta la bɛ berɛ la dem dɛ́ ka kpɔ o yal.
41013017	Ei! Aa do kpegrii tɛ tekpoŋra ne haahna baa kpoŋe bechasɔɔhne a gɛ saŋ nɔ noo!
41013018	Hé soŋe Korowii asɛ a gɛ waa nɔ bɛ waa saŋ chig oo!
41013019	Dɛkalkɛŋɔ a gɛ wekpega nɔ dɔŋa ta ɛɛ bwa. A ɔma! Dɛ den le saŋ la Korowii aa ta harɛ la dɛ kpoŋe ba le fini nɔ, nɛwɛnyini ta a dɔŋa nae bwa. A gɛ waa nɔ ɛo waa, a dɔŋa aa ɛɛ ba kpa.
41013020	Dɛ Korowii fe ta tɔpera la ane teŋe ta aa, nomɛlbwa fe aa lee ba. Kɛ o koh o nɛra waa chal ba ba teŋɛ o nɛɛ la waa dɛ teŋe tɔpechɔga la ane ta.
41013021	"A gɛ saŋ la bane ɛɛ dɛɛ ŋɔɔ, 'Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ásɛ o ba lɛ yaa laanee nɔ!' Asɛ bane ge ŋɔ, 'On ka lɔ le la!' A gɛ waa nɔ bwa baa ɛ aa, he bɛ a bɛlbwa yarada,
41013022	dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛra ɛɛ bao dɛ ba teŋe nyosone ŋɔ Kristo laanee ban, asɛ bane ge ŋɔ Korowii keameree ban. Baa baa ɛ nyokpowaa ne bebeewaa dɛɛ nyin bɔr dɛ́ negre nɛra Korowii aa chal ba la kwara.
41013023	Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ! N dɔɔ bagle waa aa dɛ ba ɛɛ mɔɔ tɔpere la ba.
41013024	"A gɛ wekpega nɔ baa ɛ dɛ kaa laa, wee aa bɔr chaahna ba kpa, korobie ge aa bɔr chaahna ba kpa.
41013025	Weweela dɛ ba nyundua lee dɛ lee harɛ, asɛ Korowii doa bwa yiigi dɛ chɔg.
41013026	Belaa baa ba n Nɛn Bie nae kɛŋɔ maa lɔ baama bini dɛɛ ba kpegri waa wola dɔŋ dɔe ne jirima ne.
41013027	Mɛɛ tomɛ nyundua toromaa harɛ nɔ bobɛlbwa bá valɛ lawɛ n nɛra maa chal ba la bwa ba pɛ.
41013028	"Hé kpɔ pur daa nɔna hweli wa. O baa fogre dɛɛ le papo-lwɛɛne, dɛ nomɛlbwa jemɔ kɛŋɔ bɔwɔb saŋ telo.
41013029	Gɛɛ dɛ he ba dɛ na a gɛ waa nɔ naa, hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ tɔpere la tuuhno tel dɛɛ nyin joe.
41013030	Kasinteŋ, a gɛ waa nɔ bwa dɛ ba ɛɛ mɔɔ fini nɛra nɔ bwa serewe.
41013031	Nyundua ne harɛ ɛɛ chɔgoo. Aa lee ba do kpa. Kɛ n waa la te kpegri ɛɛ do lee dɛɛ la saŋ bɛlbwa.
41013032	"A gɛ tɔpere nɔ te, nomɛlbwa aa tɔpere la bala saŋ jemɛ. Korowii toroma baa lɔ nyundua la kwara aa tɔpere la jemɛ. O bie la gbabir aa jemɛ. O gboo jemɛ tɔpere la.
41013033	Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ, hɛ́ɛ do dɛɛgɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ haa tɔpere la jemɛ.
41013034	Aa ɛo kɛŋɔ nomoa bɛl aa dɛ ba bobɛl kaala dɛ bagle o bonɔɔna tomare, dɛ ŋɔ baa waa dɛ nyiŋi o dem la ta be ŋɔ wɛ́ɛ nyiŋi o ta kɛrɛdɛ la.
41013035	Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he ta wone jemɛ tɔɔ la wee dem te la aa dɛ ba bala. Bɛl lole jwaanaa wɛɛ ba bala. Gɛ laa ge aa, harambaŋa ne. Bɛl lole o ta jabala siiga saŋ balaa, chɔɔbɔree wɛɛ ba bala.
41013036	He bɛ gel o ba pigri heya, dɛ he dɛ chɔ doromi.
41013037	Waa nɔ maa dɛ bol he be nɔ, nɛra bwa bee mɛɛ ŋɔ la. Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋu ŋwɛnɛ kɛrɛdɛ!"
41014001	A baa ka tɔpera anɛ ásɛ ba di ba bena nyoa baa dɛ yerɔ Galekaa la. A gɛ bena nyoa nɔ tɔpera taa baa di paanoo baa wola iisi a ta do la. Dɛ Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema la dɛ nyin ŋwɛnɛ bɛl dɛ́ sɔh lawɛ Yeesu dɛ kpoo,
41014002	dɛ ŋɔ, "Nɛndamanta nɔ aa dɛ ba chema ya bena nyoa nɔ dii ta nɔ, dɛ ya kpoo gɛ tɔpera nɔ ta naa, baa lɛ gaeeh."
41014003	Yeesu la Bɛtani dɛ ka chog Seemɔn weechɔga faa chɔg o bwara ka la dea. Baa dɛ di kwaa la, haah bɛl kpɔ nosɔɔhsoma a yog aa kpega loŋbir bɛl ba jo ba be. O baa pagre loŋ la dɛ wee tulalee la dɛɛ do Yeesu nyu ta.
41014004	Dɛ nɛra baa lɔ bela la bane baah diu, baa bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Aah tulalee nɔ ge ken chɔga nɔ munii ameo?
41014005	Ba fe yoga aa, o fe ɛɛ le suugajena tentenee ba fee kpɔ tɛ nyaara. A gɛ fe ta bɔe kɛŋɔ gɛ nɔ waa ɛa nɔ naa?" Dɛ chwee haah la kohona.
41014006	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Hé gelo ken. Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ hao gɛ nɔɔ? Wedɛɛgee o ɛɛ mɛ la.
41014007	Nyaara aa he be paŋa ba bwa. Dɛ he dɛ nyin ban wedɛɛga ɛɛ yaa, hɛɛ wonoo dɛɛ ɛɛ ba saŋ bɛlbwa. Kɛ n te, maa he bee do ka tonɛ.
41014008	Anla waa won ɛ laanee o ɛ la. N huga laalee o pu sie dɛɛ kpɔ dɛ fuge tulalee dɛɛ do n nyu ta la.
41014009	Kasinteŋ, bobɛlbwa baa bol Amanesoma nɔ harɛ ta bobɛlbwa la, baa bol waa waa ɛa nɔ waa dɛ kpɔ liiru."
41014010	Asɛ Judas Eskareɔt waa ɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la bɛl la ir la Sɔfonomonome be dɛ ka ŋɔ wɛɛ wonoo cha ba ásɛ ba lawɛ Yeesu.
41014011	Baa no gɛ la, ba sie lɛo, dɛ ŋɔ baa tɛo suugaa. Asɛ Judas pa mun dɛɛ nyin ŋwɛnɛ bɛl dɛ́ won gel ba dɔɔ.
41014012	Ba bena nyoa nɔ dii tɔpelogle taa baa kpɔ ba te dɛ laa iisi kwaa kpɔ ba deremi dɛɛ kpoo pebiiri ásɛ dɛ kpɔ di Galekaa kondikwaa la. Awola la Yeesu habɔteŋra la bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Lee hɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ ya ka ɛ Galekaa kondikwaa la tɛɛ he dio?"
41014013	Belaa o tomɛ ba nɛra banɛ dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé la bwɛɛ bini. He kaa na baa bɛl o che vii ne nee aa, hé teŋɛ o nɛ
41014014	dɛ ka jo dem waa jo o ta la. He laŋaa, hé ŋɔ dem te la be ŋɔ nomoa la ŋɔ lee dea o ne o habɔteŋra aa dɛ ba Galekaa kondikwaa o bini dii la dɔɔ?
41014015	Asɛ ó bagle heyaa abrɔsane doa dea bɛl baa kwaaro dɛ nyin kane bwa cheg o bini kɛrɛdɛ la. Belaa hɛɛ ba ya kondikwaa bwa ɛɛ dɛ cheg."
41014016	O habɔteŋra la aa la bwɛɛ la ta la, gɛ waa bagla la tentenee ba ka na, asɛ dɛ daa ba Galekaa kondikwaa la bela.
41014017	A jɔmɔra ne la, Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la ba bela.
41014018	Baa soga dɛɛ di kwaa la, Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, he nɛra n ne haa pɛ nɔn dɛɛ di kwaa nɔ bini bɛlee dɛɛ ba n yoga tɛ nɛra la."
41014019	Ate dɛ ba teene bini chɔgɔ, ba berɛ dɛɛ bɔɔro beŋkpoŋa beŋkpoŋa ŋɔ, "Menee kɛɛ? Menee kɛɛ?"
41014020	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "He nɛra fi dɛ banɛ nɔ n ne haa dɛ pɛ nɔn hɛna beŋkpoŋ bini nɔ bɛlee.
41014021	N Nɛn Bie la ɛɛ sewɔɔ gɛ Korowii Tɔn aa bagla kɛŋɔ mɛɛ ɛo la. Kɛ naate waa yog mɛ tɛ ba kpo mɛ la, bwɛɛlɛ! Ba fe ta on lolɛ kwaraa fe bɔ!"
41014022	Baa dɛ di kwaa la, Yeesu kpɔ paanoo dɛ jam Korowii, dɛ kuu, dɛ kpɔ tɛ o habɔteŋra la, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé lɛ paanoo nɔ dɛ di. N bo-olii."
41014023	Asɛ o berɛ kpɔ numol ne sen ge dɛ jam Korowii dɛ kpɔ tɛɛ ba, asɛ ba nyɔ ka tɛ dɔŋa.
41014024	Asɛ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Sen nɔ chegɔ tɛ n chal maa dɛ ba nɛra kɛrɛdɛ waa koeh dɛ fuge ta. A ɛ fɔo dɛ chɔ Korowii ne nɛwɛnyini baah ta.
41014025	Kasinteŋ, maa a gɛ sen nɔ anee nyɔ kpa bwa, nemenɛ kɛŋɔ awola maa ba nyɔ anfala Korowii Kora la ta."
41014026	Asɛ ba go yel bɛl dɛ jam Korowii, dɛ le kaa Ɔlevere Bwe la ta.
41014027	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He bwa ɛɛ ba chwao gel mɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii Tɔn baglɔ kɛŋɔ, 'Korowii ɛɛ kpo petegre laanee, asɛ peera la bwa lɔ pegre.'
41014028	Kɛ dɛ Korowii baa ir mɛ seo ta naa, mɛɛ tɔ he siee la Galilia harɛ ta."
41014029	Anee Pita ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛ n bala nɔ bwa chwao gele kwara naa, n te aa chwa gele!"
41014030	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ Pita be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, jabal ne sii kera anɛ kere chɔmbibi ne dɛ he tɔɔh kera atoro ŋɔ haa men jemɛ kwaraa!"
41014031	Anee Pita ŋɔ, "Dɛ seo kwaraa yaa, n ne hɛɛ sewɔɔ, kɛ maa tɔh ŋɔ maa hen jemɛ bwa!" Gɛɛ o habɔteŋra la bwa ŋɔ baa o habɔɔ le bwa.
41014032	Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra aa tel bela baa dɛ yerɛ Gɛtsɛmane la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé so bonɔ asɛ ń ka soŋe Korowii ba."
41014033	O kpɔ Pita ne Jems ne Jɔn kaa bá ka doo. Waa dɛ kaa la, dɛ ɔmee ne bambiteŋa lawɔ kohona.
41014034	Asɛ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "N tea bini chɔgɔ kohona to. A gbo ɛɛ kpo mɛɛ kwara. Hé so bonɔ dɛɛ were ń la ba."
41014035	Asɛ o la sie tama dɛ ka pi harɛ dɛ soŋe Korowii ŋɔ a fe ɛɛ magroo waa, waa aa dɛ ba la fe bɛ o nɛɛ chig.
41014036	Dɛ berɛ soŋo ja ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, wobɛlbwa toole haa wola won ɛ. N poori, bɛ gel n na a gɛ wahala nɔ, kɛ ɛ he tetoowaa dɛ gel n tetoowa."
41014037	Asɛ Yeesu berɛ ba ba be dɛ ba na o habɔteŋra batoro la kɛŋɔ ba chɔɔge doromi. Anee o bɔɔ Seemɔn Pita ŋɔ, "Chɔe he chɔ aa? He ta wone were tamaa bɛlbwa naa?"
41014038	Asɛ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ dɛɛ soŋe Korowii asɛ Bɔnsam bɛ won negre heyaa. He bambile fe dɛ nyin wedɛɛga ɛɛ, kɛ he bwadabii pwɛre."
41014039	Asɛ o berɛ la dɛ ka soŋe Korowii gɛ o faa kaa soŋe la,
41014040	dɛ berɛ ba ba be, dɛ ba chɔɔge doromi, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ dom dɛ chug ba taeh. Baa jemɛ gɛ baa bol o be kpa.
41014041	Waa bera ka ba tooro tena dɛ ba dɛ chɔɔge doromi ja, anee o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "He ta chɔɔ dɛɛ onaa? A tonɔ. Saŋ la baa dɛ ba n Nɛn Bie kpɔe dɛ do wechɔg-ɛɛra nɔn ta la telo.
41014042	Hé ir yá kaa. Baa la waa lee mɛ tɛ baa ba n kpoe laanee la."
41014043	Yeesu taa dɛ bol waa, dɛ o habɔteŋra la bini bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Judas balɔ. Nɛnlaa banee teŋɛ o nɛɛ dɛ kpoŋe tokobie ne keri ne gule. Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema la ne bela nomonomee tomɛ a gɛ nɛra nɔ.
41014044	Baa dɛ ba la, Judas ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Naate maa gbaaro pɛl n bambile dɛ mo o lwɛɛma la, hé lawɔ dɛ nyiŋu kɛrɛdɛ o bɛ won lɛ o te dɛ chwa."
41014045	Waa baa tel Yeesu be la, o gbaaro pɛl o bambile dɛ mo o lwɛɛma dɛ ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ!"
41014046	Belaa ba lawɔ.
41014047	Asɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra la bɛl laa o kere kpɔ dɛ ŋwɛnɛ Sɔfore Nomoa la bonɔɔ deŋne bɛl dɛ laa cha.
41014048	Asɛ Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ŋwɛɛree men he kpɔ keri ne gule dɛɛ ba hé ba lag mɛ naa?
41014049	Saŋ la bwa maa lɔ Korowii Dea dɛɛ bagle waa la, ɛrɛɛ haa wola men lawɔɔ? Gɛ aa ɛ asɛ waa baa chwera la bwa ɛ kpela la waa anɔ bwa ɛɛ ɛ nɔ."
41014050	Belaa Yeesu habɔteŋra la bwa lɔ pegre dɛ chwao.
41014051	Dɛ bonɔɔ bɛl kpɔ yapoŋ mile chara dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ, asɛ ba fe ɛɛ nyin o lawa,
41014052	asɛ o gel yapoŋ la dɛ chwa kaa gɛ.
41014053	Belaa ba kpɔ Yeesu la Sɔfore Nomoa la dem. Dɛ Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema ne ba bela nomonome bwa cheme bela.
41014054	Dɛ Pita teŋɛ ba nɛɛ bojaŋ dɛ ba jo nomoa la dem baah. Dɛ o ne soojare baa dɛ daah doonyoa la sogo dɛɛ ŋwee nii.
41014055	Sɔfonomonome ne Juda tena nomonome baa dɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole la bwa nyin ŋwɛnɛ la bwa ta baa che dɛ́ di waa la bɔ Yeesu dɛ́ fee gel ba kpoo kahonɛ,
41014056	dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛra kɛrɛdɛ teŋe nyosone dawɛ Yeesu nɛ, kɛ dɛ ba webagla la aa beŋkpoŋ ɛ.
41014057	Asɛ baala bane ir dɛ teŋe nyosone ŋɔ,
41014058	"Ya noɔ waa dɛ bol ŋɔ wɛɛ pagre Korowii Dea nɔ nɛwɛnyini aa mao nɔɔ dɛ berɛ kpɔ tɔpera atoro ma onla nɛwɛnyini aa wola mae."
41014059	Dɛ a gɛ nɛra nɔ gba webagla la ta beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ.
41014060	Belaa Sɔfore Nomoa la ir che nɛra la bwa baah ta dɛ bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Amɔ he ta wobɛlbwa dɔe dɛ́ chaŋe waa nɔ baa dɛ bol nɔ bɛlbwa naa?"
41014061	Asɛ Yeesu tɔ nyoa, o ta wobɛlbwa chaŋɛ. Asɛ nomoa la berɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Henee Korowii Bie Kristo la waa ŋɔa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ásɛ o ba lɛ yaa la aa?"
41014062	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Menee, kɛ hɛɛ na n Nɛn Bie laanee kɛŋɔ maa soge nomombɔr Korowii waa ɛ kpegri bwa Dɔɔ la dig ta dɛɛ ba baamare ta!"
41014063	Asɛ Sɔfore Nomoa la laa o gbagba laala waa doa la pee dɛ ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa danseɛ yá berɛ so dɛɛ nyin jaɔ?
41014064	He ta nɛnhɛlwobol waa dɛ bol Korowii noɛ yaa? Ɛrɛɛ he na nɔ?" Ate dɛ ba bwa ŋɔ, "O ɛ wechɔga. Hé kpoo!"
41014065	Dɛ ba bane ta nentane dɛɛ ta o nɛ, asɛ bane ge kpɔ nɔɔra tɔ o sie dɛɛ lɔɔro dɛɛ tɔɔ kande dɛ ŋɔ ó jemɛ naate waa lɔɔ. Asɛ soojare baa dɛ daah bela la kpakpaa o lwɛrɛme.
41014066	Pita ta lɔ dem baah bela, asɛ Sɔfore Nomoa la tolo bɛl ba
41014067	dɛ ba nao dɛ o dɛ ŋwee nii, dɛ nyiŋu jeiih ken dɛ ŋɔ, "Kɛ he ge fa teŋɛ Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt la nɛɛ laɔ?"
41014068	Asɛ Pita tɔh pelepelepele ken, dɛ ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa hɛɛ bol nɔɔ? Maa a bini jemɛ kwara!" Waa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o kaa dem la doonyoa bɔr.
41014069	Sɔfore Nomoa tolo la berɔ nao ja dɛ ŋɔ nɛra baa chegɛ bela la be ŋɔ, "Nɛra la bini bɛlee baa nɔ!"
41014070	Asɛ Pita berɛ tɔh ŋɔ waa Yeesu jemɛ ja. A ta bigre bɛlbwa asɛ nɛra baa chegɛ bela la ŋɔ, "Haa won tɔh ŋɔ Yeesu nɛra la bɛl laa hen, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Galilia tee hen."
41014071	Asɛ Pita ŋwɛɛ ŋɔ, "Maa baa nɔ haa dɛ bol o waa nɔ jemɛ kwara!"
41014072	Bug la ta dɛ jabal nɛɛtena sio, asɛ Pita lii gɛ Yeesu aa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Jabala ne sii kera anɛ dɛ he tɔɔh kera atoro bwa ŋɔ haa men jemɛ bwa" la. Waa lii a gɛ waa nɔ la, dɛ o dɛ wi.
41015001	Tɔɔ aa pera chɔmbibi ne la, Sɔfonomonome ne bwɛɛ nomonome ne Tɔn Jerema bwa, Juda tena nomonome baa dɛ nyiŋi ba waa bini la te bwa, chemo dɛ vɔrɔwe Yeesu vɔrɔwa, dɛ vɔrɔwe o nɔɔra, dɛ kpɔɔ ka tɛ Room nomoa waa dɛ nyiŋi bela harɛ asɛ baa yerɔ Paelet la.
41015002	Belaa Paelet bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Henee Juda tena kooro ɛ?" Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Anee he bol la."
41015003	Sɔfonomonome la teŋe nyosone dawɛ Yeesu nɛ.
41015004	Asɛ Paelet bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "He ta wobɛlbwa dɔe dɛ́ bol aa? Haa won chaŋe wedamanta nɔ bwa baa kpɔa dɛɛ dawɛ nɔ bini ane aa?"
41015005	Yeesu ta wobɛlbwa chaŋɛ, asɛ Paelet nyoa kpo.
41015006	A gɛ tɔpejen la baa tel aa, wechɔg-ɛɛ te bɛlbwa baa doo dea asɛ bwɛɛla la ŋɔ bá leo ta la, a chɛ kɛŋɔ ba leo ta.
41015007	A gɛ saŋ la, nɛra bane fa vuugi Room nomonome baa dɛ nyiŋi bela harɛ la dɛ kpoo nɛra a gɛ waa la ta. Dɛ baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Barabas ja a gɛ nɛra nɔ nɛ, asɛ ba do ba bwa dea.
41015008	Asɛ nɛnlaa la ba Paelet be dɛ ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ó le wechɔg-ɛɛra la bɛl ta, gɛ baa dɛ ɛ bena bɛlbwa la.
41015009	Belaa o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ń foo Juda tena kooro la ta kɛɛ?"
41015010	Dɛ o gbabir jemɔ kɛŋɔ bɔweela waa Sɔfonomonome la che Yeesu nɛɛ pɛɛpɛɛ dɛ kpɔɔ ba o be la.
41015011	Jaah dɛ Sɔfonomonome la do nɛnlaa la bwa ŋɔ bá ŋɔ Barabasee baa nyin, dɛ ŋɔ Páelet leo ta.
41015012	Belaa Paelet bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Aah ɛrɛɛ he ŋɔ ń ɛ baa la haa dɛ yerɔ Juda tena kooro laɔ?"
41015013	Asɛ ba bwa kparɛ si ŋɔ, "Kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta!"
41015014	Anee Paelet bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ yɔ? Bɔkwa wechɔga o ɛɔ?" Ate dɛ ba berɔ kwaa si kohona ŋɔ, "Kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta!"
41015015	Paelet aa wola nyin kɛŋɔ nɛnlaa la bwaawee ir o nɛɛ la, o le Barabas ta tɛɛ ba dɛ gel ba lɔɔ Yeesu bampɔrɔ ŋwɛɛra ne mɔɔ dɛ kpɔɔ tɛ ŋɔ bá ka kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta.
41015016	Asɛ soojare la kpɔ Yeesu le kaa Paelet dem baah dɛ yerɛ ba bala soojare bwa,
41015017	dɛ kpɔ yaswɛm bɛl kɛŋɔ ba bela kooyal tɔ Yeesu, dɛ kpɔ sɔɔhne sɔh koogbɛrɛ piu,
41015018	dɛ ba dɛ guŋi o sie dɛɛ si, "Woowo, Juda tena kooro!"
41015019	Asɛ ba kpɔ chweremi dɛɛ cha o nyu, dɛ ta nentane dɛɛ ta o nɛ, dɛɛ guŋu harɛ kɛŋɔ baa dɛ ɛ kooro la.
41015020	Baa mugli o baah tonɛ la, ba laa yaswɛm la foo o bwara ta, dɛ kpɔ o gbagba laala la doo, dɛ kpɔɔ le dɛɛ kaa dɛ́ ka kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta.
41015021	Baa dɛ kaa la, ba kaa na Sairini baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Seemɔn, dɛ o le bobɛl dɛɛ ba. Ba ɛgro o lɛ Yeesu dagagre la che. Dɛ a gɛ Seemɔn la biirii Alɛksanda ne Rufus.
41015022	Asɛ ba kpɔ Yeesu kaa bela baa dɛ yerɛ Gɔlgɔta la. Gɔlgɔta munii Nyuhog Bɔr.
41015023	Asɛ ba kpɔ tɛɛga ane baa dɛ yera mire aa wona dɛɛ sɔɔh bwadabii wee nyoa do sen ta dɛ kpɔ tɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ó nyɔ, asɛ o vɛh nyɔe.
41015024	Ba foo o laala, dɛ kpaa o nɔɔra ne o nakpale pɛl dagagre ta. Dɛ soojare la dɛ nyin Yeesu laala bɔna, dɛ ta chacha mɔɔ dɛ́ won jemɛ laala ba bɛlbwa aa di.
41015025	Koola nenyɔɔ saŋee ba kpaa Yeesu pɛl dagagre ta.
41015026	Ba chwerɛ o wechɔga waa ɛa ba koh a waa kpoo la pɛl o dagagre la ta. A gɛ waa laanee, |scJUDA TENA KOORO|d.
41015027	Ŋwɛɛra banɛɛ ba kpaa pɛl dagagra ta ja Yeesu nɛ. Bɛl sagɛ o dig ta, bɛl ge sagɛ o gal ta.
41015028	Asɛ waa baa chwera Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ "Ba yerɔ wechɔg-ɛɛ" la ɛ kasinteŋ.
41015029	Nɛra baa kpɔ bela bɔr baa kaa la chɛgre Yeesu dɛɛ mugli o baah ŋɔ, "Chwa! He nɛn haa pagre Korowii Dea dɛ berɛ kpɔ tɔpera atoro mao laanee nɔ naa?
41015030	Lɛ he te dɛ tu harɛ yá na!"
41015031	Gɛɛ Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema la mugli o baah dɔŋa be dɛ ŋɔ, "Ao! Nɛra gboo o won lɛɛ, kɛ waa won lɛ o te.
41015032	He nɛn haa ŋɔa henee Israel tena kooro Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ásɛ o ba lɛ yaa la, le dagagre la doa tu harɛ yá na dɛ won yaradae." Asɛ ŋwɛɛra baa kpaa ba pɛl dagagra ta ja o nɛɛ la gee chɛgro.
41015033	Wee aa baa che nyubaah la, bɔr biro jumaa ken dɛ ka tel wekee saŋ mɔɔ bɔr berɛ chaah ja.
41015034	Wekee saŋ aa tela la, Yeesu do lɔŋɔ kpegri nɛɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?" O munii kɛŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ Korowii, n Mɛɛ Korowii, ɛrɛɛ he chwa mɛ nɔɔ?"
41015035	Nɛra baa chegɛ bela la aa no gɛ la, ba ŋɔ, "Na, Elaejaa wɛɛ yerɛ la!"
41015036	Asɛ bɛl chwa dɛ ka kpɔ konjɔgɔjɔgɔ waa won nee lɛɛ ka li sennyɛga ta dɛ kpɔ toh daa ta tɛo ó nyɔ, dɛ ŋɔ, "Hé gel ya na, dɛ Elaeja ɛɛ ba leo dagagre nɔ taa yaa?"
41015037	Belaa Yeesu do lɔŋɔ kohona, asɛ o doma le o sewɛ.
41015038	Asɛ yal waa teŋe Korowii Dea baah ta la pere anɛ le nyundua ba ta harɛ.
41015039	Soojare lafa nomoa waa dɛ daah Yeesu aa na gɛ Yeesu hweera aa teŋa la, o nyoa kpoo, asɛ o ŋɔ, "Korowii Biee baa nɔ kpela!"
41015040	Dɛ haahna bane ge chegɛ bojaŋ dɛɛ nyiŋi. Ba bini banee Mɛɛre waa le Magdala la, ne Jemsbechala ne Josis nya Mɛɛre, ne Salome.
41015041	A gɛ saŋ waa lɔ Galilia harɛ la, dɛ a gɛ haahna nɔɔ daa kondikwaa dɛɛ tɛo. Dɛ haahna bane ba faa teŋɛ o nɛɛ pirim ba Jerusalam la bwa lɔ bela.
41015042	Awola tɔpere la taa baa nyin ba kwaa bwa dɛɛ cheg ásɛ dɛ tɔɔ peraa ba di Ona Tɔpere la.
41015043	Dɛ Josef waa le Arimatea la ɛ ba bela nomonome la bini nɛn nɛra bwa aa dɛ tɛo duure. O ge dɛ kpa saŋ la Korowii aa di kora dɛ lɛɛ ba la. Awola jɔmɔra la, o lɔ bambile dɛ la Paelet be dɛ ka soŋo ŋɔ ó tɛo ŋwɛnɛ ó ka kpɔ Yeesu lale la.
41015044	Asɛ a pigri Paelet kɛŋɔ Yeesu aa dena sewɛ la. Anee o yerɛ soojare lafa nomoa la dɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Yeesu sewɔ kpela aa?"
41015045	Nomoa la aa sɛah ŋɔ Yeesu sewɔ la, Paelet tɛ Josef ŋwɛnɛ ŋɔ ó ka kpɔ o lale la.
41015046	Asɛ Josef yawɛ yapoŋ dɛ ka laa Yeesu kpɔ dagagre la doa dɛ kpɔ yapoŋ la fɔrɔwo dɛ hugo. Bwe bɔɔ bɛl baa kwiu kɛŋɔ dea binii ba hugo, dɛ gbili bwe tɔ bɔɔ la nyoa.
41015047	Mɛɛre waa le Magdala la ne Josis nya Mɛɛre na bela baa hugo.
41016001	Ona Tɔpere la aa gara la, Mɛɛre waa le Magdala la ne Jems nya Mɛɛre ne Salome yawɛ tɛɛga ane a sɔɔh aa soma ŋɔ bá fee kpɔ ka fɔgle Yeesu lale la.
41016002	Yawanyoa tɔpelogle chɔɔ ne wee aa dena le la, dɛ ba tel bela baa huge Yeesu la.
41016003	Baa dɛ ba la, dɛ ba dɛ bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Umee dɛɛ ba bwe la gbila le bɔɔ la nyoa tɛ yaa ɔ?"
41016004	Baa ta sie nyiŋi la, dɛ bwejen la gbilo le bɔɔ la nyoa.
41016005	Baa jo bɔɔ la bini dɛ bonɔɔ bɛl soge o dig pera, dɛ do wurpoŋ, asɛ ba bwara yɔr.
41016006	O ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He bɛ gel he bwara yɔr," dɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt baa kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta la lalee hɛɛ nyin nɔ naa? O toole bonɔ kpa. Waa sewa la, o iro. Hé na bela baa hugo la.
41016007	Hé la dɛ ka ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la ne ba dɔŋ Pita be ŋɔ o dɛ tɔ sie kaa Galilia harɛ. Belaa hɛɛ ba o nae gɛ o faa bola la."
41016008	Asɛ ba nyoa kpo, ba kpɔ bochela chwa le bɔɔ la bini. Baa dɛ kaa la, dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ, anomanta ba ta wobɛlbwa bolɛ nomɛlbwa be.
41016009	Yawanyoa tɔpelogle la ta chɔmbibi ne Yeesu aa ir seo ta la, o tɔ sie kpɔ o te bagle Mɛɛre waa le Magdala la. Yeesu fa doŋi kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ anuanɛ gɛ haah nɔ nɛ.
41016010	Mɛɛre laŋɔ dɛ ka ŋɔ nɛra ba faa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ la be waa la waa naa la. Waa la ba be, dɛ ba koh Yeesu seo la waa dɛɛ ɛ lwe dɛɛ wi siniire mɛrmɛr ken.
41016011	Waa ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ Yeesu berɔ ir seo ta dɛ ŋɔ o te nao la, ba ta on yaradae.
41016012	A habɔɔ la Yeesu berɔ begre o te dɛ ba ba nɛra banɛ be, dɛ ba le Jerusalam dɛɛ kaa.
41016013	Ba ge aa laŋa ka bol ba bala kabora la be la, ba ta yaradae.
41016014	A habɔɔ la, o kpɔ o te bagle o habɔteŋra fi dɛ beŋkpoŋ la, dɛ ba dɛ di kwa. O pwaah ba ba yarada nyae ne ba bambikpeg la waa kɛŋɔ baa wola ba bala baa tɔ sie nao la yaradae la.
41016015	Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé kaa harɛ ta bobɛlbwa dɛ ka bol Amanesoma la bagle nɛwɛnyina bwa.
41016016	Nomɛlbwa waa yarada asɛ ba sɔɔ nee la, Korowii ɛɛ kpɔ o wechɔgaa kɛo. Kɛ naate waa wola yaradae la, wɛɛ di bolchɔgee.
41016017	Nɛra baa yarada n waa la ɛɛ ɛ wejenaa ásɛ nɛra na dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ n nɛraa ban. Baa dɔ kpegrii dɛ won che n sɔn ta dɛɛ doŋi kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛ. Korowii Domadɛɛge ɛɛ ir ba nɛɛ baa bol wobofala.
41016018	Dɛ harɛkwaa dom ba aa, wobɛlbwa aa ba ɛɛ ba. Dɛ ba nyɔ tɛgchɔga kwara naa, baa sewa ba. Baa wonoo kpɔ ba nɔɔra dawɛ weela tena nɛɛ bá dɔ bokpega."
41016019	Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu aa bol waa ba be tonɛ la, Korowii kpɔɔ kaa nyundua, o ka so nomombɔr o dig ta.
41016020	Asɛ o habɔteŋra la kaa bobɛlbwa dɛ kaa bol Korowii Waa la. Dɛ Korowii teŋɛ ba nɛɛ asɛ ba we-ɛɛla baa dɛ ɛ la gel nɛra jemɛ kɛŋɔ ba waa baa bola dɛɛ gaage la ɛ kpela.
42001001	Nomoa Teɔfelɔs, nɛra warɔ dɛ takapɔ dɛ chwerɛ waa aa chig yabala la bini.
42001002	Ba chwerɛ waa baa noa dɛ le nɛra baa kpɔ siwi naa mumpar la, dɛ faa ɛ a toma dɛɛ bol Korowii Waa la be.
42001003	Nomoa, n gbagba nyiŋi a gɛ waa nɔ bini kɛrɛdɛ dɛ le mumpar, anomanta n liiro kɛ aa magroo kɛ n chwerɛ dɛ bagle a bini gɛ aa teŋa beŋkpoŋa beŋkpoŋa dɛ tɛɛ,
42001004	ásɛ he won jemɛ waa baa bol he be la bini kasinteŋ bwa kɛrɛdɛ.
42001005	Gɛ saŋ Hɛrɔd aa ɛ kooro Judia harɛ la, dɛ Sɔfo bɛl lole baa yerɔ Sakaria, asɛ o ɛ Abia be pera Sɔfore la bɛl. Dɛ o haah sɔne Ɛlesabɛt. Dɛ Sɔfore deene la bɛl biee o ge.
42001006	Dɛ gɛ nɛra banɛ nɔ bwa ɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa aa su Korowii siwi, baa no Korowii wa, dɛɛ teŋɛ a bwa ta kɛrɛdɛ.
42001007	Sakaria moo, ba bwa ba hwɛɛh, kɛ dɛ ba ta bie dɔe, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ Ɛlesabɛt ɛ hambara.
42001008	Awola bɛl Abia be pera Sɔfore toma telo, asɛ Sakaria do Korowii Dea dɛɛ ɛ o Sɔfo toma.
42001009	Gɛ Sɔfore yon dɛɛ ɛ la, ba ta chacha mɔɔ dɛ leo ŋɔ ó jo Korowii Dea dɛ ka fuh konsɔɔhsoma.
42001010	O jo bela, asɛ nɛnlaa la bwa che buse dɛɛ soŋe Korowii ásɛ o fuh konsɔɔhsoma la tonɛ.
42001011	Belaa nyundua torome forɛ le ba Sakaria be Korowii Dea bela dɛ ka che bela waa dɛ fuh konsɔɔhsoma la dig bɔr.
42001012	Sakaria aa na nyundua torome la la, a ɛo anebɛlbwa, asɛ ɔmee lawɔ.
42001013	Anee nyundua torome la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Sakaria, dɛɛ berɛ ɔma! Korowii no he wesoŋa. He haah Ɛlesabɛt ɛɛ lolɛ bibaalee tɛɛ, asɛ hé pa o sɔn Jɔn.
42001014	Dɛ o lolaa, he bambile ɛɛ sɔɔhnee he sie lɛ, nɛra sie lɛ pirim, ba hɛgre.
42001015	Wɛɛ ɛ nɛnjen Korowii bee. Waa sen kɛɛ kwaa aa dɛ dɛɛ te bɛlbwa nyɔe ba. Waa lɔ o nya tea bini kwaraa la, Korowii Domadɛɛge la dɛ ba o nɛɛ soga kpegri nɛ.
42001016	Wɛɛ geloo Israel tena charɛ ba liire dɛ ba N Naa Korowii be.
42001017	Wɛɛ dɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge ne kpegrii kɛŋɔ Korowii keame Elaeja ken, dɛ tɔ ya Dɔɔ sie, dɛ gel eehnanar ne ba bii nyoa pɛ, dɛ berɛ deŋnekpeg tena liire ba nɛra ba wa aa dɛ su Korowii siwi ŋwɛnɛ ta. Gɛɛ wɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ nyin nɛra cheg ya Dɔɔ, ásɛ o balaa, ba won lɛo dɛ tomɔ."
42001018	Belaa Sakaria bɔɔ nyundua torome la ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ hé ɛ n jemɛ kɛ gɛ waa nɔ ɛ kpela ɔ? Dɛkalkɛŋɔ n ne n haah bwa hwɛɛhrɔ."
42001019	Anee nyundua torome la chaŋo ŋɔ, "Menee Gabreɛl maa dɛ che Korowii sie la. Onee tom mɛ ŋɔ ń ba bol amanesoma nɔ he be.
42001020	Kɛ haa wola n waa nɔ yaradae dɛɛ tɔŋ mɛ nomanta, hɛɛ berɛ amumuu dɛ ka tel kɛŋɔ waa nɔ bwa aa ɛa dɛ ɛ kpela mɔɔ he won bol wa. Jemɛ kɛŋɔ waa nɔ maa bola nɔ saŋ telaa, a bwa ɛɛ ɛo kɛrɛdɛ ken."
42001021	Gɛ saŋ Sakaria aa lɔ Korowii Dea bela la, dɛ nɛra chegɛ buse dɛɛ kpao. A ɛɛ ba nyokpoa kɛ waa bigri bela la.
42001022	Waa le Korowii Dea bela dɛ ba buse la, o ta wone bol waa nɛra la be. Anomanta ba nao kɛŋɔ o na komɛl dea bela. Anee gela waa wola won waa bol dɛ ɛ amumu dɛ kpɔ nɔɔra ne nyu dɛɛ bagle waa la.
42001023	Sakaria toma aa tonɛ Korowii Dea bela gɛ saŋ la, o kaa o bwɛ.
42001024	Waa nɔ habɔɔ la, Sakaria haah Ɛlesabɛt jo tea dɛ kpɔ o te sɔh dem korobie anue.
42001025	Ɛlesabɛt chegɛ a gɛ waa nɔ ta, dɛ ŋɔ, "Name te N Naa Korowii laa sihiih kpɔ n sie ta asɛ n won jo nɛra bini."
42001026	Ɛlesabɛt tea la korobie numɛl ta la, Korowii nyundua torome baa dɛ yerɔ Gabreɛl la le Korowii be dɛ ba bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Nasarɛt waa lɔ Galilia harɛ ta la ta.
42001027	Tolo bɛl waa wola baa jemɛ bwa baa yerɔ Mɛɛre bee o ba. Dɛ Mɛɛre dɛ ba baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Josef yala gɛ saŋ. Kooro Devid deaa Josef le.
42001028	Nyundua torome la ba Mɛɛre be dɛ ba ŋɔ, "Korowii nɛnnyini, jam. N Naa Korowii chegɛ he habɔɔ."
42001029	Waa nyundua torome la aa baa bol Mɛɛre be la ɛo anebɛlbwa, asɛ o lii o nyu bini ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa nɔɔ?"
42001030	Belaa nyundua torome la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛɛ berɛ ɔma, kɛ Korowii tɛɛ hɛɛra.
42001031	Hɛɛ kpoŋe tea dɛ lolɛ bibaa asɛ dɛ pa o sɔn Yeesu.
42001032	Wɛɛ ɛ nɛnjenii, asɛ baa yerɔ Korowiijen Bie. N Naa Korowii dɛ ba on o naa Devid kora la dɔŋ chega o di.
42001033	Wɛɛ ɛ Jekɔb naanar bwa sekwaraa kooro o kora aa wola jaga dɔe."
42001034	Anee Mɛɛre ŋɔ nyundua torome la be ŋɔ, "Maa wola baa jemɛ mɔɔ nɔ, ɛrɛɛ waa nɔ ɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ won magre ɔ?"
42001035	Belaa nyundua torome la ŋɔ, "Korowii Domadɛɛge ɛɛ ba he bee, asɛ Korowii kpegri tɔ he nɛ, asɛ he kpoŋe tea. Anɔ taa aa ba chega bie haa dɛ ba lola la ɛ nɛŋkaih, asɛ baa yerɔ Korowii Bie.
42001036	Dɛɛ no! He lole Ɛlesabɛt baa dɛ lii kɛŋɔ o hwɛɛhrɔ ŋɔ waa lolɛ la, taraken o jo tea. Korobie anumɛlee nɔ, kɛ o ge fe ɛ hambara.
42001037	Na, wobɛlbwa ta Korowii ɛɛ tele."
42001038	Anee Mɛɛre ŋɔ, "N Naa Korowiirii dɔɔ mɛ, anomanta ó ɛɛ mɛ gɛ bwa haa ŋɔa nɔ." Asɛ nyundua torome la le Mɛɛre be dɛ kaa.
42001039	A gɛ waa nɔ ta la, Mɛɛre iro dɛ kpɔ yɔra chig ŋwɛnɛ ta ka le Judia bwe harɛ bobɛl dɛ kaa Sakaria bwɛ,
42001040	dɛ ka jo Sakaria dem dɛ ka chɔɔ Ɛlesabɛt.
42001041	Ɛlesabɛt aa no Mɛɛre taa la, anee bie la aa lɔ o tea bini la lɔ kpegri nɛ, asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge ba so Ɛlesabɛt nɛ.
42001042	Belaa o kpɔ takpeg bol waa ŋɔ, "Korowii sweere andɛɛga gwaa haahna bwa, dɛ swee he bie waa lɔ he tea bini la ge andɛɛga.
42001043	N gee umeo n Dɔɔ nya ɛɛ ba ba chɔɔ mɛ nɔɔ?
42001044	Bug la ta he wobol aa chole n deŋna ta la, bie waa lɔ n tea bini la den kpɔ silɛɛ ne hɛgra dɛ lɔ.
42001045	He na som kɛ haa no n Naa Korowii wobol dɛ yarada kɛŋɔ gɛ waa la ɛɛ ɛo nɔ."
42001046	Anee Mɛɛre ŋɔ, "N dɛ kpɛɛ Korowii n bambile bwa ne.
42001047	N sie lɛ Korowii waa lɛɛ mɛ la nɛ.
42001048	O nyiŋi n ge maga nɔ dɔŋ maa ɛ nɛŋgwɛgre nɔ nɛ, dɛ gel nomɛlbwa ɛɛ ba taraken lee dɛɛ bol n waa ŋɔ n na som,
42001049	dɛkalkɛ Korowiijen ɛ wejena tɛ mɛ. O chɛ duura.
42001050	Nɛra te bwa baa dɛ ɔmɔ la, o dɛ na ba sum, dɛɛ na ba biirere sum, dɛɛ na ba ge biirere ne ba naanar bwa sum.
42001051	O chagle o kpegri dɛ doŋi nɛra baa dɛ lii ba te nɛnjena la ba pegre.
42001052	O ir kpegnɛra ba kora ta, dɛ gɔɔ nɛŋgwɛgra baa di kpegri.
42001053	O tɛ nyaara kondɛɛga ba di, dɛ doŋi dɔɔhna ba kpɔ nɔŋgbagla kaa.
42001054	O lii nyobaga waa bagɛ ya naanar la, dɛ lawɛ o Israel tena bini kpoŋe wobɛlbwa ta, dɛɛ sune ba nɛ
42001055	gɛ tenten waa bagɛ Abraham ne o naanar kɛ wɛɛ na ba sumii saŋ bɛlbwa la."
42001056	Belaa Mɛɛre so Ɛlesabɛt be dɛ ɛ korobie atoro mɔɔ dɛ kaa o bwɛ.
42001057	Ɛlesabɛt lola aa tela la, o lolɛ bibaa.
42001058	O nɛra ne o bala aa no gɛ Korowii aa na o sum dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga tɛo la, o ne ba bwa sie lɛo.
42001059	Bie la aa dɔ yawanyoa la, ba balɔ ŋɔ ba ba teŋe o pen, dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin ba kpɔ o mɛɛ Sakaria sɔn pao.
42001060	Anee o nya Ɛlesabɛt ŋɔ, "Akai! A chɛ kɛ ya pao Jɔn!"
42001061	Belaa ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Aah, he lole bɛlbwa ta gɛ sɔn nɔ dii yɔ!"
42001062	Asɛ ba kpɔ nɔɔra dɛ bagle waa Sakaria be, dɛ bɔɔro sɔn waa dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ ba kpɔ pa o bie la.
42001063	Belaa Sakaria gel ba nyin dapɛga tɛo, asɛ o chwerɛ o ta dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ, "Bie la sɔne Jɔn." Nɛra baa lɔ bela la ŋɔ ba ta nyokpowaa nɔ dɔŋa nae bwa.
42001064	Bug la ta la, Sakaria o faa wola won bol waa la nyoa chaarɔ, o won bol wa, dɛɛ kpɛɛ Korowii kɛŋɔ waa ɛ wejena tɛo la.
42001065	Belaa ɔmee lawɛ nɛra baa lɔ bela la bwa, asɛ ba kpɔ gɛ waa nɔ perɛ Judia bwe harɛ bwɛɛre la bwa ta.
42001066	Nomɛlbwa waa no waa nɔ la, o liira o nyu bini ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ gɛ bie nɔ ɛɛ ba doe yɔ?" Ba nao kɛŋɔ Korowii teŋɛ bie la nɛ.
42001067	Jɔn mɛɛ Sakaria ge la, Korowii Domadɛɛge la baa so o nɛ, asɛ o won bol waa aa dɛ ba bala kerekere, dɛ ŋɔ,
42001068	"Hé gel ya jam Israel tena Korowii, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o cha o nɛra dɛ lɛ ya le wahala ta.
42001069	O tɛ yaa nɛnjen o le o bonɔɔ Devid dea dɛ ŋɔ ó ba lɛ yaa.
42001070	O chegɛ o keamere la nɛɛ dɛ bol wubwa
42001071	ŋɔ wɛɛ lɛ yaa le ya dɔma ne nɛra baa hah yaa bwa sekwaraa nɔn taa,
42001072	dɛ na ya sum gɛ waa bagɛ ya naanar nyoa la, dɛ lii o fɔo o ne baa fɔwa la.
42001073	O ne ya naa Abrahamee fɔwɛ fɔo la, asɛ o ŋwɛɛ ntam baglo
42001074	kɛŋɔ wɛɛ lɛ yaa le ya dɔma nɔn taa ásɛ ya tomɔ yaa wola ɔmɛ,
42001075	ásɛ ya ɛ nɛndɛɛga ne nɛŋkaihre o sie ya soga bini bwa."
42001076	Anee Sakaria bol waa o bie la be ŋɔ, "N bie, baa yerɛɛ Korowiijen keamee, dɛkalkɛŋɔ hɛɛ tɔ ya Dɔɔ siee dɛ kwaa bɔr tɛo ásɛ o ba,
42001077	ásɛ dɛ ŋɔ o nɛra be ŋɔ, dɛ ba charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta naa, wɛɛ kpɔɔ kɛ ba dɛ lɛɛ ba.
42001078	N Naa Korowii tea aa dɛ domɛ nɛn nɛɛ kohona nomanta, wɛɛ geloo o wee ɛɛ chaah yaa,
42001079	asɛ dɛ chaah ya banɔ la yaa lɔ biro ta dɛɛ ɔmɛ seo la, dɛ chagle yaa deŋnesɔɔhna ŋwɛnɛ."
42001080	Kenii a do asɛ Jɔn kpeg, dɛ dɔ nomonliire. O soge pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo dɛ ka tel kɛŋɔ tɔpere waa pa o toma mun Israel tena bini aa tela.
42002001	A gɛ saŋ la Room koojen bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Ɔgɛstas la do mmara ŋɔ bá kure nɛra baa lɔ harɛ bobɛlbwa.
42002002	A gɛ nɛra kura nɔɔ tɔ sie. Dɛ Kwiriniosii dɛɛ nyiŋi Siiria harɛ ta a gɛ saŋ.
42002003	Anomanta dɛ nomɛlbwa dɛ kaa o bwɛɛ dɛ́ ka chwerɛ o sɔn.
42002004	Anee Josef le Nasarɛt waa lɔ Galilia harɛ ta la, dɛ chig ŋwɛnɛ ta kaa Bɛtlɛham waa ɛ Devid bwɛɛ dɛ do Judia harɛ ta la dɛ́ ka chwerɛ o sɔn, dɛkalkɛŋɔ belaa ɛ o naa Devid bwɛ.
42002005	Josef ne Mɛɛre ba bwa nɛra aa sɛah ŋɔ ba so la bwaa la Bɛtlɛham sɔna chwera la ta. Dɛ Mɛɛre kpoŋe tea gɛ saŋ.
42002006	Baa lɔ bela la, lol lɔɔ,
42002007	asɛ o lolɛ o binyoa, o ɛ bibaa. O kpɔ yal fɔrɔwo dɛ kpɔɔ bil kon jagre aa dɛ di kwaa o bini la bini, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ bɔr toole bela hɔɔhra aa dɛ chɔ bwɛɛ la ta la kwara bá chɔ.
42002008	A gɛ saŋ la, dɛ petegra bane tegɛ ba peera kaa dibɔr, asɛ bɔr jo, asɛ ba chɔ bela dɛɛ daah ba peera la.
42002009	Belaa nyundua torome bɛl forɛ le ba nɛ, asɛ Korowii jirima chaah bela. Ɔmee lag ba taeh.
42002010	Anee nyundua torome la ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hɛ́ɛ berɛ ɔma! Amanesoma aa dɛ ba silɛɛ ne bala ba tɛ nɛra bwa la nee n ba.
42002011	Jwaana nɔ ne, ba lolɛ he Lɛɛ. He Dɔɔ Kristo Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ heyaa laanee ba lole Devid bwɛɛ la.
42002012	Waa haa che a ta jemɔ laanee nɔ: Hɛɛ na bie laanee kɛŋɔ baa kpɔ yal fɔrɔwo o chɔ kon jagre aa dɛ di kwaa o bini la bini."
42002013	Bug la ta dɛ nyundua toroma bane denɔ warɛ dɛ ja onɔ la nɛ, dɛ go yela dɛɛ kpɛɛ Korowii, dɛɛ ŋɔ,
42002014	"Hé tɛ Korowii waa lɔ nyundua la sɔn, asɛ dɛ gel nɛwɛnyina baa lɔ harɛ ta Korowii siwi aa su ba la ge dɔ bosɔɔhna."
42002015	Nyundua toroma la aa le petegra la be dɛ kaa nyundua la, ba ŋɔ dɔŋa be ŋɔ, "Hé gel ya la Bɛtlɛham dɛ ka na waa aa chig bela asɛ N Naa Korowii che nyundua toroma nɔ nɛɛ dɛ ba bol ya be nɔ."
42002016	Ba chig ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ la bela warane, dɛ ka na Mɛɛre ne Josef, dɛ na bie la ge kɛ waa chɔ kon jagre aa dɛ di kwaa o bini la bini.
42002017	Belaa petegra la aa na bie la la, ba bol nɛra baa cheme bela la be gɛ nyundua torome la aa baa bol bie la waa ba be la.
42002018	Nɛra baa cheme bela aa no waa nɔ la, ba bwa nyoa kpo waa petegra la aa bola la ta.
42002019	Asɛ Mɛɛre kpɔ waa la bwa do o nyu bini dɛɛ kari.
42002020	Petegra la berɔ dɛɛ kaa. Gɛ nyundua torome la aa bol ba be la tentenee ba ka na. Anomanta ba go yela dɛɛ kpɛɛ Korowii.
42002021	Bie la aa dɔ yawanyoa la, ba kpɔ kere chɔgɔ, dɛ pa o sɔn Yeesu, gɛ tenten nyundua torome la aa ŋɔa mɔɔ o nya kpoŋe o tea la.
42002022	Tɔpere aa tela kɛŋɔ Mɛɛre sɔ o lola doŋa ta gɛ Mosis Mmara la aa bagla la, o ne Josef kpɔ ba bie Yeesu ja ba nɛɛ dɛ la Korowii Dea Jerusalam dɛ́ kpɔɔ ka bagle Korowii,
42002023	gɛ Mmara la aa bagla kɛ bie baa tɔ sie lolɔ o ɛ bibaa la, bá kpɔɔ tɛ Korowii la.
42002024	Ba laŋɔ asɛ dɛ ka ɛ saraha tɛ Korowii gɛ Mmara la aa bagla ŋɔ bá kpɔ brɔnomare anɛ kɛɛ kulukukure anɛ la Korowii Dea dɛ ka jaamo la.
42002025	A gɛ saŋ la dɛ baa bɛl lɔ Jerusalam baa yerɔ Semeɔn. O ɛ nɛndɛɛge, dɛɛ ɔmɛ Korowii, dɛ o dɛ nyiŋi naate waa dɛ ba ó ba lɛ Israel tena ŋwɛnɛ. Dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge ir o nɛ,
42002026	dɛ gel o jemɛ kɛŋɔ o siwi ɛɛ na Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ Israel tena la mɔɔ dɛ sewɛ.
42002027	Awola la Korowii Domadɛɛge la kpɔ Semeɔn kaa Korowii Dea, asɛ Josef ne Mɛɛre ge kpɔ Yeesu la bela ásɛ ba ɛo ba we-ɛɛla gɛ Mmara la aa bagla la.
42002028	Baa joa la, Semeɔn kaa kpɔ Yeesu pɛl o bambile dɛ jam Korowii dɛ kpɛɛro,
42002029	dɛ ŋɔ, "N Naa Korowii, he teŋɛ he nyobaga ta. Name te hɛɛ wonoo gel men maa ɛ he bonɔɔ sewɛ sɔnɔnɔɔ,
42002030	dɛkalkɛŋɔ n siwi na ya Lɛɛ,
42002031	haa leo tɛ yaa ŋɔ nɛ́ra bwa nao la.
42002032	On dɛɛ ba he waa kpɔe dɛ bagle nɛnhɔɔhra, ásɛ he nɛra Israel tena dɔ jirima la."
42002033	Gɛ Semeɔn aa bol Yeesu waa la kpo Yeesu nya ne o mɛɛ nyoa.
42002034	Semeɔn soŋe wedɛɛga tɛ Yeesu nya ne o mɛɛ, dɛ ŋɔ o nya be ŋɔ, "Hé no waa nɔ! Bie nɔ chegɔ tɛ Israel tena bane kwaara ne bane chɔga. Wɛɛ berɔɔ che tɛ Korowii, asɛ nɛra bol waa yagɔ,
42002035	asɛ nomɛlbwa bambile bini waa chɔ baŋ. Gɛ baa dɛ ba o ɛɛ la, aa we he nɛɛ kɛŋɔ baa kpɔ kere dɛɛ tɔge he bambile ken."
42002036	A gɛ saŋ la, dɛ luhaah bɛl lole dɛ ɛ Korowii keame, baa yerɔ Hana. Dɛ baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Fanoɛl la bihaahnee on, asɛ o le Aasa dea. Dɛ o hwɛɛhrɔ. O yalɔ o toli saŋ, o ne o jaa so bene anuanɛ asɛ o jaa la ba sewɛ.
42002037	O ta yalɛ kpa, dɛ ba di bene fifranuatoro dɛ anaarɛ. O ta o Korowii toma kpɔe bil harɛ. Chɔɔ ne jwaana dɛ o lɔ Korowii Dea, dɛ yon dɛɛ vɔwɛ nyoa dɛɛ soŋe Korowii.
42002038	Bug la ta Yeesu nya ne o mɛɛ aa lɔ Korowii Dea la, Hana ge jo bela dɛ ka che ba jwɛh, dɛ kpɔ jam ne kpɛɛra tɛ Korowii, dɛ bol Yeesu waa bagle nɛra baa soga dɛɛ kpa Korowii kɛ ó ba lɛ Jerusalam tena ta la.
42002039	Josef ne Mɛɛre aa tona gɛ Korowii Mmara la aa bagla la, ba berɔ kaa ba bwɛɛ Nasarɛt waa lɔ Galilia harɛ ta la.
42002040	Yeesu kpego, dɛ do kpegri, dɛ dɔ liire, asɛ Korowii chao wɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga.
42002041	Bena nyoa bɛlbwaa Yeesu nya ne o mɛɛ la Jerusalam dɛ kaa di ba tɔpejen baa dɛ yerɔ Galekaa la.
42002042	Gɛ saŋ Yeesu aa di bene fi dɛ anɛ la, o ne o nya ne o mɛɛ la Jerusalam dɛ ka di a gɛ tɔpere la, gɛ ba yon dɛɛ ɛ wubwa la.
42002043	Baa di tɔpere la tonɛ dɛ berɛ dɛɛ kaa ba bwɛɛ la, Yeesu pere o te le ba nɛ, dɛ ka mun so Jerusalam, dɛ o nya ne mɛɛ ta jemɛ.
42002044	Dɛ ba dɛ lii kɛŋɔ o lɔ nɛra baa pɛa dɛɛ kaa la bini. Anomanta ba valɔ tɔpebir mɔɔ dɛ ta kaa nyin o bɔr ba lolanar ne ba jerema be.
42002045	Baa nyin o bɔr kahonɛ la, ba berɔ la Jerusalam dɛ kaa gaage o bɔr.
42002046	A tɔpetooro wee la, ba kaa nao Korowii Dea, dɛ o ne Juda tena baa dɛ bagle Korowii waa sogo, wɛɛ no ba wa, dɛɛ bɔɔ ba wa.
42002047	Nɛra baa lɔ bela dɛɛ no waa la bwa nyoa kpo gɛ waa jemɛ waa kohona, ne gɛ baa dɛ bɔɔro waa asɛ o won dɛɛ bagle a bini kɛrɛdɛ la ta.
42002048	O nya ne o mɛɛ aa nao la, ba nyoa kpoo, anee o nya bɔɔro ŋɔ, "N bidɛɛge, bɔkwa waa he ɛ yaa ken? N ne he mɛɛ bwa siwi swɛɛrɔ, ya kpɔ sibegra dɛɛ gaage he bɔr."
42002049	Belaa o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he gaage dɛɛ nyin n bɔr nɔɔ? He ta wone jemɛ kɛŋɔ n Mɛɛ Korowii deemii n do kɛɛ?"
42002050	Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, ba ta a mun noɛ.
42002051	Belaa Yeesu ir ba chig ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ kaa Nasarɛt. Waa lɔ o nya ne o mɛɛ be la, dɛ o dɛ no ba deŋna wa. O nya kpɔ waa la bwa do o nyu bini dɛɛ kara.
42002052	Dɛ Yeesu dɛ kpeg dɛɛ jemɛ wa, asɛ o we-ɛɛla ɛɛ lɛ Korowii ne nɛra sie.
42003001	Gɛ saŋ Siisa Tibeereɔs aa di Room kora bene fi dɛ anue la, dɛ Pɔnteɔs Paelet ɛ Judia harɛ nomoa, asɛ Hɛrɔd ɛ Galilia harɛ kooro, asɛ o dɔɔ Felep ɛ Ituria ne Trakonaetes kooro. Dɛ Laiseenias ɛ Abilini kooro,
42003002	asɛ Anas ne Kaefas ɛ Sɔfonomonome Jerusalam. Gɛ saŋee Korowii kpɔ o waa do Jɔn waa ɛ Sakaria bie la nyoa pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo harɛ ta la,
42003003	asɛ o ir dɛ bol Korowii Waa la bwɛɛre aa bar Jɔɔdan Moo la bwa ta dɛɛ ŋɔ nómɛlbwa charɛ o liire dɛ le o wechɔga ta ásɛ ba sɔɔ Korowii nee ásɛ Korowii kpɔ o wechɔga kɛo.
42003004	Gɛ waa nɔɔ Korowii keame Aesaya chwerɛ o tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Nomɛl dɛ bol waa takpeg ne pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo ta dɛ ŋɔ nɛ́ra gel ba we-ɛɛla togre, dɛ kpɔ ba te dɛɛ kpa ba Dɔɔ bala.
42003005	Fɛlembɔɔ te bɛlbwa chɛ kɛŋɔ he tɔɔ, dɛ bur deŋgare ne bwe te bɛlbwa. Ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa waa gola la chɛ kɛŋɔ he togro, dɛ kwaa ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa bɔɔne bɔɔnere aa lɔ o ta ó chɔ kpantalaŋ.
42003006	Nɛwɛnyina bwa ɛɛ nao gɛ lɛɛ Korowii aa dɛ ba yaa lɛɛ la aa doa."
42003007	Belaa Jɔn ŋɔ nɛra baa lea ba o be ŋɔ ó sɔ ba nee la be ŋɔ, "Nɛnchɔga kɛŋɔ harɛkwaa baa do nii kpɔg ta asɛ a le dɛ chwa dɛɛ kaa! Umee ŋɔ he be ŋɔ hɛɛ wonoo chwa le Korowii bandia ta nɔ?
42003008	Hɛ́ɛ ɛ waa aa dɛ chagle kɛŋɔ he charɛ he liire le he wechɔga ta kpela. He bɛ he hwɛga kpɔ do Abraham nɛɛ kɛ o ɛ he nabaa nomanta hɛɛ wonoo chwa Korowii bandia. Hé gel n ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, Korowii ɛɛ wonoo gel bwea nɔ begre Abraham naanar.
42003009	He do kɛŋɔ daa. Daa bɛlbwa waa wola nɔndɛɛga nɔnɛ la, baa teŋo ta dɛ fuuh. Gɛɛ Korowii ge gɔɔ o kpanfɛ nɛra baa wola ba liire charɛ la nɛɛ dɛɛ ba ba teŋna ta, dɛ kpɔ ba do nii ta ba fuh."
42003010	Anee nɛnlaa la aa baro cheme la bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Aah, ɛrɛɛ yá ɛɔ?"
42003011	Asɛ o chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa dɔ batakaani bele anɛ la, ó kpɔ bɛl tɛ nɛn waa wola bɛl dɔe kwaraa, asɛ nomɛlbwa o ge aa dɔ kondikwaa dɛ́ di la ge ɛ gɛ tenten."
42003012	Belaa lampoo lɛɛra baa dɛ bɔ apoo bane ba ŋɔ ó sɔ ba Korowii ne, dɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ɛrɛɛ chɛ kɛŋɔ ya ɛɔ?"
42003013	Anee o chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "He bɛ suuga lɛ dɛɛ gwaa gɛ aa chɛ kɛŋɔ hɛɛ lɛ."
42003014	Soojare bane ge ba o be dɛ ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Asɛ ya ge sɛh? Ɛrɛɛ chɛ kɛŋɔ ya gee ɛɔ?" Asɛ o ŋɔ ba ge be ŋɔ, "He bɛ nɛra ɛgre dɛɛ lɛ suuga ba be, dɛ bɛ nomɛlbwa ge suuga lɛ dɛ tɔ o wechɔga ta. Hé gel he kembɔa ɛɛ su he siwi."
42003015	Nɛnlaa la hɛgra den ir waa aa dɛ ba bala la ta, baa lii ba nyu bini kɛŋɔ Jɔn kenii Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ásɛ o ba lɛ yaa la.
42003016	Anomanta Jɔn ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Nee tenten nee mɛɛ sɔ heya. Kɛ nomɛl ta dɛ ba dɛ gwaa mɛ, maa wola o napaa teera kwaraa dɔ. O te, Korowii Domadɛɛge ne nii nee wɛɛ ba heyaa sɔe.
42003017	O do kɛŋɔ paa waa chegɛ o pɛla ta dɛ kpɔ o te dɛɛ ba kwaa pala. Wɛɛ palɛ a bwaa kɛrɛdɛ ken, asɛ dɛ pa do kon ta ka cheg. Kɛ a pɛga la te, wɛɛ kpɔ nii aa wola dime bwaa fuah."
42003018	Waa Jɔn aa bola dɛ kpɔ ja nɛra dɛ gel baa no Amanesoma la te ta nyoa dɔe.
42003019	Jɔn ŋɔ Galilia kooro Hɛrɔd be ŋɔ moe waa mo o nime haah Hɛrɔdeas la, ne wechɔga bwa waa ɛa ja la ta magrɛ.
42003020	Gɛ waa nɔ Jɔn aa bol o be la nomanta, o gelɔ ba lawɔ do dea dɛ den do anam kwara.
42003021	Gɛ saŋ Jɔn faa dɛ sɔ nɛra la bwa Korowii nee la, o sɔ Yeesu ge. Yeesu nee sɔe ta, waa dɛ soŋe Korowii la, nyundua pilo,
42003022	asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la tu ba o nɛɛ dɛ do kɛŋɔ brɔnoma, asɛ ba no taa bɛl nyundua kɛŋɔ, "Henee n bie maa dɛ nyin he wa, he waa ɛɛ su n siwi."
42003023	Gɛ saŋ Yeesu aa pa mun dɛɛ ɛ o toma la, dɛ o di bene dɛ ɛ fifraatoro, dɛ nɛra dɛ lii kɛŋɔ Josef biee. Josef ge mɛɛɛ Heli, Heli ge mɛɛɛ Matat, Matat ge mɛɛɛ Lewi, Lewi ge mɛɛɛ Mɛlke, Mɛlke ge mɛɛɛ Janai, asɛ Janai la ge mɛɛɛ Josef. Josef ge mɛɛɛ Matateas, Matateas ge mɛɛɛ Emɔs, Emɔs ge mɛɛɛ Neehum, Neehum ge mɛɛɛ Esli, Esli ge mɛɛɛ Nagae, asɛ Nagae la ge mɛɛɛ Maat. Maat ge mɛɛɛ Matateas, Matateas ge mɛɛɛ Semein, Semein ge mɛɛɛ Josek, Josek ge mɛɛɛ Jɔda, Jɔda ge mɛɛɛ Jɔhanan, asɛ Jɔhanan la ge mɛɛɛ Risa. Risa ge mɛɛɛ Sɛrubabɛl, Sɛrubabɛl ge mɛɛɛ Sealteɛl, Sealteɛl ge mɛɛɛ Nɛre, Nɛre ge mɛɛɛ Mɛlke, Mɛlke ge mɛɛɛ Adi, asɛ Adi la ge mɛɛɛ Kosam. Kosam ge mɛɛɛ Elmadam, Elmadam ge mɛɛɛ Er, Er ge mɛɛɛ Josua, Josua ge mɛɛɛ Eliesa, Eliesa ge mɛɛɛ Jorim, asɛ Jorim la ge mɛɛɛ Matat. Matat ge mɛɛɛ Lewi, Lewi ge mɛɛɛ Semeɔn, Semeɔn ge mɛɛɛ Judas, Judas ge mɛɛɛ Josef, Josef ge mɛɛɛ Jonam, asɛ Jonam la ge mɛɛɛ Eliakim. Eliakim ge mɛɛɛ Mɛlea, Mɛlea ge mɛɛɛ Mɛna, Mɛna ge mɛɛɛ Matata, Matata ge mɛɛɛ Netan, Netan ge mɛɛɛ Devid, asɛ Devid la ge mɛɛɛ Jese. Jese ge mɛɛɛ Obɛd, Obɛd ge mɛɛɛ Boas, Boas ge mɛɛɛ Sala, Sala ge mɛɛɛ Naasɔn, Naasɔn ge mɛɛɛ Aminadab, asɛ Aminadab la ge mɛɛɛ Admin. Admin ge mɛɛɛ Aani, Aani ge mɛɛɛ Hɛsrɔn, Hɛsrɔn ge mɛɛɛ Pɛrɛs, Pɛrɛs ge mɛɛɛ Juda, Juda ge mɛɛɛ Jekɔb, asɛ Jekɔb la ge mɛɛɛ Aesek. Aesek ge mɛɛɛ Abraham, Abraham ge mɛɛɛ Tɛɛra, Tɛɛra ge mɛɛɛ Neehɔ, Neehɔ ge mɛɛɛ Sɛrɔg, Sɛrɔg ge mɛɛɛ Reu, asɛ Reu la ge mɛɛɛ Pɛlɛg. Pɛlɛg ge mɛɛɛ Iba, Iba ge mɛɛɛ Sala, Sala ge mɛɛɛ Keinan, Keinan ge mɛɛɛ Afaksad, Afaksad ge mɛɛɛ Sɛm, asɛ Sɛm la ge mɛɛɛ Nowa. Nowa ge mɛɛɛ Lamɛk, Lamɛk ge mɛɛɛ Mɛtusala, Mɛtusala ge mɛɛɛ Inɔk, Inɔk ge mɛɛɛ Jarɛd, Jarɛd ge mɛɛɛ Mahalalel, asɛ Mahalalel la ge mɛɛɛ Keinan. Keinan ge mɛɛɛ Enos, Enos ge mɛɛɛ Sɛt, Sɛt ge mɛɛɛ Adam, asɛ Korowiirii ge ta Adam.
42004001	Yeesu aa le o Korowii nee sɔe la bɔr dɛɛ kaa dem la, Korowii Domadɛɛge la ir o nɛ, dɛ kpɔɔ kaa pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo ta, asɛ o ka do bela tɔpera fifraanaarɛ.
42004002	Asɛ Bɔnsam ka daahno na a gɛ tɔpera nɔ ta. Dɛ waa komɛlbwa di, anomanta a habɔɔ la, dɛ lɔr lawɔ.
42004003	Bela la, Bɔnsam ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛ henee Korowii Bie la kpela aa, gel bwe nɔ berɛ paanoo hé di."
42004004	Anee Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, 'Kondikwaa gbo laa dɛɛ tɛ nɛn mkpa.' "
42004005	Asɛ Bɔnsam berɛ kpɔɔ ka cheg bobɛl kɛŋɔ bwejeŋ bɛl doa ken, dɛ ka kpɔ harɛ nɔ bobɛlbwa baa dɛ di kora gale o sie ta,
42004006	dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛ he kpɔ duure tɛ mɛ naa, mɛɛ kpɔ a kpegri ne a kondɔɔh bwaa tɛɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a bwa sekwaraa lɔ n nɔn ta. Nɛn maa dɛ nyin laanee ń kpɔ dɛɛ tɛ.
42004007	Dɛ he kpɔ duure tɛ mɛ naa, a bwa dɛ ba he kwaa ɛɛ, he di a kpegri."
42004008	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, 'Dɛɛ duu N Naa Korowii dɛɛ tomɛ o gbo.' "
42004009	Belaa Bɔnsam kpɔɔ kaa Jerusalam, dɛ kpɔɔ ka cheg Korowii Dea nyundujagla, dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛ henee Korowii Bie la kpela aa, che bonɔ dɛ jah le harɛ,
42004010	dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, 'Korowii ɛɛ geloo o nyundua toroma ɛɛ nyiŋi he nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
42004011	Baa lawɛɛ haa wola nakpala kwaraa lɔ.' "
42004012	Anee Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, 'Bɛ N Naa Korowii daah na.' "
42004013	Bɔnsam aa daah Yeesu ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta kɛ ó fe ɛ wechɔga dɛ kahonɛ la, o gelo dɛ kaa tama mɔɔ.
42004014	Dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge kpegri lɔ Yeesu nɛ, asɛ o berɛ la Galilia harɛ. Belaa o waa perɛ baah bela bwɛɛre la bwa ta.
42004015	O la ba cheremi deene bini dɛ ka bol Korowii Waa nɛra be, ba bwa kpɛɛro.
42004016	Asɛ o ba Nasarɛt bela baa dɛɛro la asɛ, gɛ o yon dɛɛ ɛ Ona Tɔpere bɛlbwa la, o la cheremi dea, dɛ ir che ŋɔ o kure Korowii Tɔn la.
42004017	Asɛ ba kpɔ Korowii keame Aesaya tɔn la ba do o nɔn ta. O pili tɔn la, dɛ na bela baa chwera ŋɔ,
42004018	"Korowii Domadɛɛge la ir n nɛ, dɛ lee mɛ ŋɔ ń ba bol amanesoma bagle nyaara, dɛ ŋɔ nɛra baa do ba dea la be ŋɔ ba Lɛɛ balɔ, dɛ gel nyoŋa sibie pili ba won dɛɛ na, dɛ lɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa la ba dɔma nɔn ta,
42004019	asɛ dɛ gel nɛra bwa jemɛ kɛ tɔpere ya Dɔɔ aa dɛ ba o nɛra lɛɛ la telo."
42004020	Yeesu kure tɔn la tonɛ dɛ laa tɔ, dɛ kpɔ do nɛn waa dɛ nyiŋi cheremi dea bela la nɔn ta, dɛ so harɛ. Asɛ nɛra baa lɔ cheremi dea bela la bwa kpɔ sie pa o nɛɛ dɛɛ nyiŋu fuuu ken.
42004021	O berɔ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Fini, waa haa noa le Korowii Tɔn bini nɔ chigo gɛ Korowii aa bola ŋɔ aa ɛo la."
42004022	Belaa nɛra la bwa kpɛɛro. Ba nyoa kpo gɛ o nyoa ne wobol aa soma la, asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Josef bie la laa nɔ naa?"
