42004023	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "N jemɔ kɛŋɔ hɛɛ sɛg mɛɛ ŋɔ, 'Tɛɛga te, chah he te. Gɛ yaa noa kɛ he ɛ Kapeeneɔm la, ɛ ane he gbagba bwɛɛ bonɔ ge.' "
42004024	Dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be kɛ Korowii keame ta sɔn dɔe o gbagba bwɛ.
42004025	Gɛ saŋ Korowii keame Elaeja faa lole hwel che bene atoro korobie anumɛl bwaala aa wola nɛ asɛ lɔr chole harɛ la bwa ta la, dɛ luhaahna warɔ dɛ do Israel tena bini,
42004026	kɛ Korowii ta Elaeja tomɛ ba bini bɛlbwa be. Luhaah bɛl waa lɔ Sidon harɛ bwɛɛ bɛl baa yerɔ Sarɛpta la gbo bee o tomɔ.
42004027	Gɛ saŋ Korowii keame Elaesa faa lole la, dɛ Israel tena weechɔga ane aa chɔg ba bwadabii warɔ. Kɛ o ta ba bɛlbwa chaeh. Siiria harɛ baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Naaman la gboo o chah."
42004028	Nɛra baa lɔ cheremi dea bela la aa no waa nɔ la, dɛ bwaawee lag ba.
42004029	Dɛ ba bwɛɛ la chɔŋɛ bwe ta. Ba iro dɛ tɛgre Yeesu le bwɛɛ la ta, dɛ kpɔɔ ka che bwe la doa bobɛl waa wila su, dɛ fee tagɔ ta, ásɛ o nyu ba yagɛ harɛ.
42004030	Anee o valɛ jo nɛra la baah dɛ valɛ o tetoora kaa.
42004031	Yeesu la Galilia harɛ bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Kapeeneɔm la ta, dɛ kaa bag ba Korowii Waa Ona Tɔpera ta,
42004032	asɛ gɛ waa dɛ bagle Korowii Waa la ɛ ba bwa nyokpoa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ o dɛ bol waa kpegri ne.
42004033	Cheremi dea bela la, dɛ baa bɛl lɔ bela, kwaa ɛɛ ir o nɛ, asɛ o do lɔŋɔ ŋɔ,
42004034	"Aa! Yeesu Nasarɛt te, bɔkwaa hɛɛ nyin ya be nɔ? Ya chɔgaa he ba kɛɛ? N jemɛ he nɛnsoo. Henee Korowii bikaih la waa ŋɔa ŋɔ o dɛ ba bala la."
42004035	Anee Yeesu kɔr kwaa la aa lɔ baa la nɛɛ la ŋɔ, "Hé tɔ nyoa dɛ le o nɛ!" Belaa a lɔ baa la bil nɛra la siwi ta. A ta on wobɛlbwa ɛɛ, dɛ le o nɛɛ dɛ kaa.
42004036	Nɛra baa lɔ bela la bwa nyoa kpoo, ba ŋɔ dɔŋa be ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa nɔɔ! Hé na gɛ baa nɔ aa kpɔ kpegri bol waa bagle kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ asɛ a kaa!"
42004037	Anomanta Yeesu waa perɛ baah bela bwɛɛre la bwa ta.
42004038	Yeesu le cheremi dea bela dɛ la Seemɔn dem, dɛ Seemɔn helahaah bwara wɔrɔbɔ tenten, asɛ ba bol o waa Yeesu be ŋɔ ó chaoh.
42004039	Belaa o la weela te la be o chɔɔbɔr, dɛ ka che o jwɛh, dɛ kɔr o weela la, asɛ a le o nɛ, o dɔ bokpega bug la ta dɛ nyiŋ ba.
42004040	Wee aa dɛ jo la, nɛra baa dɔ chamenetena baa we weela bwa soosiwi la kpɔ ba ba Yeesu be, asɛ o kpɔ o nɔɔra dawɛ ba nɛɛ dɛ chah ba bwa sekwaraa.
42004041	Kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ la le ba nɛɛ pirim. Aa dɛ le dɛ a dɛ dooge lɔŋɔre dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Henee Korowii Bie la!" Yeesu kah kwaa la, o ta gelɛ a bol wa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a jemɔ kɛŋɔ onee Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ o nɛra la.
42004042	Bɔr aa dɛ chaah la, Yeesu le bwɛɛ la ta dɛ ka so bela nomɛlbwa aa wola toole. Dɛ nɛra iro dɛɛ nyin o bɔr. Baa nao la, ba ta on ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ kɛ o kaa bobɛlbwa, dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ bá ne o so.
42004043	Anee o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "A chɛ kɛŋɔ n bol Korowii Kora Amanesoma la bwɛɛre ane ge ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ anee Korowii tom mɛ ŋɔ ń ba ɛ."
42004044	Anomanta o valɔ dɛɛ bol Amanesoma la dɛɛ bagle nɛra cheremi deene bini Judia harɛ bwa.
42005001	Awola bɛl dɛ Yeesu chegɛ Gɛnɛsarɛt Moo la nyoa, asɛ nɛnlaa bane ba baro cheme, dɛ tagɛ dɔŋa dɛɛ ba o be dɛ́ ba no Korowii Waa waa dɛ bol la.
42005002	Yeesu na gbeni anɛ ane nɛra bane baa dɛ ɛ nee toma aa lawa vɔwɛ dɛ le kaa chɛgɛ ba asauri.
42005003	Belaa o ka jo gbera la bɛl bini. Dɛ Seemɔn konee. O ŋɔ Seemɔn be ŋɔ ó tagɛ gbera la do tama. Anee o tagɛ do tama, asɛ Yeesu so o bini dɛ bol waa bagle nɛnlaa la.
42005004	Waa bol waa bagle nɛra la tonɛ la, o ŋɔ Seemɔn be ŋɔ, "Hé ne he bala la pa he asauri la do gbera nɔ bini dɛ ɛgɛ do baah ta dɛ ka ta."
42005005	Anee Seemɔn ŋɔ, "E! N Dɔɔ, jwaana ne bwaa ya le ta asauri nɔ, ya ta komɛlbwa dɔe. Kɛ haa dɔa ŋɔ gɛ nɔ te naa, mɛɛ geloo ya ka ta."
42005006	Baa tagɛ gbera la do nebaah ta la, ba kaa ta asau la bɔle pɛŋedamanta ane nɛ, asɛ wɛɛ ba kɛɛra.
42005007	Anomanta ba laa nɔn ir ba bala bane ba ne baa dɛ ɛ tonsiwi beŋkpoŋ dɛ do gbera bɛl bini la ŋɔ bá ba, asɛ ba ba dɛ ba cha ba, dɛ tɛgre pɛŋa la do gbeni anɛ la bwa bini a su dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin dɛ morɛ.
42005008	Seemɔn Pita aa na a gɛ waa nɔ la, o kaa guŋi Yeesu sie dɛ ŋɔ, "Oo, n Dɔɔ, wechɔg-ɛɛree men! N poori, le n be."
42005009	Pɛŋedamanta Seemɔn ne nɛra baa ja o nɛɛ la aa dɔa la ɛ ba bwa nyokpoa.
42005010	Gɛ tentenee a ɛ ba bala Sebedii bii Jɔn ne Jems la nyokpoa. Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ Seemɔn be ŋɔ, "Dɛɛ berɛ ɔma. Le fini dɛɛ kaa, hɛɛ gel pɛŋa nyinaa dɛ baa teŋɛ n nɛ, asɛ n bagle heyaa gɛ baa nyin nɛra baa tɛ Korowii."
42005011	Baa tawɛ ba gbeni la ba chuge dɛ lawa vɔrɔwe la, ba gel wobɛlbwa dɛɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ.
42005012	Awola bɛl dɛ Yeesu lɔ bwɛɛ bɛl ta, dɛ baa bɛl lɔ bela asɛ weechɔga ɛ o bwara bwa. Waa na Yeesu la, o baa guŋi o sie dɛ soŋo ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, dɛ he sɛoh ŋɔ hɛɛ chaah mɛɛ yaa, hɛɛ wonoo gel n bwara kwaa."
42005013	Anee Yeesu tɛr nɔn lego, dɛ ŋɔ, "N sɛoh. He bwara kwaarɔ." Bug la ta dɛ o weela la denɔ le o nɛ, o bwara kwaa.
42005014	Asɛ Yeesu kaoh ŋɔ, "Bɛ nomɛlbwa be ŋɔ, kɛ la Sɔfo be ó ka pɛne, asɛ hé kpɔ kwaa ka tɛo ó kpo, gɛ Mosis aa bagla la, ásɛ nɛra bwa na dɛ jemɛ kɛ he weela la toole he nɛɛ kpa."
42005015	Waa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ o bɛ nomɛlbwa be ŋɔ la, name tenee a ɛ anam. Yeesu waa perɔ kohona, asɛ nɛra ɛɛ ba o be pirim dɛ́ baa no o waa la, wɛɛ chah ba weela.
42005016	Dɛ ba dɛ ba o be gɛ naa, gɛɛ o yon laa o te kpɔ ba bini dɛ kaa bela nomɛlbwa aa wola toole dɛ kaa soŋe Korowii.
42005017	Awola bɛl dɛ Yeesu dɛ bagle nɛra Korowii Wa, asɛ Farisii tena bane ne Tɔn Jerema baa le Galilia harɛ ne Judia harɛ bwɛɛre la bwa ta ne Jerusalam ba dɛ ba so bela, dɛ Korowii tɛo kpegri asɛ wɛɛ chah weela tena.
42005018	Belaa baala bane che baa bɛl waa kuuga ne o kalaŋ ba, asɛ dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin bɔr dɛ kpɔɔ jo dem bela Yeesu aa lole la dɛ́ kpɔɔ ka bil o sie.
42005019	Bɔr aa fara la, ba ta wone kpɔ baa la ba o be, anee ba teeh dea la dɛ ka forɛ sal la bela Yeesu aa chega la dɛ kpɔ baa la ne o kalaŋ waa chɔ o ta la dɛ che bela kpɔɔ bil Yeesu sie nɛra la baah ta.
42005020	Yeesu aa na gɛ baa yaradao la, o ŋɔ baa la waa kuuga la be ŋɔ, "Baa, n kpɔ he wechɔga kɛɛ."
42005021	Asɛ Tɔn Jerema la ne Farisii tena baa soge bela la lii ba nyu bini ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ o do dɛɛ bol nɛnhɛlwaa gɛ nɔɔ? Dɛ Korowii laa aa, umee dɛ won kpɔ nɛn wechɔga kɛo wɔ?"
42005022	Yeesu aa na waa baa dɛ lii la, o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ lii gɛ waa nɔ nɔɔ?
42005023	Maa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ n kpɔ o wechɔga kɛo nɔ, ne kɛŋɔ maa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ó ir dɛ valɛ, a bini umee kpega ɔ?
42005024	Mɛɛ chagle heyaa kɛŋɔ n Nɛn Bie dɔ kpegri harɛ nɔ ta kɛ n kpɔ nɛra wechɔga kɛ ba." Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, o ŋɔ weela te la be ŋɔ, "Men ŋɔ he be, ir dɛ kpɔ he kalaŋ kaa dem!"
42005025	Asɛ baa la ir bug la ta dɛ kpɔ o kalaŋ nɛra la bwa siwi ta bela, dɛ kpɛɛ Korowii dɛɛ kaa.
42005026	Yeesu aa ɛ gɛ la, nɛra la bwa nyoa kpoo, ɔmee lag ba, asɛ baa kpɛɛ Korowii dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa nyokpowaa ya na fini ken?"
42005027	Anɔ habɔɔ la, Yeesu valɔ baa kaa dɛ na lampoo lɛɛ bɛl kɛŋɔ waa soge o toma ta dɛɛ lɛ lampoo. Dɛ o sɔne Lewi. Yeesu aa nao la, o ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ir ba teŋɛ n nɛ."
42005028	Anee Lewi gel wobɛlbwa dɛ ir teŋɛ o nɛ.
42005029	Lewi gelɔ ba ɛ kondikonjena o dem dɛ hɔɔh Yeesu, asɛ o ne Yeesu ne lampoo lɛɛra pirim ne nɛra bane ka so dɛɛ di kwaa la.
42005030	Belaa Farisii tena ne ba bini Tɔn Jerema la pwah o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he ne lampoo lɛɛra baa dɛ bɔ nɛra apoo ne wechɔg-ɛɛra pɛ dɛɛ di kwaa nɔɔ?"
42005031	Yeesu aa no gɛ waa nɔ la o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Weela tenaa dɛɛ gaage tɛɛga te bɔr, bokpega tena laa."
42005032	Dɛ ŋɔ, "Nɛra baa dɛ lii ba te nɛndɛɛga waa laa n ba. Wechɔg-ɛɛra waa n ba ásɛ ba charɛ ba liire."
42005033	Asɛ ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛ waa Jɔn habɔteŋra la ne Farisii tena la yon vɔwɛ nyoa dɛɛ soŋe Korowii, asɛ he habɔteŋra nɔ te aa wola gɛ ɛ nɔɔ?"
42005034	Anee Yeesu sɛg ba dɛ ŋɔ, "Baa laa dɔa kpɔ hanfale dɛ yerɛ o daamanar ŋɔ bá ba bá lɛ ba sie nɔ, baa berɔɔ so lɔr aa? Baa lɔree so.
42005035	Kɛ tɔpere bɛl ɛɛ bao kɛŋɔ baa lawɛ men hanfale jaa laanee le ba bini. Gɛ saŋ la te, baa vɔwɛ nyoaa."
42005036	Belaa o berɛ sɛg ba ŋɔ, "Baa yafale mɔnɛ dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ tɔ yabene bɔɔ. Dɛ he ɛ gɛ naa, dɛ he chɔg onfale la, o ne ombene la ge aa dɔŋaa le."
42005037	Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ, "Baa senfala kpɔe dɛɛ do loŋbena aa kɔɔhna bini dɛɛ tɔ a nyoa. Dɛ he ɛ gɛ naa, senfala la baa peraa, aa do kpegrii dɛ pere loŋa la a chɔg, asɛ sen la fuge.
42005038	Senfala chɛ loŋfala.
42005039	Nomɛlbwa aa sen aa peraa nyɔ dɛ berɛ kaa nyin anɔ la aa wola pere bɔr kpa, dɛkalkɛ ampera la wer tɛo."
42006001	Awola Ona Tɔpere bɛl, Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra kpɔ mea koo bɛl ta, asɛ o habɔteŋra la kuugi mea la ane dɛ fɔga dɛɛ chwe.
42006002	Baa dɛ ɛ gɛ la, Farisii tena bane na dɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ɛ toma dɛɛ to ya Ona Tɔpere mmara nɔɔ?"
42006003	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "He ta gɛ ya naa Devid aa ɛa saŋ la lɔr aa dɛ kpo o ne nɛra baa ja o nɛɛ la kure kɛɛ?
42006004	O la Korowii Dea dɛ ka di paanoo aa ɛ Korowii kwa, nomɛlbwa fe aa wola ŋwɛnɛ dɔe kɛ o di atane kɛ Sɔfore gbo la. O diu, dɛ tɛ o nɛra ge ba di."
42006005	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "N Nɛn Bie laanee dɔ Ona Tɔpere kpegri."
42006006	Awola Ona Tɔpere bɛl, Yeesu la cheremi dea dɛ ka bagle wa. Dɛ baa bɛl lɔ bela, asɛ o nɔndig sewɛ.
42006007	Dɛ Tɔn Jerema ne Farisii tena lole dɛɛ nyiŋi Yeesu kɛ wɛɛ chah baa laanee Ona Tɔpere la ta, ásɛ ba dɔ o waa dɛ bol.
42006008	Dɛ Yeesu te jemɛ waa baa dɛ lii, anee o yerɛ baa la o nɔndig aa sewa la, dɛ ŋɔ ó ir ba che ba sie. Asɛ o ir dɛ ba che ba sie.
42006009	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "N dɛ bɔɔ heya. Ɛrɛɛ Korowii Waa la ɛɛ bagle yaa ŋɔ yaa ɛ Ona Tɔpere ta laɔ? Dɛ́ a ɛ a ŋwɛnɛ ta kɛ yaa ɛ nɛra wedɛɛga kɛɛ ya fig baɔ? A ɛ a ŋwɛnɛ ta kɛ ya lɛ nɛra mkpa kɛɛ ya chɔg baɔ?"
42006010	Yeesu nyiŋi nɛra la bwa, asɛ dɛ ŋɔ baa la be ŋɔ ó tɛr o nɔn. Waa tɛr o nɔn la, dɛ o nɔn la berɔ do kpegri.
42006011	Belaa Tɔn Jerema la ne Farisii tena la baah di baa bol dɔŋa be gɛ aa chɛ kɛ ba ɛ Yeesu.
42006012	Yeesu aa le bela la, o la deŋgare bɛl ta bela nomɛlbwa aa wola toole, dɛ ka do bela dɛɛ soŋe Korowii jwaana la bwa.
42006013	Tɔ aa pera la, o yerɛ o habɔteŋra la, asɛ dɛ kpɔ ba bini fi dɛ banɛ dɛ ŋɔ o toromaa ban.
42006014	O kpɔ Seemɔn waa pao Pita la, ne Pita nime Andriu, dɛ Jems ne Jɔn ne Felep ne Batolomeo,
42006015	dɛ kpɔ Maatiu ne Tɔmas ne Alfeɔs bie Jems, dɛ Seemɔn baa dɛ yerɔ Sɛlɔt la,
42006016	dɛ kpɔ Jems bie Judas ne Judas Eskareɔt waa leo tɛ ba kpoo la.
42006017	Waa kpɔ o toroma la tonɛ la, o ne ba le deŋgare la doa dɛɛ tu harɛ, dɛ ba pu o habɔteŋra la bane, asɛ o ne ba che bobɛl waa chɔ harɛ. Ba warɔ pirim dɛ le Judia harɛ, ne Jerusalam, ne mpo nyoa bwɛɛre baa dɛ yera Taaya ne Sidon,
42006018	dɛ ba o be dɛ́ ba no o wa, asɛ ó chaah ba weela. Nɛra kwaa aa dɛ ir ba nɛɛ a ɛɛ ba weela bwa ba bela, asɛ o doŋa ta ba.
42006019	Dɛ nɛra la bwa siwi swɛɛrɔ baa nyin dɛ lego, dɛkalkɛŋɔ kpegri bɛl le o bini dɛɛ chah ba bwa.
42006020	Yeesu nyiŋi o habɔteŋra la, dɛ ŋɔ, "He nɛra haa ɛ nyaara la, he na som, dɛkalkɛ heyaa dɛɛ ba Korowii koobii ɛɛ.
42006021	He banɔ la lɔr aa dɛ kpo heyaa taraken la, he na som, dɛkalkɛŋɔ hɛɛ ba vagɔɔ. He banɔ la haa dɛ wi taraken la, he na som, dɛkalkɛ hɛɛ ba mamɔɔ.
42006022	Dɛ nɛra koh n Nɛn Bie nɔ waa dɛ hah heya, dɛ vɛh heya, dɛ chɛgre heya, dɛ yerɛ he sɔnchɔge aa, he na som.
42006023	Dɛ a ba gɛ naa, hé gel he sie lɛ kohona asɛ he hɛgre, dɛkalkɛ he kembɔr warɔ taeh Korowii be. Gɛ tentenee ba naanar ɛ Korowii keamere ba faa lole la.
42006024	He banɔ la haa ɛ kondɔɔhna la, hé bwɛɛlɛ! He silɛɛ bwaa hɛɛ na la.
42006025	He banɔ nɔ haa vagra taraken nɔ, hé bwɛɛlɛ! Lɔr ɛɛ ba kpo heyaa taeh. He banɔ nɔ haa dɛ mamɛ taraken nɔ, hé bwɛɛlɛ! Hɛɛ ba wiu.
42006026	He banɔ la nɛra aa dɛ bol he bwara wedɛɛge nɔ, hé bwɛɛlɛ! Gɛ tentenee ba naanar kpɛɛ keamechɔga baa wola Korowii nyoa waa bolɛ la.
42006027	"He banɔ la haa dɛ no n waa nɔ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ nyin he dɔma wa, dɛɛ ɛɛ ba wedɛɛga.
42006028	Hé swee andɛɛga dɛɛ tɛ banɔ la baa dɛ taah heya, dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ banɔ la baa dɛ ɛ heyaa wechɔga la ge.
42006029	Dɛ nomɛl kpaa he lwɛɛma aa, berɛ baŋ bɛl ge tɛo ó kpaa ja. Dɛ nomɛl lɛ he yal he be naa, kpɔ he batakaare ge jao.
42006030	Dɛ nomɛl soŋe komɛl aa, tɛo. Dɛ nomɛl kpɔ he komɛl aa, bɛ o be lɛ kpa.
42006031	Gɛ haa dɛ nyin kɛ nɛra ɛ dɛɛ tɛ heyaa la, hé ge ɛ gɛ tenten dɛɛ tɛɛ ba.
42006032	"Dɛ he dɛ nyin nɛra baa dɛ nyin he waa gbo aa, dɛ he wedɛɛga haa dɛ ɛ a gwaa la, anee ameo? Wechɔg-ɛɛra gba dɛ nyin nɛra baa dɛ nyin ba wa.
42006033	Dɛ he ɛ wedɛɛga dɛɛ tɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ heyaa wedɛɛga gbo aa, dɛ he chɛ jam aa? Wechɔg-ɛɛra gba aa gɛ ɛa?
42006034	Dɛ nɛra baa dɛ bɔ heyaa gboo hɛɛ kemɛ kwaa aa, bɔkwa kembɔree hɛɛ ba dɔe yɔ? Wechɔg-ɛɛra gba dɛ kemɛ ba bala wechɔg-ɛɛra kwa, ásɛ ba baa dɔ aa, ba bɔ ba.
42006035	Hɛ́ɛ nyin he dɔma wa, dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga dɛɛ tɛɛ ba. He dɛ kemɛ nɛra kwaa aa, he bɛ a lɛɛ waa dɛɛ lii. Dɛ he dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, anee hɛɛ ba kembɔr dɔe kohona dɛ ɛ he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la bii. O te dɛ nyiŋi wechɔg-ɛɛra ne boniayɛ tena bwa.
42006036	Hɛ́ɛ sune nɛra nɛ, gɛ he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la aa dɛ sune nɛra nɛɛ la.
42006037	"He bɛ dɔŋa dɛɛ pwah, asɛ Korowii ge bɛ heyaa pwah. He bɛ dɔŋa bolchɔge dɛɛ pa, asɛ Korowii ge bɛ heyaa bolchɔge pa. Hé kpɔ he dɔŋa wechɔga dɛɛ kɛ ba, asɛ Korowii ge kpɔ he wechɔga dɛɛ kɛ heya.
42006038	Hɛ́ɛ tɛ dɔŋa kwa, asɛ Korowii gee tɛ heyaa a do kan kohona. Korowii dɛ ba he tɛɛ yaa, wɛɛ magaa, dɛ jwiira, dɛ ɛgra a jo kɛrɛdɛ dɛ su porrr ken dɛɛ ta. Kon haa kpɔa magɛ kwaa tɛ he dɔŋ la tentenee baa ba kpɔe magɛ tɛ he ge."
42006039	Yeesu berɔ sɛg ba ŋɔ, "Nyoŋe ɛɛ wonoo lawɛ o dɔŋ nyoŋe daa a magre aa? Ba bwa aa bɔɔ taa ka le dɛ chogli aa?
42006040	Nɛn waa dɛ hweli toma la ta o dɔɔ gwaalɛ, kɛ dɛ o dɔɔ hweli toma dɛ jemɛ tonɛ kwaraa naa, o ne o dɔɔ ɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
42006041	"Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ bol he dɔŋ wechɔga tama waa haa wola he te wechɔgdamanta waa dawɛ nɔɔ?
42006042	A do kɛŋɔ dabor aa lɔ he siwi ta haa wola on kpɔe, dɛ ŋɔ he dɔŋ be ŋɔ, 'N dam, gel n laa dapugri kpɔ he siwi ta.' Nɛra haa nyiŋi nɛra sie mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ waa la! Tɔ sie laa dabor la kpɔ he siwi ta mɔɔ dɛ́ won na kɛrɛdɛ dɛ laa dapugri waa lɔ he dɔŋ siwi ta la kpɔ.
42006043	"Dadɛɛge aa won nɔnɛ nɔnchɔga, gɛɛ dachɔge ge aa wola won nɔnɛ nɔndɛɛga.
42006044	Daa bɛlbwa nɔna waa nɔna la taa ba che dɛɛ jemɔ. Sɔɔh da aa pur nɔna nɔnɛ, gɛɛ kontromoo ge aa wola lomporo nɔnɛ.
42006045	Nɛndɛɛge wedɛɛga ɛɛ taa a che baa jemɛ wedɛɛga aa lɔ o bambile bini. Gɛɛ ba che nɛnchɔge ge wechɔga ɛɛ ta dɛɛ jemɛ wechɔga damanta aa lɔ o bambile bini, dɛkalkɛ waa aa lɔ nɛn bambile ta laanee o nyoa ɛɛ bol.
42006046	"Ɛrɛ waa hɛɛ yer mɛ he dɔɔ, haa wola waa maa dɛ bol he be ɛ nɔɔ?
42006047	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ba n be dɛ baa no n waa nɔ dɛɛ ɛa la, mɛɛ chagle heyaa gɛ waa doa.
42006048	Naate do kɛŋɔ nɛn waa dɛ ba o dea doe, dɛ kwi o mun pae bɔɔ ka jagɛ bwetal ta mɔɔ dɛ ma dea la. Asɛ nee palɛ ba jo dea la mun, o ta chole, dɛkalkɛ o doo kɛrɛdɛ.
42006049	Nomɛlbwa ge waa no n waa nɔ, waa wola gɛ aa bagla la ɛ la, o do kɛŋɔ nɛn waa do o dea, o ta o mun pae bɔɔ kwii ka jagɛ bwetal ta mɔɔ dɛ den doo la, asɛ nee aa pala ba jo dea la mun ta la, o chole dɛ chɔg kwaraa."
42007001	Yeesu aa bol a gɛ waa nɔ bwa bagle nɛra la tonɛ la, o le bela dɛ kaa Kapeeneɔm.
42007002	Dɛ Room sooja nomoa bɛl lɔ bela dɛ dɔ bonɔɔ bɛl dɛɛ nyin o waa kɛrɛdɛ. Dɛ bonɔɔ la bwara dɛ weo, a ka jɛɛ ken o sewɛ.
42007003	Sooja nomoa la aa no Yeesu waa la, o tomɛ Juda tena nomonome bane ŋɔ bá ka soŋo o ba chah o bonɔɔ la tɛo.
42007004	Baa la Yeesu be la, ba soŋo kohona ŋɔ ó ba chah nomoa la bonɔɔ la tɛo, dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "A wer kɛŋɔ he cha nomoa nɔ,
42007005	dɛkalkɛ o dɛ nyin ya Juda tena wa, hale o do cheremi dea tɛ yaa kwara."
42007006	Baa ŋɔ gɛ la, Yeesu iro, o ne baa kaa. Aa ka tama o tel dem bela la, sooja nomoa la tomɛ o daamanar o be ŋɔ bá ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ o ta chɛɛ kɛ Yeesu ba o dem, anomanta o bɛ o te koh,
42007007	dɛ ŋɔ o gbagba ge ta chɛɛ kɛŋɔ o ba Yeesu be. Kɛ Yéesu bol waa waa ba o dem dɛ ba bol la ásɛ o bonɔɔ la gbaŋre.
42007008	O bolɔ ŋɔ, "N ɛ nɛn maa lɔ nomonome bane lɔga, dɛ dɔ soojare ba do n ge lɔga. Mɛɛ wonoo ŋɔ bɛl be ŋɔ, 'Ba,' o ba, dɛ berɛ ŋɔ onfale be, 'Kaa,' o ge kaa. Mɛɛ wonoo ŋɔ n bonɔɔ be ŋɔ, 'Ɛ ken tɛ mɛ,' asɛ o ɛ."
42007009	Yeesu aa no waa nɔ la, o nyoa kpoo yarada waa yaradao la wa, asɛ o berɛ habɔɔ dɛ ŋɔ nɛnlaa baa teŋɛ o nɛɛ la be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n ta nɛn waa yarada mɛ ken nae bwa. N ta o yarada dɔŋ nae Israel tena kwaraa bini."
42007010	Belaa nɛra sooja nomoa la aa tom ba la berɛ kaa o be. Baa tel o dem la, ba nao kɛŋɔ o bonɔɔ la gbaŋrɔ.
42007011	Aa ɛ tama la, Yeesu leɔ dɛɛ kaa bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Neen la ta. Waa dɛ kaa la, dɛ o habɔteŋra ne nɛnlaa bane ja o nɛ.
42007012	Waa dena dɛɛ tel bwɛɛ la ta la, dɛ ba chegɛ baa bɛl waa sewa dɛɛ kaa ka huge. Dɛ gɛ nɛn waa sewa la ɛ luhaah bɛl bibeŋkpoŋ waa dɔa. Dɛ bwɛɛ la tena bane teŋɛ luhaah la nɛɛ pirim.
42007013	Belaa Yeesu aa na haah la la, o waa do o sum, asɛ o ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛɛ berɛ wii."
42007014	Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, o kaa lege lale la baa fɔrɔwo la, asɛ nɛra baa chegɔɔ la jagɛ che bobeŋkpoŋ, asɛ o ŋɔ, "Bonɔɔ, n ŋɔ hé ir!"
42007015	Belaa bonɔɔ la fugri ir so, dɛ den dɛɛ bol wa. Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ haah la be ŋɔ, "He biee la."
42007016	Ɔmee lawɛ nɛra baa lɔ bela la bwa, asɛ baa kpɛɛ Korowii dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Korowii keamejen bɛl ba ya bini bonɔ! Korowii balɔ dɛ́ ba lɛ o nɛra!"
42007017	Yeesu waa waa ɛa la perɛ Judia harɛ ne harɛre aa baro cheme la bwa ta.
42007018	Anee Jɔn waa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la habɔteŋra ba Jɔn be dɛ ka bol a gɛ waa nɔ bwa baglo.
42007019	Asɛ o yerɛ ba bini banɛ, dɛ tom ba Yeesu be ŋɔ bá ka bɔɔro ŋɔ onee nɛn Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ geloo o ba la aa, kɛɛ o laa ɔ, asɛ báa nyiŋi naate habɔɔ?
42007020	Jɔn habɔteŋra la aa ba Yeesu be la, ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Jɔn waa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee laanee tomɛ yaa he be dɛ ŋɔ yá ba bɔɔre ŋɔ, henee naate Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ geloo o ba la aa, kɛɛ he laa ɔ, asɛ yáa nyiŋi naate habɔɔ?"
42007021	A gɛ saŋ la dɛ Yeesu chah weela tena taeh, dɛ doŋi kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛ a le ba nɛ, asɛ dɛ gel nyoŋa gee na bɔr.
42007022	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ Jɔn toroma la be ŋɔ, "Hé ka bagle Jɔn be waa haa baa na ne anɔ la haa baa no. Hé ŋɔ o be ŋɔ nyoŋa dɛ na bɔr, boobie ɛɛ valɛ, asɛ nɛra weechɔga aa chɔg ba bwadabii la ge bwara kwaa. Hé ŋɔ o be ŋɔ amumure dɛ no wa, lala ir seo ta, asɛ nyaara ge dɔ Amanesoma la dɛɛ no.
42007023	He naate haa wola men tɔŋle la, he na som."
42007024	Jɔn toroma la aa kaala la, Yeesu bol Jɔn waa nɛnlaa la be ŋɔ, "Haa la pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo la ta bela la, bɔkwaa he fe ɛɛ nyin kɛ he na laɔ? Kpɔg bɛl peu aa dɛ ta wɛɛ yiigi waa he la bela kɛɛ?
42007025	Dɛ gɛ laa ge aa, dɛ bɔkwa tenee he la ŋɔ he ka nyiŋi ɔ? Nɛn waa do laaladɛɛgaa he la ka nyiŋi kɛɛ? Nɛra baa dɛ do laaladɛɛga dɛɛ di ba tetookondikwaa la, koodemii ba do.
42007026	Hé den bag mɛ, bɔkwa tenee he la bela ka nyiŋi ɔ? Korowii keamee kɛɛ? Kasinteŋ, Korowii keamee he na la, kɛ o gwaa Korowii keame kwara.
42007027	Jɔn nɔ waa ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, 'Korowii ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ tomɛ n toromee ó tɔ he sie dɛ kwaa ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ" ' la.
42007028	N dɛ ŋɔ he be, ba lolɛ nɛnjena harɛ nɔ ta, kɛ Jɔn gwaa ba bwa. Kɛ nomɛlbwa waa ɛ bechala Korowii Kora la ta te berɔ gwaalo."
42007029	Nɛmpɛɛne la ne lampoo lɛɛra la kwaraa baa dɛ bɔ nɛra apoo aa no Yeesu waa la, ba sɛoh ŋɔ Korowii waa dɔ kasinteŋ. Gɛ nɛra nɔɔ Jɔn faa sɔ Korowii nee la.
42007030	Kɛ ba nomonome ne Farisii tena la ne Tɔn Jerema la te vɛh Korowii waa aa wera tɛɛ ba la. Dɛ ba te fa ta gelɛ Jɔn sɔ ba Korowii ne.
42007031	Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa konee mɛɛ ba fini nɛra nɔ kpɔe dɛ magɔɔ? Bɔkwa nɛraa ban ɔ?
42007032	Ba do kɛŋɔ bechale bane aa dɛ hɛlɛ fɔgbaah, asɛ bane ŋɔ ba bala be ŋɔ, 'Ɛrɛɛ ya go silɛɛ yela asɛ he sie ta lɛɛ hé sa, ya berɛ ta wiile ge, he loo ta kui hé wi nɔɔ?'
42007033	Jɔn waa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la aa bala la, dɛ waa sen nyɔ, dɛ yon lawɛ o nyoa vɔwɛ, asɛ he ŋɔ kwaa dɛ ir o nɛ!
42007034	Asɛ n Nɛn Bie ge aa bala nɔ, n dɛ di kwaa dɛɛ nyɔ sen, asɛ he ŋɔ, 'Hé na baa nɔ! Kondikondidii ne sennyɔɔree on. Lampoo lɛɛra baa dɛ bɔ nɛra apoo ne wechɔg-ɛɛraa o daamanar.' " Yeesu aa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o ŋɔ,
42007035	"Wejereme bɛlbwa we-ɛɛla taa a che baa jemɛ kɛ o ɛ wejereme."
42007036	Farisii te bɛl yerɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ó ba ó ne o di kwa, asɛ Yeesu la o dem ba ka so tig ta, dɛɛ ba kwaa dii.
42007037	Bwɛɛ la ta la, dɛ haah bɛl dɛ bɔ jwamane dɛ do bela. Waa noa kɛ Yeesu lɔ Farisii te la dem dɛɛ di kwaa la, anee o ka kpɔ nosɔɔhsoma loŋjega bɛl del
42007038	dɛ ba guŋi Yeesu jwɛh dɛ wi ta o napaala ta, dɛ kpɔ o nyumpona fee o sinii la waa wia ta Yeesu napaala ta la, dɛ mo o napaala, dɛ fuge nosɔɔhsoma la fɔgla.
42007039	Belaa Farisii te la waa yerɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ó ba di kwaa la aa na a gɛ waa nɔ la, o lii o nyu bini ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ fe ɛ Korowii keame tenten naa, o fe jemɛ haah nɔ hahsoo waa dɛ lego nɔ. O fe jemɛ o wechɔga waa lɔ a ta bwɛɛ nɔ ta."
42007040	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Seemɔn, n dɔ waane dɛ́ bol he be." Asɛ baa la ŋɔ, "Nomoa, bol."
42007041	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "Nɛra banɛ banee di baa bɛl kem. Ba bwa di o kem te, kɛ bɛl kwaa gwaa o dɔŋ kwaa kera fi.
42007042	A gɛ kema la nɛra banɛ la aa dia la, ba bɛlbwa ta wone bɔ, asɛ o kpɔ kɛ ba. A gɛ waa nɔ aa do gɛ nɔ, ba bini umee hɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ wɛɛ nyin baa la waa kohonaa yɔ?"
42007043	Anee Seemɔn chaŋo ŋɔ, "N dɛ lii kɛ naate o kem aa kana la, onee dɛ nyin baa la waa kohona." Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kpelaa he ŋɔ."
42007044	Yeesu aa ŋɔ gɛ la, o berɛ sie ta haah la be, dɛ ŋɔ Seemɔn be ŋɔ, "Kɛ he na haah nɔ kenɛ? Maa ba he dem bonɔ la, he ta men nee tɛɛ ń sarame n nakpale. Kɛ haah nɔ te wio ta n nakpale ta dɛ kpɔ o nyumpona feera kɛrɛdɛ ken.
42007045	He ta men lɛɛ silɛɛ ne dɛ mo n lwɛɛma. Kɛ maa baa so nɔ bwa, o ta n napaala moe gelɛ bwa.
42007046	He ta men nee tɛɛ ń sarame n nakpale gɛɛ mɛɛ bol noo maa kpɔ fɔgle n nyu wa aa? Kɛ o te fuge nosɔɔhsoma fɔgle n nakpale.
42007047	Anomanta mɛɛ dii kasinteŋii. Nyina haah nɔ aa nyin n waa kohona nɔ baglɔ kɛ Korowii kpɔ o wechɔga damanta waa ɛa la bwa kɛo. Naate waa wola wechɔga ɛɛ kohona a ɛ kɛŋɔ he kpɔa kɛo la, nyina waa dɛ nyin he waa la aa kan do. Waa Korowii jam kohona kɛ nɛn waa ɛ anjena la."
42007048	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ haah la be ŋɔ, "Korowii kpɔ he wechɔga kɛɛ."
42007049	Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, anee nɛra baa soge tig ta bela dɛ ja o nɛɛ la ɛɛ lii ba nyu bini ŋɔ, "Nɛn besoo baa nɔ o kpɔ wechɔga dɛɛ kɛ nɛra nɔɔ?"
42007050	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ haah la be ŋɔ, "He yarada haa yarada mɛ nɔ lɛɛ. Ir dɛɛ la. Kórowii tɛɛ bosɔɔhna."
42008001	Aa ɛ tama la, Yeesu jo bwɛjena ne bwɛjegre ta dɛɛ bol Amanesoma la kɛ Korowii Kora la dii telo. Dɛ o habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la,
42008002	ne haahna bane waa doŋi kwaa ba nɛɛ dɛ chaah ba weela la ja o nɛ. Gɛ haahna nɔ bɛlee Mɛɛre waa le Magdala Yeesu faa doŋi kwaa bele anuanɛ le o nɛɛ la.
42008003	Bɛl gee Joana waa ɛ Kusa waa ɛ nomoa dɛɛ nyiŋi Kooro Hɛrɔd dem la haah, ne Susaana ne ba bala bane baa wara dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la nɛ, dɛ kpɔ ba gbagba suuga dɛ yawɛ kwaa tɛɛ ba baa di la.
42008004	Dɛ nɛra teŋo le bwɛɛre aa teŋɛ dɔŋa nɛɛ la ta dɛɛ ba Yeesu be. Nɛnlaa la aa wara dɛ bar Yeesu cheme la, o kpɔ sɛgla dɛ bol waa bag ba ŋɔ,
42008005	"Baa bɛlee ira dɛ kaa merɛ mea o koo ta. Waa dɛ merɛ mea la la, ane lee ŋwɛnɛ ta, asɛ nɛra tigri a ta, jumbii ge ba tɔɔ di.
42008006	Mea la ane ge lee bwetala ta. Aa lea la, a jwalɔ dɛ serewe, dɛkalkɛŋɔ sɔn toole bela.
42008007	Mea la ane lee sɔɔhne baah dɛ le, sɔɔhne la kpeg dɛ lawa a serewe.
42008008	Ane ge lee harɛdɛɛge la ta dɛ le, dɛ do wer kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ mendaa bɛlbwa ɛ bie lafa." Yeesu aa bol waa nɔ tonɛ la, o kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa no la, ó no!"
42008009	Yeesu aa tonɛ o wobol la o habɔteŋra la bɔɔro sɛgla la mun.
42008010	Anee o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Korowii ta o Kora bini wobɛlbwa kpɔe sɔh he te. Kɛ nɛra baa kaa la te, sɛgla nee mɛɛ ba waa ba be bola, ásɛ a ɛ gɛ baa chwera ŋɔ, 'Ba dɔ sibie, kɛ baa na, dɛ dɔ deŋna kɛ baa no, baa waa mun jemɛ.'
42008011	"Hé no sɛgla la mun. Mea la chegɔ tɛ Korowii Waa la.
42008012	Asɛ anɔ la aa lee ŋwɛnɛ nyoa asɛ jumbii ba tɔɔ di la chegɔ tɛ nɛra baa no Korowii Waa la, asɛ bug ta dɛ Bɔnsam baa laa kpɔ ba nyu bini asɛ ba bɛ ba te kpɔ tɛ Korowii o lɛɛ ba la.
42008013	Anɔ la ge aa lee bwetala ta bela teera aa wola toole kohona asɛ a lune aa wola wone kaa bini asɛ a jwalɛ dɛ sewɛ la, a do kɛ nɛra ba yon no waa la, dɛ ba sie lɛo, kɛ aa wola won ban jooge dɛɛ ka ba nyu bini la. A chegɛ Korowii Waa ta waane puu ba aa, dɛ ba horɔ.
42008014	Asɛ anɔ la ge aa lee sɔɔhne baah, sɔɔhne la lawa a sewɛ la gee nɛra baa no Korowii Waa la, asɛ ba soga bini ne kondɔɔh waa ne wepuu aa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta begre ba sie, baa gelɛ waa la ɛɛ dɔ tɔnɔ la.
42008015	Anɔ la ge aa lee harɛdɛɛge ta dɛ le dɛ do wer dɛ ma kohona la gee nɛra baa no waa la dɛ kpoŋe a bini kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ dɔ bambile dɛ teŋɛ a ta, dɛ gel a dɔ tɔnɔ la.
42008016	"Nomɛlbwa aa kandea choŋi dɛ kpɔ kon dɛɛ pi o ta, kɛɛ dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ do mpa lɔga. Ba choŋi kandea aa, kon taa ba kpɔɔ dɛɛ chɔŋɛ ásɛ wɛɛ chaah nɛra bwa.
42008017	Komɛlbwa waa sɔah la ɛɛ le bochaahnee ba nao. Waa bwa baa tɔ a ta la ɛɛ ba leo nɛra jemɛ.
42008018	Anomanta hé no kɛrɛdɛ dɛ jemɛ waa nɔ mun. Dɛ he wono no a mun aa, mɛɛ ja heyaa anee, dɛkalkɛŋɔ naate waa dɔa la, baa jao anee, asɛ nɛn waa wola komɛlbwa dɔe la, tama kwaraa waa dɔa la ɛɛ le o nɔn taa."
42008019	Yeesu nya ne o nimanar la bela waa lole la, kɛ nɛnlaa la nomanta, ba ta wone tel o be.
42008020	Anee nomɛl ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He nya ne he nimanar chegɛ buse dɛɛ nyin ba nae."
42008021	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "N nya ne n nimanaree nɛra baa dɛ no Korowii Waa dɛɛ teŋɛ a ta la."
42008022	Awola bɛl, Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la kaa jo gbera bini, asɛ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ bá kaa moo baŋ le, asɛ ba tagɛ gbera la do.
42008023	Baa tawa dɛɛ kaa la, Yeesu chɔ dom gbera la bini. Bug la ta dɛ peujen bɛl dɛ ta dɛ kpɔ nehaŋma dɛɛ jo ba gbera la bini, asɛ gbera la ɛɛ ba mora.
42008024	Anee o habɔteŋra la chumu dɛ ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ya serewɔ tonɛ!" Belaa o ir dɛ kɔr peu la ne nehaŋma la, asɛ a hel, asɛ bɔr hel kerker ken.
42008025	Bɔr aa hela la, o bɔɔ o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ haa wola men yarada nɔɔ?" Ba ɔmɔ, ba bwa bwara hwah, asɛ baa bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Nɛn besoo siwii nɔ, wɛɛ bol waa peu ne nehaŋma ɛɛ no o wobol nɔɔ?"
42008026	Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la tawɛ gbera kaa Galilia Moo la baŋ, Gerasa harɛ ta.
42008027	Yeesu aa le gbera la bini la, baa bɛl waa ɛ bwɛɛ la te kwa aa dɛ ir o nɛɛ baa chemo. Dɛ kwaa la aa ir o nɛɛ bigro, asɛ o foo o laala ta, dɛ chwa le dem dɛ ka so lala hugribɔr.
42008028	Gɛ baa nɔ aa na Yeesu la, o chwao dɛ ba guŋi o sie, dɛ kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Yeesu, Korowiijen Bie, bɔkwaa hɛɛ nyin n be nɔ? N dɛ soŋe, bɛ men weweele do."
42008029	Pɛɛ laa baa la do lɔŋɔ la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ Yeesu tɔ sie ŋɔ kwáa la le o nɛ. Gɛɛ kwaa la yon dɛɛ ir o nɛ, asɛ baa lawɔ dɛɛ doo kpɛɛ. Ba doo kpɛɛ aa, gɛɛ o yon kuuga, asɛ kwaa la yon kaa o ne pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo ta.
42008030	Belaa Yeesu bɔɔro ŋɔ, "He sɔne ɛrɔɔ?" Asɛ o ŋɔ, "N sɔne Dɔm." Dɛ kwaa la warɔ pirim dɛ do o nɛ, a waa o ŋɔ o sɔne Dɔm la.
42008031	Anee kwaa la soŋe Yeesu ŋɔ o bɛ an doŋi ka ta bela baa dɛ ba wechɔg-ɛɛra bwa hɔhɔrɔwa doe la.
42008032	Bela la, dɛ prakooni damanta ane lɔ diŋgoŋ bɛl ta dɛɛ di. Anee kwaa la soŋe Yeesu ŋɔ ó gel a kaa prakooni la nɛ, asɛ o tɛa ŋwɛnɛ.
42008033	A le baa la nɛɛ dɛ ka jo prakooni la nɛ, asɛ prakooni damanta la bwa chwa biribiri, dɛ wili diŋgoŋ la dɛ ka lee moo ta dɛ serewe kwaraa.
42008034	Belaa nɛra baa dɛ tegɛ prakooni la aa na waa aa chiga la, ba chwa dɛ la bwɛɛ la ta ne bwɛjegre ne daamune aa bɛne bela la ta, dɛ ka bol waa aa chiga la bela tena be.
42008035	Bela tena aa noa la, ba le ba bwɛɛre ta dɛ́ ba na waa aa chiga la. Baa ba Yeesu be la, dɛ baa la kondamanta faa lɔ o nɛɛ la, dɛ o kwaa la bwa kaalɔ, o liire ba harɛ, o do laala dɛ so Yeesu sie. Baa na gɛ waa nɔ la, ba ɔmɔ.
42008036	Nɛra baa lɔ bela dɛ na gɛ Yeesu aa chah baa la kwaa faa lɔ o nɛɛ la bol a waa ba bwɛɛ tena la aa ba bela la be.
42008037	Yeesu aa ɛ gɛ la, nɛra baa le baah bela la soŋo ŋɔ ó le ba harɛ ta dɛ kaa, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ɔmee tenten chole ba nɛ, asɛ o jo gbera bini dɛ kaa.
42008038	Yeesu aa dɛ kaa la, anee baa la kwaa faa lɔ o nɛɛ la soŋo ŋɔ, "Gel n ne he kaalɔ." Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ,
42008039	"Kaa he nɛra be dem dɛ ka bol wejena Korowii aa ɛa tɛɛ la." Baa la laŋɔ dɛ ka bol waa Yeesu aa ɛa tɛo la bwɛɛ la bwa ta.
42008040	Yeesu aa bera kaa moo la baŋ le la, nɛra baa lɔ bela la jaamo silɛɛ ne, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba sogo dɛɛ kpao.
42008041	Belaa cheremi dea nomoa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Jaerɔs la ba dɛ ba guŋi Yeesu sie dɛ soŋo ŋɔ o dɛ nyinu o dem.
42008042	Dɛ gɛ baa nɔ bibeŋkpoŋ waa dɔɔ, o ɛ bihaah dɛ di bene fi dɛ anɛ la bwara dɛ weo wɛɛ ba sewa. Yeesu aa dɛ kaa la, dɛ nɛnlaa bane teŋɛ o nɛ, dɛ fiilo do baah ta dɛɛ tagɔ.
42008043	Dɛ haah bɛl ge lole chal ɛɛ fugo bene fi dɛ anɛ, o chah, o komɛlbwa tonɛ tɛɛga tena be. Kɛ nomɛlbwa ta wone chaoh.
42008044	O jo nɛra la baah ta dɛ ka che Yeesu habɔɔ dɛ lege o batakaare nyoa. Bug la ta dɛ chal la aa dɛ fugo la teŋo.
42008045	Asɛ Yeesu bɔɔ ŋɔ, "Umee leg mɛ nɔɔ?" Waa bɔɔra la, nomɛlbwa ta sɛɛh. Anee Pita ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, nɛnlaa nɔ aa bare cheme dɛɛ tagɛ dɔŋa nɔ, anee he berɛ dɛɛ bɔɔ naate waa lege naa?"
42008046	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "N nao kɛ nomɛl leg mɛ, dɛkalkɛ kpegri ane le n bini."
42008047	Belaa haah la aa naa kɛŋɔ waa won kpɔ o te sɔh la, o kpɔ bochela dɛ ka guŋi Yeesu sie nɛra la bwa siwi ta, dɛ bagle wee la aa bala o lego la, ne gɛ o weela la aa kaala bug la ta la.
42008048	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Tolo, he yarada haa yarada mɛ la gelɔ he gbaŋre. Dɛɛ la. Korowii tɛɛ bosɔɔhna."
42008049	Yeesu nyoa taa lɔ waa waa dɛ bol la ta la, torome le cheremi dea nomoa la dem dɛ ba ŋɔ nomoa la be ŋɔ, "He bihaah la sewɔ. Bɛ berɛ ha nomoa la kpa."
42008050	Ajaah Yeesu no waa la torome la aa baa bol la, anomanta o ŋɔ Jaerɔs be ŋɔ, "Bɛ ɔmɛ, kɛ yarada mɛ. Wɛɛ berɔɔ dɔ bokpega ja."
42008051	Yeesu aa tel dem bela la, o ta gelɛ nomɛlbwa ja o nɛɛ dɛ jo bela bie la aa chɔa la, nemenɛ Pita ne Jɔn ne Jems ne bie la nya ne o mɛɛ gbosoroo.
42008052	Dɛ nɛra baa lɔ bela la koh bie la waa dɛɛ wi. Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He bɛ wi. Bie la ta sewɛ, domii o chɔ!"
42008053	Yeesu aa ŋɔ gɛ la, dɛ ba dɛ mamɔ, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba jemɔ kɛ o sewɔ.
42008054	Waa ba bie la jwɛɛh la, o lawɛ o nɔn dɛ kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Bie, ir!"
42008055	Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, bie la hweera berɔ ba ja, asɛ o fugri ir bug la ta, asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ bá nyin kwaa tɛo o di.
42008056	Bie la nya ne o mɛɛ bwa bwara yɔrɔ, asɛ Yeesu kah ba ŋɔ ba bɛ nomɛlbwa be waa aa chiga la bol.
42009001	Yeesu yerɛ o habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la ba cheme o sie, dɛ tɛɛ ba kpegri ne ŋwɛnɛ ŋɔ bá doŋi kwaa nɛra nɛ, dɛ chah weela ge,
42009002	dɛ tom ba ŋɔ bá ka bol Korowii Kora la wa, dɛ chah weela tena.
42009003	Waa dɛ tom ba la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He bɛ komɛlbwa kpɔ kpoŋe he ŋwɛnɛ nɔ kaala ta. He bɛ daŋgbale kpɔ, dɛ bɛ pure kpɔ, dɛ bɛ kondikwaa kpɔ, dɛ bɛ suuga kɛɛ batakaare bele anɛnɛ kpɔ.
42009004	Bwɛɛ bɛlbwa haa la o ta la, dem haa ka jo o ta la, hé so bela ka tel kɛŋɔ haa le bwɛɛ la ta.
42009005	Dɛ bwɛɛ la tena ta heyaa lɛɛ silɛɛ ne naa, hé jwii he napaala teera ta bela mɔɔ dɛ le bela, ásɛ a bagle kɛŋɔ he kpɔ Korowii Waa ba ba be ba vɛah."
42009006	Asɛ ba le kaa, dɛ kaa bol Amanesoma la bela bwɛɛre la ta, dɛɛ chah weela tena bobɛlbwa.
42009007	Kooro Hɛrɔd waa dɛ nyiŋi Galilia harɛ ta aa no waa Yeesu aa dɛ ɛ la bwa la, o liire ɛo sakaa ken, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ nɛra bane dɛ bol ŋɔ Jɔn o faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la ir seo ta.
42009008	Bane ŋɔ Korowii keame Elaejaa ir seo ta, asɛ bane ge ŋɔ Korowii keamebena la bɛlee weera.
42009009	Anee Kooro Hɛrɔd ŋɔ, "Jɔn te, n gelɔ ba teŋe o nyu, aah nɛn besoo ge waa mɛɛ no ken nɔɔ?" Asɛ dɛ swɛɛ siwi kɛŋɔ wɛɛ na Yeesuu.
42009010	Yeesu habɔteŋra la balɔ dɛ ba bol waa baa kaa ɛ o be, asɛ o kpɔ ba le nɛnlaa la bini ba kaa bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Bɛtsaeda la ta.
42009011	Nɛra aa no o waa la, ba tiu bela, asɛ o lɛɛ ba silɛɛ ne dɛ bol Korowii Kora la waa bag ba, dɛ chah ba bini banɔ la ba bwara aa dɛ wee ba la.
42009012	Wee aa dɛ jo la, o habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la la o be dɛ ka ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Tɛ nɛnlaa nɔ ŋwɛnɛ ba kaa bwɛɛre aa bar bonɔ nɔ dɛ́ ka nyin kondikwaa ne chɔɔbɔra, dɛkalkɛ bonɔ ɛ kpɔg baah."
42009013	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "Hé tɛɛ ba kwaa bá di." Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, ba chaŋo ŋɔ, "Paanoo anue ne pɛŋa anɛɛ ya dɔ. Nemenɛ ya la dɛ ka yawɛ kondikwaa ba tɛ nɛra nɔ bwa nɔ."
42009014	Dɛ nɛra baa lɔ bela la, ba baala ɛɛ ɛ nɛra kagboŋa banuee. Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "Hé ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ bá pɛɛge so fifraanunue."
42009015	Anee o habɔteŋra la gel nɛra la pɛɛge dɛ so gɛ.
42009016	Asɛ Yeesu kpɔ paanoo anue la ne pɛŋa anɛ la, dɛ ha sie dɛ nyiŋi nyundua dɛ jam Korowii, dɛ mɔne do o habɔteŋra la nɔɔra ta ŋɔ bá bɔne tɛ nɛra la.
42009017	Baa bɔne paanoo la tɛ nɛra la la, ba bwa diu dɛ vagre, ane ka. O habɔteŋra la tɔɔ anɔ la baa dia ka la pɛ, asɛ a su wɛgrɛjena fi dɛ anɛ.
42009018	Awola bɛl, dɛ Yeesu gbo lɔ bobɛl dɛɛ soŋe Korowii, asɛ o habɔteŋra la la o be. Anee o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Nɛn besoo nɛra ɛɛ lii mɛ nɔ?"
42009019	Anee ba ŋɔ, "Bane ŋɔ Jɔn o faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee laanee hen. Bane ŋɔ Elaejaa hen, asɛ bane ge ŋɔ Korowii keamebena la bɛlee weera."
42009020	Asɛ o bɔɔ ba ge ŋɔ, "Nɛn besoo he gee lii mɛ nɔ?" Anee Pita chaŋo ŋɔ, "Henee Kristo la Korowii aa ŋɔa wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la."
42009021	Belaa Yeesu kah ba kohona ŋɔ ba bɛ gɛ nomɛlbwa be bol.
42009022	Asɛ o berɛ ŋɔ, "Men Nɛn Bie la chɛ kɛŋɔ n na waa nomonome ne Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema nɔn ta, asɛ ba vɛɛh mɛ, dɛ kpo mɛ, asɛ a tɔpetooro wee la, n ir seo ta."
42009023	O berɛ ŋɔ ba bwa be ŋɔ, "Dɛ nomɛlbwa dɛ nyin kɛ o teŋɛ n nɛ aa, ó gel o tetookwaa nyina, dɛ kpɔ o te tɛ tɔpere bɛlbwa kɛ wɛɛ sɛh wahala nae ne seo bwaa, dɛ ba teŋɛ n nɛɛ kɛŋɔ nɛn waa kpɔ dagagre che bá ka kpaaro pɛl o ta la,
42009024	dɛkalkɛ nomɛlbwa o sie aa swɛɛ harɛ nɔ ta kwaa ta la, wɛɛ paŋɛ o nyuu. Asɛ nomɛlbwa ge o sie aa wola harɛ nɔ ta silɛɛ kwaa ta lɛ la, wɛɛ dɔ o nyuu.
42009025	Dɛ nɛn dɔ harɛ nɔ ta kwaa bwa dɛ paŋɛ o nyu aa, bɔkwa tɔnɔɔ o dɔɔ?
42009026	Nomɛlbwa sihiih aa dɛ kpoo n ne n webagla nɔ ta la, awola men Nɛn Bie ne nyundua toromedɛɛga aa ba n Mɛɛ jirima ne la, maa naatee heeh awola tɔpere.
42009027	Kasinteŋ, Korowii ɛɛ ba di o Kora harɛ nɔ taa, dɛ he bini bane ta soge le dɛ nao."
42009028	Yeesu aa bol a gɛ waa nɔ la, a yawa nyoa la, o kpɔ Pita ne Jɔn ne Jems, o ne ba teeh bwe bɛl dɛ kaa o doa, dɛ ka soŋe Korowii.
42009029	A gɛ saŋ Yeesu aa dɛ soŋe Korowii la, o sie bɔr begrɔ, asɛ o laala waa doa la to dɛɛ nyɛgle al-al ken.
42009030	Ba ne ŋɔ ba nyiŋi, dɛ o ne nɛra banɛ dɛ bol wa. Dɛ Korowii keamebena Mosis ne Elaejaa.
42009031	Baa bala dɛ Korowii jirima lɔ ba nɛ, baa bol gɛ Yeesu aa dɛ ba sewa Jerusalam ásɛ Korowii waa la ɛ kpela.
42009032	Dɛ Pita ne o bala la dɛ chɔ doromi. Ba iro dɛ na Yeesu kɛŋɔ o laala aa toa dɛɛ nyɛgle al-al ken. Ba na nɛra banɛ la baa ja Yeesu nɛɛ la ge.
42009033	Nɛra banɛ la aa le Yeesu be dɛɛ kaa la, Pita ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, a wer kɛŋɔ yaa lɔ bonɔ nɔ. Gel ya do kukure atoro, hé kpɔ bɛl, Mosis kpɔ bɛl, asɛ Elaeja ge kpɔ bɛl." Dɛ waa jemɛ waa waa dɛ bol.
42009034	Pita taa dɛ bol waa nɔ la, bam bɛl denɔ ba tɔ ba nɛ, asɛ ɔmee lag ba kɛŋɔ bam la chunchule aa baa tɔ ba nɛɛ la.
42009035	Belaa taa bɛl le bam la bini ŋɔ, "N Bie maa leo laanee la. Hé no o be!"
42009036	Wobol la aa chiga la, dɛ a ka Yeesu gbo, asɛ o habɔteŋra la hel jeiih ken gɛ waa nɔ ta, ba ta nomɛlbwa be waa baa naa la bolɛ gɛ saŋ.
42009037	Tɔ aa pera la, Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra batoro la le bwe la doa tu harɛ, asɛ nɛnlaa bane ba chemo.
42009038	Belaa baa bɛl kpɔ takpeg bol waa nɛra la bini ŋɔ, "Nomoa! N dɛ soŋe, nyiŋi n bie nɔ nɛɛ tɛ mɛ. O gboo n bie.
42009039	Kwaa dɛ ir o nɛ. A ir o nɛ aa, gɛɛ o pigri do lɔŋɔ, asɛ a won kpɔɔ go harɛ o beŋri chɔ, asɛ fufug ɛɛ le o nyoa. A dɛ ɛo hɔhɔrɔwa mɔɔ dɛ le o nɛ.
42009040	N soŋe he habɔteŋra la ŋɔ bá doŋa o nɛɛ tɛ mɛ, kɛ ba ta wone."
42009041	Anee Yeesu chaŋe ŋɔ, "Oo! Fini nɔ nɛra wechɔga aa lɔ he nɛɛ nɔ, he ta yarada dɔe! Tɔpera aŋwɛnɛɛ hɛɛ nyin kɛ n lawɛ bambile dɛ so he be mɔɔ he yarada Korowii ɔ? Maa tɔpere bɛl dii ba he be kpa oo! Kpɔ he bie la ba bonɔ."
42009042	Bie la aa dɛ ba la, kwaa la goo harɛ dɛ gel o beŋri. Yeesu kɔr kwaa la, dɛ chah bie la, dɛ kpɔɔ tɛ o mɛɛ.
42009043	Nɛra la bwa nyoa kpo Korowii kpegri la nɛ. Ba nyoa aa kpoa ba taa kooga la, Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ,
42009044	"Hé cheg deŋne dɛ no waa nɔ maa dɛ ba he be bola nɔ, asɛ dɛ bɛ soh! Ba dɛ ba men Nɛn Bie lee do nɛra nɔn ta."
42009045	O habɔteŋra la ta waa la mun noɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii kpɔɔ sɔɔh ba. Dɛ ba ge dɛ ɔmɛ, anomanta ba bɔɔro waa la mun kahonɛ.
42009046	Wetɔŋla chole o habɔteŋra la baah ta, asɛ baa nyin ba jemɛ ba bini onɔ la waa ɛ ba bwa nomoa.
42009047	Baa wola a ne baŋ leɛ mɔɔ la, dɛ Yeesu jemɛ waa baa dɛ lii. Belaa o lawɛ bechala bɛl ir che o jwɛh,
42009048	dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa koh n waa dɛ nyiŋi bie nɔ nɛɛ la, dɛ menee o nyiŋi la. Nomɛlbwa ge waa nyiŋi n nɛɛ la, dɛ naate waa tom mɛ laanee o nyiŋi la. Naate waa ɛ o te bechala he bini la, onee nomoa."
42009049	Belaa Jɔn ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, ya na baa bɛl waa kpɔ he sɔn dɛɛ doŋi kwaa nɛra nɛ, asɛ ya kaoh ŋɔ ó gel, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o ta ya bini bɛl ɛɛ."
42009050	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ Jɔn ne o bala la be ŋɔ, "He bɛ on kah ŋɔ ó gel. Nomɛlbwa waa wola he nɛɛ chegɛ la, he somee on."
42009051	Tɔpere aa dɛ tel kɛ Korowii kpɔ Yeesu kaa o be nyundua la, Yeesu kpɔ o te, dɛ den chig ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ pa sie dɛɛ kaa Jerusalam.
42009052	O tomɛ nɛra bane ŋɔ bá tɔ o sie dɛ la Samaria harɛ bwɛɛ bɛl ta dɛ́ ka nyin bɔr tɛo ó chog.
42009053	O sie aa chagɛ Jerusalam la nomanta, bela tena ta on lɛɛ.
42009054	Yeesu habɔteŋra Jems ne Jɔn aa na gɛ waa nɔ la, ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, he dɛ nyin kɛ ya gel nii le nyundua ba dɛ ba fuuh ba kɛɛ?"
42009055	O habɔteŋra la aa ŋɔ gɛ la, o ta ban gelɛ. O laa o te berɛ dɛ do ba nee ba samɛ.
42009056	Asɛ o ne o habɔteŋra la kaa ba sie bwɛɛ bɛl ta.
42009057	Baa vala dɛɛ kaa la, baa bɛl ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Bobɛlbwa haa dɛ la la, mɛɛ teŋɛ he nɛɛ kaa."
42009058	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Manyajegre kwaraa dɔ bɔɔne dɛɛ chɔ a bini, asɛ jumbii aa dɛ gah nyundua ge dɔ a kɔne, kɛ n Nɛn Bie la te ta bobɛlbwa dɔe ń chɔ dɛ onɛ."
42009059	Asɛ o berɛ ŋɔ baa bɛl ge be ŋɔ, "Teŋɛ n nɛ." Anee baa la ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, gel n la, asɛ n mɛɛ baa sewaa, ń hugo mɔɔ dɛ ba."
42009060	Asɛ Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Gel nɛra baa wola Korowii mkpa dɔe la huge ba dɔŋa, asɛ hé ka bol Korowii Kora la bini waa bagle nɛra."
42009061	Asɛ baa bɛl ge ŋɔ o be ja ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, mɛɛ teŋɛ he nɛ, kɛ gel n ka kal n haahna ne bii mɔɔ dɛ ba."
42009062	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o ge be ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa pa mun dɛɛ ba para dɛ ka kpɔ par, o nyu bini berɛ dɛɛ ɛo anɛnɛ la aa won parɛ a magre. Gɛɛ a do kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa kpɔ o te kɛŋɔ wɛɛ ja Korowii Kora la taa la bɛ berɛ dɔ liire anɛ kpa."
42010001	Anɔ habɔɔ la Yeesu yerɛ o habɔteŋra fifraanuanɛ dɛ banɛ bane, dɛ pɛ ba banɛnɛ, dɛ tom ba ŋɔ bá tɔ sie bwɛɛre ne bela waa dɛ ba a ta laŋa la ta.
42010002	O kpɔ nɛwɛnyini magɛ konduula, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Koo kondikwaa la kan, kɛ tom-ɛɛra la lɔ tamaa ken dɛɛ ba a koma. Anomanta hé soŋe Koo Te la ásɛ o kpɔ tom-ɛɛra la bane ba ja bá ka ɛ a toma.
42010003	Hé kaa. N dɛ tomɛ heyaa he ka koo he dɔma baah ta.
42010004	He bɛ suuga pure kpɔ, he bɛ pure haa kpɔ laala dɛɛ do a bini gba kpɔ, he bɛ naŋgawa bele anɛnɛ kpɔ. He bɛ ka jagɛ che ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ jam nɛra wobohweeh ne.
42010005	Dem haa ka chog o ta la, hé tɔ sie ŋɔ, 'Kórowii tɛ dem nɔ tena bosɔɔhna!'
42010006	Dɛ nɛn Korowii aa ŋɔa o dɔ bosɔɔhna lɔ bela aa, Korowii ɛɛ tɛo wedɛɛga haa soŋa laanee. Dɛ gɛ nɛn toole ge aa, he wedɛɛga haa soŋa la ɛɛ berɔɔ ba he gbagba be.
42010007	Hé so a gɛ dem la ta, dɛɛ di ba kondikwaa baa dɛ di dɛ tɛ heyaa la ane, dɛkalkɛŋɔ tom-ɛɛ kembɔr chɛo. A gɛ dem la te habɔɔ, he bɛ le ka so dem bɛlbwa ta kpa.
42010008	"Bwɛɛ bɛlbwa haa la o ta asɛ bela tena lɛ heyaa la, kwaa baa tɛ heyaa ŋɔ hé di la, hé lɛ dɛ di.
42010009	Hé chah bela tena ba bwara aa dɛ wee ba la weela, asɛ dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, 'Korowii Kora la pu heya.'
42010010	Dɛ he la bwɛɛ bɛl ta, ba ta heyaa lɛɛ yaa, he bɛ o ta so. Haa dɛɛ le la, hé ŋɔ,
42010011	'Hale ya jwii he bwɛɛ nɔ teera aa ɛ ya napaala la ta, dɛ́ bagle kɛŋɔ ya kpɔ Korowii Waa ba he be he vɛah. Kɛ a chɛ kɛ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii Kora la pu heya.'
42010012	Kasinteŋ, Sodom tena baa ɛ wechɔga asɛ Korowii fuuh ba la, baa bɔ gɛ bwɛɛ la tenaa awola Korowii aa ba dɛ ba pa bole la.
42010013	"Korasen tena, hé bwɛɛlɛ! Bɛtsaeda tena ge, hé bwɛɛlɛ! Dɛ nomɛl fe ɛ gɛ nyokpowaa nɔ maa ɛa he siwi ta nɔ Taaya ne Sidon aa, ba fe charɛ ba liire le ba wechɔga ta bigri. Ba fe ta lwe yale tɔe dɛ so sibegra ta naa?
42010014	Awola Korowii aa ba pa bole la, wɛɛ na Taaya ne Sidon tena sumii gwaa heya.
42010015	Asɛ he Kapeeneɔm tena ge, ɛrɛɛ chɛ kɛŋɔ n bol he waɔ? He dɛ nyin kɛ he ir kaa Korowii be nyundua kɛɛ? Hɛɛ ba harɛɛ Bɔnsam nii taa."
42010016	Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa ka no he be la, n bee o no, asɛ nomɛlbwa waa ka vɛh he waa la, n waa o vɛh. Nomɛlbwa waa vɛh n waa la, naate waa tom mɛ la waa o vɛh."
42010017	Yeesu habɔteŋra fifraanuanɛ dɛ banɛ la la o toma la dɛ ba silɛɛ ne, asɛ ba ne o cheme. Ba ne waa chema la, ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ, yaa kaa che he sɔn ta dɛ bol waa la, kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ kwaraa ɔmɛ yaa."
42010018	Belaa Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "He pɔ Bɔnsam nɛ. N nao kɛŋɔ waa le nyundua ba le harɛ kerabeŋkpoŋ kɛŋɔ bwaala aa nyɛgla ken.
42010019	Hɛ́ɛ no! N tɛ heyaa kpegri kɛŋɔ he tigri harɛkwaare ne nɔrɔme nɛ, dɛ pɔ ya dɔm ne o toroma bwa nɛ, wobɛlbwa aa wola won ɛ heya.
42010020	He bɛ gel a do he som kɛŋɔ kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ aa no he wobol nɔ. Waa aa chɛ kɛ he koh a waa dɛ gel he sie lɛ laanee kɛŋɔ ba chwerɛ he sɔna nyundua ja Korowii bii nɛ."
42010021	Gɛ saŋ dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la ir Yeesu nɛɛ dɛ gel o sie lɛ, asɛ o ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, nyundua ne harɛ bwa Dɔɔ! N dɛ jaame kɛŋɔ haa kpɔ waa nɔ sɔh sipila tena ne wejerema, dɛ kpɔ bagle nɛra baa wola wobɛlbwa jemɛ nɔ. Jam, n Mɛɛ. Gɛɛ wera he be."
42010022	Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ kpɔ wobɛlbwa do n nɔn ta. Nomɛlbwa aa men Korowii Bie jemɛ nemenɛ n Mɛɛ la gbo, asɛ nomɛlbwa ge aa n Mɛɛ la jemɛ nemenɛ n ne nɛra maa dɛ nyin kɛ n gel ba jemɔ la."
42010023	Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la gbo aa baa so la, o berɛ sie ta ba be, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He nɛra he siwi aa na wejena maa dɛ ɛ nɔ la, he na som.
42010024	Kasinteŋ, Korowii keamere ne koranar kɛrɛdɛ fe dɛ nyin waa haa dɛ na dɛɛ no nɔ, dɛ no dɛ na, kɛ ba ta dɔe."
42010025	Tɔn Jereme bɛl balɔ dɛ ba kpɔ wobol kɛ wɛɛ daah Yeesuu dɛ jemɛ o liire, dɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ɛrɛɛ mɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ́ dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa nɔ?"
42010026	Anee Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ Korowii Tɔn la bagle ɔ? Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ no a mun ɔ?"
42010027	Asɛ baa la ŋɔ, "Dɛ́ hé nyin N Naa Korowii he bambile bwa, he hweera, he bokpega ne he liire bwa ne, dɛ nyin he dɔŋ kɛ he gbagba."
42010028	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Kpelaa he ŋɔ. Dɛɛ ɛ gɛ, hɛɛ dɔ gɛ mkpa laanee."
42010029	Dɛ Tɔn Jereme la dɛ nyin kɛ o bagle kɛ o te dɛ ɛ waa Yeesu aa bɔɔra la bwa, dɛ ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Umee n dɔŋ ɔ?"
42010030	Anee Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Baa bɛlee le Jerusalam dɛɛ kaa Jeriko, dɛ ka pu ŋwɛɛra ŋwɛnɛ baah ta, ba den gugru, dɛ lɔɔro, dɛ pirao, tamaa kaa o sewɛ, dɛ laa o laala bwa lɛ o be, dɛ gelo o chɔ ŋwɛnɛ baah ta bela dɛɛ ba sewa.
42010031	Dɛ Sɔfo bɛl ge kpɔ ŋwɛnɛ la ta dɛ baa kaa, dɛ na baa la, dɛ fɛrɔ ba kaa.
42010032	Dɛ Lewi te bɛl waa dɛ ɛ toma Korowii Dea ge kpɔ ŋwɛnɛ la tenten ta dɛ ba pu baa la, dɛ ge fɛrɔ kaa.
42010033	Dɛ Samaria tena ba ne Juda tena aa wola jo la bɛl kpɔ a gɛ ŋwɛnɛ la tenten ta dɛ baa kaa, dɛ ba pu baa la, dɛ o chɔ o bug ta bela. Waa nao la, dɛ o waa sum o be.
42010034	O chog o bone cheg, dɛ nyiŋi a bini, dɛ laa noo ne tɛɛga kpɔ dɛ suuh tel o be, dɛ kpɔ noo la ne tɛɛga la do o ŋwɛra la ta. O vɔrɔwa, dɛ gɔɔro so o konteehne waa soge o ta la ta, dɛ kpɔɔ kaa bela dem bɛl hɔɔhra yon dɛɛ chog o ta la ta, dɛ ka nyiŋu.
42010035	Tɔ aa pera la Samaria te la kpɔ suugapoŋa anɛ tɛ naate waa dɛ nyiŋi hɔɔhra dem la ta la, dɛ berɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ó nyiŋi weela te la nɛ, dɛ ŋɔ wɛɛ berɔɔ ba kaa, asɛ dɛ ba bɔɔ komɛlbwa waa chɔg o nɛɛ la kem."
42010036	Yeesu aa bol waa nɔ tonɛ la, o bɔɔ Tɔn Jereme la ŋɔ, "Nɛra batoro nɔ, ba bini umee nyiŋi baa la ŋwɛɛra aa lɔɔro dɛ pirao la kɛŋɔ o dɔŋ ɔ?"
42010037	Belaa Tɔn Jereme la chaŋe ŋɔ, "Onɔ la waa na o sum dɛ nyiŋu laanee." Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Kaa dɛ kaa ɛ gɛ tenten."
42010038	Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la aa dɛ kaa la, ba kaa tel bwɛɛ bɛl ta, belaa haah bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Maata lɛo dɛ kaa o ne o dem.
42010039	Dɛ Maata dɔ o nime bihaah bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Mɛɛre. Dɛ gɛ Mɛɛre nɔ, dɛ o soge Yeesu be dɛɛ no o webagla la.
42010040	Dɛ Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la kondikwaa toma gwaa Maata nɛ, anee o la Yeesu be dɛ ka ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, he ta nae kɛŋɔ n nime aa kpɔ toma la bwa ta n gbo nɛ aa? Anomanta ŋɔ o be ó ba cha mɛ!"
42010041	Anee Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Eei, Maata! Wedamanta begre he sie, a lɛ he liire bwa. Kɛ webeŋkpoŋ gee hiaah.
42010042	Waa aa weraa Mɛɛre kpɔ la, anomanta maa won ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ó gel."
42011001	Awola bɛl, dɛ Yeesu lɔ bobɛl dɛɛ soŋe Korowii. Waa tona la, o habɔteŋra la bɛl ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, bagle yaa Korowii soŋa, gɛ Jɔn aa bagle o habɔteŋra la."
42011002	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Dɛ he dɛ soŋe Korowii aa, hé ŋɔ, 'Ya Mɛɛ haa lɔ nyundua, henee chɛ duura. Bagle he Kora dii harɛ nɔ ta.
42011003	Tɛ yaa ya fini kondikwa,
42011004	dɛ kpɔ ya wechɔga kɛ yaa, gɛ yaa kpɔ ya dɔŋa wechɔga dɛɛ kɛ ba la. Dɛɛ ke yaa wechɔga lugri ta.' "
42011005	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "He kpɔ kɛŋɔ he bini bɛl dɔ o dam, dɛ la ka chumu harambaŋa, dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, 'N dam, kem mɛ pea atoro.
42011006	N dam bɛl le bobɛl ba chog mɛ taraken, n ge ta komɛlbwa dɔe dɛ́ tɛo ó di.'
42011007	Dɛ he soŋo gɛ naa, wɛɛ wonoo ŋɔ hé gelo, ŋɔ he bɛ o dom chɔg ŋɔ o karɛ o gbera o ne o bii chɔ, anomanta waa won ir dɛ tɛɛ komɛlbwa naa? Akai! Waa won ŋɔ gɛ.
42011008	Kasinteŋ, dɛ a ka darame la gbo wa aa, o fe aa ir dɛ tɛɛ komɛlbwa. Kɛ haa wola kaalɛ, dɛ ta che dɛɛ soŋo la nomanta, wɛɛ tɛɛ komɛlbwa haa dɛ nyin laanee.
42011009	"Anomanta gɛɛ a do hɛ́ɛ soŋe Korowii, wɛɛ tɛ heyaa. Hɛ́ɛ nyin he konnyina o be, hɛɛ dɔɔ. Hé swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ lɔ gbera, wɛɛ ya heyaa.
42011010	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ soŋo la dɛ dɔ, asɛ nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin o konnyina dɛɛ le o be la, o dɛ tɛo. Gɛɛ Korowii ɛɛ ba gbera yae dɛ tɛ nomɛlbwa waa dɛ lɔ la.
42011011	"He bini umee o bie ɛɛ nyin pɛŋe, ó ka lawɛ harɛkon ba tɛo wɔ?
42011012	Kɛɛ dɛ o dɛ nyin jahal aa, ó ka lawɛ nɔm ba tɛo wɔ?
42011013	Dɛ he wechɔg-ɛɛra nɔ kwaraa jemɔ dɛ kpɔ kondɛɛga dɛɛ tɛ he bii aa, ɛrɛ waa he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la te aa wola nɛra baa dɛ soŋo o Domadɛɛge la tenee tɛo!"
42011014	Dɛ Yeesu dɛ doŋi kwaa aa lɔ baa bɛl nɛɛ o berɛ amumu. Kwaa la aa le baa la nɛɛ la, o bol wa. Nɛnlaa la aa lɔ bela la nyoa kpoo.
42011015	Bane te ŋɔ, "Kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ bwa nomoa baa dɛ yerɔ Bɛlsebul la, onee tɛo kpegri wɛɛ doŋi kwaa la."
42011016	Dɛ bane ge dɛ nyin dɛ daahno na dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ó ɛ we-ɛɛla ane asɛ dɛ bagle kɛ onee nɛwɛnyini Lɛɛ la.
42011017	Yeesu aa jemɛ waa baa dɛ lii la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Dɛ harɛ bɛl ta tena bini pere anɛ ba gbo ɛɛ yo aa, harɛ la dɛ pagre. Gɛɛ dɛ waane ba lola bɛl bini asɛ ba pere anɛ dɛ gbo ɛɛ yo aa, lola la aa won ɛ lola.
42011018	Anomanta dɛ Bɔnsam kora bini pero baa yo aa, o kora la aa won ɛ kora. Heyaa ŋɔa ŋɔ Bɛlsebulee tɛ mɛ kpegri n won kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ doŋa.
42011019	Dɛ Bɛlsebul nɛɛ n che dɛɛ doŋa aa, a wer. Aah dɛ he ge, umee tɛ he habɔteŋra nɔ kpegri ba won a doŋa ɔ? He gbagba habɔteŋra la we-ɛɛlaa dɛɛ bagle kɛŋɔ he kono kwara!
42011020	Korowii kpegri nee mɛɛ doŋi kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ la. Anomanta hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii Kora dii la telo tonɛ.
42011021	"Dɛ bokpega te kpɔ o dɔmkwaa dɛɛ daah o dem kɛrɛdɛ naa, o komɛlbwa aa chɔg.
42011022	Kɛ dɛ bɛl ge berɔ do kpegri gwaalo dɛ ka puu dɛ pɔ o nɛ aa, o dɛ kpɔ o dɔmkwaa waa kpɔ o sie dawɛ a ta la, dɛ kpɔ o kondɔɔh ja.
42011023	"Nomɛlbwa waa wola n nɛɛ jae la aa n waa nyin. Nomɛlbwa waa wola men chae dɛɛ boa n nɛra nyoa dɛɛ pɛ la lɔ ba dɛɛ pegre.
42011024	"Fini nɔ nɛra do kɛŋɔ nɛn Bɔnsam aa gela o torome bɛl do o nɛɛ dɛ chɔg o da. A habɔɔ la naate charɛ o liire, asɛ Bɔnsam torome la le o nɛɛ dɛ kaa ka nyin bofale dɛ́ so. O gaagaa, o ta wone dɔ bɔr dɛ́ so onɛ, dɛ berɛ ŋɔ, 'Mɛɛ kaa n bug ta bela maa lea ba laanee,'
42011025	dɛ berɛ ka na kɛ baa la liire bini chaahnɔ kɛŋɔ dea baa chaaro dɛ kwaaro kɛrɛdɛ ba ta nɛn kpɔe do o ta dɛ gel o chɔ pɛɛ la.
42011026	Gɛɛ o yon la ka kpɔ o bala anuanɛ aa gwaalo kwara. A bwa won ba so naate la nɛ, dɛ chɔg o da gwaa gɛ o faa doa wubwa la. Gɛɛ aa ba doe fini nɔ nɛra baa ɛ nɛnchɔga nɔ nɛ."
42011027	Yeesu aa bol gɛ waa nɔ tonɛ la, haah bɛl bol waa o be takpeg ne nɛra la baah ta, dɛ ŋɔ, "Haah waa lolɛ dɛ dɛɛre la na som."
42011028	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Nɛra baa dɛ no Korowii Waa dɛɛ teŋɛ a ta laanee na som."
42011029	Nɛra la aa bar Yeesu cheme pirim la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ fini nɔ nɛra ɛ nɛnchɔga ken?" Ba dɛ nyin nyokpowaa dɛ na mɔɔ dɛ yarada kɛ Korowii bee n le, kɛ baa dɔ na. Waa aa pu Korowii keame Jona la dɔŋa gboo dɛɛ ba n ge pui ásɛ he che a ta dɛ jemɛ n nɛnsoo.
42011030	Gɛ Korowii aa ɛ Jona dɛ bagle Niniwe tena kɛ on tomɔ la, gɛ tentenee wɛɛ ba men Nɛn Bie la ge ɛɛ dɛ bagle fini nɔ nɛra kɛ on tom mɛ.
42011031	Awola nɛra bwa aa ir seo ta dɛ ba che Korowii sie asɛ o bol ba waa dɛ pa bole la, Seba kooro waa ɛ haah la ɛɛ bol waa bɔ fini nɔ tena, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o valɔ le o harɛ ta bojaŋ le dɛ́ ba no Kooro Solomɔn wejemwa. Kɛ kasinteŋ, naate waa gwaa Kooro Solomɔn lɔ bonɔ, asɛ he ŋɔ haa o bee no.
42011032	Niniwe tena gba ɛɛ bol waa bɔ fini nɔ tena, dɛkalkɛ ba te no Korowii Waa Jona aa bola la mun dɛ charɛ ba liire le ba wechɔga ta. Kɛ kasinteŋ, naate waa gwaa Jona lɔ bonɔ, asɛ he ŋɔ haa o bee no.
42011033	"Nomɛlbwa aa kandea choŋi asɛ dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ sɔh dea bini, bela nomɛlbwa aa wola on na, kɛɛ dɛ kpɔ kon pi o ta. Ba choŋi kandea aa, ba kpɔɔ dɛɛ chɔŋɛ kon ta asɛ wɛɛ chaah nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ba bela.
42011034	Sibie do kɛ kandea dɛ tɛ nɛwɛnyini. He sibie wer aa, he dɛ na bɔr. Dɛ a chɔgɔ ge aa, amɔ dɛ he lɔ biro ta. Gɛɛ a do, dɛ he sie begre Korowii waa ta naa, dɛ he wobɛlbwa ta chaahnɔ. Kɛ dɛ he sie begre harɛ nɔ ta kwaa ta naa, he lɔ biro ta.
42011035	Anomanta hé nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ ásɛ he sie won chaah waa Korowii aa kpɔa tɛ heyaa la ta, he bɛ biro ta so.
42011036	Dɛ he sie begre Korowii waa ta, asɛ he gel wetɔŋla ne dachɔge bɛlbwa dɛ lɛ Korowii wa aa, gɛɛ he sie ɛɛ ba chaahna kɛrɛdɛ Korowii waa la ta, kɛŋɔ baa choŋi kandea asɛ wɛɛ chaah bɔr kohona la."
42011037	Yeesu aa bol waa tonɛ la, Farisii te bɛl yerɔ ŋɔ ó ba di kwaa o dem. Anee o la baa la dem dɛ ka so dɛɛ ba kwaa dii.
42011038	A ɛ Farisii te la nyokpoa kɛ waa dɛ ba kwaa dii la, o ta nɔɔra samɛ gɛ ba nawee wa aa dɛ bagle la.
42011039	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He Farisii tena do kɛŋɔ baa loo numoli ne hɛne bwara dɛ gel a bini la. Nɛra sie ta waa gboo hɛɛ ɛ, kɛ he bambile bini te, wechɔga ne kwaa ta sibegra gboo he bwa.
42011040	Gɛna! Korowii waa ta yaa nɔ, o laa ɛ ya bini ne ya baŋ bwa kɛɛ?
42011041	Hé kpɔ kwaa haa nyina cheg la dɛɛ kɛ nyaara he bambile bwa ne ásɛ komɛlbwa do wer tɛ heya.
42011042	"He Farisii tena, hé bwɛɛlɛ kɛ haa dɛ tɛ Korowii o bɔr he par nyoa kondikonjegre kwaraa ta, kɛ dɛ vɛh kasinteŋ ne Korowii nyina te la. Anɔ nɔɔ chɛ kɛ hɛɛ ɛ, kɛ he bɛ anɔ la aa jaa la gel.
42011043	Farisii tena, hé bwɛɛlɛ kɛ haa dɛ nyin sobɔrdɛɛga cheremi deene bini, dɛɛ nyin kɛ baa duu heyaa nɛra baah ta nɔ.
42011044	Hé bwɛɛlɛ! He do kɛŋɔ ŋwama nɛra aa wola a waa jemɛ dɛɛ valɛ a ta ken."
42011045	Belaa Tɔn Jerema la bɛl ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, dɛ he ŋɔ gɛ naa, dɛ he jo ya gba nɛ."
42011046	Anee Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "He Tɔn Jerema haa dɛ bagle Korowii Waa la ge, hé bwɛɛlɛ. He kpɔ wekpega aa do kɛŋɔ bone dɛ dawɛ nɛra nɛ, kɛ dɛ te berɛ laa nɔn kpɔ a ta.
42011047	Hé bwɛɛlɛ. Heyaa ma kwaa chɔŋre Korowii keamere ŋwama ta la. Gɛ nɛra nɔ laa he naanar kpoo la aa?
42011048	Kwaa haa maa chɔŋre Korowii keamere la ŋwama la ta la baglɔ kɛŋɔ he gbabir sɛh waa he naanar aa ɛa la ta.
42011049	Anɔ waa Korowii bol o Tɔn la baa dɛ yerɔ Wejema la bini ŋɔ, 'Mɛɛ tomɛ n keamere ne toroma ba bee, baa kpoo banee dɛ fiigi bane' la.
42011050	Anomanta Korowii ɛɛ pɛɛ fini nɔ nɛra o keamere nɛra aa kpoo ba le harɛ mumpar la bwa waa.
42011051	Dɛ le Abɛl kpoe ta ka tel Sakaria baa kpoo bela baa dɛ fuh kwaa dɛɛ tɛ Korowii ne Korowii Dea la tenten baah ta la. Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, Korowii ɛɛ pɛɛ fini nɔ nɛra ba bwa waa.
42011052	Hé Tɔn Jerema ge bwɛɛlɛ! He do kɛŋɔ nɛra baa laa dea Korowii wejema aa lɔ o bini karɛ, dɛ laa koŋkare la kpɔ haa wola o binii jo, he ge aa nɛra ŋwɛnɛɛ tɛ ba jo dɛ ka hweli."
42011053	Yeesu aa le bela kaa la, Tɔn Jerema la ne Farisii tena la mugli o baah taeh, dɛ gel o bol waa kohona,
42011054	dɛ hagro bela dɛ́ lawɛ o nyoa.
42012001	Aa ɛ tama la, nɛra kagboŋa baa cheme Yeesu sie. Baa wara nomanta, dɛ ba dɛ tigri dɔŋa nakpale ta. Belaa Yeesu tɔ sie bol waa o habɔteŋra la be dɛ sɛg ba ŋɔ, "Hé nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ Farisii tena iisi wa. Nɛra sie baa nyiŋi dɛɛ ɛ wa.
42012002	Wobɛlbwa nɛra aa tɔ a ta la ɛɛ le baŋee, asɛ waa aa sɔah bwa ge le nɛra jemɛ.
42012003	Taraken waa haa bola biro ta la, aa le bochaah taa ba no, asɛ waa haa sɔah bol nɛn be dea he ne o gbo la, baa bola nɛnlaa baahnee.
42012004	"Yabala, n dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, he bɛ nɛra baa dɛ ba wona kpo heyaa baa wola won ɛ waane kpa la ɔmɛ.
42012005	Kɛ mɛɛ bagle heyaa naate aa chɛ kɛŋɔ hɛɛ ɔmɛɛ. Hɛ́ɛ ɔmɛ Korowii waa dɛ ba wona kpo heya, dɛ berɛ won kpɔ heyaa kaa Bɔnsam nii ta la. Onee chɛ kɛŋɔ he ɔmɛ.
42012006	He nao kɛ pɛtoprɛ ta yog dɔe, kɛ Korowii ta beŋkpoŋ kwaraa waa soɛh.
42012007	He nyumpona kwara, Korowii jemɛ a nyoa. He bɛ dɛɛ ɔmɛ. He ta pɛtoprɛ gwaalɛ wobɛlbwa ta naa?
42012008	"Hé gel n ŋɔ he be, nomɛlbwa waa won che nɛra baah ta dɛ sɛh ŋɔ o ja n nɛɛ la, awola Korowii aa ba dɛ ba bol nɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole la, n Nɛn Bie la gee yerɛ naate sɔn nyundua toroma siee kɛ o ja n nɛ.
42012009	Nomɛlbwa ge waa vɛɛh mɛ nɛra baah ta, dɛ ŋɔ o ta n nɛɛ jae la, awola Korowii aa ba dɛ ba bol nɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole la, n gee vɛh naatee nyundua toroma sie ŋɔ n ne o laa.
42012010	Nomɛlbwa waa bol waa yagɛ n Nɛn Bie la, Korowii ɛɛ kpɔɔ kɛo, kɛ naate waa ɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la nɛnhɛla la te, Korowii aa o wechɔgaa kpɔ kɛo.
42012011	"Dɛ ba yerɛ heyaa ka che cheremi deene bini ne harɛ nɔ ta nomonome sie naa, he bɛ gel gɛ haa bol dɛ lɛ he te la hiah heya,
42012012	dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge la ɛɛ bagle heyaa bug la ta gɛ haa dɛ ba bola."
42012013	Belaa baa bɛl waa ja nɛnlaa la nɛɛ ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ŋɔ n dɔɔ be ásɛ o gel ya bɔne kpanjogo ya mɛɛ aa sewa dɛ gel tɛ yaa a do o be la bini."
42012014	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nɛmbaa, umee kpɔ mɛ cheg ŋɔ ń bol he waa dɛ bɔne he kapɛrɛ ɔ?"
42012015	O ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé gel he sie chɔ harɛ he nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ kwaa dɛɛ kam, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛwɛnyini kondɔɔh kohona laa o mkpa."
42012016	Yeesu sɛg ba ŋɔ, "Suuga te bɛlee fa lole o koo kondikwaa ɛ taeh.
42012017	Belaa o so dɛ lii o nyu bini ŋɔ, 'Ɛrɛɛ mɛɛ ba ɛɛ yɔ? Bela maa chea do la aa kanɛ,'
42012018	dɛ ŋɔ, 'Mɛɛ pagre n dɔndɔŋre nɔɔ dɛ ɛa a do kan ásɛ n mea ne n kwaa bwa dɔ bɔr jo a bini.'
42012019	O lii waa o nyu bini dɛ ŋɔ, 'N dɔ kwaa dɛ́ di la sie, mɛɛ diu dɛ lɛ n sie dɛ so dɛɛ onɛ.'
42012020	Anee Korowii ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, 'Gɛne! Fini jwaana nɔ ne hɛɛ sewɔɔ, asɛ kwaa haa kwaara cheg la, lee hɛɛ ba a bɔr nae jaɔ?' "
42012021	Waa Yeesu aa bola dɛ kpɔ teŋe gɛ waa la ta laanee kɛ, "Gɛɛ aa ba nɛra la baa kwaa kondɔɔh dɛɛ cheg ba te harɛ ta bonɔ baa wola kembɔr bɛlbwa dɔe Korowii be la nɛɛ doe."
42012022	Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "Anomanta, n dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, he bɛ gel he sie begre he soga bini kwaa haa di ne kwaa haa tɔ wa.
42012023	He mkpa gwaa kondikwa, he bwadabii ge gwaa yal.
42012024	Hé ta sie nyiŋi jumbii na. Aa kwaa du, aa komɛ, a ta bela aa komɛ kwaa dɛɛ do dɔe. Korowiirii dɛɛ tɛa kondikwa. He gwaa jumbii bam!
42012025	He bini umee dɛ won kpɔ sibegra ŋwɛnɛ bɛl dɛ kpɔ tɔpebeŋkpoŋ ja o mkpa ta nɔ?
42012026	Dɛ haa won ɛ a gɛ wetamaa nɔ gba naa, ɛrɛɛ he gel he sie ɛɛ begre anɔ la aa kaa waɔ?
42012027	"Hé ta sie nyiŋi kpɔg bini koŋkwaa aa dɛ fe a fee yon do wer la dɛ na. Aa toma ɛɛ dɛɛ koh, aa yabi ta. Kɛ n dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, Kooro Solomɔn gba ne o kondɔɔh bwa, o laala ta wer doe kɛ a gɛ kwaa nɔ bwa.
42012028	Kpɔga haa naa a do wer fini, asɛ kere gbo dɛ a serewɔ ba fuah nɔ, dɛ Korowii gelɔ a do wer ken naa, ɛrɛɛ waa wola won tɔ heyaa yal gwaala ɔ? He yarada aa kanɛ kwara!
42012029	Anomanta he bɛ gel he sie begre hɛɛ nyin anɔ la haa di ne anɔ la haa nyɔ.
42012030	Nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ baa wola Korowii tomɛ la liiree dɛɛ do a gɛ kwaa nɔ ta. He Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la jemɔ kɛ he dɛ nyin anɔ bwa.
42012031	Hé gel he sie begre Korowii Kora la ta, asɛ ó kpɔ anɔ haa dɛ nyin nɔ bwa tɛ heya.
42012032	"Anomanta, Korowii toroma, haa kanɛ, kɛ he bɛ dɛɛ ɔmɛ, dɛkalkɛ a dɛ ɛ he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la silɛɛ kɛ he ja o Kora la ta.
42012033	Hé yog kwaa haa dɔa asɛ dɛ kpɔ a suuga la kɛ nyaara. He ɛ gɛ naa, hɛɛ dɔ pure aa wola chɔg ne kondɔɔh aa wola tonɛ bwa Korowii doa. Belaa kondɔɔh aa wola mule, dɛkalkɛ ŋwɛɛra aa won la ka ŋwɛa, kwaa ge aa wola won chwea.
42012034	Bela he kondɔɔh aa lole laanee he liire ge do.
42012035	"Hé kpɔ he te dɛɛ kpa toma ɛɛ. Hé kpɔ he te dɛ gel he kandere ɛɛ hɔ,
42012036	kɛŋɔ bonɔɔna ba dɔɔ aa kaa hanfale chema asɛ ba so kpao, ásɛ dɛ o balɔ dɛ ba lɔ gbera aa, bug la ta ba yao la.
42012037	Bonɔɔna baa soga kpa ba dɔɔ, ba ta dom chɔe o ba puu ba la, ba sie dɛ lɛ. Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, wɛɛ kpɔ o tenee dɛ yer ba so tig ta, asɛ dɛ tɛɛ ba kwaa ba di.
42012038	Dɛ ba dɔɔ la balɔ jwaana kɛɛ harambaŋa dɛ ba puu ba kɛ ba sogo kpao waa, ba sie ɛɛ lɛo.
42012039	Hɛ́ɛ no. Dɛ dem te fe jemɛ gɛ saŋ ŋwɛɛ aa ba ŋwɛo waa, o fe aa gel o won ba jo o dem dɛ ŋwɛo.
42012040	Gɛɛ chɛ kɛŋɔ hé ge kpɔ he te dɛ so kpa, dɛkalkɛ pigraa n Nɛn Bie la ɛɛ ba ba pigri heya."
42012041	Anee Pita ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, yanee hɛɛ sɛgle nɔ kɛɛ nomɛlbwa jao wɔ?"
42012042	Asɛ Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Bonɔɔ waa dɔ kasinteŋ dɛ dɔ liire la nɔn taa o dɔɔ kpɔ o dem tena la dɛɛ do, dɛ ŋɔ bɔr dɛ magre aa, ó tɛɛ ba kondikwa.
42012043	Dɛ bonɔɔ la dɔɔ la baa puu, dɛ o dɛ ɛ gɛ waa kpɔa do o nɔn ta la aa, bonɔɔ la sie ɛɛ lɛo.
42012044	Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, o dɔɔ la ɛɛ kpɔ o komɛlbwaa do o nɔn ta ŋɔ wɛ́ɛ nyiŋi a ta.
42012045	Kɛ dɛ bonɔɔ la ta gɛ liire, dɛ ŋɔ, 'N dɔɔ ŋwɛnɛ nɔ waa kaala nɔ, waa ba taraken,' dɛ do o dɔŋa bonɔɔna la ne toli baa kaa la nɛɛ dɛɛ lɔɔ, dɛ di kwaa dɛ nyɔ sen dɛɛ dɛɛ raa, amɔ wɛɛ na waa.
42012046	Tɔpebeŋkpoŋii o dɔɔ ɛɛ ba bala ba pigru, asɛ dɛ ba tɛr o deŋne taeh kɛŋɔ baa dɛ ɛ nɛra baa wola Korowii yarada la ken.
42012047	"Bonɔɔ waa jemɛ gɛ o dɔɔ raa dɛ nyin, kɛ dɛ vɛh o te kpɔe dɛ ɛ gɛ tɛo la, o dɔɔ ɛɛ geloo ba lɔɔro taeh.
42012048	Kɛ bonɔɔ waa wola gɛ o dɔɔ raa dɛ nyin jemɛ, dɛ ɛ lɔɔra waa la, baa lɔɔroo tamaa ken dɛ́ kpɔ dɛɛ tɛr o deŋne. Nɛn Korowii aa chao o jemɛ waa kohona la nɛɛ o kpɔ wedamanta ɛɛ dawɛ. Nɛn baa kpɔ waa do o nɔn ta kohona la bee baa bɔɔ waa kohona.
42012049	"N balɔ dɛ́ ba kpɔ nii ta harɛ nɔ ta ó fuh. Dɛ nii la fe dɔɔ dɛɛ hɔ aa, a fe ɛɛ do n somee taeh.
42012050	Wahala ane chɔ n sie a chɛ kɛŋɔ ba do mɛ a ta kɛŋɔ ba dɛ sɔ nɛn Korowii ne aa, ba yon doo nee ta la. Dɛ n ta a gɛ wahala la nae tonaa, n bambile ta men sɔɔhnɛ.
42012051	He dɛ lii kɛ n ba nyopɛo ne harɛ nɔ ta kɛɛ? Akai, n balɔ ásɛ nɛra ne ba lolanar dɔm.
42012052	Le fini dɛɛ kaa, dem beŋkpoŋ nɛra banue aa lɔ o ta la, ba baah dɛ ba pera asɛ batoro hah banɛ, asɛ banɛ la ge hah batoro la.
42012053	Mɛɛnanar dɛ ba ba bibaala haeh, asɛ bibaala ge hah ba mɛɛnanar. Nyare ɛɛ hah ba bihaahnaa, asɛ bihaahna hah ba nyare. Haahna ɛɛ hah ba bii haahnaa, asɛ ba bii haahna hah ba."
42012054	Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ nɛnlaa la be ŋɔ, "Dɛ he na baama dɛ kaa mun ta naa, gɛɛ he ŋɔ bwaala dɛ ba nɛɛ, dɛ o nɛo.
42012055	He jemɛ bela peu aa le dɛɛ ta he ŋɔ bɔwɔb ɛɛ bao, dɛ o balɔ kpela.
42012056	Nɛra haa dɛ nyiŋi nɛn sie bɔr mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ wa, he won nyundua ne harɛ nyiŋa dɛ jemɛ waa aa dɛ ba chiga, aah ɛrɛ waa haa wola won jemɛ waa aa dɛ chig taraken nɔ te mun nɔɔ?
42012057	"He te aa won nyiŋi dɛ na waa aa wera dɛɛ teŋɛ a ta naa?
42012058	Dɛ he ne he dɔŋ dɔɔ, asɛ o kpɔe dɛɛ kaa kɔɔto aa, larawe naate hé ne o pɛ. Dɛ gɛ laa, o tel he ne bela aa, kɔɔto nomoa waa dɛ pa bole la dɛ ba he kpɔe dɛ tɛ prosiri, asɛ ba ka doe dea.
42012059	Belaa hɛɛ ba doe ka tel kɛ haa bɔ suuga baa dɛ lɛɛ la bwa ka tonɛ, kapɛrɛ gba aa wola ka."
42013001	Gɛ saŋ la dɛ nɛra bane lɔ bela dɛ ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ Galilia tena bane fa kpoo kwaa dɛɛ tɛ Korowii, asɛ Paelet kpoo ba, asɛ ba chal koo kwaa baa kpoa tɛ Korowii la chal ta.
42013002	Asɛ Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "He dɛ lii kɛŋɔ waa aa pu a gɛ Galilia tena nɔ dɛ bagle kɛ ba wechɔga gwaa Galilia tena baa kaa la kwaa kɛɛ?
42013003	N dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, gɛ laa a do. Dɛ he ta he liire charɛ le he wechɔga ta naa, he bwa gee serewoo."
42013004	Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ, "Asɛ nɛra fi dɛ banuatoro bane dejaŋ bɛl aa kua chole ba nɛɛ Siloam ba bwa serewe la geɔ? He liire dɛ ɛ heyaa kɛ ba wechɔga gwaa nɛra baa lɔ Jerusalam bwa kwaa kɛɛ?
42013005	N dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, gɛ laa a do. Dɛ he ta he liire charɛ dɛ le wechɔga ta naa, he bwa gee serewoo."
42013006	Yeesu sɛg ba ŋɔ, "Baa bɛlee fa lole dɛ du daa bɛl o koo ta. O laŋɔ ŋɔ ó ka nyin o nɔna togri, o ta nɔn beŋkpoŋ kwaraa dɔe o ta.
42013007	Anee o ŋɔ nɛn waa kpɔɔ wɛɛ nyiŋi koo la ta la be ŋɔ, 'Na, bene atoroo nɔ maa dɛ ba bonɔ dɛ baa nyin daa nɔ nɔna, kɛ maa ane dɔ. Anomanta teŋo ta! Ɛrɛɛ o che bonɔ dɛ lɛ bɔr dɛɛ ɛɔ?'
42013008	Asɛ nɛn waa dɛ nyiŋi koo la ta la ŋɔ, 'N Dɔɔ, gel o che benanyoa beŋkpoŋ ja yá na. Mɛɛ kwi o munii dɛ che nabena do o mun ta.
42013009	Dɛ benanyoa chemo o nɔnaa, amɔ te dɛ anee. O ta wone nɔnɛ ge aa, asɛ hé teŋo ta.' "
42013010	Awola Ona Tɔpere bɛl, dɛ Yeesu dɛ bagle waa ba cheremi dea bɛl ta.
42013011	Dɛ haah bɛl kwa aa dɛ ir o nɛɛ dɛ kpɔ weela ta o nɛɛ bene fi dɛ anuatoro dɛ guro waa wola won pee o te kwaraa lɔ bela.
42013012	Yeesu aa nao la, o yerɔ dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Haah, le fini dɛɛ kaa, he weela kaalɔ, aa ba kpa."
42013013	Yeesu kpɔ nɔɔra dawɛ haah la nɛ, asɛ bug la ta o won pee o te, dɛ jam Korowii.
42013014	Cheremi dea bela nomoa la baah diu kɛ Yeesu aa chah nɛn Ona Tɔpere ta la, dɛ ŋɔ nɛra la aa lɔ bela la be ŋɔ, "Tɔpera anumɛlee chɛ kɛŋɔ ya kpɔ dɛɛ ɛ toma. Anomanta a gɛ tɔpera la taa chɛ kɛ he baa chah he weela, kɛ Ona Tɔpere te ta laa!"
42013015	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Nɛra haa dɛ nyiŋi nɛn sie bɔr mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ wa! Haa he nae ne keegore yae dɛɛ ta Ona Tɔpere dɛ tega la nee ta á kaa nyɔ ne aa?
42013016	Haah nɔ, Abraham naa on. Bene fi dɛ anuatoroo la Bɔnsam aa soge o nɛɛ dɛ chɔgo, aah aa were kɛ ba doŋi Bɔnsam la le o nɛɛ Ona Tɔpere dɛ lɛo ta aa?"
42013017	Yeesu aa bol gɛ la, sihiih kpo o dɔma la. Kɛ nɛnlaa baa kaa la te sie lɛ nyokpowaa waa ɛa la ta.
42013018	Anee Yeesu berɛ ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛ tenee Korowii Kora waa la doɔ? Bɔkwa konee mɛɛ ba o kpɔe dɛ magɔɔ?
42013019	O waa tamaa bɛlbwa won yɛɛra kɛŋɔ baa bɛl aa ira dɛ kpɔ mastad bii waa do jegaa gwaa daa bɛlbwa bi, dɛ kpɔ ka du, asɛ o le dɛ ɛ da, jumbii sɔh kɔne do o kpala ta."
42013020	Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa konee ń berɛ kpɔ Korowii Kora waa la magɛ jaɔ?
42013021	A won komɛlbwa begra kɛŋɔ haah bɛl aa ira dɛ kpɔ iisi tama ka koo men logbaa del ta, asɛ a won gel men la bwa uge."
42013022	Yeesu chig ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ kaa Jerusalam. Waa dɛ kaa la, o kpɔ bwɛjena ne bwɛjegre ta dɛɛ bagle nɛra wa.
42013023	Anee nomɛl bɔɔro ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, nɛra tama kenii Korowii ɛɛ ba lɛɛ yaa?" Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ,
42013024	"Hé takapɔ dɛ kpɔ doonyoa waa do feelɔɔ o ta joe do kpegri la ta dɛ jo ka ja Korowii Kora la ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛra ɛɛ warɔɔ dɛɛ nyin dɛ jo bela, kɛ baa won dɔ bɔr jo.
42013025	Dem te la ɛɛ iruu dɛ ba laa gbera la tɔ, a ka heyaa che baŋ, asɛ hɛɛ lɔ gbera dɛɛ soŋo ŋɔ, 'N poori, nomoa! Laa gbera ya yaa ásɛ ya jo.' Asɛ o ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, 'Maa heyaa jemɛ bobɛlbwa.'
42013026	Belaa hɛɛ ba ŋɔe ŋɔ, 'Ya ne he fa pɛ nɔn di kwa, asɛ he bol waa bagle yaa ya bwɛɛ ka.'
42013027	Asɛ o berɛ ŋɔ he be ja ŋɔ, 'N ŋɔ maa heyaa jemɛ bobɛlbwa. Hé le n nɛɛ kaa, nɛnchɔga bane!'
42013028	"Bela la, hɛɛ na Abraham ne Aesek ne Jekɔb ne Korowii keamere la bwa Korowii Kora la taa, asɛ Korowii doŋi he te ta. Belaa aa ba he nɛɛ wee, asɛ hɛɛ wi.
42013029	Nɛra ɛɛ le wee leebɔr ne wee cholibɔr ne harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwaa dɛ ba ja Korowii Kora la ta, asɛ dɛ pɛ nɔn di kwaa dɛ lɛ sie.
42013030	Hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ nɛra baa ka mun taraken ɛɛ ba tɔ siee, asɛ nɛra baa tɔ sie la ge ba kaa mun ta."
42013031	Yeesu taa chegɛ bug la ta la, Farisii tena bane ba o be dɛ ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "A chɛ kɛ he le bonɔ dɛ kaa bobɛl, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Kooro Hɛrɔd dɛ nyini dɛ́ kpoe."
42013032	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé ka ŋɔ baradeɛre te la be ŋɔ, 'Mɛɛ so lee dɛɛ doŋi kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛ, dɛɛ chah weela tena tɔpera anɛ mɔɔ dɛ tonɛ n toma.'
42013033	Mɛɛ sewɔɔ te, kɛ a chɛ kɛ n valɛ ŋwɛnɛ tɔpera anɛ dɛ kaa Jerusalam. Bela laa baa kpoo Korowii keamere aa?
42013034	"Oo, Jerusalam tena! Korowii tomɛ o keamere he be naa, gɛɛ he kpoo ba, o tomɛ toroma he be naa, gɛɛ he fog ba bwea. Saŋ bɛlbwaa mɛɛ nyin kɛ n kpɔ nɔn tɔ he nɛɛ kɛ jal aa lawɛ o bii dɛɛ do o kena lɔgre la, kɛ haa nyin kɛ n lawɛ heyaa pɛ.
42013035	Taraken te, Korowii ta he waa tɛ heya. Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, haa men na kpa ka tel gɛ saŋ maa ba ja, asɛ he ŋɔ, 'Woowo! Korowii Biee chegɛ o sɔn ta dɛɛ ba la!' "
42014001	Awola Ona Tɔpere bɛl, Yeesu la Farisii tena nomonome la bɛl dem dɛɛ la ka di kwa, asɛ nɛra baa lɔ bela la ɛɛ nyiŋu dɛɛ kari waa waa dɛ ɛ bwa.
42014002	Dɛ baa bɛl waa suuga soge Yeesu sie bela,
42014003	anee Yeesu bɔɔ Tɔn Jerema la ne Farisii tena la ŋɔ, "Ya mmarare la dɛ tɛ ŋwɛnɛ kɛ ba chah nɛn Ona Tɔpere aa?"
42014004	Asɛ ba bwa hel. Anee o lawɛ baa la dɛ chaoh dɛ kpɔɔ ta o kaa.
42014005	Asɛ o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "He bini umee o bie kɛɛ o nao le kɔlɔŋ bini Ona Tɔpere, waa wola on lawɛ le kɔlɔŋ la bini warane Ona Tɔpere la tenten ta nɔ?"
42014006	Ba ta wone dɔ waane chaŋo a gɛ waa la ta.
42014007	Nɛra baa yer ba ŋɔ bá ba di kwaa la aa bala la, dɛ ba dɛ pɛne sobɔrdɛɛga dɛ́ so. Anee Yeesu aa na ba gɛ la, o kpɔ sɛgla bol waa bag ba ŋɔ,
42014008	"Dɛ nomɛl baa yerɛ heyaa hanfale kondikwaa mun ŋɔ hé ba di kwaa aa, he bɛ nomonsobɔra ka pɛne dɛɛ so. Aa bao kɛ o ken ka yerɛ nomɛl o nomonome aa gwaale.
42014009	Dɛ o balaa, naate waa yerɛ he bwa la ɛɛ ba ŋɔ he bee ŋɔ hé ir dɛ kpɔ nomombɔr la tɛ nomoa la. Belaa hɛɛ ba sihiih kpɔe dɛ ir ka so bechasobɔr nɛra la bwa habɔɔ.
42014010	Dɛ ba yerɛ a gɛ yer nɔ dɔŋ bɔr aa, ka so bechasobɔr, asɛ dɛ naate waa yerɛ la balaa, ó ba ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, 'N dam, ir kaa sie nomombɔr bela ka so.' An dɛ tɛɛ jirima nɛra baa yerɛ he ne ba bwa la siwi ta.
42014011	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ maŋkura o te la, Korowii ɛɛ ba o ne harɛɛ, asɛ nomɛlbwa waa dɛ pwɛr o te la, Korowii ɛɛ ɛo nɛnjenii."
42014012	Yeesu aa bol gɛ waa nɔ tonɛ la, o ŋɔ baa la waa yer ba ŋɔ bá ba di kwaa la be ŋɔ, "Dɛ he ɛ kondikonjena webaŋa kɛɛ jwaana dɛɛ yerɛ nɛra ŋɔ bá ba di aa, bɛ he daamanar, he nimanar, he lola, kɛɛ he dɔŋa kondɔɔhna gbo yerɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba gee ɛ anee dɛ yerɛ, amɔ dɛ he kwaa la kemee ba bɔe la.
42014013	Dɛ he ɛ gɛ kondikwaa nɔ soosiwi aa, yerɛ nyaara ne boobie ne nɛra ba nakpale aa teŋna, ne nyoŋa bá ba di,
42014014	ásɛ Korowii ɛɛ andɛɛga, dɛkalkɛ ba ta komɛlbwa dɔe dɛ́ kpɔ bɔe kem. Awola nɛndɛɛga aa ir seo ta la, Korowii ɛɛ bɔe a kemee."
42014015	Belaa nɛra Yeesu ne baa soge kondibɔr la bɛl no gɛ waa la, dɛ ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Nɛra baa ba ja Korowii Kora la ta dɛ di kwaa la, ba sie ɛɛ lɛo kɛrɛdɛ!"
42014016	Anee Yeesu sɛg ba ŋɔ, "Baa bɛlee fa lole dɛ ɛ kondikonjena, dɛ yerɛ nɛra pirim ŋɔ bá ba di.
42014017	Bɔr magrɔ kɛ bá ba kondikwaa la dibɔr, asɛ o tomɛ bonɔɔ ŋɔ ó ka yerɛ nɛra waa yer ba la ŋɔ bá ba, kɛ o tonɛ komɛlbwa.
42014018	Bonɔɔ la aa la ba be la, ba bwa ŋɔ ba ta bɔr dɔe, dɛ vɛh. Sitɔte la ŋɔ bonɔɔ la be ŋɔ o yawɛ harɛ bɛl a chɛ kɛ o la dɛ ka nao, anomanta bónɔɔ la ka ŋɔ o dɔɔ be ŋɔ o bɛ gel a ɛ waane kɛ waa wola bɔr dɔe dɛ ba la.
42014019	Bɛl ge ŋɔ o yawɛ nae fi dɛ vɔrɔwe kwaa doa dɛɛ kaa a ne koo dɛ́ ka parɛ a ne dɛ na, kɛ tórome la ka ŋɔ o dɔɔ be ŋɔ o bɛ gel a ɛ waane kɛ waa wola bɔr dɔe dɛ ba la.
42014020	Bɛl ge ŋɔ waa mo haah ta bigre, anomanta waa won ba.
42014021	"Asɛ bonɔɔ la la dɛ ka ŋɔ o dɔɔ la be gɛ baa bola la. Anee o dɔɔ la baah di, o ŋɔ o bonɔɔ la be ŋɔ, 'Ɛ warane kaa fɔgbaah ne lomoola ta dɛ ka yerɛ nyaara ne boobie ne nyoŋa ne nɛra ba nakpale aa teŋna ásɛ ba ba di kwaa la.'
42014022	A ta bigre bɛlbwa bonɔɔ la ba dɛ ba ŋɔ o dɔɔ la be ŋɔ, 'N la he tom la, kɛ sobɔra ane ta chɔ le pɛɛpɛɛ.'
42014023	Anee o berɛ ŋɔ bonɔɔ la be ŋɔ, 'La ŋwɛnɛre ta ne dahare, nomɛlbwa haa nao la, lawɔ ba ásɛ n dem bonɔ su.
42014024	Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, nɛra n faa yer ba la bini bɛlbwa aa n kondikwaa nɔɔ di kpa!' "
42014025	Awola bɛl, nɛnlaa bane ja Yeesu nɛɛ o ne baa kaa, asɛ o ka berɛ o te dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ,
42014026	"Dɛ nomɛlbwa ba n be o ta men nyine gwaa o mɛɛ ne o nya, ne o haah ne bii, o dɔɔranar ne nimanar ne nimambii dɛ o gbagba aa, waa won ɛ n habɔteŋre.
42014027	Nomɛlbwa waa wola won kpɔ o te tɛ, dɛ sɛh wahala nae ne seo bwa, dɛ teŋɛ n nɛɛ kɛŋɔ nɛn waa kpɔ dagagre che bá ka kpaaro pɛl o ta la waa won ɛ n habɔteŋre.
42014028	Dɛ he bini bɛl dɛ nyin kɛ o do abrɔsane aa, waa nyiŋi na kɛŋɔ o dɔ suuga aa dɛ ba wona tel la aa?
42014029	O ta nyiŋe kɛrɛdɛ mɔɔ dɛ pa dea la mun, dɛ o ta ba wone tonɛ dea la doe yaa, nɛra ɛɛ mamɔɔ,
42014030	dɛ ŋɔ, 'Baa nɔ laa fe dɛ do dem la aa? O laa hora naa?'
42014031	"Dɛ kooro ne o koodɔŋ bɛl dɔ yoi, o dɔ nɛra kagboŋa fi o dɔŋ la ge dɔ nɛra kagboŋa fifraanɛ naa, waa so dɛ lii kɛ wɛɛ wonoo kpɔ o nɛra la ka pu o dɔŋ la waa dɔ nɛra gwaalo la mɔɔ dɛ le ka puu wa?
42014032	O ne o dɔŋ la baah taa jaŋa o na kɛŋɔ waa won puu yo la, wɛɛ do toromaa bá ka larawo ásɛ ba pɛ.
42014033	Gɛ tentenee a chɛ kɛ he so lii mɔɔ. Nomɛlbwa ta o komɛlbwa gelaa, waa won ɛ n habɔteŋre.
42014034	"Yar wer, kɛ dɛ aa somɛ kpa a, ɛrɛɛ bá berɛ dɛɛ ba a ɛɛ á do som jaɔ?
42014035	A ta wejema bɛlbwa dɔe kpa. Aa harɛ gba kwaa. Fugaa a den chɛ kɛŋɔ ba fuga ta. He naate haa no la, no."
42015001	Awola bɛl lampoo lɛɛra baa dɛ bɔ apoo ne wechɔg-ɛɛra teŋɔ dɛ ba bar Yeesu cheme dɛ́ no o wa.
42015002	Anee Farisii tena ne Tɔn Jerema bane ŋwalɔ dɛ ŋɔ, "Gɛ baa nɔ dɛ lɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra o ne ba yon pɛ nɔn dɛɛ di kwa."
42015003	Belaa Yeesu sɛg ba ŋɔ,
42015004	"He bini umee dɛ dɔ peera lafa, asɛ beŋkpoŋ nyograa, waa wola o bɔree gaage ɔ? Wɛɛ gel fifraanuanaarɛ dɛ anuanaarɛ laanee a dibɔr tama dɛ ka gaage beŋkpoŋ waa nyogra la bɔr ka tel kɛŋɔ waa nao.
42015005	Dɛ naate na a gɛ pee nɔ naa, silɛɛ kohona nomanta, wɛɛ kpɔɔ dawɛ vam ba dem.
42015006	O ba dem aa, wɛɛ ŋɔ o daamanar ne nɛra o ne baa soga bwa bee ŋɔ, 'N sie lɛo kohona kɛŋɔ maa na n pee waa nyogra nɔ. Anomanta hé ba yá lɛ ya sie.'
42015007	Kasinteŋ, gɛɛ aa ba Korowii doa ge doe. Wechɔg-ɛɛ beŋkpoŋ charɛ o liire dɛ le o wechɔga ta naa, Korowii ne o nyundua toroma sie ɛɛ lɛ o nɛɛ dɛ gwaa nɛra fifraanuanaarɛ dɛ banuanaarɛ baa dɛ lii kɛ ba ɛ nɛndɛɛga baa wola chɛɛ kɛŋɔ ba charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta.
42015008	"Gɛ laa ge aa, haah besoo lole dɛ dɔ suugapoŋa fi, asɛ dɛ beŋkpoŋ nyograa, waa wola niinii choŋi dɛ chaa o dea dɛ gaage o bɔr sibegra ne ka tel kɛŋɔ waa nao wɔ?
42015009	O nao waa, wɛɛ yerɛ o daamanar ne nɛra o ne baa soga laanee dɛ ŋɔ, 'N sie lɛo kohona kɛŋɔ maa na n suugapoŋ waa nyogra nɔ. Anomanta hé ba yá lɛ ya sie.'
42015010	Kasinteŋ, gɛɛ aa ba Korowii doa ge doe. Wechɔg-ɛɛ beŋkpoŋ charɛ o liire dɛ le o wechɔga ta naa, Korowii ne o nyundua toroma sie ɛɛ lɛ o nɛɛ taeh."
42015011	Yeesu berɔ sɛg ba ŋɔ, "Baa bɛl fa dɔ bibaala banɛ.
42015012	O bii la bini ombechala la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ó bɔne o kpanjogo bini, asɛ dɛ tɛo o bɔr. Asɛ baa la bɔne o kpanjogo la bini tɛ o bii la, dɛ kpɔ o bie bechala la bɔr tɛo.
42015013	A ta tɔpere bɛl dii, o bie bechala la yog o te kwaa la bwa, dɛ kpɔ o suuga jo pua bojaŋ kaa. Waa laŋa la, o kaa ɛ suuga la sagasaga ken.
42015014	Waa baa di suuga la bwa la, a ta tɔpere bɛl dii, asɛ lɔrjen bɛl chole harɛ la ta bela waa lole la, dɛ o ta suuga dɔe, o ta kondikwaa ge dɔe dɛ́ di.
42015015	Aa do gɛ la, o kpɔ o te ka pɛl bela te bɛl, asɛ o gel o kaa nyiŋi o prakooni nɛ.
42015016	Lɔr la nyoa baa do kpegri kohona, asɛ o baa pɛlɛ prakooni la kondikwaa kwaraa nɛ, kɛ nomɛlbwa ge ta on komɛlbwa tɛɛ.
42015017	"Asɛ o sie aa baa ba harɛ la, o sogo dɛ lii o mɛɛ waa dɛ ŋɔ, 'N mɛɛ bonɔɔna kwaraa baa lɔ o sie la di kwaa dɛɛ ka, asɛ n do bonɔ lɔr ɛɛ kpo mɛ la.
42015018	Mɛɛ iruu dɛ la n mɛɛ be dɛ ka ŋɔ, "N mɛɛ, n ɛ wechɔga dɛ jo he ne Korowii bwa nɛ.
42015019	N ta chɛɛ kɛŋɔ he yer mɛ he bie kpa. Kɛ n poori, lɛɛ mɛ dɛ kpɔ mɛ ɛ he bonɔɔna la bɛl." '
42015020	Bie la aa lii gɛ la, o iro chig ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ kaa o mɛɛ be. Waa dɛ kaa o mɛɛ be la, o mɛɛ lɔ dem dɛ nao bojaŋ, asɛ o tea domɔ, o chwa dɛɛ chemo dɛ ka gbaaro pɛl o bambile.
42015021	Belaa bie la ŋɔ, 'N mɛɛ, n jo he ne Korowii nɛ. N ta chɛɛ kɛŋɔ he yer mɛ he bie kpa.'
42015022	Bie la nyoa ta lee mɔɔ dɛ o mɛɛ yerɛ o bonɔɔna ŋɔ, 'Hé chwa ka nyiŋi n yale la bwa bini ondɛɛge ba tɛo ó tɔ, dɛ kpɔ nonisegdɛɛge ba doo, dɛ nyin naŋgawa ba tɛo ó do.
42015023	He tonaa, hé ka lawɛ nabie la bwa bini ondɛɛge dɛ ba kpo, ásɛ ya di kwa dɛ lɛ ya sie,
42015024	dɛkalkɛŋɔ n fa liiro kɛŋɔ n bie nɔ sewɔ, asɛ o berɛ ba nɔ. O faa nyogra la, taraken te n nao.' Ate ba ɛ kondikwaare dɛɛ di dɛɛ lɛ ba sie tenten.
42015025	"Waa nɔ bwa aa dɛ ɛ la, dɛ binomoa la le koo dɛɛ ba. Waa dɛ tel ba dem la, o no gboŋri ne yela ne sae gbɔga dem bela.
42015026	Anee o yerɛ o mɛɛ bonɔɔna la bɛl dɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, 'Bɔkwa waa chig deemɔ?'
42015027	Anee o ŋɔ, 'He nime la waa joa kaa la, onee bala, asɛ he mɛɛ gel ya kpo nabie la bwa bini ondɛɛge la dɛ ɛ kondikwaa dɛ di dɛɛ lɛ ya sie, dɛkalkɛŋɔ wobɛlbwa ta on ɛɛ.'
42015028	Asɛ binomoa la baah di, o kire ŋɔ waa deemii jo. Asɛ o mɛɛ ba larawo ŋɔ ó ba dem.
42015029	Belaa bie la ŋɔ o mɛɛ be ŋɔ, 'N mɛɛ, n ge aa dena dɛɛ tomɛ saŋ la bwa, n ta he toma vɛɛh bwa, bɔkwa konee he tɛ mɛ nɔ? He ta bombie kwaraa lawɛ tɛ mɛ ŋɔ ń kpo, n ge ne n daamanar kpɔ lɛ sie bwa.
42015030	Kɛ he bie nɔ waa kaa chɔg o suuga haahna nɛɛ dɛ ba nɔ, he berɔ garɛ kpo nabidɛɛge tɛo.'
42015031	Anee baa la ŋɔ, 'N bidɛɛge, n ne haa lole nɔ, n komɛlbwa maa dɔa la, hen dɔa.
42015032	He nime nɔ aa nyogra dɛ berɛ ba nɔ, a chɛ kɛŋɔ ya gel ya sie lɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya ŋɔ o sewɔ, o berɛ ba nɔ, ya ŋɔ o nyogrɔ, kɛ taraken ya nao.' "
42016001	Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "Baa bɛlee fa lole dɛ ɛ kondɔɔh, dɛ kpɔ o kwaa bwa do o bonɔɔ bɛl nɔn ta ŋɔ wɛ́ɛ nyiŋi a ta. Belaa nɛra ka ŋɔ suuga te la be ŋɔ o bonɔɔ la dɛ di o suuga sagasaga.
42016002	Anee suuga te la tomɛ nɛn o ka yerɛ o bonɔɔ la, asɛ o ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, 'N dɛ no waane kɛ he dɛ di n suuga. Ka kpɔ he tɔn ba dɛ ba bag mɛ suuga aa jo he nɔn ta, ne gɛ haa ɛ a ne, asɛ dɛ kpɔ n kwaa do n nɔn ta, dɛkalkɛ maa gel he nyiŋi n kwaa ta kpa.'
42016003	"Asɛ bonɔɔ la kaa dɛ ka lii o nyu bini ŋɔ, 'N dɔɔ dɛ ba men toma ta lee. Ɛrɛɛ mɛɛ ba ɛɛ yɔ? N ge aa kpege dɛ́ parɛ di, asɛ n sie ge garɔ ne kwaa soŋa.
42016004	N jemɛ gɛ maa ɛ, asɛ dɛ ba lee mɛ toma ta naa, ń dɔ daamanar baa nyiŋ mɛ.'
42016005	O yerɛ nɛra baa di o dɔɔ kema la beŋkpoŋa beŋkpoŋa, dɛ bɔɔ sitɔte la ŋɔ, 'Aŋwɛnɛɛ he di n dɔɔ kem ɔ?'
42016006	Anee o ŋɔ, 'N di kem ŋgo garare lafa.' Anee bonɔɔ la ŋɔ, 'Lɛ tɔn warane, dɛ so harɛ dɛ chwerɛ fifraanue.'
42016007	Asɛ o berɛ bɔɔ nɛɛte ge ŋɔ, 'Kem aŋwɛnɛɛ he ge dio?' Asɛ o ŋɔ, 'N di kem mea baagere kagboŋ.' Anee bonɔɔ la ŋɔ, 'Lɛ tɔn dɛ so harɛ dɛ chwerɛ lafraanuatoro.'
42016008	Anee bonɔɔ naŋgarawa te nɔ dɔɔ la aa noa la, o kpɛɛro ŋɔ o ɛa wejema ta." Yeesu aa sɛg ba tonɛ la, o ŋɔ, "Nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta liire la, ba dɔ wejema ba ne ba bala kpoŋa dɛ gwaa nɛra ba sie aa chaah Korowii waa ta la."
42016009	Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ ja ŋɔ, "Hé kpɔ he laala ne suuga aa ɛ harɛ nɔ ta kondɔɔh la dɛɛ nyin daamanar, asɛ dɛ a baa hiah heya aa, bá won lɛ heyaa silɛɛ ne bwɛɛ waa wola chɔg bwa la ta.
42016010	"Naate waa wona dɔ kasinteŋ kontamaa ta la, wɛɛ wonoo dɔ kasinteŋ anjena ge ta. Naate waa wola wone dɔ kasinteŋ kontamaa ta la, waa won dɔ kasinteŋ anjena ge ta.
42016011	Dɛ he ta wone nyiŋi harɛ nɔ ta kondɔɔh a kwara aa ɛ konsale nɔ ta naa, ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ba wona nyiŋi kondɔɔh tenten ta nɔ?
42016012	Dɛ he ta wone nyiŋi nomɛl kon ta naa, umee dɛɛ ba he gbagba kwaa kpɔe dɛ do he nɔn ta nɔ?
42016013	"Nomɛlbwa aa won tomɛ dɔɔranar banɛ. Dɛ a ba gɛ naa, wɛɛ dɛɛ nyin bɛl waa dɛ gwaa bɛl. A laa ge aa, o sie ɛɛ dɛɛ lɛ bɛl bee dɛ gwaa bɛl. Haa won tomɛ Korowii dɛ berɛ won nyin harɛ nɔ ta kondɔɔh a magre."
42016014	Farisii tena la aa no gɛ la, ba chwee Yeesu, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba dɛ nyin suuga taeh.
42016015	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He dɛ ɛ he te kɛ he ɛ nɛndɛɛga he waa aa su Korowii siwi, kɛ Korowii jemɛ gɛ he liire aa doa. Kon waa ɛ konjen nɛwɛnyini sie ta la, Korowii te aa on komɛlbwa bu.
42016016	"Mosis Mmara la ne Korowii keamere la waa la baa chwera laanee lole baa bagle mɔɔ dɛ ka tel gɛ saŋ Jɔn o faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la aa bala. Le gɛ saŋ waa bala dɛ baa bol Korowii Kora la Amanesoma la, nomɛlbwa siwi swɛɛrɔ wɛɛ nyin bɔr dɛ ja Korowii Kora la ta.
42016017	Kɛ, nyundua ne harɛ ɛɛ chɔgoo, dɛ ba ta Mmara la bini wejegaa bɛlbwa berɛ.
42016018	"Nomɛlbwa waa vɛh o haah dɛ berɛ ka mo hanfale la, o ɛ wechɔga dɛ bɔ jwamane, asɛ nomɛlbwa ge waa mo haah o jaa raa vɛoh la, o ge bɔ jwamane.
42016019	"Baa bɛlee fa lole dɛ dɔ suuga, dɛɛ do laaladɛɛga dɛ dɔ kwaa nɔ bwa, asɛ dɛɛ di kondɛɛga tɔpere bɛlbwa, dɛɛ lɛ o sie tenten.
42016020	Dɛ baa bɛl ge lole dɛ nya, asɛ ŋwɛra ɛ o bwa baa yerɔ Lasorɔs. Ba yon kpɔɔ ka bil suuga te la dem doonyoa,
42016021	asɛ wɛɛ do hwɛga kondikwaa suuga te la aa di ka asɛ o bonɔɔna kpɔ ba ta la ta. Hale dɛ nyootena ba dɛ kpɛle o ŋwɛra la.
42016022	"Nyaa la baa sewɛ, asɛ nyundua toroma ba kpɔɔ kaa nyundua o ka so Abraham be. Suuga te la ge baa sewɛ, asɛ ba hugo,
42016023	asɛ o ka jo Bɔnsam nii ta. Dɛ o dɛ na nii taeh. On ŋɔa o nyiŋi, dɛ na Abraham bojaŋ le, asɛ Lasorɔs so o be.
42016024	Anee o ha nyoa yerɛ Abraham dɛ ŋɔ, 'N Naa Abraham! Na n sum, asɛ dɛ tomɛ Lasorɔs ásɛ o kpɔ o nonii ka lege nesɔn dɛ kpɔ ba lege n nyondoŋe. N lɔ nii ta n bwara ɛɛ nyɛg mɛ.'
42016025	Anee Abraham ŋɔ, 'N bie, lii kɛŋɔ gɛ saŋ he faa lɔ harɛ ta la, he di yɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ Lasorɔs na wahala. Taraken nɔ o dɛ di yɛɛ, asɛ he gee na wahala.
42016026	Hale n ŋɔ o ba bela kwaraa noo, waa won ba, dɛkalkɛŋɔ bɔjen bɛl lɔ ya ne he baah ta, nomɛlbwa waa lɔ bonɔ dɛɛ nyin o ba bela haa lole la aa wola won ba, asɛ nɛra baa lɔ he be bela dɛɛ nyin dɛ ba bonɔ la ge aa won ba.'
42016027	"Anee suuga te la ŋɔ, 'Amɔ te n dɛ soŋe, n Naa, tomɔ ó la n mɛɛ dem,
42016028	dɛ ka kah n nimanar banue bane baa lɔ bela la ŋɔ, gɛ maa ɛa la, ba bɛ gɛ ɛ asɛ dɛ ba ba bonɔ maa lole dɛɛ na wahala nɔ.'
42016029	Asɛ Abraham ŋɔ, 'He nimanar la dɔ tɔne Mosis ne Korowii keamere la aa chwera la á ja ba. A chɛ kɛ ba kura dɛ no waa baa dɛ bol.'
42016030	Anee suuga te la ŋɔ, 'Akai, baa no, n Naa. Kɛ dɛ nomɛl iro le seo ta dɛ ka ŋɔ ba be te naa, anee ba no dɛ charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta.'
42016031	Anee Abraham ŋɔ, 'Dɛ baa tɔne Mosis ne Korowii keamere la aa chwera la waa no aa, nomɛl iro le seo ta dɛ la ba be kwara noo, baa no.' "
42017001	Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "A ɛ wobɛlbwa, waa aa dɛ ba gela nɛn ɛ wechɔga la ɛɛ bao. Kɛ naate aa che o nɛɛ dɛ ba la, bwɛɛlɛ.
42017002	Dɛ ba vɔwɛ nambwe do naate baŋa dɛ kpɔɔ ka ta moo vil ta kwara naa, a fe bɔ kɛŋɔ waa gela bechajegre nɔ dɔŋ bɛlbwa ɛ wechɔga.
42017003	Anomanta hé nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ! "Dɛ he dɔŋ ɛɛ wechɔga aa, ŋɔ o be. Dɛ o no a mun dɛ charɛ o liire aa, kpɔ o wechɔga kɛo.
42017004	Dɛ tɔpere bɛlbwa o ɛɛ wechɔga kera anuanɛ, asɛ dɛ ba he be dɛ ba ŋɔ waa waa ɛɛ la, o kon chɔgaa, kpɔ kɛo."
42017005	Yeesu habɔteŋra la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ, cha yaa dɛ gel ya dɔ yarada kohona."
42017006	Asɛ Yeesu chaŋe ŋɔ, "Dɛ he yarada fe kan kɛŋɔ sipon gba aa, he fe ɛɛ wonoo ŋɔ dajen nɔ aa chega nɔ be ŋɔ ó chugri ka che moo ta, asɛ o no dɛ ɛ gɛ."
42017007	Yeesu berɔ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "He bini umee dɛ dɔ bonɔɔ wɛɛ parɛ he koo kɛɛ wɛɛ nyiŋi he peera ta, asɛ waa le toma ta ba dem la, he den ŋɔ o be ó ba di kwaɔ?
42017008	Akai! Haa o be gɛɛ ŋɔ. Hɛɛ ŋɔ o bee ŋɔ, 'Ɛ n kondikwaa ka cheg mɛ, asɛ dɛ kpɔ he te ba che n be tig ta dɛ ɛ n wobɛlbwa tɛ mɛ ń di kwaa tonɛ mɔɔ he ge ka di he kwa.'
42017009	Bonɔɔ la ɛɛ dɔ jaamee waa o dɔɔ la aa doo a ta laanee yaa? Akai.
42017010	Gɛ tentenee he waa do. Dɛ he ɛ waa Korowii aa do heyaa a ta ŋɔ hé ɛ aa, he bɛ he te kpɛɛ. Hé ŋɔ, 'Ya ɛ bonɔɔna yaa wola tɔnɔ dɔe. Toma aa chɛ kɛŋɔ ya ɛ la gboo ya ɛ la.' "
42017011	Yeesu aa dɛ kaa Jerusalam la, o kpɔ Samaria harɛ ne Galilia harɛ jwɛh ta.
42017012	Asɛ waa dɛ jo bwɛjega bɛl ta la, baala fi bane bwadabii weechɔga ane aa lɔ ba nɛɛ pa sie o be dɛɛ ba dɛ ba chemo. Ba chegɛ bojaŋ,
42017013	dɛ ha nyoa ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu, na ya sum!"
42017014	Belaa Yeesu aa na ba la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé kpɔ he te ka bagle Sɔfore la ásɛ ba nyiŋi heyaa na." Baa chig ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ kaa la, ba weela la kaalɔ, ba bwara kwaa.
42017015	Ba bini beŋkpoŋ aa naa kɛŋɔ o weela la kaalɔ o bwara kwaa la, o laa berɛ dɛ baa jam Korowii takpeg ne,
