42017016	dɛ ba guŋi Yeesu sie dɛ jaamo. Dɛ gɛ baa la ɛ Samaria tee.
42017017	Anee Yeesu bɔɔro ŋɔ, "He lɔ nɛra fi n chah heya, leperaa banuanaarɛ la te dɔɔ?
42017018	Ɛrɛɛ baa nɔ waa wola Juda te ɛɛ nɔ gbo won kpɔ jam ba tɛ Korowii nɔɔ?"
42017019	Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ir kaa, yarada haa yarada mɛ nɔɔ gela he dɔ he te."
42017020	Awola bɛl Farisii tena bane bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Bɛweeree Korowii Kora la ɛɛ ba bala ɔ?" Anee o ŋɔ, "Korowii Kora la ta komɛl haa dɛ ba o nae ɛɛ.
42017021	O ta komɛl yaa dɛ ba ŋɔe ŋɔ, 'Onee nɔ, kɛɛ onee ka lɔ le nɔ' ɛɛ. Bambile binii o do."
42017022	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "Aa ba tel saŋ bɛlee asɛ hɛɛ nyin dɛ fe dɔ n Nɛn Bie la kɛŋɔ n ne haa soga tɔpebeŋkpoŋ gbo gba, kɛ haa gɛɛ dɔ.
42017023	Nɛra bane ɛɛ ba ŋɔ he bee ŋɔ n lɔ bonɔ kɛɛ le nɔ. He bɛ ka nyiŋi.
42017024	Gɛ bwaala yon nyɛgle nyundua bwa chaah la, gɛɛ n Nɛn Bie la bala ɛɛ ba doe, nomɛlbwa na mɛ.
42017025	Kɛ a chɛ kɛŋɔ n na wahala kohona asɛ fini nɔ nɛra vɛɛh mɛ, mɔɔ anɔ bɛlbwa ba ɛ.
42017026	"Gɛ aa ɛa Nowa bere saŋ la, gɛɛ n Nɛn Bie la ge bala saŋ ɛɛ ba ɛɛ.
42017027	Nowa bere saŋ la, dɛ ba dɛ di kwa, dɛɛ nyɔ sene, dɛɛ mo haahna, dɛ lawɛ haahna tɛ baala baa mo, dɛ ka tel kɛŋɔ awola Nowa aa jo o gberjen la bini, asɛ bwaala nɛ aaa, mpo ne neerare bwa su tɔ harɛ bwa, asɛ ba bwa serewe kwaraa.
42017028	"Gɛ tenten aa ɛa Lɔt bere saŋ ge asɛ Sodom tena ɛɛ di kwa, dɛɛ nyɔ sene, dɛɛ di bona, dɛɛ parɛ, dɛɛ ma deene la, gɛɛ aa ba ɛɛ.
42017029	Awola Lɔt aa le Sodom dɛɛ kaa la, Korowii gelɔ nii ne jebɔrɔwe aa dɛ fuh le nyundua dɛ ba fuh Sodom tena bwa kwaraa.
42017030	"Gɛ tentenee aa ba ɛɛ awola n Nɛn Bie la aa ba ja la.
42017031	Awola tɔpere la, nomɛlbwa waa lɔ sal dea doa o laala do dea la, o bɛ tu ba kpɔ kpa. Gɛ tentenee nomɛlbwa ge waa do koo ta la, o ge bɛ dem ba dɛ́ ba kpɔ komɛlbwa kpa.
42017032	Hé lii waa aa pu Lɔt haah la.
42017033	Nomɛlbwa o siwi aa swɛɛ harɛ nɔ ta silɛɛ kwaa ta la, wɛɛ paŋɛ o nyuu. Asɛ nomɛlbwa ge o siwi aa wola harɛ nɔ ta silɛɛ kwaa ta lɛ la, wɛɛ dɔ o nyuu.
42017034	Kasinteŋ, awola jwaana la, nɛra banɛ ɛɛ pɛo dɛ chɔ kalaŋ beŋkpoŋ ta, asɛ Korowii ba kpɔ beŋkpoŋ kaa dɛ gel bɛl.
42017035	Haahna banɛ ɛɛ pɛo dɛɛ tuge kwa, asɛ Korowii ba kpɔ bɛl kaa, dɛ gel bɛl.
42017036	Baala banɛ ɛɛ do koo taa, asɛ o ba kpɔ bɛl kaa dɛ gel bɛl."
42017037	Anee o habɔteŋra la bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ, leperaa aa ba chiga ɔ?" Asɛ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Bela konlale aa lole la, belaa kokosakiri ɛɛ cheme."
42018001	Yeesu kpɔ sɛgla bol waa bagle o habɔteŋra la, dɛ ŋɔ a chɛ kɛ baa soŋe Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa, dɛ bɛ bɔhwaah dɛɛ ɛ.
42018002	O ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Nomoa bɛlee fa lole dɛɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole kɔɔto, dɛ do bwɛɛ bɛl ta. Dɛ waa Korowii ɔmɛ, waa nɛn ge heeh.
42018003	Dɛ bwɛɛ la tenten ta la, dɛ luhaah bɛl ge lɔ bela, o yon dɛɛ la nomoa la be dɛ kaa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, 'Cha mɛ asɛ dɛ lɛɛ mɛ le n dɔm nɔn ta.'
42018004	Dɛ kɔɔto nomoa la aa sie do o be, dɛ gel a bigri. A habɔɔ la o lii o nyu bini ŋɔ, 'Maa Korowii ɔmɛ, maa nɛn ge heeh,
42018005	kɛ luhaah nɔ mare nɔ waa dɛ ɛɛ mɛ nɔ nomanta, mɛɛ nyiŋuu, dɛ gel o di bole, ásɛ o laa o melee waane kpɔ n nɛ.' "
42018006	Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "He no gɛ kɔɔto nomonchɔge la aa bola aa?
42018007	Dɛ nɛn waa do ken wono lɛ nɛn aa, ɛrɛɛ Korowii aa wola won cha o nɛra baa wia dɛɛ noo chɔɔ ne jwaana la dɛ lɛɛ ba le ba dɔma nɔn ta nɔ? Aa bigruu mɔɔ o cha ba aa?
42018008	N dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, Korowii ɛɛ wonoo cha ba. Wɛɛ ɛa warane gee. Dɛ n Nɛn Bie la balaa, mɛɛ ba pu nɛra baa dɔ yarada harɛ nɔ taa te naa?"
42018009	Yeesu sɛgle nɛra baa dɛ lii ba te kɛŋɔ ba ɛ nɛndɛɛga gwaa nɛra bwa la ŋɔ,
42018010	"Awola bɛl nɛra banɛ bane la Korowii Dea dɛ kaa soŋe Korowii. Dɛ bɛl ɛ Farisii te asɛ bɛl ge ɛ nɛnchɔga baa dɛ lɛ lampoo la bɛl.
42018011	Belaa Farisii te la ir che dɛ soŋe Korowii o nyu bini ŋɔ, 'Korowii, n dɛ jaame kɛŋɔ maa wola doe kɛ n bala baa dɛ bɔ apoo, baa wola kasinteŋ bol, dɛɛ bɔ jwamane nɔ. N dɛ jaame kɛŋɔ maa wola doe kɛŋɔ banchɔge nɔ waa dɛ lɛ lampoo nɔ.
42018012	N dɛ vɔwɛ nyoa tɔpera anɛ yawanyoa bɛlbwa ta, dɛɛ bɔne kwaa maa dɛ dɔ bwa bini bɔre fi dɛ kpɔ beŋkpoŋ dɛ baa tɛ hen Korowii.'
42018013	"Lampoo lɛɛ la te chegɛ bojaŋ, o ta sie hae dɛ nyiŋi nyundua kwara, kɛ dɛ kpɔ nɔɔra dawɛ nyu dɛ ŋɔ, 'Oo, N Naa Korowii, wechɔg-ɛɛree men. Na n sum dɛ kpɔ n wechɔga kɛ mɛ.' "
42018014	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "N dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, lampoo lɛɛ la bee Korowii no dɛ kpɔ o wechɔga kɛo dɛ doo nɛndɛɛga bini, asɛ o kaa o dem. Farisii te la te, o ta o be noɛ. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ gɔɔ o te la, Korowii dɛ ba o ne harɛ, asɛ nomɛlbwa waa ɛ o te nɛŋgwɛgre la, Korowii dɛ gɔɔro."
42018015	Nɛra bane kpɔ ba bii ba o be ŋɔ ó kpɔ o nɔɔra dawɛ ba nɛɛ dɛ swee andɛɛga tɛɛ ba. O habɔteŋra la aa na ba la, ba kɔr ba kɛŋɔ baa dɛ ɛ gɛ la.
42018016	Belaa Yeesu yerɛ bechale la ba o be, asɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "He bɛ bechale la ŋwɛnɛ tɔ. Hé gel ba ba n be, dɛkalkɛŋɔ banɔ dɔŋa nɔɔ Korowii koobii la.
42018017	Kasinteŋ, naate waa wola o te kpɔe tɛ Korowii dɛ yaradao kɛŋɔ bechale nɔ la, waa Korowii Kora la ta dɔe ba dɛ ja bwa."
42018018	Asɛ Juda tena nomoa bɛl bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Nomondɛɛge, ɛrɛɛ chɛ kɛŋɔ n ɛ dɛ dɔ Korowii mkpa waa wola jaga dɔe bwa nɔ?"
42018019	Anee Yeesu bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he yer mɛ nɛndɛɛge nɔɔ? Nomɛlbwa toole dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge, nemenɛ Korowii gbo.
42018020	Kɛ he jemɛ Korowii mmarare la aa dɛ bagle kɛ, 'Bɛ jwamane bɔ, bɛ nɛn kpo, bɛ ŋwɛ, bɛ nyosone teŋe dawɛ he dɔŋ nɛ, dɛɛ duu he nya ne he mɛɛ' laɔ?"
42018021	Anee baa la ŋɔ, "Gɛ saŋ maa ɛ bechala la bwaa n le dɛ teŋɛ anɔ bwa ta."
42018022	Yeesu aa no gɛ la, o ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "A ta kae webeŋkpoŋ. Ka yog kwaa haa dɔa, asɛ dɛ kpɔ a suuga kɛ nyaara. He ɛ gɛ naa, hɛɛ dɔ kwaa cheg Korowii doa. Ka ɛ gɛ asɛ dɛ ba teŋɛ n nɛ."
42018023	Baa la aa no gɛ waa nɔ la, o tea bini chɔgɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ o dɔ suuga taeh.
42018024	Yeesu nyiŋu dɛ na kɛŋɔ o tea bini chɔgɔ, asɛ o ŋɔ, "A kpegri kɛŋɔ dɔɔh dɔ bɔr ja Korowii Kora la ta.
42018025	Aa do pwɛree tɛ nyogma kɛŋɔ o won jo tɔɔge bɔɔ ta gwaa kɛŋɔ dɔɔh naa wona jo Korowii Kora ta."
42018026	Nɛra baa no waa nɔ la ŋɔ, "Amɔ te umee dɛɛ ba o nyu dɔe yɔ?"
42018027	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Waa aa kpega tɛ nɛn, waa wola won ɛ la, aa kpege Korowii te be. Wɛɛ wonoo ɛ."
42018028	Asɛ Pita ŋɔ, "Nyiŋi na, ya te, ya gel komɛlbwa yaa dɔa dɛ baa teŋɛ he nɛɛ la."
42018029	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, nomɛlbwa waa koh Korowii Kora nɔ waa dɛ gel o dem, kɛɛ o haah ne bii, kɛɛ o nya ne mɛɛ, kɛɛ o dɔɔranar ne o nimanar la,
42018030	wɛɛ dɔ banee dɛ gwaa gɛ harɛ ta bonɔ. A bwa habɔɔ la, wɛɛ dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe nyundua laanee ja."
42018031	Yeesu kpɔ o habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la le bokɛre asɛ dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé no! Ya dɛ kaa Jerusalam. Belaa men Nɛn Bie wobɛlbwa Korowii keamere la aa chwera la ɛɛ ba kpela ɛɛ.
42018032	Baa kpɔ mɛɛ do nɛnhɔɔhra baa wola Korowii tomɛ la nɔn ta, asɛ ba di n loro, dɛ chɛg mɛ, asɛ dɛ ta nentane ta n nɛ.
42018033	Baa lɔɔ mɛɛ dɛ kpo mɛ, asɛ a tɔpetooro wee la, n ir seo ta."
42018034	Yeesu aa bol gɛ waa la ba be la, ba ta a bɛlbwa mun noɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ Korowii kpɔ a mun noe sɔɔh ba. Ba ta gɛ waa dɛ bol la mun noɛ.
42018035	Baa dɛ tel Jeriko la, dɛ baa bɛl waa nyoŋa soge ŋwɛnɛ nyoa dɛɛ soŋe kwa.
42018036	Waa no nɛnlaa la gbɔga ba baa kaa la, o bɔɔ waa aa bala.
42018037	Anee ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt laanee ba dɛɛ kaa."
42018038	Belaa o kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Devid Naa Yeesu, na n sum dɛ cha mɛ!"
42018039	Asɛ nɛra baa tɔ sie la kaoh ŋɔ ó tɔ nyoa. Dɛ name tenee o taa bola kohona kwara, dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Devid Naa, na n sum dɛ cha mɛ!"
42018040	Anee Yeesu jagɛ che, dɛ ŋɔ bá lawɛ baa la waa nyoŋa la ba tɛo. Baa ba o ne o be la, Yeesu bɔɔro ŋɔ,
42018041	"Bɔkwaa hɛɛ nyin kɛ n ɛ tɛɛ nɔ?" Asɛ baa la ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, n poori, gel n berɛ dɛɛ na ja."
42018042	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He yarada lɛɛ. N chaeh. Na bɔr."
42018043	Ate bug la ta dɛ o dɛ na bɔr, dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ, dɛɛ jam Korowii. Asɛ nɛra la bwa aa naa la, ba kpɛɛ Korowii.
42019001	Yeesu la Jeriko dɛ kaa valɛ bwɛɛ la bini.
42019002	Dɛ lampoo lɛɛra nomoa bɛl lɔ bwɛɛ la ta dɛ ɛ suuga te baa yerɔ Sakeos.
42019003	Dɛ o dɛ nyin dɛ na gɛ Yeesu aa doa, kɛ nɛnlaa la nomanta o ta on nae, dɛkalkɛ o ɛ nɛmbora.
42019004	Anee o chwa tɔ nɛnlaa la sie, dɛ ka teeh daa bɛl waa chegɛ bela Yeesu aa dɛ ba kpɔe ba kaa la, ásɛ dɛ dɔɔ na.
42019005	Yeesu aa baa tel daa la mun la, o ha sie dɛ nyiŋi o doa dɛ ŋɔ Sakeos be ŋɔ, "Ɛ warane dɛ tu harɛ ba. He deaa mɛɛ ba choga fini."
42019006	Asɛ Sakeos tu harɛ warane dɛ ba kpɔ Yeesu kaa o dem silɛɛ ne.
42019007	Nɛra baa lɔ bela dɛ na la ŋwalɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o kaa chog wechɔg-ɛɛ dea.
42019008	Sakeos iro che dɛ ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Nomoa! N dɛ soŋe, no. Mɛɛ bɔne n laala bini bɔre anɛɛ, dɛ kpɔ beŋkpoŋ kɛ nyaara. Dɛ n kpɔ apoo ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ lɛ nomɛl kwaane aa, mɛɛ bɔ kwaa la bele anaarɛɛ tɛ naate."
42019009	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Fini tɔpere nɔ Korowii lɛ dem nɔ tena, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Abraham naaa Sakeos gba.
42019010	Nɛra baa nyogra waa n Nɛn Bie ba dɛ́ ba nyin ba bɔr dɛ lɛɛ ba."
42019011	Dɛ ba dɛ tel Jerusalam, asɛ nɛra la ɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ Korowii Kora dii tɔpere la denɔ dɛɛ ba bala. Baa dɛ no o be la, Yeesu berɔ bol waa sɛgla ne ba be.
42019012	O ŋɔ, "Koobie bɛlee fa lole dɛɛ ba bojaŋ bwɛɛ bɛl ta kaala bá ka chego kora ásɛ o ba dɛ ba ɛ kooro.
42019013	Waa dɛ ba kaala la, o yerɛ o bonɔɔna fi, dɛ tɛ bɛlbwa suugaswɛm bwe, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ bá kpɔ dɛɛ di bona ka tel gɛ saŋ waa ba.
42019014	"Waa kaala la, o waa ta o bwɛɛ tena tea toorɛ, asɛ ba tomɛ toroma bá tiu dɛ ka ŋɔ, 'Yaa baa nɔ nyin kɛ o ɛ ya kooro.'
42019015	"Kɛ ane a bwa o dɔ o kora la, dɛ laa berɛ ba. Waa bala la, o gelɔ ba yerɛ o bonɔɔna waa tɛɛ ba suuga la tɛo, ásɛ o na suuga baa dɔa.
42019016	Sitɔte la aa bala la, o ŋɔ nomoa la be ŋɔ, 'Nomoa, suugaswɛm bwe haa kpɔa tɛ mɛ la, n kpɔɔ di bona dɛ dɔ suugaswɛm bwea fi dɛ ja onɔ la haa kpɔa tɛ mɛ la ta.'
42019017	Anee nomoa la ŋɔ, 'Jam, bonɔndɛɛge, he ɛ wa! Gɛ haa di kasinteŋ tamaa nɔ ta nɔ, mɛɛ geloo he nyiŋi bwɛɛre fi ta.'
42019018	"Belaa bonɔn-nɛɛte ba, dɛ ba ŋɔ o dɔɔ la be ŋɔ, 'Nomoa, n dɔ suugaswɛm bwea anue dɛ ja onɔ la haa kpɔa tɛ mɛ la ta.'
42019019	Anee nomoa la ŋɔ o ge be ŋɔ, 'Mɛɛ geloo he nyiŋi bwɛɛre anue ta.'
42019020	"Asɛ bɛl ge ba dɛ ba ŋɔ, 'Nomoa, suugaswɛm bwe haa tɛ mɛ laanee la. N kpɔɔ vɔwɛ duku ta dɛ kpɔ sɔh.
42019021	N ɔmɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he bambile kpegri, he ɛ nɛn haa dɛ kpɔ kwaa aa wola he kwaa ɛɛ, dɛɛ komɛ kwaa haa wola due.'
42019022	Anee nomoa la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, 'Bonɔnchɔge kohona! He gbagba nyoa wobol taa mɛɛ ba chega dɛ pae bolchɔge. He jemɔ kɛ n ɛ bambikpeg te, dɛɛ kpɔ kwaa aa wola n kwaa ɛɛ, dɛɛ komɛ kwaa maa wola due kenɛ?
42019023	Aah ɛrɛɛ haa wola n suuga kpɔe ka cheg mɛ baŋge ásɛ n fee ba lɛ a ne a nee bwa nɔ?'
42019024	"Belaa nomoa la ŋɔ bonɔɔna la kar baa chegɛ o be la be ŋɔ, 'Hé laa suuga la lɛ o be dɛ kpɔ ka tɛ bonɔɔ la waa dɔ suugaswɛm bwea fi dɛ ja o kon ta la.'
42019025	Anee ba ŋɔ ba dɔɔ la be ŋɔ, 'Nomoa, kɛ o dɔ suugaswɛm bwea fi ɔɔ?'
42019026	Asɛ nomoa la ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, 'Hé gel n ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, nomɛlbwa waa dɔ kwaa la, baa berɔɔ jao ane ja. Nomɛlbwa ge waa wola komɛlbwa dɔe la, tama kwara waa dɔa la, aa le o nɔn taa.
42019027	N dɔma la baa ŋɔa baa men nyin kɛ n ɛ ba kooro la ge, hé lag ba ba n siwi ta bonɔ dɛ ba kpoo ba!' "
42019028	Yeesu aa bol a gɛ waa nɔ tonɛ la, o tɔ sie ba nɛɛ dɛɛ kaa Jerusalam.
42019029	Baa dɛ tel Bɛtfej ne Bɛtani bwɛɛre ta, Ɔlevere Bwe bɔr la, o tomɛ o habɔteŋra la bini banɛ ŋɔ bá tɔ sie,
42019030	dɛ ŋɔ, "Hé la bwɛɛ nɔ waa lɔ he sie nɔ ta. Haa dɛɛ tel bela la, hɛɛ nao kɛŋɔ baa vɔwɛ keego bie bɛl baa wola o ta soge bwa. Hé lao pur dɛ kpɔɔ ba.
42019031	Dɛ nomɛl bɔɔ heyaa ŋɔ bɔkwaa hɛɛ puru dɛ ɛ aa, hé ŋɔ naate be ŋɔ he Dɔɔ dɛ nyinu."
42019032	Asɛ ba la, dɛ ka na gɛ waa la tenten Yeesu aa ŋɔ ba be la.
42019033	Baa dɛ pur keego la la, kontena bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Bɔkwaa hɛɛ pur keego bie nɔ dɛ́ ka ɛɔ?"
42019034	Anee ba ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ dɛ nyinu."
42019035	Asɛ ba kpɔ keego la ba tɛ Yeesu, dɛ kpɔ ba yale darawe o nyaŋ ta dɛ gɔɔ Yeesu so o ta.
42019036	Waa soge keego la ta baa kaa la, nɛra pa ba yale pa ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ tɛo jirima, asɛ o kpɔ keego la valɛ a ta.
42019037	Baa wili Ɔlevere Bwe la dɛɛ tel Jerusalam la, Yeesu habɔɔ nɛra la bwa sie lɛo, baa kpɛɛ Korowii kohona kɛŋɔ waa ɛ nyokpowaa ba na la.
42019038	Dɛ ba dɛ ŋɔ, "Korowii jam! Korowii swee andɛɛga tɛ Kooro waa chegɛ o sɔn ta dɛɛ ba nɔ, dɛ gel nyundua tena bwa bwara sɔɔh ba. Ó jam!"
42019039	Bela la, dɛ Farisii tena lɔ nɛnlaa la bini. Ba ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, kah he habɔɔ nɛra nɔ ásɛ ba hel!"
42019040	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Dɛ ba helaa, bwea kwara ɛɛ mooluu."
42019041	Baa dɛ ba Jerusalam tela la, Yeesu nyiŋi bwɛɛ la dɛ wi tɛ o tena.
42019042	O wio ŋɔ, "Alako he fe jemɛ gɛ haa ɛ dɛ dɔ bosɔɔhna fini! Korowii kpɔɔ sɔh heya, anomanta haa won jemɛ.
42019043	Tɔpere bɛl ɛɛ bao asɛ he dɔma ba ma danjwɛɛ bar he bwɛɛ nɔ, dɛ tɔ heyaa do haa wola won le.
42019044	Baa wuruu jo he bwɛɛ nɔ ta, dɛ pagre he deene dɛ kpoo heya. Baa kuugi he deene bwaa buruburu ken, bwe beŋkpoŋ kwara aa wola ka dɛ dawɛ o dɔŋ ta kpa. Anɔ bwa ɛɛ ɛo, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he lɛɛ tɔpere aa tela la, he ta sie doe."
42019045	Asɛ Yeesu la Korowii Dea dɛ den kaa doŋi nɛra baa kpɔ bela berɛ bona dibɔr la.
42019046	O ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Korowii Tɔn bini o ŋɔ, 'N dea ɛ Korowii soŋebɔr,' gɛɛ he te berɛ kpɔ bela berɛ ŋwɛɛra sɔɔhbɔr aa?"
42019047	Dɛ o dɛ la Korowii Dea tɔpere bɛlbwa dɛ kaa bagle wa. Dɛ Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema ne nɛra la bini nomonome la dɛ nyinu dɛ́ kpo,
42019048	kɛ ba ta gɛ baa ɛ dɛ dɔɔ nae, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ o wobol dɛ do nɛra bwa som, baa wola won kaa dɛ gel o wobol la, dɛ che dɛɛ no.
42020001	Awola bɛl dɛ Yeesu lɔ Korowii Dea dɛɛ bagle nɛra wa, dɛɛ bol Amanesoma la, asɛ Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema ne nɛra la bini nomonome ba,
42020002	dɛ ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Umee tɛɛ ŋwɛnɛ ŋɔ hé ɛ gɛ waa nɔ haa dɛ ɛ nɔɔ? Umee tɛɛ kpegri te nɔ?"
42020003	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé gel n bɔɔ heyaa webeŋkpoŋ. Hé bag mɛ,
42020004	Jɔn kpegri waa dɔa dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ sɔ nɛra nee la, Korowiirii tɛo waa, kɛ nɛnee?"
42020005	Waa bɔɔ ba gɛ la, dɛ ba gbo dɛ tɔŋle dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ŋɔe yɔ? Dɛ ya ŋɔ a le Korowii be naa, wɛɛ bɔɔ yaa waa aa bala ya ta Jɔn yaradae.
42020006	Dɛ ya berɔ ŋɔ nɛn bee a le ge aa, nɛra nɔ baa lɔ bonɔ nɔ bwa ɛɛ fogre yaa bwea dɛ kpoo yaa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba te bwa jemɔ kɛŋɔ Jɔn fa ɛ Korowii keame."
42020007	Anee ba ŋɔ, "Yaa jemɛ bela kpegri la aa lea."
42020008	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "N ge aa kpegri maa dɔa dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ ɛ waa nɔ leebɔree bagle he be."
42020009	Yeesu kpɔ sɛgla bol waa bagle nɛra la, dɛ ŋɔ, "Baa bɛlee fa lole dɛɛ parɛ kwaane baa kpɔa dɛɛ daa sen. O kpɔ nɛra báa ɛ koo la toma, a koma telaa, ba dɔ ba bɔr. A habɔɔ la, o kpɔ koo la tɛɛ ba bá nyiŋi o ta dɛɛ tɛo, dɛ kaa harɛ bɛl ta, dɛ ka bigri.
42020010	Kwaa la koma saŋ aa baa tel la, o tomɛ o bonɔɔ bɛl ŋɔ ó ka lɛ o dibɔr ba tɛo. Belaa nɛra la lɔɔ bonɔɔ la dɛ doŋu, ba ta on komɛlbwa tɛɛ o kaa.
42020011	Belaa koo te la berɛ tomɛ bonɔn-nɛɛte, asɛ ba lɔɔ o ge dɛ ɛo wilewile ken, dɛ doŋu o kaa, ba ta on komɛlbwa tɛɛ.
42020012	Anee koo te la berɛ tomɛ o bonɔn-tooro te ja, asɛ nɛra la pira o ge dɛ kpɔɔ ta koo la baŋ.
42020013	"Belaa koo te la ŋɔ, 'Ɛrɛɛ ń ɛ jaɔ? Mɛɛ tomɛ n bibeŋkpoŋ maa dɛ nyin o waa nɔɔ. O te ba nao baa heehroo!'
42020014	Nɛra la aa na o bie la la, ba den ŋɔ, 'Yoowa, baa la gbagba bie la. O mɛɛ toole naa, on dɛɛ ba o kpanjogo dii. Hé gel ya kpoo ásɛ dɛ o mɛɛ baa sewaa, dɛ kwaa la ɛ ya kwa.'
42020015	Anee ba lawɛ bie la dɛ kpoo dɛ kpɔɔ vigri koo la baŋ." Anee Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ koo te nɔ dɛ ba ba ɛɛ yɔ?
42020016	Wɛɛ ba kpoo a gɛ nɛra laanee dɛ kpɔ koo la do nɛnfala nɔn ta." Nɛra la aa no gɛ la, ba ŋɔ, "Korowii ɛɛ la a ne bojaŋ!"
42020017	Yeesu nyiŋ ba dɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Amɔ ɛrɛ tenee hɛɛ no Korowii Tɔn bini waa mun ɔ? 'Bwe la mamaala faa vɛoh dɛ liiru konsala laanee baa lawɛ dea kpoŋe la.'
42020018	Nomɛlbwa waa chole Bwe la waa lawɛ dea la kpoŋe la ta la, wɛɛ kuuguu. O berɔ le ba le nomɛlbwa nɛɛ ge aa, wɛɛ pweremoo."
42020019	Dɛ Tɔn Jerema la ne Sɔfonomonome la siwi swɛɛrɔ kɛŋɔ baa lawɔɔ bug la ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ ba jemɔ ŋɔ banee o sɛgle. Kɛ dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ nɛnlaa la.
42020020	Anomanta ba sie lɔ o nɛɛ baa kpaahno dɛ́ dɔɔ. Ba tɛ nɛra bane suuga, dɛ tom ba ŋɔ bá ka hagre Yeesu bela webɔɔre ne, a do kɛŋɔ siswɛm waa baa bɔɔ, ásɛ dɛ dɔɔ lawɛ, dɛ kpɔɔ do ba harɛ la Room nomoa nɔn ta.
42020021	A gɛ nɛra la ba Yeesu be dɛ ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ he dɛ bol kasinteŋ. Haa nɛra sie nyiŋe mɔɔ dɛɛ bol wa. Korowii ŋwɛnɛɛ hɛɛ bagle nɛra kasinteŋ ne ásɛ ya won jemɛ gɛ waa dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ ya ɛ.
42020022	Webeŋkpoŋii yaa nyin kɛŋɔ ya jemɛ. Onee kɛŋɔ ya mmarare dɛ tɛ yaa ŋwɛnɛ kɛ ya bɔ lampoo dɛɛ tɛ Room Koojen Siisa kɛɛ ya bɛ dɛɛ bɔɔ?"
42020023	Dɛ Yeesu jemɛ ba webɔɔre la mun, dɛ ŋɔ,
42020024	"Hé kpɔ suuga bwe ba n na." Anee ba kpɔ bɛl ba, asɛ o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ume nyu ne o sɔnee dawɛ o ta nɔ?" Asɛ ba chaŋe ŋɔ Koojen Siisaa.
42020025	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Oo. Amɔ hé kpɔ kwaa aa ɛ Koojen Siisa kwaa tɛo, dɛ kpɔ kwaa aa ɛ Korowii kwaa la tɛ Korowii."
42020026	Ba ta wone dɔ wobɛlbwa dɛ́ che a ta lawɔ nɛra siwi ta, asɛ ba nyoa kpo ba che surumm ken.
42020027	Belaa Saduki tena bane ba Yeesu be. Dɛ Saduki tena la aa yarada kɛŋɔ kerekere nɛra ɛɛ ir seo taa.
42020028	Ba baa bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Nomoa, Mosis fa chwerɛ mmara bɛl tɛ yaa ŋɔ, dɛ baa sewɔ gel o haah dɛ ba ta bii dɔe yaa, a chɛ kɛŋɔ o nime kɛɛ o dɔɔ kpɔ haah la mo dɛ logle bii, ásɛ a gɛ bii la ɛ lale la bii.
42020029	Hahbeŋkpoŋ bibaala banuanɛɛ fa lole, asɛ binomoa la mo haah dɛ sewɛ, dɛ o ta bie dɔe.
42020030	Asɛ onɔ la waa teŋɛ binomoa la nɛɛ la kpɔ haah la mo dɛ ba sewɛ, dɛ o ge ne o ta bie lolɛ.
42020031	Asɛ bitooro te la ge mo haah la dɛ sewɛ, dɛ o ta bie dɔe. Gɛ tentenee ba bwa mo haah la ka lɔ nyoa ta dɛ ba serewe, dɛ ba ta bii dɔe.
42020032	A habɔɔ la, haah la ge baa sewɛ.
42020033	Aah taraken dɛ nɛra bwa seo ta ira tɔpere la baa tel asɛ bibaala la bwa iraa, ba bini umee dɛɛ ba haah la jaa ɛɛ yɔ?"
42020034	Anee Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Fini nɔɔ baala ne haahna ɛɛ mo dɔŋa nɔ,
42020035	kɛ nɛra baa dɛ ba seo ta ira dɛ won dɔ bɔr ja Korowii Kora la ta la te aa haahna moe ba, baa jaranar ge yala ba.
42020036	Baa sewɛ kpa bwa. Baa doo kɛŋɔ Korowii toroma baa lɔ nyundua la, dɛ ɛ Korowii bii, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba iro le seo ta.
42020037	Mosis gba fa bol seo ta ira nɔ waa kaih ken. Hé nyiŋi bela waa chwerɛ dawii fuih wa, dɛ bol Korowii waa ŋɔ onee Abraham Korowii ne Aesek Korowii ne Jekɔb Korowii la.
42020038	Lala laa dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii, weeraa dɛɛ tomɔ. Korowii te be, nomɛlbwa ɛ wee."
42020039	Asɛ Tɔn Jerema la bane ŋɔ, "Nomoa, he bola a ŋwɛnɛ ta!"
42020040	Ba ta wone bɔɔro wobɛlbwa kpa.
42020041	Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Aah Devid gbabir bol waa Korowii Kpɛɛra Tɔn la bobɛl ŋɔ, 'N Naa Korowii ŋɔ n Dɔɔ be ŋɔ ó so nomombɔr o dig ta ka tel kɛŋɔ waa ba o dɔma ne harɛ asɛ o tigri ba nɛ.' Waa bol gɛ nɔ, dɛ ɛrɛ waa ba ŋɔ Devid naa dɛ ɛ Kristo la nɔɔ?
42020044	Devid faa dɛ yerɔ o Dɔɔ nɔ, aah dɛ ɛrɛɛ Kristo la berɛ ɛ dɛ ɛ Devid naa ɔ?"
42020045	Yeesu chegɛ nɛra la bwa siwi ta dɛ ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ,
42020046	"Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi Tɔn Jerema la kɛrɛdɛ. Ban yon do laalajena ásɛ nɛra bwa na ba dɛɛ guŋ ba harɛ yawa ta la. Ba dɛ nyin nomombɔra soga cheremi deene ne bela nɛra aa chema dɛɛ di tɔpejena.
42020047	Ba sie begre kwa, dɛ yon kpɔ Korowii soŋa wobojaŋa ne tɔ sie dɛɛ kam kwaa luhaahna deremi. Korowii ɛɛ tɛr ba deŋnee taeh."
42021001	Yeesu aa lɔ Korowii Dea la, o nao kɛŋɔ dɔɔhna ta ba suugare dɛɛ do suuga log bini.
42021002	Belaa luhaah nyaa bɛl ge ba do suuga bwejegre anɛ.
42021003	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, luhaah nyaa nɔ do suugajena dɛ gwaa nɛra nɔ bwa,
42021004	dɛkalkɛŋɔ o dea suuga bwaa o kpɔ ba do log nɔ bini la. Kɛ dɔɔhna nɔ te suuga bini tama baa naa kɛŋɔ a waa aa ba nɛɛ we la, anee ba kpɔ ba do la."
42021005	Belaa Yeesu habɔteŋra la bane ɛɛ bol Korowii Dea la waa o be, gɛ bwea baa kpɔa mao, ne kondɛɛga nɛra aa ɛa tɛ Korowii ba kpɔ kwaa o danjwɛɛ la wer aa doa. Anee Yeesu ŋɔ,
42021006	"Tɔpere bɛl ɛɛ bao asɛ anɔ haa naa nɔ, ba ta ɛɛ pagre a bwaa asɛ bwe beŋkpoŋ bɛlbwa aa wola lee do dɛ chɔŋɛ o dɔŋ nɛɛ kpa."
42021007	Anee ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Nomoa, saŋ besoo aa ba chiga ɔ? Bɔkwaa dɛɛ ba bagla kɛ gɛ waa nɔ dɛ ba chiga ɔ?"
42021008	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ asɛ nomɛlbwa bɛ heyaa negre. Nɛra pirim ɛɛ kpɔ n sɔnee ba dɛ ba ŋɔ banee men, dɛ ŋɔ tɔpere la telo. He bɛ ba nɛɛ teŋɛ.
42021009	Dɛ he baa no laa yoi waa ne harɛ vuuga waa bobɛlbwa naa, he bɛ ɔmɛ. A chɛ kɛ gɛ waa nɔ bwa chig. Kɛ dɛ wobɛlbwa jaga la ta tele mɔɔ."
42021010	Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ, "Harɛre ne ba dɔŋa harɛre ɛɛ yo laalee, asɛ koranar ne ba dɔŋa koranar ge yo dɔŋa laa.
42021011	Harɛ ɛɛ jigri bobɛlaa taeh, asɛ lɔr ne weela bwa soosiwi ba bobɛla. Hɛɛ na ɔmewaa aa wola balɛ bwa nyunduaa.
42021012	"Mɔɔ gɛ waa nɔ bwa chig la, baa tɔ sie larawe heya, dɛ ɛ heyaa hɔhɔrɔwa, dɛ lawɛ heyaa la cheremi deene bini dɛ ka bol he waa dɛ do heyaa dea. Baa koh n waa dɛ lawɛ heyaa ka che nomonome ne koranar siini.
42021013	Belaa hɛɛ ba ŋwɛnɛ dɔe dɛ bol Amanesoma la bag ba.
42021014	Ba baa lawɛ heya aa, he bɛ gel waa haa ka bol la hiah heya.
42021015	Menee dɛɛ ba n tɛ heyaa waa haa ka bol la, dɛ tɛ heyaa wejema asɛ he dɔma bɛ won di bɔ heyaa kɛɛ dɛ tɔŋle heya.
42021016	He mɛɛnanar ne nyare, ne he dɔɔranar ne nimanar, ne he lolanar ne daamanar ɛɛ le heyaa tɛ ásɛ ba kpoo he bane.
42021017	N nomanta nɛra ɛɛ hah heyaa.
42021018	Mɛɛ cha heyaa asɛ he nyumpon beŋkpoŋ kwara aa harɛɛ le.
42021019	He lawɛ bambile aa, hɛɛ dɔ he nyuu.
42021020	"He baa na kɛŋɔ soojare bar Jerusalam cheme aa, amɔ te hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ o pagra telo.
42021021	Amɔ a chɛ kɛŋɔ nɛra baa lɔ Judia harɛ gɛ saŋ la chwa kaa bwea dor dɛ ka sɔh. Nɛra baa lɔ Jerusalam la chɛ kɛŋɔ ba le warane, asɛ bɛlbwa waa wola toole bwɛɛ la bini a gɛ saŋ la bɛ o bini jo.
42021022	A gɛ saŋee Korowii ɛɛ ba o nɛra deŋne tɛra, asɛ waa Korowii Tɔn la aa bagla la bwa ɛ kpela.
42021023	Tekpoŋra ne haahna baa dɔ bii baa ɔr la, bwɛɛlɛ! Dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛra ɛɛ na wahala harɛ nɔ ta kohonaa, asɛ Korowii baah di ba nɛɛ o tɛr ba deŋne.
42021024	Baa kpɔ kerii kpoo bane, asɛ dɛ larawe bane dɛ kpɔ ba kaa harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwa, asɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ ɛ Jerusalam bwa posaposa ken ka tel kɛŋɔ ba ge saŋ aa ba kaa.
42021025	"Hɛɛ na nyokpowaa wee ne korobie ne weweela taa. Harɛ ta ge, mpo ɛɛ jigruu dɛɛ lɔ nehaŋma kohona, asɛ nɛra bwa ɔmɛ, ba bwara yɔr.
42021026	Nɛra bambile ee teŋoo kohona, ba lii waa aa dɛ ba bala la wa, ba hwaahge, dɛkalkɛ Korowii doa bwa ɛɛ yiiguu dɛ chɔg.
42021027	Belaa baa ba n Nɛn Bie nae kɛŋɔ maa lɔ baama ta dɛɛ ba kpegri ne jirima a dɔŋ aa wola toole ne.
42021028	Dɛ gɛ waa nɔ baa pa mun dɛɛ ɛ aa, hé kpɔ he te dɛɛ kpa, dɛkalkɛ he lɛɛ tɔpere la telo."
42021029	Yeesu berɔ kpɔ sɛgla bol waa ba be ŋɔ, "Hé ta sie nyiŋi pur daa ne daa aa kaa nɔ dɛ na.
42021030	O ba dɛ fogre aa, hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ bɔwɔb saŋ telo.
42021031	Gɛ tentenee dɛ he ba dɛ na a gɛ waa nɔ naa, hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii Kora la dii telo.
42021032	"Hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ fini nɔ nɛra bwa laa dɛɛ ba serewa mɔɔ waa nɔ bwa chig.
42021033	Nyundua ne harɛ ɛɛ chɔgoo, kɛ n waa la te aa begre bwa. Aa che gɛɛ saŋ bɛlbwa.
42021034	"Hé nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ! He bɛ gel bodia kondikwaa dii ne sen nyɔe ne he weliira gwaa he nɛ, asɛ tɔpere la bɛ heyaa ba pigri kɛŋɔ nɛn yon gbarɛ bel la,
42021035	dɛkalkɛ o bala tɔpere la ɛɛ pigri nɛra baa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwaa.
42021036	Hé gel he sie chɔ harɛ hɛɛ kpa dɛɛ soŋe Korowii tɔpere bɛlbwa dɛ́ dɔ bokpega dɛ le a gɛ waa aa chig la nyoa, asɛ dɛ won che n Nɛn Bie sie."
42021037	Dɛ tɔpere bɛlbwaa Yeesu bol waa dɛɛ bag ba Korowii Dea, asɛ bɔr baa jo aa, o yon kaa bwe bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Ɔlevere Bwe la doa dɛ ka chɔ.
42021038	Asɛ tɔɔ perɔ chɔmbibi aa, o yon fel ba Korowii Dea bela, asɛ nɛra yon la o be dɛ́ ka no o waa la.
42022001	Aa ka tama ba tɔpejen baa dɛ yerɔ Galekaa baa kpɔ paanoo baa wola iisi a ta do dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ diu la tel la,
42022002	dɛ Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema la dɛ nyin ŋwɛnɛ bɛl dɛ́ che o ta kpo Yeesu, kɛ dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ bela tena la.
42022003	Belaa Bɔnsam ba so Judas baa dɛ yerɔ Eskareɔt la nɛ. Dɛ o ɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la bɛl.
42022004	O la Sɔfonomonome ne nɛra baa dɛ daah Korowii Dea bela la nomonome be, o ne ba ka vɔrɔwe gɛ waa dɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ́ le Yeesu tɛɛ ba.
42022005	Ba sie lɛo taeh, ba bagɔ nyoa ŋɔ dɛ o wono gel ba dɔɔ waa, baa tɛo suugaa.
42022006	O sɛh dɛɛ nyin saŋ waa wera nɛnlaa la aa wola Yeesu be do ásɛ o leo tɛɛ ba.
42022007	Ba tɔpere baa dɛ kpo pebiiri dɛ kpɔ di Galekaa la telo,
42022008	asɛ Yeesu tomɛ Pita ne Jɔn dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé kaa dɛ ka ɛ Galekaa kondikwaa ásɛ ya ba di."
42022009	Anee ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Leperaa hɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ ya ɛa chegɔ?"
42022010	O ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Haa dɛɛ jo bwɛɛ la ta la, hɛɛ nao kɛŋɔ baa bɛl chegɛ vii ne ne. Hé teŋɛ o nɛɛ kaa dem waa dɛ kaa o ta la ta,
42022011	asɛ dɛ ka ŋɔ dem te la be ŋɔ, 'Ya nomoa ŋɔ dea haa dɛ ba kpɔe tɛ o ne o habɔteŋra ásɛ ba ba so o bini dɛ di Galekaa kondikwaa la sɛ?'
42022012	Wɛɛ bagle heyaa abrɔsane doa dea bɛl waa kwaa o bini dɛ kpɔ kane ne teeburre cheg bela. Belaa hɛɛ ba kwaa la ɛɛ cheg."
42022013	Pita ne Jɔn laŋɔ dɛ ka na wobɛlbwa gɛ tenten Yeesu aa ŋɔ ba be la, asɛ ba ɛ kondikwaa la cheg bela.
42022014	Bɔr aa magra kɛŋɔ bá di Galekaa kondikwaa la, Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la kaa so dɛɛ ba kwaa dii.
42022015	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "A gɛ Galekaa kondikwaa nɔ waa fa lɔ n bambile bini wubwa, asɛ mɛɛ nyin kɛ n ne he dia mɔɔ ba ɛɛ mɛ hɔhɔrɔwa.
42022016	N gelɔ hɛɛ no kɛŋɔ maa a gɛ kondikwaa nɔ anee di kpa, nemenɛ waa Galekaa nɔ aa chega tɛ la aa ɛa Korowii Kora la ta."
42022017	Belaa Yeesu kpɔ numol ne sen dɛ jam Korowii dɛ kpɔ tɛ o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "Hé nyɔ ka tɛ dɔŋa."
42022018	Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Fini habɔɔ, maa sen nɔ anee nyɔ kpa ka tel gɛ saŋ Korowii aa ba di kora."
42022019	Asɛ o berɛ kpɔ paanoo dɛ jam Korowii dɛ mɔne tɛɛ ba, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Anɔ chegɔ tɛ n bo-ol maa koh he waa dɛ kpɔ tɛ nɛra bá kpo mɛ. Hɛ́ɛ ɛ gɛ dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ lii mɛ."
42022020	Gɛ tentenee baa di kwaa la tonɛ la, o kpɔ numol ne sen la tɛɛ ba dɛ ŋɔ, "Sen nɔɔ chega tɛ n chal maa dɛ ba he waa koeh dɛ fuge ta. Aa ɛ fɔofalee dɛ chɔ Korowii ne nɛwɛnyini baah ta."
42022021	O berɔ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé no! Naate waa lee mɛ tɛ la lɔ bonɔ n ne o pɛ nɔn dɛɛ di kwa.
42022022	Gɛ Korowii aa bagla la taa aa ba chega n Nɛn Bie la sewɛ, kɛ naate waa lee mɛ tɛ ba kpo mɛ la, ó bwɛɛlɛ."
42022023	Ate dɛ ba dɛ bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Ya bini umee su baah dɛɛ ba ó ɛ gɛ waa nɔ nɔɔ?"
42022024	Webegra berɔ ba chole o habɔteŋra la baah ta kɛ ba bini umee ɛ ba nomoa ɔ?
42022025	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Nɛnhɔɔhra baa wola Korowii tomɛ la, ba koranaree yon dɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ baa di kpegri ba nɛra nɛ, ba nomonjena gee nyin baa yer ba nomonjena.
42022026	He te ne gɛ waa la jaŋne. He bini nomoa la, ó ɛ o te kɛ bechala, asɛ ónɔ la waa dɛɛ nyiŋi he nɛɛ la ge ɛ o te kɛŋɔ somanji.
42022027	Nɛn waa soga o dɔŋ ɛɛ bɔne kwaa ne naate waa dɛ bɔne kwa, ba bini umee ɛ nomoa ɔ? Naate waa soga la laa aa? Kɛ n te aa lɔ he bini nɔ, n ɛ n te kɛ somanji.
42022028	Heyaa ja n nɛɛ n wahala bwa bini.
42022029	Anomanta n dɛ tɛ heyaa kora hé di, gɛ n Mɛɛ aa tɛ mɛ la.
42022030	N ne hɛɛ pɛ nɔnee di kwaa n kora ta, asɛ he so kookane ta dɛ bol Israel deene fi dɛ banɛ la bwa waa dɛ pa bole.
42022031	"Seemɔn, no! Bɔnsam soŋe Korowii ŋwɛnɛ dɛ́ daah heyaa dɛ́ fe vuugi heyaa sagasaga ken.
42022032	Kɛ n soŋe Korowii tɛɛ asɛ he yarada nyoa bɛ sɔɔh. Dɛ he berɔ berɛ he liire ba n be naa, hé lawɛ he bala la bá do wɔrɔbe."
42022033	Anee Pita chaŋo ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, n chegɔ kɛ bá do n nee dea. Seo kwaraa yaa, n ne hɛɛ sewɔɔ."
42022034	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "Ae, Pita! Jabal logle ne sii fini dɛ he tɔɔh kera atoro ŋɔ haa men jemɛ."
42022035	Asɛ Yeesu bɔɔ o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "N faa tomɛ heyaa ŋɔ hé ka bol Amanesoma la, dɛ ŋɔ he bɛ suuga kpɔ, he bɛ bone ne naŋgawa kpɔ la, komɛl nya heya aa?" Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Komɛlbwa sese ta yaa nyae."
42022036	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Name te nomɛlbwa waa dɔ suuga kɛɛ bone la, ó kpɔ, asɛ nómɛlbwa waa wola dɔmkon dɔe la ge yog o yal dɛ kpɔ yawɛ bɛl.
42022037	Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, 'Ba kuro ja wechɔg-ɛɛra bini.' N waa baa chwera la bwa dɛ ba chiga taraken."
42022038	Belaa o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ, tokobie anɛɛ la." Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "A magrɔ."
42022039	O le bwɛɛ la ta dɛ kaa Ɔlevere Bwe la ta, gɛ o yon dɛɛ ɛ la, asɛ o habɔteŋra la teŋɛ o nɛɛ kaa.
42022040	Baa tel bela la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hɛ́ɛ soŋe Korowii asɛ Bɔnsam bɛ won negre heya."
42022041	Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, o le ba jwɛɛh dɛ kaa sie tama, dɛ ka guŋi dɛɛ soŋe Korowii,
42022042	dɛ ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, hɛɛ sɛoh waa, bɛ gel n na a gɛ wahala haa ŋɔa ń na nɔ. Kɛ ɛ he tetoora dɛ gel n tetoora."
42022043	Asɛ nyundua torome den ba o be dɛ ba doo gbemba.
42022044	O tea bini aa chɔga kohona la, o soŋe Korowii siswɛm ne, asɛ bɔwɔb le o nɛɛ dɛ kor dɛɛ lee kɛŋɔ chal ken.
42022045	Waa soŋe Korowii tonɛ dɛ berɛ la o habɔteŋra la be la, lokua kohona nomanta dɛ ba chɔɔge doromi.
42022046	Anee o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he chɔɔge nɔɔ? Hé ir dɛ soŋe Korowii asɛ Bɔnsam bɛ won negre heya."
42022047	Yeesu nyoa taa lɔ waa ta wɛɛ bol la, dɛ Judas waa ɛ o habɔteŋra la bini bɛl la kaa tɔ nɛnlaa bane sie dɛ ba ba ne Yeesu be dɛ fe gbaaro pɛl o bambile dɛ mo o lwɛɛma.
42022048	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Lwɛɛma moe nee hɛɛ ba n Nɛn Bie la lee dɛ tɛ aa?"
42022049	O habɔteŋra o ne baa lɔ bela la aa na waa aa dɛ ba bala la, ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, yá kpɔ ya tokobie nɔ ya ne ba yo aa?"
42022050	Asɛ ba bini bɛl kpɔ o tokobi dɛ ŋwɛnɛ Sɔfore Nomoa bonɔɔ dig deŋne dɛ laa cha.
42022051	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Hé gel," dɛ kpɔ nɔn ka lege bonɔɔ la deŋne la bug la ta dɛ chaoh.
42022052	Belaa Yeesu bɔɔ Sɔfonomonome ne nɛra baa dɛ daah Korowii Dea nomoa ne ba bwɛɛ nomonome baa bala dɛ́ ba lawɔ la ŋɔ, "Ŋwɛɛree men he kpoŋe tokobie ne gule dɛ́ ba lag mɛ naa?
42022053	N ne haa lɔ Korowii Dea tɔpere bɛlbwa la, ɛrɛɛ haa wola men lawɛ bela ɔ? Taraken nɔ bɔr aa bira nɔ he dɔ ŋwɛnɛ kɛ he ba lag mɛ."
42022054	Ba lawɔ dɛ kpɔɔ dɛɛ kaa Sɔfore Nomoa dem, dɛ Pita ne ba baah tɛrɔ, asɛ o teŋɛ ba nɛ.
42022055	Dɛ ba mar nii dem baah bela, asɛ Pita ka pu gɛ nɛra la so a jwɛh.
42022056	Pita aa soge nii la jwɛɛh la, Sɔfore Nomoa la tolo bɛl nao, dɛ nyiŋu jeiih ken, dɛ ŋɔ, "Yeesu habɔteŋree baa nɔ."
42022057	Anee Pita tɔh pelepele ken dɛ ŋɔ tolo la be ŋɔ, "Maa on jemɛ kwara!"
42022058	Aa bera la sie tama ken la, baa bɛl na Pita dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ba bini bɛlee he gba!" Anee o ŋɔ, "Akai, n ta ba bini jae!"
42022059	A habɔɔ dɛ ɛ dɔŋhwere beŋkpoŋ la, baa bɛl ge berɔ dalwe Pita jae waa ja Yeesu nɛɛ la ta ja, dɛ ŋɔ, "Galilia tee baa nɔ, anomanta tɔŋla bɛlbwa toole kɛŋɔ o ta Yeesu nɛɛ jae!"
42022060	Belaa Pita ŋɔ baa la be ŋɔ, "Maa waa haa dɛ bol nɔ bini jemɛ!" O nyoa taa lɔ waa la ta wɛɛ bol la jabal den si.
42022061	Asɛ Yeesu ke nyiŋi Pita siwi ta, asɛ o lii waa Yeesu faa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ jabal logle ne sii dɛ o tɔɔh kera atoro ŋɔ waa on jemɛ la.
42022062	Ate Pita le buse dɛ ka wi kɛrɛdɛ.
42022063	Nɛra baa lawɛ Yeesu la mugli o baah dɛ lɔɔro.
42022064	Ba kpɔ kon vɔwɛ o sie dɛɛ tɔɔ kande dɛ ŋɔ, "Dɛɛ jemɛ, umee lɔe nɔɔ?"
42022065	Dɛ bolo nɛnhɛlwaa kohona.
42022066	Tɔ aa pera la, ba kpɔ Yeesu ka cheme Juda tena nomonome baa dɛ bol waa dɛ pa bole ne Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema sie,
42022067	dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛ henee Kristo Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la aa, bol ya no!" Anee o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Dɛ n ŋɔ he be gɛ noo, haa men yarada,
42022068	n berɔ bɔɔ heyaa waane ge oo, haa men chaŋe.
42022069	Le taraken dɛɛ kaa la, n Nɛn Bie la ɛɛ so nomombɔree Korowii waa dɔ kpegri bwa dig ta."
42022070	Asɛ ba bwa ŋɔ, "Amɔ he ɛ Korowii Bie kɛɛ?" Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Anee he bol la."
42022071	Belaa ba ŋɔ, "Amɔ o gbagba aa bola nɔ, danseɛ besoo yá berɛ dɛɛ nyin jaɔ?"
42023001	Nɛra la tagɛ ba kane ta dɛ ir, ba kpɔɔ la harɛ nomoa Paelet be,
42023002	dɛ ka haŋɛ o nyoa ŋɔ, "Ya lawɛ baa nɔ kɛ waa dɛ chɔg ya harɛ. O dɛ do nɛra dochɔga ŋɔ ba bɛ lampoo bɔ dɛɛ tɛ Room Koojen Siisa kpa, dɛ berɛ dɛɛ ɛ o te ya Juda tena kooro Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ yaa nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ geloo o ba ba lɛ yaa la."
42023003	Anee Paelet bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Henee Juda tena kooro ɛ?" O ŋɔ, "Anee he bol la."
42023004	Asɛ Paelet ŋɔ Sɔfonomonome ne nɛnlaa baa cheme o sie la be ŋɔ, "N ta wechɔga baa nɔ aa ɛa nae."
42023005	Dɛ nɛra la nyoa ta kpegri, ba bol ane dɛɛ dawɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "O kpɔ o webagla dɛɛ chɔg nɛra liire Juda tena harɛ bwa ta taraken. Galilia harɛ taa o pa mun, dɛ kpɔ ba le bonɔ!"
42023006	Paelet aa no gɛ la, o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Galilia tee yaa?"
42023007	Baa bola ŋɔ Galilia tee la, dɛ Hɛrɔd waa ɛ Galilia kooro gɛ saŋ la ba Jerusalam, asɛ o gel ba kpɔɔ la o be.
42023008	Waa na Yeesu la, dɛ o sie lɛo taeh. Waa no o waa dɛ fe ɛɛ nyinu o ɛ nyokpowaa ó na bigro, anomanta dɛ o dɛ nyinu dɛ́ na.
42023009	Kooro Hɛrɔd bɔɔro waa taeh, asɛ o mwaa o ne.
42023010	Belaa Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema la bol waa takpeg ne dɛɛ dawɛ o nɛ.
42023011	Asɛ Kooro Hɛrɔd ne o soojare ɛɛ mugli o baah dɛɛ mamɔ, dɛ ka kpɔ koowur ba doo dɛ berɛ kpɔɔ ka tɛ Paelet.
42023012	Dɛ Kooro Hɛrɔd ne Paelet faa somɛ, kɛ le awola la, ba kpɔ darame.
42023013	Paelet yerɛ bela tena ne Sɔfonomonome ne bwɛɛ nomonome ba cheme,
42023014	dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Heyaa lawɛ baa nɔ ba n be dɛ ŋɔ o dɛ do nɛra dochɔga ŋɔ bá lɛ gaeh harɛ nɔ ta. N bɔɔro a bini he bwa siwi ta bonɔ dɛ na kɛŋɔ o ta wechɔga ɛɛ. Kpɔe he kpɔ waa la dɛɛ dawɔ.
42023015	Gɛɛ Kooro Hɛrɔd ge aa wola wechɔga bɛlbwa o nɛɛ nae dɛ berɛ kpɔɔ ba tɛ yaa. Wobɛlbwa ta baglɛ kɛŋɔ yá kpoo.
42023016	Kɛ mɛɛ geloo ba lɔɔro bampɔrɔ ŋwɛɛra ne dɛ kpɔɔ ta."
42023017	Dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ ba tɔpejen baa dɛ yerɔ Galekaa la we-ɛɛla aa doa la, o telaa, ba yon le wechɔg-ɛɛra baa do ba dea la beŋkpoŋ ta ó kaa.
42023018	Belaa nɛnlaa la bwa kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Kpoo! Le Barabas ta ó kaa!"
42023019	Gɛ Barabas nɔ ɛ nomɛl waa ja waane ba faa ir a ne dɛ vuugi Room Koojen nomonome ba faa dɛ nyiŋi ba harɛ la ta, asɛ dɛ kpoo nɛra ge ja, asɛ ba lawɔ ka do dea.
42023020	Paelet bambile bini la, dɛ o dɛ nyin kɛ o gel Yeesu o kaa, asɛ o berɛ bol waa bagle nɛnlaa la ja.
42023021	Ane a bwa ba ta noɛ, dɛ kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta! Kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta!"
42023022	O bɔɔ ba tooro tena ŋɔ, "Wechɔga besoo o ɛɔ? N ta wechɔga waa ɛa a chɛ kɛ ba kpoo nae! Mɛɛ geloo ba lɔɔro chweema ne dɛ kpɔɔ ta."
42023023	Dɛ gɛ baa dɛ bol la taa ba ta do, dɛ kpɔ takpeg dɛɛ ŋɔ o chɛ kpaara pɛl dagagre ta. Ba nyoa baa gwaa Paelet nɛ,
42023024	asɛ o sɛh gɛ baa dɛ nyin tɛɛ ba, dɛ kpɔ waa la dawɛ Yeesu nɛ.
42023025	Paelet le baa la waa ja waane ba faa ir a ne dɛ vuugi Room Koojen nomonome dɛ kpoo nɛra ba doo dea la ta la o kaa, asɛ dɛ kpɔ Yeesu tɛɛ ba ŋɔ bá ka ɛo gɛ bwa baa dɛ nyin.
42023026	Soojare la aa kpɔɔ dɛɛ kaa dɛ́ ka kpoo la, ba kaa cheme baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Seemɔn. Sairini tee. Dɛ o le koo dɛɛ ba, asɛ soojare la lawɔ dɛ lɛ dagagre Yeesu aa dɛ chegɔɔ la, dɛ gel Seemɔn cheo teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ.
42023027	Dɛ nɛnlaa tenten teŋɛ o nɛ, ba bini bane ɛ haahna dɛ kpɔ nɔɔra dawɛ nyu dɛɛ dooge lɔŋɔre dɛ wi dɛɛ tɛo.
42023028	Asɛ Yeesu berɛ o te dɛ ŋɔ, "Jerusalam haahna, he bɛ wi tɛ mɛ. He wi tɛ he nyuune ne he bii,
42023029	dɛkalkɛŋɔ tɔpere bɛl dɛ ba bala asɛ he ŋɔ, nɛra baa wola lolɛ bwa ne banɔ la baa wola bii ɔrɛ bwa la na som.
42023030	A gɛ saŋee 'nɛra ɛɛ ba bwea ne deŋgarere be ŋɔe ŋɔ á ba tɔ ba nɛɛ bá sɔh a lɔgre.'
42023031	Da-lwɛɛ dɛ fuh aa, dahole te ta pɔeh yaa?"
42023032	Soojare la kpɔ wechɔg-ɛɛra banɛ bane ja o nɛɛ dɛɛ la ka kpoo ba.
42023033	Ba kaa tel bobɛl baa dɛ yerɛ bela Nyuhog Bɔr. Belaa ba kpaa Yeesu pɛl dagagre ta, dɛ kpaa wechɔg-ɛɛra la ge pɛl dagagra ta, dɛ kpɔ bɛl pa Yeesu dig ta, bɛl ge pa o gal.
42023034	Yeesu ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, kpɔ ba wechɔga kɛ ba. Baa waa baa dɛ ɛ nɔ jemɛ." Soojare la kpɔ o laala bil dɛɛ ta chacha ŋɔ naate waa di la, ó kpɔ onɔ la waa dɛ nyin.
42023035	Nɛnlaa chegɛ bela dɛɛ nyiŋu. Juda tena nomonome mugli o baah ŋɔ, "Kɛ he wono lɛ bane oo? Dɛ he ŋɔ henee Kristo la Korowii aa leo la aa, lɛ he te yá na!"
42023036	Gɛɛ soojare la ge mamɔ dɛ mugli o baah, dɛ tuuh tel o jwɛh, dɛ kpɔ sennyɛga tɛo ŋɔ ó nyɔ,
42023037	dɛ ŋɔ, "Dɛ he ŋɔ henee Juda tena kooro la aa, lɛ he te!"
42023038	O nyundua bɔr dagagre la ta la, ba chwerɔ ka pɛl bela ŋɔ, |scJUDA TENA KOORO LAANEE LA|d.
42023039	Wechɔg-ɛɛra baa ja o nɛɛ la bɛl bol waa yagɔ ŋɔ, "He laa Kristo la kɛɛ? Lɛ he te dɛ lɛ ya geo."
42023040	Asɛ nɛɛte la aa jaa la kaoh ŋɔ, "Jamɔ haa Korowii ɔmɛ kɛɛ? Gɛ baa ɛ yaa nɔ, gɛɛ ba ɛ o ge.
42023041	O te kwara wechɔga bɛlbwa toole o nɛ. Kɛ ya te, waa yaa ɛa la, kenii a chɛ kɛ ya na."
42023042	Dɛ ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Yeesu, he baa di he kora aa, asɛ hé lii n wa."
42023043	Anee Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, hale fini, hɛɛ ja n nɛɛ nɛndɛɛga silɛɛ bwɛɛ nyundua belaa."
42023044	Dɛ wee gel lɔe dɛ ka tel wekee saŋ,
42023045	asɛ yal baa kpɔa teŋe Korowii Dea bini la baah pere anɛ.
42023046	Yeesu kpɔ takpeg do lɔŋɔ dɛ ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, he nɔn taa n lileo do!" Waa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o doma le, o sewɛ.
42023047	Sooja nomoa waa lɔ bela dɛ na waa aa chiga la, o ŋɔ, "Kpelaa, wechɔga toole baa nɔ nɛ," dɛ kpɛɛ Korowii.
42023048	Nɛra baa bala dɛ́ ba nyiŋi la loo kuu, ba kpɔ nɔɔra dawɛ nyu dɛ kaa dem.
42023049	Kɛ nɛra baa jemɔ kɛrɛdɛ la ne haahna baa teŋɛ o nɛɛ dɛ le Galilia harɛ la te ta chegɛ bojaŋ dɛɛ nyiŋu.
42023050	Dɛ baa bɛl sɔne Josef, o ɛ Juda te dɛ le bela bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Arimatea. Dɛ o ja nomonome baa bol Yeesu waa la ne, dɛ o dɛ ɔmɛ Korowii dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge.
42023051	O te fe ta sɛɛh teŋɛ ba nɛɛ kɛ bá kpo Yeesu.
42023052	Gɛ baa la la Paelet be dɛ ka soŋe Yeesu lale,
42023053	dɛ lao kpɔ le dagagre la ta, dɛ kpɔ yapoŋ baago dɛ kpɔɔ ka bil bwe bɔɔ baa komɔ kɛŋɔ dea bini. Dɛ ba ta lale kpɔe do o bini bwa.
42023054	Dɛ awola ɛ Fiara, asɛ baa kpɔ ba te dɛ́ di Ona Tɔpere la.
42023055	Haahna baa teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ le Galilia harɛ la la bwe bɔɔ la ta bá ka na bela ne gɛ baa kpɔ lale la bil bɔɔ la bini.
42023056	Asɛ ba berɛ kaa dem dɛ ka ɛ kwaane a sɔɔh aa soma dɛɛ ba kpɔe ka ɛ lale la. Ona Tɔpere la, ba onɔ gɛ mmara la aa bagla la.
42024001	Tɔɔ aa pera Kwasie tomun aa dɛ kpɔ la, haahna la kpɔ kwaa a sɔɔh aa soma la la bwe bɔɔ la ta,
42024002	dɛ ka na kɛŋɔ nomɛl gbili bwe baa kpɔa tɔ bɔɔ la le o nyoa,
42024003	asɛ ba jo dɛ na kɛŋɔ ba Dɔɔ Yeesu lale la toole.
42024004	Ba nyoa aa kpoa ba che bela la, dɛ baala banɛ bane baa do laalapoŋa aa nyɛgle al-al ken denɔ ba che ba jwɛh.
42024005	Ɔmee lag ba taeh, asɛ ba gure nyuune suugi harɛ. Anee baala la ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he baa nyin nɛnwee lala bɔr ɔ?
42024006	Waa o faa bol he be Galilia harɛ la, he soɔh kɛɛ? O toole bonɔ, o iro.
42024007	O fa ta ŋɔe ŋɔ a chɛ kɛŋɔ ba le o Nɛn Bie tɛ nɛnchɔga, ba kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta asɛ a tɔpetooro wee la o ir seo ta naa?"
42024008	Belaa haahna la ta lii gɛ waa la,
42024009	dɛ laa berɛ kaa dem dɛ ka taa bagle Yeesu habɔteŋra fi dɛ beŋkpoŋ la ne nɛra baa ja ba nɛɛ la.
42024010	Mɛɛre waa le Magdala la ne Joana ne Jems nya Mɛɛre ne haahna bane baa jaa laanee bol waa la bagle o habɔteŋra la.
42024011	Yeesu habɔteŋra la kpɔ waa la ɛ mola, ba ta kpɔe ɛ wobɛlbwa.
42024012	Belaa Pita te kpɔ chwae dɛ la bwe bɔɔ la ta, dɛ ka boŋɛ dɛ haah o bini dɛ na yapoŋ baa kpɔa baage lale la gbo chɔe. Dɛ kpɔ nyokpoa kaa dem.
42024013	Awola tenten la, Yeesu habɔɔ nɛra la bini banɛ bane chig ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ le Jerusalam dɛɛ kaa Emɛyas. Bela ne Jerusalam ɛɛ ɛ kwansini anuanɛɛ.
42024014	Dɛ ba dɛ bol waa dɔŋa be, dɛɛ bagle dɔŋa waa aa chiga.
42024015	Baa dɛ bol waa sibegra ne dɛ bɔɔ dɔŋa dɛɛ kaa la, Yeesu gbagba kaa puu ba, ba ne wɛɛ kaa.
42024016	Ba nao, kɛ ba ta wone jemɔ.
42024017	Belaa Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa he valɛ dɛɛ ba dɛɛ bol dɔŋa be nɔɔ?" Asɛ ba jagɛ che sum ne surumm ken.
42024018	Asɛ ba nɛra banɛ la bini bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Kliopas la chaŋo ŋɔ, "He te ta waa aa chig bonɔ tɔperaanɛ nɔ noɛ kɛɛ? Jerusalam nɛnhɔɔhree hen kɛɛ?"
42024019	Anee Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa yɔ?" Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Waa aa pu Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt la waa yaa bol. O ɛ Korowii keame dɛ dɔ kpegri wobol ne we-ɛɛla ta, Korowii ne nɛra bwa jemɛ o wa.
42024020	Ya Sɔfonomonome ne ya bela nomonome kpɔɔ tɛ ŋɔ bá di o wa, dɛ kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta dɛ kpoo.
42024021	Kɛ ya te, ya fa dɔ hwɛga kɛ onee naate o fe aa dɛ ba dɛ́ ba lɛ Israel tena la. Waa nɔ aa chiga tɔpera atoroo la.
42024022	Anɔ la ge aa jaa, haahna bane baa ɛ ya bini bane la gelɔ ya nyoa kpo. Ba felo dɛ la bela baa hugo,
42024023	kɛ ba ta o lale nae. Asɛ ba ba dɛ ba ŋɔ ba na nyundua toroma bela, ba chagle kɛŋɔ Yeesu ir seo ta.
42024024	Belaa yabala la bane baa ɛ o habɔteŋra la bane la bela baa hugo la, dɛ ka na a gɛ waa la tenten, dɛ a ɛ kpela gɛ haahna la aa bola la. Kɛ Yeesu gbagba te, ba ta on nae."
42024025	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Nfɛrɛ nyaara! Ɛrɛɛ haa wola Korowii keamere waa baa bola la yarada nɔɔ?
42024026	A ta chɛɛ kɛŋɔ Kristo la Korowii aa ŋɔa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la na gɛ wahala nɔ bwa mɔɔ asɛ dɛ dɔ Korowii Kora la di kɛɛ?"
42024027	Asɛ Yeesu bag ba o bwara waa aa lɔ Korowii Tɔn la bwa bini. O pa mun le anɔ la aa lɔ Mosis Tɔne la bini dɛ bagle kaa anɔ la aa lɔ Korowii keamere kwaa la ta.
42024028	Baa tel bwɛɛ la baa dɛ kaa o ta la, Yeesu ɛo kɛŋɔ waa dɛ kaa sie,
42024029	kɛ ba ta on ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ, dɛ soŋo ŋɔ, "Wee joɔ, bɔr dɛ bir, anomanta ba yá chɔ." Asɛ o sɛh o ne ba ka so.
42024030	Kondiiga saŋ aa tela ba ka cheme tig ta la, o kpɔ paanoo dɛ jam Korowii dɛ kuugi do ba nɔɔra ta.
42024031	Belaa ba sie ta chole o nɛɛ kɛŋɔ Yeesuu. Bug la ta o den nyogre ba siwi ta.
42024032	Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "A waa laa wɛɛ bagle Korowii Tɔn la waa ŋwɛnɛ ta asɛ a jo ya bini gɛ la aa?"
42024033	Bug la taa ba ir dɛ berɛ kaa Jerusalam a wola jɔmɔra la ne, dɛ ka na Yeesu habɔteŋra fi dɛ beŋkpoŋ la.
42024034	Dɛ ba ne nɛra baa jaa la pɛo so dɛɛ bol ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ la iro kpela! O kpɔ o te bagle Seemɔn!"
42024035	Gɛ nɛra banɛ la bagle waa aa chig Emɛyas ŋwɛnɛ ta gɛ saŋ baa dɛ kaa asɛ Yeesu ka puu ba la bini chag ba, dɛ bagle gɛ aa ɛa o kuugi paanoo tɛɛ ba mɔɔ ba ta jemɔ.
42024036	A gɛ saŋ nɛra banɛ la aa bol gɛ waa la dɛɛ bag ba la, bug la ta dɛ Yeesu denɔ ba che ba baah ta dɛ ŋɔ, "Kórowii tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna."
42024037	Ba jarɔ, ɔmee lag ba, ba lii kɛŋɔ lalee ba ken na.
42024038	Asɛ o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Bɔkwaa gela he bambile chɔg nɔɔ? Bɔkwa waa hɛɛ ɛ aahna-aahna nɔɔ?
42024039	Hé nyiŋi n nɔɔra ne n napaala, asɛ dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ menee. Hé lag mɛ dɛ na, dɛkalkɛŋɔ lale ta bwadabii ne hoga dɔe gɛ haa na mɛ n che nɔ."
42024040	Yeesu bol gɛ waa nɔ dɛ kpɔ o nɔɔra ne o napaala bag ba.
42024041	Ba sie lɛo, kɛ dɛ ba bwara hwaoh, asɛ ba taa tɔŋle. O bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "He dɔ kondikwaa ane bonɔ naa?"
42024042	Asɛ ba tɛo pɛŋe baa ŋwiiro pera,
42024043	asɛ o lɛ dɛ chwe ba siwi ta,
42024044	dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Anɔ waa gɛ saŋ n ne haa lole la, n yon dɛɛ bol he be ŋɔ a chɛ kɛ n bwara wobɛlbwa baa chwera Mosis Mmara la bini ne Korowii keamere tɔne la bini ne Korowii Kpɛɛra Tɔn bini la ɛ kpela la."
42024045	Anee o kpɔ lii ba, ba no Korowii Tɔn la mun.
42024046	Dɛ berɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Ba chwerɔ ŋɔ Kristo la chɛ kɛŋɔ o na wahala nɛra nɔn ta ba kpoo, asɛ o seo habɔɔ tɔpera atoro la, o ir seo ta,
42024047	ásɛ ba che o sɔn ta dɛ bol Amanesoma la dɛ ŋɔ nɛ́ra charɛ ba liire dɛ le wechɔga ta ásɛ Korowii kpɔ ba wechɔga kɛ ba, dɛ pa mun le Jerusalam dɛ bagle gɛ waa nɔ harɛ bobɛlbwa.
42024048	Heyaa waa nɔ danseɛ tena.
42024049	Kɛ hé no, n gbabir ɛɛ tomɛ kon n Mɛɛ aa bagɛ heyaa nyoa laanee he be. Anomanta hé so bwɛɛ nɔ ta ka tel kɛŋɔ kpegri la aa le nyundua ba he be."
42024050	Belaa o kpɔ ba le Jerusalam kaa Bɛtani dahare dɛ ka laa o nɔɔra ir dɛ soŋe Korowii tɛɛ ba.
42024051	O Korowii soŋa dɛ tɛɛ ba ta la, o le ba jwɛh, asɛ Korowii kpɔɔ kaa nyundua.
42024052	Ba berɛ kpɔ silɛɛ kaa Jerusalam,
42024053	dɛ yon ka jo Korowii Dea dɛɛ jam Korowii tɔpere bɛlbwa.
43001001	Wobɛlbwa mumpar Korowii aa wola nyundua ne harɛ tae mɔɔ la, dɛ Korowii Nyoa Wobol la lole. Dɛ o ne Korowiirii lole, asɛ o ne o bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ.
43001002	Dɛ onee ja Korowii nɛɛ mumpar la.
43001003	O nɛɛ Korowii che dɛ ta komɛlbwa. Kontaale bɛlbwa toole waa wola o nɛɛ chegɛ dɛ tao.
43001004	Korowii Nyoa Wobol la bee Korowii mkpa do, asɛ gɛ mkpa nɔ ge ɛ kɛŋɔ nii dɛɛ chaah nɛwɛnyini sie.
43001005	Nii nɔ lole dɛɛ chaah biro ta, kɛ biro ta wone tɔɔ ŋwɛnɛ ó chaah bɔr kahonɛ bwa.
43001006	Dɛ baa bɛl lole baa yerɔ Jɔn. Korowiirii tomɔ
43001007	ŋɔ ó ba bol nii la waa dɛ chaah nɛwɛnyini sie la waa nɛra be, ásɛ ba no dɛ yarada.
43001008	Dɛ Jɔn gbagba laa gɛ nii la. Balaa o ba dɛ ba bol nɛn waa ɛ nii tenten la waa ásɛ nɛra jemɛ o wa.
43001009	Korowii Nyoa Wobol laanee nii kasinteŋ waa dɛ ba harɛ nɔ ta dɛ ba pili nɛwɛnyini sie la.
43001010	O nɛɛ Korowii che dɛ ta nɛwɛnyini, kɛ waa ba harɛ ta bonɔ la, nɛwɛnyini ta on jemɛ.
43001011	O ba o gbagba harɛ ta, asɛ o gbagba nɛra vɛoh.
43001012	Kɛ nɛra la te bwa baa lɛo dɛ yaradao la, o tɛɛ ba kpegri kɛŋɔ bá ɛ Korowii bii.
43001013	Ŋwɛnɛ nɛwɛnyini aa chegɛ o ta dɛɛ lolɛ bii la, kɛɛ nɛwɛnyini pɛla, kɛɛ nɛwɛnyini tetoora ta laa ba lol ba ba ɛ Korowii bii. Korowii kpegri taa a che ba berɛ o bii.
43001014	Korowii Nyoa Wobol la baa berɛ nɛwɛnyini, dɛ ba so ya be. Ya na o jirima waa dɔa, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii Bibeŋkpoŋ laanee on. Dɛ o wobɛlbwa wer, asɛ o dɔ kasinteŋ ge kohona.
43001015	O waa Jɔn faa bol kohona dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Nɛn n faa dɛ bol o waa dɛ ŋɔ men tɔ sie o nɛɛ kɛ o gwaa mɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o lole mɔɔ ba lol mɛ la, on la."
43001016	Korowii chao kohona asɛ o ge na ya sum dɛɛ tɛ yaa andɛɛga saŋ bɛlbwa, waa wola gel bwa.
43001017	Mosis nɛɛ Korowii che dɛ ba Mmara la ne. Yeesu Kristo ge nɛɛ nɛn nɛɛ suna ne kasinteŋ bwa che dɛ ba harɛ ta.
43001018	Nomɛlbwa ta Korowii nae bwa. O Bibeŋkpoŋ waa pɛlo la, on gela nɛwɛnyini jemɔ.
43001019	A wola bɛl, Juda tena nomonome baa lɔ Jerusalam la tomɛ ba Sɔfore ne Tɔn Jerema bane ŋɔ bá ka bɔɔ Jɔn o nɛnsoo. Waa waa bola dɛ kpɔ di Yeesu danseɛ laanee nɔ.
43001020	Baa bɔɔro gɛ la, o ta nyoa tɔe. O bol kasinteŋ ŋɔ, "Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la laa men."
43001021	Anee ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Aah dɛ umee hen ɔ? Elaejaa hen kɛɛ?" Asɛ o ŋɔ, "O laa men." Anee ba ŋɔ, "Korowii keame laanee hen kɛɛ?" Asɛ o ŋɔ, "Akai."
43001022	Belaa ba ŋɔ, "Bagle he nɛnsoo yá jemɛ, dɛ won dɔ wobɛl ka bol nɛra baa tomɛ yaa la be. Nɛn besoo hɛɛ lii he te nɔ?"
43001023	Belaa Jɔn kpɔ Korowii keame Aesaya waa o faa bola la chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Menee naate waa dɛ bol waa takpeg ne pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo harɛ ta dɛɛ ŋɔ, 'Hé gel he we-ɛɛla togre, dɛ kpɔ he te dɛɛ kpa he Dɔɔ bala' la."
43001024	Anee nɛra Farisii tena la aa tom ba la
43001025	bɔɔ Jɔn ŋɔ, "He ŋɔ Kristo la laa hen, Elaeja ge laa hen, Korowii keame la ge laa hen, aah dɛ ɛrɛɛ he ɛ dɛ won dɛɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii ne ɔ?"
43001026	Belaa Jɔn ŋɔ, "Nee n te kpɔ dɛɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii ne. Nomɛl lɔ he bini taraken haa wola on jemɛ.
43001027	Men bala mɔɔ o ba, kɛ o gwaa mɛ. Maa o napaa tee kwaraa dɔ."
43001028	Bwɛɛ baa dɛ yerɔ Bɛtani o do Jɔɔdan Moo la wee leebɔr pera la, belaa a gɛ waa nɔ chig. Dɛ belaa Jɔn ɛɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii ne.
43001029	Tɔ aa pera la, Jɔn na Yeesu kɛŋɔ waa dɛ ba o be. Belaa Jɔn ŋɔ nɛra o ne baa chega la be ŋɔ, "Hé na Korowii Pebie waa dɛ ba nɛra bwa wechɔga laa dɛ kpɔ ba nɛɛ la!
43001030	O waa n faa bol ŋɔ, 'Nomɛl lɔ n habɔɔ dɛɛ ba, dɛ gwaa mɛ, dɛkalkɛ o lole mɔɔ ba lol mɛ' la.
43001031	Dɛ n gbabir faa on jemɛ, kɛ o waa n ba dɛ baa sɔ nɛra Korowii nee ásɛ Israel tena jemɔ."
43001032	Jɔn bol Yeesu waa ja ŋɔ, "N na Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa le nyundua kɛŋɔ brɔnoma, dɛ ba so o nɛ.
43001033	N te fe aa jemɛ kɛ onee, kɛ Korowii waa lee mɛ ŋɔ ń ba kpɔ nee dɛɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee laanee gela n jemɔ. O ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, 'Hɛɛ na n Domadɛɛge laanee o ba so naate nɛ. On dɛɛ ba n Domadɛɛge kpɔe dɛ sɔ nɛra la.'
43001034	A gɛ waa nɔ chigo n na, anomanta n dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ Korowii Biee on."
43001035	Tɔ aa pera la, dɛ Jɔn ne o habɔteŋra banɛ chegɛ bela ja.
43001036	O na Yeesu o baa kaa, asɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "Hé na Korowii Pebie la!"
43001037	Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, o habɔteŋra banɛ la noɔ, dɛ ka teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ.
43001038	Belaa Yeesu ke nyiŋi dɛ na kɛ baa teŋɛ o nɛ, asɛ o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Bɔkwaa hɛɛ nyin ɔ?" Asɛ ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Rabae, lee he dem doɔ?" (Rabae munii nɛn waa dɛ chagle wa.)
43001039	Belaa o ŋɔ, "Hé ba na." Asɛ ba la dɛ ka na o dem. Dɛ a bɔ jɔmɔra dɔŋ anaarɛ, asɛ ba so o be bela wee ba jo.
43001040	Dɛ Andriu ɛ nɛra banɛ la Jɔn aa bol waa ba no dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ la bini bɛl. Seemɔn Pita nimee on.
43001041	Waa waa tɔ sie ɛ laanee kɛŋɔ o kaa nyin o dɔɔ Seemɔn bɔr, dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ya na Mɛsaya la." (Mɛsaya munii Kristo.)
43001042	O la Seemɔn ne Yeesu be. Belaa Yeesu nyiŋu dɛ ŋɔ, "He sɔne Seemɔn. Jɔn biee hen. Taraken baa dɛɛ yerɛɛ Sefas." (Grik tena ge dɛ yerɛ Sefas Pita. O munii Bwe.)
43001043	Tɔ aa pera la, Yeesu ɛo kɛŋɔ wɛɛ la Galilia harɛ taa. O kaa na baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Felep dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Baa teŋɛ n nɛ!"
43001044	Dɛ Felep bwɛɛ Bɛtsaeda, belaa Andriu ne Pita ge le.
43001045	Felep ge kaa na baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Nataaneɛl, dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ya na naate Mosis aa chwerɛ o waa Korowii Tɔn bini la. O waa Korowii keamere la ge chwerɛ la. O sɔne Yeesu. Josef waa le Nasarɛt la biee."
43001046	Belaa Nataaneɛl ŋɔ, "Nasarɛt ge, kondɛɛge besoo dɛ won le bela ɔ?" Anee Felep ŋɔ, "Ba ba na nɔ!"
43001047	Yeesu aa na Nataaneɛl wɛɛ ba o be la, o ŋɔ, "Israel te tentenee nɔ. O waa dɔ kasinteŋ kɛrɛdɛ!"
43001048	Belaa Nataaneɛl bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he ɛ jem mɛ nɔ?" Asɛ Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Haa lɔ pur la mun la, n nae mɔɔ Felep ka yerɛ la."
43001049	Anee Nataaneɛl ŋɔ, "Nomoa, Korowii Biee hen. Henee Israel tena Kooro la."
43001050	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Maa ŋɔ he be ŋɔ n nae pur la mun la waa he den yarada mɛ nɔ naa? Hɛɛ na wejenaa a gwaa anɔ!"
43001051	Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, hɛɛ nao nyundua aa pila, asɛ nyundua toroma che bela tu dɛɛ ba men Nɛn Bie be, dɛ berɛ teeh dɛɛ kaa."
43002001	A habɔɔ tɔpetooro wee la, dɛ ba dɛ ɛ hanfalewaa bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Keena o do Galilia harɛ ta la. Dɛ Yeesu nya Mɛɛre lɔ bela.
43002002	Ba yerɛ Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la bane ge hanfale waa la bɔr bela.
43002003	Dɛ ba dɛ tɛ nɛra la aa cheme bela la sen, asɛ a bo. Belaa Yeesu nya ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ba sen bwa tonɔ."
43002004	Anee Yeesu bɔɔ o nya ŋɔ, "N nya, aah ɛrɛ waa he berɛ dɛɛ nyiŋi n te siwi ta nɔɔ? Gɛ saŋ maa dɛ ba n toma ɛɛ la ta tele mɔɔ."
43002005	O nya berɔ ŋɔ bonɔɔna baa dɛ do sene la be ŋɔ, "Dɛ o baa ŋɔ hé ɛ wobɛlbwa naa, hé ɛ."
43002006	Dɛ vɛɛhna anumɛl chegɛ bela asɛ ba kpɔ dɛɛ ɛ ba nawee bɛl. Ba yon ɛ nee do a bini ásɛ nɛra yon dɛɛ sarame ba sarama bɛl soo mɔɔ dɛɛ di kwa. Dɛ vɛɛhna la bɛlbwa won nee haŋkorɔ fah lɛɛ.
43002007	Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ bá do nee vɛɛhna la bini á su, asɛ ba do nee a su laŋlaŋ ken.
43002008	Baa do nee vɛɛhna la bini la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé ɛ ane la ka tɛ hanfale dea nomoa la." Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, ba la nee la ne ka tɛo. Baa tɛo la, dɛ senee.
43002009	Nomoa la aa dagɛ nee aa berɛ sen la na la, o ta wone jemɛ bela aa lea ba, kɛ dɛ bonɔɔna baa dɛ do sen la te jemɔ.
43002010	Anomanta o yerɛ hanfale jaa la dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa dɛ ba nɛra sen tɛɛ yaa, andɛɛga nee o yon tɔ sie le, asɛ nɛra bwa aa baa nyɔ vagɛ la, mɔɔ o yon le anɔ la aa wola somɛ la ne asɛ baa nyɔ. Ɛrɛɛ he te tɔ sendɛɛga cheg dɛ ka mun dɛɛ ba a ne nɔɔ?"
43002011	Yeesu nyokpowaa waa tɔ sie ɛa laanee la. Keena waa lɔ Galilia harɛ ta laanee o ɛa, dɛ chagle o nɛnsoo ne kpegri waa dɔa, asɛ o habɔteŋra la na dɛ yaradao.
43002012	A habɔɔ la, Yeesu ne o nya ne o nimanar ne o habɔteŋra la la Kapeeneɔm dɛ ka so bela tɔpera anɛ.
43002013	Dɛ Juda tena tɔpejen baa dɛ yerɔ Galekaa la joɔ tonɛ, anomanta Yeesu la Jerusalam.
43002014	Bela la, o nao kɛŋɔ nɛra bane aa dɛ yog nae ne peera ne brɔnomare Korowii Dea bobɛl. Dɛ nɛra baa dɛ pegri suugare ge soge ba teeburre ta dɛɛ ɛ ba toma.
43002015	Belaa Yeesu pɛrɛ bampɔrɔ ŋwɛɛra dɛ kpɔ doŋi peera ne nae ne kondɛɛra la bwa bela. O tagɛ nɛra baa dɛ pegri suugare la teeburre piigi, dɛ lɔ ba suugare merɛ,
43002016	dɛ kɔr banɔ la baa dɛ yog brɔnomare la ŋɔ bá le a ne bela, dɛ ŋɔ ba bɛ o Mɛɛ dem kpɔ berɛ bonadibɔr.
43002017	Bela la, o habɔteŋra la liiro kɛŋɔ baa chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini bobɛl kɛŋɔ, "Korowii Dea waa swɛɛ n siwi taeh" la.
43002018	Belaa Juda tena nomonome la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa nyokpowaa hɛɛ ba wona ɛ dɛ́ chagle kɛŋɔ he dɔ ŋwɛnɛ dɛ won ɛ a gɛ waa nɔ nɔ?"
43002019	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "He kuugi Korowii Dea nɔ naa, n gee kpɔ tɔpera atoroo doo."
43002020	Belaa ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Dea baa kpɔ bene fifraanaarɛ dɛ anumɛl mao la, hen dɛ won kpɔ tɔpera atoro gbo doo waa?"
43002021	Dɛ Yeesu gbagba bwadabii waa wɛɛ bol dɛ kpɔ magɛ Korowii Dea la.
43002022	Anomanta la, Korowii aa ir Yeesu seo ta la, belaa o habɔteŋra la lii kɛŋɔ Yeesu fa bol a gɛ waa nɔ. A gelɔ ba yarada waa baa chwera Korowii Tɔn bini la, ne waa Yeesu aa bola la.
43002023	Yeesu taa lɔ Jerusalam dɛɛ di Galekaa la la, nɛra warɔ dɛ che o nyokpowaa waa ɛa ta dɛ yaradao kɛŋɔ onee Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ nɛwɛnyina la.
43002024	Kɛ Yeesu ta ban yaradae kɛŋɔ ó kpɔ o te tɛɛ ba, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o jemɛ nɛwɛnyini da kɛrɛdɛ.
43002025	A ta hiaih kɛ nɛn baglo gɛ nɛwɛnyini aa doa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o gbagba jemɛ waa aa lɔ nɛn bambile bini.
43003001	Dɛ Juda tena nomoa bɛl lole baa yerɔ Nikodeemɔs. Dɛ o ɛ Farisii te.
43003002	Awola bɛl jwaana, o ba Yeesu be dɛ ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, nomɛlbwa jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowiirii tomɛ ŋɔ hé ba bagle nɛra wa, dɛkalkɛ dɛ Korowii ta nɛn habɔɔ chegaa, waa won ɛ nyokpowaa nɔ haa dɛ ɛ nɔ."
43003003	Belaa Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin Korowii Kora la ta dɛ ja la, nemenɛ ba berɛ lolɔ ja."
43003004	Anee Nikodeemɔs pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Nɛn waa kpega la, ɛrɛɛ bá ɛ dɛ berɛ won lolɔ jaɔ? Wɛɛ wonoo berɛ jo o nya tea bini ja asɛ o lolɔ waa?"
43003005	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, dɛ ba ta nomɛlbwa lolɛ nee ne Korowii Domadɛɛge ne naa, waa Korowii Kora ta jae ba.
43003006	Nɛwɛnyini lola lole, asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge ge lola do le. Nɛwɛnyini lola ɛ bwadabii wa, asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge lola ge ɛ lileo wa.
43003007	He bɛ gel waa maa bola ŋɔ a chɛ kɛ ba berɛ lolɛ heyaa la kpo he nyoa.
43003008	Bela peu aa dɛ nyin laanee o ta dɛɛ kaa. O dɛ ta aa, he dɛ no o gbɔga kɛ haa on na, haa won jemɛ bela waa lea ne bela waa dɛ kaa. Gɛɛ nomɛlbwa Korowii Domadɛɛge aa lolɔ la do. Dɛ o we-ɛɛla laa aa, komɛlbwa toole dɛɛ bagle kɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge lolɔ."
43003009	Belaa Nikodeemɔs pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ waa nɔ ɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ won magre ɔ?"
43003010	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he ɛ Juda tena nomonjen dɛɛ bagle Korowii Wa, haa wola gɛ waa nɔ jemɛ nɔɔ?
43003011	Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, waa yaa jema la, ne waa ya sie aa naa la, anee yaa bol, kɛ haa ya be no.
43003012	Aah dɛ maa dɛ bol waa aa lɔ harɛ ta bonɔɔ haa wola men yarada nɔ, dɛ n bol waa aa lɔ Korowii doa aa, ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ won yarada a te nɔ?
43003013	Dɛ n Nɛn Bie laa aa, nomɛlbwa ta Korowii be nyundua laŋɛ mɔɔ. N gboo le o be nyundua dɛ tu ba harɛ.
43003014	Gɛ saŋ ya naanar aa lɔ pua la, Korowii keame Mosis la fa kpɔ buni dɛ logɛ harɛkon dɛ kpɔ do daa ta dɛ gɔɔro ásɛ nɛra nyiŋu dɛ bɛ dɛɛ sewɛ. Gɛɛ a chɛ kɛ ba gɔɔ n Nɛn Bie la.
43003015	Dɛ ba baa gɔɔ mɛ gɛ naa, nomɛlbwa waa yarada n waa la, wɛɛ dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa laanee.
43003016	"Korowii dɛ nyin nɛwɛnyini taeh. A waa o gel men maa ɛ o Bibeŋkpoŋ gbo waa dɔɔ la ba harɛ nɔ ta, asɛ nomɛlbwa waa yarada n waa la bɛ sewɛ, kɛ ó dɔ o mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa la.
43003017	Korowii aa tom mɛ harɛ la, o ta ŋɔe ŋɔ ń ba bol he waa dɛ pa heyaa bolchɔge. Kɛ o tom mɛ ŋɔ ń ba nyin ŋwɛnɛ tɛ heyaa ásɛ o won lɛ heya.
43003018	Nomɛlbwa waa yarada n waa la, Korowii aa o waa bol a ba ɛ kɛ wɛɛ di bolchɔgee. Kɛ nomɛlbwa waa wola n waa yaradae la, Korowii pao bolchɔge tonɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o ta o Bibeŋkpoŋ la waa yaradae.
43003019	Ba bolchɔge pae munii kɛŋɔ nii waa dɛ chaah bɔr la ba harɛ nɔ ta, kɛ nɛwɛnyini berɔ dɛɛ nyin biro gwaa nii la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba wobɛlbwa ɛ wechɔga.
43003020	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ wechɔga la, waa bochaah nyin, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o le bochaah ta naa, nɛra ɛɛ na o wechɔga laanee.
43003021	Naate waa dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga la te, waa bochaah lee ɔmɛ. Wedɛg-ɛɛ bɛlbwa dɛ ɛ o waa bochaah ta ásɛ nɛra bwa na dɛ jemɛ kɛ o jemɛ Korowii."
43003022	A habɔɔ la, Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la la Judia harɛ ta, asɛ o ka di tɔpera anɛ ba be dɛɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee bela.
43003023	Dɛ Jɔn ge dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Aenɔn o ne Salem aa wola jaŋɛ la ta. Dɛ nee lɔ Aenɔn taeh, asɛ nɛra ɛɛ ba Jɔn be wɛɛ sɔ ba Korowii ne.
43003024	A gɛ saŋ la dɛ ba ta Jɔn lawɛ do dea mɔɔ.
43003025	Dɛ nɛra baa teŋɛ Jɔn nɛɛ la ne Juda te bɛl dɛ tɔŋle dɔŋa ba bela Korowii toma waa aa ɛ nɔɔra ne naa sarama ne nee sɔe wa.
43003026	Ba la Jɔn be dɛ ka pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Nomoa, he dɛ lii kɛ he ne baa bɛl faa chegɛ Jɔɔdan Moo la wee leebɔr pera la aa? O waa he faa bol la. O dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii ne, asɛ nɛra bwa chwa dɛɛ kaa o be."
43003027	Belaa Jɔn ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa toole dɛ won dɔ komɛl dɛ Korowii laa tɛo.
43003028	Maa ŋɔa ŋɔ n laa Kristo la, dɛ ŋɔ tomaa ba tom mɛ ŋɔ ń tɔ o sie la, he ta noɛ yaa?
43003029	Hanfale jaaree dɔ o haah. Kɛ, dɛ hanfale jaa la dam lɔ hanfale la waa bɔr dɛ no o nyoa bela aa, dɛ o sie lɛo. Gɛɛ n ge bwara sɔɔh mɛ kohona.
43003030	A chɛ kɛ o sɔn ɛɛ le kohona asɛ n te sɔn ɛɛ ba harɛ.
43003031	"Nɛn waa le nyundua la gwaa nomɛlbwa. Nɛn waa le harɛ bonɔ la, harɛ waa o jemɛ, a waa gee o won bola. Kɛ nɛn waa le Korowii be nyundua la te gwaa nomɛlbwa.
43003032	Waa o siwi aa naa ne waa waa noa Korowii be laanee wɛɛ bol, kɛ nɛwɛnyini aa o be no.
43003033	Nomɛlbwa sɛh Korowii wa aa, o gbagba wono dɛɛ jemɛ kɛ Korowii waa dɔ kasinteŋ.
43003034	Nɛn Korowii aa tomɔ la, Korowii wobolee wɛɛ bol, dɛkalkɛ Korowii tɛo o Domadɛɛge la tɛɛ tenten.
43003035	Korowii nyin o Bie la taeh, dɛ kpɔ wobɛlbwa kpegri do o nɔn ta.
43003036	Nomɛlbwa waa yarada Korowii Bie la waa la, wɛɛ dɔ mkpaa aa wola jaga dɔe bwaa. Nomɛlbwa waa wola Korowii Bie la waa yaradae la, waa mkpa dɔe ba. Korowii bandia ɛɛ do o nɛɛ saŋ bɛlbwaa."
43004001	Farisii tena la noɔ kɛŋɔ Yeesu berɔ dɛɛ dɔ nɛra kohona dɛɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee kohona dɛɛ gwaa Jɔn.
43004002	Kasinteŋ, dɛ Yeesu gbagba aa nɛra Korowii nee sɔ. Dɛ o habɔteŋra laanee dɛɛ sɔ ba Korowii ne.
43004003	Yeesu aa no gɛ baa dɛ bol o waa la, o le Judia harɛ dɛ́ kaa Galilia harɛ ta.
43004004	Dɛ Samaria harɛ taa chɛ kɛ o kpɔ dɛ won kaa Galilia harɛ ta.
43004005	O baa le Samaria bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Seka la ta. Dɛ a gɛ bwɛɛ la ne harɛ la Jekɔb aa kpɔa tɛ o bie Josef la aa jaŋɛ.
43004006	Dɛ Jekɔb kɔlɔŋ bɛl lɔ bela. Yeesu aa vala dɛ koh la, o kaa so kɔlɔŋ la nyoa. Dɛ wee chegɛ nyufala.
43004007	Samaria haah bɛl balɔ ŋɔ ó ba dɔ ne, asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Tɛ mɛ nee ń nyɔ."
43004008	Dɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra la kaa bwɛɛ la ta dɛ́ ka nyin kondikwaa ba.
43004009	Belaa haah la nyoa kpo, o chaŋo ŋɔ, "Fini te Juda te dɛ soŋe Samaria haah ne aa?" Dɛ Juda tena dɛ kɔgɛ Samaria tena taeh, dɛ baa sɛh ba ne baa pɛ numoli ne loga kwara.
43004010	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛ he fe jemɛ kon Korowii aa dɛ nyin he tɛɛ nɔ, dɛ jemɛ naate waa dɛ soŋe nee nɔ naa, he fe ɛɛ soŋoo ásɛ o fee tɛɛ nee aa won tɛɛ mkpa."
43004011	Belaa haah la ŋɔ, "Nomoa, bule nɔ aa luŋa, asɛ haa wola kon baa kpɔa dɛɛ ta kɔlɔŋ dɔe nɔ, lee hɛɛ ba a gɛ nee aa dɛ tɛ mkpa nɔ dɔe yɔ?
43004012	He dɛ lii kɛ he gwaa ya naa Jekɔb waa tɛ yaa a gɛ bule nɔ la kɛɛ? O ne o bii ne o kondɛɛra bwaa fa dɛ nyɔ nee bule nɔ ta."
43004013	Belaa Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa nyɔ nee nɔ la, nyɔgre ɛɛ kpoo ja.
43004014	Kɛ nomɛlbwa waa nyɔ nee maa dɛ tɛo la te, nyɔgre aa on kpo bwa. Nee maa tɛo la ɛɛ ɛo kɛŋɔ bule o bini dɛɛ bule nee aa dɛ tɛ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa."
43004015	Belaa haah la ŋɔ, "Nomoa, amɔ te, tɛ mɛ a gɛ nee la ane asɛ nyɔgre bɛ men kpo kpa, asɛ n bɛ bonɔ ba ba dɔ nee kpa."
43004016	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ó ka yerɛ o jaa ba.
43004017	Asɛ o ŋɔ, "N ta jaa dɔe." Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "Dɛ he ŋɔ he ta jaa dɔe yaa, kpelaa he ŋɔ.
43004018	He yalɛ baala banue bwa, kɛ onɔ la he ne waa lole taraken la, he jaa laa on, anomanta kpelaa he ŋɔ."
43004019	Asɛ haah la ŋɔ, "Nomoa, maa naa nɔ, Korowii keamee hen.
43004020	Bwe nɔ taa ya Samaria tena naanar faa tomɛ Korowii saŋ la. Aah ɛrɛ waa he Juda tena ŋɔ Jerusalamee chɛ Korowii toma nɔɔ?"
43004021	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, aa ba tel saŋ bɛlee nɛra aa wola Korowii tomɛ bwe nɔ ta, baa on tomɛ Jerusalam ge.
43004022	He Samaria tena te, ɛɛ he gee ɛ te, kɛ haa kon haa dɛ tomɛ jemɛ. Kɛ ya Juda tena te jemɛ kon yaa dɛ tomɛ, dɛkalkɛ ya nɛɛ aa ba chega asɛ Korowii lɛ nɛwɛnyina bwa.
43004023	Korowii toma te lɔ bambile bini. Aa ba tel saŋ bɛlee, asɛ nɛra baa dɛ tomɛ Korowii kpela kpela la che o Domadɛɛge la ta dɛɛ tomɔ bambile bini, dɛɛ tomɔ kasinteŋ ne, dɛkalkɛ gɛɛ wɛɛ nyin kɛ baa tomɔ. A gɛ tɔpere la telo tonɛ.
43004024	Korowii ɛ lileo. Anomanta dɛ ya dɛ tomɔ waa, yá che o Domadɛɛge kpegri ta dɛ kpɔ kasinteŋ dɛɛ tomɔ bambile bini."
43004025	Anee haah la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "N jemɔ kɛŋɔ ya Lɛɛ la baa dɛ yerɔ Kristo la ɛɛ bao. O balaa, wɛɛ bagle yaa wobɛlbwaa."
43004026	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Onee he ne wɛɛ bol waa la. Kristo laanee men."
43004027	Belaa Yeesu habɔteŋra la ba. Baa baa na o ne haah naa chega dɛɛ bol waa la, a ɛɛ ba anebɛlbwa. Kɛ ba bɛlbwa ge ta berɛ won bɔɔ haah la kon la waa dɛ nyin Yeesu be. Bɛlbwa ta wone bɔɔ Yeesu wee la aa bala o ne haah la ɛɛ bol waa la.
43004028	Haah la gel o vii waa dɛ ba o ne nee dɔe la bela dɛ chwa la bwɛɛ la ta ka ŋɔ bela tena be ŋɔ,
43004029	"Hé ba ba na noo! Baa bɛl wono bagle n waa maa dɛ ɛ bwa! Jamɔ Kristo laanee kɛɛ?"
43004030	Haah la aa ŋɔ gɛ la, bela tena chwao le ba bwɛɛ la ta dɛɛ ba Yeesu be.
43004031	Haah la aa kaa bwɛɛ la ta la, Yeesu habɔteŋra la soŋo jande jande ŋɔ, "Nomoa, lɛ kondikwaa di!"
43004032	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "N dɔ kondikwaa ane haa wola a waa jemɛ."
43004033	Anee o habɔteŋra la ɛɛ pɛɛ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Nomɛl baa tɛo kondikwaa o di gbaɔ?"
43004034	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "N kondikwaa kɛ maa dɛ ɛ n Mɛɛ waa tom mɛ la tetoora, ne kɛ maa ɛ o toma waa tɛ mɛ la bwa tonɛ.
43004035	He laa yon ŋɔ ba du kwa aa, korobie anaarɛɛ aa di mɔɔ baa koma la aa? Kasinteŋ, he bɛ chɔ. Hé ta sie na koo kwaa bwa aa bea ne koma gɛ!
43004036	Nɛn waa komɛ kwaa dɛɛ tɛ Korowii la dɛ dɔ o kembɔr. Nɛwɛnyinaa naate ɛɛ komɛ, dɛɛ lɛɛ ba ásɛ ba dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa la, ásɛ naate ne nɛn waa dua la bwa sie lɛ.
43004037	Baa ŋɔa, 'Bɛlee dɛɛ du, bɛl gee komɛ' la, kpelaa.
43004038	N waa nɔ maa gela hɛɛ bagle nɔ, a do kɛŋɔ maa gela hɛɛ komɛ kwaa bela haa wola parɛ la. Bane tɔ sie koh mɔɔ he baa na som la."
43004039	Samaria tena baa lɔ bwɛɛ la ta kɛrɛdɛ yarada Yeesu, dɛkalkɛŋɔ haah la ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "O bol waa maa dɛ ɛ bwa n be."
43004040	Anomanta Samaria tena la aa ba Yeesu be la, ba soŋo ŋɔ ó so ba be. O soge ba be tɔpera anɛ dɛɛ bag ba Korowii Wa.
43004041	Yeesu waa waa dɛ bol la gelɔ nɛra pirim berɛ yarada o waa la ja,
43004042	dɛ ŋɔ haah la be ŋɔ, "A ta ɛɛ kɛŋɔ he waa haa bola la gboo gela ya yaradao. Ya gbagba ge aa kpɔ deŋne no o waa la name la, anee gela ya yarada dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ nɛra bwa Lɛɛree nɔ kpela."
43004043	Yeesu aa di tɔpere anɛ bela la, o le bela dɛɛ kaa Galilia harɛ.
43004044	O gbabir fa bolɔ ŋɔ, "Korowii keame bɛlbwa ta sɔn dɔe o gbagba bwɛɛ bwa."
43004045	Waa jo Galilia harɛ la, bela tena lɛo silɛɛ ne, dɛkalkɛŋɔ baa la Galekaa dii Jerusalam la, ba na waa waa ɛa Galekaa dii la ta bwa.
43004046	Yeesu la Galilia bwɛɛ Keena. Belaa o faa kpɔ nee berɛ sen la. Waa la bela la, dɛ Abane nomoa bɛl bibaa bwara dɛ weo Kapeeneɔm.
43004047	Nomoa la aa noa kɛŋɔ Yeesu le Judia harɛ ba Galilia harɛ la, o ba o be dɛ ba soŋo ŋɔ ó la Kapeeneɔm dɛ́ ka chah o bie waa dɛ ba sewa la.
43004048	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He bɛlbwa ta nyokpowaa ne wekpega ane nae yaa, haa men yarada bwa."
43004049	Asɛ nomoa la soŋo ŋɔ, "Nomoa, yá kaa. A waa laa aa, n bie la ɛɛ sewɔɔ."
43004050	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛɛ la he bwɛ, he bie la ɛɛ gbaŋroo!" Baa la yarada Yeesu waa waa bola la, dɛ berɛ kaa o bwɛ.
43004051	Waa dɛ kaa la, o bonɔɔna chemo ŋwɛnɛ ta, dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He bie la gbaŋrɔ!"
43004052	Belaa o bɔɔ ba saŋ la yiso o bie la weela la nyoa aa ba harɛ, asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Dɛ ɛ webaŋa dɔŋ beŋkpoŋ saŋee o bɔwɔrɔba la le o nɛ."
43004053	Belaa nomoa la lii kɛŋɔ a gɛ saŋ la tentenee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He bie la ɛɛ gbaŋroo" la. A taa a che o ne o dem tena bwa yarada Yeesu waa la, dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo.
43004054	Yeesu aa le Judia harɛ ba Galilia harɛ la, nyokpowaa nɔɔ jaa nɛɛ waa ɛa.
43005001	A habɔɔ la, dɛ Juda tena tɔpejen bɛl telo, asɛ Yeesu la Jerusalam.
43005002	Dɛ tam bɛl chɔ Jerusalam asɛ Juda tena ɛɛ yerɔ Bɛtsata. O chɔɔ bɛne doonyoa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Peera Doonyojen la. Tam la nyoa la, ba ɛ soŋnibɔra bele anue dɛ tɔa.
43005003	Soŋnibɔra bela la, weela tena kɛŋɔ nyoŋa, boobie ne banɔ la ba peri aa serewa warɔ dɛ chɔ bela.
43005005	Dɛ baa bɛl ja weela tena la nɛɛ o weela do o nɛɛ bene fifraatoro dɛ anuatoro dɛ o ta chaeh dɔe.
43005006	Yeesu aa baa na o chɔe la, o wono jemɛ kɛŋɔ weela la aa lɔ o nɛɛ bigro, anomanta o bɔɔro ŋɔ, "He dɛ nyin kɛ he dɔ bokpega aa?"
43005007	Anee o ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh. Kɛ tam la poraa, maa nɛn dɔ ó kpɔ mɛ kaa do o ta. Maa takapɔ ŋɔ ń ka jo o ta, dɛ n dɔŋ tɔ n sie."
43005008	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ir che dɛ kpɔ he kalaŋ dɛ kaa!"
43005009	Yeesu aa ŋɔ gɛ la, baa la gbaŋrɔ dɛ ir che dɛ kpɔ o kalaŋ dɛ valɛ dɛɛ kaa. Ona Tɔpere taa a gɛ waa nɔ chig.
43005010	Asɛ Juda tena nomonome ŋɔ weela te la Yeesu aa chaoh la be ŋɔ, "Fini ɛ Ona Tɔpere, anomanta he jo ya kii nɛɛ kɛŋɔ haa kpɔ he kalaŋ che la!"
43005011	Asɛ o chaŋe ŋɔ, "Naate waa chaah mɛ laanee ŋɔa ŋɔ ń ir kpɔ n kalaŋ dɛ kaa."
43005012	Anee ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Umee su baah ŋɔ hé ir dɛ kpɔ he kalaŋ che nɔɔ?"
43005013	Baa la ta wone jemɛ naate la nɛnsoo waa chaoh la, dɛkalkɛ dɛ nɛnlaa tentenee lɔ bela asɛ Yeesu koo ba bini kaa.
43005014	A habɔɔ la, Yeesu na baa la Korowii Dea asɛ dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He nao kenɛ, taraken haa dɔ bokpega nɔ, gel wechɔga ɛɛ, asɛ anɔ la aa gwaa logla kwaa la bɛ he nɛɛ ba chig kpa."
43005015	Belaa baa la aa le bela la, o la Juda tena nomonome la be dɛ ka chagle kɛŋɔ Yeesuu chaoh la.
43005016	Baa noa kɛŋɔ Yeesuu ɛ a gɛ waa nɔ Ona Tɔpere ta la, belaa ba pa mun haoh, dɛkalkɛ dɛ o chɔg ba Ona Tɔpere mmara.
43005017	Anee Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ te dɛ ɛ o toma saŋ te bɛlbwa, anomanta gɛɛ chɛ kɛŋɔ n gee ɛ."
43005018	Gɛ waa nɔ Yeesu aa bola la ɛɛ ba bwaawee kohona dɛ gel baa nyinu dɛ́ kpo kwara, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ Ona Tɔpere la gbo laa wɛɛ chɔg. O berɔ ŋɔ o Mɛɛ waa lolɔɔ Korowii, asɛ dɛ kpɔ o te dɛɛ magɔ kɛŋɔ o ne o ɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
43005019	Belaa Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, toma Korowii aa dɛ ɛ laanee o Bie gee ɛ, dɛkalkɛ waa won kpɔ o gbo liire dɛɛ ɛ gɛ waa dɛ nyin. Anɔ la Korowii aa dɛ ɛ laanee o Bie ge nyiŋi dɛɛ ɛ.
43005020	Dɛkalkɛ Korowii dɛ nyin o bie asɛ dɛɛ baglo waa wɛɛ ɛ o we-ɛɛla dɔŋa. Anomanta wɛɛ bagloo wɛɛ ɛ wejena aa gwaa anɔ kwara ásɛ a ɛ heyaa nyokpoa.
43005021	Gɛ Korowii aa dɛ chum nɛra baa serewa asɛ dɛ gel baa dɔ mkpa la, gɛ tentenee o Bie la gee ba wona chum bɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin dɛ tɛo mkpa.
43005022	Korowii gbagba aa nomɛlbwa waa bol dɛ pa bole. O tɛ o Bie la ŋwɛnɛ ŋɔ ó bol nomɛlbwa waa dɛ pa bole.
43005023	Dɛ ŋɔ nómɛlbwa tɛ o Bie la jirima gɛ tenten baa dɛ tɛo jirima la. Anomanta nomɛlbwa waa wola o Bie la jirima tɛ la, dɛ gɛɛ waa wola o Mɛɛ la waa tomɔ la jirima tɛ.
43005024	"Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, nomɛlbwa waa no n waa la dɛɛ teŋɛ a ta asɛ dɛ yarada n Mɛɛ waa tom mɛ la, onee dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la. Maa naate waa bol dɛ pa bole kpa, dɛkalkɛ o le seo nɔn ta dɛ berɛ dɔ Korowii mkpa.
43005025	Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be ja kɛŋɔ saŋ bɛl ɛɛ bao asɛ nɛra baa serewa no men Korowii Bie la taa, asɛ banɔ la baa dɛ no la dɔ Korowii mkpa. Tɔpere la dɔɔ tel kwara.
43005026	Gɛ Korowii aa dɔ mkpa dɛɛ tɛ la, gɛɛ o gel o Bie la ge dɔ mkpa dɛɛ tɛ,
43005027	asɛ dɛ tɛo ŋwɛnɛ kɛ ó won dɛɛ bol nɛra waa dɛɛ pa bole, dɛkalkɛ o Bie laanee Nɛn Bie la.
43005028	He bɛ gel anɔ ɛ heyaa nyokpoa, dɛkalkɛ tɔpere bɛl dɛ ba asɛ nɛra baa serewa la no n taa,
43005029	asɛ bɛlbwa le o bɔɔ bini. Banɔ la baa ɛ wedɛɛga la te ɛɛ berɔɔ dɔ Korowii mkpa, asɛ banɔ la ge baa ɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra la, o berɛ chɔg ba.
43005030	"N gbo aa won ɛ wobɛlbwa n bambile ta, nemenɛ anɔ la Korowii aa chag mɛ la. A taa n che dɛ bol nɛra waa dɛɛ pa bole. An gela n bole pae togre nɔ, dɛkalkɛ waa n Mɛɛ waa tom mɛ la aa kpɔa tɛ mɛ la gboo mɛɛ ɛ dɛ gel n bambile wa.
43005031	Dɛ n ŋɔ mɛɛ di danseɛ tɛ n gbagba aa, nɛra ɛɛ ŋɔɔ nyosonee mɛɛ teŋe.
43005032	Kɛ nomɛl lole dɛ di danseɛ dɛɛ tɛ mɛ, asɛ n jemɛ kɛŋɔ o danseɛ dii ɛ kpela.
43005033	Jɔn bee he tomɛ he toroma asɛ o di mɛ kasinteŋ la danseɛ bagle heya.
43005034	Maa n te kpɔe dɛɛ dawɛ nɛwɛnyini nɛɛ ó di mɛ danseɛ. N dɛ bol anɔ ásɛ he yarada Korowii ó won lɛ heya.
43005035	A gɛ Jɔn nɔ fa do kɛ kandea baa choŋu wɛɛ chaah bɔr kohona, asɛ hɛɛ nyin o bɔr chaahna la som dɛ na tama mɔɔ.
43005036	"Kɛ n dɔ danseɛ bɛl waa kpega dɛ gwaa Jɔn danseɛ waa baa di tɛ mɛ la kwara. Anee kɛ toma n Mɛɛ Korowii aa kpɔa do n nɔn ta ŋɔ ń ɛ la. Anee dɛɛ bagle kɛ onee tom mɛ.
43005037	Asɛ n Mɛɛ la waa tom mɛ laanee dɛɛ di mɛ danseɛ. He ta o taa noɛ bwa a ba ɛ kɛŋɔ he na o sie bɔr ka,
43005038	he ta o waa la ge kpɔe do he bambile bini, dɛkalkɛ he ta nɛn waa tomɔ he be la yaradae.
43005039	He swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ kure Korowii Tɔn la, asɛ dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ hɛɛ dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe le a ta. Asɛ gɛ tɔn nɔ bini waa gee di danseɛ dɛɛ tɛ mɛ.
43005040	Kɛ haa nyin kɛ he ba n be dɛ́ ba dɔ mkpa la.
43005041	Maa sɔn nyin nɛwɛnyini be.
43005042	He te, n jemɛ heyaa dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ he bambile ta Korowii waa lawɛ.
43005043	N Mɛɛ Korowii sɔn nee n ba he vɛɛh mɛ, kɛ dɛ nomɛlee fe bala o gbagba sɔn ta naa, he fe ɛɛ no o bee.
43005044	He dɛ nyin sɔn dɔŋa be, kɛ a ta wehiah ɛɛ tɛ heyaa kɛŋɔ hé nyin sɔn Korowii te be. He do ken aa, ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ba wona dɛ yarada mɛ nɔ?
43005045	"He bɛ dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ menee dɛ che Korowii sie dɛɛ bagle he wechɔga haa ɛa. Me laa. Mosis haa kpɔ he hwɛga bwa do o nɛɛ la, on dɛɛ bagla.
43005046	He fe yaradao waa, he fe yarada n ge, dɛkalkɛ onee chwerɛ n waa o tɔn bini.
43005047	Haa wola waa waa chwera yaradae nɔ, ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ba wona yarada n waɔ?"
43006001	A habɔɔ la Yeesu le Galilia Moo baa dɛ yerɔ Tibeerias Moo la.
43006002	Belaa nɛnlaa tenten teŋɛ o nɛ, dɛkalkɛ ba nao kɛ waa ɛ nyokpowaa weela tena chaeh ta ka.
43006003	Belaa Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la bwa deeh kaa bwe bɛl doa dɛ ka so bela.
43006004	Dɛ a ka tama Juda tena tɔpejen bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Galekaa la tel.
43006005	Yeesu baa ha sie dɛ nyiŋi dɛ na kɛŋɔ nɛnlaa bane dɛ ba o be, asɛ dɛ bɔɔ o habɔteŋra la bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Felep la ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ɛɛ dɛ dɔ kondikwaa dɛ tɛ nɛndamanta nɔ bwa dɔŋa bá dio?"
43006006	Yeesuu saahna bɔɔ Felep gɛ waa nɔ dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ daahno dɛ́ na. Kɛ o te la, dɛ o jemɛ anɔ la waa dɛ ba ɛɛ.
43006007	Asɛ Felep ge ŋɔ, "Dɛ yaa dɔ suuga damanta kɛŋɔ denaarere lafraanɛɛ dɛ yawɛ paanoo kwaraa naa, bɛlbwa aa won dɔ tama tama kwaraa di."
43006008	Anee Yeesu habɔteŋra la bini bɛl waa ɛ Seemɔn Pita nime baa yerɔ Andriu la ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ,
43006009	"Bibaa bɛl lɔ ya bini bonɔ dɛ dɔ paanoo anue ne pɛŋa anɛ. Aah ɛrɛɛ a gee ba wona ɛ nɛndamanta nɔ bwa nɔ?"
43006010	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé gel ba bwa so harɛ." Dɛ kpɔglor warɛ bela, asɛ ba so a ta. Dɛ ba bini baala gbo ɛɛ ɛ kagboŋa banue.
43006011	Belaa Yeesu kpɔ paanoo la dɛ jam Korowii dɛ bɔne tɛ nɛnlaa la. Gɛ tentenee o kpɔ pɛŋa la dɛ jam Korowii dɛ bɔne tɛɛ ba ja. Asɛ bɛlbwa dɔ gɛ aa magre o ne.
43006012	Baa dia tonɛ dɛ bwa vagre la, o ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "Hé tɔɔ anla baa dia ka la pɛ asɛ a bɛ chɔg ta."
43006013	Asɛ ba tɔɔ paanoo anue la nɛnlaa la aa dia a ka la pɛ, asɛ a su wɛgrɛre fi dɛ anɛ.
43006014	Nɛnlaa la aa na a gɛ nyokpowaa nɔ Yeesu aa ɛa la, ba ŋɔ dɔŋa be ŋɔ, "Kpelaa! Onɔɔ Korowii keame baa ŋɔa ŋɔ wɛɛ bao la."
43006015	Belaa Yeesu na kɛŋɔ nɛra la dɛ nyin kɛ ba lawɔ dɛ chego kora kpegri ne ó di, asɛ o sɔh le ba bini dɛ gbo ka so bwe la doa ja.
43006016	A jɔmɔra ne la, Yeesu habɔteŋra la bwa berɔ tu ba moo la nyoa
43006017	asɛ dɛ ba jo gbera bini, dɛ berɛ gale moo la dɛ fe ɛɛ kaa Kapeeneɔm. Bɔr baa jo dɛ Yeesu ta ba be balɛ mɔɔ.
43006018	Gɛ saŋ la ge, dɛ peujen bɛl dɛ ta dɛɛ begre nee la, asɛ nehaŋma tɔ o bwa.
43006019	O habɔteŋra la aa tawa dɛ kaa dɛ ɛ kwansini atoro kɛɛ anaarɛ la, ba nao kɛŋɔ Yeesu aa valɛ nee la sie dɛɛ ba ba be, asɛ ɔmee lag ba taeh.
43006020	Belaa waa na gɛ la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Menee! He bɛ ɔmɛ!"
43006021	Baa naa kɛ Yeesuu la, ba sie lɛo, asɛ ba gel o ba jo gbera la bini. A ta bigre bɛlbwa ba tel bela baa dɛ la.
43006022	Tɔ aa pera la, nɛnlaa la baa soge moo la nyoa la nao kɛŋɔ dɛ gbera beŋkpoŋ gboo fa chegɛ legbɔɔ bela. Yeesu habɔteŋra la gboo jo gbera la bini dɛ kaa, o te ta ba nɛɛ jae.
43006023	Asɛ gbeni ane le bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Tibeerias la ta dɛ ba legbɔɔ la ta bela nɛra la aa soga Yeesu kpɔ paanoo dɛ jam Korowii a waa dɛ bɔne tɛɛ ba ba di la.
43006024	Anomanta nɛnlaa la aa naa kɛŋɔ Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la bini bɛlbwa toole bela la, ba jo gɛ gbeni la bini dɛ kaa o bɔr gaaga Kapeeneɔm.
43006025	Nɛra la aa tel bela la, ba kaa na Yeesu kɛ waa lɔ moo la baŋ bela, asɛ dɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Nomoa, saŋ besoo he ba bonɔ nɔ?"
43006026	Belaa o chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, paanoo la he dɛ aa dia vagɛ la waa hɛɛ gaage n bɔr la. Menɛkɛsɛ he no nyokpowaa la bɛlbwa mun.
43006027	He bɛ kondikwaa aa won chɔga nɔ ta dɛɛ koh. Hɛ́ɛ koh kondikwaa aa wola chɔg dɛɛ tɛ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la ta. Gɛ kondikwaa nɔɔ n Nɛn Bie la ɛɛ ba heyaa tɛɛ, dɛkalkɛ menee Korowii tɛ kpegri kɛŋɔ kooro aa tomɛ o bie faahna ne la."
43006028	Anee ba pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ɛɛ asɛ dɛ won ɛ waa Korowii aa dɛ nyin ɔ?"
43006029	Asɛ Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Gɛ Korowii aa dɛ nyin laanee kɛ nómɛlbwa yarada o Bibeŋkpoŋ waa tomɔ la asɛ dɛ kpɔ o te tɛo."
43006030	Asɛ ba berɛ bɔɔro ja ŋɔ, "Aah bɔkwa nyokpowaa hɛɛ ba ɛɛ ásɛ ya na dɛ yaradae nɔ? Ɛ waane yá na.
43006031	Ya naanar fa di kondikwaa ane soo aa le nyundua baa yera maana gɛ saŋ baa dɛ valɛ pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo harɛ ta la. Anee ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini kɛŋɔ 'O tɛɛ ba kondikwaa aa le nyundua ba asɛ ba di la.' "
43006032	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, Mosis laa tɛ heyaa kondikwaa aa le nyundua la. N Mɛɛ gboo won kondikwaa tenten aa le nyundua la kpɔe dɛ tɛ.
43006033	Kondikwaa la Korowii aa tɛ yaa laanee nɛn waa le o gbagba be nyundua dɛ ba mkpa ne ba tɛ nɛwɛnyini bwa la."
43006034	Anee nɛnlaa la ŋɔ, "Nomoa, tɛ yaa gɛ kondikwaa nɔ tɔpere bɛlbwa yaa di."
43006035	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Menee kondikwaa aa dɛ tɛ Korowii mkpa la. Nomɛlbwa waa ba n be la, lɔr aa on kpo. Asɛ nomɛlbwa ge waa yarada mɛ dɛ kpɔ o te tɛ mɛ la, nyɔgre gba aa o kpoe ba bwa.
43006036	N ŋɔ he be ŋɔ he na mɛ, kɛ he ta men yaradae dɛ kpɔ he te tɛ mɛ mɔɔ.
43006037	Nomɛlbwa n Mɛɛ Korowii aa kpɔ tɛ mɛ la ɛɛ ba n bee dɛ ba teŋɛ n nɛ. Maa nomɛlbwa ge waa ba n be laanee doŋi ta bwa,
43006038	dɛkalkɛŋɔ n gbagba tetoowaa waa laa n le nyundua ba. Naate waa tom mɛ la tetoowaa waa n ba.
43006039	N Mɛɛ Korowii waa tom mɛ la tetoowaa kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa kpɔa tɛ mɛ la bɛ n nɔn ta le, asɛ tɔpera bwa jaga wee la, ń iru seo ta.
43006040	Dɛkalkɛ gɛ n Mɛɛ la aa dɛ nyin laanee kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa na men maa ɛ o Bie la dɛ yarada mɛ dɛ kpɔ o te tɛ mɛ la ɛɛ dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe, asɛ ń iru seo ta, tɔpera bwa jaga wee."
43006041	Belaa Juda tena la ɛɛ nagre o waa kɛŋɔ o ŋɔ onee kondikwaa tenten aa le nyundua ba la.
43006042	Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Amɔ Josef bie Yeesu la laa kɛɛ? Ya jemɛ o nya ne o mɛɛ bwa. Aah ɛrɛɛ o berɛ ŋɔ nyunduaa o te le ba nɔɔ?"
43006043	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Hé gel n waa nagra dɔŋa be gɛ.
43006044	Nomɛlbwa aa won ba n be nemenɛ n Mɛɛ la gbagba waa tom mɛ la tɛro ba n be, asɛ tɔpera bwa jaga wee la, ń iru seo ta.
43006045	Ba chwerɔ do Korowii keamere tɔne bini ŋɔ, 'Korowiirii dɛɛ ba nomɛlbwa waa bagla.' Anomanta nomɛlbwa Korowii aa dɛ baglo o waa la asɛ wɛɛ hweli la, wɛɛ ba n bee.
43006046	A ta ɛɛ kɛŋɔ nomɛl na Korowii siwi ne ka, nemenɛ men maa le o be nyundua dɛ ba la gbo.
43006047	Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, nomɛlbwa waa yarada mɛ la dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe.
43006048	Menee kondikwaa waa dɛ tɛ Korowii mkpa la.
43006049	He naanar fa di kondikwaa ane soo baa yera maana aa le nyundua, kɛ ba serewɔ.
43006050	Kondikwaa nɔ maa dɛ bol o waa nɔ, nyunduaa o ge le, kɛ nomɛlbwa waa di a gɛ kondikwaa nɔ soo la waa sewɛ.
43006051	Menee kondikwaa aa le nyundua ba dɛ dɔ mkpa la. Nomɛlbwa waa di gɛ kondikwaa nɔ la ɛɛ dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe. Asɛ kondikwaa maa kpɔ tɛ nɛwɛnyini bwa bá di dɛ dɔ mkpa laanee n bo-ol."
43006052	Belaa Juda tena la berɛ dɛɛ tɔŋle dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Aah ɛrɛɛ wɛɛ ba wona tɛ yaa o bo-ol yaa di o?"
43006053	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, dɛ nomɛlbwa ta n Nɛn Bie la bo-ol dii asɛ dɛ nyɔ n chal aa, amɔ dɛ o ta mkpa la dɔe.
43006054	Nomɛlbwa waa di n bo-ol asɛ dɛ nyɔ n chal ge la dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe, asɛ tɔpera bwa jaga wee la, ń iru seo ta.
43006055	N bo-olii kondikwaa tenten, asɛ n chal gee nee tenten.
43006056	Nomɛlbwa waa di n bo-ol asɛ dɛ nyɔ n chal la, n ne wɛɛ ɛ beŋkpoŋii, waa wola won dagre o te n nɛɛ kpa.
43006057	N Mɛɛ waa tom mɛ laanee mkpa dɔɔ la, anomanta o gelɔ n ge dɔ mkpa. Gɛɛ nomɛlbwa waa di n bo-ol la, mɛɛ ba gela o dɔ mkpa.
43006058	Kondikwaa aa le nyundua ba dɛɛ tɛ mkpa laanee nɔ, o ta do kɛŋɔ he naanarwa kondikwaa baa dia mkpa aa wola toole a ta ba serewe la. Nomɛlbwa waa di kondikwaa nɔ la ɛɛ dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe."
43006059	Kapeeneɔm cheremi deaa Yeesu do dɛɛ bagle nɛra waa dɛ bol a gɛ waa nɔ.
43006060	O habɔteŋra la aa no gɛ la, ba kɛrɛdɛ ŋɔ, "Waa nɔ te kpegri kohona to, yaa won ɛ gɛ."
43006061	Yeesu aa naa kɛ o habɔteŋra la dɛ nagre waa la waa la, o pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Gɛ waa nɔ kpegri tɛ heyaa kɛɛ?
43006062	Dɛ he fe na n Nɛn Bie la n berɛ dɛɛ kaa nyundua bela maa lea ba la ge sɛh?
43006063	Hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge gbosoroo dɛɛ tɛ mkpa. Nɛwɛnyini bokpega te ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ. Waa maa dɛ bol he be nɔ dɛ ba Korowii Domadɛɛge la ne asɛ dɛɛ tɛ heyaa mkpa.
43006064	Kɛ he bini bane ta yaradae." Mumpar la bwa dɛ Yeesu te jemɛ ba bini banɔ la baa wola yaradae dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo ne naate waa leo tɛ bá kpoo la.
43006065	Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ, "Anɔ waa n ŋɔ nomɛlbwa aa won ba n be nemenɛ n Mɛɛ Korowii leo tɛ mɛ la."
43006066	A gɛ waa nɔ taa a che nɛra ba faa teŋɛ o nɛɛ la kɛrɛdɛ le mumur dɛ gel o nɛɛ teŋa.
43006067	Anee o bɔɔ o habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la ŋɔ, "He ge dɛ nyin kaala kɛɛ?"
43006068	Asɛ Seemɔn Pita ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, dɛ ya le he be naa, ume bee yaa ba kaala ɔ? He wobol taa mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe do.
43006069	Ya dɛ yaradae, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ henee Korowii Bidɛɛge la."
43006070	Belaa Yeesu chaŋe ŋɔ, "Menee le he nɛra fi dɛ banɛ nɔ, kɛ he bini bɛl ɛ Bɔnsam nɛn."
43006071	Dɛ Seemɔn Eskareɔt bie Judas waa wɛɛ bol la. O habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la bɛlee, kɛ onee dɛ ba leo tɛ.
43007001	Anɔ habɔɔ la, dɛ Galilia harɛ ta gboo Yeesu do dɛɛ gaage. Dɛ waa nyin kɛ o la Judia harɛ te ta, dɛkalkɛ dɛ bela nomonome la dɛ nyin o bɔr dɛ́ kpoo.
43007002	Gɛ saŋ la dɛ a ka tama Juda tena tɔpejen bɛl ba yon dɛɛ do kukure dɛɛ so a bini tɔpera anuatoro la tel bá di.
43007003	Anee Yeesu nimanar ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Le bonɔ dɛ kaa Judia harɛ ta ásɛ he habɔteŋra baa lɔ bela la ka na he nyokpowaa haa dɛ ɛ nɔ.
43007004	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin kɛ nɛra jemɛ o waa la, waa o waa ɛɛ dɛɛ sɔh. Anomanta gel nɛra bwa na he we-ɛɛla nɔ."
43007005	O nimanar la gbabir ta on yaradae.
43007006	Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He te, tɔpere bɛlbwa wer tɛ heyaa kɛ he la bela, kɛ n te tɔpere ta tele mɔɔ.
43007007	Heyaa harɛ nɔ ta nɛra aa wola haeh, kɛ ba hah n te, dɛkalkɛ saŋ bɛlbwaa mɛɛ bol ŋɔ ba we-ɛɛla aa were.
43007008	Hé kaa ka di tɔpejen la. Tɔpere n te aa ba bela la ta tele mɔɔ."
43007009	Waa bol gɛ la, o kwaarɔ so Galilia harɛ ta.
43007010	Yeesu nimanar la aa kaa gɛ tɔpejen la dii la, a habɔɔ o ge ir dɛ la bela. O kpɔ o te sɔh, o ta nɛra baah valɛ.
43007011	Dɛ Juda tena nomonome la dɛ gaage o bɔr tɔpejen la dii ta asɛ dɛɛ pɛɛ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Leperaa baa la doɔ?"
43007012	Dɛ nɛnlaa la kɛrɛdɛ dɛ ŋwalɛ o wa. Bane ŋɔ, "O ɛ nɛndɛɛge." Bane ge ŋɔ, "Akai, nɛra gboo wɛɛ negre."
43007013	Bɛlbwa ta bolɛ asɛ a le baŋ nɛra no, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ Juda tena nomonome la.
43007014	Baa di Kukure tɔpera la tel baah ta la, Yeesu kaa jo Korowii Dea dɛ pa mun dɛɛ bagle nɛra Korowii Wa.
43007015	O webagla la ɛ Juda tena la nyokpoa kohona, asɛ baa bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ gɛ baa nɔ won jemɛ anɔ bwa, dɛ o ta tɔnjereme ɛɛ nɔɔ?"
43007016	Belaa o chaŋe ŋɔ, "Waa maa dɛ bagle nɔ ta n gbagba be leɛ, a bwa le Korowii waa tom mɛ la be.
43007017	Dɛ nomɛlbwa sɛoh kɛ wɛɛ ɛ Korowii tetoowaa te naa, wɛɛ won jemɛ kɛŋɔ kasinteŋ waa aa le Korowii bee mɛɛ bol la. N gbagba webagla laa.
43007018	Dɛ nɛn kpɔ o kpegri dɛɛ bagle wa aa, o nyin sɔn dɛɛ tɛ o gbagba. Nɛn waa nyin sɔn dɛɛ tɛ nɛn waa tomɔ la te la, o waa dɔ kasinteŋ, waa nɛra negre.
43007019	"Mosis ta heyaa Korowii mmara la tɛɛ yaa? Asɛ he bini bɛlbwa toole dɛ teŋɛ a ta. Aah dɛ ɛrɛɛ he berɛ dɛɛ nyin mɛ dɛ kpo nɔɔ?"
43007020	Belaa nɛnlaa la bane ŋɔ, "Dɛ kpoe nɛ? Jamɔ komɛl gale he sie. Umee dɛɛ nyini dɛ kpo ɔ?"
43007021	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Webeŋkpoŋ gboo n ɛ asɛ he nyoa kpo gɛ la.
43007022	Mosis bee he dɔ penteŋa mmara la. O be laa penteŋa le te, he naanaree pa a mun. Anomanta he won bie pen teŋa Ona Tɔpere kwaraa ta.
