43007023	Dɛ he lolɛ bie o yawanyoa chig Ona Tɔpere ta naa, he dɛ teŋe o pen, dɛkalkɛ haa nyin he chɔg Mosis Mmara la. Dɛ gɛɛ te naa, ɛrɛɛ he baah berɛ di n nɛɛ kɛ maa chah nɛn Ona Tɔpere ta nɔ?
43007024	Hɛ́ɛ pese wobɛlbwa kɛrɛdɛ mɔɔ dɛɛ bola. He bɛ ŋɔ waane aa were dɛ he ta a bini nyiŋe."
43007025	Bela la dɛ Jerusalam tena bane dɛ bol ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ laa baa nyin o bɔr dɛ́ kpo la kɛɛ?
43007026	Na, onee chegɛ nɛra baah ta dɛɛ bol waa asɛ ba bwa tɔ nyoa che la. Nomonome ken nao kɛŋɔ onee Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la.
43007027	Akai! Baa nɔ te, ya jemɔ dɛ jemɛ o lee bɔr, kɛ Kristo la te, dɛ o balaa, nomɛlbwa aa o leebɔree jemɛ."
43007028	Dɛ Yeesu chegɛ Korowii Dea bela dɛɛ bol wa. Aa ba gɛ la o kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "He jem mɛ dɛ jemɛ bela maa lea. N gbagba kpegri ne laa n ba. Korowii waa ɛ kasinteŋ te laanee tom mɛ. Haa on jemɛ.
43007029	N te jemɔ, dɛkalkɛ o bee n le, on tom mɛ n ba nɔ."
43007030	Anɔ nomanta ba fe dɛ lawɔ, asɛ ba ta wone, dɛkalkɛ dɛ o tɔpere ta tele mɔɔ.
43007031	Nɛnlaa la kɛrɛdɛ bwa yaradao, asɛ dɛɛ bol ŋɔ, "Amɔ dɛ Kristo la baa ba naa, wɛɛ won dɛɛ ɛ nyokpowaa kohona dɛ gwaa anɔ baa nɔ aa dɛ ɛ nɔ kenɛ?"
43007032	Farisii tena la aa noa kɛŋɔ nɛnlaa la dɛ ŋwalɛ Yeesu waa dɔŋa be la, ba ne Sɔfonomonome la tomɛ nɛra baa dɛ daah Korowii Dea la ŋɔ bá ka lawɔ.
43007033	Dɛ Yeesu dɛ bol ŋɔ, "Tɔpera anɛ bɛlee mɛɛ ba he be bonɔ soga. Maa bigri asɛ dɛ berɛ kaa naate waa tom mɛ la be.
43007034	Hɛɛ baa nyin n bɔree, kɛ haa men na, dɛkalkɛ bela maa do la, haa won ba bela."
43007035	Anee Juda tena nomonome la bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Amɔ leperaa baa nɔ ɛɛ nyin kaala asɛ yaa wola on ba na kpa nɔɔ? O ken ɛɛ kaa Juda tena baa jo pua ka so Grik tena harɛ ta la bee, dɛ́ kaa chagle Grik tena o waa la kɛɛ?
43007036	O ŋɔ, yaa ba nyin o bɔree kɛ yaa on na, asɛ bela waa dɛ kaa ge la, bɛlbwa aa won ba o be. Aah dɛ ɛrɛɛ wɛɛ chagle nɔɔ?"
43007037	Ba Kukure tɔpera la dii ta tɔpere waa baa ka mun dɛ ɛ tɔpejen tenten la, Yeesu iro che dɛ kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa nyɔgre aa dɛ kpoo la, ó ba n be ń tɛo nee ó nyɔ.
43007038	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ yarada mɛ la, mɛɛ ɛo gɛ Korowii Tɔn aa bagla laanee. Dɛ́, 'Nee waa dɔ mkpa la ɛɛ dɛɛ le o nɛɛ saŋ bɛlbwaa kɛŋɔ moo aa dɛ palɛ la.' "
43007039	Nee nɔ waa bol o waa nɔ, Korowii Domadɛɛge la waa ba kpɔ do nɛra baa yaradao la nɛɛ la waa o bol la. Gɛ saŋ la dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la ta balɛ mɔɔ, dɛkalkɛ dɛ Yeesu ta o jirima dɔe mɔɔ.
43007040	Nɛnlaa la bini bane no o waa waa bola la, dɛ ŋɔ, "Korowii keame laanee baa nɔ kpela."
43007041	Bane ŋɔ, "Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa laanee." Asɛ bane ge tɔŋle ŋɔ, "Galilia harɛ taa Kristo la ɛɛ ba lee ba naa?
43007042	Korowii Tɔn ta baglɛ kɛŋɔ Kristo la ɛɛ ɛ Devid naanar la bɛlee dɛ le o bwɛɛ Bɛtlɛham aa?"
43007043	Anomanta nyopɛo ta ba bini balɛ kpa, Yeesu gbosoroo wa.
43007044	Asɛ bane ɛɛ nyin dɛ lawɔ, kɛ nomɛlbwa ta wone kpɔ nɔn lego.
43007045	Belaa nɛra baa dɛ daah Korowii Dea la berɛ kaa Sɔfonomonome ne Farisii tena la be dɛ ka bol, asɛ ba ge bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he ta on lawɛ ba nɔ?"
43007046	Anee ba ŋɔ, "Baa la waa waa dɛ bol la, nomɛlbwa ta o wobol dɔŋa bolɛ bwa."
43007047	Asɛ Farisii tena la berɛ pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Jamɔ o wono negre he ge kɛɛ?
43007048	He na ya nomonome nɔ bini bɛl kɛŋɔ waa dɛ yaradao waa? Kɛɛ he na Farisii tena la bɛl kɛ waa dɛ yaradao?
43007049	A gɛ nɛnlaa nɔ te la, baa Mosis Mmara la jemɛ. Dɛ Korowii nyotaahna lag ba."
43007050	Belaa Nikodeemɔs waa ɛ Farisii te dɛ faa la Yeesu be ka la bɔɔ ba ŋɔ,
43007051	"Mosis Mmara ta, yaa wonoo pa nɛn bolchɔge dɛ ya ta on yerɛ dɛ bɔɔro dɛ jemɛ waa waa ɛa mɔɔ naa?"
43007052	Anee ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Jamɔ he ge le Galilia harɛ kɛɛ? Dɛ he pese Korowii Tɔn la bini dɛ na naa, hɛɛ nao kɛŋɔ Korowii keame aa Galilia harɛ taa le ba bwa."
43007053	Belaa ba bwa ir kaa ba deremi.
43008001	Asɛ Yeesu kaa bwe baa dɛ yerɔ Ɔlevere Bwe la ta.
43008002	Bɔr aa dɛ chaah chɔmbibi la, o berɛ kaa Korowii Dea. Belaa nɛnlaa ba o be dɛ ba baro cheme, asɛ o so harɛ dɛɛ chag ba Korowii Wa.
43008003	Asɛ Tɔn Jerema ne Farisii tena lawɛ haah bɛl waa dɛ bɔ jwamane dɛ ba o ne Yeesu be, dɛ gel o ba che ba bwa baah ta.
43008004	Asɛ ba ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ya lawɛ haah nɔ dɛ o ne baa bɛl waa wola o jaa ɛɛ chɔɔ.
43008005	Mosis Mmara dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ haah waa do ken la chɛ kɛŋɔ ba fogro bwea kpo. Amɔ taraken ɛrɛɛ he ge ŋɔɔ?"
43008006	Ba pɛɛro gɛ waa nɔ dɛ́ kpɔ daahno dɛ na kɛŋɔ wɛɛ bol waanee ásɛ ba fee dɔ o nyoa lawɛ. Belaa Yeesu joŋi asɛ dɛ kpɔ o nonii dɛɛ chwerɛ harɛ.
43008007	Ba taa chega dɛɛ pɛɛro waa gɛ la, o iro che asɛ dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé bini bɛlbwa waa wola wechɔga ɛɛ bwa la tɔ sie ta bwe forɔ."
43008008	Asɛ dɛ berɛ kwaa joŋi dɛɛ chwerɛ harɛ ja.
43008009	Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, bɛlbwa lii o wechɔga waa ɛa. Bɛlbwa ta wone kpɔ kon forɔ kpa, dɛ bwa pegre. Ba nomonomee tɔ sie dɛ kaa beŋkpoŋa beŋkpoŋa a ba tel bechale nɛɛ dɛ ba tonɛ, a ba ka Yeesu ne haah la o ta che bela gɛ.
43008010	Asɛ Yeesu ir che, dɛ pɛɛ haah la ŋɔ, "Leperaa ba kaalɔ? Ba bini bɛlbwa toole dɛ́ pae bolchɔge kpaa?"
43008011	Anee o ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh, n Dɔɔ, bɛlbwa toole." Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Ate n ge aa hen bolchɔgee pa kpa. Kaa, kɛ bɛ wechɔga ka ɛ kpa."
43008012	Yeesu bol waa bagle Farisii tena la ja, dɛ ŋɔ, "N ɛ kandea dɛ chaah harɛ nɔ ta nɛra. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ teŋɛ n nɛɛ la aa biro taa valɛ bwa, wɛɛ valɛ bochaah taa dɛ dɔ mkpa."
43008013	Belaa Farisii tena la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Henee bol he waa dɛ gbagba berɛ di he te danseɛ, anomanta nyosonee hɛɛ teŋe."
43008014	Anee o ŋɔ, "Akai. A lole kɛ n dɛ di n gbagba danseɛ te, kɛ kasinteŋii mɛɛ bol, dɛkalkɛ n jemɛ bela maa lea ne bela maa dɛ kaa. Haa n leebɔr ne n kaabɔr jemɛ.
43008015	Harɛ nɔ ta liiree he kpɔ nyiŋi nɛn dɛɛ bol wa, kɛ n te aa bole pa.
43008016	Dɛ mɛɛ ɛ gɛ kwaraa yaa, mɛɛ ɛa a togre, dɛkalkɛ n gbo laa, n Mɛɛ waa tom mɛ la ja n nɛ.
43008017	He mmarare la dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ webeŋkpoŋ nɛra banɛ bwa aa bol la ɛ kpela.
43008018	N gbagbaa dɛɛ di n te danseɛ, asɛ n Mɛɛ la waa tom mɛ la ge ɛ danseɛ dɛ ja n nɛɛ wobɛlbwa maa dɛ ɛ ta."
43008019	Asɛ ba pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Leperaa he mɛɛ nɔ doɔ?" Anee o ŋɔ, "Gɛ haa wola men jemɛ nɔ, gɛɛ haa wola n Mɛɛ la ge jemɛ," dɛ berɛ ŋɔ, "Dɛ he fe jem mɛ naa, he fe jemɛ n Mɛɛ la ge."
43008020	Korowii Dea suuga tae dakare bɔr belaa Yeesu do dɛɛ bagle waa dɛ bol gɛ waa nɔ. Bɛlbwa ta wone lawɔ, dɛkalkɛ dɛ o tɔpere ta tele mɔɔ.
43008021	Asɛ Yeesu berɛ bol waa bagle nɛra la ja ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ ba kaaloo he gaage dɛɛ nyin n bɔr, kɛ haa men na. He wechɔga taa hɛɛ ba sewa. Bela maa kaa la, haa won ba bela."
43008022	Anee Juda tena nomonome la bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "O ŋɔ yaa won la bela waa dɛ kaa! Jamɔ wɛɛ kpo o tenee kɛɛ?"
43008023	Belaa Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Harɛ nɔ ta nɛraa heya, asɛ n ge le nyundua. He le harɛ nɔ ta, kɛ n te, harɛ nɔ ta laa n le.
43008024	A waa n ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, hɛɛ sewɛ he wechɔga taa la. Dɛ nomɛlbwa ta men yaradae kɛŋɔ menee men te naa, hɛɛ sewɛ he wechɔga taa."
43008025	Belaa ba bɔɔro ja ŋɔ, "Henee ume o?" Asɛ o chaŋe ŋɔ, "Anee n ŋɔ he be chɔɔ bwa la.
43008026	N fe dɔ he waa dɛ́ bol kohona he di bolchɔge a ta, kɛ maa bol. Naate waa tom mɛ la waa dɔ kasinteŋ nomanta n wobɛlbwa maa bol la ɛ waa aa le o be."
43008027	Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, ba ta o waa la mun noɛ kɛŋɔ o Mɛɛ Korowii la waa wɛɛ bol.
43008028	Anomanta o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Awola haa gɔɔ n Nɛn Bie la nyundua la, belaa hɛɛ ba n nae kɛŋɔ menee men kpela, asɛ dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ n gbagba kpegri ne laa mɛɛ ɛ wa, kɛ anɔ la n Mɛɛ la aa ŋɔ n be laanee mɛɛ bol.
43008029	Naate waa tom mɛ la ja n nɛ, o ta men tae, dɛkalkɛ n dɛ ɛ anɔ la aa dɛ too o tea."
43008030	Nɛra baa no Yeesu waa la kɛrɛdɛ yaradao.
43008031	Asɛ o ŋɔ Juda tena baa yaradao la be ŋɔ, "Dɛ he gelɔ n waa maa bagle heyaa la do he bambile bini hɛɛ teŋɛ a ta te naa, dɛ he ɛ n habɔteŋra kpela,
43008032	dɛ won jemɛ kasinteŋ la asɛ kasinteŋ la gel he dɔ he te."
43008033	Anee ba ŋɔ, "Abraham naanaree ya te, nomɛlbwa nɛndɔɔla laa yan. Aah, ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ bagle kɛŋɔ yaa dɔ ya tenee yaa wola nɛndɔɔlaa ɛ kpa nɔɔ?"
43008034	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ wechɔga la ɛ nɛndɔɔle. Wechɔga yawɔ yom.
43008035	Nɛndɔɔle aa o dɔɔ deemii do ka tonɛ, kɛ dem te bie te ɛɛ do dem belaa saŋ bɛlbwa.
43008036	Anomanta dɛ men Korowii Bie la lɛ heyaa dɛ gel he dɔ he te naa, amɔ te dɛ he dɔ he te kɛrɛdɛ.
43008037	"N gbabir jemɔ kɛŋɔ he ɛ Abraham naanar, kɛ he berɔ dɛɛ nyin mɛ dɛ kpo, dɛkalkɛ haa n webagla yarada.
43008038	Waa n Mɛɛ aa bag mɛɛ mɛɛ bol he be la, asɛ he gee ɛ anɔ la he mɛɛ aa bola he no."
43008039	Anee ba ŋɔ, "Ya mɛɛɛ Abraham." Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "Dɛ Abraham bii tentenee heya aa, he fe dɛ ɛ o we-ɛɛla siwi.
43008040	N waa maa dɛ bol saŋ bɛlbwa la ɛ kasinteŋ waa maa noa le Korowii be, kɛ he dɛ nyin mɛ dɛ kpo. Gɛɛ Abraham ɛ aa?
43008041	He ge mɛɛ toma siwii hɛɛ ɛ la." Anee ba ŋɔ, "Nyoasɛm bii laa yan oo, Korowii gboo ya Mɛɛ."
43008042	Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Dɛ he mɛɛɛ Korowii kpela aa, he fe dɛ nyin n wa, dɛkalkɛ o bee n le ba dɛ do bonɔ taraken nɔ. N gbagba kpegri ne laa n ba, onee tom mɛ.
43008043	Ɛrɛɛ haa wola n waa mun no nɔɔ? Haa wola nyin kɛ he teŋɛ a ta la waa.
43008044	Bɔnsam biirii heya. Waa waa dɛ nyin ɛɛ laanee he gee nyin ɛɛ. Chɔɔ bwaa o le nɛŋkpoa we-ɛɛla ne, waa kasinteŋ ŋwɛnɛ kpɔ nemenɛ nyosone gbo. O ŋɔ o bol wa aa, nyosone gboo wɛɛ teŋe, dɛkalkɛ o daa. O ɛ nyosonteŋni, asɛ nyosone bwa kooro on.
43008045	Kɛ n te maa dɛ bol kasinteŋ la waa haa wola men yarada la.
43008046	He bini umee dɛ won chagle kɛ n ɛ wechɔga ka ɔ? Aah dɛ n dɛ bol kasinteŋ aa, ɛrɛɛ haa wola men yarada ɔ?
43008047	Nomɛlbwa waa ɛ Korowii bie la dɛ no o wa. Haa wola o bii ɛɛ la waa haa wola o waa nyin dɛ no la."
43008048	Belaa Juda tena la bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Nyosonee yaa teŋe kɛ yaa ŋɔa ŋɔ, he ɛ Samaria te kwaa do he nɛɛ la aa?"
43008049	Anee o ŋɔ, "Kwaa toole n nɛ, n Mɛɛ sɔnee mɛɛ kwaa, asɛ he te ɛɛ chɔg mɛ.
43008050	Sɔn laa mɛɛ nyin. Nɛn waa nyin sɔn dɛɛ tɛ mɛ la lole. Onee dɛ ba pa nomɛlbwa bole.
43008051	Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, nomɛlbwa waa no n waa nɔ dɛ teŋɛ a ta la aa sewɛ bwa."
43008052	Anee Juda tena la ŋɔ, "Ya ta ŋɔe yaa? Kwaa lɔ he nɛ. Ya nabaa Abraham ne Korowii keamere la gba serewɔ, gɛɛ he te ŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa no he waa nɔ dɛ teŋɛ a ta la aa sewɛ bwa naa?
43008053	He gwaa ya nabaa Abraham waa sewa la kɛɛ? Korowii keamere la ge serewɔ. Aah dɛ ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ lii he te nɔ?"
43008054	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "N gbagba dɛ nyin sɔn aa, a ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ, kɛ n Mɛɛ la haa dɛ bol o waa ŋɔ onee he Korowii laanee dɛɛ tɛ mɛ sɔn.
43008055	Haa on jemɛ, kɛ n te jemɔ. Dɛ n ŋɔ maa on jemaa, dɛ n ɛ nyosonteŋni kɛ heya. N jemɔ asɛ dɛɛ no o deŋna wa.
43008056	He nabaa Abraham sie lɛo wɛɛ tamane n bala wa. O nao o baah sɔɔhno."
43008057	Asɛ ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He ta bene fifraanue gba dii mɔɔ, gɛɛ he na Abraham aa?"
43008058	Anee o ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, baa wola Abraham lolɛ mɔɔ la dɛ n lole."
43008059	Belaa ba pa bwea ŋɔ ba dɛ fogro, asɛ o sɔh dɛ le Korowii Dea bela kaa.
43009001	Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra aa dɛ valɛ la, o na baa bɛl baa lolɔ nyoŋe.
43009002	Belaa o habɔteŋra la bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Nomoa, baa nɔ ne o nya ne o mɛɛ, ba bini ume wechɔgaa ba nyoŋa nɔ ne nɔɔ?"
43009003	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ ne o lolanar bini bɛlbwa wechɔga be laa a le. Gɛ Korowii aa chagle o kpegri o nɛɛ waa a ba gɛ la.
43009004	A wer kɛŋɔ bɔr aa chaahna nɔ, ya swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ ɛ Naate waa tom mɛ la toma, dɛkalkɛ bɔr dɛ ba bira nomɛlbwa aa wola won ɛ toma bɛlbwa kpa.
43009005	N taa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta bonɔ nɔ, menee kandea dɛɛ chaah nɛra bwa."
43009006	Waa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o ta nentane ta harɛ dɛ tegɛ a ne teera, dɛ kpɔ fɔgɛ baa la sie.
43009007	Asɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "La tam la baa dɛ yerɔ Siloam la ta dɛ ka samɛ he sie." Gɛ sɔn Siloam la munii kɛŋɔ "Ba tomɔ." Waa laŋa dɛ ka samɛ o sie la tonɛ la, dɛ o dɛ na, dɛ berɛ ba buse.
43009008	Belaa o bala ne nɛra ba faa nao ka kɛ o fa nyoŋɔ dɛɛ soŋe kwaa la ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ laa fa yon so dɛɛ soŋe kwaa la aa?"
43009009	Bane ŋɔ, "Onee," asɛ bane ge ŋɔ, "Akai, o laa, lee wɛɛ leo." Asɛ baa la ge gbagba ŋɔ, "Menee!"
43009010	Anee ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ a ɛ he berɛ ɛɛ na nɔɔ?"
43009011	Belaa o ŋɔ, "Baa la baa dɛ yerɔ Yeesu laanee ta nentane dɛ tegɛ a ne teera pɛ dɛ kpɔ fɔgɛ n sie, dɛ ŋɔ ń la Siloam ta dɛ́ ka samɛ ta. Asɛ maa laŋa dɛ ka samɛ la, bug la ta mɛɛ na la."
43009012	Anee ba pɛɛro ja ŋɔ, "Leperaa o dɔɔ?" Asɛ o ŋɔ, "Maa jemɛ bela waa lole."
43009013	Belaa ba lawɛ baa la o faa nyoŋa la dɛ kaa o ne Farisii tena sie.
43009014	Dɛ tɔpere Yeesu aa tegɛ nentane pɛ teera ta dɛ kpɔ chaoh la ɛ Ona Tɔpere.
43009015	Belaa Farisii tena la berɛ pɛɛro gɛ aa ɛa asɛ o won dɛɛ na. Anee o ŋɔ, "Kpechɛgree o kpɔ maa n sie asɛ n samɛ ta taraken dɛ won dɛɛ na la."
43009016	Asɛ Farisii tena la bane ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ ta Korowii be leɛ, dɛkalkɛ o chɔg Ona Tɔpere." Bane ge ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ wechɔg-ɛɛ ɛɛ ba wona ɛ nyokpowaa nɔ dɔŋa baa nɔ aa ɛa nɔɔ?" A chegɛ a ta ba nyoa ta pɛɛ kpa.
43009017	Asɛ Farisii tena la berɛ pɛɛ baa la ja ŋɔ, "He ŋɔ o chaeh dɛ gel hɛɛ na bɔr, taraken nɔ, ɛrɛɛ he na o wa ɔ?" Anee o ŋɔ, "Korowii keamee on."
43009018	Dɛ Juda tena nomonome la te dɛ tɔŋle ŋɔ, ba fe aa yarada kɛŋɔ o fa nyoŋɔ ka asɛ dɛ berɛ dɛɛ na, nemenɛ baa na o nya ne o mɛɛ mɔɔ.
43009019	Ba yer ba dɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "He bie nɔ naa? He ŋɔ haa lolɔ dɛ o nyoŋɔ ɛ? Aah ɛrɛɛ a ɛ asɛ o berɛ won dɛɛ na nɔ?"
43009020	Anee ba ŋɔ, "Ya jemɔ kɛ ya biee. Yaa lolɔ dɛ o nyoŋɔ.
43009021	Kɛ yaa gɛ aa ɛa asɛ wɛɛ na ne naate waa gela wɛɛ na te waa jemɛ. Amɔ hé pɛɛ o gbagba na nɔ, dɛkalkɛ o kpego dɛ won bol wa."
43009022	Dɛ Juda tena nomonome laanee baa ɔmɛ waa ba ŋɔ gɛ. Nomonome la ɛ nyoa beŋkpoŋ kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa ŋɔ Yeesu ɛ Kristo la, baa doŋi naatee o bɛ ba cheremi dea jo kpa.
43009023	A waa o nya ne o mɛɛ ŋɔ o kpego ŋɔ bá pɛɛro la.
43009024	Ba berɔ yerɛ baa la o faa nyoŋa la nɛɛtena, asɛ dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nyiŋi Korowii dɛ bol kasinteŋ. Ya te jemɔ kɛ baa nɔ waa chaeh nɔ ɛ wechɔg-ɛɛ."
43009025	Belaa o ŋɔ, "Dɛ o ɛ wechɔg-ɛɛ ne o ta ɛɛ yoo, n te aa jemɛ. Webeŋkpoŋ maa jema laanee kɛ, n fa nyoŋɔ asɛ taraken dɛ berɛ dɛɛ na."
43009026	Anee ba berɛ pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Aah ɛrɛɛ o ɛɛ nɔ? Bɔkwa waa o ɛ dɛ won pili he sie nɔɔ?"
43009027	Anee o ŋɔ, "N faa bol he be wubwa la, he vɛh noe. Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ nyin kɛ n bol ja ɔ? He ge dɛ nyin he ɛ o habɔteŋra kɛɛ?"
43009028	Belaa ba chɛgro kohona, asɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "Henee o habɔteŋre! Ya te, Mosis habɔteŋraa yan.
43009029	Gɛ yaa jema laanee kɛ Korowii bol waa dɛ bagle Mosis, kɛ baa nɔ te, yaa o leebɔr jemɛ."
43009030	Asɛ baa la chaŋe ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa nɔɔ? Heyaa ŋɔa haa o leebɔr jemɛ, kɛ o gelɔ n te won dɛɛ na.
43009031	Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii deŋna toole wechɔg-ɛɛra be. O deŋna lɔ banɔ la baa dɛ duuru dɛɛ ɛ waa waa dɛ nyin la be.
43009032	Le harɛ mumpar bwa, umee noa kɛŋɔ nomɛl wono pili nɛn baa lolɔ dɛ o nyoŋɔ sie bwa nɔ?
43009033	Dɛ Korowii be laa baa nɔ le ba naa, o fe aa won ɛ waa nɔ dɔŋa."
43009034	Anee ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He ne he wechɔgaa ba lolɛ. Gɛɛ he ŋɔ hé chagle yaa wa aa?" Asɛ ba doŋu cheremi dea bela bala kwara.
43009035	Yeesu aa noa kɛŋɔ ba doŋu cheremi dea bala la, o nyin o bɔr asɛ dɛ pɛɛro ŋɔ, "He dɛ yarada Nɛn Bie la aa?"
43009036	Asɛ o pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Nomoa, umee naate la ásɛ he chag mɛ n jemɔ dɛ yaradao wɔ?"
43009037	Anee o ŋɔ, "Naatee he den na gɛ la, o ne henee dɛɛ bol waa la."
43009038	Belaa baa la ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, n dɛ yaradae!" Asɛ dɛ guŋi o sie dɛ tɛo duure.
43009039	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Nɛra waa bola dɛ pa bole waa n ba harɛ nɔ ta, ásɛ nyoŋa berɛ dɛɛ na, ásɛ banɔ la ge baa dɛ na la berɛ nyoŋa."
43009040	Dɛ Farisii tena bane lɔ bela. Baa no gɛ la, ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Amɔ ya ge ɛ nyoŋa kɛɛ?"
43009041	Anee Yeesu chaŋe ŋɔ, "Dɛ he fe sɛoh kɛŋɔ he ɛ nyoŋa kwaraa naa, wechɔga fe toole he nɛ, kɛ haa ŋɔa he dɛ na nomanta, he ta lɔ wechɔga ta."
43010001	Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, dɛ nomɛlbwa jo peera leg bini, dɛ o ta doonyoa chegɛ jo dɛ ka che baŋ bɛl dɛ teeh jo a be naa, dɛ ŋwɛɛree on.
43010002	Kɛ petegre waa ɛ peera te la te, doonyoaa o che dɛɛ jo a be.
43010003	Dɛ o balaa, onee naate waa dɛ daah doonyoa la ɛɛ ba pila tɛ o dɔ bɔr jo a be. Peera la ɛɛ no o taa asɛ o yerɛ anla aa ɛ o kwaa la sɔna a teŋɛ o nɛɛ o le a ne kaa.
43010004	O le o gbagba kwaa la ne naa, o dɛ tɔ a sie asɛ a teŋɛ o nɛ, dɛkalkɛ a jemɛ o taa.
43010005	Aa nɛnhɔɔh nɛɛ teŋɛ bwa. Aa chwao, dɛkalkɛ aa nɛnhɔɔhra taa jemɛ."
43010006	Sɛglaa o kpɔ dɛ bag ba gɛ waa nɔ, kɛ ba ta a mun noɛ.
43010007	Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ ba be ja ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, n do kɛŋɔ peera leg doonyoa la.
43010008	Nɛra baa tɔ n sie dɛ ba la bwa, peera la ta deŋne ba be doe, dɛkalkɛ ba ɛ ŋwɛɛra.
43010009	Menee doonyoa la, gɛ peera aa chegɛ doonyoa dɛ jo dɛɛ le, dɛ dɔ kwaa dɛɛ di la, gɛɛ nomɛlbwa waa yarada mɛ la ɛɛ ba mkpa dɔe.
43010010	Ŋwɛɛ balaa, o balɔ dɛ́ ba ŋwɛ dɛ kpo dɛ chɔg kwa. Wedɛɛga waa laa wɛɛ ba. Kɛ n te balɔ dɛ́ ba tɛ heyaa mkpa ásɛ he dɔ kɛrɛdɛ.
43010011	"Menee Petegredɛɛge la. Dɛ seo kwaraa yaa, mɛɛ kpɔ n nyu charɛ n peera.
43010012	Nɛn waa dɛ nyiŋi peera ta dɛɛ lɛ suuga la, o ta do kɛ petegre peera la aa ɛ o kwa. Paa te la na gbolo bala aa, wɛɛ chwao gela, asɛ o jo a bini dɛ lawɛ ane, dɛ lɔ a kar pegre.
43010013	Wɛɛ chwao gela, dɛkalkɛ o gbabir kwaa laa, o waane laa a wa. O kembɔr gbo waa wɛɛ ɛ.
43010014	"Menee Petegredɛɛge la. Gɛ maa jemɛ n peera la, gɛɛ a ge jem mɛ,
43010015	kɛŋɔ n Mɛɛ aa jem mɛ asɛ n ge jemɔ la. Dɛ seo kwaraa yaa, mɛɛ kpɔ n nyuu charɛ dɛ lɛa.
43010016	N peera ane ta lɔ lega ane bini. Mɛɛ nyin a ge bɔree dɛ tɔ a sie dɛ kpɔa ba ja anɔ ta, asɛ aa no n taa dɛ bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ, dɛ pɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ n nɛ.
43010017	Maa sɛah kɛŋɔ mɛɛ koh n peera waa dɛ sewɛ dɛ berɛ ir seo ta la nomanta n Mɛɛ la dɛ nyin mɛ taeh.
43010018	Lao seo laa mɛɛ ba sewa nɔ. N tetoosewee mɛɛ ba sewa. N dɔ kpegri kɛ ń kpɔ n te tɛ dɛ sewɛ, dɛ berɛ dɔ kpegri kɛŋɔ ń ir seo ta. Gɛɛ n Mɛɛ ŋɔ ń ba ɛ."
43010019	Yeesu aa bol gɛ la, dɛ Juda tena la nyoa ta pɛɛ ba tɔŋle dɔŋa ja.
43010020	Asɛ ba bini kɛrɛdɛ bwa ŋɔ, "Komɛlee gale o sie ta le! O nyu toole! Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ do deŋne onɔ ge be dɛɛ no o waa nɔɔ?"
43010021	Ba bini bane ge ŋɔ, "Dɛ komɛl gale nɛn sie aa, wɛɛ won dɛɛ bol waa ken aa? Chogla te ɛɛ won chah nyoŋe wɛɛ na naa?"
43010022	Dɛ alalawo saŋee, asɛ baa di tɔpejen bɛl baa kpɔa dɛɛ le Korowii Dea kwaara bini Jerusalam la.
43010023	Dɛ Yeesu dɛ valɛ Korowii Dea doonyoa bela baa dɛ yerɔ Solomɔn Doonyoa la,
43010024	asɛ Juda tena ba baro cheme dɛ pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he ta gel yaa ɛ he waa aahna-aahna ken nɔɔ? Dɛ henee Kristo la aa, den gel ya jemɛ."
43010025	Anee o chaŋe ŋɔ, "N ŋɔ he be wubwa, kɛ haa men yarada. N we-ɛɛla bwa maa ɛa la, n Mɛɛ la kpegri nee mɛɛ ɛa asɛ aa di mɛ danseɛ.
43010026	Haa wola n peera ɛɛ waa haa wola men yarada la.
43010027	N peera dɛ no n taa asɛ n jema aa teŋɛ n nɛ,
43010028	asɛ mɛɛ tɛa mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa. Aa sewɛ bwa ge. Nomɛlbwa ge aa won toa n nɔn ta.
43010029	N Mɛɛ la waa kpɔa tɛ mɛ la kpegri gwaa komɛlbwa kpegri, anomanta nomɛlbwa aa won toa o nɔn ta.
43010030	N ne n Mɛɛ la bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ."
43010031	Belaa Juda tena la pa bwea ja ŋɔ baa fogroo kpo.
43010032	Asɛ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "N baa ɛ wedɛɛga kohona n Mɛɛ la kpegri ne he bwa siwi ta asɛ he na. Aah dɛ wedɛɛga nɔ bini ame waa hɛɛ ba men bwea fogra nɔɔ?"
43010033	Anee ba chaŋe ŋɔ, "He wedɛɛga te ɛɛ waa laa yaa ba he kpoe nɔ, kɛ he musu waa haa dɛ bol la waa. Nɛwɛnyinii hen, kɛ he berɔ dɛɛ bagle kɛŋɔ he ɛ Korowii."
43010034	Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Korowii Tɔn baglɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii bolɔ ŋɔ, 'He bɛlbwa ɛ Korowii.' He ta kure dɛ na kɛɛ?
43010035	Dɛ o yerɛ nɛra waa kpɔ o waa la bagle la Korowii aa, dɛ a ɛ kasinteŋ waa yaa wola won vɛh,
43010036	dɛ men n Mɛɛ Korowii aa lee mɛ dɛ tom mɛ harɛ nɔ ta la ŋɔ Korowii Biee men aa, ɛrɛɛ he ŋɔ n dɛ bol musu waa nɔɔ?
43010037	Dɛ maa n Mɛɛ la we-ɛɛla ɛ te naa, he bɛ men yarada.
43010038	Kɛ dɛ n dɛ ɛ o we-ɛɛla aa ɛ nyokpowaa te, dɛ haa men yarada kwaraa naa, hé yarada o nyokpowaa la te asɛ dɛ jemɛ kɛ n ne o ɛ beŋkpoŋ bɛlbwa aa wola won dagre o te o dɔŋ nɛ."
43010039	Bela la, dɛ ba fe dɛ nyin Yeesu dɛ́ lawɔ ja, asɛ o laa o te kpɔ fɛmm dɛ kaa.
43010040	Yeesu le Jɔɔdan Moo la ja dɛ kaa o baŋ bela Jɔn faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la, dɛ ka so bela.
43010041	Nɛra ba o be pirim asɛ dɛ baa bol dɔŋa be ŋɔ, "Jɔn ta nyokpowaa bɛlbwa ɛɛ, kɛ baa nɔ bwara waa Jɔn aa bagla la bwa ɛ kpela."
43010042	Bela la, nɛra yarada Yeesu pirim.
43011001	Baa bɛlee fa lole baa yerɔ Lasorɔs. Dɛ o bwara dɛ weo. Bwɛɛ waa lɔ o ta sɔne Bɛtani. Dɛ gɛ bwɛɛ nɔ taa Mɛɛre ne o nahaah Maata ge do.
43011002	A gɛ Mɛɛre nɔɔ fa fuge nosɔɔhsoma ɛ Yeesu nakpale dɛ kpɔ o nyumpona feera la. O nimambiee Lasorɔs o bwara aa dɛ weo nɔ.
43011003	Asɛ o nimambii la tomɛ nɛra ba ka ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, he dandɛɛge la bwara dɛ weo."
43011004	Yeesu aa no gɛ la, belaa o ŋɔ, "Serewe weela laa wɛɛ we nɔ. Gɛ aa ɛ Korowii dɔ jirima ásɛ a che a ta Korowii Bie la ge dɔ jirima waa a ba gɛ."
43011005	Dɛ Yeesu dɛ nyin Maata ne Mɛɛre ne Lasorɔs bwa taeh.
43011006	Kɛ waa no Lasorɔs weela waa la, o soge bela tɔpera anɛ mɔɔ.
43011007	A habɔɔ la, o ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "Hé gel ya berɛ kaa Judia harɛ ta."
43011008	Anee ba ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, he laa baah bɛl ta bela tena fe ɛɛ nyini dɛ́ fogre bwea kpo la kɛɛ, gɛɛ he berɛ dɛɛ nyin bela laŋa taraken ja aa?"
43011009	Anee o chaŋe ŋɔ, "Le chɔɔ wee aa le ka tel jɔmɔra wee aa jo la, dɔŋhwere fi dɛ anɛ laa aa? Dɛ bɔr chaahnɔ nɛn ɛɛ valaa, waa naa lɔ bwa, dɛkalkɛ wee leɔ bɔr chaah.
43011010	Kɛ dɛ nɛn dɛ valɛ biro ta naa, anee wɛɛ lɔ na, dɛkalkɛ o ta kon dɔe wɛɛ chaahno bɔr. Korowiirii wola o sie chaahnɛ la."
43011011	Waa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o berɔ ŋɔ, "Domii ya dam Lasorɔs chɔ, anomanta mɛɛ lao dɛ́ ka chumu."
43011012	Belaa o habɔteŋra la chaŋo ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, dɛ domii o chɔ te naa, wɛɛ iruu dɛ dɔ bokpega."
43011013	Dɛ Lasorɔs seo waa wɛɛ bol ba be, asɛ ba ge ta a mun noɛ dɛɛ lii o dom chɔe waa la.
43011014	Belaa Yeesu pili a bini chasee ŋɔ, "Lasorɔs sewɔ.
43011015	Kɛ he nomanta la, a do n som kɛ maa wola toole bela o sewɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ an dɛ gel he yarada mɛ. Hé ir yá kaa o be bela!"
43011016	Belaa Tɔmas baa dɛ yerɔ Kpar la ŋɔ o bala Yeesu habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "Hé gel ya pu nomoa ásɛ ya ne o bwa kaa, asɛ dɛ seo kwaraa yaa, yá ne o sewɛ."
43011017	Baa tel bela la, Yeesu noɔ kɛŋɔ o sewɔ ba hugo o dɔ tɔpera anaarɛ.
43011018	Bɛtani ne Jerusalam baah nɛɛ ɛ kwansini anɛɛ.
43011019	Asɛ Juda tena warɛ dɛ ba Maata ne Mɛɛre be dɛ baa bwɛɛ ba ba nimambie la seo wa.
43011020	Maata aa noa kɛŋɔ Yeesu dɛ ba la, o leɔ dɛ ka chemo, asɛ Mɛɛre te ta so dem.
43011021	Maata aa chemo la, o ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, he fe lɔ bonɔ naa, n nimambie nɔ fe ta sewɛ nɔ.
43011022	Kɛ n jemɔ kɛŋɔ taraken kwara, komɛlbwa haa soŋe Korowii la, wɛɛ ɛo tɛɛ."
43011023	Belaa o chaŋo ŋɔ, "He nimambie la ɛɛ ir seo taa dɛ dɔ mkpa."
43011024	Anee Maata ŋɔ, "N jemɔ kɛ tɔpera bwa jaga wee la lala bwa aa ir seo ta la, o gee iruu."
43011025	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Menee dɛɛ chum nɛra seo ta, menee dɛɛ tɛɛ ba mkpa. Nomɛlbwa waa yarada mɛ la, dɛ o sewɔ kwaraa naa, wɛɛ dɔ mkpaa.
43011026	Asɛ nomɛlbwa waa soge le dɛɛ yarada mɛ la, wɛɛ dɔ mkpaa, waa sewɛ bwa. He dɛ yarada gɛ waa nɔ naa?"
43011027	Anee o sɛh ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh, n Dɔɔ, n yaradao kɛŋɔ henee Korowii Bie Kristo baa bola ŋɔ wɛɛ ba harɛ nɔ taa la."
43011028	Maata aa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o berɔ la dem dɛ ka sɔh bol Mɛɛre be ŋɔ, "Nomoa la balɔ dɛɛ pɛɛ he wa."
43011029	Mɛɛre aa no gɛ la, o iro warane asɛ dɛɛ kaa o be.
43011030	Dɛ Yeesu ta bwɛɛ bini joɛ mɔɔ. Dɛ o ta lɔ bela Maata aa baa chemo la.
43011031	Juda tena bane baa lɔ Mɛɛre be dem bela dɛɛ larawe o bwara la aa naa kɛŋɔ o iro dɛ ɛ warane le buse la, ba ge iro teŋɛ dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ o ken dɛ kaa bela baa bil o nimambie la ka wi.
43011032	Mɛɛre aa tel bela Yeesu aa lole asɛ dɛ nao la, o kaa guŋi o sie dɛ ŋɔ, "Nomoa, he fe lɔ bonɔ naa, n nimambie nɔ fe ta sewɛ nɔ."
43011033	Yeesu aa na gɛ waa dɛ wi asɛ Juda tena baa teŋɛ o nɛɛ la gee wi la, o loo kuu asɛ chal valɛ o bwara bini.
43011034	Belaa o pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Leperaa he bilu wɔ?" Anee ba ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, ba dɛ ba na."
43011035	Yeesu wio.
43011036	Asɛ Juda tena la ɛɛ bol dɔŋa be ŋɔ, "Hé na nyina waa dɛ nyinu dɛɛ wi gɛ!"
43011037	Bane ge ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ laa wona gel nyoŋe na la aa? Dɛ o lɔ bonɔ naa, o fe ta wone chah onɔ o fe bɛ sewaa?"
43011038	Belaa Yeesu loo ku, chal valɛ o bwara bini ja, asɛ ba la bela Lasorɔs aa chɔa la. O bɔɔ la, bwee ba komɛ dɛ gbili bwe tɔ o nyoa.
43011039	Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé laa bwe la gbili le bɔɔ la nyoa." Belaa Maata waa ɛ Lasorɔs nimambie la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ. "N Dɔɔ, taraken o ken ka chɔgɔ dɛ do sɔɔh, dɛkalkɛ o tɔpera anaarɛɛ la."
43011040	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "N ta ŋɔe ŋɔ dɛ he yarada mɛ naa, hɛɛ na gɛ Korowii aa dɔ jirimaa yaa?"
43011041	Ba laa bwe la gbili le bɔɔ la nyoa, asɛ Yeesu ha sie nyundua dɛ ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, n dɛ jaame kɛ haa dɛ no n wa.
43011042	N te jemɔ kɛ tɔpere bwaa hɛɛ no n wa. Nɛra baa ja n nɛɛ bonɔ nɔ waa mɛɛ bol gɛ ásɛ ba won jemɛ kɛŋɔ henee tom mɛ la."
43011043	Waa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o kpɔ takpeg dɛ yerɛ lale la ŋɔ, "Lasorɔs, le ba!"
43011044	Asɛ o ir dɛ le bɔɔ la bini. Dɛ yal baa kpɔa vɔrɔwe o nakpale ne o nɔɔra la ta vɔwɔ gɛ, asɛ botire ge vɔwɛ o nyu. Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé pur laala la bwa ásɛ o kaa."
43011045	Juda tena la baa ba Mɛɛre be la aa na gɛ waa nɔ Yeesu aa ɛa la, ba kɛrɛdɛ yaradao.
43011046	Kɛ ba bini bane te berɔ la Farisii tena la be asɛ dɛ ka bol waa Yeesu aa ɛa la bwa.
43011047	Anomanta Sɔfonomonome ne Farisii tena kaa cheme ba Juda tena nomonome baa dɛ nyiŋi ba waa bini la, dɛ ŋɔ, "Aah, ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ɛɛ taraken ɔ? Na nyokpowe-ɛɛla nɔ bwa dɔŋa baa nɔ aa dɛ ɛ.
43011048	Dɛ ya gelo waa, nɛra kɛrɛdɛ bwa ɛɛ yaradao, asɛ a che a ta ya dɔɔranar Room tena dɔ bɔr dɛ ba lɛ ya Korowii Dea nɔ ne harɛ nɔ bwa kpegri dɛɛ di."
43011049	Belaa ba bini bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Kaefas o ɛ Sɔfore Nomoa a gɛ benanyoa la ta la ŋɔ, "He ta liire dɔe ken aa?
43011050	Nɛmbeŋkpoŋ lɛ nɛra bwa seo dɛ sewaa, a ta bɔ kɛ harɛbir bwa aa pagraa?"
43011051	Kaefas gbagba liire laa o kpɔ bol gɛ waa nɔ. Waa ɛ Sɔfore Nomoa laanee Korowii tɛo gɛ liire la o bola ŋɔ Yeesu ɛɛ lɛ Juda tena bwa sewee sewɛ la.
43011052	Juda tena gbo laa. Ba ne Korowii nɛra baa lɔ bobɛlbwa la bwa sewee wɛɛ ba lɛɛ sewɛ dɛ́ lawɛ ba bwa pɛ ásɛ ba ɛ beŋkpoŋ.
43011053	Awolaa ba le pɛ nyoa dɛɛ nyin Yeesu dɛ́ kpo.
43011054	Anomanta dɛ waa o te kpɔe dɛɛ jo Juda tena la bini kpa. O joɔ kaa pua bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Ifram ta, asɛ o ne o habɔteŋra la ka so bela.
43011055	Juda tena Galekaa tɔpere la aa dɛ tel la, nɛra kɛrɛdɛ le ba bwɛɛre ta dɛ kaa Jerusalam dɛ kaa ɛ we-ɛɛla ane dɛ́ laa doŋa kpɔ ba nɛɛ dɛ́ won di tɔpere la.
43011056	Belaa nɛra baa ba Jerusalam la ɛɛ gaage Yeesu bɔr dɛ che Korowii Dea dɛɛ pɛɛ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Wɛɛ ba ya tɔpejen nɔ taa kɛɛ waa ba nɔ? Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ lii rɔ?"
43011057	Dɛ Sɔfonomonome la ne Farisii tena la te dɔɔ bol ŋɔ, dɛ nomɛlbwa jemɛ bela waa lole naa, ó bag ba ásɛ ba ka lawɔ.
43012001	Aa baa ka tɔpera anumɛl bá di Galekaa tɔpere la la, Yeesu berɔ ba Bɛtani dɛ la Lasorɔs la waa chumu seo ta la dem.
43012002	Ba hɔɔhro, o ne nɛra bane ne Lasorɔs so dɛɛ di kwaa la, asɛ Maata tɔɔ dɛɛ tɛɛ ba.
43012003	Anee Mɛɛre kpɔ nosɔɔhsoma loŋbir a yog aa kpega dɛ do wer kohona ba fɔgle Yeesu napaala dɛ kpɔ o nyumpona feera. Asɛ dea la bini bwa sɔɔh do som ken.
43012004	Belaa Yeesu habɔteŋra la bini bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Judas Eskareɔt o taa dɛ ba Yeesu lee tɛ la ŋɔ,
43012005	"Ba fe yog nosɔɔhsoma nɔ dɛ lɛ suugajena dɛ bɔne tɛ nyaara ta bɔ naa?"
43012006	Menɛkɛsɛ ŋɔ nyaara waa hiaoh waa o ŋɔ gɛ la. Waa ɛ ŋwɛɛ waa o ŋɔ gɛ. Dɛ onee dɛɛ kpoŋe ba suuga, asɛ dɛ yon ŋwɛ ane dɛɛ di.
43012007	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Hé gelo jeih ken. Noo o kpɔ dɛɛ hug mɛ.
43012008	He ne nyaara ɛɛ do lee saŋ bɛlbwa. Kɛ n te, maa he bee so ka tonɛ."
43012009	Belaa Juda tena pirim aa noa kɛŋɔ Yeesu lɔ Bɛtani la, ba ba bela dɛɛ nyinu dɛ́ na. O gbo waa laa, Lasorɔs waa chumu seo ta la ge jao.
43012010	Anomanta Sɔfonomonome la vɔrɔwɔ kɛŋɔ bá kpo Lasorɔs gba,
43012011	dɛkalkɛŋɔ o waa Juda tena kɛrɛdɛ vɛh ba nɛɛ teŋa dɛɛ yarada Yeesu dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo.
43012012	Tɔ aa pera la, nɛnlaa baa ba Jerusalam dɛɛ ba ba di Galekaa la noɔ kɛŋɔ Yeesu dɛ ba bela.
43012013	Belaa ba nyin bambie papooni dɛ kpɔ le bwɛɛ bini ka chemo ŋwɛnɛ ta silɛɛ ne dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Woowo! Korowii jam! O swee Israel tena Kooro waa valɛ o sɔn ta dɛɛ ba nɔ andɛɛga."
43012014	Dɛ Yeesu nyin keego bie bɛl, dɛ so o ta gɛ baa chwera Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ,
43012015	"Saayɔn tena, he bɛ ɔmɛ! Hé nyiŋi na! He Kooroo soge keego bie ta dɛɛ ba la."
43012016	Dɛ o habɔteŋra la ta o waa nɔ mun noɛ logla la, dɛ ka tel kɛ Korowii aa tɛo jirima mɔɔ ba ta lii kɛŋɔ ba chwerɛ o bwara waa Korowii Tɔn bini gɛ, asɛ ba ɛo gɛ kpela.
43012017	Dɛ nɛnlaa Yeesu aa yerɛ Lasorɔs lalbɔɔ bini o ir seo ta ba siwi ta la bol gɛ waa ɛa la bwa dɛɛ bagle nɛra.
43012018	Nɛnlaa baa noa kɛŋɔ o ɛ wejena nɔ la koh a waa dɛ ka chemo.
43012019	Belaa Farisii tena la bol dɔŋa be ŋɔ, "Hɛlaa yaa hɛlɛ la! Yaa won ɛo wobɛlbwa noo! Na nɛra bwa aa wura teŋɛ o nɛɛ gɛ!"
43012020	Dɛ Grik tena bane ja nɛra baa kaa Jerusalam dɛɛ la ká tomɛ Korowii Galekaa tɔpere la ta la nɛ.
43012021	Ba la Felep waa le Galilia harɛ bwɛɛ baa dɛ yerɔ Bɛtsaeda la be, dɛ ka soŋo ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ya dɛ nyin Yeesu dɛ́ nao."
43012022	Belaa Felep ka ŋɔ Andriu be, asɛ ba bwa la ka bol Yeesu be.
43012023	Anee o chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "N Nɛn Bie la tɔpere telo kɛŋɔ Korowii tɛ mɛ jirima.
43012024	Kasinteŋ, dɛ ba ta mebii kpɔe du o pɔh aa, waa won ya. O gboo dɛ do le. Dɛ he duu te naa, o dɛ le dɛ ya kɛrɛdɛ.
43012025	Nomɛlbwa o siwi aa swɛɛ harɛ nɔ ta silɛɛ kwaa ta la, wɛɛ paŋɛ o nyuu. Asɛ nomɛlbwa ge o siwi aa wola harɛ nɔ ta silɛɛ kwaa ta lɛ la, wɛɛ dɔ o nyuu dɛ dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la.
43012026	Nomɛlbwa waa sɛh dɛɛ tom mɛ la, wɛ́ɛ teŋɛ n nɛ. Bobɛlbwa maa do la, belaa n toroma gee ba doe. N Mɛɛ la ɛɛ tɛ nomɛlbwa waa dɛ tom mɛ la sɔnee.
43012027	"Taraken n liire ta bobeŋkpoŋ chegɛ. Ɛrɛɛ ń soŋe n Mɛɛ ŋɔɔ? Ń soŋo ŋɔ, 'N Mɛɛ, lɛɛ mɛ le waa nɔ nyoa' aa? Akai! A ta gɛ magrɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ waa nɔ waa n ba."
43012028	Asɛ o ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, gel he sɔn dɔ jirima!" Belaa ba no taa bɛl le nyundua kɛŋɔ, "N gelɔ n sɔn dɔ jirima, kɛ mɛɛ berɔɔ gel o dɔ ja."
43012029	Nɛnlaa baa ja o nɛɛ bela la aa no taa la la, bane ŋɔ bwaalaa kɔra, asɛ ba bane ge ŋɔ nyundua torome bɛlee bol waa o be.
43012030	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "N waa laa ya no gɛ taa nɔ. He waa.
43012031	Tɔpere Korowii aa bol harɛ nɔ ta nɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole la telo, asɛ name gee mɛɛ ba n doŋi Bɔnsam waa ɛ harɛ nɔ ta kpegnɛn la ta.
43012032	Men, baa sag mɛ nyunduaa. Ba baa sag mɛ naa, mɛɛ tɛr nɛra bwaa ba n be."
43012033	Anɔ waa bola nɔ dɛ bagle seo la soosiwi waa dɛ ba sewa.
43012034	Belaa nɛnlaa la chaŋe ŋɔ, "Ya noɔ Korowii Tɔn la ɛɛ bagle kɛŋɔ dɛ Kristo la balaa, waa sewɛ bwa. Aah, ɛrɛɛ he te berɛ ŋɔ Nɛn Bie la chɛ kɛŋɔ ba sagɔ nyundua ɔ? Umee Nɛn Bie nɔ kwaraa te nɔ?"
43012035	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Bɔr taa dɛ chaah he nɛɛ tɔpera anɛ nɔ, hɛ́ɛ valɛ o ta. Dɛ gɛ laa aa, bɔr ɛɛ biruu he nɛ. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ valɛ biro ta la aa bela waa dɛ kaa jemɛ.
43012036	Bɔr taa dɛ chaah he nɛɛ nɔ, hé yarada bochaah la dɛ berɛ bochaah nɛra." Yeesu aa bol gɛ waa nɔ tonɛ la, o le ba baah asɛ dɛ ka sɔh.
43012037	O ɛ nyokpowaa kohona ba siwi ta, kɛ a ne a bwa ba ta on yaradae.
43012038	Anɔ dɛ bagle kɛ Korowii keame Aesaya waa waa bola la ɛ kpela. O bolɔ ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, ya faa bol he waa la, umee yarada yaa ɔ? Ba na he kpegri, kɛ umee wona jemɛ kɛŋɔ henee yɔ?"
43012039	Gɛɛ a do ba ta waa la yaradae, asɛ Aesaya berɛ bol ja ŋɔ,
43012040	"Korowii tɔɔge ba sie, dɛ gel ba bambile do kpegri, gɛ aa ɛ ba sibie bɛ na, asɛ ba liiree bini bɛ chaah ba no a mun, a ba ɛ kɛ baa charɛ ba liire dɛ ba o be o chaah ba."
43012041	Yeesu jirimaa Aesaya na asɛ dɛ bol o waa gɛ la.
43012042	Juda tena nomonome kɛrɛdɛ gba yarada Yeesu, kɛ baa dɛ ɔmɛ Farisii tena nomanta, ba ta bolɛ nomɛlbwa no, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba bolaa, aa geloo ba doŋ ba cheremi dea joe.
43012043	Nɛra bee baa nyin sɔn dɛ gwaa kɛ Korowii aa tɛɛ ba sɔn.
43012044	Belaa Yeesu kpɔ takpeg dɛ ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa yarada mɛ la, n laa wɛɛ yarada. Naate waa tom mɛ laanee wɛɛ yarada la.
43012045	Nomɛlbwa waa na mɛ la, dɛ naate waa tom mɛ laanee o na gɛ la.
43012046	N ba harɛ nɔ ta kɛŋɔ kandea dɛ baa chaah nɛra bwa, ásɛ nomɛlbwa waa yarada mɛ la bɛ biro ta do kpa.
43012047	Dɛ nɛn no n waa la dɛ waa a ta teŋaa, n laa dɛ bol o waa dɛ pa bole, dɛkalkɛ nɛra waa bola dɛ pa bole waa laa n ba harɛ nɔ ta. Nɛra bwa lɛɛ waa n ba.
43012048	Kɛ nɛn waa vɛh n ne n waa maa dɛ bol la ɛɛ di bolchɔgee. N waa maa dɛ bol nɔɔ dɛ pao bolchɔge tɔpere bwa jaga wee.
43012049	Dɛkalkɛ n gbabir kpegri ne laa mɛɛ bol waa nɔ. N Mɛɛ waa tom mɛ laanee do mɛ dɛ chag mɛ gɛ maa bol o wa.
43012050	N jemɔ kɛŋɔ o waa la dɛ tɛ mkpa aa wola jage dɔe, anomanta anɔ la waa bol n be laanee n gee bol."
43013001	Aa ka tama ba di tɔpejen Galekaa la la, dɛ Yeesu jemɔ kɛŋɔ tɔpere telo kɛ ó le harɛ nɔ ta dɛ berɛ kaa o Mɛɛ be. Dɛ o dɛ nyin o nɛra baa teŋɛ o nɛɛ harɛ nɔ ta la kɛrɛdɛ dɛ ka tonɛ.
43013002	O ne o habɔteŋra aa lɔ tig ta jɔmɔra la, Bɔnsam tɔ sie kpɔ liichɔga ba do Seemɔn Eskareɔt bie Judas bini kɛŋɔ ó le Yeesu tɛ.
43013003	Dɛ Yeesu te jemɔ kɛŋɔ wobɛlbwa kpegrii o Mɛɛ Korowii kpɔ tɛo, asɛ dɛ berɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ gɛ waa le o be ba la, gɛɛ o berɛ dɛɛ ba o be kaala.
43013004	Belaa o ir kondikwaa la ta, dɛ foo o batakaare, dɛ kpɔ bwarabwaa mile chara,
43013005	asɛ dɛ fuge nee do kon bini dɛ pa mun kpɔ dɛɛ sarame o habɔteŋra la nakpale, asɛ dɛ kpɔ bwarabwaa waa kpɔa mile chara la dɛɛ feera.
43013006	Waa baa tel Seemɔn Pita be la, anee Seemɔn Pita pɛɛro ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, n nakpalee hɛɛ ba sarama aa?"
43013007	Anee Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Haa n waa maa dɛ ɛ nɔ mun jemɛ taraken mɔɔ. A habɔɔ hɛɛ ba jema."
43013008	Asɛ o berɛ ŋɔ, "Akai! Maa sɛh he sarame n nakpale bwa." Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "Dɛ he ta gelɛ n sarame he nakpale aa, amɔ n ne he toole wobɛlbwa bini kpa."
43013009	Anee o berɛ ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, amɔ dɛ gɛɛ te naa, bɛ n nakpale gbo sarame ɔ. Den sarame n nɔɔra ne n nyu bwa ja."
43013010	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Nɛn waa sɔ nee la, dɛ nakpale laa o ba sarame aa, waa berɛ sɔ nee kpa, dɛkalkɛ doŋa toole o nɛ. Anomanta doŋa toole he bɛlbwa nɛ, nemenɛ he bini beŋkpoŋ."
43013011	Dɛ Yeesu te jemɛ naate waa dɛ nyin o leo tɛ. A waa o tɔ sie ŋɔ doŋa toole ba bɛlbwa nɛ, nemenɛ ba bini beŋkpoŋ la.
43013012	Waa sarame ba bwa nakpale tonɛ la, o berɔ kpɔ o batakaare la do dɛ berɛ ka so o soŋnibɔr, asɛ dɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "He jemɛ waa aa bala asɛ n ɛ heyaa gɛ nɔ naa?
43013013	He dɛ yer mɛ he dɔɔ kɛɛ he nomoa aa, a ŋwɛnɛ taa, dɛkalkɛ gɛɛ a do.
43013014	Too, taraken he dɔɔ kɛɛ he nomoa aa sarame he nakpale nɔ, gɛɛ a chɛ kɛŋɔ he gee sarame dɔŋa kwa.
43013015	Anɔ maa ɛa nɔ chɔ le dɛ tɛ heya, hé nyiŋa dɛ gee ɛ a dɔŋa.
43013016	Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, yom ta o dɔɔ gwaalɛ, torome ge ta nɛn waa tomɔ gwaalɛ.
43013017	Dɛ he jemɛ gɛ waa nɔ dɛɛ ɛa ge te naa, hɛɛ na somee.
43013018	"He bwa waa laa mɛɛ bol, dɛkalkɛŋɔ n jemɛ banɔ la maa lee ba. Anɔ gelɔ waa baa chwera Korowii Tɔn bini la ɛ kasinteŋ kɛŋɔ 'N dansom n ne waa pɛ nɔn di kondikwaa la, onee ɛɛ mɛ dɔm.'
43013019	N pu sie dɛɛ bagle heyaa mɔɔ asɛ dɛ gɛ waa nɔ baa ba naa, he jemɛ dɛ yarada kɛ menee Kristo la.
43013020	Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, nomɛlbwa maa tomɔ asɛ he lɛo la, dɛ menee he lɛ. Gɛɛ nomɛlbwa waa lɛɛ mɛ la ge, dɛ naate waa tom mɛ laanee o lɛ."
43013021	Yeesu aa bol gɛ waa nɔ tonɛ la, o bambile chɔgɔ kohona, o ta wobɛlbwa kpɔe sɔɔh ba kpa, dɛ ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, he bini bɛlee dɛ lee mɛ tɛ."
43013022	O habɔteŋra la ta wone jemɛ naate waa dɛ bol o wa, dɛ nyiŋi dɔŋa sie.
43013023	Dɛ ba bini bɛl Yeesu aa dɛ nyinu kohona la sogo kpagɔ.
43013024	Belaa Seemɔn Pita lɔ sie o be ŋɔ ó bɔɔro ó bagle ba bini bɛl waa ŋɔa.
43013025	Anee o kpɔ o te pɛl Yeesu dɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, ya bini umee yɔ?"
43013026	Asɛ o chaŋe ŋɔ, "Nɛn maa dɛ ba paanoo kpɔe li dɔr tɛo la, onee dɛ lee mɛ tɛ." Belaa o kpɔ paanoo li dɔr dɛ kpɔ do Seemɔn Eskareɔt bie Judas nɔn ta.
43013027	Waa tɛr nɔn dɛ lɛ paanoo la la, Bɔnsam den ba so o nɛ. Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ir ka ɛ waa haa dɛ ba ɛɛ la warane."
43013028	Nɛra baa soga ja o nɛɛ tig ta bela la ta waa waa bola la mun noɛ.
43013029	Dɛ Judasee chɔ ba suuga bwa nyoa. Anomanta dɛ ba bini bane dɛ lii kɛ Yeesu ken dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ó ka nyin tɔpejen la kondikwa. Dɛ gɛ laa ge aa, amɔ o ken ŋɔ ó ka tɛ nyaara suuga.
43013030	Judas aa lɛ paanoo la dɛ di tonɛ la, o den le ba be bela kaa. Dɛ jwaanaa.
43013031	Waa kaala la, Yeesu ŋɔ ba be, "Korowii tɛ n Nɛn Bie la jirima name, asɛ a che n nɛɛ o ge dɔ jirima.
43013032	Dɛ a chegɛ n nɛɛ Korowii dɔ jirima aa, aa che o nɛɛ n ge dɔ jirima, dɛ dɔa taraken.
43013033	N bii, maa he be bonɔɔ bigri bɛlbwa. Hɛɛ baa nyin n bɔree. Gɛ maa bol Juda tena nomonome be laanee mɛɛ bol he be la. Anee kɛŋɔ haa won ba bela maa kaa la.
43013034	N dɛ do heyaa wefala ta. Anee kɛŋɔ, hɛ́ɛ nyin dɔŋa. Gɛ maa nyin heyaa la, gɛɛ chɛ kɛŋɔ he gee nyin dɔŋa.
43013035	Dɛ he dɛ nyin dɔŋa aa, aa geloo nɛra bwa jemɛ kpela kɛŋɔ he ɛ n habɔteŋra."
43013036	Anee Seemɔn Pita pɛɛro ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, leperaa hɛɛ kaalɔ?" Asɛ Yeesu chaŋe ŋɔ, "Taraken nɔ, haa won teŋɛ n nɛɛ la bela maa dɛ kaa nɔ, kɛ he ta ɛɛ ba ti mɛɛ."
43013037	Belaa o pɛɛro ja ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, ɛrɛ waa maa wola won teŋɛ he nɛɛ taraken ɔ? Dɛ seo kwaraa yaa, mɛɛ koh he waa sewɛ."
43013038	Anee Yeesu berɛ bɔɔ ŋɔ, "Kpelaa kɛŋɔ hɛɛ won koh n waa sewaa? Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, jabal-logle ne sii dɛ he tɔɔh kera atoro ŋɔ haa men jemɛ kwaraa."
43014001	Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ, "He bɛ gel he bambile chɔg! Hɛ́ɛ yarada Korowii asɛ dɛɛ yarada n ge.
43014002	Deene lɔ n Mɛɛ Korowii dem taeh. Dɛ gɛ laa a do aa, n fe aa he bee ŋɔ n dɛ la ka kwaa sobɔr cheg heyaa bela.
43014003	Dɛ n kaa kwaa bɔr cheg heyaa bela aa, mɛɛ berɔɔ ba asɛ dɛ ba kpɔ heyaa kaa bela maa lole, asɛ bela maa so la, hé ge do bela.
43014004	He jemɛ bela maa dɛ ba kaala la ŋwɛnɛ."
43014005	Anee Tɔmas pɛɛro ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, aah yaa wola bela haa dɛ kaa jemɛ nɔ, ɛrɛɛ yaa ba wona jemɛ ŋwɛnɛ dɛ́ ba he be bela ɔ?"
43014006	Belaa o chaŋo ŋɔ, "Menee ŋwɛnɛ, menee kasinteŋ, menee mkpa. Dɛ nomɛlbwa ɛɛ la n Mɛɛ la bee yaa, nemenɛ ó che n nɛ.
43014007	He fe jem mɛ kɛrɛdɛ naa, he fe jemɛ n Mɛɛ la ge. Taraken he jemɔ. Onee he na la."
43014008	Anee Felep ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, bagle yaa he Mɛɛ la, ásɛ ya baah sɔɔh yaa."
43014009	Asɛ Yeesu chaŋe ŋɔ, "N ne haa lole le saŋ la bwa nɔ, amɔ he ta wone jem mɛ mɔɔ naa, Felep? Nomɛlbwa waa na mɛ la, dɛ n Mɛɛɛ o na la. Ɛrɛɛ he berɛ ŋɔ ń bagle heyaa n Mɛɛ la nɔɔ?
43014010	Haa yarada kɛŋɔ n ne n Mɛɛ la pɛo dɛ ɛ beŋkpoŋ, o joo mɛ n ge joo kɛɛ? N waa maa bol la bwa ta n gbabir be leɛ. N Mɛɛ laanee joo mɛ asɛ dɛɛ ɛ o toma.
43014011	Hɛ́ɛ yarada mɛ kɛ maa ŋɔa ŋɔ, n jo n Mɛɛ asɛ o ge joo mɛ la. Dɛ gɛ laa ge aa, hé yarada mɛ n nyokpowe-ɛɛla la wa.
43014012	Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, nomɛlbwa waa yarada mɛ la, wɛɛ ɛ n we-ɛɛla dɔŋa bwa soosiwii. Wɛɛ won dɛɛ ɛ anɔ la aa gwaa n kwaa nɔ kwaraa, dɛkalkɛ mɛɛ berɔɔ kaa n Mɛɛ be.
43014013	Asɛ komɛlbwa haa che n sɔn ta dɛ soŋe la, mɛɛ ɛo. Anɔ taa aa ba chega ń lɛ jirima tɛ n Mɛɛ Korowii.
43014014	Dɛ he chegɛ n sɔn ta soŋe komɛlbwa naa, mɛɛ ɛo.
43014015	"He dɛ nyin n wa aa, hɛ́ɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ n waa maa kpɔa tɛ heyaa la taa.
43014016	Mɛɛ soŋe n Mɛɛ Korowiirii ó berɛ tɛ heyaa Habɔchekpaa ja wɛ́ɛ cha heya, dɛ soŋe dɛɛ tɛ heya, asɛ he ne o so saŋ bɛlbwa.
43014017	Korowii Domadɛɛge laanee. Wɛɛ geloo he jemɛ Korowii kasinteŋ waa la. Nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire aa won yarada o Domadɛɛge wa, dɛkalkɛ baa won nao asɛ dɛ jemɔ. Kɛ he te jemɔ, dɛkalkɛ o ne heyaa lole, asɛ o so he nɛ.
43014018	N baa kaa laa, maa heyaa ta kɛ bilalbii, mɛɛ berɔɔ ba he be.
43014019	A ka tama, nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire aa men na kpa, kɛ he te ɛɛ na mɛɛ. Maa dɔ mkpa nomanta, he gee dɔ mkpaa.
43014020	Tɔpere la telaa, hɛɛ jemɔɔ kɛŋɔ n ne n Mɛɛ ɛ beŋkpoŋ, bɛl aa wola won dagre o te o dɔŋ nɛ, asɛ n ne he ge ɛ beŋkpoŋ gɛ tenten.
43014021	Nomɛlbwa waa lɛ n waa maa kpɔa tɛ heyaa dɛɛ teŋɛ a ta la, onee dɛɛ nyin mɛ. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin mɛ la, n Mɛɛ la ɛɛ nyinuu, asɛ n ge nyin naate, dɛ kpɔ n te baglo."
43014022	Belaa Judas (Judas Eskareɔt la laa) pɛɛro ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ba he te kpɔe bagle ya gbosoo, asɛ dɛ gel nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire nɔɔ?"
43014023	Asɛ Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin mɛ la, wɛɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ n webagla la taa. N Mɛɛ ɛɛ nyinuu, n ne o bwa ba o be ya ne o so.
43014024	Nomɛlbwa waa wola men nyin la, waa n webagla ta teŋɛ. Waa haa dɛ no nɔ ta n be leɛ, a bwa le n Mɛɛ waa tom mɛ la be.
43014025	"N taa lɔ he be nɔɔ mɛɛ bol gɛ waa nɔ he be.
43014026	Korowii Domadɛɛge waa ɛ Habɔchekpaa la, onee n Mɛɛ ɛɛ ba toma ó che n sɔn ta ba dɛ ba bagle heyaa wobɛlbwa, dɛɛ lii heyaa anɔ la bwa n faa bol he be la.
43014027	Deŋnesɔɔhnaa n kpɔ dɛɛ tɛ heya, n gbabir deŋnesɔɔhnaa. Harɛ nɔ ta deŋnesɔɔhna laa, anomanta he bɛ gel he bambile teŋe asɛ hɛɛ ɔmɛ.
43014028	"N bol he be he no kɛŋɔ 'Mɛɛ kaaloo asɛ dɛ berɛ ba he be.' Dɛ he fe dɛ nyin mɛ naa, he sie fe ɛɛ lɛo kɛŋɔ maa kaa n Mɛɛ be, dɛkalkɛ o gwaa mɛ.
43014029	N pu sie dɛɛ bol he be mɔɔ a ba ɛ gɛ, ásɛ dɛ a ɛ gɛ naa, he yarada mɛ.
43014030	N ne haa won bol waa kohona kpa, dɛkalkɛ harɛ nɔ ta kpegnɛn dɛ ba. O ta kpegri bɛlbwa dɔe n nɛ,
43014031	kɛ a chɛ kɛŋɔ harɛ nɔ ta nɛra bwa jemɛ kɛ n dɛ nyin n Mɛɛ la, a waa mɛɛ ɛ anɔ la bwa waa do mɛ ŋɔ ń ɛ la. Hé ir, yá le bonɔ."
43015001	Yeesu berɔ sɛg ba ŋɔ, "Menee konduule tenten waa dɛ nɔnɛ, asɛ n Mɛɛ gee paa la.
43015002	N kpale bɛlbwa waa wola nɔnɛ la, o teŋo dɛɛ ta, kɛ n kpale waa won nɔna la te, o dɛ kuu o nyoo ó won nɔnɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
43015003	A chegɛ waa maa bagle heyaa la ta he do kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ kpala baa kuu a nyoo a won nɔna kɛrɛdɛ la.
43015004	Hé kpɔ he te pɛl mɛ asɛ n ge lawɛ heyaa pɛl n te. Konduule kpale aa won nɔnɛ dɛ o ta o tenten ta choŋe. Gɛ tentenee dɛ he ta he te kpɔe pɛl mɛ naa, haa wola won ɛ wobɛlbwa.
43015005	"Menee konduule la, asɛ he gee o kpala. Dɛ he bɛlbwa choŋi n nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ asɛ n ge lawɔ pɛl n te naa, anee o won nɔnɛ kɛrɛdɛ. Dɛ he ta n nɛɛ chegɛ te naa, haa won ɛ wobɛlbwa.
43015006	Dɛ he bɛlbwa ta o te kpɔe pɛl mɛ naa, wɛɛ ɛo kɛŋɔ konduule kpale baa teŋo ta asɛ o hol la. Kpala aa do ken la, pae ba paa dɛɛ do nii ta, aa fuh.
43015007	He kpɔ he te pɛl mɛ asɛ n webagla ge do he liire bini naa, he dɛ soŋe komɛlbwa haa dɛ nyin aa, hɛɛ dɔɔ.
43015008	Dɛ he wono dɛɛ ɛ n Mɛɛ tetoowaa kɛŋɔ kpale waa dɛ nɔnɛ kɛrɛdɛ naa, wɛɛ dɔ jirimaa. Anee dɛ bagle kɛ n habɔteŋraa heyaa kpela.
43015009	"Gɛ n Mɛɛ la aa dɛ nyin mɛ laanee n gee nyin heya. Anomanta he bɛ he te laa kpɔ n nyina maa dɛ nyin heyaa la ta bwa.
43015010	He dɛ teŋɛ waa maa kpɔa tɛ heyaa la ta naa, haa he tenee laa kpɔ n nyina maa dɛ nyin heyaa la ta, kɛŋɔ maa teŋɛ waa n Mɛɛ aa kpɔa tɛ mɛ la ta maa wola n te laa kpɔ o nyina ta la.
43015011	N bagle heyaa waa nɔ ásɛ he dɔ n silɛɛ dɔŋ, asɛ he sie lɛ ka tonɛ.
43015012	Waa maa kpɔa tɛ heyaa laanee la: Hɛ́ɛ nyin dɔŋa gɛ maa dɛ nyin heyaa la.
43015013	Nyina bɛlbwa toole dɛ gwaa kɛŋɔ nɛn aa wona koh o daamanar waa dɛ sewɛ.
43015014	He dɛ teŋɛ n waa maa kpɔa tɛ heyaa la ta te naa, amɔ dɛ n daamanaree heya.
43015015	Maa heyaa n bonɔɔna yerɛ kpa, dɛkalkɛ bonɔɔ naa won jemɛ o nomoa waa bini. N daamanaree mɛɛ yerɛ heyaa name te, dɛkalkɛ n gelɔ he jemɛ wobɛlbwa maa noa dɛ le n Mɛɛ be.
43015016	He laa lee mɛ, menee le heya. Gɛ kpaldɛɛge aa dɛ nɔnɛ la, gɛɛ mɛɛ nyin kɛ he do, dɛɛ ɛ n Mɛɛ tetoowa, dɛ bɛ an gel bwa. Dɛ he dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, komɛlbwa haa soŋe n sɔn ta la, wɛɛ tɛ heyaa.
43015017	Waa maa kpɔa dɛɛ tɛ heyaa laanee kɛŋɔ, hɛ́ɛ nyin dɔŋa.
43015018	"Dɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta liire gbo hah heya aa, hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ menee ba tɔ sie hah.
43015019	Dɛ he fe ɛ ba bini bane aa, ba fe ɛɛ nyin heyaa. Kɛ maa le heyaa le ba bini he ɛ n nɛra la waa ba hah heyaa la.
43015020	Hɛ́ɛ lii gɛ n faa bol he be ŋɔ, yom ta o dɔɔ gwaalɛ la. Dɛ ba ɛɛ mɛ hɔhɔrɔwa aa, gɛɛ baa ba he ge ɛɛ. Dɛ ba teŋɛ n webagla ta naa, baa teŋɛ he ge kwaa ta gɛɛ.
43015021	Anɔ bwaa baa ba n waa koeh dɛɛ ɛ heya, dɛkalkɛŋɔ baa naate waa tom mɛ la jemɛ.
43015022	N fe ta balɛ dɛ ba bol waa chag ba aa, ba fe aa bolchɔgee di. Kɛ taraken baa noa dɛ laa ba liire kpɔ a ta nomanta, ba ta nyoa dɔe dɛ́ bol le kpa.
43015023	Bɛlbwa waa hah mɛ la, dɛ o hah n Mɛɛ la ge.
43015024	Dɛ n fe ta waa nɛwɛnyini bɛlbwa aa wola ɛɛ ka ɛ ba siwi ta te naa, ba fe aa bolchɔgee di. Kɛ ba na n nyokpowe-ɛɛla bwa, dɛ garɛ hah n ne n Mɛɛ bwa.
43015025	Anɔ ɛ gɛ ásɛ waa baa chwera Korowii Tɔn bini la ɛ kpela kɛŋɔ, 'Ba hah mɛ pɛɛ.'
43015026	"Mɛɛ tomɛ Habɔchekpaa laanee o le n Mɛɛ be dɛ ba he be. Onee Korowii Domadɛɛge waa dɛ bagle Korowii kasinteŋ waa la. Dɛ o balaa, onee dɛ ɛ n danseɛ.
43015027	He gee bol n waa bagle nɛra, dɛkalkɛ chɔɔ bwaa n ne he do le.
43016001	"N bagle heyaa waa nɔ bwa, asɛ wobɛlbwa bɛ won gel he le habɔɔ.
43016002	Nɛra ɛɛ doŋi heyaa cheremi deene binii, asɛ a ba saŋ bɛl kɛŋɔ bá kpoo heya, dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ Korowii tetoowaa baa ɛ gɛ la.
43016003	Anɔ bwaa baa ba heyaa ɛɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ baa n ne n Mɛɛ jemɛ.
43016004	N bol waa nɔ he be, ásɛ dɛ a baa ba gɛ naa, he won lii dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ n fa bol he be. N faa lɔ he be la waa maa wola he be bolɛ chɔɔ bwa la.
43016005	"Taraken mɛɛ berɔɔ kaa Naate waa tom mɛ la be, kɛ he bini bɛlbwa ta men bɔɔrɛ bela maa dɛ ba kaala.
43016006	Maa bol gɛ waa nɔ he be nomanta, he tea bini chɔgɔ.
43016007	Kasinteŋii mɛɛ bol he be la, a wer tɛ heyaa kɛ ń kaa. Dɛ n ta kaalaa, Habɔchekpaa la aa he bee ba. Kɛ dɛ n baa kaalaa, mɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba he be.
43016008	Dɛ o balaa, wɛɛ di nɛra kasinteŋii dɛ gel ba jemɛ waa aa ɛ wechɔga, ne waa aa dɛ su Korowii siwi, ne gɛ Korowii bole pae waa aa doa.
43016009	Wɛɛ di ba kasinteŋii ba wechɔga ɛɛ ta, dɛkalkɛ baa men yarada,
43016010	dɛ di ba kasinteŋ waa aa dɛ su Korowii siwi la ta, kaala maa dɛ kaa n Mɛɛ be haa wola men na kpa la nomanta.
43016011	Wɛɛ di ba kasinteŋii Korowii bole pae la ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii bol harɛ nɔ ta kpegnɛn la waa dɛ pao bolchɔge.
43016012	"N fe dɔ waa kohona dɛ́ bol bagle heya, kɛ aa gwaa he nɛɛ kɛ he won no a mun bug nɔ ta.
43016013	Kɛ dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge waa dɛ chagle Korowii kasinteŋ waa la balaa, wɛɛ pili wobɛlbwa binii tɛ heyaa hé no a mun. O gbabir nyu bini waa laa wɛɛ ba bola bagle heya. Anɔ la waa noa le Korowii be laanee wɛɛ ba bola, dɛ chagle heyaa waa a taa lɔ sie dɛɛ ba bala.
43016014	Onee dɛ tɛ mɛ jirima, dɛkalkɛ on dɛ kpɔ n wobɛlbwa dɛ ba bol he be.
43016015	Komɛlbwa n Mɛɛ la aa dɔa la ɛ n kon. A waa n ŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge laanee dɛ kpɔ n wobɛlbwa dɛ bol he be la.
43016016	"A ka tamaa ken haa men na kpa, asɛ a berɔ ɛ tama ge aa, he na mɛ ja."
43016017	O habɔteŋra la bane bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "O waa nɔ waa dɛ bol nɔ munii ɛrɔɔ? O ŋɔ, a ka tama yaa on na, asɛ a berɔ ɛ tama ge aa, ya nao ja, dɛ berɛ ŋɔ, o Mɛɛ la bee wɛɛ kaa waa yaa wola on na kpa la."
43016018	Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ 'a ka tama' nɔ waa bola nɔ ɛɛ bagle ɔ? Yaa a mun jemɛ!"
43016019	Belaa Yeesu aa jema kɛŋɔ ba dɛ nyin ba bɔɔro gɛ wobol la mun la, o ŋɔ, "Amɔ maa ŋɔa ŋɔ a ka tama haa men na, asɛ a berɔ ɛ tama ge aa, he na mɛ ja nɔ, a waa hɛɛ bɔɔ dɔŋa a mun nɔ naa?
43016020	Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, he loo ɛɛ kuu he wi, asɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire sie lɛ. He tea bini ɛɛ chɔgoo, kɛ he tebinichɔg la ɛɛ berɛ heyaa silɛɛ.
43016021	Dɛ lol tea lɔ haah naa, o tea bini dɛ chɔg, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o bonyɛga saŋ telo. O baa lolɛ tonaa, o dɛ soh o bonyɛga la asɛ o sie berɛ lɛ kɛŋɔ waa lolɛ bie do harɛ ta la.
43016022	Gɛɛ a do he ge be. Taraken te, he tea bini chɔgɔ, kɛ maa berɛ ba na heyaa la taa he sie ɛɛ ba lɛɛ kohona. Gɛ silɛɛ la, nomɛlbwa aa won lɛ he be.
43016023	Tɔpere la telaa, haa men wobɛlbwaa bɔɔ kpa. Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, dɛ he soŋe komɛlbwa n Mɛɛ be naa, wɛɛ koh n waa dɛ tɛ heya.
43016024	He ta n sɔn kpɔe dɛ soŋe komɛlbwa bwa. Kɛ taraken te, hé kpɔ n sɔn soŋe, hɛɛ dɔɔ ásɛ he sie lɛ kohona.
43016025	"Anɔ maa bola bagle heyaa nɔ ɛ sɛgla, kɛ tɔpere bɛl dɛ ba bala maa wola heyaa sɛgle kpa. Mɛɛ bol n Mɛɛ la waa he bee dɛ pili a bini chasee ken.
43016026	Tɔpere la telaa, hɛɛ kpɔ n sɔnee soŋe Korowii. N ta ŋɔe ŋɔ n dɛ che he naa ta dɛ soŋe tɛ heya.
43016027	N Mɛɛ gbabir dɛ nyin heya, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he dɛ nyin mɛ, dɛ yarada kɛŋɔ o bee n le ba.
43016028	O bee n le dɛ ba harɛ nɔ ta, taraken n berɔ dɛɛ le bonɔ dɛ́ kaa o be."
43016029	Anee o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "Taraken te haa yaa sɛgle kpa. He dɛ pili waa bini chasee.
43016030	Ya nao name kɛŋɔ he jemɛ wobɛlbwa aa lɔ nɛn nyu bini mɔɔ wɛɛ pɛɛre. A ta chɛ kɛŋɔ bɛlbwa pɛɛre waane kpa. A gelɔ ya yarada kɛŋɔ Korowii bee he le."
43016031	Anee Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "He berɔ dɛɛ yarada mɛ taraken te naa?
43016032	Tɔpere bɛl dɛ ba, o joɔ tonɛ, he bwa dɛ ba chwae pegre kaa he deremi asɛ a ka n gbo. N ne n Mɛɛ aa lole saŋ bɛlbwa nomanta, aa n gbo kae ba.
43016033	A waa mɛɛ bagle heyaa waa nɔ ásɛ he dɔ deŋnesɔɔhna dɛ le pɛɛ n ne haa pɛa la ta la. Hɛɛ na hɔhɔrɔwaa harɛ nɔ ta, kɛ hé lawɛ bambile, dɛkalkɛ n fagɛ harɛ nɔ ta komɛlbwa nɛ."
43017001	Yeesu aa bol waa nɔ tonɛ la, o ha sie dɛ nyiŋi nyundua asɛ dɛ jam Korowii ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, tɔpere la telo. Tɛ men maa ɛ he Bie jirima ásɛ n ge won kpɔ jirima tɛɛ.
43017002	He tɛ mɛ kpegri nɛra bwa nɛ, asɛ n won kpɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe tɛ nɛra haa kpɔ ba tɛ mɛ la.
43017003	Banɔ la baa jemɛ dɛ jemɛ kɛ he gboo Korowii kasinteŋ la, dɛ berɛ jem mɛ kɛ menee Yeesu Kristo haa tomɔ la, banee dɛ dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la.
43017004	N tɛɛ jirima harɛ nɔ ta kɛŋɔ maa tonɛ toma haa kpɔa do n nɔn ta ŋɔ ń ɛ la bwa.
43017005	Anomanta, n Mɛɛ, maa chegɛ he sie taraken nɔ, tɛ mɛ jirima n ne haa dɔa wubwa mɔɔ dɛ ta harɛ nɔ la.
43017006	"Nɛra haa lee ba le harɛ nɔ ta nɛra bini dɛ kpɔ ba tɛ mɛ la, n gelɔ ba jemɛ kɛrɛdɛ. Henee dɔɔ ba dɛ kpɔ ba tɛ mɛ, asɛ ba sɛh dɛɛ teŋɛ he waa la ta.
43017007	Taraken ba jemɔ kɛŋɔ komɛlbwa haa tɛ mɛ la, he bee a le.
43017008	N bol waa haa bag mɛ la bag ba, asɛ ba sɛh a ta. Ba jemɔ kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ he bee n le ba, dɛ yarada kɛ henee tom mɛ.
43017009	N dɛ soŋe dɛɛ tɛɛ ba. Harɛ nɔ ta nɛra bwa laa n soŋe dɛɛ tɛ. Banɔ la haa kpɔ ba tɛ mɛ laanee n soŋe dɛɛ tɛ, dɛkalkɛ henee dɔɔ ba.
43017010	N komɛlbwa ɛ he kon, asɛ he ge komɛlbwa ɛ n kon. Ba waa n dɔ jirima.
43017011	N dɛ ba he be bela. Maa harɛ nɔ taa bigri, kɛ ba te ɛɛ ka harɛ nɔ taa. Anomanta, n Mɛdɛɛge, kpɔ sɔn haa tɛ mɛ la kpegri tɔ ba nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ ásɛ ba ɛ beŋkpoŋ gɛ n ne haa ɛ beŋkpoŋ la.
43017012	N faa lɔ ba be la, n kpɔ sɔn haa tɛ mɛ la kpegri tɔ ba nɛ, ba bɛlbwa ta n nɔn ta nyogrɛ, nemenɛ onɔ la baa chwerɛ o waa he Tɔn bini ŋɔ wɛɛ nyogroo la, o gbosoroo nyogra, ásɛ he Tɔn bini waa la ɛ kpela.
43017013	"Taraken n berɔ dɛɛ ba he be bela, kɛ n taa lɔ harɛ ta nɔ, n dɛ bol waa nɔ ásɛ ba won dɔ silɛɛ maa dɔa la kɛrɛdɛ ka tonɛ.
43017014	Maa bol he Amanesoma la bag ba la, a gelɔ ba ta nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire nɛɛ jae kpa, gɛ maa wola ba nɛɛ jae la. Anomanta ba hah ba.
43017015	Maa soŋe ŋɔ hé laa ba kpɔ le harɛ nɔ ta, kɛ n dɛ soŋe ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ kee ba Bɔnsam nɛ.
43017016	Gɛ maa wola nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire nɛɛ jae la, gɛɛ ba ge aa wola ba nɛɛ jae.
43017017	Che he kasinteŋ waa la ta dɛ laa doŋa bɛlbwa kpɔ ba nɛɛ bá won ɛ he gbo nɛra. He waa ɛ kasinteŋ.
43017018	Gɛ haa tom mɛ harɛ nɔ ta la, gɛ tentenee n gee tom ba.
43017019	Ba nomanta n kpɔ n te tɛɛ dɛ ɛ he gbosoroo nɛn ásɛ ba ge gba won berɛ he gbosoroo nɛra, teŋa baa dɛ teŋɛ he kasinteŋ la ta nomanta.
43017020	"Ba gbo laa n soŋe dɛɛ tɛ. Nɛra baa ba che banɔ nɔ waa baa dɛ bol ta dɛ yarada mɛ la bwaa n soŋe dɛɛ tɛ.
43017021	N dɛ soŋe kɛ hé ɛ ba bwa beŋkpoŋ. N Mɛɛ, gɛ n ne haa ɛ beŋkpoŋ bɛl aa wola won dagre o te o dɔŋ nɛɛ la, gɛɛ mɛɛ soŋe kɛ ya ne ba won ɛ beŋkpoŋ ásɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire bwa won yarada kɛŋɔ henee tom mɛ.
43017022	Gɛ haa tɛ mɛ jirima laanee n ge tɛɛ ba ásɛ ba won ɛ beŋkpoŋ gɛ n ne haa ɛ beŋkpoŋ la.
43017023	N ne ba ɛ beŋkpoŋ, n ne he ge ɛ beŋkpoŋ, bɛl aa wola won dagre o te o dɔŋ nɛ aa, anee dɛ gel ba beŋkpoŋri la won che kɛrɛdɛ ásɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire la jemɛ kɛŋɔ henee tom mɛ dɛɛ nyin ba gɛ haa dɛ nyin mɛ la.
43017024	"N Mɛɛ, henee kpɔ ba tɛ mɛ. N dɛ nyin kɛ ba ja n nɛɛ bela maa lole ásɛ dɛ won na n jirima haa kpɔa tɛ mɛ. He tɔ sie nyin mɛ mɔɔ dɛ ta harɛ, a waa he tɛ mɛ jirima la.
43017025	N Mɛdɛɛge, nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire aa hen jemɛ, kɛ n te jemɛ, asɛ banɔ nɔ ge jemɛ kɛŋɔ henee tom mɛ.
43017026	N gelɔ ba jemɛ, mɛɛ geloo baa jemɛ, ásɛ ba won dɛɛ nyin dɔŋa gɛ haa dɛ nyin mɛ la, ásɛ n ne ba won pɛ."
43018001	Yeesu aa soŋe Korowii tonɛ la, o ne o habɔteŋra la leɔ dɛ ka le nenabɔɔ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Kedrɔn. Dɛ ba du daa ane bela, asɛ ba ka jo a baah.
43018002	Dɛ Judas waa leo tɛ la jemɛ bela, dɛkalkɛ Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la dɛ cheme bela warawara.
43018003	Anomanta Judas na Sɔfonomonome ne Farisii tena, asɛ ba tɛo soojare ne nɛra baa dɛ daah Korowii Dea la bane. Asɛ ba kpɔ kandere ne kapɛle ne dɔmkwa, asɛ Judas kpɔ ba la daa la baah bela.
43018004	Dɛ Yeesu jemɛ waa aa dɛ ba o nɛɛ chiga bwa, anomanta o leɔ ka chem ba, asɛ dɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ume bɔree hɛɛ nyin ɔ?"
43018005	Anee ba ŋɔ, "Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt la bɔree yaa nyin." Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "Menee nɔ!" Dɛ Judas waa le Yeesu tɛ la ja soojare la ne nɛra la nɛɛ ba che bela.
43018006	Yeesu aa ŋɔa men nɔ la, ba le habɔɔ dɛ chogli.
43018007	Belaa o berɛ kwaa pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Ume bɔree hɛɛ nyin ɔ?" Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt la."
43018008	Anee o ŋɔ, "N ta ŋɔe ŋɔ menee nɔ naa? Dɛ n bɔree hɛɛ nyin aa, amɔ hé gel nɛra baa ja n nɛɛ nɔ te kaa."
43018009	Gɛ aa ɛ asɛ waa o faa bola o Mɛɛ be la ɛ kasinteŋ kɛŋɔ o faa ŋɔa ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, nɛra haa tɛ mɛ la bɛlbwa ta n nɔn ta nyogrɛ" la, a waa o bol gɛ.
43018010	Dɛ Seemɔn Pita dɔ kere o be bela. O pamɛ kere la dɛ ŋwɛnɛ Sɔfore Nomoa bonɔɔ dig deŋne dɛ laa cha. Gɛ bonɔɔ la sɔne Malkus.
43018011	Pita aa ɛ gɛ la, Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Kpɔ kere la su o tɔɔ ta! N bɛ wahala n Mɛɛ aa chega ŋɔ ń na la na kɛɛ?"
43018012	Room soojare ne ba nomoa ne Juda tena baa dɛ daah Korowii Dea lawɛ Yeesu dɛ vɔrɔwo,
43018013	dɛ tɔ sie la o ne Anas be. Dɛ Kaefasee Sɔfore Nomoa a gɛ bena la ta. Dɛ o mo Anas bie.
43018014	A gɛ Kaefas nɔɔ fa ŋɔ Juda tena nomonome be ŋɔ nɛmbeŋkpoŋ lɛ nɛra bwa seo sewaa, a bɔ harɛbir bwa aa pagra la.
43018015	Baa dɛ kaa Yeesu ne la, Seemɔn Pita ne o dɔŋa habɔteŋra la bɛl teŋɛ o nɛ. Dɛ Sɔfore Nomoa la jeremee a gɛ habɔteŋre nɔ, anomanta o teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ dɛ jo Sɔfore Nomoa la dem bela.
43018016	Baa jo dem bela la, Pita te kaa jagɛ che dem la doonyoa. Dɛ tolo bɛlee dɛɛ daah doonyoa la. Asɛ Yeesu habɔteŋre la Sɔfore Nomoa la aa jemɔ la berɛ le buse dɛ ba bol waa tolo la be dɛ kpɔ Pita jo dem bela.
43018017	Belaa tolo la bɔɔ Pita ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ habɔteŋre laa hen aa?" Anee o chaŋo ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh, o habɔteŋre laa men."
43018018	Dɛ waa lole, anomanta dɛ Sɔfore Nomoa bonɔɔna ne nɛra baa dɛ daah Korowii Dea la do nii hɔla ta dɛ cheg dɛɛ ŋwee, asɛ Pita ka ja ba nɛɛ dɛ gee ŋwee.
43018019	Sɔfore Nomoa la bɔɔ Yeesu o habɔteŋra ne o webagla la wa.
43018020	Anee o ŋɔ, "Tɔpere bɛlbwaa mɛɛ bagla nɛra baah ta ba bwa ɛɛ no. Korowii Dea ne cheremi deene ya Juda tena bwa aa dɛ cheme a bini la, belaa mɛɛ bagla. N ta sɔeh dɛ bagle wobɛlbwa ge bwa.
43018021	Amɔ ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ bɔɔ mɛ gɛ nɔɔ? Bɔɔ nɛra baa noa la, banee dɛ jemɛ waa maa bag ba dɛ́ bagle."
43018022	Yeesu aa chaŋe waa la gɛ la, dɛ Sɔfore Nomoa la bonɔɔ bɛl chegɛ o jwɛɛh asɛ dɛ kpaa o lwɛɛma, dɛ kɔro ŋɔ, "Kenii chɛ kɛ he chaŋe Sɔfore Nomoa aa?"
43018023	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "Waa maa bola a ta magrɛ la, bagle nɛ́ra bwa no. Dɛ gɛ laa ge aa, n lɔe nɔ munii ɛrɔɔ?"
43018024	Asɛ Anas gel ba la Yeesu ne Sɔfore Nomoa Kaefas be, dɛ o nɔɔra ta vɔrɔwɔ gɛ.
43018025	Dɛ Seemɔn Pita ta chegɔ dɛɛ ŋwee nii la, asɛ ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Baa la habɔteŋra la bɛl laa hen aa?" Asɛ o tɔh pelepele ŋɔ, "Bɛl laa men!"
43018026	Dɛ Sɔfore Nomoa la bonɔɔ Pita aa ŋwɛnɛ o deŋne dɛ laa cha la lole bɛl lɔ dem bela. O bɔɔrɔ ŋɔ, "Kɛ dɛ he ja baa la nɛra la nɛɛ daa la baah bela laɔ?"
43018027	Anee o tɔh ja ŋɔ, "Akai!" Bug la taa jabal si.
43018028	Tomun aa dɛ kpɔ la, Juda tena nomonome la kpɔ Yeesu la Kaefas be dɛ ba o ne Room nomoa waa dɛ nyiŋi ba harɛ ta la be koodem. Dɛ Galekaa tɔpere telo, anomanta Juda tena nomonome la te ta dem bela joɛ, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba jo bela aa, baa kah doŋaa baa wola won di Galekaa kondikwaa la.
43018029	Baa vɛh bela joe la, ba harɛ nomoa Paelet leɔ ba ba be, dɛ ba bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa o ɛ aa wola magrɛ hɛɛ bɔɔro wɔ?"
43018030	Anee ba chaŋe ŋɔ, "Dɛ wechɔg-ɛɛ laa aa, ya fe ta o ne he be balɛ."
43018031	Asɛ Paelet ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé gbabir kpɔɔ kaa ka bol o waa gɛ he mmara aa dɛ chagle." Anee ba ge chaŋo ŋɔ, "Ya ta ŋwɛnɛ dɔe kɛŋɔ yá bol nɛn waa dɛ pao bolchɔge bá kpoo."
43018032	Gɛ waa nɔ chigo ásɛ nɛra jemɛ kɛ Yeesu waa waa bola dɛ bagle seo la soo waa dɛ ba sewa la ɛ kpela.
43018033	Asɛ Paelet berɛ jo o koodem bela, dɛ yerɛ Yeesu ba o be, dɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Henee Juda tena kooro ɛ?"
43018034	Belaa o chaŋo ŋɔ, "He gbagbaa na waa nɔ dɛɛ bɔɔ mɛ kɛɛ nɛra banee bol n waa he be nɔ?"
43018035	Anee Paelet ŋɔ, "Haa na mɛ nɔ, Juda tee men aa? He gbagba bwɛɛ tena ne he Sɔfonomonomee ba he ne n be. Bɔkwa wechɔgaa he ɛɔ?"
43018036	Asɛ Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Harɛ ta bonɔ laa mɛɛ di kora. Dɛ harɛ ta bonɔɔ mɛɛ di kora aa, n nɛra fe aa sɛh bá kpɔ mɛ tɛ Juda tena, ba fe ɛɛ yoo lɛɛ mɛ. Kɛ harɛ ta bonɔ kora laa mɛɛ di."
43018037	Yeesu aa ŋɔ gɛ la, anee Paelet bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Amɔ kooroo hen kpela kenɛ?" Asɛ o chaŋo ŋɔ, "Henee ŋɔa kooroo men. Kasinteŋ bola waa ba lol mɛ. A waa n ba harɛ nɔ ta dɛ́ ba bol kasinteŋ la nɛra bwa be. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin kasinteŋ la, on dɛɛ no n be."
43018038	Anee Paelet ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa gee kasinteŋ nɔɔ?" Waa bol gɛ la, o berɔ le dɛ ka ŋɔ Juda tena la be ŋɔ, "N ta waa maa che a ta pao bolchɔge nae,
43018039	kɛ gɛ he Juda tena yon gel n foo wechɔg-ɛɛ beŋkpoŋ dɛɛ ta he Galekaa kondikwaa tɔpere ta la, ń foo Juda tena kooro nɔ ta gɛ kɛɛ?"
43018040	Belaa ba bwa nyɛg kohona ŋɔ, "Bɛ on foo! Foo Barabas!" Dɛ gɛ Barabas nɔ, ŋwɛɛree.
43019001	Belaa Paelet gel o soojare ka lawɛ Yeesu, dɛ lɔɔro bampɔrɔ ŋwɛɛra ne.
43019002	Ba koh o baah mugla waa dɛ kpɔ sɔɔhne sɔh koogbɛrɛ piu, dɛ kpɔ yaswɛm bɛl o do kɛŋɔ ba bela koranar wur ken dɛ doo.
43019003	Dɛ ba dɛ ba o be dɛɛ si, "Woowo, Juda tena kooro!" dɛɛ kpaa o lwɛrɛme.
43019004	Baa ɛo gɛ la, Paelet le buse ja dɛ ba ŋɔ Juda tena la be ŋɔ, "Hɛ́ɛ no bonɔ, mɛɛ le o ne busee tɛ heya, ásɛ he jemɛ kɛ n ta wobɛlbwa o nɛɛ nae dɛ́ che a ta dɛ pao bolchɔge."
43019005	Anomanta o gelɔ Yeesu le buse, dɛ sɔɔhne koogbɛrɛ piu, asɛ o do wurswɛm la. Asɛ Paelet ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Onee la."
43019006	Sɔfonomonome ne nɛra baa dɛ daah Korowii Dea la aa nao la, ba kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Gel ba kpoo! Gel ba kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta!" Anee Paelet chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Hé gbagba ba kpɔɔ ka kpaa pɛl dagagre ta. N te ta wobɛlbwa o nɛɛ nae dɛ́ che a ta dɛ gel ba kpoo."
43019007	Belaa Juda tena la berɛ chaŋo ŋɔ, "Ya dɔ mmara bɛl waa dɛ bagle kɛ o chɛ kpoe, dɛkalkɛ o dɛ yerɛ o te Korowii Bie."
43019008	Paelet aa no gɛ waa nɔ la, a taa o berɛ ɔmɛ kohona kwara.
43019009	Anomanta o berɔ jo koodem bela, asɛ dɛ ka bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Lepetenee he leɔ?" Kɛ o ta on chaŋɛ.
43019010	Anee o berɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Haa men chaŋe kɛɛ? Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ n dɔ kpegri dɛ won gel ba foori ta, dɛ berɛ won gel ba kpaare pɛl dagagre ta kɛɛ?"
43019011	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Korowiirii sɛah dɛ gel he dɔ kpegri n nɛ. O fe ta sɛɛh yaa, he fe ta kpegri dɔe n nɛ. Nɛn waa lee mɛ tɛ dɛ gel he dɔɔ mɛ la wechɔga gwaa he kwa."
43019012	Paelet aa no gɛ la, dɛ o dɛ nyin ŋwɛnɛ bɛl dɛ fee kpɔ Yeesu ta ó kaa. Ate nɛnlaa la kpɔ takpeg dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ yerɛ o te kooro la ɛ Room Koojen Siisa dɔm! Anomanta dɛ he kpɔ baa nɔ ta aa, amɔ dɛ Room Koojen la dɔmee hen!"
43019013	Paelet aa no gɛ la, o kpɔ Yeesu le buse dɛ ba so bela waa soga dɛɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole la. Bwea nee ba mao o ir nyundua. Juda tena dɛ yerɛ bela Gabata.
43019014	Awola la ɛ tɔpere Juda tena bwa aa dɛ kpɔ ba te dɛ daa kondikwaa dɛɛ cheg dɛ́ won di Ona Tɔpere waa lɔ ba Galekaa la ta la. Dɛ wee tel nyufala tonɛ, asɛ Paelet ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He kooro laanee la!"
43019015	Anee ba nyɛg kohona ŋɔ, "Gel ba kpoo! Gel ba kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta!" Asɛ Paelet bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "He kooro gbabirii he ŋɔ ń gel ba kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta naa?" Anee Sɔfonomonome la chaŋo ŋɔ, "Ya ta kooro bɛlbwa dɔe ka ja Koojen Siisa nɛ!"
43019016	Ate Paelet kpɔ Yeesu tɛɛ ba ŋɔ bá ka kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta. Asɛ soojare la kpɔɔ kaa.
43019017	Ba kpɔɔ le koodem bela dɛ gel o che dagagre baa dɛ ba o kpaara pɛl o ta la dɛ ba tel bobɛl baa dɛ yerɛ bela Nyuhog Bɔr, asɛ Juda tena gee yerɛ bela Gɔlgɔta.
43019018	Baa tel bela la, ba kpaaro pɛl dagagre la ta. Ba kpaa nɛra banɛ ja o nɛ, bɛl do o dig ta, asɛ bɛl ge do o gal ta, asɛ o do ba bwa baah ta.
43019019	Belaa Paelet gel ba chwerɛ waane ka pɛl Yeesu dagagre la nyundua. Waa baa chwera laanee kɛ, |scJUDA TENA KOORO YEESU WAA LE NASARƐT LAANEE LA|d.
43019020	Dɛ bela ne Jerusalam aa jaŋɛ, anomanta Juda tena kɛrɛdɛ bwa na gɛ waa la dɛ kura. Ba chwera Juda tena wobol ne Room tena wobol ne Grik tena wobol ta.
43019021	Anomanta Juda tena Sɔfonomonome la ŋɔ Paelet be ŋɔ, "Gɛ haa chwera ŋɔ, 'Juda tena kooroo on' nɔ aa were. Chwerɛ ŋɔ 'Onee ŋɔa Juda tena kooroo on.' "
43019022	Anee Paelet chaŋe ŋɔ, "N te dɔɔ chwerɛ tonɛ."
43019023	Soojare la aa kpaa Yeesu pɛl dagagre ta tonɛ la, ba bɔne o laala bini bɔre anaarɛ, asɛ bɛlbwa kpɔ beŋkpoŋ. Kɛ o batakaare waa doo lɔga la te, ba sɔɔh kombir, ba ta bobɛlbwa nyarɛ pɛ.
43019024	Anomanta soojare la ŋɔ dɔŋa be ŋɔ, "He bɛ gel ya kɛɛro. Hé gel ya ta chacha, naate waa di la ó kpɔ." Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Baa kpɔ n laalaa bɔne dɔŋa, dɛ ta chacha dɛ́ na naate waa di n batakaare." Gɛ baa chwera laanee soojare la ɛ, dɛ gel a ɛ kpela.
43019025	Dɛ Yeesu nya ne Yeesu nyajen ne Kliopas haah Mɛɛre ne Mɛɛre waa le Magdala la chegɛ Yeesu dagagre la jwɛɛh bela.
43019026	Yeesu aa na o nya ne o habɔteŋre waa dɛ nyinu kohona la kɛŋɔ baa chegɛ dɔŋa jwɛh, asɛ o ŋɔ o nya be ŋɔ, "N nya, he biee la,"
43019027	dɛ ŋɔ o habɔteŋre la ge be ŋɔ, "He nyaa la." Le awola la, o habɔteŋre la lawɛ Mɛɛre kaa o dem o ka so o be.
43019028	A habɔɔ Yeesu aa naa kɛŋɔ o wobɛlbwa tonɔ la, o ŋɔ, "Nyɔgre dɛ kpo mɛ," ásɛ waa aa lɔ Korowii Tɔn bini la ɛ kpela.
43019029	Dɛ vii bɛl ne sennyɛga chegɛ bela, asɛ ba kpɔ komɛl kɛŋɔ yabii vɔwɛ daa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ hesop dajaŋ ta, dɛ kpɔ li sennyɛga la dɛ kpɔ su o nyoa ó nyɔ.
43019030	Yeesu aa nyɔa tonɛ la, o ŋɔ, "A tonɔ," asɛ dɛ gure o nyu dɛ gel o doma le, o sewɛ.
43019031	Dɛ awola tɔpere la ɛ tɔpere Juda tena aa dɛ kpɔ ba te, dɛkalkɛ tɔɔ peraa dɛ ba jo Ona Tɔpere waa ɛ ba tɔpejen tenten la ta. Dɛ baa nyin kɛŋɔ Yeesu ne nɛra la sagɛ ka tel tɔpejen la ta. Anomanta ba kaa soŋe Paelet ŋɔ ó gel soojare kuugi ba nakpale bá sewɛ warane, ásɛ ba dɔ bɔr laa ba kpɔ dagagre la ta.
43019032	Baa soŋe ŋwɛnɛ la, soojare la kaa kuugi nɛra la baa kpaa ba ne Yeesu pɛl dagagre ta la, nakpale.
43019033	Baa tel Yeesu be la, ba nao kɛŋɔ o te dɔɔ sewɛ, anomanta ba ta o te nakpale kuuge.
43019034	Kɛ soojare la bɛl kpɔ lampea dɛ yagɛ Yeesu loŋi ta. Bug la ta, chal ne nee le.
43019035	Naate waa di waa nɔ danseɛ la naa siwi ne, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ kasinteŋii, dɛɛ bola ásɛ he ge no dɛ yarada.
43019036	Anɔ gelɔ waa baa chwera Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Baa o hog beŋkpoŋ kwaraa ku" la ɛ kpela.
43019037	Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn la bobɛl ge ŋɔ, "Baa nyiŋi nɛn baa yagɔ lampea ne laanee."
43019038	Anɔ bwa habɔɔ la, baa bɛl waa le Arimatea baa yerɔ Josef la Paelet be dɛ ka soŋo Yeesu lale. Dɛ a gɛ Josef nɔ dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ, kɛ o koh Juda tena ɔma waa dɛɛ sɔh o te a gɛ bɔr. Paelet tɛo ŋwɛnɛ ŋɔ ó ka kpɔ lale la kaa, asɛ o ka kpɔɔ kaa.
43019039	Nikodeemɔs waa la Yeesu be jwaana bɛl la, o ne Josefoo la Yeesu hugribɔr bela. Nikodeemɔs la konsɔɔhsoma baa kpɔa dɛɛ fɔgle ba lala ne bela. A kan dɛ do tɔgre dɛ ɛ men baa kpɔa dɛ ɛ paanoo la baage del.
43019040	Ba nɛra banɛ la kpɔ Yeesu lale la dɛ kpɔ konsɔɔhsoma la fɔglo, dɛ kpɔ yapoŋ vɔrɔwo, gɛ Juda tena aa dɛ ɛ ba lala dɛɛ hug ba la.
43019041	Bela baa kpo Yeesu la, dɛ ba du daa ane bela, asɛ ba forɛ lalbɔɔ bwe bɛl ta kɛŋɔ dea ken. Dɛ ba ta nomɛlbwa o bini huge bwa.
43019042	Dɛ lalbɔɔ la bɛne bela, asɛ ba Ona Tɔpere ge telo tonɛ, anomanta ba denɔ kpɔ Yeesu ka huge o bini.
43020001	Tomun aa dɛ kpɔ Kwasiara la, Mɛɛre waa le Magdala la la bela baa huge Yeesu la, dɛ ka na kɛŋɔ bwe baa kpɔa tɔ bɔɔ la nyoa la le o nyoa.
43020002	Waa na gɛ la, o chwao la Seemɔn Pita ne o dɔŋ Yeesu aa dɛ nyinu kohona la be dɛ ka ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Ba laa ya Dɔɔ kpɔ lalbɔɔ la bini, yaa jemɛ bela baa kpɔɔ bil."
43020003	Pita ne o dɔŋ habɔteŋre la iro dɛ la bela baa huge Yeesu la.
43020004	Dɛ chwae baa chwa, asɛ Pita dɔŋ la chwa warane dɛ felu tel bɔɔ la ta.
43020005	O boŋɔ haah dɛ na yapoŋ la chɔe, kɛ o ta lalbɔɔ la bini tenten joɛ.
43020006	Belaa Pita waa ka mun la ba dɛ ba jo bɔɔ la bini, dɛ na yapoŋ la bela,
43020007	dɛ na yapoŋ baa kpɔa vɔwɛ o nyu la kɛŋɔ waa gula chɔ pera.
43020008	Belaa Yeesu habɔteŋre waa tɔ sie tel bela la ge berɛ jo lalbɔɔ la bini, dɛ na a bwa. Waa naa la, o den yarada.
43020009	Dɛ ba ta waa aa lɔ Korowii Tɔn bini bobɛl dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ a chɛ kɛ Yeesu ir seo ta la mun noɛ mɔɔ.
43020010	Yeesu habɔteŋra la berɛ kaa ba deremi.
43020011	Kɛ dɛ Mɛɛre te ta chegɛ bɔɔ la nyoa dɛɛ wi. Waa dɛ wi la, o boŋɔ dɛ haah lalbɔɔ la bini,
43020012	asɛ dɛ na nyundua toroma banɛ. Ba do kompoŋa so bela baa kpɔ Yeesu lale bil la. Bɛl soge o nyu bɔr, asɛ bɛl so o nakpale bɔr.
43020013	Belaa nyundua toroma la bɔɔro ŋɔ, "N nya, bɔkwa waa hɛɛ wi ken nɔ?" Asɛ o ŋɔ, "Ba kpɔ n Dɔɔ kaa. Maa jemɛ bela baa kpɔɔ ka bil."
43020014	Waa bol gɛ tonɛ dɛ berɛ o te, dɛ Yeesuu chega, kɛ o ta jemɛ kɛ onee.
43020015	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "N nya, bɔkwa waa bala hɛɛ wi ken nɔ? Ume bɔree hɛɛ nyin ɔ?" Dɛ Mɛɛre dɛ lii kɛŋɔ nɛn waa dɛ nyiŋi daa baa dua bela la ta laanee, anomanta o chaŋo ŋɔ, "Nomoa, dɛ henee ba kpɔ n Dɔɔ kaa laa, hé gel n jemɛ bela haa kpɔɔ ka bil, ásɛ dɛ la ka kpɔɔ."
43020016	Anee Yeesu yerɔ ŋɔ, "Mɛɛre." Asɛ o berɛ sie o be dɛ kpɔ Juda tena wobol ŋɔ, "Raboni!" (o munii Nomoa), dɛ ka lawɔ kpoŋe.
43020017	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kpɔ mɛ ta, n ta n Mɛɛ be laŋɛ mɔɔ. Kaa ka ŋɔ n nimanar be ŋɔ, 'N berɔ dɛɛ kaa nyundua n ne he bwa Mɛɛ waa ɛ ya bwa Korowii la be.' "
43020018	Asɛ Mɛɛre waa le Magdala la la Yeesu habɔteŋra la be dɛ ka ŋɔ, "N na ya Dɔɔ la!" O bol waa Yeesu aa bola la ba be.
43020019	Awola Kwasiara la jwaana la, Yeesu habɔteŋra la cheme dea bɛl bini. Dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ Juda tena, anomanta ba tɔɔge gbeni la dɛ laa karɛ ba nɛ. Belaa ba ŋɔ ba nyiŋi, dɛ Yeesu baa che ba baah dɛ ŋɔ, "Kórowii tɛ heyaa bambisɔɔhna."
43020020	Waa bol gɛ la, o kpɔ o nɔɔra ne o loŋi bag ba, asɛ ba sie lɛ kohona kɛŋɔ baa na ba Dɔɔ la.
43020021	Yeesu berɔ bol ja ŋɔ, "Kórowii tɛ heyaa bambisɔɔhna. Gɛ n Mɛɛ aa tom mɛ la, gɛɛ n gee tomɛ heya."
43020022	Waa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o hweero ta ba nɛɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "Hé lɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la.
43020023	Dɛ he ŋɔ Korowii kpɔ nɛra wechɔga kɛ ba aa, wɛɛ kpɔɔ kɛ ba, kɛ dɛ he ŋɔ Korowii bɛ nɛra wechɔga kpɔ kɛ ba aa, aa do ba nɛɛ."
43020024	Dɛ Tɔmas baa dɛ yerɔ Kpar o ɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra la bini bɛl la toole o bala la be gɛ saŋ Yeesu aa ba bela la.
43020025	Anomanta dɛ ba dɛ bol o be ŋɔ, "Ya na ya Dɔɔ la." Asɛ o chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Dɛ n te ta dadowɛre la buge aa lɔ o nɔɔra ta la nae, dɛ kpɔ n nonii do bela, dɛ berɛ kpɔ n nɔn do o loŋi bela baa kpɔ lampea yagɛ la aa, maa waa nɔɔ yarada."
43020026	A yawanyoa la, Yeesu habɔteŋra la berɔ ba cheme dea la bini ja, dɛ Tɔmas ja ba nɛ. Ba kagre dea la gbeni, kɛ Yeesu baa jo che ba baah, dɛ ŋɔ, "Kórowii tɛ heyaa bambisɔɔhna!"
43020027	Asɛ dɛ ŋɔ Tɔmas be ŋɔ, "Kpɔ he nonii ba do n nɔɔra bɔɔne la ta, dɛ kpɔ he nɔn do n loŋi bɔɔ la ge ta, dɛɛ yarada mɛ, dɛ gel aahna-aahna la haa dɛ ɛ la."
43020028	Asɛ Tɔmas ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, n Korowii!"
43020029	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Haa na mɛ nɔ waa he yarada mɛ nɔ kɛɛ? Nɛra baa wola men nae dɛ yarada mɛ la, ba na som."
43020030	Nyokpowaa Yeesu aa ɛa o habɔteŋra la siwi ta warɔ taeh. A bwa laa n chwerɛ do tɔn nɔ bini.
43020031	Kɛ n chwerɛ anɔ ásɛ he che a ta dɛ yarada kɛŋɔ Yeesuu Kristo Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ bao la, onee Korowii Bie la, ásɛ a che he yarada haa dɛ yaradao la ta he dɔ Korowii mkpa.
43021001	A habɔɔ la, Yeesu kpɔ o te ba bagle o habɔteŋra la Tibeerias Moo la ta ja. Kenii a ɛ ba nao.
43021002	Dɛ o habɔteŋra Seemɔn Pita ne Tɔmas baa dɛ yerɔ Kpar la, ne Nataaneɛl waa le Keena waa lɔ Galilia harɛ ta, ne Sebedii bii, ne ba bini banɛ pɛo so.
43021003	Asɛ Seemɔn Pita ŋɔ o bala la be ŋɔ, "N dɛ la ń ka ta asau." Anee ba ŋɔ, "Amɔ te ya ne hɛɛ lao." Asɛ ba bwa ka jo gbera bini dɛ ka ɛ toma aaa tɔɔ ba per, dɛ ba ta komɛlbwa dɔe.
43021004	Tɔ aa pera la, dɛ Yeesu chegɛ nee nyoa bela, kɛ o habɔteŋra la aa nao la, ba ta jemɛ kɛ onee.
43021005	Belaa o yer ba ŋɔ, "Bwɛɛla, he ta pɛŋa dɔe yaa?" Anee ba ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh, ya ta komɛlbwa dɔe."
43021006	Asɛ o ŋɔ, "Hé ta asau la ta gbera la dig bɔr, hɛɛ dɔ anee." Belaa ba ta do bela, asɛ asau la lawɛ pɛŋa kohona, ba ta wone tɛro do gbera la bini.
43021007	Anee Yeesu habɔteŋre waa dɛ nyinu kohona la ŋɔ Pita be ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔree." Dɛ Seemɔn Pita foo o batakaare bil. Waa noa kɛŋɔ ba Dɔɔree la, o berɛ kpɔ do, dɛ le nee la ta.
43021008	Asɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra la kar la tawɛ gbera la dɛ tɛr asau la ne pɛŋa la teŋɛ dɛ ba ta baŋ, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba ne baŋ aa jaŋɛ kohona. Wɛɛ ɛ nagale lafaa.
43021009	Baa baa chuge la, ba na hɔla nii asɛ pɛŋe dawɛ a doa, asɛ paanoo chɔ bela.
43021010	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé kpɔ pɛŋa haa lawa la ane ba."
43021011	Belaa Seemɔn Pita ka jo gbera la bini dɛ tɛr asau la le baŋ, dɛ pɛŋejena su o bwa. A lɔ lafa fifraanue dɛ atoro, kɛ a ne a wara bwa, asau la bobɛlbwa ta kɛɛrɛ.
43021012	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Hé ba chɔɔ nyoa." O habɔteŋra la bɛlbwa ta wone lɔ bambile dɛ pɛɛro o nɛnsoo, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba jemɔ kɛŋɔ ba Dɔɔree.
43021013	Asɛ Yeesu ka kpɔ paanoo la tɛɛ ba, dɛ kpɔ pɛŋe la tɛɛ ba gɛ tenten.
43021014	Korowii aa iru seo ta la, anɔɔ jaa tooro waa kpɔ o te bagle o habɔteŋra la.
43021015	Belaa baa di kwaa tonɛ la, o bɔɔ Seemɔn Pita ŋɔ, "Jɔn bie Seemɔn, he dɛ nyin mɛ dɛ gwaa banɔ nɔ naa?" Anee Pita ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh, n Dɔɔ, he jemɔ kɛŋɔ n dɛ nyin he wa." Anee Yeesu berɛ ŋɔ, "Dɛɛ nyini n pebiiri nɛ."
43021016	O berɔ pɛɛro nɛɛtena ŋɔ, "Jɔn bie Seemɔn, he dɛ nyin mɛ naa?" Anee o ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh, n Dɔɔ, he jemɔ kɛŋɔ n dɛ nyin he wa." Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Dɛɛ nyiŋi n peera nɛ."
43021017	Yeesu berɔ kwaa pɛɛro tooro tena ŋɔ, "Jɔn bie Seemɔn, he dɛ nyin n waa aa?" Waa nɔ gelɔ Seemɔn Pita bambile chɔg kohona kɛ waa bera bɔɔro tooro tena ŋɔ, "He dɛ nyin n waa" la. Asɛ o ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, he jemɛ wobɛlbwa, he gbabir jemɔ kɛ n dɛ nyin he wa." Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛɛ dɛɛ n peera.
43021018	Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, he faa ɛ bonɔɔ la, he won kriso vɔwa dɛ kaa bela bwa haa dɛ nyin. Kɛ dɛ he baa hwɛɛhraa, hɛɛ tɛr nɔɔraa asɛ nomɛl vɔrɔwe dɛ kaa he ne bela haa wola nyin laŋa."
43021019	O bol anɔ dɛ kpɔ ɛɛ bagle seo la soo Pita aa dɛ ba sewa, á che a ta Korowii dɔ jirima. Waa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o ŋɔ Pita be ŋɔ, "Dɛɛ teŋɛ n nɛ."
43021020	Baa dɛ kaa la, Pita keo nyiŋi dɛ na kɛŋɔ o dɔŋ habɔteŋre Yeesu aa dɛ nyinu kohona la teŋɛ ba nɛ. Onee fa soga kpagɛ Yeesu gɛ saŋ o ne o habɔteŋra la aa chema tig ta, asɛ dɛ bɔɔro naate waa dɛ ba o lee tɛ la.
43021021	Pita aa nao la, o bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, aah baa nɔ ge sɛh?"
43021022	Belaa o chaŋo ŋɔ, "Dɛ n dɛ nyin kɛ o so le dɛ ka tel saŋ maa ba kwaraa naa, he waanee yaa? Hé te dɛɛ teŋɛ n nɛ!"
43021023	Yeesu aa bol gɛ la, dɛ o habɔteŋra la dɛ bol bobɛlbwa ŋɔ, amɔ ba dɔŋ habɔteŋre la aa sewɛ bwa. Kɛ gɛ laa Yeesu ŋɔ. Waa waa bolaa kɛŋɔ, dɛ o dɛ nyin o habɔteŋre la so ka tel gɛ saŋ waa ba naa, Pita waane laa.
43021024	A gɛ habɔteŋre nɔɔ bagle gɛ waa nɔ dɛ chwerɛ a bwa bil. Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ a ɛ kpela.
43021025	Waa Yeesu aa ɛa warɔ taeh. A bwa laa ba chwerɛ do tɔne ta. Dɛ ba fe wono chwerɛ a bwa do tɔne ta naa, a gɛ tɔne la fe aa bɔr dɔe ba dɛ jo harɛ nɔ ta.
44001001	Nomoa Teɔfelɔs, n tɔn la maa tɔ sie chwerɛ la, n le Yeesu toma la mumpar dɛ bagle o we-ɛɛla ne o webagla waa bwa
44001002	ka tel awola Korowii aa kpɔɔ kaa nyundua la. O chegɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la kpegri ta dɛ bagle baala la waa kpɔa ŋɔ bá ɛ o toroma la waa baa dɛ ba ɛɛ la, asɛ Korowii kpɔɔ kaa nyundua.
44001003	Waa sewa dɛ ir la, o kpɔ o te bagle o toroma la kera aŋwɛnɛ bwa tɔpera fifraanaarɛ baah ta, dɛɛ bol Korowii Kora waa ba be. Gɛ baa nao la gelɔ ba jemɛ kpelakpela kɛŋɔ o ir seo ta.
44001004	Ba ne waa bera ba cheme ja la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He bɛ Jerusalam le mɔɔ. Hé so kpa koŋkɛɛle la maa ŋɔa n Mɛɛ bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tɛ heyaa la.
44001005	Nee nee Jɔn sɔ nɛra Korowii ne, kɛ aa tɔpere bɛlee di asɛ Korowii kpɔ o Domadɛɛge la sɔ heya. Anomanta hé so kpao."
44001006	Ba ne waa baa cheme la, ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ, taraken te hɛɛ geloo ya Israel tena berɛ di ya kora la gbaɔ?"
44001007	Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ nɔn taa wobɛlbwa ne a tɔpere bwa do. He ta ŋwɛnɛ dɔe kɛŋɔ he jemɛ tɔpere la waane aa dɛ ba chiga.
44001008	Kɛ dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la baa so he nɛ aa, wɛɛ tɛ heyaa kpegrii asɛ he di danseɛ tɛ mɛ Jerusalam fɔgbaah, ne Judia harɛ kabora bwa ta, ne Samaria harɛ ta, ne harɛ jaga bwa."
44001009	Waa bol a gɛ waa nɔ tonɛ ba ta che dɛɛ nyiŋu la, dɛ Korowii baa kpɔɔ dɛɛ kaa nyundua, asɛ baamare ba tɔ o nɛɛ nyundua bela, ba ta on nae kpa.
44001010	Waa dɛ kaa, dɛ ba sie ta pa nyundua haah ken. Bug la ta baala banɛ bane baa do laalapoŋa baa che ba jwɛh,
44001011	dɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Galilia tena, ɛrɛɛ he che bonɔ dɛɛ nyiŋi nyundua haah gɛ nɔɔ? Yeesu nɔ Korowii aa baa kpɔɔ le he be kaa nɔ, wɛɛ berɔɔ ba gɛ tenten haa nao wɛɛ kaa nyundua nɔ."
44001012	Asɛ Yeesu toroma la le Ɔlevere Bwe la ta baa chega o kaa nyundua gel ba la ta dɛɛ kaa Jerusalam. A ka tama bwe la ne Jerusalam ɛ kwansini beŋkpoŋ.
44001013	Dɛ ba dɔ dea abrɔsane bɛl doa Jerusalam. Ba la Jerusalam dɛ ka jo o bini. Ba nɛra baa jo dea la bini laanee: Pita ne Jɔn, ne Jems ne Andriu, ne Felep ne Tɔmas, ne Batolomeo ne Maatiu, ne Alfeɔs bie Jems, ne Seemɔn Sɛlɔt, ne Jems bie Judas.
44001014	Dɛ ba ne haahna la ne Yeesu nya Mɛɛre ne Yeesu nimanar la pɛo cheme dɛ yon dɛɛ soŋe Korowii warawara.
44001015	Aa baa di tɔpera anɛ la, ba bala la bwa chemo. Baa tel nɛra lafa fifraanɛɛ. Asɛ Pita ir che ba baah ta dɛ ŋɔ,
44001016	"Yabala, Korowii Domadɛɛge chegɛ Devid nɛɛ dɛ pu sie bagle Judas waa tɔ nɛra sie dɛ bag ba Yeesu ba lawɔ la wa. Gɛ waa bagla laanee chɛ kɛ a ɛ. A waa a ɛ gɛ la.
44001017	O fa ja ya nɛ. Ya ne o bwaa fa dɛ ɛ Korowii toma nɔ."
44001018	(Waa yog Yeesu la, o kpɔ o tonchɔga la suuga dɛ ka yawɛ harɛ bɛl. A gɛ harɛ nɔ taa o chole, o tea pere, o looni le, asɛ o sewɛ.
44001019	Jerusalam tena bwa no o seo la wa. Anomanta ba pa a gɛ harɛ la sɔn ba wobol ta Akɛldama. O munii Chal Harɛ.)
44001020	Pita ŋɔ, "Ba chwerɛ Korowii Kpɛɛra Tɔn la bini ŋɔ, 'Hé gel o dem chɔ pɛɛ, nomɛlbwa bɛ o ta do.' Dɛ berɛ chwerɛ ŋɔ, 'Hé berɛ o toma tɛ nomɛl.'
44001021	Anomanta a chɛ kɛŋɔ nomɛl ba ja ya nɛɛ dɛ di ya Dɔɔ Yeesu seo ta ira la danseɛ. Nɛra ya ne ba faa teŋɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu nɛɛ dɛɛ gaage la,
44001022	dɛ kpoŋe le gɛ saŋ la Jɔn faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la dɛ ba le saŋ la Korowii aa baa kpɔ ya Dɔɔ le ya be kaa nyundua la, a gɛ nɛra nɔ bɛlee dɛ won ja ya nɛɛ dɛ di o seo ta ira la danseɛ."
44001023	Asɛ ba kpɔ nɛra banɛ dɛ ŋɔ bá ta bie tɛɛ ba dɛ́ won jemɛ naate aa chɛ kɛ o ja ba nɛɛ la. Josef baa dɛ yerɔ Baasabas (dɛ berɛ dɛɛ yerɔ Jastos la) ne Matayasee ba kpɔ,
44001024	dɛ soŋe Korowii ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ, hen jemɛ nomɛlbwa nyu bini. Anomanta bagle yaa nɛra banɛ nɔ bini onɔ la haa dɛ nyin
44001025	kɛŋɔ o chig Judas naa ta dɛɛ ɛ he toma Judas aa vɛah dɛ kaa bela aa chɛ kɛ o do la."
44001026	Baa ta bie la, Matayasee dia, asɛ ba kpɔɔ ja Yeesu toroma fi dɛ beŋkpoŋ la nɛ.
44002001	Ba tɔpejen baa dɛ yerɔ Pɛntekɔs la telo, asɛ ba bwa cheme bobeŋkpoŋ.
44002002	Kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ komɛl dɛ gbɔgre nyundua dɛɛ si kɛŋɔ peujen bɛl aa dɛ ta ken. Asɛ a gɛ gbɔga la tɔ dem la baa lɔ o ta la bwa.
44002003	Asɛ ba na kwaane kɛŋɔ ninlao ken, asɛ a pegri dɛ ba so ba nɛra baa lɔ bela la te bɛlbwa nɛ.
44002004	Ate dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge baa so ba bwa nɛɛ kpegri ne dɛ ir ba nɛ, asɛ baa bol wobofala. Korowii Domadɛɛge laanee gela ba won dɛɛ bol a gɛ wobofala la la.
44002005	Dɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɔmɛ Korowii dɛɛ tomɔ gɛ Juda tena aa dɛ tomɔ la le harɛ ta bobɛlbwa dɛ ba su Jerusalam bwa.
44002006	Baa no gbɔga la la, ba bwa baa cheme bela, asɛ a ɛɛ ba anebɛlbwa kɛŋɔ nɛra la aa dɛ bol waa ba bɛlbwa bwɛɛ wobol ta la.
44002007	Belaa ba nyoa aa kpoa kohona la, baa bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Galilia tena laa nɛra nɔ kɛɛ?
44002008	Aah ɛrɛɛ ba ɛ dɛ won dɛɛ bol ya bɛlbwa wobol nɔɔ?
44002009	Ya bwa harɛre kokogrɔ. Ya bane le Paatea, bane le Midia ne Elam, bane ge le Mɛsopoteemea ne Judia, ne Kapadoosia. Ya bane ge le Pɔntos ne Eesia,
44002010	bane le Frejea ne Pamfiilia, bane le Ijipt ne Lebya harɛ, Sairini jwɛɛh bela. Ya bane le Room.
44002011	Ba lolɛ ya bane Juda tena harɛ, bane ge ɛ hɔɔhra, kɛ ya bwa ge dɛ tomɛ Korowii gɛ Juda tena aa dɛ tomɔ la. Ya bane ge le Kret ne Arebia. Kɛ ya bwa dɛ no kɛŋɔ baa dɛ bol waa ya gbagba wobol ta dɛɛ bagle wejena Korowii aa ɛa!"
44002012	Asɛ ba nyoa kpo kohona, baa bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Aah bɔkwa soo waa nɔɔ?"
44002013	Asɛ bane gee mamɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra la ŋɔ senee ba nyɔ.
44002014	Belaa Pita ne o bala Yeesu toroma fi dɛ beŋkpoŋ la ir che, asɛ Pita ɛɛ bol waa takpeg ne dɛ ŋɔ, "Yabala Juda tena ne he nɛra haa cheme Jerusalam bwa, hé cheg deŋne dɛ no waa nɔ aa dɛ ɛ nɔ mun.
44002015	Gɛ haa dɛ lii ŋɔ senee nɛra nɔ nyɔ nɔ, sen laa ba nyɔ. Chɔɔ laa ta naa?
44002016	Waa Korowii keame Joel faa bola laanee hɛɛ na chɔɔ nɔ ne la. O bolɔ ŋɔ,
44002017	'Korowii ŋɔ, "Harɛ chɔga tɔpera aa ka mun la ta la, mɛɛ tɛ nɛra bwa soosiwii n Domadɛɛge la kohona, asɛ ba bibaala ne bihaahna bwa bol n waa la, asɛ ba bonɔɔna na chaahna, asɛ ba banjeni dee deera.
44002018	Gɛ saŋ la, mɛɛ geloo n Doma la ir n yombaala ne yomhaahna gba kwaraa nɛɛ ásɛ ba bol n waa la.
44002019	Mɛɛ ɛ nyokpowaa nyundua ne harɛ ta, asɛ nɛra na chal ne nii ne ninchuu kohona.
44002020	Wee dɛ ba bira, asɛ korobie swɛɛ kɛŋɔ chal ken mɔɔ n tɔpejen la ba.
44002021	A gɛ saŋ la, nomɛlbwa waa yerɛ men Korowii sɔn la, mɛɛ lɛo." '
44002022	"N bala Israel tena, hé no waa nɔ. Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt la fa ɛ nɛn bɛl Korowii aa gela o won dɛɛ ɛ nyokpowaa, asɛ he na dɛ won jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii kpegri nee wɛɛ ɛ o toma kpela. A gɛ waa nɔ ta heyaa wehɔɔhra ɛɛ.
44002023	Korowii jemɛ Yeesu waa bwa wubwa dɛ chega ken mɔɔ a tel nɔ. O ɛa kɛŋɔ wɛɛ kpɔɔ do he nɔn ta, asɛ he gel wechɔg-ɛɛra kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta dɛ kpoo.
44002024	Asɛ Korowii lɛo seo nɔn ta dɛ iru seo ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ seo ta kpegri dɔe o nɛɛ dɛ́ lawɔ o bɛ won ir.
44002025	O waa Devid bol ŋɔ, 'N ne Korowii lole saŋ bɛlbwa. Maa ɔmɛ bwa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o chegɛ n habɔɔ.
44002026	Anomanta n sie lɛo, n wobol ge bwa ɛ bansɔɔhna wobol. Maa n bwadabii waa jar, dɛkalkɛŋɔ n sie dawɛ Korowii nɛ.
44002027	N Naa Korowii, haa he bidɛɛge waa soeh ba lala bwɛ. Haa gel o chɔ bɔɔ bini pɔh.
44002028	He bag mɛ ŋwɛnɛ maa kpɔ dɛ dɔ bokpega. Saŋ bɛlbwa maa na he siwi la, n bwara ɛɛ sɔɔh mɛɛ.'
44002029	"Yabala, mɛɛ wonoo bol n naa Devid wa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya bwa jemɛ o waa kɛrɛdɛ. O sewɔ, ba hugo, hale o ŋwam ta lole fini nɔ.
44002030	Kɛ o ɛ Korowii keame, dɛ berɛ jemɛ nyoa Korowii aa ŋwɛɛ ntam bagɛ ŋɔ wɛɛ geloo Devid naa bɛl ba di o kara la.
44002031	Devid na chaahna dɛ won jemɛ waa Korowii aa dɛ ba ɛɛ kerekere. Anomanta Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ásɛ o ba lɛ yaa la seo ta ira waa o faa bol ŋɔ Korowii ta o waa soɛh lala bwɛ, o ta bɔɔ bini chɔe pɔh la.
44002032	A gɛ Yeesu nɔɔ Korowii ir seo ta la. Ya bwa kpɔ ya sie nao dɛɛ diu danseɛ.
44002033	O Mɛɛ Korowii aa kpɔɔ kaa nyundua dɛ gel o so nomombɔr o dig ta la, o tɛo o Domadɛɛge la gɛ o faa bagɛ nyoa la, asɛ Yeesu ge berɛ kpɔ tɛ yaa. O tomaa hɛɛ na dɛɛ no la.
44002034	He jemɔ kɛŋɔ Devid gbagba laa ira kaa nyundua, kɛ waa waa bola laanee nɔ. O ŋɔ, 'N Naa Korowii ŋɔ n Dɔɔ be ŋɔ ó so nomombɔr o dig ta bela
44002035	ásɛ o ba o dɔma ne harɛ ásɛ o tigri ba nɛ.'
44002036	"Anomanta a chɛ kɛŋɔ Israel tena bwa jemɛ kɛŋɔ Yeesu laanee Korowii ɛ nɛwɛnyini bwa dɔɔ la. Onee Kristo la. Kɛ o laa he kpaa pɛl dagagre ta dɛ kpoo la aa?"
44002037	Nɛra la aa no a gɛ waa nɔ la, ba nao kɛŋɔ ba ɛ wechɔga, asɛ ba tea bini chɔg, ba bɔɔ Pitawa ŋɔ, "Aah ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ɛɛ yɔ, yabala?"
44002038	Anee Pita ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "A chɛ kɛŋɔ he bini bɛlbwa charɛ o liire dɛ le wechɔga ta, dɛ gel ba sɔɔ Korowii nee ásɛ o teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛ, ásɛ Korowii kpɔ o wechɔga kɛo. He ɛ gɛ naa, Korowii ɛɛ tɛ heyaa o Domadɛɛge laanee,
44002039	dɛkalkɛŋɔ he ne he naanar ne bojaŋ tena Korowii aa dɛ yer ba ŋɔ bá ba o be la bwa waa o bagɛ nyoa la la."
44002040	O bol waa kohona dɛ ja ba dɛ gbɛgbɛ ba ŋɔ, "Fini nɛra wechɔga kan ga. Hé takapɔ dɛ laa he te le nɛnchɔga la Korowii aa dɛ ba ba wechɔga kpɔe dɛ bɔ ba kem la bini."
44002041	Nɛra la kɛrɛdɛ yarada Pita wobol la, asɛ ba sɔ ba Korowii ne. Ba nɛra kagboŋa batoroo yarada Yeesu waa dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo awola tɔpere la ta dɛ ba ja ba nɛ.
44002042	A gɛ nɛra la balɔ dɛ baa hweli Korowii waa Yeesu toroma la be warawara. Dɛ ba ne Yeesu toroma laanee pɛa dɛɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa, dɛɛ di kwaa dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii.
44002043	Dɛ Korowii chegɛ Yeesu toroma la nɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ tomkpega, asɛ nɛra bwa nyoa kpo baa ɔmɛ.
44002044	Dɛ nɛra baa yarada Yeesu waa dɛ ɛ asɔre tena la bwa pɛo dɛɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa, dɛɛ bɔne komɛlbwa baa dɔa.
