44002045	Dɛ ba dɛ yog ba koŋkwaare ne harɛre dɛ kpɔ a suuga la dɛɛ bɔne dɔŋa gɛ bɛlbwa aa hiah, asɛ bɛlbwa won yawɛ o konnyina.
44002046	Tɔpebii te bɛlbwaa baa cheme Korowii Dea, dɛ pɛ dɛɛ di kwaa ba deremi silɛɛ ne tepoŋ ne.
44002047	Dɛ ba dɛ jam Korowii, dɛ nɛra dɛ kpɛɛ ba taeh. Asɛ Korowii lɛ nɛnfala tɔpebii te bɛlbwa ba ba baa ja o nɛra la nɛ.
44003001	Awola bɛl Pita ne Jɔn la Korowii Dea wekee saŋ. A gɛ saŋ nɔɔ nɛra la bwa cheme dɛɛ soŋe Korowii webaŋa.
44003002	Baa kaa tel dea la doonyoa la baa dɛ yerɔ Doonyodɛɛge la ta la, dɛ baa bɛl soge bela. Dɛ a gɛ baa la soge boobi o bechale saŋ bwa. Asɛ tɔpere bwa ba yon cheo ka so a gɛ doonyoa bela o kaa soŋe suuga nɛra baa dɛ jo Korowii Dea bela la be.
44003003	Pita ne Jɔn aa dɛ ba dea bela joe la, o soŋ ba ŋɔ bá tɛo komɛl.
44003004	Belaa ba pa sie o be, asɛ Pita ŋɔ, "Nyiŋi yaa!"
44003005	Anee o nyiŋ ba dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ baa tɛo komɛlee.
44003006	Belaa Pita ŋɔ, "N ta suuga dɔe dɛ́ tɛɛ, kɛ mɛɛ tɛɛ kon n ge aa dɔa laanee. Yeesu Kristo waa le Nasarɛt la sɔn ta, ir dɛ valɛ!"
44003007	Asɛ Pita lawɛ boobi la nɔndig dɛ gɔɔro ir. Bug la ta dɛ baa la nakpale ne o nalurumi denɔ do kpegri,
44003008	o chugri ir che o naa anɛ la ta dɛɛ valɛ, asɛ o ne ba jo Korowii Dea bela. O kpɔ silɛɛ dɛɛ valɛ dɛɛ sa, dɛɛ kpɛɛ Korowii.
44003009	Nɛra baa lɔ bela la bwa nao kɛŋɔ waa dɛ valɛ dɛɛ kpɛɛ Korowii.
44003010	Baa naa kɛŋɔ boobi la o faa dɛ soŋe kwaa Doonyodɛɛge la ta laanee dɛɛ valɛ la, ba nyoa kpoo ba chara jegre kɛŋɔ waa bera won ir che dɛɛ valɛ la.
44003011	Baa la toɔh pɛl Pita ne Jɔn, asɛ ba ne o ka tel Korowii Dea la bobɛl baa dɛ yerɛ bela Solomɔn Pato la, asɛ nɛra la aa nao la, ba nyoa kpoo, asɛ ba bwa chwa biribiri ken dɛ ba Pita ne Jɔn ne baa la be bela.
44003012	Pita aa na nɛra la la, o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Yabala Israel tena, ɛrɛɛ waa nɔ kpo he nyoa hɛɛ nyiŋi yaa gɛ nɔɔ? He dɛ lii ŋɔ ya gbagba kpegri ta kɛɛ ya nɛndɛɛga ɛɛ kohona waa baa nɔ won ir che dɛɛ valɛ nɔ kɛɛ?
44003013	Gɛ laa. Korowii la ya naanar faa dɛ tomɛ la, Abraham ne Aesek ne Jekɔbwa Korowii la, on tɛ o bonɔɔ Yeesu sɔn gɛ la. Onee he kpɔ tɛ nomonome ŋɔ bá bol o waa dɛ kpoo la. Harɛ nomoa Paelet aa ŋɔa ó tao la, he ta ŋɔe ŋɔ haa sɛah?
44003014	Wechɔga bɛlbwa toole o nɛ, wedɛɛga gboo o ɛ. Kɛ he ŋɔ haa on nyin, dɛ ŋɔ nɛn waa dɛ kpo nɛra laanee hɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ Paelet foo ta dɛ gelo.
44003015	Korowii nɛn nɛwɛnyini aa che o nɛɛ dɛ dɔ mkpa la, onee he kpo la, asɛ Korowii lawɔ ir seo ta. Ya na a gɛ waa nɔ. A danseɛ yaa di la.
44003016	O sɔnee ya yerɛ asɛ baa nɔ gbaŋre la. Yarada yaa dɛ yarada Yeesu la, a taa a che waa nɔ haa naa nɔ won ɛ la. O waa la yaa dɛ yarada la, a gbosoroo chah baa nɔ he bwa aa jemɔ nɔ la. He bwa gee naa kɛŋɔ o gbaŋrɔ.
44003017	"Yabala, n jemɔ kɛŋɔ bɛ jemaa gela he ne he nomonome ɛ Yeesu waa haa ɛo la.
44003018	Korowii tɔ sie gel o keamere la bwa bagle ŋɔ o Kristo la waa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ásɛ o ba lɛ yaa la dɛ ba waa nae. A gɛ waa la, kenii Korowii chega a ba ɛ.
44003019	Anomanta hé charɛ he liire le he wechɔga ta dɛ kpɔ he te tɛ Korowii ásɛ o kpɔ he wechɔga kɛ heya, dɛɛ tɛ heyaa bambisɔɔhna, dɛɛ do heyaa gbemba.
44003020	Wɛɛ berɔɔ tomɛ Yeesu waa ɛ Kristo la he be. Onee o le ŋɔ ó ba lɛ heyaa la.
44003021	A chɛ kɛŋɔ Yeesu do nyundua dɛ ka tel tɔɔ la wee Korowii aa ɛ wobɛlbwa kɛrɛdɛ ken, gɛ waa gela o keamedɛɛga la bagle la.
44003022	Mosis baglɔ ŋɔ, 'N Naa Korowii ɛɛ tomɛ o keamee ó ba bol o waa dɛɛ tɛ heyaa gɛ waa tom mɛ la. He gbagba dwee binii wɛɛ ba o lee. A chɛ kɛŋɔ he cheg deŋne dɛ no o wobol, dɛ ɛ gɛ bwa waa dɛ bagle.
44003023	Nomɛlbwa waa wola o wobol noɛ la, baa pero le Korowii nɛra binii dɛ kpoo!'
44003024	Korowii keamere baa dɛ bagle Korowii waa la, le Samoɛl bere saŋ ne banɔ la baa teŋɛ o nɛɛ bwa, ba bwaa bagle waa aa dɛ ɛ fini nɔ wa.
44003025	Korowii nyoa la waa baga dɛ gel o keamere bol la, heyaa o bagɛ tɛ. Fɔo la Korowii ne he naanar aa fɔwa la laworomɛɛ hɛɛ di la. O ŋɔ Abraham be ŋɔ, 'He naanar nɛɛ aa ba chega n ɛ wedɛɛga tɛ harɛ ta nɛra bwa.'
44003026	A waa Korowii le o torome la dɛ tɔ sie tomɔ he be ásɛ o ba ɛ heyaa wedɛɛga dɛ gel bɛlbwa charɛ o liire dɛ le o wechɔga ta la."
44004001	Pita ne Jɔn aa chega dɛɛ bol waa nɛra la be la, Sɔfore bane ne nɛra baa dɛ daah Korowii Dea la nomoa ne Saduki tena bane balɔ. Dɛ Saduki tena la aa yarada kɛŋɔ nɛra bwa ɛɛ ir seo taa tɔpebɛl.
44004002	Ba baah diu kɛŋɔ Pita ne Jɔn aa dɛ bol nɛra la be ŋɔ Yeesu ir seo ta la. A gɛ la baglɔ kɛŋɔ serewa ɛɛ ba ir seo taa.
44004003	Anomanta ba lawɛ Pita ne Jɔn ka do dea ásɛ bɔr chaah mɔɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ saŋ baa lag ba la dɛ jɔmɔraa.
44004004	Nɛra baa lɔ bela dɛɛ no waa la dɛ yaradaa warɔ. Dɛ baala baa yarada waa la ba nɛra kagboŋa banue.
44004005	Tɔ aa pera la, Juda tena nomonome, ne bwɛɛ nomonome, ne Tɔn Jerema bwa cheme Jerusalam.
44004006	Ba ne Sɔfore Nomoa Anas ne Kaefas, ne Jɔn, ne Alɛksanda ne Sɔfore Nomoa dea nɛra la bwaa chema.
44004007	Asɛ ba kpɔ Pita ne Jɔn ba che nɛra la baah ta, dɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ŋwɛnɛ besoo taa a che he ɛ gɛ nɔɔ? Ume sɔn taa he che ɛ gɛ waa nɔɔ?"
44004008	Belaa Korowii Domadɛɛge la ir Pita nɛɛ kpegri nɛ, asɛ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Bwɛɛla sitɔɔra ne nomonome,
44004009	dɛ bɔɔraa hɛɛ bɔɔ yaa dɛ́ jemɛ ŋwɛnɛ la ta aa chega ya won ɛ boobi nɔ wedɛɛge nɔ dɛ won chaoh weela aa,
44004010	amɔ te hé no, asɛ Ísrael tena bwa no, kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo waa le Nasarɛt, haa kpoo dagagre ta asɛ Korowii iru seo ta la, o sɔn kpegri taa a che baa nɔ waa chega nɔ dɔ bokpega la.
44004011	Yeesu nɔ bwara waa ba bagle Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, 'Bwe la he mamaala aa vɛah dɛ liiru konsala la, on baa lawɛ dea la kpoŋe la.'
44004012	Dɛ Yeesu laa aa, nomɛlbwa toole dɛ won lɛ yaa. Nomɛlbwa toole harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwa yá yerɔ o won lɛ yaa ka ja Yeesu nɛ."
44004013	Dɛ Pita ne Jɔn aa tɔn jemɛ kohona bɛlbwa, dɛ ɛ nɛmpɛɛne baa wola Korowii waa hwele kohona bɛlbwa. Nomonome la aa na bambile la soo baa wona kpoŋe dɛɛ bol waa la, dɛ a ɛɛ ba anebɛlbwa. Belaa ba sie chaah ba nɛɛ kɛŋɔ ba fa teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ dɛɛ hwelu. An gela ba jemɛ waa dɛ dɔ bambile gɛ la.
44004014	Nomonome la ta berɛ won bol wobɛlbwa kpa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ ba gbabir na baa la baa chaoh la. Dɛ o chegɛ Pita ne Jɔn be.
44004015	Asɛ ba ŋɔ Píta ne Jɔn le dea la bini ka che dahara. Dɛ ba dɛ bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ,
44004016	"Aah ɛrɛ tenee yaa ba baala nɔ ɛɛ yɔ? Jerusalam tena bwa nao dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ nyokpowaa ba ɛ gɛ nɔ. A te ta tɔŋla dɔe.
44004017	Hé gel ya aah ba ŋɔ ba bɛ wobɛlbwa bol Yeesu sɔn ta bobɛlbwa kpa, asɛ waa nɔ bɛ won kaa bojaŋ kpa."
44004018	Asɛ ba berɛ yer ba jo dea dɛ aah ba ŋɔ ba bɛ too bol wobɛlbwa bobɛlbwa Yeesu sɔn ta kpa!
44004019	Anee Pita ne Jɔn chaŋe ŋɔ, "Hé gbabir di kasinteŋ. He ɔma ne Korowii ɔma, amee magra Korowii be nɔ?
44004020	Waa ya gbagba aa naa dɛ no la, yaa won gel a bola bwa!"
44004021	Belaa nomonome la kwaa aah ba kohona gwaa logla la, dɛ gel ba. Ba nao kɛŋɔ ba ŋɔ bá ham ba ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta naa, nɛra la aa ban sɛh,
44004022	dɛkalkɛŋɔ baa la baa chaoh la gwaa bene fifraanaarɛ o weela la ta, asɛ nɛra la bwa na gɛ baa chaoh la dɛɛ kooga dɛɛ jam Korowii.
44004023	Baa gel Pita ne Jɔn la, ba la ba bala la be dɛ ka bagle gɛ Sɔfore Nomoa ne nomonome la aa bola la.
44004024	Ba bala la aa no waa la la, ba bwa pɛo soŋe Korowii ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ haa ɛ komɛlbwa dɔɔ, hen ta nyundua ne harɛ ne mpo ne kwaa aa lɔ a ta bwa!
44004025	He chegɛ he Domadɛɛge ta dɛ gel ya naa Devid waa ɛ he bonɔɔ la ŋɔ, 'Ɛrɛɛ nɛnhɔɔhra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la lɛ gaeh, dɛɛ le jina dɛɛ koh ba te pɛɛ nɔɔ?
44004026	Harɛ ta koranar kpɔ ba te dɛ cheme, dɛ yo N Naa Korowii ne o Kristo la.'
44004027	Kpela ge, Hɛrɔd, ne Pɔnteɔs Paelet ne nɛnhɔɔhra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ, ne Israel tena bwa cheme bwɛɛ nɔ ta. Ba yo Yeesu, he gbagba bonɔɔ waa wola wechɔge bɛlbwa dɔe la. Onee he ɛ he Kristo la.
44004028	Ba bwa chemo dɛ ɛ waa he gbagba aa kpɔ he kpegri ne he tetoora vɔrɔwe ŋɔ aa ɛo la.
44004029	N Naa Korowii, berɛ na gɛ baa dɔa aah he bonɔɔna, dɛ́ tɛɛ ba kpegri ba won bol he waa bansua bwa ne.
44004030	Tɛɛ ba kpegri ba won dɛɛ chah weela, dɛ gel ba che he gbagba bonɔndɛɛge Yeesu nɛɛ dɛ ɛ wekpega ne nyokpowa."
44004031	Baa soŋe Korowii tonɛ la, dea baa lɔ o bini la jigro. Korowii Domadɛɛge la baa so ba nɛ, asɛ baa bol Korowii Waa la bansua bwa ne.
44004032	Dɛ nɛra baa yarada Yeesu waa la dɛ ɛ asɔre tena la bwa dɔ nyopɛo, ba liire bwa ge ɛ beŋkpoŋ. Bɛlbwa ta o gbagba kondɔɔla kpɔe ɛ o gbo kwa. Dɛ bɛlbwa dɔ kon aa, o dɔŋ konee.
44004033	Kpegri tenten nee Yeesu toroma la di o seo ta ira la danseɛ. Asɛ Korowii cha ba, dɛ gel ba won dɛɛ bonyen nɛra.
44004034	Dɛ ba bɛlbwa toole aa noo, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ banɔ la baa dɔ deene ne harɛre la dɛ yoga,
44004035	dɛ kpɔ a suuga dɛɛ ba Yeesu toroma la be, asɛ baa bɔna gɛ aa chɛ kɛ bɛlbwa dɔ.
44004036	Dɛ ba bini bɛl le Lewi dea, ba lolɔ Saepros, asɛ baa yerɔ Josef. Dɛ Yeesu toroma la dɛ yerɔ Banabas. O sɔn la munii "Nɛn waa dɛ do nɛra gbemba."
44004037	O kaa yog o harɛ bɛl dɛ kpɔ a suuga ba tɛ Yeesu toroma la.
44005001	Dɛ baa bɛl sɔne Ananias, o haah ge sɔne Safaera. O ne o haah yog ba harɛ bɛl,
44005002	asɛ ba nyoa pɛ, asɛ o kpɔ suuga la ane sɔh, dɛ kpɔ a kabora ba tɛ Yeesu toroma la.
44005003	Belaa Pita bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Ananias, ɛrɛɛ he gel Bɔnsam won negre dɛ gel he ba negre Korowii Domadɛɛge la, dɛ kwaa he suuga la pera sɔh nɔɔ?
44005004	Haa wola harɛ la yoge mɔɔ la, dɛ hen dɔ he kon. Haa yogu tonɛ la ge la, dɛ suuga la ge ɛ he kwa. Aah dɛ bɔkwaa gela he ɛ gɛ nɔɔ? Nɛwɛnyini laa he negre nɔ. Korowiirii he negre la!"
44005005	Ananias aa dena no waa nɔ la, o den chole, dɛ sewɛ ge. Nɛra baa no a gɛ waa nɔ la bwa ɔmɔ kɛrɛdɛ.
44005006	Belaa bonɔɔna bane ir dɛ ba vɔrɔwo, dɛ cheo le buse, dɛ ka hugo.
44005007	Tama, dɛ o haah ge balɔ, dɛ waa jemɛ kɛŋɔ waane ɛ o jaa.
44005008	Anee Pita bɔɔro ŋɔ, "He ne he jaa harɛ la haa yoga la, o suuga bwaa nɔ naa?" Asɛ haah la sɛh ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh, a bwaa."
44005009	Belaa Pita pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he ne he jaa nyoa pɛ asɛ he daah Korowii Domadɛɛge dɛ́ na nɔɔ? Bonɔɔna baa kaa huge he jaa laanee tel doonyoa la. Baa che he gee le buse."
44005010	Bug la ta dɛ o ge cholo chɔ Pita sie bela, dɛ ge sewɛ. Bonɔɔna la aa bala dɛ o ge sewɔ, asɛ ba cheo le buse dɛ ka hugo o jaa jwɛh.
44005011	A gelɔ asɔre tena la bwa ne nomɛlbwa waa no a waa ɔmɛ taeh.
44005012	Dɛ Yeesu toroma la dɛ ɛ wekpega ne nyokpowaa nɛra la bini. Dɛ asɔre tena la dɛ cheme Korowii Dea la dahara bobɛl baa dɛ yerɛ bela Solomɔn Pato la ta.
44005013	Dɛ nɛra baa wola Yeesu waa yarada la dɛ kpɛɛ ba kɛrɛdɛ. Kɛ dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ kɛŋɔ bá ba puu ba dɛɛ so Solomɔn Pato ta bela.
44005014	Dɛ balaa nɛra ge den na dɛɛ ba dɛ baa ja ba nɛ. Dɛ ba bini baala ne haahna bwaa dɛɛ ba dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛ Yeesu.
44005015	Nɛra koh Yeesu toroma la toma baa dɛ ɛ la waa dɛ che weela tena ne ba mpare ne ba kalaŋre ba bil ŋwɛnɛ nyoa, ásɛ dɛ Pita ba dɛ kaa laa, o lileo dawɛ bane nɛɛ asɛ ba gbaŋre.
44005016	Asɛ nɛra le Jerusalam bwɛjegre la ta dɛ ba pirim, dɛ che weela tena ne nɛra kwaa aa dɛ ir ba nɛɛ bwa ba, asɛ ba bwa dɔ bokpega.
44005017	Kɛ Sɔfore Nomoa la ne o nɛra baa ɛ Saduki tena la bwa aa na toma Yeesu toroma la aa dɛ tomɛ la, a ɛɛ ba bɔweela kohona,
44005018	asɛ ba ir kpɔ ŋwɛnɛ bɛl dɛ lawɛ Yeesu toroma la do dea, bela baa dɛ do nɛra bwa la.
44005019	Awola jwaana la, nyundua torome bɛl baa ya dea la gbera dɛ le Yeesu toroma la ne buse, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ,
44005020	"Hé la ka che Korowii Dea la bini dɛ ka bol Yeesu ŋwɛnɛfale nɔ waa bwa nɛra be."
44005021	Yeesu toroma la no nyundua torome la waa la, asɛ tɔ aa pera chɔmbibi ne la, ba ka jo Korowii Dea la bini dɛɛ bol Yeesu waa la. Awola chɔɔ ne la, Sɔfore Nomoa la ne o nɛra yerɛ Juda tena nomonome la bwa dɛ ba cheme, dɛ tomɛ nɛra ŋɔ bá la dea la baa lawɛ Yeesu toroma la do la bini dɛ ka lee ba ba.
44005022	Toroma la aa la dea la bini la, ba ta Yeesu toroma la ka nae, dɛ berɛ ba nomonome la be dɛ ba ŋɔ,
44005023	"Yaa la bela dɛ koŋkare baa kpɔa karɛ gbeni la ta lɔ a ta, dɛ nɛra baa dɛ nyiŋi doonyoone la ta la ge chegɛ bela. Kɛ yaa ya gbeni la la, ya ta nomɛlbwa nae dea la bini!"
44005024	Sɔfonomonome la ne nomoa waa chɔ nɛra baa dɛ nyiŋi Korowii Dea doonyoo la nyoa la aa no a gɛ waa nɔ la, a ɛɛ ba anebɛlbwa. Ba ta wone jemɛ waa la mun.
44005025	Belaa baa bɛl ba dɛ ba ŋɔ. "Hé no bonɔ! Nɛra la haa do ba dea laanee lɔ Korowii Dea dɛɛ bagle nɛra Korowii Waa la!"
44005026	Asɛ nomoa waa chɔ nɛra baa dɛ nyiŋi Korowii Dea doonyoo nyoa la ne o nɛra la dɛ ka lawɛ Yeesu toroma la ba. Dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ kɛŋɔ dɛ ba kpɔ kpegri lag ba aa, ba bwɛɛ tena la baah nɛɛ diu, ba ta bwea fog ba. Anomanta ba lag ba kaa jeiih ken.
44005027	Ba ba Yeesu toroma la ne dɛ ba gel ba che Juda tena nomonome la baah ta, asɛ Sɔfore Nomoa la bɔɔ ba ŋɔ,
44005028	"Yaa kah heyaa ŋɔ he bɛ too gel ya na heyaa hɛɛ bol baa nɔ waa la, ɛrɛɛ he berɛ dɛɛ ɛ ja nɔɔ? Hé nyiŋi na kɛŋɔ haa bol o waa a perɛ Jerusalam bwa gɛ! Ɛrɛɛ he chaa o seo waa dɛɛ chog yaa ŋɔ yan gela ba kpoo nɔɔ?"
44005029	Belaa Pitawa ŋɔ, "Korowii chɛ kɛŋɔ ya ɔmɛ gwaa nɛwɛnyini.
44005030	Korowii la ya naanar aa dɛ tomɔ laanee ir Yeesu la haa kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta dɛ kpoo la.
44005031	Korowii iru seo ta dɛ kpɔɔ ka so nomombɔr o dig ta, dɛ ɛo nɛra bwa Sitɔɔ ne ba Lɛɛ, asɛ dɛ koh o waa dɛ kpɔ Israel tena baa charɛ ba liire le ba wechɔga ta la wechɔga kɛ ba.
44005032	Nae yaa na waa nɔ la waa yaa di a danseɛ la. Korowii Domadɛɛge waa kpɔa tɛ nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ o ŋwɛnɛ ta la ge chegɛ ya nɛɛ dɛɛ di waa nɔ danseɛ."
44005033	Nomonome la aa no Yeesu toroma la waa nɔ la, ba bwaawee iro kohona, ba fe ɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ ba kpoo ba.
44005034	Dɛ Farisii te bɛl lɔ bela baa yerɔ Gamaleɛl. Dɛ o dɛ bagle nɛra Mosis Mmara, nɛra bwa gee tɛo duure. O iro che ba baah dɛ ŋɔ bá le Yeesu toroma la ne buse tama.
44005035	Anee o ŋɔ nomonome la be ŋɔ, "Yabala Israel tena, hɛ́ɛ do nɛra nɔ dɛɛgɔ kɛrɛdɛ.
44005036	Baa la ba faa yerɔ Teɔdas faa bala dɛ ba kpɔ o te ɛ nɛnjen la, nɛra dɛ ɛ lafraanaarɛ fa ta o nɛɛ teŋaa? Baa kpoo la, o habɔɔ tena la bwa ta lɔe pegre, asɛ o waa waa kpoŋa dɛɛ gaage la bwa sɔɔh naa?
44005037	A habɔɔ la, Galilia te ba faa yerɔ Judas la fa ta leɛ a gɛ saŋ baa dɛ kure nɛra la, dɛ ge ba yo Abane nomonome dɛ dɔ nɛnlaa kohona naa? Ba ta o ge kpoe asɛ o nɛra la ge bwa pegre aa?
44005038	Anomanta n poo heya, he bɛ nɛra nɔ wobɛlbwa ɛ. Hé gel ba jeiih ken. Dɛ ba gbagba liire ne ba bokpega binii baa ɛ ba waa nɔ naa, ba waa nɔ ɛɛ sɔɔhnoo.
44005039	Kɛ dɛ Korowii be gee a le aa, ɛrɛɛ he ɛ won na kɛŋɔ hɛɛ wonoo sɔɔh ba waa nɔ nɔ? He ta kɛrɛdɛ nyiŋaa, Korowiirii hɛɛ yo laa la oo!" Asɛ nomonome la teŋɛ Gamaleɛl waa la ta.
44005040	Ba yerɛ Yeesu toroma la jo dea, dɛ lɔɔ ba chweremi ne, dɛ kwaa aah ba ŋɔ ba bɛ too kpɔ Yeesu sɔn bol waa kpa, dɛ kpɔ ba ta.
44005041	Baa le nomonome la be, dɛ ba sie lɛo kohona kɛŋɔ Korowii aa tɛɛ ba sɔn dɛ gel ba ge maga nɔ dɔŋ won koh Yeesu waa dɛ di sihiih ne weweele la.
44005042	Anomanta tɔpere te bɛlbwaa baa bol Amanesoma la Korowii Dea la bini ne nɛra deremi kɛŋɔ Yeesuu Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ásɛ o ba lɛ o nɛra la.
44006001	A habɔɔ la, asɔre tena aa ba dɛ warɛ la, nagra baa chole Juda tena baa ɛ hɔɔhra dɛɛ bol Grik wobol la, ne banɔ la baa dɛ bol Juda wobol la baah ta. Dɛ ba dɛ bɔne suuga dɛɛ tɛ asɔre tena la tɔpere bɛlbwa. Asɛ Juda tena baa dɛ bol Grik wobol la ŋɔ baa ba te luhaahna tɛ.
44006002	Belaa Yeesu toroma fi dɛ banɛ la yerɛ asɔre tena la bwa cheme, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "A ta magrɛ kɛŋɔ yá gel Korowii Waa bagla dɛɛ nyiŋi suuga waa ta.
44006003	Anomanta, yabala, hé nyiŋi dɛ le he bini nɛra banuanɛ nɛra bwa aa jema kɛŋɔ ba ɛ nɛndɛɛga asɛ ba we-ɛɛla ɛɛ bagle kɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge la soge ba nɛɛ kpegri nɛɛ dɛ gel ba ɛ wejerema la, ásɛ ya kpɔ suuga waa nɔ do ba nɔn ta,
44006004	ásɛ ya te won dɔ bɔr dɛ kpɔ Korowii soŋa ne o Waa bola gbo ɛ ya toma."
44006005	Nɛra la bwa sie lɛ waa la Yeesu toroma la aa bola la ta, dɛ le baa bɛl Korowii Domadɛɛge aa soge o nɛɛ kpegri nɛɛ wɛɛ yarada Korowii dɛɛ tomɔ kasinteŋ ne baa yerɔ Steeven la. Nɛra baa jaa la ge sɔnaa Felep, ne Prokɔrɔs, ne Nikenɔ, ne Taemɔn, ne Paamenas, ne Nikolas. Dɛ Anteɔk tee Nikolas nɔ, asɛ wɛɛ tomɛ Korowii Juda tena ŋwɛnɛ baa dɛ tomɛ Korowii la ta.
44006006	Nɛra la kpɔ a gɛ nɛra nɔ bagle Yeesu toroma la, asɛ ba kpɔ ba nɔɔra darawe ba nɛɛ dɛ soŋe Korowii tɛɛ ba.
44006007	Korowii waa la perɛ bela. Dɛ nɛra baa yarada waa la dɛ baa ja asɔre tena la nɛɛ Jerusalam la dɛ warɛ tenten. Hale Sɔfore la kɛrɛdɛ bwaa yaradaa dɛ baa teŋɛ Yeesu ŋwɛnɛ la ta.
44006008	Dɛ Korowii cha Steeven kohona, dɛ tɛo kpegri o won dɛɛ ɛ nyokpowaa ne waa aa kpega nɛra baah ta.
44006009	Belaa Juda tena baa dɛ cheme cheremi dea bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Libetines la ta la ir dɛɛ tɔŋle Steeven. Dɛ Juda tena nɔ le Sairini ne Alɛksandrea, bane ge le Silisia harɛ ne Eesia harɛ ta.
44006010	Baa dɛ tɔŋlo la, Korowii Domadɛɛge la tɛ Steeven wejema kohona dɛ gel wobɛlbwa waa bola la, baa wechɔge bɛlbwa na a ta. O bol waa la bwa bɔ ba.
44006011	Asɛ ba sɔh kpɔ suuga tɛ nɛra bane dɛ do ba ŋɔ, "Hé ŋɔ he na baa nɔ kɛŋɔ waa dɛ bol Mosis ne Korowii nɛnhɛlwobol."
44006012	Kenii a gɛ nɛra nɔ ɛ dɛ won berɛ ba bwɛɛ tena ne Juda tena nomonome ne Tɔn Jerema la bwa liire dɛ gel ba baah di Steeven nɛ. Asɛ ba lawɔ la ba nomonome baa dɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole sie.
44006013	Ba gelɔ nɛra bane ge ba teŋe nyosone dɛ bol waa baa wola nae bwa dawɛ Steeven nɛɛ ŋɔ, "Tɔpere bɛlbwaa baa nɔ bol waa dɛɛ yagɛ ya Korowii Dea nɔ ne Mosis Mmara la.
44006014	Ya noɔ waa ŋɔa ŋɔ Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt la ɛɛ pagre Korowii Dea nɔɔ, dɛ begre ya mmarare ne ya waa Mosis aa bagle ya naanar la bwa."
44006015	Nomonome la ne nɛra baa lɔ bela la bwa kpɔ sie pa Steeven nɛ. Dɛ o sie bɔr dɛ nyɛgle al-al kɛŋɔ nyundua torome sie bɔr ken.
44007001	Belaa Sɔfore Nomoa la bɔɔ Steeven ŋɔ, "Kpelaa ba ŋɔ nɔ naa?"
44007002	Anee Steeven chaŋe ŋɔ, "N mɛɛwa ne n dɔɔranar, hɛ́ɛ no waa nɔ maa dɛ ba bola nɔ! A gɛ saŋ la ya naa Abraham aa wola Haran kaalɛ mɔɔ la, Korowii waa ɛ jirima bwa dɔɔ la ba o be Mɛsopoteemea harɛ ta,
44007003	dɛ ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, 'Gel he lolanar dɛ le he harɛ haa lɔ o ta nɔ ta dɛ ka so harɛ maa dɛ ba he bagla la ta.'
44007004	Asɛ Abraham ir le o harɛ ta dɛ ka so Haran. O mɛɛ aa sewa habɔɔ laanee Korowii gel o ba so harɛ nɔ haa soge o ta fini nɔ ta.
44007005	A gɛ saŋ la, Korowii ta harɛ la pera teŋe tɛ Abraham kɛŋɔ o ɛ o ge kon nɔ. O ta nagale beŋkpoŋ del kwaraa teŋe tɛo. Kɛ Korowii bagɔ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ kpɔɔ tɛo, ásɛ harɛ la ɛ o ne o naanar kon. A gɛ saŋ la Korowii aa bagɛ Abraham nyoa nɔ la, dɛ o ta bii dɔe mɔɔ.
44007006	Waa Korowii aa bol Abraham be laanee kɛŋɔ o naanar ɛɛ ka berɛ hɔɔhraa harɛ bɛl taa, asɛ bela tena kpɔ ba ɛ yoma dɛ fig ba kohona bene lafraanaarɛ.
44007007	Dɛ ŋɔ wɛɛ bol a gɛ harɛ la tena waa dɛ pa ba bole, dɛ bɔ ba a kem, ásɛ a habɔɔ la o nɛra ba bonɔ dɛ baa tomɔ.
44007008	Asɛ Korowii bagle Abraham ŋɔ wɛ́ɛ teŋe o bii pena ásɛ a gɛ waa la ɛ nawee dɛ che tɛ o ne Abraham fɔo la baa fɔwa la wa. A waa Abraham aa lolɛ o bie Aesek o dɔ yawanyoa beŋkpoŋ la, ba teŋe o pen. Aesek ge aa baa lolɛ o bie Jekɔb la, o teŋe o pen. Asɛ Jekɔb ge teŋe o bii fi dɛ banɛ baa ɛ ya deene nomonome la bwa pena.
44007009	"Dɛ Jekɔb bii la aa ba nime Josef la waa nyin, dɛ kpɔ bɔweela yogu tɛ Ijipt tena, asɛ ba ka kpɔɔ ɛ ba yom. Dɛ Korowii teŋɛ Josef nɛ,
44007010	anomanta wobɛlbwa ta on ɛɛ o wahala waa naa la bwa ta. A balɔ kɛŋɔ Josef la Ijipt harɛ kooro be, Korowii tɛo jirima ne liire, asɛ o waa too kooro la tea kohona. Anomanta o ɛ Josef o harɛ la bwa ne o dem tena bwa nomoa.
44007011	"Belaa lɔr ba chole Ijipt ne Keenan harɛ bwa ta, asɛ baa na wahala kohona. Dɛ ya naanar ta kondikwaa dɔe dɛ́ di.
44007012	Belaa Jekɔb ba no kɛŋɔ kondikwaa lɔ Ijipt harɛ, dɛ tomɛ o bii la ŋɔ bá la bela ka yawɛ ane ba. Dɛ ba logla laŋa baa dɛ la bela bwaa la.
44007013	Baa bera ba la bela nɛɛtena la, Josef kpɔ o te bag ba, asɛ ba jemɛ kɛŋɔ ba nime Josef laanee on. Ijipt harɛ kooro la ge baa jemɛ ba wa.
44007014	Belaa Josef kal o mɛɛ Jekɔb ŋɔ ó ne o bii ne o naanar la bwa ba so o be Ijipt harɛ. Dɛ ba bwa lɔ nɛra fifraanuanɛ dɛ nɛra banue.
44007015	Asɛ Jekɔb ir kaa Ijipt harɛ dɛ ka so bela. Belaa o ne o bii la bwa ka serewe.
44007016	Baa serewa la, ba cheg ba la Sɛkem, dɛ ka hug ba lalbɔɔ la Abraham faa yawa Hamɔ dea tena be la ta.
44007017	"Korowii nyobaga waa bagɛ Abraham kɛ wɛɛ lee ba Ijipt harɛ taa dɛ tɛɛ ba harɛfale la aa tela la, dɛ ya naanar baa lɔ Ijipt harɛ la warɔ kohona.
44007018	Koofale waa wola Josef waa jemɛ baa di Ijipt kora.
44007019	Dɛ o dɛ neg ba dɛɛ ɛɛ ba nyubinikpeg, dɛɛ fig ba, dɛ gel ba kpɔ ba bechasɔɔhne kaa ta baa serewe.
44007020	"A gɛ saŋ nɔɔ ba lolɛ Mosis. Dɛ o wer bonɔɔ kɛrɛdɛ. O nya nyiŋi o nɛɛ korobie atoro mɔɔ dɛ kpɔɔ ka ta.
44007021	Baa tao la, a gɛ kooro la bihaahnee nao dɛ kpɔɔ dɛ nyiŋu kɛŋɔ o gbagba bie.
44007022	Mosis hweli Ijipt tena waa bwa dɛ dɔ ba wejema bwa. Dɛ o wobol dɛ jo deŋne, o berɛ won wejena ge ɛɛ ja.
44007023	"Waa baa dɔ bene fifraanaarɛ la, a ba o nyu bini kɛŋɔ ó nyiŋi dɛ na gɛ baa dɛ ɛ o bala Israel tena la.
44007024	Waa baa na Ijipt tena la bɛl wɛɛ fiigi o bwɛɛ te awola bɛl la, o lɛ o bwɛɛ te la nyoa dɛ kpo Ijipt te la bɔ kem.
44007025	Dɛ o dɛ lii kɛŋɔ o bwɛɛ tena la ɛɛ jemɔɔ kɛŋɔ Korowiirii dɛɛ nyin o kpɔɔ lɛɛ ba ta, kɛ ba ta gɛ jemɛ.
44007026	Tɔ aa pera la, o na Israel tena banɛ baa yo, dɛ la ŋɔ ó ka larawe ba yoi la. O ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, 'Nɛmbeŋkpoŋii heya. Bɔkwaa dɔ heyaa hɛɛ yo ken ɔ?'
44007027	Asɛ ba bini onɔ la waa dɛ wegre o dɔŋ nyoa la tagɛ Mosis dɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, 'Umee chege kora ta ŋɔ hé baa nyiŋi ya nɛɛ dɛɛ bol ya waa dɛɛ pa bole ɔ?
44007028	He dɛ nyin he kpo mɛ gɛ haa kpo Ijipt te la dɛ la kɛɛ?'
44007029	Mosis aa no a gɛ waa nɔ la, o ɔmɔ, dɛ chwa le Ijipt harɛ dɛ ka so Midian harɛ ta. O lolɛ bibaala banɛ bela.
44007030	"Bene fifraanaarɛ aa baa gale Mosis nyu ta bela la, o la pua bɛl waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo ta, Sinai bwejen la bɔr, dɛ ka na nyundua torome bela. Dɛ dawii ane aa dɛ lawɛ baahnee nyundua torome la che.
44007031	Dɛ dawii la dɛ lawɛ, kɛ dɛ aa fuh. Anomanta a ɛ Mosis anebɛlbwa, asɛ o tuuh tel ninlao la bɔr dɛ́ won na kɛrɛdɛ. Waa tuuhna dɛɛ tel bela la, o noɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii aa dɛ bol ŋɔ,
44007032	'Menee Korowii la he naanar Abraham ne Aesek ne Jekɔb aa dɛ tomɛ la.' Mosis ɔmɔ dɛɛ chel, o ta berɛ dɔ bambile dɛ́ nyiŋu.
44007033	Asɛ Korowii ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, 'Foo he naŋgawa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ n siee he che la.
44007034	N na fiiga Ijipt tena aa dɛ fiigi n nɛra Ijipt harɛ la, dɛ no ba wii baa dɛ wi la bwa ge. A balaa n ba ŋɔ ń ba lɛɛ ba ta la. Anomanta n dɛ ba he toma Ijipt harɛ.'
44007035	"Mosis la Israel tena faa vɛoh dɛ ŋɔ ó bagle naate waa chego kora ta ŋɔ ó baa nyiŋi ba nɛɛ dɛɛ bol ba waa la, onee Korowii tomɛ ŋɔ ó ba tɔ ba sie dɛ lɛɛ ba ta la. Nyundua torome la Mosis aa nao dawii nii ta la nɛɛ Korowii che dɛ tomɔ.
44007036	Mosis ɛ nyokpowaa Ijipt harɛ ta mɔɔ dɛ kpɔ o nɛra le bela, dɛ ɛ nyokpowaa Mposwɛm la ta ne bene fifraanaarɛ baa dia pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo ta la bwa ta.
44007037	Mosisii ŋɔ nɛra la be ŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ tomɛ o keame bɛlee ba be gɛ waa tomɔ la, dɛ ŋɔ wɛɛ le ba dwee taa.
44007038	A gɛ Mosis nɔ ne ya naanar ne nyundua torome waa bol waa o be Sinai bwe ta laanee fa dɛ cheme pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo la ta. Belaa Korowii kpɔ o waa aa wola garɛ, aa wola tonɛ ge la, tɛo ŋɔ ó ba ŋɔ ya be.
44007039	"Kɛ ya naanar ŋɔ baa o waa no, dɛ vɛh o nɛɛ teŋa dɛɛ wi Ijipt harɛ wa.
44007040	Ba ŋɔ Aarɔn be ŋɔ ó kwaa voga tɛɛ ba ásɛ a tɔ ba sie. Dɛ ŋɔ ba ta wone jemɛ kon la aa ɛ Mosis la waa tɔ ba sie le Ijipt harɛ ta la.
44007041	Belaa ba ma vog bɛl kɛŋɔ nabii ken dɛ kpoo kwaa dɛɛ tɛo, dɛ koh kon la ba gbagba aa maa la waa di kwa, dɛ sa dɛɛ lɛ ba sie.
44007042	Asɛ Korowii berɛ habɔɔ kpo ba, dɛ gel baa ɛ ba tetoowaa dɛɛ tomɛ wee ne korobie ne weweela aa lɔ nyundua la. Gɛɛ ba chwerɛ Korowii Keamere Tɔn ta la ŋɔ, 'Israel tena, he faa lɔ pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo ta bene lafraanaarɛ la, menee he fa kpoo kondɛɛra dɛɛ tɛ la aa?
44007043	Vog Molɔk la dea ne wewee la haa mao dɛɛ tomɔ dɛɛ yerɔ Refan la laa he che dɛɛ gaage la aa? He gbagbaa fa ma a gɛ voga nɔ dɛɛ toma. Anomanta mɛɛ doŋi heyaa kaa Babilɔn harɛ ta dɛ kaa he ne bojaŋ.'
44007044	"Ya naanar aa lɔ pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo ta la, dɛ ba dɔ tɔne ane baa dɛ baŋra kɛŋɔ dea ken, asɛ a gɛ dea la ɛ Korowii dobɔr. Gɛ Korowii aa bagle Mosis laanee ba kwaaro.
44007045	A gɛ Korowii Dea nɔ baa kpɔ tɔne baŋro nɔ baa di ya naanar nɔn ta saŋ bɛl. Ba ge naanaree serewa dɛ kpɔ tɛɛ ba. Ba ne Josua aa dɛ valɛ la bwa, dɛ ba chegɛ a gɛ debaŋre la tɔne. Baa dɛ kaa la bwa dɛ Korowii dɛ doŋi nɛra baa lɔ ba sie bwɛɛre la ta la asɛ baa so a ta. Gɛɛ dea la do ba be ka tel saŋ la Devid aa baa di kora la.
44007046	Dɛ Korowii dɛ nyin Devid wa. Dɛ Devid dɛ nyin o ma dea ásɛ o ɛ Korowii o naa Jekɔb faa dɛ tomɛ la dea. Belaa o soŋe Korowii ŋɔ ó tɛo ŋwɛnɛ ásɛ o ma a gɛ dea la.
44007047	Korowii ta on a gɛ ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ. Devid bie Solomɔnee bera ba ma Korowii Dea la.
44007048	"Gɛ Korowii keame la aa bagla la, Korowii waa kana gwaa komɛlbwa la aa deene nɛwɛnyini aa maa la ta so. Korowii keame bagle gɛ Korowii aa ŋɔa ŋɔ,
44007049	'Nyunduaa n kara, asɛ harɛ gee n nakpajagrebɔr. Debesoo siwii hɛɛ ba wona ma ń jo o ta nɔ? Debesoo taa ń won jo dɛ chɔ onɔɔ?
44007050	N gbagba laa ta kwaa nɔ bwa kɛɛ?' "
44007051	Asɛ Steeven ɛɛ bol waa dɛ ŋɔ, "Deŋnekpeg tena, ɛrɛɛ he bambili do kpegri kɛŋɔ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ nɔɔ? Ɛrɛɛ haa wola Korowii Waa no ken? He ne he naanar bwa beŋkpoŋ, haa Korowii Domadɛɛge la waa nyin dɛ no saŋ te bɛlbwa.
44007052	Korowii keamere la bini ume nɛɛ he naanar aa wola chegɛ dɛ ɛo sagasaga nɔ? Ba ta nɛra Korowii aa toma ŋɔ bá ba bol o nɛŋkaih la bala waa la kpooraa? Waa bala la, he ge ta on yoge dɛ kpoo waa?
44007053	He nɔn taa nyundua toroma kpɔ Korowii mmarare la ba do, kɛ he ta a ta teŋɛ!"
44007054	Nomonome la aa no gɛ Steeven aa bola la, dɛ ba baah diu, baa pwee dɛɛ chwee bobɛlbwa.
44007055	Korowii Domadɛɛge aa soge Steeven nɛɛ kpegri nɛɛ nomanta, o nyiŋi nyundua dɛ na kɛŋɔ bɔr aa chaahna werwer ken Korowii be. Asɛ o na Yeesu chega nomombɔr Korowii dig ta bela,
44007056	asɛ o ŋɔ, "Hé na! N na nyundua aa pila asɛ Nɛn Bie la che nomombɔr Korowii dig ta bela!"
44007057	Belaa nomonome la nyɛg o nɛɛ bab! dɛ kpɔ nɔɔra tɔɔge ba deŋna dɛ bɛ o wobol la no kpa. Bug la ta dɛ ba bwa lɔɔ ba tɔ o nɛ,
44007058	dɛ tuugu le bwɛɛ la dahara. Nɛra baa no o wobol la foo ba laala bil bonɔɔ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Sɔɔl sie mɔɔ, dɛ la ka fogre Steeven bwea.
44007059	Baa dɛ fogro bwea la, dɛ o yerɛ Yeesu, dɛɛ ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ Yeesu, n kpɔ n lileo dɛɛ do he nɔn ta dɛ́ sewɛ!"
44007060	Belaa o guŋi harɛ dɛ bol waa takpeg ne ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, bɛ gel a gɛ wechɔga nɔ gure ba nɛ." Waa ŋɔ gɛ tonɛ, o den sewɛ.
44008001	Baa kpo Steeven la, Sɔɔl sɛoh ŋɔ o chɛ kpoe. Awola tɔpere la ba fiigi asɔre tena baa lɔ Jerusalam la, asɛ ba chwa pegre Judia harɛ ne Samaria harɛ bwɛɛre la ta. Yeesu toroma la gboo wola chwae.
44008002	Nɛra baa dɛ ɔmɛ Korowiirii kaa huge Steeven dɛ wiu kɛrɛdɛ.
44008003	Sɔɔl ge ɛ wobɛlbwa waa won dɛ́ chɔg asɔre tena la waa bwa, dɛ jo bela deremi bwa ta dɛ tɛgre ba bini baala ne haahna bwa kaa do dea.
44008004	Bobɛlbwa asɔre tena la aa pegra dɛ la la, ba bol Amanesoma la dɛɛ gaage.
44008005	Felep iro la Samaria harɛ bwɛɛ bɛl ta, dɛ ka bol Kristo la Korowii aa ŋɔa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la waa bela tena be, dɛ ka bag ba ŋɔ Yeesuu Kristo la.
44008006	Nɛnlaa la aa na nyokpowaa waa dɛ ɛ, dɛ no o wobol la, ba cheg deŋne no o be,
44008007	dɛkalkɛŋɔ o wono doŋi kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra la kɛrɛdɛ nɛɛ ta. Aa dɛ le la, dɛ a dɛ dooge lɔŋɔre. Felep chah nɛra ba bobɛla aa serewa ne boobie ge ja,
44008008	asɛ bwɛɛ la tena sie lɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
44008009	Dɛ baa bɛl lɔ bwɛɛ la ta dɛ ɛ o te bebee bɛl baa yerɔ Seemɔn. O bebeewaa la kpo Samaria tena bwa nyoa. Dɛ o dɛ maŋkura o te dɛɛ yerɛ o te nɛnjen bɛl.
44008010	Anomanta bela bechale ne ba nomonjena bwaa cheg deŋne dɛ yon dɛɛ no o be, dɛ ta kane so dɛɛ nyiŋi o we-ɛɛla. Ba nyoa kpo o waa dɛ ŋɔ, "Jamɔ Korowii kpegnɛn baa dɛ yerɔ Kpegri Tenten Dɔɔ laanee nɔ?"
44008011	Seemɔn soge bela bigri. O bela soga la saŋ bebeewaa waa ɛa la ta wekokori ɛɛ, anomanta ba ta kane so dɛ cheg deŋne no o be kɛrɛdɛ.
44008012	Baa bera ba no Amanesoma waa Felep aa dɛ bol dɛɛ bagle Korowii Kora ne Yeesu Kristo waa la, ba yaradao. Dɛ ba ne ba haahna bwa dɛ ba baa sɔ ba Korowii ne.
44008013	Seemɔn Bebee la gba berɔ ba yarada Korowii waa la, asɛ ba sɔɔ a ne. Baa sɔɔ nee la, o kpɔ o te pɛl Felep. Bobɛlbwa Felep aa dɛ la la, o ne onee dɛɛ la. Seemɔn aa na nyokpoa tomkpega Felep aa dɛ ɛ la, a ɛo anebɛlbwa.
44008014	Yeesu toroma baa lɔ Jerusalam aa noa kɛŋɔ Samaria tena yarada Korowii waa la la,
44008015	ba tomɛ Pita ne Jɔn ba be. Baa la bela la, ba kaa soŋe Korowii tɛɛ ba, asɛ Korowii tɛɛ ba o Domadɛɛge la.
44008016	Dɛ Korowii ta gelɛ o Domadɛɛge la so ba bɛlbwa nɛɛ mɔɔ. Dɛ nee gboo ba sɔ ba báa teŋɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu nɛ.
44008017	Pita ne Jɔn kpɔ ba nɔɔra darawe ba nɛ, asɛ Korowii gel o Domadɛɛge la ba so ba nɛ.
44008018	Seemɔn aa naa kɛŋɔ darawa Pita ne Jɔn aa kpɔ nɔɔra darawe nɛra la nɛɛ laanee gela Korowii Domadɛɛge la ba so ba nɛɛ la, o kpɔ suuga ba ba be,
44008019	dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé lɛ dɛ tɛ n ge a gɛ kpegri nɔ bɛl ásɛ nomɛlbwa maa kpɔ nɔɔra dawɛ o nɛɛ la, Korowii Domadɛɛge la ɛɛ so o nɛ."
44008020	Belaa Pita ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He ne he suuga bwa ɛɛ pɔɔh! Ɛrɛɛ he ɛ na kɛŋɔ hɛɛ wonoo yawɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge waa kpɔa kɛ o nɛra nɔɔ?
44008021	He ta ya toma nɔ ta jae, he ta dibɔr ge dɔe a ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he bambile ta chaahnɛ Korowii be.
44008022	Charɛ he liire dɛ le he wechɔga nɔ haa dɛ lii nɔ ta, dɛ soŋe Korowii asɛ dɛ aa magroo waa, ó kpɔ he wechɔga haa liira nɔ kɛɛ.
44008023	He bɔweela gɛne kohona, he wechɔga ge kan kohona to."
44008024	Anee Seemɔn ŋɔ Pita ne Jɔn be ŋɔ, "N poo heya, hé soŋe Korowii tɛ mɛ asɛ waa haa dɛ bol nɔ bɛlbwa bɛ men ɛ."
44008025	Pita ne Jɔn babagle waa Korowii aa ɛa bwa, dɛ bol Korowii Waa bwɛɛ la tena be. Baa tona dɛ berɛ dɛɛ kaa Jerusalam la, ba chegɛ Samaria harɛ bwɛɛre la kɛrɛdɛ ta dɛ bol Amanesoma la ba be.
44008026	Belaa nyundua torome bɛl ŋɔ Felep be ŋɔ, "Ir kaa wekaŋle harɛ bɔr le, bela ŋwɛnɛ bɛl aa le Jerusalam kaa Gasa la." Pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gboo a gɛ bɔr nɔ.
44008027	Felep iro chig ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ la, dɛ ka na Itiopia harɛ haŋkooro Kandase nomoa waa dɛ cheg o suuga dɛɛ nyiŋi o kondɔɔh bwa la. Dɛ ba fɔgɛ a gɛ baa nɔ lur.
44008028	O la Jerusalam ka tomɛ Korowii dɛ berɛ dɛɛ kaa o bwɛ. Dɛ o soge kwaa ba yon vɔwɛ pɛl jagre dɛ so a bini aa tɛgra la bɛl ta dɛɛ kure Korowii keame Aesaya tɔn bobɛl.
44008029	Belaa Korowii Domadɛɛge ŋɔ Felep be ŋɔ, "La jagre kon la jwɛh."
44008030	Asɛ Felep chwa la o be dɛ ka no kɛŋɔ waa dɛ kure Korowii keame Aesaya tɔn bobɛl. O bɔɔro ŋɔ, "He dɛ no waa haa dɛ kure nɔ mun aa?"
44008031	Anee nomoa la ŋɔ, "Dɛ nomɛl ta men a mun baglaa, mɛɛ wonoo no a mun aa?" Belaa o ŋɔ Felep be ŋɔ ó teeh ba so o be jagre kon la ta.
44008032	Dɛ Korowii Tɔn waa nomoa la aa dɛ kure laanee la: "O helɔ kɛŋɔ baa lawɛ pee kaa kpobɔr o yon hel la. O tɔ nyoa kɛŋɔ baa dɛ fonɛ pebie pona o yon tɔ nyoa la. O ta nyoa pile bol wobɛlbwa sese.
44008033	Ba doo sihiih dɛ vɛh o waa bola dɛ tɛo a ŋwɛnɛ ta, dɛ kpoo. Waa dɔa sewɛ la, umee dɛ won bagle o naanar waa kpa ɔ?"
44008034	Belaa nomoa la ŋɔ Felep be ŋɔ, "Bag mɛ nɛn la nɛnsoo Korowii keame nɔ aa dɛ bol o waa nɔ. O gbagba waa wɛɛ bol, kɛɛ nomɛl waa wɛɛ bol ɔ?"
44008035	Asɛ Felep le a gɛ waa la baa la aa kura Korowii Tɔn ta la ta dɛ bagle Yeesu bwara waa aa ɛ Amanesoma la.
44008036	Baa kpɔ ŋwɛnɛ la ta dɛɛ kaa la, ba kaa le nee bɛl ta, anee nomoa la ŋɔ Felep be ŋɔ, "Nee la. Den sɔ mɛ Korowii ne. Kɛ waane lole ja?"
44008037	(Asɛ Felep ŋɔ, "Dɛ he yarada Yeesu Kristo waa bambile bwa ne naa, mɛɛ sɔe a nee." Anee nomoa la ŋɔ, "N yaradao. N yaradao kɛŋɔ Korowii Biee Yeesu Kristo.")
44008038	Belaa o gel o jagre kon la che, asɛ ba nɛra banɛ la bwa tu dɛ jo nee la ta, asɛ Felep sɔɔ Korowii ne.
44008039	Baa le nee la ta la, Korowii Domadɛɛge baa kpɔ Felep kaa bug la ta. Nomoa la ta on nae kpa, dɛ chig ŋwɛnɛ ta kaa silɛɛ ne.
44008040	Felep ne nyiŋa dɛ o lɔ Asotas. O le bela bol Amanesoma la baah bela bwɛɛre la bwa ta ka tel Sisaaria.
44009001	Dɛ Sɔɔl ta swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ aah asɔre tena la ŋɔ wɛɛ kpo baa. O la Sɔfore Nomoa be
44009002	dɛ ka soŋo ŋɔ ó tɛo o nɔn bini tɔn ásɛ o kpɔ gaage bwɛɛ la baa dɛ yerɔ Damaskɔs la cheremi deene ta, asɛ dɛ o na Yeesu ŋwɛnɛfale tena la bɛlbwa naa, baalee yoo, haahnee yoo, ó lag ba dɛ vɔg ba, dɛ kpɔ ba ba Jerusalam.
44009003	Sɔɔl aa dɛ kaa dɛ ka tel Damaskɔs la, kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ nii le nyundua dɛ chaah o nɛ.
44009004	Belaa o chole harɛ dɛ no kɛŋɔ nomɛl aa dɛ yerɔ dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Oo, Sɔɔl! Ɛrɛɛ he che n nɛɛ gɛ nɔɔ?"
44009005	Asɛ Sɔɔl ŋɔ, "Henee umeo, n Dɔɔ?" Asɛ naate ŋɔ, "Menee Yeesu la haa dɛ yoo mɛ la.
44009006	Kɛ ir dɛ kaa Damaskɔs bwɛɛ bini. Belaa hɛɛ ba gɛ aa chɛ kɛ he ɛ jema."
44009007	Nɛra ba ne Sɔɔl aa dɛ kaa la no wobol ane, kɛ ba ta nɛn nae. Asɛ ba jagɛ che, ba ta jemɛ waa baa bol.
44009008	Sɔɔl iro che dɛ pili sie, kɛ dɛ waa na, asɛ ba lawɔ daa ba Damaskɔs.
44009009	A di tɔpera atoro, dɛ waa na. Dɛ waa kwaa di, waa nee ge nyɔ.
44009010	Dɛ asɔre te bɛl lɔ Damaskɔs baa yerɔ Ananias. O noɔ kɛŋɔ Yeesu aa dɛ yerɔ chaahna ta ŋɔ, "Ananias!" Asɛ o sɛh ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, menee la."
44009011	Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Ir la fɔgbaah la baa dɛ yerɛ bela 'Fɔgtogre' la ta, dɛ ka jo Judas dem dɛ bɔɔ Taasos baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Sɔɔl la wa. O dɛ soŋe Korowii,
44009012	dɛ na chaahna bini kɛ baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Ananias aa baa jo dea dɛ kpɔ nɔɔra dawɛ o nɛɛ asɛ o berɛ dɛɛ na ja."
44009013	Belaa Ananias ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, nɛra baa bol baa nɔ waa n be warɔ. O wechɔgdamanta waa ɛ he nɛra baa lɔ Jerusalam la bwa waa ba bol n be.
44009014	O taraken bala waa ba Damaskɔs nɔ, Sɔfonomonomee tɛo kpegri ŋɔ ó ba ba larawe ya nɛra yaa dɛ tomɛ la bwa la."
44009015	Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ "Kaa! Menee leo dɛɛ nyin n tomɔ ásɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ ne ba koranar ne Israel tena bwa ba che o nɛɛ dɛ jem mɛ.
44009016	Mɛɛ geloo o jemɛ wahala bwa waa dɛ ba n waa koeh dɛ na."
44009017	Anomanta Ananias kaa jo dem Sɔɔl aa lɔ o ta la ta, dɛ kpɔ o nɔɔra dawɛ o nɛɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "N dɔŋ Sɔɔl, ya Dɔɔ Yeesu gbagbaa tom mɛ he be. Onee kpɔ o te bagle gɛ saŋ haa dɛ ba bonɔ la. O tom mɛ ŋɔ ń ba ásɛ he berɛ won dɛɛ na ja, ásɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la ge so he nɛ."
44009018	Bug la ta dɛ kwaane le Sɔɔl sie lee harɛ kɛŋɔ pɛŋe pɛga ken, asɛ o berɛ won dɛɛ na ja. Anee o ir, asɛ ba sɔɔ Korowii ne,
44009019	asɛ o di kwa, o bwara do kpegri. O soge asɔre tena baa lɔ Damaskɔs la be tɔpera anɛ,
44009020	asɛ o den la bela cheremi deene bini dɛ kaa bol Yeesu waa dɛɛ bagle nɛra dɛɛ ŋɔ Korowii Biee Yeesu.
44009021	Nɛra baa no o wobol la bwa nyoa kpoo, ba ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ laa fa dɛ ɛ nɛra baa lɔ Jerusalam dɛɛ tomɛ Yeesu la sagasaga dɛɛ nyin o kpoo ba la aa? Aah a gɛ asɔre tena nɔ lawa sɔn laa o yerɛ dɛ ba bonɔ dɛ́ fe ba lag ba ka tɛ Sɔfonomonome la aa?"
44009022	Sɔɔl aa dɛ bol Korowii Waa la, dɛ name kwaraa o wobol la bini ɛɛ do kpegri. O baglɔ le Korowii wobol la ta kɛŋɔ Yeesuu Kristo la kasinteŋ, anomanta Juda tena baa soge Damaskɔs la ta wone tɔŋlo kpa.
44009023	Aa bigra tama la, Juda tena la chemo dɛ vɔrɔwe ŋɔ bá fe kpo Sɔɔl,
44009024	asɛ o no ba waa baa vɔrɔwa la. (Dɛ ba ma danjwɛɛ bar ba bwɛɛ la, asɛ o dɔ doonyoone.) Dɛ ba dɛ daah bwɛɛ la doonyoone chɔɔ ne jwaana bwa dɛɛ nyin bɔr dɛ́ kpoo.
44009025	Belaa o habɔteŋra la doo wɛgrɛ bini jwaana dɛ che danjwɛɛ la tokoro bɛl ta kpɔɔ tu bwɛɛ la dahara, o kaa Jerusalam.
44009026	Sɔɔl aa la Jerusalam la, o laŋɔ ŋɔ ó fe ka ja asɔre tena baa lɔ bela la nɛ, kɛ dɛ ba bwa dɛ ɔmɔ, ba ta on yaradae kɛ asɔre tena la bɛlee on.
44009027	Belaa Banabas tɔ o sie dɛ kpɔɔ ba Yeesu toroma la be, dɛ bagle gɛ Sɔɔl aa dɛ ba ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ ba na Yeesu asɛ o bol waa o be. Banabas bagle gɛ Sɔɔl aa wona bol waa Damaskɔs bambile ne Yeesu sɔn ta.
44009028	Ate dɛ Sɔɔl ne asɔre tena laanee dɛɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa Jerusalam bela. O bol waa bambile ne Yeesu sɔn ta.
44009029	O ne Juda tena baa dɛ bol Grik wobol la bol waa dɛ tɔŋle waa kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ baa nyin bɔr dɛ́ kpoo.
44009030	Sɔɔl bala asɔre tena la aa baa na gɛ la, ba kpɔɔ kaa Sisaaria, dɛ ka doo ŋwɛnɛ bela o kaa Taasos.
44009031	A habɔɔ la, asɔre tena baa lɔ Judia ne Galilia ne Samaria harɛre la bwara sɔɔh ba, asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la cha ba, nɛra baa ja ba nɛ, baa dɛ ɔmɛ Korowii dɛɛ teŋɛ o ŋwɛnɛ ta nomanta.
44009032	Dɛ Pita dɛ valɛ bwɛɛre ta taeh. Awola bɛl o ba Korowii nɛra baa lɔ bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Leda la be.
44009033	Belaa o ka na baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Aeneas. Dɛ o kuugo so harɛ bene anuatoro.
44009034	Pita ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Aeneas, Yeesu Kristo chaeh. Ir che dɛ gugri he kalaŋ bug nɔ ta." Bug la ta dɛ Aeneas iro che.
44009035	Nɛra baa lɔ Leda ne Saron bwa na baa la dɛ charɛ ba liire, dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ.
44009036	Dɛ haah bɛl lɔ Jopa dɛ ɛ asɔre te baa yerɔ Tabita. Grik tena ge dɛ yerɔ Dɔɔkas. Dɛ haah la dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga taeh dɛɛ cha nyaara.
44009037	A gɛ saŋ Pita aa lɔ Leda la, Tabita bwara weo o sewɛ, asɛ ba sɔɔ ne dɛ kpɔɔ bil abrɔsane bɛl doa.
44009038	Dɛ Jopa ne Leda aa jaŋɛ, anomanta asɔre tena baa lɔ Jopa la aa noa kɛŋɔ Pita lɔ Leda la, ba tomɛ baala banɛ o be dɛ ŋɔ bá ka ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ba dɛ soŋo kɛ ó gel wobɛlbwa dɛ ba ba be warane.
44009039	Toroma la aa laŋa la, Pita kpɔ o te dɛ puu ba kaa. Waa laŋa la, ba kpɔɔ deeh abrɔsane la. Dɛ luhaahna baa lɔ bela la bwa baa chwa baro dɛɛ wi, dɛ kpɔ batakaani ne yale Tabita aa sɔah gɛ saŋ waa wola sewɛ mɔɔ la dɛɛ bagle Pita.
44009040	Pita doŋi ba bwa le buse dɛ guŋi harɛ, dɛ soŋe Korowii, dɛ berɛ sie lale la be dɛ ŋɔ, "Tabita, ir!" Haah la pili o sie. Waa na Pita la, o iro so.
44009041	Belaa Pita tel o be dɛ lawɔ ir che, dɛ ka yerɛ asɔre tena ne ba bini luhaahna la bwa dɛ kpɔ haah la waa iru la tɛɛ ba.
44009042	A gɛ waa nɔ perɛ Jopa bwa, asɛ nɛra kɛrɛdɛ che a ta dɛ yarada Yeesu waa la.
44009043	A habɔɔ la, Pita soge Jopa bela bigri. Dɛ gbansaba bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Seemɔn la deaa o do.
44010001	Dɛ baa bɛl lɔ Sisaaria baa yerɔ Kɔnɛɛleɔs. Itali harɛ soojare bane nomoaa on.
44010002	O ne o dem tena bwa dɛ tomɛ Korowii. Dɛ o dɛ cha Juda tena baa ɛ nyaara la taeh, dɛɛ soŋe Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa.
44010003	Awola bɛl o na waane kɛŋɔ deera ken wekee saŋ. O nao kɛŋɔ nyundua torome bɛl aa baa jo o be dɛ yerɔ ŋɔ, "Kɔnɛɛleɔs!"
44010004	Asɛ o ha sie nyiŋu ɔmee ne dɛ ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ yɔ? A som aa, n Dɔɔ?" Asɛ nyundua torome la ŋɔ, "He soŋa haa dɛ soŋe Korowii, ne he chae haa dɛ cha nɛra la lɛ o sie, o dɛ ba he chae.
44010005	Tomɛ nɛra ba la Jopa dɛ ka yerɛ baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Seemɔn Pita la ba.
44010006	O ɛ hɔɔh dɛ do gbansaba bɛl waa soge mpo nyoa baa yerɔ Seemɔn la dem."
44010007	Nyundua torome la aa bol waa tonɛ la, o kaalɔ, asɛ Kɔnɛɛleɔs yerɛ o bonɔɔna banɛ ne sooja bɛl waa dɛ tomɛ Korowii kohona dɛɛ teŋɛ o Kɔnɛɛleɔs nɛɛ saŋ bɛlbwa la,
44010008	dɛ bol waa la bwa chag ba, dɛ tom ba Jopa.
44010009	Tɔ aa pera baa la dɛ ka tel Jopa la, Pita deeh sal dea webaŋa ne dɛɛ ba Korowii soŋa. Dɛ wee chegɛ nyufala.
44010010	Dɛ lɔr lawɔ, asɛ wɛɛ nyin kwaa dɛ di, kɛ dɛ ba ta dɛ ɛ o kondikwa. Belaa o na waane kɛŋɔ deera ken.
44010011	O nao kɛŋɔ nyundua aa pera, asɛ ba lawɛ komɛl kɛŋɔ yajen o nyoo bɔre anaarɛ la bwa, kwaane do o ta a sagɛ jɛɛhjɛɛh dɛ le nyundua dɛɛ ba harɛ.
44010012	Dɛ naa anaarɛ tena ne ola aa dɛ tuugi harɛ ne anɔ la aa dɛ huuh ne jumbii bwa lɔ yal la ta.
44010013	Belaa Pita no kɛŋɔ nomɛl aa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Pita! Ir dɛ kpo chwe!"
44010014	Asɛ Pita ŋɔ, "Ei! N Dɔɔ, gɛ aa won magre. N ta koŋkiila dii bwa."
44010015	Anee naate berɛ ŋɔ o be nɛɛtena ŋɔ, "Kon Korowii aa laa o doŋa kpɔ o nɛɛ la, bɛ on kondoŋ yerɛ kpa."
44010016	A gɛ waa nɔ ɛo kera atoro mɔɔ kon la berɛ kaa nyundua.
44010017	Pita aa wola waa la mun jemɛ dɛ so sakaa la, kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ nɛra Kɔnɛɛleɔs aa tom ba la balɔ. Ba bɔɔ Seemɔn dem dɛ ka che dem la doonyoa,
44010018	dɛ yerɛ nomɛl dɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Seemɔn la baa dɛ yerɔ Pita la lɔ dem nɔ ta kɛɛ?"
44010019	Pita liire aa lɔ waa la ta o taa lii la, Korowii Domadɛɛge ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nɛra batoro bane dɛ nyin he bɔr,
44010020	anomanta bɛ ɔmɛ. La ba be, dɛkalkɛŋɔ menee tom ba."
44010021	Anee Pita ir la nɛra la be dɛ ka ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Men nɔ, a som aa?"
44010022	Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Soojare nomoa Kɔnɛɛleɔs laanee tomɛ yaa. O ɛ nɛndɛɛge waa dɛ tomɛ Korowii, asɛ Juda tena bwa ɛɛ duuru. Nyundua torome bɛlee ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ó yerɛ ba o dem dɛ́ no waa haa dɛ ba o be bola."
44010023	Belaa Pita ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ bá chɔ o be ásɛ tɔɔ per ba kaa. Tɔ aa pera la, Pita bala asɔre tena baa lɔ Jopa la bane ja o nɛɛ asɛ ba ne toroma la kaa.
44010024	Baa lea la, tɔɔ perɔ mɔɔ ba tel Sisaaria. Dɛ Kɔnɛɛleɔs yerɛ o lolanar ne o daamanar cheme dɛ so dɛɛ kpa Pita.
44010025	Waa tel Kɔnɛɛleɔs dem bela dɛɛ ba dem la bini joe la, Kɔnɛɛleɔs baa chemo dɛ guŋi harɛ.
44010026	Anee Pita lawɔ ir dɛ ŋɔ, "Ir harɛ, he nɛwɛnyini dɔŋee men."
44010027	Pita ne o bol waa ka jo dem bela. Belaa Pita na kɛŋɔ nɛra cheme bela pirim,
44010028	asɛ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He gbabir jemɔ kɛŋɔ ya Juda tena aa nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ bini jo. Kɛ Korowii berɔ ŋɔ n be ŋɔ n bɛ nomɛlbwa nɛndoŋ yerɛ.
44010029	A waa he yer mɛ n ba warane la. N dɛ bɔɔ heyaa ŋɔ ɛrɛɛ he ŋɔ ń ba ɛɔ?"
44010030	Belaa Kɔnɛɛleɔs ŋɔ, "Tɔpera anaarɛɛ nɔ, maa lɔ n dem saŋ nɔ bɔr tenten dɛɛ soŋe Korowii wekee saŋ la, kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ baa bɛl waa do laalapoŋa kpelkpel chegɛ n sie
44010031	dɛ ŋɔ, 'Kɔnɛɛleɔs! Korowii no he soŋa haa dɛ soŋo dɛ na he chae haa dɛ cha nyaara la bwa.
44010032	Tomɛ nomɛl Jopa baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Seemɔn Pita la be ó ka yerɔ ba. O ɛ hɔɔh dɛ do gbansaba bɛl waa soge mpo nyoa baa yerɔ Seemɔn la dem.'
44010033	A waa n tomɛ nɛra he be warane la. He ge ɛ waa kɛŋɔ haa bala nɔ. A waa ya bwa cheme Korowii sie bonɔ la. Ya dɛ nyin waa Korowii aa ŋɔa hé ba bol ya be la dɛ́ no."
44010034	Belaa Pita pa o wobol mun dɛ ŋɔ, "Taraken te n nao kɛŋɔ kpela, nɛwɛnyini bɛlbwa ta o dɔŋ gwaalɛ Korowii be.
44010035	Kɛ harɛ bɛlbwa ta la, nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɔmɛ Korowii dɛ jemɔ la, Korowii sie dɛ lɛ o nɛ.
44010036	He jemɛ waa waa ŋɔa bá ka bol Israel tena be dɛ bagle Yeesu Amanesoma aa dɛ tɛ bosɔɔhna la. Yeesuu komɛlbwa Dɔɔ.
44010037	Jɔn o faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la toma la habɔɔ Yeesu waa che dɛ perɛ Judia harɛ bwa la. Galilia harɛɛ a pa mun.
44010038	He jemɛ gɛ Korowii aa kpɔ o Domadɛɛge ne o kpegri tɛ Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt la wa. Dɛ Korowii teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ, asɛ o valɛ dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga dɛɛ chah nɛra Bɔnsam aa lɔ ba bil la.
44010039	O waa waa ɛa Judia harɛ ta ne Jerusalam la bwaa ya na dɛɛ di a danseɛ. Ba kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta dɛ kpoo.
44010040	Asɛ o seo habɔɔ tɔpetooro wee la ta la, Korowii iru seo ta, dɛ gel o kpɔ o te ba chagle yaa.
44010041	Korowii ta gelɛ o kpɔ o te chagle nomɛlbwa ka ja ya nɛra waa le yaa ŋɔ yá di o danseɛ nɔ nɛ. Ya gɛ nɛra nɔ ne o pɛ nɔn di kwaa o seo ta ira la habɔɔ.
44010042	Onee le yaa dɛ ja yaa ŋɔ yá bol o waa bagle nɛra bwa, dɛ́ di danseɛ kɛŋɔ onee Korowii le ŋɔ ó ba di weera ne lala bwa wa.
44010043	Korowii keamere la bwa bol Yeesu waa ŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa yarada o waa la, o nomanta Korowii ɛɛ kpɔ naate wechɔgaa kɛo."
44010044	Pita taa dɛ bol waa la, dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge baa so nɛra baa dɛ no o wobol la bwa nɛ.
44010045	Dɛ Juda tena baa ɛ asɔre tena ba ne Pita aa le Jopa ba la, baa na gɛ la, ba nyoa kpoo kɛŋɔ Korowii aa gela o Domadɛɛge la ba so nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ gba nɛ,
44010046	dɛ gel baa bol wobofala dɛɛ jam Korowii la. Belaa Pita ŋɔ,
44010047	"Gɛ tenten Korowii aa tɛ yaa o Domadɛɛge laanee o tɛ nɛra nɔ ge la. Aah aa do gɛ nɔ, umee dɛ won vɔm ba Korowii nee sɔe yɔ?"
44010048	Belaa Pita ŋɔ bá sɔ ba nee Yeesu Kristo sɔn ta. Baa sɔ nɛra la nee tonɛ la, ba gelɔ Pita so ba be tɔpera anɛ.
44011001	Yeesu toroma la ne ba bala asɔre tena baa lɔ Judia harɛ ta la noɔ kɛŋɔ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la bwa no waa la dɛ yarada.
44011002	Pita aa la Jerusalam la, ba bala Juda tena baa dɛ maŋkura penteŋ waa la pwaoh ŋɔ,
44011003	"Ɛrɛ waa he ka chog nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ baa wola ba pena teŋe dem dɛ saah di kwaa bela nɔɔ?"
44011004	Baa ŋɔ gɛ la, anee Pita le waa la mun ta dɛ bagle waa la bwa aa bala o di ba kondikwaa la.
44011005	O ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Jopaa n do dɛɛ soŋe Korowii, dɛ na waane a do kɛŋɔ deera ken. N nao kɛŋɔ baa lawɛ komɛl kɛŋɔ yajen nyoo bɔre anaarɛ la bwa, kwaane do o ta, a sagɛ jɛɛhjɛɛh dɛ le nyundua dɛɛ ba harɛ.
44011006	Maa nyiŋi o ta la, n na ola, a bini anɔ la aa dɛ di ol ne anɔ la aa dɛ chwe kpɔga bwa, ne anɔ la aa dɛ tuugi harɛ ne anɔ la aa dɛ huuh bwa, ne jumbii bwa.
44011007	Asɛ n no kɛŋɔ nomɛl aa ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, 'Pita, ir dɛ kpo, dɛ chwe.'
44011008	Belaa n ŋɔ, 'Aa magre, n Dɔɔ! N ta koŋkiila dii bwa. A ɛ doŋa tɛ mɛ kɛrɛdɛ.'
44011009	Asɛ naate berɛ kwaa ŋɔ n be nyundua bela ŋɔ, 'Kon Korowii aa laa o doŋa kpɔ o nɛɛ la, bɛ on kondoŋ lii kpa.'
44011010	A gɛ waa nɔ ɛo kera atoro, asɛ kon la berɛ kaa nyundua kwaraa.
44011011	"Bug la ta dɛ baala batoro bane baa le Sisaaria ba tom ba n be denɔ ba jo dem maa lɔ o ta la ta.
44011012	Belaa Korowii Domadɛɛge la ŋɔ n be ŋɔ n bɛ ɔmɛ, kɛ ń teŋɛ ba nɛɛ kaa. Yabala banumɛl nɔ baa le Jopa nɔ ge teŋɛ n nɛɛ la Sisaaria, asɛ ya bwa ka jo Kɔnɛɛleɔs dem.
44011013	Belaa o ge bagle gɛ o ge aa na nyundua torome o dem, asɛ o ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, 'Tomɛ nɛn Jopa, asɛ ó la baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Seemɔn Pita la be.
44011014	Wɛɛ bol waa he bee ásɛ he ne he dem tena bwa che a ta dɛ dɔ he nyu.'
44011015	Maa la o be la, maa pa mun dɛɛ bol waa la, dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la baa so o ne o dem tena nɛɛ kɛŋɔ waa baa so ya nɛɛ logla la.
44011016	Belaa n lii gɛ ya Dɔɔ faa ŋɔa ŋɔ, 'Nee nee Jɔn faa sɔ nɛra Korowii ne, kɛ he te, Korowii Domadɛɛge nee baa ba he sɔe la.'
44011017	Yaa baa yarada Yeesu la, kon Korowii aa kpɔa tɛ yaa laanee o tɛ nɛra nɔ la. Aah dɛ n gee umeo dɛ́ tɔŋle Korowii ɔ?"
44011018	Baa no gɛ la, ba nyoa sɔɔhnɔ, asɛ ba jam Korowii dɛ ŋɔ, "Amɔ te Korowiirii tɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la ge ŋwɛnɛ ásɛ ba charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta dɛ dɔ ba nyu!"
44011019	Steeven seo la habɔɔ fiiga baa fiigi asɔre tena asɛ ba pegre la gelɔ bane kaa bojaŋa tenten. Hale bane la Finiisia ne Saepros ne Anteɔkwa bwa. Baa dɛ valɛ a gɛ harɛre nɔ ta la, ba ta Yeesu waa la bolɛ nomɛlbwa be ka ja Juda tena nɛ.
44011020	Kɛ Saepros ne Sairini baala bane ba ge aa ɛ asɔre tena la te iro dɛ la Anteɔk dɛ ka bol ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Amanesoma la waa nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ be.
44011021	Dɛ Korowii dɛ cha ba o kpegri ne, asɛ nɛra no Yeesu waa la dɛ yaradaa dɛ charɛ ba liire dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛ Yeesu. Dɛ a gɛ nɛra nɔ warɔ kɛrɛdɛ.
44011022	Asɔre tena baa lɔ Jerusalam la baa no a gɛ waa nɔ, dɛ tomɛ Banabas ŋɔ ó la Anteɔk asɔre tena la be dɛ́ ka na gɛ ba Korowii toma aa doa.
44011023	Waa la bela dɛ ka na gɛ Korowii aa nyin ba dɛɛ cha ba la, o sie lɛo. Anomanta o ja ba dɛ do ba gbemba ŋɔ báa teŋɛ Yeesu ŋwɛnɛ ta ba bambile bwa ne.
44011024	Dɛ Banabas ɛ nɛndɛɛge asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge ge so o nɛɛ kpegri nɛ. Dɛ o dɛ yarada Yeesu taeh dɛ kpɔ o te tɛo. Anomanta nɛra charɛ ba liire pirim dɛ ba tomɛ Yeesu.
44011025	Banabas la Taasos dɛ ka gaage Sɔɔl bɔr.
44011026	Waa nao la, o kpɔɔ kaa Anteɔk. Baa lɔ bela la, ba benanyobir bwa dɛ ba ne bela asɔre tena dɛ cheme. Ba bagle nɛra pirim Yeesu waa bela. Anteɔk belaa ba tɔ sie yerɛ nɛra baa yarada Yeesu la Kristo tena.
44011027	A gɛ saŋ la, Korowii keamere bane le Jerusalam la Anteɔk.
44011028	Dɛ ba bini bɛl sɔne Agabus. Korowii Domadɛɛge la ir o nɛ, asɛ o ir che dɛ na chaahna dɛ ŋɔ lɔrchɔge bɛl dɛ ba ba harɛ la ta bala. (Kpela, a balɔ Klɔdeɔs kara dii saŋ).
44011029	Belaa asɔre tena la ŋɔ baa pu siee ta suuga gɛ ba bɛlbwa aa wona laanee dɛ ka tɛ ba bala asɔre tena baa lɔ Judia harɛ la mɔɔ lɔr la ba.
44011030	Ba ta a gɛ suuga la dɛ kpɔ tɛ Banabas ne Sɔɔl ba ka tɛ Judia harɛ asɔre tena la nomonome.
44012001	A gɛ saŋ la, dɛ Juda tena kooro bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Hɛrɔd la larawe asɔre tena bane dɛɛ fig ba.
44012002	O gelɔ ba teŋe Jɔn dɔɔ Jems nyu.
44012003	Waa ɛ gɛ dɛ na kɛŋɔ a lɛ Juda tena sie la, belaa o gel ba lawɛ Pita ge. Paanoo baa wola iisi a ta do la benanyoa dii taa a gɛ waa nɔ chig.
44012004	Kooro Hɛrɔd aa lawɛ Pita la, o doo dea dɛ gel soojare bananaarɛ bele banaarɛ ɛɛ daahno. Dɛ o fe dɛ lii kɛ dɛ ba di Galekaa benanyoa la tonaa, o fee bol Pita waa nɛnfuuh baah ta dɛ pa bole ásɛ nomɛlbwa na.
44012005	Gɛɛ a do ba do Pita dea. Kɛ dɛ o bala asɔre tena la pɛpɛo dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛo tenten.
44012006	Kooro Hɛrɔd fe lawɛ tɔpere bɛl dɛ́ fe bol Pita waa la dɛ pa bole. Jwaana la tɔ aa per ásɛ tɔpere la tel la, dɛ Pita chɔ soojare baa dɛ daahno la banɛ baah ta dɛɛ chɔ dom, asɛ jɔgrɔre anɛ do o nɔɔra. Dɛ soojare banɛ lɔ dea la doonyoa dɛɛ daah bela.
44012007	Kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ nyundua torome chegɛ dea la bini, asɛ bela chaah. O baa lɔ Pita dɛ chumu, dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ir warane!" Bug la ta dɛ Pita nɔɔra jɔgrɔre la foo le.
44012008	Asɛ nyundua torome la ŋɔ, "Do he laala ne he naŋgawa." Pita aa ɛ gɛ nyundua torome la aa ŋɔa la, o berɔ kwaa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Kpɔ he yal tɔ dɛ teŋɛ n nɛ."
44012009	Belaa Pita teŋɛ o nɛɛ le dea la bini. Waa teŋɛ o nɛɛ dɛɛ le la bwa, dɛ o ta jemɛ kɛŋɔ wekpelaa o na la. Dɛ o dɛ lii kɛ deeraa wɛɛ dee.
44012010	Ba baa garɛ bologle soojare aa dɛ daah la, dɛ ba garɛ nɛɛte ge ja, dɛ ba tel doonyoa o gbera aa ɛ buni asɛ ba che o ta le buse dɛɛ jo bwɛɛ la bini la. Baa dɛ tel gbera la bɔr, dɛ o gbo yao, asɛ ba le dɛ kpɔ ŋwɛnɛ bɛl ta dɛɛ kaa. Bug la ta dɛ nyundua torome la nyogrɔ.
44012011	Belaa Pita ta na waa aa ɛo la, dɛ ŋɔ, "Namee n ta jemɛ kɛ N Naa Korowiirii gela o nyundua torome nɔ ba lɛɛ mɛ le Kooro Hɛrɔd nɔn ta, dɛ lee mɛ waa Juda tena bwa fe aa dɛ lii kɛ mɛɛ nao la ta."
44012012	Waa na gɛ la, o la haah bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Mɛɛre la dem. A gɛ Mɛɛre nɔ biee Jɔn Maak. Dɛ nɛra cheme bela pirim dɛɛ soŋe Korowii.
44012013	Pita lɔ dem la gbera, asɛ tolo bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Roda ba dɛ fe ba yao.
44012014	Waa no taa la kɛŋɔ Pitaa la, silɛɛ kohona gelɔ o ta berɛ ya gbera la, dɛ berɛ chwa la ka ŋɔ asɔre tena la be ŋɔ Pita chegɛ buse.
44012015	Ate dɛ ba ŋɔ, "Choglaa hɛɛ we kɛɛ?" Baa dɛ tɔŋlo la bwa, dɛ o nyoa kpegri kɛrɛdɛ wɛɛ bagle kɛ kpelaa wɛɛ bol la. Anee ba ŋɔ, "Amɔ te o lalee."
44012016	Ate dɛ Pita dɛ lɔ gbera la tenten. Baa yaa dɛ nao la, ba nyoa kpoo.
44012017	Anee Pita kpɔ nɔn ɛg ba ŋɔ bá bwa tɔ nyoa, asɛ dɛ bagle gɛ Korowii aa leo o dea doe la ta bwa. O ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ bá ŋɔ Jems ne ba bala la kar la be, dɛ le kaa bobɛl.
44012018	Tɔ aa pera la, sibegra chole soojare baa dɛ daah bela la nɛɛ taeh, asɛ baa nyin Pita bɔr yalayala ken, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba ta wone jemɛ bela waa kpɔa.
44012019	Kooro Hɛrɔd aa baa no kɛŋɔ Pita nyogrɔ la, o gelɔ ba nyin o bɔr, kɛ ba ta on nae. Anomanta o gelɔ ba bɔɔ soojare la waa kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ ŋɔ bá kpoo ba. A habɔɔ la, Kooro Hɛrɔd le Judia harɛ dɛ ka so Sisaaria tama.
44012020	Dɛ o baah di bwɛɛre baa dɛ yera Taaya ne Sidon la tena nɛɛ taeh. Belaa gɛ bwɛɛre nɔ tena nyoa pɛo, asɛ ba ba dɛ ba na Kooro bonɔɔna nomoa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Blastus la ŋɔ ó cha ba dɛ larawe Kooro ásɛ ba ne o pɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ Kooro Hɛrɔd harɛ taa a gɛ nɛra nɔ ɛɛ yawɛ ba kondikwa.
44012021	Kooro Hɛrɔd tɛɛ ba tɔpere báa berɛ kpɔ ba o be ja. A gɛ tɔpere la aa tela la, o do o koolaala dɛ so o kookara ta dɛ bol waa bagle nɛra la.
44012022	Waa bol waa la, nɛra la koogaɔ, dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Nɛwɛnyini laa bol waa nɔ. Vogee berɛ nɛn dɛ bol waa la."
44012023	Kooro Hɛrɔd aa wola gelɛ ba kpɛɛ Korowii, dɛ lɛ kpɛɛra la tɛ o te la, kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ nyundua torome baa lɔɔ bil, asɛ kpaloglare diu o sewɛ.
44012024	Anɔ bwa aa dɛ ɛ la, dɛ nɛra dɛ yarada Korowii waa la, asɛ aa perɛ ge tenten.
44012025	Banabas ne Sɔɔl aa ɛ toma baa tom ba ŋɔ bá la Jerusalam ka ɛ tonɛ la, ba ne Jɔn Maak kaa Anteɔk.
44013001	Dɛ Korowii keamere ne nɛra baa dɛ chagle nɛra Korowii waa ge lɔ Anteɔk asɔre tena la bini. Banee Banabas ne Seemɔn baa dɛ yerɔ Nɛmbiŋi la, ne Lusias waa le Sairini la, ne Maneeyan la baa dɛɛro Kooro Hɛrɔd mɛɛ dem la, ne Sɔɔl.
44013002	Awola bɛl a gɛ nɛra nɔ aa vɔwɛ nyoa dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii la, Korowii Domadɛɛge baa ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé le Banabas ne Sɔɔl tɛ mɛ ásɛ ba ɛ toma maa lee ba ŋɔ bá ba ɛ la."
44013003	Anomanta ba vɔwɛ nyoa dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛ kpɔ nɔɔra darawe nɛra banɛ la nɛɛ dɛ kpɔ ba do Korowii nɔn ta, dɛ gel ba kaa.
44013004	Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa tom ba la, ba la Sɛluusia, dɛ ka che bela kpɔ gbera kaa Saepros harɛ ta. Dɛ ekwii a gɛ harɛ nɔ.
44013005	Baa tel Saepros bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Salamis ta la, ba bol Korowii Waa bagle nɛra bela Juda tena cheremi deene bini. Dɛ ba dɔ Jɔn Maak wɛɛ cha ba ba toma ta.
44013006	Ba gaage Saepros harɛ la bwa ta dɛ bol Korowii Waa bagle nɛra dɛ ka le o nyoa bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Pafɔs la ta. Baa tel Pafɔs la, ba kaa na Juda te dobodobo te bɛl. Dɛ o sɔne Baajesɛs. Dɛ Grik tena ge dɛ yerɔ Ɛlemas. O koh o dobodobo la waa dɛɛ yerɛ o te Korowii keame.
44013007	Dɛ ekwi la nomoa baa dɛ yerɔ Sɛɛjos Pɔɔlos la bee o do. A gɛ nomoa nɔ jemɛ waa taeh, dɛɛ nyin Korowii Waa dɛ no. Anomanta o yerɛ Banabas ne Sɔɔl ba o be.
44013008	Dɛ dobodobo te la aa nyin kɛŋɔ nomoa la no Yeesu wa, dɛɛ tɔ Banabas ne Sɔɔl ŋwɛnɛ, dɛɛ tɔŋ ba.
44013009	Asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge ir Sɔɔl Grik tena aa dɛ yerɔ Pɔɔl la nɛ, asɛ o pa sie baa la nɛɛ dɛ nyiŋu dɛ ŋɔ,
44013010	"Bɔnsam nɛn kohona, he hah wedɛɛga bwa kɛrɛdɛ! He lambaara kan ga. Bɛ he wechɔga la kpɔ tɔ Korowii ŋwɛnɛ.
44013011	Dɛɛ no bonɔ. Korowii ɛɛ bagle o kpegri he nɛɛ asɛ he nyoŋe, asɛ a bigri tama mɔɔ he berɛ won dɛɛ na bɔr." Kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ o sie ɛo jumaa kɛŋɔ kɔɔla ken, o den nyoŋe, dɛɛ lagre bɔr dɛɛ nyin nɛn ó lawɔ da.
44013012	Nomoa la aa na a gɛ waa nɔ la, o yarada Yeesu waa dɛ kpɔ o te tɛo, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Yeesu waa la baa dɛ chagle la kpo o nyoa.
44013013	Pɔɔl ne nɛra o ne baa dɛ valɛ la jo gbera ta le Pafɔs bela dɛ ba Pɛɛga waa lɔ Pamfiilia harɛ ta la. Jɔn Maak gel ba bela dɛ berɛ kaa Jerusalam.
44013014	Pɔɔl ne o nɛra la le Pɛɛga dɛ la Anteɔk waa lɔ Pisidia harɛ ta la. Ona Tɔpere la aa baa tel la, ba kaa jo bela Juda tena cheremi dea bini dɛ so.
44013015	Baa soge bela la, nɛra bane kure waane le Mosis Mmara Tɔn bini ne Korowii Keamere Tɔn bini, asɛ nomonome baa dɛ nyiŋi cheremi dea la bini waa ta la ŋɔ Pɔɔlwa be ŋɔ, "Yabala, dɛ he dɔ waane dɛ́ bol dɛ ja yaa aa, ŋwɛnɛ chɔ le."
44013016	Belaa Pɔɔl ir che dɛ kpɔ nɔn ɛg ba ŋɔ bá tɔ nyoa, dɛ ŋɔ, "N bala Israel tena ne he nɛra haa baa ja ya nɛɛ dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii, hé no n be.
44013017	Korowii la ya Israel tena nɔ aa dɛ tomɛ la fa le ya naanar ŋɔ ba ɛ o nɛra nɛwɛnyini bwa bini. A gɛ saŋ baa lɔ Ijipt harɛ la, o gelɔ ba warɛ, asɛ ba sɔn ge le kohona. Belaa o ba kpɔ ba le Ijipt harɛ o kpegri ne,
44013018	dɛ nyiŋi ba nɛɛ ba bene fifraanaarɛ baa dia pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo harɛ la bwa ta.
44013019	Wobol bele anuanɛ bwa nɛraa o doŋi ba harɛre ta Keenan harɛ ta, dɛ gel a gɛ harɛre la ɛ ba kwaa bene lafraanaarɛ fifraanue.
44013020	"Anɔ bwa habɔɔ la Korowii tɛɛ ba nomonome baa nyiŋi ba nɛɛ dɛ ka tel Korowii keame Samoɛl bere saŋ.
44013021	A gɛ saŋ la ba soŋe Korowii ŋɔ ó tɛɛ ba kooro, asɛ o tɛɛ ba Kes bie Sɔɔl ŋɔ ó ɛ ba kooro. Dɛ Benjamen dea biee on. Bene fifraanaarɛɛ Sɔɔl di kora la mɔɔ,
44013022	Korowii leo kora la ta, dɛ kpɔ Devid so. Korowii bol Devid waa ŋɔ, 'Jese bie Devid waa too n tea, dɛkalkɛ onee n na kɛŋɔ wɛɛ ɛ n tetoowaa maa dɛ nyin kɛ o ɛ bwa.'
44013023	Gɛ Devid nɔ dea taa Korowii le Yeesu waa bagɛ Israel tena nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ geloo o ba lɛɛ ba la.
44013024	Yeesu aa wola balɛ mɔɔ la, dɛ Jɔn dɛ bagle Israel tena bwa ŋɔ bá charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta, ásɛ o sɔ ba Korowii ne.
44013025	Jɔn toma aa dɛ tonɛ la, o bɔɔ nɛra bane ŋɔ, 'Nɛn besoo hɛɛ lii mɛ nɔ? Nɛn haa dɛ kpao la laa men. O ta lɔ habɔɔ. Maa o napaa tee kwaraa dɔ.'
44013026	"Yabala, Abraham naanar ne he nɛra haa wola Juda tena ɛɛ dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii bwa, ya bee waa aa dɛ ba nɛwɛnyini lɛɛ nɔ ba.
44013027	Jerusalam tena ne ba nomonome ta jemɛ kɛ Yeesuu nɛwɛnyini Lɛɛ la. Korowii waa o keamere aa chwera asɛ ba kure dɛɛ bag ba Ona Tɔpera bwa ta la, dɛ baa a mun no. A waa ba bol o waa dɛ pao bolchɔge dɛ kpoo gɛ Korowii keamere aa bagla ŋɔ baa ɛo la.
44013028	Dɛ ba ta wobɛlbwaa dɔe dɛ kpɔ dawɔ kɛŋɔ o chɛ kpoe, kɛ dɛ ge soŋe ba harɛ nomoa Paelet ŋɔ ó pao bolchɔge dɛ kpoo.
44013029	Baa ɛo gɛ Korowii Tɔn aa bagla ŋɔ baa ɛo bwa tonɛ la, ba kpɔɔ le dagagre la doa dɛ ka hugo.
44013030	Asɛ Korowii berɛ iru seo ta.
44013031	O kpɔ o te bagle nɛra o ne baa le Galilia harɛ kaa Jerusalam la kera aŋwɛnɛ bwa. A gɛ nɛra nɔɔ dɛɛ diu danseɛ Juda tena bwa be.
44013032	"Amanesoma nee ya ba he be. Gɛ Korowii aa bagɛ ya naanar nyoa la,
44013033	gɛɛ o ɛ tɛ ya nɛra yaa ɛ ba naanar la. Anee kɛ o ir Yeesu seo ta. Ba chwerɛ o waa Korowii Kpɛɛra Tɔn yel nɛɛte la bini ŋɔ, 'N biee hen. Finii n lolɛ.'
44013034	Gɛ Korowii aa bagle o waa o Tɔn bini ŋɔ wɛɛ iru seo taa asɛ o bɛ bɔɔ bini chɔ pɔh laanee nɔ: 'Mɛɛ ɛɛ wedɛɛga maa bagɛ Devid nyoa kasinteŋ bwa ne laanee.'
44013035	A waa ba berɛ chwerɛ a gɛ tɔn la bobɛl ŋɔ, 'Haa gel he bidɛɛge chɔ bɔɔ bini pɔh' la.
44013036	"Gɛ saŋ Devid aa lole la, o ɛ Korowii tetoowaa kɛrɛdɛ mɔɔ dɛ sewɛ, asɛ ba hugo, o bwadabii pɔh.
44013037	Kɛ nɛn la Korowii aa iru seo ta la te ta pɔeh.
44013038	Yabala, ya dɛ nyin kɛ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ Yeesu waa waa ɛa la waa ya won dɛɛ bol he be ŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ kpɔ he wechɔgaa kɛ heyaa la.
44013039	Wubwa la, haa dɛ nyin gɛ haa ɛ ásɛ Korowii kpɔ he wechɔga kɛ heyaa la, Mmara la Korowii aa kpɔa do Mosis nɔn ta la ta wone cha heya. Kɛ taraken te, nomɛlbwa waa yarada Yeesu la, Korowii dɛ lɛo kɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su o siwi.
44013040	Anomanta hɛ́ɛ do dɛɛgɔ asɛ waa Korowii keamere la aa bola la bɛ heyaa ɛ. Ba baglɔ ŋɔ,
44013041	'He nɛra haa nyiŋi nɛra dɛɛ vah dɛɛ mamɛ nɛra la, hé nyiŋi waa maa dɛ ɛ nɔ kɛrɛdɛ. Aa ba kpo he nyoa he serewe. Waa maa dɛ ɛ fini nɔ ɛ waane, dɛ nɛn bagle a bini tɛ heyaa kwara naa, haa wola yarada!' "
44013042	Pɔɔl aa bol waa tonɛ la, o ne Banabas iro dɛɛ le cheremi dea la bini. Belaa nɛra baa bol waa bag ba la ŋɔ Pɔ́ɔlwa berɛ ba Ona Tɔpere waa ba ja la ta dɛ́ ba bol waa la bag ba ja.
44013043	Nɛra la aa le cheremi bɔr bela la, Juda tena ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ dɛ baa ja Juda tena nɛɛ dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii gɛ Juda tena aa dɛ tomɔ la teŋɛ Pɔɔl ne Banabas nɛɛ pirim. Pɔɔlwa bol waa bag ba, dɛ ja ba ŋɔ báa teŋɛ Korowii ŋwɛnɛ ta ásɛ wɛɛ cha ba.
44013044	Ona Tɔpere la aa bala ja la, bwɛɛ la tena kɛrɛdɛ bwa la cheremi dea bela dɛ́ ka no Korowii Wa.
44013045	Juda tena la aa na nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la aa wara kohona la, a ɛɛ ba bɔweela taeh, asɛ baa tɔŋle Pɔɔl ne Banabas dɛɛ ɛɛ ba nɛnhɛla.
44013046	Baa dɛ ɛ Pɔɔl ne Banabas nɛnhɛla la, ate ta kwaraa baa bol waa bansua ne dɛɛ ŋɔ, "A ŋwɛnɛ taa ya tɔ sie bol Korowii Amanesoma waa la he be la. Kɛ he gbagba aa vɛah dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ he te ta Korowii mkpa la chɛɛ nɔ te naa, yaa gel heyaa dɛ la nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la be,
44013047	dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛɛ ya Dɔɔ ŋɔ ya be ŋɔ, 'N le heyaa ŋɔ hé ɛ nii dɛɛ chaah nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la bwa, ásɛ nɛra baa lɔ harɛ jaga bwa la che he nɛɛ dɛ no Korowii Waa aa dɛ ba ba lɛɛ la he be.' "
44013048	Nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la aa no waa nɔ la, ba sie lɛo taeh. Anomanta ba jam Korowii kɛŋɔ waa gela ba no o waa la. Asɛ nɛra Korowii aa ŋɔa baa dɔ o mkpa laanee la yarada Yeesu waa la dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo.
44013049	O waa la perɛ bela bwɛɛre la bwa ta.
44013050	Anɔ bwa aa dɛ ɛ la, dɛ bela Juda tena la ir bela nomonjena ne haahna bane baa ɛ nɛnjena dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii la bwaawee, asɛ ba baah di Pɔɔl ne Banabas nɛ, ba hah ba dɛ doŋ ba ba bela bwɛɛre la ta.
44013051	Pɔɔl ne Banabas pee ba napaala teera ta bela dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ ba kpɔ Korowii Waa ba ba be asɛ ba vɛah, dɛ kaa Ikooniam.
44013052	Anɔ bwa aa dɛ ɛ la, bɔhwaah ta asɔre tena baa lɔ bela la lawɛ. Dɛ ba sie lɛo kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la ge so ba nɛɛ taeh.
44014001	Pɔɔl ne Banabas aa la Ikooniam la, ba kaa bol Korowii Waa bela Juda tena cheremi dea ta gɛ ba yon dɛɛ ɛ la. Korowii Domadɛɛge la cha ba asɛ baa bola kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ bela Juda tena kɛrɛdɛ ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la bwa yarada Yeesu waa la dɛ kpɔ ba tɛ tɛo.
44014002	Kɛ bela Juda tena baa wola Yeesu waa yarada la te chɔg Pɔɔl ne Banabas sɔn, dɛ ir nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la bwaawee, asɛ ba baah di nɛra baa yarada Yeesu waa la nɛ.
44014003	Pɔɔl ne Banabas soge bela bigri. Baa lɔ bela la, dɛ ba dɛ bol Yeesu waa bansua ne, dɛɛ bagle gɛ waa dɛ sune nɛwɛnyini nɛɛ dɛɛ cha ba. O cha ba asɛ ba won dɛɛ ɛ nyokpowaa ne wekpega, asɛ nɛra na dɛ jemɛ kɛ o waa baa dɛ bol la ɛ kpela.
44014004	Bwɛɛ la tena baah pegro, bane teŋɛ Juda tena la nɛ, bane ge teŋɛ Yeesu toroma la nɛ.
44014005	Juda tena la bane ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la ne ba bela nomonome fe vɔrɔwɔ ŋɔ bá ɛ Yeesu toroma la hɔhɔrɔwa dɛ́ fog ba bwea ge.
44014006	Kɛ Yeesu toroma la no a gɛ waa nɔ dɛ chwa kaa bwɛɛre ane baa dɛ yera Lestra ne Dɛɛbe ne baah bela bwɛɛre la ta. Dɛ Laikoonia harɛ taa gɛ bwɛɛre la do.
44014007	Baa lɔ bela la, dɛ ba dɛ bol Yeesu Amanesoma la bela.
44014008	Dɛ baa bɛl lɔ Lestra dɛ so boobi le o bechale saŋ bwa, waa wola wone valɛ bwa.
44014009	Pɔɔl aa dɛ bol waa la bwa dɛ boobi la soge bela dɛ cheg deŋne dɛɛ no o be. Pɔɔl nao kɛ boobi la yarada waa waa dɛ bol la, dɛ na kɛ wɛɛ wonoo che o yarada la ta dɛ chaoh. Belaa o pa sie boobi la be,
44014010	dɛ kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Ir che!" Asɛ boobi la fugri ir che chiŋ, dɛɛ valɛ.
44014011	Nɛra aa na waa nɔ la, ba bol waa ba Laikoonia wobol la ne kpegri nɛɛ dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Ya vogaa berɛ nɛra dɛ ba ya be la!"
44014012	Ba ŋɔ ba vogjen baa dɛ yerɔ Seus laanee Banabas, dɛ ŋɔ ba voga bini keame baa dɛ yerɔ Hɛɛmes laanee Pɔɔl, dɛ kpɔ a sɔna pa ba. Ba ŋɔ Pɔɔlee voga keame la, dɛkalkɛ dɛ on dɛɛ bol waa saŋ bɛlbwa.
44014013	Dɛ Seus vog dea chegɛ bwɛɛ la ŋwɛnɛ ta, dahara nyoa tenten. Seus vog te kpɔ nae ne kwaa ba ge aa kpɔa dɛɛ ɛ nɛra woowo le bwɛɛ la ŋwɛnɛ ta, dahara nyoa tenten, dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin kɛ o ne o bwɛɛ tena kpo tɛ Yeesu toroma la kɛ voga ken.
44014014	Banabas ne Pɔɔl aa no gɛ waa nɔ la, a ɛɛ ba anebɛlbwa, asɛ ba kpɔ tebinichɔg pee ba gbagba batakaani, gɛ ba bwɛɛ tena yon dɛɛ ɛ la, dɛ lɔ jo nɛra la bini sibegra ne, dɛɛ bol waa takpeg ne dɛɛ ŋɔ,
44014015	"Bwɛɛla, ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ɛ ken nɔɔ? Nɛraa yan kɛ heyaa ken. Amanesoma nee ya ba he be, ásɛ he no dɛ gel konsale nɔ ne komɛlbwa toma, dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii o gbo aa ɛ Korowii dɛ do le saŋ bɛlbwa dɛ ta nyundua ne harɛ ne mpo ne kwaa aa lɔ a ta bwa la.
44014016	A saŋ la, dɛ Korowii gelɔ he nɛra haa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la ɛɛ ɛ he tetoowa.
44014017	Kɛ dɛ o chegɛ wedɛɛga waa dɛ ɛ la ta dɛ gel he jemɛ kɛ o lole. Dɛ o dɛ tɛ heyaa bwaala ne, dɛ gel kondikwaa gee ɛ, asɛ he di dɛɛ vagɛ he bwara ɛɛ sɔɔh heya."
44014018	Dɛ nɛra la nae kpoora dɛ tɛ Yeesu toroma la swɛɛ ba siwi taeh. Wedamanta Yeesu toroma la aa bola la bwa habɔɔ la, dɛ ba siwi ta swɛɛ kwaa kpoora dɛ tɛɛ ba la ta. Gɛɛ ba ɛ aaa, mɔɔ dɛ ta ba gel.
44014019	A habɔɔ la Juda tena bane baa le Ikooniam ne Anteɔk waa lɔ Pisidia harɛ ta la ba bela dɛ ba bol waa dɛ berɛ Lestra tena la liire asɛ ba baah di Pɔɔl nɛ. Ba fogro bwea dɛ tuugu le bwɛɛ la ta. Dɛ ba dɛ lii kɛ o sewɔ.
44014020	Nɛra baa yarada Yeesu waa la ba Pɔɔl be dɛ ba baro cheme, asɛ o ir dɛ berɛ jo bwɛɛ la bini. Tɔ aa pera la, o ne Banabas la Dɛɛbe.
44014021	Baa lɔ Dɛɛbe la, ba bol Amanesoma la bela. Bela tena baa no Pɔɔlwa waa la dɛ charɛ ba liire dɛ yarada Yeesu waa dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo la warɔ. Ba le bela dɛ laa berɛ ba Lestra, dɛ la Ikooniam, dɛ ka che bela kaa Anteɔk waa lɔ Pisidia harɛ ta la.
44014022	Pɔɔlwa do gɛ bwɛɛre nɔ asɔre tena la gbemba ŋɔ báa teŋɛ Yeesu ŋwɛnɛ la ta kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ ba nyogre, dɛ ŋɔ a chɛ kɛ nomɛlbwa na wahala kohona mɔɔ dɛ dɔ Korowii Kora la bini jo.
44014023	Bwɛɛre nɔ bɛlbwa ta asɔre tena aa lole la, Pɔɔl ne Banabas le ba bini bane ba ɛ ba nomonome. Nyoa vɔwa ne Korowii soŋa nee ba yon kpɔ nomoa la do Korowii baa kpɔ ba yarada bwa do o nɛɛ la nɔn ta.
44014024	Ba gaage Pisidia harɛ kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ che bela ba Pamfiilia harɛ ta.
44014025	Ba bol Korowii waa Pɛɛga, dɛ che bela la Ataalia.
44014026	Belaa ba che kpɔ gbera dɛ laa berɛ ba Anteɔk. Anteɔkee ba fa kpɔ Pɔɔl ne Banabas do Korowii nɔn ta kɛŋɔ ó cha ba asɛ ba ɛ toma baa tona taraken nɔ la.
44014027	Baa ba Anteɔk la, ba yerɛ asɔre tena la bwa cheme dɛ bag ba gɛ Korowii aa kpɔ ba ɛ toma bwa, ne gɛ waa pili ŋwɛnɛ tɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la ba ge jemɛ Yeesu waa dɛ yaradao la bwa.
44014028	Ba ne asɔre tena la sogo bigri.
44015001	Baala bane le Judia harɛ ba Anteɔk dɛ baa bagle nɛra baa yarada Yeesu waa la dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Dɛ he ta he pena teŋe gɛ Mosis Mmara la aa bagla la aa, haa Korowii mkpa dɔe ba."
44015002	Pɔɔl ne Banabas ne gɛ nɛra la tɔŋle dɔŋa kɛrɛdɛ. Anomanta ba tomɛ o ne Banabas ne Anteɔk asɔre tena la bane Jerusalam ŋɔ bá ka na Yeesu toroma la ne asɔre tena nomonome la a gɛ waa la wa.
44015003	Baa tom ba la, ba kaalɔ. Baa dɛ kaa la, ba kaa kpɔ harɛre ane baa dɛ yera Finiisia ne Samaria ta dɛɛ la, dɛɛ bol bela asɔre tena be gɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la aa bera dɛɛ yarada Yeesu dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo. Ba ge aa no gɛ la, ba sie lɛo taeh.
44015004	Baa tel Jerusalam la, Yeesu toroma la ne bela asɔre tena ne ba nomonome lɛɛ ba kɛrɛdɛ. Pɔɔlwa bagle toma Korowii aa chegɛ ba nɛɛ dɛ ɛ bwa.
44015005	Dɛ asɔre tena la bane ɛ Farisii tena. Ba iro dɛ ŋɔ, "A chɛ kɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ dɛ baa yarada Yeesu taraken la ɛɛ teŋe ba pena dɛɛ di Mosis Mmara ge ta."
44015006	Belaa Yeesu toroma la ne asɔre tena nomonome la cheme dɛ nyiŋi waa la ta.
44015007	Ba bol waa dɛ tɔŋle dɔŋa la sie, asɛ Pita ir che dɛ ŋɔ, "Yabala, he jemɔ kɛ Korowiirii fa lee mɛ he bini ŋɔ ń bol o Amanesoma la bagle banɔ la baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la, ásɛ ba ge no o waa dɛ yarada.
44015008	Korowiirii jemɛ nomɛlbwa nyu bini, dɛ tɛɛ ba o Domadɛɛge gɛ waa tɛ yaa la, dɛ bagle kɛ o nɛraa ba ge.
44015009	O ta baglɛ kɛŋɔ ba korɔ ya korɛ. Baa yarada Yeesu waa la waa Korowii laa ba wechɔga kpɔ ba nɛ.
44015010	Aah dɛ ɛrɛ waa hɛɛ nyin kɛ he daah Korowii dɛ́ na nɔɔ? Dɛ bontɔga ya ne ya naanar bwa faa wola wone che la laa hɛɛ nyin he kpɔ chog ba nɔ naa?
44015011	Aa magre! Yarada yaa yarada ya Dɔɔ Yeesu la waa o na ya sum dɛ cha yaa, dɛ lɛ yaa. Gɛ tentenee ba ge yaradao o lɛɛ ba."
44015012	Nɛra baa cheme bela la bɛlbwa ta berɛ tɔŋle kpa, dɛ tɔ nyoa dɛɛ no Pɔɔl ne Banabas be. Pɔɔl ne Banabas bagle nyokpowaa ne wekpega Korowii aa kpɔ ba ɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la bini.
44015013	Baa bol waa tonɛ la, Jems ge bol waa ŋɔ, "Yabala, hé no n be!
44015014	Seemɔn Pita bagle gɛ Korowii aa tɔ sie ɛ dɛ bagle kɛ o dɛ nyin nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la taeh. O baglɔ ŋɔ Korowii le ba bini bane ŋɔ ba ɛ o nɛra.
44015015	Korowii keamere la bwaa fa bol a gɛ waa nɔ dɛ chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ,
44015016	'A habɔɔ la, mɛɛ berɔɔ ba nyiŋi Devid kora waa gua kɛŋɔ dea waa kua chole la ta. Mɛɛ berɔɔ ir ba kora la kɛŋɔ dea waa chola ba kwaa mao la, dɛ tɛ ba naa bɛl kpegri ásɛ o di kora ja,
44015017	ásɛ harɛ ta nɛra baa kaa baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la bwa ba nyin n bɔr dɛ tom mɛ. Men lee ba ŋɔ ba ɛ n nɛra. N Naa Korowiirii ŋɔ gɛ.
44015018	A saŋ la bwaa o gel nɛra na gɛ waa nɔ.'
44015019	Gɛ n te aa naa laanee kɛ, ya bɛ Mosis Mmara nɔ kpɔ dɛɛ ha nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ dɛ charɛ ba liire dɛɛ teŋɛ Korowii ŋwɛnɛ ta la,
44015020	kɛ yá chwer ba tɔn ŋɔ ba bɛ voga kwaa dɛɛ di, dɛ laa ba te kpɔ jwamane waa ta, dɛ bɛ kon baa wola o baŋa teŋe o sewɛ la dɛɛ di, dɛ bɛ chal dɛɛ di,
44015021	dɛkalkɛŋɔ Mosis Mmara nɔ yaa bagle a waa nɔ, bwɛɛre bɛlbwa taa nɛra baa dɛ bagla la do. Ona Tɔpere te bɛlbwa taa baa kure Mosis Mmara waa nɔ cheremi deene ta dɛ le saŋ la bwa ba le fini."
44015022	Belaa Yeesu toroma la ne asɔre tena la ne ba nomonome bwa ɛ ba liire kɛŋɔ baa le ba bini banee asɛ dɛ tomɛ ba ne Pɔɔl ne Banabas Anteɔk. Judas baa bera dɛɛ yerɔ Baasabas la ne Silasee ba le. Dɛ a gɛ nɛra nɔ ɛ asɔre tena la nomonome baa dɛ tɔ ba sie la bane.
44015023	Asɛ ba chwerɛ tɔn tɛɛ ba ŋɔ bá kpɔ kaa. Waa baa chwera laanee nɔ: "Yabala haa lɔ Anteɔk ne Siiria harɛ ne Silisia harɛ haa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la, Yeesu toroma la ne ya asɔre tena ne ya nomonome yaa ɛ he bala Jerusalam la bwa dɛ na heya.
44015024	"Ya noɔ kɛ ya bini bane ba dɛ bagle heyaa waane, asɛ he liire ɛ heyaa sakaa ken. Ya laa tom ba.
44015025	Anomanta ya chemo ya nyoa pɛ, asɛ ya ŋɔ yaa tomɛ nɛraa ásɛ ba ne Banabas ne Pɔɔl ba wa aa too ya tea kohona la la he be.
44015026	Bambile bwa nee Pɔɔl ne Banabas ɛɛ ɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo toma nɔ. Dɛ baa dɔ sewee toma nɔ ɛɛ ta noo, ba waane laa.
44015027	Ya ŋɔ Júdas ne Silas ge ja ba nɛɛ dɛ ɛ dɛ bol tɔn nɔ bini waa tenten hé no.
44015028	Waa ya ne Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa naa laanee kɛ aa were kɛ ya gel hɛɛ ki komɛlbwa ka ja anɔ aa dɛ ba wona cha heyaa nɔ nɛ.
44015029	Anee kɛ he bɛ voga kwaa dɛɛ di, he bɛ chal dɛɛ di, he bɛ ol baa wola o baŋa teŋe o sewɛ dɛɛ di, hé laa he te kpɔ jwamane waa ta. Dɛ he wono dɛɛ ki anɔ bwa naa, he wobɛlbwa ɛɛ magroo tɛ heya. Kórowii cha heya."
44015030	Ba kpɔ tɔn la do Pɔɔl ne Banabaswa nɔn ta dɛ ta ba ŋwɛnɛ, asɛ ba kaa Anteɔk. Ba kaa yerɛ bela asɔre tena bwa cheme, dɛ kpɔ tɔn la tɛɛ ba.
44015031	Baa kure tɔn la la, ba sie lɛo, dɛkalkɛŋɔ tɔn la do ba gbemba.
44015032	Dɛ Korowii keameree Judas ne Silas. Ba bol waa taeh dɛ kpɔ do ba gbemba, dɛ ja ba.
44015033	Ba soge Anteɔk tama, asɛ ba bala la ŋɔ bá berɛ la nɛra baa tom ba la be, dɛ ŋɔ Kórowii la ba ne sɔnɔnɔɔ.
44015035	Pɔɔl ne Banabas te soge Anteɔk tama, asɛ ba ne ba bala bane ɛɛ bol Amanesoma la dɛɛ bagle ya Dɔɔ Yeesu waa nɛra be.
44015036	A habɔɔ la, Pɔɔl ŋɔ Banabas be ŋɔ ó gel ba berɛ la bwɛɛre baa bagle nɛra Yeesu waa a ta la bwa ta dɛ ka na gɛ ba bala baa bag ba Yeesu waa la aa doa.
44015037	Dɛ Banabas dɛ nyin kɛ Jɔn Maak ja ba nɛɛ dɛ la.
44015038	Dɛ Pɔɔl ge be naa, a ta magrɛ kɛ Jɔn Maak la bɛl, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o fa teŋɛ ba nɛɛ toma la ta dɛ ka tel baah ta dɛ chwa gel ba Pamfiilia.
44015039	Pɔɔl ne Banabas begre wa, dɛ a nyoa kpegri, asɛ ba pegri. Banabas kpɔ Jɔn Maak ja o nɛɛ ba jo gbera ta kaa Saepros,
44015040	asɛ Pɔɔl ge kpɔ Silas. Baa dɛ ba kaala la, asɔre tena la kpɔ ba do Korowii nɔn ta ŋɔ wɛ́ɛ nyiŋi ba nɛ.
44015041	Baa dɛ kaa la, ba kpɔ Siiria ne Silisia harɛ ta dɛɛ ja bela asɔre tena, dɛɛ do ba gbemba.
44016001	Pɔɔl baa le Dɛɛbe ne Lestra dɛ ba na asɔre te bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Timoti la bela. Dɛ o nya ɛ Juda te dɛɛ yarada Yeesu wa. Asɛ o mɛɛ te ɛ Grik te.
44016002	Dɛ asɔre tena baa lɔ Lestra ne Ikooniam la bwa dɛ yerɛ Timoti sɔndɛɛge taeh.
44016003	Pɔɔl sie lɛ Timoti nɛ, asɛ wɛɛ nyin kɛ o teŋɛ o nɛ, dɛ koh Juda tena baa lɔ bela la waa dɛ teŋe Timoti pen, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ ba jemɔ kɛ Grik tee o mɛɛ.
44016004	Baa valɛ bwɛɛre la ta dɛɛ kaa la, ba bol koŋkiila Yeesu toroma la ne Jerusalam asɔre tena nomonome la aa bagla kɛ nɛ́ra ɛɛ ki la waa bela asɔre tena be.
44016005	Gɛɛ ba ɛ dɛ won cha bela asɔre tena ba do kpegri Yeesu waa baa dɛ yarada la ta, asɛ nɛnfala ge baa ja ba nɛɛ tɔpere bɛlbwa.
44016006	Ba valɔ dɛ ka kpɔ harɛre baa dɛ yera Frejea ne Galaasia la ta, dɛkalkɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la ta ban ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ bá bol Yeesu waa la Eesia harɛ.
44016007	Baa dɛ kaa dɛ ka tel Maesea harɛ jaga la, ba fe ŋɔ bá jo Bitiinia harɛ ta, kɛ Yeesu Domadɛɛge ta ban ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ,
44016008	asɛ ba berɛ kpɔ Maesea harɛ ta kaa Troas.
44016009	Awola jwaana ne la, Pɔɔl na chaahna. O nao kɛ Makidoonia harɛ te bɛl aa chega dɛɛ soŋo dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Ba Makidoonia dɛ ba lɛ yaa."
44016010	Pɔɔl aa na chaahna la la, men maa dɛ chwerɛ tɔn nɔ ne o kpɔ ya te dɛ kaa Makidoonia harɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya jemɔ kɛ Korowiirii dɛɛ nyin kɛ ya la ka bol Amanesoma la bela tena be.
44016011	Anomanta ya chegɛ Troas jo gbera ta dɛ pa sie kaa Samotres. Tɔ aa pera la, ya la Neapolis,
44016012	dɛ ka che bela kpɔ harɛ kaa Felepae. Dɛ Felepae nɔɔ ɛ Makidoonia be pera bwɛɛre la bwa bwɛjen. Dɛ koojen waa dɛ nyiŋi Room harɛ laanee dɔ bela. Ya bigri bela tama.
44016013	Ona Tɔpere la ta la, ya le dem dɛ la bwɛɛ la moo nyoa. Dɛ ya dɛ lii kɛ Juda tena ɛɛ dɛɛ cheme belaa dɛɛ soŋe Korowii. Dɛ haahna bane cheme bela, asɛ ya so harɛ dɛ bol waa ba be.
44016014	Dɛ nɛra baa lɔ bela dɛ no waa yaa bola la bɛl sɔne Liidia. Dɛ yale aa kɔlaa wɛɛ yog, dɛ do Tiatra dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii. Waa dɛ no waa Pɔɔl aa dɛ bol la, Korowii pili o liire asɛ o noa kɛrɛdɛ dɛ yarada Yeesu dɛ kpɔ o te tɛo.
44016015	Ya sɔ o ne o dem tena bwa Korowii ne, asɛ o soŋe yaa ŋɔ, "Dɛ he jemɔ ŋɔ n dɛ tomɛ Korowii kɛrɛdɛ naa, amɔ hé ba so n be." O soŋe yaa, asɛ ya kaa o dem.
44016016	Awola bɛl ya dɛ la Korowii soŋebɔr moo nyoa bela dɛ ka na bitolo bɛl. Dɛ nɛra bane yomii, asɛ kwaa gee ir o nɛɛ asɛ o won dɛɛ vogɛ. Dɛ o voga la gelɔ o tena ɛɛ dɔ suuga taeh.
44016017	A gɛ bitolo la do lɔŋɔre teŋɛ ya ne Pɔɔl nɛɛ dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Korowiijenii tomɛ nɛra nɔ he be la! Waa haa ɛ ásɛ Korowii lɛ heyaa laanee baa bol la!"
44016018	Tɔpera aŋwɛnɛ bwa dɛ gɛɛ wɛɛ ɛ, anomanta a baa pe Pɔɔl, asɛ o berɛ habɔɔ dɛ kpɔ bandia ŋɔ kwaa la aa dɛ ir yomhaah la nɛɛ la be ŋɔ, "Yeesu Kristo sɔn ta, hé le o nɛ!" Bug la ta dɛ kwaa la le o nɛ.
44016019	Kwaa la aa lea la, dɛ yomhaah la aa wone dɛɛ vogɛ kpa. O tena aa naa kɛŋɔ o bɛ won voga la tɔ ba suuga dɔe ŋwɛnɛ la, ba lawɛ Pɔɔl ne Silas dɛ tɛg ba kaa ba bela Room nomonome be bombaah ta.
44016020	Dɛ a gɛ nomonome nɔɔ dɛɛ bol nɛra waa dɛɛ pa bole. Yom la dɔɔranar la ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Juda tenaa nɛra nɔ. Ba hae baa dɛ ha ya bwɛɛ nɔ tena la aa were.
44016021	Wefala aa wola were kɛ ya Room tena teŋɛ a ta laanee baa bagle."
44016022	Dɛ nɛnlaa bane lɔ bela dɛɛ chɛgre Pɔɔl ne Silas, asɛ Room nomonome la wur Pɔɔl ne Silas laala dɛ gel ba lɔɔ ba chweremi ne.
44016023	Ba gelɔ ba lɔɔ ba kohona dɛ tɔ ba dea, dɛ ŋɔ nɛn waa dɛ nyiŋi nɛra baa tɔ ba dea nɛɛ la be ŋɔ ó nyiŋi ba nɛɛ ba bɛ ba chwa.
44016024	Room nomonome la aa bol gɛ la, nomoa waa dɛ nyiŋi nɛra baa tɔ ba dea nɛɛ la kpɔ Pɔɔl ne Silas ka do loŋ ta, dɛ do daa ba nakpale ta.
44016025	Harambaŋa la, dɛ Pɔɔl ne Silas dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛ go yela dɛɛ kpɛɛ Korowii, asɛ nɛra baa do ba dea ja ba nɛɛ la ɛɛ no ba be.
44016026	Kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ harɛ jigro kohona, asɛ deene la jigri le mun ta ka le nyundua. Kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ deene la gbeni bwa pilo, asɛ jɔgrɔre baa do nɛra la bwa cha le ba nɔɔra ta.
44016027	Nomoa waa dɛ nyiŋi nɛra baa do ba dea la iro, dɛ na kɛ gbeni la aa pila. Waa na gɛ la, o te ŋɔ nɛra la bwa chwao, dɛ laa o kere kpɔ ŋɔ ó kpo o te.
44016028	Asɛ Pɔɔl do lɔŋɔ kpegri nɛɛ ŋɔ, "Bɛ he te kpo! Ya bwa lole!"
44016029	Belaa nomoa la ŋɔ bá tɛo kandea. Baa ba kandea ne la, o chwao jo Pɔɔl ne Silas be. Dɛ o dɛ ɔmɛ ɔma tenten, asɛ o bwara ɛɛ sa, asɛ o ba guŋi ba sie.
44016030	O lag ba le buse dɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Nomonome, ɛrɛɛ mɛɛ ba ɛɛ ásɛ Korowii lɛɛ mɛ nɔ?"
44016031	Belaa ba ŋɔ, "Yarada ya Dɔɔ Yeesu dɛ kpɔ he te tɛo. Dɛ he ɛ gɛ naa, wɛɛ lɛ he ne he dem tena bwaa."
44016032	Ba bol Yeesu waa la bagle o ne nɛra baa lɔ o dem la bwa.
44016033	Awola harambaŋa la ne la, nomoa la yagle chal la aa ɛ Pɔɔlwa bwara la. Dɛ lɔɔraa Room nomonome baa dɛ bol nɛra waa dɛ pa bole la gel ba lɔɔ ba asɛ chal ɛ ba bwara. O ne o dem tena bwaa ba sɔ Korowii nee awola,
44016034	asɛ o kpɔ ba ba o dem dɛ ba tɛɛ ba kondikwaa ba di. Awola la, o ne o dem tena bwa sie lɛo kɛŋɔ baa yarada Korowii dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo la.
44016035	Tɔ aa pera chɔɔ ne la, Room nomonome la tomɛ nɛra ŋɔ bá ba ŋɔ nomoa la be ŋɔ ó gel Pɔɔl ne Silas kaa.
44016036	Belaa o ŋɔ Pɔɔl be ŋɔ, "Room nomonome tomɛ nɛra ŋɔ bá ba le he ne Silas dea. Anomanta hé le, dɛ kaa. Kórowii ka do heya."
44016037	Anee Pɔɔl ŋɔ toroma la be ŋɔ, "Room tenaa ya bwa, kɛ ba lɔɔ yaa pɛɛpɛɛ bombaah ta dɛ tɔ yaa dea, dɛ ba ta ya waa bolɛ dɛ na wechɔga bɛlbwa ya nɛ. Aah taraken nɔ sɔeh ba berɛ dɛɛ nyin dɛ sɔh ta yaa nɔ naa? Aa magre! Hé gel Room nomonome la gbagba ba ba lawɛ yaa le!"
44016038	Toroma la kaa bol Pɔɔl waa waa bola la Room nomonome la be. Nomonome la aa noa kɛŋɔ Pɔɔl ne Silas ɛ Room tena la, ba ɔmɔ.
44016039	Anomanta ba baa do ba jaŋgbare, dɛ lag ba le bela baa tɔ ba dea la, dɛ soŋ ba ŋɔ bá le bwɛɛ la ta.
44016040	Pɔɔl ne Silas aa le bela la, ba la Liidia dem. Ba kaa na bwɛɛ la asɔre tena la bela, dɛ bol waa bag ba, dɛ do ba gbemba, dɛ kaa.
44017001	Baa dɛ kaa la, ba kaa kpɔ bwɛɛre ane baa dɛ yera Amfepɔles ne Apoloonia la ta dɛ ka le Tɛsalonika. Dɛ Tɛsalonika Juda tena dɔ cheremi dea bela.
44017002	Pɔɔl la cheremi dea bela gɛ o yon dɛɛ ɛ bwɛɛre bwa ta la. Waa lɔ bela la, o yawanyoa atoro bwa dɛ o ne Juda tena la dɛ bol waa dɛɛ tɔŋle dɔŋa Korowii waa baa chwera la ta.
44017003	Dɛ o dɛ bag ba Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ nɛwɛnyina la waa Korowii Tɔn bini, ásɛ ba jemɛ kɛ Korowii keamere fa baglɔ kɛŋɔ Kristo la ɛɛ na wahalaa, dɛ sewɛ, dɛ ir seo ta. Gɛ baa chwera la chɛ kɛ a ɛ. Waa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Yeesu nɔ n yon dɛɛ bol o waa nɔ, onee Kristo la."
44017004	Bane yarada Pɔɔl waa la, dɛ ba ja o ne Silas nɛ. Bela haahna baa ɛ nɛnjena la galga ne bela Grik tena baa dɛ tomɛ Korowii la galga ge baa ja ba nɛ.
44017005	Nɛra baa yarada Pɔɔlwa waa la dɛ baa ja asɔre tena la nɛɛ la aa dɛ warɛ la, dɛ aa somɛ Juda tena la be, asɛ ba ka nyin nɛŋkasale baa wola toma dɔe dɛ yon do dem baah dɛɛ gaage gbo la, dɛ ir ba bwaawee asɛ ba ne ba valɛ dɛɛ do gbɔga bwɛɛ la bwa. Ba la Jasen dem ŋɔ bá fe ka lawɛ Pɔɔl ne Silas ba tɛ bwɛɛla la.
44017006	Baa wola ban dɔe lawɛ la, ba tɛgre Jasen ne asɔre tena la bane ka tɛ bwɛɛ la nomonome, dɛ nyɛg dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Nɛra nɔ, ban chɔg nɛra liire bobɛlbwa dɛɛ valɛ dɛ gel bobɛlbwa ɛɛ ɛ yeŋyeŋ la. Taraken ba ba ya bwɛɛ nɔ ta,
44017007	asɛ Jasen ge lɛɛ ba do o dem. Waa ya Koojen Siisa aa wola nyin laanee baa ɛ. Ba ŋɔ Koojen bɛl ge berɔ do le ja ya Koojen nɔ nɛ. Dɛ́ o sɔne Yeesu."
44017008	Bwɛɛ la tena ne ba nomonome aa no waa nɔ la, a gelɔ ba liire ɛ sakaa.
44017009	Nomonome la gelɔ Jasen ne asɔre tena la kpɔ suuga cheg ajinamuu kɛŋɔ baa wobɛlbwaa ɛ kpa. Jasenwa waa baa ɛa laanee ba nyiŋi dɛ lɛɛ ba suuga dɛ ta ba.
44017010	Bɔr aa baa jo la, asɔre tena la kpɔ Pɔɔl ne Silas kaa Beria. Baa la bela la, ba kaa jo bela cheremi dea bini.
44017011	Dɛ bela Juda tena la waa do kɛrɛdɛ gwaa Tɛsalonika Juda tena, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba lɛ Yeesu waa la silɛɛ ne, dɛ won dɛɛ nyiŋi Korowii Tɔn bini tɔpere bɛlbwa dɛ́ɛ na, dɛ́ jemɛ kɛ waa Pɔɔl aa dɛ bol la, kpelaa kɛɛ nyosonee yɔ.
44017012	Nɛra la kɛrɛdɛ yarada Yeesu dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo. Grik haahna baa ɛ nɛnjena la kɛrɛdɛ ne ba baala bwa yarada Yeesu.
44017013	Juda tena baa lɔ Tɛsalonika aa noa kɛŋɔ Pɔɔl kaa bol Korowii Waa Beria ge la, ba ba bela dɛ ba do ba, asɛ ba bwaawee ir Pɔɔlwa nɛ.
44017014	Belaa asɔre tena la gel Pɔɔl kaa mpo nyoa bug ta, asɛ Silas ne Timoti te so Beria.
44017015	Nɛra la baa tɔ Pɔɔl sie dɛɛ la o ne la la o ne ka tel Atens, dɛ berɛ kaa Beria. Baa dɛ kaa la, Pɔɔl ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ bá ka ŋɔ Silas ne Timoti be ásɛ ba ba o be warane.
44017016	Pɔɔl aa soge Atens bela dɛɛ kpa Silas ne Timoti la, o nao kɛ voga su bwɛɛ la bwa. Waa na gɛ la, o tea bini chɔgɔ.
44017017	Anomanta dɛ o dɛ la bela cheremi dea o ne Juda tena ne Grik tena baa dɛ tomɛ Korowii gɛ Juda tena aa dɛ tomɔ la kaa nyiŋi Korowii waa la bini. Dɛ tɔpere bɛlbwaa wɛɛ so bwɛɛ la fɔgbaah, asɛ dɛɛ bol waa nɛra baa dɛ ba bela la be, asɛ o ne baa nyiŋi Korowii waa la bini.
44017018	Dɛ nɛra bane hweli bela wejema baa dɛ yera Epikuria ne Stoik la, dɛ ge ɛ gɛ wejema la chachagla bela. Dɛ a gɛ nɛra nɔ ge dɛ tɔŋlo dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ wobobala te nɔ gee bol nɔɔ?" Asɛ bane ge ŋɔ, "Jamɔ harɛ bɛl voga waa wɛɛ bol nɔ." Pɔɔl aa dɛ bol Yeesu ne seo ta ira waa ba lii gɛ la.
44017019	Anomanta ba kpɔ Pɔɔl kaa bela nomonome baa dɛ yer ba Areɔpagos tena la, dɛ ka ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Bagle he wefala haa kpoŋa dɛɛ gaage la bini yá no.
44017020	Ya ta he waa nɔ te dɔŋa noɛ bwa, anomanta ya dɛ nyin kɛ he bagle yaa a mun."
44017021	Dɛ Atens tena ne ba hɔɔhra tomaa wefala bola ne wefala pɛɛra dɛ́ no.
44017022	Pɔɔl aa chegɛ nomonome la sie la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "N nao kɛŋɔ he Atens tena dɛ tomɛ voga kɛrɛdɛ,
44017023	dɛkalkɛŋɔ maa dɛ gaage he bwɛɛ nɔ ta dɛ na bɔra haa kpoo kwaa dɛɛ kwaa he koŋkwaare la, n nao kɛŋɔ baa chwerɛ bobɛl ŋɔ, 'Ya dɛ tomɔ, kɛ yaa on jemɛ.' Kon haa wola on jemɛ dɛ gee tomɔ la, o waa mɛɛ bol he be la. O sɔne Korowii.
44017024	"Korowiirii ta harɛ ne kwaa aa lɔ o ta bwa. On dɔ nyundua ne harɛ bwa. O waane laa chɔɔbɔra nɛwɛnyini aa maa tɛo la wa.
44017025	Nɛwɛnyini kondikwaa waa laa o do le, waa nɛwɛnyini komɛlbwa nyin, dɛkalkɛŋɔ on dɛɛ tɛ yaa bokpega ne hweera ne komɛlbwa.
44017026	Nɛmbeŋkpoŋii o ta, asɛ a gɛ nɛn la lolɛ harɛ bɛlbwa nɛra, asɛ ba ya perɛ harɛ bwa. Waa ta nɛwɛnyini la, o do bɛlbwa tɔpera ne ya dobɔra.
44017027	On saahna ɛa gɛ, ásɛ nɛwɛnyini ɛɛ lagre dɛɛ nyin o bɔr kɛ nyoŋa ken, asɛ o bɔr nyina bini la, bá nao. Kɛ kasinteŋ, Korowii toole bojaŋ. O ne ya bɛlbwa baah naa jaŋɛ.
44017028	Nomɛl te kompɛɛ: 'Korowii alaworomɛɛ ya bwa do le, dɛɛ hwee, dɛɛ ɛ ya tomare.' He nɛra baa dɛ chwerɛ wobobeela la gba di gɛ waa nɔ danseɛ dɛ ŋɔ, 'O biirii ya gbabir.'
44017029	"Korowii biirii yan, anomanta ya bɛ on kpɔ magɛ suugaswɛm ne suugapoŋ ne bwea koŋkwaare nɛwɛnyini gbagba aa kpɔ ba liire maa la.
44017030	Saŋ la nɛwɛnyini faa wola Korowii ŋwɛnɛ jemɛ kɛrɛdɛ la, o laa sie kpɔ ba wechɔga ta. Kɛ taraken te, o ŋɔ hárɛ ta bobɛlbwa nɛra charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta,
44017031	dɛkalkɛŋɔ o do tɔpere waa dɛ ba nɛwɛnyini bwa waa bola kasinteŋ ne la. O le nɛn wɛɛ ba waa la bola. O ir naate seo ta ásɛ nɛra jemɛ kɛŋɔ kpelaa o waa la."
44017032	Pɔɔl aa bol seo ta ira waa la, dɛ ba dɛ mamɔ, asɛ bane ge ŋɔ, "Ya dɛ nyin kɛ he bol he waa la yá no ja."
44017033	Belaa o le ba bini, dɛ kaa.
