44017034	Nɛra la bane te yarada Yeesu waa la dɛ ba ja o nɛ. Nɛra baa yaradaa la bini bɛl sɔne Daneseɔs. Dɛ Areɔpagos nomonome la bɛlee on. Haah bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Damaris ne nɛra bane yarada Yeesu waa la.
44018001	A habɔɔ la, Pɔɔl le Atens dɛ kaa Kɔrent.
44018002	Belaa o ka na Juda te bɛl, dɛ o sɔne Akwela. Dɛ Pɔntos tee on, asɛ o ka so Room, dɛ berɛ le bela ba Kɔrent, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ Room Koojen Klɔdeɔs doŋi Juda tena bwa Room. Dɛ Akwela haah sɔne Presela. Pɔɔl la ba be dɛ ka na ba,
44018003	dɛ so ba be dɛ ɛ toma, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ gbansaba toma o faa dɛ ɛ wubwa laanee baa ɛ.
44018004	Dɛ o dɛ la ba cheremi dea Ona Tɔpere bɛlbwa dɛ kaa bol wa, asɛ o ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ ne Juda tena bwa yon dɛɛ nyiŋi Korowii waa bini. Dɛ o dɛ tɔŋ ba ásɛ ba fe teŋɛ o kon ta.
44018005	Silas ne Timoti aa le Makidoonia harɛ ba la, a taa Pɔɔl do kpegri name dɛ gel wobɛlbwa ɛɛ dɛɛ bol Yeesu waa la, dɛɛ di danseɛ dɛɛ bagle Juda tena kɛŋɔ Yeesuu Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la.
44018006	Dɛ nɛra la dɛ nyin Pɔɔl toma chɔga, dɛɛ ɛo nɛnhɛla. Anomanta o jwii o laala doŋa ta dɛ́ bagle kɛ o bag ba Korowii waa asɛ ba vɛah, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Dɛ he nyograa, nɛn laa ɛ heya, he gbagbaa ɛ he nyu. Le fini dɛɛ kaa, nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ mɛɛ ba Korowii waa bagla. Maa he bee ba kpa."
44018007	Waa le ba be la, o kaa chog baa bɛl waa dɛ tomɛ Korowii gɛ Juda tena aa dɛ tomɛ Korowii baa yerɔ Titeɔs Jastos la. Dɛ o dem lɔ bela cheremi dea jwɛɛh tenten.
44018008	Dɛ nomoa waa dɛ nyiŋi cheremi dea la ta la sɔne Krispus. Dɛ o ne o dem tena bwa yarada Yeesu waa la. Kɔrent tena kɛrɛdɛ no Yeesu waa la dɛ yaradaa, asɛ ba sɔ ba Korowii ne.
44018009	Awola bɛl Pɔɔl na chaahna jwaana. O nao kɛŋɔ Korowii aa dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Bɛ dɛɛ ɔmɛ, dɛɛ bol n waa la nɛra be. Bɛ nyoa tɔ,
44018010	dɛkalkɛŋɔ n chegɛ he habɔɔ. N nɛra warɛ bwɛɛ nɔ ta. Anomanta mɛɛ che he mun taa, asɛ nomɛlbwa bɛ won ɛɛ wobɛlbwa."
44018011	Anomanta Pɔɔl soge bwɛɛ la ta dɛ bagle nɛra Korowii waa benanyoa dɛ korobie anumɛl.
44018012	Gɛ saŋ baa tɛ baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Galio nomonome asɛ o nyiŋi Akaaya harɛ dɛɛ tɛ Room Koojen laanee Juda tena pɛ nyoa dɛ lawɛ Pɔɔl la o be.
44018013	Baa la o ne la, ba kaa ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ jo ya kii nɛ. O dɛ bagle nɛra ŋɔ báa tomɛ Korowii ŋwɛnɛ bɛl ta aa wola were."
44018014	Pɔɔl te ne ŋɔ o bol waa dɛ Galio ŋɔ Juda tena la be ŋɔ, "Juda tena, dɛ tonchɔga anee baa nɔ fe tomɛ nɔ naa, ŋwɛnɛ fe lole kɛ ń lawɛ bambile dɛ no he be.
44018015	Kɛ aa ɛ waa waa bola ne he bwɛɛ tena sɔna ne he bwɛɛ waa gbo waa nɔ te, hé gbagba ka nyiŋi a ta. Maa a gɛ waa nɔɔ bol."
44018016	Galio doŋ ba o kɔɔto bela.
44018017	Belaa ba lawɛ cheremi dea nomoa baa dɛ yerɔ Sɔɔstenes la dɛ lɔɔro Galio kɔɔto dea la sie tenten, kɛ Galio ta ban chaŋɛ kwara.
44018018	A habɔɔ la, Pɔɔl soge Kɔrent asɔre tena la be bigri, asɛ dɛ kal ba dɛ le bela kaa Keŋkrea. Dɛ o bagɛ nyoa bɛl, anomanta o fonɛ o nyu mɔɔ dɛ le Keŋkrea, asɛ o ne Akwela ne Presela kpɔ stiimae dɛɛ kaa Siiria harɛ.
44018019	Ba kpɔɔ ka tel Ɛfesos, asɛ Pɔɔl gel ba dɛ te kaa bela cheremi dea, asɛ o ne bela Juda tena kaa bol Korowii wa.
44018020	Nɛra la fe ŋɔ ó so ba be tama, kɛ o ta sɛɛh.
44018021	Kɛ waa dɛ ba ba be lee dɛ kaa la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Dɛ Korowii sɛoh te naa, mɛɛ berɔɔ ba he be," dɛ che Ɛfesos kpɔ stiimae kaa.
44018022	Waa tel Sisaaria la, o la Jerusalam dɛ ka chɔɔ bela asɔre tena, dɛ le bela kaa Anteɔk.
44018023	Waa soge bela tama la, o le bela dɛ valɛ Galaasia harɛ ne Frejea harɛ bwɛɛre ta dɛɛ ja nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ dɛ do bela la, dɛɛ do ba gbemba.
44018024	Dɛ Juda te bɛl ɛ bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Alɛksandrea la bie, dɛ ba Ɛfesos, asɛ baa yerɔ Apolos. Dɛ o jemɛ wobol taeh, dɛ jemɛ Korowii Tɔn bini waa ge kɛrɛdɛ.
44018025	Ba fa bagle Apolos Yeesu bwara waa ne o ŋwɛnɛre bwa, asɛ o jema, dɛ gee bagla o bokpega bwa ne. Kɛ, dɛ Jɔn o faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la waa waa bagle nɛra Yeesu waa la gboo o no.
44018026	O lɔ bambile dɛ baa bol Korowii Waa cheremi dea. Presela ne Akwela no waa waa dɛ bol la, dɛ kpɔɔ la ba dem dɛ ka baglo Korowii Waa la kɛrɛdɛ.
44018027	Belaa Apolos ŋɔ wɛɛ la Akaaya harɛ taa. Anomanta Ɛfesos asɔre tena la doo gbemba dɛ chwerɛ Akaaya harɛ asɔre tena tɔn ŋɔ o ba ba be naa, bá nyiŋu kɛrɛdɛ. Waa la bela la, o kaa cha nɛra Korowii aa sune ba nɛɛ dɛ gel ba yarada o waa la taeh.
44018028	O wono bagle Korowii Waa bini bombaah kpegri nɛ, Juda te bɛlbwa aa wola wone tɔŋlo, dɛ won bagle waa Korowii Tɔn bini kɛŋɔ Yeesuu Kristo la waa ɛ nɛwɛnyina bwa Lɛɛ la.
44019001	Apolos aa lɔ Kɔrent la, Pɔɔl kpɔ harɛ la bwe doa bɔr dɛ ka le Ɛfesos. Waa la bela la, o kaa pu nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ la bane bela,
44019002	dɛ pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Haa kpɔ he te tɛ Yeesu la, Korowii tɛ heyaa o Domadɛɛge la aa?" Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Ɔɔhɔ, ya te ta Korowii Domadɛɛge la waa noɛ kwaraa bwa."
44019003	Anee Pɔɔl berɛ kwaa pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Aah dɛ bɔkwa waa he sɛh ŋɔ hɛɛ ɛo mɔɔ ba sɔ heyaa Korowii nee laɔ?" Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Jɔn waa o faa dɛ chagle laanee ya sɛh."
44019004	Belaa o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Nɛra baa charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta laanee Jɔn sɔ Korowii ne. Jɔn faa dɛ bagle nɛra waa la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ naate o taa lɔ sie dɛɛ ba bala la baa ba naa, bá yaradao dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo. Dɛ Yeesu waa wɛɛ bol la."
44019005	Baa no gɛ waa nɔ la, ba gelɔ ba sɔ ba Korowii nee dɛ́ bagle kɛ ba ɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu nɛra.
44019006	Pɔɔl kpɔ o nɔɔra dawɛ ba nɛ, asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge ba so ba nɛ, asɛ baa bol wobofala, dɛɛ bol Korowii Wa.
44019007	Dɛ baa tel baala fi dɛ banɛɛ.
44019008	Pɔɔl di korobie atoro bwa bela, dɛɛ bol Korowii Waa bela tena be bansua ne ba cheremi dea bini. Dɛ o lag ba dɛɛ so, o ne baa bol Korowii Kora la wa. O takapɔ kɛ wɛɛ berɛ ba liiree ásɛ ba fe teŋɛ o kon ta.
44019009	Dɛ ba bini bane deŋne kpegri baa waa la yarada kwara, dɛɛ bol Yeesu nɛɛ teŋa la waa aa wola were kwara nɛnlaa la bwa baah ta. Anomanta Pɔɔl gel ba, dɛ lawɛ nɛra baa yarada Yeesu waa la, asɛ tɔpere bɛlbwa o ne ba kaa cheme bobɛl baa dɛ yerɛ bela Teraanɔs Sukuu la ta.
44019010	Gɛ Sukuu la ta laŋa dɛ kaa hweli Korowii waa tɔpere bɛlbwa la, ba ɛ gɛ bene anɛ. Anomanta Juda tena ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ dɛ do Eesia harɛ ta bela bwaa no Yeesu waa la.
44019011	Dɛ Korowii chegɛ Pɔɔl nɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ nyokpowaa aa do kpegri dɛ berɛ gwaa logla kwaa la.
44019012	Dɛ nɛra kpɔ dukure ne yakwane waa lega dɛɛ la weela tena be, asɛ ba weelare ɛɛ le ba nɛ, asɛ ba bini banɔ la kwaa aa dɛ ir ba nɛɛ la ge kwaa la ɛɛ le ba nɛ.
44019013	Dɛ Juda tena bane lɔ bela dɛ yon gaage dɛɛ doŋi kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛ. Ba ge fe dɛ nyin dɛ kpɔ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu sɔn dɛɛ doŋi a gɛ kwaa nɔ dɛ yon dɛɛ kɔgra ŋɔ, "Yeesu Pɔɔl aa dɛ bol o waa la sɔn ta, hé le kɛ yaa dɛ ŋɔ he be nɔ!"
44019014	Dɛ Juda tena Sɔfonomoa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Skiiva la bibaala banuanɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ gɛ.
44019015	Awola bɛl baa ŋɔa ba kpɔ Yeesu sɔn doŋi kwaa nomɛl nɛɛ la, a gelɔ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "N jemɛ Yeesu, dɛ jemɛ Pɔɔl ge. Asɛ he ge, heyaa bamewaɔ?"
44019016	Ate dɛ baa la kwaa aa dɛ ir o nɛɛ la gug ba dɛ lɔɔ ba, dɛ a ɔma. O pira ba dɛ kɛɛ ba laala dɛ wur ba, asɛ ba chwa le o dem bela.
44019017	Juda tena ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ dɛ do Ɛfesos la bwa no gɛ waa nɔ, asɛ ɔmee lag ba kɛrɛdɛ. Gɛ waa nɔ aa chiga la, bela tena ta Yeesu waa la wesale liire kpa. Ba ɔmɔ kɛrɛdɛ.
44019018	Name dɛ bela asɔre tena la kɛrɛdɛ le bombaah dɛɛ bol wechɔga baa ɛa, dɛɛ sɛh ba chɔgre.
44019019	Asɛ ba bini bane baa ɛ dobodobo ka mɔɔ dɛ ɛ asɔre tena la le ba tɔne baa nyiŋi a bini dɛɛ ɛ dobodobo la ne, dɛ kpaa nii do a ta bombaah bela. Baa kari tɔne la suuga la, aa do kanee. Aa tel suugapoŋa kagboŋa fifraanuee.
44019020	Gɛ ŋwɛnɛkpeg nɔ taa a che Korowii waa la perɛ dɛ won do kpegri kohona.
44019021	Gɛ waa nɔ habɔɔ la, Pɔɔl ɛ o liire kɛŋɔ wɛɛ la Makidoonia harɛ ne Akaaya harɛ taa, dɛ́ ka kaa Jerusalam, dɛ ŋɔ dɛ o la a bwa ta naa, a chɛ kɛ o la Room gba.
44019022	O tomɛ o bonɔɔna banɛ baa dɛ yer ba Timoti ne Erastos la, asɛ ba tɔ o sie kaa Makidoonia harɛ. Kɛ o te soge Eesia harɛ ta tama.
44019023	A gɛ saŋ la, dɛ Ɛfesos tena baa wola asɔre tena ɛɛ la lɛ gaeh nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ ŋwɛnɛfale la ta la nɛ.
44019024	Dɛ jwini te bɛl lɔ bela baa yerɔ Demetros. Dɛ o kpɔ suugapoŋa dɛɛ kwaa bela vog bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Aatemes la dea chaa, asɛ gɛ toma la ɛɛ tɛ o ne o bala tom-ɛɛra tɔnɔ tenten.
44019025	O yerɛ o tom-ɛɛra la bwa ne nɛra o ne baa dɛ ɛ tonsiwi beŋkpoŋ la bwa, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Yabala, he jemɔ kɛ toma nɔ taa a che ya do wer la.
44019026	Kɛ taraken, he gbabir na waa Pɔɔl nɔ aa dɛ ɛ, dɛ no waa waa dɛ bol. Ɛfesos bonɔ gbo laa wɛɛ ɛ o waa nɔ. Eesia harɛ kɛrɛdɛ bwaa wɛɛ ɛa. O wono berɛ nɛndamanta bwa liire baa teŋɛ waa waa dɛ bagle la ta. O waa waa dɛ bol laanee kɛ voga nɛwɛnyini gbagba aa kpɔ nɔn dɛɛ ɛa la ta kasinteŋ dɔe.
44019027	Waa dɛ ɛ gɛ nɔ, n dɛ ɔmɛ kɛŋɔ ya toma nɔ sɔn bɛ ba chɔg. Ya toma nɔ gbo sɔn laa dɛɛ ba chɔga. Ya vogjen Aatemes dea nɔ nɛra aa dɛ maŋkurao nɔ, baa on komɛlbwa yera ba kpa, asɛ o sɔn sewɛ, asɛ dɛ kpo vog baa dɛ tomɔ Eesia harɛ ne bobɛlbwa la sɔn kwaraa! Baa on ɔmɛ kpa."
44019028	Nɛra la aa no gɛ waa nɔ la, ba bwaawee iro, asɛ baa dooge lɔŋɔre dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Ya Ɛfesos tena vog Aatemes nɔ dɔŋ toole!"
44019029	Ate dɛ gbɔga tɔ bwɛɛ la bwa, asɛ nɛnlaa la aa dɛ do gbɔga la lawɛ nɛra bane baa dɛ yer ba Gayos ne Aristakus la. Dɛ Makidoonia harɛ tenaa ban, asɛ ba ne Pɔɔl ɛɛ valɛ. Nɛra la tɛg ba la bela ba bwɛɛ tena aa chema dɛɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole la.
44019030	Dɛ Pɔɔl fe dɛ nyin nɛra la be bela laŋa, kɛ nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ la ta on ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ.
44019031	Dɛ o daamanaree Eesia harɛ nomonome la bane. Ba tomɛ nɛra ŋɔ bá ka kaoh ŋɔ o bɛ lii kɛŋɔ wɛɛ tire nɛra la baah belaa.
44019032	Dɛ nɛnlaa la kɛrɛdɛ aa jemɛ wee la waa baa cheme bela. Dɛ ba bwa aa wesiwi beŋkpoŋ bol. Bane nyɛga tɔɔ ba bol waa chagɛ bonɔ, dɛ bane ge bol ba kwaa chagɛ le. Dɛ ba bwa dɛ bol waa sagasaga ken, asɛ gbɔga tɔ bela bwa.
44019033	Bela Juda tena fe gelɔ ba bini bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Alɛksanda la ir che, dɛ fe tɔh ba nyoa ŋɔ ba laa ba waa la ne. Anee o kpɔ nɔn ɛg ba ŋɔ bá tɔ nyoa, ásɛ o fe tɔh o bwɛɛ tena nyoa.
44019034	Nɛra la te ne o nae kɛ Juda tee on, dɛ ba pɛo dɛɛ bol kohona ŋɔ, "Ya vog Aatemes te dɔŋ toole!" Ba si gɛ naaa dɔŋhwere anɛ bwa.
44019035	Belaa ba krache nomoa waa chɔ ba nyoa la le dɛ gel ba tɔ nyoa. Baa tɔ nyoa la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Yabala Ɛfesos tena, nomɛlbwa jemɔ kɛŋɔ ya bwɛɛ nɔɔ dɔ ya vogjen Aatemes vog dea dɛɛ nyiŋi o ta. Yanee dɔ Aatemes bwe la aa le Korowii doa ba le harɛ la ge.
44019036	Tɔŋla toole gɛ waa nɔ te ta. Aa do gɛ nɔ, a chɛ kɛ he tɔ nyoa dɛɛ nyiŋi. A ta chɛ kɛ he ɛ waane dɛ ba le waa nɛ.
44019037	Nɛra nɔ ta ya vog nɔ komɛlbwa ŋwɛɛ, ba ta on sisa wobol ge bolɛ. Aah dɛ bala haa ba ba ne bonɔ nɔ mun ɔ?
44019038	Dɛ nomɛl ɛ Demetros ne o bala waane aa, kɔɔto deene lole, nomonome baa dɛ bol waa a ta la ge lole. Bá ka samane dɔŋa bela.
44019039	Dɛ gɛ ge laa aa, dɛ waane ta lole naa, tɔɔ la wee bwɛɛ nɔ nomonome aa cheme la, bá kpɔ bil ba sie.
44019040	Yaa dɛ do gbɔga ken nɔ, ya ta kɛrɛdɛ nyiŋaa, baa koh a waa lawɛ yaa. Ba lawɛ yaa ge aa, yaa wobɛlbwaa dɔ bol dɛ bagle gbɔga nɔ mun."
44019041	Waa bol waa nɔ gɛ la, o gelɔ nɛra la pegre.
44020001	Gbɔga la nyoa aa sɔɔhna la, Pɔɔl yerɛ bela asɔre tena la cheme, dɛ do ba gbemba, dɛ kal ba, dɛ kaa Makidoonia harɛ.
44020002	O kpɔ baah bela bwɛɛre la ta dɛ bol waa bag ba taeh dɛ ja ba, dɛ le bela ba Grik tena harɛ ta.
44020003	O di korobie atoro bela mɔɔ dɛ kpɔ o te dɛ́ fe kpɔ stiimae kaa Siiria harɛ. Waa dɛ kpɔ o te dɛ́ kaa la taa o na kɛŋɔ bela Juda tena dɛ vɔrɔwe dɛ́ lawɔ. Belaa o berɛ laa berɛ kpɔ Makidoonia harɛ dɛ kaa.
44020004	Perɔs bie Sopata waa le Beria la teŋɛ Pɔɔl nɛɛ kaa. Aristakus ne Sɛkondos baa le Tɛsalonika la ge la bɛl. Gɛɛ Gayos waa le Dɛɛbe la, ne Tichikos ne Trɔfemos baa le Eesia harɛ la ge la bɛl. Timoti ge la bɛl.
44020005	Gɛ nɛra nɔ tɔ sie dɛ ka so kpa Pɔɔl ne men maa dɛ chwerɛ waa nɔ Troas.
44020006	Ya tɔpejena yaa dɛ di paanoo yaa wola iisi a ta do la garɔ mɔɔ ya che Felepae jo stiimae bini. Yaa le Felepae la, a tɔpera anuee ya ba puu ba Troas. Ya di yawanyoa Troas bela.
44020007	Memene wee jɔmɔra ne la, ya asɔre tena la chemo dɛ di kondikwaa ya Dɔɔ aa kpɔa ja yaa ŋɔ yá kpɔ dɛɛ lii o waa la, asɛ Pɔɔl bol Korowii Waa dɛɛ bagle yaa. Dɛ o fe dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ tɔɔ peraa ó kaa, anomanta o bol waa ka tel harambaŋa.
44020008	Dɛ abrɔsane bɛl doaa ya cheme, asɛ kandere do bela pirim.
44020009	Dɛ bonɔɔ bɛl soge tokoro ta baa yerɔ Yutekɔs. Pɔɔl aa bol waa bigri la, dom lawɛ Yutekɔs kɛrɛdɛ. Waa dɛ chɔ la, o le tokoro la ta abrɔsane la doa le harɛ. Dɛ gɛ dea laanee chɔŋa tooro abrɔsane la deene aa chɔŋra la ta. Baa gɔɔro, dɛ o sewɔ.
44020010	Anee Pɔɔl tu harɛ dɛ ka pi o nɛ, dɛ gbaaro pɛl o bambile, o berɛ wee. Asɛ Pɔɔl ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He bɛ ɔmɛ, o siwi lole."
44020011	Asɛ Pɔɔl berɛ deeh abrɔsane la dɛ ka di kwa, asɛ o ne ba bol waa la sie ka tel kɛ tɔ aa pera mɔɔ o kaa.
44020012	Ate nɛra la sie lɛo kohona kɛŋɔ bie la aa ira la, dɛ kpɔɔ kaa dem.
44020013	Ya kaa kpɔ ya stiimae la kaa bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Asos la ta. Dɛ ya fe dɛ lii kɛ yaa ka kpɔ Pɔɔlee Asos bela, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ya ne o vɔrɔwɔ asɛ o ŋɔ wɛɛ kpɔ harɛɛ dɛɛ cheme yaa bela.
44020014	Waa baa pu yaa Asos la, ya kpɔɔ ya stiimae la ta, asɛ ya ne o ba Mitiliini.
44020015	Tɔ aa pera la, ya berɔ kpɔ stiimae la le bela dɛ ba chɔ ekwi bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Keɔs la jwɛh. Tɔ aa pera ja la, ya ba bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Samos la ta. Asɛ tɔ aa bera per ja la, ya ba bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Maeletus la ta.
44020016	Yaa dɛ ba la, ya ta Ɛfesos chegɛ, dɛkalkɛ dɛ Pɔɔl aa nyin kɛ o ba bigri Eesia harɛ ta. Dɛ o dɛ nyin kɛ o won tel Jerusalam warane dɛ ba tɔpejen baa dɛ yerɔ Pɛntekɔs la ta garɛ mɔɔ.
44020017	Pɔɔl chegɛ Maeletus kal Ɛfesos asɔre tena nomonome ŋɔ bá ba o be Maeletus.
44020018	Baa bala la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Le awola maa ba he be Eesia harɛ bonɔ la ba le fini, he na n da maa kpoŋa bwa.
44020019	Dɛ n kpɔ n te kɛ n Dɔɔ Yeesu bonɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ o toma nɔ sipwɛra ne. N koh he nyogra haa nyogre Korowii ŋwɛnɛ waa dɛ yon dɛɛ wi. Juda tena aa dɛ vɔrɔwe n vɔrɔwa la, a noo mɛ tenten.
44020020	N ta wobɛlbwa kpɔe sɔh heya. Wobɛlbwa aa le tɔnɔ tɛ heyaa la, n ta a ta tɔe. N bagle nɛra Korowii Waa cheremi bɔra, dɛ bagle o waa he deremi.
44020021	Juda tena ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ bwa bee n bol, dɛ ja ba ŋɔ bá charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta, dɛ ba Korowii be, dɛ yarada Yeesu dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo.
44020022	"Taraken nɔ, Jerusalamee mɛɛ kaa la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge kpɔ bela laŋa do n bambile ta maa wola won vɛh. Dɛ waane ɛɛ puu mɛɛ bela yaa, maa jemɛ.
44020023	Waa maa jema bwaa kɛŋɔ bela bwa maa la la, gɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge che nɛra nɛɛ dɛ ŋɔ wahala ne dea chɔe chɔ n sie dɛɛ kpaa mɛ.
44020024	N waane laa n gbagba hweera wa. Waa aa swɛɛ n siwi laanee kɛ gɛ maa ɛ dɛ́ tonɛ toma n Dɔɔ Yeesu aa tɛ mɛ ŋɔ ń ɛ la. N tomaa kɛ ń bol Amanesoma la nɛra be bá jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii dɛ sune nɛra nɛɛ dɛɛ nyin ba chae.
44020025	"Taraken nɔ, n jemɔ kɛ he nɛra maa valɛ he nɛɛ dɛ bol Korowii Kora nɔ waa he be nɔ, haa men na kpa bwa.
44020026	Mɛɛ di heyaa kasinteŋii fini. Dɛ he bɛlbwa baa nyogre Korowii ŋwɛnɛ aa, n laa ɛ waane,
44020027	dɛkalkɛŋɔ n ta waa Korowii aa dɛ nyin la wobɛlbwa kpɔe sɔh heya.
44020028	Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ, dɛɛ nyiŋi nɛra Korowii Domadɛɛge aa kpɔ ba do he nɔn ta ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi ba nɛɛ la kɛrɛdɛ. Korowii Bie gbagba chalee o kpɔ yawɛ o nɛra asɛ ba ɛ o kwaa nɔ, anomanta hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi ba nɛ.
44020029	N jemɔ kɛŋɔ maa dɛ kaa nɔ, nɛnchɔga ɛɛ jo he binii kɛŋɔ petegre toole naa, gbolore yon jo peera baah dɛɛ larawa la.
44020030	N jemɔ kɛŋɔ he gbagba bini bane ɛɛ dɛɛ bol waa aa wola weree, dɛ negre nɛra ásɛ ba gel Yeesu nɛɛ teŋa dɛɛ teŋɛ ba nɛ.
44020031	A waa n ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ ŋɔ he bɛ ba soh kɛ n faa lɔ he be bene atoro bwa dɛ yon dɛɛ ja heyaa Korowii waa ta tɔpebii te bɛlbwa, dɛ koh he waa dɛɛ wi la.
44020032	"N kpɔ heyaa do Korowii nɔn ta ásɛ o kpoŋe heya, ásɛ o nɛra nɛɛ suna waa la won do he bambile bini ásɛ he do kpegri, dɛ won di kapɛrɛsom la waa ɛa cheg nɛra waa laa ba doŋa bwa kpɔ ba nɛɛ asɛ ba ɛ o gbo nɛra la.
44020033	N sie ta nomɛlbwa suuga kɛɛ o yal ta begrɛ.
44020034	He gbabir jemɔ kɛŋɔ gɛ saŋ maa lɔ he be la, bɔwɔbee n kwee mɔɔ n ne nɛra baa teŋɛ n nɛɛ la ɛɛ dɔ ya komɛlbwa.
44020035	N chegɛ n we-ɛɛla ta dɛ bagle heyaa kɛŋɔ a chɛ kɛ ya swɛɛ siwi ɛ toma ken, ásɛ dɛ won dɛɛ cha nɛra baa wola kpege la. A chɛ kɛ yaa lii waa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu gbagba aa bola ŋɔ, 'Nɛn waa dɛ kɛ nɛra kwaa la, o bwara dɛ sɔɔhno dɛ gwaa nɛn baa dɛ kɛo kwaa' la."
44020036	Pɔɔl aa bol waa tonɛ la, o guŋi harɛ, asɛ o ne ba soŋe Korowii.
44020037	Baa ira la, ba lawɔ gbaa ba bambili, dɛ kpɔ wiile dɛ kalo.
44020038	Wee la aa gela ba loo ku kohona laanee kɛŋɔ waa ŋɔa baa on na kpa bwa la. Baa gwao tonɛ la, ba doo ŋwɛnɛ la stiimae la bɔr.
44021001	Yaa le ba be la, ya jo stiimae bini dɛ pa sie kaa Kɔs, asɛ tɔ aa pera la, ya la Roods, dɛ ka che bela kaa Patara.
44021002	Belaa ya na kɛŋɔ stiimae bɛl aa ba dɛ kaa Finiisia harɛ ta, asɛ ya jo o bini dɛ kaa,
44021003	dɛ ba le bobɛl dɛ na ekwi bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Saepros la, dɛ berɛ pa sie weekaŋle harɛ bɔr pera dɛ ka le Siiria harɛ ta, dɛ ka tu Taaya, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ belaa stiimae la ɛɛ ba bone aa lɔ o bini la ne.
44021004	Ya nyin asɔre tena baa lɔ bela la bɔr, dɛ so ba be yawanyoa. Bela la Korowii Domadɛɛge la gelɔ ba ŋɔ Pɔɔl be ŋɔ o bɛ Jerusalam la.
44021005	Ya kaala aa tela la, ya le bela dɛ chig ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ kaa. Ba ne ba haahna ne bii bwaa baa do yaa ŋwɛnɛ dɛ le bwɛɛ la ta, dɛ ka tel nee nyoa, asɛ ya guŋi harɛ nee nyoa bela dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛ kal dɔŋa.
44021006	Yaa kal dɔŋa tonɛ la, ya jo stiimae bini, asɛ ba kaa dem.
44021007	Ya le Taaya ba Tɔlemaes dɛ ba chɔɔ bela asɔre tena, dɛ so ba be tɔpebeŋkpoŋ.
44021008	Tɔ aa pera la, ya le bela dɛ ba Sisaaria, dɛ ba chog Felep. Dɛ o ɛ nɛra banuanɛ ba faa lee ba Jerusalam ŋɔ báa nyiŋi suuga waa ta la bɛl. Dɛ o dɛ gaage dɛɛ bol Korowii Wa.
44021009	Dɛ o dɔ bihaahna banaarɛ baa wola yalɛ bwa asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la cha ba ba yon dɛɛ bol Korowii Wa.
44021010	Ya bigri bela tama, asɛ Korowii keame bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Agabus la le Judia harɛ ba.
44021011	Waa ba ya be la, o baa kpɔ Pɔɔl kriso, dɛ vɔrɔwe o gbagba nɔɔra ne nakpale dɛ ŋɔ ya be ŋɔ, "Kenii Korowii Domadɛɛge ŋɔ: Juda tena ɛɛ vɔrɔwe kriso nɔ te kenii Jerusalam, dɛ kpɔɔ do nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ nɔn ta."
44021012	Yaa no gɛ waa nɔ la, ya ne asɔre tena baa lɔ bela la soŋe Pɔɔl ŋɔ o bɛ Jerusalam la.
44021013	Belaa o ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ wi ken dɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ he do mɛ bɔhwaah nɔɔ? Dɛ baa vɔg mɛɛ Jerusalamee yaa, n sɛh gɛ. Dɛ baa kpo mɛɛ ge kwaraa naa, n sɛh gɛ. Dɛ baa koh n Dɔɔ Yeesu waa dɛ ɛɛ mɛ anɔ bɛlbwa naa, n waane laa. N sɛh gɛ waa nɔ wubwa bambile bwa ne."
44021014	Ya bol harɛ bini waa nɔ bwa o be, o ta noɛ. Anomanta ya gelo dɛ ŋɔ, "Gɛ Korowii aa dɛ nyin a ɛ la, á ɛ gɛ."
44021015	A habɔɔ la, ya kpɔ ya bone dɛ kaa Jerusalam.
44021016	Sisaaria asɔre tena la bane ge teŋɛ ya nɛɛ la, dɛ tɔ ya sie la ya ne baa la ya fe aa dɛ ba o dea choga la dem. Dɛ o le Saepros, dɛ ɛ nɛnlogla baa lɛ Yeesu waa la bɛl, asɛ baa yerɔ Meesan.
44021017	Yaa ba Jerusalam la, asɔre tena la lɛ yaa silɛɛ ne.
44021018	Tɔ aa pera la, Pɔɔl kpɔ yaa la Jems be, dɛ asɔre tena nomonome la bwa lɔ bela.
44021019	Pɔɔl ne ba lea dɔŋa, asɛ o bagle waa bwa Korowii aa chao o won ɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la harɛre ta.
44021020	Baa no Pɔɔl waa la la, ba jam Korowii taeh. Belaa ba ge ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, taraken nɔ, yaa won jemɛ Juda tena baa yarada ya Dɔɔ Yeesu nɔ nyoa bagle. Ba warɔ kohona. Ba sie begre Mosis Mmara la ge ta taeh.
44021021	Gɛ nɛra nɔ bwa noɔ kɛŋɔ haa dɛ gaage la, he ka dɛ bagle Juda tena baa lɔ harɛre aa wola Juda tena harɛre ɛɛ ta la ŋɔ bá gel Mosis Mmara la ta teŋa. Hale ba ŋɔ he ŋɔ bá gel ba bii pena teŋa, dɛ ŋɔ ba bɛ Juda tena kii te bɛlbwa ta dɛɛ teŋɛ. Mosis Mmara ge ta ŋwɛnɛ gɛ tɛɛ.
44021022	Gɛ nɛra nɔ ɛɛ noo kɛŋɔ he balɔ. Anomanta ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ba ɛɛ yɔ?
44021023	Yaa baglee gɛ aa chɛ kɛ he ɛ. Baala banaarɛ bane bagɛ Korowii nyoa bonɔ.
44021024	Kpɔ ba la Korowii Dea, asɛ hé ne ba ka pɛ ɛ we-ɛɛla haa dɛ ba ɛɛ ásɛ dɛ laa doŋa kpɔ he nɛɛ la. He laŋaa, hé bɔ ba kem aa chɛ kɛ ba bɔ waa la ta la tɛɛ ba, ásɛ ba won fonɛ ba nyuune. He ɛ ken aa, nɛra bwa ɛɛ jemɔɔ kɛŋɔ haŋaa ba haŋɛ he nyoa. Baa nao kɛŋɔ he gbabir dɛ teŋɛ Mosis Mmara la ta.
44021025	Asɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ dɛ yarada Yeesu waa la ge la, ya chwer ba ŋɔ ba bɛ vog kwaa ne chal ne ol baa wola o baŋa teŋe o sewɛ la dɛɛ di, dɛ ŋɔ bá laa ba te dɛɛ kpɔ jwamane waa ta."
44021026	Baa ŋɔ gɛ la, Pɔɔl lɛ nɛra banaarɛ la, asɛ tɔ aa pera la, o ne ba ka ɛ we-ɛɛla la ásɛ ba doŋa le ba nɛ. Baa tona la, Pɔɔl kaa jo Korowii Dea bini dɛɛ bagle tɔpera aa di mɔɔ ba kpoo ba bɛlbwa koŋkwaare, ásɛ ba we-ɛɛla la tonɛ. Dɛ a lɔ tɔpera anuanɛ.
44021027	Tɔpera anuanɛ la aa ba dɛ tel a jaga la, Juda tena bane baa le Eesia harɛ pera la na Pɔɔl Korowii Dea, dɛ bol waa dɛ ir nɛra bwaawee, dɛ lawɔ,
44021028	dɛ kpɔ takpeg dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Israel tena, hé ba cha yaa oo! Baa nɔɔ vala dɛɛ bol waa bobɛlbwa dɛɛ yagɛ ya Israel tena ne Mosis Mmara ne Korowii Dea nɔ la. Name te kwaraa doŋaa o kpɔ baa jo ya Korowii Dea nɔ bini. Nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ, aa wola chɛɛ kɛŋɔ ba jo Korowii Dea la, banee o lawɛ baa jo o bini!"
44021029	Dɛ ba na o ne baa bɛl waa le Ɛfesos baa yerɔ Trɔfemos la Jerusalam bela. A waa ba ŋɔ gɛ la, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba dɛ lii kɛŋɔ Pɔɔl jo o ne ba Korowii Dea la bini.
44021030	Ate dɛ bwɛɛ la tena bwa lɛ gaeh, dɛ chwa le bobɛlbwa dɛ lawɛ Pɔɔl dɛ tuugu le Korowii Dea la bini. Bug la ta dɛ ba tɔɔge Korowii Dea la gbeni bwa.
44021031	Nɛra la aa chegɛ Pɔɔl kpoe naa ta la, nɛra kaa ŋɔ Room soojanomonjen waa dɛ nyiŋi bela soojare nɛɛ la be ŋɔ Jerusalam tena bwa lɛ gaeh.
44021032	Ate nomoa la gel wobɛlbwa ɛɛ dɛ kpɔ soojanomonome bane baa lɔ o lɔga ne soojare bane dɛ chwa la bela baa dɛ lɔɔ Pɔɔl la. Nɛra la aa na nomoa la wɛɛ ba soojare ne la, ba gel Pɔɔl lɔɔra.
44021033	Nomoa la baa lawɛ Pɔɔl dɛ gel ba do kwaa o nɔɔra, dɛ bɔɔ nɛra la ŋɔ, "Nɛn besoo baa nɔ nɔ? Webesoo o ɛɔ?"
44021034	Ate dɛ ba dɛ nyɛg bobɛlbwa, bane ɛɛ bol anɔ, bane gee bol ane soosiwi. Baa dɛ do gbɔga gɛ la, o ta wone jemɛ waa la kasinteŋ, dɛ ŋɔ bá lawɛ Pɔɔl ka do soojare dejen bini.
44021035	Ba dɛ la dɛ ka tel dea la sanjol baa chegɛ o ta dɛɛ jo o bini la ta, asɛ nɛra la ɛɛ nyin ba kpo Pɔɔl. Anee soojare la lɛo ba be dɛ gɔɔro dawɛ ba vaama ta.
44021036	Dɛ nɛra teŋɔ dɛ kpɔ takpeg dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Hé kpoo! Hé kpoo!"
44021037	Soojare la aa dɛ ba Pɔɔl ne dea la bini joe la, o bol waa ba nomonjen la be dɛ ŋɔ, "Nomoa, n dɛ nyin n bol waane he be tama." Belaa nomoa la ŋɔ, "He dɛ no Grik wobol aa?
44021038	Jamɔ Ijipt te la waa bala baah bɛl ta dɛ ba wetɔŋla ne dɛ yo Abane nomonome asɛ dɛ jo nɛŋkpoora kagboŋa banaarɛ baa kpoŋe dɔmkwaa la ne kpɔg bini laanee hen kɛɛ?"
44021039	Anee Pɔɔl ŋɔ, "Juda tee men. Silisia harɛ bwɛjen baa dɛ yerɔ Taasos la biee men. N poori, tɛ mɛ ŋwɛnɛ ń bol waa nɛra nɔ be."
44021040	Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, nomoa la tɛo ŋwɛnɛ, asɛ o che dea la sanjol ta dɛ kpɔ nɔn ɛgɛ nɛra la ŋɔ bá tɔ nyoa. Ba tɔ nyoa surumm ken, asɛ Pɔɔl kpɔ Israel wobol dɛɛ bol waa ba be, dɛ ŋɔ:
44022001	"N mɛɛwa ne n dɔɔranarwa, hé do deŋna n be ásɛ n bol n kon hé no."
44022002	Baa noa kɛŋɔ ba gbagba wobolee wɛɛ bol ba be la, ba tɔ nyoa jeiih ken, asɛ Pɔɔl ɛɛ bol o wa, dɛ ŋɔ,
44022003	"Juda tee men. Silisia harɛ bwɛɛ baa dɛ yerɔ Taasos la taa ba lol mɛ. Kɛ Jerusalam bonɔɔ ba dɛɛ mɛ, asɛ Gamaleɛl chag mɛ kwa, dɛ bag mɛ ya naanar kii bwa, asɛ mɛɛ teŋɛ a ta. N sie begrɔ mɛɛ tomɛ Korowii gɛ he bɛlbwa aa dɛ tomɔ fini nɔ.
44022004	Dɛ n fa chegɛ nɛra baa teŋɛ gɛ ŋwɛnɛfale nɔ ta nɔ nɛɛ dɛɛ nyin ba dɛ́ kpo, dɛ lawɛ ba baala ne haahna bwa do deene.
44022005	Sɔfore Nomoa ne ya Juda tena nomonome bwa ɛɛ wonoo di danseɛ kɛŋɔ kpelaa n ŋɔ. Banee fa chwerɛ tɔne tɛ mɛ ásɛ n kpɔ la yabala Juda tena baa lɔ Damaskɔs la be ásɛ ba tɛ mɛ ŋwɛnɛ ń won lawɛ ŋwɛnɛfale la tena baa lɔ bela dɛ kpɔ ba ba Jerusalam ásɛ ba ka ɛɛ ba wahala la.
44022006	"Maa dɛ la dɛ ka tel Damaskɔs la, kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ nii le nyundua dɛ chaah n nɛɛ kohona dɛ bar mɛ cheme. Dɛ wee chegɛ nyufala.
44022007	Belaa n chole harɛ. Maa chola la, n no taa bɛl o ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, 'Oo, Sɔɔl! Ɛrɛɛ he che n nɛɛ gɛ nɔɔ?'
44022008	Bela n ŋɔ, 'Henee umeo, n Dɔɔ?' Asɛ o ŋɔ, 'Menee Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt la. Menee hɛɛ yo la.'
44022009	Dɛ n ne nɛra banee dɛɛ kaa. Ba na nii la te, kɛ ba ta naate waa dɛ bol waa n be la wobol te noɛ.
44022010	Belaa n pɛɛro ŋɔ, 'N Dɔɔ, ɛrɛɛ mɛɛ ba ɛɛ yɔ?' Asɛ o ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, 'Ir la Damaskɔs ásɛ Korowii ka bagle waa waa dɛ nyin kɛ he ɛ.'
44022011	Nii la aa chaah n sie kohona la, a gelɔ n nyoŋe. Anomanta nɛra n ne baa dɛ kaa laanee bera lag mɛ da dɛ ba n ne Damaskɔs.
44022012	"Damaskɔs bela la, dɛ baa bɛl lole baa yerɔ Ananias. Dɛ o ɛ nɛn waa dɛ tomɛ Korowii kɛrɛdɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ Mosis Mmara la ge ta kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ Juda tena baa lɔ bela la bwa ɛɛ tɛo duure kohona.
44022013	Ananias baa che n be dɛ ŋɔ, 'N dɔɔ Sɔɔl, Korowii gel he sie pili.' Bug la ta dɛ n denɔ berɛ dɛɛ na, dɛ nao.
44022014	Asɛ o ŋɔ, 'Korowii ya naanar faa dɛ tomɔ la, onee lee tɛ o te ŋɔ hé jemɛ waa waa dɛ nyin, dɛ won no o Bidɛɛge la gbagba wobol, dɛ nao ge.
44022015	O ɛ gɛ ásɛ he won di danseɛ tɛo nɛra bwa be waa haa naa bwa ta, ne waa haa noa bwa ta.
44022016	Anomanta bɛ berɛ so kpa. Gel ba sɔe Korowii ne, asɛ he yerɛ Yeesu sɔn dɛ soŋo ó kpɔ he wechɔga kɛɛ.'
44022017	"A habɔɔ la, n berɔ kaa Jerusalam. Belaa n kaa soŋe Korowii o dea bini dɛ na chaahna.
44022018	N na n Dɔɔ Yeesu, asɛ o ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, 'Le Jerusalam warane. N waa nɔ haa dɛ di a danseɛ nɔ, Jerusalam tena aa a noe ba.'
44022019	Belaa n ŋɔ, 'N Dɔɔ, ba gbabir na gɛ n faa la cheremi deene bini dɛ kaa lɔɔ nɛra baa yarada he waa nɔ, dɛɛ do ba deene.
44022020	Gɛ saŋ baa kpo Steeven o faa dɛ di he waa nɔ danseɛ la, dɛ n lɔ bela dɛ sɛh ŋɔ o chɛ kpoe. Hale baala la aa dɛ kaa bá ka kpoo dɛ wur ba yale la, men lɛa kpoŋe.'
44022021	Anee o ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, 'Kaa! Mɛɛ geloo he kaa bojaŋ, dɛ la nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ be.' "
44022022	Pɔɔl aa dɛ bol o waa la bwa dɛ nɛra la bwa cheg deŋne dɛɛ no o be. Kɛ waa ba dɛ bol nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ be laŋa waa la, ba baah diu baa nyɛg kohona dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Hé le o ne! Bɔkwaa he gel o che dɛɛ ɛɔ?"
44022023	Ba baah diu, asɛ baa nyɛg, dɛɛ viwe ba yale, dɛ ɛ teera dɛɛ ta nyundua.
44022024	Anomanta soojanomonjen la gelɔ ba kpɔ Pɔɔl jo dea. Dɛ o ta wone jemɛ wee la aa bala nɛra la ɛɛ nyɛg gɛ la. Anomanta o ŋɔ bá lɔɔ Pɔɔl bampɔrɔ ŋwɛɛra ne, dɛ ɛo hɔhɔrɔwa ásɛ o fe sɛh chɔgre dɛ bol kasinteŋ.
44022025	Baa ŋɔa ba lɔɔro la, o pɛɛ ba bini nomoa la ŋɔ, "Ŋwɛnɛ lole kɛŋɔ he lɔɔ Room te dɛ ba ta o waa bolɛ dɛ na wechɔga waa ɛa aa?"
44022026	Pɔɔl aa ŋɔ gɛ la, sooja la kaa ŋɔ ba nomonjen la be ŋɔ, "Dɛɛ do baa nɔ dɛɛgɔ dɛ bɛ on wechɔga bɛlbwa ɛ. Room tee on."
44022027	Belaa nomoa la ba pɛɛ Pɔɔl ŋɔ, "Room tee hen aa?" Asɛ Pɔɔl sɛh ŋɔ Room tee on.
44022028	Anee nomoa la ŋɔ, "Bɛlee n gba, kɛ n bɔ kem taeh mɔɔ dɛ won ɛ Room te nɔ." Belaa Pɔɔl ŋɔ, "Room tee lolɛ n te n ɛ Room te."
44022029	Bug la ta dɛ nɛra ba fe aa dɛ ba Pɔɔl lɔɔra la le habɔɔ. Nomoa la ge aa naa kɛ Room tee Pɔɔl asɛ o gel ba do kwaa o nɔɔra la, o ɔmɔ.
44022030	Dɛ nomoa la dɛ nyin o jemɛ waa Pɔɔl aa ɛa asɛ Juda tena la baah di o nɛɛ la. Anomanta tɔ aa pera la, o gelɔ ba le Pɔɔl dea, dɛ gel Sɔfonomonome ne Juda tena nomonome baa dɛ bol waa la bwa cheme. Baa chema la, o gelɔ Pɔɔl ba che ba sie.
44023001	Waa baa che nomonome la bwa sie la, o nyiŋ ba, dɛ ŋɔ, "Yabala, n bambile bwa nee n tomɛ Korowii le saŋ la bwa ba le fini. N liire ta men ɛɛ kɛ n ɛ wechɔga bwa."
44023002	Asɛ Ananias waa ɛ Sɔfore Nomoa la ŋɔ nɛ́ra baa chegɛ Pɔɔl jwɛɛh la kpaa o nyoa ta.
44023003	Belaa Pɔɔl ŋɔ, "Korowii ɛɛ lɔe bɔ kem, nɛra sie ta gboo he ɛ nɛndɛɛge kɛŋɔ dekɔɔh baa lɔɔ fula. Haa chema nɔ, gɛ Mmara aa chagla laa hɛɛ ba nyiŋa dɛ bol n wa aa? Aah dɛ haa ŋɔa bá lɔɔ mɛ nɔ, dɛ Mmara tɛ ŋwɛnɛ gɛ naa?"
44023004	Anee nɛra baa chegɛ Pɔɔl jwɛɛh la ŋɔ, "Sɔfore Nomoaa hɛɛ chɛgre naa?"
44023005	Asɛ Pɔɔl ŋɔ, "Yabala, n ta jemɛ kɛ Sɔfore Nomoaa on. Korowii Tɔn baglɔ kɛŋɔ ŋwɛnɛ toole kɛ nomɛlbwa chɛgɛ nomoa waa dɛ nyiŋi o bwɛɛ tena nɛ."
44023006	Pɔɔl nyiŋi nɛra baa cheme bela la dɛ na kɛŋɔ bane ɛ Saduki tena, asɛ bane ge ɛ Farisii tena. Belaa o kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Yabala, Farisii tee men noo! Farisii tena biee men. N dɛ hwɛgɛ kɛ nɛra ɛɛ ir seo taa. Gɛ hwɛga nɔ maa dɔa nɔ waa ba ba n ne ŋɔ hé bol n waa dɛ pa bole la!"
44023007	Waa dena ŋɔ gɛ la, wetɔŋla chole Saduki tena la ne Farisii tena la baah. Ba nyoa ta berɛ pɛ kpa,
44023008	dɛkalkɛ dɛ Farisii tena la te ŋɔ nɛra bwa ɛɛ ba ir seo taa, dɛ ŋɔ lala ge lole, dɛ ŋɔ nyundua toroma ge lole. Kɛ dɛ Saduki tena la te aa gɛ waa nɔ bɛlbwa yarada.
44023009	Ba nyɛga la nyoa baa do kpegri, asɛ Farisii tena Tɔn Jerema la ir che dɛ ŋɔ, "Ya ta wechɔga bɛlbwa baa nɔ nɛɛ nae. Bɛl lole komɛl kɛɛ nyundua torome bɛlee bol waa o be!"
44023010	Ba wetɔŋla la nyoa baa do kpegri kohona, asɛ ɔmee berɛ lawɛ soojanomonjen la, asɛ wɛɛ lii kɛ baa tɛgre Pɔɔlee kpo. Anomanta o gelɔ o bechale jo nɛra la baah ta dɛ lɛ Pɔɔl ba nɔn ta dɛ kpɔɔ kaa soojare dejen baa doo o bini la ta.
44023011	Awola jwaana ne la, ya Dɔɔ Yeesu baa che Pɔɔl jwɛh dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Bɛ ɔmɛ. Hɛɛ di danseɛ tɛ mɛ Room gɛ haa dia tɛ mɛ Jerusalam nɔ."
44023012	Tɔ aa pera la, Juda tena la bane chemo dɛ vɔrɔwe waane. Ba ŋwɛɛ ntam ŋɔ dɛ ba ta Pɔɔl kpoe yaa, ba bɛlbwa bɛ kwaa di, o bɛ nee nyɔ. Ba ŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa to ntam la la, Kórowii kpoo.
44023013	Ba nɛra ba nyoa aa pɛa ba vɔrɔwe gɛ waa nɔ la gwaa nɛra fifraanaarɛ.
44023014	Ba la Sɔfonomonome ne bwɛɛ nomonome be dɛ ka ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Ya ŋwɛɛ ntam ŋɔ dɛ ya ta Pɔɔl kpoe yaa, yaa kwaa di.
44023015	Anomanta hé ne Juda tena nomonome baa dɛ bol waa la tomɛ nɛn soojanomonjen la be ŋɔ ó le Pɔɔl tɛ heya, á do kɛŋɔ haa dɛ nyin he kwaa nyiŋi o waa bini kɛrɛdɛ la. Dɛ ba dɛ ba o ne naa, waa bonɔɔ tel ya te kpoo."
44023016	Jaah Pɔɔl nimambie bɛl bibaa no gɛ waa la. Anomanta o la soojare dejen baa kpɔ Pɔɔl ka do o bini la ta dɛ ka ŋɔ o be.
44023017	Belaa Pɔɔl yerɛ soojanomonome la bɛl dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "La bonɔɔ nɔ ne he nomonjen la be. O dɔ waane dɛ́ bol o be."
44023018	Sooja la la o ne ba nomoa la be dɛ ka ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Pɔɔl la baa doo dea laanee yer mɛ dɛ ŋɔ n be ŋɔ ń ba bonɔɔ nɔ ne he be. O dɔ waane dɛ́ bol he be."
44023019	Belaa nomoa la lawɛ bonɔɔ la nɔn dɛ le o ne bokɛre dɛ pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa he dɔ dɛɛ nyin he bol n be nɔ?"
44023020	Anee bonɔɔ la ŋɔ, "Juda tena vɔrɔwɔ ŋɔ baa ba soŋee asɛ hé kere kpɔ Pɔɔl tɛɛ ba bá la o ne ba nomonome baa dɛ bol waa la sie, á do kɛŋɔ baa dɛ nyin ba ka kwaa nyiŋi o waa bini kɛrɛdɛ la.
44023021	Kɛ bɛ Pɔɔl kpɔ tɛɛ ba, dɛkalkɛ ba nɛra dɛ gwaa fifraanaarɛ sɔh ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ́ kpoo. Gɛ nɛra la ŋwɛɛ ntam ŋɔ ba ta Pɔɔl kpoe yaa, baa kwaa di, baa nee gee nyɔ. Ba ɛ wobɛlbwa tonɛ. He siwi taa baa nyiŋi."
44023022	Belaa nomoa la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Bɛ gel nomɛlbwa no kɛŋɔ he bol gɛ waa nɔ n be." O ta bonɔɔ la ŋwɛnɛ o kaa.
44023023	Soojanomonjen la yerɛ o soojanomonome la banɛ dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé nyin soojare lafraanɛ, dɛ nyin soojare baa soge jagre ta dɛɛ yo la ge fifraanuanɛ, ne soojare baa dɛ yo lampea ne la lafraanɛ ásɛ ba la Sisaaria fini jwaana dɔŋ anuanaarɛ saŋ.
44023024	Nyin konteehna tɛ Pɔɔl ásɛ o so bɛl ta, dɛ la o ne sɔnɔnɔɔ ka tɛ harɛ nomoa Fɛlekse."
44023025	Nomoa la chwerɛ tɔn tɛɛ ba ŋɔ bá kpɔ ka tɛ harɛ nomoa la. Kenii o chwerɔ:
44023026	Men Klɔdeɔs Lisiasii chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ n nomoa Fɛlekse. He le aa?
44023027	Juda tenaa lawɛ baa nɔ dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin o kpoe, asɛ n ka le ba nɛ, dɛ no kɛ o ɛ Room te, dɛ kpɔ soojare ka lɛo.
44023028	Maa lɛo dɛɛ nyin n jemɛ wee la waa baa dɛ nyin o kpoe la, n kpɔɔ la Juda tena nomonome baa dɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole la sie.
44023029	Belaa n na kɛŋɔ ba kii waa ba lawɔ. Waa baa kpɔa dawɔ la ta chɛ kɛŋɔ ba kpoo. A ta chɛ kɛ ba doo dea gba.
44023030	A habɔɔ la, n berɔ ba no kɛŋɔ ba vɔrɔwe o vɔrɔwa dɛɛ nyin o kpoe, asɛ n ŋɔ a chɛ kɛ n ba o ne he be bug ta. N ŋɔ nɛ́ra o ne baa dɔa la ge ba he be dɛ ba bagle waa la aa lɔ o ne ba baah ta. N jagɛ bonɔ.
44023031	Gɛ nomoa la aa bagle soojare la la, gɛɛ ba ɛ. Ba kpɔ Pɔɔl le jwaana dɛ ka tel o ne bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Antepatres la.
44023032	Asɛ tɔ aa pera la, ba bini banɔ la baa kpɔ naa ta la berɔ ba Jerusalam, dɛ gel konteehna tena la, asɛ ba ne Pɔɔl kaa.
44023033	Baa kaa tel Sisaaria dɛ kpɔ tɔn la tɛ nomoa waa dɛ nyiŋi harɛ la ta la, ba kpɔ Pɔɔl ge do o nɔn ta.
44023034	O kure tɔn la, dɛ pɛɛ Pɔɔl harɛ la ta waa lea. Pɔɔl aa ŋɔa Silisiaa o le la,
44023035	nomoa la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nɛra he ne baa dɔa la balaa, mɛɛ bol he waa laanee dɛ pa bole." Dɛ o lɔ Hɛrɔd koodem bɛl ta. O ŋɔ bá kpɔ Pɔɔl do bela, dɛ ŋɔ bá nyiŋu kɛrɛdɛ.
44024001	Tɔpera anue aa baa gale la, Sɔfore Nomoa Ananias ne nomonome bane ne mmara jereme bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Tɛtolɔs la la Sisaaria. Ba la ba harɛ nomoa Fɛlekse be bela baa dɛ ba waa bola la, dɛ ka bagle waa Pɔɔl aa ɛa ba ne o dɔ la.
44024002	Ba yerɛ Pɔɔl ba, asɛ Tɛtolɔs den pa mun dɛɛ bɔ nkoro dɛ ŋɔ, "Nomoa, he laworomɛ taraken ya dɔ deŋnesɔɔhna la sie. He wono kpɔ ŋwɛnɛfale ta dɛɛ nyiŋi ya harɛ nɔ, asɛ o do som.
44024003	Ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta la, ya ne nɛra baa lɔ bojaŋ bobɛlbwa dɛ jaame kohona.
44024004	Maa nyin kɛ n kpɔ wobobala lawɛ so bigri. Kɛ n poori, lawɛ bambile dɛ no ya wetamaa nɔ.
44024005	"Nɛnchɔge bɛlbwa ta baa nɔ tele! O ne bɔpɛo aa somɛ! O toma bwaa kɛ ó valɛ bol waa dɛɛ ir Juda tena bwaawee asɛ baa lɛ gaeh harɛ bɛlbwa waa la o ta la ta. Nɛra bane baa dɛ teŋɛ Korowii toma ŋwɛnɛfale bɛl waa wola were la ta asɛ baa yer ba Nasarɛt tena la, ba nomoaa on.
44024006	O fe dɛ nyin dɛ lawɛ nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ kwaraa ba jo ya Korowii Dea bini. Dɛ ya ge kii gɛ kɔkɔkɔkɔ. A waa ya lawɔ.
44024008	Dɛ he gbabir pɛɛro waa, o gbagba ɛɛ bagle wee la aa bala ya lawɔ laanee."
44024009	Ate dɛ Juda tena baa lɔ bela la bwa denɔ pɛ dɛ sɛh ŋɔ kasinteŋii waa ba nɛn la aa bola la bwa.
44024010	Belaa ba harɛ nomoa la kpɔ nɔn ɛ Pɔɔl ŋɔ ó bol wa, asɛ Pɔɔl ŋɔ, "N jemɔ kɛŋɔ haa lea di nomonome dɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole harɛ nɔ ta bigro. Anomanta a som n be kɛ haa dɛ ba n waa nɔ ta nyiŋa nɔ.
44024011	Maa la Korowii soŋebɔr Jerusalam la, a ta tɔpera fi dɛ anɛ kwaraa gwaalɛ. He dɛ nyin hé pɛɛ no.
44024012	Maa la bela la, n ne nomɛlbwa ta wobɛlbwa tɔŋlɛ. N ta nɛra ge doe ŋɔ bá ɛ wobɛlbwa. Korowii Dea oo, cheremi dea oo, bwɛɛ bini noo, n ta nɛra doe a bɛlbwa bini ŋɔ bá ɛ wobɛlbwa.
44024013	Ba ta danseɛ bɛlbwa dɔe dɛ́ chagle kɛ n ɛ waa nɔ bɛlbwa baa kpɔa dɛɛ dag mɛ nɔ.
44024014	Ba waa nɔ bini beŋkpoŋ waa ɛ kasinteŋ laanee kɛ baa ŋɔa ŋɔ ŋwɛnɛ la baa dɛ yerɔ ŋwɛnɛfale la, o taa mɛɛ teŋɛ, dɛ kpɔ o ta dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii ya naanar faa dɛ tomɔ la. N dɛ teŋɛ wobɛlbwa aa lɔ Mosis Mmara bini ne Korowii Keamere Tɔne bini la ta.
44024015	N dɛ hwɛgɛ kɛŋɔ nɛndɛɛga ne nɛnchɔga bwa ɛɛ berɔɔ ir seo ta. Nɛra nɔ gba dɔ gɛ hwɛga nɔ.
44024016	N jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ ba bol nɛwɛnyina bwa waa dɛ pa bole. Anomanta n dɛ ɛ n wobɛlbwa naa, n dɛ ɛa kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ bolchoge di Korowii ne nɛwɛnyina bwa be.
44024017	"Maa le Jerusalam bigro, asɛ n la bela ŋɔ ń kpɔ suuga ane ka tɛ n bala Juda tena ba soga bini aa kpega tɛɛ ba, asɛ dɛ ɛ n saraha ane.
44024018	Baa na mɛ Korowii Dea la, dɛ gɛ saraha nɔɔ mɛɛ ɛ. Dɛ n dɔɔ laa n doŋa kpɔ n nɛɛ tonɛ dɛ fonɛ n nyu tonɛ. Dɛ nɛnlaa bɛlbwa ta n nɛɛ jae a ba ɛ kɛ ba lɛ gaeh.
44024019	Dɛ Juda tena bane baa le Eesia harɛ lɔ bela. Dɛ n ɛɛ ba waane aa, a chɛ kɛ ba gbagba fe aa lɔ bonɔ dɛ fe bagle.
44024020	Gɛ laa ge aa, hé gel nɛra nɔ baa lɔ bonɔ nɔ bagle, dɛ gɛ saŋ baa lag mɛ ka cheme Juda tena nomonome sie la, dɛ ba na n wechɔge bɛl aa?
44024021	Webeŋkpoŋ gbo waa n jemɛ. Onee kɛ awola baa chem mɛ la, n kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, 'Maa dɛ yarada kɛ nɛra bwa ɛɛ ir seo taa la, a waa he lag mɛ cheme bonɔ nɔ.' "
44024022	Dɛ Fɛlekse jemɛ ŋwɛnɛfale la waa taeh. Anomanta o teŋe wobol la ta, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Dɛ soojanomonjen Lisias balaa, mɛɛ nyiŋi he waa nɔ taa."
44024023	Waa teŋe waa la ta la, o ŋɔ nomoa waa dɛ nyiŋi Pɔɔl nɛɛ la be ŋɔ ó berɛ kaa Pɔɔl ne dea, dɛ ŋɔ wɛ́ɛ nyiŋu kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ o bɛ on tɔ do dea, asɛ dɛ Pɔɔl daamanar ba o be naa, ó tɛɛ ba ŋwɛnɛ ba baa chao.
44024024	Aa baa di tɔpera anɛ la, Fɛlekse ne o haah Drusila ba Sisaaria. Dɛ Juda tee o haah la. Fɛlekse gelɔ ba ka yerɛ Pɔɔl, asɛ o baa baglo gɛ baa teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ yaradao.
44024025	Pɔɔl aa ba dɛ bol ŋɔ a chɛ kɛ nomɛlbwa gel o waa do kaih, dɛ ŋɔ a chɛ kɛ nomɛlbwa ɛɛ nyiŋi o te kɛrɛdɛ wechɔga ɛɛ ta, dɛ ŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ ba bol nɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole la, Fɛlekse berɔ ɔmɛ dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Gel mɔɔ. Dɛɛ la. N baa dɔ bɔr ja aa, mɛɛ yerɛɛ."
44024026	Dɛ o dɛ lii kɛ Pɔɔl ɛɛ tɛo suugaa, anomanta tama dɛ o yerɔ ŋɔ ó ba asɛ baa bol wa.
44024027	Bene anɛ baa gale, asɛ Fɛlekse le kara ta, asɛ Pɔɔkeɔs Fɛstos ba di kara. Dɛ Fɛlekse dɛ nyin kɛ Juda tena sie lɛ o nɛ, anomanta o gelɔ Pɔɔl ta do dea.
44025001	Fɛstos ba Sisaaria dɛ ba di tɔpera atoro, dɛ le bela la Jerusalam.
44025002	Waa la bela la, Sɔfonomonome ne Juda tena nomonome kpɔ waa ba ne Pɔɔl aa dɔa bil o sie dɛ soŋo ŋɔ
44025003	ó cha ba dɛ ba Pɔɔl ne Jerusalam ba tɛɛ ba. Dɛ ba dɔɔ vɔrɔwe cheg kɛ dɛ ba dɛ ba Pɔɔl ne naa, nɛ́ra ba sɔh ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ kpoo.
44025004	Belaa Fɛstos ŋɔ Pɔɔl chɔ dea Sisaaria, dɛ ŋɔ aa bigri o gba la Sisaaria bela.
44025005	Kɛ bá gel ba nomonome puu la bela, asɛ dɛ Pɔɔl ɛ waane aa, bá bagla bela.
44025006	Fɛstos berɔ di tɔpera anuatoro kɛɛ tɔpera fi ba be Jerusalam mɔɔ dɛ ba Sisaaria. Tɔ aa pera la, o kaa so bela baa dɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole la dɛ ŋɔ bá ba Pɔɔl ne.
44025007	Pɔɔl aa bala la, Juda tena baa le Jerusalam la baa che o jwɛɛh dɛ bol waa aa wola were dawɛ o nɛ. Kɛ ane a bwa, ba ta wone dɔ wobɛlbwa dɛ chagle kɛ ba waa la ɛ kasinteŋ.
44025008	Pɔɔl wono bol waa dɛ bagle kɛ o ta wechɔga ɛɛ. O baglɔ kɛ o ta wobɛlbwa ɛɛ dɛ jo Juda tena kii bɛlbwa nɛ, dɛ bagle kɛ o ta wobɛlbwa ɛɛ dɛ jo ba Korowii Dea kii bɛlbwa nɛ, dɛ ŋɔ o ta Room Koojen la ge nɛɛ joɛ.
44025009	Dɛ Fɛstos dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ o kpɔ Juda tena la darame, anomanta o bɔɔ Pɔɔl ŋɔ, "Hɛɛ la Jerusalamee ásɛ ba ka bol he waa baa kpɔa dawɛ he nɛɛ nɔ n siwi ta dɛ pa bole n ge na naa?"
44025010	Belaa Pɔɔl ŋɔ, "Akai! Room Koojen gbagba nɛra sie n che taraken nɔ. Bonɔɔ chɛ kɛ ba bol n waa nɔ dɛ pa bole. He gbabir jemɔ kɛ n ta Israel tena nɔ wechɔge bɛlbwa ɛɛ.
44025011	Dɛ n fe jo ya kii bɛl nɛɛ asɛ a ɛ kɛ a chɛ kɛ ba kpo mɛ naa, n fe aa won ŋɔ mɛɛ chwa sewee. Kɛ dɛ ba waa baa kpɔa dɛ dag mɛ nɔ ta kasinteŋ ɛɛ te naa, nomɛlbwa aa won kpɔ mɛ do ba nɔn ta. N dɛ nyin kɛ he la n ne Room Koojen Siisa sie ásɛ o ka bol n waa nɔ dɛ pa bole."
44025012	Belaa Fɛstos ne o nomonome le jina. Baa bala la, Fɛstos ŋɔ Pɔɔl be ŋɔ, "Dɛ he ŋɔ hɛɛ la Room Koojen bee ó ka bol waa nɔ dɛ pa bole te naa, hɛɛ la o bee."
44025013	Aa baa ɛ tɔperaanɛ la, kooro bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Agrepa ne haah bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Bɛnes ba Sisaaria dɛ ba chɔɔ Fɛstos.
44025014	Baa di Sisaaria tɔperaanɛ la, Fɛstos taa Pɔɔl waa la bagle Kooro Agrepa, dɛ ŋɔ, "Fɛlekse fa tɔ a gɛ baa nɔ dea, kɛ o ta lole.
44025015	N la Jerusalam, asɛ Juda tena Sɔfonomonome ne ba bwɛɛ nomonome kaa bol o wa, dɛ kpɔ waa dɛɛ dawɔ, dɛ ŋɔ ń bol o waa dɛ pao bolchɔge.
44025016	Baa ŋɔ gɛ la, n ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ ya Room tena te aa gɛ ɛ. Ya te bwɛ, dɛ nɛn ne o dɔŋ dɔɔ, dɛ ya ta on ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ o ne nɛn waa kpɔ waa dawɔ la cheme o bol o kon, o ge bol, asɛ a bɔɔ waa, yaa on bolchɔge pa gɛ.
44025017	Anomanta Juda tena la aa lawɛ dɔŋa ba bonɔ la, n ta hɛlɛ kwaraa. Tɔ aa pera la, n baa so n kara ta bela maa soga dɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole la, dɛ gel ba ba Pɔɔl ne bela.
44025018	Dɛ n te dɛ lii kɛŋɔ o ken ɛ wechɔga ane kohona. Kɛ nɛra la waa baa kpɔa dɛɛ dawɔ la ta wechɔga bɛlbwa ɛɛ.
44025019	Dɛ ba Korowii toma waa ne baa bɛl waa sewa baa yerɔ Yeesu la waa baa bol. Ba ŋɔ Pɔɔl te ŋɔ gɛ Yeesu la waa sewa la ir seo ta.
44025020	Dɛ maa jemɛ gɛ maa ɛ dɛ bɔɔ gɛ waa nɔ bini jemɛ dɛ won bola kɛrɛdɛ. Anomanta n bɔɔ Pɔɔl ŋɔ, 'Yá la Jerusalam bá ka bol he waa nɔ dɛ pa bole bela kɛɛ?'
44025021	Maa ŋɔ gɛ la, o soŋɔ ŋɔ wɛɛ chɔ dea ka tel kɛ Room Koojen Siisa gbagba aa bol o waa la dɛ pa bole. A waa n tɔɔ do dea la ásɛ n baa dɔ ŋwɛnɛ aa, n gel o la bela."
44025022	Belaa Kooro Agrepa ŋɔ Fɛstos be ŋɔ, "N gbagba dɛ nyin n na baa nɔ dɛ no o waa nɔ." Asɛ Fɛstos ŋɔ, "Tɔ kere peraa, hɛɛ noo."
44025023	Tɔ aa pera la, Kooro Agrepa ne Bɛnes do ba koolaala, asɛ ba waa dɔ nyɛl kohona, asɛ ba ne bela soojanomonome ne bela nomonjena ba jo lamu ta. Baa chema la, Fɛstos gelɔ ba ba Pɔɔl ne.
44025024	Belaa Fɛstos ŋɔ, "Kooro Agrepa, ne nɛra haa cheme bonɔ nɔ, n dɛ lii kɛ he bwa na baa nɔ. Juda tena baa lɔ Jerusalam ne banɔ la baa lɔ Sisaaria bonɔ bwa kpɔ bandia dɛɛ nyɛg ŋɔ o waa aa were, ŋɔ o do kpoe.
44025025	Kɛ n ta wone na waa waa ɛa a ɛ kɛŋɔ o do kpoe. Anomanta o gbagba aa baa ŋɔ yá tɛ ŋwɛnɛ asɛ Room Koojen Siisa gbagba ka bol o waa la dɛ pa bole la, n ɛ n liire kɛŋɔ mɛɛ geloo o la o be.
44025026	Kɛ waa maa bagle do tɔn bini kɛŋɔ ken ne kenii o ɛ waa n ŋɔ Room Koojen gbagba nyiŋi o waa bini la, an kpega tɛ mɛ nɔ. Amɔ a waa n ba o ne he bwa sie, ne Kooro Agrepa gbagba sie, ásɛ he nyiŋi o waa nɔ bini la. Bɛl lole he ken ɛɛ wonoo cha mɛ ń dɔ o waane dɛ chwerɛ Room Koojen,
44025027	dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ n la o ne o be dɛ n ta wechɔga waa ɛa baglaa, a ta magrɛ."
44026001	Anee Kooro Agrepa ŋɔ Pɔɔl be ŋɔ, "N tɛɛ ŋwɛnɛ, ir dɛ bol he kon." Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, Pɔɔl ir nɔn dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ o dɛ ba o kon bola bá no, dɛ ŋɔ,
44026002	"Kooro Agrepa, n sie lɛo kohona kɛ maa dɛ ba n kon bola he siwi ta, dɛ bagle waa bwa Juda tena aa kpɔa dɛɛ dag mɛ nɔ.
44026003	N sie lɛo kohona, dɛkalkɛ he jemɛ ya Juda tena nawee waa bwa. Anomanta n poori, lawɛ bambile dɛ no n kon.
44026004	Juda tena bwa jemɛ gɛ maa doa n bechale saŋ bwa ba le fini. Gɛ saŋ maa lɔ n bwɛɛ ne Jerusalam la, waa n faa dɛ ɛ bwa, ba jemɛ a bwa.
44026005	Dɛ ba sɛoh ŋɔ bá bol kasinteŋ aa, ba fe ɛɛ wonoo di danseɛ kɛŋɔ ya Juda tena Korowii toma ŋwɛnɛ o ta teŋa aa kpega kohona baa yerɛ o nɛra Farisii tena la, o taa n gee teŋɛ.
44026006	Korowii bagɛ ya naanar nyoa bɛl. N dɛ hwɛgɛ gɛ nyobaga la ta. Gɛ hwɛga nɔ waa ba koh lag mɛ asɛ n che he sie hɛɛ ba n waa bola la.
44026007	Ya Juda tena deene fi dɛ anɛ tena la bwaa dɛɛ yarada Korowii kɛŋɔ wɛɛ ɛ gɛ waa bagɛ yaa nyoa laanee, dɛ koh a waa dɛɛ tomɔ sibegra ne chɔɔ ne jwaana bwa. N Naa Kooro, webeŋkpoŋ nɔ ya bwa aa dɛ hwɛgɛ o ta nɔ, onee ba kpɔ dawɛ n nɛɛ ŋɔ n ɛ wechɔga la. Na nɔ!
44026008	Ya waa yaa dɛ hwɛgɛ a ta laanee kɛŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ ir yaa seo taa. Bɔkwaa ɛa he nɛra haa lɔ bonɔ nɔ aa wola won yarada kɛŋɔ Korowii won nɛra seo ta ira ɔɔ?
44026009	"N gba fa hah Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt la waa la. N fa liiro kɛŋɔ ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa maa dɔa la, a chɛ kɛ n kpɔ o ta dɛ chɔg o waa la.
44026010	Maa lɔ Jerusalam la, dɛ gɛ toma nɔɔ mɛɛ ɛ. N soŋe Sɔfonomonome ba tɛ mɛ ŋwɛnɛ asɛ n larawe Korowii nɛra do deene pirim. Gɛ saŋ la, dɛ ba bol ba waa dɛ pa ba bolchɔge ŋɔ bá kpoo ba aa, gɛɛ n ge sɛh teŋɛ ba kpoora la ta.
44026011	Dɛ n dɛ la cheremi deene bini saŋ bɛlbwa dɛ kaa ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa taeh, dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ ba bol Korowii nɛnhɛlwaa ásɛ n lag ba. Ba waa aa dɛ di n baah kohona nomanta, dɛ n ti ba dɛɛ la bwɛɛre aa wola Juda tena bwɛɛre ɛɛ kwaraa ta, dɛ kaa ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa.
44026012	"Gɛ ŋwɛnɛ nɔ bɛlee n soŋe Sɔfonomonome be, asɛ ba tɛ mɛ kpegri ŋɔ ń la Damaskɔs.
44026013	N Naa Kooro, yaa lɔ ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ kaa la, gɛ saŋ wee aa chegɛ nyufala la, n ne nyiŋa dɛ nii le nyundua dɛ chaah bɔr gwaa wee, dɛ chaah bɔr bar n ne nɛra yaa dɛ valɛ la.
44026014	Belaa ya bwa chogli harɛ, asɛ n no kɛŋɔ nomɛl aa kpɔ ya bwɛɛ wobol dɛɛ bol waa n be, dɛ ŋɔ, 'Oo, Sɔɔl! Ɛrɛɛ he che n nɛɛ gɛ nɔɔ? He gbagbaa hɛɛ ɛ la. He ne nao baa doo ŋwɛn dɛɛ tegɔ o ta naa dɛɛ yagre o dɔɔ daa bwa beŋkpoŋ.'
44026015	Anee n ŋɔ, 'Henee umeo, n Dɔɔ?' Asɛ o ŋɔ, 'Menee Yeesu haa chegɛ n nɛɛ la.
44026016	Ir che! N dɛ nyin n lee ásɛ he ɛ n bonɔɔ dɛ valɛ dɛɛ bol waa haa naa fini nɔ, ne anɔ la haa naa kerekere la nɛra be. A waa n kpɔ n te chagle la.
44026017	Mɛɛ tomɛɛ Juda tena ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ bwa bee, dɛ kisi wechɔge ba be.
44026018	Hen dɛ ka pili ba sie ásɛ ba le biro ta dɛ ba bochaah ta bela nii aa lole, dɛ le Bɔnsam nɔn ta dɛ ba Korowii be, ásɛ o kpɔ ba wechɔga kɛ ba, ásɛ ba ba ja nɛra baa yarada mɛ n sɔ ba doŋa bwa ta ba ɛ n bii la nɛ.'
44026019	"N Naa Kooro, maa na gɛ waa nɔ la, n ta vɛɛh. Gɛ bwa Yeesu aa le nyundua ba ŋɔ n be la, n ɛo.
44026020	N tɔ sie la Damaskɔs, dɛ la Jerusalam, dɛ gaage Judia harɛ la te bwa, dɛ la harɛre a nɛra aa wola Juda tena ɛɛ ge ta. Maa dɛ gaage la bwa, dɛ n dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ bá charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta, dɛ ba Korowii be, asɛ dɛ gel ba we-ɛɛla chagle kɛ ba charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta.
44026021	Gɛ waa nɔ waa Juda tena lag mɛ gɛ saŋ maa lɔ Korowii Dea la, dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin n kpoe.
44026022	Dɛ le gɛ saŋ nɔ bwa ba le fini nɔ, n dɛ lii kɛŋɔ Korowii alaworomɛɛ n ta do le dɛ won che he sie dɛɛ di waa nɔ danseɛ nomonjena ne bechale bwa be nɔ. Waa Korowii keamere ne Mosis faa dɛ bol ŋɔ aa ɛo laanee n gee bol.
44026023	Anee kɛŋɔ a chɛ kɛ Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la na wahala, dɛ tɔ sie ir seo ta lala bwa nɛ, dɛ́ won che o seo ta ira la ta bagle Juda tena ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la kɛŋɔ ya toole seo nɔn ta ne biro ta kpa, dɛkalkɛ nii chaah ya nɛ."
44026024	Pɔɔl aa dɛ bol waa ken la, nomoa Fɛstos kɔro ŋɔ, "Pɔɔl, choglaa dɛɛ wee kɛɛ? He tɔn jema kohona laanee dɛɛ wee chogla la!"
44026025	Anee Pɔɔl ŋɔ, "Nomoa, chogla laa mɛɛ we! Kasinteŋ torodoo mɛɛ bol la.
44026026	N Naa Kooro Agrepa te jemɛ waa maa dɛ bol nɔ bwa. A waa maa wola waa bola o sie ɔmɛ la. N jemɔ kɛŋɔ a bɛlbwa ta o habɔɔ leɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a bɛlbwa ta waa baa sɔah ɛ ɛɛ.
44026027	N Naa Kooro, he yarada waa Korowii aa gela o keamere la bol la aa? N jemɔ kɛŋɔ he yaradaa."
44026028	Belaa Kooro Agrepa ŋɔ, "He dɛ lii kɛ hɛɛ wonoo gel n berɛ asɔre te bug nɔ ta kɛɛ?"
44026029	Anee Pɔɔl ŋɔ, "Dɛ bug nɔ taa yoo, dɛ kerekeree yoo, n te waa maa dɛ soŋe laanee kɛŋɔ he ne nɛra nɔ baa dɛ no n waa nɔ fini nɔ do kɛŋɔ maa doa nɔ. Kɛ maa soŋe kɛ ba do kwaa he nɔɔra kɛ baa do mɛ nɔ te."
44026030	Belaa Kooro Agrepa ne Nomoa Fɛstos ne Bɛnes, ne nɛra baa lɔ bela la bwa ir,
44026031	asɛ baa le bela la, baa ŋɔ dɔŋa be ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ wobɛlbwa ta baglɛ kɛ o chɛ kpoe, kɛɛ ba doo dea."
44026032	Kooro Agrepa ŋɔ Nomoa Fɛstos be ŋɔ, "Dɛ ken laa o soŋe ŋɔ hé la o ne Room Koojen Siisa be ó ka bol o waa dɛ pa bole nɔ naa, n fe ɛɛ ŋɔɔ hé kpɔɔ ta wɛɛ la."
44027001	Ba vɔrɔwɔ ŋɔ yá kpɔ nee ta kaa Itali harɛ bɛla Room Koojen aa soga la. Anomanta ba kpɔ Pɔɔl ne nɛra bane baa do ba ge dea ja o nɛɛ la tɛ Room Koojen soojanomoa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Juleɔs la.
44027002	Stiimae bɛl le Adramitiam ba, asɛ ya jo o ta dɛɛ kaa. Dɛ o dɛ kaa Eesia harɛ mpo nyoa bwɛɛre ta. Dɛ baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Aristakus ja ya nɛ. Makidoonia harɛ bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Tɛsalonika la taa o le.
44027003	Tɔ aa pera laanee ya jo Sidon. Juleɔs kpoŋe Pɔɔl kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ tɛo ŋwɛnɛ ó ka na o daamanar ásɛ ba tɛo kwaa aa chɛ kɛ o dɔ o ŋwɛnɛ la ta.
44027004	Ya chegɛ bela dɛɛ kaa, asɛ peu ka ta dɛɛ cheme yaa. Anomanta ya berɔ kaa Saepros waa ɛ ekwi la baŋ bobɛl peu la aa wola bela te ta la dɛ kaa.
44027005	Ya kpɔ mpo ta gɛ dɛɛ la dɛ ka fɛrɛ Silisia ne Pamfiilia jwɛh, dɛ ka chuge Maera waa lɔ Lisia harɛ ta la.
44027006	Belaa sooja nomoa la na Alɛksandrea tena stiimae bɛl waa dɛ kaa Itali harɛ, dɛ kpɔ yaa do o ta.
44027007	Ya kaalɔ tama tama ken tɔpera anɛ, mɔɔ dɛ ta ba tel Kenaedes, dɛkalkɛ dɛ peu aa yaa ŋwɛnɛ tɛ. Peu la aa wola ŋwɛnɛ tɛ la, ya pa sie Kret ne Salmon a bwa aa ɛ ekwie la baah ta dɛ fɛrɛ Kret baŋ bela peu la aa wola bela te ta la dɛɛ kaa.
44027008	Yaa fɛrɛ Kret harɛ baŋ pera bela kaa la, a no yaa kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ ya ba le legbɔɔ bɛl o ne Lasea aa wola jaŋɛ baa yerɛ bela Legbɔdɛɛge la.
44027009	Yaa bigri ŋwɛnɛ ta kohona la nomanta, ya ne Legbɔdɛɛge tela dɛ ya Juda tena tɔpejen yaa dɛ vɔwɛ nyoa o ta la garɔ. Gɛ tɔpere nɔ ge garaa, dɛ gɛ mpo la ta vala aa were. Anomanta Pɔɔl ja ba ŋɔ,
44027010	"Bwɛɛla, n nao kɛ le bonɔ dɛɛ la la, ya ŋwɛnɛ nɔ aa werii do tɛ yaa. Ya dɛ la naa, yaa ka na siswɛmee, asɛ ya ne ya stiimae nɔ ne ya bone nɔ ka nee ta."
44027011	Pɔɔl aa bol gɛ la, sooja nomoa la ta o be noɛ. O teŋɛ nɛn waa dɛ valɛ stiimae la ne la ne stiimae te la nyoa wobol ta.
44027012	Legbɔdɛɛge legbɔɔ bela aa were ne stiimae la chega peujena la saŋ. Ba ŋɔ stiimae legbɔdɛɛge lɔ Kret harɛ bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Finiks la ta, anomanta ba kɛrɛdɛ ŋɔ bá takapɔ so stiimae la bini tama tama dɛɛ la bela dɛ ka so bela, ásɛ peujena la saŋ kaa mɔɔ. Dɛ Finiks legbɔɔ la chɔɔ kɛ korobifale guri aa do gɛ la, asɛ o harɛ la nyoa bɛl sie chagɛ wee cholibɔr dig pera, asɛ bɛl ge chagɛ wee cholibɔr gal pera.
44027013	A ta bigre dɛ peujega bɛl tao le wekaŋle harɛ bɔr dɛɛ ba, asɛ ba lii kɛ baa wonoo kaa gɛ ba fe aa liira wubwa la. Ba laa ba stiimae la buni baa kpɔa do nee bini dɛ gel stiimae la ɛɛ che la kpɔ dɛ fɛrɛ Kret harɛ dɛɛ kaa.
44027014	A ta bigre bɛlbwa asɛ bela peuchɔge bɛl o yon le wee leebɔr gal pera dɛɛ ba la ir kpegri nɛ, dɛ le Kret harɛ dɛ ta dɛɛ ba mpo ta.
44027015	Peu la aa taa dɛ ba lɔ yaa la, ya lawɛ ya stiimae la nyoa kahonɛ. Dɛ stiimae la aa wone dɛɛ kaa sie kpa, dɛ den dɛɛ kaa bela peu la aa taa chagɛ la.
44027016	Ya baa tel ekwi bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Kaoda la wekaŋle harɛ bɔr, asɛ o tɔ yaa bɔr peu la be tama, kɛ dɛ o ta dɛ vuugi yaa te. Ya bwara nyɛgɔ mɔɔ ba ta won gɔɔ gberjega waa pɛl ya stiimae la dɛ do ya stiimae la bini, dɛ kwaa stiimae la vɔrɔwɛ kɛrɛdɛ. Ba chweeh stiimae la ŋwɛɛra aa lɔ o keŋkeŋni la, asɛ a hamɛ kiŋkiŋ. Dɛ kechɛ bɛl lɔ bela baa yerɔ Siritis, asɛ baa ɔmɛ kɛŋɔ peu la ɛɛ tag baa kaa bela asɛ ba ka bela. Anomanta ba ba stiimae la yajen la aa lɔ o doa la ne harɛ, asɛ peu la tag ba dɛɛ kaa.
44027018	Tɔ aa pera la, dɛ peu la ta dɛ ta kohona. Anomanta ba pa stiimae la bini bone ane vigri ásɛ o fɛgre.
44027019	Tɔ aa pera ja la, ba gbagba pa stiimae la laala ane ta.
44027020	Tɔpera aŋwɛnɛ bwa dɛ yaa wee na, yaa weweela ge na, asɛ peu la ge na dɛɛ ta kpegri nɛɛ gɛ. Ate dɛ yaa ya nyuune te waa lii kɛŋɔ yaa ɛ nɛraa kpa.
44027021	Baa lɔ gbera la bini bigri baa wola kondikwaa dii la, Pɔɔl iro che dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Yabala, maa ŋɔa ya bɛ Kret le la, a chɛ kɛ he fe no n kon ta. Laala aa chɔga ne anɔ la haa paa ta nɔ, a fe ta gɛ balɛ.
44027022	Kɛ he bɛ ɔmɛ. He bɛlbwa aa sewa ba. Stiimae nɔ gboo dɛɛ ba chɔga.
44027023	Wee la aa gela n ŋɔ gɛ laanee kɛ, dɛ jwaana ne la, Korowii waa dɔɔ mɛ dɛ gel mɛɛ ɛ o toma la, o torome ba n be,
44027024	dɛ ba ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, 'Pɔɔl, bɛ ɔmɛ! Hɛɛ la Koojen Siisa bee. Nɛra la bwa he ne baa dɛ valɛ nɔ, Korowii noɔ tɛɛ. Wɛɛ lɛɛ baa.' "
44027025	Pɔɔl aa bol gɛ la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Anomanta he bɛ ɔmɛ, dɛkalkɛ n dɛ yarada Korowii. N jemɔ kɛŋɔ gɛ waa bola la, gɛɛ aa ba ɛɛ.
44027026	Kɛ peu nɔ ɛɛ tagɛ yaa ka ta ekwi harɛ bɛl ta."
44027027	Tɔpere waa teŋa fi dɛ anaarɛ la harambaŋa ne la, dɛ peu la ta dɛ tagɛ yaa gɛ. Dɛ ya lɔ mpo la baa dɛ yerɔ Mɛdetɛreenia la ta. Dɛ stiimae la tom-ɛɛra la liire ɛɛ ba kɛŋɔ ya ken dɛ tel harɛ bɛl ta.
44027028	Anomanta ba magɛ nee la dɛ na kɛŋɔ o luŋri tel nagale fifraanaarɛ. Aa ɛ tama la, ba berɔ magɛ na ja, dɛ na kɛŋɔ o luŋri tel nagale fifraatoro.
44027029	Dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ kɛŋɔ ya stiimae la ɛɛ chuge bwea anee dɛ pegri, dɛ koh a waa gɔɔ o bune anaarɛ bwa do nee ta stiimae la mun ta. Dɛ ba dɛ soŋe Korowii ŋɔ bɔ́r chaah warane.
44027030	Ate dɛ stiimae tom-ɛɛra la fe dɛ nyin bɔr dɛ le o bini dɛ chwa. Ba pur o gberjega la do nee ta, dɛ teŋe nyosone ŋɔ ba fe dɛ la ka kpɔ stiimae la sie dɛ́ ka tɛr o bune ŋwɛɛra ane do nee ta.
44027031	Belaa Pɔɔl ŋɔ soojanomoa la ne soojare la be ŋɔ, "Dɛ stiimae tom-ɛɛra nɔ ta o bini sogaa, he bɛlbwa aa he nyuu dɔ."
44027032	Asɛ soojare la chaa ŋwɛɛra aa vɔwɛ gberjega la pɛl stiimae la, dɛ gel o kaa.
44027033	Tomun aa ba dɛ kpɔ la, Pɔɔl soŋ ba ŋɔ bá bwa di kwa, dɛ ŋɔ, "He tɔpera fi dɛ anaarɛɛ nɔ he tea bini aa chɔga he so dɛɛ kpa waa aa dɛ ba chiga, haa wola kwaa dii.
44027034	N poo heya, hé di kwaa tama, dɛ́ won yo lɛ he nyuune. Haa waa nɔ nyoa kae ba. Wobɛlbwa aa he bɛlbwa ɛɛ ba."
44027035	Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, o kpɔ paanoo dɛ jam Korowii ba bwa siwi ta, dɛ mɔn dɛ di.
44027036	Waa ɛ gɛ la, ba bambile ba harɛ, asɛ ba dɔ gbemba dɛ won di kwa.
44027037	Dɛ ya bwa lɔ nɛra lafraanɛ fifraanuanɛ dɛ nɛra banumɛl.
44027038	Yaa di kwaa vagre gɛ yaa dɛ nyin la, ba gɔɔ kwaa baa kpɔa dɛɛ ɛ paanoo la ta nee ta, ásɛ stiimae la do fɛgre.
44027039	Tɔ aa pera la, stiimae tom-ɛɛra ta wone jemɛ harɛ la yiso baa tel o ta. Ba na legbɔjen bɛl, dɛ na o nyoa bwea ne hɛŋle, dɛ ɛ ba liire kɛŋɔ dɛ aa magroo waa, baa kpɔ stiimae laanee chagɛ legbɔɔ la ta.
44027040	Ba chaa stiimae la bune la do nee bini. Dɛ ba fa vɔwɛ stiimae la ŋwandaa ge dɛɛ pɛlo, kɛ ba pur o ge dɛ pagri stiimae la sie yatɔg waa sagɛ nyundua la, asɛ peu tagɛ stiimae la dɛɛ la bela o sie aa chaga la, dɛ tagɔ ka chuge.
44027041	Stiimae la kaa chuge hɛŋle ane ta asɛ o sie la karɛ che a ta dɛ kaa kahonɛ. Waa chegɛ bobeŋkpoŋ gɛ la, dɛ nehaŋma dɛ lɔ o habɔɔ la kohona. Nehaŋma la pagre o habɔɔ la bwa.
44027042	Soojare la fe vɔrɔwɔ ŋɔ baa kpoo nɛra baa do ba dea dɛɛ kaa ba ne laanee, dɛ ŋɔ a waa laa aa, baa wa nee le dɛ chwa kaa.
44027043	Dɛ ba nomoa la aa Pɔɔl kpoe nyin dɛ koh o waa ŋɔ bá gel ba. O gelɔ nɛra baa jemɛ nee la tɔ sie le nee dɛ wa kaa baŋ,
44027044	asɛ ba kar la dawɛ dapɛgre ne stiimae la pugrere ta dɛ wa le. Kenii ya bwa ɛ dɛ le.
44028001	Ya le nee la baŋ, dɛ le ya siswɛm la nyoa mɔɔ dɛ ta no kɛŋɔ gɛ ekwi harɛ la sɔne Mɔlta.
44028002	Bela tena nyiŋi yaa kɛrɛdɛ. Yaa dena jo bela dɛ bwaala dɛ nɛ asɛ waa do le kohona, asɛ ba mar nii tɛ yaa ya ŋwee.
44028003	Pɔɔl nyin daa ane ŋɔ ó kpɔ ba do nii la ta. Jaah harɛkon lɔ daa la ta. Waa doa nii ta bɔwɔb lawɛ harɛkon la la, o leɔ dɛ chogo, dɛ ka sagɛ o nɔn ta.
44028004	Bela tena la aa na harɛkon la Pɔɔl nɔn ta saga la, dɛ ba dɛ bol dɔŋa be ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ magaa kpo nɛn! Na waa le seo nyoa mpo ta asɛ o wechɔga taa ti o luge gɛ!"
44028005	Pɔɔl mer harɛkon la ta nii la ta. O choga la ta on wobɛlbwa ɛɛ.
44028006	Dɛ bela tena la te sogo dɛɛ nyiŋi kɛŋɔ Pɔɔl nɔn la ɛɛ ɔrɔɔ, dɛ ŋɔ gɛ laa ge aa, wɛɛ choloo bug ta dɛ sewɛ. Baa soga dɛɛ nyiŋu kɛŋɔ wɛɛ sewɔɔ waa wola sewɛ wobɛlbwa aa wola on ɛɛ la, ba berɔ ŋɔ vog bɛlee ken berɛ nɛn ba ba be la.
44028007	Dɛ nomoa waa dɛ nyiŋi bela harɛ la ta sɔne Publius. Dɛ on dɔ harɛre aa lɔ ba jwɛɛh bela la te bwa. O lɛ yaa dɛ nyiŋi yaa kɛrɛdɛ tɔpera atoro.
44028008	Dɛ Publius mɛɛ bwara wɔrɔbɔ asɛ o chɔ. Dɛ o dɛ feege ge. Pɔɔl jo o be dea dɛ kpɔ nɔɔra dawɛ o nɛ, dɛ soŋe Korowii tɛo, asɛ o gbaŋre.
44028009	Gɛ waa nɔ aa ɛa la, bela tena ba bwara aa dɛ wee ba la ba Pɔɔl be, asɛ o soŋe Korowii tɛɛ ba ba gbaŋre.
44028010	Ba kɛ yaa kwaa pirim. Yaa dɛ ba stiimae ta joe dɛ kaa la, ba tɛ yaa laala aa chɛ kɛ ya dɔ mɔɔ dɛ le la bwa.
44028011	Ya di korobie atoro bela mɔɔ dɛ dɔ Alɛksandrea tena stiimae bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Vogkpara la bini jo. Peujen saŋ aa tela la, stiimae la tena baa so Mɔlta ásɛ peujena tonɛ mɔɔ ba le.
44028012	Yaa lea la, ya kaa chog bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Serakius la, dɛ di tɔpera atoro.
44028013	Ya le bela dɛ la bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Rɛgeɔm la. Tɔ aa pera la, dɛ peu bɛl tao le wekaŋle harɛ bɔr dɛɛ ba. Tɔpera anɛɛ ya di ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ tel bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Puteoli la.
44028014	Dɛ asɔre tena bane lɔ bela dɛ ŋɔ yá di yawanyoa ba be mɔɔ dɛ kaa. Belaa ya le dɛ ba Room.
44028015	Room asɔre tena aa no ya waa la, ba baa cheme yaa Apius Yawa ta ne bela baa dɛ yerɛ Deene Atoro la bɔr. Pɔɔl aa na ba la, o bambile ba harɛ, asɛ o jam Korowii.
44028016	Waa ba Room la, ba tɛo o gbo dea, dɛ gel sooja beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ daahno.
44028017	Pɔɔl aa di tɔpera atoro Room la, o yerɛ bela Juda tena nomonome bwa cheme dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Yabala, n ta ya bwɛɛ tena wobɛlbwa ɛɛ, n ta ya naanar waa baa dɛ ɛ la bɛlbwa nɛɛ joɛ, asɛ ba lag mɛ Jerusalam dɛ kpɔ mɛ tɛ Room tena ba tɔ mɛ dea la.
44028018	Ba ge aa nyiŋi n waa bini la, dɛ ba fe dɛ nyin n tae, dɛkalkɛ dɛ wobɛlbwa ta chaglɛ kɛŋɔ bá kpo mɛ gɛ ya bwɛɛ tena aa chagla la.
44028019	Baa ŋɔa bá ta mɛ la, ya bwɛɛ tena ta sɛɛh kwaraa, asɛ n koh a waa ŋɔ amɔ te bá tel n ne Room Koojen Siisa sie ó ka nyiŋi a ta. Kasinteŋ, dɛ anɔ laa aa, n ne ya bwɛɛ tena ta wobɛlbwa dɔe.
44028020	A waa n ŋɔ a chɛ kɛ n na heya, asɛ dɛ kpɔ bil he sie, dɛkalkɛ nɛn Juda tena bwa aa dɛ hwɛgɛ o nɛɛ kɛŋɔ wɛɛ ba lɛ yaa la waa ba lag mɛ dɛ do kwaa n nɔɔra nɔ."
44028021	Anee Juda tena la ŋɔ, "Ya bwɛɛ Judia harɛ tena ta yaa tɔn bɛlbwa chwerɛ dɛ bagle he wobɛlbwa ya be. Yabala baa le ya bwɛɛ dɛɛ ba bonɔ nɔ ge bɛlbwa ta he wechɔge bɛlbwa bolɛ ya no.
44028022	Yaa no he nyoa wobolee, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ he ŋwɛnɛfale nɔ haa kpɔ o ta dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii nɔ te, baa o waa nyin bobɛlbwa."
44028023	Ba tɛo tɔpere baa kpɔ ba no o nyoa wobol. Tɔpere la aa tela la, ba ba o be pirim o dea bela. Pɔɔl le chɔɔ dɛ bag ba Korowii Kora waa ka tel jwaana. O bol Yeesu wa, dɛ lii ba waa Mosis ne Korowii keamere faa chwera Korowii Tɔn bini la bwa, dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin kɛ ba sɛh ŋɔ Yeesu waa ba faa chwerɛ la.
44028024	Nɛra la bane yarada o waa la, bane ge ta an yaradae.
44028025	Pɔɔl bol waa tonɛ asɛ baa ba pegra. Dɛ ba bwa liire ta beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ, baa tɔŋle dɔŋa. O berɔ bol webeŋkpoŋ ja, mɔɔ ba bwa pegre. O waa waa bola laanee kɛŋɔ, "Korowii Domadɛɛge chegɛ o keame Aesaya nɛɛ bol waa ya naanar be, dɛ kpelaa o ŋɔ. O bolɔ ŋɔ,
44028026	'Ka ŋɔ nɛra la be ŋɔ: Hɛɛ noo kohona, kɛ haa a mun noe ba. Hɛɛ nyiŋuu kohona, kɛ haa a jema ba.
44028027	Dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛra nɔ bambile kpegri, ba kpɔ nɔɔra tɔɔge deŋna, dɛ tɔɔge ba sibie ge. Dɛ a waa laa aa, ba sie fe ɛɛ nao, asɛ ba deŋna no, asɛ ba jemɛ a mun, dɛ charɛ ba liire asɛ n lɛɛ ba.' "
44028028	Pɔɔl berɔ ŋɔ, "Anomanta, hé no. Korowii waa aa dɛ ba nɛwɛnyini lɛɛ la, o berɔ kpɔa tɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la, dɛkalkɛ ban dɛɛ ba o be noe."
44028029	Pɔɔl aa bol waa tonɛ la, ba leɔ dɛɛ kaa dɛɛ tɔŋle dɔŋa kohona.
44028030	Pɔɔl hane dea dɛ so o bini bene anɛ. Dɛ nɛra dɛ ba o be. O ta ba bɛlbwa berɛ.
44028031	Dɛ o dɛ bagle nɛra Korowii Kora wa, dɛ kpɔ bansua dɛɛ bagle ya Dɔɔ Yeesu wa. Nomɛlbwa ta on ŋwɛnɛ tɔe.
45001001	Men Pɔɔl maa ɛ Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔ la, men chwerɛ tɔn nɔ. Korowiirii lee mɛ dɛ gel n ɛ Yeesu torome, dɛ kpɔ o Amanesoma tɛ mɛ ŋɔ mɛ́ɛ bol nɛra be.
45001002	A gɛ Amanesoma nɔ waa o che o keamere waa lee ba nɛɛ dɛ bagɛ nɛwɛnyini nyoa a saŋ la la. A waa ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini la.
45001003	Korowii Bie Yeesu Kristo waa ɛ ya Dɔɔ la, o waa Amanesoma la ɛɛ bagle. O nɛwɛnyini ɛɛ be pera la, Kooro Devid deaa o le,
45001004	asɛ o Korowii ɛɛ ge be pera la, Korowii chegɛ o seo ta ira la ta dɛ bagle kpegri ne kɛŋɔ o Korowii Biee on.
45001005	O nɛɛ Korowii che dɛ sune n nɛ, dɛ cha mɛ, dɛ gel mɛɛ ɛ Yeesu toma dɛɛ bagle nɛwɛnyini te bwa o waa ásɛ ba yaradaa dɛɛ ɛa, ásɛ o dɔ sɔn.
45001006	He Room tena ge ja a gɛ nɛra nɔ Korowii aa lee ba ŋɔ bá ba ɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛra nɔ nɛ.
45001007	He Room tena Korowii aa dɛ nyin heyaa dɛ le heyaa ŋɔ hé ba ɛ o nɛra la, he bwaa mɛɛ chwerɛ tɔn nɔ. Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo bwa na he sum dɛ cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
45001008	Mɛɛ tɔ sie che Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ jam N Naa Korowii he waa kɛŋɔ haa yarada Yeesu Kristo waa nɔ kohona, asɛ nɛra bwa ɛɛ bol he waa nɔ.
45001009	Korowii maa dɛ tomɔ n bambile bwa ne, dɛɛ bol o Bie la Amanesoma waa la, o jemɔ kɛ saŋ bɛlbwaa n soŋo dɛɛ tɛ heya. Onee n danseɛ te.
45001010	N dɛ soŋo kɛŋɔ dɛ o sɛoh waa, ń fe won ba na heyaa taraken te.
45001011	N sie chegɛ chiŋ mɛɛ nyin kɛ n na heyaa dɛ cha heyaa waane Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa tɛ mɛ ne, ásɛ he do kpegri he teŋa haa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ la ta.
45001012	Ya bwaa dɛɛ ba dɔŋa chae. Gɛ maa yarada Yeesu Kristo la, aa do heyaa gbembaa, asɛ gɛ he ge aa yaradao la do n ge gbemba.
45001013	Yabalawa, n dɛ nyin kɛ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ saŋ bɛlbwaa n fe ɛɛ nyin kɛ n ba he be, asɛ waa yon dɛɛ tɔ mɛ ŋwɛnɛ. N dɛ nyin n dɔ he bane dɛ tɛ Yeesu Kristo kɛŋɔ maa dɔ bane le nɛra ba ge aa wola Juda tena ɛɛ bini la.
45001014	A chɛ kɛ n bol Yeesu Amanesoma la nɛra bwa be, nɛra baa kaa sie ne banɔ la baa ka mun, nɛra ba sie aa pila ne banɔ la ba sie aa wola pile bwa be.
45001015	Anomanta n siwi swɛɛrɔ mɛɛ nyin kɛ n bol Yeesu Amanesoma la he Room tena ge be.
45001016	Sihiih aa men kpo Yeesu Amanesoma nɔ bola ta. A taa Korowii che dɛɛ bagle o kpegri, dɛɛ lɛ nɛra bwa baa yarada o waa la. Juda tenaa ó tɔ sie lɛ, nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ ge jao.
45001017	Yeesu Amanesoma laanee dɛɛ bagle gɛ Korowii aa dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ nɛwɛnyini do ásɛ ya waa su o siwi. Le waa la mumpar ka tel a jaga bwa, o waa yaradae waa gboo a bwa. Korowii Tɔn baglɔ kɛŋɔ, "Naate o wa aa togra dɛ su Korowii siwi la, wɛɛ yaradao dɛ dɔ o nyu."
45001018	Korowii baah di nɛra ba wechɔga aa tɔ o kasinteŋ waa la ŋwɛnɛ asɛ a sɔɔh ba la nɛ. O baah dɛ di ba wechɔga la ta kɛrɛdɛ.
45001019	Korowii wobɛlbwa nɛwɛnyini aa wona jemɛ la, o gelɔ ba naa chasee ken. O gbagbaa pili a bini bag ba.
45001020	Dɛ le gɛ saŋ Korowii aa ta harɛ la, o bwara waa nɛwɛnyini aa wola wone dɛɛ na siwi ne, kɛŋɔ o kpegri aa wola jaga dɔe ne o dor bwa, o gelɔ nɛwɛnyini na a bwa. Nɛwɛnyini wono che Korowii kwaa waa taa ta dɛ na o kpegri ne gɛ waa doa. Anomanta nɛwɛnyini aa won ŋɔ baa jemɛ kɛ Korowii lole.
45001021	Nɛwɛnyini jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii lole, kɛ baa on duu gɛ aa chɛ kɛ baa duuru. Baa jam kpɔe dɛɛ tɛo. Nɛwɛnyini wechɔga gelɔ ba wili, ba ta liire dɔe kpa.
45001022	Ba dɛ yerɛ ba te wejerema, kɛ gɛna gee ban.
45001023	Korowii te aa sewɛ bwa. Kɛ ba vɛh o toma, dɛɛ tomɛ kwaa ba gbagba aa kwaara a do kɛŋɔ nɛwɛnyini, kɛɛ jumbii, kɛɛ konaatena, kɛɛ kontuuga la.
45001024	Anomanta Korowii ta ba waa tɛɛ ba, asɛ baa ɛ wedoŋa ba bambile aa lawa, dɛɛ chɔ baala ne haahna aa wola Korowii ŋwɛnɛ ta ɛɛ.
45001025	Ba gel Korowii kasinteŋ la toma dɛɛ tomɛ kwaa aa wola kasinteŋ dɔe. Kwaa Korowii aa taa la, anee baa tomɛ, dɛ gel Korowii gbagba. On chɛ kɛ yaa duuru saŋ bɛlbwa. Aamen.
45001026	Ba ken ɛɛ nomanta, Korowii ta ba waa tɛɛ ba, asɛ baa ɛ ba pɛla waa aa ɛ sihiih kohona. Ba haahna kwaraa ne baala aa chɔ kpa, ba ne ba dɔŋa haahnaa dɛɛ chɔ baa ne haah.
45001027	Gɛɛ ba baala ge ne haahna aa wola chɔ kpa, dɛ berɛ dɛɛ pɛlɛ ba bandɔŋa nɛɛ kɛŋɔ haahna ken. Ba ne ba dɔŋa baalaa dɛɛ chɔ baa ne haah. Ba wechɔga baa dɛ ɛ la nomanta, ba dɛ dɔ a kembɔr aa chɔg ba nɛndaa.
45001028	Baa wola sɛɛh kɛŋɔ bá jemɛ Korowii waa nomanta, o ta ba waa tɛɛ ba, asɛ ba liire bwa ɛ anchɔga, asɛ baa ɛ waa aa wola chɛɛ kɛ baa ɛ.
45001029	Harɛ bini wechɔga nɔ bwaa baa ɛ: mur, sibegra, meesɔɔh, bɔweela, nɛŋkpoa, nagra, dɔŋa negra, dɔŋa haeh, ne nɛra ŋwala.
45001030	Baa dɔŋa wedɛɛga bol, ba hah Korowii, ba siwi aa nɛn tɔgɛ, ba jenu, ba mbarafo. Saŋ bɛlbwaa baa nyin ŋwɛnɛfala dɛ́ ɛ wechɔga. Ba siwi aa ba mɛɛnanar ne ba nyare su.
45001031	Ba nya nfɛrɛ, ba waa ta kasinteŋ dɔe, ba chal toole dɔŋa nɛ, ba tea aa nɛn nɛɛ domɛ.
45001032	Ba jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii ŋɔ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ ken la, ba chɛ kpoe, kɛ dɛ ge ta na dɛɛ ɛa, dɛ garɛ dɛɛ kpɛɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɛa la.
45002001	He naate haa dɛ pwah he dɔŋ, he ta wobɛlbwa dɔe dɛ́ bol dɛ́ lɛ he te kpa. Henee ume noo, haa dɛ pwah he dɔŋ dɛ berɛ dɛɛ ɛ o wechɔga waa dɛ ɛ la dɔŋa la, dɛ he gbagbaa hɛɛ pa bolchɔge la.
45002002	Nɛn ɛ wechɔga nɔ dɔŋa aa, Korowii dɛ pao bolchɔge. O te, a ŋwɛnɛ taa wɛɛ pa nɛwɛnyini bolchɔge.
45002003	Kɛ he te, waa haa dɛ pwah nɛra a waa la, anee he gee ɛ. He dɛ lii kɛŋɔ Korowii aa he te waa bola ba dɛ pa bole kɛɛ?
45002004	Waa nɔ bwaa Korowii ta tea dɛɛ ɛ heya, dɛɛ tɛ heyaa sisɔna dɛɛ lawɛ bambile nɔ bwa ásɛ he charɛ he liire dɛ le he wechɔga ta. Kɛ haa o wedɛɛga nɔ bu, dɛɛ nyiŋa pɛɛ.
45002005	He deŋne kpegri. Haa gelɛ he tea bini ɛɛ chɔg he wechɔga wa. He gelɔ Korowii bwaawee ɛɛ do kan he nɛɛ tɔpere bɛlbwa. Awola waa ba pa bole kasinteŋ ne la, o baah nɛɛ di he nɛɛ taeh.
45002006	Gɛ nomɛlbwa we-ɛɛla aa doa la, anee wɛɛ ba nyiŋa dɛ bol o waa dɛ pa bole.
45002007	Nɛra baa dɛ nyin jirima Korowii be, dɛɛ nyin kɛ Korowii kpɛɛ ba, dɛɛ nyin mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe, dɛ koh a waa dɛ lawɛ bambile dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga saŋ bɛlbwa la, Korowii ɛɛ tɛɛ baa mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa.
45002008	Nɛra baa dɛ ɛ ba tetoowa, baa wola Korowii waa aa ɛ kasinteŋ ta teŋɛ, dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga la, Korowii bwaawee ɛɛ ir ba nɛɛ taeh.
45002009	Nɛra baa dɛ ɛ wechɔga la, ba bwara ɛɛ nyɛgoo taeh, aa noo baa taeh. Juda tenaa dɛ tɔ sie na bonyɛga a noo ba, nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la ge jao.
45002010	Asɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga la, Korowii ɛɛ geloo ba dɔ jirima, dɛ kpɛɛ ba, dɛ tɛɛ ba bambisɔɔhna. Juda tenaa dɛ tɔ sie na anɔ bwa, nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la ge jao.
45002011	Korowii aa nomɛlbwa waa nyin gwaa bɛl.
45002012	Nɛra baa wola Mmara Korowii aa kpɔa tɛ Mosis la jemɛ dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga la, baa sewɔɔ. Kɛ Mosis Mmara la ta laa Korowii ɛɛ ba nyiŋa dɛ bol ba waa dɛ pa bole. Banɔ la baa jemɛ Mmara la la, Mmara la taa Korowii ɛɛ ba nyiŋa dɛ bol ba waa dɛ pa bole.
45002013	Maa dɛ bol nɔ, Mmara nɔ noe laa gela nɛn ɛɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa ɛɛ su Korowii siwi. Mmara la ta teŋaa gela nɛn ɛɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa ɛɛ su Korowii siwi.
45002014	Nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la, baa Mosis Mmara la jemɛ. Kɛ saŋ bɛlbwa ba gbagba aa kpɔ ba nyu bini nfɛrɛ dɛ ɛ gɛ Mmara la aa dɛ bagle la, dɛ ba nyu bini nfɛrɛ la ɛ mmara tɛɛ ba. Kɛ a fe lole kɛŋɔ baa Mosis Mmara la jemɛ te.
45002015	Ba we-ɛɛla chaglɔ kɛŋɔ waa Mosis Mmara la aa dɛ bagle la lɔ ba bambile bini. Ba liire gba dɛ di danseɛ gɛ waa nɔ ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a tel ane ta naa, ba gbagba liire yon ɛɛ ba kɛŋɔ ba ɛ wechɔga, ane ge ta ba gbagba liire yon ɛɛ ba kɛŋɔ ba ɛ wedɛɛga.
45002016	Waa nɔ bwaa dɛɛ ba ɛɛ awola Korowii aa dɛ ba nɛra wechɔga baa ɛa dɛɛ sɔh la ne bochaah lee asɛ Yeesu Kristo pa bole la ta. Gɛɛ me Amanesoma la ɛɛ bagle.
45002017	Asɛ he naate haa dɛ yerɛ he te Juda te, dɛ kpɔ he sie dawɛ Mosis Mmara la ta dɛ kpɔ Korowii dɛɛ ta nyoa la ge sɛh?
45002018	He jemɛ gɛ Korowii aa dɛ nyin kɛ hɛɛ ɛ, dɛ jemɛ Mmara la, dɛ jemɛ waa aa wera bwa.
45002019	Kɛ he dɛ yerɛ he te nɛn waa jemɛ waa dɛɛ bagle nɛra baa wola wobɛlbwa jemɔɔ? Kɛ he ŋɔ henee ɛ nii dɛɛ chaah nɛra baa lɔ biro ta laɔ?
45002020	Wejema bwa ne Korowii wobɛlbwa lɔ Mmara la bini, anomanta he kpɔ he te kɛ wejereme dɛɛ bagle gɛna ne bamuge wa.
45002021	Haa dɛ bagle he dɔŋa waa nɔ, ɛrɛɛ haa wola won bagle he te gbagba ɔ? Haa dɛ ŋɔ nɛra be ŋɔ ba bɛ dɛɛ ŋwɛ asɛ dɛ te dɛɛ ŋwɛ nɔ sɛh?
45002022	He tenten nɔ, he ŋɔ nɛra bɛ ba bala haahna ne ba bala jaranar dɛɛ nyin. He gbagba, haa gɛ ɛa? He ŋɔ he kii voga, heyaa gee bera dɛɛ ŋwɛ kwaa a deene bini.
45002023	Heyaa kpɔ Mmara la dɛɛ ta nyoa, heyaa gee wola a ta teŋɛ, asɛ nɛra koh he we-ɛɛla waa dɛɛ ɛ Korowii nɛnhɛla.
45002024	Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, "He Juda tenaa gela nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la siwi sa Korowii la."
45002025	He dɛ teŋɛ Mmara la ta naa, dɛ he pena teŋa nɔ dɔ mun. Kɛ dɛ haa Mmara la ta teŋaa, ate he fe gel he pena teŋa bɔ.
45002026	Nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ baa wola ba pena teŋe la, ba dɛ teŋɛ Mmara la ta naa, haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ lɛɛ baa kɛŋɔ nɛra baa teŋe ba pena aa?
45002027	He Juda tena te jemɛ Mmara nɔ dɛɛ teŋe he pena, kɛ he bane aa Mmara la ta teŋɛ. Asɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la ge, baa ba pena teŋe, kɛ ba bini bane dɛ teŋɛ Mmara la ta. Ba we-ɛɛla ɛɛ geloo Korowii pa heyaa bolchɔge.
45002028	Nɛn waa ɛ Juda te, wobɛlbwa aa wola toole dɛɛ bagle kɛ o ɛ Juda te dɛ ja o pen teŋa gbo ta la, Juda te tenten laa on. Penteŋa dɔ mun.
45002029	Waa aa dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ nɛn ɛ Juda te tenten la, bambile binii a do. Korowii Domadɛɛge laanee dɛɛ ba toma ɛɛ he bambile bini ásɛ he won ɛ Juda te tenten. Mmara bɛlbwa aa gɛ bambile nɔ tɛ. Nɛn Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa chao asɛ o bambile bini waa ɛɛ bagle kɛŋɔ o ɛ Korowii nɛn la, nɛwɛnyini laa dɛɛ ba o kpɛɛra, Korowiirii dɛɛ ba o kpɛɛra.
45003001	Dɛ kenii a do aa, dɛ ɛrɛ gwaalaa ya Juda tena gwaa he nɛra haa wola Juda tena ɛɛ yɔ? Dɛ bɔkwa tɔnɔɔ lɔ ya penteŋa ta nɔ?
45003002	Ya Juda tena na som taeh dɛ gwaa nɛra baa kaa la ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta. Anɔ la aa tɔ sie laanee kɛŋɔ yanee Korowii tɔ sie kpɔ o waa bagle.
45003003	Amɔ dɛ ya bini bane ta Korowii yaradae yaa, wɛɛ koh a waa asɛ o waa aa yaradaa dɔa?
45003004	Akai! Dɛ nɛwɛnyini bwa ɛ nyosonteŋna kwara naa, Korowii te wa ɛɛ dɔ kasinteŋii saŋ bɛlbwa. Anee Korowii Tɔn la bol la. O bagle Korowii waa ŋɔ, "He wobol ɛɛ bagloo kɛŋɔ he dɔ kasinteŋ. Hɛɛ dɛɛ di bole he waa taa."
45003005	Nɛwɛnyini te ɛɛ ŋɔɔ, "Dɛ a chegɛ ya wechɔga ta asɛ nɛra na kɛŋɔ Korowii ɛ nɛndɛɛge aa, amɔ ya ta wedɛɛga ɛɛ kɛɛ? Dɛ Korowii tɛr ya deŋne aa, dɛ o waa tograa?" Nɛwɛnyini liiree nɔ!
45003006	Kɛ gɛ laa a do. Dɛ Korowii waa ta tograa, ɛrɛɛ wɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ te won bol nɛwɛnyini waa dɛ pa bole ɔ?
45003007	Nomɛl gee pɛɛroo ŋɔ, "Aah dɛ a chegɛ n nyosone ta asɛ nɛra na kɛŋɔ Korowii dɔ kasinteŋ, o dɔ sɔn aa, dɛ n nyosone la ɛ wechɔga ja aa?"
45003008	Amɔ yáa ɛ wechɔga ásɛ wedɛɛga le a ta kɛɛ? Nɛra bane chɔg n sɔn, ba haŋɛ n nyoa ŋɔ n dɛ ŋɔ a gɛ waa nɔ ɛɛ ta wechɔga ɛɛ. Korowii ɛɛ tɛr ba deŋnee, dɛ a ŋwɛnɛ ta gee.
45003009	Taraken nɔ, ŋwɛnɛ besoo taa ya Juda tena gwaa he nɛra haa wola Juda tena ɛɛ yɔ? Ya ta heyaa gwaalɛ. N fa baglɔ kɛŋɔ ya Juda tena ne he nɛra haa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la, ya bwa ɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra.
45003010	Anee Korowii Tɔn la ŋɔ la. O baglɔ ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa toole dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa ɛɛ su Korowii siwi. Nɛmbeŋkpoŋ kwaraa toole.
45003011	Nomɛlbwa toole dɛ jemɛ wa, nomɛlbwa toole dɛɛ nyin Korowii bɔr dɛ́ tomɔ.
45003012	Ba bwa berɛ habɔɔ kpo Korowii, dɛ bwa berɛ nɛnsale. Ba bɛlbwa aa wedɛɛga ɛ. Nɛmbeŋkpoŋ kwaraa toole.
45003013	Ba nyoa wobol doŋo, a sɔɔh. Nyosone gboo ba bwa. Gɛ domkpule domɛ nɛn dɛ o kpoo bug ta la, gɛɛ a gɛ nɛra nɔ ge kpɔ ba nyoa wobol dɛɛ chɔg nɛra.
45003014	Wobochɔga gboo su ba nyoo.
45003015	Ba gbaŋre nɛŋkpoa waa ta.
45003016	Bobɛlbwa baa dɛ la la, waa gboo baa chɔg, dɛɛ ɛ nɛra hɔhɔrɔwa.
45003017	Waa aa gela nɛn bambile ɛɛ sɔɔhno la te, baa an jemɛ.
45003018	Baa Korowii ge ɔmɛ."
45003019	Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ waa Mmara la aa dɛ bagle la, nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ Mmara la ta laanee Mmara la ɛɛ bagle, asɛ nomɛlbwa bɛ won dɔ wobɛlbwa dɛ bol Korowii sie, ásɛ o won bol nomɛlbwa waa dɛ pa bole.
45003020	Maa dɛ ŋɔ nɔ, Mmara ta teŋa aa won gel nomɛlbwa we-ɛɛla su Korowii siwi bwa. Mmara la toma bwaa kɛŋɔ ó gel nɛwɛnyini jemɛ kɛŋɔ ya ɛ wechɔga.
45003021	Korowii gelɔ ya jemɛ ŋwɛnɛ la ta aa chega ya wa ɛɛ su o siwi. Mmara ta teŋa ta laa a che. Mosis Mmara la ne Korowii keamere tɔne di danseɛ gɛ ŋwɛnɛ nɔ ta.
45003022	Yeesu Kristo yaradae taa a che nɛra wa ɛɛ su Korowii siwi. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ yarada Yeesu waa la, o waa dɛ su Korowii siwi, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛwɛnyini bwa beŋkpoŋ Korowii be.
45003023	Nɛwɛnyini bwa ɛ wechɔga, ya bɛlbwa ta gɛ Korowii fe aa dɛ nyin o maŋkura yaa la chɛɛ.
45003024	Yeesu Kristo yawɛ yaa o chal ne. A waa ya wa ɛɛ su Korowii siwi. O nɛn sum nae kohona waa o ɛ gɛ tɛ yaa pɛɛpɛɛ la.
45003025	Korowiirii le Yeesu Kristo ŋɔ ó ba fuge o chal ta dɛ soŋe ya wechɔga ásɛ o bandia le nɛra baa yarada Yeesu Kristo seo waa la nɛ. Korowiirii fa saahna ɛ gɛ dɛ bagle kɛ o waa togrɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a saŋ la, nɛra aa dɛ ɛ wechɔga la, o laa sie kpɔ ba be. A fe chɛ kɛ o tɛr nɛwɛnyini deŋne, kɛ o lawɛ bambile.
45003026	Taraken waa gela Yeesu Kristo koh ya wechɔga waa dɛ sewɛ nɔ, o baglɔ kɛŋɔ o waa togrɔ. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ yarada Yeesu dɛ kpɔ o te tɛo la, Korowii gelɔ o ɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa ɛɛ su o siwi.
45003027	Aa do gɛ nɔ, ya dɔ ŋwɛnɛ kɛŋɔ ya ta nyoa aa? Ya ta ŋwɛnɛ dɔe. Ɛrɛ taa a che yaa wola won ta nyoa nɔɔ? Mmara ta teŋa ta laa a che. Yeesu Kristo yaradae laanee tɔ gɛ waa nɔ bwa ŋwɛnɛ,
45003028	dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya sɛoh kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo yaradae taa a che Korowii gel nɛn ɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa ɛɛ su o siwi. Mmara ta teŋa aa gelɛ nɛn ɛɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa ɛɛ su Korowii siwi bwa.
45003029	Juda tena gbo laa Korowii che tɛ. Nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la, ba bwa waa o do le.
45003030	Korowii beŋkpoŋ gboo lole. Yeesu Kristo yaradae taa aa ba chega o gel Juda tena ɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa su o siwi. O yaradae taa aa ba chega o gel nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ ge ɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa su o siwi.
45003031	Aa do gɛ nɔ, dɛ ya dɛ yarada Yeesu aa, dɛ ya tɔ Mmara la ŋwɛnɛ kɛɛ? Akai! Yeesu yaradae nɔ te kwaraa dɛɛ ba gela ya won teŋɛ Mmara la ta.
45004001	He ta sie nyiŋi ya Juda tena nabaa Abraham na. Gɛ saŋ la, bɔkwaa o na yarada waa nɔ bini nɔ?
45004002	Dɛ o we-ɛɛla taa a che o waa su Korowii siwi aa, ate o fe dɔ waa dɛ́ kpɔ ta nyoa. Kɛ dɛ he nyiŋi Korowii Tɔn bini na naa, waa won ta nyoa Korowii sie.
45004003	Korowii Tɔn baglɔ kɛŋɔ Abraham yarada taa a che Korowii lɛo kɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su o siwi.
45004004	Nɛn ɛ toma ba bɔɔ kem aa, dɛ kemee ba bɔɔ. Dɛ kɛɛ laa ba kɛo.
45004005	Kɛ nɛn waa wola wobɛlbwa ɛɛ dɛ kpɔ o yarada do Korowii gbo nɛɛ kɛŋɔ o won wechɔg-ɛɛra nɛndɛɛga ɛɛ la, a chegɛ o yarada la ta asɛ Korowii lɛo kɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa ɛɛ su o siwi.
45004006	Gɛɛ ya Juda tena nabaa Devid faa bagle nomɛlbwa Korowii aa wola o we-ɛɛla nyiŋe asɛ dɛ lɛo kɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su o siwi la waa kɛŋɔ o na som la.
45004007	O bolɔ ŋɔ, "Naatena Korowii aa kpɔ ba wechɔga kɛ ba, waa wola a waa lii kpa la, ba na som.
45004008	Nyusom tee naate Korowii aa wola o wechɔga waa lii kpa bwa la."
45004009	A gɛ som nae nɔ Devid aa bol o waa nɔ, dɛ Juda tena aa dɛ teŋe pena nɔ, ba gboo dɛɛ ba som nae yaa, kɛ nɛra baa wola pena teŋe bwaa o ŋɔ? Too, baa bagla Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Abraham yarada taa a che asɛ o waa su Korowii siwi" nɔ,
45004010	a gɛ waa nɔ chigo mɔɔ Korowii gel Abraham teŋe o pen kɛɛ o teŋo mɔɔ nɔ? A chigo mɔɔ Abraham teŋe.
45004011	O pen teŋa la ɛ we-ɛɛle bɛl waa dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ o yarada waa o won ɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su Korowii siwi, dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ waa wola teŋe mɔɔ la, dɛ o waa su Korowii siwi. Nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ baa wola pen teŋe dɛɛ yarada Korowii asɛ o lɛɛ ba kɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa su o siwi la, ba mɛɛɛ Abraham.
45004012	Nɛra baa teŋe ba pena la, Abraham biirii ba ge. Ba pena waa laa ba ɛ o bii. Dɛ ba dɔ yarada Abraham aa dɔa mɔɔ ba teŋe o pen la aa, anee ba ɛ o bii.
45004013	Korowii nyoa la o faa bagɛ Abraham ne o naanar ŋɔ harɛ nɔ bwa ɛɛ ba ɛ ba konee la, Mmara ta teŋa waa laa o bagɔ gɛ nyoa la. Dɛ Abraham dɛ yarada Korowii, asɛ a che a ta o ɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su Korowii siwi, a waa Korowii bagɔ nyoa.
45004014	Nyoa Korowii aa bagɛ Abraham ne o naanar la, dɛ nɛra baa teŋɛ Mmara ta laanee wɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ tɛ aa, ate dɛ yarada nɛwɛnyini aa dɛ yarada Korowii nɔ ta mun dɔe. Dɛ Korowii nyobaga la ge fe ɛ pɛɛ.
45004015	Mmara laanee dɛɛ ba Korowii bandia ne nɛra nɛ. On lole nɛra gee too waa Korowii baah nɛɛ di nɛra nɛ. Dɛ mmara fe toole naa, nɛra fe aa on to.
45004016	Nyoa Korowii aa baga la, yarada taa a che. A chɛ kɛ a ɛ gɛ ásɛ kon Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa la, o ɛ kon waa kpɔa tɛ pɛɛpɛɛ. O ɛ kon Korowii aa kpɔa tɛ Abraham naanar bwa pɛɛpɛɛ waa wola nsana lee ba. Nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ Mosis Mmara la ta la, ba gbo laa Korowii bagɛ gɛ nyoa la. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ yarada Yeesu waa la kɛŋɔ Abraham aa yarada Korowii la, wɛɛ di nyobaga la tɔnɔɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya bwa mɛɛɛ Abraham.
45004017	Anee Korowii waa baa chwera ŋɔ, "N gelɔ he ɛ nɛnfuuh bwa mɛɛ" la bagle la. A gɛ waa nɔ ɛ kasinteŋ Korowii be. Onee Abraham faa yarada la. On won nɛra baa serewa kwaraa chuma, dɛ won dɛɛ bol waa aa wola chige bwa kɛŋɔ aa chiga ka la.
45004018	Dɛ Abraham dɛ yarada Korowii dɛɛ hwɛgɛ o nɛɛ ge. Dɛ waa nɛn aa wola Korowii yarada a ta la, dɛ o te dɛ yaradao. A taa a che o ɛ nɛnfuuh bwa mɛɛ gɛ Korowii aa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He naanar ɛɛ warɔɔ" la.
45004019	Dɛ Abraham di bene lafa tonɛ, dɛ waa kpege kpa. Kɛ Korowii aa ŋɔa o naanar ɛɛ warɔɔ la, o ne o hwɛɛhra bwa, ne o haah hambara ɛɛ bwa, o ta tɔŋlɛ.
45004020	O ta tɔŋlɛ tamaa bɛlbwa kɛŋɔ Korowii aa won ɛ waa waa bagɔ nyoa laanee. O ta Korowii yaradae gelɛ bwa. Dɛ name kwaraa o ta dɔ yarada kohona, dɛɛ jam Korowii.
45004021	Dɛ Abraham jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ wonoo ɛ gɛ waa bagɔ nyoa la.
45004022	A waa Korowii che Abraham yarada ta asɛ dɛ lɛo kɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su o siwi la.
45004023	A gɛ waa la baa chwera do Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Korowii lɛo kɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su o siwi" la, Abraham gbo laa ba chwerɛ tɛ.
45004024	Ya nɛra yaa dɛ yarada Korowii waa ir ya Dɔɔ Yeesu seo ta la, ya bwaa ba chwera tɛ. Ya bwaa Korowii ɛɛ ba lɛɛ kɛ nɛndɛɛga, ya waa su o siwi.
45004025	Ya wechɔga waa Korowii leo ŋɔ ó ba sewɛ, asɛ Korowii berɛ iru seo ta, ásɛ a che o nɛɛ Korowii lɛ yaa kɛ nɛndɛɛga ya waa su o siwi.
45005001	Taraken nɔ, ya yarada aa gela Korowii lɛ yaa kɛ nɛndɛɛga ya waa su o siwi nɔ, ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ a che asɛ ya ne Korowii pɛ.
45005002	Yaa yarada Yeesu dɛ kpɔ ya te tɛo la, a taa a che o gel Korowii ɛɛ na ya sum dɛɛ cha yaa gɛ waa dɛ cha yaa nɔ. Anomanta ya sie lɛo, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ bela Korowii aa lole o waa dɔ jirima kohona la, ya gee do belaa.
45005003	A gbo ta laa ya dɔ silɛɛ. Ya sie dɛ lɛ ya wahala yaa dɛ na nɔ ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ anee dɛɛ ba gela ya dɔ bambile.
45005004	Bambile dɔe nɔ taa aa ba chega asɛ dɛ Korowii daah yaa na naa, ya waa won dɔ kasinteŋ. Ya waa dɔ kasinteŋ Korowii be naa, an dɛɛ ba gela ya dɔ hwɛga.
45005005	Hwɛga yaa dɔa nɔ, aa pɛɛ ɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii tɛ yaa o Domadɛɛge la ásɛ ya jemɛ o nyina waa dɛ nyin yaa kohona.
45005006	Maa dɛ ŋɔ nɔ, ya fa toole ane bɛlbwa bini Korowii ŋwɛnɛdɛɛge la be pera. Dɛ ya faa Korowii ŋwɛnɛ ta teŋɛ. Kɛ tɔpere Korowii aa doa la aa tela la, Yeesu lɛ ya wechɔg-ɛɛra seo dɛ sewɛ.
45005007	A kpegri kɛŋɔ nɛn lɛ nɛndɛɛge kwaraa seo dɛ sewɛ. Nɛn waa dɛ nyin nɛn la te, bɛl lole nomɛl ken ɛɛ wonoo lɔ bambile lɛ o seo dɛ sewɛ.
45005008	Maa dɛ ŋɔ nɔ, hé na gɛ Korowii tea aa dɛ domɛ nɛwɛnyini nɛ. Gɛ saŋ ya taa ɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra la, a taa Yeesu Kristo lɛ ya seo dɛ sewɛ.
45005009	Yeesu Kristo seo taa a che asɛ Korowii gel ya ɛ nɛndɛɛga ya waa su o siwi. Aah dɛ Korowii bwaawee baa ir nɛra nɛ aa, a te taa Yeesu Kristo aa wola won lɛ yaa aa?
45005010	Dɛ ya ne Korowii fa dɔmɔ, asɛ o che o Bie Yeesu seo la ta dɛ gel ya ne o pɛ aa, ya ne Korowii aa pɛa taraken nɔ, a te ta kwaraa laa wɛɛ ba o Bie Yeesu seo ta ira ne o le doe nɔ waa koeh dɛ lɛ yaa aa?
45005011	A gbo laa. Ya sie lɛ Korowii nɛɛ kohona ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nomanta. O nɛɛ a che ya ne Korowii pɛ.
45005012	Nɛmbeŋkpoŋ nɛɛ a che wechɔga ba harɛ nɔ ta, asɛ a che o wechɔga ta seo ba harɛ ta. A waa seo bu nɛwɛnyini bwa la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛwɛnyini bwa ɛ wechɔga.
45005013	Korowii aa wola Mosis Mmara la ne balɛ mɔɔ la, dɛ wechɔga lole. Kɛ bela mmara aa wola toole la, baa wechɔga nkontaah bu.
45005014	Kɛ le Adam bere saŋ la ba le Mosis bere saŋ la, dɛ seo chɔ le tɛ nomɛlbwa. Hale nɛra ba faa wola Korowii nyoa vɛɛh kɛ Adam la bwaa fa dɛ serewe. Adam chaaree naate ba faa ŋɔa o dɛ ba bala la. Onee Yeesu Kristo.
45005015	Kɛ Adam ne Yeesu waa ta beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ chae Korowii aa na ya sum dɛ cha yaa la, a ne Adam wechɔga ta beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ. A gwaala kohona. Nɛmbeŋkpoŋ wechɔga taa a che seo ba nomɛlbwa nɛ. Nɛmbeŋkpoŋ alaworomɛ gee nɛra bwa di. Onee Yeesu Kristo. O nɛɛ Korowii che dɛ sune nomɛlbwa nɛ, dɛ cha yaa kohona a gwaa Adam wechɔga la.
45005016	A berɔ do kɛŋɔ chae Korowii aa cha yaa la ne waa aa le nɛmbeŋkpoŋ la wechɔga ta la ta beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ. Wechɔge beŋkpoŋ taa a che Korowii pa ya bwa bolchɔge. Asɛ wechɔga aa wara la, Korowii na ya bwa sum dɛ cha yaa dɛ lɛ yaa kɛŋɔ nɛndɛɛga ya waa su o siwi.
45005017	Nɛmbeŋkpoŋ wechɔga taa seo che dɛɛ di kora nɛwɛnyina nɛ. Gɛɛ a che nɛmbeŋkpoŋ nɛɛ asɛ Korowii na nɛwɛnyina sum kohona kwaraa dɛ cha yaa ya won ɛ nɛndɛɛga ya waa su o siwi pɛɛpɛɛ dɛ di kora mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la ta. Onee Yeesu Kristo.
45005018	Gɛ Adam wechɔge beŋkpoŋ aa lɛ chɔgre tɛ nɛwɛnyini bwa la, gɛɛ Yeesu Kristo wedɛɛge beŋkpoŋ waa ɛa gel Korowii lɛ yaa kɛŋɔ nɛndɛɛga ya waa su o siwi, asɛ nɛwɛnyini bwa won dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa.
45005019	Dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ nɛmbeŋkpoŋ deŋnekpeg aa gela nɛra bwa ɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra la, gɛɛ a che nɛmbeŋkpoŋ pwɛre waa doa ta asɛ Korowii lɛ nɛra kɛrɛdɛ kɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa su o siwi.
45005020	Mmara balɔ dɛ́ gel wechɔga warɛ. Kɛ, wechɔga aa dɛ dawɛ la, a taa Korowii na nɛwɛnyini sum dɛ cha yaa kohona.
45005021	Gɛ wechɔga aa chegɛ seo nɛɛ dɛɛ di kpegri la, gɛɛ Korowii suna waa dɛ sune nɛwɛnyini nɛɛ la ge che gɛ Korowii aa ɛ yaa nɛndɛɛga ya waa su o siwi la ta dɛɛ di kpegri, asɛ ya won dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo gelɔ nɛra ɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa su Korowii siwi.
45006001	Taraken nɔ, ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ŋɔe yɔ? A chɛ kɛ ya na dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga tɔpere bɛlbwa ásɛ Korowii ɛɛ na ya sum dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ kɛ yaa tɔpere bɛlbwa kɛɛ?
45006002	Akai! Gɛ nɛn sewaa, waa wola toole wobɛlbwa bini kpa la, gɛɛ ya ne wechɔga baah do. Aah dɛ ya ne wechɔga aa wola toole wobɛlbwa bini nɔ, ŋwɛnɛ besoo taa yaa ba wona dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga jaɔ?
45006003	He soɔh kɛŋɔ baa sɔ yaa Korowii nee yáa teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ la, ya ne onee pɛa sewɛ kɛɛ?
45006004	Baa sɔ yaa Korowii nee la nomanta, a kaa ɛ kɛŋɔ ya ne Yeesuu ba pɛ huge. Ya ne waa pɛa sewɛ la nomanta, gɛ Korowii aa chegɛ o kpegri a dɔŋ aa wola toole la ta dɛ iru seo ta la, gɛɛ wɛɛ ba ya ge chae ya kwaa so sofale waa wera, dɛ charɛ dofale waa wera.
45006005	Dɛ ya ne o pɛo dɛ sewaa, ya ne wɛɛ pɛo ir seo ta.
45006006	Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ ya dobene la ne Yeesuu ba pɛ sagɛ o dagagre ta. Ya dobene la ne o wechɔga bwaa ba kpo asɛ o bɛ won di kpegri ya nɛɛ kpa, asɛ wechɔga bɛ won yawɛ yaa yoma kpa.
45006007	Nomɛlbwa waa sewa la, o fooro dɛ le wechɔga kpegri aa dɛ di la be pera.
