45006008	Ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa sewɛ la nomanta, ya dɔ yarada kɛŋɔ yaa dɔ mkpa waa dɔa laanee.
45006009	Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo ir seo ta waa wola sewɛ kpa bwa, seo ta kpegri dɔe o nɛɛ kpa.
45006010	O seo waa sewa la, kerabeŋkpoŋii o sewɛ dɛ pɔ kpegri wechɔga aa dɔa la nɛ. Taraken soga waa soga nɔ, o lole dɛ tɛ Korowii.
45006011	Gɛɛ a chɛ kɛ he kpɔ he te kɛŋɔ he ne wechɔga toole wobɛlbwa bini kpa kɛ nɛn aa sewa la. He ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la nomanta, a chɛ kɛ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowiirii he do le tɛ.
45006012	A ta chɛ kɛŋɔ he gel wechɔga ɛɛ di kpegri he nɛ, asɛ hɛɛ ɛ he bwadabii waa wola lee do saŋ bɛlbwa nɔ tetoowa.
45006013	He bɛ he bwadabii bobɛlbwa kpɔ dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga. A chɛ kɛŋɔ he kpɔ he te tɛ Korowii kɛŋɔ nɛra baa sewa dɛ ir, dɛ charɛ ba soga ne ba dor. Hé kpɔ he bwadabii bobɛlbwa tɛ Korowii, dɛ kpɔa dɛɛ ɛ waa aa togra.
45006014	Wechɔga aa kpegri dɔe ba he nɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii suna waa dɛ sune nɛra nɛɛ la lɔgaa he do. He toole Mmara lɔga kpa.
45006015	Yaa lɔ Korowii suna waa sune ya nɛɛ lɔga yaa wola toole Mmara lɔga nɔ, a chɛ kɛ yaa ɛ wechɔga kɛɛ? Akai!
45006016	Kɛ he jemɔ kɛŋɔ dɛ he kpɔ he te do nomɛl nɔn ta ŋɔ on dɔ heya aa, dɛ on dɔ heyaa kenɛ? He kpɔ he te tɛ wechɔga aa, hɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ wechɔgaa asɛ dɛ sewɛ. He kpɔ he te tɛ Korowii dɛɛ no o be naa, wɛɛ lɛ heyaa kɛ nɛndɛɛga asɛ he waa su o siwi.
45006017	Korowii jam! Wechɔga faa yawɛ heyaa yom, asɛ taraken nɔ he no o waa baa chagle heyaa dɛ kpɔ he te tɛo he bambile bwa ne nɔ,
45006018	Korowii le heyaa wechɔga yawa a faa yawɛ heyaa yom la ta. Taraken nɔ, he berɛ yoma dɛ tɛ wedɛɛga ɛɛ.
45006019	He waa mun noe jaŋne, a waa n kpɔ waa haa dɛ noa tɔpere bɛlbwa dɛɛ bagle heyaa waa la. Gɛ he faa teŋa dɛ kpɔ he te do wedoŋa ta wubwa dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga la, gɛɛ a chɛ kɛŋɔ he berɛ kpɔ he te do wedɛɛga ta, ásɛ he waa do goroŋ.
45006020	Wubwa la, dɛ wechɔga yawɛ heyaa yoma. Dɛ he ne wedɛɛga toole wobɛlbwa bini.
45006021	Dɛ wechɔga gboo hɛɛ ɛ. Taraken nɔ, a waa dɛ ɛ heyaa sihiih. A gɛ waa nɔ, dɛ tɔnɔ besoo a dɔ tɛ heya ɔ? Waa aa lɔ gɛ wechɔga nɔ habɔɔ laanee seo.
45006022	Kɛ taraken nɔ, Korowii le heyaa wechɔga ta. On dɔ heya. He tɔnɔ haa dɔa laanee kɛŋɔ he soga bini aa togra Korowii be. A taa aa ba chega asɛ he dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe.
45006023	Wechɔga dɔ a kembɔr. A kembɔree seo. Asɛ kon Korowii ge aa dɛ tɛ laanee mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa. Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ o che dɛɛ tɛ a gɛ mkpa nɔ.
45007001	Yabalawa, he jemɛ mmara wa, anomanta he jemɔ kɛ harɛ ta gboo mmara dɔ kpegri nɛra nɛ.
45007002	Haah waa yala la, dɛ o jaa ta sewaa, hahmor mmara vɔrɔwo, o ɛ o jaa la gbo haah. O jaa sewɔ te naa, dɛ hahmor mmara ta on vɔrɔwɛ kpa.
45007003	Kɛ dɛ o jaa ta soge le, asɛ o ne banfale ge berɛ do le ja aa, baa yerɔ hanjwamanee. Dɛ o jaa sewɔ te naa, dɛ hahmor mmara ta on vɔrɔwe kpa. O yalɛ banfale aa, dɛ o ta jwamane bɔe.
45007004	Yabalawa, Yeesu Kristo seo waa sewa la, a ɛo kɛŋɔ he ne onee pɛa sewɛ. Anomanta he toole Mmara lɔga. Mmara la aa kpegri di he nɛɛ kpa kɛŋɔ haah jaa sewaa, waa wola toole hahmor mmara lɔga kpa la. He berɔ ɛ Yeesu Kristo waa ir seo ta la nɛra, asɛ dɛ won ɛ Korowii toma, he waa dɔ tɔnɔ o be.
45007005	Saŋ la yaa lɔ wechɔga ya nɛwɛnyini mar nɔ wechɔga aa suu nɔ aa dɛ nyin la ta dɛɛ ɛ la, dɛ Mmara la dɛ ir ya bambile wechɔga ɛɛ ta, asɛ wobɛlbwa yaa dɛ ɛ la, aa kaa ya ne seo ta.
45007006	Taraken te ya fooro, Mmara la ta yaa dɔe kpa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya ne a gɛ Mmara nɔ o faa kpɔ yaa berɛ yoma la toole wobɛlbwa bini kpa. Ya ɛo kɛ yaa serewa. Yaa Mmara ŋwɛnɛ ta kpɔe dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii kpa. Korowii Domadɛɛge laanee dɛɛ bagle yaa ŋwɛnɛfale yaa tomɛ Korowii taraken.
45007007	Aa do gɛ nɔ, dɛ Mmara la aa were kɛɛ? O wer, kɛ on gela n jemɛ kɛŋɔ komɛl lole baa yerɔ wechɔga. Dɛ Mmara la fe ta ŋɔe ŋɔ nɛwɛnyini bɛ gel o sie begre o dɔŋ kon aa, n fe aa jemɛ kɛŋɔ sibegra aa were.
45007008	Liichɔga nao kɛŋɔ aa wonoo che mmara Korowii aa doa la ta dɛ gel n ɛ wechɔga. Liichɔga aa na gɛ la, a chegɛ mmara la ta dɛ gel n sie ɛɛ begre komɛlbwa ta. Dɛ mmara toole naa, wechɔga ta kpegri dɔe.
45007009	Mmara aa wola toole la, dɛ wobɛlbwa toole n baŋa n so. Kɛ mmara aa bala la, belaa liichɔga ge ir, asɛ n na kɛŋɔ n sewɔ.
45007010	Mmara o fe aa chɛ kɛ o ba mkpa ne la, seo nee o ba.
45007011	Liichɔga nao kɛŋɔ a dɔ bɔr name. Mmara taa a che dɛ neg mɛ, dɛ tag mɛ do seo ta.
45007012	Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ Mmara la ɛ kondɛɛge, asɛ o bini wobɛlbwa ge togre dɛ do wer.
45007013	Aah dɛ kon waa wera nɔ, o taa a berɛ che mɛɛ ba seo dɔe yaa? O ta laa. Liichɔgaa chegɛ kon waa wera ta dɛ gel n dɔ seo, dɛ bagle o dor ásɛ n jemɔ kɛrɛdɛ. Mmara la taa a che asɛ ya jemɛ kɛŋɔ liichɔga doŋo, aa wola were kwaraa.
45007014	Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge bee Mmara la le dɛ do wer. Kɛ n te, nɛwɛnyinii men, anomanta wechɔga yag mɛ.
45007015	Waa maa dɛ ɛ kwaraa la nɔ, n ta wone jemɛ wee la aa gela mɛɛ ɛa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ maa waa n fe aa dɛ nyin ɛɛ la ɛ. Waa maa wola nyin laanee mɛɛ ɛ.
45007016	Maa wola waa maa dɛ ɛ nyin dɛ gee ɛa la nɔ, a baglɔ kɛŋɔ n sɛoh kɛŋɔ Mmara la wer.
45007017	Anomanta la nɔ, n gbagba laa dɛɛ ɛ a gɛ wechɔga nɔ. Liichɔga aa lɔ n bini la, an gela mɛɛ ɛa.
45007018	N jemɔ kɛŋɔ liidɛɛga bɛlbwa toole n bini. N nɛwɛnyini mar nɔ wechɔga aa suu nɔɔ n ŋɔ nɔ. Maa dɛ ŋɔ nɔ, n dɛ nyin wedɛɛga ɛɛ, kɛ maa won an ɛ.
45007019	Wedɛɛga maa dɛ nyin ɛɛ la, a laa mɛɛ ɛ. Wechɔga maa wola a ɛɛ nyin la, anee mɛɛ ɛ.
45007020	Dɛ waa maa wola ɛɛ nyin la, dɛ anee mɛɛ ɛ aa, a baglɔ kɛŋɔ n gbagba laa dɛɛ ɛa kpa, dɛ liichɔga aa lɔ n bini laanee dɛɛ ɛa.
45007021	Waa maa naa laanee kɛŋɔ n dɛ nyin wedɛɛga ɛɛ yaa, dɛ komɛl ŋɔ n bɛ ɛ.
45007022	N bambile fe lawɛ Korowii mmara la ta teŋa,
45007023	kɛ n bwadabii ge berɔ do dor bɛl. O dɛ vuugi n bambile. N bwadabii aa Korowii mmara la aa lɔ n bambile bini la ta teŋa nyin. Liichɔgaa gela n bwadabii aa wola Korowii mmara la ta teŋa nyin nɔ. A gɛ liire nɔ yag mɛ yom.
45007024	Akwe! Bɔkwa waa na mɛ kenɔ? Umee dɛ lɛɛ mɛ bwadabii nɔ waa dɛ kaa n ne seo ta nɔ nɔn ta nɔ?
45007025	Korowii jam. Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo alaworomɛ, Korowiirii dɛ lɛɛ mɛ. Anomanta n bambile bini te, Korowii mmara taa mɛɛ teŋɛ. Kɛ n nɛwɛnyini mar wechɔga aa suu nɔ be pera te, wechɔga taa mɛɛ teŋɛ.
45008001	Taraken nɔ nɛra ba ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la te aa bolchɔge dii ba ba tɛr ba deŋne.
45008002	Maa dɛ ŋɔ nɔ, Korowii Domadɛɛge lɔga maa lole dɛ dɔ mkpa nɔ taa Yeesu Kristo che dɛ lɛɛ mɛ le wechɔga ne seo lɔga n faa lole la ta.
45008003	Nɛwɛnyini mar aa do gɛ, waa wola kpege dɛɛ tɔ Mmara ŋwɛnɛ, asɛ Mmara lɛ nɛwɛnyini kahonɛ la, Korowii te wono lɛ nɛwɛnyini. O gelɔ o Bie tenten kpɔ nɛwɛnyini mar wechɔga aa suu nɔ dɔŋ dɛ ba chɔg liichɔga kpegri o faa dɔa nɛwɛnyini nɛɛ la dɛ laa wechɔga kpɔ,
45008004	ásɛ ya waa do sweih kɛŋɔ Mmara la aa bagla ŋɔ yá do la. Yaa nɛwɛnyini mar liichɔga aa suu nɔ waa ta teŋɛ, Korowii Domadɛɛge waa taa yaa teŋɛ.
45008005	Nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ nɛwɛnyini mar liichɔga aa suu nɔ tetoowaa ta la, a taa ba ge liire do. Nɛra ba ge aa dɛ teŋɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge waa ta la, a taa ba liire do.
45008006	He kpɔ liire do nɛwɛnyini mar nɔ liichɔga waa ta naa, he ne sewee. Kɛ he kpɔ liire do Korowii Domadɛɛge tetoowaa ta naa, he dɔ mkpa dɛ dɔ deŋnesɔɔhna.
45008007	Nomɛlbwa waa kpɔ o liire do bwadabii waa ta dɛ gwaa wobɛlbwa la, o som laa Korowii, waa Korowii mmara ta teŋɛ. Waa won teŋɛ Korowii mmara ta ge bwa.
45008008	Nɛra baa kpɔ ba liire do nɛwɛnyini mar wechɔga aa suu nɔ dɛ gwaa wobɛlbwa la, ba waa aa won too Korowii tea bwa.
45008009	He te la, he ta he nɛwɛnyini mar nɔ wechɔga aa suu nɔ som kpɔe gwaa wobɛlbwa. Dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge lɔ he nɛ aa, gɛ waa dɛ bagle heyaa laanee hɛɛ ba dɛɛ ɛ. Nomɛlbwa waa wola Domadɛɛge Yeesu Kristo aa dɛ tɛ la dɔe la, dɛ Yeesu nɛn laa on.
45008010	Dɛ Yeesu Kristo Domadɛɛge la lɔ he nɛ aa, wechɔga nomanta he bwadabii ɛɛ sewɔɔ te. Kɛ Korowii aa lɛ heyaa kɛ nɛndɛɛga he waa su o siwi nomanta, he lileore ɛɛ dɔ mkpaa.
45008011	Korowii waa ir Yeesu seo ta la, dɛ o Domadɛɛge lɔ he nɛ aa, gɛ Korowii aa iru seo ta la, wɛɛ che o Domadɛɛge la taa dɛ tɛ he bwadabii aa dɛ ba pɔeh kerekere nɔ mkpa.
45008012	Anomanta yabalawa, waa dawɛ ya nɛ, ya di kem, kɛ ya nɛwɛnyini mar nɔ wechɔga aa suu nɔ kem laa ya di á ɛ kɛŋɔ yaa teŋɛ o nɛ,
45008013	dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ nɛn teŋɛ nɛwɛnyini mar wechɔga aa suu nɔ pɛla waa ta naa, waa mkpa dɔe ba. Kɛ dɛ nɛn chegɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la nɛɛ dɛ vɛh o bwadabii pɛla wobɛlbwa naa, wɛɛ dɔ mkpaa.
45008014	Nɛra baa kpɔ ba te tɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge wɛɛ bag ba ŋwɛnɛ la, Korowii biirii ban.
45008015	Korowii Domadɛɛge la waa kpɔa tɛ heyaa la, o ta gelɛ he ne Korowii baah do kɛŋɔ nɛn ne o yom asɛ hɛɛ ɔmɔ. O gelɔ he ɛ Korowii bii. O alaworomɛ ya won wii dɛ yerɛ Korowii "n Mɛɛ," kɛŋɔ bie aa dɛ yerɛ o mɛɛ gɛ la.
45008016	Korowii Domadɛɛge yon gel ya jemɛ ya bambile bini kɛŋɔ Korowii biirii yaa.
45008017	Yaa ɛ Korowii bii nomanta, dɛ ya sɛoh dɛ na wahala Yeesu Kristo aa naa la aa, ya gee di o kapɛrɛɛ kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo aa dɛ di la, asɛ Korowii kpɛɛ yaa gɛ waa kpɛɛ Yeesu Kristo la.
45008018	Wahala nɔ yaa dɛ na taraken nɔ, he nyiŋi som yaa dɛ ba nae kerekere la aa, a ta wahala ɛɛ kwaraa.
45008019	Korowii kontaala bwa siwi swɛɛrɔ aa kpa tɔɔ la wee Korowii aa bagle nɛra baa ɛ o bii la.
45008020	A dɛ yo dɛ yo kaahonɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a ta a te dɔe. Korowiirii taa o tetoora ta kɛŋɔ a bɛ kpegri dɔ. Kɛ a dɛ hwɛgɛ
45008021	kɛŋɔ tɔpebɛl Korowii ɛɛ geloo a foo dɛ le kpegri bɛ dɔe nɔ ta, aa wola pɔh kpa, dɛ ja Korowii bii nɛɛ dɛ ge na som kɛŋɔ baa foora la.
45008022	Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ ba le fini, Korowii kontaala bwa bwara dɛ nyɛg, aa pɛmɛ kɛŋɔ lol tea lɔ haah o yon dɛɛ pɛmɛ la.
45008023	Maa dɛ ŋɔ nɔ, Korowii kontaala gbo bwara laa dɛɛ nyɛg. Ya nɛra yaa dɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge kɛŋɔ kwaa Korowii aa ba tɛ yaa la bini konlogle la, ya gba bwara dɛ nyɛg. Ya dɛ nyiŋi Korowii ŋwɛnɛ kɛŋɔ wɛɛ ba ɛ yaa o biirii, dɛ lɛ ya bwadabii wechɔga ne seo nɔn ta.
45008024	Korowii aa lɛ yaa la, dɛ gɛ hwɛga nɔɔ ya dɔ. Kon nɛn aa dɔa la, waa berɛ dɛɛ hwɛgɛ o waa kɛŋɔ wɛɛ dɔɔ kpa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ kon waa wola nɛn nɔn ta joɛ la, o waa baa hwɛgɛ.
45008025	Ya te la, kon waa wola ya nɔn ta joɛ mɔɔ la, o waa yaa hwɛgɛ. Yaa too.
45008026	Gɛ ya hwɛga yaa dɔa la aa lawɛ yaa ya wahala bwa bini la, gɛɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge gee cha yaa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya yarada aa kanɛ. Yaa jemɛ gɛ aa chɛ kɛ yaa soŋe Korowii kwara. Korowii Domadɛɛge soŋo dɛɛ tɛ yaa mmɔbɔrɔ ne nɛn aa wola won bagle kwara.
45008027	Korowii te jemɛ nɛn bambile bini waa bwa, dɛ jemɛ o Domadɛɛge la nyu bini, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ Korowii aa dɛ nyin la, gɛɛ o Domadɛɛge la soŋo dɛɛ tɛ o nɛra.
45008028	Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ nɛra baa dɛ nyin Korowii la, wobɛlbwa aa puu ba la, o gelɔ a ɛ wedɛɛga dɛɛ tɛɛ ba. O tetooraa o lee ba ba ɛ o bii.
45008029	Nɛra Korowii aa jemɛ ba waa cheg wubwa la, waa wola ban tae mɔɔ la, dɛ o tɔ sie lee ba ŋɔ bá ba do kɛŋɔ o Bie la ken, ásɛ ba bwa ɛ o Bie la nimanar, asɛ o ge ɛ ba Dɔɔ.
45008030	Anomanta nɛra Korowii aa tɔ sie lee ba gɛ la, o lee ba ŋɔ bá ɛ o toma. Waa lee ba ŋɔ bá ɛ o toma la, o lɛɛ ba kɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa su o siwi, asɛ o tɛɛ ba ŋwɛnɛ kɛŋɔ ba ba so o jwɛh dɛ dɔ jirima.
45008031	Ya ta sie nyiŋi anɔ bwa na naa, ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ŋɔe yɔ? Dɛ Korowii teŋɛ ya nɛ aa, umee dɛ won ɛ yaa waane ɔ?
45008032	Nɛn waa wola yaa o Bie kwaraa vɔmɛ, dɛ koh ya bwa waa kpɔɔ do nɛwɛnyini nɔn ta ba kpoo la, bɔkwaa bala waa wola tea ta dɛ tɛ yaa komɛlbwa dɛ ja o Bie la nɛɔ?
45008033	Umee dɛ won na Korowii bii waa lee ba nɔ bwara wechɔge bɛl dɛ bolɔ? Korowii kwara waa dɛ pa bole la, o ŋɔ ba waa wer dɛɛ su o siwi.
45008034	Aah dɛ umee dɛ won pa ba bolchɔge ɔ? Yeesu Kristo kɛɛ? Sewaa o te koh ya waa sewɛ, kɛ a gbo laa. O berɔ ir seo ta dɛ ka so nomombɔr Korowii dig ta, dɛ soŋo dɛɛ tɛ yaa.
45008035	Bɔkwaa dɛ won pere ya ne Yeesu Kristo baah waa wola yaa nyina ba kpaɔ? Noe aa dɛ no yaa kɛɛ wahala yaa dɛ na, kɛɛ chega nɛra aa chegɛ ya nɛ, kɛɛ lɔr, kɛɛ nyaa, kɛɛ dɛ ya chegɛ seo nyoao, kɛɛ sewɔ?
45008036	Gɛ Korowii Tɔn aa dɛ bagle la, "He nomanta ya chegɛ seo nyoa saŋ bɛlbwa. Saŋ bɛlbwaa baa ɛ yaa kɛŋɔ peera baa dɛ la ka kpoa la ken."
45008037	Anɔ bwa sekwaraa ta la, ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ yaa yoo le. Yeesu Kristo waa nyin yaa la nɛɛ yaa ba chega dɛ le.
45008038	N jemɔ kɛŋɔ wobɛlbwa toole dɛ tɔ yaa ŋwɛnɛ waa wola ya waa nyina ba. Seo kɛɛ mkpa aa won tɔ yaa ŋwɛnɛ. Nyundua toroma kɛɛ Bɔnsam toroma aa bea yaa wola an na aa won tɔ yaa ŋwɛnɛ. Waa aa dɛ ɛ fini nɔ kɛɛ anɔ la aa dɛ ba ɛɛ kerekere ge aa won tɔ yaa ŋwɛnɛ. Kwaa aa dɔ kpegri bɛlbwa sese ge aa won tɔ yaa ŋwɛnɛ.
45008039	Komɛlbwa toole dɛ do nyundua kɛɛ harɛ bobɛlbwa dɛ won tɔ yaa ŋwɛnɛ. Korowii kontaala bini komɛlbwa toole dɛ won pere yaa le Korowii nyina aa chegɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ wɛɛ nyin yaa la ta.
45009001	Kasinteŋii mɛɛ ba bola la. Maa ɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛn la nomanta, maa nyosone teŋe. Korowii Domadɛɛge la gelɔ n jemɛ n bambile bini kɛŋɔ maa nyosone teŋe.
45009002	N tea bini chɔgɔ, n bambile ge aa n wee gel bwa.
45009003	N gbagba bwɛɛ tena baa ɛ n nɛraa gela n bambile bwa wee mɛ gɛ nɔ. Dɛ Korowii taah mɛ asɛ n ne Yeesu Kristo baah pere kwaraa ásɛ o lɛɛ ba aa, n dɛ nyin gɛ.
45009004	Israel tena maa dɛ bol ba waa nɔ, Korowii ɛ ya o bii dɛ bagle yaa o jirima. O ne ya fɔwɛ fɔo, asɛ o tɛ yaa o mmara, dɛ bagle yaa gɛ aa chɛ kɛ yaa tomɔ, dɛ bagɛ yaa nyoa bele aŋwɛnɛ bwa.
45009005	Ya nabaala la nɛra bwa aa jemɛ ba waa la naanaree yan. Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la, o nɛwɛnyini ɛɛ be pera la, ya dwee on. Korowiirii dɛɛ nyiŋi nɛwɛnyini bwa nɛɛ saŋ bɛlbwa. Onee chɛ jam. Aamen.
45009006	N ta ŋɔe ŋɔ Korowii vɛh o nyobaga la ta teŋa, kɛ Israel tena bwa laa Korowii le kɛ o nɛra.
45009007	Abraham naanar bwa ge laa Korowii bii. Korowii aa ŋɔ Abraham be ŋɔ, "Aesek luge taa hɛɛ ba he naanar maa bagɛ nyoa dɔe" la,
45009008	a baglɔ kɛŋɔ Abraham dwee la te bwa waa lol ba gɛ nɛra bwa aa dɛ lolɛ la, Korowii nɛra laa ban. Abraham bie la Korowii aa bagɔ nyoa la, o dweee Korowii jemɛ kɛŋɔ Abraham naanaree ban,
45009009	dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii aa bagɛ Abraham nyoa la, waa waa bola laanee kɛŋɔ, "Benanyoa saŋ nɔ mɛɛ berɔɔ ba. N ne bala dɛ Saara lolɛ bibaa."
45009010	Anɔ gbo laa. Rebɛɛka aa kpoŋe o kpara la tea la, ba bwa mɛɛ ɛ beŋkpoŋ. Ya nabaa Aesekee ba mɛɛ.
45009011	Baa wola ban lolɛ mɔɔ, a ɛ kɛŋɔ ba ɛ wechɔga kɛɛ wedɛɛga la, dɛ Korowii dɔɔ ŋɔ ba nya be ŋɔ, "Bii nɔ, bechala la ɛɛ lɛ nomonome o dɔɔ bee asɛ o dɔɔ la berɛ dɛɛ tomɔ." A gɛ waa nɔ baglɔ kɛŋɔ lee Korowii aa le Jekɔb la, o tetooraa o leo. Jekɔb we-ɛɛla laa o nyiŋi dɛ leo.
45009013	Anee Korowii Tɔn la bagle ŋɔ, "N nyin Jekɔb dɛ hah Esɔ" la.
45009014	Amɔ yaa wonoo ŋɔ Korowii waa ta togrɛ kɛɛ? O waa togrɔ.
45009015	O ŋɔ Mosis be ŋɔ, "Naate n tea aa toora kɛŋɔ ń sune o nɛɛ la, mɛɛ sune o nɛɛ. Naate n tea aa toora kɛŋɔ ń tea domɛ o nɛɛ la, n tea ɛɛ domɛ o nɛɛ."
45009016	Waa nɛwɛnyini aa dɛ nyin ne anɔ la yaa dɛ ɛ la, Korowii te aa an nyiŋi. O te suna waa sune nɛwɛnyini nɛɛ la, anee wɛɛ nyiŋi.
45009017	Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini gɛ Korowii faa ŋɔ Ijipt kooro be la. Anee kɛŋɔ, "N gelɔ he ɛ kooro ásɛ nɛwɛnyini bwa che he nɛɛ dɛ na gɛ maa dɔ kpegri, asɛ dɛ yerɛ n sɔn harɛ ta bobɛlbwa."
45009018	Naate Korowii tea aa toora kɛŋɔ ó sune o nɛɛ la, o nɛɛ wɛɛ sune. Naate ge o tea aa toora kɛŋɔ ó gel o deŋne do kpegri la, onee o gel o deŋne ɛɛ do kpegri.
45009019	Nomɛl ɛɛ ŋɔɔ, "Dɛ kenii a do aa, Korowii ɛɛ wonoo ŋɔ nomɛl deŋne kpegri nomanta o ɛ wechɔga aa? Dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii dawɛ waa ŋɔ á ɛ gɛ naa, a chɛ kɛ a ɛ gɛ."
45009020	Dɛ henee ume kɛŋɔ Korowii bol waa he chaŋe bɛl ɔ? Vii gee wonoo bɔɔ mamaa wee la aa bala o mao gɛ waa mao waa?
45009021	Naate waa dɛ ma la, o ta ŋwɛnɛ dɔe kɛ o kpɔ choh waa dɛ ma a ne la ma kwaa aa too o tea aa? A too o tea aa, wɛɛ kpɔ a gɛ choh laanee ma viine anɛ, dɛ kpɔ bɛl dɛɛ ɛ kwaa tɔpejena gbo, dɛ kpɔ bɛl ge dɛɛ ɛ kwaa tɔpere bɛlbwa.
45009022	Gɛɛ a do Korowii be. Nɛwɛnyini ɛ o viine waa maa. Bane chɛ chɔga. O ma bane ge ásɛ ba ba na som o be. Dɛ o fe dɛ nyin o bagle o bandia nɛra baa chɛ chɔga la nɛɛ dɛ́ gel nɛra na o kpegri, kɛ o lawɛ bambile,
45009023	ásɛ nɛra waa sune ba nɛɛ dɛ cheg ba kɛŋɔ bá ba na som la won jemɛ gɛ o som la aa doa dɛ dɔ jirima kohona.
45009024	Yanee o sune ya nɛɛ la. Yanee o le ŋɔ ya ɛ o nɛra la. Israel tena gbo bini laa o le nɛra ŋɔ ba ɛ o nɛra nɔ. O le bane nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ ge bini.
45009025	Kenii o ŋɔ o keame Hosia tɔn bini: "Nɛra ba faa wola n nɛra ɛɛ n faa wola ban nyin la, mɛɛ yer baa n nɛra ne n nɛnnyina."
45009026	Ba chwerɛ tɔn la bobɛl ge ŋɔ, "Nɛra Korowii faa ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, 'N nɛra laa heyaa' la, banee ba berɛ dɛɛ ba Korowiijen bii yera."
45009027	Aesaya bol Israel tena waa ŋɔ: "Dɛ Israel tena warɔ kɛŋɔ mpo nyoa hɛŋle kwaraa naa, ba bini tamaa kenii Korowii ɛɛ ba lɛɛ.
45009028	Wɛɛ bol nɛwɛnyini bwa waa wɔrɔbe nɛɛ dɛ pa bole."
45009029	Anee Aesaya fa bol la, "Dɛ Nemenɛ Korowii fe ta o nɛra dwee tama bane gelaa, ya fe ɛɛ tonɔɔ kwaraa kɛŋɔ Sodom ne Gomoora tena."
45009030	Ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ŋɔe yɔ? Nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ la, ba siwi aa wola swɛɛrɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii lɛɛ ba kɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa su o siwi la, ba yarada nomanta, Korowii siwi su ba.
45009031	Kɛ Israel tena te aa swɛɛ siwi dɛ kpɔ ba sie do Mmara ta teŋa ta, dɛ ŋɔ an dɛ gel Korowii lɛɛ ba kɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa su o siwi la, o siwi ta ba te kwaraa sui.
45009032	Aah dɛ bɔkwaa gela a ba gɛ nɔ? Baa wola sie kpɔe dawɛ Korowii yaradae ta, dɛ kpɔ sie dawɛ ba we-ɛɛla ta kɛŋɔ an dɛ gel Korowii siwi su ba la, a waa. Anomanta ba lɔ naa Bwe nɛra aa lɔ naa o ta dɛɛ chole la ta.
45009033	O waa ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini la. Ba chwerɔ ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ kpɔ Bwee cheg Saayɔn, asɛ nɛra ɛɛ lɔ naa o ta dɛɛ chogli. Kɛ nomɛlbwa waa yaradao la, sihiih aa o kpoe ba."
45010001	Yabala, Korowii fe lɛ Israel tena aa, a fe som n be noo! N soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛɛ ba ga.
45010002	Kasinteŋ, n wono bol ba waa kɛŋɔ ba Korowii toma swɛɛ ba siwi te, kɛ baa on tomɛ a ŋwɛnɛ ta.
45010003	Baa gɛ Korowii aa ɛa dɛɛ lɛ nɛra kɛ nɛndɛɛga ba wa ɛɛ su o siwi jemɛ, anomanta ba gbagba ŋwɛnɛɛ baa kpɔ, dɛ vɛh Korowii ŋwɛnɛ waa chegɛ o ta dɛ gel nɛra wa ɛɛ su o siwi la ta teŋa.
45010004	Yeesu Kristo bala la teŋe Mosis Mmara ta teŋa ta kɛŋɔ a taa nɛn che Korowii lɛo kɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su o siwi la. Taraken nomɛlbwa waa yarada Yeesu Kristo waa la, Korowii ɛɛ lɛo kɛ nɛndɛɛgee asɛ o waa su o siwi.
45010005	Kenii Mosis bol nɛra baa dɛ nyin ba che Mmara ta teŋa ta ásɛ ba waa su Korowii siwi la wa. O ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ teŋe waa aa lɔ Mmara la bwa ta la, wɛɛ dɔ mkpaa le Mmara la ta teŋa ta."
45010006	Kenii Korowii Tɔn bagle nɛra baa che yarada ta asɛ ba waa su o siwi ge wa: "Bɛ he nyu bini lii ŋɔ, 'Umee dɛ la nyundua, kɛɛ dɛ tu bɔluŋ bini dɛ́ ka nyinu ba nɔ?' " Yeesu Kristo ta do kɛ hé kpɔɔ tu harɛ, kɛɛ hé nyinu lala bini ba.
45010008	Waa Korowii Tɔn aa dɛ bol laanee kɛŋɔ, "Korowii waa la pu heyaa tonɛ. A lɔ he nyoo ne he bambili ta kwara." Yeesu Kristo yaradae waa yaa dɛ bol he be laanee Korowii waa nɔ.
45010009	Dɛ he nɛn kpɔ nyoa ŋɔ komɛlbwa Dɔɔree Yeesu, dɛ yarada he bambile bini kɛŋɔ Korowii iru seo ta naa, Korowii ɛɛ lɛɛ,
45010010	dɛkalkɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo waa la yaradae bambile bwa ne taa a che Korowii ɛɛ lɛ nɛwɛnyini kɛ nɛndɛɛga ba wa ɛɛ su o siwi, asɛ a bola nyoa ne dɔŋa be taa a che Korowii lɛ yaa.
45010011	Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa yaradao la, sihiih aa o kpoe ba."
45010012	Israel tena ne nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ la, ba bwa kɛrɛdɛ Korowii be. Komɛlbwa Dɔɔree Korowii. Nomɛlbwa waa wia dɛɛ yerɔ la, o dɛ chao kohona.
45010013	Anee Korowii Tɔn bol la, "Nomɛlbwa waa wi yerɛ ya Dɔɔ la, wɛɛ lɛo."
45010014	Aah dɛ nɛn ta on yaradae dɛ kpɔ o te tɛo waa, ɛrɛɛ wɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ won yerɛ o sɔn ó lɛo wɔ? Dɛ nɛn ta o waa noɛ yaa, ɛrɛɛ wɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ won yaradao dɛ kpɔ o te tɛo wɔ? Dɛ nɛn ta o waa la bolɛ nɛn be naa, ɛrɛɛ wɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ noɔ?
45010015	Dɛ Korowii ta nɛn tomaa, ɛrɛɛ wɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ bol o waa laɔ? Anee kɛŋɔ Korowii Tɔn aa ŋɔa la. O bolɔ ŋɔ, "Nɛra baa kpoŋe amanesoma dɛɛ valɛ la, he no ba bala waa aa, he bambile dɛ sɔɔhne taeh!"
45010016	Amanesoma la balɔ, kɛ Israel tena bwa laa sɛh a ta teŋa. Korowii keame Aesaya gbagba fa bolɔ ŋɔ, "N Naa Korowii, umee yarada waa yaa bol ba be laɔ?"
45010017	He nyiŋo na naa, Yeesu Kristo waa la noe taa a che nɛra ɛɛ yaradaa, asɛ a bola ge taa a che nɛra ɛɛ noa.
45010018	Mɛɛ bɔɔ heyaa webeŋkpoŋii: Kpelaa kɛŋɔ ba ta noɛ yaa? Ba noɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii Tɔn bolɔ ŋɔ, "Ba waa baa dɛ bol la la harɛ ta bobɛlbwa nɛra aa lole, a tel harɛ jaga bwa."
45010019	N berɔ dɛɛ bɔɔ ja: Israel tena fa ta noɛ yaa? Mosis tɔ sie chwerɛ waa Korowii aa bola, dɛ ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ geloo he dɔ bɔweela nɛra baa wola ban kure dɛɛ ja n nɛra nɛɛ la nɛ, dɛ gel harɛ o nɛra aa gɛna ɛ heyaa he bwaawee ir."
45010020	Korowii keame Aesaya te kwaraa chwerɛ Korowii wobol ane a gwaa gɛ. O chwerɔ ŋɔ, "Nɛra ba faa wola n bɔr gaage la, ban na mɛ. Nɛra ba faa wola n waa bɔɔ la, banee n kpɔ n te chagle."
45010021	Kenii o bagle gɛ Korowii aa bol Israel tena ge wa: "Saŋ bɛlbwaa n pagri n nɔɔra kɛŋɔ ń lɛ n nɛra. Kɛ baa men yarada. Ba deŋne kpegri, baa waa ge no."
45011001	N dɛ bɔɔ heyaa ŋɔ: Korowii vɛh o nɛra Israel tena kɛɛ? Akai! N gbabir nɔ, Israel tee men. N ɛ Abraham naa dɛ le Benjamen dea.
45011002	Korowii ta nɛra o faa lee ba cheg wubwa ba ɛ o nɛra la vɛɛh. Kɛ he jemɛ gɛ Korowii Tɔn aa bol Korowii keame Elaeja waa ŋɔ o chɔg Israel tena tɛ Korowii laɔ?
45011003	O bolɔ ŋɔ, "N Naa Korowii, ba kpoo he keamere dɛ hugri bela baa kpoo kwaa dɛɛ tɛɛ bwa. N gboo kaa, dɛ ba dɛ nyin n gba kpoe."
45011004	Ɛrɛɛ Korowii chaŋe Elaeja ɔ? O chaŋo ŋɔ, "N ta dɔ nɛra kagboŋa banuanɛ bane ba do le dɛ ɛ n nɛra baa wola vog Baal guŋe bwa."
45011005	Gɛɛ a do taraken. Nɛra tama bane ta lole Korowii aa na ba sum dɛ lee ba ba ɛ o nɛra.
45011006	Ba we-ɛɛla ta laa a che o lee ba. Ba sumii o na dɛ lee ba ba ɛ o nɛra. Dɛ ba we-ɛɛla taa a fe che o lee ba ba ɛ o nɛra aa, dɛ suna baa ŋɔa Korowii dɛ sune nɛwɛnyini nɛɛ dɛɛ cha ba la ta mun dɔe.
45011007	Ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ŋɔe yɔ? Gɛ Israel tena aa dɛ nyin kɛ ba waa su Korowii siwi la, ba ta gɛ dɔe. Nɛra tama Korowii aa lee ba ba ɛ o nɛra la, ba waa su o siwi. Ba kar taŋ deŋne Korowii be.
45011008	Anee ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Korowii saa ba liire, dɛ tɛɛ ba sie aa wola kasinteŋ laanee na, ne deŋna aa wola kasinteŋ laanee no, dɛ kpoŋe ba le fini tɔpere nɔ" la.
45011009	Ya nabaa Devid bolɔ ŋɔ, "Korowii, gɛ saŋ baa dɛɛ di kwaa dɛɛ lɛ ba sie la, gel siswɛm pig ba. Gel waa ba sie aa dɛ lɛ a ta la ɛ kon baa lɔ naa o ta dɛɛ chogli, dɛ ɛ bel dɛɛ lag ba, asɛ ba wa ɛɛ gure ba nɛ.
45011010	Gel ba sie tɔɔge ba bɛ kasinteŋ la dɛɛ na, asɛ dɛɛ na wahala saŋ bɛlbwa."
45011011	Mɛɛ bɔɔ webeŋkpoŋii ja: Israel tena aa lɔ naa dɛ chole la, ba denɔ chole baa wola won ir kpa aa? Akai! Baa iruu, kɛ ba wechɔga la taa a che Korowii lɛɛ waa lɛ nɛwɛnyini la maa nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ ásɛ Israel tena na ba bwara wee ba.
45011012	Israel tena wechɔga baa ɛa la ba wedɛɛga ne ba tɛ nɛwɛnyini, asɛ ba chola baa chola dɛ paŋɛ kwaa Korowii be la ge ba wedɛɛga tenten ne dɛ ba tɛ nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ. Israel tena chola la kwaraa aa ba wedɛɛga ne ba tɛ nɛwɛnyini nɔ, dɛ ba bwa lɛ Korowii wa aa, ɛrɛɛ aa ba doe yɔ?
45011013	He nɛra haa wola Israel tena ɛɛ la, he bee mɛɛ bol waa nɔ: Korowii aa lee mɛ ŋɔ ń ɛ Yeesu torome he be nɔ, mɛɛ maŋkura n toma nɔɔ.
45011014	Bɛl lole n bwɛɛ tena na gɛ naa, aa we ba nɛɛ, asɛ a che a ta ba bane lɛ Yeesu waa nɔ.
45011015	Aa chegɛ Israel tena ne Korowii baah chɔga ta asɛ nɛwɛnyini kabora ne Korowii baah kwaa nɔ, dɛ Korowii berɔ lɛ Israel tena dɛ kpɔ ba ɛ o bii aa, bɔkwa nee aa ba balaɔ? Aa ba silɛɛ nee kohona, kɛŋɔ lala bwa aa ir seo ta.
45011016	Dɛ kon pera wer dɛ chɛ Korowii aa, dɛ o kar la bwa ge wer. Dɛ daa lune wer dɛ chɛ Korowii aa, dɛ o ne o kpala bwaa.
45011017	Moo laa pala dɛɛ kaa nyundua la aa? Israel tena do kɛ kobaah ɔleve da. Ba teŋe o kpala ane ta, dɛ kpɔ hen haa wola Israel te ɛɛ dɛ do kɛ kpɔg baah ɔleve daa kpale, dɛ ba vɔrɔwe marɛ kobaah kon la bɛl bug ta, asɛ hɛɛ nyɔ o nedɛɛga dɛ di, dɛ dɛg.
45011018	Anomanta bɛ kena dɛɛ kpagri daa kpala la baa kɛa ta la nɛ. He mbarafo mun ɔ? Daa kpale laa hen kɛɛ? Hen gela daa la lune do le kɛɛ an gela he do le nɔ?
45011019	He te ɛɛ ŋɔɔ he waa ba kɛ daa la kpala la ta asɛ dɛ vɔrɔwe marɛ.
45011020	He ŋɔ gɛ naa, kpelaa he ŋɔ. Baa wola Yeesu waa la yaradae waa ba teŋ ba ta. He ge aa yarada Yeesu waa la, a waa he ta che la. Anomanta bɛ mbarafo dɛɛ ɛ. Pwɛr he te dɛɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ.
45011021	Israel tena kwaraa baa ɛ daa la tenten pera la, Korowii kɛ ba ta. He tenee dɛ ɛ deŋnekpeg, waa wola heyaa kɛ ta aa?
45011022	He nyiŋo na naa, dɛ he jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii tea som, kɛ o waa ge kpegri taeh. Nɛra ba deŋne aa kpega baa wola o ŋwɛnɛ ta teŋɛ la, o dɛ nyiŋ ba sinyɛga ne. Kɛ dɛ hɛɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ o ŋwɛnɛ taa te naa, wɛɛ ta tea tɛ he te. Kɛ dɛ he ta o ŋwɛnɛ ta teŋaa, wɛɛ kɛ he gee ta.
45011023	Dɛ Israel tena berɔ yarada Yeesu waa la te naa, Korowii ɛɛ berɔɔ lɛɛ ba do ba bug ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ aa kpege o be.
45011024	Korowii laa gela ba teŋe he nɛra haa do kɛ kpɔg baah ɔleve daa kpala dɛ ba vɔrɔwe marɛ kobaah ɔleve daa kpul ta nɔ naa, ba fe aa an gɛ ɛ wubwa. Aah dɛ Korowii won he nɛra haa do kɛ kpɔg baah ɔleve daa kpala kwara kɛɛ dɛ vɔrɔwe marɛ kobaah kwaa kwaraa ta a magre aa, Israel tena baa do kɛ kobaah ɔleve daa kpala waa kɛa ta la, ɛrɛ waa o berɔ kpɔ ba vɔrɔwe marɛ ba bug ta aa wola magre ɔ?
45011025	Yabalawa, wesɔɔhla anee mɛɛ nyin kɛ he jemɛ, ásɛ dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ wobɛlbwa laa he den jemɛ. Anee kɛŋɔ Israel tena nɔ bane deŋnekpeg baa dɛ ɛ nɔ, ken laa aa ba kae. Nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ Korowii ɛɛ nyin kɛ o lɛɛ ba la, ba tel gɛ del waa dɛ nyin la aa, Israel tena ɛɛ gel ba deŋnekpeg nɔɔ.
45011026	Anomanta, Korowii ɛɛ lɛ Israel tena bwaa dɛ ɛ o bii, kɛŋɔ Korowii Tɔn aa bagla la. O baglɔ ŋɔ, "Nɛwɛnyini Lɛɛ la ɛɛ le Saayɔnee ba, dɛ ba le Israel tena waa aa gela baa wola Korowii waa ta teŋɛ bwa la ta.
45011027	Fɔo n ne baa fɔwɛ laanee kɛŋɔ mɛɛ lee baa ba wechɔga ta."
45011028	Israel tena aa vɛh Yeesu Amanesoma la nomanta, ba berɛ Korowii dɔma, asɛ a le wedɛɛga tɛ heya. Kɛ baa ɛ nɛra Korowii aa chal ba la nomanta, o ta dɛ nyin ba taeh. Nyoa waa bagɛ ba naanar la, a waa o taa nyin ba la.
45011029	Korowii te dɔɔ ŋɔ o nɛnee nɛn, dɛ ŋɔ wɛɛ ɛo wedɛɛgaa yaa, waa nsana le.
45011030	Gɛ he nɛra haa wola Israel tena ɛɛ faa wola Korowii waa ta teŋɛ asɛ o koh kɛ Israel tena vɛh o waa ta teŋa asɛ dɛ sune he nɛɛ la,
45011031	gɛ tentenee Israel tena aa vɛh Korowii waa ta teŋa la, wɛɛ koh suna waa sune he nɛɛ la waa dɛ sune ba ge nɛ.
45011032	Nɛwɛnyini bwa taŋ deŋne Korowii be, asɛ o koh a waa dɛ pa nɛra bwa bolchɔge. Ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa toole yá che o ta dɛ le a gɛ bolchɔge nɔ ta. A ɛ gɛ ásɛ Korowii na ya bwa sum.
45011033	Ei! Korowii liire ne o wejema kan te! Umee dɛ won jemɛ Korowii waa mun ɔ? Umee dɛ won jemɛ o waa bini bwa nɔ?
45011034	Anee Korowii Tɔn bagle la. O bolɔ ŋɔ, "Umee jemɛ Korowii nyu bini nɔ? Umee dɛ won baglo waɔ?
45011035	Ume komɛlee Korowii kemɛ ka a ɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii di o kem dɛ ba bɔɔ wɔ?"
45011036	O ta nomɛlbwa kem dii, dɛkalkɛŋɔ on ta kon te bɛlbwa. O nɛɛ komɛlbwa che dɛ do le, o waa gee a do le. O chɛ jirima saŋ bɛlbwa wee. Aamen.
45012001	Anomanta yabalawa, n dɛ soŋe heya. Hé nyiŋi Korowii suna waa sune ya nɛɛ la dɛ kpɔ he te tɛo. Gɛ baa kpɔ kondɛɛga aa chɛ Korowii dɛɛ su o siwi dɛ kpo dɛ ɛ saraha tɛo dɛɛ tomɔ la, hé ge kpɔ he te kɛŋɔ gɛ saraha la, dɛ laa doŋa bɛlbwa kpɔ he nɛɛ dɛɛ tomɔ he bokpega ne. Gɛɛ a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ tomɛ Korowii.
45012002	He bɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta liire la da kpɔ. Hé gel Korowii tɛ heyaa liifala dɛ berɛ heyaa asɛ he won jemɛ waa waa dɛ nyin, dɛ jemɛ waa aa wera o be dɛɛ too o tea, ne waa aa togra.
45012003	N chegɛ suna Korowii aa sune n nɛɛ dɛ kpɔ o toma do n nɔn ta nɔ ta dɛɛ ja heyaa kɛ gɛ bɛlbwa haa doa la, gel ba nae gɛ. Bɛ́lbwa pwɛr o te dɛ won jemɛ waa Korowii aa tɛo yarada ŋɔ ó kpɔ ɛ.
45012004	Ya bwadabii ɛ kombeŋkpoŋ, dɛ dɔ nyu, ne nɔɔra, ne nakpale, ne amesoore bwa. A bwa ge ne a tomaree.
45012005	Gɛɛ ya gba do. Ya warɔ te, kɛ ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa nɔ, ya bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ, ya bɛlbwa ge lole tɛ ya dɔŋa.
45012006	Kpegri Korowii aa cha ya bwa ya dɔ kokogrɔ. A chɛ kɛ ya bɛlbwa kpɔ kpegri Korowii aa sune o nɛɛ dɛ tɛo la ɛ toma. Dɛ Korowii Waa bola kpegri o kpɔ tɛɛ naa, a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ bola gɛ del he yarada aa doa.
45012007	Dɛ he dɔŋa toma kpegri Korowii tɛɛ naa, a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ ɛ gɛ. Dɛ waa bagla kpegri gee o tɛɛ naa, a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ bagle.
45012008	Dɛ nɛra gbemba doe kpegri Korowii tɛɛ naa, a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ ɛ gɛ. Dɛ dɔŋa kwaa kɛɛ kpegri o tɛɛ naa, a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ ɛa bambile bwa ne. Dɛ waa sie tɔe kpegri o tɛɛ naa, a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ ɛa tea bwa ne. Dɛ wedɛɛga ɛɛ kpegri o tɛɛ naa, a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ ɛa tepoŋ ne.
45012009	Hɛ́ɛ nyin dɔŋa bambile bwa ne. Hé hah wechɔga te bɛlbwa, dɛ lawɛ wedɛɛga te bɛlbwa bini kpoŋe kiŋkiŋ.
45012010	Hé lawɛ dɔŋa kɛ nyabii, dɛɛ tɛ dɔŋa duure gwaa gɛ haa dɛ lii he te gbagba.
45012011	Hé laa bɔhwaah kpɔ he waa bini, dɛ do gbemba dɛɛ tomɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo.
45012012	Haa dɔ hwɛga nomanta, hé gel he sie lɛ. Wobɛlbwa pu heya aa, hé lawɛ bambile. Hé swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ soŋe Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa.
45012013	Hɛ́ɛ tɛ he dɔŋa asɔre tena ba soga bini aa kpega tɛɛ ba he kwaa haa dɔa la ane. He bɛ hɔɔhra dɛɛ doŋi he deremi.
45012014	Hé soŋe wedɛɛga Korowii be dɛɛ tɛ nɛra baa chegɛ he nɛ. Hé soŋe andɛɛga dɛɛ tɛɛ ba, he bɛ wechɔga soŋe dɛɛ tɛɛ ba.
45012015	Nɛra lɔ silɛɛ bini naa, hé puu ba he ne ba lɛ sie. Ba dɛ wi ge aa, hé ne baa wi.
45012016	Hé ne he dɔŋa so sodɛɛga. He bɛ jenu dɛɛ ɛ, he bɛ he te pere dɛɛ le nyaara ne nɛŋgwɛgra bini. He bɛ he te wejerema kohona dɛɛ lii.
45012017	He bɛ wechɔga kpɔ dɛɛ bɔ wechɔga kem. Hɛ́ɛ ɛ waa aa wera nomɛlbwa be.
45012018	Dɛ aa magroo waa, hɛɛ wonoo waa, hé takapɔ asɛ wechɔga bɛlbwa bɛ he ne nomɛlbwa baah do.
45012019	Yabala, nɛra ɛ heyaa wechɔga aa, he bɛ ane ɛ dɛɛ bɔ kem. Hé kpɔ tɛ Korowii. O baah dɛ di ba nɛɛ taeh. On dɛ bɔ ba kem, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Korowii bolɔ ŋɔ, 'Mɛɛ tɔ a pegee, mɛɛ bɔ ba a kemee.' "
45012020	He bɛ waa kem dɛɛ bɔ. Hɛ́ɛ ɛ gɛ Korowii Tɔn aa ŋɔa hɛ́ɛ ɛ la. "He dɔm chɔ lɔr aa, tɛo kondikwaa ó di. O ta nee dɔe dɛ́ nyɔ aa, tɛo ane. He ɛ ken aa, sihiih dɛ ba o kpoe o baŋa gole."
45012021	He bɛ gel liichɔga lɛ he lem. Hé kpɔ wedɛɛga dɛɛ tɔ wechɔga ŋwɛnɛ.
45013001	A chɛ kɛ nomɛlbwa siwi su o harɛ nomonome dɛɛ teŋɛ ba mmara ge ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii ta ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ yaa, nomonome aa lee do. Korowiirii cheg ba.
45013002	Nomɛlbwa waa vɛh o harɛ nomonome mmara ta teŋa la, dɛ waa Korowii aa chegaa o vɛh. Wɛɛ di bolchɔgee.
45013003	Nɛra baa dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga la, baa nomonome ɔmɛ. Wechɔg-ɛɛraa dɛɛ ɔm ba. Haa nyin kɛ hɛɛ ɔmɛ nomonome sie chega aa, amɔ dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga. He dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga aa, baa kpɛɛree,
45013004	dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii bonɔɔnaa ban. He kɛrɛdɛ waa baa ɛ ba toma la. Dɛ he dɛ ɛ wechɔga te naa, dɛɛ ɔmɛ nomonome, dɛkalkɛŋɔ pɛɛpɛɛ laa ba dɔ kpegri baa kpoŋa la. Korowiirii tɛɛ ba kpegri ásɛ ba tɛr wechɔg-ɛɛra deŋne dɛɛ tɛo.
45013005	Anomanta hé gel he siwi ɛɛ su he nomonome. Korowii bala waa dɛ ba bala dɛ ba tɛr he deŋne la gbo waa laa a chɛ kɛ he siwi ɛɛ su ba. Dɛ he siwi aa ban su aa, dɛ he gbabir liire aa gel he bambile sɔɔhne.
45013006	A waa a do wer kɛŋɔ hɛɛ bɔ lampoo ge la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nomonome baa do lampoo lɛɛ mmara nɔ la, Korowii tomaa baa ɛ gɛ la.
45013007	Anomanta komɛlbwa aa chɛ kɛ he tɛ nɛn la, tɛo. Dɛ he nyu lampoo yaa, bɔ. Dɛ he kondɔɔh bɛlbwa ge lampoo yaa, bɔ. Dɛ duuree a chɛ kɛ he tɛ nɛn aa, tɛo, dɛ jirimaa a chɛ kɛ he tɛ nɛn aa, tɛo.
45013008	He bɛ kem di wobɛlbwa ta a chɔ le kpa heyaa ka ja dɔŋa nyina ta. A gboo ɛ kem aa chɛ kɛ he di. Nomɛlbwa waa wona dɛɛ nyin o dɔŋ la, o tonɛ Korowii mmara la bwa.
45013009	Korowii mmara aa chagla kɛŋɔ, "Bɛ jwamane bɔ, bɛ nɛn kpo, bɛ ŋwɛ, bɛ gel he sie begre he dɔŋ kon la," a ne anɔ la aa kaa la bwa lɔ a gɛ mmara beŋkpoŋ nɔ waa dɛ bagle kɛ, "Nyin he dɔŋ kɛ he gbagba" nɔ ta.
45013010	Nɛn haa dɛ nyinu la, haa on wechɔgaa ɛ bwa. Naate waa dɛ nyin o dɔŋ la, dɛ o dɛ teŋɛ Korowii mmara la bwa ta.
45013011	Hɛ́ɛ nyin dɔŋa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he jemɔ kɛŋɔ tɔpere la telo. He jemɔ kɛŋɔ a telo kɛŋɔ dɛ chɔe he chɔ a, he ir! Ya lɛɛ tɔpere la joɔ tonɛ taraken dɛ gwaa gɛ saŋ yaa kpɔ ya te tɛ Yeesu dɛ pa mun dɛɛ teŋɛ o nɛɛ la.
45013012	Tɔpere waa kaa bɔr chaah la aa kanɛ kpa. Tɔɔ perɔ tonɛ. Hé gel ya gel waa aa ɛ biro bini waa ɛɛ, dɛ kpɔ bochaah laala do dɛ won yo biro bini wa.
45013013	Hé gel ya lawɛ ya te kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ do kɛ nɛra bɔr aa chaah ba nɛ, dɛ warɛ dɛ valɛ dɛɛ do gbɔga ne sennyɔdɛɛ waa toole kpa, hahnyin ne banyin ne wedoŋa toole kpa, nagrenyin ne bɔweela toole kpa.
45013014	Hé kpɔ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo waa ɛ dɔmkwa dɛ laa sie kpɔ he nɛwɛnyini mar wechɔga aa suu nɔ tetoowaa ta.
45014001	Dɛ Kristo te bɛl lole, o yarada aa wola kanɛ wɛɛ nyin o jo he bini naa, hé lɛo do he bini. He bɛ o we-ɛɛla aa korɛ he kwaa ta la dɛɛ tɔŋle.
45014002	Bɛl yarada gelɔ o won komɛlbwa dii, asɛ naate o yarada aa wola kanɛ la, o gee di papooni ne taŋna gbo, waa ol di.
45014003	Naate waa dɛ di komɛlbwa la, a ta chɛɛ kɛŋɔ wɛɛ lii naate waa wola ol di la nɛndoŋ. Naate waa wola ol di la, o bɛ naate waa dɛ di komɛlbwa wechɔg-ɛɛ dɛɛ lii, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii lɛo dɛ ɛo o bie.
45014004	Henee umeo he won pwah nomɛl bonɔɔ nɔ? O dɔɔ gbagbaa dɔ ŋwɛnɛ kɛŋɔ o won bagle kɛ o bonɔɔ dɛ ɛ waa kɛɛ waa waa ɛ. Waa ɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔ la nomanta, wɛɛ ɛ waa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ wɛɛ wonoo chao o ɛ wa.
45014005	Nomɛl ɛɛ dɛɛ liiruu kɛŋɔ tɔpere bɛl ɛ onjen gwaa bɛl, asɛ bɛl gee lii kɛŋɔ tɔpere bwa kɛrɛdɛ. A chɛ kɛ bɛlbwa jemɛ anɔ la aa wera kɛŋɔ o ɛ ne anɔ la aa wola were o nyu bini.
45014006	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ lii kɛŋɔ tɔpere bɛl ɛ onjen dɛ gwaa bɛl la, o dɛ tɛ Korowii duure, a waa wɛɛ ɛ gɛ. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ di komɛlbwa la, o dɛ tɛ Korowii duure, a waa wɛɛ ɛ gɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o dɛ jam Korowii kondikwaa la wa. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ki kondikwaa ane soo dii la, o ge dɛ tɛ Korowii duure, a waa wɛɛ ɛ gɛ. O gba dɛ jam Korowii.
45014007	Ya bini bɛlbwa toole dɛ so le dɛ tɛ o gbo, bɛlbwa ge toole o seo ɛ o gbo wa.
45014008	Yaa lɔ mkpa ta nɔ, dɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu waa ya do le. Dɛ ya baa sewɛ ge aa, dɛ onee ya sewɛ tɛ. Anomanta, ya lɔ mkpa ta noo, sewaa ya sewoo, ya Dɔɔ Yeesuu dɔ yaa.
45014009	Yeesu Kristo seo waa sewa dɛ ir la, o ɛ gɛ dɛ́ ɛ weera ne lala bwa dɔɔ.
45014010	Aah dɛ bɔkwaa gela he nɛra haa wola ol di ɛɛ pwah he bala baa dɛ di komɛlbwa nɔɔ? He banɔ la haa dɛ di komɛlbwa ge la, bɔkwaa gela hɛɛ lii he bala baa wola ol di nɛndoŋa nɔɔ? Ya bwa ɛɛ che Korowii siee, asɛ o bol ya waa dɛ pa bole.
45014011	Korowii Tɔn baglɔ kɛŋɔ, "N Naa Korowii bolɔ ŋɔ, 'N ŋwɛɛrɔ kɛŋɔ nɛra bwa ɛɛ guŋ mɛ harɛɛ, asɛ nomɛlbwa di kasinteŋ kɛŋɔ Korowiirii men.' "
45014012	Anomanta la nɔ, ya bɛlbwa ɛɛ bagle o toma waa ɛa Korowii siee.
45014013	Aa do gɛ nɔ, yá gel dɔŋa pwaeh la. Waa aa chɛ kɛ yaa ɛ laanee kɛŋɔ ya ɛ ya liire kɛŋɔ waa aa gel ya dɔŋa lɔ naa dɛ chole kɛɛ ba ɛ wechɔga la, yaa gel a ɛɛ.
45014014	Pɛɛ n ne n Dɔɔ Yeesu aa pɛa nɔ gelɔ n jemɛ kaih kɛŋɔ kondikwaa bɛlbwa toole dɛ ɛ kondikondoŋa. Kɛ dɛ nomɛl lii o nyu bini kɛŋɔ kondikwaa ane ɛ kondikondoŋa aa, dɛ a ɛ doŋa dɛ tɛo.
45014015	Dɛ he koh he kondikwaa waa dɛ gel he dɔŋ ɛ wechɔga o tea bini chɔg aa, dɛ he dɛ nyinu waa? O waa Yeesu Kristo koh dɛ sewɛ, anomanta bɛ gel he kondikwaa haa dɛ di la chɔgo.
45014016	Bɛ gel nɛra dɔ ŋwɛnɛ dɛ yerɛ waa haa dɛ liira wedɛɛga la wedoŋa.
45014017	Kondikwaa yaa dɛ di ne anɔ la yaa dɛ ki la ta wejena bɛlbwa ɛɛ Korowii Kora waa bini. Waa aa ɛ wehiah laanee kɛŋɔ gɛ yaa ɛ ya waa su Korowii siwi, ne waa aa dɛ ba deŋnesɔɔhna ne ya ne ya dɔŋa baah ta, ne silɛɛ aa le Korowii Domadɛɛge be.
45014018	Nɛn a gɛ waa nɔ aa hiaoh Yeesu Kristo toma bini la, Korowii sie dɛ lɛ o nɛ, asɛ o wa ɛɛ su nɛwɛnyini ge siwi.
45014019	Anomanta la, a chɛ kɛ ya gel ya siwi swɛɛ waa aa dɛ ba deŋnesɔɔhna ne, ne waa aa dɛ ba gela ya dɔŋa che kiŋkiŋ ta.
45014020	Bɛ kondikwaa waa koh dɛ chɔg waa Korowii aa ɛa. Ya won kondikwaa bɛlbwa dii, kɛ aa were kɛŋɔ ya di kondikwaa aa dɛ ba nɛn ne wechɔga ta laŋa.
45014021	Waa aa togra kɛ hɛɛ ɛ laanee kɛŋɔ ol dii ne sen nyɔe, ne wobɛlbwa aa dɛ ba wona gel he dɔŋ lɔ naa chole la, a chɛ kɛ he laa he te kpɔ a ta.
45014022	Gɛ he liire aa dɛ ɛɛ kondikwaa dii be pera la, kpoŋe a bini gɛ ásɛ a do he ne Korowii gbo baah ta. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ a ŋwɛnɛ taa wɛɛ ɛa, aa wola o liire bini aahna-aahna ɛ la, o na som!
45014023	Kɛ dɛ o dɛ di komɛl dɛɛ ɛ aahna-aahna kɛŋɔ o ɛ kondoŋ kɛɛ o ta kondoŋ ɛɛ yaa, Korowii ɛɛ pao bolchɔgee kɛŋɔ waa dɛ diu, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o waa waa dɛ ɛ la, waa an ɛ yarada ne. Wobɛlbwa ge nɛn aa dɛ ɛ waa wola an ɛ yarada ne, o liire aa wola on kɛrɛdɛ do a ta la, a ɛ wechɔga.
45015001	Ya nɛra ya yarada aa kana la, a chɛ kɛ yaa lawɛ bambile banɔ la ba yarada aa wola kanɛ la nɛɛ dɛɛ cha ba. A ta chɛɛ kɛ yaa ɛ ya gbo tetoowa.
45015002	A chɛ kɛ ya bɛlbwa ɛɛ ɛ waa aa wera dɛɛ tɛ ya dɔŋa ásɛ a cha ba asɛ ba won che kiŋkiŋ.
45015003	Yeesu Kristo aa lɔ harɛ ta la, dɛ o tetoowaa laa wɛɛ ɛ. Korowii Tɔn bolɔ ŋɔ, "Korowii, chɛga baa chɛgɛ la, anee ba kpɔ tɛ mɛ."
45015004	Wobɛlbwa ba faa chwera la, dɛ yanee ba chwera tɛ kɛŋɔ yá hweli waa le a ta. A gɛ waa nɔɔ dɛɛ ja yaa bambile dɔe ta, dɛɛ do yaa gbemba, ásɛ a che a ta ya dɔ hwɛga.
45015005	Korowii waa dɛ tɛ nɛn bambile dɛɛ do gbemba la, on dɛ tɛ heyaa nyopɛo teŋa haa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ la ta,
45015006	ásɛ he pɛ dɛ kpɔ nyopɛo kpɛɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo Mɛɛ Korowii.
45015007	Anomanta la nɔ, hé lɛ nɛra dɛɛ ja he nɛɛ gɛ Yeesu Kristo aa lɛ heyaa la, ásɛ nɛra na dɛ tɛ Korowii jirima,
45015008	dɛkalkɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo wono ɛ toma Israel tena bini asɛ dɛ chagle kɛ Korowii waa dɔ kasinteŋ. Anee Korowii ɛ dɛ chugri o nyobaga waa bagɛ Israel tena naanar la,
45015009	ásɛ a che a ta nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ la ge kpɛɛ Korowii kɛŋɔ waa dɛ sune nɛra nɛɛ kohona. Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bobɛl kɛŋɔ, "Anomanta mɛɛ yerɛ he sɔn nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ baahnee, dɛ go yela kpɛɛre."
45015010	dɛ berɛ chagle bobɛl ge ŋɔ, "He nɛra haa wola Israel tena ɛɛ, hé pu Israel tena hɛgre,"
45015011	dɛ berɛ chwerɛ ŋɔ, "Nɛra haa wola Israel tena ɛɛ, hé bwa jam N Naa Korowii, dɛ go yela kpɛɛro."
45015012	Asɛ Aesaya ge bol ja, dɛ ŋɔ, "Jese naa bɛl ɛɛ bao. On dɛ ir dɛ di kora nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ nɛ. O nɛɛ baa ba hwɛga dɔe."
45015013	Korowii waa gela ya dɔ hwɛga Yeesu nɛɛ la, ó tɛ heyaa silɛɛ ne bansɔɔhna he yarada haa dɛ yarada Korowii la ta, asɛ Kórowii Domadɛɛge ge cha heyaa asɛ he won dɛɛ hwɛgɛ Yeesu nɛɛ kohona.
45015014	Yabalawa, n gbabir jemɔ kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ he dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga taeh. He jemɛ waa kohona, dɛ won dɔŋa waa bagla ge.
45015015	He nyiŋo na naa, n tɔn nɔ maa chwerɔ nɔ, n di heyaa kasinteŋ waane ta dɛɛ lii heya. Korowii aa sune n nɛɛ dɛ kpɔ o toma nɔ do n nɔn ta ŋɔ mɛ́ɛ bagle nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ la, a waa n won di heyaa kasinteŋ gɛ la. Maa dɛ bol Yeesu Amanesoma la dɛɛ bagle he nɛra haa wola Israel tena ɛɛ la, n kpɔ n te ɛ kɛŋɔ Sɔfo waa lɛ nɛra kwaa ɛ saraha dɛɛ tɛɛ ba Korowii Dea bini la. N dɛ nyin he no a waa dɛ yaradaa ásɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge won laa he doŋa kpɔ he nɛɛ asɛ he ɛ Korowii nɛra. Belaa ń won kpɔ heyaa tɛ Korowii kɛŋɔ baa ɛ saraha dɛɛ tɛo la, asɛ he waa su o siwi o lɛ heya.
45015017	N ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa nomanta, n won n te maŋkurae toma maa ɛa dɛɛ tɛ Korowii nɔ ta.
45015018	Waa Yeesu Kristo aa chegɛ n nɛɛ dɛ ɛ he nɛra haa wola Israel tena ɛɛ bini la, maa lii kɛŋɔ mɛɛ won bol anfala ane ja a ta. A gbo waa n jemɛ. Anee kɛŋɔ taraken haa yarada Korowii waa nɔ. Waa Yeesu aa cha mɛ mɛɛ bol dɛɛ bagle heya, ne waa waa cha mɛ mɛɛ ɛ,
45015019	ne wekpega ne nyokpowaa Korowii Domadɛɛge la kpegri aa gela mɛɛ ɛ la bwa gelɔ he yarada Korowii waa nɔ. Taraken nɔ, le Jerusalam ka le Ilirikumwa le bwa, n bol Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma nɔ bela.
45015020	N ɛ n liire wubwa kɛŋɔ mɛɛ bol Yeesu Amanesoma nɔɔ. Kɛ harɛre baa bol o waa a ta la, a ta laa mɛɛ bola. A waa laa aa, dɛ nomɛl toma waa pa a mun cheg la taa n kpɔ dɛɛ choŋi la.
45015021	Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Nɛra nomɛlbwa aa wola o waa bolɛ ba be ka la, baa no o waa, dɛ jemɔ."
45015022	Anɔ waa maa wola bɔr dɔe dɛ ba he be kera aŋwɛnɛ bwa la.
45015023	Kɛ taraken nɔ maa tonɛ n toma bonɔ nɔ, asɛ n sie che chiŋ bene aŋwɛnɛ nɔ bwa kɛŋɔ ń ba na heyaa nɔ,
45015024	n dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ n ba dɛ kaa Speen harɛ ta naa, ń na heya. N jemɔ kɛŋɔ n baa so he be tɔpera anɛ, dɛ le bela dɛɛ kaa Speen harɛ ta naa, hɛɛ cha mɛɛ.
45015025	Taraken nɔ, kwaane nee mɛɛ ba ń ba kaa Jerusalam dɛ ka tɛ Korowii nɛra baa lɔ bela la.
45015026	Ba bala baa lɔ Makidoonia harɛ ne Akaaya harɛ tata koŋkwaare ane ŋɔ ń kpɔ ka tɛ Jerusalam Korowii nɛra ba soga bini aa kpega tɛɛ ba la.
45015027	Ba sie lɛo kɛŋɔ baa ta kwaa la la. Kasinteŋ, baa won jam Jerusalam Korowii nɛra la ka tonɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ Korowii aa cha Israel tena asɛ nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ di ba tɔnɔ la, gɛɛ a chɛ kɛ dɛ nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ la ge dɔ harɛ bonɔ kwaa aa, Israel tena ge di ba tɔnɔ.
45015028	Dɛ n kpɔ ba suuga bwa ka do ba nɔn ta tonaa, mɛɛ ba kaa Speen harɛ taa. Kɛ mɛɛ che he bee.
45015029	N jemɔ kɛŋɔ dɛ n ba he be naa, Yeesu Kristo ɛɛ cha mɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ ásɛ n ge ba cha heyaa kohona.
45015030	Yabalawa, n kpɔ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo ne nyina Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa gela yaa nyin dɔŋa la dɛɛ soŋe heyaa kɛŋɔ he cha mɛ dɛ swɛɛ siwi soŋe Korowii tɛ mɛ.
45015031	Hé soŋe Korowii tɛ mɛ ásɛ o kpɔ nɔn tɔ n nɛɛ Judia harɛ tena baa wola Yeesu yarada la bini, ásɛ waa maa dɛ la ka ɛ Jerusalam Korowii nɛra bini la, bá sie lɛ a ta,
45015032	asɛ dɛ Korowii sɛoh waa, ń ba he be silɛɛ ne, dɛ ba onɛ tama.
45015033	Korowii waa dɛ tɛ yaa deŋnesɔɔhna la, ó cha he bwa. Aamen.
45016001	Yɔɔ. Ya nimambie nɔ sɔne Fiibi. Asɔre tena baa lɔ Keŋkrea la binii o do dɛɛ ɛ toma.
45016002	Hé lɛo ja he nɛɛ gɛ aa chɛ kɛ Korowii nɛra lɛ ba dɔŋ la ya Dɔɔ Yeesu nomanta. Komɛlbwa waa dɛɛ nyin dɛ le he be la, hé chao, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o gba cha Korowii nɛra taeh. N gbabir nɔ, o cha mɛ ka.
45016003	N dɛ na Presela ne Akwela n ne ba bwa aa dɛ ɛ Yeesu Kristo toma nɔ la.
45016004	Ba fa koh n waa dɛ kpɔ ba nyuune charɛ seo. N ne asɔre tena baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la bwaa dɛɛ jam ba.
45016005	N dɛ na asɔre tena baa cheme ba dem dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii la bwa. N dɛ na n chamenate Epiniitus waa tɔ sie yarada Yeesu Kristo waa nɔ Eesia harɛ ta bwa la.
45016006	N dɛ na Mɛɛre waa dɛ ɛ toma he bini ga la.
45016007	Hé ŋɔ n bwɛɛ tena Andronikus ne Junias ba faa do n ne ba dea ka la be ŋɔ n dɛ na ba. Ba ɛ nɛra bane ba sɔn aa lea Yeesu toroma bini. Ba tɔ sie ɛ asɔre tena n nɛ.
45016008	N dɛ na Ampelatos waa ɛ n chamenate ya Dɔɔ Yeesu nɛɛ teŋa ta la.
45016009	N dɛ na Ɔrbanus ya ne o bwa aa dɛ ɛ Yeesu Kristo toma nɔ la, ne n chamena Stakes.
45016010	N dɛ na Apeles wekpega aa puu o ta che kiŋkiŋ Yeesu Kristo waa nɔ ta la. N dɛ na Aristobulus dem tena bwa.
45016011	N dɛ na n bwɛɛ te Herodion. N dɛ na Nasesos dem tena la baa ɛ asɔre tena la bwa.
45016012	N dɛ na n nimambii Trefiina ne Trefosa ba bwa aa dɛ ɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu toma nɔ la. Hé ŋɔ n nimambie Pɛɛses nomɛlbwa aa dɛ nyin o waa la be ŋɔ n dɛ nao. O ge koh ya Dɔɔ Yeesu toma nɔ ta ga.
45016013	N dɛ na Rufus o sɔn aa lea ya Dɔɔ Yeesu toma nɔ ta la, ne o nya waa nyiŋ mɛ kɛ n gbagba nya la.
45016014	N dɛ na Asiŋkritus, ne Flegɔn, ne Hɛɛmes ne Patroba, ne Hɛɛmas, ne yabala baa jaa la bwa.
45016015	N dɛ na Faelolɔgɔs, ne Julia, ne Nɛɛreɔs ne o nimambihaah, ne Ɔlempas, ne Korowii nɛra ba ne baa lɔ bela la bwa.
45016016	Hɛ́ɛ lea dɔŋa kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ nyabii. Nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ la bwa dɛ na heya.
45016017	Yabala, n dɛ soŋe heyaa kɛŋɔ hɛɛ nyiŋi nɛra baa gela he baah nɛɛ pegri dɛɛ bagle waa a ne Yeesu Kristo waa baa bagle heyaa nɔ aa wola jo asɛ dɛɛ vuugi heyaa la. Hé jem ba dɛɛ ke he te ba nɛ.
45016018	A gɛ nɛra nɔ, ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo laa baa tomɛ. Waa ba sie aa dɛ lɛ a ta la, anee baa ɛ. Nyotor ne nyosone nee baa negre nɛra baa wola wobɛlbwa jemɛ la.
45016019	Nɛra bwa dɛ bol he teŋa haa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu waa la ta waa bobɛlbwa, anomanta n sie lɛ he nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ. Kɛ n dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ he ɛ wejerema wedɛɛga ɛɛ bɔr, asɛ dɛ ɛ nɛra haa wola wobɛlbwa jemɛ wechɔga ɛɛ be pera.
45016020	Korowii waa dɛ tɛ yaa deŋnesɔɔhna la aa bigri chɔg Bɔnsam ne o toma asɛ he tigri o nɛ. Yá Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya.
45016021	Timoti n ne waa dɛ ɛ toma la dɛ na heya. Lusias ne Jasen, ne Sosipata ba bwa aa ɛ n bwɛɛ tena la dɛ na heya.
45016022	Men Tɛɛseɔs Pɔɔl aa gela n chwerɛ tɔn nɔ tɛo la, n ge dɛ na heyaa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo sɔn ta.
45016023	N Pɔɔl dea te Gayos dɛ na heya. O deemii bonɔ asɔre tena ɛɛ cheme. Erastos waa dɛ cheg bwɛɛ nɔ suuga la, o ne ya dɔŋ Kwaatos bwa dɛ na heya.
45016025	Hé gel ya jam Korowii. Wɛɛ wonoo gel he che kiŋkiŋ Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma maa dɛ bol he be la ta. Korowii pili a gɛ waa nɔ bini. Anee fa ɛ wesɔɔhla saŋ la bwa la,
45016026	kɛ taraken te, o chegɛ o keamere waa baa chwera la ta dɛ le a bwa ne baŋ. Korowii waa lole saŋ bɛlbwa la tɛ ŋwɛnɛ taraken ŋɔ nɛ́ra bol o waa la. O ɛ gɛ ásɛ ba bola dɛɛ bagle nɛra bwa ásɛ ba yaradaa dɛ teŋɛ a ta.
45016027	Hé gel ya che Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ jam Korowii o gbo aa ɛ Korowii, dɛ gbo jemɛ wobɛlbwa la. O jirima aa tonɛ bwa! Aamen.
46001001	Menee Pɔɔl aa too Korowii tea asɛ o lee mɛ ŋɔ ń ba ɛ Yeesu torome la. N ne n dɔŋ Sɔɔstenes bwaa chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ he asɔre tena haa lɔ Kɔrent dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii la.
46001002	Korowiirii le heya, dɛ koh pɛɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la waa dɛ laa doŋa bɛlbwa kpɔ he nɛɛ dɛ gel he ɛ o nɛra. Ya dɛ chwerɛ he ne nɛra baa lɔ bobɛlbwa dɛɛ tomɛ ya ne ba bwa Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo la.
46001003	Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
46001004	N dɛ jam Korowii tɔpere bɛlbwa kɛ waa koh pɛɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la waa dɛ sune he nɛɛ dɛɛ cha heyaa nɔ.
46001005	He ne waa pɛa la nomanta, o ja heyaa kpegri ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta. O gelɔ he jemɛ wobol, dɛ tɛ heyaa wejema, asɛ a bagle kɛŋɔ
46001006	Yeesu Kristo waa la ya faa bol he be la jo he bambile bini kɛrɛdɛ.
46001007	Anomanta taraken haa kpɔ hwɛga dɛɛ kpa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo bala nɔ, wobɛlbwa kpegri ta heyaa nyae le Korowii be.
46001008	Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nɔɔ dɛɛ ba gela he che kiŋkiŋ ka tel he serewe bena asɛ awola tɔpere waa ba la, wechɔga bɛlbwa bɛ he nɛɛ do.
46001009	Korowii ɛ kasinteŋ te. Onee le heyaa ŋɔ hé ne o Bie la do som. O Bie laanee ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo la.
46001010	Yabala, n kpɔ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo dɛɛ soŋe heyaa kɛ hé bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ. He bɛ dɔŋa baahna pegri, hé gel he nyoa pɛ he we-ɛɛla ne he liire ta.
46001011	Yabala, nɛra bane le Kloi dem dɛ ba ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, webegra chole he bini bane baah ta, a waa n bol a gɛ waa nɔ la.
46001012	N noɔ kɛ bane ŋɔ ba teŋɛ n Pɔɔl nɛ, bane ge ŋɔ ba teŋɛ Apolos nɛ, asɛ bane ge ŋɔ Pita nɛɛ ba te teŋɛ, bane ge ŋɔ ba teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛ.
46001013	Hé na! Yeesu Kristo binii he bɔne la! N Pɔɔlee ba koh he waa kpaa pɛl dagagre ta la aa? Kɛɛ n sɔn nee ba sɔ heyaa Korowii nee ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ teŋɛ n nɛɛ la? Akai!
46001014	N dɛ jam Korowii kɛ gɛ saŋ n faa lɔ he be la, n ta nomɛlbwa Korowii nee sɔe ka ja Krispus ne Gayos nɛ.
46001015	Anomanta nomɛlbwa toole dɛ won ŋɔ n sɔ heyaa Korowii nee ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ teŋɛ n nɛ.
46001016	Dɛ Steeven ne o dem tena ge laa n berɛ sɔ Korowii ne aa, maa lii kɛŋɔ n sɔ nomɛl nee kpa.
46001017	Yeesu Kristo fe ta men tomɛ ŋɔ ń baa sɔ nɛra Korowii ne. O ŋɔ ń ba bol Amanesoma la nɛra be, kɛ n bɛ n gbagba wejema ne nyotor kpɔ dɛɛ bol waa la, ásɛ Yeesu sewa waa sewɛ dagagre ta la bɛ pɛɛpɛɛ ɛ.
46001018	O dagagre la ta seo la yaa dɛ bol a waa la ɛ wesale tɛ nɛra baa dɛ nyogre. Kɛ ya banɔ la Korowii aa dɛ lɛ yaa la te, ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii kpegri lɔ a ta.
46001019	Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ Korowii ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ geloo nɛra wejema ne tɔn jema ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ."
46001020	A ba gɛ naa, dɛ lee wejerema ne tɔn jerema wejema dɔɔ jaɔ? Nɛra baa dɔ wobol wejema ge, dɛ lee ba dɔɔ? Korowii gelɔ nɛwɛnyini wejema ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ.
46001021	Ba gbagba wejema gelɔ baa Korowii jemɛ. Korowii kpɔ o wejema ɛa gɛ, dɛ ŋɔ a ɛo silɛɛ kɛ wɛɛ lɛ nɛra baa yarada Amanesoma yaa bola dɛɛ bagle nɛra asɛ baa liira wesale la.
46001022	Juda tena dɛ nyin ya ɛ nyokpowaa bag ba, Grik tena gee nyin kɛ ya bag ba wejema mɔɔ ba yarada.
46001023	Ya te, Yeesu Kristo sewa dagagre ta la waa yaa bol. A ɛ waa Juda tena aa dɛ lɔ naa a ta dɛɛ vɛah, asɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ ge la, a ɛ wesale ba be.
46001024	Kɛ Juda tena ne Grik tena Korowii aa lee ba ŋɔ bá ba ɛ o nɛra la, Yeesu Kristo waa la ɛ Korowii kpegri ne o wejema ba te be.
46001025	Korowii wesale gwaa nɛwɛnyini wejema, o gwɛgra ge gwaa nɛwɛnyini kpegri.
46001026	Yabala, hé lii gɛ haa doa asɛ Korowii le heyaa ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ teŋɛ o nɛɛ la. He galga ta wejerema ɛɛ nɛra be. He galga ge ta nɛnjena ɛɛ nɛra be. He bwa ge laa ɛ koobii.
46001027	Korowiirii saahna le waa nɛra aa dɛ liira wesale dɛ́ gel sihiih kpo wejerema, asɛ dɛ saah le gwɛgra ge dɛ́ gel sihiih kpo kpegnɛra,
46001028	dɛ kpɔ waa nɛra siwi aa wola an su ne anɔ la baa dɛ liira wepuu, ne anɔ la baa wola a waa jemɛ ŋɔ á ba chɔg anɔ la nɛra aa dɛ maŋkuraa la,
46001029	asɛ nɛn bɛ won gɔɔ o te Korowii sie.
46001030	Korowiirii gela he ne Yeesu Kristo pɛ, asɛ ya che o nɛɛ dɛ dɔ Korowii wejema. O nɛɛ a che Korowii na yaa kɛ nɛndɛɛga dɛ berɛ kpɔ yaa ɛ o kwa. Onee kpɔ seo dɛ yawɛ yaa le ya wenaale ta.
46001031	Anomanta gɛ Korowii Tɔn la aa ŋɔa la: "Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin o te maŋkurae la, wɛɛ maŋkura o te waa Korowii aa ɛa ta."
46002001	Yabala, a gɛ saŋ n faa ba he be dɛ ba di Korowii waa danseɛ he be la, nyotor ne nɛwɛnyini wejema laa n kpɔ bol waa bagle heya.
46002002	Maa lɔ he be la, dɛ maa nyin kɛ n kpɔ wejema ane ja n wobol ta, nemenɛ Yeesu Kristo seo waa sewa dagagre la ta la wa.
46002003	N faa lɔ he be la, n ta kpegri dii he nɛ. Ɔmee ne bochela nee n ɛ toma he bini.
46002004	N webagla bini la, n ta wejema kpɔe bol waa bagle heyaa ásɛ he sie lɛ. Kɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge laanee di n wobol la danseɛ dɛ gel a do kpegri.
46002005	Anomanta nɛn wejema ta laa a che hɛɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo dɛɛ teŋɛ o nɛ. Korowii kpegri la taa a che.
46002006	Ya dɛ bol wejema waa te dɛɛ bagle nɛra ba sie aa chaah Korowii waa ta kɛrɛdɛ. Wejema yaa dɛ bagle a waa nɔ ta harɛ nɔ ta nɛra ne ba nɛnjena wejema ɛɛ. Ba te ɛɛ ba ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ.
46002007	Korowii wejema waa yaa bagle. A fa sɔɔh, nɛwɛnyini faa wola a waa jemɛ. A ɛ waa Korowii aa ɛa cheg yaa mɔɔ dɛ ta harɛ nɔ, ásɛ a ba cha yaa ya dɔ jirima.
46002008	Harɛ nɔ ta nomonjena fa ta a gɛ wejema nɔ mun noɛ. Dɛ ba fe no a mun aa, ba fe ta gelɛ ba kpo ya Dɔɔ la waa dɔ jirima la dagagre ta.
46002009	A gɛ waa nɔ waa ba faa chwerɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "Waa nomɛlbwa aa wola a dɔŋa nae, nomɛlbwa aa wola a waa noɛ, nomɛlbwa ge aa wola an liire laanee Korowii ɛ cheg nɛra baa dɛ nyin o wa."
46002010	Kɛ Korowii chegɛ o Domadɛɛge la ta dɛɛ bagle yaa a waa ásɛ ya won no a mun. O Domadɛɛge la dɛ na wobɛlbwa bini kɛrɛdɛ, hale dɛ jemɛ Korowii wesɔɔhla gba.
46002011	Nomɛlbwa aa o dɔŋ nyu bini jemɛ, nemenɛ naate gbagba. Gɛɛ a do nɛwɛnyini aa wola waa aa lɔ Korowii be jemɛ. O Domadɛɛge gbosoroo jemɛ o nyu bini.
46002012	Ya te, liire yaa dɔa ta harɛ nɔ ta liire ɛɛ. Korowiirii kpɔa tɛ yaa. O kpɔ o Domadɛɛge tɛ yaa o do ya nɛ. Anee gela ya jemɛ kwaa waa tɛ yaa la.
46002013	Yaa dɛ bol waa nɔ, yaa nɛwɛnyini wejema ta chegɛ dɛɛ bola. Korowii Domadɛɛge laanee dɛɛ bagle yaa waa yaa bol. Anɔ la waa bol la, anee ya ge kpɔ dɛɛ bagle o wa.
46002014	Nomɛlbwa Korowii Domadɛɛge aa wola toole o nɛɛ la, o dɛ vɛh o Domadɛɛge la wa. A ɛ wesale tɛ naate, waa a mun no, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge gboo gela nɛn ɛɛ no Korowii waa mun.
46002015	Nɛn Korowii Domadɛɛge aa lɔ o nɛɛ la jemɛ wobɛlbwa ŋwɛnɛre. Kɛ nɛn waa wola toole o nɛɛ la aa won jemɛ naate waa lɔ o nɛɛ la ŋwɛnɛre.
46002016	Korowii Tɔn bini ba pɛɛrɔ ŋɔ, "Nɛn besoo dɛ won jemɛ Korowii liire o? Umee dɛ won baglo waɔ?" Kɛ ya te dɔ Yeesu Kristo liire.
46003001	Yabala, n fa ta wone bol waa bagle heyaa kɛrɛdɛ gɛ maa dɛ bagle nɛra Korowii Domadɛɛge aa chaah ba sie la. N bola tɛ heyaa kɛ nɛra ba taa dɛ teŋɛ ba nɛwɛnyini mar waa ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he do kɛŋɔ bechale ken Yeesu Kristo waa la ta.
46003002	Wobopwɛra nee n faa bagle heyaa waa kɛŋɔ baa dɛ ɔr bechala waa wola tele ne kondikwaa dii la. Hale taraken kwara he ta tele mɔɔ,
46003003	dɛkalkɛŋɔ he ta dɛ teŋɛ nɛwɛnyini mar ta. Bɔweela ne nagra aa lɔ he baah ta nɔ, nɛwɛnyini mar nɛɛ laa hɛɛ teŋɛ nɔ naa? Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ dɛ he dɔ gɛ da nɔ naa, he ja nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta liire nɛɛ kɛɛ?
46003004	Dɛ he bane ŋɔ he dɛ teŋɛ n Pɔɔl nɛ, asɛ he bane ge ŋɔ ba dɛ teŋɛ Apolos nɛ aa, amɔ dɛ he ne nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ ba nɛwɛnyini mar ta la da beŋkpoŋ.
46003005	Bamewaa Apolos ne Pɔɔl hɛɛ maŋkura ba gɛ nɔɔ? Tom-ɛɛra gboo yaa. Korowii tomɛ yaa he be, asɛ he no Yeesu waa dɛ yaradaa dɛ kpɔ he te tɛo. Toma Korowii aa kpɔa tɛ ya bini bɛlbwa laanee yaa ɛ.
46003006	Ya fa do kɛŋɔ nɛra baa dɛ du kwaa dɛ do he bini. Menee dua, asɛ Apolos ge ka ba dɛ ba do nee a ta. Korowiirii gela kwaa la le dɛ kpeg.
46003007	Anomanta nɛn waa dɛ du kwaa ne onɔ la waa dɛ do nee a ta la te bɛlbwa aa won waane ɛ. Korowii gbosoroo won waa ɛɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ onee gela kwaa won lee, dɛɛ kpeg.
46003008	Nɛn waa dɛ du kwaa ne onɔ la waa dɛ do nee a ta la te bɛlbwa ta korɛ. Korowii dɛ bɔ bɛlbwa kem gɛ aa chɛa.
46003009	Korowiirii dɔ yaa, ya ne o pɛ dɛɛ ɛ toma. Asɛ he ge do kɛŋɔ o koo waa dɛ parɛ ne o dea waa dɛ do.
46003010	Korowiirii cha mɛ n won ɛ toma kɛŋɔ nɛn waa jemɛ dea mae kɛrɛdɛ la, dɛ pa dea la mun, asɛ nomɛl ge ba ma dɛɛ chɔŋɛ. Kɛ bɛ́lbwa nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ gɛ waa maa dɛɛ chɔŋɛ.
46003011	Yeesu Kristo gboo Korowii den kpɔ cheg kɛ dea mumpar. Dɛ Yeesu laa aa, nomɛlbwa toole yá che o nɛɛ o lɛ yaa.
46003012	A do kɛŋɔ bane aa kpɔ suugaswɛm, bane kpɔ suugapoŋ, bane kpɔ bwedɛɛga dɛ ma chɔŋɛ dea la mumpar la ta, asɛ bane ge kpɔ daa ne kpɔga ne jaage sɛɛh dɛ ma chɔŋɛ.
46003013	Dɛ Korowii tɔpere waa dɛ ba nɛra bwa waa bola dɛ pa bole la telaa, belaa baa ba nae gɛ bɛlbwa toma aa doa. Awola tɔpere la, niinii dɛɛ ba toma nomɛlbwa aa ɛa la wer bini bagla.
46003014	Dɛ nii la jo toma haa ɛa chɔŋɛ dea la mumpar la ta dɛ a ta fueh yaa, Korowii ɛɛ bɔe a kemee.
46003015	Kɛ dɛ nomɛl toma fuoh waa, Korowii ɛɛ lɛ naatee, kɛ wɛɛ paŋɛ komɛlbwaa. Wɛɛ ɛo kɛŋɔ kon baa keeru le nii ta ken.
46003016	Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ he chegɔ tɛ Korowii Dea asɛ o Domadɛɛge la so he bini kɛɛ?
46003017	Anomanta nomɛlbwa waa chɔg Korowii Dea la, Korowii ɛɛ chɔg naatee, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o Dea la waa doa la ɛ dea doŋa bɛlbwa aa wola toole o ta. Heyaa o Dea la.
46003018	He bɛ he te dɛɛ negre. Dɛ he bini bɛl lole dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ o dɔ harɛ nɔ ta wejema aa, ó ɛ o te gɛne ásɛ dɛ dɔ Korowii wejema tenten.
46003019	Harɛ nɔ ta wejema ɛ wesale Korowii be. Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini dɛ ŋɔ, "Nɛra kpɔ wejema ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga, kɛ Korowii dɛ lag ba."
46003020	Ba chwerɛ o bobɛl ge ŋɔ, "Korowii jemɛ harɛ nɔ ta wejerema liire kɛŋɔ a ɛ wepuu."
46003021	Anomanta he bɛ bane kpɔ dɛɛ ta nyoa. Komɛlbwa chɔ le dɛ tɛ heya.
46003022	Pɔɔl ne Apolos ne Pita, nyundua ne harɛ, mkpa ne seo, kwaa aa lole fini ne kerekere oo, heyaa dɔ a bwa.
46003023	Yeesu Kristo gee dɔ heya, asɛ Korowii ge dɔ Yeesu Kristo.
46004001	A wer kɛ hɛɛ yerɛ yaa Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔna. Korowii bagle yaa o wesɔɔhla dɛ kpɔ do ya nɔn ta ŋɔ yáa bagle nɛra.
46004002	Waa aa chɛ nɛn baa kpɔ waa do o nɔn ta laanee kɛŋɔ o gel o waa dɔ kasinteŋ.
46004003	Dɛ he dɛ kpɛɛ mɛ kɛɛ he dɛ chɔg mɛ noo, n waane laa. Nɛwɛnyini laa dɛ won bol n waa dɛ pa mɛ bole. N gbabir aa won kpɛɛ n te dɛ chɔg n te.
46004004	N ta wechɔga bɛlbwa nae n waa bini te, kɛ a ta baglɛ kɛ mɛɛ di bolee. N Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristoo dɛɛ ba n waa bola dɛ pa bole.
46004005	Anomanta he bɛ nomɛlbwa kpɛɛ kɛɛ dɛ chɔgo ka tel kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo aa ba. Dɛ o balaa, wobɛlbwa aa sɔah la ɛɛ le bochaahnee, wedɛɛga oo, wechɔga oo, a bwa ɛɛ leo, asɛ wobɛlbwa aa sɔah dɛ do nɛwɛnyini bambile bini la chɔ baŋ, asɛ Korowii kpɛɛ nomɛlbwa gɛ aa chɛo.
46004006	Yabala, n kpɔ toma n ne Apolos aa ɛa la dɛ che a ta dɛ bagle waa nɔ, ásɛ he no a mun dɛ jemɛ waa aa wera kɛŋɔ he ɛ. Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ: He bɛ ɛ garɛ gɛ baa chwera Korowii Tɔn bini la. He bɛ bane kpɔ gwaa bane dɛ́ɛ maŋkura he te.
46004007	Umee ŋɔ he be ŋɔ he gwaa bane ɔ? Wobɛlbwa haa jema la, Korowiirii tɛɛ. Bɛ nyoa dɛɛ ta a do kɛŋɔ Korowii laa kpɔ waa haa jema la kɛɛ.
46004008	He dɛ lii kɛŋɔ he dɔ komɛlbwa a magre he ne, he ɛ dɔɔhna. He berɔ garɛ yaa dɛɛ di kora. Dɛ he fe dɛ di kora kpela te naa, a fe bɔ. Ya ne he bwa fe ɛ koranar.
46004009	N te be, Korowii gelɔ ya banɔ nɔ yaa ɛ Yeesu toroma nɔ ka mun, dɛ do kɛŋɔ nɛra baa lag ba dɛɛ la ka kpoo ba, asɛ nɛra bwa ɛɛ nyiŋ ba, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nyundua toroma ne nɛra bwa dɛ nyiŋi yaa.
46004010	Yeesu Kristo nomanta ya ɛ gɛna nɛra be, kɛ he dɛ yerɛ he te wejerema o waa ta. Ya ɛ nɛŋgwɛgra nɛra be, kɛ he ɛ he te o kpegnɛra. Ba dɛ duu heya, dɛ lawɛ ya te sie dɛɛ tegɛ harɛ.
46004011	Lɔr ne nyɔgre dɛ kpo yaa, yakwanee yaa tɔ, nɛra ɛɛ lɔɔ yaa, ya ta sobɔr dɔe dɛ kpoŋe ba le fini.
46004012	Ya bokpega taa yaa di. Nɛra hah yaa dɛɛ chɛgre yaa, kɛ ya te soŋe wedɛɛga dɛɛ tɛɛ ba. Ba dɛ ɛ yaa hɔhɔrɔwa, kɛ ya te sɔɔh bwara dɛɛ tɛɛ ba.
46004013	Nɛra dɛ chɔg ya sɔn, kɛ ya te dɛ kwaa ba sɔn. Ya do kɛŋɔ puldoa haahra nɛra be, hale ba le fini.
46004014	N ta gɛ waa nɔ chwerɛ ba tɛ heyaa dɛ́ gel sihiih kpo heya, kɛ jae mɛɛ ja heya, haa ɛ n bidɛɛga maa dɛ nyin heyaa la nomanta.
46004015	Dɛ he dɔ nɛra ba warɛ pirim dɛ won cha heyaa Yeesu Kristo ŋwɛnɛ ta naa, n gboo ta he mɛɛ. Menee tɔ sie bol Amanesoma la he be. A taa n che ɛ he mɛɛ Yeesu Kristo waa ta.
46004016	Anomanta n dɛ soŋe heya, hé kpɔ n da.
46004017	A waa gela n tomɛ Timoti he be la. O ɛ n bie maa dɛ nyinu, wɛɛ no n deŋna waa Yeesu Kristo toma nɔ ta. Wɛɛ lii heyaa gɛ maa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo waa la ta. Gɛ maa dɛ bagle asɔrere ta bobɛlbwa laanee wɛɛ ba heyaa liira.
46004018	He bane dɛ bagle he te dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ maa ba dɛ ba na heyaa kpa.
46004019	Dɛ Korowii sɛoh waa, aa bigri mɛɛ ba he bee dɛ gbagba ba na kpegri nɛra baa dɛ bagle ba te la aa dɔa. Ba wobol gbo ta laa n ŋɔ.
46004020	Korowii Kora bini doe ta nyoa wobol pɛɛpɛɛ ɛɛ. O kpegri dɔe waa.
46004021	Ɛrɛ balaa hɛɛ nyin kɛ n ba he be nɔ? Hɛɛ charɛ he daa asɛ n nyin he waa dɛ ba bambisɔn ne kɛɛ ń kpɔ chweema ba dɛ́ ba tɛr he deŋne ɔ?
46005001	N dɛ no kɛ he bini bane dɛ bɔ jwamane aa wola were, hale nɛra baa wola Korowii tomɛ kwara aa wola gɛɛ ɛ. Ba ŋɔ he bini bɛl lawɛ o mɛɛ haah kwaraa dɛɛ chɔ.
46005002	A fe chɛ kɛŋɔ he gel he teene bini chɔg waa nɔ wa, asɛ hɛɛ maŋkura he te la. Aa were kɛŋɔ gɛ nɛn la ta ja he bini kpa!
46005003	N gbabir toole he be bela, kɛ n liire te lɔ he be. N dɔɔ pa naate waa ɛ gɛ waa nɔ bolchɔge kɛŋɔ n gbagba aa lɔ bela ken.
46005004	Dɛ he baa cheme ya Dɔɔ Yeesu sɔn ta, o kpegri do he nɛ, n ge liire do he bini naa,
46005005	hé kpɔ naate bwadabii do Bɔnsam nɔn ta ó chɔgo, asɛ awola ya Dɔɔ aa ba la, ó ge ba lɛ o doma te.
46005006	Aa were kɛŋɔ hɛɛ maŋkura he te. Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ iisi tama wono gel men damanta ɛɛ ugaa?
46005007	Anomanta hé laa gɛ wechɔg-ɛɛ la kpɔ he bini asɛ o wechɔga aa do kɛŋɔ iisi la bɛ heyaa bu, ásɛ he do wer kɛŋɔ paanoo baa wola iisi a ta doe, dɛ di tɔpejen Galekaa la. He do gɛ kpela. Yeesu Kristo koh ya waa dɛ sewɛ kɛŋɔ baa kpo peera Galekaa tɔpere la.
46005008	Anomanta hé gel ya kpɔ ya te kɛŋɔ yaa dɛ ba Galekaa kondikwaa dii ken, anee kɛŋɔ yá laa meesɔɔh ne wechɔga bɛlbwa soosiwi kpɔ ya bini gɛ baa laa iisi kpɔ paanoo baa kpɔa dɛɛ di Galekaa ta la. Hé gel ya kpɔ kasinteŋ ne tepoŋ dɛ teŋɛ Korowii nɛ.
46005009	N tɔn n faa chwerɛ heyaa la, n baglɔ kɛ he ne nɛra jwamane aa lɔ ba sie ta la bɛ pɛ.
46005010	Banɔ la baa wola yabala asɔre tena ɛɛ dɛɛ bɔ jwamane, ba sie ɛɛ begre kwa, baa tomɛ voga la, ba te laa n ŋɔ hé laa he te kpɔ ba nɛɛ nɔ, dɛkalkɛ ba te lɔ bobɛlbwa. Haa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta nɔ, haa won laa he te kpɔ ba nɛ!
46005011	Nɛra la maa dɛ bol ba waa laanee nɛra baa ŋɔa ba ja yabala asɔre tena nɛ, kɛ dɛɛ bɔ jwamane, dɛ kpɔ suuga gwaa komɛlbwa, dɛɛ tomɛ voga, dɛɛ bol nɛra bwara wechɔga, dɛ nyɔ sen dɛɛ dɛɛ, dɛɛ ŋwɛ la. Ba ŋɔ ba ɛ asɔre tena dɛ berɛ dɛɛ ɛ waa aa do ken nɔ la, he ne gɛ nɛra nɔ te bɛlbwa bɛ pɛ a ba ɛ kɛ hɛɛ pɛ nɔnee di kwa.
46005012	Nɛra baa wola asɔre tena ɛɛ la te, n ta ŋwɛnɛ dɔe kɛ n bol ba waa dɛ pa bole. Korowiirii dɛ bol ba waa dɛ pa bole.
46005013	Nɛra baa ɛ asɔre tena la te, heyaa chɛ kɛŋɔ he bol ba waa dɛ pa bole. Korowii Tɔn baglɔ kɛŋɔ "Hé doŋi wechɔg-ɛɛ le he bini."
46006001	Umee ŋɔ he be ŋɔ dɛ he bini bɛl ne o dɔŋ asɔre te dɔ waane aa, ó gel Korowii nɛra, dɛ kpɔɔ la nɛra baa wola Korowii tomɛ be bá ka bola ɔ? Korowii nɛra laa dɛ bola aa?
46006002	Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ kerekere Korowii nɛraa dɛɛ ba harɛ nɔ ta nɛra waa bola dɛ pa bole kɛɛ? Dɛ heyaa dɛ ba bol ba waa te naa, ɛrɛɛ haa wola won bol wejegre aa do ken nɔɔ?
46006003	Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ yan dɛ ba bol nyundua toroma waa dɛ pa bole kɛɛ? Harɛ nɔ ta nɛra waa yaa wola won bol aa?
46006004	Dɛ he ne he dɔŋ dɔ waane aa, ɛrɛɛ he kpɔ dɛɛ do nɛra asɔre tena aa wola ban kpɔe dɛɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa la nɔn ta ŋɔ bá bola ɔ?
46006005	A dɔ sihiih tɛ heya. Amɔ wejereme beŋkpoŋ kwaraa toole he bini dɛ won bol he baah wa,
46006006	asɛ hɛɛ samane dɔŋa dɛ gel nɛra baa wola asɔre tena ɛɛ kaa bol he waa nɔ naa? A ta gɛ chɛɛ.
46006007	Haa dɛ samane dɔŋa nɔ gba kwara baglɔ kɛŋɔ he dɔɔ di bolchɔge. Dɛ he ne he dɔŋ dɔ waane aa, lawɛ bambile. Dɛ o ŋwɛɛ kwaraa naa, kpɔ kɛo. A wer gwaa kɛŋɔ haa samano.
46006008	Kɛ haa gɛ ɛ. Heyaa dɛɛ ɛ dɔŋa wechɔga, dɛɛ faah dɔŋa, hale he bala asɔre tena.
46006009	Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ wechɔg-ɛɛra aa Korowii Kora la taa ja kɛɛ? He bɛ he nyu negre. Nɛra baa dɛ ɛ sɛnwaa, ne vog toroma, ne nɛra baa dɛ bɔ jwamane, ne baala ba ne ba bandɔŋa aa dɛ chɔ haah ne baa,
46006010	ne ŋwɛɛra, ne nɛra ba sie aa dɛ begre ba dɔŋa kwa, ne sennyɔdɛɛra, ne nɛra baa dɛ bol dɔŋa wobochɔga, ne nɛra baa dɛ faah nɛra, nɛn waa dɛ ɛ a gɛ waa nɔ te bɛlbwa la aa Korowii Kora la taa ja.
46006011	He bini bane fa kpoŋe gɛ da nɔ. Kɛ taraken Korowii koh ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo ne Korowii Domadɛɛge la toma la waa dɛ sɔ he wechɔga bwa ta, dɛ gel he ɛ nɛndɛɛga he waa su o siwi.
46006012	Nomɛl te kompɛɛ, "N dɔ ŋwɛnɛ kɛ n ɛ wobɛlbwa." Kpelaa, kɛ a bwa laa wera tɛ yaa. N fe jemɔ kɛ maa komɛlbwa ki, kɛ maa gel komɛlbwa gwaa n nɛ.
46006013	Bɛl gee ŋɔɔ, "Tea waa kondikwaa do le, asɛ kondikwaa ge che dɛ tɛ tea." Kpelaa, kɛ Korowii gelɔ a bwa dɔ jaga dɛ́ chɔg. O ta nɛn bwadabii ɛɛ tɛo ŋɔ ó kpɔ ɛ jwamanwa, kɛ o ɛo tɛo kɛŋɔ ó kpɔ tomɔ. Anomanta nɛn bwadabii ɛ Korowii kon, wɛɛ tɛo komɛlbwa.
46006014	Gɛ Korowii aa kpɔ o kpegri ir ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo seo ta la, gɛɛ wɛɛ ba o kpegri la kpɔe dɛ ir ya ge seo ta.
46006015	Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ he bwadabii ɛ Yeesu Kristo bwadabii pera kɛɛ? Dɛ gɛɛ a do te naa, amɔ a chɛ kɛŋɔ n kpɔ n bwadabii waa ɛ Yeesu bwadabii pera la ka bɔ jwamane aa? Akai! He bɛ gel a ba gɛ.
46006016	Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa bɔ jwamane la, o ne haah la pɛo dɛ ɛ bwadabii beŋkpoŋ aa? Korowii Tɔnee bagla ŋɔ, "Nɛra banɛ la ɛ beŋkpoŋ."
46006017	Nomɛlbwa waa kpɔ o te pɛl ya Dɔɔ la ge, o ne o bwa dɔ Doma beŋkpoŋ.
46006018	Anomanta hé laa he te dɛɛ kpɔ jwamane ta. Wechɔga bɛlbwa nɛn aa dɛ ɛ la, aa o bwara bini so. Kɛ nɛn waa dɛ bɔ jwamane la, o gbagba bwadabii wɛɛ do wechɔga ta.
46006019	Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ he bwadabii ɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la sobɔr kɛɛ? Korowii kpɔɔ tɛ heya, o so he nɛ. Anomanta he laa dɔ he te. Korowiirii dɔ heya,
46006020	dɛkalkɛŋɔ o kpɔ Yeesu Kristo chal yawɛ heya. Anomanta hé nyiŋi he bwadabii ta kɛrɛdɛ dɛ kpɔ tomɛ Korowii dɛ tɛo sɔn.
46007001	He fa chwerɛ tɔn dɛ ba bɔɔ mɛ ŋɔ, dɛ baa ŋɔ waa haahnee mo aa, a wer aa? Baa ŋɔ waa haahnee mo aa, a wer.
46007002	Kɛ jwamane aa wara la nomanta, a chɛ kɛŋɔ baa bɛlbwa dɔ o haah, asɛ haah bɛlbwa ge dɔ o jaa.
46007003	Baa bɛlbwa bɛ ŋɔ o ne o haah naa chɔ, gɛɛ haah ge bɛ ŋɔ waa sɛh o ne o jaa chɔ.
46007004	Haah ta o bwadabii kpegri dɔe chɔe bɔr, o jaaree dɔ. Gɛɛ baa ge aa wola o bwadabii kpegri dɔe, o haahnee dɔ.
46007005	Anomanta bɛlbwa bɛ o te kpɔ sɔh o dɔŋ chɔe be pera, atane kɛŋɔ he bwa sɛoh kɛŋɔ he dɛ nyin kɛ he kpɔ bambibeŋkpoŋ soŋe Korowii tɔpere bɛl tama mɔɔ. Gɛ te wer. Kɛ dɛ he ɛ gɛ tonaa, hé berɛ pɛ ja. Dɛ he ta pɛɛ yaa, haa wola won lawɛ he te la, Bɔnsam ɛɛ geloo he ɛ wechɔga.
46007006	Waa nɔ maa bagla nɔ ta denɛ dɛɛ do heyaa ŋɔ a chɛ kɛŋɔ he mo haahna. Kɛ n dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ dɛ he mo haah naa, a ta wechɔga ɛɛ.
46007007	N te fe dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa fee bɛ haah mo, dɛ so gɛ maa soga nɔ. Kɛ nomɛlbwa laa Korowii ta ŋɔ ó gbo so dɛ bɛ haah mo. O dɛ tɛ nomɛlbwa o we-ɛɛla waa dɛ ɛ la kpegri, bɛl yon do kpegri anɔ ta, bɛl ge do kpegri anɔ ta.
46007008	Waa maa dɔa dɛ tɛ nɛra baa wola haahna dɔe, ne haahna baa wola jaranar dɔe, ne nɛra ba jaranar aa serewa laanee kɛ bá fee so gɛ n gbo aa soga nɔ.
46007009	Dɛ bɛlbwa nao kɛŋɔ waa won haŋre dɛ gbo so te naa, amɔ ó mo haah kɛɛ ó yalɛ. A bɔ kɛŋɔ haah kɛɛ baa pɛla aa dɔe aa we he nɛɛ kohona.
46007010	Anɔ la maa bera dɔ dɛɛ tɛ hahmoola ne jadɔɔhnaa nɔ. N gbagba laa dɛɛ bol. Ya Dɔɔree ŋɔa ŋɔ haah bɛ o jaa vɛh.
46007011	Kɛ dɛ o vɛh o jaa raa, o bɛ baa bɛlbwa yalɛ kpa, atane kɛŋɔ o berɛ la o jaa la be asɛ ba ka pɛ dɛ so ja. Baa ge bɛ o haah vɛh.
46007012	N gbagbaa dɛɛ bol anɔ te dɛɛ tɛ he kar la. Ya Dɔɔ laa bola. Dɛ he ɛ asɔre te dɛ mo haah waa wola asɔre te ɛɛ, a too o tea o ŋɔ wɛɛ soo waa, bɛ on vɛh.
46007013	Dɛ haah ge ɛ asɔre te dɛ yalɛ baa waa wola asɔre te ɛɛ, dɛ o tea toorɔ kɛŋɔ o ne wɛɛ soo waa, haah la bɛ on vɛh.
46007014	Baa waa wola asɔre te ɛɛ la, o mo haah waa ɛ asɔre te aa, pɛɛ o ne haah la aa pɛa la nomanta, Korowii kpɔ baa la dɛɛ ɛ o nɛn. Gɛɛ a do, haah ge ta asɔre te ɛɛ dɛ yalɛ baa waa ɛ asɔre te aa, pɛɛ o ne waa pɛa la nomanta, Korowii kpɔ haah la ge dɛɛ ɛ o nɛn. Dɛ gɛ laa aa, he bii fe ta Korowii bii ɛɛ, kɛ taraken ba ɛ o kwa.
46007015	Dɛ onɔ la waa wola asɔre te ɛɛ ŋɔ wɛɛ vɛh o dɔŋ waa ɛ asɔre tee yaa, tɛo ŋwɛnɛ wɛɛ la. A ba gɛ naa, a ta wechɔga ɛɛ. Korowii dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ ya so deŋnesɔɔhna ta.
46007016	Dɛ Korowii ɛɛ che haah haa ɛ asɔre te nɛɛ dɛ lɛ he jaa raa, he jemaa? Gɛɛ a do baa haa ɛ asɔre te la nɛɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii ken ɛɛ che he nɛɛ dɛ lɛ he haah naa, he jemaa?
46007017	Korowiirii tɛ bɛlbwa o we-ɛɛla wɛɛ ɛ. Anomanta a chɛ kɛŋɔ bɛlbwa ɛ gɛ Korowii aa leo dɛ tɛo ŋɔ wɛ́ɛ ɛ la. Gɛɛ mɛɛ bol asɔre tena baa lɔ bobɛlbwa la be.
46007018	Dɛ ba kpɔ kere chɔgɛ nomɛl mɔɔ Korowii leo o ba ɛ asɔre te aa, o bɛ kpɔ sɔh. Korowii le nomɛl ge, dɛ ba ta kere kpɔe chɔgɔ waa, o bɛ gel ba kpɔ kere chɔgɔ.
46007019	Ba kpɔ kere chɔgɛ noo, a ta waane ɛɛ, ba ta kere kpɔe chɔgɛ noo, a ta waane ɛɛ. Kɛ Korowii Waa la ta teŋaa ɛ kasinteŋ.
46007020	Anomanta do gɛ haa doa mɔɔ Korowii lee he ba ɛ asɔre te la.
46007021	Dɛ he ɛ yom dɛ ba ɛ asɔre te aa, bɛ gel a we he nɛ. Kɛ dɛ ba tɛɛ ŋwɛnɛ ŋɔ hé le he yom ɛɛ la ta naa, bɛ vɛh.
46007022	Nomɛlbwa waa ɛ yom dɛ ɛ asɔre te la, o dɔ o te Korowii be. Gɛɛ a do, nomɛlbwa waa dɔ o te dɛ ba ɛ asɔre te la, o ɛ Yeesu Kristo yom.
46007023	Korowiirii kpɔ Yeesu Kristo chal la yawɛ heya, anomanta he bɛ lii kɛŋɔ nɛraa dɔ heya.
46007024	Yabala, gɛ he faa doa mɔɔ Korowii le heyaa he ba ɛ asɔre tena la, hé ta do gɛ, asɛ he ne Korowii do le.
46007025	Korowii ta men nɛra baa wola yalɛ la waa baglɛ, kɛ o dɛ cha mɛ asɛ mɛɛ ɛ o toma kɛrɛdɛ. Anomanta mɛɛ bagle gɛ maa jemaa.
46007026	Waa lole dɛ dawɛ ya nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ, anomanta n te be te, a wer kɛ gɛ haa soga la, hé ta so gɛ.
46007027	Dɛ he dɔ haah naa, bɛ ŋɔ hɛɛ vɛoh. Dɛ he ta bɛl dɔe ge aa, bɛ ŋɔ hɛɛ nyin bɛlee.
46007028	He mo haah naa, a ta wechɔga ɛɛ. Dɛ haah ge yalaa, a ta wechɔga ɛɛ. Kɛ waa lɔ a ta he soga bini, a waa mɛɛ nyin n lɛ heyaa le a ta la.
46007029	Maa ŋɔ gɛ nɔ, yabala, yaa harɛ nɔ taa bigri bɛlbwa. Anomanta le fini dɛɛ kaa, a chɛ kɛŋɔ he banɔ la haa dɔ haahna la ɛ kɛŋɔ he ta haahna dɔe ken,
46007030	he banɔ la haa dɛ wi ɛ kɛŋɔ he waa aa sume ken, he banɔ la ge haa dɛ mamɛ ɛ kɛŋɔ he sie ta lɛɛ ken, he banɔ la ge aa dɛ yawɛ la ɛ kɛŋɔ kwaa haa yawa la ta he kwaa ɛɛ ken.
46007031	Asɛ he banɔ la ge haa dɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa harɛ nɔ ta la bɛ ɛ a gwaa kohona, dɛkalkɛŋɔ harɛ nɔ ne o waa dɔ jaga. Waa bigri bɛlbwa.
46007032	N dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ harɛ nɔ ta waa bɛ heyaa ha kohona. Baa waa wola haah dɔe la, o siwi dɛ swɛɛ Korowii toma ta, wɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ Korowii sie lɛ o nɛ.
46007033	Kɛ baa waa dɔ haah la te sie dɛ begre harɛ nɔ ta kwaa ta, ásɛ o haah sie ɛɛ lɛ o nɛ. Webele anɛɛ yon do o baŋa.
46007034	Haah waa wola yalɛ, kɛɛ tolo, o sie dɛ begre Korowii toma ta, o kpɔ o te ne o liire bwa dɛɛ tɛ Korowii toma. Asɛ haah waa yala la ge sie ɛɛ begre harɛ nɔ ta kwaa ta ásɛ o jaa sie lɛ o nɛ.
46007035	N dɛ nyin kɛ n cha heya, a waa gela mɛɛ bol waa gɛ la. Maa nyin kɛŋɔ he ŋwɛnɛ tɔ. N dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ he ɛ anɔ la aa wera ásɛ he liire bwa won do Korowii toma ta.
46007036	Dɛ baa bɛlbwa dɔ o bihaah waa kpega ne yala, o ŋɔ waa gel o yalɛ, dɛ berɛ na kɛŋɔ a wer kɛŋɔ bie la yalaa, ó ɛ gɛ bwa waa dɛ nyin. Ó gel o yalɛ. A ta wechɔga ɛɛ.
46007037	Dɛ baa bɛlbwa nyiŋi gɛ waa nɔ kɛrɛdɛ dɛ ŋɔ waa o bihaahnee kpɔ tɛ baa bɛlbwa ó mo aa, dɛ nomɛl laa hɛo, dɛ o gbagba bambile binii a le, asɛ o ta on kpɔe tɛ baa laa, o ɛ wa.
46007038	Anomanta, dɛ nomɛl lawɛ o bihaah tɛ baa o mo aa, o ɛ kɛrɛdɛ. Kɛ naate waa wola o bihaah lawɛ tɛ baa ó mo la ɛa kɛrɛdɛ gwaa o dɔŋ waa lawɛ o bihaah tɛ yal la.
46007039	Dɛ haah yalɔ, o jaa ta do le naa, baa laanee dɔ haah la kpegri. Kɛ dɛ baa la sewaa, o ta haah la kpegri dɔe kpa. Haah la won kaala dɛ ka yalɛ baa waa dɛ nyinu ja. Kɛ o bɛ baa waa wola asɔre te ɛɛ yalɛ.
46007040	A ka n waa aa, dɛ o fe ta yalɛ kpa kwaraa fe wer tɛo gwaa kɛŋɔ waa yala. N gbagba liire te, kɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la soge n nɛ.
46008001	A ka kwaa baa kpoora dɛɛ tɛ voga wa. A waa jema te, ya bwa jemɛ a wa. Kɛ nɛwɛnyini wejema gelɔ wɛɛ nyin sɔn. Asɛ nɛnnyin ge ɛ chae.
46008002	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ lii kɛŋɔ o ɛ wejereme la, o ta wejema aa chɛ kɛ o jemɛ la dɔe mɔɔ.
46008003	Naate waa dɛ nyin Korowii la te, Korowii gba jemɔ.
46008004	Anomanta vog kwaa dii maa dɛ bol a waa nɔ, ya jemɔ kɛ voga ta komɛlbwa ɛɛ harɛ nɔ ta, Korowii beŋkpoŋii lole.
46008005	Kwaa nɛra aa kpɔa ɛ Korowii dɛɛ yera ba dɔɔranar la warɔ dɛ do nyundua ne harɛ.
46008006	Kɛ ya te be, Korowii lɔ beŋkpoŋ. Onee N Naa Korowii waa ta komɛlbwa, asɛ ya do le dɛɛ tomɔ la. Ya Dɔɔ ge lɔ beŋkpoŋ. Onee ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo. O nɛɛ Korowii che dɛ ta komɛlbwa, asɛ ya ge che o nɛɛ dɛ dɔ mkpa.
46008007	Nomɛlbwa laa jemɛ gɛ. Bane duu gɛ voga nɔ bigri a man ba. Hale ba le fini, dɛ ba di kwaa baa kpoora tɛ voga nɔ naa, dɛ ba liire dɛ ɛɛ ba kɛŋɔ voga laanee dɔ kwaa la. Ba yarada aa wola kanɛ Yeesu waa la ta nomanta, dɛ ba dɛ lii kɛŋɔ ba ɛ wechɔga.
46008008	Ya kondikwaa yaa dɛ dia laa dɛ gel ya ɛ nɛndɛɛga Korowii be. Dɛ ya dɛ dia oo, ya dɛ kia oo, aa wobɛlbwa bagle.
46008009	Kɛ a ne a bwa hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ kɛ dɛ he ta an kie, he dɛ dia aa, he bɛ gel he we-ɛɛla negre nɛra ba yarada aa wola kanɛ Yeesu waa ta ba kia la.
46008010	Nɛn o yarada aa wola kanɛ Yeesu waa ta la, o na he nɛn haa jemɛ Yeesu waa la kɛrɛdɛ soge vog mun dɛɛ di kwa aa, aa geloo o ge di.
46008011	He gelɔ he dɔŋ waa wola kiŋkiŋ chegɛ, Yeesu Kristo aa koh o waa sewɛ, ɛɛ ba he wejema ne daŋra dɛ nyogre aa?
46008012	Dɛ he dɛ ɛ he bala ba yarada aa wola kanɛ Yeesu waa ta la wechɔga ken asɛ ba tea bini chɔg aa, Yeesu Kristoo hɛɛ ɛ wechɔga la.
46008013	Dɛ n nao kɛ kondikwaa maa dɛ di la ɛɛ geloo n dɔŋ ge di a kaa o ne wechɔga ta naa, amɔ te mɛɛ gel a dii asɛ n dɔŋ ge bɛ di dɛ ba kaa wechɔga ta.
46009001	N ta n te dɔe dɛɛ di n nyu aa? N ta Yeesu torome ɛɛ yaa? N ta ya Dɔɔ Yeesu nae yaa? He teŋa haa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ nɔ le toma maa ɛa he bini ya Dɔɔ kpegri ta la.
46009002	Dɛ bane ta sɛɛh kɛŋɔ Yeesu toromee men aa, he te jemɔ kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ n ɛ o torome, dɛkalkɛŋɔ pɛɛ he ne waa pɛa la dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ n ɛ o torome kpela.
46009003	Dɛ nɛra dɛ pwaah mɛ naa, kenii mɛɛ ŋɔ:
46009004	Nɛra dɛ cha yaa kondikwaa ta naa, dɛ a ŋwɛnɛ ta laa aa?
46009005	Yeesu Kristo nimanar ne Pita ne Yeesu toroma la bwa mo haahna ba ne baa valɛ. Ya te ta gɛ ŋwɛnɛ dɔe kɛ ya mo haahna baa ɛ asɔre tena ya ne baa valaa?
46009006	Kɛɛ n ne Banabas gboo chɛ kɛ ya koh mɔɔ dɛɛ di?
46009007	Dɛ he ɛ sooja dɛɛ kaa laa laa, toma la ta laa hɛɛ di aa? He parɛ koo aa, haa koo la kondikwaa di aa? Nategre besoo wola o nae elnee nyɔɔ?
46009008	Nɛwɛnyini waa gbo laa dɛɛ bagle gɛ. Mosis Mmara gba bagle gɛ.
46009009	Mosis chwerɔ ŋɔ, "He bɛ nae aa dɛ ɛ toma he koo ta la nyoa vɔwɛ dɛ ŋɔ a bɛ kwaa di." Korowii ŋɔ ken aa, kondɛɛra gboo o ŋɔ aa?
46009010	Nɛwɛnyini waa o koh ŋɔ gɛ, gɛ aa cha yaa la waa o chwera, ásɛ nomɛlbwa waa dɛ parɛ, ne nomɛlbwa waa dɛ komɛ kwaa la dɔ hwɛga kɛŋɔ wɛɛ dɔ kwaa la anee.
46009011	Dɛ ya bol Korowii Waa he be asɛ he dɔ Korowii mkpa aa, dɛ a ta magrɛ kɛ ya lɛ kondikwaa le he be dɛ won dɔ harɛ nɔ ta bokpega aa?
46009012	He dɛ tɛ bane gɛ. Dɛ gɛ nɛra la dɔ gɛ ŋwɛnɛ aa, amɔ dɛ ya te ta pɔeh yaa? Kɛ ya te aa gɛ kpegri la bagle he nɛ, dɛ dɔ bambile wobɛlbwa ta dɛ bɛ Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma la ŋwɛnɛ tɔ.
46009013	Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ toma Korowii Dea la, a taa ba dɔ kwaa dɛɛ di, asɛ banɔ la ge baa dɛ kpoo kwaa baa kpɔa baa tɛ Korowii o Dea bini la, a taa ba gee di kɛɛ?
46009014	Gɛ tentenee ya Dɔɔ ɛ tɛ nɛra baa dɛ bol Amanesoma la dɛ ŋɔ báa di a ta.
46009015	N dɔ ŋwɛnɛ kɛ n ɛ a bwa, kɛ n ta nomɛlbwa be ŋɔe ŋɔ ó tɛ mɛ komɛlbwa bwa. Maa chwerɛ dɛɛ nyin kɛ he tɛ mɛ a gɛ kwaa nɔ. N sewɔ bɔ n be kɛŋɔ waa maa koh a waa maŋkura n te la le n nɔn ta.
46009016	Maa won koh Amanesoma nɔ bola waa dɛɛ bagle n te, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowiirii dɛɛ do mɛ asɛ mɛɛ bol. Dɛ n ta bolaa, mɛɛ dɔ waa.
46009017	Dɛ n tetoora nee mɛɛ ɛa aa, a fe magrɔ kɛ n fe ɛɛ lɛ a kembɔr. Kɛ Korowiirii kpɔ o Amanesoma la do n nɔn ta ŋɔ ń bol nɛra be. Anomanta n gbagba tetoora laa mɛɛ ɛa.
46009018	Kembɔr besoo mɛɛ dɔɔ? N kembɔree kɛŋɔ n won bol Amanesoma la bagle nɛra pɛɛpɛɛ dɛ bɛ kpegri maa dɔa la bagle ba nɛ.
46009019	N fe dɛ di n nyu, nomɛlbwa laa dɔɔ mɛ, kɛ n ɛ n te nɛndɔɔle dɛɛ ɛ toma dɛɛ tɛ nomɛlbwa dɛ́ fee dɔ nɛra kɛrɛdɛ tɛ Korowii.
46009020	Maa dɛ ɛ toma Juda tena bini la, n ɛ n te kɛŋɔ Juda te ásɛ dɛ dɔɔ ba tɛ Korowii. N ta Mosis Mmara la ta jae te, kɛ dɛ n koo nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ a ta la nɛ aa, n dɛ ɛ n te kɛ ba bini bɛl, asɛ dɛ yon dɛɛ teŋɛ ba mmarare la ta gɛ ba yon dɛɛ ɛ la, ásɛ dɛ dɔɔ ba tɛ Korowii.
46009021	Gɛ tentenee dɛ n koo nɛnhɔɔhra baa wola Mosis Mmara la ta teŋɛ nɛ aa, n yon ɛ n te kɛ ban, ásɛ dɛ dɔɔ ba tɛ Korowii. Kɛ aa bagle kɛ n dɛ vɛh Korowii nyoa wobol. N dɛ teŋɛ gɛ Yeesu Kristo aa ŋɔa yá teŋɛ la ta.
46009022	Dɛ n kaa koo nɛra bini, dɛ ba yarada aa kanɛ Yeesu Kristo waa ta naa, n ge dɛ ɛ n te kɛŋɔ ba bini bɛl ásɛ dɛ won dɔɔ ba. Gɛ nomɛlbwa aa doa la, gɛɛ mɛɛ ɛ n te ásɛ dɛ che ŋwɛnɛ bɛl ta dɛ won dɔ bane ásɛ Korowii lɛɛ ba.
46009023	Amanesoma nɔ waa mɛɛ teŋɛ anɔ bwa ta la, ásɛ dɛ won na som maa dɛ bol a waa la ane.
46009024	Dɛ nɛra dɛ ba chwae dɛ́ lɛ komɛl aa, ba bwa dɛ chwa te, kɛ ba bini beŋkpoŋii dɛɛ dɔ kon la. Anomanta hé chwa kɛrɛdɛ dɛ́ dɔ kon la.
46009025	Nomɛlbwa waa jemɛ chwae dɛɛ tɛgre o te dɛ́ chwa lɛ komɛl la, o dɛ dɔ haŋra kwaa bwa ta dɛ́ ka chwa dɛ tɔ sie ásɛ ba kpɔ gbɛrɛ piu. Kpɔga nee ba sɔh gɛ gbɛrɛ la, waa bigri dɛ o chɔgɔ. Kɛ ya te chwae yaa dɛ chwa la, ya dɛ nyin gbɛrɛ waa wola chɔg bwa.
46009026	Anomanta n dɛ chwa n sie dawɛ komɛl ta. Maa chwa pɛɛ. N do kɛŋɔ nɛn waa dɛ yo, maa nɔɔra ta pɛɛpɛɛ.
46009027	N dɛ lawɛ n te, dɛɛ haŋre kɛrɛdɛ kɛ, n gbagba maa dɛ bol Amanesoma nɔ dɛɛ bagle nɛra nɔ, n bɛ ba koni dɛ horɛ.
46010001	Yabala, n dɛ nyin kɛ n lii heya, ya naanar bwa nɛɛ Korowii bam la faa tɔ. Moo la aa teŋa la, ba bwaa kpɔ o baah kaa.
46010002	A kaa ɛ kɛŋɔ ba faa sɔ ba bwa nee bam la ne moo la ta ásɛ ba ne Mosis pɛ.
46010003	Ba bwa dɔ kondikwaa le Korowii kpegri ta dɛ di.
46010004	A berɔ che Korowii kpegri ta ba dɔ nee dɛ nyɔ. Bwe taa ba dɔ nee la le. Kristoo bwe la, dɛ faa teŋɛ ba nɛɛ ba kaa.
46010005	Kɛ Korowii sie ta ba galga nɛɛ lɛɛ, asɛ ba serewe perɛ kpɔg la baah bobɛla.
46010006	A gɛ waa nɔ bwa ɛo dɛ́ gel ya jemɛ wa, asɛ wechɔga pɛla bɛ yaa dɔ gɛ a pɛla faa dɔɔ ba la.
46010007	Ya bɛ voga dɛɛ tomɛ gɛ ba bini bane faa dɛ ɛ la. Mosis chwerɔ ŋɔ, "Nɛra la sogo dɛ kwaa ba voga, dɛ di kwa, dɛ nyɔ sen, dɛ ir sa sachɔga."
46010008	Ya bɛ jwamane bɔ gɛ nɛra la bane faa ɛa asɛ Korowii kpoo ba bini kagboŋa fifraanɛ dɛ batoro tɔpebeŋkpoŋ la.
46010009	Ya bɛ Korowii daah dɛɛ na gɛ bane faa daahno na asɛ o gel harɛ kpɔkpɔ ba ba serewe la.
46010010	Ya bɛ waa nagre gɛ bane faa nagre waa asɛ nyundua torome ba kpoo ba la.
46010011	Waa aa pu a gɛ nɛra la ɛo dɛ gel ba jemɛ wa. Mosis chwerɛ a wa, dɛ́ gel ya nɛra yaa lɔ harɛ nɔ aa ka tɔpere tamaa o chɔg nɔ ta nɔ jemɛ wa.
46010012	Anomanta nomɛlbwa waa dɛ lii kɛŋɔ o chegɛ kiŋkiŋ Yeesu Kristo waa nɔ ta la, wɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ naa ba lɔ.
46010013	Nomɛlbwa dɛ na wekpega. Anomanta dɛ he dɛ na wekpega aa, he laa bɔ bere. Korowii waa dɔ yarada. Waa gel wekpega bɛlbwa gwaa he nɛɛ asɛ he horɛ. Wɛɛ bagle heyaa ŋwɛnɛ haa kpɔ dɛ won lawɛ bambile ka tel kɛŋɔ haa le a nyoa.
46010014	Anomanta, n daamanar, hé laa he te kpɔ voga waa ta.
46010015	He ɛ wejerema, anomanta hé nyiŋi waa nɔ maa bola nɔ bini dɛ na.
46010016	Saŋ bɛlbwa yaa pɛ so dɛɛ di kwaa dɛɛ lii Yeesu Kristo seo la la, sen la yaa dɛ jam Korowii dɛɛ nyɔ la gelɔ ya ne Yeesu Kristo pɛ o chal la waa ta. Paanoo yaa mɔna dɛɛ di la gelɔ ya ne o pɛ o bwadabii waa ta.
46010017	Ya warɔ, kɛ paanoo beŋkpoŋ la yaa pɛa di la nomanta ya ɛ beŋkpoŋ.
46010018	Hé ta sie dɛ na Juda tena wa. Nɛra baa dɛ di kwaa baa kpoora dɛɛ tɛ Korowii la, ba ta gɛ we-ɛɛla la ta jae yaa?
46010019	N dɛ bagle kɛ kwaa baa kpoora dɛɛ tɛ voga la, a ne voga gbagba ɛ kwaane kɛɛ? Akai!
46010020	N dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ dɛɛ kpoo kwaa la, ba kpoorɔ dɛɛ tɛ Bɔnsam toroma yaa wola an na la. Korowii laa ba ɛ dɛɛ tɛ. Maa nyin kɛŋɔ he ne Bɔnsam toroma pɛ komɛlbwa.
46010021	Haa won nyɔ sen la yaa dɛ nyɔ dɛɛ lii ya Dɔɔ waa la, dɛ berɛ ka nyɔ Bɔnsam toroma la kwa. He ne ya Dɔɔ aa won pɛ nɔn di kwa, asɛ he ne Bɔnsam toroma la ge berɛ pɛ nɔn di kwa. Aa gɛɛ magre!
46010022	Hei! He dɛ nyin he mugli ya Dɔɔ baah o mee raa? Ya kpegri gwaalo waa?
46010023	Nomɛl te kompɛɛ: "N dɔ ŋwɛnɛ kɛ n ɛ wobɛlbwa," kɛ a bwa laa wera tɛ mɛ, a bwa ge laa dɛɛ cha mɛ.
46010024	Aa were kɛŋɔ nɛn gel o gbo waa hiaoh. A chɛ kɛ o gel o dɔŋ ge kɛrɛdɛ doe hiaoh.
46010025	Dɛ ba dɛ yog ola ol yogribɔr aa, yawɛ dɛ di. Bɛ dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ ane ken aa were. Hé yawɛ di,
46010026	dɛkalkɛŋɔ "Korowiirii dɔ harɛ ne komɛlbwa aa lɔ o ta."
46010027	Dɛ nɛn waa wola asɔre te ɛɛ yerɛ ŋɔ hé ba di kwaa he sɛh aa, kondikwaa bɛlbwa waa tɛɛ la, bɛ dɛɛ lii ŋɔ a ken aa were kɛŋɔ he di. Lɛ dɛ di.
46010028	Kɛ dɛ nomɛl ŋɔ he be ŋɔ vogee ba kwaa, a kondikwaa yaa, naate waa bagle gɛ waa nɔ ŋɔ he bɛ di la nyu bini liire nomanta bɛ di, asɛ o bɛ ba lii kɛŋɔ he ɛ wechɔga.
46010029	A ta wechɔga ɛɛ tɛɛ. Naate la waa n ŋɔ he bɛ di la, asɛ o liire bɛ on aahna-aahna ɛ. Ɛrɛɛ mɛɛ ba nomɛl nyu bini liire waa koeh dɛ gel waa maa dɛ ɛɔ?
46010030	Dɛ n jam Korowii kondikwaa maa dɛ ba dii wa aa, nomɛlbwa bɛ men pwah kɛ maa di a gɛ kwaa la.
46010031	Anomanta wobɛlbwaa hɛɛ ɛ oo, kwaa hɛɛ di oo, komɛlbwa hɛɛ nyɔ oo, hé ɛ dɛ kpɔ jirima dɛɛ tɛ Korowii.
46010032	He bɛ gel nomɛlbwa daŋre he ne dɛ ba nyogre. Juda tee yoo, nɛnhɔɔh waa wola Juda te ɛɛ yoo, asɔre tee yoo, he bɛ ba bini bɛlbwa gɛ ɛ.
46010033	Gɛɛ mɛɛ ɛ, ásɛ n waa lɛ nomɛlbwa sie. N gbo waa laa hiah mɛ. Nomɛlbwa ge waa hiah mɛ, gɛ maa ɛ dɛ won dɔɔ ba tɛ Korowii ó lɛɛ ba.
46011001	Anomanta hé kpɔ n da gɛ maa kpɔ Yeesu da la.
46011002	N dɛ kpɛɛ heyaa liira haa dɛ lii n waa bwa wobɛlbwa ta, dɛɛ teŋɛ waa Korowii aa bag mɛ asɛ n ge bagle heyaa la ta.
46011003	N dɛ nyin kɛ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristoo baa bɛlbwa nomoa, asɛ baa ɛ haah nomoa, Korowii ge ɛ Yeesu Kristo nomoa.
46011004	Baa bɛlbwa waa dɛ soŋe Korowii kɛɛ dɛ che Korowii Domadɛɛge la kpegri ta dɛɛ bol Korowii Wa, kɛ dɛ kpɔ kon bɔle o nyu la, waa duure kpɔe dɛɛ tɛ Yeesu Kristo.
46011005	Dɛ haah ge dɛ soŋe Korowii kɛɛ dɛ che Korowii Domadɛɛge la kpegri ta dɛɛ bol waa o ta kon kpɔe bɔle o nyu aa, waa duure kpɔe dɛɛ tɛ baa. O do kɛŋɔ nɛn baa fonɛ o nyu ken.
46011006	Dɛ waa sɛh dɛ kpɔ kon bɔle o nyu ta naa, amɔ te bá fonɛ o nyu ta. A ta magrɛ kɛ ba fonɛ o nyu ta ge aa, amɔ te ó kpɔ kon dɛɛ bɔle o nyu ta.
46011007	Aa were kɛŋɔ baa ge kpɔ kon bɔle o nyu, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o do gɛ Korowii aa doa dɛɛ bagle Korowii jirima. Kɛ haah te dɛ bagle baa jirima.
46011008	Haah bini laa baa le, haahnee le baa bini.
46011009	Haah waa laa Korowii ta baa, kɛ baa waa Korowii ta haah.
46011010	A gɛ waa nɔ ne nyundua toroma nyiŋa baa dɛ nyiŋi heyaa nomanta, a chɛ kɛŋɔ haah kpɔ kon dɛɛ bɔle o nyu á bagle kɛŋɔ baa dɔ kpegri o nɛ.
46011011	Asɔre tena waa bini te, baa ne haah bwa sie dawɛ dɔŋa nɛ.
46011012	Baa binii haah le mumpar la, kɛ taraken te haahnee dɛɛ lolɛ baa, asɛ Korowii ge ta komɛlbwa.
46011013	Hé bwa nyiŋi gɛ waa nɔ kɛrɛdɛ. A wer kɛŋɔ haah nɛɛ soŋe Korowii dɛ o ta kon kpɔe bole o nyu ta naa?
46011014	Gɛ Korowii aa ta baa la, o nyu mogɔ kohona naa, aa were. A ɛ sihiih.
46011015	Kɛ dɛ haah nyu mogɔ dɛ kpeg aa, a dɛ tɛo jirima wɛɛ do wer, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowiirii tɛɛ ba nyumpona ŋɔ á tɔ ba nyuune ta.
46011016	Dɛ nomɛl dɛ tɔŋle gɛ waa nɔ naa, ó jemɛ kɛŋɔ gɛɛ ya ne asɔre tena bwa ɛɛ ɛ.
