46011017	Waane ge lole maa wola heyaa kpɛɛ dɛɛ ba he be bola. He chemaa, he dɛ chɔg dɔŋa, haa dɔŋa cha.
46011018	Waa aa tɔ sie laanee kɛŋɔ, n noɔ kɛŋɔ dɛ he chemo dɛɛ soŋe Korowii aa, haa nyopɛo dɔ. N dɛ lii kɛŋɔ kpelaa ba ŋɔ.
46011019	Aa ba gɛɛ. Dɛ a ta gɛ balaa, nɛra aa won jemɛ banɔ la baa ɛ nɛndɛɛga he bini.
46011020	Gɛ he yon cheme dɛɛ di kwaa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu sɔn ta dɛɛ lii o waa la, o waa laa hɛɛ lii gɛ la.
46011021	He bini bane dɛ di gɛ kondikwaare la warane, haa chegɛ dɛɛ kpa he bala. Bane yon dɔ di dɛ nyɔ kohona dɛ berɛ dɛɛ dɛɛ, dɛ bane ta komɛlbwa dɔe dɛ́ di.
46011022	Ɛrɛ waa yɔ? He ta deremi dɔe dɛ́ so bela di kwaa kɛɛ? He dɛ fɛgre Korowii nɛra, dɛ gel sihiih ɛɛ kpo he bala baa nyaa. Ɛrɛɛ ń ɛ heya ɔ? Ń kpɛɛ heya aa? Akai.
46011023	Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu bag mɛ waa nɔ n ge bagle heyaa kɛŋɔ o fa ɛ waane jwaana baa leo tɛ la. O kpɔ paanoo,
46011024	asɛ dɛ soŋe Korowii do o ta, dɛ kuugi o bini dɛ ŋɔ, "N bo-olii nɔ, n koh he waa dɛ kpɔ tɛ nɛra bá kpo mɛ. Hɛ́ɛ di gɛ paanoo nɔ dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ lii mɛ."
46011025	Baa dia tomɛ la, o laa numol ne sen ane kpɔ, dɛ ŋɔ, "Sen nɔɔ chega dɛ tɛ n chal. Aa ɛ fɔofalee dɛ chɔ Korowii ne nɛwɛnyini baah ta. Hɛ́ɛ nyɔ dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ lii mɛ."
46011026	Ya Dɔɔ wobol nɔ dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ saŋ bɛlbwa haa di paanoo nɔ dɛ kpɔ numol nɔ nyɔ sen nɔ la, ya Dɔɔ seo waa hɛɛ bagle gɛ la, ka tel saŋ waa berɛ ba ja.
46011027	Anomanta nomɛlbwa waa di gɛ paanoo nɔ, dɛ kpɔ numol nɔ nyɔ sen nɔ, waa wola an a ŋwɛnɛ ta ɛɛ la, dɛ Yeesu bo-ol ne o chalee o kpɔ doŋa dɛɛ lege la.
46011028	Nomɛlbwa chɛ kɛŋɔ o nyiŋi o waa bini kɛrɛdɛ mɔɔ dɛ di a gɛ kwaa nɔ.
46011029	Dɛ nomɛlbwa dɛ di gɛ kwaa nɔ o ta liire kɛŋɔ ya Dɔɔ bo-olii yaa, amɔ dɛ o dɛ mugli Korowii baah dɛɛ do o te wahala ta.
46011030	A waa he galga ɛɛ we weela dɛɛ gwɛgre, asɛ bane gee serewe la.
46011031	Dɛ ya fe ɛɛ nyiŋi ya waa bini kɛrɛdɛ yaa, Korowii fe aa yaa bolchɔgee pa dɛ tɛr ya deŋne.
46011032	Ya Dɔɔ raa dɛ nyiŋi ya waa bini taraken nɔ, o dɛ tɛr ya deŋne ásɛ ya gel wechɔga ɛɛ, asɛ ya bɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta liire waa dɛ ba ban bolchɔge pae la nɛɛ ja.
46011033	Anomanta, yabala, he pɛo dɛɛ di a gɛ kwaa nɔ naa, he bɛ a dii dɛɛ too. Hé so dɛɛ kpa dɔŋa dɛ bwa cheme mɔɔ dɛɛ di.
46011034	Dɛ lɔr dɛ kpo bɛl aa, ó di kwaa dem mɔɔ dɛ ba. He bɛ ya Dɔɔ kwaa la di gɛ aa wola chɛɛ kɛŋɔ he dia. Gɛ laa, Korowii baah nɛɛ di he nɛɛ. Anɔ la aa kaa la, n balaa, mɛɛ bagle heyaa.
46012001	Yabala, n dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ he jemɛ kpegri Korowii Domadɛɛge aa dɛ cha yaa ya dɔ la bini kɛrɛdɛ.
46012002	He na kɛŋɔ gɛ saŋ he faa wola Korowii tomɛ la, dɛ he nyogrɔ dɛɛ tomɛ voga aa wola waa bol, kɛ dɛ a dɔ kpegri he nɛɛ hɛɛ toma.
46012003	Anomanta n dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ he jemɛ gɛ waa nɔ kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa dɛ bol waa Korowii Domadɛɛge la kpegri ne la, waa won taah Yeesu. Nomɛlbwa ge waa dɛ bol ŋɔ Yeesuu ya Dɔɔ la, dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la kpegrii gela wɛɛ ŋɔ gɛ la.
46012004	Kpegri Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa cha nɛra ba dɔ la kogrɔ, kɛ Doma beŋkpoŋ laanee tɛ a bwa.
46012005	Toma ya Dɔɔ aa bɔna tɛ yaa la kogrɔ, kɛ Dɔɔ beŋkpoŋ tomaa yaa ɛ.
46012006	Wejema Korowii aa bɔna tɛ yaa la kogrɔ, kɛ Korowii beŋkpoŋii chegɛ ya bwa nɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa.
46012007	Korowii Domadɛɛgee tɛ nomɛlbwa kpegri ŋɔ ó kpɔ dɛɛ cha o bala.
46012008	O tɛ nɛra bane wejema, dɛ tɛ bane ge sipila. O Doma beŋkpoŋ laanee tɛ ba bwa a gɛ kpegri la, bá won bol waa dɛɛ bagle nɛra,
46012009	dɛ gel bane che o kpegri la ta dɛ dɔ yarada kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ dɛ tɛ bane ge kpegri weela chaeh ta.
46012010	O tɛ bane kpegri ba won nyokpowaa ɛɛ, asɛ bane ge won che o kpegri la ta dɛ won bol Korowii Wa. O gelɔ bane won jemɛ kon la soo waa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ ba che o ta dɛɛ ɛ wa, dɛ gel bane ge won bol wobofala, asɛ dɛ gel bane ge won wobofala mun bagla dɛɛ bagle nɛra.
46012011	A gɛ waa nɔ bwa, Korowii Domadɛɛge beŋkpoŋ laanee tɛ nomɛlbwa kpegri o kpɔ dɛɛ ɛ gɛ la. Gɛ aa too o teaa o tɛ nomɛlbwa.
46012012	Hé ta sie nyiŋi he bwadabii na, o ɛ kombir, kɛ o dɔ pegra, asɛ a bwa pɛ dɛ ɛ bwadabii beŋkpoŋ. Gɛɛ Yeesu Kristo do.
46012013	Juda tena o, Grik tena o, yoma o, nɛra baa dɔ ba te noo, Korowii kpɔ o Domadɛɛge la sɔ ya bwa ne, asɛ ya ɛ beŋkpoŋ. O tentenee o gel ya bwa dɔ dɛ nyɔ do ya bini.
46012014	Nɛwɛnyini bwadabii ta konsiwi beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ. O pegra warɔ.
46012015	Dɛ he nakpala ŋɔ o ta nɔn ɛɛ nomanta o ta bwara ta jae yaa, dɛ nyosonee. O ta nɔn ɛɛ te, kɛ o ge ja bwadabii ta.
46012016	Dɛ deŋne ge ŋɔ o ta siwi ɛɛ nomanta o ta bwadabii ta jae yaa, dɛ nyosonee. O ta siwi ɛɛ, kɛ o ja bwadabii ta.
46012017	Dɛ bwadabii fe dɔ siwi gbo, deŋne ta jae yaa, ɛrɛɛ o fe ɛɛ ba waa noe yɔ? Dɛ bwadabii fe ɛ deŋne gbo o ta mee dɔe yaa, ɛrɛɛ o fe ɛɛ ba sɔɔh noe yɔ?
46012018	Gɛ laa Korowii ta yaa. O do bwadabii pegra nɔ bwa, bɛlbwa ne o dobɔr. Onee saahna ɛa gɛ.
46012019	Dɛ bwadabii fe ɛ konsiwi beŋkpoŋ gbo, pegra bɛlbwa toole o ta naa, o fe ɛ bwadabii aa? Akai.
46012020	Ya bwadabii pegra la kogrɔ, kɛ bwadabii la te ɛ kombeŋkpoŋ.
46012021	Siwi aa won ŋɔ nɔn be ŋɔ, "He ta n nɛɛ jae yaa, n gbo ɛɛ wonoo ɛ toma." Gɛɛ nyu ge aa wola won ŋɔ nakpala be ŋɔ, "He ta n nɛɛ jae yaa, n gbo ɛɛ wonoo ɛ toma."
46012022	Bwadabii bobɛla yaa wola lii kɛŋɔ a kpegri la dɔ tɔnɔ.
46012023	Bwadabii bobɛla yaa wola lii kɛŋɔ a wer laanee yaa nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ. Anɔ la sihiih aa dɛ kpo yaa a waa yaa wola nyin kɛŋɔ nɛn na la, anee yaa tɔ a ta kɛrɛdɛ.
46012024	Anɔ la aa wera te, a ta hiaih kɛŋɔ ya nyiŋi a ta kpa. Gɛɛ Korowii ɛ ya bwadabii ásɛ yaa heeh a gɛ bɔra yaa wola lii kɛŋɔ a waa hiaoh la.
46012025	Korowii ɛa gɛ asɛ bwadabii la bini bɛ pegri, asɛ a bwa ɛɛ cha dɔŋa.
46012026	Dɛ bwadabii bobɛl dɔ weela aa, dɛ bwadabii bwaa weela lawɛ la. Dɛ ba kpɛɛ bwadabii bobɛl aa, a dɛ do bwadabii la bwa som.
46012027	He bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ Yeesu Kristo bwadabii ta. He bwa pɛo dɛ ɛ o bwadabi.
46012028	Korowii tɛ he bɛlbwa toma waa dɛɛ ɛ asɔre tena bini. Anɔ la aa tɔ sie, o ŋɔ bane ɛ Yeesu toroma; nɛɛ, dɛ ŋɔ báne che Korowii kpegri ta dɛɛ bol waa waa kpɔa bag ba; tooro, dɛ kpɔ bane ŋɔ báa bagle nɛra o wa, dɛ berɛ kpɔ bane ge ŋɔ báa ɛ nyokpowa, dɛ tɛ bane ge kpegri ŋɔ báa chah weela tena. Dɛ ŋɔ báne ɛɛ cha nɛra, báne ɛ nomonome dɛɛ tɔ nɛra sie, dɛ gel bane ge won wobofala bola.
46012029	He bwaa ɛ Yeesu toroma aa? He bwaa won Korowii kpegri la ta chega dɛ bol wa aa? He bwaa won Korowii waa la bagla aa? He bwaa won nyokpowaa ɛɛ yaa?
46012030	He bwaa won weela tena chaeh yaa? He bwaa won wobofala bola aa? He bwaa won wobofala mun bagla aa?
46012031	Hé gel he sie begre asɛ hɛɛ nyin kpegri Korowii Domadɛɛge be ásɛ dɛ won cha nɛra ŋwɛnɛre aa wera kohona la ta. Mɛɛ bagle heyaa ŋwɛnɛ waa wera gwaa a bwa.
46013001	Dɛ n wono dɛɛ bol nɛra bwa ne nyundua toroma wobol, kɛ dɛ maa nɛn nyin aa, dɛ gbɔgaa mɛɛ do kɛŋɔ baa dɛ lɔ dawuro waa pera wɛɛ do gbɔga la.
46013002	Hale n wono che Korowii kpegri la ta dɛɛ bol o waa la kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ jemɛ o wesɔɔhla bwa, dɛ dɔ sipila kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ che o kpegri la ta dɛ dɔ yarada dɛ́ won ŋɔ bwejen be ó chugri le o bug ta dɛ kaa bofale asɛ o chugri, dɛ maa nɛn nyin aa, dɛ n ta nɛn ɛɛ.
46013003	Dɛ n wono kpɔ n komɛlbwa kɛ nyaara bá lɛ di, asɛ n berɛ koh Yeesu waa la waa dɛ sɛh ŋɔ mɛɛ geloo ba kpɔ nii fuuh mɛ, dɛ maa nɛn nyin aa, dɛ a ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ.
46013004	Dɛ nɛn dɛ nyin nɛn aa, o dɔ bambile dɛɛ tɛ o bala, dɛɛ ɛɛ ba kɛrɛdɛ. Waa bɔweela ɛ. Waa o te nɛnjen yerɛ. Waa o te bagle.
46013005	Waa waa sagasaga ɛ o bala be. Waa o gbo nyin, o dɛ nyin nomɛlbwa. O baah naa nɛra nɛɛ di warawara. Waa nɛn waa lɛɛ dɛɛ do o bini.
46013006	Kasinteŋii dɛɛ lɛ o sie. O sie aa wechɔga ta lɛ.
46013007	Dɛ nɛn dɛ nyin nɛn aa, wɛɛ pwɛr o tenee tɛo wobɛlbwa ta. O dɛ yaradao wobɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ ta, dɛ dɔ hwɛga ne bambile wobɛlbwa ta.
46013008	Nɛnnyin ta jaga dɔe. Korowii waa baa chegɛ o kpegri ta dɛɛ bol bwa ɛɛ tonɔɔ tɔpebɛl wee. Wobofala baa chegɛ Korowii kpegri ta dɛɛ bol bwa ɛɛ teŋoo tɔpebɛl wee. Wejema gee ba tonɔɔ.
46013009	Ya waa yaa jema la ta jema bɛl ɛɛ, waa yaa chegɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge ta dɛɛ bol la gba ta bola bɛl ɛɛ.
46013010	Anɔ la aa wera ka tonɛ la saŋ telaa, tama yaa dɔa taraken nɔ bwa ɛɛ tonɔɔ.
46013011	Gɛ saŋ n faa ɛ bechala la, dɛ n dɛ bol bechawobol, dɛɛ ɛ bechawa, dɛɛ lii bechaliire. Kɛ maa baa kpeg dɛ ɛ nomoa la, n gel n bechawaa la bwa.
46013012	Gɛ tentenee ya waa do taraken. A do kɛŋɔ yaa dɛ nyiŋi digi waa wola na kɛrɛdɛ ta ken. Dɛ tɔpere bɛl telaa, yaa naa kɛrɛdɛɛ kɛŋɔ a chɔ ya sie. Anɔ la bwa yaa jema taraken nɔ, anjena ta lɔ mun ta. Kɛ tɔpere la telaa, mɛɛ jemɛ wobɛlbwa gɛ Korowii aa jem mɛ la.
46013013	Anomanta webele atoroo lole, yarada, hwɛga ne nɛnnyin. Kɛ nɛnnyinii gwaa a bwa.
46014001	Hé gel he sie begre nɛnnyin ta, asɛ dɛɛ nyin kpegri waa lɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge la be dɛ́ kpɔ dɛɛ cha nɛra. Kɛ kpegri háa swɛɛ siwi dɛ nyin kohona laanee kɛŋɔ he won che Korowii Domadɛɛge kpegri ta dɛɛ bol o wa,
46014002	dɛkalkɛŋɔ naate waa dɛ bol wobofala la, nɛra laa o bol dɛɛ tɛ. Korowiirii o bol dɛɛ tɛ. O chegɛ Korowii kpegri ta dɛɛ bol waa aa sɔah. Nɛra aa a waa no.
46014003	Naate waa chegɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la ta dɛɛ bol waa la te bolɔ dɛɛ bagle nɛra dɛɛ cha ba bá jemɛ Korowii Wa. O dɛ do ba gbemba dɛɛ larawe ba bwara.
46014004	Nɛn waa dɛ bol wobofala la, o bolɔ dɛɛ tɛ o gbagba. Naate waa chegɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge kpegri ta dɛɛ bol Korowii Waa la ge, asɔre tena la bwaa wɛɛ cha.
46014005	Dɛ he bwa won wobofala bola aa, n dɛ nyin gɛ. Kɛ dɛ he won Korowii Domadɛɛge kpegri ta chega dɛ bol wa aa, gɛɛ dɛ do n som kohona. Naate waa dɛ bol Korowii Waa la gwaa nɛn waa dɛ bol wobofala, atane kɛ nomɛl won a mun bagla dɛɛ tɛ asɔre tena á cha ba.
46014006	Yabala, dɛ n ba he be dɛ baa bol wobofala dɛ haa a mun no aa, tɔnɔ besoo he dɔ le n be nɔ? Dɛ n ta Korowii Domadɛɛge kpegri la ta chegɛ dɛ dɔ waa aa sɔah dɛ bagle heyaa, kɛɛ dɛ n ta wejema ane dɔe, kɛɛ maa Korowii nyoa wobol kɛɛ o ŋwɛnɛre bagla jemaa, tɔnɔ besoo hé dɔ le n be nɔ?
46014007	Hé ta sie na kwaa baa dɛ hɛlɛ a ne. Dɛ a sii aa chɔ kɛrɛdɛ naa, ɛrɛɛ nɛra ɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ no a bini nɔ?
46014008	Dɛ ba dɛ hoh laa bɛla ásɛ nɛra no dɛ ka yo, dɛ baa on hoh kɛrɛdɛ naa, umee dɛ won jemɛ dɛ kpɔ o te nɔ?
46014009	Gɛɛ a do, dɛ he wobol bini noe kpegri aa, ɛrɛɛ baa ba ɛɛ dɛ no a mun ɔ? A do kɛŋɔ he gbo aa soga dɛɛ do gbɔga.
46014010	Harɛ nɔ ta wobol warɔ, a bwa ge ɛ nɛra bane wobol dɛ dɔ mun.
46014011	Anomanta nɛn dɛ bol waa maa a mun no aa, dɛ n berɛ deŋnebire te naate be. Dɛ o ge aa n kon no aa, o ge berɛ deŋnebire te n be.
46014012	He siwi aa begra hɛɛ nyin kpegri Korowii Domadɛɛge be ó cha heyaa Korowii toma ta nɔ, hɛ́ɛ nyin anɔ la aa won cha asɔre tena kohona.
46014013	Naate waa chegɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge kpegri ta dɛɛ bol wobofala la, ó soŋe Korowii ásɛ o chao o won dɛɛ bagle a mun.
46014014	Dɛ n dɛ soŋe Korowii wobofale ne naa, dɛ n lilewee dɛɛ soŋo la, kɛ n liire te aa wobɛlbwa ɛ.
46014015	Amee jaɔ? Mɛɛ soŋe Korowii n lileo nee, asɛ dɛɛ soŋo n liire ge ne. Mɛɛ kpɔ n lilewee go yela, dɛ kpɔ n liire ge go ja.
46014016	Dɛ gɛ laa aa, he dɛ jam Korowii he lileo ne naa, ɛrɛɛ naate waa wola yarada dɛ ɛ nɛmpɛɛ la ɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ no a mun dɛ sɛh he nyoa ŋɔ "Aamen" dɛ teŋɛ waa haa jaamo a waa la ta nɔ? Waa won no waa haa dɛ bol la mun.
46014017	He te jam Korowii kɛrɛdɛ kwaraa gba aa, a ta tɔnɔ dɔe tɛo.
46014018	N dɛ jam Korowii kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ waa gela n ge won wobofala bola, hale dɛ won a bola gwaa heyaa nɔ.
46014019	Kɛ dɛ n lɔ asɔre ta, dɛ bol n bwɛɛ wobol tama asɛ nɛra won no aa, a bɔ kɛŋɔ maa kpɔ wobofala bol waa kohona nɛra ta a mun noɛ.
46014020	Yabala, hé gel bechaliire. A chɛ kɛŋɔ he dɔ nomonliire. Wechɔga ɛɛ te, hé ɛ he te bechasɔɔhne a bɔr. He bɛ gel he liire kpeg wechɔga ɛɛ ta.
46014021	Ba chwerɔ do Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ geloo nɛra nɔ no n waa wobofala ta. Hɔɔhraa mɛɛ ba gela ba bol bag ba, kɛ baa no. Korowiirii ŋɔa."
46014022	Anomanta Korowii gelɔ nɛra ɛɛ bol wobofala dɛɛ bagle o kpegri dɛɛ tɛ nɛra baa wola on yarada. Nɛra baa dɛ yaradao la waa laa. O waa bagla Korowii Domadɛɛge la kpegri ta la, banɔ la baa dɛ yaradao la waa.
46014023	Dɛ asɔre tena chemo, asɛ bɛlbwa ɛɛ bol wobofale, asɛ nɛra baa wola yarada dɛ ɛ nɛmpɛɛne ba ja he nɛ aa, baa ŋɔ he dɛ we chogla aa?
46014024	Kɛ dɛ he bwa chemo dɛ che Korowii Domadɛɛge kpegri la ta dɛɛ bol o wa, asɛ nɛn waa wola yarada dɛ ɛ nɛmpɛɛ ba ja aa, wɛɛ noo dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ o dɛ ɛ wechɔga. Waa haa dɛ bol la bwa ɛɛ jo o nyu binii asɛ o nyoa kpo.
46014025	O tea bini waa bwa ɛɛ chɔ baŋee, asɛ o guŋi Korowii harɛ dɛ soŋo, asɛ dɛ ŋɔ nɛra be ŋɔ Korowii ja he nɛɛ kpela.
46014026	Yabala, amee jaɔ? Saŋ bɛlbwa haa cheme la, bɛl dɛ tɛ yel, bɛl dɔ sipila waa haa dɛ hwela, bɛl ge dɔ waane Korowii aa baglo, bɛl gee bol wobofala, bɛl gee bagle a mune. Hé gel waa haa dɛ ɛ la dɔ tɔnɔ tɛ nomɛlbwa.
46014027	Nɛra baa dɛ bol wobofala la, hé gel ba ɛ nɛra banɛ kɛɛ batoro gbo. A chɛ kɛ ba bol kaa tɛ dɔŋa, asɛ bɛl gee bagle a mun ásɛ nɛra no gɛ waa bola.
46014028	Dɛ nomɛlbwa toole dɛ won bagle wobofale la mun aa, amɔ te náate waa ira dɛ fee bol waa la tɔ nyoa dɛ so. Kɛ o ne Korowii ɛɛ bol waa o bambile bini.
46014029	Nɛra baa dɛ ba Korowii Domadɛɛge kpegri ta chega dɛ bol o waa la, hé gel ba ɛ banɛ ne batoro gbo, asɛ ba kar la so dɛɛ no ba be, dɛɛ pese waa la kɛrɛdɛ.
46014030	Dɛ bɛl sogo Korowii Domadɛɛge baglo waane aa, a chɛ kɛ naate waa dɛ bol waa la tɛo bɔr ó bol.
46014031	Hé bwa ɛɛ bol Korowii waa beŋkpoŋa beŋkpoŋa ásɛ a dɔ tɔnɔ tɛ he bwa, dɛ do heyaa gbemba.
46014032	Nɛra Korowii Domadɛɛge aa tɛɛ ba kpegri bá bol o waa la, ba won ba te lawa,
46014033	dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii aa wesagasagare nyin. Deŋnesɔɔhnaa wɛɛ nyin. Gɛ baa dɛ ɛ asɔrere ta bobɛlbwa laanee.
46014034	He dɛ ɛ asɔre aa, hé gel haahna hel. A ta magrɛ kɛŋɔ baa bol waa bela. Gɛ Korowii Tɔn aa bagla la, hé ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ báa no he baala la be.
46014035	Dɛ haahna la dɛ nyin waane bɔɔra aa, bá la dem mɔɔ dɛ ka bɔɔ ba jaranar. A ta magrɛ kɛŋɔ haah bol waa asɔre dea bela.
46014036	He bee Korowii waa la che dɛ ba naa? He gboo no waa la aa?
46014037	He banɔ la haa dɛ bol ŋɔ he won Korowii kpegri ta chega dɛ bol o waa la, kɛɛ he dɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge la la, hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ waa maa chwera ba tɛ heyaa la ɛ Korowii mmara.
46014038	Nomɛlbwa waa wola nyin kɛŋɔ o no la, hé gelo.
46014039	Yabala, hé gel he sie begre hɛɛ nyin kpegri Korowii be ásɛ dɛ won kpɔ bol o wa, dɛ bɛ banɔ la baa dɛ bol wobofala la ŋwɛnɛ tɔ.
46014040	Hɛ́ɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa ŋwɛnɛ aa magra ta dɛ bɛ wesagasagare dɛɛ ɛ.
46015001	Yabala, hé gel n lii heyaa Amanesoma la n faa bola bagle heyaa asɛ he no dɛ taa teŋɛ a ta,
46015002	asɛ a lɛ heyaa la wa. Dɛ yarada haa dɔa Amanesoma la ta la ɛ kpela, he ta an vɛɛh dɛ kpoŋe a bini kɛrɛdɛ gɛ maa bagle heyaa la te naa, amɔ te a lɛ heya. Dɛ gɛ laa te naa, amɔ dɛ he yarada la ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ.
46015003	Gɛ Korowii aa bag mɛ laanee n bagle heyaa la. O bagle waane aa ɛ wejena kɛŋɔ gɛ Yeesu aa koh ya wechɔga waa dɛ sewɛ gɛ Korowii Tɔn aa bagle o waa mɔɔ a ɛ la.
46015004	Ba hugo, asɛ a tɔpetooro wee la Korowii iru seo ta. Gɛɛ Korowii Tɔn bagle mɔɔ a ɛ.
46015005	Pitaa tɔ sie nao, mɔɔ o habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la bwa nao,
46015006	mɔɔ o habɔɔ nɛra lafraanue la ge nao kerabeŋkpoŋ. Ba galga ta lole ba le fini, bane ge serewe.
46015007	A habɔɔ la Jems nao, asɛ Yeesu toroma bwa nao.
46015008	Menee ka mun nao. N do kɛŋɔ bechala o nya aa kpoŋe o tea o ta beɛ kɛrɛdɛ mɔɔ ba lolɔ la.
46015009	Menee Yeesu toroma la bwa bechala n waa aa wola hiaih. N ta chɛɛ kwaraa kɛ ba yer mɛ o torome, dɛkalkɛ gɛ n faa hah asɔre tena dɛ ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa la aa were.
46015010	Kɛ Korowii sune n nɛ, dɛ cha mɛ. Chae waa cha mɛ laanee gela n do gɛ maa doa nɔ la. O suna waa sune n nɛɛ la ta pɛɛ ɛɛ. N iro, asɛ dɛɛ ɛ o toma la kohona hale dɛ gwaa n bala kwara. N gbagba kpegri ne laa mɛɛ ɛ toma nɔ. Korowiirii sune n nɛɛ dɛ cha mɛ, asɛ mɛɛ ɛa gɛ la.
46015011	Dɛ menee bol Amanesoma la bagle heya o, nɛra banee yoo, webeŋkpoŋii ya bwa ɛɛ bagle, anee he gee yarada.
46015012	Dɛ ya bagle Yeesu Kristo waa ŋɔ Korowiirii iru seo ta naa, ɛrɛɛ he bini bane berɛ dɛɛ ŋɔ Korowii aa nɛraa ir seo ta nɔɔ?
46015013	Dɛ Korowii aa nɛraa ir seo ta naa, amɔ te Yeesu gba ta seo ta ire.
46015014	Dɛ Korowii ta Yeesu Kristo ire seo ta te naa, amɔ te waa yaa dɛ bagle heyaa la, ne yarada haa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo la bwa ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ.
46015015	Dɛ gɛɛ te naa, amɔ te Korowii danseɛ yaa dɛ di la ta kasinteŋ ɛɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya dɛ bagle heyaa ŋɔ Korowiirii ir Yeesu le seo ta. Dɛ nɛra aa seo taa ir te naa, amɔ ya teŋe nyosone.
46015016	Dɛ nɛra aa seo taa ir aa, amɔ te Korowii ta on ire seo ta.
46015017	Dɛ Korowii ta Yeesu Kristo ire seo ta naa, amɔ te he dɛ yaradao pɛɛpɛɛ, dɛ he wechɔga ta lɔ he nɛ.
46015018	A berɔ dɛɛ bagle kɛŋɔ nɛra ba faa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo mɔɔ dɛ serewe la, Korowii aa ban lɛ.
46015019	Dɛ ya soga yaa soga nɔ gbo taa ya dɔ hwɛga Yeesu Kristo be naa, amɔ te ya waa sum gwaa nɛra bwa wa.
46015020	Kɛ gɛ laa a do. Korowiirii ir Yeesu Kristo seo ta. Onee tɔ sie ir seo ta nɛra baa serewa la nɛɛ mɔɔ ba ge baa ir.
46015021	Nɛmbeŋkpoŋii ba seo ne. Nɛmbeŋkpoŋ gee ba seo ta ira ne.
46015022	Ya ne Adam bwa aa ɛ beŋkpoŋ la waa yaa serewe la. Gɛɛ a do ya banɔ la ge ne Yeesu Kristo aa ɛ beŋkpoŋ la ɛɛ ir seo taa dɛ dɔ mkpa.
46015023	Kɛ ya bwa ne ya tɔperaa ya ir. Yeesu Kristoo tɔ sie ir mɔɔ, ásɛ ya banɔ la ya ne waa ɛ beŋkpoŋ la ge ir gɛ saŋ waa ba ja la,
46015024	asɛ mɔɔ wobɛlbwa ba a jaga. A taa Yeesu Kristo dɔ kpegri dɛ pɔ konchɔga aa bea yaa wola an na bwa soosiwi nɛ, dɛ kpɔ kora la do o Mɛɛ Korowii nɔn ta ó di.
46015025	Yeesu Kristo chɛ kɛŋɔ o di kpegri komɛlbwa waa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta nɛɛ ka tel kɛŋɔ waa pɔ o dɔma bwa nɛ.
46015026	Dɛ o baa pɔ ba bwa nɛɛ tonaa, o dɔm muŋkaa waa pɔ o nɛɛ laanee seo.
46015027	Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Korowii gelɔ o dɔ komɛlbwa kpegri." Dɛ ba ŋɔ, "O gelɔ o dɔ komɛlbwa kpegri" aa, a ta baglɛ kɛŋɔ o dɔ o Korowii waa dɔ kpegri la dɛ kpɔ tɛo o di la ge kpegri.
46015028	Dɛ Korowii baa ɛ gɛ tonaa, o Bie gee kpɔ o tenee do o Mɛɛ Korowii waa kpɔ komɛlbwa kpegri tɛo la lɔga, asɛ Korowii gbo ɛ kpegri bwa dɔɔ.
46015029	Nɛra bane chegɛ lala naa ta dɛ gel baa sɔ ba Korowii ne. Bɔkwa waa baa ɛ gɛ nɔɔ? Dɛ lala aa seo taa ir aa, bɔkwa waa gela ba gel ba ɛ gɛ dɛɛ tɛɛ baɔ?
46015030	Bɔkwa waa ya gee jo siswɛm waa ta saŋ bɛlbwa nɔɔ?
46015031	Yabala, kpelaa mɛɛ ŋɔ, dɛ maa siswɛm ta jo tɔpere bɛlbwa naa, amɔ te dɛ n laa yon dɛɛ kpɛɛ heyaa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ teŋa ta la.
46015032	Gɛ nɛra faa ɛɛ mɛ Ɛfesos la do kɛŋɔ n ne kpɔg bini olchɔga aa yoa ken. Dɛ harɛ nɔ ta waa gbo waa n ne ba yo aa, bɔkwa tɔnɔɔ n dɔ a ta nɔ? Dɛ nɛra aa seo taa iraa, ya fe ɛɛ ŋɔɔ hé gel ya ir dɛ di kwaa dɛ lɛ sie, dɛkalkɛŋɔ tɔpebɛl yaa sewɔɔ.
46015033	He bɛ gel nɛra ɛɛ negre heya. Danchɔge kpɔe dɛ chɔg dadɛɛge.
46015034	Anomanta hé ir dɛ gel he sie chɔ harɛ hɛɛ ɛ kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ bɛ wechɔga dɛɛ ɛ. He bini bane aa Korowii waa jemɛ kɛrɛdɛ. A ta sihiih ɛɛ tɛ heya aa?
46015035	He bini bɛl ɛɛ bɔɔroo ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ lala ɛɛ ba wona ir seo ta nɔ? Ɛrɛɛ ba bwara ɛɛ ba doe yɔ?"
46015036	Gɛne! Komɛlbwa haa du la, o dɛ pɔh mɔɔ dɛ le.
46015037	Komɛlbwa haa du la, dɛ mea yoo, kon waa dɔ bii yoo, o papooni laa hɛɛ du. O bii hɛɛ du, asɛ o yon ɛ papooni dɛ le baŋ.
46015038	Korowiirii dɛɛ begra gɛ a bwa soosiwi aa doa gɛ waa dɛ nyin.
46015039	Bwadabii bwa ta beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ. A bwa ne a soosiwii. Nɛwɛnyini bwadabii korɛ ola kwaa ta. Asɛ pɛŋa ge kwaa korɛ jumbii kwaa ta.
46015040	Korowii doa kwaa lole, asɛ harɛ ta ge kwaa do le, kɛ a wer korɛ dɔŋa ta.
46015041	Wee wer korɛ korobie wer ta. Weweela ge wer korɔ. Hale weweela bini kwara, ane dɛ chaah gwaa ane.
46015042	Gɛɛ nɛra seo ta ira ɛɛ ba doe. Bwadabii yaa dɔa nɔ, dɛ ya baa serewe aa, o bwa ɛɛ chɔgoo, kɛ bwadabii yaa dɔ dɛ ir seo ta la, o te aa chɔg bwa.
46015043	Bwadabii yaa dɔa mɔɔ dɛ serewe la ɛɛ chɔgoo. O ɛ kompɛɛ baa hugo, kɛ Korowii ɛɛ leo seo taa asɛ o ɛ kondɛɛge. Kon baa hugo la aa kpegri bɛlbwa dɔ, kɛ Korowii ɛɛ iruu asɛ o do kpegri.
46015044	Bwadabii yaa dɔɔ harɛ nɔ ta laanee baa ba huga, kɛ onɔ la Korowii aa dɛ ba ira seo ta la te ɛɛ korɔɔ. Gɛ harɛ nɔ ta bwadabii aa lole la, gɛɛ Korowii doa kon ge do le.
46015045	Ba chwerɔ do Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Korowii ta nɛnlogle, dɛ yerɔ Adam, asɛ o dɔ mkpa dɛ do le." Kɛ muŋkaa Adam la te ɛ Korowii doa nɛn dɛɛ tɛ mkpa. Onee Yeesu Kristo.
46015046	Korowii doa bwadabii laa ya tɔ sie dɔ. Harɛ nɔ ta konee ya tɔ sie dɔ mɔɔ dɛ dɔ Korowii doa kon la.
46015047	Nɛnlogle la, ba mao tee ne o ɛ harɛ nɛn. Asɛ nɛɛte la ge le nyundua.
46015048	Gɛ onɔ la baa mao tee ne faa doa la, gɛɛ o nɛra ge do. Asɛ gɛ onɔ la waa le nyundua aa doa la, gɛɛ o ge nɛra do.
46015049	Gɛ yaa le onɔ la waa le harɛ nɔ ta la, gɛɛ yaa ba onɔ la waa le nyundua la ge lee.
46015050	Yabala, hé gel n ŋɔ he be, harɛ nɔ ta bwadabii aa won la Korowii be. Kon waa dɛ pɔh la ne onɔ la waa wola pɔh aa won pɛ.
46015051	Hɛ́ɛ no, mɛɛ bagle heyaa wesɔɔhle bɛlee. Ya bwa laa dɛɛ ba serewa. Hale dɛ ya serewɔ oo, ya ta serewoo, Korowii ɛɛ begre ya bwa bwadabii kerabeŋkpoŋii.
46015052	Aa ɛo wɔrɔbe nɛɛ kilo, gɛ saŋ Korowii bɛla aa ba si dɛ bagle waa bwa jaga la. Dɛ o sio waa, Korowii ɛɛ ir serewa laanee seo ta asɛ ba dɔ bwadabii waa wola pɔh, dɛ begre ya banɔ la yaa wola sewɛ dɛ ta so le la bwara,
46015053	dɛkalkɛŋɔ a ɛ kpela kɛŋɔ bwadabii waa wola pɔh la chɛ kɛŋɔ o chig onɔ la waa dɛ pɔh la naa ta. A chɛ kɛŋɔ bwadabii waa wola sewɛ la chig onɔ la waa dɛ sewɛ la naa ta.
46015054	Dɛ onɔ la waa wola sewɛ, waa wola pɔh la baa chig onɔ la waa dɛ sewɛ dɛɛ pɔh la naa ta naa, belaa waa baa chwera do Korowii Tɔn bini la ɛɛ ba kpela ɛɛ. Ba chwerɔ ŋɔ, "O kpɔ kpegri pɔ seo nɛ."
46015055	"Seo, lee he kpegri dɔɔ jaɔ? Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ won dɛ do yaa weweele ta nɔ?"
46015056	Wechɔgaa gela seo ɛɛ do yaa weweele ta. Mmara yaa wola o ta teŋɛ la ge gelɔ seo dɔ kpegri ya nɛ.
46015057	Korowii chɛ jam kohona. O tɛ yaa kpegri dɛ le ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo be ásɛ ya pɔ seo nɛ.
46015058	Anomanta, yabala maa dɛ nyin he wa, hé lawɛ waa la bini kiŋkiŋ dɛ bɛ gel wobɛlbwa ha heyaa asɛ he berɛ habɔɔ. Hé lawɛ ya Dɔɔ toma bini bambile bwa ne, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he koeh aa pɛɛ ɛɛ ba.
46016001	A ka suuga yaa dɛ nyin ya ta tɛ Korowii nɛra la. Hɛ́ɛ ɛ gɛ n faa ŋɔ asɔre tena baa lɔ Galaasia harɛ ta be ŋɔ báa ɛ la.
46016002	Kwasiara bɛlbwa, hé bini bɛlbwa ɛɛ kpɔ suuga, gɛ bɛlbwa waa wona dɛ le anɔ la Korowii aa chao o dɔ la ta, dɛ kpɔ cheg. Hɛ́ɛ ɛ gɛ, asɛ n balaa, he bɛ suuga dɛɛ ta kpa.
46016003	Dɛ n balaa, mɛɛ chwerɛ tɔnee dɛ kpɔ tɛ nɛra haa dɛ yarada ba, dɛ tom ba bá kpɔ a ne kwaa haa tɛ Korowii nɛra la la Jerusalam.
46016004	Dɛ a chɛ kɛ n ne ba la naa, mɛɛ tɔ ba siee ya la.
46016005	N dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ n la Makidoonia harɛ ta. Dɛ n baa le bela aa, mɛɛ ba he bee,
46016006	dɛ ba so he be dɛ bigri tama. N ken ɛɛ so he bee alalawo saŋ, ásɛ alalawo saŋ kaa mɔɔ he ta mɛ ŋwɛnɛ n kaa bela bwa maa dɛ nyin.
46016007	Dɛ n ŋɔ mɛɛ ba na heyaa tarakenii yaa, maa won bigri he be. Kɛ dɛ Korowii sɛoh n ba won ba naa, mɛɛ bigri he bee.
46016008	Mɛɛ so Ɛfesos bonɔɔ ka tel kɛŋɔ tɔpejen Pɛntekɔs la aa tel,
46016009	dɛkalkɛŋɔ n dɔ bɔr bonɔ dɛ́ won ɛ Korowii toma kohona asɛ a le tɔnɔ dɛ tɛo. Nɛra baa dɛ nyin ba tɔ n toma ŋwɛnɛ la warɔ te.
46016010	Timoti ba he be naa, hé lɛo kɛrɛdɛ ásɛ o sie lɛ. Korowii toma maa dɛ ɛ la, anee o gee ɛ.
46016011	Anomanta he bɛ o sie lawɛ tegɛ harɛ. Hé doo ŋwɛnɛ ásɛ o kpɔ bambisɔɔhna dɛ berɛ ba n be. N dɛ nyiŋi o ne yabala la ŋwɛnɛ.
46016012	N soŋe ya dɔŋ Apolos ŋɔ o ja yabala la nɛɛ ba ba he be, kɛ a ta o som doe kɛ ó la bela taraken. Dɛ o baa dɔ bɔr aa, wɛɛ bao.
46016013	Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ asɛ dɛ ta lawɛ waa la bini kiŋkiŋ. Hé dɔ bambile asɛ dɛ gel lawa haa lawɛ waa la bini la do kpegri.
46016014	Hé kpɔ nɛnnyin dɛɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa dɛɛ tɛ nɛra.
46016015	Yabala, he jemɔ kɛŋɔ Stɛfanas ne o dem tenaa tɔ sie yarada Yeesu waa la Akaaya harɛ nɛra la bwa bini dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo dɛ swɛɛ siwi dɛ ɛ toma dɛɛ tɛ Korowii nɛra.
46016016	Anomanta n dɛ soŋe heya, hɛ́ɛ no nomɛlbwa waa do ken ne nɛra baa ja ba nɛɛ dɛɛ koh toma nɔ ta la deŋna wa.
46016017	Stɛfanas ne Fɔtonaatos ne Akaikus balɔ, asɛ a do n som taeh, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he gbabir ta wone ba ásɛ n na heya, kɛ ba chig he naa ta dɛ ba,
46016018	dɛ ba do mɛ gbemba taeh, dɛ do he ge gbemba. Hɛ́ɛ duu nɛra baa do ken nɔ.
46016019	Asɔre tena baa lɔ Eesia harɛ la dɛ na heyaa taeh. Akwela ne Presela ne asɔre tena baa dɛ cheme ba dem la ge dɛ na heyaa Yeesu sɔn ta.
46016020	Yabala bwa baa lɔ bonɔ dɛ na heya. Hɛ́ɛ lea dɔŋa kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ nyabii.
46016021	Men Pɔɔl gbagbaa bol waa nɔ ba chwerɛ, asɛ n gbabir ge chwerɛ anɔ aa kaa nɔ. N dɛ na heya.
46016022	Nomɛlbwa waa wola ya Dɔɔ nyin la, Korowii nyotaahna lɔ o nɛ. Ya Dɔɔ, ba!
46016023	Yá Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya.
46016024	He nɛra he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la, n dɛ na heyaa n bambile bwa ne. Aamen.
47001001	Men Pɔɔl aa too Korowii tea asɛ o lee mɛ ŋɔ ń ɛ Yeesu Kristo torome la, n ne ya dɔŋ Timotii chwerɛ tɔn nɔ. Ya chwerɔ dɛɛ tɛ asɔre tena baa dɛ tomɛ Korowii Kɔrent, ne Korowii nɛra bwa baa lɔ Akaaya harɛ ta.
47001002	Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
47001003	Hé gel ya jam ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo Mɛɛ Korowii. Onee ya Mɛɛ waa dɛ sune ya nɛɛ kohona, dɛ ɛ Korowii waa wona dɛɛ larawe nɛn bwara.
47001004	On dɛɛ larawe ya bwara ya wenaale bwa ta, ásɛ ya ge won che bambisɔɔhna waa tɛ yaa la ta dɛɛ larawe yabala baa lɔ wenaale bɛlbwa soosiwi ta la bwara.
47001005	Gɛ yaa ja Yeesu nɛɛ dɛ na wahala kohona la, gɛ tentenee a che o nɛɛ ya dɔ bɔlarawa ge kohona.
47001006	Dɛ ya dɛ na wahala aa, he chae waa yaa naa ásɛ dɛ won larawe he bwara, asɛ Korowii won lɛ heya. Dɛ Korowii berɔ larawe ya bwara ge aa, dɛ he chae waa o ɛ gɛ, ásɛ ya won cha heya, he won lawɛ bambile gɛ saŋ haa ba na ya wahala yaa naa la dɔŋ la.
47001007	Anomanta, ya hwɛga yaa dɔa he nɛɛ la aa pɛɛ ɛɛ ba, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ haa dɛ na ya wahala la dɔŋ nɔ, gɛɛ hɛɛ ba ya bɔlarawa Korowii aa ba tɛ yaa la ane dɔe.
47001008	Yabalawa, ya dɛ nyin he jemɛ wahala yaa naa Eesia harɛ la wa. Dɛ a kan dɛ gwaa ya nɛɛ kohona. Dɛ yaa lii kɛŋɔ yaa le a nyoa bokpega binii.
47001009	Ya te fe jemɔ kɛŋɔ yaa sewɔɔ, kɛ ya ta sewɛ. Korowiirii ɛa gɛ asɛ ya bɛ ya gbagba bokpega ta dɛɛ hwɛgɛ, asɛ dɛ kpɔ hwɛga do on waa dɛ ir nɛra seo ta la nɛ.
47001010	O lɛ yaa le siswɛm a fe aa chɛ kɛ ya sewɛ a ta la ta. O ta dɛ lɛ yaa. Ya kpɔ ya sie dawɛ o nɛɛ kɛŋɔ wɛɛ teŋɔɔ dɛɛ lɛ yaa.
47001011	Hé cha yaa dɛɛ soŋe Korowii, asɛ dɛ o baa no he wesoŋa dɛ cha yaa aa, nɛra won kpɔ jam tɛo pirim dɛ tɛ yaa kɛŋɔ waa no nɛndamanta wesoŋa baa soŋa tɛ yaa la.
47001012	Webeŋkpoŋii gela ya baŋa pa. Anee kɛŋɔ yaa wonoo ŋɔ bambile bwa ne kɛŋɔ wobɛlbwa yaa ɛa harɛ bonɔ la, tepoŋ ne bambile bwa nee ya ɛa Korowii ŋwɛnɛ ta, a laa kɛ waa yaa ɛa he be la. Korowiirii sune ya nɛɛ dɛ cha yaa ya ɛa. Harɛ bonɔ wejema ne laa ya ɛa.
47001013	Waa yaa chwerɛ heyaa asɛ he kure dɛ no a mun la, anee ya chwerɛ. Wobɛlbwa toole a bini he no a mun kahonɛ.
47001014	Taraken haa jemɛ ya waa tama nɔ, n dɛ lii kɛŋɔ hɛɛ jemɛ ya waa bwaa, ásɛ awola ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo aa ba la, he baŋa pa ya waa kɛŋɔ ya baŋa aa pa he waa la.
47001015	Maa jemɛ he waa ken la, a waa n faa ɛ kɛ mɛɛ ba cha heyaa kera anɛ bwaa la.
47001016	N fa ɛo kɛ n Makidoonia harɛ kaala ta la, ń kpɔ he be, asɛ n le bela dɛɛ ba ge aa, ń ba so he be tama, asɛ he ta mɛ ŋwɛnɛ n kaa Judia harɛ.
47001017	Maa lii ken la, dɛ n le nɛn o liire aa dɛ ɛo aahna-aahna kɛɛ? N dɛ magle magla aa, n gbo kɛrɛdɛɛ mɛɛ nyiŋi kɛŋɔ nɛwɛnyina aa dɛ ɛ, asɛ a wer tɛ mɛ naa, n ŋɔ ɔɔh, asɛ bug ta n berɔ na kɛ aa were tɛ mɛ naa, n ŋɔ ɔɔhɔ kɛɛ?
47001018	N nyoa maa bagɛ heyaa la, aahna-aahna toole a ta. A ɛ kasinteŋ kɛŋɔ Korowii wa aa ɛ kasinteŋ nyosone aa wola toole a ta la.
47001019	Korowii Bie Yeesu Kristo la n ne Silvanos ne Timoti aa bagle o waa he be la dɔ kasinteŋ. O ta dɔe kɛŋɔ o ŋɔ ɔɔh, dɛ berɛ le habɔɔ dɛ ŋɔ ɔɔhɔ. O te bol wa aa, dɛ o bolɔ.
47001020	Nyoo bwa Korowii aa baga la, Yeesu nɛɛ ya che dɛ jemɛ kɛ a ɛ kasinteŋ. O waa ya won Aamen la sii, asɛ Korowii won dɔ sɔn.
47001021	Korowiirii gela ya ne he bwa won lawɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ teŋa la kpoŋe kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ le yaa tɛ o toma,
47001022	dɛ do yaa nso aa bagle kɛ onee dɔ yaa, dɛ tɛ yaa o Domadɛɛge la wɛɛ so ya nɛ, asɛ ya che a ta dɛ jemɛ waa bwa waa ɛa cheg yaa.
47001023	Korowii waa jemɛ n nyu bini bwa la, onee n danseɛ te waa nɔ ta. N faa wola Kɔrent balɛ la, maa nyin kɛ n ba chɛgre heyaa he wechɔga waa asɛ he bambile chɔg, a waa n ta balɛ.
47001024	Kpegri laa yaa bagle heyaa he Korowii yaradae ta. Yaa gɛ lii kwaraa. Ya jemɔ kɛ he chegɔ kiŋkiŋ he yarada ta. Ya dɛ nyin kɛ ya cha heyaa ásɛ he sie lɛ.
47002001	Anomanta, n ɛ n liire kɛŋɔ maa he bee ba asɛ dɛ ba gel he tea bini chɔg kpa.
47002002	N gelɔ he tea bini chɔg aa, umee dɛ lar mɛ bwara jaɔ? Nɛn toole, nemenɛ he tenten maa chɔg he tea bini la.
47002003	A waa n chwerɛ heyaa tɔn la la. Dɛ maa nyin kɛ he nɛra haa chɛ kɛ he gel n sie lɛ la, n ba he be asɛ he berɛ ba ɛɛ mɛ tebinichɔg wa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ n jemɛ he bwa waa kɛ n silɛɛ he silɛɛ.
47002004	Tɔn la n faa chwerɛ heyaa la, dɛ a dɛ we n nɛɛ taeh, asɛ n tea bini chɔg mɛɛ wi siniire dɛɛ chwerɔ. N fa ta on chwerɛ dɛ́ gel he tea bini chɔg, kɛ n chwerɔ ásɛ he na gɛ del maa dɛ nyin he bwa.
47002005	Nɛn o faa ba tebinichɔg ne la, n gbo tea bini laa o chɔg. He bwa tea binii o chɔg ŋwɛnɛ bɛl ta. Maa nyin kɛ n do naate siswɛm, a waa n bola ken la.
47002006	Gɛ he kɛrɛdɛ nyoa aa pɛa he tɛr naate deŋne nɔ, a magrɔ. He bɛ ane ɛ ja kpa.
47002007	A chɛ kɛ he kpɔ o wechɔga kɛo name, dɛɛ doo gbemba. Gɛ laa, o tea bini chɔgɔ kohona aa, wɛɛ horɔɔ.
47002008	Anomanta, n dɛ soŋe heyaa kɛŋɔ he gel o jemɛ kɛŋɔ he dɛ nyinu kohona.
47002009	Maa dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ n ɛ heyaa dɛ na kɛŋɔ hɛɛ no n waa ta wobɛlbwa taa kɛɛ haa no la, a waa n chwerɛ heyaa tɔn la la.
47002010	Nomɛlbwa haa kpɔ o wechɔga kɛo la, n ge kpɔɔ kɛo. Nomɛl ɛɛ mɛ waane a chɛ kɛ n kpɔ kɛo waa, n koh he waa dɛ kpɔ kɛo Yeesu Kristo siwi ta,
47002011	asɛ Bɔnsam bɛ ŋwɛnɛ ba dɔ dɛ chɔg ya wa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya jemɛ o ŋwɛnɛre waa kpɔa dɛɛ negre nɛn.
47002012	Maa baa tel Troas ŋɔ n bol Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma la la, n nao kɛŋɔ ya Dɔɔ pili ŋwɛnɛ tɛ mɛ kɛ n ɛ toma bela.
47002013	Kɛ maa wola ya dɔŋ Taetos ka pue bela la, n baah ta men sɔɔhnɛ. Anomanta n kal bela tena dɛ kaa Makidoonia harɛ.
47002014	Korowii jam kɛ waa chegɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ gel ya yo dɛɛ le nɔ. Korowii chegɛ ya nɛɛ dɛ gel nɛra ɛɛ no Yeesu Kristo waa la bobɛlbwa kɛŋɔ konsɔɔhsoma sɔɔh aa dɛ le nomɛlbwa ɛɛ no la.
47002015	Yeesu Kristo gelɔ ya ɛ konsɔɔhsoma Korowii be, ásɛ nɛra Korowii aa dɛ lɛɛ ba, ne banɔ la baa nyogre ŋwɛnɛ dɛɛ ba chɔga ta bwa ɛɛ no ya sɔɔh.
47002016	Banɔ la baa dɛ nyogre la ɛɛ no sɔɔh laanee dɛ serewe, asɛ banɔ la Korowii aa dɛ lɛɛ ba la ge no dɛ dɔ mkpa. Umee dɛ won ɛ gɛ toma nɔ nɔ?
47002017	Nɛra kɛrɛdɛ kpɔ Korowii waa la berɛ bona dii dɛ yog dɛɛ di. Ba laa yan. Korowiirii tɛ yaa waa nɔ ŋɔ yáa bola, asɛ yaa bola o siwi ta bambile bwa ne, pɛɛ ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la nomanta.
47003001	Yaa dɛ ŋɔ ken nɔ, kpɛɛraa yaa kpɛɛ ya te ja kɛɛ? A hiaoh kɛŋɔ ya kpoŋe tɔne aa bagle ya nɛnsoo ne gɛ ya toma aa doa mɔɔ he lɛ yaa aa? Kɛɛ a hiaoh kɛ ya dɔ ane le he be asɛ nɛra won yarada yaa aa?
47003002	He gbagbaa ya tɔn waa dɛ bagle tondɛɛga yaa ɛa. Ya bambile taa Korowii chwerɛ, asɛ nomɛlbwa na heyaa dɛɛ pese heyaa kɛŋɔ nɛn aa dɛ kure tɔn la.
47003003	He we-ɛɛla dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ he ɛ Yeesu Kristo tɔn waa chegɛ ya nɛɛ dɛ chwerɛ. Iŋki ne laa o chwerɔ, Korowii waa lole saŋ bɛlbwa la Domadɛɛgee o kpɔ chwerɔ. Bwe ta laa o chwerɔ, bambile taa o chwerɔ.
47003004	Ya won gɛ bola, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya chegɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛɛ yarada Korowii a gɛ waa nɔ ta.
47003005	A ta ɛɛ kɛŋɔ ya dɛ lii kɛŋɔ ya won waane ɛɛ ya gbagba kpegri ta. Korowii bee ya dɔ kpegri dɛɛ ɛ anɔ la bwa yaa dɛ ɛ.
47003006	Korowii gelɔ ya won dɛɛ ɛ o fɔofale la toma. A gɛ fɔofale nɔ ta mmara baa chwera waa ɛɛ, Korowii Domadɛɛge waa. Mmara baa chwera la dɛ ba seo ne, kɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la te dɛ ba mkpa ne.
47003007	Bwe taa Korowii faa chwerɛ Mosis Mmara la dawɛ. Bela Korowii aa kpɔ Mmara la tɛ Mosis la, Korowii jirima ba bela, bela bwa chaah, dɛ chaah Mosis nɛɛ o sie bɔr ɛɛ nyɛgle. Mosis aa la Israel tena be la, dɛ nyɛgla o sie bɔr aa dɛ nyɛgle la nyoa sɔɔhnɔ tonɛ. Kɛ Israel tena aa nao la, ba ŋɔ o sie bɔr dɛ nyɛgle kohona to, ba ta wone nyiŋu. Mosis Mmara kwara waa dɛ la nɛn ne seo ta la wono ba jirima nɔ dɔŋ ne naa,
47003008	dɛ ɛrɛɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la wa ɛɛ ba doe yɔ? Aa gɛɛ gwaa laa?
47003009	Waa aa gela nɛra ɛɛ di bolchɔge Korowii sie la dɔ jirima ken aa, dɛ anɔ la aa gela nɛra ɛ nɛndɛɛga ba wa ɛɛ su o siwi la, ɛrɛɛ a jirima ɛɛ ba doe yɔ?
47003010	Waa a faa dɔ jirima kohona la, taraken a ta jirima dɔe kpa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ anfala jirima tɔɔge a nɛ.
47003011	Waa aa ɛa tɔpera anɛ dɛ tonɛ la, dɛ a dɔ jirima aa, dɛ anɔ la aa wola jaga dɔe bwa la, a jirima ta gwaalaa?
47003012	Ya dɔ hwɛga gɛ waa nɔ ta, anomanta yaa ɔmɛ.
47003013	Ya ta do kɛ Mosis o faa wola nyin kɛ Israel tena na kɛŋɔ o sie bɔr nyɛgla nyoa dɛ sɔɔh, dɛ koh a waa kpɔ yachaahne tɔ sie la.
47003014	Israel tena faa waa la mun no. Taraken gba, gɛɛ ba ta do. Baa dɛ kure fɔobene la waa la, a ta do kɛ baa kpɔ yachaahne tɔ ba sie. Ba ta Yeesu Kristo waa lɛɛ yaa, yachaahne la aa ba sie lee ba.
47003015	Hale fini gba, saŋ bɛlbwa ba dɛ kure Mosis Mmara Tɔn aa, a ta do kɛ yachaahne aa tɔ ba liire, dɛ gel baa a mun no.
47003016	Kɛ, saŋ bɛlbwa nɛwɛnyini aa charɛ o liire dɛ berɛ ba Yeesu be la, yachaahne la ɛɛ leo.
47003017	Ya Dɔɔ Yeesuu Domadɛɛge la. Bobɛlbwa ge o Domadɛɛge la aa lole la, nomɛlbwa dɔ o te, o toole Mmara lɔga.
47003018	Anomanta, komɛlbwa ta ya te sie tɔe. Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu jirima chaah ya nɛ, dɛɛ begre yaa asɛ yaa do gɛ waa doa, jirima yaa dɔa la ɛɛ ja. Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu waa ɛ Domadɛɛge la bee a bwa le.
47004001	Korowiirii sune ya nɛɛ dɛ tɛ yaa toma nɔ, anomanta ya bwara aa yaa hwah.
47004002	Ya gel waa baa ɛa dɛɛ sɔh ne sihihwaa bɛlbwa. Yaa nɛra negre, yaa Korowii waa yaa dɛ bagle la sie berɛ. Kasinteŋ torodoo yaa di Korowii sie. A taa ya che dɛ gel nɛra ɛɛ jemɛ ya da.
47004003	Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma nɔ yaa dɛ bol nɔ, dɛ a sɔɔh kwaraa naa, dɛ nɛra baa dɛ nyogre la bee a sɔh.
47004004	Bɔnsam baa dɛ maŋkurao harɛ nɔ ta kɛŋɔ Korowii la, o chɔg nɛra baa wola Yeesu yarada la liire. Waa nyin kɛŋɔ Amanesoma nii aa le Yeesu Kristo o wa aa dɔ jirima kohona be la chaah ba. Yeesu do gɛ Korowii aa doa.
47004005	Ya gbagba waa laa yaa bagle nɛra nɔ. Yeesu Kristo waa yaa bagle kɛŋɔ onee komɛlbwa Dɔɔ, dɛɛ bagle kɛŋɔ o nomanta, he bonɔɔnaa yan.
47004006	Korowii waa pere bochaah le biro ta, dɛ gel bɔr chaah la, onee gela o nii chaah ya bambile ne ya sie, asɛ ya won jemɛ gɛ o jirima yaa naa Yeesu be la aa doa.
47004007	Waa nɔ bwa yaa jema nɔ do kɛŋɔ baa kpɔ kondɛɛga do viine bini la. Yanee viine la. Yaa kpege, kɛ Korowii kpɔ o toma tɛ yaa asɛ yaa ɛ. O ɛ gɛ dɛ́ won bagle kɛŋɔ kpegri aa gwaa kpegri bwa la le o be. Ya be laa a le.
47004008	Nɛra dɛ ha yaa kohona, kɛ baa ya nɛɛ pɔ. Waa dɛ hiah yaa ya nyiŋi gɛ yaa ɛ kahonɛ, kɛ ya bwara aa yɔr, yaa gel.
47004009	Nɛra chegɛ ya nɛ, kɛ Korowii te ta ya habɔɔ leɛ. Ba go yaa bil te, kɛ ba ta wone kpo yaa.
47004010	Wenaale nɔ yaa dɛ na nɔ dɛ bagle kɛ ya sɛoh kɛ yaa sewɛ Yeesu seo la dɔŋee, ásɛ nɛra na dɛ jemɛ kɛ ya dɔ o mkpa la.
47004011	Yaa soge le nɔ, Yeesu nomanta saŋ bɛlbwaa ya so seo nyoa, ásɛ nɛra na o mkpa ya bwadabii waa won sewa nɔ aa dɔa.
47004012	Anomanta a kaa ɛ kɛ ya te dɛ sewɛ, asɛ he te ɛɛ dɔ mkpa dɛ le ya seo la ta.
47004013	Ba chwerɔ do Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Maa yaradaa waa n bol." Gɛɛ ya gee yarada. Yaa yaradaa waa yaa bol.
47004014	Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii waa ir ya Dɔɔ Yeesu seo ta la, onee dɛɛ ba ya banɔ la ya ne Yeesu aa pɛa la seo ta ira, dɛ kpɔ ya ne heyaa kaa o be.
47004015	He waa Korowii ɛ anɔ bwa. Waraa nɛra Korowii aa na ba sum den na dɛɛ warɛ. Baa kpɔ jam kohonaa tɛ Korowii ásɛ o dɔ jirima.
47004016	Ken nɔ nomanta, bɔhwaah aa yaa lawɛ. Tɔ aa dɛ per nɔ bwaa ya bwadabii gwɛgre dɛɛ la. Kɛ ya bini te la, kpegrii ya yarada do dɛɛ la.
47004017	Wahala tama nɔ yaa dɛ na tɔpera anɛ bɛl nɔ ɛɛ geloo ya dɔ jirima aa wola jaga dɔe, asɛ a gwaa wahala nɔ kwaraa ken.
47004018	Kwaa baa dɛ naa siwi ne la ta laa ya te sie dawɛ. Anɔ la baa wola an na la taa ya sie dawɛ. Kwaa baa dɛ naa la te, tɔpera anɛ bɛlee aa di. Asɛ anɔ la baa wola an na ge la, a ta jaga dɔe bwa.
47005001	Ya harɛ nɔ ta bwadabii nɔ do kɛ pata ya do o ta. Ya jemɔ kɛ dɛ o chɔgaa, Korowii ɛɛ tɛ yaa defale o gbagba aa doa waa wola chɔg bwa nyunduaa.
47005002	Ya bwadabii nɔ te pe yaa. Ya sie chegɛ chiŋ yaa hime, dɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ Korowii kpɔ ya Korowii doa bwadabii la do yaa,
47005003	asɛ ya bɛ bwadabii nya.
47005004	Ya taa lɔ ya bwadabii aa do kɛ patare ta nɔ, ya bwara dɛ nyɛg, yaa hime. Ya bwadabii nɔ kpɔe dɛ le ya nɛɛ waa laa dena swɛɛ ya siwi. Ya Korowii doa bwadabii la doe waa swɛɛ ya siwi kohona, ásɛ o chig bwadabii waa won sewa nɔ naa ta ya dɔ mkpa.
47005005	Korowiirii cheg gɛ waa nɔ tɛ yaa, dɛ kpɔ o Domadɛɛge tɛ yaa a bagle kɛŋɔ wɛɛ ba tɛ yaa o mkpa laanee.
47005006	Anomanta ya bwara aa yaa hwah bwa. Ya jemɔ kɛ ya lɔ ya bwadabii nɔ bini naa, ya toole ya Dɔɔ be,
47005007	dɛkalkɛŋɔ waa yaa dɛ na la ne laa ya so. Waa yaa dɛ yarada a waa la nee ya so.
47005008	Ya bwara aa yaa hwah tamaa bɛlbwa. Dɛ ya gel ya bwadabii nɔ waa do kɛ dea nɔ dɛ ka do ya Dɔɔ be naa, gɛɛ yaa nyin.
47005009	Anomanta, ya bwadabii nɔ binii ya do oo, ya Dɔɔ bee ya do oo, ya dɛ nyin ya waa bwa won su o siwi,
47005010	dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya bwa ɛɛ ba che Yeesu Kristo sie o bol ya waa dɛ pa bole, ásɛ bɛlbwa dɔ waa o faa lɔ mkpa ta dɛɛ ɛ la kembɔr. Dɛ bɛlbwa we-ɛɛla wer oo, aa were oo, wɛɛ dɔ a kembɔree.
47005011	Yaa jemɛ gɛ Korowii aa do ɔma la waa ya bol waa dɛɛ bagle nɛra ásɛ ba jemɛ kasinteŋ la la. Korowii jemɛ ya bambile bini bwa. N dɛ lii kɛŋɔ he ge jemɛ ya nɛnsoore he bambile bini.
47005012	Anɔ dɛ bagle kɛ kpɛɛraa ya kpɛɛ ya te dɛɛ bagle heyaa ja kɛɛ? Akai! Ya dɛ nyin ya bagle heyaa waa ásɛ he che a ta dɛ won dɛɛ maŋkura yaa nɛra baa dɛ chɔg yaa la be. Waa nɛwɛnyina aa dɛ naa laanee baa maŋkura. Baa nɛn bambile bini waa nyiŋi.
47005013	Dɛ ya nyu toole naa, Korowii waa a ba gɛ. Ya sie chɔ harɛ ge aa, he wesomee a ba gɛ.
47005014	Yeesu Kristo nyina waa dɛ nyin yaa laanee dɛɛ do yaa ya we-ɛɛla bwa ta. Gɛ yaa naa laanee kɛŋɔ dɛ nɛmbeŋkpoŋ lɛ nɛra bwa seo sewaa, a kaa chaa kɛ nɛra la bwa sewɔ.
47005015	O sewɔ tɛ nɛra bwa. Anomanta nɛra baa soge le la ta chɛ kɛ ba so ba gbagba soga kpa. Bá so tɛ naate waa sewa tɛɛ ba asɛ Korowii iru seo ta la.
47005016	Anomanta, fini habɔɔ, yaa nɛra nyiŋi gɛ nɛwɛnyina aa dɛ nyiŋ ba la. Ya fa dɛ nyiŋi Yeesu Kristo gba gɛ, kɛ yaa on gɛ nyiŋi kpa.
47005017	Nomɛlbwa o ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la, o berɛ nɛnfale. O gel o webena o faa dɛ ɛ la, dɛ charɛ dafale.
47005018	Korowiirii ɛ a bwa. Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ o che dɛ kwaa ya ne o baah ya ne o pɛ, dɛ tɛ yaa toma nɔ ŋɔ yá nyin nɛra dɛɛ tɛo ásɛ ba ne o baah kwaa bá won pɛ.
47005019	Korowii chegɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ kwaa o ne nɛwɛnyina baah dɛ lag ba dɛɛ pɛl o te, waa wola ba wechɔga nyiŋe. Yanee o kpɔ o waa tɛ ŋɔ yá bagle gɛ waa kwaa o ne ba baah dɛ lag ba ásɛ o ne ba pɛ.
47005020	Taraken nɔ, Yeesu Kristoo tomɛ yaa ŋɔ yá bol waa dɛɛ tɛo la. A kaa ɛ kɛŋɔ Korowiirii chegɛ ya nɛɛ dɛɛ bol waa nɛra be la. Ya chegɛ Yeesu Kristo naa ta dɛɛ soŋe heyaa kɛŋɔ hé gel he ne Korowii baah kwaa he pɛ.
47005021	Dɛ wechɔga bɛlbwa toole Yeesu Kristo nɛ, kɛ ya kɛrɛdɛ nomanta, Korowii gelɔ o lɛ ya wechɔga che, asɛ dɛ ya ne o pɛo waa, ya waa won su Korowii siwi o lɛ yaa kɛ nɛndɛɛgaa yan.
47006001	Ya ne Korowii bwa aa pɛa dɛɛ ɛ toma nɔ nɔ, ya dɛ soŋe heyaa kɛŋɔ Korowii aa na he sum dɛ cha heyaa nɔ, he bɛ gel a ɛ pɛɛ.
47006002	Korowii bolɔ ŋɔ, "Tɔpere aa tela kɛŋɔ n na he sum la, n no he be. N ta he chae vɛɛh awola la, n lɛ heya." Hé no! Tɔpere telo kɛŋɔ he no Korowii be ó na he sum. Finii he lɛɛ tɔpere.
47006003	Yaa nyin kɛ nomɛlbwa dɔ ya toma wechɔge bɛlbwa dɛ bol, anomanta waa aa gel nɛra lɔ naa la, yaa an kpɔe dɛɛ ɛɛ ba.
47006004	Ya dɛ ɛ ya wobɛlbwa gɛ aa chɛ kɛ nɛra Korowii aa tom ba ɛɛ ɛ. Wekpega dɛ pu yaa, ya lawɛ bambile dɛɛ so a ne. Ya dɛ na bambiwɔrɔbe wa, a won yaa hiaih kohona. Ya dɛ na sibegrewaa ge kɛrɛdɛ.
47006005	Ba dɛ lɔɔ yaa, dɛɛ do yaa deene, dɛ lɛ gaeh ya nɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ yaa sagasaga. Ya dɛ ɛ tomkpega dɛɛ koh. Tɔpebɛl yaa dom dɔe dɛɛ chɔ. Tɔpebɛl yaa kondikwaa dɔe dɛɛ di.
47006006	Ya chegɛ ya goroŋ yaa doa la ta, ne Yeesu Kristo ŋwɛnɛ la waa yaa jema, ne bambile yaa dɔa, ne ya tesom ta dɛ bagle kɛ Korowii bonɔɔnaa yan. Ya chegɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la yaa dɔa, ne gɛ yaa nyin nɛra tea bwa ne,
47006007	ne kasinteŋ bola ta, ne Korowii kpegri waa kpɔa cha yaa ta dɛɛ bagle kɛ Korowii bonɔɔnaa yan. Waa aa dɛ su Korowii siwi laanee ya dɔmkwa. A nee yaa yo dig ne gal ne, a nee yaa tɔ ya te gbemgbe.
47006008	Bane dɛ pena yaa, bane ɛɛ yoo yaa. Bane dɛ chɛgre yaa, bane ɛɛ kpɛɛ yaa. Ba dɛ yerɛ yaa nyosonteŋna, kɛ kasinteŋ gee yaa bol.
47006009	Baa yaa komɛlbwa yerɛ, kɛ nɛra bwa ge jemɛ yaa. A fe chɛ kɛ ya sewɛ, kɛ yan soge le la. Ba ɛ yaa hɔhɔrɔwa, kɛ ba ta yaa kpoe.
47006010	Ba dɛ ɛ yaa tebinichɔg wa, kɛ saŋ bɛlbwa dɛ ya lɔ silɛɛ ta. Ya ɛ nyaara, kɛ ya won nɛra chae kohona. Ya ta komɛlbwa dɔe, kɛ yan gee komɛlbwa.
47006011	Yabala Kɔrent tena, bambile bwa nee ya bol waa he be. Ya dɛ nyin he waa taeh.
47006012	Ya laa wola heyaa nyin, heyaa wola yaa nyin. Ya waa toole he bambile ta.
47006013	N dɛ bol waa nɔ dɛɛ bagle heyaa kɛŋɔ n ne n bii ken. Ya dɛ nyin heya, anomanta hé ge ta tea dɛɛ nyin yaa!
47006014	He bɛ gel he ne nɛra baa wola Korowii waa lɛɛ la pɛ dɛ ɛ beŋkpoŋ, dɛkalkɛ darame bɛlbwa toole wedɛɛga ne wechɔga baah. Ɛrɛɛ bochaah ne biro ɛɛ ba wona pɛ a magre ɔ?
47006015	Yeesu Kristo ne Bɔnsam ɛɛ wonoo pɛ a magre aa? Nɛra baa yarada Yeesu Kristo ne banɔ la baa wola on yaradae aa won pɛ a magre!
47006016	Voga ɛɛ wonoo che Korowii Dea a magre aa? Ya bwadabii nɔɔ Korowii waa lole saŋ bɛlbwa la dea. Anee Korowii gbabir bol la. O bolɔ ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ ba so n nɛra bee dɛ do ba baah. Baa yer mɛ ba Korowiirii, asɛ n ge yer ba n nɛra.
47006017	Anomanta n bolɔ ŋɔ, 'Hé le ba bini! Hé pere he te le ba nɛɛ kwara! Hé laa he te kpɔ waa te bɛlbwa aa ɛ doŋa waa ta, ásɛ n lɛ heya,
47006018	dɛ ɛ he Mɛɛ, asɛ he ɛ n bii.' Men Nemenɛ Korowiirii bola."
47007001	N dandɛɛga, yanee Korowii bagɛ a gɛ nyoa nɔ bwa. Anomanta hé gel ya do kaih. Yá laa ya bwadabii ne ya bambile kpɔ wechɔga bɛlbwa ta. Hé gel ya swɛɛ siwi dɛ́ do goroŋ, ɔma yaa dɛ ɔmɛ Korowii nomanta.
47007002	Hé kpɔ he bambile tɛ yaa dɛɛ no ya wa. Ya ta he bɛlbwa wechɔga ɛɛ. Ya ta bɛlbwa chɔgɛ, ya ta bɛlbwa negrɛ di ge bwa.
47007003	Waa maa bola nɔ, pwaeh laa mɛɛ pwah heya. Anee n faa bol la, ya dɛ nyin heyaa taeh. Seo taa yoo, bokpega taa yoo, ya ne heyaa.
47007004	He waa dɔ kasinteŋ n be. He gelɔ n baŋa ɛɛ pa taeh. Ya wenaale yaa dɛ na bwa habɔɔ la, n bwara ta hwaeh. N sie ta dɛ lɛ taeh.
47007005	Yaa ba Makidoonia harɛ ta habɔɔ kwaraa la, ya bwara ta yaa sɔɔhnɛ. Bobɛlbwa yaa kpɔ la, ya ne wahalaa. Dɛ yoi laa nɛra ɛɛ yo yaa kwara naa, dɛ ya ne bambiwɔrɔbaa.
47007006	Kɛ Korowii aa dɛ larawe tebinichɔg te bwara la nomanta, Taetos bala la gelɔ ya dɔ bɔlarawa.
47007007	O bala la gbo laa larawe ya bwara. O baa bagle gɛ waa baa na heyaa o gbabir bambile sɔɔhno he wa. O bolɔ ŋɔ n waa dɛ ɛ heya, dɛ ŋɔ waa n faa bola la gelɔ he tea bini chɔg. O bagle gɛ haa chegɛ n habɔɔ dɛ yo dɛɛ tɛ mɛ. Anomanta name kwaraa n sie lɛ kohona.
47007008	N faa chwerɛ heyaa tɔn he tea bini chɔg la, a we n nɛ. Kɛ aa berɛ dɛɛ we n nɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he tea bini ta chɔgɛ la sie.
47007009	Kɛ taraken te n sie lɛo. He tea bini aa chɔga waa laa n sie lɛ. He tebinichɔg la aa gela he charɛ da la, a waa n sie lɛ. Gɛɛ Korowii ɛɛ nyin kɛ nɛwɛnyini tea bini ɛɛ chɔg. Anomanta, ya ta heyaa wechɔge bɛlbwa ɛɛ.
47007010	Nɛwɛnyini tea bini chɔgɔ gɛ Korowii aa dɛ nyin kɛ wɛɛ ɛ aa, a gelɔ wɛɛ charɛ o liire. A gɛ waa nɔɔ dɛɛ ba Korowii mkpa ne. Anomanta a ta chɛ kɛ ya gel ya tea bini chɔg a ta. Kɛ harɛ bonɔ tebinichɔg te, seo nee aa ba.
47007011	Tebinichɔg Korowii aa dɛ nyin he dɔ laanee he dɔ la. Hé na waa aa lea tɛ heya. Hé na gɛ haa dɛ takapɔ, asɛ he siwi swɛɛ hɛɛ nyin he bagle kɛ he ta wechɔga ɛɛ. Hé na gɛ he bwaawee aa ir wechɔga ta, hé na gɛ haa dɛ ɔmɛ. A gelɔ he pɛla lawɛ yaa, asɛ he siwi swɛɛ waa aa togra ta. A gelɔ he siwi swɛɛ nɛra baa wola wedɛɛga ɛɛ nɛɛ he tɛr ba deŋne. He wono bagle kɛ he ta wechɔga bɛlbwa ɛɛ waa la ta.
47007012	Maa chwerɛ heyaa tɔn la la, a ta ɛɛ kɛ naate waa ɛ o dɔŋ wechɔga, kɛɛ naate o dɔŋ aa ɛo wechɔga waa n chwerɔ. Korowii gba nao kɛ n chwerɔ ásɛ he won jemɛ gɛ haa dɛ nyin yaa.
47007013	Anee larawe ya bwara. A gbo laa. Yaa na gɛ haa cha Taetos o dɔ silɛɛ la, a gelɔ ya sie lɛ.
47007014	N fa bol he waa Taetos be, dɛ kpɛɛ heya. He ta gelɛ sihiih kpo mɛ. Waa yaa bol he be la bwa ɛ kasinteŋ. Gɛɛ waa yaa bol Taetos be dɛ kpɛɛ heyaa la bwa ɛ kasinteŋ.
47007015	O lii gɛ he bwa faa dɛ no o waa ne gɛ he faa dɛ tɛo duure dɛɛ ɛ yalayala la aa, dɛ o nyina waa dɛ nyin heyaa la, dɛ jae a na dɛɛ ja.
47007016	N sie lɛo kohona kɛŋɔ maa dɔ heyaa dɛ won kpɔ hwɛga do he nɛɛ wobɛlbwa ta nɔ.
47008001	Yabalawa, ya dɛ nyin he jemɛ gɛ Korowii aa sune Makidoonia asɔre tena nɛɛ dɛ cha ba ba dɔ bonya kohona.
47008002	Ba na wahala kɛrɛdɛ. A lole kɛ nyaaraa ban kohona, kɛ ba sie aa lɛ Yeesu lɛɛ waa lɛɛ ba la ta kohona nomanta, ba wono ta suuga kohona ásɛ ba kpɔ cha nɛra.
47008003	Mɛɛ wonoo ŋɔ ba ta tea tɛ yaa kwaa gɛ ba bokpega aa tela, hale ba tɛo gwaa ba bokpega del kwara. Ba gbagba tetooraa ba ɛ gɛ, nɛn laa do ba.
47008004	Ba gbagbaa soŋe yaa sibegra ne ŋɔ yá gel ba ja nɛra baa dɛ cha Korowii nɛra la nɛ.
47008005	Ba ɛ waa dɛ gwaa gɛ ya te fe aa dɛ lii. Ba tɔ sie kpɔ ba te do N Naa Korowii nɔn ta, mɔɔ dɛ kpɔ ba te do ya ge nɔn ta gɛ Korowii aa dɛ nyin.
47008006	Anomanta ya ŋɔ Taetos be ŋɔ tondɛɛga nɔ soo waa pa a mun la, ó den ba choŋi a ta, asɛ dɛ cha heyaa he ɛ wedɛɛga haa dɛ ɛ kwaa kɛɛ bɔr la ka tonɛ.
47008007	He dɛ ɛ waa Yeesu waa bwa ta, yarada ta, waa bola ta, wejema ta, ne nyina haa dɛ nyin nɛra chae ta, ne nyina haa dɛ nyin yaa la ta. Anomanta ya dɛ nyin kɛ hɛɛ ɛ waa kwaa kɛɛ ge ta.
47008008	N ta bolɛ dɛɛ bil a ɛ lao kɛŋɔ hɛ́ɛ kɛ. N dɛ nyin n jemɛ kɛŋɔ he nɛnnyin la ɛ nɛnnyin kasinteŋ. A waa n bagle gɛ bane siwi aa swɛɛ kwaa kɛɛ ta la.
47008009	Kɛ he na gɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo aa sune ya nɛɛ dɛ cha yaa kenɛ? He nao kɛŋɔ o fa dɔ kwaa nɔ bwa, dɛ koh he waa dɛ berɛ nya, asɛ a che o nyae ta he berɛ dɔɔhna.
47008010	Gɛ n te aa naa kɛŋɔ hé den tonɛ waa haa pa a mun bena ken la. Heyaa tɔ sie dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ he dɛ nyin nɛra chae.
47008011	Hé swɛɛ siwi dɛ tonɛ warane. Hé swɛɛ siwi dɛ tonɔ gɛ haa vɔrɔwa la. Hé tɛ anɔ la haa dɔa.
47008012	Dɛ he bambile lawɔ kɛ hɛɛ tɛ suugaa yaa, gɛ bwa haa dɔa dɛ́ tɛ la, aa su Korowii siwii. Waa ŋɔ hé tɛ gwaa gɛ haa dɔa.
47008013	Koeh laa n laa dɛɛ kpɔ bane nɛɛ dɛ kpɔ baa dawɛ he nɛ. Haa dɔa kohona taraken nɔ, a wer kɛŋɔ he cha banɔ la aa kpega tɛɛ ba. He ɛ gɛ naa, a baa do kpegri tɛ heyaa asɛ ba ge dɔ aa, baa cha heyaa. Dɛ he bwa kɛrɛdɛ.
47008015	Anee ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini la: "Naate waa pa kondikwaa kohona la, kondikwaa ta o nɛɛ gwaalɛ. Naate waa wola kondikwaa pae kohona la, o ta kondikwaa nyae."
47008016	Ya dɛ jam Korowii kohona kɛŋɔ waa gela Taetos siwi swɛɛ wɛɛ cha heyaa kɛŋɔ ya siwi aa swɛɛ he nɛɛ la.
47008017	Waa yaa ŋɔa Táetos ɛ la, o sɛoh ŋɔ wɛɛ ɛo. Dɛ o siwi swɛɛrɔ kɛŋɔ o cha heya, anomanta o tetooraa o ba he be la.
47008018	Ya dɔŋ la asɔre tena bwa aa dɛ kpɛɛro Amanesoma la bola ta la, o ne Taetosee yaa tomɛ he be la.
47008019	A gbo laa, asɔre tena la bwaa leo ŋɔ ó ja ya nɛɛ ya kpɔ koŋkɛɛla nɔ kaa Jerusalam gɛ aa ɛ asɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu dɔ sɔn. Ya dɛ ɛ toma nɔ dɛ́ kpɔ dɛɛ bagle kɛŋɔ ya dɛ nyin Korowii nɛra chae.
47008020	Ya dɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ asɛ nomɛlbwa bɛ waane ba dɔ bol dɛ le gɛ yaa dɛ nyiŋi koŋkɛɛla damanta nɔ ta.
47008021	Waa aa swɛɛ ya siwi kɛŋɔ yaa ɛ laanee waa aa togra. Waa aa togra Korowii be gbo laa yaa ba ɛɛ. Yaa ɛ waa aa tograa nɛwɛnyini ge be.
47008022	A waa ya tomɛ ya dɔŋ ŋɔ ó ne ba ba la. Ya daahno na kera aŋwɛnɛ bwa, dɛ na kɛŋɔ saŋ bɛlbwa la, o siwi swɛɛrɔ kɛŋɔ o cha toma nɔ. Taraken te kwaraa la, o siwi begrɔ kɛŋɔ ó cha heyaa kohona, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o dɛ yarada heyaa kohona.
47008023	Taetos te la, n ne onee dɛɛ ɛ toma nɔ dɛɛ cha heya. Yabala baa ja o nɛɛ la ge la, asɔre tenaa lee ba. Ba nɛɛ Yeesu Kristo che dɔ sɔn.
47008024	Anomanta hé gel ba na gɛ haa dɛ nyin nɛn ásɛ asɔre tena bwa no, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ yaa koh he waa dɛɛ maŋkura ya te la, pɛɛ laa.
47009001	A ta hiaih kwaraa kɛŋɔ n chwerɛ heyaa chae asɔre tena aa dɛ cha Korowii nɛra baa lɔ Judia harɛ la wa.
47009002	N jemɔ kɛŋɔ he te dɛ nyin ba chae. Anomanta n kpɔ heyaa maŋkura n te Makidoonia tena be taeh. N ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Bena ken bwaa yabala baa lɔ Akaaya harɛ la swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ nyin nɛra chae." He siwi aa swɛɛra hɛɛ nyin nɛra chae la, a gelɔ ba kɛrɛdɛ gee nyin nɛra chae.
47009003	N dɛ tomɛ yabala nɔ he be. N dɛ nyin kɛ he kpɔ he te dɛ ta suuga gɛ maa ŋɔa he dɛ ɛ la, ásɛ nɛra maa kpɔ heyaa dɛɛ maŋkura n te ba be la jemɛ kɛŋɔ pɛɛ laa mɛɛ maŋkura n te.
47009004	Dɛ Makidoonia harɛ tena teŋɛ n nɛɛ ba dɛ ba na kɛŋɔ he ta he te kpɔe mɔɔ naa, dɛ sihiih ta he te kpoe yaa, sihiih ɛɛ kpo ya tenee, dɛ le gɛ yaa dɛ maŋkura heyaa la nomanta.
47009005	A waa n na kɛŋɔ a chɛ kɛ n soŋe yabala nɔ ásɛ ba tɔ sie n nɛɛ dɛ ba he be, dɛ ba lɛ koŋkɛɛla la haa ŋɔa hɛɛ tɛo la bwa cheg, asɛ ya ne bala la, dɛ a bwa chemo, ásɛ a bagle kɛ nyinaa hɛɛ nyin dɛ tɛ, lao laa.
47009006	Hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ he du tama aa, tamaa hɛɛ ba koma, he du kohona ge aa, kohonaa hɛɛ ba koma.
47009007	Anomanta, bɛ́lbwa tɛ gɛ aa magra o bambile ta. Bɛlbwa nao kɛŋɔ o tɛo aa we o nɛɛ yaa, ó gel tɛɛ. Bɛl dɛ lii kɛ doe ba doo ŋɔ o tɛ aa, ó gel, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa dɛ tɛ kwaa bambile bwa ne la, Korowii sie dɛ lɛ o nɛ.
47009008	Korowiirii dɛ won tɛ heyaa kwaa a gwaa gɛ haa dɛ nyin, asɛ he dɔ kohona saŋ bɛlbwa, dɛ won kpɔ dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga kohona.
47009009	Anee ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini la: "Waa nɔn nyore, o dɛ tɛ nyaara tɛɛ tenten. O wedɛɛga ɛɛ ta jaga dɔe."
47009010	Korowiirii dɛɛ tɛ nɛwɛnyini kondwee baa du, dɛɛ tɛ kondikwa. On dɛ tɛ heyaa kondwee haa dɛ nyin bwa, dɛ gel a le dɛ nɔnɛ kohona, dɛ gel he wedɛɛga ɛɛ ge won dɛɛ ja.
47009011	Wɛɛ geloo he dɔ saŋ bɛlbwa dɛ́ won ta tea dɛɛ tɛ Korowii nɛra saŋ bɛlbwa, ásɛ nɛra warɛ pirim dɛ jam Korowii he koŋkɛɛla la yaa kpɔa tɛɛ ba la wa.
47009012	Dɛ ya kpɔ he koŋkɛɛla nɔ dɛɛ tɛ Korowii nɛra aa hiah ba aa, dɛ chae gbo laa hɛɛ cha ba. Dɛ a chegɛ a ta nɛra kpɔ silɛɛ gee jam Korowii kohona.
47009013	He we-ɛɛla nɔ ɛɛ geloo nɛra na he yarada haa dɔa, dɛ jam Korowii a wa. Baa jam Korowiirii kɛŋɔ haa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma la haa ŋɔa he yaradaa la ta. Nɛra ɛɛ jam Korowiirii kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa aa wola heyaa doe, asɛ he gbagba ta tea dɛ tɛ ba ne nomɛlbwa kwaa haa dɔa nɔ.
47009014	He waa ɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ a gɛ nɛra laanee, asɛ ba dɛ soŋe Korowii aa, ba soŋe dɛɛ tɛ heya, he bonya Korowii aa gela he dɔ la nomanta.
47009015	Ya dɛ jam Korowii kohona. Yaa won jemɛ bagle o koŋkɛɛle damanta waa kɛ yaa la wa.
47010001	Men Pɔɔl, n dɛ soŋe heya. Ba ŋɔ n lɔ he be naa, n pwɛre, kɛ n le he be te naa, n waa kpegri. N dɛ soŋe heyaa kɛŋɔ hé nyiŋi gɛ Yeesu Kristo aa pwɛra o tea do som la,
47010002	asɛ dɛ no n be. Mɛɛ bagle kpegri nɛra baa dɛ lii kɛŋɔ harɛ bonɔ waa ŋwɛnɛre taa ya teŋɛ dɛɛ ɛ ya waa la nɛɛ. Maa nyin kɛ n bagle a gɛ kpegri la he nɛ.
47010003	A ɛ kasinteŋ kɛŋɔ harɛ bonɔɔ ya so. Kɛ harɛ bonɔ laa laa yaa yo.
47010004	Dɔmkwaa yaa dɛ yo a ne la, nɛwɛnyina kwaa laa. A ɛ Korowii dɔmkwaa o kpegri aa lɔ a ta, asɛ ya kpɔ dɛ pagre dekpega.
47010005	Nɛwɛnyina wejema baa dɛ maŋkuraa dɛɛ tɔŋle waa la, a ne webagla baa dɛ maŋkuraa kohona dɛɛ tɔŋle waa ásɛ nɛra jemɛ Korowii kahonɛ la do kɛ dekpega yaa dɛ ba wona pagre la. Ya berɔ dɔ kpegri dɛ́ won berɛ nomɛlbwa liire, asɛ ba no Yeesu Kristo be.
47010006	N kpɔ n te dɛ so dɛɛ kpa, ásɛ he te dɔɔ ba no n be ka tonaa, n tɛr nɛra baa vɛah la deŋne.
47010007	Haa waa kari kɛɛ? Nomɛlbwa dɛ lii kɛ o ɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛn aa, ó jemɛ kɛŋɔ gɛ waa ɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛn la, gɛɛ ya ge ɛ Yeesu nɛra.
47010008	Dɛ n dɛ maŋkura kpegri ya Dɔɔ aa tɛ yaa ŋɔ yá kpɔ dɛɛ cha heyaa la aa, sihiih aa men kpo. O tɛ mɛ kpegri ń won cha heya. O ta men kpegri tɛɛ ń kpɔ chɔg heya.
47010009	Maa nyin kɛ a ɛ kɛŋɔ aahraa n kpɔ tɔne dɛɛ aah heya.
47010010	Bane ɛɛ ŋɔɔ, "Pɔɔl tɔne nyoa kpegri to. Kɛ he na o gbagba aa, waa kpege. O wobol gba ta wale dɔe."
47010011	A gɛ tena nɔ, a chɛ kɛ ba jemɛ kɛŋɔ ya toole he be naa, waa yaa chwera dɛɛ ha heyaa ta korɛ, asɛ waa yaa lɔ he be dɛɛ ɛ ge korɛ.
47010012	Yanee bamewa ya kpɔ ya te magɛ nɛra baa dɛ lii ba te nɛnjena ɔ? Yaa ya nyu kpɔe dɛɛ lɔ ba. Ba yon nyiŋi ba bala we-ɛɛla dɛ kpɔ magɛ ba kwaa dɛ ŋɔ ba kwaa togrɔ. Ba gɛnɔ te!
47010013	Waa aa wola toole anɔ la Korowii aa gela yaa ɛ ta la, ya te aa anee kpɔ maŋkura ya te. Anɔ la bwa waa maga tɛ yaa la, a gbo taa yaa ba ya te maŋkurae. Toma yaa dɛ ɛ he be la gba ja anɔ la waa tɛ yaa la ta.
47010014	He be bala ja ya toma ta. Yaa ba he be la, dɛ ya ta ɛɛ ka garɛ. Yaa kpɔ Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma la ba he be la, dɛ ya ta ɛɛ ka garɛ ya toma jaga.
47010015	Yaa nyin kɛ ya garɛ bela Korowii aa maga tɛ yaa. Toma yaa ɛa la, anee ya kpɔ dɛɛ maŋkura ya te. Toma nɛra bane aa ɛa la, yaa an kpɔe dɛɛ maŋkura ya te. Ya dɔ hwɛga kɛ he yarada ɛɛ kaa siee, asɛ toma yaa dɛ ɛ he bini la ɛɛ ja dɛ kaa sie.
47010016	A taa yaa ba wona bol Amanesoma la harɛre aa lɔ sie la ta, asɛ dɛ bɛ waa nɛra bane aa ɛa kpɔ maŋkura ya te.
47010017	Anee ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini la: "Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin o te maŋkurae la, wɛɛ maŋkura o te waa Korowii aa ɛa ta."
47010018	Naate waa dɛ kpɛɛ o te la, o laa nɛndɛɛge. Naate Korowii aa dɛ kpɛɛro la, onee nɛndɛɛge.
47011001	N dɛ nyin he lawɛ bambile dɛ no n gɛne waa nɔ tama. Soŋaa mɛɛ soŋe heya.
47011002	He waa dɛ we n bwara kɛŋɔ he wa aa dɛ we Korowii nɛɛ la. He do kɛ haah waa wola baa jemɛ bwa, asɛ n kpɔɔ tɛ baa bɛl yal ken. Yeesu Kristo gbagbaa a gɛ baa nɔ, o gboo chɛ kɛ o ɛ he jaa.
47011003	Kɛ n dɛ ɔmɛ kɛŋɔ Bɔnsam bɛ bɔr ba dɔ che dɛ berɛ he liire asɛ he bɛ Yeesu Kristo dɛɛ nyin tepoŋ ne kpa, kɛŋɔ waa berɛ harɛkon dɛ kpɔ nyosone negre Hawa la.
47011004	Kɛ he dɛ lawɛ bambile dɛɛ no nɛra baa ba he be dɛ baa bagle Yeesu waa a korɛ waa ya faa bagle heyaa la ta nɔ? Kɛ ba dɛ bagle kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ waa a korɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge waa soge he nɛɛ la ta, kɛɛ ba dɛ bagle heyaa amanesoma a korɛ anɔ la ya faa bagle heyaa la ta naa, he dɛ lawɛ bambile dɛɛ no ba be nɔ?
47011005	Maa lii kɛ nɛra baa dɛ maŋkura ba te kɛ ba gwaa Yeesu Kristo toroma la gwaa mɛ ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta.
47011006	Bɛl lole n nyoa ken ta chaahnɛ wobol ta, kɛ wejema te, n dɔɔ. Wobɛlbwa yaa jema ge la, ya gelɔ a bini chaah he jemɛ a bwa ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta.
47011007	N faa bagle heyaa Korowii Amanesoma la la, n ta heyaa komɛlbwa sese lɛɛ. Maa pwɛr n te gɛ ásɛ nɛra siwi ɛɛ su heyaa la, dɛ wechɔgaa n ɛ aa?
47011008	Maa dɛ ɛ toma he be la, dɛ bobɛl asɔre tenaa dɛɛ bɔ mɛ kem. He nyiŋo na naa, dɛ a kaa ɛ kɛ maa ŋwɛɛ ba dɛ́ kpɔ dɛɛ cha heya.
47011009	Gɛ saŋ maa lɔ he be la, suuga waa hiah mɛ naa, maa n te kpɔe dɛɛ dawɛ he nɛ. Yabala baa le Makidoonia harɛ ba laanee baa tɛ mɛ kwaa maa dɛ nyin bwa. Gɛ n faa wola n te kpɔe dawɛ he nɛɛ wubwa la, gɛɛ maa wola n tenee kpɔ dawɛ he nɛɛ saŋ bɛlbwa bwa.
47011010	N chegɛ Yeesu Kristo kasinteŋ la waa gela n dɔ la ta dɛɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, nomɛlbwa toole Akaaya harɛ bobɛlbwa dɛ́ tɔ mɛ ŋwɛnɛ maa wola won maŋkura n te a gɛ waa nɔ ta.
47011011	Maa dɛ ŋɔ ken nɔ, a ta ɛɛ kɛŋɔ maa heyaa nyin. Korowii gbabir jemɔ kɛŋɔ n dɛ nyin heya.
47011012	Waa maa dɛ ɛ nɔ, maa a ɛɛ gela ba. Mɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ gɛɛ, ásɛ nɛra baa dɛ maŋkura ba te ŋɔ tombeŋkpoŋii ya ne baa ɛ la bɛ won dɔ ŋwɛnɛ dɛɛ maŋkura ba te.
47011013	A gɛ nɛra la, Yeesu Kristo toroma gbagba laa ban. Negraa baa negre nɛra dɛ ɛ ba te kɛ Yeesu Kristo toromaa ban la.
47011014	A ta nyokpowaa ɛɛ, dɛkalkɛ Bɔnsam gbabir won o te begra dɛ do kɛ Korowii nyundua torome tenten ken.
47011015	Anomanta dɛ Bɔnsam bonɔɔna ge begre ba te kɛŋɔ banee dɛɛ chagle ŋwɛnɛ yaa kpɔ o ta dɛ́ ɛ nɛndɛɛga ya waa ɛɛ su Korowii siwi aa, dɛ a ta nyokpowaa ɛɛ. Korowii ɛɛ bɔ ba kemee gɛ ba toma aa doa.
47011016	N dɛ ŋɔ he be ja: Nomɛlbwa bɛ lii kɛŋɔ gɛnee men. N gɛnɔ gba kwara naa, hɛ́ɛ no n be ásɛ n ge won maŋkura n te tama.
47011017	N jemɔ kɛ waa maa dɛ bol taraken nɔ, ya Dɔɔ Yeesu laa ŋɔa ń bola. Maŋkurae nɔ maa dɛ maŋkura n te nɔ, gɛne waa mɛɛ ɛ la.
47011018	Bane aa koh harɛ bonɔ kwara waa dɛɛ maŋkura ba te nomanta, n gee maŋkura n tenee.
47011019	Haa jemɛ waa kohona nomanta, he dɛ lawɛ bambile, dɛ kpɔ silɛɛ dɛɛ no gɛna be.
47011020	Nɛra kpɔ heyaa berɛ yoma, dɛ negre heyaa dɛɛ di, dɛɛ faah heya, dɛɛ nyiŋi he nyu baahna, dɛɛ kpaa he lwɛrɛme, kɛ he waane laa.
47011021	A dɛ ɛɛ mɛ sihiih kɛ n bol waa nɔ. N ta jemɛ kɛ ya berɔ do pwɛre tɛ heyaa to. Ya ta an kɛrɛdɛ ɛɛ. Dɛ nomɛl dɔ wobɛl dɛ won koh a waa maŋkura o te naa, n gba ɛɛ wonoo maŋkura n te a gɛ waa la ta. Gɛnewaa mɛɛ bol nɔ te.
47011022	Dɛ Hibru tenaa ban aa, bɛlee n ge. Israel tena gee ban aa, bɛlee n gba. Abraham naanaree ban aa, bɛlee n ge.
47011023	Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔnaa ban kɛɛ? N dɛ bol chogla wobol te, kɛ dɛ ba ɛ Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔna aa, n ɛ o bonɔɔ gwaa ba! N ɛ toma gwaa ba. Ba do mɛ dea gwaa ba, dɛ cha mɛ chweremi gwaa ba. Waa maa naa a yon ka jɛɛ n sewɛ warɔ.
47011024	Kera anue bwaa Juda tena cha mɛ ba chweremi fifraatoro dɛ anuanaarɛ la.
47011025	Kera atoroo Room tena lɔɔ mɛ chweremi ne, dɛ fog mɛ bwea kera beŋkpoŋ. Kera atoroo stiimae morɛ n ne. N lɔ nee sie bɔr bir dɛ chaah, dɛ kwaa bir a gɛ stiimae mora nɔ bɛl ta.
47011026	N gaagebala nɔ ta la, neerare suugo dɛ tɔ mɛ do, n do siswɛm ta ka, asɛ ŋwɛɛra baa dɛ kpo nɛra dɛɛ kpɔ ba laala ge fe ɛɛ nyin n kpoe. N bala Juda tena ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ bwa ge chegɛ n nɛɛ dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin n kpoe. Bwɛɛre ta ne kpɔg baah ne mpo ta bwaa n na sibegrewa. N na sibegrewaa nɛra baa wola asɔre tena kpelakpela ɛɛ be.
47011027	N ɛ toma dɛ koh kɛrɛdɛ. A kɛrɛdɛ ta, dɛ maa dom chɔ. Lɔr ne nyɔgre ge kpo mɛ kɛrɛdɛ. N vala kɛrɛdɛ ta, dɛ telogaa mɛɛ chɔ, dɛ busee mɛɛ chɔ, dɛɛ chɔ waa.
47011028	Anɔ te bwa chɔ keŋkeŋ. Maa won bagle a bwa. Waa aa lɔ n bini dɛɛ swɛɛ n siwi laanee kɛŋɔ asɔre tena baa lɔ bobɛl bwa la waa dɛ ha mɛ tɔperee bwa.
47011029	Dɛ asɔre tena la bɛlbwa sɔɔhnaa, dɛ n gbabir bwara yɔrɔ. Dɛ Bɔnsam negre bɛlbwa kaa wechɔga ta naa, dɛ a ɛɛ mɛ bandia.
47011030	Dɛ mɛɛ maŋkura n tenee yaa, waa aa dɛ chagle kɛ n ɛ nɛŋgwɛgre la taa mɛɛ ba n te maŋkurae.
47011031	Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Mɛɛ Korowii jemɔ kɛ nyosone laa mɛɛ teŋe. O chɛ jam tɔperee bwa.
47011032	Maa lɔ Damaskɔs la, bwɛɛ la nomoa waa lɔ Kooro Aretas lɔga le nɛra ŋɔ báa daah doonyoone aa lɔ danjwɛɛ waa bar bwɛɛ la bwa cheme ta la ásɛ dɛ lag mɛ.
47011033	Aa ba gɛ la, n daamanar bane do mɛ wɛgrɛjen bini dɛ do ŋwɛn o ta kɛŋɔ baa dɛ ta kɔlɔŋ ken, dɛ che danjwɛɛ la tokoro bɛl ta dɛ kpɔ mɛ tu dahara, asɛ n le o nɔn ta.
47012001	A chɛ kɛ n maŋkura n te. N jemɔ kɛ aa wobɛlbwa kwaa te. Mɛɛ bagle chaahna Korowii aa gela n na, ne waa waa pila bag me.
47012002	N jemɛ asɔre te baa bɛl. Dɛ ɛ bene fi dɛ anaarɛɛ nɔ Korowii aa keeru kaa o be nyundujagla. Dɛ o nɛndaa gbabirii kaa nyundua oo, dɛ o lileo gboo kaa bela oo, maa jemɛ. Korowii gboo jema.
47012003	N jemɔ kɛ ba lawɔ kaa nyundua, kɛ anee n bol la, o nɛndaa gbabirii kaa bela oo, dɛ o lileo gboo kaa bela oo, Korowii gboo jema.
47012004	Korowii la o ne o be, o ka no waane nɛwɛnyini aa wola won bola. Korowii ta ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ kɛ nɛwɛnyini bola.
47012005	Dɛ n ŋɔ n maŋkura n te naa, gɛ nɛn nɔɔ mɛɛ ba kpɔe maŋkura n te. Maa n gbagba we-ɛɛlaa kpɔ maŋkura n te, nemenɛ n nɛŋgwɛgre ɛɛ gbo ta.
47012006	Dɛ n ŋɔ ń kpɔ n gbagba we-ɛɛla maŋkura n te kwaraa naa, gɛnewaa laa te, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a ɛ kasinteŋ. Menee gɛ nɛn la, kɛ maa nyin n kpɔ gɛ waa la maŋkura n te. Dɛ n waa maa dɛ ɛ nɛra ɛɛ na, ne anɔ la baa dɛ no ta laa aa, maa nyin kɛ nɛra kpɛɛ mɛ wobɛlbwa ta.
47012007	Korowii aa nyin kɛ n kpɔ wejena maa naa chaahna ta la dɛɛ maŋkura n te. Anomanta o gelɔ Bɔnsam kpɔ waane do n nɛɛ aa ha mɛ, dɛɛ tɔg mɛ kɛŋɔ sɔɔh, n bɛ won dɛɛ ɛ mbarafo.
47012008	Kera atoro bwaa n soŋe Korowii kɛŋɔ o laa a gɛ waa nɔ kpɔ n nɛ,
47012009	asɛ o ŋɔ, "Chae maa sune he nɛɛ dɛ chae nɔ gbo magre he ne. Bela nɛn aa gwɛgra la, belaa baa na n kpegri kohona." Anomanta a do n som kohona kɛ maa dɛ maŋkura n te n gwɛgra ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a taa mɛɛ na Yeesu Kristo kpegri n nɛ.
47012010	N sie dɛ lɛ n gwɛgra maa gwɛgra, ne chɛga baa dɛ chɛg mɛ, ne kpegri bɔr yon do tɛ mɛ, ne chega nɛra aa chegɛ n nɛ, ne gɛ maa koh Yeesu Kristo waa aa noo mɛ bwa ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ saŋ maa gwɛgre la, a taa mɛɛ do kpegri.
47012011	N bol waa kɛ gɛne, kɛ heyaa gela n ɛ gɛ. Heyaa chɛ kɛ he fe ɛɛ tɛ me sɔn. A lole kɛ n waa aa bobɛlbwa tel te, kɛ nɛra baa dɛ maŋkura ba te gwaa Yeesu Kristo toroma la, ba bɛlbwa ta men gwaalɛ wobɛlbwa ta.
47012012	N faa lɔ he be la, n lawɛ bambile kɛrɛdɛ dɛɛ ɛ waa aa chagla kɛŋɔ Yeesu toroma la bɛlee men. Wekpega ne nyokpowaa bwaa n ɛ.
47012013	Bɔkwaa n ɛ tɛ asɔre tena baa kaa la maa wola ɛɛ tɛ heyaɔ? Anɔ la maa wola heyaa ɛɛ laanee kɛŋɔ, n ta heyaa hae suuga waa ta. Hé kpɔ n wechɔga kɛ me!
47012014	N tooro tenaa nɔ maa kpɔ n te dɛɛ ba he be bala dɛ́ ba chɔɔ heya. Maa heyaa komɛlbwa bɔɔra ba. He waa hiah mɛ, he suuga laa hiah mɛ. Bechale ne ba mɛɛ, umee dɛɛ nyiŋi o dɔŋ ɔ?
47012015	N sie ɛɛ lɛo kɛŋɔ n chɔg n komɛlbwa he nɛ. N chɔg n bokpega he nɛɛ kwara dɛ won cha heya aa, a som n be. Maa dɛ nyin heyaa kohona waa he te laa n waa kpɔ he bambile ta kɛɛ?
47012016	He nao kɛŋɔ n ta n te kpɔe dawɛ he nɛɛ kenɛ? Kɛ nomɛl gee ŋɔɔ n sie pilo to mɛɛ negre heya.
47012017	Nɛra n faa toma he be la, n chegɛ ba bini bane nɛɛ dɛ negre heyaa di aa?
47012018	Men soŋe Taetos dɛ tomɛ o ne ya dɔŋ asɔre te la he be. Hɛɛ wonoo ŋɔ Taetos baa negre heyaa di aa? Dabeŋkpoŋ laa n ne o kpoŋaa? Ya bwa we-ɛɛla ta beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ yaa?
47012019	Yaa dɛ ŋɔ ken nɔ, he dɛ lii kɛŋɔ ya sɔnee yaa kwaa he be kɛɛ? Akai! Korowii siee yaa bola, pɛɛ ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la nomanta. Yabala, wobɛlbwa yaa bol la, he wer waa yaa bola, ásɛ he won che kiŋkiŋ.
47012020	N dɛ ɔmɛ kɛ n balaa, gɛ maa dɛ nyin kɛ he do la, maa heyaa gɛɛ na, gɛ he ge aa dɛ nyin kɛ n do la, haa men gɛɛ na. N dɛ ɔmɛ kɛ mɛɛ ba na nagra, ne bɔweela, ne bandisale, ne n gbo dɔ, ne dɔŋa chɛgra, dɔŋa ŋwala, mbarafo, ne wesagasagare ɛɛ he baahnee.
47012021	Maa nyin kɛ n ba ba he be asɛ N Naa Korowii koh he wechɔga waa dɛ gel n fɛgre. N balɔ dɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra ta warɔ he bini ba tea bini ta chɔgɛ ba charɛ ba liire ba wedoŋa ne ba jwamane ne ba pɛlchɔga we-ɛɛla baa dɛɛ ɛ ta naa, n tea bini ɛɛ chɔgoo.
47013001	N tooro tenaa nɔ maa dɛ ba ń ba chɔɔ heya. N balaa, wobɛlbwa nɛra banɛ kɛɛ nɛra batoro aa di danseɛ a ta la, anee mɛɛ ba noe kɛ a ɛ kasinteŋ, gɛ Korowii Tɔn aa bagla la.
47013002	N dɛ nyin n ŋɔ he banɔ la he faa ɛ wechɔga la ne banɔ la baa kaa la be ŋɔ, n balɔ dɛ he ta gelaa, maa he gela ba, mɛɛ tɛr he deŋnee. N faa ba he be nɛɛtena la, n bolɔ, n kwaarɔ dɛɛ bol.
47013003	He fa dɛ nyin he na waane dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristoo soge n nɛɛ dɛɛ bol waa la. Too, hɛɛ nao. Kpegri ta on nyae. Wɛɛ bagle o kpegri he nɛɛ.
47013004	Ba faa kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta o sewɛ la, a baglɔ kɛŋɔ o gwɛgrɔ, kɛ Korowii kpegri nomanta o iro. Ya ne o bwa fa pɛo gwɛgre. Kɛ taraken, ya chegɛ Korowii kpegri ta dɛ dɔ mkpa, asɛ ya won do he be o kpegri la ta.
47013005	Hé nyiŋi he te dɛ na kɛŋɔ he yaradao kɛrɛdɛ kɛɛ he ta on yaradae yɔ? Hé pese he te dɛ na. He jemɛ kɛŋɔ he ne Yeesu Kristo pɛo kɛɛ? He nao kɛŋɔ he ne o ta pɛɛ te naa, ate dɛ he horɛ o waa yaradae ta.
47013006	N dɛ lii kɛŋɔ he nyiŋi yaa na naa, hɛɛ jemɔɔ kɛŋɔ yaa o waa yaradae ta horɛ.
47013007	Kɛ, ya dɛ soŋe Korowii kɛŋɔ he bɛ wechɔga dɛɛ ɛ. Nɛra nao kɛŋɔ ya ta horaa, a wer, kɛ a laa hiah. Waa aa hiah kɛŋɔ he ɛ waa aa wera. Dɛ a gelɔ a do kɛŋɔ ya te horaa, a ta waane ɛɛ.
47013008	Yaa won ɛ wobɛlbwa dɛ jo kasinteŋ la nɛ, chae a chɛ kɛ yaa chao.
47013009	Ya gwɛgrɔ hé do kpegri aa, dɛ ya sie lɛo. Ya dɛ soŋe Korowii kɛŋɔ he waa togre ka tonɛ.
47013010	A waa n chwerɛ heyaa tɔn nɔ dɛ n ta he be balɛ mɔɔ la. N dɛ ɛ gɛ asɛ dɛ bɛ sinyɛga ba kpɔ dɛɛ bol waa he be kpegri ya Dɔɔ la aa tɛ mɛ la ne. Korowii ŋɔ ń kpɔ a gɛ kpegri nɔ cha heya, o ta ŋɔe ŋɔ ń kpɔ chɔg heya.
47013011	Too, yabala, n nyoa jagɛ bonɔ. Hé so kɛrɛdɛ. Hé swɛɛ siwi kɛ hɛɛ geloo he wobɛlbwa togre ka tonɛ. Hé no n waa maa bola dɛ kpɔ ja heyaa la. Hé gel he nyoa pɛ, he bɛ dɛɛ yo. Korowii waa dɛ nyin nɛwɛnyini kohona dɛɛ tɛ bosɔɔhna la, ó cha heya.
47013012	Hɛ́ɛ lea dɔŋa kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ nyabii.
47013013	Korowii nɛra baa lɔ bonɔ bwa dɛ na heya.
47013014	Yá Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo na he sum dɛɛ cha heya, Kórowii bagle o nyina he nɛ, asɛ Kórowii Domadɛɛge la ne he bwa pɛ.
48001001	Men Pɔɔl maa ɛ Yeesu torome la, men chwerɛ tɔn nɔ. Nɛwɛnyini laa lee mɛ dɛ tɛ mɛ toma nɔ. Yeesu Kristo ne o Mɛɛ Korowii waa iru seo ta laanee lee mɛ.
48001002	N ne yabala baa lɔ n be bonɔ nɔ bwaa chwera dɛɛ tɛ asɔre tena haa lɔ Galaasia harɛ ta bwa.
48001003	Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
48001004	Ya Dɔɔ ɛ N Naa Korowii tetoowa kɛŋɔ waa koh ya wechɔga waa dɛ sewɛ dɛ lɛ yaa le taraken nɛra baa dɔ liichɔga bini nɔ.
48001005	Korowii chɛ jirima saŋ te bɛlbwa. Aamen.
48001006	He waa ɛɛ mɛ anebɛlbwa. Korowiirii le heya. Yeesu Kristo aa sune he nɛɛ dɛ lɛ heyaa la waa Korowii le heya. Kɛ he denɔ dɛɛ vɛh Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma la dɛɛ teŋɛ wefale ta.
48001007	Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma bɛlbwa toole dɛ ɛ kasinteŋ dɛ ja anɔ la yaa dɛ bagle heyaa la ta. Nɛra bane dɛ wili heya, dɛɛ nyin dɛ berɛ Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma la, a waa n ŋɔ gɛ la.
48001008	Dɛ ya bini bɛl kɛɛ Korowii nyundua torome le nyundua dɛ ba bol Yeesu Kristo bwara wobɛlbwa a berɛ korɛ anɔ la yaa dɛ bagle heyaa la ta naa, Kórowii fuuh!
48001009	Gɛ ya faa bola la, gɛɛ mɛɛ bol he be ja la. Dɛ nomɛlbwa bol Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma bɛlbwa a korɛ anɔ la he faa noa dɛ yarada la ta naa, Kórowii fuuh!
48001010	Maa ŋɔ ken nɔ, dɛ nɛwɛnyini bee mɛɛ nyin sɔn kɛɛ Korowii be nɔ? Maa sɔn nyin nɛwɛnyini be, Korowii bee mɛɛ nyin sɔn. Dɛ nɛwɛnyini bee mɛɛ nyin sɔn te naa, n fe ta Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔ ɛɛ.
48001011	Yabalawa, hé gel n ŋɔ he be ŋɔ Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma nɔ maa dɛ bol he be nɔ, nɛwɛnyini be laa a le.
48001012	Nɛwɛnyini laa tɛ mɛ gɛ wejema nɔ. Nɛwɛnyini laa bag mɛ. Yeesu Kristo gbagbaa pili a bini bag mɛ dɛ gel n jemɛ a wa.
48001013	Gɛ saŋ n faa dɛ tomɛ Korowii gɛ Juda tena aa dɛ tomɔ la, he noɔ gɛ n faa dɛ teŋɛ gɛ ŋwɛnɛ la ta dɛ che Korowii nɛra baa dɛ tomɔ nɛ, dɛɛ ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa tenten, dɛɛ nyin dɛ chɔg ba toma bwa.
48001014	Dɛ n dɛ teŋɛ ya Juda tena Korowii toma ŋwɛnɛ la ta gwaa n nyudɔŋa baa ɛ Juda tena kɛrɛdɛ, dɛɛ teŋɛ ya Juda tena nawee waa ge ta gwaa nomɛlbwa.
48001015	Kɛ Korowii te lee mɛ kwaraa mɔɔ ba lol mɛ, asɛ dɛ sune n nɛɛ dɛ cha mɛ dɛ kpɔ mɛ do toma nɔ ta.
48001016	A ɛo silɛɛ kɛŋɔ o gel n jemɛ o Bie la dɛ́ won bagle o Amanesoma nɛnhɔɔhra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la be. Waa lee mɛ gɛ la, n ta taarɛ bagle nomɛlbwa ŋɔ ó bag mɛ gɛ maa ɛ mɔɔ dɛ jo o toma la ta.
48001017	N ta Jerusalam laŋɛ dɛ́ ka na nɛra baa tɔ sie ɛ Yeesu toroma n nɛɛ la mɔɔ. Pae n den pa sie kaa Arebia harɛ. Maa le bela la, n baa kaa Damaskɔs.
48001018	A habɔɔ bene atoroo mɔɔ n la Pita be Jerusalam dɛ́ ka chɔɔro dɛ jemɔ. Maa la Pita chɔɔra la, n kaa so o be tɔpera fi dɛ anue.
48001019	N ta Yeesu toroma la bɛlbwa nae bela ka ja Pita nɛ. Jems waa ɛ ya Dɔɔ la nime la gee n berɛ na ja Pita nɛ.
48001020	Kasinteŋii mɛɛ chwerɛ la. Korowii gba jemɔ kɛ nyosone laa.
48001021	A habɔɔ la, n la Siiria harɛ ne Silisia harɛ bwɛɛre ane ta.
48001022	A gɛ saŋ la, dɛ Judia harɛ asɔre tena la ta men nae siwi ne mɔɔ.
48001023	Dɛ n waa nɛra aa dɛ bol la gboo baa no. N waa baa dɛ bol laanee kɛŋɔ, nɛn o faa dɛ ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa laanee bera lɛ Yeesu Amanesoma ba faa yaradaa o koh a waa hah ba dɛɛ nyin ba kpoe la dɛɛ bol la.
48001024	Ba chegɛ a ta dɛ jam Korowii a wa.
48002001	A habɔɔ bene fi dɛ anaarɛ la, n berɔ la Jerusalam ja. N kpɔ Taetos ja n nɛ, asɛ ya ne Banabas la.
48002002	Korowiirii gela n jemɛ dɛ la ba be. N tɔ sie la asɔre tena nomonome be n ne ba gbo so, n bagle Yeesu Amanesoma maa dɛ bol nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ be la bwa ásɛ ba jemɛ n wa, ásɛ n toma maa ɛa ne anɔ la n taa dɛ ba ɛɛ la bɛ pɛɛ ɛ.
48002003	Dɛ Grik tee Taetos anomanta o ta pen teŋe. Kɛ nomɛlbwa ta on hɛɛ ŋɔ bá teŋe o pen.
48002004	Dɛ nɛra la bane tea bini laa gɛ baa gel Taetos la. Dɛ a gɛ nɛra nɔ dɛ ɛ ba te kɛŋɔ asɔre tenaa ban ken dɛ sɔh jo ya bini, dɛ baa nyiŋi dɛ́ jemɛ ya asɔre tena dɔe yaa dɔ ya te Mosis Mmara aa wola yaa vɔrɔwe la bini. Dɛ ba dɛ nyin ba hɛ yaa yá berɛ dɛɛ ɛ waa yaa vɛah la.
48002005	Yaa wola nyin kɛ ba won berɛ Amanesoma la sie ásɛ kasinteŋ la do le tɛ heyaa la, ya ta ban sie tɛɛ kwaraa.
48002006	Nɛra la bini banɔ la baa dɛ lii ba nɛnjena la ta wone dɔ wobɛlbwa bol dɛ ja Amanesoma maa dɛ bol la ta. N te kwaraa waane laa ba nɛnjena ɛɛ wa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛnjena o, nɛnjegre o, a laa Korowii te ɛɛ nyiŋi.
48002007	Ba gbabir nao kɛŋɔ Korowiirii kpɔ o waa la tɛ mɛ ŋɔ ń bol nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la be, gɛ waa kpɔ o waa tɛ Pita ŋɔ ó bol Juda tena be la.
48002008	Dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ Korowii aa bagle o kpegri Yeesu torome Pita nɛɛ wɛɛ tomɛ Juda tena bini la, gɛɛ o bagle o kpegri men maa ɛ Yeesu torome nɔ nɛɛ mɛɛ tomɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ bini.
48002009	Jems ne Pita ne Jɔn nomɛlbwa aa dɛ yer ba asɔre tena nomonome la gbabir sɛoh kɛŋɔ Korowiirii kpɔ gɛ toma nɔ do n nɔn ta dɛ cha mɛ a ta. Anomanta ba do nɔɔra n nɔn ta dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ nɛmbeŋkpoŋii ya bwa Korowii toma nɔ bini. Ya nyoa pɛo, asɛ ba sɛh kɛŋɔ n ne Banabas ɛɛ bol Yeesu waa dɛɛ bagle nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ, asɛ ba gee bagle Juda tena.
48002010	Waa baa bola ja bwaa kɛŋɔ yáa lii nyaara waa dɛɛ cha ba. Dɛ gɛ waa nɔ ɛ waa n ge aa swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ ɛa wubwa.
48002011	Pita aa ba Anteɔk la, n diu kasinteŋ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ o dɛ ɛ waa aa wola a ŋwɛnɛ ta ɛɛ.
48002012	Jems fa tomɛ nɛra bane Anteɔk. Gɛ nɛra nɔ aa wola Anteɔk balɛ mɔɔ la, dɛ Pita ne asɔre tena la bini bane baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la pɛo dɛɛ di kwa. Kɛ Jems toroma la aa baa jo Anteɔk la, Pita chwa a gɛ nɛra la be kwaa dii, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ o dɛ ɔmɛ kɛŋɔ hɔɔhra la bɛ ba ŋɔ waa Juda tena nawee waa dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ ba ne nɛra baa wola pena teŋne aa kwaa di la ta teŋɛ.
48002013	Pita koh nɛra sie bɔr ɔma waa dɛ nyogre ŋwɛnɛ. Yabala Juda tena baa ɛ asɔre tena la kar la ge koh nɛra sie bɔr ɔma waa dɛ ɛ gɛ Pita aa ɛa la. Banabas gba nyogre ŋwɛnɛ, dɛ teŋɛ ba nɛ.
48002014	Maa naa kɛŋɔ ba nyogre Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma la ŋwɛnɛ la, n di Pita kasinteŋ yabala la bwa siwi ta ŋɔ, "Ŋwɛnɛ besoo taa a che he ɛ Juda te haa wola Juda tena nawee waa la ta teŋɛ dɛ ŋɔ he hamɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ ŋɔ báa teŋɛ a ta nɔ?
48002015	Ya te nɔ, Juda tenaa ya nyare ne ya mɛɛnanar, ba lolɛ yaa, asɛ ya ge ɛ Juda tena. Nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ asɛ Juda tena ɛɛ yer ba 'wechɔg-ɛɛra' la laa yaa.
48002016	Kɛ, ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ Mosis Mmara ta teŋa laa gela nɛn ɛɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa ɛɛ su Korowii siwi, nemenɛ kɛŋɔ haa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo waa la dɛ kpɔ he te tɛo. Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ ya ge kpɔ ya yarada do, asɛ Korowii koh o waa dɛ lɛ yaa kɛ nɛndɛɛga ya waa su o siwi. Mmara ta teŋa laa dɛɛ ba yaa nɛndɛɛga ɛɛ Korowii be, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Mmara ta teŋa aa won gel nomɛlbwa waa su Korowii siwi.
48002017	"Yaa dɛ nyin ya che Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛga ya waa su Korowii siwi la, an gela ya vɛh Mmara ta teŋa dɛ berɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra la. Dɛ a do gɛ naa, dɛ Yeesu Kristoo dɛɛ cha dɛ gel wechɔga ɛɛ won dɛɛ kaa sie naa? Akai!
48002018	Mosis Mmara n gbagba faa ŋɔa o ta teŋa ta tɔnɔ dɔe la, dɛ n berɔ berɛ habɔɔ dɛ baa teŋɛ o ta naa, n ta wechɔga ɛɛ yaa?
48002019	A gɛ Mmara laanee pili n sie dɛ gel n jemɛ waa dɛ chwa o ta teŋa. Mosis Mmara la te be pera te naa, n do kɛŋɔ nɛn waa sewa. N ne Mmara la toole wobɛlbwa bini kpa, ásɛ n won do le tɛ Korowii.
48002020	Baa kpaa Yeesu Kristo pɛl o dagagre ta la, a kaa ɛ kɛ n ne onee sewa. Anomanta n soga nɔ maa soga nɔ, n gbagba laa dɛɛ hwee nɔ. Korowii Bie Yeesu Kristoo soge n nɛɛ dɛɛ hwee la. N hweera nɔ maa dɛ hwee nɔ, yarada maa yaradao la, anee gela n do le la. Korowii Bie nɔ nyin mɛ kohona dɛ kpɔ o hweera charɛ n nyu.
48002021	Maa sɛh gel Korowii nɛra nɛɛ suna la ɛ pɛɛ. Dɛ Mosis Mmara ta teŋa taa a che nɛn ɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su Korowii siwi aa, amɔ te dɛ pɛɛpɛɛ Yeesu Kristo sewɛ."
48003001	Ee, Galaasia tena, he gɛnoo! Ya ta heyaa baglɛ gɛ aa ɛa Yeesu Kristo sewɛ dagagre ta bwa naa? Aah bɔkwaa bera negre heyaa jaɔ?
48003002	Hé gel n bɔɔ heyaa webeŋkpoŋ. Mosis Mmara ta teŋa taa a che he dɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa, kɛɛ haa no Yeesu Kristo waa la dɛ yaradaa taa a che nɔ?
48003003	He gɛnɔ ga! Korowii Domadɛɛgee gela he won pa mun Yeesu nɛɛ teŋa ta. Ɛrɛɛ he berɛ dɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ he kpɔ he gbagba kpegri ɛ ka tonɛ nɔɔ?
48003004	Amɔ waa he sie aa naa ne anɔ la haa noa la bwa ɛ pɛɛ aa? Dɛ a ɛ pɛɛ te naa, dɛ aa were kwaraa!
48003005	Korowii Domadɛɛge nɔ waa tɛ heya, dɛɛ ɛ nyokpowaa he bini nɔ, dɛ Mosis Mmara ta teŋa waa o ɛ a bwa kɛɛ haa dɛ no o waa dɛ yaradaa la waa yɔ?
48003006	Hé nyiŋi Abraham na. Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, "O yarada Korowii, asɛ Korowii che o yarada la ta dɛ lɛo kɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su o siwi."
48003007	A chɛ kɛ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ nɛra baa dɛ yarada Korowii la, banee Abraham naanar.
48003008	Korowii Tɔn baglɔ kɛŋɔ yarada taa aa ba chega asɛ Korowii lɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la kɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa su o siwi. Korowii bol Amanesoma la waa Abraham be dɛ ŋɔ, "He nɛɛ aa ba chega Korowii swee nɛwɛnyini bwa andɛɛga."
48003009	Yaradaa Abraham yarada Korowii asɛ o swee andɛɛga tɛo. Anomanta nomɛlbwa waa yarada Korowii la, Korowii ɛɛ sweero andɛɛgaa.
48003010	Nɛra baa kpɔ sie dawɛ Mosis Mmara gbo ta kɛŋɔ a taa ba che Kórowii lɛɛ ba la, bá bwɛɛlɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a lɔ Korowii Tɔn bini kɛŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa to Mosis Mmara la bɛlbwa saŋ bɛlbwa wee la, ó bwɛɛlɛ."
48003011	Taraken nɔ, ya nao kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa aa won che Mosis Mmara la ta dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su Korowii siwi, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa aa won teŋɛ a bwa ta. Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, "Naate o waa aa togra dɛ su Korowii siwi la, wɛɛ yaradao dɛ dɔ o nyu."
48003012	Nɛn waa dɛ teŋɛ Mosis Mmara ta la, yarada laa dɛɛ ba o lɛɛ. Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa wona dɛɛ teŋɛ Mosis Mmara la bwa ta la, on dɛɛ ba o nyu dɔe."
48003013	Yeesu Kristo lɛ nyotaahna aa lɔ Mosis Mmara la ta bɛ won teŋa la dawɛ o nɛɛ dɛ lɛ yaa le a ta. Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa baa sagɔ daa ta la, Korowii nyotaahna lɔ o nɛ."
48003014	Korowii fa bagɛ Abraham nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ ɛo wedɛɛgee. Gɛ aa ɛ asɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ che Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ dɔ a gɛ wedɛɛge nɔ la waa o lɛ nyotaahna la dawɛ o nɛɛ dɛ lɛ yaa le a ta la, ásɛ a che yarada ta Korowii tɛ yaa o Domadɛɛge la waa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tɛ yaa la.
48003015	Yabalawa, hé gel n kpɔ harɛ bonɔ waane magɛ waa nɔ maa dɛ bol nɔ. Dɛ nɛra banɛ fɔwɛ fɔo o do kpegri aa, nɛmpɛɛ aa won puru ba habɔɔ, nomɛlbwa ge aa berɛ won berɔ ba habɔɔ.
48003016	Korowii Tɔn la baglɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii bagɛ Abraham ne o naa nyoa. Korowii Tɔn la ta ŋɔe ŋɔ Korowii bagɛ Abraham ne o naanar nyoa. Dɛ́ Abraham ne o naa. O baglɔ kɛŋɔ Abraham naa beŋkpoŋ, onee kɛ Kristo.
48003017	Waa maa dɛ nyin n bagle laanee kɛŋɔ Korowii ne Abraham fɔwɛ fɔo bɛl, asɛ Korowii bagɛ Abraham nyoa kɛŋɔ wɛɛ di fɔo la taa. Mosis Mmara nɔ ge la, fɔo nɔ habɔɔ bene lafraanaarɛ dɛ fifraatoroo a ge ba. Dɛ ɛrɛɛ Mosis Mmara nɔ won ɛ dɛɛ chɔg gɛ fɔo nɔ dɛ teŋe Korowii nyobaga la ta nɔ?
48003018	Dɛ Mosis Mmara la ta teŋa taa aa ba chega Korowii ɛ yaa o wedɛɛge la te naa, ate dɛ o nyoa waa bagɛ Abraham la ɛ pɛɛ. Kɛ gɛ laa a do. Nyoa Korowii aa bagɛ Abraham la waa o sune o nɛɛ dɛ chao, dɛ ŋɔ wɛɛ ɛo wedɛɛgee la.
48003019	Aah dɛ bɔkwa waa Korowii tɛ yaa Mosis Mmara laɔ? Wechɔga jema waa o kpɔa ja yaa. Korowii ɛo kɛŋɔ Ḿmara la do le dɛ ka tel kɛŋɔ Abraham naa la aa bala. Abraham naa nɔɔ Korowii bagɛ nyoa la la. Nyundua toromaa Korowii gel ba ba Mosis Mmara la ne ba tɛ yaa. Nɛn nɛɛ nyundua toroma la ba chig dɛ kpɔ Mmara la tɛo, asɛ o ge kpɔ tɛ ya naanar.
48003020	Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa la ge la, o gbo waaa, nɛmbeŋkpoŋ waa ta keame hiaih.
48003021	Amɔ dɛ Mosis Mmara nɔ ne nyoo Korowii aa bagɛ yaa la aa jo kɛɛ? A dɛ jo. Dɛ nɛwɛnyini fe dɔ mmara bɛl waa dɛ ba wona togre nɛra ásɛ ba dɔ ba nyu aa, ate nomɛlbwa waa dɛ teŋɛ gɛ mmara la ta la, o waa fe ɛɛ su Korowii siwii kɛŋɔ o ɛ nɛndɛɛge.
48003022	Korowii Tɔn la baglɔ kɛŋɔ wechɔga vɔrɔwe nɛwɛnyini bwa, ásɛ Korowii nyobaga waa bagɛ yaa la ɛ nɛra baa yarada Yeesu Kristo la gbo kwa. Anomanta nɛra baa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo laanee Korowii ɛɛ ba o nyobaga kwaa la kpɔe tɛ.
48003023	Yeesu Kristo yaradae waa nɔ aa wola balɛ mɔɔ la, dɛ Mosis Mmara la vɔrɔwe yaa kɛŋɔ nɛra baa do ba dea ken. Yeesu Kristo yaradae waa nɔɔ bala mɔɔ ya ta dɔ ya te.
48003024	Dɛ Mosis Mmara nɔɔ dɛɛ nyiŋi yaa mɔɔ Yeesu Kristo ba. Waa bala la, o yaradae taa aa ba chega asɛ ya waa su Korowii siwi, asɛ o lɛ yaa kɛŋɔ nɛndɛɛga.
48003025	Yeesu Kristo yarada waa nɔ aa tel ya be nɔ, Mosis Mmara la laa dɔ yaa kpa.
48003026	Haa yarada Yeesu Kristo la nomanta, he bwa ɛ Korowii bii.
48003027	He banɔ la ba faa sɔ heyaa Korowii nee ásɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo ɛ beŋkpoŋ la, Yeesu Kristo daa he kpɔ gɛ la.
48003028	Anomanta pegra bɛlbwa toole he baah kpa. Juda tena oo, nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ yoo, yoma oo, deheɛre oo, haahna oo, baala oo, he bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ Yeesu Kristo be pera.
48003029	Dɛ he ɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛra te naa, ate Abraham naanaree heya. Kon Korowii aa bagɛ Abraham nyoa la, he gee dɔɔ.
48004001	N waa maa dɛ nyin n bol laanee kɛŋɔ nɛnjen biee dɛɛ so o mɛɛ bug ta dɛɛ di o kwaa bwa te, kɛ o taa ɛ bechala la te, o ne ba dem nɛndɔɔla gba waa beŋkpoŋ. Kɛ on gee dɔ o mɛɛ kwaa bwa.
48004002	O ta ɛ bechala aa, o lɔ nɛra lɔga. Ban dɛɛ nyiŋi o komɛlbwa ta, dɛ ka tel tɔpere o mɛɛ aa doa la mɔɔ ba kpɔ komɛlbwa do o nɔn ta.
48004003	Gɛɛ a fa do ya gba nɛ. Dɛ ya do kɛ bechale ken, asɛ koŋkwaa aa dɛ di kpegri harɛ bonɔ la ɛɛ di kpegri ya nɛ.
48004004	Korowii tɔpere la aa sua la, o tomɛ o gbagba Bie, asɛ nɛnhaah lolɔ harɛ nɔ ta, asɛ o ɛ nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ Mosis Mmara ta la bɛl.
48004005	Gɛ Korowii aa ɛ dɛ won lɛ ya nɛra Mosis Mmara la faa vɔrɔwe yaa la waa o ɛ gɛ, ásɛ dɛ won kpɔ yaa ɛ o bii.
48004006	Korowii aa dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ o bagle kɛŋɔ o biirii yaa la nomanta, o tɛ yaa o Bie la Domadɛɛge la o so ya nɛ, asɛ ya won dɛɛ yerɔ "n Mɛɛ" kɛŋɔ bie aa dɛ yerɛ o mɛɛ gɛ la.
48004007	Taraken nɔ, nɛndɔɔla laa heyaa kpa, Korowii biirii heya. Haa ɛ Korowii bii la nomanta, wɛɛ tɛ heyaa kwaa waa dɛ tɛ o bii bwa laanee.
48004008	Wubwa la, dɛ haa Korowii jemɛ, anomanta dɛ koŋkwaa aa wola Korowii gbagba ɛɛ la ɔma vɔrɔwe heya.
48004009	Taraken nɔ haa jemɛ Korowii nɔ, gɛ laa ge aa, taraken nɔ Korowii aa jemɛ heyaa nɔ, ɛrɛɛ a ɛ asɛ he berɛ dɛɛ nyin he berɛ habɔɔ dɛ kpɔ he te tɛ kwaa aa wola kpegri bɛlbwa dɔe, ne waa aa dɔ wesoma nɔɔ? Ɛrɛɛ he berɛ dɛɛ nyin he kpɔ he te tɛa ásɛ a vɔrɔwe heyaa ja nɔɔ?
48004010	Kɛ he ta dɛ teŋɛ Mosis Mmara ta dɛɛ maŋkura tɔpejena ne korobie ane ne bene ane kenɛ?
48004011	He waa dɛ we n nɛ. Amɔ toma maa ɛa he be la bwa ɛ pɛɛ aa?
48004012	N poo heya, yabala, n fa dɛ teŋɛ Mosis Mmara ta dɛ gel, dɛ berɛ do gɛ haa doa nɔ. Anomanta hé ta che kiŋkiŋ dɛ gel a ta teŋa dɛ do gɛ maa doa nɔ. N faa lɔ he be la, he ta men wechɔge bɛlbwa ɛɛ.
48004013	Kɛ he dɛ lii wee waa gela n ba he be logla la dɛ ba bol Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma la laɔ? Dɛ n bwara dɛ wee mɛ.
48004014	Dɛ n weela la gelɔ n kpoŋa do kpegri, kɛ he ta men haih-haih ɛɛ dɛ vɛɛh mɛ. Gɛ he fe aa lɛ nyundua torome Korowii aa tomɔ la, gɛɛ he lɛɛ mɛ. Gɛ he fe aa lɛ Yeesu Kristo gbagba la, gɛɛ he lɛɛ mɛ.
48004015	He sie faa lɛ n nɛɛ kohona la, taraken te bɔkwa waa bera ba nɔ? Mɛɛ wonoo ŋɔ gɛ saŋ la he fe wonaa, he fe foromi he sibie kwaraa tɛ mɛ.
48004016	Aah n kasinteŋ maa dɛ di heyaa nɔɔ gela n berɛ ɛ he dɔm taraken nɔ kɛɛ?
48004017	Nɛra maa bol ba waa ŋɔ ba dɛ wili heyaa la, ba swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ ɛ kɛŋɔ baa dɛ nyin he waa la, kɛ waa aa lɔ ba nyu bini la aa were. Ba waa baa dɛ nyin ɛɛ laanee kɛŋɔ bá pere n ne he baah ásɛ dɛ fe berɛ he sie kaa ba be.
48004018	Nɛn waa nyina wer te, kɛ waa aa che a ta asɛ nɛn ɛɛ nyin o dɔŋ waa la, a taa kasinteŋ do. A gɛ waa nɔ ɛ kasinteŋ saŋ bɛlbwa. N lɔ he be noo, a ɛ kasinteŋ, n toole he be noo, a ɛ kasinteŋ.
48004019	N bii maa lolɛ heyaa Yeesu Kristo waa ta, he ta he da charɛ dɛ do kɛ Yeesu Kristo aa, he gelɔ n tea berɛ dɛɛ wee mɛ kɛ lol tea aa dɛ we haah la.
48004020	N fe dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ n fe aa lɔ he be taraken, dɛ fe berɛ n nyoa. He waa ɛɛ mɛ anebɛlbwa
48004021	He banɔ la haa dɛ nyin kɛ hɛɛ teŋɛ Mosis Mmara la ta la, he ta noɛ gɛ Mosis Mmara la aa dɛ bagle aa?
48004022	Korowii Tɔn ta baglɛ kɛŋɔ bibaala banɛɛ Abraham dɔ aa? Dɛ bibaala banɛ nɔ bɛl nya ɛ yom, asɛ nɛɛte la te nya ta yom ɛɛ.
48004023	Gɛ baa ne haah naa dɛ lolɛ bie laanee Abraham ne o yomhaah la lolɛ o bilogle la. Kɛ o binɛɛte la o nya aa wola yom ɛɛ la te, Korowiirii bagɔ nyoa dɛ tɛo bie la.
