48004024	Yaa kpɔ haahna banɛ nɔɔ magɛ Korowii ne nɛwɛnyini nyopɛo dɔe fɔo bele anɛ la. Ba bɛlbwa chegɔ tɛ fɔo la beŋkpoŋ. Heega waa ɛ Abraham yomhaah la chegɔ tɛ fɔo la nɛwɛnyini ne Korowii aa fɔwa Sinai Bwe ta bela Korowii aa kpɔ o Mmara la tɛ Mosis la. A gɛ fɔo la tenaa ɛ yoma la.
48004025	Heegaa chega tɛ Sinai Bwe waa lɔ Arebia harɛ ta la. O tenten, on chega tɛ fini Jerusalam bwɛjen nɔ o nɛra bwa aa ɛ yoma nɔ.
48004026	Haah waa wola yom ɛɛ la ge chegɔ tɛ Jerusalam la waa lɔ nyundua la. Onee ya nya nɔ,
48004027	dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba chwerɔ do Korowii Tɔn la bini ŋɔ, "Hambara, gel he sie lɛ! Haah haa wola loltea weweele nae ka, gel he sie lɛ hɛɛ moo, dɛkalkɛŋɔ haah la o jaa raa chwao la ɛɛ ba dɔ biirii gwaa onɔ la o jaa raa wola on chwae la."
48004028	Gɛ Korowii aa bagɛ Abraham nyoa dɛ gel o lolɛ Aesek la, gɛɛ o bagɛ nyoa ya ge ɛ o bii.
48004029	A gɛ saŋ la, dɛ Abraham bie la waa lolɔ gɛ baa ne haah naa dɛ lolɛ la, dɛ o chegɛ onɔ la Korowii aa chegɛ o Domadɛɛge nɛɛ dɛ tɛ Abraham la nɛɛ taeh. Gɛ waa nɔ ta lole fini nɔ.
48004030	Kɛ a bwa habɔɔ la, ɛrɛɛ Korowii Tɔn la bagle ɔ? O baglɔ ŋɔ, "Doŋi yomhaah la ne o bie la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ yomhaah la bie la ne haah la waa wola yom ɛɛ la bie la aa won pɛ di ba mɛɛ kapɛrɛ a magre."
48004031	Anomanta, yabala, ya ta yomhaah bii ɛɛ. Haah waa wola yom ɛɛ la biirii yaa.
48005001	Ya di ya nyu. Yeesu Kristo foo yaa, anomanta ya ta nɛndɔɔla ɛɛ kpa. Waa foo heyaa nɔ, hé che kiŋkiŋ. He bɛ gel ba kpɔ waa dɛɛ ha heyaa kpa.
48005002	Hé gel n ŋɔ he be, dɛ he teŋɛ Mosis Mmara nɔ ta dɛ gel ba teŋe he pena aa, dɛ waa Yeesu Kristo aa ɛa tɛ heyaa la ta tɔnɔ dɔe tɛ heyaa kwaraa. Men Pɔɔl, men ŋɔa.
48005003	Hé gel n kwaa ŋɔ he be he no kɛrɛdɛ, nomɛlbwa waa gela ba teŋe o pen ásɛ o waa su Korowii siwi la, a chɛ kɛ o teŋɛ Mosis Mmara la bwa ta.
48005004	He banɔ la haa dɛ nyin he che Mosis Mmara ta teŋa ta ásɛ dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛga he waa su Korowii siwi la, he pere he te le Yeesu Kristo be. He ta nɛra Korowii aa sune ba nɛɛ la nɛɛ jae.
48005005	Ya te ken nɔ, ya chegɛ yarada yaa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo la ta dɛɛ hwɛgɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge ɛɛ geloo ya ɛ nɛndɛɛga ya waa su Korowii siwi.
48005006	Yeesu Kristo ŋwɛnɛ ta teŋa nɔ ta te, ba teŋe nɛn pen oo, ba ta o pen teŋoo, a laa ɛ wehiah. Waa aa hiah laanee kɛŋɔ nɛn aa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo asɛ gɛ yarada nɔ won gel wɛɛ nyin o dɔŋa.
48005007	He fa dɛ teŋɛ ŋwɛnɛdɛɛge la ta kɛrɛdɛ. Bɔkwaa bala haa wola berɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ kasinteŋ ŋwɛnɛ la ta kpaɔ? Bɔkwaa tɔ heyaa ŋwɛnɛ ɔ?
48005008	Korowii waa le heyaa he ba o be la, o be laa gɛ liire nɔ le.
48005009	Ba ŋɔ, "Iisi tama ken won paanoo damanta hoeh," anomanta hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi liire aa do ken nɔ dɔŋa kɛrɛdɛ.
48005010	N te ta dɛ yarada heya. Ya Dɔɔ la ya bwa aa dɛ tomɛ la nomanta n dɛ yarada heyaa kɛŋɔ haa liifalee dɔ. Naate waa dɛ wili heyaa nɔ, gɛ bwa waa doa, Korowii ɛɛ bɔɔ kemee.
48005011	Yabalawa, dɛ n fe ta dɛ bol ŋɔ penteŋa hiaoh waa, nɛra fe chegɛ n nɛɛ ken aa? Dɛ n fe kpɔ penteŋa waa dɛ ja Yeesu Kristo dagagre ta sewa la waa ta dɛɛ bol aa, nɛra fe dɛ vɛh n wobol nɔ naa?
48005012	A ka n te wa aa, nɛra baa dɛ wili heyaa ŋɔ hé teŋe he pena la, ba dɛ nyin aa, bá fɔgɛ ba lure ge.
48005013	Yabalawa, Korowiirii le heyaa tɛ o te, dɛ lɛ heyaa asɛ Mmara la bɛ heyaa vɔrɔwe kpa. Kɛ haa dɔ he te nɔ, he bɛ gel a do he som kohona, asɛ hɛɛ ɛ wechɔga la bwa he bwadabii aa dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ hɛɛ ɛ. Hé kpɔ dɔŋa nyina dɛɛ tomɛ dɔŋa.
48005014	Maa dɛ ŋɔ nɔ, webeŋkpoŋ bɛl lole dɛ he dɛ ɛ aa, dɛ he tonɛ Mosis Mmara la bwa. Onee kɛŋɔ, "Nyin he dɔŋ kɛ he gbagba."
48005015	Dɛ haa dɔŋa nyin, dɛɛ yo aa, amɔ te hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ. A waa laa aa, he dɛ ba dɔŋa baah chɔga kwaraa.
48005016	Waa maa dɛ nyin n bol laanee kɛŋɔ hé kpɔ he te tɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la, ásɛ wɛɛ bagle heyaa ŋwɛnɛ. Dɛ o dɛ bagle heyaa ŋwɛnɛ aa, haa wechɔga he nɛwɛnyini mar aa dɛ nyin la ɛɛ ba,
48005017	dɛkalkɛŋɔ waa he nɛwɛnyini mar wechɔga aa suu la aa dɛ nyin la, Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa an nyin. Nɛwɛnyini mar wenyina ne Korowii Domadɛɛge wenyina aa jo. Anomanta waa haa dɛ nyin ɛɛ la, haa wona ba dɛ ɛ.
48005018	Dɛ he kpɔ he te tɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la wɛɛ bagle heyaa ŋwɛnɛ te naa, Mosis Mmara la aa won di kpegri he nɛ.
48005019	Nomɛlbwa jemɛ nɛwɛnyini mar wechɔga aa suu nɔ tetoowa. Anee kɛŋɔ jwamane ne wedoŋa ne pɛlchɔga we-ɛɛla te bwa soosiwi,
48005020	ne voga toma ne sɔm wa. A bini anee kɛŋɔ nɛra ne ba dɔŋa aa dɛ di dɔm dɛɛ yo, ne sɔnnyin kohona, ne bandisale ne sibegra, ne nɛra ne ba bala baah pegra, ne nyopɛo bɛ dɔe,
48005021	ne bɔweela, ne dɛɛra, dɛ dɛɛ dɛɛ do gbɔga kohona, ne wesale aa do ken nɔ. N fa ŋɔ he be wubwa ŋɔ hé nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ ŋɔ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ gɛ waa nɔ la, baa Korowii Kora la ta jae ba. N berɔ kwaa dɛɛ lii heyaa ja.
48005022	Korowii Domadɛɛge la te, kwaa waa dɛ tɛ laanee dɔŋa nyina, ne silɛɛ, ne nyopɛo, ne bambile dɔe, ne tesom, ne wedɛɛga ɛɛ, ne kasinteŋ dɔe,
48005023	ne pwɛre doe, dɛ gel nɛn won o te lawa. Harɛ bɛlbwa toole dɛ ki a gɛ waa nɔ.
48005024	Nɛra baa ɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛra la, ba kpaa ba nɛwɛnyini mar wechɔga aa suu nɔ wenyina ne ba liichɔga bwa pɛl Yeesu dagagre la ta dɛ kpoa.
48005025	Taraken nɔ, ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge laanee tɛ yaa mkpa, anomanta a chɛ kɛ ya kpɔ ya te tɛo dɛ gel wɛɛ bagle yaa ŋwɛnɛ ya soga bini.
48005026	A ta chɛ kɛ yaa ɛ jenu. A ta chɛ kɛ yaa ir dɔŋa bwaawee. A ta chɛ kɛ ya dɔ bɔweela dɔŋa nɛ.
48006001	Yabala, dɛ he lawɛ he bini bɛl wechɔga bɛlbwa ta naa, he banɔ la haa dɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge la kɛrɛdɛ la, hé togro. Kɛ he bɛ o nɛɛ nyɛg te, hé togro sipwɛra ne. He gbagba ge la, a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ Bɔnsam bɛ heyaa ba negre do wechɔga ta.
48006002	Waa pu he dɔŋ dɛ ɛ bone tɛo waa, hé chao. He dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, dɛ Yeesu Kristo mmara la taa hɛɛ teŋɛ la.
48006003	Dɛ nɛn ta nɛnjen ɛɛ dɛɛ lii o te nɛnjen aa, dɛ o dɛ negre o te.
48006004	Hé bɛlbwa nyiŋi o we-ɛɛla na. Dɛ a wer aa, ó gel o sie lɛ. Kɛ he bɛ he te kpɔ dɛɛ magɛ dɔŋa dɛɛ nyin sɔn,
48006005	dɛkalkɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa ne o bonee wɛɛ ba chega.
48006006	Nomɛlbwa baa dɛ baglo Yeesu Kristo waa nɔ la, kondɛɛge bɛlbwa haa dɔ la, tɛ naate waa dɛ bagle la.
48006007	He bɛ he te dɛɛ negre. Haa jemɛ kɛ baa Korowii negre kɛɛ? Kwaa nɛn aa dua la, anee wɛɛ komɛ.
48006008	Dɛ nɛn teŋɛ o nɛwɛnyini mar wechɔga aa suu pɛla kwaa nɛɛ dɛ du wechɔga aa, sewee wɛɛ ba koma. Dɛ nɛn teŋɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la tetoowaa ta dɛ du wedɛɛga aa, wɛɛ komɛ mkpa waa wola jaga dɔe bwa laanee Domadɛɛge la be.
48006009	He bɛ gel ya bwara ɛɛ hwah yaa wedɛɛga ɛɛ ta. Dɛ ya swɛɛ siwi a ta naa, Korowii tɔpere la telaa, yaa komaa.
48006010	Anomanta saŋ bɛlbwa, dɛ ŋwɛnɛ lole naa, yáa cha nomɛlbwa, a laa kɛŋɔ nɛra ya ne baa dɛ di lola Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ teŋa nɔ ta nɔ.
48006011	N gbagbaa chwerɛ bonɔ la. Hé na gɛ maa chwera a do bare gɛ!
48006012	Nɛra baa dɛ do heyaa ŋɔ hé teŋni he pena la, nɛra sie ta waa baa ɛ gɛ. Ba dɛ ɛ gɛ ásɛ Juda tena na dɛ bɛ ba yaradae baa yarada Yeesu dagagre ta sewa waa koh dɛ hah ba.
48006013	Nɛra baa sɛah ba teŋni ba pena la, ba gba aa Mosis Mmara la bwa ta teŋɛ. Ba dɛ nyin ba teŋni he pena ásɛ dɛ won kpɔ a waa dɛɛ ta nyoa.
48006014	N te aa n te maŋkura wobɛlbwa ta. Yeesu dagagre ta sewa la waa taa n te ɛɛ jaagi. O seo la gelɔ harɛ ta bonɔ waa berɛ wepɛɛ n be, a ta kpegri dɔe n nɛɛ kpa.
48006015	Penteŋa ne o bɛ teŋa te ta hiaih kwaraa. Waa aa hiah laanee kɛ Korowii aa charɛ ya liire ya ɛ nɛnfala.
48006016	Nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ gɛ waa maa dɛ bagle nɔ ta ba soga bini la, Kórowii na ba sum dɛ tɛɛ ba bambisɔɔhna. Banee o nɛra Israel tena la.
48006017	Nomɛlbwa bɛ men yɔna do kpa. Yeesu Kristo toma maa dɛ ɛ la, a ŋwɛra pɛla lɔ n nɛ.
48006018	Yabala, yá Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya. Aamen.
49001001	Men Yeesu Kristo torome Pɔɔlee chwerɛ tɔn nɔ. Korowii tetooraa o tɛ mɛ toma nɔ. N chwerɔ dɛɛ tɛ he nɛra haa lɔ Ɛfesos dɛ ɛ Korowii nɛra dɛɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ kasinteŋ ne la.
49001002	Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
49001003	Hé gel ya jam ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo Mɛɛ Korowii, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o cha yaa wedɛɛga la bwa aa le o Domadɛɛge be la ta, asɛ yaa na som o be nyundua, pɛɛ ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la nomanta.
49001004	Korowii felo dɛ le yaa tɛ o te saŋ la o faa wola harɛ gba tae la, dɛ ŋɔ o dɛ ba gela ya ne Yeesu Kristo pɛ yá won do kaih dɛ bɛ doŋa bɛlbwa dɔ o be.
49001005	O nyina waa dɛ nyin yaa waa o fel jemɛ ya waa cheg kɛŋɔ wɛɛ koh Yeesu Kristo waa dɛ kpɔ yaa ɛ o bii. O tetooraa o chega gɛ.
49001006	O Binyini la waa o sune ya nɛɛ dɛ ta tea dɛ cha yaa gɛ ásɛ nɛra won kpɛɛro ya sum waa dɛ na kohona la wa.
49001007	O Binyini laanee lɛ ya seo sewɛ. O chalee yawɛ yaa tɛ Korowii, asɛ o kpɔ ya wechɔga dɛɛ kɛ yaa. Anee dɛɛ bagle suna waa sune ya nɛɛ kohona dɛɛ cha yaa la.
49001008	O ta dɛ cha yaa kɛrɛdɛ ya won dɔ wejema ne liire.
49001009	Gɛ bwa Korowii aa ɛ Yeesu Kristo waa cheg o tetoora ta a fa sɔh yaa la, o berɔ pili a bwa bini tɛ yaa ya won jemɛ gɛ aa su o siwi o chega gɛ saŋ la,
49001010	asɛ a ɛ gɛ saŋ la waa liira la. O chega kɛŋɔ wɛɛ geloo nyundua ne harɛ ta komɛlbwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ, asɛ Yeesu Kristo ɛ ba Dɔɔ.
49001011	Ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa ba ɛ beŋkpoŋ la waa o le yaa tɛ o te. Korowii o yon dɛɛ cheg gɛ wobɛlbwa aa dɛ ba ɛɛ asɛ a yon ɛ gɛ waa dɛ nyin la, on fela le yaa tɛ o te
49001012	ásɛ nɛra won nyiŋi ya banɔ la yaa fela dɔ hwɛga Yeesu Kristo waa ta la, dɛ kpɛɛro, dɛ tɛo jirima.
49001013	Baa bagle heyaa kasinteŋ dɛ le Amanesoma la aa dɛ lɛ heyaa la ta la, he gba sɛoh dɛ ja beŋkpoŋri ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa ɛa la ta. Haa yarada Korowii dɛ kpɔ he te tɛo la, o kpɔ o Domadɛɛge tɛ heyaa gɛ waa bagɛ heyaa nyoa la. O Domadɛɛge la lɔ ya nɛɛ dɛ ɛ nso kɛŋɔ ya ɛ Korowii nɛra.
49001014	O Domadɛɛge la taa a che ya jemɛ kɛŋɔ yaa dɔ kwaa Korowii aa bagɛ o nɛra nyoa laanee. Anee bagla kɛŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ lɛ o nɛra bwaa ta dɛ lɛ sɔn ne jirima tɛ o te.
49001015	A waa gela maa no he yarada haa dɛ yarada ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo dɛ kpɔ he te tɛo dɛɛ nyin Korowii nɛra la bwa la,
49001016	n ta dɛ jam Korowii he waa saŋ bɛlbwa, dɛ soŋo dɛɛ tɛ heya.
49001017	Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo Mɛɛ Korowii la waa dɔ jirima kɛrɛdɛ ga la, ó ja heyaa wejema, dɛ chaah he sie ásɛ he won dɛɛ jemɛ o waa saŋ bɛlbwa,
49001018	dɛ pili he sie dɛ gel he won jemɛ hwɛga Korowii aa le heyaa he dɔ a do kan kohona la kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ wedɛɛga waa bagɛ o nɛra nyoa ŋɔ baa dɔɔ la kan taeh,
49001019	dɛ berɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ kpegri Korowii aa dɔa dɛɛ cha ya banɔ la yaa yaradao la kan, a ta dɔŋ dɔe. Hé lii gɛ o faa cha Yeesu Kristo o kpegri ne la, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ kpegri la tentenee ó kpɔ dɛɛ cha yaa.
49001020	O iru seo ta dɛ kpɔɔ kaa o be ka so nomombɔr o be nyundua bela,
49001021	o dɔ kpegri kɛrɛdɛ ga dɛ gwaa kpegri konchɔga aa bea yaa wola an na bwa soosiwi aa dɔa, dɛ dɔ sɔn gwaa komɛlbwa kɛɛ nomɛlbwa waa lole taraken ne nɛra baa dɛ ba bala tɔpere aa dɛ ba bala la ta.
49001022	Korowii kpɔ komɛlbwa ne nomɛlbwa bil Yeesu Kristo sie o tire ba nɛ, dɛ berɛ gel o ɛ asɔre tena bwa nyu,
49001023	asɛ ba ge ɛ o bwadabi. Onee kana ga dɛ won su harɛ nɔ bwa, kɛ asɔre tena laanee gela o di mu ka tonɛ.
49002001	He fa do kɛŋɔ he sewɔ Korowii be. He wechɔgaa gela he begre gɛ.
49002002	He fa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta liire dɛɛ teŋɛ wechɔga ta, dɛɛ teŋɛ konchɔga bwa yaa wola an na la dɔɔ la nɛ. O tentenee dɛɛ ɛ toma deŋnekpeg tena bambili bini.
49002003	Gɛɛ ya bwa faa ɛ, dɛɛ ɛ waa ya nɛwɛnyini mar wechɔga aa suu nɔ aa dɛ nyin, asɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ ya bwadabii pɛla ne ya liichɔga ta. Ya ne nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta liire bwa nɛɛ Korowii baah faa di.
49002004	Kɛ Korowii nyina waa dɛ nyin yaa kohona, ne suna o yon dɛɛ sune ya nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ la nomanta,
49002005	o ir yaa seo la ya wechɔga nomanta yaa sewa la ta, dɛ berɛ koh pɛɛ ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la waa dɛ tɛ yaa mkpafale. Korowii suna waa sune he nɛɛ la taa a che o lɛ heya.
49002006	Korowiirii ir ya ne Yeesu Kristo bwa seo ta, asɛ pɛɛ ya ne waa pɛa la nomanta, o berɛ tɛ ya bwa soŋnibɔra o be nyundua.
49002007	O ɛ gɛ dɛ́ kpɔ bagle nɛra baa wola toole dɛ taa ba bala asɛ ba na gɛ waa gara sune ya nɛɛ kohona dɛ cha yaa kɛrɛdɛ, gɛ waa chegɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ ta tea ɛ yaa waa nɔ bwa la. O nɛn nɛɛ suna kan kɛrɛdɛ. A ta dɔŋ dɔe.
49002008	Korowii aa lɛ heyaa ta la, o nɛn nɛɛ suna ne he yarada waa o ɛ gɛ. He gbagba be laa a le, pɛɛpɛɛ o lɛ heyaa ta dɛ tɛ heyaa mkpa.
49002009	Ya wedɛɛga ta laa a che o lɛ yaa, nomɛlbwa bɛ kpɔ dɛɛ maŋkura o te.
49002010	Korowiirii ta ya bwa. Waa ta yaa la, wedɛɛga ɛɛ waa o ta yaa ásɛ ya che Yeesu Kristo kpegri ta dɛɛ ɛa. O tɔ sie cheg yaa kɛ ya baa ɛ wedɛɛga.
49002011	Anomanta hɛ́ɛ lii gɛ he faa doa la. He ta Juda tena ɛɛ, asɛ Juda tena baa dɛ maŋkura penteŋ waa koh kɛ haa he pena teŋe dɛɛ nyiŋi he nyu baah. A ɛ nɛwɛnyini bwadabii we-ɛɛla.
49002012	He faa Kristo Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la waa jemɛ. He fa ta Juda tena Korowii aa lee ba dɛ gel ba ɛ o nɛra la nɛɛ jae. He faa nyoo Korowii aa baga dɛ kwaa o ne o nɛra fɔo dɔe la waa jemɛ. He fa ta hwɛga bɛlbwa dɔe. He faa Korowii jemɛ ó won cha heya.
49002013	Kɛ taraken he banɔ la he ne Korowii baah faa jaŋa la, Korowii koh Yeesu Kristo seo waa sewa asɛ he ne o won pɛ la waa dɛ kpɔ heyaa ba o be.
49002014	On gela nyopɛo ba, dɛ gel ya banɔ la ya faa hah dɔŋa la ɛ beŋkpoŋ. Haeh ya Juda tena ne he banɔ la haa wola Juda tena ɛɛ nɔ faa hah dɔŋa la do kɛ danjwɛɛ dɛ teŋe yaa baah ta. Onee pagre a gɛ danjwɛɛ la.
49002015	O gbagba bwadabii o kpɔ ɛ gɛ dɛ sewɛ dɛ laa Mosis Mmara la laa kpɔ ya nɛ, asɛ banɔ la baa dɛ teŋɛ a ta la bɛ ba te pere le banɔ la baa wola a ta teŋɛ la nɛ. Onee wona kpɔ ya bwa pɛ dɛ begre yaa ya ɛ nɛmbeŋkpoŋ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya bwa ne onee pɛa. Gɛɛ o ɛ dɛ gel ya dɔ nyopɛo.
49002016	Waa la bwa a faa vɔrɔwe yaa ya hah dɔŋa la, o chɔg a bwa ta dagagre la ta dɛ gel ya bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ, dɛ berɛ lawɛ ya ne Korowii pɛ.
49002017	O baa bagle he nɛra haa wola Juda tena ɛɛ he ne Korowii baah faa jaŋa la ne Juda tena ba ne Korowii baah aa wola jaŋɛ la bwa amanesoma kɛŋɔ nyopɛo balɔ.
49002018	Onee gela ya bwa dɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge la, dɛ che o nɛɛ dɛ won dɛɛ tel o Mɛɛ be.
49002019	Anomanta he ta hɔɔhra ɛɛ kpa. He ɛ bwɛɛlembii dɛ ja o nɛra la nɛ, dɛ ɛ o gbagba lola,
49002020	dɛ ja Yeesu toroma ne o keamere la nɛ. Jae haa ja ba nɛɛ do kɛŋɔ baa dɛ ma dea la. O gelɔ he do kɛŋɔ dea danjwɛ. O toroma ne o keamere laanee dea la sollogle, asɛ o gbagba gee bwedɛɛge la baa kpɔa pa dea la mun la.
49002021	Onee lawɛ banɔ la bwa ba ne waa pɛa la kpoŋe, asɛ dea la ɛɛ kpeg dɛ ɛ Korowii Dea, o nomanta.
49002022	Pɛɛ he ne waa pɛa la nomanta, he gba ja dea la Korowii aa dɛ ma o ɛ o dobɔr la ta. O Domadɛɛge la aa soge he nɛɛ la nomanta, he ɛ o dobɔr.
49003001	Gɛɛ a do men Pɔɔl baa koh kɛ n dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ bol o waa la dɛɛ bagle he banɔ la haa wola Juda tena ɛɛ dɛ do mɛ dea la, n dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ heya.
49003002	He ken no gɛ Korowii aa sune n nɛɛ dɛ cha mɛ kɛrɛdɛ n won dɛɛ cha heyaa la.
49003003	O gbagbaa pili o wesɔɔhla waa bini bag mɛ. N fa chwerɛ gɛ waa nɔ tama dɛ tɛ heya.
49003004	Dɛ he kure gɛ n faa chwera la aa, hɛɛ wonoo jemɛ kɛŋɔ n jemɛ Yeesu Kristo wesɔɔhla la bini.
49003005	Korowii fa ta o wesɔɔhla bini pile bagle saŋ la tena. Kɛ taraken o Domadɛɛge bagla o nɛra baa ɛ o toromedɛɛga ne o keamedɛɛga la be,
49003006	dɛ gel ba jemɛ kɛŋɔ pɛɛ banɔ la baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la ne Yeesu aa pɛa la ne Amanesoma la baa noa la nomanta, ba ja Juda tena nɛɛ dɛ ɛ Korowii kwa, dɛ bwa ja Yeesu Kristo bwadabii ta, dɛ bwa pɛ dɛɛ di Korowii nyobaga la ge tɔnɔ.
49003007	Amanesoma toma nɔɔ Korowii kpɔ tɛ mɛ. Sunaa o sune n nɛɛ kohona dɛ cha mɛ o kpegri ne, n won dɛɛ ɛ toma nɔ.
49003008	N ɛ bechala o nɛra bwa bini n fe aa wola chɛɛ, kɛ menee o le ŋɔ ń bol o Amanesoma la bagle nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ ásɛ ba ge jemɛ wedɛɛga aa wola jaga dɔe dɛ le Yeesu Kristo waa bini.
49003009	Korowii aa ta komɛlbwa ba le fini, o kpɔ waa nɔ ne gɛ a ŋwɛnɛre aa doa sɔh nɛwɛnyini. Kɛ taraken o pili a bini bag mɛ ń bol bagle nɛra bwa ba jemɛ.
49003010	O ɛ gɛ ásɛ nyundua toroma ne kwaa aa dɔ kpegri bwa dɛ do Korowii be nyundua bwa pese asɔre tena waa dɛ jemɛ gɛ bwa Korowii wejema aa kana ne gɛ waa dɛ ɛ o toma.
49003011	Gɛ waa chega wubwa la, ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo aa bala la, a wono ɛ gɛ.
49003012	Yaa dɛ yarada Yeesu ya ne o pɛ nɔ, yaa wonoo ba Korowii be yaa wola ɔmɛ.
49003013	Anomanta waa maa dɛ soŋe heyaa laanee kɛ he bɛ gel he bwara hwah wahala maa koh he waa dɛɛ na nɔ ta. Hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ he dɛ dɔ sɔn n wahala nɔ ta.
49003014	Anomanta n dɛ guŋi N Naa Korowii harɛ.
49003015	Onee komɛlbwa waa lɔ nyundua ne harɛ bwa Mɛɛ. O bee ba mɛɛnanar lɛ ba sɔn ne ba kpegri dɛɛ di.
49003016	N dɛ soŋo kɛ, chae waa dɛ cha yaa kohona a dɔ jirima nɔ nomanta, ó gel o Domadɛɛge tɛ heyaa kpegri ásɛ he won lawɛ o waa bini kiŋkiŋ he bambile bwa ne,
49003017	dɛ won dɔ yarada kɛrɛdɛ, ásɛ he won lawɛ Yeesu Kristo he ne o pɛ. N dɛ soŋo he bambile won do o nɛɛ dɛ lawɔ kɛrɛdɛ,
49003018	ásɛ he ne Korowii nɛra la bwa won jemɛ gɛ Yeesu Kristo nyina aa kana dɛ do luŋri, aa wola jaga dɔe bwa.
49003019	O nyina waa dɛ nyin yaa la gwaa ya liire. Kɛ n dɛ soŋe Korowii he won jema, dɛ won dɔ o gbagba da kɛrɛdɛ ga dɛ ka tonɛ.
49003020	Hɛ́ɛ tɛ Korowii sɔn! Onee chegɛ o kpegri waa kpɔa dɛɛ ɛ toma ya bini la ta dɛ won ɛ waa aa gwaa gɛ ya fe aa liira dɛɛ soŋo la.
49003021	Hé gel o dɔ jirima Yeesu Kristo ne asɔre tena waa bini saŋ bɛlbwa! Aamen.
49004001	Men Pɔɔl maa koh ya Dɔɔ waa la waa ba do mɛ dea la, n dɛ soŋe he bwa, hɛ́ɛ teŋɛ gɛ aa chɛ kɛ nɛra Korowii aa lee ba tɛ o te ɛɛ teŋɛ la.
49004002	Hɛ́ɛ sɔɔh bwara dɛɛ pwɛr he te, dɛ koh dɔŋa nyina waa dɛ dɔ bambile dɔŋa nɛ,
49004003	dɛ swɛɛ siwi hé ne he bala baah do wer saŋ bɛlbwa, dɛ bɛ nyopɛo la Korowii Domadɛɛge aa tɛ heyaa la chɔg.
49004004	Yeesu bwadabii lɔ beŋkpoŋ, o Domadɛɛge ge lɔ beŋkpoŋ, asɛ hwɛga Korowii aa le yaa ya bwa dɔ la ge ɛ beŋkpoŋ.
49004005	Ya bwa Dɔɔ lɔ beŋkpoŋ. Waa ya bwa aa dɛ yarada, ne Korowii nee baa sɔ ya bwa la ge ɛ beŋkpoŋ.
49004006	Ya bwa Mɛɛɛ Korowii, o lɔ beŋkpoŋ. Onee dɔ ya bwa dɛɛ ɛ toma ya bwa bini, dɛ do ya bwa nɛ.
49004007	Kɛ ya bɛlbwa dɔ chae Yeesu Kristo aa chao. Gɛ waa dɛ nyin laanee o bɔna tɛ ya bwa gɛ del aa chɛ kɛ bɛlbwa dɔ.
49004008	Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "O kaa nyundua. Nɛra waa lag ba la teŋɛ o nɛɛ dɛ kaa, asɛ o kɛ nɛra kwa."
49004009	Baa ŋɔa ŋɔ o kaa nyundua la, a baglɔ kɛŋɔ o tɔ sie tu ba harɛ.
49004010	Nɛn waa tua la, o tentenee kaa nyundua dɛ ka do nyundujagla ásɛ dɛ won do bobɛlbwa.
49004011	Onee kɛ nɛra kwaa la. Kwaa waa kɛ nɛra laanee nɔ: O cha bane ba won che o kpegri ta dɛ ɛ o toroma, dɛ cha bane ba won che o kpegri ta dɛ bol o wa, dɛ cha bane ge baa bol o Amanesoma la. O cha bane ge baa nyiŋi o nɛra nɛɛ dɛɛ bag ba o ŋwɛnɛ ta teŋa.
49004012	Gɛɛ o ɛ dɛ cha nɛra ba won ɛ o toma dɛ cha dɔŋa Yéesu Kristo bwadabii la won do kpegri,
49004013	asɛ ya bwa won dɔ nyopɛo yarada yaa yarada Korowii Bie ne jema yaa jemɔ la ta kɛrɛdɛ dɛ ka tonɛ, dɛ won kpeg kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ nomonome o nɛɛ teŋa ta, gɛ Yeesu Kristo aa doa la. Onee ya kpɔ dɛɛ magɛ ya te dɛ jemɛ gɛ yaa kpeg.
49004014	A taa aa ba chega nɛra aa wola won negre yaa kɛŋɔ bechale. Dɛ ya ta kpege kɛrɛdɛ o nɛɛ teŋa ta naa, bane ɛɛ ba bagle yaa waa aa koraa, ya den sɛh warane dɛɛ tɛɛ ba kɛŋɔ peu won gɔɔ kon ir nyundua dɛ yon kpɔ ka ta bobɛlbwa la. Nɛra bane won ba liire kpɔe dɛ teŋe nyosone a do kɛŋɔ kpelaa ken, dɛ won negre nɛra.
49004015	Korowii dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ ya lawɛ kasinteŋ la bini kɛrɛdɛ dɛɛ bola dɔŋa be nɛnnyin ne, ásɛ ya won kpeg kɛrɛdɛ dɛ do gɛ Yeesu Kristo aa doa. Onee ya nyu.
49004016	Yan gee o bwadabi. Onee choŋri bwadabii la bwa, aa lawɛ dɔŋa kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ dɛɛ cha dɔŋa ásɛ dɛ won kpeg tel o maga bwa la. Dɔŋa nyinaa gela Yeesu Kristo bwadabii won kpeg gɛ dɛ do kpegri la.
49004017	N siswɛm waa n che n Dɔɔ Yeesu sɔn ta dɛɛ bol he be la. He bɛ banɔ la baa wola Korowii tomɛ la nɛɛ teŋɛ kpa. Wepuu baa lii dɛɛ teŋɛ a ta la.
49004018	Ba sibie tɔɔgɔ. Ba nya liire, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba ɛ deŋnekpeg tena. A waa gela baa wola Korowii mkpa dɔe la.
49004019	Wobɛlbwa aa ban sihiih ɛ. Anomanta ba saahnɔ dɛɛ teŋɛ ba pɛlchɔga we-ɛɛla ta, dɛɛ ɛ wedoŋa ba siwi swɛɛ a ta.
49004020	Kɛ he te, gɛ laa ba bagle Yeesu Kristo waa ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ teŋɛ a ta.
49004021	He no o wa, ba bagle heyaa kasinteŋ ŋwɛnɛ la, asɛ he jemɛ gɛ baa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ.
49004022	Taraken hé gel he dabene la ne waa he faa dɛ teŋɛ a ta la. He pɛlchɔgaa negre he bwa dɛɛ chɔg he da la. Hé gel webena la bwa,
49004023	dɛ gel Korowii kwaa he bambile ne he liire bwa á berɛ anfala.
49004024	O tɛ heyaa dafale bɛl soosiwi waa kwaara, o do kɛ o tenten la ásɛ he won ɛ nɛndɛɛga tenten, he waa bwa do kɛrɛdɛ o be. Anomanta hé kpɔ dafale la.
49004025	Hé laa nyosone bɛlbwa laa kpɔ he waa ta, dɛɛ bol kasinteŋ dɛɛ tɛ dɔŋa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he bwa pɛ bwadabii beŋkpoŋ ta dɛ ɛ beŋkpoŋ.
49004026	Dɛ he baah diu waa, he bɛ gel a ɛ bandichɔga he ɛ wechɔga. Hé gel o sɔɔh warane. Aa were kɛŋɔ he baah di wee ka jo dɛ o ta sɔɔhnɛ.
49004027	He bɛ gel Bɔnsam dɔ bɔr dɛ negre heya.
49004028	He fa dɛ ŋwɛ kɛɛ? Hé gel gɛ ɛɛ dɛ kpɔ he nɔɔra haa kpɔa dɛɛ ŋwɛ la dɛɛ ɛ tondɛɛga dɛ dɔ dɛɛ di, dɛ won dɔ ane dɛɛ tɛ nyaara ba gee di.
49004029	He bɛ gel wedoŋa bɛlbwa ɛɛ le he nyoo, kɛ hé gel he wobol ɛ waa aa wera dɛɛ do nɛra gbemba waa aa kpoŋ ba ta, dɛ won cha banɔ la baa dɛ noa la.
49004030	He bɛ gel Korowii Domadɛɛge la tea bini chɔg. Korowiirii kpɔɔ do heyaa nso dɛ́ won jemɛ he banɔ la waa dɛ ba lɛɛ o lɛɛ tɔpere la.
49004031	Hé gel nyɛgre doe, ne bandia, ne gaeh, ne wesagasagare, ne bahmugliwa, ne meesɔhwaa bwa,
49004032	dɛɛ ɛ dɔŋa wedɛɛga, dɛ dɔ dɔŋa chal. Dɛ he dɔŋ ɛɛ wechɔga aa, kpɔ kɛo kɛŋɔ Korowii aa koh Yeesu Kristo waa dɛ kpɔ he wechɔga kɛ heyaa la.
49005001	He ɛ Korowii bii waa dɛ nyin heya, anomanta hé chaaro dɛ kpɔ o da.
49005002	A wer kɛŋɔ he so dɔŋa nyina ne kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo aa nyin yaa dɛ sewɛ lɛ yaa a ɛ sarahadɛɛge dɛ tɛ Korowii la.
49005003	Kɛ jwamane ne wedoŋa ne sibegra dɔŋa kwaa ta te, he bɛ a waa dɛɛ bol a ba ɛ kɛŋɔ hɛɛ ɛa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ aa were tɛ Korowii nɛra.
49005004	Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ he wobol bini, dɛ bɛ wobochɔga ne gɛnewobol ne wobosale dɛɛ bol. A ta chɛ kɛ hɛɛ bola. Hé gel he wobol ɛ Korowii kpɛɛra wa.
49005005	Hé jemɛ kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ nɛra baa dɛ bɔ jwamane, dɛɛ ɛ wedoŋa, ba sie ɛɛ begre kwaa ta la aa bɔr dɔe ba Yeesu Kristo ne Korowii Kora la bini. Sie begra kwaa ta do kɛŋɔ vog toma ken.
49005006	He bɛ gel nomɛlbwa kpɔ wepuu dɛ won negre heya. A gɛ waa nɔ bwa waa Korowii baah di deŋnekpeg tena nɛɛ wɛɛ ba ba deŋne tɛra.
49005007	Anomanta he ne gɛ nɛra la bɛ wobɛlbwa ta pɛ.
49005008	He waa bwa fa ɛ biro bini wa, kɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu nomanta he ɛ bochaah ta nɛra. Anomanta hé gel he soga bini wobɛlbwa do kɛŋɔ bochaah ta nɛra.
49005009	Bochaah ta we-ɛɛlaa wedɛɛga, wekaih, ne kasinteŋ wa.
49005010	Anomanta hé jemɛ waa haa ɛ aa lɛ Korowii sie,
49005011	asɛ dɛ gel biro bini waa ɛɛ. A ta tɔnɔ dɔe. Hé le a ne baŋ ásɛ nɛra jemɛ gɛ aa doa.
49005012	Waa ba yon sɔh dɛɛ ɛ la aa were. A waa bagla gba dɔ sihiih.
49005013	Ba le komɛlbwa ne bochaah ta naa, o kon soosiwi won nae kɛrɛdɛ.
49005014	Kon la bwa bɔr aa chaah o ta la, o gbagba dɛ bagle o te. A waa ba yon ŋɔ, "He banɔ la haa sewa chɔ la, hé ir ásɛ Kristo chaah he nɛɛ" la.
49005015	Anomanta hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi he soga bini kɛrɛdɛ dɛ ɛ wejerema dɛ bɛ gɛn.
49005016	Wechɔga lole kɛrɛdɛ taraken. Anomanta hé takapɔ dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga taraken nɔ haa dɔ bɔr dɛ ɛa nɔ.
49005017	Hé gel he nfɛrɛ nyae la dɛ jemɛ waa Korowii aa dɛ nyin la kɛrɛdɛ.
49005018	He bɛ sen nyɔ kohona dɛɛ dɛɛ. Gɛ dɛ chɔg nɛn. Kɛ hé gel Korowii Domadɛɛge la so he nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ,
49005019	asɛ dɛ gel o wobol ne o yela do he bambile bini he bola dɛɛ tɛ dɔŋa, dɛɛ go yela aa dɛ bagle o waa la ne anɔ la aa dɛ kpɛɛro. Hé kpɔ silɛɛ dɛɛ kpɛɛ he Dɔɔ he bambile bwa ne,
49005020	dɛɛ yerɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo sɔn dɛɛ jam N Naa Korowii waa bwa ta.
49005021	Hé bwa ɛɛ no dɔŋa be ɔma haa dɛ ɔmɛ Yeesu Kristo la nomanta.
49005022	Haahna, hɛ́ɛ no he jaranar waa kɛŋɔ he Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo waa hɛɛ no la,
49005023	dɛkalkɛŋɔ baalee ɛ o haah nyu te kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo aa ɛ asɔre tena bwa nyu te la. Banee ɛ o bwadabi wɛɛ lɛɛ ba.
49005024	Anomanta a chɛ kɛ haahna ɛɛ no ba jaranar waa wobɛlbwa ta kɛŋɔ asɔre tena aa dɛ no Yeesu Kristo waa la.
49005025	Baala, hɛ́ɛ nyin he haahna kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ gɛ Yeesu Kristo aa dɛ nyin asɔre tena dɛ koh ba waa sewɛ la.
49005026	O sewɔ tɛɛ ba dɛ́ gel ba won ɛ o nɛra asɛ ba doŋa bwa won le ba nɛ, o waa baa noa ne Korowii nee baa sɔ ba nomanta.
49005027	O ɛ gɛ dɛ́ won kpɔ asɔre tena berɛ o handɛɛge, doŋa bɛlbwa aa wola toole o nɛ, waa wola kirihiah bɛlbwa dii, o bobɛlbwa aa wola jweremɛ, dɛ do wer ka tonɛ.
49005028	Gɛɛ chɛ kɛ baala gee nyin ba haahna kɛŋɔ gɛ baa dɛ nyin ba gbabir bwadabii la. Baa bɛlbwa waa dɔ haah dɛɛ nyinu gɛ la, o gbabirii wɛɛ nyin la.
49005029	Umee dɛ hah o gbabir ɔ? Nomɛlbwa dɛ nyiŋi o te kɛrɛdɛ dɛɛ nyiŋi o nyu gɛ Yeesu Kristo aa dɛ nyiŋi asɔre tena la.
49005030	Ya bwa ɛ o bwadabii la pera.
49005031	Ba chwerɔ ŋɔ, "Gɛ nomanta baa lɛɛ gel o nya ne o mɛɛ, asɛ o ne o haah ka pɛ, ba nɛra banɛ la ɛ nɛmbeŋkpoŋ."
49005032	A gɛ waa nɔ bini luŋri. N te be te, Yeesu Kristo ne asɔre tena waa ba bagle gɛ la.
49005033	Anomanta hé bɛlbwa takapɔ dɛ nyin o haah kɛŋɔ o gbagba, háah ge kpɔ duure dɛɛ tɛ o jaa.
49006001	Bechale, hɛ́ɛ no he nyare ne he mɛɛnanar wa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ anee wera tɛ heyaa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ teŋa ta.
49006002	Ba chwerɔ ŋɔ, "Duu he nya ne he mɛɛ," dɛ berɛ chwerɛ nyobaga bɛl waa ja o ta, o ɛ Korowii mmara waa tɔ sie bagɛ nyoa ja o ta.
49006003	Kenii o ŋɔ, "Dɛ he dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, Korowii ɛɛ nyiŋi heyaa, dɛ tɛ heyaa mkpajaŋ harɛ nɔ ta."
49006004	Mɛɛnanar, he bɛ he bii sibegra dɛɛ do asɛ ba baah nɛɛ di. Hé kpoŋ ba kɛrɛdɛ dɛɛ bag ba ŋwɛnɛre ne waa la bwa aa wera ya Dɔɔ be.
49006005	He banɔ la baa do heyaa bonɔɔna kɛɛ toli la, hɛ́ɛ no he dɔɔranar baa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta wa, dɛɛ duu ba, dɛ ta tea dɛɛ tom ba kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristoo hɛɛ tomɛ.
49006006	He bɛ sɔn waa koh dɛ kpɔ bokpega dɛɛ ɛ toma nɛra sie ta, kɛ hɛ́ɛ ɛ toma kɛrɛdɛ gɛ aa chɛ kɛ Yeesu Kristo bonɔndɛɛga ne toldɛɛga ɛɛ ɛ, dɛɛ ɛ toma he bambile bwa ne á su Korowii siwi.
49006007	Hé kpɔ silɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ toma. Nɛn laa hɛɛ tomɛ. He Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristoo hɛɛ tomɛ.
49006008	Onee dɛɛ ba nomɛlbwa kem bɔe o tondɛɛga bwa waa ɛa ta. Dɛ bonɔɔ kɛɛ toloo ba doe noo, dɛ he nyuu hɛɛ di oo, he bwa dɛ ba tondɛɛga haa ɛa kembɔr dɔe Yeesu Kristo be.
49006009	Dɔɔranar, hɛ́ɛ ɛ he bonɔɔna ne toli kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ gel ba fiiga. He jemɔ kɛŋɔ he ne ba bwa Dɔɔ lɔ beŋkpoŋ nyundua. Waa bane nyine dɛɛ gwaa bane.
49006010	Anɔ la aa kaa laanee kɛŋɔ hé gel he ne ya Dɔɔ pɛ ásɛ he won dɔ kpegri waa dɔa kohona la.
49006011	Bɔnsam dɔ baradeɛre kɛrɛdɛ ga. Anomanta hé kpɔ Korowii laa laala bwa do dɛ won yoo,
49006012	dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛn laa ya ne wɛɛ yo. Ya ne Bɔnsam toroma aa bea yaa wola an na a dɔ kpegri harɛ nɔ ta nɛra baa wola Korowii tomɛ dɛ do biro ta la nɛ, ne konchɔga bwa soosiwi aa wara kohona laanee dɛɛ yo la.
49006013	Anomanta a chɛ kɛŋɔ he kpɔ Korowii laa laala bwa dɛ do kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ konchɔga la baa ŋɔ a yo heya aa, he won che kiŋkiŋ dɛ yo ka tonɛ dɛ ta won che.
49006014	Kenii hɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ won che. Hé kpɔ kasinteŋ ɛ kriso, dɛ kpɔ waa aa togra ɛ laa batakaare,
49006015	dɛ kpɔ Amanesoma la aa dɛ bagle nyopɛo dɔe la do he nakpale,
49006016	asɛ dɛ kpɔ yarada tɔ he te gbemgbe dɛ́ won lɛ hɛma la Bɔnsam aa kpɔa su nii ta dɛɛ ta heyaa la bwa dɛɛ ta,
49006017	dɛ berɛ kpɔ lɛɛ Korowii aa lɛ heyaa la ɛ buni gbɛrɛ dɛ kpɔ pi, dɛ kpɔ o waa la aa ɛ o Domadɛɛge tokobii la kpoŋe.
49006018	Hɛ́ɛ soŋo harɛ bini soŋa nɔ bwa. Hé che Korowii Domadɛɛge la kpegri ta dɛ soŋo saŋ bɛlbwa. He bɛ dom dɛɛ chɔ. Hɛ́ɛ soŋe Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa dɛɛ tɛ o nɛra la bwa.
49006019	Hɛ́ɛ soŋo dɛɛ tɛ n ge, asɛ dɛ n dɛ ba waa bola aa, ń dɔ waa dɛɛ bol, dɛ dɔ bambile dɛ won pili o wesɔɔhla la dɛ le Amanesoma la bini.
49006020	Maa ɛ Yeesu nachige dɛɛ bol Amanesoma nɔ ba koh a waa do mɛ dea nɔ. Hɛ́ɛ soŋe Korowii asɛ n ta dɔ bambile dɛɛ bagla gɛ aa chɛ kɛ mɛɛ bagla.
49006021	Tichikos waa ɛ ya dɔŋ yaa nyinu kohona wɛɛ ɛ ya Dɔɔ toma kasinteŋ ne la, onee dɛ ba bagle n toma waa bwa ne gɛ maa doa.
49006022	A waa gela n tomɔ he be ásɛ o ba bol ya waa bagle heya, dɛ do heyaa gbemba la.
49006023	Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo tɛ he ne yabala la bwa deŋnesɔɔhna ne nɛnnyin ne yarada,
49006024	dɛ cha he banɔ la bwa haa dɛ nyin ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo bambile bwa ne aa wola jaga dɔe la.
50001001	Men Pɔɔl ne Timoti yaa ɛ Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔna la, yanee chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ Korowii nɛra he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pea he do Felepae la, ne he nomonome ne nɛra baa chɔ tomare nyoa la bwa.
50001002	Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
50001003	Saŋ bɛlbwa maa lii he waa la, n dɛ jam N Naa Korowii he wa,
50001004	dɛ yon kpɔ silɛɛ dɛ soŋo dɛɛ tɛ he bwa,
50001005	pɛɛ ya ne he bwa aa pɛa dɛɛ cha dɔŋa Amanesoma toma la ta le mumpar ba le fini la nomanta.
50001006	N dɔ hwɛga kɛŋɔ gɛ Korowii aa pa mun dɛɛ ɛ o tondɛɛga he bambile bini la, wɛɛ ja a taa ka tel awola Yeesu Kristo aa ba la.
50001007	A ŋwɛnɛ taa n dɔ he hwɛga gɛ la, dɛkalkɛ he bwa waa lɔ n bambile ta. Baa do mɛ dea la, ne yoi maa yoa lɛ Amanesoma la cheg dɛ bol kasinteŋ aa lɔ a ta dɛɛ bagle nɛra la, n ne he bwa nɛɛ Korowii sune dɛ cha yaa a ta.
50001008	Korowii jemɔ kɛŋɔ he pɛla lag mɛ taeh, nɛnnyin Yeesu Kristo aa kpɔa do n bambile ta la nomanta.
50001009	N dɛ soŋe Korowii kɛŋɔ o gel he dɔ nɛnnyin kɛrɛdɛ dɛɛ ja, dɛ berɛ dɔ wejema ne nfɛrɛ dɛ ja a ta,
50001010	ásɛ dɛ won jemɛ waa aa wera kohona. Anee dɛ gel he won do kaih, nomɛlbwa aa wola he wechɔga dɔe ba dɛ bol ka tel awola Yeesu Kristo aa ba la.
50001011	N dɛ soŋo kɛ he che Yeesu Kristo kpegri la ta dɛ won dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga kɛrɛdɛ, ásɛ nɛra ɛɛ tɛ Korowii sɔn ne jirima.
50001012	Yabala, n dɛ nyin kɛ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ wedɛɛga le waa aa chig n nɛɛ la ta, dɛ gel Amanesoma la won kaa sie.
50001013	Bonɔ koojen soojare baa dɛ daah o dem, ne nɛra baa lɔ bonɔ bwa jemɔ kɛŋɔ maa ɛ Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔ waa ba do mɛ dea.
50001014	Asɛ n dea chɔe la berɛ gel yabala galga gee yarada ya Dɔɔ Yeesu kohona, dɛ dɔ bambile dɛɛ bagle Korowii Waa la kɛrɛdɛ, baa wola ɔmɛ.
50001015	Kasinteŋ, bɔweela ne dɔŋa meera waa nɛra bane ɛɛ bol Amanesoma la, asɛ bane gee bola bambile bwa ne.
50001016	Ba te la, nɛnnyin waa baa ɛa, dɛkalkɛ ba jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowiirii kpɔ toma nɔ tɛ mɛ ŋɔ ń yo lɛ Amanesoma la cheg.
50001017	Banɔ la ge, ba gbagba sɔn nyina waa baa bol Yeesu Kristo wa, ba tepoŋ ne laa. Ba dɛ lii kɛŋɔ ba ɛ gɛ naa, baa wonoo gel n tea bini chɔg dɛ ja n dea chɔe nɔ ta.
50001018	Kɛ pɛɛpɛɛ. Dɛ liichɔga nee baa bola o, dɛ tepoŋ nee baa bola o, Yeesu Kristo waa baa bol la, n baah sɔɔh mɛ. Aa sɔɔh mɛɛ dɛɛ la,
50001019	dɛkalkɛŋɔ n jemɔ kɛ Korowii ɛɛ lɛɛ mɛɛ le waa aa chig n nɛɛ nɔ ta, he Korowii soŋa ne Yeesu Kristo Domadɛɛge la alaworomɛ.
50001020	Waa maa dɛ nyin n siwi swɛɛ a ta laanee kɛŋɔ n bɛ n toma ba ɛ kahonɛ sihiih ba kpo mɛ, asɛ n won dɔ bambile kɛrɛdɛ taraken kɛŋɔ n faa dɔ bambile la, asɛ Yeesu Kristo won dɔ jirima n we-ɛɛla bini. Dɛ ba gelɔ n so le noo, ba kpo mɛ noo, Yéesu Kristo dɔ jirima a bwa bini.
50001021	N soga nɔ maa soga nɔ, Yeesu Kristo waa n so. Dɛ n sewɔ ge aa, anee dɔ tɔnɔ tɛ mɛ kwara.
50001022	Kɛ dɛ n ta soge le naa, mɛɛ ba wonoo ɛ toma a won dɔ tɔnɔ kɛrɛdɛ. Anomanta, maa jemɛ onɔ la bwa waa wera n be ń kpɔ.
50001023	N chiŋchaŋo. N dɛ nyin kɛ n sewɛ dɛ ka so Yeesu Kristo be. A bɔ kohona kɛ maa soge bonɔ.
50001024	Kɛ he nomanta, a hiaoh kohona kɛ n do bonɔ dɛ́ won cha heya.
50001025	Anomanta, n jemɔ kɛŋɔ mɛɛ so he bee dɛ won cha he bwa he kpeg Yeesu Kristo waa la ta, dɛ dɔ silɛɛ he yarada ta,
50001026	asɛ dɛ n baa so he be ja aa, he won dɔ bɔr kɛrɛdɛ dɛɛ jaagi n wa, dɛɛ kpɛɛ Yeesu Kristo.
50001027	Waa aa hiaah laanee kɛŋɔ hé gel he we-ɛɛla bwa do wer gɛ aa chɛ kɛ nɛra baa no Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma la waa aa doa, asɛ dɛ n baa ba he be noo, n ta ba wone ba noo, ń no he waa kɛŋɔ he bwa liire ɛ beŋkpoŋ, he che kiŋkiŋ, he nyoa pɛ, he che tɛ Amanesoma la haa yaradaa la, a won la sie,
50001028	dɛ berɛ dɔ bambile haa wola he dɔma ɔmɛ tamaa bɛlbwa bwa. He bambile dɔe la taa bá che jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii gbagba ɛɛ lɛ heyaa dɛ chɔg ba.
50001029	Korowii gelɔ he won yarada Yeesu Kristo, dɛ berɛ won koh o waa na hɔhɔrɔwa. Wejenaa o ɛ tɛ heyaa he won koh o waa na hɔhɔrɔwa la.
50001030	He gba dɛ yo gɛ tenten he faa na mɛ mɛɛ yo la. Gɛ yoi laanee hɛɛ no kɛ n ta dɛ yo la.
50002001	Haa dɔ gbemba pɛɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la ta, o nyina gee larawe heyaa bwara, he dɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge ge wɛɛ cha heya, dɛ dɔ nɛnnyin he chal do dɔŋa nɛɛ nɔ,
50002002	amɔ hé ɛ waane dɛɛ ja ásɛ n sie lɛ kohona ka tonɛ. N dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ he bwa dɔ nyopɛo, asɛ he liire ne he dɔŋa nyina ne wobɛlbwa haa lii la bwa won ɛ beŋkpoŋ.
50002003	He bɛlbwa bɛ o gbo sɔn nyina kɛɛ jenu waa koh dɛɛ ɛ wa, kɛ hé pwɛr he te dɛɛ tɛ dɔŋa, dɛ kpɔ ba gwaa he gbagba.
50002004	He bɛ gel he gbo waa hiah heya. Hé gel he dɔŋa ge waa hiah heya.
50002005	Gɛ Yeesu Kristo aa doa la, gɛɛ a chɛ kɛ he do.
50002006	O do gɛ Korowii aa doa, kɛ o ta gelɛ gɛ su o siwi kɛ o ne Korowii ɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
50002007	O kpɔ o Korowii dor la bil, dɛ kpɔ o te kɛ somanji, dɛ do gɛ nɛwɛnyini aa doa.
50002008	Waa baa ɛ nɛwɛnyini la, o pwɛr o te dɛɛ no o Mɛɛ Korowii nyoa wobol, dɛ gel ba kpoo. Dagagre ta kwaraa ba kpoo.
50002009	A waa Korowii tɛo nomonome kɛrɛdɛ ga, dɛ berɛ tɛo sɔn gwaa sɔna tena bwa.
50002010	O sɔnjen la nomanta, nomɛlbwa ɛɛ guŋi o siee dɛ kpɔ duure dɛɛ tɛo. Banɔ la baa lɔ nyundua, ne banɔ la baa lɔ harɛ ta, ne banɔ la baa serewa bwa, ba bwa ɛɛ kpɔ duuree dɛɛ tɛo,
50002011	asɛ nomɛlbwa sɛh kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristoo nɛra bwa Dɔɔ, asɛ o Mɛɛ Korowii dɔ jirima.
50002012	Anomanta n dandɛɛga, gɛ haa dɛ no n waa dɛɛ teŋɛ a ta gɛ saŋ n faa lɔ he be la, a hiaoh kohona kɛŋɔ maa wola toole he be nɔ, hé ta kpoŋe gɛ. Korowii aa lɛ heyaa nɔ, hé kpɔ duure ne ɔmee dɛɛ teŋɛ toma haa dɛ tomɛ Korowii la ta,
50002013	dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii soge he bɛlbwa nɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ toma, dɛ gel he won sɛh dɛ won dɛɛ tomɔ kɛrɛdɛ gɛ aa su o siwi.
50002014	Wobɛlbwa haa dɛ ɛ la, he bɛ waa dɛɛ nagre, dɛ bɛ waa dɛɛ tɔŋle,
50002015	dɛkalkɛŋɔ a wer kɛŋɔ he ɛ Korowii bii nomɛlbwa aa wola he wechɔga dɔe dɛ bol, he tea to, he do kaih. Fini nɛra baa ɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra kɛrɛdɛ baa wola ŋwɛnɛ la ta kpɔ baahnee he do. Gɛ weweela aa dɛ chaah jwaana biro ta la, gɛɛ chɛ kɛ he do ba baah dɛɛ chaah.
50002016	Hé gel Korowii wa aa dɔ mkpa la do he bambile bini kɛrɛdɛ dɛɛ la, ń won hɛgre he waa Yeesu Kristo bala tɔpere la ta kɛŋɔ n ta koɛh ta pɛɛ.
50002017	Dɛ yarada haa dɛ yarada Korowii dɛɛ tomɔ la do kɛŋɔ saraha, asɛ a chɛ kɛ n chal fuge a ta naa, n dɛ nyin gɛ. A ba gɛ naa, n sie ɛɛ lɛo, asɛ he puu mɛ lɛ sie.
50002018	Gɛ tentenee a chɛ kɛŋɔ he ge sie lɛ, asɛ n pu heyaa lɛ sie.
50002019	Dɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu sɛoh waa, mɛɛ tomɛ Timoti he bee taraken ó ba na heya, dɛ ba bol he waa n be ásɛ n baah sɔɔh mɛ.
50002020	N ne o gboo dɔ liire beŋkpoŋ he wa. Anomanta, n jemɔ kɛ onee he waa do o bambile bini wɛɛ nyin he ne andɛɛga.
50002021	Dɛ o laa aa, bɛlbwa sese dɛ dawɛ o gbagba wa, waa Yeesu Kristo waa dawɛ.
50002022	He gba jemɛ gɛ o waa aa dɔ kasinteŋ dɛ do wer. N ne o pɛo wɛɛ cha mɛ Amanesoma toma la ta kɛŋɔ bechala ne o mɛɛ.
50002023	Anomanta, dɛ n baa na gɛ baa dɛ ba n chega aa, mɛɛ tomɔ he bee.
50002024	N dɔ hwɛga ya Dɔɔ nɛɛ kɛŋɔ aa bigri bɛlbwa asɛ n gbabir dɔ bɔr dɛ ba he be.
50002025	N liiro kɛŋɔ a hiaoh kɛ n tomɛ ya dɔŋ Epafrodaetɔs he be. N ne onee dɛɛ ɛ toma nɔ, dɛ yo dɛɛ tɛ Korowii. Onee he faa tomɛ n be o ba cha mɛ la. N gee berɔɔ tomɔ he be,
50002026	dɛkalkɛŋɔ, he pɛla lawɔ wɛɛ lii he bwa waa taeh. A dɛ hao kohona kɛŋɔ haa no o weela wa.
50002027	O fa we weela dɛ chɔ fɔgɛ taeh, dɛ fe ɛɛ ba sewa. Kɛ Korowiirii na o sum dɛ sune n ne o bwa nɛ. Dɛ o fe sewaa, n tea bini fe chɔgɔ dɛ ja n wahala ta.
50002028	Ate waa n siwi swɛɛ mɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ n tomɔ he be ásɛ he nao he sie lɛ, asɛ he waa bɛ men dɛɛ ha kohona.
50002029	Hé kpɔ silɛɛ dɛ lɛo, teŋa he ne o bwa aa dɛ teŋɛ ya Dɔɔ nɛɛ la nomanta. Hɛ́ɛ duu nɛra baa do kɛŋɔ on.
50002030	Yeesu Kristo toma waa o koh dɛ kpɔ o nyu charɛ seo. A ka jɛɛ ken o fee sewɛ. Waa haa wola won cha mɛ a ta, dɛ koh a waa tomɔ n be la taa o fe ɛɛ ba sewa.
50003001	Yabala, waa aa kaa laanee kɛŋɔ, hé gel he sie lɛ he ne ya Dɔɔ pɛɛ la ta. Wesiwi beŋkpoŋii n berɛ chwerɛ dɛɛ tɛ heyaa la, kɛ aa men ha. A dɛ ba gela he won che kiŋkiŋ.
50003002	Hɛ́ɛ do nɛnchɔga baa ɛ ba te manyare la dɛɛgɔ. Nɛra baa dɛ maŋkura penteŋ dɛ ŋɔ nómɛlbwa mɔn o bɔtɔn mɔɔ dɛ tomɛ Korowii la waa mɛɛ bol la.
50003003	Ya banɔ la yaa dɛ tomɛ Korowii o Domadɛɛge kpegri ta dɛɛ tɛ Yeesu Kristo sɔn, yaa wola bɔtɔn mɔna waa maŋkura la, yanee jemɛ penteŋ tenten la.
50003004	Dɛ bɔtɔn wa ɛɛ wonoo lɛ yaa aa, menee fe dɔ hwɛga kɛrɛdɛ. Dɛ nomɛlbwa ŋɔ a chegɛ o waa waa ɛa ta o dɔ hwɛga aa, menee dɔ hwɛga dɛ gwaa naate.
50003005	Israel tee men. Baa lol mɛ n dɔ yawanyoa la taa ba teŋe n pen. Benjamen deaa n le. Israel te kaiih men, dɛkalkɛ n mɛɛ ne n nya bwa ɛ Hibru tena. Dɛ ba dɛ bol Mmara ta teŋa wa aa, nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ Mmara ta kohona baa yer ba Farisii tena la bɛlee men.
50003006	Dɛ ba dɛ nyin nɛn o siwi faa swɛɛ a ta naa, menee, dɛkalkɛŋɔ n fa chegɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra la nɛɛ taeh. Dɛ ba berɔ dɛɛ nyin nɛndɛɛge Mmara la be pera ge aa, n waa bwa togrɔ.
50003007	Kɛ waa la bwa n faa lɔ a ta a ɛ tɔnɔ tɛ mɛ la, Yeesu Kristo nomanta, n dɛ liira wepuu.
50003008	Kasinteŋ, komɛlbwa ne wobɛlbwaa n vɛh dɛɛ yera wepuu dɛ́ won jemɛ n Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo. O jemaa hiaah gwaa komɛlbwa. N koh o waa dɛ gel wobɛlbwa ta, dɛɛ liira puldoa haahra, dɛɛ nyin n won dɔ Yeesu Kristo kɛrɛdɛ,
50003009	ásɛ ya bwa won pɛ, asɛ n ɛ nɛndɛɛge, n waa su Korowii siwi. N ta ŋɔe ŋɔ ń che Mmara ta teŋa ta dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge n waa su o siwi. Kɛ n dɛ nyin n che yarada maa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo la ta dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge n waa su o siwi. Nɛndɛɛge ɛɛ le Korowii be wɛɛ tɛ nɛra la bwa baa yarada Yeesu.
50003010	N waa bwaa kɛ ń won jemɛ Yeesu Kristo, dɛ won jemɛ kpegri la soo waa ira seo ta dɛ dɔ, dɛ na wahala waa naa la dɔŋa, dɛ kpɔ n te kɛ n sewɔ gɛ waa sewa la,
50003011	gɛ aa ɛ n won ir seo ta gɛ waa ira la.
50003012	N ta ŋɔe ŋɔ n denɔ won do kaih dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge dɛ ka tonɛ. Akai! N ta swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ nyin n won do gɛ bwa Yeesu Kristo aa lee mɛ ŋɔ ń do la.
50003013	Yabala, maa lii kɛŋɔ n tonɛ wobɛlbwa. Webeŋkpoŋii hiah mɛ. N gel waa aa lɔ habɔɔ, dɛ takapɔ dɛɛ la sie dɛ́ won ka dɔ anɔ la aa lɔ sie la,
50003014	dɛ swɛɛ siwi dɛ́ won tel a jaga dɛ won dɔ kembɔr. Korowiirii yer mɛ ŋɔ ń ba dɛ ba do o be, Yeesu Kristo nomanta. A waa n swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ nyin n won dɔ kembɔr la la.
50003015	A wer kɛŋɔ ya banɔ la bwa yaa kpega Korowii waa la ta la dɔ gɛ liire. Dɛ he bane ge liire korɔ waa nɔ ane ta naa, Korowii ɛɛ geloo a bini chaah tɛ heya.
50003016	Kɛ gɛ bwa yaa wona dɛ jemɛ la, yá kpoŋe a bini dɛɛ la.
50003017	Yabala, hé kpɔ n da, dɛɛ nyiŋi nɛra ge baa dɛ teŋɛ gɛ yaa dɛ teŋɛ la,
50003018	dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛra warɔ baa wola gɛ ŋwɛnɛ la ta teŋɛ. N fa bagle ba waa he be kera aŋwɛnɛ bwa, dɛ berɛ dɛɛ bagle heyaa taraken sinii ne ŋɔ ba ɛ Yeesu Kristo seo waa sewa dagagre la ta la waa dɔm.
50003019	Ŋwɛnɛ gɛ nɛra nɔ aa kpɔ o ta la dɛ kaa ba ne seo ta. Ba kpɔ tea ne bwadabii waa gwaa Korowii. Waa aa ɛ sihihwaa la, a nee baa ta nyoa. Ba liire bwa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta kwaa ta.
50003020	Kɛ harɛ nɔ ta ta ya bwɛɛ ɛɛ. Ya bwɛɛ lɔ nyundua. Yaa lɔ bonɔ nɔ, ya siwii swɛɛrɔ yaa kpa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo waa ɛ ya Lɛɛ la ó le bela ba.
50003021	Dɛ o balaa, wɛɛ begre ya bwadabisale aa won pɔeh nɔɔ a do wer kɛŋɔ o gbagba bwadabii aa do wer kohona gɛ la. O kpegri taa wɛɛ ba gɛ ɛɛ. O dɔ kpegri kɛŋɔ o won gel komɛlbwa no o be.
50004001	Yabala haa ɛ n nɛnnyina, he pɛla lag mɛ. He bee n silɛɛ do, he waa baa ba men tɔɔ dawa. Anomanta n dandɛɛga, hé che kiŋkiŋ pɛɛ ya ne ya Dɔɔ aa pɛa la ta.
50004002	N dɛ soŋe Yoodia ne Sentiki kɛŋɔ ba kwaa ba baah dɛ ɛ beŋkpoŋ pɛɛ ya ne ya Dɔɔ aa pɛa la ta.
50004003	N dɔŋdɛɛge, n dɛ soŋe, cha haahna la dɛ kwaa ba baah, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba cha mɛ Amanesoma nɔ bola ta ga. Klɛment ne n bala tom-ɛɛra la ge jao. Ba sɔna lɔ Korowii Mkpa Tɔn bini.
50004004	Hé che pɛɛ he ne ya Dɔɔ aa pɛa la ta dɛ gel he sie lɛ. Kasinteŋ, hé gel he sie lɛ.
50004005	Hé gel nomɛlbwa jemɛ he waa kɛ he pwɛre. Ya Dɔɔ bala la pu yaa tonɛ.
50004006	He bɛ gel wobɛlbwa ha heya, kɛ hé kpɔ wobɛlbwa dɛɛ do Korowii nɔn ta dɛɛ soŋo waa aa hiah heya, dɛɛ jaamo kɛ waa dɛ no he wesoŋa.
50004007	Belaa ó ge tɛ heyaa o bambisɔn waa gwaa bambisɔn te bwa nɛwɛnyini be á cha heya, dɛ gel he bambile ne liire chɔ bobeŋkpoŋ pɛɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la nomanta.
50004008	Too, yabala, anɔ la aa kaa laanee nɔ: Hé gel he liire do wedɛɛga ta. Wobɛlbwa aa ɛ kasinteŋ, ne anɔ la aa dɔ jirima, ne anɔ la aa togra, ne anɔ la aa do kaih, ne waa aa wera, ne anɔ la aa dɔ pɛla, wobɛlbwa aa ɛ wedɛɛga dɛ chɛ kpɛɛra la, hé gel he liire do a ta.
50004009	Wobɛlbwa haa hwela dɛ dɔ le n be, kɛɛ dɛ no dɛ na mɛɛ ɛ la, hé gee ɛ gɛ ásɛ Korowii waa dɛ tɛ nɛra bambisɔn la ja he nɛ.
50004010	N sie lɛo kohona pɛɛ ya ne ya Dɔɔ aa pɛa nɔ ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he berɔ kwaa dɛɛ do n liire dɛ cha mɛ taraken. He fa cha mɛ ka. A ta ɛɛ kɛŋɔ haa berɛ dɛɛ lii n waa kpa. Kɛ bɔree he faa wola dɔe dɛ nyiŋ mɛ.
50004011	N ta ŋɔe ŋɔ n nyao. Akai. N wono hweli wobɛlbwa maa lɔ a ta n soga bini a man mɛ, n sie lɛ a ta.
50004012	Dɛ n nyao waa, n jemɛ gɛ maa so. N berɔ dɔ ge aa, n jemɛ a ge gba soga. N hweli wobɛlbwa a man mɛ. Kondikwaa lole n di dɛ vagoo, kondikwaa toole n chɔ lɔr oo, n dɔɔ kohona kɛɛ nyae n nya oo, n won a bɛlbwa kpoŋa.
50004013	N won Yeesu Kristo waa dɛ cha mɛ la kpegri ta chega dɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa.
50004014	Kɛ haa kpɔ n waa berɛ he bwa wa, dɛ cha mɛ n wahala ta la, he ɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
50004015	He gba jemɔ kɛŋɔ gɛ saŋ maa ba he be Makidoonia harɛ logle la dɛ bol Amanesoma la dɛɛ tɛ heyaa asɛ dɛ kpɔ bela dɛɛ kaa la, asɔre tena baa lɔ bwɛɛre la ta la bɛlbwa ta men chae. He Felepae tena gboo koh toma maa ɛa he bini la waa dɛ cha mɛ suuga ne.
50004016	Hale n faa lɔ Tɛsalonika la, he fa wono ha mɛ kwaa aa hiah mɛ. Kerabeŋkpoŋ kwara laa.
50004017	Kasinteŋ, a ta ɛɛ kɛŋɔ komɛlee mɛɛ nyin he be, kɛ he tɔnɔ haa dɔ dɛ le chae haa cha mɛ la binii mɛɛ nyiŋi.
50004018	N dɔ komɛlbwa maa dɛ nyin la bwa ka garɛ. N dɔ he haala haa ha mɛ la le Epafrodaetɔs be. He haala la ɛ sarahadɛɛge dɛ tɛ Korowii dɛɛ su o siwi.
50004019	N Naa Korowii ɛɛ cha heyaa komɛlbwa haa nyaa la taa dɛ le o kondɔɔh tenten la ta pɛɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la nomanta.
50004020	Hɛ́ɛ tɛ N Naa Korowii jirima saŋ bɛlbwa. Aamen.
50004021	Too, he banɔ la bwa he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa he ɛ Korowii nɛra la, n dɛ na heya. He bala baa lɔ n be bonɔ la dɛ na heya.
50004022	Korowii nɛra la bwa dɛ na heya. Banɔ la baa lɔ Room koodem laanee dena dɛɛ na heyaa kohona.
50004023	Yá Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya.
51001001	Men Yeesu Kristo torome Pɔɔl ne ya dɔŋ Timotii chwerɛ tɔn nɔ. Korowii tetooraa o tɛ mɛ toma nɔ.
51001002	Ya chwerɔ dɛɛ tɛ yabala haa lɔ Kolose dɛ ɛ Korowii nɛra, asɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo pɛ, hɛɛ teŋɛ o nɛɛ kasinteŋ ne la. Ń Naa Korowii cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
51001003	Ya dɛ jam ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo Mɛɛ Korowii he waa ya wesoŋa bini saŋ bɛlbwa,
51001004	dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya noɔ kɛŋɔ he dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo kɛrɛdɛ dɛ kpɔ he te tɛo, dɛɛ nyin Korowii nɛra bwa ge.
51001005	Amanesoma aa ɛ kasinteŋ la aa ba he be logla la, he no hwɛga aa dɛ tɛ la wa. He yarada ne nɛnnyin la le kwaa haa dɛ hwɛgɛ a ta la ta. Korowii ge kwaa a bwa cheg heyaa Korowii doa kɛrɛdɛ ken.
51001006	Amanesoma la perɔ, nɛra ɛɛ noa bobɛlbwa, aa ba hɛɛra ne. Gɛ tentenee aa ba hɛɛra ne he be dɛ le awola haa noa Korowii pili he sie he jemɛ suna waa sune he nɛɛ dɛ cha heyaa la.
51001007	Epafras bee he no Amanesoma la. Ya ne o bwaa pɛa dɛɛ ɛ toma nɔ. O ɛ Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔ o wa aa dɔ kasinteŋ yaa nyinu kɛrɛdɛ. Ya naa taa o che dɛɛ cha heya.
51001008	O bol ya be gɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge aa cha heyaa asɛ hɛɛ nyin dɔŋa.
51001009	Anomanta ya le awola yaa no he waa dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ heyaa kɛŋɔ ó Domadɛɛge bagle heyaa o wobɛlbwa kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ berɛ dɛɛ pili he sie hé won jemɛ wobɛlbwa aa ɛ Korowii tetoora la,
51001010	dɛ won do gɛ aa chɛ kɛ ya Dɔɔ torome do, he wobɛlbwa won su o siwi, he won dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga bwa soosiwi, dɛ won jemɛ Korowii kohona,
51001011	dɛ won dɔ kpegri kɛrɛdɛ dɛ le o gbagba kpegri waa do kan dɛ dɔ jirima kɛrɛdɛ la ta. N dɛ soŋe Korowii o cha heyaa gɛ hé won lawɛ bambile wobɛlbwa ta,
51001012	dɛ won kpɔ silɛɛ dɛɛ jaamo waa ɛ ya Mɛɛ la. Onee gela ya chɛ kɛ ya ne o nɛra bwa won dɔ kondɛɛga waa dɔa tɛ o bii baa ja o Kora waa ɛ Bochaah Kora la ta.
51001013	O lɛ yaa le biro ta dɛ kpɔ yaa ka ja o Bie waa dɛ nyinu la Kora ta.
51001014	O Bie laanee lɛ yaa le Bɔnsam nɔn ta dɛ kpɔ ya wechɔga ge kɛ yaa la.
51001015	Yaa won Korowii na. Kɛ gɛ Korowii aa doa la, gɛɛ o Bie ge do. O Bie la lole mɔɔ o ta komɛlbwa.
51001016	O Bie la nɛɛ o che dɛ ta komɛlbwa waa lɔ harɛ ta ne komɛlbwa waa lɔ nyundua, anɔ la yaa dɛ naa ne anɔ la yaa wola an na kɛŋɔ nyundua toroma ne konchɔga aa dɛ di kpegri bwa soosiwi. O Bie la nɛɛ o che dɛ taa, asɛ a do le tɛo.
51001017	Gɛ saŋ a bɛlbwa faa wola toole la, dɛ o te lole. Onee lawɛ komɛlbwa kpoŋe, a ta do le ba le fini nɔ la.
51001018	Onee asɔre tena bwa nyu, ba gee o bwadabi. Onee tɔ sie komɛlbwa nɛ, dɛ tɔ sie ir seo ta nomɛlbwa nɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ on chɛ kɛ o ɛ nomoa komɛlbwa nɛ.
51001019	Korowii tetooraa o Bie Yeesu ɛ o gbagba.
51001020	O ɛ gɛ dɛ́ che o Bie la nɛɛ dɛ kwaa o ne kwaa aa lɔ nyundua ne harɛ bwa baah. O gelɔ o Bie sewɛ dagagre la ta o chal kwaa wobɛlbwa.
51001021	He faa Korowii jemɛ dɛ ɛ o dɔma, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he fa dɛ lii liichɔga, dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga.
51001022	Kɛ name Yeesu Kristo aa baa ɛ nɛn dɛ sewɛ la, Korowii chegɛ o seo la ta dɛ kwaa he ne o baah, dɛ gel he won do kaih doŋa bɛlbwa aa wola toole he nɛ, nomɛlbwa aa wola he waa dɔe ba dɛ bol awola haa ba che Korowii sie la.
51001023	Dɛ he ta kpoŋe waa haa dɛ yaradaa la bini, he ta habɔɔ leɛ, dɛ dɔ hwɛga le Amanesoma la baa bola bagle heyaa he no la ta kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa aa won chɔg he liire he bɛ dɛɛ hwɛgɛ kpa aa, amɔ hɛɛ wonoo che o sie. Ba dɛ bol Amanesoma nɔ bobɛlbwa. N gbabir dɛ bola, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowiirii lee me.
51001024	Taraken a do n som kɛ maa lɛ he wahala dɛɛ na. Wahala lole ń che Yeesu Kristo naa ta dɛ na tɛ asɔre tena baa ɛ o bwadabii la. Anomanta a do n som kɛ maa dɛ ba wona na wahala aa kaa la ane ásɛ a won tonɛ.
51001025	N ɛ toma dɛɛ tɛ o asɔre tena. Korowiirii koh he chae waa dɛ tɛ mɛ a gɛ toma nɔ, dɛ ŋɔ mɛ́ɛ bagle o waa la bwa nɛ́ra bwa no.
51001026	Korowii waa la fa sɔɔh saŋ la bwa, nɛra ta a mun jemɛ. Kɛ taraken te, o pili a bwa bini dɛ tɛ o nɛra,
51001027	bá na dɛ jemɛ gɛ waa dɛ nyin kɛ o ɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la baah. O waa waa pili o bini la ɛ wedɛɛga aa ɛ wejena dɛɛ kpo nyoa. Anee kɛ Yeesu Kristo Doma soge he nɛ, he dɔ hwɛga o be kɛ tɔpebɛl hɛɛ dɔ jirima o bee.
51001028	Ya waa yaa dɛ bagle bwaa Yeesu Kristo la. Ya dɛ ja nomɛlbwa, dɛɛ bagle nɛra bwa wejema bwa ne ásɛ dɛ ba won kpɔ bɛlbwa ba Korowii be kɛ ba kpeg Yeesu Kristo waa ta, pɛɛ ba ne waa pɛa la nomanta.
51001029	A waa gela n swɛɛ siwi dɛ takapɔ dɛɛ ɛ toma la. Yeesu Kristoo tɛ mɛ kpegri ga n won dɛɛ ɛ gɛ toma la.
51002001	N dɛ nyin he jemɛ gɛ n siwi aa swɛɛra mɛɛ koh n te he ne Laodisia tena ne nɛra baa wola men jemɛ la wa,
51002002	dɛ́ do he bwa gbemba he won nyin dɔŋa dɛ ɛ beŋkpoŋ, dɛ won jemɛ Korowii wesɔɔhla waa pili a bini tɛ heyaa la kɛrɛdɛ, he bɛ aahna-aahna tamaa bɛlbwa ɛ, dɛ dɔ tɔnɔ le o waa la bini kɛrɛdɛ. O waa laanee Yeesu Kristo.
51002003	Korowii wejema aa wola jaga dɔe la bwa lɔ Yeesu Kristo be. O nɛɛ ya che dɛ dɔ gɛ wejema nɔ.
51002004	N dɛ bagle heyaa asɛ nomɛlbwa bɛ won kpɔ nyotor negre heya.
51002005	N toole he be, kɛ n liire te lɔ he be. Anomanta a do n som kɛ he bwa aa pɛa, asɛ dɛ lawɛ yaradae haa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo la bini kpoŋe kiŋkiŋ la.
51002006	Haa dɔa kpɔ he te tɛ Yeesu Kristo kɛ he Dɔɔ nɔ, hé ne o pɛ wobɛlbwa ta.
51002007	A taa aa ba chega he won che kiŋkiŋ dɛ kpeg o waa la ta, dɛ won yarada o waa bwa kɛrɛdɛ gɛ baa bagle heyaa la, dɛɛ jam Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa.
51002008	Webagla ane lole bane ɛɛ bagle dɛɛ yera wejema. Hé nyiŋa kɛrɛdɛ. A ɛ nyosone kɛɛ wepuu, ba kpɔ dɛɛ negre nɛra. Nɛwɛnyini nawee waa, ne koŋkwaa aa dɛ di kpegri harɛ nɔ ta wejema waa baa bagle la. Yeesu Kristo be laa a le.
51002009	Yeesu Kristo ɛ Korowii gbagba. O ba harɛ nɔ ta dɛ ba berɛ nɛwɛnyini.
51002010	He ne waa pɛa la, he dɔ komɛlbwa. Onee dɔ sɔn waa gwaa kwaa yaa wola an na bwa soosiwi sɔn.
51002011	He ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la, o teŋe he dobene la ta. O ge penteŋaa la. He te teŋa nɔ ta gɛ nɛwɛnyini aa dɛ teŋe la ɛɛ.
51002012	Korowii nee ba faa sɔ heyaa la, anee bagla kɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo bwaa ba pɛ huge. Asɛ a berɛ che yarada haa dɛ yarada Korowii ne kpegri waa kpɔa ir Yeesu seo ta la ta he ne o bwa pɛ ir dɛ dɔ mkpa.
51002013	He wechɔga ne he dobene Korowii faa wola teŋe ta la gelɔ he fa do kɛŋɔ he serewɔ. Kɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la, Korowii kpɔ he bwa wechɔga kɛ heya, dɛ tɛ he bwa mkpafale.
51002014	Teŋa haa ŋɔa ŋɔ hɛɛ teŋɛ o Mmara taa dɛ berɛ horɛ a bar heyaa la, a bwa taa o le heya. Waa a waa pɛɛ kpa. Korowii kpaa a bwa pɛl Yeesu dagagre la ta a tonɛ.
51002015	Yeesu seo waa sewa la, o chɔg kwaa aa dɔ kpegri bwa kpegri, dɛ lɛ a kpegri dɔɔh. O ɛ gɛ dɛ gel sihiih kpoa nɛra bwa siwi ta, bá jemɛ kɛŋɔ o gelɔ koŋkpega la bwa kpegri ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ.
51002016	Anomanta dɛ nomɛlbwa dɛ pwah heyaa kwaa ane haa dɛ di, ne kwaa haa dɛ nyɔ, ne he tɔpejena dii benanyoa ne korobie ne yawanyoa yawanyoa ta naa, he bɛ on dawɛ.
51002017	A gɛ waa nɔ fa tɔ sie chig dɛɛ bagle waa aa dɛ ba ɛɛ kerekere la kɛŋɔ nɛn lileo aa tɔ o sie, waa wola o gbagba ɛɛ la. Yeesu Kristo waa la aa bala la, anee waa la tenten.
51002018	Dɛ nomɛlbwa dɛ pwah heyaa ŋɔ haa gɛ waa teŋe nyosone ŋɔ pwɛraa wɛɛ pwɛr o te dɛɛ tomɛ nyundua toroma la ta teŋaa, he bɛ on dawɛ. Gɛ nɛn nɔ dɛ maŋkura o te kɛŋɔ o dɛ na waa deera ta, dɛɛ yerɛ o te nɛnjen, kɛ pɛɛpɛɛ. Nɛwɛnyini liire taa wɛɛ teŋɛ,
51002019	dɛ vɛh o te kpɔe dɛ do Yeesu Kristo lɔga. Onee ya nyu, asɛ ya ɛ o bwadabii dɛɛ dɔ bokpega o be, bɛlbwa lawɛ o dɔŋ kpoŋe kɛrɛdɛ ya ne o ɛ beŋkpoŋ, dɛ che pɛɛ yaa pɛa la ta dɛ gel yaa kpeg gɛ Korowii aa dɛ nyin.
51002020	He ne Yeesu Kristo pɛo dɛ sewɛ, anomanta he ne koŋkwaa aa dɛ di kpegri harɛ nɔ ta toole wobɛlbwa bini kpa. Aah bɔkwa waa he ta kpɔ he te dɛɛ do harɛ nɔ ta kii ta dɛ gel a vɔrɔwe heyaa ŋɔ,
51002021	"He bɛ onɔ lawɛ, dɛ bɛ onɔ dagɛ, dɛ bɛ onɔ lege" nɔɔ?
51002022	Gɛ kwaa nɔ ɛ kwaa dɛ he ɛa aa, dɛ a waa tonɔ. Nɛwɛnyini kii ne ba nawee waa a te.
51002023	Kpela, nɛra ɛɛ dɛɛ duu nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ gɛ waa nɔ ta la kɛ ba ɛ wejerema, dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ ba Korowii toma aa swɛɛ ba siwi kohona waa baa pwɛr ba te dɛɛ ha ba bwadabii la. Kɛ a bwa ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ. Aa won gel nomɛlbwa lawɛ o te dɛ gel wechɔga ɛɛ.
51003001	Dɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo bwaa pɛa ir seo ta te naa, amɔ te hé swɛɛ siwi dɛ gel he bambile che kwaa aa lɔ nyundua la ta. Belaa Yeesu do dɛ so nomombɔr Korowii dig ta la.
51003002	Hé gel he liire bwa do kwaa aa lɔ nyundua la ta, dɛ gel kwaa aa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta,
51003003	dɛkalkɛŋɔ he do kɛŋɔ nɛra baa serewa a bɔr, he toole a ta kpa. He mkpa lɔ Yeesu Kristo be, o ge do Korowii be.
51003004	Awola Yeesu Kristo he mkpa aa lɔ o be aa ba harɛ ta la, he ne o bwa ɛɛ pɛo dɛ ba gɛ saŋ, dɛ ba dɔ jirima o bala la ta.
51003005	Anomanta hé gel he harɛ nɔ ta dor bwa ta kwaraa. He bɛ he bwadabii kpɔ do jwamane, ne wedoŋa, ne kayɛglɛ, ne pɛlchɔga, nɛ kwaa ta sibegra ta. Kwaa ta sibegra do kɛŋɔ voga toma ken.
51003006	A gɛ waa nɔ, Korowii bwaawee dɛ ir a ta taeh. Wɛɛ kpɔ wahalaa ta nɛra baa dɛ ɛ deŋnekpeg dɛɛ ɛ gɛ la nɛ.
51003007	He ne ba bwaa fa lɔ a ta dɛɛ ɛ.
51003008	Kɛ a chɛ kɛŋɔ he gel a bwa sekwaraa taraken te. Hé laa bandia kpɔ he waa ta, he baah bɛ dɛɛ di sagasaga, hé gel meesɔhwa, he bɛ dɔŋa dɛɛ chɛgre, he bɛ gel wobochɔga ɛɛ le he nyoo.
51003009	He bɛ nyosone teŋe dɛɛ tɛ dɔŋa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he laa he dabene la ne o we-ɛɛla la bwa kpɔ he nɛ,
51003010	dɛ charɛ dafale. Korowiirii gela he do gɛ la. Onee dɛɛ kwaa he dafale la saŋ bɛlbwa ásɛ he do kɛrɛdɛ gɛ waa doa la, dɛ́ won jemɔ kɛrɛdɛ ka tonɛ.
51003011	Anomanta nɛra Korowii aa gela ba do gɛ dofale nɔ la, ba ta dɔe kɛ ba pegri dɔŋa bini kpa kɛŋɔ onɔ ɛ Juda te kɛɛ onɔ nɔ ta Juda te ɛɛ nɔ. Nɛra bini pegra toole kpa, kɛŋɔ onɔ teŋe o pen, kɛɛ onɔ nɔ ta o pen teŋe nɔ. Hɔɔh kɛɛ daamun te kɛɛ yom kɛɛ nɛn waa dɔ o te toole kpa, ba bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ. Yeesu Kristo gbo waa hiah o nɛra.
51003012	Heyaa Korowii bidɛɛga waa le heyaa tɛ o te, dɛ laa he doŋa bwa kpɔ he nɛ, dɛɛ nyin heyaa kɛrɛdɛ. Anomanta hé kpoŋe dadɛɛge dɛɛ sune dɔŋa nɛ, dɛ ta tea dɛɛ tɛ dɔŋa, dɛɛ pwɛr he te, dɛɛ tɛ nɛra sie, dɛ dɔ bambile tɛɛ ba.
51003013	Dɛ he bini bɛlbwa ne o dɔŋ dɔ waa aa, ó lawɛ bambile dɛ kpɔ kɛo. Gɛ Korowii aa kpɔ he wechɔga kɛ heyaa la, gɛɛ chɛ kɛ he ge kpɔ dɔŋa kwaa dɛɛ kɛ ba.
51003014	Anɔ nɔ habɔɔ, hɛ́ɛ nyin nɛn. Nɛnnyinii dɛ won gel he dɔ nyopɛo dɛ ɛ anɔ bwa kɛrɛdɛ ka tonɛ.
51003015	Hé gel nyopɛo waa aa le Yeesu Kristo be la do he bambile bini wobɛlbwa ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowiirii yerɛ heyaa ŋɔ hé bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ dɛ dɔ nyopɛo. Hé gel he sie ɛɛ su waa waa ɛa tɛ heya, hɛɛ jaamo.
51003016	Hé gel Yeesu Kristo waa la do he bambile bini kɛrɛdɛ hɛɛ bagle dɔŋa, dɛɛ bag ba wejema bwa ne, dɛ go wesoŋa yela ne kpɛɛra yela dɛɛ jam Korowii he bambile bwa.
51003017	Wobɛlbwa haa dɛ ɛ ne anɔ la bwa haa dɛ bol la, hɛ́ɛ ɛa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu sɔn ta, dɛ che o nɛɛ dɛɛ jam o Mɛɛ Korowii.
51003018	Haahna, hɛ́ɛ no he jaranar wa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛɛ a chɛ kɛŋɔ nɛra ba ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu aa pɛa ɛɛ ɛ.
51003019	He baala ge, hɛ́ɛ nyin he haahna kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ ban dɛɛ panya.
51003020	Bechale, hɛ́ɛ no he nyare ne he mɛɛnanar waa saŋ bɛlbwa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛɛ dɛɛ lɛ Korowii sie.
51003021	Mɛɛnanar, he bɛ hɛ bii dɛɛ do bandia ne, asɛ ba bambile bɛ chɔg.
51003022	Bonɔɔna ne toli ge, hɛ́ɛ no nɛra haa dɛ tom ba harɛ nɔ ta la waa saŋ bɛlbwa. He bɛ ba sie bɔr na mɔɔ dɛɛ tom ba dɛɛ nyin baa kpɛɛ heya. Hé ta tea dɛɛ tom ba ɔma haa dɛ ɔmɛ he Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nomanta.
51003023	Wobɛlbwa haa dɛɛ ɛ la, hɛ́ɛ ɛa bambile bwa ne kɛŋɔ he Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristoo he ɛ dɛɛ tɛ. Nɛn laa he ɛ dɛɛ tɛ.
51003024	He Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristoo he ɛ dɛɛ tɛ. He jemɔ kɛŋɔ o bee hɛɛ ba kembɔr waa kpɔa cheg o nɛra la dɔe.
51003025	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ wechɔga la, wɛɛ dɔ o wechɔga kembɔree. Korowii aa bane siwii nyiŋi gwaa bane.
51004001	He banɔ la haa dɔ bonɔɔna ne toli la, hɛ́ɛ ɛɛ ba waa aa togra dɛ do wer, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he gba lɔ nomɛl lɔga, o do Korowii doa.
51004002	Hé swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ soŋe Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa, dɛ gel he sie ge do a ta. Hé gel he siwi su waa waa ɛa tɛ heyaa hɛɛ jaamo.
51004003	Hé soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ ya gba, ásɛ o tɛ yaa ŋwɛnɛ ya won bol o Waa dɛ bagle o wesɔɔhla aa ɛ Yeesu Kristo waa la. A waa ba koh do mɛ dea nɔ.
51004004	Hɛ́ɛ soŋo n won dɛɛ bola kɛrɛdɛ gɛ aa chɛ kɛŋɔ n bol a bwa á bini chaah la.
51004005	Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ jemɛ gɛ aa chɛ kɛŋɔ hɛɛ ɛ nɛra baa wola asɔre tena ɛɛ la, asɛ dɛ he dɔ ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa naa, hé che o ta dɛ won dɔɔ ba tɛ Korowii.
51004006	Hé gel he wobol do som dɛɛ lɛ sie saŋ bɛlbwa, dɛ ba pɛɛ heyaa wobɛlbwa naa, hé won jemɛ gɛ aa chɛ kɛ he bol.
51004007	Yɔɔ, ya dɔŋ Tichikos yaa dɛ nyinu o waa dɔ kasinteŋ, wɛɛ cha yaa, ya ne o bwa ɛɛ ɛ ya Dɔɔ toma nɔ la, wɛɛ ba bagle n waa bwa he bee.
51004008	A waa mɛɛ tomɔ he be ó ba bol ya waa bwa ásɛ he baah sɔɔh heyaa la.
51004009	O ne ya dɔŋ Onisemɔs o wa aa dɔ kasinteŋ yaa nyinu la bwaa mɛɛ tomɛ, ásɛ ba ba bol waa aa dɛ chig bonɔ bwa he be. Onisemɔs te ɛ he bwɛɛ te.
51004010	Aristakus baa do n ne on dea la ne Banabas nime Maak dɛ na heya. A gɛ Maak nɔ waa n faa bol he be la. O ba he be naa, hé lɛo silɛɛ ne.
51004011	Jeses baa bera dɛɛ yerɔ Jastos la ge dɛ na heya. Juda tena baa yarada Yeesu la bini, nɛra batoro nɔ gboo dɛɛ cha mɛ, n ne baa ɛ Korowii Kora la toma. Ba dɛ cha mɛ taeh.
51004012	Epafras waa ɛ he bwɛɛ te la dɛ na heya. O dɛ ɛ Yeesu Kristo toma, dɛ soŋe Korowii kɛrɛdɛ ga dɛɛ tɛ heyaa saŋ bɛlbwa ásɛ o gel he won che kiŋkiŋ dɛ jemɛ o waa kɛrɛdɛ ka tonɛ, asɛ Yeesu Kristo waa bɛ heyaa aahna-aahna ɛ, he won ɛ Korowii tetoowaa bwa.
51004013	N gbabir na gɛ Epafras aa dɛ tomɛ he ne banɔ la baa lɔ Laodisia ne Heɛrapɔles la kohona.
51004014	Tɛɛga te Luk ya bwa aa dɛ nyinu la ne Demas ge dɛ na heya.
51004015	Hé ŋɔ yabala baa lɔ Laodisia la ne Nimfa ne asɔre tena baa dɛ cheme Nimfa dem la be ŋɔ n dɛ na ba.
51004016	Dɛ he baa kure tɔn nɔ tonaa, hé gel ba ka kuro bagle asɔre tena baa lɔ Laodisia la. Tɔn maa tɛ ba ge la, hé lɛ dɛ ka kure.
51004017	Hé ŋɔ Akipus be ŋɔ ó do sie dɛ ɛ toma ya Dɔɔ Yeesu aa kpɔa tɛo la bwa kɛrɛdɛ ken.
51004018	N gbagbaa chwerɛ bonɔ la, n dɛ na heya. Hɛ́ɛ lii n waa kɛ n ta chɔ dea, dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ mɛ. Kórowii cha heya.
52001001	Men Pɔɔl ne Silas ne Timotii chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ he nɛra haa ɛ asɔre tena dɛ do Tɛsalonika dɛɛ tomɛ N Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo la. Kórowii cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
52001002	Ya dɛ jam Korowii tɔpere bɛlbwa dɛ yon dɛɛ yerɛ he sɔna ya Korowii soŋa bini.
52001003	Gɛɛ tɔpere bɛlbwa ge yaa bol N Naa Korowii waa bera ɛ ya Mɛɛ la be he yarada haa yaradao dɛ won kpɔ dɛɛ ɛ o toma, ne he nyina haa dɛ nyinu dɛ gel he sie begre o toma ta, ne hwɛga haa dɔa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo be dɛ won dɛɛ lawɛ bambile wobɛlbwa ta la.
52001004	Yabala, ya jemɔ kɛ Korowii dɛ nyin heya, dɛ le heyaa ŋɔ hé ba ɛ o bii,
52001005	dɛkalkɛŋɔ Amanesoma la yaa bagle heyaa la, wobol gbo ta laa a che dɛ ba he be. Awola haa no waa la la, Korowii kpegri la ne o Domadɛɛge la gelɔ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ a ɛ kpela. He jemɛ gɛ yaa koh he waa dɛ kpoŋe ya te gɛ saŋ ya ne haa soga la.
52001006	Hé nyiŋi yaa dɛ kpɔ ya ne ya Dɔɔ da la. Haa no Korowii Waa la dɛ yaradaa la, he na wahala ga, kɛ he wono lɛ Korowii Waa la silɛɛ aa le Korowii Domadɛɛge la be ne.
52001007	Gɛ haa ɛa laanee chɔa dɛ tɛ Makidoonia harɛ ne Akaaya harɛ asɔre tena bwa, baa nyiŋi dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii.
52001008	He bee ya Dɔɔ la waa che dɛ perɛ baah bela bwa. Bela tena gbo laa noa, kɛ yarada haa dɛ yarada Korowii la tel bobɛlbwa. Anomanta a ta chɛ kɛŋɔ ya bol he waa nɛra be kpa.
52001009	Ba gbabir dɛ bol he wa, gɛ haa kpoŋe yaa dɛ no ya be dɛ charɛ he liire le voga aa wola mkpa dɔe la ta dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii kasinteŋ waa lole dɛ dɔ mkpa la.
52001010	Dɛ he sogo kpa o Bie Yeesu waa dɛ ba nyundua lee dɛ ba la. Onee o chum seo ta la. Onee lɛ yaa le Korowii bandia waa dɛ ba bala la ta.
52002001	Yabala, he gbabir jemɔ kɛ chɔɔra yaa chɔɔ heyaa la ta pɛɛ ɛɛ.
52002002	He jemɔ kɛ ba tɔ sie ɛ yaa hɔhɔrɔwa Felepae dɛ chɛgre yaa taeh mɔɔ ya ba he be Amanesoma la ne la. Kɛ Korowii tɛ yaa bansua ya won bol o waa la.
52002003	Jae yaa dɛ ja nɛra la, kasinteŋ ŋwɛnɛ taa, negra laa yaa negre nɛra, wedoŋa ge laa ya lii.
52002004	Anɔ la Korowii aa dɛ nyin laanee yaa bol. Yanee o dɔ hwɛga tɛ kɛŋɔ ya bol o Amanesoma la. Anomanta yaa anɔ la nɛwɛnyini sie aa dɛ lɛ a ta bol, kɛ anɔ la Korowii waa jemɛ bambile bɛlbwa waa la aa dɛ nyin la, anee yaa bol.
52002005	Gɛ haa jema la, he kpɛɛra waa laa ya koh ba he be. Ya ta balɛ dɛ́ ba bol waa dɛ negre heyaa dɛ lɛ kwaane ge. Korowii gboo jema.
52002006	Ya ta sɔn nyine dɛ le he ne nomɛlbwa be.
52002007	Ya ɛ Yeesu Kristo toroma, dɛ fe dɔ ŋwɛnɛ kɛ ya lɛ komɛl le he be. Kɛ ya tɛ heyaa sisɔna kɛŋɔ haah naa ta tea dɛɛ dɛɛ o bechasɔɔhna la.
52002008	Ya nyin he waa ya bambile bwa ne. Korowii Amanesoma la gbo ne laa ya ba he be. Yaa nyin he waa gɛ la, a ɛ yaa silɛɛ kɛŋɔ ya kpɔ ya te ja wobol la ta dɛ tɛ heya.
52002009	Yabala, haa ya toma ne ya koeh la waa lii kɛɛ? Ya ɛ toma chɔɔ ne jwaana bwa asɛ ya bɛ he bɛlbwa koeh do gɛ saŋ yaa lɔ he be dɛ bol Korowii Amanesoma la dɛɛ bagle heyaa la.
52002010	He asɔre tena nɔ ne Korowii bwa ɛ ya danseɛ tena, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he nao kɛ ya we-ɛɛla wer dɛ lɛ Korowii sie, doŋa bɛlbwa aa wola toole a ta.
52002011	He nao gɛ yaa do he bini bɛlbwa gbemba gɛ baa yon dɛɛ ɛ o bii la.
52002012	Ya do heyaa gbemba dɛ larawe he bwara dɛ do heyaa ŋɔ hé so sodɛɛga ásɛ he waa lɛ Korowii sie. Onee le heyaa he ba ɛ o bii, dɛ kpɔ o Kora la ne o nyanyini la pera tɛ heya.
52002013	Ya dɛ jam Korowii tɔpere bɛlbwa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ yaa bol Korowii Waa la he be la, he noa kɛŋɔ Korowii Wa. He ta an noɛ kɛŋɔ nɛn wa. Gɛɛ a do kpela. A gɛ waa nɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ toma he asɔre tena nɔ bini la.
52002014	Yabala, he ne Korowii nɛra baa lɔ Judia harɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ la bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ wahala baa naa Juda tena be la, he ge na a dɔŋa he bwɛɛ tena be.
52002015	Juda tena nɔɔ kpo ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo ne Korowii keamere la, dɛ hah yaa, dɛ doŋi yaa la. Gɛ nɛnchɔga nɔ aa Korowii siwi su. Ba ɛ nɛra bwa dɔm,
52002016	dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba dɛ tɔ yaa ŋwɛnɛ ya bɛ Korowii Waa la bol chagle nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la asɛ Korowii bɛ ban lɛ. Anomanta ba wechɔga dɛ warɛ tɔpere bɛlbwa, ásɛ Korowii bwaawee ir ba nɛ.
52002017	Ya te la, yabala, baa doŋi yaa le he be tɔpere tamaa nɔ la, ya ta he waa soɛh. Kɛ nae yaa wola heyaa na. Yaa le he be la, dɛ he be bala swɛɛ ya siwi, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ sikii lawɛ yaa taeh.
52002018	Yaa dɛ nyin he be bala la, ya takapɔ gɛ yaa ɛ dɛ́ na heyaa ja. N Pɔɔl yon takapɔ kɛ n fe ɛɛ ba he bee. Kɛ Bɔnsam aa yaa ŋwɛnɛ tɛ.
52002019	Ya sie begra aa begra nɔ, he bee ya hwɛga ne silɛɛ do. He waa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu ɛɛ ba yaa tɔɔ dawa, ya hɛgre awola waa ba ya ba che o sie la.
52002020	He nɛɛ aa ba chega ya dɔ sɔn ne silɛɛ.
52003001	Ya haŋrɔ kahonɛ, yaa wola he waa no la, ya liiro kɛŋɔ aa do werii kɛ ya tomɛ Timoti he be asɛ a ka ya nɛra banɛ gbo Atens.
52003002	Timoti ɛ ya dɔŋ dɛ ɛ Korowii torome dɛɛ bol Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma la. Ya tomɔ ó ba do heyaa gbemba dɛ ja heyaa he yarada haa dɛ yarada Korowii la bɔr,
52003003	he bini bɛlbwa bɛ wahala nɔ waa koh dɛ chwa. He bwa jemɔ kɛ gɛɛ chɛ kɛ ya na.
52003004	Ya ne haa lole la, ya bol wahala nɔ waa dɛ ba bala nɔ waa he be he jemɛ wubwa. Asɛ gɛ yaa ŋɔa laanee bala la.
52003005	A waa gela n haŋre kahonɛ dɛ tomɛ Timoti ásɛ dɛ jemɛ he yarada bini kɛŋɔ Bɔnsam ken baa negre heyaa dɛ gel ya toma yaa baa ɛ la ken ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ.
52003006	Kɛ taraken Timoti aa le he be ba la, o ba amanesoma ne kɛŋɔ he dɛ yarada Korowii dɛɛ nyin nɛra ge. O ŋɔ ya be ŋɔ he dɛ lii ya waa kɛrɛdɛ tɔpere bɛlbwa, dɛɛ nyin kɛ he na yaa gɛ yaa dɛ nyin heyaa dɛ na la.
52003007	Yabala, ya wahala ne ya wenaale yaa dɛ na nɔ, ya gel a bwa. He yarada gelɔ ya baah sɔɔh yaa he wa.
52003008	Dɛ he lawɛ Korowii waa la kpoŋe kiŋkiŋ naa, dɛ ya dɔ bokpega.
52003009	Bɔkwa jaamee yaa ba wona kpɔ tɛ Korowii he waɔ? Silɛɛ yaa dɔa le Korowii be nɔ kan. He waa gela ya sie lɛ la.
52003010	Ya dɛ soŋe Korowii chɔɔ ne jwaana bwa ásɛ dɛ na he sie bɔr ja, dɛ bol waa aa dɛ ba wona cha heyaa he yarada bini ásɛ he do kpegri ja.
52003011	N Naa Korowii gbabir waa bera ɛ ya Mɛɛ la ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu ɛɛ chagle yaa ŋwɛnɛɛ ya ba he be.
52003012	Yá Dɔɔ Yeesu ja heyaa dɔŋa nyina kɛrɛdɛ ásɛ hɛɛ nyin nomɛlbwa gɛ yaa dɛ nyin heyaa la.
52003013	Wɛɛ geloo he do kpegri dɛ bɛ wechɔga dɔ, dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛga N Naa Korowii waa ɛ ya Mɛɛ la be awola o ne o toromedɛɛga la bwa aa ba la.
52004001	Anɔ la aa jaa la, yabala, waa la haa hwela ya be gɛ aa chɛ kɛ he so asɛ Korowii sie lɛ he nɛɛ la, gɛɛ hɛɛ ɛ la. Ya chegɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu naa ta dɛɛ ja heyaa ŋɔ a chɛ kɛ he ɛ dɛ gwaa gɛ.
52004002	He jemɛ waa yaa chegɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu nɛɛ dɛ bol bagle heyaa la.
52004003	Korowii dɛ nyin kɛ he ɛ nɛndɛɛga dɛ laa he te kpɔ jwamane ta.
52004004	Báa bɛlbwa nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ kɛ wɛɛ mo haahnee ŋwɛnɛdɛɛge ta.
52004005	He bɛ siyala ne sibegra ŋwɛnɛ ta kpɔ kɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la.
52004006	Nomɛlbwa bɛ o dɔŋ nɛɛ jo a gɛ waa nɔ ta, dɛkalkɛ Korowii ɛɛ tɛr nɛra baa dɛ ɛ gɛ la deŋnee, gɛ yaa ja heyaa logla la ŋɔ hé nyiŋi a ta kɛrɛdɛ la.
52004007	Korowii aa le yaa ŋɔ ya ɛ o bii la, o ta ŋɔe ŋɔ yá ba ɛ wedoŋa. O ŋɔ yá ba ɛ wedɛɛga.
52004008	Nomɛlbwa waa wola a gɛ waa nɔ ta teŋɛ la, dɛ nɛwɛnyini waa laa o vɛh, dɛ Korowii waa tɛ heyaa o Domadɛɛge la waa o vɛh.
52004009	Too. Ane gee la. A ta hiaih kɛ ya berɛ bagle heyaa dɔŋa nyina waa kpa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii bagle heyaa ŋɔ hé nyin dɔŋa.
52004010	Kasinteŋ, he dɛ nyin he bala baa lɔ Makidoonia harɛ la bwa. Yabala, ya dɛ soŋe heyaa kɛ he bɛ waa nɔ gel, kɛ hé ɛ gwaa gɛ.
52004011	Hé takapɔ dɛ ɛ he te nɛŋgwɛgra dɛ bɛ nɛra waa ta dɛɛ jo. Hé kpɔ he bokpega ɛ toma, dɛ bɛ he te kpɔ dɛɛ dawɛ nɛra nɛ, gɛ yaa ŋɔ he be wubwa la.
52004012	He dɛ ɛ ken aa, hɛɛ dɔ jirima nɛra baa wola asɔre tena ɛɛ la bee, haa he tenee kpɔ dawɛ nɛra nɛ.
52004013	Yabala, ya dɛ nyin kɛ ya bol yabala baa serewa la wa, asɛ he tea bini bɛ chɔg kohona kɛŋɔ nɛra baa kaa, baa wola hwɛga dɔe kɛŋɔ yaa ir seo taa la.
52004014	Ya yaradao kɛ Yeesu sewɔ dɛ ir. Gɛ tentenee yaa yarada kɛŋɔ Korowii dɛ ba banɔ la baa yarada Yeesu mɔɔ dɛ serewe la kpɔe dɛ ja Yeesu nɛɛ ba ne o ba gɛ saŋ waa ba la.
52004015	Ya Dɔɔ la waa waa bolaa nɔ. Ya banɔ la yaa so le dɛ ka tel gɛ saŋ ya Dɔɔ la aa ba la, yaa yabala baa serewa la siee tɔ kaa ya Dɔɔ be,
52004016	dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya Dɔɔ la gbabir ɛɛ le nyundua dɛ tu ba, dɛ ba yerɛ o nɛra takpeg ne, asɛ o nyundua toroma nomoa ge yerɛ, Korowii bɛla si tɔ o sie, asɛ banɔ la baa yarada Yeesu Kristo mɔɔ dɛ serewe la ir,
52004017	asɛ Korowii kpɔ ba ne ya banɔ la ge ya taa soge le gɛ saŋ la bwa kaa nyundua baama ta dɛ́ ka cheme ya Dɔɔ bela, asɛ ya ne o so saŋ bɛlbwa.
52004018	Anomanta hé kpɔ waa nɔ dɛɛ larawe dɔŋa bwara.
52005001	Yabala, a ta chɛ kɛŋɔ n chwerɛ dɛ bagle heyaa tɔpere la waa nɔ aa dɛ ba chiga,
52005002	dɛkalkɛŋɔ he bwa jemɔ kpela kɛŋɔ tɔpere ya Dɔɔ la aa ba la ɛɛ pigruu kɛŋɔ ŋwɛɛ aa dɛ pigri nɛn jwaana la.
52005003	Gɛ saŋ nɛra aa ba ŋɔ, "Bobɛlbwa sɔɔhnɔ, ya dɔ deŋnesɔɔhna name te" la, belaa dɛ harɛchɔg la ɛɛ ba ba pigra. Wɛɛ pigruu kɛŋɔ haah naa kpoŋe tea asɛ lol tea lɔɔ la ken. Gɛ saŋ la, baa bɔree dɔ dɛ chwa ka sɔh.
52005004	Kɛ yabala, he te toole biro ta, he sie chaah waa nɔ ta. Anomanta Yeesu bala la aa heyaa pigri kɛŋɔ ŋwɛɛ.
52005005	He bwa sekwara ɛ nɛra he sie aa chaah Korowii waa ta. Biro bini nɛra laa yan, bochaah ta nɛraa yan.
52005006	Anomanta ya bɛ bɔhwaah ɛ kɛŋɔ bane aa dɛ ɛ la, kɛ hé gel ya sie chɔ harɛ yaa nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ.
52005007	Bɔhwaahra ne nɛra baa dɛ dɛɛ te bwa ɛ biro bini nɛra.
52005008	Ya te yaa ɛ bochaah ta nɛra nɔ, hé gel ya sie chɔ harɛ, asɛ dɛ kpɔ yarada ne nɛnnyin ɛ ya laa batakaare kɛŋɔ baa do laa batakaare dɛɛ yo laa la, dɛ berɛ kpɔ hwɛga yaa dɔa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu be kɛŋɔ wɛɛ lɛ yaa la ɛ buni gbɛrɛ dɛ kpɔ pi.
52005009	Korowii ta yaa tae ŋɔ yá ba di bolchɔge o sie. O ta yaa ŋɔ yá che Yeesu nɛɛ dɛ dɔ ya nyu.
52005010	Onee sewa tɛ yaa, asɛ awola o balaa, dɛ ya soge mkpa ta noo, sewaa ya sewɛ oo, yá ne Korowii won pɛ.
52005011	Anomanta hɛ́ɛ do dɔŋa gbemba dɛɛ cha dɔŋa, gɛ haa dɛ ɛ nɔ.
52005012	Yabala, ya dɛ soŋe heyaa kɛŋɔ hɛ́ɛ duu nɛra baa ɛ he nomonome dɛɛ ɛ Korowii toma nɔ dɛɛ ja heyaa la.
52005013	Ba toma la nomanta hɛ́ɛ duu ba kɛrɛdɛ taeh, dɛɛ nyin ba wa. Hé gel he bwa nyoa pɛ.
52005014	Yabala, ya dɛ soŋe heyaa kɛ hɛ́ɛ ja banɔ la baa ɛ bɔhwaahra la, dɛɛ do ɔmeera la gbemba, dɛ lawɛ banɔ la baa wola chegɛ kiŋkiŋ Korowii ŋwɛnɛ ta la kpoŋe, dɛ dɔ bambile tɛ nomɛlbwa.
52005015	Hé nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ gel bɛlbwa kpɔ wechɔga dɛɛ bɔ wechɔga kem, kɛ hé ɛ wedɛɛga dɛɛ tɛ he dɔŋa ne nomɛlbwa.
52005016	Hé gel he sie ɛɛ lɛ tɔpere bɛlbwa, wobɛlbwa ta,
52005017	dɛɛ soŋe Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa.
52005018	Hɛ́ɛ jam Korowii wobɛlbwa ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛɛ Korowii che Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛɛ bagle o tetoowaa he be.
52005019	He bɛ gel Korowii Domadɛɛge waa soge he nɛɛ la nyoa sɔɔh.
52005020	He bɛ he bala baa dɛ na chaahna la nyoa dɛɛ vɛh.
52005021	Kɛ hé nyiŋi ba webagla asɛ dɛ lawɛ anɔ la aa wera la bini.
52005022	Hé laa he te kpɔ wechɔga bɛlbwa ta.
52005023	Korowii waa dɛ tɛ yaa bosɔɔhna la, ó gbabir laa doŋa bwa kpɔ he nɛ, dɛ ɛ heyaa nɛndɛɛga ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta ka tel kɛŋɔ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo aa ba.
52005024	Korowii waa le heyaa he ba ɛ o bii la, o ɛ kasinteŋ te. Onee dɛɛ ba heyaa nɛndɛɛga ɛɛ.
52005025	Yabala, hé soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ yaa.
52005026	Hɛ́ɛ lea dɔŋa kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ nyabii.
52005027	N kpɔ ya Dɔɔ dɛɛ do heyaa kɛ hé kure tɔn nɔ bagle yabala la bwa sekwaraa.
52005028	Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo waa dɛ na nɛra sum la, wɛɛ cha heyaa.
53001001	Men Pɔɔl ne Silvanos ne Timotii chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ Yeesu asɔre tena baa lɔ Tɛsalonika dɛ ɛ N Naa Korowii waa bera ɛ ya Mɛɛ la ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nɛra la.
53001002	Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
53001003	Yabala, ya koh he waa dɛ yon dɛɛ jam Korowii. He chɛ gɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he yarada haa dɛ yarada Korowii la dɛ kaa sie saŋ bɛlbwa. Nyina haa dɛ nyin dɔŋa la ge gba dɛ do kan ja.
53001004	Ya gbagba dɛ bol he waa dɛɛ bagle asɔre tena baa cheme bobɛlbwa dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii la, dɛɛ kpɛɛ heya. Ya dɛ ŋɔ ba be gɛ nɛra aa dɛ ɛ heyaa hɔhɔrɔwa, aa no heyaa saŋ bɛlbwa, asɛ he dɔ bambile haa wola habɔɔ le dɛ ta teŋɛ dɛɛ yarada Yeesu la.
53001005	He we-ɛɛla baglɔ kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii bole waa pa heyaa la togrɔ. Haa koh o Kora waa dɛɛ na hɔhɔrɔwa nɔ, anee dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ he chɛ o Kora la ta jae.
53001006	Kɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ heyaa hɔhɔrɔwa la te, Korowii ɛɛ bɔ ba a kemee. O we-ɛɛla togrɔ. Ó ɛɛ ba gɛ hɔhɔrɔwa la,
53001007	dɛ gel he bwara sɔɔh heya. Ya ne he bwaa dɛɛ ba bosɔɔhna la dɔe gɛ saŋ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo aa forɛ le nyundua o ne o nyundua toroma baa dɛ di kpegri ne nii nɛɛ ba la.
53001008	O balaa, wɛɛ bol nɛra baa wola Korowii jemɛ, baa wola Amanesoma aa dɛ bagle ya Dɔɔ Yeesu waa noɛ la waa, dɛ bɔ ba a kem,
53001009	dɛ per ba le o be. Baa o kpegri aa gela o dɔ jirima laanee na kpa, asɛ o kpɔ hɔhɔrɔwa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa ta ba nɛ.
53001010	Awola waa ba o tɔpejen la ta asɛ o nɛra tɛo duure la, nɛra baa yaradao la bwa ɛɛ nao dɛ kpɛɛro. He gba jao, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya faa bagle heyaa o waa la, he noɔ dɛ teŋɛ a ta.
53001011	Yeesu bala la waa ya yon dɛɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ heya, ásɛ o cha heyaa he soga bini won magre dɛ chɛ lee waa le heyaa dɛ tɛ o te la, dɛ tɛ heyaa kpegri he won ɛ wedɛɛga la bwa aa lɔ he bambile bini ne wobɛlbwa haa ŋɔ hé ɛ, yarada haa yaradao la nomanta.
53001012	Ya dɛ soŋe Korowii gɛ ásɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu sɔn won dɔ jirima dɛ le he we-ɛɛla ta, asɛ he ge gba won dɔ jirima dɛ le o be. N Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo suna waa dɛ sune ya nɛɛ dɛɛ cha yaa la nomanta, a bwa won ɛ gɛ.
53002001	Yabala, ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo bala waa ne gɛ ya bwa aa dɛ ba o be chema la, n dɛ soŋe heya,
53002002	hɛ́ɛ lii a waa kɛrɛdɛ. Maa nyin nomɛlbwa bol wetamaa ane asɛ he den ɔmɛ dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ ya Dɔɔ balɔ kaa. Dɛ ba ŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge bag ba gɛ baa bol, kɛɛ dɛ he na tɔn bɛl o negre heyaa kɛŋɔ yanee chwerɔ waa, he bɛ no dɛ gel a ɛ heyaa waane.
53002003	He bɛ gel nomɛlbwa negre heyaa ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta. Hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ waane ɛɛ ɛo mɔɔ asɛ tɔpere la ba. Gɛ saŋ nɛra aa ir dɛ warɛ pirim dɛ vɛh Korowii la ɛɛ bao, mɔɔ nɛn waa ɛ Kristo dɔm tenten Korowii bandia aa lɔ o nɛɛ kɛŋɔ ó chɔgo la le.
53002004	Wɛɛ ɛ o tenee dɛ gwaa komɛlbwa nɛra aa dɛ toma dɛɛ yera ba dɔɔranar, hale wɛɛ kpɔ Korowii Dea berɛ sobɔr dɛ ŋɔ onee Korowii.
53002005	Haa lii kɛŋɔ n faa lɔ he be la dɛ n dɛ bagle heyaa gɛ waa nɔ naa?
53002006	Hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ komɛlee tɔɔ ŋwɛnɛ o le kahonɛ la, nemenɛ o saŋ tel.
53002007	Wechɔga dɔɔ ba taraken, kɛ aa won dɔ bɔr kohona, nemenɛ kon la waa tɔa ŋwɛnɛ la le mɔɔ.
53002008	Dɛ kon waa tɔa ŋwɛnɛ la baa le aa, belaa Wechɔga Te la ɛɛ ba bochaah lee nɛra jemɔ. Kɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo bala jirima ne o nyoa peu gbo kwara ɛɛ won kpoo bug ta.
53002009	Gɛ saŋ waa ba mɔɔ Yeesu ba kpoo la, Bɔnsam ɛɛ do o nɛɛ dɛɛ chao kɛrɛdɛ o won dɔ kpegri kohona, dɛ won dɛɛ ɛ nyokpowaa ne wejena, dɛɛ negre nɛra kɛŋɔ Korowiirii tɛo kpegri ken,
53002010	dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga bwa soosiwi aa lole, dɛ won dɛɛ negre nɛra baa nyogra dɛɛ ba chɔga la. Korowii ɛɛ chɔg baa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba vɛh kasinteŋ waa aa dɛ ba wona lɛɛ ba la, ba ta o waa nyine.
53002011	Anomanta o gelɔ nyosone o nyoa aa kpega ɛɛ ba ba be dɛ ba tɔɔge ba sie, asɛ baa yarada waa aa ɛ nyosone,
53002012	ásɛ o won pa nomɛlbwa waa wola sɛɛh dɛ teŋɛ o kasinteŋ waa la ta kɛ dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga o sie lɛ a ta la bolchɔge.
53002013	Anomanta a chɛ kɛŋɔ ya jam Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa he wa, yabala. O dɛ nyin heyaa kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ le harɛ mumpar la bwa le heyaa kɛŋɔ wɛɛ lɛ heyaa. O Domadɛɛge aa gela he doŋa bwa le he nɛɛ la, ne gɛ haa no o kasinteŋ waa dɛ yaradaa la, a waa o lɛ heyaa la.
53002014	Yanee fa bol Amanesoma la bagle heyaa he no la, asɛ Korowii che a ta le heyaa ásɛ he ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo won pɛ dɔ jirima.
53002015	Anomanta, yabala, hé lawɛ kiŋkiŋ dɛ teŋɛ waa la bwa yaa kpɔ nyoa dɛ bagle heya, ne anɔ la yaa chwera tɔn ta dɛ tɛ heyaa la ta. Hé gel a bwa do he nyu bini kɛrɛdɛ.
53002016	Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo gbagba ne N Naa Korowii waa ɛ ya Mɛɛ dɛɛ nyin yaa kɛrɛdɛ dɛ sune ya nɛɛ dɛ cha yaa, dɛ tɛ yaa hwɛga aa wera ne gbemba aa wola tonɛ bwa la,
53002017	bá tɛ heyaa gbemba dɛ gel he che kiŋkiŋ, asɛ dɛ won ɛ wedɛɛga te bɛlbwa, dɛ won dɛɛ bola ge.
53003001	Anɔ la aa kaa la, yabala, hé soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ ya gba, ásɛ ya Dɔɔ waa la won perɛ kɛrɛdɛ dɛ won dɔ jirima, asɛ nɛra no kɛŋɔ gɛ he ge faa noa la.
53003002	Hé soŋo o lɛ yaa dɛɛ le meesɔɔh tena ne nɛnchɔga be, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa laa dɛ no waa yaa dɛ bol la dɛ yaradaa.
53003003	Kɛ Korowii waa dɔ kasinteŋ la, wɛɛ geloo hɛɛ kpeg waa la ta teŋa ta dɛ lɛ heyaa le Bɔnsam nɔn ta o bɛ heyaa dɔ.
53003004	Yaa dɛ yarada ya Dɔɔ la waa ya won dɛɛ yarada he ge kɛŋɔ he dɛ teŋɛ gɛ ya faa bagle heyaa la ta la, dɛ berɛ dɛɛ yarada heyaa kɛ hɛɛ kpoŋe gɛ ya faa bol he be laanee dɛɛ la.
53003005	Yá Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya ásɛ he won jemɛ nyina Korowii aa nyin heya, ne bambile Yeesu Kristo aa lawa o hɔhɔrɔwa la bini la.
53003006	Yabala, ya chegɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo sɔn ta dɛɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, he bini bɛlbwa dɛ ɛ bɔhwaah o ta sɛɛh dɛɛ ɛ toma gɛ yaa bagla la aa, hé gelo, he ne o bɛ pɛ.
53003007	Ya faa lɔ he be la, dɛ ya ta bɔhwaahra ɛɛ. Anomanta hé jemɛ gɛ haa ɛ dɛ teŋɛ ya nɛ.
53003008	Ya ta nomɛlbwa kondikwaa dii pɛɛpɛɛ. Ya ɛ toma chɔɔ ne jwaana, dɛɛ koh kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ heyaa ha ya kondikwaa wa.
53003009	Yaa ɛ gɛ nɔ, a ta ɛɛ kɛŋɔ ya ta ŋwɛnɛ dɔe kɛ ya lɛ gɛ kwaa nɔ le he be. Ya dɔ ŋwɛnɛ, kɛ ya ɛ gɛ dɛ́ kpɔ bagle heyaa ásɛ hɛɛ teŋɛ a ta.
53003010	Waa yaa kpɔa tɛ heyaa gɛ saŋ ya faa lɔ he be bela laanee kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa ŋɔa waa tomaa ɛ la ta chɛ kɛŋɔ o di kwa.
53003011	Ya dɛ no he waa kɛŋɔ he bane ta sɛɛh dɛɛ ɛ toma, dɛ valɛ pɛɛpɛɛ dɛ kpɔ nyoa dɛɛ do nɛra waa ta.
53003012	Ya chegɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo sɔn ta dɛɛ ŋɔ gɛ nɛra nɔ be ŋɔ bá do sie dɛɛ ɛ ba gbagba toma dɛɛ di ba koeh ta.
53003013	Yabala, hé ɛ wedɛɛga dɛɛ la, dɛ bɛ ŋɔ he koɔh.
53003014	Dɛ nomɛlbwa ta sɛɛh kɛ wɛɛ teŋɛ gɛ yaa ŋɔa tɔn nɔ bini nɔ taa yaa, hé nyiŋu kɛrɛdɛ. He ne o bɛ pɛ dɛɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa, ásɛ sihiih kpoo.
53003015	N ta ŋɔe ŋɔ hé kpɔɔ berɛ he dɔm te, kɛ hé jao kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ gɛ haa dɛ ja he nimanar.
53003016	Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo la gbagba waa dɔ bambisɔn kɛrɛdɛ la, ó tɛ heyaa bambisɔn saŋ bɛlbwa, wobɛlbwa ta, dɛ ja he bwa nɛ.
53003017	N Pɔɔl gbagbaa chwerɛ bonɔ nɔ. N dɛ na heya. Kenii n yon dɛɛ ɛ n tɔn bɛlbwa bini ásɛ he won jemɛ kɛŋɔ n tɔnee.
53003018	Yá Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha he bwa sekwaraa.
54001001	Men Pɔɔl maa ɛ Yeesu Kristo torome laanee chwerɛ tɔn nɔ. Korowii waa ɛ ya Lɛɛ ne Yeesu Kristo yaa dɛ hwɛgɛ o nɛɛ laanee do mɛ ŋɔ mɛ́ɛ bol o waa nɔ.
54001002	N bie Timotii n chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ. Menee bol Korowii Waa he no, dɛ berɛ n bie a ta la. Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo chae dɛ na he sum, dɛ tɛɛ bosɔɔhna.
54001003	Waa maa ba dɛ kaa Makidoonia harɛ ta dɛ ŋɔ he be la, a taa n ta do. N ŋɔ hé so Ɛfesos dɛ kah nɛra baa teŋe nyosone dɛɛ tɛ nɛra ŋɔ Korowii Waa baa chagle la ŋɔ bá gel gɛ waa la, dɛ bɛ Korowii waa la sie berɛ.
54001004	Ŋɔ ba bɛ gel nyosone la ne gɛ baa dɛ bagle ba naanar lee bɔra baa wola a nyoa na bwa la lɛ ba liire. Wetɔŋla gbo nee gɛ waa nɔ ɛɛ ba. Korowii toma ŋwɛnɛre laa baa bagle la, dɛkalkɛ yarada gbo taa a che baa jemɛ Korowii toma ŋwɛnɛre.
54001005	Wee maa koh a waa doe waa nɔ ta laanee kɛŋɔ bá won dɔ nɛnnyin. Nɛn waa dɔ nɛnnyin nɔ soo la ta wechɔga bɛlbwa dɔe, o tea too, o dɔ yarada kasinteŋ.
54001006	Nɛra bane gel gɛ waa nɔ dɛ ka teŋɛ wesale aa wola mun dɔe bola ta.
54001007	Ba dɛ nyin kɛ ba ɛ ba te kɛ nɛra baa dɛ chagle nɛra Mmara la, kɛ waa ba siwi yon swɛɛ a ta baa bol la, ba gba aa a mun jemɛ.
54001008	Ya bwa jemɔ kɛ dɛ nɛn wono ɛ gɛ Mmara la aa dɛ bagle la aa, Mmara la wer tɛo.
54001009	A chɛ kɛŋɔ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ nɛndɛɛga waa laa ba koh dɛɛ do mmara, kɛ nɛra baa wola mmara ta teŋɛ la, ne deŋnekpeg tena, ne nɛra baa vɛh Korowii la, ne wechɔg-ɛɛra, ne nɛra baa wola Korowii tomɛ, baa wola on duu la, ne nɛra baa dɛ kpoo ba mɛɛnanar ne ba nyare, dɛ nɛra baa dɛ kpo nɛra bwa,
54001010	ne jwamane tena, ne baala ba ne ba bandɔŋa aa dɛ chɔ haah ne baa, ne nɛra baa lawɛ nɛra dɛɛ yog ba kɛ yoma, ne nyosonteŋna, ne nɛra ba yon jemɛ kɛ nyosonee baa teŋe dɛ garɛ dɛɛ ŋwɛɛ Korowii la, ne nɛra baa dɛ ɛ we-ɛɛla te bɛlbwa a ne webagla aa togra la aa wola kaa la, ba waa ba koh dɛɛ do mmara.
54001011	Gɛ waa aa togra la bwa lɔ Amanesoma Korowii aa kpɔa do n nɔn ta ŋɔ ń chagle nɛra la ta. Anee dɛɛ bagle Korowii waa dɔ jirima ne silɛɛ la wa.
54001012	N dɛ jam ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo waa tɛ mɛ o kpegri la kɛ waa yarada mɛ dɛ kpɔ o toma nɔ do n nɔn ta nɔ.
54001013	A lole kɛ n fa dɛ ɛ Yeesu Kristo la nɛnhɛla, dɛɛ ɛo hɔhɔrɔwa, n siwi sao mɛɛ yoo. Kɛ Korowii na n sum, dɛkalkɛ maa wola Korowii yarada dɔe n bini la, dɛ maa jemɛ gɛ maa dɛ ɛ.
54001014	O sune n nɛɛ kohona dɛ cha mɛ taeh n dɔ yarada ne nɛnnyin yaa dɔa le pɛɛ ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la ta.
54001015	Waa nɔ ɛ kasinteŋ aa chɛ kɛŋɔ he lɛa kɛŋɔ wechɔg-ɛɛra waa Yeesu Kristo koh ba harɛ nɔ ta dɛ́ ba lɛɛ ba. N wechɔgaa kana gwaa nomɛlbwa kwa.
54001016	Kɛ Korowii sune n nɛ, asɛ Yeesu dɔ bambile tɛ mɛ n wechɔga damanta nɔ bwa ta, ásɛ nɛra baa ba no Korowii waa dɛ yaradao la jemɛ gɛ Yeesu aa dɔ bambile kohona, dɛ won yaradao dɛ dɔ o mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la.
54001017	Yá kpɔ duure tɛ Koojen la o Kora dii aa wola jaga dɔe, waa wola sewɛ bwa, baa wola won on na, o gbo aa ɛ Korowii la, dɛɛ guŋu harɛ fini ne tɔpere bɛlbwa. Aamen.
54001018	N bie Timoti, n dɔ waane dɛ́ bol he be, ásɛ he lawɛ a bini he Korowii toma ta. Gɛ ba faa chegɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge kpegri ta dɛ bol o toma waa tɛɛ kpegri hɛ́ɛ ɛ nɔ waa la, gɛ waa la tenten taa mɛɛ doe la. Anomanta gel gɛ waa la doe gbemba ásɛ he won yo kɛrɛdɛ,
54001019	asɛ dɛ kpoŋe Korowii yarada bini kiŋkiŋ, dɛɛ ɛ waa haa jema kɛ a togrɔ. Gɛɛ bane aa wola ɛɛ, asɛ ba ta wone yarada Korowii ka tonɛ dɛ horɛ la.
54001020	Banɔ la baa hora la bini banee Haemeneas ne Alɛksanda. N kpɔ ba do Bɔnsam nɔn ta ásɛ ba jemɛ kɛŋɔ baa Korowii nɛnhɛla ɛ.
54002001	Anɔ la aa tɔ sie mɛɛ ja asɔre tena kɛŋɔ báa teŋɛ a ta laanee kɛ hɛ́ɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ nomɛlbwa. Hɛ́ɛ soŋo dɛɛ jaamo wobɛlbwa ta.
54002002	Hé soŋo dɛɛ tɛ koranar ne nɛra baa dɛ di nomonome bwa ásɛ ya bwa so bosɔɔhna ta jeih ken, dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii gɛ aa chɛa, dɛɛ ɛ waa aa wera o be.
54002003	Gɛɛ wera, dɛɛ lɛ ya Lɛɛ Korowii sie.
54002004	O te dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa dɔ o nyu, asɛ dɛ ba jemɛ kasinteŋ waa la.
54002005	Anee kɛ Korowii beŋkpoŋii lole, dɛ dɔ nachige beŋkpoŋ do o ne nɛwɛnyini baah ta, o ge ɛ nɛn. Onee Yeesu Kristo
54002006	waa kpɔ o te tɛ kɛŋɔ ba kpɔɔ charɛ nɛra bwa nyu la. Gɛ saŋ aa chɛ kɛŋɔ waa nɔ magre la taa a den chig la. O ɛ gɛ a chɔ danseɛ saŋ bɛlbwa.
54002007	Anɔ waa Korowii lee mɛ ŋɔ ń lɔ a dawuro bagle nɛra, dɛ berɛ ɛ Yeesu torome ge la. Kasinteŋii mɛɛ bol la, maa nyosone teŋe. Onee gela mɛɛ bagle nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la ásɛ ba yarada Yeesu dɛ jemɛ kasinteŋ la.
54002008	N dɛ nyin kɛ bobɛlbwa baala baa ɛ asɔre tena la laa ba te kpɔ bandisale ne wetɔŋla ta, asɛ dɛ won ɛ nɛndɛɛga dɛ ir nɔɔra soŋe Korowii.
54002009	Gɛ tentenee mɛɛ nyin kɛ dɛ haahna dɛ ba laala doe yaa, ba bɛ jwamanlaala ne laala a waa aa do bola dɛɛ do. Bá kpɔ laala aa magre ba ne, dɛ bɛ ba te kpɔ do nyuune ɛɛ aa dɛ ba kem ne, ne suugaswɛm koŋkwaare doe, ne yale a yog aa kpega liga ta.
54002010	Kɛ báa ɛ wedɛɛga kɛ haahna baa dɛ tomɛ Korowii. Ba wedɛɛga ɛɛ laanee dɛ gel ba do wer toli.
54002011	A wer kɛŋɔ haahna ɛɛ pwɛr ba te, dɛ cheg deŋne dɛɛ no Korowii Waa baa dɛ bag ba la.
54002012	N ta ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ kɛŋɔ haahna di nomonome baala nɛɛ dɛɛ bagle wa. A chɛ kɛŋɔ ba tɔ ba nyoa dɛɛ no,
54002013	dɛkalkɛ Adamee Korowii tɔ sie ta mɔɔ dɛ ta o haah Hawa.
54002014	Adam ge kwaraa laa Bɔnsam negre la. Hawaa o negre dɛ gel o ɛ wechɔga la.
54002015	Kɛ dɛ haahna kpoŋe Korowii yarada bini kiŋkiŋ, dɛɛ nyin nɛn, dɛ laa ba te dɛɛ kpɔ wedoŋa ta, baa wesale ɛ aa, Korowii ɛɛ geloo ba dɔ ba nyu ba lola ta.
54003001	A ɛ kasinteŋ kɛŋɔ dɛ nɛn ŋɔ wɛɛ tɔ asɔre tena siee yaa, dɛ tondɛɛga tentenee naate ɛɛ nyin la.
54003002	A gɛ nɛn la, a ta chɛ kɛŋɔ nɛra dɔ o wechɔge bol. A chɛ kɛ o haah ɛ beŋkpoŋ. A chɛ kɛ o won o te lawa, dɛ dɔ nfɛrɛ, o we-ɛɛla ɛɛ lɛ nɛra sie. A chɛ kɛ o ɛ nɛn waa won hɔɔhra kpoŋa, dɛ won Korowii Waa bagla.
54003003	A ta chɛ kɛŋɔ o ɛ sennyɔdɛɛ, o bɛ nagrenyini ɛ. Kɛ ó ɛ nɛn waa pwɛra, waa wola o bwara ne waa nyin. A ta chɛ kɛ o siwi begre suuga.
54003004	A chɛ kɛ o won o haah ne bii nyiŋa, asɛ o bii ɛɛ no o deŋna waa dɛɛ tɛo duure.
54003005	Dɛ nɛn aa won o haah ne bii nyiŋi aa, ɛrɛɛ wɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ won nyiŋi asɔre tena nɛɔ?
