54003006	A chɛ kɛ o ɛ nɛn waa kpɔ o te tɛ Korowii dɛ yaradao bigri, gɛ aa ɛ nɛra waa tɔ ba sie la nomanta, o nyu bini bɛ on som ba do o maŋkura o te kohona, asɛ o ba jo Korowii nɛɛ gɛ Bɔnsam aa ɛa la.
54003007	A chɛ kɛ o ɛ nɛn nɛra baa wola asɔre tena ɛɛ kwara aa dɛ yerɛ o sɔndɛɛge, asɛ o bɛ sihiih waane ba ɛ dɛ le Bɔnsam bel ta.
54003008	Nɛra baa chɔ tomare nyoa asɔre la ta la ge, gɛ. A wer kɛŋɔ baa ɛ waa aa dɔ duure, dɛɛ di kasinteŋ. Ba ta chɛɛ kɛ ba ɛ sennyɔdɛɛra, ba ta chɛɛ kɛ ba kpɔ suuga sibegra dɛɛ bɔ nɛra apoo.
54003009	A chɛ kɛ ba kpoŋe Korowii wesɔɔhla waa waa gela ya jemɛ la bini kiŋkiŋ, dɛɛ ɛ waa baa naa kɛ a togrɔ.
54003010	A wer kɛŋɔ he nyiŋi ba waa bini dɛ na dɛ ba waa wer mɔɔ he tɛɛ ba ŋwɛnɛ ba ɛ gɛ toma la.
54003011	Ba haahna chɛ kɛ baa ɛ waa aa dɔ duure, dɛ bɛ nɛra dɛɛ ŋwalɛ. A chɛ kɛ ba won ba te lawa, dɛ kpɔ kasinteŋ dɛɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa.
54003012	A chɛ kɛ nomɛlbwa waa chɔ asɔre tomare nyoa la haah ɛ beŋkpoŋ, dɛ won o haah ne bii nyiŋa kɛrɛdɛ.
54003013	Banɔ la baa dɛ ɛ ba toma kɛrɛdɛ la dɛ dɔ sɔn, dɛɛ do kpegri yarada baa dɔa dɛɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ la ta.
54003014	N dɛ nyin kɛ n wonaa, ń ba nae. Kɛ n tɔ sie chwerɛ waa nɔ dɛɛ tɛɛ,
54003015	asɛ dɛ n baa bigri aa, tɔ́n nɔ bagle gɛ aa chɛ kɛ ya banɔ la Korowii aa kpɔ yaa ɛ o dem tena nɔ so dɛɛ ɛ ya wa. Yanee Korowii waa wola sewɛ bwa la toroma waa kpɔ o kasinteŋ waa la tɛ ŋɔ yá lawɛ a bini kpoŋe kiŋkiŋ kɛ pila yon lawɛ dea kpoŋe la.
54003016	Ŋwɛnɛ yaa kpɔ o ta dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii nɔ, tɔŋla toole kɛ wesɔɔhla aa lɔ o ta asɛ Korowii gel ya jemɛ la ɛ wejena kohona. Waa yaa lawɛ a bini kpoŋe laanee: Korowii baa berɛ o te nɛwɛnyini. O Domadɛɛge la gelɔ nɛra bwa jemɛ kɛ o waa togrɔ. Nyundua toroma nao. Nɛra bol o waa bagle harɛ nɔ ta nɛra baa lɔ bobɛlbwa. Ba no o waa harɛ nɔ ta dɛ yaradao, asɛ Korowii kpɔɔ kaa nyundua o ka dɔ jirima.
54004001	Korowii Domadɛɛge la pili waa nɔ bini chasee ken bagle heyaa ŋɔ, kerekere la nɛra bane ɛɛ vɛh Yeesu waa nɔɔ dɛ kaa yarada koŋkwaa aa dɛ neg ba, asɛ dɛɛ no a be.
54004002	Nɛra baa kpɔ nyosone dɛɛ negre nɛra laanee kpɔ gɛ negra webagla la ɛɛ bagle nɛra. Ba liire chɔgɔ. Nɛra negra ne wechɔga man ba kɛŋɔ nɛn baa kpɔ buniwɔb chɔgro a mano waa wola konwɔb ɔmɛ kpa la.
54004003	Gɛ nɛra nɔɔ vala dɛɛ chagle nɛra ŋɔ aa were kɛ baa mo haah kɛɛ haah yalɛ la, dɛ berɛ ŋɔ kondikwaa ane aa were kɛŋɔ nɛra di la. Kɛ Korowiirii ta gɛ kondikwaa nɔ ŋɔ bánɔ la baa jemɛ kasinteŋ waa la dɛɛ yaradao la kpɔ jam tɛo dɛ dia.
54004004	Korowii kontaala te bwa wer. Dɛ ya kpɔ jam tɛo mɔɔ dɛ lɛa te naa, ate dɛ komɛlbwa ta vɛɛh doe,
54004005	dɛkalkɛ gɛ haa jam Korowii la ne Korowii gbagba wobol la won gela a do wer Korowii be ásɛ nɛn di.
54004006	Dɛ he kpɔ gɛ waa nɔ bagle he bala aa, anee dɛɛ ba chagla kɛŋɔ he ɛ Yeesu Kristo torome tenten haa teŋɛ Korowii waa haa yaradaa ne kasinteŋ la ta, dɛ kpɔ kpeg dɛ do kpegri.
54004007	Laa he te kpɔ wobosale aa wola Korowii waa ɛɛ nɛra ɛɛ nyin a bola la ta, dɛ swɛɛ siwi hweli gɛ haa dɛɛ teŋɛ Korowii waa la ta.
54004008	Dɛ he swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ tɛgre he pɔla bini naa, a dɔ tɔnɔ tama. Kɛ dɛ he swɛɛ siwi kɛ hɛɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ Korowii waa la taa yaa, anee dɔ tɔnɔ wobɛlbwa ta, dɛkalkɛ Korowii nɛɛ teŋa dɔ tɔnɔ tɛ nɛra fini ne seo habɔɔ bwa.
54004009	Gɛ waa nɔ ɛ kpela tɔŋla aa wola toole a ta kwaraa. Anomanta no dɛ lawɛ a bini kpoŋe kɛrɛdɛ.
54004010	Koeh yaa dɛ swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ ɛ o toma nɔ bwa, Korowii waa lole saŋ bɛlbwa o gbo ɛ Korowii la nɛɛ ya sie dawɛ. Onee dɛɛ lɛ nɛn te bɛlbwa. Nomɛlbwa waa yaradao dɛ kpɔ o te tɛo la, o dɛ lɛo.
54004011	Dɛɛ chag ba gɛ waa nɔ bwa dɛɛ ja ba báa teŋɛ a ta.
54004012	Bɛ gel nɛra koh kɛ he ɛ bechala nomanta dɛɛ ɛɛ sisawa, kɛ gel nɛra baa yarada Yeesu la na gɛ haa dɛ bol wa, gɛ he da aa doa, gɛ haa dɛ nyin nɛn, gɛ haa yarada Yeesu dɛ kpɔ he te tɛo, ne gɛ haa laa he te kpɔ wedoŋa ta, asɛ dɛ hweli waa le a ta.
54004013	Do sie kure Korowii Tɔn dɛɛ bag ba cheremi bɔra, dɛɛ bol Korowii Waa la dɛɛ chag ba a bini ka tel gɛ saŋ maa ba.
54004014	Kpegri Korowii aa chae he dɔ dɛ le awola baa kpɔ nɔɔra darawe he nɛɛ dɛ che Korowii Domadɛɛge kpegri ta dɛ bol a waa la, bɛ gel a ɛ pɛɛ.
54004015	Swɛɛ siwi dɛ kpɔ he te tɛ gɛ waa nɔ dɛɛ ɛa ásɛ nɛra bwa na gɛ he toma aa dɛ kaa kɛrɛdɛ.
54004016	Dɛɛ nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ he soga bini ne he webagla bini. Kpoŋe a bini kiŋkiŋ, dɛɛ ɛ gɛ haa dɛ bagle nɛra la. Dɛ he dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, hɛɛ lɛ he gbagba ne nɛra baa dɛ no he be la bwaa.
54005001	Dɛ baa waa gwaale nomoa ɛ waane aa wola weraa, bɛ o nɛɛ nyɛg, kɛ bol waa baglo kɛŋɔ he gbagba mɛɛ, asɛ dɛɛ ɛ bibaala haa ɛ nomoa ka tɛɛ ba la ge kɛŋɔ he gbagba nimanar,
54005002	dɛ kpɔ haahna baa gwaale nomonome la ɛ he nyare. Asɛ bihaahna haa gwaa ba la ge, hɛ́ɛ ɛɛ ba kɛ he nimambii, wedoŋa bɛlbwa bɛ he ne ba baah ta do.
54005003	Haahna ba jaranar aa serewa baa wola nomɛlbwa dɔe ó nyiŋi ba nɛɛ la, dɛɛ duu ba dɛɛ cha ba.
54005004	Kɛ dɛ luhaah bɛl lole dɛ dɔ bii kɛɛ naanar aa, a chɛ kɛ ba jemɛ gɛ ba ne waa so, ba nyiŋu, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a wer kɛŋɔ nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ Korowii waa ta la ɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga dɛɛ nyiŋi ba lolanar gɛ ba ge faa koh ba nɛɛ la. Gɛɛ dɛɛ su Korowii siwi.
54005005	Luhaah waa nyaa o ta nɛn dɔe ó nyiŋi o nɛɛ la te, Korowii nɛɛ o sie dawɛ wɛɛ soŋo chɔɔ ne jwaana bwa ó chao.
54005006	Kɛ luhaah bodia wa aa dɛ lɛ o sie la, o soge le te, kɛ o do kɛŋɔ nɛn waa sewa.
54005007	Ja ba gɛ waa nɔ ta asɛ nɛra bɛ ba bwara wechɔge dɔ bol.
54005008	Dɛ nomɛl lole, waa o nya ne o mɛɛ kɛɛ o dem tena nyiŋi aa, naate Korowii toma ɛ pɛɛ. Naate waa wola Korowii yarada gba bɔɔ.
54005009	Bɛ luhaah waa wola bene fifraanumɛl dɔe mɔɔ la kure ja luhaahna maa bol ba waa ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ cha ba dɛɛ nyiŋ ba la nɛ. Luhaah waa dɔ bene fifraanumɛl, waa wola baa bɛlbwa jemɛ ka ja o jaa nɛ,
54005010	nɛra bwa jemɛ o wedɛɛga waa ɛa wa, kɛŋɔ waa wona dɛɛ o bii ŋwɛnɛdɛɛge ta ba ɛ bechadɛɛga, dɛ won dɛɛ kpoŋe hɔɔhra kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ pwɛr o te ɛ toma tɛ asɔre tena, dɛ won cha nɛra wa aa puu ba, asɛ dɛ won kpɔ o te bwa tɛ wedɛɛga ɛɛ gbo la waa mɛɛ bol he be ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi ba nɛɛ la.
54005011	Bɛ luhaahna ba taa ɛ toli kure ja luhaahna maa bol ba waa nɔ nɛ, dɛkalkɛ ba pɛla ɛɛ ba lawɛ yalee, ba gel Yeesu Kristo toma la dɛ ka yalɛ,
54005012	asɛ a ɛ wechɔga tɛɛ ba kɛŋɔ ba faa bola ŋɔ Yeesu Kristo toma gboo baa ba ɛɛ, dɛ berɛ vɛh la.
54005013	Luhaahna nɔ dɔŋa, baa wedɛɛga bɛlbwa dɔe dɛɛ ɛ ka ja kɛŋɔ baa dɛ gaage dɛɛ valɛ deremi ta pɛɛpɛɛ. A gbo laa. Baa kpɔ nyoa dɛɛ do nɛra waa ta, dɛɛ ŋwalɛ nɛra, asɛ dɛɛ bol waa aa wola chɛɛ kɛŋɔ ba bol bwa.
54005014	Anomanta dɛ luhaahna ba taa ɛ toli la yalɔ dɛ logle bii, dɛ won ba deremi ta nyiŋa, gɛ aa ɛ asɛ ya dɔma bɛ wedoŋa bɛlbwa dɔ bol yagɛ yaa aa, gɛɛ n fe ɛɛ nyin.
54005015	Taraken gba, luhaahna bane dɔɔ le Yeesu Kristo habɔɔ dɛ ka teŋɛ Bɔnsam nɛɛ tonɛ.
54005016	Haah bɛlbwa waa ɛ asɔre te asɛ luhaahna do o dem la, ó takapɔ kɛ wɛɛ nyiŋi luhaahna laanee asɛ dɛ bɛ koeh la bwa kpɔ dawɛ asɔre nɛ, gɛ aa ɛ asɛ asɔre ge won nyiŋi luhaahna la baa wola nɛra dɔe bá nyiŋi ba nɛɛ la.
54005017	Asɔre nomonome la baa dɛ tɔ asɔre tena sie kɛrɛdɛ la chɛ kembɔr bele anɛ. Banee kɛŋɔ banɔ la ba sie aa dɛ begre Korowii Waa la bola ne a chagla ta la,
54005018	dɛkalkɛ a lɔ Korowii Tɔn la bini kɛ, "He bɛ nae aa dɛ ɛ toma he koo ta la nyoa vɔwɛ dɛ ŋɔ a bɛ kwaa di." Dɛ berɛ chwerɛ do o bini ja ŋɔ, "Tom-ɛɛ bɛlbwa kembɔr chɛo."
54005019	Dɛ nomɛl ba he be dɛ ba kpɔ waa dɛ dawɛ asɔre nomoa bɛl aa, bɛ no nemenɛ nɛn nɛɛte ne tooro te baa di danseɛ kɛ waa la ɛ kasinteŋ mɔɔ he no dɛ kpɔ ɛ wa.
54005020	Dɛ bɛl ɛ wechɔga aa, yerɔ cheme asɔre tena la bwa sie dɛ kaoh. He ɛ gɛ naa, nɛra baa lɔ bela dɛ na la ɛɛ ɔmɔɔ dɛ laa ba te dɛɛ kpɔ wechɔga ta.
54005021	N chegɛ Korowii ne Yeesu Kristo ne nyundua toroma la bwa sie dɛ kpɔ waa nɔ dɛɛ tɛɛ, asɛ he we-ɛɛla bwa ta la, he bɛ gel nɛra bane waa su he siwi dɛ gwaa bane, kɛ dɛɛ ɛ ba bwa kɛrɛdɛ.
54005022	Bɛ totoo kpɔ nɔɔra dawɛ nomɛlbwa nɛɛ dɛ leo ŋɔ ó ɛ Korowii toma, asɛ dɛ naate ta ba wone kpoŋe tom la bini dɛ ka ɛ wechɔga aa, a ba maali. Nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ gel wedoŋa bɛlbwa maali.
54005023	He tea la ne gɛ he bwara yon dɛɛ wee warawara la nomanta, bɛ nee gbo dɛɛ nyɔ kpa. He ɛo waa, hɛ́ɛ nyɔ sen ge tama.
54005024	Nɛra bane lole, ba te ne wechɔga ɛɛ dɛ nɛra bwa nao, a yon che a ta ba la ba ne kɔɔto ka pa ba bolchɔge. Kɛ nɛra bane ge ɛ wechɔga aa, waa la peu dɛ kaa kwaraa mɔɔ nɛra jemɛ.
54005025	Gɛ tentenee wedɛɛga ɛɛ ge aa wola won sɔh. Dɛ nɛn ɛ wedɛɛga sɔh gba aa, aa le baŋee.
54006001	Nɛra baa ɛ nɛndɔɔla la chɛ kɛŋɔ baa ɔmɛ ba dɔɔranar dɛɛ duu ba, asɛ nɛra bɛ ŋwɛnɛ dɔ bol wechɔga yagɛ Korowii ne waa nɔ yaa dɛ chagle nɔ.
54006002	Nɛndɔɔla ba ne ba dɔɔranar bwa aa ɛ asɔre tena la bɛ koh kɛ ba ne ba bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ nomanta ba siwi ɛɛ sa ba. Ba tenee chɛ kɛ ba tomɛ ba dɔɔranar kɛrɛdɛ kwara, dɛkalkɛ ba dɔɔranar la ge ɛ asɔre tena baa dɛ nyin ba la bini bane. Bol gɛ waa nɔ bag ba dɛ chag ba a bini.
54006003	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ chagle Korowii Wa, asɛ a korɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo kasinteŋ waa la ta, ne gɛ yaa dɛ chagle nɛra ŋwɛnɛ baa kpɔa dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii la ta la,
54006004	naate dɛ maŋkura o te pɛɛpɛɛ. Waa wobɛlbwa jemɛ. Wetɔŋla dɛ weo chogla, asɛ wetama bɛlbwa dɛ o dɛ vuuga. Gɛ waa nɔɔ dɛɛ ba bɔweela ne nagra ne dɔŋa chɛgra ne liichɔga ne la.
54006005	Gɛ te la ne nɛra baa wola wedɛɛga lii, baa wola ya kasinteŋ waa la jemɛ la, ba dɛ sagɛ wetɔŋla aa wola mun dɔe ta, dɛ yon dɛɛ lii kɛ Korowii toma ɛ ŋwɛnɛ bɛl baa kpɔ o ta dɛɛ nyin suuga.
54006006	Nɛn haa dɛ tomɛ Korowii, he siwi ɛɛ su komɛlbwa Korowii aa tɛɛ la, he ɛ kondɔɔh tenten.
54006007	Baa lolɛ yaa la, ya ta komɛlbwa ne harɛ nɔ ta balɛ. Gɛɛ a do ya seo tɔpere ge yaa wola won kpɔ komɛlbwa le bonɔ kaa.
54006008	Anomanta, dɛ ya dɔ kwaa yaa di, dɛ dɔ yale dɛɛ tɔ aa, hé gel a magre ya ne.
54006009	Nɛra ba siwi aa swɛɛ suuga ta la dɛ chole. Suuga sibegra dɛ neg ba dɛɛ do pɛlchɔga ta, dɛ gel baa na wa, dɛɛ pɛlɛ konsale ne waa aa dɛ ba waa ne nɛ, dɛ yon gel ba chɔg kwaraa.
54006010	Suuga nyin kohona taa wechɔga bwa soosiwi ɛɛ le. Bane teŋɛ suuga nɛɛ kohona dɛ nyogre Korowii ŋwɛnɛ, dɛ gel suna dii berɛ ka ba name.
54006011	Hei, Timoti! Haa dɛ teŋɛ Korowii nɛɛ nɔ, a chɛ kɛŋɔ hɛɛ ke he te gɛ waa la te bwa ta, dɛ swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ ɛ waa aa dɛ su Korowii siwi, dɛɛ tomɔ, dɛ kpɔ he te tɛo dɛɛ yaradao, dɛɛ nyin nɛn, dɛ won bambile lawa wobɛlbwa ta, dɛ do pwɛre.
54006012	Yarada haa dɛ yarada Korowii nɔ, yodɛɛgee hɛɛ yo gɛ la. Anomanta yo kɛrɛdɛ dɛ́ dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la. A gɛ mkpa nɔɔ Korowii lee ŋɔ he ba dɔ gɛ saŋ haa chegɛ kiŋkiŋ dɛ bol gɛ haa yarada Yeesu Kristo bagle nɛnlaa la la.
54006013	Korowii waa tɛ komɛlbwa mkpa la, ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo la waa wona dɛ che Pɔnteɔs Paelet sie dɛ bol kasinteŋ la sɔn taa n che dɛɛ jae
54006014	kɛ hé lawɛ waa nɔ bini kɛrɛdɛ dɛ gel a togre asɛ nɛra bɛ a wobɛlbwa dɔ bol dɛ ka tel gɛ saŋ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo aa berɛ ba ja.
54006015	Dɛ o tɔpere baa telaa, Korowii ɛɛ geloo o berɛ ba. Korowiirii chɛ kpɛɛra. O gboo ɛ komɛlbwa nyu. Koranar bwa Kooro on, asɛ dɔɔranar bwa ge Dɔɔree on.
54006016	O gboo dɔ mkpa waa wola sewɛ bwa, dɛ so bela aa chaahna kohona nomɛlbwa aa wola won tel o jwɛh. Nomɛlbwa ta on nae ka, asɛ nomɛlbwa ge aa won nao bwa. Onee chɛ duure ne kpegri dɔe bwa saŋ bɛlbwa dɛɛ la. Aamen.
54006017	Bol waa nɔ nɛra baa ɛ dɔɔhna harɛ nɔ ta la be ŋɔ ba bɛ gel ba nyu bini do ba som kohona, dɛ bɛ hwɛga kpɔ do a gɛ kondɔɔh aa won tona dɛ won hee la ta. Kɛ bá kpɔ ba hwɛga do Korowii waa ta tea dɛɛ tɛ yaa komɛlbwa ásɛ ya won kpɔ dɛɛ lɛ ya sie la nɛ.
54006018	Ŋɔ ba be báa ɛ wedɛɛga ásɛ wedɛɛga berɛ ba kondɔɔh, ba won ba tea tae dɛɛ kɛ nɛra bwa.
54006019	Dɛ ba dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, an dɛɛ ba kerekere kondɔɔh aa wola chɔg bwa nyina cheg ba nyundua. A taa baa ba wona dɔ mkpa tenten la.
54006020	Hei, Timoti! Lawɛ waa la bwa Korowii aa kpɔa do he nɔn ta la bini kɛrɛdɛ. Laa he te kpɔ wesale nɛra aa dɛ bol a ne Korowii Waa aa wola kaa, ne gɛnewaa bane aa wola jemɛ dɛɛ yera wejema dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ tɔŋle kasinteŋ waa la ta,
54006021	dɛkalkɛ gɛ waa nɔ taa bane teŋɛ dɛ nyogre Korowii kasinteŋ ŋwɛnɛ la. Ń Naa Korowii cha he bwa.
55001001	Men Pɔɔl maa ɛ Yeesu Kristo torome la, men chwerɛ tɔn nɔ. A too Korowii tea o lee mɛ ŋɔ ń ka bol mkpa waa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ yá che Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɔ la wa.
55001002	N bidɛɛge Timoti, n dɛ nae. Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo chae, dɛ na he sum, dɛ tɛɛ bosɔɔhna.
55001003	N dɛ jam Korowii maa dɛ tomɔ tepoŋ ne gɛ tenten n naawa faa dɛ tomɔ la he wa. N Korowii soŋa ta bwaa mɛɛ jaamo he waa chɔɔ ne jwaana.
55001004	N lii wii awola haa wia la aa, gɛɛ n sie che chiŋ mɛɛ nyin n ba nae ásɛ n sie lɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
55001005	N dɛ lii gɛ haa kpɔ kasinteŋ dɛɛ yarada Korowii gɛ he naa Lowis ne he nya Yunis faa dɛ yaradao la. N jemɔ kɛ gɛ ba faa yarada Korowii dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo la, ba luge taa he den teŋɛ la.
55001006	A waa gela mɛɛ liiri kɛŋɔ hé ir nyu ne dɛ kpɔ Korowii kpegri awola maa kpɔ nɔn dawɛ he nɛɛ dɛ swee tɛɛ o kpɔ tɛɛ la ɛ toma,
55001007	dɛkalkɛ Korowii Doma waa kpɔa tɛ yaa la ta gelɛ ya ɛ ɔmeera. O gelɔ ya dɔ kpegri, dɛ dɔ dɔŋa nyina, dɛ won ya te lawa.
55001008	Bɛ gel a ɛɛ sihiih kɛ haa dɛ bol ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo waa dɛɛ bagle nɛra. Bɛ gel n ge waa dɔe sihiih kɛ baa koh Yeesu Kristo waa dɛ do mɛ dea la. Kɛ hé ge che Korowii kpegri waa kpɔa tɛɛ la ta dɛɛ na waa Amanesoma la wa.
55001009	Onee lɛ yaa, dɛ le yaa ŋɔ yá ba ɛ o nɛra. Ya tondɛɛga ɛɛ waa laa o le yaa, kɛ o liire waa dɔa tɛ yaa, ne gɛ waa na ya sum dɛ cha yaa waa o le yaa. Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ o che dɛ na ya sum, dɛ cha yaa dɛ le yaa mɔɔ dɛ ta komɛlbwa.
55001010	Kɛ tarakenii ya ta che ya Lɛɛ Yeesu Kristo bala waa ba harɛ bonɔ la ta dɛ jemɛ gɛ waa nɔ. O gelɔ seo ta kpegri dɔe kpa, dɛ berɛ che Amanesoma la ta bagle yaa gɛ yaa dɛ ba o mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa dɔe.
55001011	Amanesoma nɔ waa Korowii lee mɛ ŋɔ ń ba bol, dɛ gel n ɛ o torome ge dɛɛ bagle nɛra o wa.
55001012	A waa mɛɛ na waa maa dɛ na nɔ la. Sihiih ge aa men kpo, dɛkalkɛ n jemɛ naate maa yaradao dɛ kpɔ n te tɛo, asɛ dɛ jemɛ kɛnaŋɔ wɛɛ wonoo kpoŋe n ne toma waa kpɔa do n nɔn ta la sɔnɔnɔɔ ken dɛ ka tel o bala tɔpere.
55001013	Lawɛ kasinteŋ waa maa chagle la bini kiŋkiŋ, dɛ teŋɛ a ta, dɛ so Korowii yarada ne nɛnnyin yaa dɔa le pɛɛ ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa ta la ta.
55001014	Kpɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge la waa lɔ ya nɛɛ la kpegri lawɛ wedɛɛga Korowii aa kpɔa tɛɛ la bini kpoŋe kɛrɛdɛ.
55001015	He jemɔ kɛ nɛra baa lɔ Eesia harɛ ta bwa chwa mɛ, hale Fejelas ne Hɛmojenes gba jao.
55001016	N Naa Korowiirii dɛ na Oniseforɔs ne o dem tena sum, dɛkalkɛ dɛ on dɛɛ cha mɛ. Dɛ sihiih aa on kpo kɛ baa do mɛ dea la.
55001017	Waa dena tel Room laanee o gaage n bɔr aaa dɛ ka tel kɛ waa na mɛ.
55001018	Ya Dɔɔ laanee dɛ na o sum o bala tɔpere la ta. Henee jemɛ koeh damanta waa koh n nɛɛ Ɛfesos.
55002001	N bie Timoti, che kiŋkiŋ kpegri ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo aa chae he dɔ le pɛɛ he ne waa pɛa la ta.
55002002	Waa la nɛra aa chema warɛ asɛ n bol he be la, bola bagle nɛra ba wa aa dɔ kasinteŋ dɛ jemɛ kɛ ba gee wonoo kpɔ bol bagle nɛra bane ge la.
55002003	Dɛ wekpega pui toma nɔ ta naa, gel he bwara nyɛg kɛ Yeesu Kristo sooja gbagba.
55002004	Sooja bɛlbwa dɛ nyin kɛ o toma su o nomoa siwi. Anomanta waa o te kpɔe dɛɛ koo nɛmpɛɛne waa ta.
55002005	Chwachwaa waa dɛ chwa dɛ́ lɛ komɛl la ge, dɛ o ta chwae mmara la ta teŋaa, waa won chwa dɔ komɛlbwa.
55002006	Paa waa dɛ swɛɛ siwi o koo toma ta laanee chɛ kɛ o di koo la kondikonlogla.
55002007	Gel waa maa bola nɔ do he liire bini. Korowii ɛɛ geloo he jemɛ a bwa mun kɛrɛdɛ.
55002008	Lii Yeesu Kristo waa kɛŋɔ o iro seo ta. Kooro Devid Naa on. Gɛ waa nɔɔ mɛɛ bol Amanesoma maa dɛ bagle nɛra la ta,
55002009	dɛ koh a waa dɛɛ na wa, hale nɛra koh a waa dɛ do mɛ kwaa dɛ do mɛ dea kɛ wechɔg-ɛɛ. Kɛ Korowii waa te, nɛn aa won doa kwa.
55002010	Anomanta n koh nɛra Korowii aa lee ba la waa dɛ lawɛ bambile wobɛlbwa ta, ásɛ Yeesu Kristo lɛ ba ge, dɛ berɛ tɛɛ ba jirima aa wola jaga dɔe bwa.
55002011	Gɛ ba yon ŋɔ ɛ kasinteŋ. Ba ŋɔ, "Dɛ ya ne onee sewaa, ya ne wɛɛ berɔɔ ir dɛ dɔ mkpa.
55002012	Dɛ ya lawɛ bambile wobɛlbwa ta naa, ya ne wɛɛ di koraa. Dɛ ya ŋɔ ya ne o laa aa, o gee ŋɔɔ o ne ya laa.
55002013	Dɛ ya ta kasinteŋ tena ɛɛ yaa, o te ta ɛ kasinteŋ te, waa won begre o te."
55002014	Dɛɛ lii nɛra gɛ waa nɔ, dɛ kah ba sibegra ne Korowii sie ŋɔ ba bɛ waa dɛɛ tɔŋle. Wetɔŋla ta tɔnɔ bɛlbwa dɔe. Nɛra liiree aa chɔg.
55002015	Takapɔ kpɔ he te tɛ Korowii ásɛ he waa su o siwi kɛ nɛn waa dɛ ɛ o Korowii toma kɛrɛdɛ sihiih aa wola hen kpo, dɛ lawɛ kasinteŋ waa la bini kpoŋe kɛrɛdɛ.
55002016	Laa he te kpɔ nɛra baa dɛ bol wobosale a ne Korowii waa aa wola kaa la nɛ, dɛkalkɛ gɛ waa nɔ gelɔ nɛra ɛɛ le Korowii habɔɔ dɛ kaa ɛ anɔ la aa wola chɛɛ.
55002017	Ba webagla dɛ yɛɛ dɛɛ chɔg nɛra, gɛ ŋwɛrchɔge yon yɛ dɛ chɔg nɛn bwadabii la. Haemeneas ne Faeletɔs ja gɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ gɛ waa nɔ nɛ.
55002018	Banee nyogre kasinteŋ waa la ŋwɛnɛ, dɛ kaa bagle nɛra ŋɔ seo ta ira tɔpere la garɔ, dɛɛ chɔg nɛra baa yarada Amanesoma la bane liire waa baa yaradaa la ta.
55002019	Kɛ a ɛ wobɛlbwa Korowii Dea waa pa o mun la chegɔ kiŋkiŋ ken. Ba chwerɛ o ta ŋɔ, "Korowii jemɛ nɛra baa ɛ o kwa," dɛ berɛ chwerɛ ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa ŋɔa o ja Yeesu Kristo nɛra nɛɛ la chɛ kɛŋɔ o laa o te kpɔ wechɔga ta."
55002020	Dem waa kana la, konsiwi beŋkpoŋ gbo laa lɔ o ta. Suugaswɛm ne suugapoŋ kwaa lɔ o ta. Ane lole, daa nee ba sɛah, dɛ kpɔ choh ma ane ge. Ane lole, wejena ta gboo baa le a ne, asɛ ane ge ba kpɔa dɛɛ ɛ wesale bɛlbwa.
55002021	Anomanta dɛ nomɛlbwa laa o te kpɔ wedoŋa ne wechɔga bwa ta naa, naate la do kɛŋɔ kwaa baa dɛ le a ne wejena gbo ta la. O do kaih dɛ do le tɛ o Dɔɔ, dɛ dɔ tɔnɔ tɛo, dɛ che le kɛ ó kpɔɔ ɛ tondɛɛga te bwa.
55002022	Laa he te kpɔ wedoŋa bonɔɔna aa dɛ pɛlɛ a ta la ta, ásɛ he ne nɛra baa dɛ soŋe Korowii tepoŋ ne la siwi swɛɛ wedɛɛga ɛɛ aa dɛ su Korowii siwi, Korowii yaradae, nɛnnyin, ne waa aa dɛ ba deŋnesɔɔhna ne la ta.
55002023	Bɛ he te kpɔ dɛɛ jo gɛnewaa ne wesale tɔŋla ta. He gbabir jemɔ kɛ nagra nee aa ba.
55002024	Nɛn waa ɛ ya Dɔɔ bonɔɔ ta chɛ kɛŋɔ o ne nɛn nagre. A chɛ kɛ o pwɛr o te tɛ nomɛlbwa, dɛ won nɛra kwaa bagla kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ nɛn jo o nɛ aa, o won lawɛ bambile,
55002025	dɛɛ bagle nɛra o ne ba liire aa wola beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ la waa taa ne. Bɛl lole naa, Korowii ɛɛ na gɛ nɛra la sumii, dɛ gel ba charɛ ba liire, ásɛ ba won jemɛ kasinteŋ waa la,
55002026	asɛ ba sie ba harɛ ba chwa le Bɔnsam bel waa lag ba dɛ gel baa ɛ o waa waa dɛ nyin la ta, asɛ dɛ dɔ ba te.
55003001	Jemɛ kɛŋɔ tɔpera aa ba ka mun ba la, aa do kpegrii tɛ nɛra,
55003002	dɛkalkɛ nɛra ɛɛ dɛɛ nyin ba gbagbaa gwaa komɛlbwa, dɛɛ nyin suuga sibegra ne, dɛɛ ɛ mbarafo, dɛɛ ɛ jenu, dɛ bol waa dɛɛ yagɛ nɛra, dɛ ɛ deŋnekpeg tena baa wola ba eehnanar waa no, dɛ ɛ boniayɛ tena, dɛ ɛ ba te nɛndoŋa.
55003003	Ba chal aa dɔŋa nɛɛ doe ba, baa wechɔgaa kpɔ dɛɛ kɛ dɔŋa. Baa dɛɛ haŋɛ dɔŋa nyooree, baa haŋraa dɔ ba pɛla kwaa ta, baa dɛɛ ɛ gaeeh, baa hah wedɛɛgaa.
55003004	Baa ɛ bwɛpagre nɛraa, ba sie ɛɛ do wɔrɔbee, dɛɛ maŋkura ba te. Baa kpɔ silɛɛ kwaa gwaa Korowii.
55003005	Baa dɛɛ ɛ ba we-ɛɛlaa kɛ nɛra baa dɛ tomɛ Korowii ken, kɛ dɛɛ vɛh kpegri waa lɔ Korowii toma ta la te. Laa he te kpɔ gɛ nɛra nɔ bini.
55003006	Gɛ nɛra nɔ bini banee yon kpɔ ŋwɛnɛre ane ta dɛ sɔh jo deremi ta, asɛ dɛɛ dɔ haahna ba wechɔga aa gwaa ba nɛɛ ba sie ɛɛ yal ba ba pɛlchɔga ta la, ba yon dɛɛ teŋɛ ba nɛ.
55003007	A gɛ haahna la dɛ hweli waa tɔperee te bɛlbwa, kɛ kasinteŋ waa aa lɔ waa la bini la te, baa won an jemɛ bwa.
55003008	Gɛ Janes ne Jambɛs aa vuugi Mosis la, gɛɛ a gɛ nɛra nɔ gee vuugi kasinteŋ waa la. Ba liire aa were. Baa vɛh kasinteŋ waa la yaradae nomanta, Korowii vɛɛh ba.
55003009	Ba we-ɛɛla aa won tel sie bobɛlbwa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ a saŋ la tena aa na Janes ne Jambɛs gɛna la, gɛɛ nɛra ɛɛ na ba ge gɛna gɛ.
55003010	He Timoti te, he jemɛ waa maa dɛ bagle la bwa, dɛ jemɛ n da, ne kon la waa maa dɛ koh, ne gɛ maa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo, ne gɛ maa won bambile lawa, ne gɛ maa dɛ nyin nɛn, ne gbemba maa dɔa.
55003011	Fiiga baa fig mɛ ne n wenaale maa naa Anteɔk, Ikooniam ne Lestra, n lawɛ bambile a bwa ta la, he jemɛ a bwa. Kɛ ya Dɔɔ la cha mɛ dɛ lɛɛ mɛ a gɛ waa la bwa ta.
55003012	Kasinteŋ, nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin kɛ o ne Yeesu Kristo pɛ o soga bini o waa su Korowii siwi la, baa ɛo hɔhɔrɔwaa.
55003013	Nɛnchɔga ne nɛra baa negre nɛra dɛɛ do wechɔga ta la gee kao sagɛ wechɔga ɛɛ ta dɛɛ la, dɛɛ negre nɛra, asɛ nɛra ɛɛ negre ba ge.
55003014	Kɛ he te, dɛɛ teŋɛ kasinteŋ webagla haa hwela dɛ jemɛ kɛ a ɛ kasinteŋ la ta. Bɛ gel bwa. He jemɛ nɛra baa bagle gɛ waa la, dɛɛ yarada ba ge.
55003015	He bechale saŋ bwaa he le jemɛ Korowii Tɔn bini waa aa dɛ ba wona gel he dɔ wejema, dɛ che yarada haa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo la ta Korowii lɛɛ.
55003016	Korowii Tɔn bini waa bwa, Korowiirii kpɔa do nɛra liire ta ba chwera, asɛ a wer kɛ ba kpɔa dɛɛ bagle nɛra wa, dɛ kpɔa dɛɛ ja nɛra ba wechɔga ta, dɛ kpɔa dɛɛ togre nɛra, dɛ kpɔa dɛɛ chagle nɛra waa aa dɛ su Korowii siwi.
55003017	Anee dɛ won cha Korowii nɛn o won ɛ wedɛɛga bwa ka tonɛ.
55004001	N chegɛ N Naa Korowii ne Yeesu Kristo waa dɛ ba ba bol weera ne lala waa dɛ pa bole la sie, dɛ koh kora waa dɛ ba ba di la waa dɛɛ ŋɔ he be sibegra ne ŋɔ,
55004002	hé bol Amanesoma la bagle nɛra. A som oo, aa somoo, kpɔ he te kɛ saŋ te bɛlbwa hɛɛ bolaa. Egle sie ta ba nɛ, dɛ gel ba jemɛ wechɔga baa dɛ ɛ, asɛ dɛɛ ja ba. Lawɛ bambile dɛɛ chag ba.
55004003	Tɔpere bɛl ɛɛ bao asɛ nɛra aa kasinteŋ waa la baglaa no, dɛkalkɛ baa an nyin. Baa dɛɛ nyin waa aa dɛ do ba somee dɛ́ no, dɛ ka nyin nɛra pirim bá baa chag ba waa ba pɛla aa lɔ a ta la,
55004004	dɛ laa ba deŋne kpɔ kasinteŋ waa la ta, dɛ kaa no nyosonwa.
55004005	Kɛ he te, dɛɛ lawɛ he te wobɛlbwa ta. Wekpega pui naa, lawɛ bambile. Dɛɛ lɔ Amanesoma la dawuro, asɛ dɛɛ ɛ he toma bwa kɛ Korowii bonɔɔ.
55004006	N te, n seo tɔpere telo, n do kɛ sen baa dɔa dɛɛ ta dɛ ɛ saraha tɛ Korowii.
55004007	N yo yodɛɛge la dɛ tonɛ, dɛ chwa chwae la ge tonɛ. Amanesoma maa dɛ yaradaa la ta ge, n ta habɔɔ leɛ.
55004008	Kon waa ka mɛ taraken laanee kompoŋ Korowii ɛɛ ba nɛndɛɛga baa yoa le ba waa su o siwi la vɔwa. N Dɔɔ waa kpɔ kasinteŋ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole laanee dɛɛ ba n tɛɛ awola waa ba bol nɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole la. N gbo laa dɛɛ ba gɛ kembɔr la dɔe. Nɛra baa dɛ pɛlɛ o nɛɛ dɛɛ nyiŋu ŋwɛnɛ la bwa ɛɛ dɔɔ.
55004009	Takapɔ ba n be warane,
55004010	dɛkalkɛ Demas koh harɛ nɔ ta silɛɛ waa dɛ chwa mɛ. O chwao kaa Tɛsalonika. Krɛsens kaa Galaasia harɛ ta, asɛ Taetos ge kaa Dalmatia harɛ ta.
55004011	Luk gboo lɔ n be bonɔ. He dɛ ba naa, kpɔ Maak ja he nɛɛ he ne o ba, dɛkalkɛ o ɛ nɛn bɛl waa won n chae n toma nɔ ta ga.
55004012	N tomɛ Tichikos Ɛfesos.
55004013	Dɛ he dɛ ba naa, kpɔ Kaapus be Troas dɛ lɛ n batakaare dɛɛ baa mɛ. Lɛ n tɔne la ge ja dɛɛ baa mɛ. Anɔ la baa kpɔ ol tɔn ɛa la waa dena hiah mɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
55004014	Logre bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Alɛksanda la ɛɛ mɛ wechɔga taeh. Korowii ɛɛ bɔɔ o waa waa ɛa la kemee.
55004015	Hé ge nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ, dɛɛ ke he te o nɛ, dɛkalkɛ o ta yaa sie tɛɛ ya webagla ta kwaraa.
55004016	Baa yer mɛ cheme ŋɔ ń ba tɔh n nyoa logla la, n ta nomɛlbwa dɔe ó ba che n habɔɔ. Nɛra bwa chwa mɛ. Korowii bɛ gel a ɛ wechɔga gure ba nɛ.
55004017	Kɛ ya Dɔɔ la chegɛ n habɔɔ dɛ tɛ mɛ kpegri n won bol Amanesoma la bwa, asɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la bwa no. Korowii lɛɛ mɛ le siswɛm ta kɛŋɔ nɛn baa lɛo le nyujente nyoa ta ken.
55004018	Ya Dɔɔ la ɛɛ lee mɛ wobɛlbwa taa, dɛ kpɔ mɛ sɔnɔnɔɔ ken kaa o nyundua koobwɛɛ la ta. Onee chɛ kɛ ya tɛo jirima tɔpere bɛlbwa aa wola jaga dɔe. Aamen.
55004019	N dɛ na Presela ne Akwela ne nɛra baa lɔ Oniseforɔs dem bwa.
55004020	Erastos ta lɔ Kɔrent. Trɔfemos bwara dɛ weo nomanta, n gelo Maeletus.
55004021	Takapɔ dɛ ba mɔɔ alalawo saŋ tel. Yubilɔs ne Pudens ne Laenos ne Klɔdea ne he bala asɔre tena baa kaa la bwa dɛ nae.
55004022	Yá Dɔɔ ja he nɛ. Ń Naa Korowii cha he bwa sekwaraa.
56001001	Men Pɔɔl maa ɛ Korowii bonɔɔ dɛ berɛ ɛ Yeesu Kristo torome la, men chwerɛ tɔn nɔ. Korowiirii lee mɛ dɛ ŋɔ mɛ́ɛ cha nɛra waa lee ba tɛ o te la, ásɛ ba yarada kaa sie ba won jemɛ o kasinteŋ la, dɛ che a ta tomɛ Korowii.
56001002	Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la hwɛgaa n dɔ. Korowii waa wola nyosone teŋe laanee bagɛ gɛ mkpa nɔ nyoa bil mɔɔ dɛ ta komɛlbwa.
56001003	Tɔpere o tea aa toora la, o gelɔ mɛɛ bol a waa nɛra jemɛ. Ya Lɛɛ Korowiirii kpɔa do n nɔn ta dɛ ŋɔ mɛ́ɛ bagle nɛra.
56001004	N bie Taetos, henee n chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ. Waa ya bwa aa dɛ yarada la taa a che he ɛ n bie tenten. Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Lɛɛ Yeesu Kristo chae dɛ tɛɛ bosɔɔhna.
56001005	N gele Kret ásɛ he tonɛ waa aa hiah kɛ he ɛ la bwa, dɛ cheg nomonome asɔrere aa lɔ bwɛɛre la bɛlbwa ta gɛ maa bagle la.
56001006	He dɛ nyin he le asɔre nomoa aa, kpɔ onɔ la nomɛlbwa aa wola o wechɔge bɛlbwa dɔe dɛɛ bol, o dɔ hahbeŋkpoŋa, o bii gee yarada Yeesu, nɛra aa wola ba waa bol ŋɔ ba chɔgɔ dɛ ɛ deŋnekpeg tena,
56001007	dɛkalkɛŋɔ, a chɛ kɛ nɛn waa dɛ tɔ asɔre tena sie la ɛ nɛndɛɛge nomɛlbwa aa wola o wechɔgee dɔ bol bwa, waa ɛ Korowii bonɔɔ nomanta. A chɛ kɛ o ɛ nɛn waa wola o te bagle, dɛ lɛ nɛn kon dɛɛ ja o kon ta, o baah naa wola di warawara, waa wola sennyɔdɛɛ ɛɛ, waa wola nagra nyin, o siwi aa wola suuga ta begre kohona.
56001008	A chɛ kɛ o ɛ nɛn waa dɛ nyin hɔɔhra lɛɛ, dɛɛ nyin wedɛɛga, dɛ dɔ nfɛrɛ kɛrɛdɛ, o waa do kaih, wedoŋa bɛlbwa aa wola toole o nɛ, wɛɛ lawɛ o te kɛrɛdɛ.
56001009	A chɛ kɛŋɔ wɛɛ teŋɛ Korowii kasinteŋ waa la ta gɛ ba faa baglo la, dɛ won dɛɛ bagle Korowii waa a ŋwɛnɛ ta nɛra be, asɛ dɛ won dɛɛ ja ba, dɛ bol waa dɛɛ bagle banɔ la baa dɛ tɔŋle kasinteŋ waa la ásɛ ba ge jemɛ.
56001010	Deŋnekpeg tena lole taraken taeh, dɛ kpɔ wepuu dɛɛ negre nɛra. Juda tena baa lɔ he bini dɛɛ maŋkura penteŋ laanee dena dɛɛ ɛ gɛ kohona.
56001011	A chɛ kɛ he kah ba ba tɔ nyoa. Ba dɛ chɔg dembir nɛra liire ba yon vɛh kasinteŋ waa la ta teŋa. Ba koh suuga waa dɛɛ chagle waa aa wola chɛɛ.
56001012	Kret tena la bɛl baa dɛ liiru kɛŋɔ o jemɛ wobol kɛrɛdɛ fa bolɔ ŋɔ, "Ya Kret tena bwa ɛ nyosonteŋna, ya we-ɛɛla do kɛŋɔ kpɔg bini ola ken. Ya ɛ bɔhwaahra dɛɛ di kwaa kohona."
56001013	Kpelaa o bol, anomanta di ba kasinteŋkpeg ba jemɛ, asɛ dɛ gel gɛ da la, dɛ baa teŋɛ Korowii waa aa ɛ kasinteŋ la ta.
56001014	Ŋɔ ba bɛ deŋne cheg dɛɛ no Juda tena waa aa ɛ nyosone la, ne waa nɛra baa vɛh kasinteŋ waa la aa ŋɔa báa ɛ la.
56001015	He tea too waa, komɛlbwa wer tɛɛ, haa an kondoŋa lii. Kɛ nɛra wechɔga aa lɔ ba nɛɛ baa wola yarada la, komɛlbwa ɛ kondoŋ tɛɛ ba. Ba liire ne ba bambile bwa doŋo.
56001016	Ba ŋɔ ba jemɛ Korowii, kɛ ba we-ɛɛla dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ baa Korowii jemɛ. Ba we-ɛɛla doŋo Korowii be kohona, ba deŋne ge kpegri. Baa won ɛ wedɛɛge bɛlbwa bwa.
56002001	He te, a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ bagle Korowii waa aa ɛ kasinteŋ a ŋwɛnɛ ta kɛrɛdɛ.
56002002	Ŋɔ banjeni be báa lawɛ ba te, dɛɛ ɛ waa aa dɔ duure, dɛ dɔ nfɛrɛ, dɛɛ teŋɛ Korowii waa aa ɛ kasinteŋ kɛrɛdɛ, dɛɛ nyin nɛn, dɛ dɔ bambile ge.
56002003	Ŋɔ hanjeni ge be báa ɔmɛ Korowii dɛ gel ba we-ɛɛla do kaih, dɛ bɛ nɛra dɛɛ ŋwalɛ, dɛ bɛ gel sen lɛ ba liire. Báa bagle waa aa wera.
56002004	Dɛ ba dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, anee dɛ bagle han-yala báa nyin ba jaranar ne ba bii,
56002005	dɛ dɔ nfɛrɛ kɛrɛdɛ, wedoŋa bɛlbwa aa wola toole ba nɛ, dɛ won ba dem tomare ɛɛ, dɛɛ ɛ nɛra wedɛɛga, dɛɛ no ba jaranar wa, asɛ nomɛlbwa bɛ Korowii waa la wechɔge dɔ bol.
56002006	Ŋɔ bonɔɔna ge be ŋɔ bá dɔ nfɛrɛ wobɛlbwa ta.
56002007	Henee chɛ kɛ he gel he we-ɛɛla do wer wobɛlbwa ta ásɛ ba nyiŋi dɛɛ hweli. Dɛɛ bagle waa kasinteŋ ne, dɛɛ swɛɛ siwi a ta.
56002008	Gel a togre kɛrɛdɛ, nɛra bɛ a wobɛlbwa dɔ dɛ bol, asɛ he dɔma bɛ ya wechɔge bɛlbwa dɔ dɛ bol, asɛ sihiih kpo ba.
56002009	Gel nɛra baa lɔ bane nɔn ta kɛŋɔ bonɔɔna kɛɛ toli la no kɛŋɔ báa no ba dɔɔranar wa. Bá gel ba wa ɛɛ lɛ ba sie wobɛlbwa ta, dɛ bɛ waa begre dɛɛ do ba nyoa,
56002010	dɛ bɛ ba kwaa dɛɛ ŋwɛ. Kɛ bá gel ba we-ɛɛla dɔ yarada ba dɔɔranar be. Gɛɛ dɛɛ ba gela ya Lɛɛ Korowii waa nɔ yaa dɛ bagle nɔ che ba nɛɛ dɛ dɔ sɔn wobɛlbwa ta.
56002011	Suna Korowii aa dɛ sune nɛra nɛɛ leɔ taraken ásɛ nɛra bwa jemɛ, ó lɛɛ ba.
56002012	Anomanta gɛ dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ a wer kɛ ya laa sie kpɔ wechɔga bɛlbwa ne harɛ nɔ ta pɛlchɔga la bwa ta, dɛ dɔ nfɛrɛ, dɛɛ ɛ waa aa togra, dɛɛ ɔmɛ Korowii ya bere nɔ ta,
56002013	dɛɛ kpa gɛ saŋ Yeesu Kristo aa ba o jirima ne ya nao la. Onee Korowiijen ne ya Lɛɛ la. O bala taa ya dɔ hwɛga ne silɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
56002014	O koh ya waa dɛ sewɛ dɛ́ won lɛ yaa le wechɔga bɛlbwa ta, dɛ laa ya doŋa bwa kpɔ ya nɛ, dɛ kpɔ yaa ɛ o gbo nɛra yaa swɛɛ siwi wedɛɛga ɛɛ ta.
56002015	Bag ba gɛ waa nɔ bwa, dɛ kpɔ he kpegri do ba gbemba, dɛ ja ba, dɛ bɛ gel ba bɛlbwa nyiŋi he nyubaah.
56003001	Lii ba ŋɔ báa pwɛr ba te dɛɛ tɛ nomonome baa dɛ di kpegri te bɛlbwa, dɛɛ no ba deŋna wa, dɛ kpɔ ba te kɛ baa dɛɛ ɛ waa aa wera bwaa.
56003002	Ŋɔ ba be ba bɛ nɛra bwara wechɔge dɛɛ bol, ba bɛ dɛɛ nagre, báa pwɛr ba te, dɛɛ tɛ nomɛlbwa duure.
56003003	Maa dɛ ŋɔ naa, ya gbabir fa gɛnɔ. Ya fa ɛ deŋnekpeg tena. Ba fa negre yaa, pɛlchɔga ne bodia kpɔ yaa berɛ yoma. Meesɔɔh ne bɔweela bwa nee ya faa so. Nɛra fa hah yaa, ya ge hah dɔŋa.
56003004	Kɛ ya Lɛɛ Korowii aa le chae waa cha yaa la ne o nyina waa dɛ nyin nɛn ne asɛ ya jemɛ a waa la,
56003005	o lɛ yaa ta. Ya wedɛɛga waa laa o lɛ yaa ta. Sunaa o sune ya nɛɛ dɛ lɛ yaa ta, dɛ sɔ yaa nee ya won do kɛ baa bera kwaa lolɛ yaa. O Domadɛɛge waa kpɔa tɛ yaa o kwaa yaa la nɛɛ ya che dɛ dɔ mkpafale.
56003006	O Domadɛɛge waa kpɔa tɛ yaa la, ya Lɛɛ Yeesu Kristo waa o koh tɛ yaa kohona.
56003007	Korowii aa sune ya nɛɛ dɛ cha yaa dɛ gel ya ɛ nɛndɛɛga ya waa su o siwi la, ya dɔ hwɛga kɛ o mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa la ɛɛ ɛ ya konee.
56003008	Waa nɔ bwa ɛ kpela. Anomanta dɛɛ berɛ a bagla ɔma ásɛ nɛra baa no Korowii waa dɛ yarada la swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga. Gɛɛ wera dɛ dɔ tɔnɔ tɛ nomɛlbwa.
56003009	Kɛ laa he te kpɔ gɛne wetɔŋla ne gɛ he naanar aa teŋɛ dɔŋa nɛɛ waa bini bagla ta, ne nagrenyin, ne Mmara ŋwɛnɛre waa tɔŋla ta. A ta tɔnɔ bɛlbwa dɔe. A ɛ wepuu.
56003010	Nɛn waa dɛ ba nɛra baah pegra ne la, bol waa baglo ó gel. Dɛ o ta teŋɔ dɛɛ ɛ aa, bol waa baglo ja. Dɛ o ta he nɛɛtena waa la noɛ yaa, he ne o bɛ wobɛlbwa ta pɛ.
56003011	Jemɛ kɛŋɔ nɛn waa do gɛ la vɛh kasinteŋ waa la. O gbabir jemɔ kɛŋɔ o dɛ ɛ wechɔga gba, kɛ dɛ ge taa ɛ.
56003012	Dɛ n tomɛ Aatemes kɛɛ Tichikos he be naa, takapɔ dɛ ba n be Nikopolis warane. N ɛ n liire kɛ ń ka so bela alalawo saŋ.
56003013	Takapɔ dɛ cha Sɛnos waa ɛ mmara jereme la ne Apolos bá won la ba ŋwɛnɛ la. Bɛ gel komɛlbwa baa kpɔ la ŋwɛnɛ la waa hiah ba.
56003014	Gel yabala bwa hweli wedɛɛga ɛɛ, dɛɛ cha nɛra aa hiah ba, dɛ bɛ nɛra baa wola tɔnɔ dɔe ɛ.
56003015	Nɛra n ne baa lɔ bonɔ la bwa dɛ nae. N dɛ na nɛra baa dɛ nyin yaa ya ne baa yarada Yeesu la. Kórowii cha he bwa.
57001001	Men Pɔɔl baa koh Yeesu Kristo waa dɛ do mɛ dea la, ne ya dɔŋ Timotii chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ ya dandɛɛge Faelemɔn waa bera ɛ ya dɔŋ tom-ɛɛ ge la,
57001002	ne ya nimambie Apia, ne ya dɔŋ Akipus ya ne waa chega dɛ yo dɛɛ tɛ Korowii o toma nɔ ta la, ne asɔre tena baa dɛ cheme he dem la bwa.
57001003	Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
57001004	N Korowii soŋa bini te bɛlbwa, n dɛ yerɛ he Faelemɔn sɔn dɛ kpɔ jam dɛɛ tɛ Korowii,
57001005	dɛkalkɛŋɔ n no he nyina haa dɛ nyin Korowii nɛra bwa ne gɛ haa dɛ yarada ya Dɔɔ Yeesu la wa.
57001006	Waa maa dɛ soŋe Korowii laanee kɛŋɔ nyopɛo la he ne o nɛra aa dɔa hɛɛ yaradao la chae kɛrɛdɛ, ásɛ he won jemɛ wedɛɛga te bɛlbwa Korowii aa dɛ nyin o cha yaa ya won dɔ, pɛɛ ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la nomanta.
57001007	N dam, he nyina haa dɛ nyin Korowii nɛra la dɛ do mɛ gbemba dɛ gel n sie ɛɛ lɛ taeh, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he dɛ nyiŋ ba dɛɛ do ba gbemba.
57001008	He nɛnnyin nomanta, n dɛ nyin kɛ n soŋe waane. N fe dɔ ŋwɛnɛ Yeesu Kristo be pera kɛŋɔ ń di kpegri he nɛɛ dɛ ŋɔ hé ɛ gɛ aa wera kɛŋɔ he ɛ, kɛ maa gɛɛ ɛ.
57001009	Nyina haa dɛ nyin nɛra la taa n che dɛɛ soŋe, nyiŋi gɛ men Pɔɔl aa ɛ banjena, ne dea baa koh Yeesu Kristo waa dɛ do mɛ nɔ ta dɛ no n waa nɔ.
57001010	He nɛndɔɔle Onisemɔs waa ɛ n bie Yeesu Kristo be pera la naa taa n che dɛɛ soŋe waa nɔ. Gɛ saŋ baa do mɛ dea la taa n bol Yeesu waa baglo o kpɔ o te tɛo.
57001011	Wubwa la dɛ o ta tɔnɔ dɔe tɛɛ, kɛ taraken te o dɔ tɔnɔ tɛ ya bwa.
57001012	N gelɔ wɛɛ ba he be kɛŋɔ n gbagba bie maa dɛ nyinu n bambile bwa ne la.
57001013	N fe dɛ nyin kɛ o do n be bonɔ dɛ́ che he naa ta dɛɛ cha mɛ n dea doe nɔ baa koh Amanesoma la waa dɛ do mɛ nɔ ta.
57001014	Kɛ maa nyin n ɛ wobɛlbwa dɛ le he habɔɔ dɛ n ta he be ŋɔe, asɛ a ba ɛ kɛŋɔ n dɛ di kpegri he nɛ. N dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ wedɛɛge haa ɛ la le he gbabir bambile bini.
57001015	Bɛl lole naa, Korowiirii ŋɔa o ken le he nɔn ta tama mɔɔ dɛ berɛ ba hé ne o so ka tonɛ.
57001016	O ta he nɛndɔɔle gbo ɛɛ kpa. O ɛ he nimedɛɛge ya Dɔɔ Yeesu be pera. Gɛ n kwara aa dɛ nyin o waa nɔ, n jemɔ kɛ he te ɛɛ nyin o waa gwaa gɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o ɛ he nɛndɔɔle ne he nime tenten ya Dɔɔ Yeesu be pera.
57001017	Dɛ he jemɔ kɛŋɔ n ne he bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ aa, lɛo kɛŋɔ haa dɛ ba n lɛɛ ken.
57001018	Dɛ o fa ɛɛ wechɔga ane, kɛɛ dɛ he kem bɛlee o dio, kpɔ pɛɛ mɛ.
57001019	N Pɔɔl gbagbaa chwerɛ gɛ waa nɔ bonɔ kɛŋɔ mɛɛ bɔe kemee la. Kɛ jemɛ kɛ he gba di n kem Korowii mkpa la haa chegɛ n nɛɛ dɛ dɔ la ta.
57001020	Anomanta n dam, gel n ge dɔ tɔnɔ dɛ le nyopɛo n ne haa chegɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ dɔ la ta ásɛ n baah sɔɔh mɛ.
57001021	N jemɔ kɛŋɔ hɛɛ no n waa nɔɔ dɛ ɛ gwaa gɛ kwara. A waa n chwerɛ tɔn nɔ la.
57001022	Anɔ la ge aa jaa laanee kɛŋɔ nyin dea dɛɛ cheg mɛ. N dɔ hwɛga kɛŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ no he wesoŋa haa dɛ soŋo dɛɛ tɛ mɛ laanee asɛ dɛ berɛ kpɔ mɛ ba tɛ heyaa ja.
57001023	Epafras baa koh Yeesu Kristo waa dɛ do n ne on dea la dɛ nae.
57001024	Gɛɛ Maak ne Aristakus ne Demas ne Luk baa ɛ n bala tom-ɛɛra la gee nae.
57001025	Yá Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya. Aamen.
58001001	A saŋ la dɛ Korowii chegɛ o keamere nɛɛ dɛɛ bol waa ya naanar be. Kera aŋwɛnɛ bwaa o bol waa ba be. Dɛ ŋwɛnɛre waa chegɛ a ta dɛɛ bol waa ba be fuuh.
58001002	Fini tɔpera nɔ aa ka mun nɔ te, o Bie nɛɛ o che dɛɛ bol waa ya be. Korowii Bie nɔɔ o kpɔ cheg kɛŋɔ o toole naa, onee lole dɛ dɔ komɛlbwa. O nɛɛ Korowii che dɛ ta komɛlbwa.
58001003	He na o jirima waa dɔa, dɛ he na jirima Korowii aa dɔa. Gɛ Korowii aa doa o ge den do kati. O wobol dɔ kpegri. A kpegrii lawɛ komɛlbwa kpoŋe. Korowii Bie la aa laa ya wechɔga kpɔ ya nɛɛ tonɛ la, o kaa so nomombɔr nyundua Korowiijen dig ta,
58001004	dɛ gwaa nyundua toroma bwa, gɛ sɔn Korowii aa tɛo la aa gwaa ba sɔn la.
58001005	Korowii ta o nyundua toroma la bɛlbwa be ŋɔe ŋɔ, "N Biee hen. Fini n berɛ he Mɛɛ" bwa. O ta ba bɛlbwa waa bolɛ ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ ɛ o Mɛɛ, asɛ o ɛ n Bie" bwa.
58001006	Korowii aa dɛ ba o Bie waa lɔ o be logla la harɛ ta toma la, o bolɔ ŋɔ, "A chɛ kɛ nyundua toroma bwa ɛɛ tomɔ,"
58001007	dɛ bol nyundua toroma la ge waa ŋɔ, "O gelɔ o nyundua toroma do kɛŋɔ peu ne ninlao."
58001008	O bol o Bie la waa ja, dɛ ŋɔ, "Korowii, he kora ɛɛ cheo dɛɛ la saŋ bɛlbwa. Kasinteŋii hɛɛ ba kpoŋa dɛɛ di kora he nɛra nɛ.
58001009	He dɛ nyin waa aa togra dɛ ki waa aa wola togrɛ. A waa Korowii haa dɛ tomɔ la lee ŋɔ hé ɛ kooro, dɛ tɛɛ bosɔɔhna ne sɔnjen dɛ gwaa he bala bwa la."
58001010	Korowii berɔ ŋɔ, "Nomoa, wobɛlbwa mumpar la, hen ta harɛ. Kwaa aa lɔ nyundua ge nɔ, he nɔn tomaa a bwa.
58001011	A bwa ɛɛ chɔgoo, aa wola lee do kpa, kɛ he te ɛɛ do lee dɛɛ la. A bwa ɛɛ ba ɛ kombenaa kɛŋɔ yal yon hɛh la.
58001012	Hɛɛ kpɔa bil kɛŋɔ yal hɛoh waa, ba yon kpɛrɛwo bil la. Aa begroo, aa wola won do wer kɛ konfala saŋ bɛlbwa wee kpa. Kɛ he te ɛɛ do gɛ haa doa saŋ bɛlbwa, asɛ he bene ge aa jagaa dɔ bwa."
58001013	Korowii nyundua torome besoo bee o ŋɔ, "So nomombɔr n dig ta asɛ n ba he dɔma ne harɛ he tigri ba nɛɛ," bwa nɔ?
58001014	Korowii bonɔɔna laa o nyundua toroma la te naa? Nɛra Korowii aa ba lɛ la waa o yon dɛ tomɛ o nyundua toroma la ásɛ baa cha o nɛra la.
58002001	Gɛɛ a do te naa, a chɛ kɛ ya do sie dɛ nyiŋi waa yaa noa la kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ dɛ bɛ ba koni dɛ nyogre ŋwɛnɛ.
58002002	Waa Korowii faa kpɔa tɛ o nyundua toroma ba bol la ɛo kɛ mmarakpeg bɛl. Nomɛlbwa waa wola a ta teŋɛ la, ba tɛr o deŋne gɛ aa chɛa.
58002003	A do gɛ naa, ya lɛɛ waa nɔ aa gwaa nyundua toroma waa la kohona nɔ, dɛ ya vɛah aa, ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ɛɛ dɛ leɔ? Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu gbagba fa tɔ sie bol ya lɛɛ waa nɔ, asɛ nɛra baa noa ge di danseɛ ya be kɛ a ɛ kasinteŋ.
58002004	Korowii gbagba chegɛ nyokpowaa ne wekpega ɛɛ ta, ne o Domadɛɛge waa kpɔa bɔne nɛra gɛ waa dɛ nyin la ta dɛ di a danseɛ.
58002005	Nɛra baa dɛ ba le doe yaa dɛ bol ba waa nɔ, o ta ban kpɔe do nyundua toroma lɔga.
58002006	Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini bobɛl ŋɔ, "Korowii, nɛn gee bɔkwa asɛ hɛɛ lii o waɔ? Nɛwɛnyini gee bɔkwa hɛɛ dawɛ o waɔ?
58002007	Tamaa kenii he gel nyundua toroma gwaalo. He gelɔ o dɔ jirima, asɛ komɛlbwa ɛɛ tɛo duure,
58002008	dɛ kpɔ komɛlbwa do o lɔga." Waa kpɔ komɛlbwa do nɛwɛnyini lɔga nɔ, a baglɔ kɛŋɔ komɛlbwa toole waa wola o kpegri dɔe. Kɛ ya ta nae kɛŋɔ kwaa bwa aa lɔ nɛwɛnyini lɔga mɔɔ.
58002009	Kɛ ya dɛ na Yeesu te kɛŋɔ Korowii aa ba o ne harɛ asɛ nyundua toroma gwaalo tama, asɛ waa na wahala dɛ sewɛ la, o tɛo jirima dɛ gel komɛlbwa ɛɛ tɛo duure. Korowii alaworomɛɛ o sewɛ tɛ nɛwɛnyini bwa la.
58002010	Korowiirii ta komɛlbwa, asɛ a che o kpegri ta komɛlbwa ge do le. Waa gela Yeesu na wahala la, magraa a magre kɛrɛdɛ. Waa dɛ nyin o lɛ nɛndamanta dɛ gel ba ɛ o bii, dɛ do o be dɛ dɔ jirima la waa o gel Yeesu waa ɛ ba Sitɔɔ la gbagba kpɔ a gɛ ŋwɛnɛ la ta dɛ na wahala dɛ́ won ɛ ba Sitɔdɛɛge kɛrɛdɛ ka tonɛ dɛ lɛɛ ba la.
58002011	Yeesuu laa nɛwɛnyini doŋa dɛɛ kpɔ ba nɛɛ dɛ gel ba ɛ Korowii nɛra. O ne nɛra waa laa doŋa dɛɛ kpɔ ba nɛɛ la bwa Mɛɛ beŋkpoŋ. A waa aa wola on sihiih ɛ kɛŋɔ o yer ba o nimanar la.
58002012	O ŋɔ Korowii be ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ bol he waa haa ɛa n nimanar bee. Mɛɛ kpɛɛree ba chema binii."
58002013	O toolo berɛ ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ kpɔ n tenee tɛ Korowii dɛ yaradao," dɛ berɛ ŋɔ, "N ne bechale Korowii aa tɛ mɛ laanee la."
58002014	Nɛra Yeesu aa dɛ yer ba bechale la, baa ɛ nɛwɛnyina dɛ dɔ bwadabii ne chal nomanta la, o gbabir baa berɛ nɛwɛnyini dɛ do kɛ ban, dɛ dɔ bwadabii ne chal. O ɛ gɛ, ásɛ dɛ won che o seo waa dɛ ba sewa ta dɛ chɔg naate seo aa tɛo kpegri nɛra nɛɛ la. Onee Bɔnsam.
58002015	Yeesu ɛ ken ásɛ dɛ won lɛ nɛra baa koh seo ɔma waa dɛ ɛ yoma ba soga bini bwa la.
58002016	Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ kasinteŋ, nyundua toroma laa o cha nɔ, Abraham naanaree o cha.
58002017	Dɛ a chɛ kɛ o do gɛ Abraham naanar la aa doa ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta. Gɛɛ o ɛ dɛ́ won tomɛ Korowii kɛŋɔ ba Sɔfore Nomoa kasinteŋ ne dɛɛ na ba sum, dɛ won dɛɛ soŋe ba wechɔga, dɛ won dɛɛ kwaa ba ne Korowii baah.
58002018	Bɔnsam daahno na dɛ ɛo hɔhɔrɔwa ó fe ɛ wechɔga, kɛ o ta on wone. Anomanta wɛɛ wonoo cha nɛra Bɔnsam aa dɛ daah ba dɛ na la.
58003001	Anomanta n bala Korowii nɛra waa le ya ne he bwa tɛ o te, hé ta sie nyiŋi Yeesu na. Korowiirii tomɔ ŋɔ ó ba ɛ ya waa yaa dɛ yarada nɔ Sɔfore Nomoa.
58003002	O waa dɔ kasinteŋ Korowii waa kpɔɔ ŋɔ ó ɛ o toma la be kɛŋɔ Mosis faa dɛ nyiŋi Korowii nɛra nɛɛ o waa dɔ kasinteŋ wobɛlbwa ta la.
58003003	Nɛn do dem aa, nɛra dɛ kpɛɛro dɛ gwaa dem la. Gɛɛ Yeesu ge do. A chɛ kɛ ba kpɛɛro gwaa Mosis,
58003004	dɛkalkɛ dem bɛlbwa waa ɛ dem la, dɛ nɛnee doo. Korowii gee ta komɛlbwa.
58003005	Mosis aa ɛ Korowii bonɔɔ dɛɛ nyiŋi Korowii nɛra waa bwa ta la, dɛ o waa dɔ kasinteŋ taeh, kɛŋɔ bonɔɔ kasinteŋ te wa aa dɔ kasinteŋ o dɔɔ be la. Dɛ o dɛ bol waa Korowii aa ba bol kerekere la nɛra be.
58003006	Kɛ Yeesu Kristo te kasinteŋ waa dɔa la, Korowii Bie on, asɛ o ɛ Korowii nɛra bwa nomoa. Ya yarada yaa dɔa Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ, ne hwɛga yaa dɔa ya sie lɛ a ta la, ya lawɛ a bini kpoŋe kiŋkiŋ naa, Yeesu Kristo nɛraa yan.
58003007	Anomanta Korowii Domadɛɛge bolɔ ŋɔ, "Dɛ he no Korowii waa fini naa,
58003008	he bɛ deŋnekpeg ɛ kɛŋɔ he naanar faa ɛ deŋnekpeg dɛ vɛh o waa noe dɛ jo o nɛɛ la.
58003009	He naanar bene fifraanaarɛ baa dia kpɔg baah la, ba daah mɛ na dɛ na waa maa ɛa bwa.
58003010	Anomanta n baah di gɛ nɛra la nɛ, asɛ n ŋɔ ba bambile ta n waa lawɛ bwa. Ba vɛh n waa ta teŋa.
58003011	N baah naa dia la, n ŋwɛɛrɔ ŋɔ, 'Baa ona maa tɛɛ ba ŋɔ bá ba onɛ gɛ maa dɛ onɛ la dɔe ba bwa.' "
58003012	Anomanta yabala, hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ asɛ he bini bɛlbwa bɛ liichɔga ba dɔ kɛŋɔ waa Korowii waa lole saŋ bɛlbwa dɛ gbo ɛ Korowii laanee yarada, dɛ ba vɛh o waa ta teŋa.
58003013	Anomanta hɛ́ɛ ja dɔŋa tɔperee bwa mɔɔ tɔpere la o Domadɛɛge aa bol o waa dɛ ŋɔ "fini" la garɛ, asɛ wechɔga bɛ heyaa ba negre, he deŋne ba do kpegri.
58003014	Gɛ ya yarada aa doa le mumpar la, dɛ ya wono che gɛ kiŋkiŋ ka tel wobɛlbwa jaga aa, dɛ ya ne Yeesu Kristo pɛo wobɛlbwa ta.
58003015	Korowii Tɔn bolɔ ŋɔ: "Dɛ he no Korowii waa fini naa, he bɛ deŋnekpeg ɛ kɛŋɔ he naanar faa ɛ deŋnekpeg dɛ vɛh o waa noe dɛ jo o nɛɛ la."
58003016	Dɛ lepetenaa no Korowii waa dɛ ɛ deŋnekpeg dɛ vɛh o waa noe dɛ jo o nɛɛ nɔɔ? Nɛra Mosis aa tɔ ba sie dɛ le Ijipt harɛ la bwaa ɛ deŋnekpeg la.
58003017	Lepetena nɛɛ Korowii baah di bene fifraanaarɛ nɔɔ? Nɛra baa ɛ wechɔga dɛ serewe kpɔg baah la, ba nɛɛ o baah di.
58003018	Korowii aa ŋwɛɛra ŋɔ baa ona waa tɛɛ ba ŋɔ bá ba onɛ la dɔe ba la, dɛ lepetena bee o ŋɔ gɛ nɔɔ? Nɛra baa ɛ deŋnekpeg la bee o ŋɔ gɛ.
58003019	He ta nae kɛŋɔ ba yarada bɛ dɔe waa Korowii aa wola ban ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ ba dɔ ona waa dɔa tɛɛ ba la aa?
58004001	Korowii nyoa waa bagɛ nɛra ona waa ŋɔa bá ba onɛ la ta lole. Anomanta hé gel ya nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ asɛ he bɛlbwa bɛ a gɛ nyobaga la ba paŋɛ.
58004002	Gɛ yaa dɛ no Korowii Amanesoma nɔ nɔ, gɛɛ ba ge noa. Kɛ ba te aa noa la, a ta tɔnɔ leɛ tɛɛ ba, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba ta an yaradae.
58004003	Ya te nɔ, ya dɛ yarada Korowii waa la, anomanta Korowii ɛɛ geloo ya onɛ ona waa dɛ onɛ la bɛl. Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ: "N baah naa dia la, n ŋwɛɛrɔ ŋɔ baa ona maa tɛɛ ba ŋɔ bá ba onɛ gɛ maa dɛ onɛ la dɔe ba bwa." A ta baglɛ kɛŋɔ ona toole kpa. Gɛ saŋ Korowii aa ta harɛ la, dɛ o ɛ o wobɛlbwa tonɛ dɛ te onɛ.
58004004	Korowii Tɔn bobɛl bol tɔpenuanɛ wee la waa ŋɔ, "Korowii aa tonɛ o toma bwa la, o onɔ tɔpenuanɛ wee la ta,"
58004005	asɛ bela yaa dɛ bol o waa nɔ baglɔ kɛŋɔ: "Baa ona maa tɛɛ ba ŋɔ bá ba onɛ gɛ maa dɛ onɛ la dɔe ba bwa."
58004006	A baglɔ kɛŋɔ nɛra bane ta lole dɛɛ ba a gɛ ona la dɔe. Aa chegɛ a saŋ la tena baa no Korowii Amanesoma nɔ deŋnekpeg ta asɛ ba paŋɛ Korowii ona la,
58004007	Korowii berɔ kwaa do tɔpefale, dɛ pa o sɔn "fini." A habɔɔ aa bigra la, Korowii chegɛ Devid nɛɛ dɛ bol gɛ tɔpere nɔ wa. Anee n faa bol la: "Dɛ he no Korowii waa fini naa, he bɛ deŋnekpeg ɛ."
58004008	Josua aa ba a saŋ la tena ne ba harɛ ta la, dɛ ba fe dɔ ona Korowii aa bol o waa la aa, Korowii fe ta berɛ bol tɔpefale waa kpa.
58004009	He nyiŋo na naa, ona Korowii aa kwaara cheg o nɛra la ta lole bá ba onɛ, kɛŋɔ Korowii aa ona tɔpenuanɛ wee la ta la.
58004010	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ onɛ ona Korowii aa dɛ onɛ la, dɛ o onɛ o toma bwa ta kɛŋɔ Korowii aa onɛ o toma ta tɔpenuanɛ wee la ta la.
58004011	Anomanta hé gel ya swɛɛ siwi dɛ dɔ gɛ ona la. A ta chɛ kɛ bɛlbwa ɛ a saŋ la tena deŋnekpeg la dɔŋ dɛ ba paŋɛ gɛ ona nɔ.
58004012	Korowii waa waa bola do kɛ kon o siwi aa lole, dɛɛ ɛ toma. A nyɛgre ge gwaa naŋgɔse bɛlbwa, hale dɛ fe won pere hweera le lileo ta, dɛ won jo sema bini, hale dɛ fe won pere hoga ne fɔɔla baah. A wono dɛɛ jemɛ nɛwɛnyini liire ne o wesɔɔhla bwa.
58004013	Korowii kontaale bɛlbwa toole dɛ won kpɔ o te sɔɔh. Wobɛlbwa chɔ baŋ o be wɛɛ nao. Onee yaa ba ya waa yaa ɛa harɛ bonɔ bwa taara dɛ bagle.
58004014	Ya dɔ Sɔfore Nomonjen waa wona la Korowii sie tenten. Onee Korowii Bie Yeesu la. Anomanta hé gel ya lawɛ o waa la yaa dɛ yarada la bini kpoŋe kiŋkiŋ.
58004015	Ya Sɔfore Nomonjen yaa dɔa la ta nɛn waa wola ya nɛɛ sune ya gwɛgra nɔ ta ɛɛ. Daahna bɛlbwa soosiwi toole Bɔnsam aa wola on daahnɛ kɛŋɔ waa dɛ daah yaa nɔ. Kɛ o chegɔ kiŋkiŋ, o ta wechɔga ɛɛ.
58004016	Anomanta, hé gel ya lɔ bambile dɛ tel Korowii waa dɛ sune nɛra nɛɛ dɛɛ cha ba la sie. Wɛɛ na ya sumii dɛɛ cha yaa gɛ saŋ aa hiah yaa.
58005001	Sɔfore Nomoa bɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ toma Korowii Dea la, o dɔŋa nɛwɛnyini binii ba yon leo, dɛ kpɔɔ ŋɔ ó ɛ Korowii toma dɛɛ tɛɛ ba, dɛ kpɔ jam kwaa dɛɛ tɛ Korowii, dɛ kpo kondɛɛra dɛ fuah dɛɛ tɛo ba wechɔga wa.
58005002	A gɛ Sɔfore Nomoa nɔ ɛɛ wonoo dɛɛ sune nɛra baa wola waa jemɛ dɛɛ koni la nɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o gba kwaraa ta kpegri dɔe dɛ́ won dɛɛ vɛh wechɔga ɛɛ.
58005003	Gɛ o yon kpo kwaa ɛ saraha dɛɛ tɛ nɛra ba wechɔga waa la, gɛɛ wɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛɛ tɛ o tenten, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o gba ge dɛ ɛ wechɔga.
58005004	Sɔfore Nomoa ɛɛ nɔ ɛ wejena. Nomɛlbwa toole dɛ gbagba won le o te dɛ ɛ a gɛ toma nɔ, nemenɛ Korowii aa leo kɛŋɔ waa le Aarɔn o ɛ bɛl la.
58005005	Gɛɛ a do Yeesu Kristo ge aa wola o te gbagba leɛ Sɔfore Nomoa toma aa ɛ wejena nɔ ta. Korowiirii ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "N Biee hen, fini n berɛ he Mɛɛ."
58005006	Korowii bol bobɛl ge ŋɔ, "Hɛɛ ɛ Sɔfoo saŋ bɛlbwa, kɛŋɔ Mɛlkesɛdɛk faa ɛ Sɔfo la."
58005007	Yeesu aa lɔ harɛ ta la, dɛ wii ne siniire nee wɛɛ soŋe komɛlbwa dɛɛ le Korowii be. Dɛ Korowii dɔ kpegri dɛ́ leo seo ta. Waa pwɛra dɛɛ no Korowii deŋna waa la nomanta, dɛ Korowii dɛ no o wesoŋa.
58005008	Yeesu ɛ Korowii Bie, kɛ o na wahala, dɛ che a ta dɛ won pwɛr o te dɛ no o Mɛɛ deŋna wa.
58005009	Waa wona teŋɛ o Mɛɛ ŋwɛnɛ ta kɛrɛdɛ ka tonɛ la, o berɛ nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ o Yeesu ŋwɛnɛ ta bwa Lɛɛ, bá che o nɛɛ dɛ dɔ lɛɛ aa wola jaga dɔe bwa.
58005010	Korowii bol o waa dɛ ɛo Sɔfore Nomoa kɛŋɔ Mɛlkesɛdɛk faa ɛ Sɔfo la.
58005011	Waa yaa dɔa dɛ́ bol he be dɛ le gɛ waa nɔ ta la warɔ, kɛ a bini bagla kpegri, dɛkalkɛŋɔ haa waa mun no.
58005012	Haa lea hweli waa nɔ bigro, a chɛ kɛ saŋ nɔ he fe aa jema dɛɛ bagle nɛra a wa. Kɛ he ta do kɛ nɛra baa pa mun dɛɛ hweli Korowii wa, asɛ a chɛ kɛ ba le mun ta dɛ bag ba a wa. A fe aa chɛ kɛ he won dɛɛ di kondikwaa tenten la, elee he taa ɔr.
58005013	Nomɛlbwa o taa dɛ ɔr Korowii waa ta la, bechalaa on. Waa waa jemɛ, waa wedɛɛga aa dɛ su Korowii siwi jemɛ.
58005014	Nomonomee dɛɛ di kondikwaa tenten. Banee ɛ waa ben, dɛ jemɛ wedɛɛga ne wechɔga.
58006001	Yaa jemɛ Yeesu Kristo welogla la nomanta la, siee a chɛ kɛ yaa kaa, dɛɛ la nomonome bini. Yaa berɛ pa mun bol gɛ aa chɛ kɛ ya charɛ liire le ya wechɔga aa dɛ kaa ya nɛɛ seo ta la ta, ne gɛ aa chɛ kɛ ya yarada Korowii dɛ kpɔ ya te tɛo waa kpa.
58006002	Yaa berɛ bol Korowii nee sɔe wa, ne nɔɔra kpɔe dɛ dawɛ nɛra nɛ, ne gɛ lala bwa aa ba ir seo ta, ne gɛ Korowii aa ba bol nɛra waa dɛ pa bole dɛ bɔ ba ba wechɔga kem aa wola jagaa dɔ waa kpa.
58006003	Dɛ Korowii sɛoh waa, yaa gel anɔ bwa waa baglaa, dɛ kaa sie.
58006004	Nɛra baa yarada Korowii waa ka la, ɛrɛɛ bá ɛ dɛ charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta dɛ berɛ yaradao jaɔ? Korowii chaah ba sie o waa nɔ ta ka, asɛ ba na Korowii doa koŋkɛɛle la som la bɛl, asɛ dɛ tɛɛ ba o Domadɛɛge la ka.
58006005	Ba no Korowii waa la dɛ jemɛ wera aa wera, dɛ dɔ kpegri baa dɛ ba dɔe tɔpere waa lɔ sie dɛɛ ba bala la ta ane.
58006006	Anɔ bwa habɔɔ la, ba gel Korowii waa ba faa dɛ yarada la! A kpegri kɛ ba charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta dɛ berɛ ba yaradao, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba kaa ɛ kɛŋɔ baa kwaara kpaa Korowii Bie la dɛɛ pɛl o dagagre ta, dɛ gel sihiih kpoo nɛra baah ta. Ba ɛo dawɛ ba nyu ta.
58006007	Harɛ bɛlbwa bwaala aa dɛ nɛ o ta wɛɛ ɛ kondikwaa dɛɛ tɛ nɛra baa dɛ parɔ la, Korowii ɛɛ geloo o ɛ harɛdɛɛge.
58006008	Kɛ dɛ harɛ bɛlbwa le kpɔga ne sɔɔhne aa, o ta tɔnɔ dɔe. O chegɛ Korowii taahna nyoa. Baa fuuh.
58006009	N dandɛɛga, yaa dɛ bol anɔ bwa nɔ, he te la, he wa aa yaa gwaŋɛ. Ya jemɔ kɛ he we-ɛɛla ɛɛ do werii a bagle kɛŋɔ Korowii lɛ heya.
58006010	Korowii ta nɛn waa wola waa ɛ a ŋwɛnɛ ta ɛɛ, a ba ɛ kɛŋɔ wɛɛ soh he tondɛɛga haa dɛ ɛ, ne gɛ haa dɛ nyinu dɛ koh a waa cha o nɛra dɛ taa cha ba la waa.
58006011	Ya dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ he bɛlbwa swɛɛ siwi gɛ dɛ ka tonɛ ásɛ dɛ won dɔ kon haa dɛ hwɛgɛ o ta la.
58006012	Yaa nyin kɛ he bwara hwah heya. Ya dɛ nyin he kpɔ nɛra baa lawɛ bambile dɛɛ yarada Korowii asɛ o tɛɛ ba kwaa waa bag ba nyoa la da.
58006013	Korowii bagɛ Abraham nyoa. Waa bagɔ nyoa la, komɛlbwa aa wola toole dɛ gwaalo la, o gbagbaa o ŋwɛɛ, dɛ ŋɔ,
58006014	"N ŋwɛɛrɔ kɛŋɔ mɛɛ kwaa he wobɛlbwaa tɛɛ, dɛ tɛɛ naanar kohona."
58006015	Abraham ge wono lawɛ bambile aaa, dɛ ba dɔ kon Korowii aa bagɔ nyoa la.
58006016	Dɛ nɛn dɛ ba ŋwɛɛra aa, kon waa gwaaloo o yon ŋwɛɛ, asɛ ba jemɛ kɛ kasinteŋii wɛɛ bol, dɛ tɔŋla bɛlbwa teŋo.
58006017	Dɛ Korowii dɛ nyin o bagle nɛra baa dɛ ba kon waa bag ba nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ ɛo tɛɛ ba la kɛŋɔ waa o liire chara ba bwa, a waa o ŋwɛɛ la.
58006018	Korowii bagɛ nyoa dɛ ŋwɛɛ o tenten ja. Webele anɛ nɔ gelɔ nyobaga la do kpegri, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii aa won teŋe nyosone. Anee dɛ do ya nɛra yaa ba Korowii be ŋɔ ó lɛ yaa la gbemba, asɛ ya won do kpegri ya hwɛga yaa dɛ hwɛgɛ o nɛɛ la ta.
58006019	A gɛ hwɛga nɔɔ dɛ gel ya bambile won che bobeŋkpoŋ, asɛ ya che kɛrɛdɛ. Hwɛga nɔ nomanta, a kaa ɛ kɛŋɔ ya won Korowii bodɛɛge bela pateesahjen faa tɔa nɛmpɛɛne aa wola bela jo la joe.
58006020	Yeesu aa ɛ Sɔfore Nomoa dɛɛ la saŋ bɛlbwa kɛŋɔ Mɛlkesɛdɛk la, o koh ya waa dɛ tɔ sie ya nɛɛ jo bela mɔɔ ya ge ba.
58007001	A gɛ Mɛlkesɛdɛk nɔ, dɛ Salem kooroo on, asɛ o ɛ Nemenɛ Korowii Sɔfo. A saŋ la Abraham aa le laa waa kaa yo dɛ pɔ koranar banaarɛ bane nɛɛ dɛɛ ba la, Mɛlkesɛdɛk chemo dɛ swee andɛɛga tɛo.
58007002	Belaa Abraham bɔne kwaa waa dɔa laa la ta bwa bini bɔre fi dɛ kpɔ bɔrbeŋkpoŋ tɛo. Mɛlkesɛdɛk sɔn la munii "Waa aa Togra Kooro." Salem ge munii "bambisɔɔhna." Anomanta dɛ "Bambisɔɔhna Kooroo" on.
58007003	Mɛlkesɛdɛk ta nya ne mɛɛ dɔe ya jemɛ. O ta lolanar dɔe. O ta lola tɔpere ne sewa tɔpere gba dɔe ya jemɛ. O ɛ Sɔfo saŋ bɛlbwa dɛɛ la aa wola jaga dɔe kɛŋɔ Korowii Bie la ken.
58007004	He na gɛ waa ɛ nɛnjen kenɛ? Ya nabaa Abraham o sɔn aa lea kohona la, o gbabir bɔne kwaa waa dɔa o laa ta bwa bini fi dɛ kpɔ bɔrbeŋkpoŋ tɛo.
58007005	Lewi naanar baa ɛ Sɔfore la, Mosis Mmara la ŋɔ ba bwɛɛ tena la bɛlbwa ɛɛ bɔne o kwaa bini bɔre fi dɛ kpɔ bɔrbeŋkpoŋ dɛɛ tɛɛ ba. Kɛ Abraham naanaree ba bwa ge gba.
58007006	Lewi dea laa Mɛlkesɛdɛk le. Kɛ Abraham ge bɔne o kwaa bini bɔre fi, dɛ kpɔ bɔrbeŋkpoŋ tɛo, asɛ Mɛlkesɛdɛk swee andɛɛga tɛ o kwaara Korowii aa bagɔ nyoa la.
58007007	Ya bwa jemɔ kɛŋɔ nomoaa sweera dɛɛ tɛ bechala.
58007008	Lewi luge ta Sɔfore baa dɛ lɛ kwaa fi bɛlbwa bɔrbeŋkpoŋa la, ba dɛ sewɛ. Mɛlkesɛdɛk te aa lɛa la, Korowii Tɔn baglɔ kɛŋɔ o lole saŋ bɛlbwa.
58007009	Lewi luge ta Sɔforee dɛɛ lɛ kwaa fi bɛlbwa bɔrbeŋkpoŋa. Kɛ yaa wonoo ŋɔ o nabaa Abraham aa bɔne o kwaa bini bɔre fi dɛ kpɔ bɔrbeŋkpoŋ tɛ Mɛlkesɛdɛk la, Lewi gba tɛo.
58007010	Dɛ ba ta Lewi lolɛ mɔɔ, kɛ yaa wonoo ŋɔ o ta ɛ o nabaa Abraham dwee dɛ taa ba bala a gɛ saŋ Mɛlkesɛdɛk aa cheme Abraham la.
58007011	Gɛ saŋ Korowii aa tɛ o nɛra Mmara la la, gɛ saŋee Lewi dea tena pa mun dɛɛ di sɔfore. Dɛ nɛra fe ɛɛ wonoo che saraha Lewi dea Sɔfore la faa ɛa dɛɛ tɛɛ ba la ta dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛga ka tonaa, a fe ta hiaih kɛŋɔ Sɔfo waa do kɛŋɔ Mɛlkesɛdɛk berɛ ba dɛ gel onɔ la waa le Lewi dea dɛ do kɛŋɔ Aarɔn.
58007012	Dea o tena aa dɛ di sɔfore la, o beraa, a chɛ kɛ mmara la ge berɛ.
58007013	A gɛ waa nɔ yaa dɛ bagle nɔ, ya Dɔɔ Yeesu waa yaa bol la. O ge dea waa le o ta la korɛ Sɔfore dea ta. O dea waa le o ta la te bɛlbwa ta Sɔfo toma ɛɛ bwa.
58007014	Nomɛlbwa jemɔ kɛŋɔ Juda deaa o le. Mosis ge fa ta bolɛ ŋɔ Juda dea tena dɛ di sɔfore bwa.
58007015	Tarakenii waa la bini ta chaah, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Sɔfo bɛl balɔ dɛ do kɛ Mɛlkesɛdɛk ken kati.
58007016	Nɛwɛnyini sɔfore dii mmara ta laa a che o ɛ Sɔfo. O mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la kpegri taa a che o ɛ Sɔfo.
58007017	Maa dɛ ŋɔ nɔ, Korowii Tɔn di danseɛ o waa ŋɔ, "Hɛɛ ɛ Sɔfoo dɛɛ la saŋ bɛlbwa kɛŋɔ Mɛlkesɛdɛk."
58007018	Mmarabene la aa wola kpegri ne tɔnɔ bɛlbwa dɔe la waa Korowii lao kpɔ.
58007019	A gɛ Mosis Mmara nɔ fa ta wone gel nɛwɛnyina ɛ nɛndɛɛga ka tonɛ. Kɛ taraken te, ya dɔ wefala dɛɛ hwɛgɛ a ta a gwaa ambena la, dɛ che a ta dɛ won tuuh dɛɛ tel Korowii.
58007020	Waa aa bera ja laanee kɛŋɔ Korowii ŋwɛɛra waa ŋwɛɛra la. Ba faa dɛ cheg Lewi dea Sɔfore la la, Korowii fa ta ken ŋwɛɛrɛ bwa.
58007021	Yeesu te la, ŋwɛɛraa Korowii ŋwɛɛ dɛ chego Sɔfo. Ba bagle a waa Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "N Naa Korowii ŋwɛɛrɔ, waa nyoa bera ba: 'Hɛɛ ɛ Sɔfo saŋ bɛlbwaa dɛɛ la.' "
58007022	A gelɔ Yeesu ɛ ajinamuu te ásɛ nɛwɛnyina nyiŋi dɛ na fɔofale Korowii aa fɔwa dɛ tɛ yaa la wera waa wera dɛ gwaa ombene la.
58007023	Anɔ la aa jaa laanee kɛŋɔ dɛ Lewi dea Sɔfore la dɛ serewe. Anomanta a gelɔ nɛra baa di sɔfore la warɛ.
58007024	Kɛ Yeesu te, o lole saŋ bɛlbwa. O sɔfore toma la aa berɛ dɛɛ kaa nɛnfale bɛlbwa be bwa.
58007025	Nomɛlbwa waa chegɛ Yeesu nɛɛ dɛ tuuh dɛɛ tel Korowii la, Yeesu ɛɛ lɛo waa wola nyogre kpa bwa. O lole saŋ bɛlbwa dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ nɛwɛnyina.
58007026	Magraa a den magre kɛŋɔ yaa dɔ Sɔfore Nomoa waa do kɛ Yeesu dɛɛ cha yaa. Doŋa bɛlbwa toole o nɛ, o tea too, o ne wechɔg-ɛɛra ta pɛɛ. Korowii tɛo nomonome o gwaa komɛlbwa waa lɔ nyundua.
58007027	O ta doe kɛŋɔ Lewi dea Sɔfonomonome la baa dɛ ɛ wechɔga saraha tɔpere bɛlbwa la. Ba te chɛ kɛ ba tɔ sie ɛ ba gbagba wechɔga saraha mɔɔ dɛ ɛ nɛra la ge wechɔga saraha. Saraha beŋkpoŋ gboo Yeesu ɛ, bɛl ta jae kpa. O kpɔ o te gbagba ɛ saraha.
58007028	Baa nyiŋi Mosis Mmara ta dɛɛ kpɔ Sɔfonomonome la, nɛra baa wola wone dɛɛ vɛh wechɔga kɛŋɔ nɛwɛnyini bwa aa doa laanee baa kpɔ. Kɛ Mosis Mmara la habɔɔ la, waa Korowii aa bola dɛ ŋwɛɛ o gbagba la, an gela o Bie ɛ Sɔfore Nomoa. O te vɛh wechɔga dɛ do kaih saŋ bɛlbwa dɛɛ la.
58008001	Waa yaa dɛ bol laanee kɛŋɔ ya dɔ Sɔfore Nomoa o do gɛ tenten. O soge nomombɔr Korowiijen kookara la jwɛɛh nyundua.
58008002	Korowii dobɔr tenten waa do goroŋ la, belaa wɛɛ di sɔfore. Korowii gbagbaa do bela dea la, nɛwɛnyini laa doo.
58008003	Sɔfore Nomoa bɛlbwa tomaa kɛŋɔ wɛɛ fuh kwaa dɛɛ tɛ Korowii, dɛɛ ɛ saraha ge. Anomanta a hiaoh kɛŋɔ ya Sɔfore Nomoa nɔ ge dɔ kwaa waa kpɔ dɛɛ tɛ Korowii.
58008004	Dɛ o fe lɔ harɛ bonɔ naa, o fe aa Sɔfo ɛɛ ba, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Sɔfore lɔ harɛ ta dɛɛ ɛ saraha gɛ Mosis Mmara aa bagla la.
58008005	Ba sɔfore toma baa dɛ ɛ la, chaaraa baa chaa gɛ baa dɛ ɛa Korowii doa la. A tenten laa. A waa Mosis faa dɛ ba Korowii tɛnte dea baa dɛ tomɔ o bini la ɛɛ la, Korowii ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nyiŋi dɛ ɛ komɛlbwa kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ maa bagle bwe la doa la."
58008006	Taraken nɔ, ba tɛ Yeesu sɔfore toma o gwaa harɛ bonɔ Sɔfore. Fɔofale la waa chegɛ nɛwɛnyini ne Korowii baah ta dɛ fɔwɛ la ge gwaa ombene la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nyoo Korowii aa baga fɔofale la ta la gwaa ambena la.
58008007	Dɛ fɔobene la fe wer, waane aa wola toole o ta naa, onfale fe ta hiaih kpa.
58008008	Kɛ Korowii nao kɛŋɔ o nɛra chɔg fɔobene la, a waa o ŋɔ, "Saŋ bɛl ɛɛ bao, asɛ n ne Israel tena ne Juda tena fɔwɛ fɔofale bɛl.
58008009	O ne fɔo la n ne ba naanar aa fɔwa a gɛ saŋ maa lag ba le Ijipt harɛ la aa beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ ba, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba naanar fa ta fɔo la ta teŋɛ. Anomanta n ge laa sie kpɔ ba nɛ.
58008010	Fɔo n ne Israel tena aa dɛ ba fɔwa kerekeree la: Mɛɛ kpɔ me mmaraa do ba nyu bini, dɛ chwero do ba bambile bini, asɛ dɛ ɛ ba Korowii, asɛ ba ge ɛ n nɛra.
58008011	Aa berɛ hiah kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa bagle o dɔŋ kɛɛ o nime ŋɔ, 'A wer kɛŋɔ he jemɛ Korowii' kpa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba bechale ne nomonome bwa ɛɛ jem mɛɛ.
58008012	Mɛɛ sune ba nɛɛ dɛ kpɔ ba waa aa wola togrɛ kɛ ba, maa ba wechɔga waa lii kpa."
58008013	Korowii aa dɛ bol fɔofale waa nɔ, onlogle la berɛ ombene. Waa berɛ ombene nɔ, o kpegri tonɔ, wɛɛ nyogre.
58009001	Logle fɔo Korowii ne o nɛra faa fɔwa la gba fa dɔ mmara baa chegɛ o ta dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii, dɛ dɔ bela baa dɛ tomɛ Korowii harɛ nɔ ta,
58009002	asɛ o do tɛnte dea bini. (Pateesah teŋe dea la doonyoa, asɛ bɛl ge bɔne dea la bini anɛ.) Dea la bologle la sɔne Korowii Bɔr Waa Do Goroŋ. A gɛ Korowii Bɔr Waa Do Goroŋ la bɔr belaa daa baa kpɔ kandea dɛɛ chɔŋɛ o ta, ne teebur ne paanoo baa kpɔa dɛɛ tɛ Korowii la che.
58009003	Asɛ bela baa dɛ yerɛ Korowii Bɔr Waa Do Goroŋ Tenten la ge do pateesah nɛɛte la habɔɔ.
58009004	Korowii Bogoroŋ Tenten la bɔr bela la, dɛ suugaswɛm kon baa dɛ fuh daawiile a sɔɔh aa soma o bini la lɔ bela. Dɛ daka baa kpɔ suugaswɛm ɛ o bwara bwa, asɛ o che tɛ ba ne Korowii fɔo la lɔ bela. Dɛ suugaswɛm vii la baa kpɔ kondikwaa aa le nyundua baa yera maana do o bini la, ne Aarɔn daŋgbala waa mogɛ papooni la, ne bwepɛmpɛŋre anɛ la ba faa chwerɛ o ne ba fɔobene la mmara fi la do a ta la lɔ daka la bini.
58009005	Ba kwaa nyundua toroma baa dɛ yer ba Kerobim la banɛ chɔŋɛ daka la doa baa bagle kɛŋɔ Korowii jirima lɔ bela, asɛ ba sie gba dɔŋa, dɛ pagri kena tɔ bela baa laa Korowii bandia dɛɛ kpɔ o nɛra nɛɛ la. Yaa won dɔ bɔr taraken dɛ bagle kwaa nɔ waa bwa ka tonɛ.
58009006	Ken nɔɔ dea la bini kwaa cheche, asɛ Sɔfore la ɛɛ jo o bologle la bini tɔperee bwa dɛ kaa ɛ ba toma.
58009007	Dea la bonɛɛte la te la, Sɔfore Nomoa gboo dɛɛ jo o bini. O gba kwaraa la, kerabeŋkpoŋ gboo wɛɛ jo bela bena bɛlbwa. O ta chal kpoŋaa, waa bela jo. A nee o kaa soŋe o wechɔga ne nɛra la wechɔga baa ɛa baa wola jemɛ kɛŋɔ ba ɛ wechɔga la.
58009008	Korowii Domadɛɛge dɛ bagle yaa waa dɛ le gɛ waa nɔ ta kɛŋɔ, dɛ tɛnte dea la ta lole naa, Korowii Bɔr Waa Do Goroŋ Tenten la ŋwɛnɛ ta pile mɔɔ.
58009009	A gɛ waa nɔ chegɔ dɛ tɛ fini nɔ. A baglɔ kɛŋɔ saraha ɛɛ ne konaatena fuih dɛɛ tɛ Korowii aa won gel nɛn baa fuh kwaa la dɛɛ tɛo la tea to.
58009010	A gɛ waa nɔ bwa ɛ kondiile ne konnyɔɔla ne bwara sarama waa aa ɛ nawee wa. Bwadabii waa a bwa, aa wone gel nɛn tea ɛɛ to. Korowiirii kpɔa tɛ o nɛra ásɛ baa teŋɛ a ta dɛ ka tel kɛŋɔ o ŋwɛnɛfale la aa bala.
58009011	Yeesu Kristo balɔ dɛ ba ɛ Sɔfore Nomoa, dɛɛ ɛ wefala aa bala dɛ do wer ya jemɛ a waa taraken nɔ la toma. Tɛnte dea waa dɛ ɛ toma o bini la dɔ jirima dɛ do wer gwaa onɔ la. Nɛwɛnyini laa doo, harɛ bonɔ kon laa.
58009012	Yeesu Kristo jo Korowii Bogoroŋ Tenten la. Waa jo bela la, boohna ne nabie chal laa o kpɔ jo bela. O gbagba chalee o kpɔ jo bela, dɛ lɛ yaa ta aa wola jagaa dɔ bwa. Kerabeŋkpoŋii o jo bela. A ta hiaih kɛŋɔ o jo bela kpa.
58009013	Nɛn waa kah doŋa la, dɛ ba won boohna ne nabie chal ne naloni tɔɔ kpɔe dɛ jwal o nɛɛ asɛ dɛ laa doŋa kpɔ o nɛ aa,
58009014	ɛrɛɛ a ɛ Yeesu Kristo chal aa wola won laa ya doŋa kpɔ ya nɛɛ kohona nɔ? Korowii Domadɛɛge waa lole saŋ bɛlbwa aa wola jaga dɔe la, on cha Yeesu Kristo o won kpɔ o te kɛŋɔ konaate waa wola kirihiah bɛlbwa dii dɛ ɛ saraha dɛ tɛ Korowii. Yeesu chal ɛɛ laa ya wechɔga aa dɛ kaa ya ne seo ta la bwa kpɔ ya nɛɛ asɛ ya tea to, asɛ a waa bɛ yaa hiah kpa, asɛ ya won tomɛ Korowii kasinteŋ la.
58009015	Yeesu chegɔ nɛwɛnyini ne Korowii baah ta taraken dɛ fɔwɛ fɔo dɛ tɛ nɛwɛnyini ne Korowii, ásɛ nɛra Korowii aa lee ba ŋɔ ba ɛ o nɛra la won dɔ kwaa waa bag ba nyoa la saŋ bɛlbwa dɛɛ la. Baa wonoo dɔa saŋ bɛlbwa dɛɛ la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ wechɔga ba faa dɛ ɛ fɔobene la ta la, Yeesu Kristo aa baa sewɛ la, o bɔ a kem. O sewɔ asɛ ba wechɔga la bɛ won dɔ kpegri ba nɛɛ kpa.
58009016	Dɛ nɛn chwerɛ gɛ aa chɛ kɛ ba di o kapɛrɛ, dɛ o ta sewaa, nɛn aa won di.
58009017	Kɛ dɛ o sewɔ te naa, baa wonoo bɔne o kwaa name. Dɛ naate waa chwerɛ tɔn la ta lole te naa, ŋwɛnɛ toole kɛŋɔ nɛn bɔne o laala.
58009018	A waa gela fɔobene la kwara ta la, chal ɛɛ fuge mɔɔ baa ɛ o we-ɛɛla la.
58009019	Mosis tɔ sie bagle waa bwa Korowii aa ŋɔa ó nɛra la ɛ dɛ le Korowii Mmara Tɔn bini, mɔɔ dɛ kpɔ nabie ne boohna chale koo nee ta, dɛ kpɔ pee pona aa swɛɛra ne dawii ane soosiwi ɛ chal ne nee la merɛ Korowii Mmara Tɔn la ne nɛra la bwa nɛ.
58009020	Waa kpɔa dɛɛ merɛ ba nɛɛ la, o ŋɔ, "Chal nɔɔ n kpɔ dɛɛ merɛ fɔo Korowii aa ŋɔa hɛ́ɛ teŋɛ a ta la ta á ɛ danseɛ kɛŋɔ he sɛoh kɛ hɛɛ teŋɛ o Mmara la taa."
58009021	Gɛ tentenee o yon ɛ chal la dɛ merɛ tɛnte dea la ne numoli ne koŋkwaare baa dɛ ɛ a ne toma Korowii Dea bela la bwa ta.
58009022	Mmara la ta la, chal nee baa fee doŋa waa ne kwaa kɛrɛdɛ ta. Dɛ chal ta fugaa, Korowii aa wechɔga kpɔe dɛɛ kɛ.
58009023	A gɛ kwaa la bwa, dɛ Korowii doa kwaa la chaaree a bwa. Dɛ gɛɛ chɛ kɛ ba fee doŋa a ta. Kɛ Korowii doa kwaa la te gbagba la, kwaa baa kpɔa dɛɛ ɛ saraha dɛɛ fee a doŋa la gwaa anɔ.
58009024	Bela Yeesu Kristo aa joa la, Korowii Bɔr Waa Do Goroŋ Tenten nɛwɛnyini aa mao o ɛ Korowii doa kon chaa gbo la bini laa o jo. Korowii doa gbagbaa o la, dɛ ka che Korowii sie ásɛ dɛ won cha yaa taraken.
58009025	A ta hiaih kɛ o teŋɛ dɛɛ jo Korowii Bogoroŋ la dɛ kpɔ o te ɛ saraha bena bɛlbwa gɛ Juda tena Sɔfore Nomoa aa dɛ jo ba kon ta chal aa wola o gbagba bwara chal ɛɛ ne la.
58009026	Dɛ bena bɛlbwaa wɛɛ jo bela dɛ kpɔ o te ɛ saraha aa, bena bɛlbwaa o fe ɛɛ ba wahala nae dɛ kpoŋe le harɛ mumpar ba le fini. Kɛ kerabeŋkpoŋ gboo o ba harɛ nɔ ta tɔpere tama waa kaa nɔ ta, dɛ ba kpɔ o te ɛ saraha dɛɛ doŋi wechɔga, waa wola gɛɛ ɛ kpa.
58009027	Kerabeŋkpoŋii nɛwɛnyini bɛlbwa ɛɛ ba sewa, asɛ a habɔɔ la, Korowii bol o waa dɛ pa bole.
58009028	Gɛɛ ba kpɔ Yeesu Kristo ge ɛ saraha kerabeŋkpoŋ, ásɛ o che nɛndamanta wechɔga. Wɛɛ berɔɔ ba nɛɛtena ja. Wechɔga waa laa wɛɛ ba bala name te. Nɛra baa dɛ kpao siswɛm ne laanee wɛɛ ba ba lɛ.
58010001	Tɔe Mosis Mmara la tɔ wedɛɛga a faa lɔ sie dɛɛ ba bala la sie dɛ che tɛa. A fa ta wedɛɛga la tenten ɛɛ kɛŋɔ nɛn lileo aa wola o gbagba ɛɛ la. Anomanta saraha la Mmara la aa gela baa ɛ bena bɛlbwa la aa won gel nɛra baa dɛ ba a ne la ɛ nɛndɛɛga ka tonɛ.
58010002	Dɛ saraha la fe wono gel ba berɛ nɛndɛɛga dɛ ka tonaa, ba fe ta a ɛɛ gelaa? Dɛ a fe wono dɛɛ fee ba wechɔga ba nɛ aa, ba liire fe aa ban ha a waa we ba nɛɛ kpa.
58010003	Saraha laanee dɛɛ lii ba bena bɛlbwa kɛŋɔ wechɔg-ɛɛraa ban,
58010004	dɛkalkɛŋɔ nae ne boohna chale aa won fee wechɔga nɛra nɛɛ bwa.
58010005	A waa Yeesu aa dɛ ba harɛ ta bala la, o ŋɔ Korowii be ŋɔ, "Konaatena ne koŋkwaare baa kpɔa ɛ saraha dɛɛ tɛɛ la, he sie aa a ta lɛ. Kɛ he ɛ bwadabii bɛl tɛ mɛ.
58010006	He siwi aa konaatena baa dɛ fuah ambire dɛɛ tɛɛ, ne saraha baa ɛa dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ soŋe nɛra wechɔga la su.
58010007	Belaa n ŋɔ, 'Korowii, menee la. N balɔ dɛ́ ba ɛ he tetoowaa gɛ baa chwerɛ n waa Mmara tɔn la bini la.' "
58010008	O baglɔ kɛŋɔ konaatena ne koŋkwaare baa kpɔa ɛ saraha dɛɛ tɛ Korowii la ta o sie lɛɛ. O siwi ta konaatena baa fuah dɛ ɛ saraha dɛɛ tɛo ne saraha baa ɛa dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ soŋe wechɔga la sui, kɛ dɛ Mosis Mmara ge fe bagle a bwa.
58010009	Belaa o ŋɔ, "Korowii, menee la, n balɔ dɛ́ ba ɛ he tetoowa." A baglɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii teŋe sarahabena la bwa ta dɛ kpɔ Yeesu Kristo saraha la chig a naa ta.
58010010	Yeesu Kristo aa ɛ Korowii tetoowaa dɛ kpɔ o bwadabii ɛ saraha kerabeŋkpoŋ a den tonɛ la nomanta, o laa ya bwa wechɔga kpɔ ya nɛ, dɛ gel ya ɛ Korowii nɛra.
58010011	Juda tena Sɔfore te la, tɔpere bwaa ba che ba sɔfore toma ta dɛ teŋɛ dɛɛ ɛ saraha siwibeŋkpoŋ. Kɛ a gɛ saraha nɔ aa won laa nɛn wechɔga kpɔ o nɛɛ bwa.
58010012	Kerabeŋkpoŋ gboo Yeesu Kristo te ɛ nɛwɛnyini wechɔga saraha, a den magre, aa wola hiaih kɛŋɔ o ɛ bɛl kpa, dɛ ka so nomombɔr Korowii dig ta.
58010013	Belaa o do dɛɛ kpa ka tel kɛŋɔ Korowii aa ba o dɔma ne harɛ asɛ o tigri ba nɛ.
58010014	Saraha beŋkpoŋ waa ɛa dɛ fee wechɔga nɛra nɛɛ la gboo gela ba do kaih saŋ bɛlbwa dɛɛ la.
58010015	Korowii Domadɛɛge gba di danseɛ bagle yaa. O tɔ sie ŋɔ,
58010016	"N Naa Korowii bolɔ ŋɔ, 'Fɔo n ne baa fɔwɛ tɔpera aa lɔ sie la ta laanee nɔ: Mɛɛ kpɔ me mmaraa do ba bambile bini, dɛ chwero do ba nyuune bini.' "
58010017	O berɔ ŋɔ, "Maa ba wechɔga waa lii kpa bwa."
58010018	Anomanta, dɛ Korowii dɔɔ kpɔ ya wechɔga kɛ yaa aa, a ta berɛ hiah kɛŋɔ ba ɛ saraha dɛ kpɔ soŋe ya wechɔga kpa.
58010019	Yabalawa, Yeesu seo la nomanta yaa wonoo jo Korowii Bɔr Waa Do Goroŋ Tenten la, yaa wola ɔmɛ.
58010020	Yeesu pili ŋwɛnɛfale mkpa aa lɔ o ta tɛ yaa, asɛ ya won jo Korowii Bogoroŋ la ta. O bwadabii ɛo kɛŋɔ pateesahjen o faa tɔ Korowii Bogoroŋ Tenten la ŋwɛnɛ la. Waa sewa la, ŋwɛnɛ pilo tɛ yaa.
58010021	Ya dɔ Sɔfojen wɛɛ nyiŋi Korowii bii.
58010022	Anomanta la, Korowii aa sɔ ya wechɔga ta waa wola gelɛ ya liire ɛɛ ɛ yaa kɛŋɔ ya ɛ wechɔga kpa, dɛ kpɔ o nedɛɛga sɔ ya bwadabii nɔ, hé gel ya kpɔ tepoŋ ne yarada ba o be, ya bɛ tɔŋle tama bɛlbwa,
58010023	dɛ lawɛ hwɛga yaa dɔa la bini kpoŋe kiŋkiŋ, dɛ bɛ dɛɛ ɔmɛ tama bɛlbwa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ naate waa bagɛ yaa nyoa la waa dɔ kasinteŋ.
58010024	Hé gel ya lii gɛ yaa ɛ dɛ́ won dɛɛ do dɔŋa gbemba dɔŋa nyina ne wedɛɛga ɛɛ ta,
58010025	asɛ dɛ bɛ chema yaa dɛ cheme saŋ bɛlbwa la gel, kɛŋɔ bane aa gela la. Waa bwa jaga tɔpere la dɛ tel, anomanta hɛ́ɛ do dɔŋa gbemba.
58010026	Korowii aa pili ya sie ya jemɛ o kasinteŋ nɔ nɔ, dɛ ya ta saahnɔ do wechɔga ta dɛɛ ɛ aa, saraha bɛlbwa toole bobɛlbwa dɛ́ fee ya wechɔga ya nɛɛ kpa.
58010027	Ɔmee taa yaa ba soga dɛɛ kpa Korowii tɔpere waa dɛ ba nɛra waa bola dɛ pa bole, dɛ do banɔ la baa chegɛ o nɛɛ wechɔga nii aa dɛ lawɛ kohona ta la.
58010028	Nɛn to Mosis Mmara, asɛ nɛra banɛ ne batoro di danseɛ tiao o waa waa ɛa la ta naa, baa o nɛɛ sune, kpoe baa kpoo.
58010029	Aah dɛ ɛrɛɛ a chɛ kɛ ba ɛ nɛn waa nyiŋi Korowii Bie la dɛɛ vaɔh? Dɛ nɛn nyiŋi fɔo la Korowii aa chegɛ o Bie seo ta dɛ fɔwɛ la dɛ fee o wechɔga o nɛɛ la pɛɛ aa, kembɔr besoo chɛ kɛ ba tɛo wɔ? A gɛ nɛn la ɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la waa chao la nɛnhɛla. Korowii ŋɔ ó bɔɔ kem aa, o wenaale aa kanee do aa?
58010030	Naate waa ŋɔa ŋɔ, "Menee dɔ wechɔga kem bɔe, menee dɛ bɔ nɛra ba wechɔga kem" la, ya jemɛ o nɛnsoo. Ba chwerɛ bobɛl ge ŋɔ, "N Naa Korowii ɛɛ bol o nɛra waa dɛ pa bole."
58010031	Wobɛlbwa toole dɛ do ɔma kɛŋɔ haa ɛ wechɔg-ɛɛ dɛ jo Korowii waa lole saŋ bɛlbwa la nɔn ta.
58010032	Hé lii gɛ he faa doa gɛ saŋ Korowii waa la aa chaah he sie la. He na wahala ga, kɛ he ta habɔɔ leɛ.
58010033	Ba chɛgre heyaa dɛ ɛ heyaa hɔhɔrɔwa nɛra baah ane ta. Dɛ he dɛ cha nɛra baa dɛ ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa ane ta.
58010034	He na nɛra baa do ba dea la sum, dɛ cha ba ba wahala nae ta. Ba lɛ he kwaa haa dɔa bwa, kɛ he sie ta kie. He sie lɛo, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he jemɔ kɛ he dɔ komɛl waa wola jaga dɔe dɛ gwaa anɔ la haa paŋa la.
58010035	Anomanta, he bɛ he yaradae haa dɛ yarada Korowii Bie la gel. A dɔ kembɔa kohona.
58010036	A hiaoh kɛŋɔ he lawɛ bambile dɛ́ won ɛ gɛ Korowii aa dɛ nyin, asɛ dɛ won dɔ kwaa waa bagɛ heyaa nyoa la.
58010037	Anee Korowii Tɔn bagle la: "A ka tamaa ken asɛ naate waa dɛ ba bala la ba. Waa bigra ba.
58010038	Nɛn o waa aa togra dɛ su n siwi la te la, wɛɛ yarada mɛɛ dɛ dɔ mkpa. Kɛ dɛ o le habɔɔ te naa, n sie aa o nɛɛ lɛɛ ba."
58010039	Ya ta nɛra baa dɛ le habɔɔ dɛɛ nyogre la ɛɛ. Nɛra baa dɛ yarada dɛɛ dɔ mkpa laanee yan.
58011001	Bɔkwaa yarada ɔ? Yaradaa kɛŋɔ yaa jema kaih kɛŋɔ yaa wonoo dɔ kwaa yaa dɛ tamane a wa, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ kwaa yaa wola an na siwi ne la bwa lole kpela.
58011002	Yarada taa a che Korowii pena a saŋ la tena.
58011003	Yarada taa a che ya no a mun kɛŋɔ nyoa wobol nee Korowii ta nyundua ne harɛ. Anomanta nyundua ne harɛ yaa dɛ na nɔ, kwaa baa wola an na nee ba taa.
58011004	Yaradaa Abɛl dɔ, asɛ o kwaa waa kpɔa ɛ saraha tɛ Korowii won su siwi dɛ gwaa o dɔɔ Keen kwa, asɛ Korowii lɛa dɛ penao kɛŋɔ o ɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa aa su o siwi. O fe sewɔ, kɛ o yaradae waa yarada Korowii nomanta, waa waa ɛa la chɔɔ ba le fini ba taa bola.
58011005	Yarada Enɔk yarada Korowii, asɛ Korowii kpɔɔ kaa o be nyundua, dɛ o ta sewɛ. Ba nyin o bɔr kahonɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ Korowii kpɔɔ kaa nyundua. Ba chwerɛ o waa kɛŋɔ Korowii aa wola on kpɔe kaa o be mɔɔ la, dɛ Korowii sie lɛ o nɛ.
58011006	Nɛn ta yarada dɔe yaa, o waa aa won lɛ Korowii sie. Nomɛlbwa waa ba Korowii be la, a chɛ kɛ o dɔ yarada kɛŋɔ Korowii lole, dɛ yarada kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin o jemɛ Korowii la, Korowii dɛ chao.
58011007	Yarada taa a che Korowii aa bol waa a taa lɔ sie dɛɛ ba bala Nowa be la, o no, dɛ o ta an nae mɔɔ. O noɔ dɛ kwaa gberjen o ne o haah ne bii jo o bini, ba ta serewe. Nowa te aa yaradaa, asɛ nɛwɛnyina baa kaa la aa wola yaradae la, a gelɔ nɛwɛnyini bwa di bolchɔge, asɛ dɛ gel o ɛ nɛra aa chegɛ ba yarada ta asɛ ba waa su Korowii siwi la bɛl.
58011008	Yarada taa a che Korowii aa le Abraham ŋɔ ó kaa harɛ waa bagɔ nyoa la ta la, o le dɛ kaa. Waa dɛ kaa la, dɛ waa bela waa dɛ kaa jemɛ.
58011009	Yarada nee o ka so harɛfale Korowii aa bagɔ nyoa la ta kɛŋɔ hɔɔh ken. Tɛnte deene binii o so kɛŋɔ o bie Aesek ne o ge bie Jekɔb Korowii aa bagɛ ba ge a gɛ nyoa nɔ tenten la.
58011010	Dɛ Abraham dɔ bwɛɛ bɛl hwɛga. A gɛ bwɛɛ la, Korowii gbagbaa vɔrɔwo, o che kiŋkiŋ. Waa pagre bwa.
58011011	Abraham yaradae waa dɛ yarada Korowii la taa a che o won lolɛ dɛ o hwɛɛhrɔ asɛ o haah Saara ge ɛ hambara. Dɛ o jemɔ kɛŋɔ nyoa Korowii aa bagɔ la, wɛɛ ɛo.
58011012	Abraham aa hwɛɛhra waa wola kpege kpa la, o wono lolɛ, asɛ o naanar ge ya, dɛ warɛ kɛŋɔ weweela kɛɛ mpo nyoa hɛŋle ken.
58011013	Korowii yaradae taa a gɛ nɛra nɔ bwa do dɛ ba serewe, dɛ ba ta waa Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa la nae siwi ne. Kɛ ba yarada nomanta, ba naa bojaŋ ba sie lɛ kɛŋɔ haa na hɔɔhra bojaŋ baa ba he sie lɛ la. Ba sɛoh kɛŋɔ ba ɛ hɔɔhra harɛ nɔ ta.
58011014	Nɛra dɛ bol ken aa, dɛ ba dɛ nyin ba chagle kɛŋɔ ba dɛ nyin ba gbagba harɛ dɛ́ so.
58011015	Dɛ harɛ baa le o ta ba la waa ba fee lii raa, ba fe ɛɛ wonoo berɛ kaa o ta.
58011016	Kɛ gɛ laa a do. Harɛdɛɛge waa wera gwaa bela baa lea la waa baa lii. Harɛ waa lɔ nyundua waa baa lii. Anomanta a ta Korowii sihiih ɛɛ kɛŋɔ baa dɛ yerɔ ba Korowii, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o kwaa bwɛɛ bɛl cheg ba.
58011017	Yaradaa Abraham yarada Korowii waa o won lawɛ o bie Aesek ŋɔ o dɛ kpɔɔ ɛ saraha dɛ tɛ Korowii a gɛ saŋ Korowii aa daahno na la. Abrahamee Korowii bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ, "Aesek nɛɛ aa ba chega asɛ n tɛɛ he naanar la maa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ mɛɛ tɛɛ la." Kɛ Korowii aa ŋɔa ó kpɔ o bibeŋkpoŋ Aesek la ɛ saraha tɛo la, o ta vɛɛh.
58011019	Dɛ Abraham jemɔ kɛŋɔ hale dɛ Aesek sewɔ kwaraa naa, Korowii dɔ kpegri kɛŋɔ ó won iru seo ta. Yaa wonoo ŋɔ sewaa Aesek sewɛ dɛ berɛ ba Abraham nɔn ta ja.
58011020	Yaradaa Aesek yarada Korowii waa o won swee Jekɔb ne Esɔ andɛɛga ba kerekere soga bini.
58011021	Jekɔb aa dɛ ba sewa la, o swee andɛɛga tɛ Josef bii banɛ la bwa. Dɛ o kpoŋe daŋgbala dɛ pi o ta dɛɛ jam Korowii. Jekɔb aa dɛ yarada Korowii waa o won ɛ anɔ bwa.
58011022	Josef aa dɛ ba sewa la, o ŋɔ Israel tena be ŋɔ baa le Ijipt harɛ taa, dɛ bagle gɛ baa kaa o hoga ne ka huge bwa. Waa dɛ yarada Korowii la waa o won ɛ gɛ.
58011023	Mosis nya ne o mɛɛ aa lolɔ la, ba kpɔɔ sɔh korobie atoro, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba nao kɛŋɔ o wer bonɔɔ. Ba ta Ijipt kooro mmara waa doa la ɔme. Baa dɛ yarada Korowii waa ba won ɛ gɛ.
58011024	Mosis aa kpega la, o ta sɛɛh ba yerɔ Ijipt kooro bihaah bie. Waa dɛ yarada Korowii waa o won ɛ gɛ.
58011025	O ta sɛɛh ɛ Ijipt tena bodia waa baa lɔ a ta la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a ɛ wechɔga, harɛ bonɔ gbo gee aa jagɛ. O sie lɛ Korowii nɛra la pui dɛ́ na wahala dɛ gwaa Ijipt tena bodia la.
58011026	O nyiŋi sihiih waa koh Kristo waa dɛ́ di la kɛŋɔ a wer o be dɛ gwaa kondɔɔhkwaa a faa lɔ Ijipt harɛ la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ o dɛ nyiŋi tɔpere la Korowii aa ba bɔ nɛra bwa kem la ŋwɛnɛ.
58011027	Waa dɛ yarada Korowii la waa waa wola Ijipt kooro bandia ɔmɛ dɛ le bela, a do kɛŋɔ waa dɛ na Korowii baa wola on na la ken, o ta habɔɔ berɛ.
58011028	Mosis aa dɛ yarada Korowii waa o pa Galekaa kondikwaa dii waa la mun, dɛ gel Israel tena ɛ chal lɔ ba gbeni, ásɛ Korowii nyundua torome waa dɛ kpoo Ijipt tena bibalogla la na dɛ bɛ ba te bibalogla kpoo.
58011029	Korowiirii Israel tena yarada waa Mposwɛm la aa teŋe anɛ, o nenabɔɔ sie hol kɛŋɔ harɛpɛɛ la, ba won jo dɛ le la. Ijipt tena aa ŋɔa ba ge le la, mpo la kaa ba ne.
58011030	Korowiirii Israel tena yarada waa ba bɔ nsara bar Jeriko tɔpera anuanɛ, asɛ danjwɛɛ waa bar bwɛɛ la bwa cheme kuugi la.
58011031	Korowiirii hanjwamane Rahab yarada waa o lɛ Israel tena sɔh o be kɛrɛdɛ, ba na o bwɛɛ waa dɛ ka taa, Israel tena aa wola on kpoe ja nɛra baa wola Korowii waa noɛ la nɛ.
58011032	Too, ń bagle ane ja aa? Maa bɔree dɔ bagle Gedeɔn, ne Barak, ne Samsen, ne Jɛfta, ne Devid, ne Samoɛl, ne Korowii keamere la bwa wa.
58011033	A gɛ nɛra nɔ bwa yarada Korowii kohona, dɛ che ba yarada ta yo koranar dɛ pɔ ba nɛ, dɛ gel nɛra ɛɛ ɛ waa aa togra Korowii ŋwɛnɛ ta, asɛ Korowii ɛ waa waa bagɛ nyoa la ane ba bere saŋ. Ba wono tɔ nyujentena nyoo, a ta wone lag ba.
58011034	Ba wono che nijena baah ta dɛ sɔɔh a nyoa, a ta wone fuuh ba, dɛ won lɛ ba te nɛra baa kpoŋe tokobie dɛɛ nyin ba kpoora nɔn ta. Ba wono dɔ bokpega gɛ saŋ baa gwɛgra, dɛ won yo laa kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ won pɔ harɛre ane tena nɛɛ laa ta ba chwaage.
58011035	Korowii yaradae nomanta ba wono chum haahna bane nɛra baa serewa. Nɛra bane ɛ ba bini bane ge hɔhɔrɔwa kɛŋɔ bá fe vɛh Korowii nɛɛ teŋa, kɛ ba ta ba nyu dɔe waa koɛh dɛ vɛh, gɛ aa ɛ ásɛ ba won ba ir seo ta dɛ dɔ bodɛɛge do.
58011036	Ba ɛ bane ge bahmugliwaa dɛ lɔɔ ba chweremi ne, dɛ do kwaa bane ge nɔɔra, dɛ do ba dea.
58011037	Ba fogre bane bwea dɛ kpoo ba, dɛ kpɔ sradaa teŋni bane bini anɛnɛ, dɛ kpoo bane ge tokobie ne. Dɛ booh tɔne ne pee tɔnee ba bane kpɔ berɛ laala dɛɛ do. Dɛ ba nyao kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ nɛra che ba nɛ, asɛ bane gee ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa aa wola were.
58011038	Dɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire ta chɛɛ kɛ ba ne a gɛ Korowii nɛra baa ɛ nɛnjena nɔ pɛ so. Ba ta soŋnibɔr dɔe, dɛ do pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo harɛ ne bwea dor dɛɛ gaage, dɛɛ so bwe bɔɔne ne bɔpɛɛne bini.
58011039	Nɛra dɛ pena a gɛ nɛra nɔ bwa yaradae baa yarada Korowii wa, kɛ ba bɛlbwa ta kon Korowii aa bagɛ Israel tena nyoa la dɔe.
58011040	Korowii lii waa aa wera cheg ya fini nɔ tena, dɛ ŋɔ a gɛ nɛra la gbo aa won do kaih ka tonɛ, nemenɛ kɛŋɔ ya ne ba bwa aa pɛa dɛ do kaih.
58012001	Ya te aa dɔ a gɛ nɛra nɔ bwa waa baa yarada Korowii dɛ ɛ aa bagle yaa waa nɔ, a chɛ kɛ ya ge lawɛ bambile dɛ chwa ya chwae waa chɔ ya sie nɔ siswɛm ne. A chɛ kɛ ya laa komɛlbwa waa gel ya lɔ naa ya chwae ta la kpɔ, dɛ gel wechɔga aa dɛ tɔ yaa ŋwɛnɛ bwa.
58012002	Yáa nyiŋi Yeesu waa ɛ ya Korowii yaradae bwa nyu te, dɛ ɛ a mumpar ne a jaga la. On koh bosɔɔhna waa ba dɔ waa asɛ ba ɛo hɔhɔrɔwa dagagre ta la. O ta sihiih waa koɛh dɛ vɛh. Taraken o soge nomombɔr Korowii dig ta.
58012003	Hé nyiŋi gɛ nɛnchɔga faa haoh dɛɛ chɛgro asɛ o lawɛ bambile la, asɛ bɔhwaah bɛ heyaa lawɛ, he le habɔɔ.
58012004	He ne wechɔga aa dɛ yo nɔ, he ta yoi chal le he nɛɛ mɔɔ.
58012005	He soh gɛ Korowii aa kpɔ heyaa ɛ o bii dɛ ja heyaa la aa? Ba chwerɔ ŋɔ, "N bie, Korowii dɛ tɛr he deŋne aa, bɛ an wesale lii. Dɛ o dɛ togre naa, bɛ gel a hwah he bwara,
58012006	dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛn Korowii aa dɛ nyin la, o deŋnee wɛɛ tɛr, dɛɛ togre nɛn waa lɛo kɛ o bie."
58012007	Hé lawɛ bambile wahala haa dɛ na ta, dɛ nyiŋa kɛŋɔ he Mɛɛɛ dɛɛ tɛr he deŋne. He deŋne tɛra la chaglɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii kpɔ heyaa ɛ o bii, dɛkalkɛŋɔ bie bɛlbwa toole o mɛɛ aa wola o deŋnee tɛr bwa.
58012008	Dɛ o ta he deŋne tɛrɛ kɛŋɔ waa dɛ tɛr o bii bwa deŋne la aa, amɔ dɛ o bii gbagba laa heya, dɛ kataborerii heya.
58012009	Ya mɛɛnanar baa lolɛ yaa la kwara, ba tɛr ya deŋne aa, ya dɛ no ba be. Aah dɛ ya Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua dɛ dɔ ya lileore la te sɛh, a ta chɛ kɛ ya no o be dɛ dɔ mkpa aa?
58012010	Ya mɛɛnanar baa lolɛ yaa la, tɔpera anɛ bɛlee ba tɛr ya deŋne gɛ ba ge aa naa kɛ a ŋwɛnɛ taa la. Kɛ Korowii te aa dɛ tɛr ya deŋne la, ya gbagba kɛrɛdɛ waa wɛɛ ɛ gɛ ásɛ ya do goroŋ kɛŋɔ gɛ waa doa la.
58012011	Ba dɛ tɛr nɛn deŋne aa, bug la ta la, o tea bini dɛ chɔg, o sie aa lɛ. Kɛ dɛ o hweli waa name o deŋne tɛra la ta naa, o waa dɛ togre, asɛ o bwara ɛɛ sɔɔhno.
58012012	Anomanta he bɛ nɔɔra kpɔ sawɛ nyoa. Hé hamɛ mun.
58012013	Hé gel he we-ɛɛla togre ásɛ he bala baa gwɛgra Korowii nɛɛ teŋa ta dɛ do kɛ nɛn waa dɛ dugri la bɛ he ŋwɛnɛre aa wola togrɛ la ta kpɔ dɛ ba lɔ na. A chɛ kɛ he togre he ŋwɛnɛre ásɛ ba kpɔ a ta dɛ dɔ bokpega.
58012014	Hé swɛɛ siwi kɛŋɔ he ne nɛra bwa baah nɛɛ do werii, dɛ swɛɛ siwi kɛŋɔ hɛɛ do goroŋee, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ nomɛlbwa ta goroŋ doe yaa, waa Korowii nae ba.
58012015	Korowii dɔ chae waa dɛ nyin o cha yaa kohona. Anomanta hé nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ asɛ a bɛ bɛlbwa ba paŋɛ. A waa laa aa, wechɔga ane ɛɛ ba jo he binii dɛ chɔg nɛndamanta kɛŋɔ koŋkpela yon jo kondikwaa ta dɛ chɔga la.
58012016	He bini bɛlbwa bɛ jwamane ba bɔ, dɛ vɛh Korowii ɔma kɛŋɔ Esɔ aa koh kerabeŋkpoŋ kondikwaa dii waa dɛ yog o nomonome tɛ o nime la.
58012017	He nao kɛŋɔ waa bera baa nyin kɛŋɔ o mɛɛ swee tɛo gɛ baa sweera dɛɛ tɛ binomoa la, o ta gɛ dɔe kpa. O siwi swɛɛrɔ wɛɛ nyin o dɔ gɛ a fe aa chɛa kɛ o dɔ, hale dɛɛ wi gba. Kɛ waa o gbagba aa ɛa la, o ta wone bera a do gɛ a faa doa kpa.
58012018	Haa ba Korowii be nɔ, kon haa lege be laa he ba, kɛŋɔ Israel tena faa ba bwejen Sinai ta la. A gɛ bwejen nɔ fa dɛ lawɛ nii jigijigi ken. Ba faa ba o mun la, bɔr bwa biro kpirikpirikpiri ken, asɛ peu ɛɛ ta vuguvuguvugu ken.
58012019	Dɛ bɛla bɛl dɛ si, asɛ nomɛl taa ɛɛ le. Nɛra la aa no taa la la, ba soŋɔ ŋɔ anɔ la baa noa la magre gɛ,
58012020	dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ waa naate aa dɛ bol la kpegri tɛɛ ba. O bolɔ ŋɔ, "Dɛ kondɛɛre kwaraa lege bwejen la aa, a chɛ kɛ ba fogro bwea kpo."
58012021	Waa aa chig bela la, dɛ a ɔma kohona to, asɛ Mosis ŋɔ, "Ɔmee lag mɛ, n bwara dɛ sa!"
58012022	He te aa ba Korowii be nɔ, bwejen Saayɔn waa lɔ Korowii o gbo ɛ Korowii dɛ do le saŋ bɛlbwa la gbagba bwɛɛ Jerusalam waa lɔ nyundua la, o taa he ba. Bela nyundua toroma kagboŋlafa aa chema silɛɛ ne laanee he ba.
58012023	O binomonome o kapɛrɛ aa ku ba nɔn asɛ ba sɔna do tɔn la aa lɔ o be la ta la gba cheme bela. Ba ne Korowii waa dɛ ba nɛra bwa waa bola dɛ pa bole la, ne lala ba wa aa togra dɛ su o siwi, asɛ o gel ba ɛ nɛndɛɛga ka tonɛ la bwa bee he ba.
58012024	Yeesu bee he ba. On chegɛ nɛwɛnyini ne Korowii baah ta dɛ fɔwɛ fɔofale la la. Bela waa kpɔ o chal jwal laanee he ba. O chal soŋe wedɛɛga dɛɛ tɛ yaa. A ta do kɛŋɔ Abɛl chal aa ba taahna ne la.
58012025	Anomanta hé nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ asɛ dɛ bɛ deŋne taŋ Korowii waa waa dɛ bol la ta. A saŋ la tena faa vɛh nɛn ba ne waa lɔ harɛ bonɔ waa waa bola dɛ kpɔ ja ba la, dɛ ba ta wone lɛ ba te naa, ya nɛra yaa vɛh naate waa lɔ nyundua waa waa kpɔa dɛɛ ja yaa la, ɛrɛɛ yá ɛ dɛ won lɛ ya te nɔ?
58012026	Waa bol waa gɛ saŋ la, harɛ jigro. Kɛ taraken te, o bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ ba jigri harɛɛ kerabeŋkpoŋ ja. Harɛ gbo laa mɛɛ ba jigra. Mɛɛ jigri nyundua gee ja."
58012027	A gɛ waa waa bola dɛ ŋɔ "kerabeŋkpoŋ ja" nɔ dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ o baa jigri nyundua ne harɛ naa, Korowii kontaala aa lɔ a ta dɛ won jigri la ɛɛ chɔgoo, ásɛ anɔ la aa wola won jigri la do le dɛɛ la.
58012028	Anomanta a chɛ kɛ yaa jam Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa kɛŋɔ waa gela ya do o Kora waa wola yiigi ta nɔ. A chɛ kɛ yaa tomɔ gɛ aa too o tea, dɛɛ tɛo duure dɛɛ ɔmɔ,
58012029	dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya Korowii nɔ do kɛ nii aa wona dɛɛ chɔg kwaa kohona.
58013001	He nya biirii dɔŋa Yeesu Kristo waa nɔ ta, anomanta hɛ́ɛ nyin dɔŋa saŋ bɛlbwa.
58013002	He bɛ soh kɛŋɔ a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ lɛ hɔɔhra dɛɛ nyiŋ ba kɛrɛdɛ. Bane ɛ gɛ dɛ nyiŋi nyundua toroma, dɛ baa jemɛ.
58013003	Hɛ́ɛ lii nɛra baa do ba dea waa kɛŋɔ he ne banee ba do dea ken. Hɛ́ɛ lii nɛra baa dɛ ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa ge waa kɛŋɔ he ge aa dɛ na weweele la bɛl ken.
58013004	A chɛ kɛ nomɛlbwa kpɔ duure dɛɛ tɛ hahmor, dɛ bɛ nɛmpɛɛne lawɛ dɛɛ chɔ dɛ ka ja ba haahna kɛɛ ba jaranar nɛ. Korowii ɛɛ tɛr nɛra baa dɛ ɛ wedoŋa baa ne haah chɔe be pera dɛɛ nyin ba dɔŋa haahna kɛɛ ba dɔŋa jaranar la deŋnee.
58013005	He bɛ gel suuga waa swɛɛ he siwi kohona. Hé gel anɔ la haa dɔa la magre he ne, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii bolɔ ŋɔ, "Maa heyaa ta bwa, maa sie laa kpɔ he nɛɛ bwa."
58013006	Anomanta yaa wonoo lɔ bambile ŋɔ, "N Naa Korowii dɛ cha mɛ, anomanta maa ɔmɛ. Ɛrɛɛ nɛwɛnyini ɛɛ ba wona ɛɛ mɛ nɔ?"
58013007	Hé nyiŋi he nomonome ba faa bol Korowii waa dɛɛ bagle heyaa la. Hé nyiŋi gɛ ba faa teŋɛ Korowii ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ ba serewe, dɛɛ yarada Korowii gɛ ba faa dɛ yaradao la.
58013008	Yeesu Kristo aa begre. Gɛ waa doa a saŋ la la, gɛɛ o ta do fini, gɛɛ wɛɛ ba doe saŋ bɛlbwa.
58013009	He bɛ gel wefala chɔg he liire asɛ he le Korowii ŋwɛnɛdɛɛge la ta. He dɛ nyin he do kpegri Korowii nɛɛ teŋa ta naa, hé kpɔ sie dawɛ chae Korowii aa sune nɛra nɛɛ dɛɛ cha ba la ta. He bɛ sie kpɔ dawɛ kondikwaare ane kii ne ane dii ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a ta wone cha nɛra baa kpɔ sie dawɛ a ta la.
58013010	Juda tena Sɔfore baa dɛ ɛ toma Korowii Dea bini la ta ŋwɛnɛ dɔe kɛŋɔ ba di ya saraha kwaa yaa dɛ di la ane.
58013011	Juda tena Sɔfore Nomoa dɛ ba chal ne saraha ɛɛ Korowii Bogoroŋ Tenten la aa, o dɛ jo a ne bela dɛ́ kpɔ soŋe o nɛra wechɔga. Kondɛɛra la baa ɛ a chal la te la, daharaa baa fuah.
58013012	Gɛ tentenee Yeesu ge na wahala dɛ sewɛ Jerusalam dahara, asɛ dɛ kpɔ o chal dɛ laa doŋa kpɔ nɛwɛnyina nɛɛ ásɛ ba ɛ Korowii nɛra.
58013013	Anomanta, hé gel ya la o be dahara bela, dɛ ka puu di o sihiih waa dia la,
58013014	dɛkalkɛŋɔ, ya ta bwɛɛ dɔe dɛ́ so o ta saŋ bɛlbwa harɛ bonɔ. Bwɛɛ o taa lɔ sie dɛɛ ba la, o taa ya sie dawɛ.
58013015	Anomanta a chɛ kɛ ya che Yeesu nɛɛ dɛ ɛ ya saraha dɛɛ tɛ Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa. Saraha yaa dɛ ba ɛɛ laanee kɛŋɔ yáa dɛɛ kpɛɛroo dɛɛ yerɛ o sɔn.
58013016	He bɛ dɔŋa wedɛɛga ɛɛ ne dɔŋa chae waa soh, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a gɛ waa nɔ ɛ saraha a waa aa dɛ lɛ Korowii sie.
58013017	Hɛ́ɛ no nɛra baa dɛ tɔ he sie la nyoa wa, dɛɛ ɛ waa baa ŋɔa hɛ́ɛ ɛ la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ban dɛɛ nyiŋi heya. Ba dɔ nkontaah dɛ́ bu Korowii sie dɛ bagle gɛ bwa baa nyiŋi heya. Hɛ́ɛ no ba nyoa wa, ásɛ ba won ɛ toma silɛɛ ne. Dɛ haa ba nyoa waa no aa, baa ɛa tebinichɔg nee, aa wola tɔnɔ bɛlbwa lee ba dɛ tɛ heya.
58013018	Hé soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ yaa. Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ ya tea bini too, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya dɛ nyin kɛ yaa ɛ waa aa togra saŋ bɛlbwa.
58013019	N dɛ soŋe heyaa kohona ásɛ he soŋe Korowii ásɛ o ba n ne he be warane.
