58013020	N dɛ soŋe Korowii waa ir ya Dɔɔ Yeesu seo ta la. Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu ɛ Petegrejen dɛɛ nyiŋi o peera ta. Seo o gbagba aa sɛah dɛ sewɛ la, a taa a che asɛ Korowii fɔwɛ fɔo waa wola pura dɔe bwa la. Kórowii waa dɛ tɛ bambisɔɔhna la tɛ heyaa dadɛɛge aa chɛ kɛ he dɔ dɛ́ won dɛɛ ɛ o tetoora bwa. Ó che Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ ɛ waa waa dɛ nyin bwa ya bini. Yeesu Kristo chɛ jam saŋ te bɛlbwa! Aamen.
58013022	Yabalawa, n dɛ soŋe heyaa kɛŋɔ he lawɛ bambile dɛ no waa nɔ maa chwera dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ do heyaa gbemba nɔ. He nyiŋo na naa, tɔn nɔ maa chwerɛ heyaa nɔ aa jaŋɛ bɛlbwa.
58013023	N dɛ nyin he jemɛ kɛnaŋɔ ba le ya dɔŋ Timoti dea. O balɔ warane asɛ mɛɛ ba he be naa, n ne wɛɛ bao.
58013024	Ya dɛ na he nomonome la bwa, ne Korowii nɛra la bwa. Yabala Itali harɛ tena la ge dɛ na heya.
58013025	Kórowii cha he bwa sekwaraa.
59001001	Men Jems maa ɛ Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔ laanee chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ he Israel deene fi dɛ anɛ tena haa lɔ bobɛlbwa la. N dɛ na heya.
59001002	Yabala, dɛ wobɛlbwa pu heyaa dɛ ɛ wekpega aa, hé gel he sie lɛ.
59001003	A chɛ kɛŋɔ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ dɛ wobɛlbwa pu heyaa he ta habɔɔ berɛ kpo Yeesu aa, anee dɛɛ ba gela he dɔ bambile dɛ won che kiŋkiŋ wobɛlbwa ta.
59001004	Hé dɔ bambile wobɛlbwa ta dɛ ka tonɛ, ásɛ dɛ won che a ta dɛ jemɛ wa, dɛ dɔ dadɛɛge, asɛ wobɛlbwa bɛ heyaa nya harɛ nɔ ta.
59001005	Dɛ wobɛlbwa pu heyaa hɛɛ nyin a wejema aa, hé soŋe Korowii asɛ o tɛ heya. O tea chɔ pɛɛ, waa nɛn kon tɛ o waa berɛ dɛɛ we o nɛ. Wɛɛ tɛ heyaa.
59001006	Kɛ hé kpɔ yarada dɛɛ soŋo, dɛ bɛ dɛɛ tɔŋle. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɔŋle kɛ o ken naa o konnyinii dɔ la, o ta yarada dɔe. O liire won bera warawara kɛŋɔ peu yon ta dɛɛ begre mpo nee dɛɛ kaa bobɛlbwa la.
59001007	Nɛn o liire aa ɛ anɛ la dɛ chole, o wobɛlbwa aa magre. Dɛ naate dɛ soŋe Korowii aa, o bɛ dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ wɛɛ no o bee.
59001009	Dɛ he nyao dɛ ɛ Yeesu habɔteŋre aa, gel he sie lɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he ɛ nɛnjen Korowii be.
59001010	Dɛ he ɛ dɔɔh ge aa, gel he sie lɛ kɛŋɔ he ne nyaa la bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he ɛ nɛŋgwɛgre Korowii be. Haa bigri sewɛ kɛŋɔ kpɔga yon fe dɛ chure warane dɛ berɛ sewɛ la.
59001011	Gɛ wee yon le, dɛ lɔ, asɛ kpɔga sewɛ dɛ chure a fedɛɛga la ta, asɛ a wer tonɛ la, gɛ tentenee dɔɔh gee ba sewa o kwaa nyina ta, asɛ o kondɔɔh la bwa ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ.
59001012	He bini bɛlbwa waa takapɔ lawɛ bambile dɛɛ na wahala la, o na som. Dɛ wenaale la kpoŋe la sie dɛ ba horɛ, kɛ he ta teŋɛ Korowii nɛɛ he bambile bwa ne naa, wɛɛ tɛɛ mkpa waa ŋɔa ŋɔ wɛɛ kpɔɔ tɛ nɛra baa dɛ nyinu la laanee, a ɛ kompoŋ haa yoa dɛ le ba vɔwɛ.
59001013	Dɛ waane pu nomɛl o ɛ wechɔga aa, o bɛ ŋɔ Korowiirii gela o ɛ wechɔga. Wobɛlbwa toole dɛ won gel Korowii ɛ wechɔga. Waa waane gee kpɔ ta ya nɛɛ ya ɛ wechɔga.
59001014	Dɛ waane pu nomɛl o ɛ wechɔga aa, o gbabir pɛla waa dɔa laanee gela o ɛ wechɔga.
59001015	Pɛla waa wola were la dɛ lolɛ wechɔga, asɛ wechɔga ge baa waraa, a yon lolɛ seo.
59001016	Yabala, he bɛ gel ba negre heya.
59001017	Komɛlbwa waa wera la le Korowii be. Komɛlbwa waa ɛ kondɛɛge la, Korowiirii kpɔa kɛ yaa. Onee ya Mɛɛ waa ta kwaa bwa aa lɔ nyundua dɛɛ chaah harɛ. Gɛ kwaa nɔ dɛ chaah, ane ta ge aa chaah, kɛ Korowii te aa begre bwa.
59001018	O gbagba tetooraa ya dɔ o waa aa ɛ kasinteŋ la dɛɛ no, dɛ che a ta ɛ o bii, ásɛ dɛ su o siwi kwaa waa taa la bwa bini.
59001019	Yabala, hɛ́ɛ lii waa nɔ aa teŋa nɔ. Hé gel he sie begre waa noe ta, dɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ mɔɔ dɛɛ bol wa, asɛ dɛ bɛ gel he baah nɛɛ di warawara.
59001020	Nɛwɛnyini bandia aa wobɛlbwa kwaa Korowii ŋwɛnɛdɛɛge teŋa ta.
59001021	Anomanta hé le wedoŋa ne wechɔga aa lɔ he bini dɛ gwaa he nɛɛ la ta, dɛ pwɛr he te, dɛ kpɔ he te tɛ Korowii waa la waa kpɔa do he bambili bini a won lɛ heyaa la.
59001022	He bɛ waa la no dɛ gel a ɛɛ. Dɛ he dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, he dɛ negre he te. Hé ɛ gɛ waa la aa bagla la.
59001023	Nomɛlbwa waa no waa nɔ, waa wola gɛ waa la aa bagla la ɛ la, o do kɛŋɔ nɛn waa dɛ nyiŋi digi ta dɛɛ na o gbagba la.
59001024	Waa nyiŋi o te digi la ta dɛ na gɛ waa doa la, tamaa ken, dɛ o berɔ soh gɛ waa doa.
59001025	Korowii mmara wer, o gelɔ yaa dɔ ya te, waa yaa vɔrɔwe. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ no dɛɛ pese o bini, waa wola soh dɛɛ ɛ gɛ waa bagla la, Korowii ɛɛ nyiŋi naate nɛɛ o we-ɛɛla bwa taa.
59001026	Dɛ nomɛl dɛ lii kɛ o ɛ Korowii torome, dɛ o ta nyotɔgbom dɔe yaa, o dɛ negre o nyu. Naate Korowii toma la ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ.
59001027	Waa Korowii waa ɛ ya Mɛɛ aa dɛ nyin a do wer dɛ magre o toma bini laanee kɛŋɔ, yá cha bilalbii ne luhaahna ba wahala bini, asɛ dɛ laa ya te kpɔ harɛ nɔ wechɔga ta.
59002001	Yabala, haa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo waa ɛ jirima Dɔɔ nɔ, a ta chɛ kɛŋɔ he duu nɛra bane dɛ gwaa bane.
59002002	Dɛ he ne he bala chemo dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii, nɛra banɛ ba jo he bini, bɛl do suugaswɛm kwaa dɛ tɔ yadɛɛge, bɛl ge tɔ yadoŋ,
59002003	asɛ he tɛ onɔ la waa do suugaswɛm kwaa dɛ tɔ yadɛɛge la sobɔrdɛɛge, dɛ ŋɔ onɔ la waa tɔ yadoŋ la be ŋɔ, ó te che bela kɛɛ ó ba so harɛ he sie naa,
59002004	amɔ dɛ he dɛ duu bane dɛ gwaa bane. Nɛra sie bɔree hɛɛ nyiŋi dɛɛ duu bane dɛɛ nyiŋi bane nyubaahna. Haa kɛrɛdɛ ɛ.
59002005	Yabala, hé no! Korowii we-ɛɛlaa kɛŋɔ o le harɛ nɔ ta nyaara baa yaradao kɛrɛdɛ asɛ ba yarada la ɛɛ ba kondɔɔh, asɛ ba dɔ bɔr dɛ ja o Kora waa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ geloo nɛra baa dɛ nyinu ja o ta la.
59002006	Kɛ he te lawɛ nyaara sie tegɛ harɛ. Dɔɔhna laa dɛɛ fiigi heya, dɛ lawɛ heyaa kaa che kɔɔto la aa?
59002007	Gɛ nɛra nɔ laa dɛɛ bol wechɔga dɛɛ yagɛ Yeesu sɔndɛɛge nɔ baa kpɔa dawɛ heyaa la aa? Kɛ banee hɛɛ duu la!
59002008	Dɛ he dɛ teŋɛ Korowii Kora mmara baa chwera ŋɔ, "Nyin he dɔŋ kɛ he te gbagba la" ta naa, dɛ he dɛ ɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
59002009	Kɛ dɛ he dɛ duu nɛra bane dɛ gwaa bane aa, dɛ he dɛ ɛ wechɔga. Mmara baglɔ kɛŋɔ he di bolchɔge.
59002010	Nomɛlbwa waa teŋɛ Mmara la bwa ta kɛ dɛ to o bini beŋkpoŋ la, dɛ o to o bwa, dɛ di bolchɔge.
59002011	Korowiirii bagla ŋɔ, "Bɛ jwamane bɔ." O tentenee bera bagle kɛ "Bɛ nɛn kpo." Dɛ he ta jwamane bɔe dɛ kpo nɛn naa, dɛ he ɛ nɛn haa to Mmara.
59002012	Hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii dɛ ba ya waa bola o Kora mmara waa kpɔa lɛ yaa asɛ ya dɔ ya te la ne. Anomanta hé nyiŋi he nyoo wobol ne he we-ɛɛla ta kɛrɛdɛ,
59002013	dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii aa naate waa wola o dɔŋ sum na la sumii na awola waa dɛɛ bol ya waa la. Naate waa dɛ na o dɔŋ sum la aa o waa bola ɔmɛ.
59002014	Yabala, dɛ nomɛl ŋɔ o dɛ yarada Korowii, dɛ o ta o yarada kpɔe dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga aa, tɔnɔ besoo o yarada la dɔɔ? A gɛ yarada nɔ ɛɛ wonoo lɛo waa?
59002015	He nao kɛŋɔ he dɔŋ baa kɛɛ haah dɛ chɔ waa, dɛɛ nyin yal dɛ́ tɔ, dɛɛ nyin kondikwaa ge dɛ́ di,
59002016	asɛ he ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Kórowii tɛɛ bokpega dɛ tɛɛ bosɔɔhna," dɛ vɔmɔ kwaa aa tɛo bokpega la te naa, dɛ tɔnɔ besoo lɔ waa haa bola tɛo la ta nɔ?
59002017	Gɛɛ a do yarada ta kɛŋɔ dɛ nɛn ta wedɛɛga ɛɛ dɛɛ ja o yarada ta naa, dɛ o yarada la ɛ wepuu.
59002018	Bɛl lole nomɛl ɛɛ ŋɔɔ yaradae gboo wɛɛ yarada Korowii, asɛ bɛl ge ŋɔ wedɛɛgaa o gee ɛ. Kɛ gɛ ge aa won magre. Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ba wona bag mɛ he yarada dɛ he ta wedɛɛga ɛɛ dɛɛ ja a ta nɔ? N te, mɛɛ che n wedɛɛga ɛɛ taa asɛ he jemɛ kɛ n dɛ yarada Korowii.
59002019	He dɛ yarada kɛŋɔ Korowii beŋkpoŋii lole naa? A wer ga! Kɛ he ne Bɔnsam toromaa soge dabeŋkpoŋ ta. Ba gba dɛ yarada Korowii ɔmee ne bochela ne.
59002020	Gɛne! He dɛ nyin n bagle kɛŋɔ yarada wedɛɛga ɛɛ aa wola a ta jae la ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ aa?
59002021	Ya naa Abraham fe aa dɛ ba o bie Aesek kpoe dɛ tɛ Korowii la, a ta laa a che Korowii ŋɔ o ɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su o siwi la aa?
59002022	He ta nae kɛŋɔ o yarada ne o wedɛɛga ɛɛ bwa aa pɛ aa? O wedɛɛga ɛɛ taa a che o yarada ɛ yarada kasinteŋ.
59002023	Belaa Korowii Tɔn waa la ɛ kpela kɛŋɔ baa ŋɔa ŋɔ, "Abraham yarada Korowii, asɛ o yarada nomanta Korowii ŋɔ o ɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su o siwi" la. Dɛ ba dɛ yerɔ Korowii dam.
59002024	Kɛ he nao kenɛ, nɛn wedɛɛga ɛɛ ne o yarada bwa taa a che wɛɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa ɛɛ su Korowii siwi, o yarada gbo ta laa.
59002025	Gɛ tentenee a do hanjwamane baa dɛ yerɔ Rahab la gba nɛ. Israel tena toroma bane aa bala dɛ fe ba sɔh hweli o bwɛɛ harɛ waane dɛ́ ka taa ba bwɛɛ tena be la, o lɛɛ ba sɔh dɛ bag ba ŋwɛnɛfale ba chwa kaa. Gɛ wedɛɛga nɔ taa a che Korowii ŋɔ o ge ɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su o siwi.
59002026	Anomanta gɛ nɛn ta hweera dɔe yaa dɛ o sewɔ la, gɛɛ yarada wedɛɛga ɛɛ aa wola a ta jae la ɛ yaradapuu.
59003001	Yabala, he bwa laa chɛ kɛ he gel he sie begre Korowii waa bagla ta, dɛkalkɛ gɛ haa jema la, ya nɛra yaa dɛ bagle Korowii waa la waa binii wɛɛ ba nyiŋa kɛrɛdɛ gwaa nɛra baa kaa la.
59003002	Ya bwa dɛ koni saŋ bɛlbwa. Dɛ nɛn aa wobɛlbwa waa dɛ bol la ta koni aa, dɛ o ɛ nɛŋkaih tenten. Nɛn waa won o wobol nyiŋa la, o won o te lawa wobɛlbwa ta.
59003003	Ya kpɔ bune dɛɛ do jagre nyoo ásɛ aa no ya wa, asɛ ya won a bera dɛɛ kaa bela bwa yaa dɛ nyin.
59003004	Yá ta sie na gɛ stiimae aa kana asɛ peukpeg yon ta dɛ kpɔɔ dɛɛ kaa, kɛ dajegaa bɛlee lɔ o ta ba kpɔ dɛɛ menɛ o sie asɛ wɛɛ kaa bela bwa baa dɛ nyin.
59003005	Gɛɛ nyondoŋe do jegaa nɛn bini, kɛ dɛ won wejena ɛɛ. Hé na gɛ kɔr aa doa asɛ nihɔl won o fuih.
59003006	Nyondoŋe do kɛŋɔ nihɔl ken, dɛ won wechɔga ɛɛ taeh ya bini, dɛ won yaa chɔga ya soga bini bwa. Bɔnsam niinii dɛɛ choŋu.
59003007	Kpɔg bini ola ne olchɔga ne jumbii ne kwaa aa dɛ huuh ne mpo bini pɛŋa bwa, nɛn won a dɛɛra á do pwɛre.
59003008	Kɛ nyondoŋe te, nomɛlbwa toole dɛ won o nyiŋa. O ɛ konchɔge haa wola won togro. O dɛ kpo kɛŋɔ tɛgchɔga ken.
59003009	O nee yaa jam Korowii waa ɛ ya Naa ne ya Mɛɛ la, dɛ berɛ kpɔ o tenten dɛɛ taah ya dɔŋa Korowii aa ta ba kɛŋɔ o tenten la.
59003010	Nyoa beŋkpoŋ la taa wobodɛɛga ne taahna bwa ɛɛ le. Yabala, a ta chɛ kɛŋɔ aa ba gɛ!
59003011	Nenabɔɔ ɛɛ wonoo palɛ, o nee ane do som asɛ ane ge do nyɛgre aa?
59003012	Yabala, pur da ɛɛ wonoo nɔnɛ sombie aa, kɛɛ bambi ɛɛ wonoo nɔnɛ pur nɔna aa? Gɛ tentenee nenabɔɔ o nee aa do nyɛgre la aa wola won berɛ do som bug ta tenten.
59003013	He bini umee ɛ wejereme dɛɛ no waa mun ɔ? Gel o pwɛr o te dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga ásɛ o da bagle kɛ o ɛ wejereme.
59003014	Dɛ he dɛ nyin kɛ he gbo dɔ, dɛ dɔ bɔweela ne sibegra he bambile bini naa, amɔ he bɛ sɔn dɛɛ nyin dɛɛ ŋɔ he dɔ wejema. Dɛ he dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, dɛ he ta kasinteŋ dɔe.
59003015	Gɛ wejema nɔ ta Korowii doa wejema ɛɛ, a ɛ harɛ ta kwa. Korowii Domadɛɛge toole a ta. Bɔnsam liiree.
59003016	Anomanta bela bɔweela ne n gbo dɔ aa lole la, belaa wesagasagare ne wedoŋa bwa do.
59003017	Nɛn waa dɔ Korowii doa wejema la, kenii o da do: O waa do kaih, o waa dɔ deŋnesɔɔhna, o pwɛre, o dɛ no o dɔŋ wa, o dɛ na o dɔŋ sum, o ɛ nɛndɛɛge, o we-ɛɛla bwa wer, waa nɛra bane duure dɛɛ gwaa bane, o tea too.
59003018	Nɛra baa dɛ nyin deŋnesɔɔhna la, nyopɛo nee baa ɛ ba wa, aa le wedɛɛga.
59004001	Bɔkwaa dɛɛ ba nagra ne he baah ta nɔ? Kwaa haa dɛ pɛlɛ a nɛɛ laa dɛɛ ba a ne naa? Anee dɛɛ yo heya.
59004002	Kwaa haa dɛ nyin haa wola dɔ la waa hɛɛ kpoo dɔŋa la. He dɛ nyin kwaa sibegra ne, kɛ haa dɔ, a waa gela hɛɛ nagre dɛɛ yo la. Haa wola Korowii soŋe la waa haa wola he konnyina dɔ la.
59004003	He dɛ soŋo, kɛ haa dɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ liire haa chegɛ a ta dɛɛ soŋo la aa were. He gbogbo konnyina ne kwaa haa dɛ pɛlɛ a nɛɛ waa hɛɛ soŋo.
59004004	He nɛnchɔga nɔ haa vɛh Korowii kɛŋɔ hanchɔge waa dɛ nyin baala nɔ! Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ nɛn waa dɛ nyin harɛ nɔ ta kwaa la vɛh Korowii dɛ ɛ o dɔm kɛɛ? Nomɛlbwa waa daŋre harɛ nɔ ta kwaa nyina ne la vɛh Korowii.
59004005	Kɛ he dɛ lii kɛŋɔ pɛɛpɛɛ Korowii Tɔn la ŋɔ lileo Korowii aa kpɔa do ya bini la dɛ mee la?
59004006	Kɛ chae Korowii aa na ya sum dɛɛ cha yaa la, on kpega, gɛ Korowii Tɔn la aa bagla ŋɔ, "Korowii dɛ ba nɛra baa dɛ ɛ sɔnnyin la ne harɛ, dɛɛ cha nɛra baa dɛ pwɛr ba te."
59004007	Anomanta hé kpɔ he te tɛ Korowii asɛ dɛ no o be. Hé yo Bɔnsam. Wɛɛ chwao le he be.
59004008	Hé suuh tel Korowii, asɛ o suuh ba he be. Wechɔg-ɛɛra, hé charɛ he liire dɛ le he wechɔga ta. He banɔ la he liire aa ɛ anɛnɛ la, hé laa doŋa kpɔ he nɛ.
59004009	Hé gel he tea bini chɔg, he wi. Hé gel he mama berɛ wii asɛ he silɛɛ ge berɛ sum.
59004010	Hé pwɛr he te tɛ Korowii. Wɛɛ gɔɔ heyaa.
59004011	Yabala, he bɛ he bala dɛɛ ŋwalɛ. Nomɛlbwa waa ŋwalɛ o dɔŋ kɛɛ dɛ pwaoh la, dɛ Mmara laanee o ŋɔ aa were dɛɛ pwah la. Dɛ he bol waa dɛɛ yagɛ Mmara la aa, amɔ te dɛ haa waa Mmara la aa bagla la ɛ. Dɛ he dɛ gɔɔ he te dɛɛ pwah Mmara la.
59004012	Korowii gbosoroo dɛ won do mmara dɛ won bol nɛn wechɔga wa, o gbosoroo dɛ won lɛ nɛra dɛ won chɔg bane ge. He gee umeo dɛ́ won bol he dɔŋ bwara wechɔge ɔ?
59004013	Hé berɛ dɛɛ no. He banɔ la haa dɛ lii he nyuune bini dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Fini kɛɛ tɔpere nɔ tɔpesoo yaa la bwɛɛ nɔ bwɛsoo taa dɛ ka di benanyoa dɛɛ di bona dɛ nyin kwa,"
59004014	kɛ dɛ he ge aa jemɛ gɛ tɔɔ aa dɛ ba he pera la! Gɛ kɔɔle yon ta, kɛ aa bigri dɛ yon kaa la, gɛɛ he mkpa do.
59004015	Anomanta a fe chɛ kɛŋɔ he ŋɔ, "Dɛ Korowii sɛoh dɛ tɛ yaa ŋwɛnɛ te naa, tɔɔ perɔ yaa ka ɛ kenii kɛɛ anɔɔ."
59004016	Kɛ taraken he dɛ ɛ mbarafo kɛ he gbo ɛɛ wonoo ɛ gɛ haa dɛ nyin. A gɛ waa la bwa ɛ wechɔga.
59004017	Anomanta nomɛlbwa waa jemɛ waa aa wera kɛŋɔ o ɛ, dɛ vɛh ɛɛ la, dɛ o ɛ wechɔga.
59005001	Kondɔɔhna ge, hé no n be! Waa aa dɛ ba heyaa pui la nomanta, hé dooge lɔŋɔre dɛɛ wi.
59005002	He kondɔɔh chɔgɔ, kwaa di he bwara laala bwa.
59005003	He suugaswɛm ne suugapoŋa bwa ge deero. Awola Korowii aa dɛ ba he waa bola la, he suugare aa deera la ɛɛ ɛ danseɛ kɛŋɔ he ɛ wechɔga, dɛ we heyaa kɛŋɔ nii ken. Bɔkwaa hɛɛ cheg suuga waa bwa jaga tɔpere nɔ ta dɛ́ ɛɔ?
59005004	Hɛ́ɛ no! Nɛra haa kpɔ ba, ba ɛ he kooni tomare he ta ban kem bɔe dɛ faah ba la dɛ wi he tɛl. A gɛ nɛra la wii chole Korowii waa ɛ komɛlbwa Dɔɔ la deŋna ta.
59005005	He dɔ sobɔrdɛɛge harɛ nɔ ta dɛ so, dɛɛ di he bwara. Gɛ haa dɛ di he bwara la, he do kɛŋɔ kondɛɛre baa ku kpɔga dɛɛ tɛo ó di dɛ je bá kpoo la.
59005006	He pa nɛndɛɛga ba wa aa do kaih la bolchɔge dɛ kpoo ba, ba ta wone ɛ wobɛlbwa dɛ́ lɛ ba te.
59005007	Kɛ yabala, hé lawɛ bambile dɛ ka tel gɛ saŋ ya Dɔɔ la aa ba. Hé na gɛ paa yon so kpa bwaala logla á nɛ ó du o kwa, dɛ lawɛ bambile asɛ yoo ge yo mɔɔ o koo kwaa la yon ɛ la.
59005008	Gɛ tentenee chɛ kɛŋɔ he ge lawɛ bambile dɛ che kiŋkiŋ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he Dɔɔ la bala telo.
59005009	Yabala, he bɛ dɔŋa waa dɛɛ nagre asɛ dɛ ba di bolchɔge Korowii sie. Ya bole pae dɛ tel.
59005010	Yabala, hé nyiŋi Korowii keamere la baa chegɛ o sɔn ta dɛ bol waa bagle nɛra la na, dɛ na gɛ baa na wa, kɛ dɛ won lawɛ bambile ba wahala ta la. Hé ge ɛ gɛ.
59005011	Ya dɛ yerɛ nɛra baa wona lawɛ bambile dɛ che kiŋkiŋ la silɛɛ tena. He fa no Job wa, gɛ waa wona lawɛ bambile dɛ che kiŋkiŋ o wahala bini ka tonɛ, asɛ a habɔɔ Korowii chao. Nɛra waa dɛ domɛ Korowii tea wɛɛ sune ba nɛ.
59005012	Yabala, anɔ la aa jaa dɛ ɛ siswɛm waa laanee kɛ he bɛ Korowii kɛɛ harɛ kɛɛ komɛlbwa dɛɛ ŋwɛɛ. Ba dɛ bɔɔ heyaa waa dɛ a ɛ kpela aa, hé sɛh ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh," dɛ nyosone gee yaa, hé ŋɔ, "Ɔɔhɔ." He bɛ ŋwɛɛ ja, asɛ a bɛ wechɔga ɛ dɛ tɛ heya.
59005013	Dɛ sibegrewaane pu bɛlbwa naa, wɛ́ɛ soŋe Korowii. Dɛ silɛɛ waane ge pui naa, go yela dɛ kpɛɛ Korowii.
59005014	Dɛ he bini bɛlbwa ge bwara dɛ weo waa, ó tomɛ nɛn o ka yerɛ asɔre la bini nomonome ásɛ ba ba ba kpɔ noo lege o tile Yeesu sɔn ta, dɛ soŋe Korowii tɛo.
59005015	Dɛ ba kpɔ yarada dɛ soŋe Korowii aa, weela te la ɛɛ dɔ bokpegaa. Ya Dɔɔ la ɛɛ geloo o bwara do kpegri. Dɛ wechɔga anee o ɛ kwaraa naa, Korowii ɛɛ kpɔɔ kɛo.
59005016	Anomanta a wer kɛŋɔ he bol he wechɔga dɛɛ bagle he bala he ne baa teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ la, ásɛ ba ge won dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ heya, ásɛ o tɛ heyaa bokpega, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛndɛɛge dɛ soŋe Korowii aa, o dɛ no dɛ ɛ dɛɛ tɛo.
59005017	Korowii keame Elaeja fa ɛ nɛn kɛŋɔ yan. O soŋe Korowii taeh dɛ ŋɔ ó gel bwaala nɛɛ, asɛ bwaala ta nɛɛ, hwel che bene atoro korobie anumɛl.
59005018	Asɛ o berɛ soŋe Korowii ja dɛ ŋɔ ó gel bwaala nɛ, asɛ nyundua pili, bwaala nɛ taeh, harɛ ta kwaa bwa le.
59005019	Yabala, dɛ he bini bɛl nyogrɔ le kasinteŋ ŋwɛnɛ la ta, asɛ he bini bɛl ge won berɛ chao dɛ baglo asɛ o berɛ ba teŋɛ kasinteŋ ŋwɛnɛ la ta ja aa, dɛ naate waa chao la ɛ waa taeh.
59005020	Hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa wona cha wechɔg-ɛɛ asɛ o gel wechɔga ɛɛ dɛ berɛ baa ɛ wedɛɛga ja la, dɛ naate lɛ wechɔg-ɛɛ la nyu, dɛ gel o wechɔga damanta bwa waa ɛa la, Korowii kpɔ kɛo.
60001001	Men Pita maa ɛ Yeesu Kristo torome la, men chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ he Korowii nɛra haa pegra dɛ ka ɛ hɔɔhra Pɔntos ne Galaasia ne Kapadoosia ne Eesia ne Bitiinia harɛre ta la.
60001002	Korowii waa ɛ ya Mɛɛ chegɛ jema waa jemɛ heyaa wubwa la ta dɛ le heyaa kɛŋɔ o nɛra dɛ tɛ o te. O Domadɛɛge laanee gela he do goroŋ, dɛ gel hɛɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo waa ta, asɛ o chal yagle he doŋa he nɛ. Kórowii cha heyaa dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna kohona.
60001003	Hé gel ya kpɔ jam tɛ Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo Mɛɛ Korowii. Waa dɛ sune ya nɛɛ kohona nomanta, o chegɛ ira waa ir Yeesu Kristo seo ta la ta dɛ gel ya ɛ nɛnfala. Anɔ gelɔ ya dɔ hwɛga aa awola jaga dɔe bwa.
60001004	Ya dɛ hwɛgɛ kondɔɔh waa kwaara cheg yaa la ta kɛŋɔ aa ɛ ya kwaa. O kwaa a bwa cheg heyaa Korowii doa, belaa aa wola pɔh, aa wola chɔg, aa wola tu bwa.
60001005	He chegaa a che. He yarada nomanta Korowii kpɔ o kpegri tɔ he nɛ, wobɛlbwa aa wola won ɛ heyaa ka tel kɛŋɔ waa ba lɛ heya. O ɛ lɛɛ waa ba lɛ heyaa la wobɛlbwa tonɛ, dɛ́ lɛ heyaa waa bwa jaga saŋ.
60001006	Anomanta he dɔ silɛɛ kohona, kɛ he tea bini ɛɛ chɔgoo tama te, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Bɔnsam ɛɛ daah heyaa daahna bwa soosiwii na.
60001007	A bwa dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ he yarada la ɛ yarada kasinteŋ. Suugaswɛm kwaraa nɔ, nii nee baa jemɛ a kasinteŋ, kɛ a dɛ chɔg. He yarada la gwaa suugaswɛm, anomanta a chɛ kɛ ba daah heyaa na ásɛ he won che kiŋkiŋ. Belaa baa ba heyaa kpɛɛra, asɛ he dɔ jirima, dɛ dɔ sɔn awola Yeesu Kristo aa ba ya nao la.
60001008	He ta on nae ka, kɛ he dɛ nyinu. Taraken gba, haa on na, kɛ he dɛ yaradao. Anomanta he sie dɛ lɛ kohona nɛn aa wola won bagle a wa.
60001009	He yarada dɔ mun. A gelɔ Korowii ɛɛ lɛ heya, wɛɛ lɛ heyaa ka tonɛ.
60001010	He lɛɛ nɔ, Korowii keamere fa dɛ bagle gɛ Korowii aa dɛ ba he nɛɛ suna dɛ lɛ heyaa la wa, asɛ dɛ swɛɛ siwi dɛ pese Korowii waa waa bola la dɛ́ jemɛ a bini kɛrɛdɛ.
60001011	Dɛ Kristo Doma soge ba nɛɛ dɛɛ bagle wahala Kristo aa dɛ ba nae, dɛ bagle jirima aa dɛ ba bala wahala la habɔɔ. Ba takapɔ kɛŋɔ bá fee won jemɛ tɔpere aa dɛ ba chiga, ne gɛ aa dɛ ba ɛɛ.
60001012	Korowii gelɔ a gɛ keamere la jemɛ kɛŋɔ ba koeh baa dɛ koh la, ba laa dɛ di a tɔnɔ, heyaa ba koh dɛɛ tɛ. Waa haa noa taraken dɛ le Amanesoma baa bola he be la ta la, ban fa bola. Korowii Domadɛɛge waa tomɔ ya be laanee cha ba ba bola he be la. Korowii nyundua toroma kwaraa dɛ nyin a gɛ waa nɔ dɛ́ jemɛ.
60001013	Anomanta hé ir nyu ne dɛ gel he sie chɔ harɛ. Hé kpɔ he hwɛga bwa do chae Yeesu Kristo aa cha heyaa awola waa ba nɛra bwa nao la ta.
60001014	Haa ɛ Korowii bii dɛɛ no o deŋna waa nomanta, he bɛ he pɛlchɔga waa he faa lɔ biro ta dɛɛ teŋɛ a ta la dɛɛ ɛ.
60001015	Gɛ Korowii waa le heyaa tɛ o te aa do goroŋ la, hé ge do goroŋ gɛ he we-ɛɛla bwa ta,
60001016	dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Hé do goroŋ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ n do goroŋ."
60001017	Korowii waa wola nɛn sie bɔr nyiŋe dɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole la, onee he wi dɛɛ yerɔ he Mɛɛ la. Anomanta hé kpɔ he te kɛ hɔɔhra he soga bini harɛ bonɔ, dɛɛ tɛo duure, dɛɛ ɔmɔ.
60001018	He jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii aa lɛ heyaa le he naanar wesale he faa lɔ a ta la ta la, harɛ bonɔ kwaa aa dɛ chɔg kɛŋɔ suugapoŋ kɛɛ suugaswɛm ne laa o yawɛ heya.
60001019	Yeesu waa do kɛ saraha pebie doŋa bɛlbwa aa wola toole o nɛ, waa wola kirihiah bobɛlbwa dii la, o gbagba chal nee Korowii yawɛ heya.
60001020	Korowii aa leo ŋɔ ó ɛ a gɛ toma nɔ, dɛ ba ta nyundua ne harɛ tae mɔɔ. Kɛ he waa o koh dɛ gel o ba harɛ nɛra nao, tɔpera aa ka mun nɔ ta la.
60001021	O nɛɛ a che he yarada Korowii. Korowii gee iru seo ta dɛ tɛo jirima. Anomanta he yarada ne he hwɛga haa dɛ hwɛgɛ la, Korowii nɛɛ a bwa do.
60001022	Taraken nɔ haa sɛh kasinteŋ la ta teŋa, asɛ a che a ta he doŋa le he nɛɛ hɛɛ nyin dɔŋa kɛrɛdɛ nɔ, hé den dɛɛ nyin dɔŋa kohona bambile bwa ne,
60001023	dɛkalkɛ ba berɔ kwaa lolɛ heyaa nɛnfala. Nɛn waa dɛ sewɛ la dwee laa heyaa kpa, Korowii waa wola sewɛ bwa la dweee heya. Korowii Waa aa dɛ tɛ mkpa dɛ do le saŋ bɛlbwa la taa a che ba kwaa lolɛ heya.
60001024	Korowii Tɔn bolɔ ŋɔ, "Nɛwɛnyini bwa do kɛ kpɔga, ba jirima ge do kɛ kpɔga fee. Kpɔga dɛ sewɛ, a fee gee lee.
60001025	Kɛ Korowii Waa te lole saŋ bɛlbwa." A gɛ waa nɔɔ Amanesoma baa bola bagle heyaa la.
60002001	Anomanta hé le wechɔga bɛlbwa kɛŋɔ dɔŋa negra bɛlbwa, ne nɛra sie nyiŋa dɛɛ ɛ wa, ne bɔweela ne nɛra waa bola bɛlbwa sese ta.
60002002	Hé gel he siwi swɛɛ Korowii Waa la noe ta kɛŋɔ bechasɔɔhne siwi yon swɛɛ elnee ta la, a che a ta he won kpeg he lɛɛ waa la ta.
60002003	He dagɛ ya Dɔɔ la na taraken dɛ na kɛ o wer.
60002004	O te ɛ Bwe waa dɔ mkpa. Nɛwɛnyini liiru konsala dɛ vɛoh, kɛ onee Korowii te nyiŋi kɛ o ɛ Bwedɛɛge o wa aa hiah dɛɛ nyinu. Haa ba o be nɔ,
60002005	he ge do kɛ bwea aa dɔ mkpa. Hé gel o kpɔ heyaa ma Korowii Dea ásɛ he ɛ Korowii Sɔfore haa do goroŋ, asɛ dɛ che Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii bambile bwa ne a ɛ saraha dɛɛ su o siwi.
60002006	Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Na, n pɛne Bwedɛɛge o wa aa hiah, dɛ kpɔ pa n dea mun Saayɔn o lawɔ kpoŋe. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ yaradao la, waa sihiih di bwa."
60002007	He nɛra haa dɛ yaradao ge be la, wɛɛ ɛ Bwedɛɛge o wa aa hiaah tɛ heya. Asɛ nɛra baa wola on yaradae ge la, wɛɛ ɛ gɛ baa chwera Korowii Tɔn bini laanee ba be, kɛŋɔ: "Bwe la mamaala aa vɛah la, onee bera lawɛ dea kpoŋe la,"
60002008	dɛ ɛ gɛ baa bera chwerɛ o waa ŋɔ, "Bwe waa dɛ ba gela nɛra lɔ naa dɛ chogli laanee la." Ba vɛh Korowii waa la ta teŋa, an gela baa lɔ na. Korowiirii chega gɛ.
60002009	Kɛ he te la, Korowiirii le heya. O Kora Sɔforee heyaa. He do goroŋ. He ɛ o nɛra waa le heyaa ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ bol o nyokpowaa waa ɛa. On le he ne biro ta dɛ ba he ne o bochaah waa wera kohona la ta.
60002010	He fa ta Korowii nɛra ɛɛ, kɛ taraken te, o nɛraa heya. O fa ta he sum nae, kɛ taraken te, o na he sum.
60002011	N dandɛɛga, n dɛ soŋe heyaa kɛŋɔ haa ɛ hɔɔhra bonɔ, bonɔ aa wola he bwɛɛ ɛɛ nɔ, hé laa he te kpɔ he bwadabii pɛlchɔga ta. Anee dɛɛ vuugi heyaa haa wola won ɛ waa Korowii aa kpɔa do he bambile bini la.
60002012	Haa lɔ nɛra baa wola Korowii tomɛ baah nɔ, hé gel he wobɛlbwa togre, asɛ dɛ ba dɛ bol he waa ŋɔ he ɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra aa, a habɔɔ la, bá na he we-ɛɛla kɛŋɔ a wer, dɛ kpɔ jam tɛ Korowii awola waa ba ya ne o na dɔŋa la.
60002013	Hé koh ya Dɔɔ la waa dɛ pwɛr he te dɛɛ tɛ nomonome baa cheg ba harɛ bonɔ bwa, he harɛ bwa nyu waa chɔ wobɛlbwa nyoa,
60002014	ne o ge nɛra waa lee ba ŋɔ báa tɛr wechɔg-ɛɛra deŋne dɛɛ kpɛɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ waa a ŋwɛnɛ ta la.
60002015	Korowii dɛ nyin kɛ hɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga dɛ́ won dɛɛ tɔ gɛna ŋwɛnɛ ba bɛ won bol gɛnewaa dɛɛ chɔg heya.
60002016	Hé so kɛŋɔ nɛra haa dɔ he te haa wola yoma ɛɛ. Kɛ he bɛ dɔe haa dɔ he te la kpɔ dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga. Hé gel nɛra na kɛŋɔ Korowii bonɔɔna ne tolii heyaa he soga bini.
60002017	Hɛ́ɛ tɛ nomɛlbwa duure, dɛɛ nyin he bala baa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo la. Hɛ́ɛ ɔmɛ Korowii, dɛ kpɔ duure dɛɛ tɛ he harɛ bwa nyu.
60002018	He banɔ la baa dɛ do heyaa bonɔɔna kɛɛ toli la, hé pwɛr he te dɛɛ tɛ he dɔɔranar dɛɛ duu ba. He dɔɔranar ba tea aa soma ba do pwɛre gbo laa n ŋɔ. Hɛ́ɛ duu banɔ la ba nyu bini aa kpega gba.
60002019	Maa dɛ ŋɔ nɔ, naate baa dɛ fiigu aa wola a ŋwɛnɛ ta ɛɛ, asɛ o koh Korowii waa dɛ won lawɛ bambile la, a wer dɛɛ lɛ Korowii sie.
60002020	Haa ɛ wechɔga, asɛ dɛ lawɛ bambile ba lɔɔre a waa la, bɔkwa sɔnee lɔ he bambile lawa la ta nɔ? He ɛ wedɛɛga, ba garɛ koh a waa dɛɛ ɛɛ hɔhɔrɔwa he lawɛ bambile aa, a ɛ sɔn dɛɛ tɛɛ Korowii be.
60002021	A gɛ waa nɔɔ Korowii le heyaa ŋɔ hɛɛ na, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo koh he waa dɛ na wahala, asɛ a chɔ tɛ heyaa kɛŋɔ hɛɛ lawɛ bambile he wahala ta. Ba chwerɔ ŋɔ,
60002022	"O ta wechɔga ɛɛ bwa. Nyosonwaa ta o nyoa leɛ bwa."
60002023	Ba faa dɛ chɛgro chɛgtɔrɔ la bwa la, o ta nyoa pile chɛgɛ nomɛlbwa. Ba faa dɛ ɛo hɔhɔrɔwa la bwa la, o ta nomɛlbwa aahrɛ. O kpɔ a bwa tɛ Korowii waa dɛ bol nɛra bwa waa dɛɛ pa bole kasinteŋ ne la.
60002024	O gbagba lɛ ya wechɔga dawɛ o nɛ, dɛ na wahala dagagre ta, asɛ ya bɛ so tɛ wechɔga, dɛ so tɛ wedɛɛga ɛɛ. Pirae baa pirao la taa a che he dɔ bokpega.
60002025	He fa do kɛ peera aa kpaŋa, kɛ taraken te, he ba he Dɔɔ waa dɛ nyiŋi he nyu la be.
60003001	He haahna ge, hé pwɛr he te dɛɛ tɛ he jaranar. Dɛ he dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, he banɔ la he jaranar aa wola Korowii waa yaradae la, he we-ɛɛla ɛɛ geloo ba yarada. Haa nyoa kwaraa pili bol wa,
60003002	dɛkalkɛ baa na gɛ he we-ɛɛla aa wera doŋa bɛlbwa aa wola toole a ta, ne gɛ haa dɛ ɔmɛ Korowii.
60003003	Gɛ haa dɛ ɛ he nyumpona, ne suugaswɛm koŋkwaare kɛŋɔ baŋa kwaa ne deŋna kwaa doe, ne laala haa dɛ do laa dɛ gel he do wer toli.
60003004	Hé gel nɛra na he wer waa aa lɔ bambile bini siwi aa wola an na la ta. Hé do pwɛre, dɛɛ ɛ waa bɔeh. Anee wer aa wola tu bwa, dɛ do wer kohona Korowii be.
60003005	A saŋ la haahna ba faa dɛ tomɛ Korowii kasinteŋ ne dɛɛ yaradao la, dɛ ba pwɛr ba te dɛɛ tɛ ba jaranar. Anee ba ge wer.
60003006	Dɛ gɛɛ Abraham haah Saara ge do. O pwɛr o te tɛ o jaa dɛ faa yerɔ o dɔɔ. He waa togrɔ, haa ɔmɛ ge aa, ate Saara biirii heya.
60003007	Baala ge, gɛɛ a chɛ kɛ he dɔ liire he ne he haahna soga bini, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ baa kpege kɛŋɔ heya. Hɛ́ɛ duu ba, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he ne ba bwaa dɛɛ ba Korowii mkpa waa cha heyaa hɛɛ ba dɔe la dɔe. Hɛ́ɛ ɛ ken ásɛ wobɛlbwa bɛ he Korowii soŋa ŋwɛnɛ tɔ.
60003008	Waa maa dɛ nyin n bol laanee kɛŋɔ hé gel he nyoa pɛ, hé dɔ dɔŋa chal, hɛ́ɛ nyin dɔŋa kɛŋɔ nyabii, dɛɛ sune dɔŋa nɛ, dɛ pwɛr he te dɛɛ tɛ dɔŋa.
60003009	He bɛ wechɔga kpɔ dɛɛ bɔ wechɔga kem. He bɛ wobochɔga kpɔ dɛɛ bɔ wobochɔga kem. Nɛn ɛɛ wechɔga aa, soŋe andɛɛga tɛo. Korowii aa le heyaa la, dɛ́ hɛ́ɛ ɛ gɛ ásɛ o tɛ heyaa hɛɛra.
60003010	Ba chwerɔ do Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin mkpajaŋ, dɛɛ nyin kɛ o bwara sɔɔhno la, wɛ́ɛ nyiŋi o nyoa kɛrɛdɛ. O bɛ wobochɔga dɛɛ bol, o bɛ nyosone dɛɛ teŋe.
60003011	Wɛ́ɛ ke o te wechɔga ta, dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga. Ó swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ ɛ waa aa dɛ ba nyopɛo ne.
60003012	A do gɛ, dɛkalkɛ nɛra ba we-ɛɛla aa wera dɛ su Korowii siwi la, Korowii dɛ nyiŋ ba, dɛɛ no ba wesoŋa. Kɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ wechɔga te, o ne baa jo."
60003013	He siwi swɛɛ wedɛɛga ɛɛ ta naa, umee dɛɛ ba he hae yɔ?
60003014	He dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga a che a ta hɛɛ na waa kwara naa, dɛ he ta som nae yaa? A ba gɛ naa, bɛ nɛra baa dɛ hae la ɔmɛ. Bɛ gel a hae.
60003015	Hɛ́ɛ duu Yeesu Kristo dɛɛ ɔmɔ he bambile bini kɛŋɔ he Dɔɔree on. Hé kpɔ he te saŋ bɛlbwa, asɛ nomɛlbwa bɔɔ heyaa he hwɛga haa dɔa nɔ wa aa, he won baglo a bini.
60003016	He dɛ bagla aa, hé kpɔ sisɔna ne taa dɛɛ bagla. A chɛ kɛ he tea to he jemɛ kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa aa he wobɛlbwa dɔ dɛ bol. He dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, nɛra baa koh he teŋa haa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ ne he wedɛɛga haa dɛ ɛ waa dɛ bol wobochɔga dɛɛ yagɛ heyaa la, sihiih ɛɛ kpo baa.
60003017	He dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga dɛɛ na wa aa, an wera kɛ haa dɛ ɛ wechɔga dɛɛ na wa. Dɛ Korowii tetooraa kɛ he koh he wedɛɛga ɛɛ waa dɛɛ na wa aa, a wer.
60003018	Yeesu Kristo gbagba sewɔ tɛ heyaa dɛ bɔ wechɔga kem. Kerabeŋkpoŋii o sewɛ, waa wola berɛ sewɛ kpa. O ta wechɔga ɛɛ bwa, kɛ o sewɔ tɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra. Gɛ waa ɛ ya ne Korowii pɛ waa o ɛ gɛ. Baa kpoo la, o bwadabii sewa, kɛ o lileo te dɔ mkpafale.
60003019	O lileo la lala baa vɔg ba Lala Bwɛɛ la be, dɛ ka bol Korowii Waa ba be.
60003020	A saŋ la tena baa ɛ deŋnekpeg dɛ vɛh Korowii Waa noe gɛ saŋ Nowa faa dɛ kwaa o gberjen la la, ba lalaa o bol Korowii Waa bagle la. Korowii fa lawɛ bambile ba nɛɛ bigri, dɛ ka tel kɛŋɔ Nowa aa kwaa o gberjen la tonɛ. Nɛra tama baa lɔ o bini laanee Korowii lɛ nee la ta. Dɛ ba lɔ nɛra banuatoro.
60003021	A gɛ nee nɔ chegɔ tɛ Korowii nee baa dɛ sɔ yaa aa lɛ yaa la. Korowii nee sɔe ta bwara doŋa yagla ɛɛ. Korowii nee sɔe munii kɛ ya soŋe Korowii ó tɛ yaa tepoŋ. A chegɛ Yeesu Kristo seo ta ira ta asɛ nee sɔe la won dɛɛ lɛ yaa.
60003022	O kaa Korowii be nyundua, dɛ ka so nomombɔr o dig ta, dɛɛ di kora nyundua toroma ne konchɔga aa bea yaa wola an na bwa soosiwi nɛ.
60004001	Yeesu Kristo aa baa ɛ nɛwɛnyini la, o na bonyɛga. Anomanta a chɛ kɛ he kpɔ he te dɛ jemɛ kɛ gɛɛ he ge bwara ɛɛ ba nyɛga. Nomɛlbwa waa wona lawɛ bambile dɛ na bonyɛga ka la, waa wechɔga ɛ.
60004002	Le fini dɛɛ kaa, hé kpɔ Korowii tetoora dɛɛ tɔ sie he soga bini harɛ bonɔ. He bɛ kwaa nɛwɛnyina aa dɛ pɛlɛ a ta la nɛɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ kpa.
60004003	Waa nɛra baa wola Korowii tomɛ aa dɛ ɛa asɛ he faa ɛa la, he ta a nyoa nae yaa? Dɛ he sie dɛ lɛ jwamane ne pɛlchɔga we-ɛɛla ta. Dɛ he dɛ sɔ sen, dɛɛ ɛ sagasaga, dɛ lawɛ dɔŋa dɛɛ nyɔ sennyɔbala. Dɛ he dɛ tomɛ voga dɛɛ jo Korowii kii nɛ.
60004004	Nɛra baa wola Korowii tomɛ la, a dɛ ɛɛ ba anebɛlbwa kɛŋɔ he ne baa wola pɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ wedoŋa ne wesagasagare baa dɛ ɛ la. A waa baa chɛgre heyaa la.
60004005	Anɔ bwa baa dɛ ɛ nɔ, baa ba tɔh ba nyoa Korowii siee. O kpɔ o te dɛɛ ba weera ne lala bwa waa bola dɛ pa bole.
60004006	Nɛra baa serewa la, ba bol Amanesoma nɔ bagle ba ge, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ bol ba ge waa dɛ pa bole gɛ waa dɛ ba weera ɛɛ la. Waa ba faa dɛ ɛ gɛ saŋ baa wola sewɛ mɔɔ la, anee wɛɛ ba nyiŋa dɛ pa ba bole. Korowii dɛ nyin kɛ ba dɔ mkpa gɛ waa dɔ mkpa la, a waa o gel Yeesu bol Amanesoma la chag ba la.
60004007	Wobɛlbwa jaga tɔpere la telo. Anomanta hé nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ gel he sie chɔ harɛ, asɛ dɛ won dɛɛ soŋe Korowii kɛrɛdɛ.
60004008	Waa aa ɛ wehiah kohonaa kɛ hɛ́ɛ nyin dɔŋa bambile bwa ne, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɔŋa nyina dɛ tɔ wechɔga kɛrɛdɛ ta.
60004009	He dɔŋ baa choge naa, lɛo, bɛ waa dɛɛ nagre.
60004010	Kpegri bɛlbwa nomɛlbwa aa dɔa la, Korowiirii kpɔa chao ŋɔ ó kpɔ dɛɛ ɛ o Korowii toma. Anomanta bɛ́lbwa nyiŋi o toma ta kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ cha o bala.
60004011	Nomɛlbwa Korowii aa chao o won dɛɛ bol o Waa la, wɛ́ɛ bola dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii Waaa wɛɛ bol la. Nomɛlbwa Korowii aa chao o won dɛɛ tomɛ o dɔŋ la, wɛ́ɛ tomɔ bokpega Korowii aa tɛo bwa ne, ásɛ wobɛlbwa ta la, Korowii che Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ dɔ sɔn. On chɛ kpegri ne jirima aa wola jaga dɔe bwa. Aamen.
60004012	N dandɛɛga, he bɛ gel nii haa dɛ na taraken nɔ kpo he nyoa. Daahnaa Korowii kpɔa dɛɛ daah he yarada. He bɛ gel a ɛ heyaa wehɔɔhra.
60004013	Hé gel he sie lɛ kɛŋɔ haa dɛ na Yeesu Kristo wenaale dɔŋa nɔ, ásɛ awola haa ba na o jirima waa dɔa la, he sie lɛ, he bwara sɔɔh heyaa kohona.
60004014	Dɛ ba koh he teŋa haa teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ la waa dɛɛ chɛgre heya aa, he na som. A ba gɛ naa, a dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge o wa aa dɔ jirima la soge he nɛ.
60004015	Dɛ he bini bɛl dɛ na wahala aa, a bɛ ɛ kɛŋɔ nɛnee o kpo, kɛɛ ŋwɛɛ o ŋwɛ, kɛɛ nɛnchɔgee on, kɛɛ nyoaa o kpɔ do nɛra waa ta.
60004016	Dɛ a chegɛ he Kristo te ɛɛ ta asɛ hɛɛ na wahala aa, bɛ gel a ɛɛ sihiih. Jam Korowii kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo sɔn aa dawɛ he nɛ.
60004017	Tɔpere telo kɛŋɔ Korowii bol nɛwɛnyina waa dɛ pa bole. Korowii nɛra nɛɛ wɛɛ ba mun pae. Waa dɛ ba ya kwaraa kpɔe pa mun nɔ, dɛ ɛrɛɛ nɛra baa wola Amanesoma la yaradae waa ɛɛ ba doe yɔ?
60004018	Korowii Tɔn bolɔ ŋɔ, "Nɛra baa ɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa su Korowii siwi kwaraa la, dɛ a kpegri kɛŋɔ ba dɔ ba nyu aa, dɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra baa wola Korowii ɔmɛ la, ɛrɛɛ ba waa ɛɛ ba doe yɔ?"
60004019	Anomanta he nɛra aa ɛ Korowii tetoora kɛ he na wahala la, hɛ́ɛ ɛ wedɛɛga, dɛ kpɔ he te do Korowii waa ta heyaa la nɔn ta. O waa dɔ kasinteŋ.
60005001	N dɛ nyin n bol waane he asɔre nomonome baa dɛ tɔ he sie la be. Asɔre nomoa la bɛlee n ge. N gbagba kpɔ siwi na wahala la soo Yeesu Kristo aa naa. Awola waa dɛ ba gela nɛra na o jirima la, n gee dɔ o jirima la bɛlee. N dɛ soŋe heyaa kɛŋɔ
60005002	hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi Korowii nɛra baa ɛ o peera waa kpɔ ba tɛ heyaa ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi ba nɛɛ la kɛrɛdɛ. He bɛ gel ba do heyaa mɔɔ hɛɛ nyiŋ ba kɛrɛdɛ, hé gel a ɛ he gbagba tetoowa. He bɛ suuga sibegra waa koh dɛɛ ɛ gɛ toma nɔ, hé nyiŋi nyina haa dɛ nyin kɛ toma la kaa kɛrɛdɛ la dɛɛ ɛa.
60005003	He bɛ kpegri dɛɛ di nɛra baa kpɔ ba do he nɔn ta la nɛ. Hé gel he we-ɛɛla do wer ásɛ ba nyiŋa dɛɛ chaara.
60005004	He dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, Petegra Bwa Dɔɔ la balaa, wɛɛ tɛ heyaa jirima kon o wer aa wola tu bwa, o ɛ kompoŋ haa yoa dɛ le ba vɔwɛ heya.
60005005	He bonɔɔna ge la, hɛ́ɛ tɛ he nomonome duure. Hé bwa pwɛr he te dɛɛ tɛ dɔŋa, dɛɛ cha dɔŋa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii Tɔn bolɔ ŋɔ, "Korowii ne mbarafo tena aa jo, kɛ o dɛ sune nɛra baa dɛ pwɛr ba te nɛɛ dɛɛ cha ba."
60005006	Anomanta, hé pwɛr he te dɛɛ no Korowii waa dɔ kpegri bwa la wa, ásɛ o gɔɔ heyaa ir tɔpere waa wera o be ta.
60005007	Wobɛlbwa aa dɛ ha heyaa la, hé kpɔa bil Korowii sie, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he waa lɔ o bambile ta.
60005008	Hé gel he sie chɔ harɛ, hɛɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he dɔm Bɔnsam lole. Gɛ nyujente yon dɛɛ kɔgre, dɛ gaage dɛɛ nyin ola dɛ́ lawɛ la, gɛɛ o ge gaage dɛɛ nyin nɛra dɛ́ lawɛ.
60005009	Anomanta hé che kiŋkiŋ he yarada ta. He bɛ Bɔnsam ŋwɛnɛ tɛ. Hé jemɛ kɛ he bala baa dɛ yarada Yeesu bobɛlbwa la dɛ na a gɛ waa nɔ haa dɛ na nɔ dɔŋa.
60005010	Kɛ he baa na waa tama aa, Korowii waa dɛ na nɛra sum dɛɛ cha ba kohona la, o gbagba ɛɛ kwaa he wobɛlbwaa, dɛ gel he che kiŋkiŋ, dɛ do kpegri, dɛ lawɛ heyaa he bɛ chole. Onee le heyaa hé won che pɛɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la ta dɛ dɔ o jirima aa wola jaga dɔe bwa la.
60005011	On chɛ kpegri aa wola jaga dɔe bwa. Aamen.
60005012	Silasee cha mɛ n chwerɛ heyaa tɔmbora nɔ la. N jemɔ kɛ o waa dɔ kasinteŋ ya teŋa yaa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ nɔ ta. N dɛ nyin he jemɛ gɛ aa chɛ kɛ hɛɛ ɛ, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ gɛ n faa bagle heyaa chae Korowii aa sune ya nɛɛ dɛ cha yaa la, a ɛ kasinteŋ. Hé den lawɛ a bini kiŋkiŋ.
60005013	Asɔre tena baa lɔ Babilɔn, Korowii aa lee ba gɛ waa le heyaa la, ba dɛ na heya. N bie Maak ge dɛ na heya.
60005014	Hɛ́ɛ lea dɔŋa nɛnnyin ne. He nɛra he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la, Kórowii tɛ he bwa bosɔɔhna.
61001001	Men Seemɔn Pita maa ɛ Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔ dɛ ɛ o torome la, men chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ he nɛra haa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo waa ɛ ya Korowii ne ya Lɛɛ la. O waa aa togra nomanta, o tɛ heyaa ya yarada waa wera nɔ dɔŋ.
61001002	Kórowii che he jema haa jemɔ dɛ jemɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu la ta dɛ cha heyaa kohona dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
61001003	Yeesu dɔ Korowii kpegri la dɔŋ. Anee o kpɔ cha yaa, asɛ ya dɔ komɛlbwa yaa hiah dɛ won do le dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga. Yaa jemɛ Korowii waa le yaa ásɛ ya won dɔ o jirima ne o dadɛɛge la waa o ɛ gɛ.
61001004	Waa ɛ gɛ nɔ, o cha yaa ŋwɛnɛdɛɛga kohona ta, aa wola dɔŋ dɔe. O bagɛ yaa nyoa a wa. Hɛ́ɛ che a taa dɛ le pɛlchɔga aa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta dɛɛ chɔg nɛra la nyoa, asɛ dɛ do gɛ Korowii aa doa la.
61001005	A gɛ waa nɔ wesoo nomanta la, hé takapɔ dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga dɛɛ ja he Yeesu waa yaradae ta, dɛ kpɔ wejema dɛ ja he wedɛɛga ɛɛ ta,
61001006	dɛ won dɛɛ lawɛ he te dɛɛ ja he wejema ta. Hɛ́ɛ lawɛ bambile dɛɛ ja he te lawa ta, dɛ kpɔ Korowii ɔma dɛɛ ja he bambile lawa ta.
61001007	Hɛ́ɛ nyin dɔŋa dɛɛ ja he Korowii ɔma ta, dɛɛ nyin nɛn dɛɛ ja he dɔŋa nyina ta.
61001008	Da waa wera tɛ heyaa la. He wono dɔ a gɛ da nɔ kɛrɛdɛ naa, aa geloo jema haa jemɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo la dɔ tɔnɔ dɛ su siwi.
61001009	Kɛ nomɛlbwa waa wola a gɛ da nɔ dɔe la, o liire do toŋgboŋ ken. Waa waa nyiŋe dɛɛ la sie. A gɛ te la soɔh kɛŋɔ Korowii laa o wechɔga o fa dɛ ɛ la fee o nɛ.
61001010	Anomanta yabalawa, Korowii aa le heyaa tɛ o te nɔ, hé takapɔ kɛŋɔ hɛɛ geloo he we-ɛɛla bagle kɛŋɔ Korowii nɛra waa lee ba la banee heya. He dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, haa naa lɔ Yeesu Kristo waa nɔ yaradae ta bwa.
61001011	He dɛ ɛ ken nɔ naa, Korowii ɛɛ tɛ heyaa ŋwɛnɛ kohonaa, asɛ he ja ya Dɔɔ waa ɛ ya Lɛɛ Yeesu Kristo Kora waa wola jaga dɔe la ta.
61001012	Kasinteŋ waa la haa noa la, he dɔɔ jema kɛrɛdɛ dɛ che a ta kiŋkiŋ. Kɛ mɛɛ dɛɛ lii heyaa a waa saŋ bɛlbwaa.
61001013	N dɛ lii kɛŋɔ maa wola sewɛ mɔɔ nɔ, a chɛ kɛ mɛɛ lii heyaa hé do wɔrɔbe waa nɔ ta.
61001014	N jemɔ kɛŋɔ aa bigri n wur n harɛ nɔ ta bwadabii nɔ ta. Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo gelɔ n jemɛ gɛ waa nɔ.
61001015	Mɛɛ takapɔɔ dɛ ɛ gɛ bwa maa won ɛ, asɛ dɛ n ba toole kwaraa naa, he won dɛɛ lii waa nɔ saŋ bɛlbwa.
61001016	Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo kpegri waa dɔa ne o bala waa la yaa bol he be la, a ta waa yaa kpɔ liire dɛ teŋe nyosone ɛɛ. Ya gbagba kpɔ sie na gɛ o wa aa dɔ nyɛl kohona.
61001017	O Mɛɛ Korowii gbagba aa tɛo duure ne jirima la, dɛ ya lɔ bela. Taa bɛl le o Mɛɛ Korowii waa dɔ jirima kohona la be kɛŋɔ, "N gbagba Bie maa dɛ nyinu o wa ɛɛ su n siwii nɔ."
61001018	Taa la aa le Korowii doa ba la, ya noɔ. Dɛ ya ne Yeesu lɔ bwe la Korowii aa gela o do goroŋ la ta.
61001019	Anɔ gelɔ ya jemɛ kpelakpela kɛŋɔ waa Korowii keamere la aa bola la ɛ kasinteŋ. A chɛ ke he cheg deŋne dɛɛ noa. Ba waa baa bola la do kɛ kandea waa dɛ chaah biro ta ka tel kɛŋɔ tɔ aa pera. Korowii Keamere Tɔne la ɛɛ chaah heyaa bɔree, asɛ Korowii gel he liire chaah gɛ chɔmbibi wewee aa dɛ chaah bɔr la.
61001020	Hé jemɛ kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ waa ba faa chwera Korowii Keamere Tɔne bini la, a bɛlbwa toole dɛ ɛ nɛwɛnyini nyu bini liire.
61001021	Akai! Baa chwera la, ba gbagba liire ne laa ba chwera. Korowii Domadɛɛgee ir Korowii nɛra nɛ, asɛ baa bol waa Korowii aa kpɔa do ba nyoa.
61002001	A saŋ la, nɛra bane teŋe nyosone ŋɔ Korowii keameree ban Israel tena bini. Gɛɛ nɛra ɛɛ ba bala dɛ ba teŋe nyosone ŋɔ ban dɛɛ chagle nɛra waa he bini. Baa dɛɛ chagle waa aa wola kasinteŋ ɛɛ, dɛ gel nɛra nyogre. Gɛ ba wechagle aa doa la, haa won jemɛ kɛŋɔ a ta kasinteŋ ɛɛ. Baa vɛh ba Dɔɔ waa bɔ ba wechɔga kem la waa, dɛ gel Korowii chɔg ba, ba sewɛ seopigri.
61002002	Nɛndamanta ɛɛ teŋɛ ba wedoŋa baa dɛ ɛ la taa, asɛ a che a ta nɛra bol kasinteŋ ŋwɛnɛ wobochɔga kɛ waa were.
61002003	Ba sibegra baa dɔa kohona nomanta, baa dɛɛ teŋe nyosonee ŋɔ waa baa chagle heya, dɛ negre heyaa dɛɛ di. Naate waa pa ba bolchɔge dɛɛ ba ba deŋne tɛra la kpɔ o te dɛɛ kpaa ba saŋ bɛlbwa. Waa dom chɔ. Wɛɛ ɛɛ ba posaposa kenii.
61002004	Nyundua toroma ba faa ɛ wechɔga la, Korowii ta ban gelɛ. O kpɔ ba ta deŋne tɛra bɔr waa ɛ bɔluŋluŋ dɛ bir kpirikpiri la dɛ́ ka tel awola waa ba bol nɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole la.
61002005	O ta a saŋ la tena gelɛ. O gelɔ nee su tɔ nɛra baa wola on ɔmɛ la nɛ. Nɛra waa gel ba bwaa Nowa o faa dɛ chagle nɛra ŋɔ bá gel ba waa togre Korowii be la, ne nɛra banuanɛ.
61002006	Sodom ne Gomoora tena faa dɛ ɛ wechɔga la, Korowii ŋɔ waa gel ba dwee ka, dɛ fuh ba ne ba bwɛɛre bwa dɛɛboo. Ba fuih chɔ le dɛɛ chagle waa aa ba chig nɛra baa wola Korowii ɔmɛ nɛ.
61002007	Dɛ Lɔt te ɛ nɛn waa dɛ ɔmɛ Korowii bela, asɛ wedoŋa bwɛɛre la tena aa wola Korowii ɔmɛ dɛɛ ɛ la ɛɛ hao. O te, Korowii lɛo.
61002008	Lɔt aa ɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su Korowii siwi dɛ do ba baah la, dɛ ba wedoŋa waa dɛ na ne anɔ la waa dɛ no tɔpebii bwa la gelɔ o bambile ɛɛ weo.
61002009	He nyiŋo na naa, dɛ Korowii te jemɛ gɛ waa dɛ lɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɔmɔ dɛɛ le Bɔnsam daahna ta, dɛ jemɛ gɛ waa dɛ tɛr wechɔg-ɛɛra deŋne dɛ ka tel awola waa ba bol nɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole la.
61002010	Nɛra ba sie aa begre ba bwadabii nɔ wechɔga aa suu nɔ pɛlchɔga ta, baa wola waa bu la, ba deŋnee Korowii ɛɛ ba tɛra kohona. A gɛ nɛra baa teŋe nyosone ŋɔ ba dɛ chagle waa nɔ, waa ba bambile aa lawaa baa ɛ. Ba bambile kpegri! Baa nyundua toroma bu. Wobochɔga kwaraa ba bol dɛɛ yag ba!
61002011	Nyundua toroma kpegri dɛ dɔ jirima gwaa a gɛ nyosonteŋna nɔ, kɛ baa ban chɔgɛ dɛɛ tɛ Korowii sisa wobol ne.
61002012	Nɛra nɔ te do kɛ kpɔg bini ola Korowii aa taa ŋɔ báa kpoa la ken. Baa liire kpɔe dɛɛ ɛ wa. Waa mun noe kpegri ba be naa, sisa wobolee ba bol dɛɛ yaga. Baa serewoo kɛŋɔ ola ken.
61002013	Wahala baa gela nɛra ɛɛ na la, ba gee na a dɔŋaa. Waa ba sie aa dɛ lɛ a taa kɛŋɔ ba bodia waa baa dɛ ɛa bochaah la. He ne baa pɛa dɛɛ di kwaa nɔ, ba do kɛ doŋa dɛɛ chɔg he wer. Ba sɔɔh dɛɛ ɛ bodia waa he habɔɔ taeh.
61002014	Ba na haah bɛlbwa naa, ba dɛ nyinu. Ba nyina baa dɛ nyin wechɔga ɛɛ ta dɔŋ dɔe. Ba negre nɛra baa wola chegɛ kiŋkiŋ Korowii waa ta dɛɛ kaa wechɔga ta. Ba sie dɛ begre kwaa taeh. Korowii taah ba!
61002015	Ba gel ŋwɛnɛtogre la, dɛ nyogre. Ba kpɔ Beɔ bie Balam o faa ɛ Korowii keame la ŋwɛnɛ la. O sie aa begre suuga kohona nomanta, o kpɔ ŋwɛnɛchɔge ta dɛ nyin suuga.
61002016	Korowii fa gelɔ keego bol waa o be dɛ kaoh o wechɔga la ta. Keego ge fe aa waa bol. Anomanta Korowii keame nɔ gel o chogla waa la.
61002017	He dɛ hwɛgɛ ba nɛ aa, he hwɛga ta pɛɛ. Ba do kɛ nenabɔɔ nee aa wola toole o ta, dɛ do kɛ baama peu aa ir a ne aa kaa ken. Biro kpirikpirii Korowii kwaa cheg ba.
61002018	Ba nyoa wobol kan taeh, kɛ nyosonee a bwa. Ba kpɔ bwadabii pɛlchɔga waa ne wedoŋa nɛra sie aa dɛ lɛ a ta dɛ negre nɛra dɛɛ kaa wechɔga ta. Nɛra baa pa mun dɛɛ le wechɔg-ɛɛra bini baa wola chegɛ kiŋkiŋ mɔɔ laanee ba negre dɛɛ kaa wechɔga ta.
61002019	Ba yon ŋɔ baa geloo nɛra dɔ ba te, dɛ ba gbabir ɛ yoma. Ba wechɔga ɛɛ ba yoma, dɛkalkɛŋɔ wobɛlbwa aa wona lɛ nɛn liire la, a kpɔɔ berɛ yom.
61002020	Nɛra jemɛ ya Dɔɔ waa ɛ ya Lɛɛ Yeesu Kristo waa la, dɛ won che a ta le waa aa dɛ la nɛn ne wechɔga ta harɛ bonɔ naa, a wer. Kɛ dɛ ba berɔ ba gel a gɛ wechɔga la dɔ bɔr vɔg ba ja aa, a te dɛ ba waa berɔ gbɔr dɛ gwaa mumpar la.
61002021	Dɛ ba fe ta Korowii ŋwɛnɛtogre la waa noɛ ka aa, a fe bɔ ba nɛɛ dɛ gwaa kɛŋɔ baa jemɛ Korowii ŋwɛnɛ la dɛ vɛh waa o gbagba aa ŋɔa báa ɛ la ɛɛ.
61002022	Ba waa nɔ gelɔ sɛgla baa sɛgla Korowii Tɔn bini la ɛ kasinteŋ. Ba sɛglɔ ŋɔ: "Nyoate ugaa, gɛɛ o berɛ dia," dɛ sɛgle ŋɔ, "He sɔ prakoo ne aa, wɛɛ berɔɔ ka gbili o kpechɛgre ta."
61003001	N dandɛɛga, tɔn nɔɔ n tɔn nɛɛte maa chwerɛ heya. N tɔne anɛ nɔ bwa bini la, n dɛ lii heyaa ásɛ he do wɔrɔbe waa nɔ ta, dɛ dɔ tepoŋ.
61003002	N dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ he lii waa Korowii keamere la faa bola a saŋ la la, ne waa Yeesu toroma la faa ŋɔa ya Dɔɔ waa ɛ ya Lɛɛ la ŋɔ hé ɛ la.
61003003	Anɔ la aa tɔ siee kɛŋɔ a chɛ kɛ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ tɔpera aa ka mun nɔ ta nɔ, nɛra ɛɛ dɛɛ mamɛ heyaa. Ba sie ɛɛ dɛɛ lɛ ba pɛlchɔga taa.
61003004	Baa dɛɛ bɔɔ heyaa ŋɔ, "Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ Yeesu ɛɛ berɔɔ ba ja la, lee o dɔɔ?" Dɛ ŋɔ, "Ya mɛɛnanar bwa serewɔ, dɛ o ta balɛ mɔɔ. Gɛ harɛ nɔ aa doa o mumpar la, gɛɛ o ta do."
61003005	Ba saahnɔ laa ba liire kpɔ gɛ Korowii faa kpɔ nyoa bol waa a saŋ la asɛ nyundua ne harɛ pa mun la ta. Nee nee Korowii ta harɛ, nee taa harɛ le.
61003006	Nee Korowii gel o su bɔle harɛ bwa a saŋ la dɛ chɔgo.
61003007	Gɛɛ Korowii ŋɔ nyundua kwaa bwa ne harɛ kwaa bwa aa lole taraken nɔ, á do le gɛ, ásɛ nii ɛrɛ ba fuah awola waa dɛ ba nɛra baa wola on tomɛ waa bola dɛ pa bole, dɛ chɔg ba la.
61003008	N dandɛɛga, he jemɛ kɛŋɔ tɔpebeŋkpoŋ ne bene kagboŋ bwa beŋkpoŋ Korowii be. Beŋkpoŋii a bwa o te be.
61003009	Bane dɛ lii kɛŋɔ Korowii bigri o nyobaga waa baga ŋɔ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu ɛɛ bao la chugra ta kohona to. Bambilee o dɔ tɛ heya, dɛkalkɛŋɔ waa nyin kɛ nomɛlbwa chɔg ta. O dɛ nyin kɛ nɛra bwa charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta mɔɔ o ba.
61003010	Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu bala tɔpere la, wɛɛ pigruu kɛŋɔ ŋwɛɛ bala a dɛ pigri la ken. Awola la, nyundua ɛɛ jigru kikikikikiki, dɛ nyogre nɛra siwi ta. Kwaa aa lɔ nyundua bwa ɛɛ fuuh dɛ mwɛɛ, asɛ harɛ ne kwaa aa lɔ o ta bwa fuh.
61003011	Kwaa nɔ bwa aa dɛ ba fuih ken nɔ, dɛ ɛrɛɛ chɛ kɛ he doɔ? A chɛ kɛ he do goroŋ he soga bini, dɛ kpɔ he te tɛ Korowii,
61003012	dɛɛ kpa Korowii tɔpere la nyundua aa fuh kwaraa asɛ harɛ ge komɛlbwa fuh dɛ mwɛɛ kwaraa la. Hé swɛɛ siwi ásɛ Korowii tɔpere la ba warane.
61003013	Ya dɛ nyiŋi nyoa Korowii aa baga la ŋwɛnɛ. Anee kɛŋɔ wɛɛ ta nyundua onfale ne harɛfalee. Belaa wedɛɛga ɛɛ ba doe.
61003014	Anomanta, n dandɛɛga, haa dɛ kpa awola tɔpere la la, hé swɛɛ siwi kɛŋɔ hɛɛ do goroŋee dɛ bɛ wechɔga bɛlbwa dɔ Korowii sie, asɛ he ne o baah do wer.
61003015	Hé nyiŋi Korowii bambile waa lawa nɔ kɛŋɔ ŋwɛnɛɛ o tɛ heyaa kɛŋɔ he charɛ he liire ásɛ o lɛ heya. Anee ya dɔŋ Pɔɔl yaa dɛ nyin o waa la fa kpɔ o wejema Korowii aa tɛo la dɛ chwerɛ heyaa la.
61003016	Pɔɔl dɛ bol a gɛ waa nɔ o tɔne bwa bini. Ane ta Pɔɔl tɔne waane mun noe kpegri taeh. Anomanta nɛra baa wola wobɛlbwa jemɛ baa wola chegɛ kiŋkiŋ la, ba dɛ berɛ waa la sie. Gɛɛ a gɛ nɛra nɔ ɛɛ bagle Korowii Tɔn bini waa la ane ge. Kɛ ba gbagba nyu taa ba ɛ dɛɛ dawɛ.
61003017	Anomanta n dandɛɛga, haa dɔɔ na ken nɔ, hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ asɛ dɛ bɛ ba gel nɛra baa wola Korowii ɔmɛ ba negre heyaa he lɔ naa he yarada ta dɛ bɛ kiŋkiŋ ba che kpa.
61003018	Hé swɛɛ siwi asɛ ya Dɔɔ waa ɛ ya Lɛɛ Yeesu Kristo suna waa sune he nɛɛ dɛɛ cha heyaa la ɛɛ ja kohona. Hé swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ dɔ wejema o waa ta kohona. Hé gel ya tɛo jirima taraken ne saŋ bɛlbwa. Aamen.
62001001	Waa yaa dɛ ba a waa he be bola nɔ ɛ nɛn waa ɛ Korowii Nyoa Wobol dɛ dɔ mkpa dɛ do le le mumpar la bwa wa. Ya no o waa dɛ nao. Ya nyiŋu dɛ kpɔ ya nɔɔra lego.
62001002	O fa lɔ Korowii be dɛ berɛ ba ɛ nɛn, asɛ ya nao. Anomanta ya dɛ bol o waa he be kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo waa ɛ saŋ bɛlbwa mkpa dɛ faa do o Mɛɛ be la, o ba ya be ya jemɔ.
62001003	Anɔ la yaa naa dɛ no laanee yaa bol he ge be ásɛ he no dɛ ba ja ya Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua ne o bie Yeesu Kristo beŋkpoŋri ɛɛ la ta.
62001004	Ya dɛ nyin kɛ ya bwa bwara sɔɔh yaa kɛrɛdɛ. A waa ya chwerɛ tɔn nɔ baa tɛ heyaa la.
62001005	Waa yaa noa le Yeesu be dɛɛ bol he be laanee kɛŋɔ Korowii do kɛŋɔ kon waa chaahna ken. Wechɔga bɛlbwa toole o nɛ.
62001006	Anomanta dɛ ya ŋɔ ya ne o ɛ beŋkpoŋ, kɛ dɛ berɛ dɛɛ ɛ biro bini wa aa, ya teŋe nyosone. Ya we-ɛɛla dɛ bagle kɛ ya waa ta kasinteŋ dɔe.
62001007	Korowii waa aa chaahna la, dɛ ya dɛ ɛ ya waa bwa a chaah kɛ on aa, dɛ ya ne yabala pɛo dɛ ɛ beŋkpoŋ. Dɛ Korowii Bie Yeesu chal la laa ya wechɔga bɛlbwa dɛɛ kpɔ ya nɛ.
62001008	Dɛ ya ŋɔ wechɔga toole ya nɛ aa, ya dɛ negre ya nyuune. Dɛ yaa kasinteŋ bol.
62001009	Dɛ ya bol ya wechɔga bagle Korowii aa, o ɛ nɛndɛɛge dɛ ɛ kasinteŋ te dɛɛ teŋɛ o nyobaga ta. Wɛɛ kpɔɔ kɛ yaa dɛ laa doŋa bwa kpɔ ya nɛ.
62001010	Dɛ ya ŋɔ ya ta wechɔga ɛɛ te naa, dɛ ya yerɛ Korowii nyosonteŋni. O waa la ge toole ya bini.
62002001	N bidɛɛga, n chwerɛ waa nɔ dɛɛ tɛ heya, asɛ he bɛ wechɔga dɛɛ ɛ. Kɛ dɛ nomɛlbwa garɔ ɛ wechɔga aa, ya dɔ nomɛl o do ya Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la be dɛ́ soŋe ya wechɔga dɛɛ tɛ yaa. Onee Yeesu Kristo la. O ɛ nɛŋkaih.
62002002	Onee koh ya wechɔga waa dɛ sewɛ tɛ yaa dɛ kwaa ya ne Korowii baah. Ya gbo wechɔga waa laa o sewɛ. Nomɛlbwa waa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta bwa jao.
62002003	Ya teŋɛ o waa ta naa, anee dɛɛ ba yaa bagla kɛ ya jemɔ.
62002004	Dɛ nomɛlbwa ŋɔ o jemɛ Korowii, dɛ waa o waa ta teŋaa, gɛ nɛn la ɛ nyosonteŋni, dɛ kasinteŋ toole o be.
62002005	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ teŋɛ Korowii waa ta la, onee dɛɛ nyin Korowii waa kɛrɛdɛ. Anɔ taa yaa ba chega dɛ jemɛ kɛ ya ne Korowii pɛo.
62002006	Nomɛlbwa waa ŋɔa o ne Korowii pɛo la, a chɛ kɛŋɔ o kpɔ Yeesu Kristo da la.
62002007	Yabala, waa nɔ maa dɛ chwerɛ heyaa nɔ ta wefala ɛɛ. Webena la yaa bagle heyaa le mumpar la, anee ta.
62002008	Kɛ ŋwɛnɛ bɛl ge ta la, a ɛ wefala, dɛkalkɛŋɔ biro dɛ kaa. Bochaah tenten balɔ asɛ bɔr ɛɛ chaah kɛrɛdɛ. Yeesu we-ɛɛla ne he gbagba we-ɛɛla bagle a gɛ waa nɔ mun.
62002009	Nomɛlbwa waa ŋɔa o lɔ bochaah ta kɛ dɛ hah o dɔŋ la ta lɔ biro tenten ta.
62002010	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin o dɔŋ la do kɛŋɔ nɛn waa lɔ bochaah ta. Bochaah la nomanta, komɛlbwa toole dɛ gel o lɔ nakpala dɛ chole.
62002011	Nomɛlbwa waa hah o dɔŋ la do kɛŋɔ nɛn waa lɔ biro ta. O dɛ valɛ, kɛ waa jemɛ bela waa dɛ kaa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ biro la gelɔ o nyoŋe.
62002012	N bidɛɛga, n chwerɛ waa nɔ dɛɛ tɛ heya, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii koh Yeesu waa dɛ kpɔ he wechɔga kɛ heya.
62002013	Nomonome, n chwerɛ waa nɔ dɛɛ tɛ heya, dɛkalkɛŋɔ heyaa jemɛ naate waa lole le mumpar bwa la. Bonɔɔna, n chwerɛ waa nɔ dɛɛ tɛ he ge, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he pɔ Bɔnsam nɛ.
62002014	N bidɛɛga, n chwerɔ dɛɛ tɛ heya, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he jemɛ ya Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la. Nomonome, n chwerɔ dɛɛ tɛ heya, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he jemɛ naate waa lole le mumpar bwa la. Bonɔɔna, n chwerɔ dɛɛ tɛ heya, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he bwaraa kpega, Korowii waa la do he bambile bini. Heyaa wona pɔ Bɔnsam nɛ.
62002015	He bɛ gel he sie lɛ waa aa dɛ lɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire sie la ne harɛ nɔ ta kwaa ta. Dɛ he sie dɛ lɛ a gɛ kwaa la ta naa, dɛ haa he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la waa nyin.
62002016	Bwadabii pɛlchɔga kwa, ne anɔ la aa ɛ siwi pɛla kwa, ne waa yaa nyina dɛ́ kpɔa dɛɛ maŋkura ya te la ɛ harɛ nɔ ta wa. A ta ya Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la be leɛ.
62002017	Harɛ nɔ ne o pɛla kwaa bwa sekwaraa dɔ jaga. Naate waa dɛ ɛ anɔ la Korowii aa dɛ nyin la gbosoo dɛɛ ba le doe saŋ bɛlbwa.
62002018	N bidɛɛga, wobɛlbwa jaga saŋ telo. He noɔ kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo dɔm tenten la ɛɛ bao. Hale taraken o dɔma dɔɔ warɛ dɛ ba. Anomanta ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ wobɛlbwa jaga saŋ telo.
62002019	Dɛ bane fa ja ya nɛ, kɛ dɛ ba ta denɛ ɛ ya bini bane, dɛkalkɛ ba chwao. Dɛ ba fe ja ya nɛ aa, ya ne ba fe ta pɛo. Kɛ ba chwao, asɛ a den bagle kɛŋɔ ba bini bɛlbwa ta ya nɛɛ jae.
62002020	He te dɔ Domadɛɛge la he nɛɛ dɛ le Korowii Bidɛɛge be, dɛ jemɛ o kasinteŋ waa la bwa.
62002021	Kasinteŋ bɛ jema waa laa n chwerɛ tɔn nɔ baa tɛ heya. He jemɛ kasinteŋ la, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ nyosone ne kasinteŋ aa valɛ bwa.
62002022	Amɔ umee ɛ nyosonteŋni ɔ? Nyosonteŋnii naate waa ŋɔa Yeesu laa Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la. A gɛ nɛn la, onee Yeesu Kristo dɔm tenten. Onee vɛh ya Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua ne o Bie bwa.
62002023	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ tɔŋle kɛŋɔ Yeesu laa Korowii Bie Kristo la, waa won yerɛ Korowii o Mɛɛ. Gɛɛ a do, nomɛlbwa waa sɛah ŋɔ Yeesuu Korowii Bie la, o Mɛɛɛ Korowii.
62002024	Hé kpoŋe anɔ la haa noa dɛ le mumpar la bini. Dɛ he ɛ gɛ naa, saŋ bɛlbwa he ne Yeesu ne o Mɛɛ bwa ɛɛ wonoo pɛ ba kpoŋe heya.
62002025	Dɛ ya ne Yeesu ne o Mɛɛ wono pɛ aa, a taa yaa ba chega dɛ dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe Yeesu aa bagɛ yaa nyoa la.
62002026	Nɛra baa dɛ ba dɛ́ fee baa negre heyaa la waa n chwerɛ gɛ waa nɔ dɛɛ tɛ heyaa la, ba bɛ won dɛ negre heya.
62002027	Yeesu Kristo aa dɔa tɛ heyaa Korowii Domadɛɛge o do he bini nɔ, haa nomɛlbwa nyin o bagle heyaa waa kpa. O Doma la dɛ bagle heyaa wobɛlbwa. O ɛ kasinteŋ te, waa nyosone teŋe. Hé no anɔ la waa dɛ bagle heyaa la, asɛ dɛ kpɔ he te pɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛ.
62002028	N bidɛɛga, hé gel he ne Yeesu Kristo pɛ, asɛ o baa forɛ le awola aa, ya bɛ ɔmɛ, asɛ sihiih bɛ yaa kpo o sie awola waa ba la.
62002029	He nao kɛŋɔ Korowii ɛ nɛndɛɛge, anomanta nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga aa su Korowii siwi la ɛ Korowii bie.
62003001	Hé na nyina ya Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua aa dɛ nyin yaa, dɛɛ yerɛ yaa o bii. Ya ɛ o bii kpela. A waa gela nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire aa wola yaa jemɛ la. Gɛ baa wola Korowii jemɛ la, gɛɛ baa wola ya ge jemɛ.
62003002	Yabala, taraken ya ɛ Korowii bii. Yaa jemɛ kɛrɛdɛ gɛ yaa dɛ ba doe. Kɛ ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ awola Yeesu Kristo aa forɛ le nɛra nao la, gɛ waa doa la, gɛɛ ya gee ba doe, dɛkalkɛŋɔ yaa nao dɛ na gɛ waa doa.
62003003	Nomɛlbwa waa dɔ gɛ hwɛga Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ la chɛ kɛ o lawɛ o te, dɛ laa o te dɛɛ kpɔ wechɔga ŋwɛnɛre ta dɛ́ won do kaih gɛ tenten Yeesu Kristo aa do kaih la.
62003004	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ wechɔga la di bolchɔge Korowii mmara ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ wechɔgaa dɛɛ tia mmara.
62003005	He jemɔ kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo ba harɛ nɔ ta ásɛ dɛ ba laa wechɔga kpɔ dɛ tɔ a ŋwɛnɛ. O te, dɛ wechɔga toole o nɛ.
62003006	Anomanta nomɛlbwa waa kpɔ o te pɛl Yeesu Kristo la aa berɛ teŋɛ dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga kpa. Nomɛlbwa o taa teŋa dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga la, naate ta on pesee dɛ jemɔ.
62003007	N bidɛɛga, he bɛ gel nomɛlbwa negre heya. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga aa su Korowii siwi la ɛ nɛndɛɛge gɛ Yeesu Kristo aa ɛ nɛndɛɛge la.
62003008	Nomɛlbwa waa teŋa dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga la ɛ Bɔnsam nɛn, dɛkalkɛŋɔ harɛ mumpar la bwaa Bɔnsam le dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga. A waa Korowii Bie la koh ba harɛ nɔ ta dɛ́ ba chɔg Bɔnsam toma bwa.
62003009	Nomɛlbwa waa ɛ Korowii bie la aa teŋɛ dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga kpa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o ɛ Korowii dwee. Anomanta waa won teŋɛ dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga kpa, dɛkalkɛ o mɛɛɛ Korowii.
62003010	Anɔ taa yaa ba chega dɛ jemɛ banɔ la baa ɛ Korowii bii ne banɔ la baa ɛ Bɔnsam kwa. Nomɛlbwa waa wola wedɛɛga aa su Korowii siwi ɛ, kɛɛ waa wola o dɔŋ nyin la, o ta o bie ɛɛ.
62003011	Waa haa noa le mumpar laanee kɛŋɔ a chɛ kɛŋɔ ya nyin dɔŋa.
62003012	Ya bɛ ɛ kɛŋɔ Keen, waa ɛ o te Bɔnsam bie dɛ kpo o nime Abɛl la. Bɔkwaa gela o kpoo wɔ? O we-ɛɛla waa ɛa la aa wola were asɛ o nime kwaa do wer la, anee gela o kpoo.
62003013	Yabala, dɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire hah heya aa, he bɛ gel a ɛ heyaa nyokpoa.
62003014	Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ ya le seo nɔn ta dɛ ba dɔ mkpa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya dɛ nyin dɔŋa. Nomɛlbwa waa wola o dɔŋ nyin la ta lɔ seo nɔn ta.
62003015	Nomɛlbwa waa hah o dɔŋ la do kɛŋɔ nɛn waa dɛ kpoo nɛra ken. He jemɔ kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa ge waa dɛ kpoo nɛra la ta Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la dɔe.
62003016	Gɛ Yeesu Kristo aa koh ya waa dɛ kpɔ o te tɛ dɛ sewɛ la, a taa ya che dɛ jemɛ gɛ nyina aa doa. A chɛ kɛŋɔ ya ge koh yabala waa dɛ ge kpɔ ya te tɛ kɛŋɔ yaa sewɔɔ tɛɛ ba.
62003017	Dɛ nomɛl dɔ harɛ nɔ ta kwaa bwa, dɛ na o dɔŋ waa nyaa, dɛ laa sie kpɔ o nɛ aa, amɔ dɛ o dɛ nyin Korowii aa?
62003018	N bidɛɛga, he bɛ gel ya kpɔ wobol ne nyotor berɛ dɔŋa nyina. Kɛ hé gel ya we-ɛɛla bagle kɛŋɔ ya nɛnnyin ɛ kasinteŋ nyina.
62003019	Anɔ taa yaa ba wona jemɛ kɛŋɔ ya chegɔ tɛ kasinteŋ la. Anɔ taa yaa ba bambisɔɔhna dɔe Korowii sie.
62003020	Dɛ ya liire pa yaa bolchɔge aa, Korowii gwaa ya liire dɛ jemɛ komɛlbwa.
62003021	Anomanta, yabala, dɛ ya liire aa yaa bolchɔge pa te naa, amɔ ya dɔ bambile dɛ́ che Korowii sie, yaa wola ɔmɛ.
62003022	Komɛlbwa yaa soŋo la, o dɛ tɛ yaa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya dɛ no o waa dɛɛ ɛ anɔ la aa dɛ su o siwi.
62003023	Waa Korowii aa dɛ ŋɔ ya be laanee kɛŋɔ yá yarada o Bie Yeesu Kristo la, dɛ nyin dɔŋa gɛ waa ŋɔ ya be la.
62003024	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ no Korowii waa la, o kpɔ o te dɛɛ pɛl Korowii, asɛ o ge lawɔ dɛɛ pɛl o nɛ. Korowii Domadɛɛge la waa kpɔa tɛ yaa la gelɔ ya jemɛ kɛŋɔ ya bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ.
62004001	Yabala, he bɛ nɛra baa ŋɔa ba dɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge la dɛ che o ta dɛɛ bagle waa la dɛɛ yarada warawara. Hé pese ba dɛ na kɛŋɔ kpegri baa dɔa la le Korowii Domadɛɛge la be kɛɛ? Dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛra baa dɛ negre nɛra kɛŋɔ ba ɛ Korowii keamere ba harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwa pirim.
62004002	Ŋwɛnɛ nɔ taa hɛɛ ba chega dɛ jemɛ nɛra baa dɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge la. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ bagle Yeesu waa ɛ Kristo Korowii aa tomɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la waa kɛŋɔ o baa ɛ nɛwɛnyini la, o dɔ Domadɛɛge waa le Korowii be la.
62004003	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ tɔŋle Yeesu nɛwɛnyini ɛɛ la ta Domadɛɛge la dɔe le Korowii be. Kpegri naate aa dɔa la le Yeesu dɔm tenten la be. He noɔ kɛ wɛɛ bao. Taraken, on bala la.
62004004	N bidɛɛga, Korowii nɛraa heya. He pɔ keamere baa ɛ nyosonteŋna la nɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge waa lɔ he bini la kpegri gwaa kon waa lɔ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire la kpegri.
62004005	Keamere baa ɛ nyosonteŋna la te, nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire la bini banee ban. Harɛ nɔ ta waa baa bol. A waa ba won dɛɛ bol wa, asɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire la sie ɛɛ lɛ ba nɛɛ dɛɛ no ba be la.
62004006	Ya te ɛ Korowii bii. Nomɛlbwa waa jemɛ Korowii la dɛ no ya wa. Nomɛlbwa waa wola Korowii jemɛ la aa ya waa no. Anɔ taa yaa ba chega dɛ jemɛ banɔ la baa dɔ kasinteŋ Doma waa ɛ Korowii kon ne banɔ la baa dɔ nyosone kon la.
62004007	Yabala, hé gel ya nyin dɔŋa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛnnyin le Korowii be. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin nɛn la, o ɛ Korowii bie dɛ jemɔ.
62004008	Nomɛlbwa waa wola nɛn nyin la aa Korowii jemɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowiirii nyina bwa Dɔɔ.
62004009	Kenii o bagle o nyina waa dɛ nyin yaa: O gelɔ o bibeŋkpoŋ la ba harɛ nɔ ta, ásɛ ya che o nɛɛ dɛ dɔ mkpa.
62004010	Anɔɔ dɛɛ bagle gɛ nyina tenten aa doa. Ya te nyina yaa dɛ nyin Korowii la aa bobɛlbwa tel, kɛ o ge garɔ dɛɛ nyin yaa. Hé na gɛ Korowii aa gela o Bibeŋkpoŋ la koh ya wechɔga waa dɛ ba harɛ nɔ ta dɛ sewɛ dɛ kwaa ya ne Korowii baah.
62004011	Yabala, dɛ kenii Korowii ɛɛ nyin yaa te naa, amɔ a chɛ kɛŋɔ ya nyin dɔŋa.
62004012	Nomɛlbwa ta Korowii nae ka. Kɛ dɛ ya dɛ nyin dɔŋa aa, anee Korowii ɛɛ ba yaa lawɛ pɛl o nɛ, asɛ o nyina la do ya be kɛrɛdɛ ka tonɛ.
62004013	Korowii Domadɛɛge la waa kpɔa tɛ yaa la gelɔ ya jemɛ kɛŋɔ kpela, ya kpɔ ya te pɛlo asɛ o ge lawɛ yaa pɛl o nɛ.
62004014	Ya na o Bie la dɛ di danseɛ kɛŋɔ Korowiirii gela o ba harɛ nɔ ta dɛ́ ba ɛ nɛwɛnyini Lɛɛ.
62004015	Nomɛlbwa waa yarada Yeesu kɛŋɔ Korowii Biee on la, dɛ naate kpɔ o te pɛl Korowii asɛ o ge lawɔ pɛl o te.
62004016	Anomanta ya gbabir jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii dɛ nyin yaa, dɛ kpɔ siwi dawɛ o nyina la nɛ. Korowiirii nyina bwa Dɔɔ. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin nɛn la, o kpɔ o te dɛɛ pɛl Korowii, asɛ o lawɔ dɛɛ pɛl o nɛ.
62004017	Waa lawɛ yaa pɛl o nɛɛ la, a taa a che nyina la do ya nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ ka tonɛ, asɛ ya dɔ hwɛga awola Yeesu aa ba dɛ ba bol nɛndɛɛga ne wechɔg-ɛɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole la. Yaa Yeesu bala waa ɔmɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ o da aa doa la, gɛ tentenee ya ge do nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire bini.
62004018	Nɛn dɛ nyin o dɔŋ aa, waa gɛ Korowii aa dɛ tɛr nɛra deŋne ɔmɛ. Nyina waa ɛ nyina tenten la dɛ doŋi ɔmee. Deŋne tɛra waa nɛn ɛɛ ɔmɛ Korowii. Anomanta naate waa dɛ ɔmɛ la ta nyina tenten dɔe o be.
62004019	Ya dɛ nyin dɔŋa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowiirii tɔ sie nyin yaa.
62004020	Dɛ nomɛl hah o dɔŋ dɛ ŋɔ o dɛ nyin Korowii aa, dɛ o teŋe nyosone. Dɛ nomɛl aa o dɔŋ o ne waa pɛa wɛɛ nao la nyin aa, ɛrɛɛ ó ɛ dɛ won nyin Korowii waa wola on na nɔ?
62004021	Waa Yeesu Kristo aa kpɔa tɛ yaa laanee nɔ: Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin Korowii la, a chɛ kɛŋɔ o nyin o dɔŋ ge.
62005001	Nomɛlbwa waa yaradaa kɛŋɔ Yeesu ɛ Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ la, naate ɛ Korowii bie, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ he dɛ nyin nomɛl waa aa, dɛ he dɛ nyin o bie ge wa.
62005002	Dɛ ya dɛ nyin Korowii dɛɛ teŋɛ o waa ta naa, a taa ya jemɛ kɛŋɔ ya dɛ nyin o bii.
62005003	Dɛ ya dɛ teŋɛ waa Korowii aa kpɔa tɛ yaa ta naa, anee dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ ya dɛ nyinu. O waa la ta teŋa ge aa kpege kohona tɛ yaa,
62005004	dɛkalkɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa ɛ Korowii bie la won harɛ nɔ ta liire ne o komɛlbwa nɛɛ pɔe. Ya chegɛ yarada yaa dɛ yarada Yeesu la ta dɛ pɔ a nɛ.
62005005	Umee dɛ won pɔ harɛ nɔ ta liire ne o komɛlbwa nɛɔ? Nomɛlbwa toole atane kɛŋɔ naate waa dɛ yarada kɛ Yeesu ɛ Korowii Bie la gbosoroo.
62005006	Yeesu Kristo aa bala dɛ ba ɛ o toma la, nee ne chal taa o che dɛ ba. Korowii nee sɔe la gbo ta laa o toma la che. Kɛ o chal waa fuga ta la ne Korowii nee sɔe la bwa taa a che. Asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge gee di danseɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o ɛ kasinteŋ te.
62005007	Kon bele atoroo di danseɛ dɛɛ tɛ Yeesu.
62005008	Korowii Domadɛɛge la, ne Korowii nee baa sɔɔ la, ne o chal waa fuga ta la bwaa di danseɛ dɛɛ tɛo dɛɛ bagle wesiwi beŋkpoŋ.
62005009	Dɛ ya dɛ yarada nɛwɛnyini danseɛ aa, amɔ yaa Korowii kwaa yarada aa? O kwaa laanee kpega gwaa nɛwɛnyini kwa. Korowii gbagbaa kpɔ waa nɔ di o Bie danseɛ.
62005010	Anomanta nomɛlbwa waa yarada Korowii Bie la la, naate dɔ gɛ danseɛ nɔ o gbabir bambile bini dɛ won jemɛ kɛŋɔ a ɛ kpela. Kɛ nomɛlbwa waa wola Korowii yarada la gelɔ Korowii waa la ɛ nyosone, dɛkalkɛŋɔ naate aa gɛ Korowii aa bol o Bie la waa la yarada.
62005011	Waa Korowii aa bola a ɛ danseɛ laanee nɔ: O tɛ yaa o mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa la, asɛ o Bie la bee gɛ mkpa la ge le.
62005012	Nomɛlbwa waa kpɔ o te pɛl Korowii Bie la dɔ a gɛ mkpa nɔ. Nomɛlbwa waa wola o te kpɔe pɛl Korowii Bie la ta mkpa la dɔe.
62005013	N chwerɛ waa nɔ baa tɛ he banɔ la haa dɛ yarada Korowii Bie la ásɛ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ he dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la.
62005014	Ya dɔ hwɛga Korowii be kɛŋɔ wobɛlbwa yaa soŋo la, dɛ a ɛ o tetoowa aa, wɛɛ no ya bee.
62005015	Dɛ ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii dɛ no ya be kwaa yaa dɛ soŋo la te naa, amɔ te dɛ ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ ya dɔɔ dɔ kwaa yaa dɛ soŋe o be la.
62005016	Dɛ he na he dɔŋ wɛɛ ɛ wechɔga aa, soŋe Korowii tɛo. Wɛɛ tɛo mkpaa. N ŋɔ gɛ naa, banɔ la baa wola seo wechɔga ɛɛ laanee n ŋɔ hé soŋe tɛ. Wechɔga ane lole, dɛ he ɛa aa, a chɛ kɛŋɔ he sewɛ. N ta ŋɔe ŋɔ hé soŋe Korowii tɛ nɛn a te bɔr.
62005017	Waa aa wola were bwa ɛ wechɔga, kɛ wechɔga bwa laa ɛ seo wechɔga.
62005018	Ya jemɔ kɛ nomɛlbwa waa ɛ Korowii bie la aa teŋɛ dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii Bie la dɛ nyiŋi naate nɛɛ asɛ Bɔnsam bɛ won ɛo wobɛlbwa.
62005019	Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ ya bwa ɛ Korowii bii, asɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire ne kwaa aa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta bwa ge do Bɔnsam lɔga.
62005020	Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii Bie la balɔ dɛ ba tɛ yaa liire yá kpɔ jemɛ Korowii tenten la. Korowii tenten la lawɛ yaa pɛl o nɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o kpɔ ya te pɛl o Bie Yeesu Kristo la. O ɛ Korowii tenten, dɛ dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa.
62005021	N bidɛɛga, hé nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ dɛ laa he te kpɔ komɛlbwa waa wola Korowii tenten ɛɛ la ta dɛ toma.
63001001	Men Nomoa Jɔnee chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ haah la Korowii aa kpɔɔ cheg dɛ tɛ o te la, ne o bii maa koh beŋkpoŋ ya bwa aa ɛa Korowii kasinteŋ waa la ta dɛɛ nyin ba la. N gbo laa dɛɛ nyin ba gɛ. Nɛra baa jemɛ Korowii kasinteŋ waa la bwa ge jao,
63001002	dɛkalkɛŋɔ kasinteŋ la lɔ ya bwa bambile bini. Wɛɛ do lee dɛɛ la saŋ bɛlbwa.
63001003	Ń Naa Korowii ne o Bie Yeesu Kristo sune ya bwa sekwara nɛ, dɛ cha yaa, dɛ tɛ yaa bosɔɔhna yá won jemɛ kasinteŋ la dɛ dɔ nɛnnyin.
63001004	N sie lɛo kohona kɛ maa na he bii la bane kɛ ba teŋɛ kasinteŋ waa la ta gɛ ya Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la aa ŋɔa yáa ɛ la.
63001005	Kɛ n bidɛɛge, taraken n dɛ soŋe, dɛɛ teŋɛ waa Korowii aa bola bil la ta. Wefala laa. Dɛ́ hɛ́ɛ nyin dɔŋa.
63001006	Dɛ ya dɛ nyin dɔŋa aa, dɛ ya dɛ teŋɛ o waa la ta. O waa laanee kɛŋɔ dɔŋa nyina, gɛ haa noa logla la. Anomanta hɛ́ɛ ɛ he wobɛlbwa dɔŋa nyina ta.
63001007	Nyosonteŋna tenten balɔ taraken. Banee wola yarada kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo ba harɛ nɔ ta kɛŋɔ nɛwɛnyini la. Nomɛlbwa waa wola gɛ yarada la, o ɛ nyosonteŋni dɛ ɛ Yeesu Kristo dɔm.
63001008	Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ gel he toma ɛ pɛɛ, ásɛ he won dɔ he tɔnɔ bwa dɛ le a ta.
63001009	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ bagle Yeesu Kristo waa la dɛ kpɔ o gbabir nyu bini liire dɛɛ ja la, amɔ dɛ Korowii ta naate nɛɛ teŋɛ. Nomɛlbwa waa jemɛ Yeesu Kristo webagla la dɛɛ bagla gɛ aa doa la, dɛ Korowii ne o Bie la teŋɛ o nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
63001010	Dɛ nomɛlbwa ba he be dɛ baa bagle heyaa anɔ la aa wola Yeesu Kristo waa la ane ɛɛ yaa, he bɛ naate lɛ so he be, he bɛ o sie kwara lɛ.
63001011	Nomɛlbwa waa lɛ gɛ te la sie la, o ge gba ja naate wechɔga la ta.
63001012	N dɔ waa taeh dɛ́ bol he be, kɛ maa chwerɛ do tɔn ta. N dɛ nyin kɛ n ba he be ya sie ɛ anɛ asɛ n bol he be. Belaa ya sie ɛɛ ba lɛɛ kohona.
63001013	He nime la Korowii aa kpɔɔ cheg tɛ o te la, o bii dɛ na heyaa kohona.
64001001	Men Nomoa Jɔnee chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ n dandɛɛge Gayos maa koh beŋkpoŋ ya bwa aa ɛa Korowii kasinteŋ waa la ta la dɛɛ nyin he waa la.
64001002	N dandɛɛge, n dɛ soŋe Korowii o chae he dɔ bokpega kɛrɛdɛ, he waa bwa do wer kɛŋɔ he ne Korowii baah naa do wer la.
64001003	Yabala bane balɔ dɛ ba bol he waa n be ŋɔ he dɛ teŋɛ kasinteŋ waa la ta. Dɛ́ he we-ɛɛla bwa dɛ bagle gɛ. Anomanta n baah sɔɔh mɛ taeh.
64001004	Saŋ bɛlbwa maa no n bii waa kɛŋɔ ba dɛ teŋɛ kasinteŋ la ta la, n baah dɛ sɔɔh mɛ gwaa komɛlbwa.
64001005	N dandɛɛge, gɛ he yon lɛ asɔre tena haa wola ban jemɛ kwara, kɛ dɛ won kpɔ ba ka dawɛ he nɛɛ dɛɛ nyiŋ ba la, he dɛ teŋɛ ŋwɛnɛ la ta kɛrɛdɛ.
64001006	Ba bol he waa bagle asɔre tena dɛ tɛɛ sɔn, dɛ bagle gɛ haa nyin ba. Anomanta dɛ ba dɛ ba kaala aa, cha ba ba ŋwɛnɛ la ta gɛ aa chɛ kɛ Korowii nɛn ɛ,
64001007	dɛkalkɛŋɔ Yeesu toma waa ba koh dɛɛ valɛ. Baa suuga lɛɛ dɛɛ le nɛra baa wola Korowii waa yaradae la be.
64001008	Anomanta a wer kɛŋɔ ya cha nɛra baa dɛ ɛ a gɛ toma nɔ. Dɛ ya wono dɛɛ cha dɔŋa gɛ naa, dɛ Korowii kasinteŋ waa la tomaa ya bwa ɛɛ ɛ la.
64001009	N fa chwerɛ waane dɛ tɛ asɔre tena bela, kɛ Dayɔtrafes aa dɛ nyin nomonome nomanta, o vɛh ya waa la.
64001010	Anomanta dɛ n balaa, mɛɛ bol o waa, dɛ bol gɛ waa dɛ chɔg yaa dɛ kpɔ waa dɛɛ dawɛ yaa la. A gbo laa wɛɛ ɛ. O ta sɛɛh dɛɛ nyiŋi yabala baa vala dɛɛ bol Yeesu Kristo waa la. Dɛ bane ge dɛ nyin ba lɛɛ ba dɛɛ nyiŋ ba aa, waa gelɛ baa lɛɛ ba, dɛ yon doŋi ba bwa le ba bini.
64001011	N dandɛɛge, bɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ wechɔga la nɛɛ teŋɛ. Kɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga la nɛ. Banɔ la baa dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga la ɛ Korowii bilola. Nomɛlbwa ge waa dɛ ɛ wechɔga la aa Korowii jemɛ.
64001012	Gasi toole Demetros ge nɛ. Nomɛlbwa dɛ bol o waa ga. Kasinteŋ la waa dɛ teŋɛ o ta la ge dɛ diu danseɛ. Ya gba dɛ diu danseɛ gɛ. He jemɔ kɛŋɔ yaa nyosone teŋe.
64001013	N dɔ waa taeh dɛɛ nyin n bol he be. Kɛ maa nyin kɛŋɔ n chwera do tɔn ta.
64001014	N dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ n ba chɔɔre taraken bɔr ásɛ ya sie ɛ anɛ ya bol wa. Kórowii tɛɛ bosɔɔhna. He daamanar baa lɔ bonɔ la bwa dɛ nae. Ya dɛ na ya daamanar bwa.
65001001	Tɔn nɔ le men Jud maa ɛ Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔ dɛ ɛ Jems nime la be. N chwerɔ dɛɛ tɛ he nɛra N Naa Korowii waa bera ɛ ya Mɛɛ la aa dɛ nyin heya, dɛ le heyaa tɛ o te, asɛ Yeesu Kristo gee nyiŋ heyaa la.
65001002	Kórowii na he sum kohona, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna kohona, dɛ cha heyaa hɛɛ nyin dɔŋa kohona.
65001003	N dandɛɛga, n siwi fe swɛɛrɔ mɛɛ nyin kɛ n chwerɛ heyaa tɔn dɛ bagle lɛɛ Yeesu aa lɛ n ne he bwa la wa, asɛ n berɛ na kɛŋɔ a chɛ kɛ n chwerɛ heyaa bug nɔ ta dɛ do heyaa gbemba, ásɛ hɛɛ yo waa yaa dɛ yarada la wa. Korowiirii fa bagle o nɛra gɛ baa dɛɛ tomɔ. Gɛ waa bag ba la aa berɛ bwa.
65001004	Nɛra bane sɔɔh dɛ ba koo he baah haa wola jemɛ. Baa Korowii tomɛ, dɛɛ bol ŋɔ nɛra ɛɛ wonoo dɛɛ ɛ wedoŋa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii dɛ sune nɛra nɛ. Ba dɛ ɛ gɛ ásɛ dɛ fe dɔ bɔr che dɛɛ ɛ wedoŋa baa dɛ nyin. A gɛ nɛra nɔ vɛh ya Nomoa beŋkpoŋ Yeesu Kristo waa dɔ yaa la kɛŋɔ ba Dɔɔree on. Saŋ la bwaa Korowii Tɔn bagle gɛ Korowii aa pa ba bolchɔge dɛɛ ba ba deŋne tɛra.
65001005	N jemɔ kɛŋɔ he jemɔ, kɛ n dɛ nyin kɛ n lii heyaa gɛ Korowii faa lɛ Israel tena le Ijipt tena nɔn ta, asɛ a habɔɔ bane aa wola o waa yaradae la, o kpoo ba la.
65001006	Nyundua toroma ge aa wola gelɛ bela Korowii aa tɛɛ ba ŋɔ bá di kpegri magre ba ne, dɛ le ba dobɔr la, o tɔ ba do biro ta, dɛ do kwaa ba nɔɔra ta waa wola ban foo ta bwa, dɛ́ ka tel kɛŋɔ o tɔpejen waa dɛ ba nɛra waa bola dɛ pa bole la.
65001007	Gɛɛ Sodom ne Gomoora tena ne bwɛɛre a faa lɔ ba jwɛɛh la tena ge faa chɔ dɔŋa baa ne haah ŋwɛnɛdoŋ ta aa wola were ne bola, dɛɛ chɔg ba te. Baa ɛ gɛ la, Korowii gelɔ nii chole ba nɛɛ ásɛ nɛra bwa na dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii dɛ tɛr wechɔg-ɛɛ deŋne nii aa wola dime bwa ne.
65001008	Gɛ a saŋ la tena faa ɛa Korowii ha ba la, gɛɛ nɛnchɔga baa lɔ he baah nɔ che ba deera baa dɛ dee ta dɛɛ ɛ wedoŋa ba bwadabii ne, dɛ vɛh Korowii ɔma, dɛɛ ɛ nyundua toroma nɛnhɛlwa.
65001009	Nyundua toroma bwa nomoa Maekel gba ta a dɔŋa ɛɛ bwa. O ne Bɔnsam aa dɛ yo dɛɛ tɔŋle dɔŋa Mosis lale waa dɛ́ jemɛ ba bini onɔ la waa dɔɔ la, Maekel kwaraa ta liire kɛ ó bol Bɔnsam wobochɔge. O waa waa bola bwaa kɛŋɔ, "Korowiirii dɛ dii kasinteŋ."
65001010	Waa nɛra nɔ aa wola a mun jemɛ la, wobochɔgaa ba bol dɛɛ yaga. Ba ne ola bwa beŋkpoŋ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ola ta liire dɔe. Waa aa ɛ á bwara sɔɔhna la, anee aa ɛ. Gɛɛ ba ge do. An gee dɛɛ chɔg ba.
65001011	Bá bwɛɛlɛ! Ba teŋɛ Keen ŋwɛnɛchɔge la ta. Ba koh suuganyin waa dɛ kpɔ ba te jo wechɔga Balam faa ɛa la ta. Ba dɛ vuugi Korowii kɛŋɔ Kora faa dɛ ɛ la. Korowii ɛɛ chɔg baa kɛŋɔ waa chɔg Kora la ken.
65001012	He yon cheme dɛ pɛ dɛɛ di kondikwaa aa dɛ bagle beŋkpoŋri ɛɛ haa dɔa he Dɔɔ tom nɔ ta la, a gɛ nɛra la lɔ he baah kɛŋɔ doŋa dɛɛ chɔg he wer. Ba ta sihiih dɔe. Ba gbo waa baa dawɛ, baa nɛra waa dawɛ. Ba waa ta hwɛga dɔe kɛŋɔ baama peu aa dɛ kaa a ne aa wola bwaala nee ne ba la. Ba do kɛŋɔ daa aa wola won a nɔna saŋ nɔnɛ, asɛ ba chugra ta a den serewe kwaraa la.
65001013	Ba do kɛ mpo nehaŋma a nyoa aa kpega kohona ken. Gɛ a yon dɛɛ vuugi, a fufug doŋa ɛɛ le baŋ la, gɛɛ baa vuugi waa, asɛ ba sihihwa ɛɛ le baŋ. Ba do kɛ weweela aa wola chebɔr beŋkpoŋ dɔe, baa wola hwɛga kpɔe dɛɛ do a nɛɛ dɛɛ valɛ jwaana la. Biro kpirikpirii Korowii kwaa ba bá ka do bela saŋ bɛlbwa.
65001014	Adam natɛɛ ge naa Enɔk fa na ba waa dɛ bol ba waa ken: "N Dɔɔ ɛɛ ba o nyundua toromedɛɛga kagboŋa nee,
65001015	dɛ ba bol nɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole. Wɛɛ pa ba bolchɔge ba wechɔga baa ɛa dɛ vɛh Korowii waa ta teŋa la waa, dɛ pa nɛra baa wola Korowii tomɛ bolchɔge ba nɛnhɛlwobochɔga baa bola dɛɛ yagɔ la wa."
65001016	Gɛ nɛra nɔ, saŋ bɛlbwaa baa nagre wa, waa aa ba siwi su. Wedoŋa ba sie aa dɛ lɛ a ta laanee baa ɛ. Ba dɛ ta nyoa. Kwaane dɔe dɛ le nɛra be waa baa bol nɛra wedɛɛge.
65001017	N dandɛɛga, hɛ́ɛ lii waa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo toroma la faa bol he be la.
65001018	Ba ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, "Tɔpera aa ka mun la ta la, nɛra ɛɛ leo dɛɛ mamɛ heya. A gɛ nɛra nɔ aa Korowii ɔmɛ. Wedoŋa ba sie aa dɛ lɛ a taa baa ɛ."
65001019	A gɛ nɛra nɔɔ gela he ne he asɔre tena dɔŋa baah nɛɛ pegri la. Harɛ bonɔ som lɛ ba liire bwa. Korowii Domadɛɛge la toole ba nɛɛ kwaraa.
65001020	N dandɛɛga, hé te swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ cha dɔŋa dɛ won che kiŋkiŋ, ásɛ he yarada haa dɔa Yeesu Kristo ŋwɛnɛgoroŋ nɔ ta la do kan kohona. Hɛ́ɛ soŋe Korowii o Domadɛɛge la kpegri ne.
65001021	Korowii dɛ nyin heya, anomanta hɛ́ɛ pɛlo, dɛɛ kpa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo waa dɛ sune nɛra nɛɛ la, ásɛ o tɛ heyaa mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe.
65001022	Hɛ́ɛ sune nɛra baa dɛ ɛ aahna-aahna Yeesu Kristo waa nɔ ta baa wola an yarada kɛrɛdɛ la nɛ.
65001023	Hɛ́ɛ lɛ nɛra baa dɛ ba wechɔga ta joe kɛŋɔ baa dɛ to kon dɛ le nii ta la. Hɛ́ɛ sune bane ge nɛɛ dɛɛ cha ba, kɛ hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ asɛ ba wechɔga bɛ heyaa ba bu.
65001024	Korowii waa wona dɔ kpegri dɛ́ lawɛ heyaa haa wola chole, dɛ laa he doŋa bwa kpɔ he nɛ, dɛ gel he dɔ silɛɛ dɛ che o sie dɛ na o jirima la,
65001025	o gboo Korowii ne ya Lɛɛ, ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nomanta. O chɛ jirima. O dɔŋ toole. Onee dɔ komɛlbwa kpegri, dɛ ɛ komɛlbwa Dɔɔ dɛ le saŋ la bwa ba le fini, dɛ dɔ a bwa saŋ bɛlbwa! Aamen.
66001001	Waa nɔ aa lɔ tɔn nɔ bini nɔ, Korowiirii kpɔa bagle Yeesu Kristo ásɛ o kpɔ bagle o bonɔɔna ne toli bá won jemɛ wa aa dɛ ba ɛɛ taraken. Yeesu Kristo gelɔ nyundua torome bɛl ba o bonɔɔ Jɔn be dɛ ba baglo a wa.
66001002	Jɔn bagle waa waa naa bwa. Korowii waa ne Yeesu Kristo webagla ne waa waa naa dɛ no bwaa o chwerɛ.
66001003	Naate waa kure tɔn nɔ waa dɛ bagle wa aa dɛ ba chiga nɛra no la na som. Banɔ la ge baa no waa baa kure la dɛ ɛ waa waa bagla la, ba gba na som. Tɔpere waa kaa ásɛ waa nɔ bwa chig la aa kanɛ kpa.
66001004	Men Jɔnee chwerɛ waa nɔ dɛɛ tɛ asɔrere bele anuanɛ aa lɔ Eesia harɛ ta la. Korowii waa lole saŋ la dɛ ba le fini, dɛɛ ba le doe saŋ bɛlbwa la, o ne o Domare anuanɛ aa lɔ o kookara mun la,
66001005	ne Yeesu Kristo waa ɛ kasinteŋ te dɛ che tɛ Korowii, dɛ sewɛ, dɛ tɔ nɛra bwa sie ir seo ta, dɛ ɛ koranar baa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta bwa nomoa la, ó cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna. Hɛ́ɛ tɛ naate waa dɛ nyin yaa, dɛ sewɛ, dɛ kpɔ o chal lɛ yaa, a le yaa wechɔga ta la sɔn.
66001006	O gelɔ ya bwa ɛ o Kora ta nɛra, dɛ ɛ Sɔfore dɛɛ tomɛ o Mɛɛ Korowii. Anomanta hé tɛo sɔn. Onee dɔ kpegri saŋ bɛlbwa dɛɛ la. Aamen.
66001007	Hɛ́ɛ no! Wɛɛ bao. Baamare taa o che dɛɛ ba bala. Nomɛlbwa ɛɛ na o balaa. Nɛra ba faa yagɔ dɛ kpoo la, ba gba ɛɛ nao. Harɛ nɔ ta nɛra bwa ɛɛ nao, dɛ koh o bala waa dɛ ba la waa dɛ wi. Aa ba gɛɛ. Aamen.
66001008	Nemenɛ Korowii waa ɛ komɛlbwa Dɔɔ dɛ do le saŋ la dɛ ba le fini, dɛɛ ba le doe saŋ bɛlbwa la, o ŋɔ, "Menee komɛlbwa Mumpar ne a Jaga."
66001009	Menee Jɔn maa ɛ he dɔŋ, dɛ koh pɛɛ ya bwa ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la waa dɛɛ na wahala, dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii o Kora ta, dɛɛ lawɛ bambile wobɛlbwa ta la. N lɔ ekwi harɛ baa dɛ yerɔ Patmɔs la ta, bela baa koah kɛŋɔ n bol Korowii Waa dɛ ɛ Yeesu danseɛ dɛ lag mɛ ka ta la.
66001010	Awola bɛl ya Dɔɔ Tɔpere ta, Korowii Domadɛɛge ir n nɛ, n no takpeg bɛl n habɔɔ kɛŋɔ bɛla aa dɛ si ken.
66001011	O ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, "Waa nɔ haa dɛ ba nae nɔ, chwera do tɔn bini, dɛ kpɔ ka tɛ asɔrere anuanɛ aa lɔ Ɛfesos, Smɛɛna, Pɛɛgamɔm, Tiatra, Saades, Feladɛlfea ne Laodisia la."
66001012	Belaa n ke nyiŋi kɛ mɛɛ na naate waa bol waa n be laanee, asɛ dɛ na suugaswɛm daa anuanɛ baa kpɔ kandere dɛɛ chɔŋɛ a ta,
66001013	dɛ na komɛl kɛŋɔ nɛn ken, o do batakaarejaŋ o tel o napaala ta, dɛ vɔwɛ suugaswɛm kriso o bambile ta, dɛ do suugaswɛm daa baa kpɔ kandere dɛɛ chɔŋɛ a ta la baah ta.
66001014	O nyumpona too kpelkpel kɛŋɔ yabi, o sibie gee nyɛgle kɛŋɔ ninlao ken.
66001015	O nakpale ge swɛɛrɔ kɛŋɔ baa kpɔ yaawa do nii ta wɛɛ nyɛgle la. Asɛ o taa ge do kɛŋɔ chuubu aa dɛ si la.
66001016	O kpoŋe weweela anuanɛ o nɔndig ta, asɛ tokobijen sie anɛ te waa nyɛga ɛɛ le o nyoa. O sie bɔr ge dɛ nyɛgle kɛŋɔ wee aa dɛ lɔ kpegri nɛɛ la.
66001017	Maa nao la, n cholo chɔ o sie kɛŋɔ serewe ken. O kpɔ o nɔndig dawɛ n nɛ, dɛ ŋɔ, "Bɛ ɔmɛ. Menee komɛlbwa Sitɔɔ ne a Muŋkaa bwa.
66001018	Men lole saŋ bɛlbwa la. N fa sewɔ, kɛ taraken n iro, maa wola sewɛ saŋ bɛlbwa kpa, dɛ dɔ seo ne Lala Bwɛɛ safoone.
66001019	"Chwerɛ waa haa naa nɔ, ne anɔ la aa lole taraken, ne anɔ la aa dɛ ba bala anɔ nɔ habɔɔ.
66001020	Weweela anuanɛ haa naa a do n nɔndig ta la, ne suugaswɛm daa anuanɛ baa kpɔ kandere dɛɛ chɔŋɛ a ta la, n dɛ bagle a mun dɛ tɛɛ. Weweela anuanɛ la ɛ nyundua toroma baa chega tɛ asɔrere bele anuanɛ aa lɔ bwɛɛre anuanɛ la ta la. Daa anuanɛ baa kpɔ kandere dɛɛ chɔŋɛ a ta la gee asɔrere anuanɛ la."
66002001	"Chwerɛ waa nɔ dɛ kpɔ ka tɛ nyundua torome waa chega tɛ asɔre waa lɔ Ɛfesos la ŋɔ, "Kenii men maa kpoŋe weweela anuanɛ n nɔndig ta, dɛɛ valɛ suugaswɛm daa anuanɛ baa kpɔ kandere dɛɛ chɔŋɛ a ta baah la ŋɔ:
66002002	N jemɛ he toma haa ɛa, ne he koeh, ne he bambile haa lawa, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ haa nɛnchɔga waa nyin. He fa kari nɛra ba faa dɛ yerɛ ba te n toroma la, dɛ na kɛŋɔ ba ta n toroma ɛɛ, dɛ na kɛŋɔ ba ɛ nyosonteŋna.
66002003	He lawɛ bambile dɛ koh n waa dɛ na wahala kɛ dɛ ta lawɛ a bini.
66002004	"Kɛ he webeŋkpoŋ maa dɔa laanee kɛŋɔ, nyina he faa dɛ nyin mɛ logla la ta gɛ doe kpa.
66002005	Anomanta hɛ́ɛ lii gɛ he faa doa wubwa la, dɛ charɛ he liire, dɛ berɛ ka kpɔ he logla we-ɛɛla la ja. Gɛ laa aa, mɛɛ ba he bee dɛ ba laa he kandea daa la kpɔ le o bug ta.
66002006	Kɛ Nikolai tena we-ɛɛla la haa haah la te, he ɛ wa. Gɛɛ n gba hah ba we-ɛɛla.
66002007	"Nomɛlbwa waa dɔ deŋna la, ó no waa Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa dɛ bol asɔre tena be la. Naate waa won dɛ yo le la, mɛɛ geloo o di mkpa daa la waa lɔ Korowii bwɛdɛɛge la ta nɔna.
66002008	"Chwerɛ waa nɔ ka tɛ nyundua torome waa chega tɛ asɔre waa lɔ Smɛɛna la ŋɔ, "Kenii men maa ɛ komɛlbwa Sitɔɔ ne a Muŋkaa, dɛ sewɛ, dɛ ir la ŋɔ:
66002009	N jemɛ he wahala ne he nyae wa, kɛ he ɛ dɔɔhna taeh. N jemɛ wechɔga nɛra baa dɛ yerɛ ba te Juda tena kɛ dɛ ɛ Bɔnsam habɔteŋra la aa bola dawɛ he nɛ.
66002010	He bɛ wahala bɛlbwa haa ba na la ɔmɛ. Hɛ́ɛ no! Bɔnsam ɛɛ geloo ba larawe he bane do dea, dɛ daah heyaa dɛ na. Hɛɛ na wahalaa kohona tɔpera fi. Dɛ seo bini kwara, he chegɛ kiŋkiŋ naa, mɛɛ tɛ heyaa mkpaa o ɛ kompoŋ haa yoa dɛ le ba vɔwɛ heya.
66002011	"Nomɛlbwa waa dɔ deŋna la, ó no waa Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa dɛ bol asɔre tena be la. Naate waa won yo le la, seo nɛɛte la aa won ɛo wobɛlbwa.
66002012	"Chwerɛ waa nɔ ka tɛ nyundua torome waa chega tɛ asɔre waa lɔ Pɛɛgamɔm la ŋɔ, "Kenii men maa dɔ tokobijen o sie aa ɛ anɛ dɛ do nyɛgre la ŋɔ:
66002013	N jemɛ bela haa soga. Bɔnsam soŋnibɔree he do la, kɛ dɛ ta che kiŋkiŋ. Hale gɛ saŋ ba faa kpo Antipas waa ɛ kasinteŋ te dɛ che tɛ mɛ he be Bɔnsam soŋnibɔr bela la, he ta tɔeh kɛŋɔ haa men yarada.
66002014	"Kɛ n dɔ he waane tama. Bane lɔ he bini dɛɛ teŋɛ Balam webagla ta. Onee fa gela Balak negre Israel tena ba ɛ wechɔga dɛ di ola baa kpoa tɛ voga dɛ kaa bɔ jwamane la.
66002015	Nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ Nikolai tena webagla ta gba lɔ he bini.
66002016	Anomanta hé charɛ he liire dɛ le he wechɔga ta. Dɛ gɛ laa aa, mɛɛ ba he be waranee, dɛ ba kpɔ tokobii la waa lɔ n nyoa la dɛ yo he banɔ la haa dɛ teŋɛ Nikolai tena webagla la ta la.
66002017	"Nomɛlbwa waa dɔ deŋna la, ó no waa Korowii Domadɛɛge aa dɛ bol asɔre tena be la. Naate waa won yo le la, mɛɛ tɛo kondikwaa ane soosiwi baa dɛ yera maana nomɛlbwa aa wola an nae bwaa ó di, dɛ tɛo bwedɛɛge ompoŋ bɛl maa chwerɛ sɔnfale bɛl dawɛ o ta, nomɛlbwa aa wola sɔn la jemɛ dɛ ka ja naate maa kpɔ tɛo la nɛ.
66002018	"Chwerɛ waa nɔ ka tɛ nyundua torome waa chega tɛ asɔre waa lɔ Tiatra la ŋɔ, "Kenii men maa ɛ Korowii Bie, dɛ dɔ sibie a do kɛŋɔ ninlao, dɛ dɔ nakpale kɛŋɔ yaawa la ŋɔ:
66002019	N jemɛ he we-ɛɛla ne he nɛnnyin wa, ne he Korowii yaradae, ne chae haa dɛ cha dɔŋa, ne he bambile haa dɛ lawɛ wobɛlbwa ta, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ he taraken we-ɛɛla wer gwaa he logla kwaa la.
66002020	"Kɛ n dɔ he waane dɛ bol. Hanchɔge Jɛsɛbɛl la waa dɛ yerɛ o te Korowii keame la, he gelɔ o do he be dɛɛ bagle heya, dɛɛ negre n bonɔɔna ne n toli baa bɔ jwamane, dɛɛ di ola baa kpoora dɛɛ tɛ voga.
66002021	N tɛo tɔpere ŋɔ ó gel gɛ asɛ dɛ charɛ o liire le o wechɔga ta, kɛ waa no.
66002022	Hɛ́ɛ no! Mɛɛ do o ne nɛra o ne baa dɛ bɔ jwamane la weelaa ba chɔ, a noo ba kɛrɛdɛ. Dɛ ba ta gelɛ dɛ charɛ ba liire le ba wechɔga ta dɛ gel ba tonchɔga la aa, ba bwa ɛɛ na wahalaa.
66002023	Mɛɛ kpoo o habɔteŋraa ásɛ asɔre tena bwa jemɛ kɛŋɔ menee jemɛ nɛwɛnyini nyu bini ne ba weliira bwa. Mɛɛ bɔ he bɛlbwa kemee gɛ o we-ɛɛla aa doa.
66002024	"Kɛ he Tiatra tena haa kaa, haa wola wechɔga waa bagla la ta teŋɛ, haa wola Bɔnsam we-ɛɛla baa dɛ yera wesɔɔhla la jemɛ la, maa wekpega ane bɛlbwaa kpɔ dawɛ he nɛ.
66002025	Kɛ waa la haa lawɛ a bini kɛrɛdɛ la, hé den lawɛ a bini gɛ ń ba.
66002026	"Naate waa won yo le, dɛ won ɛ n toma gwɛeeh dɛ ka tel a tona bini la, mɛɛ tɛo kpegrii ó di harɛ nɔ ta nɛra nɛ.
66002027	'Wɛɛ kpɔ kpegrii dɛɛ nyiŋi harɛ nɔ ta nɛra bwa nɛɛ a ŋwɛnɛ ta, dɛ lɔɔ ba, dɛ chɔg ba kɛŋɔ baa pagre vii la.' N Mɛɛ tɛ mɛ gɛ kpegri nɔ. N gee kpɔɔ tɛ naate la gɛ tenten,
66002028	dɛ tɛo chɔɔlenwewee la.
66002029	Nomɛlbwa waa dɔ deŋna la, ó no waa Korowii Domadɛɛge aa dɛ bol asɔre tena be la.
66003001	"Chwerɛ waa nɔ ka tɛ nyundua torome waa chega tɛ asɔre waa lɔ Saades la ŋɔ, "Men maa dɔ Korowii Domare anuanɛ ne weweela anuanɛ la ŋɔ: N jemɛ he we-ɛɛla. Nɛra jemɔ kɛŋɔ he soge le bokpega ta, kɛ he sewɔ. He kpegri haa dɔa dɛɛ teŋɛ n nɛɛ la nyoa dɛ sɔɔh.
66003002	Anomanta hé ir nyu ne dɛ kwaa a gɛ waa a nyoa aa dɛ sɔɔh la, á won che kɛrɛdɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ n ta he we-ɛɛla bɛlbwa nae a do wer dɛ togre n Mɛɛ Korowii be.
66003003	Hɛ́ɛ lii gɛ ba faa bagle heyaa ne waa haa noa la, dɛ lawɛ a bini, dɛ charɛ he liire le he wechɔga ta. Dɛ he ta nyu ne iraa, mɛɛ pigri heyaa kɛŋɔ ŋwɛɛ ken, haa wola jemɛ gɛ saŋ maa ba he be.
66003004	"He ta dɔ nɛra tama baa wola gelɛ wechɔga doŋa do ba nɛ. Mɛɛ tɛɛ ba yapoŋaa bá tɔ, n ne ba valɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba chɛ gɛ.
66003005	"Naate waa won yo le la, mɛɛ tɔɔ yapoŋee kɛ ban. Maa o sɔnee fee le Mkpa Tɔn la bini bwa. Mɛɛ bol o waa n Mɛɛ ne o nyundua toroma la bee, kɛŋɔ n nɛnee on.
66003006	Nomɛlbwa waa dɔ deŋna la, ó no waa Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa dɛ bol asɔre tena be la.
66003007	"Chwerɛ waa nɔ ka tɛ nyundua torome waa chega tɛ asɔre waa lɔ Feladɛlfea la ŋɔ, "Kenii men maa do kaih, dɛ ɛ kasinteŋ te, dɛ dɔ Devid safoa, dɛ o pili komɛl nomɛlbwa aa wola won tɔɔ, dɛ o tɔ komɛl ge aa, nomɛlbwa aa wola won pilu la ŋɔ:
66003008	N jemɛ he we-ɛɛla. Hɛ́ɛ no! N pili ŋwɛnɛ tɛ heya, nomɛlbwa aa won tɔɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he kpegri aa kanɛ. Kɛ he wono dɛɛ teŋɛ n webagla ta. He ta tɔeh kɛ n ne he laa. He ta n nɛɛ teŋa gelɛ.
66003009	Hɛ́ɛ no! Bɔnsam habɔteŋra baa dɛ teŋe nyosone, baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ dɛɛ yerɛ ba te Juda tena la, mɛɛ geloo ba ba guŋi he sie dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ n dɛ nyin heya.
66003010	Haa noa tɛ mɛ, dɛ lawɛ bambile dɛ na wahala nomanta, mɛɛ lɛ heyaa le wahala aa dɛ ba harɛ nɔ ta nɛra bwa nɛɛ dɛ ba daah ba la ta.
66003011	"N dɛ ba taraken. Hé lawɛ waa haa jema la bini kiŋkiŋ asɛ dɛ bɛ gel nomɛlbwa won negre heyaa he paŋɛ kompoŋ baa dɛ ba heyaa vɔwa he yoi dɛ le ta la.
66003012	Naate waa won yo le la, mɛɛ geloo o ɛ kɛŋɔ pila n Mɛɛ Korowii Dea bini, waa wola belaa le kpa bwa. Mɛɛ chwerɛ n Mɛɛ Korowii sɔn ne o bwɛɛ sɔnee dawɛ o nɛ. Jerusalam onfale waa dɛ ba n Mɛɛ Korowii be nyundua lee dɛ ba he be la sɔnee mɛɛ ba chwera dɛ dawɛ o nɛ, dɛ berɛ chwerɛ n sɔnfale dawɛ o nɛ.
66003013	Nomɛlbwa waa dɔ deŋna la, ó no waa Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa dɛ bol asɔre tena be la.
66003014	"Chwerɛ waa nɔ ka tɛ nyundua torome waa chega tɛ asɔre waa lɔ Laodisia la ŋɔ, "Kenii men maa ɛ Aamen, dɛ che tɛ Korowii, n waa dɔ kasinteŋ, Korowii che n nɛɛ ta komɛlbwa la ŋɔ:
66003015	N jemɛ he we-ɛɛla. Haa wɔbɛ, haa sɔnɛ ge. Dɛ wɔrɔbe kɛɛ sɔnee he den do aa, a fe bɔ.
66003016	Kɛ haa do ywɛlɛywɛlɛ haa wola wɔbɛ, haa wola sɔnɛ la, mɛɛ poo heyaa ta.
66003017	He ŋɔ he dɔ kwa, dɛ ɛ dɔɔhna, komɛlbwa ta heyaa nyae. Kɛ haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ he waa dɔ sinyana, dɛ do sum. He ɛ nyaara, dɛ nyoŋe ja, he ta komɛlbwa dɔe dɛ do.
66003018	Hé gel n ŋɔ he be. A wer kɛ he nyin suugaswɛm maa kpɔ nii dɛ laa o doŋa bwa kpɔ ta la dɛ yawɛ le n be, dɛ́ dɔ kwa, dɛ yawɛ yapoŋa n be dɛ́ tɔ, asɛ dɛ laa sihiih kpɔ he nɛɛ he muŋgbal chega ta, dɛ ba yawɛ tɛɛga n be dɛ́ ka do he sibie ta dɛ́ won dɛɛ na.
66003019	"Nɛra maa dɛ nyin ba la, n dɛ ja ba dɛɛ tɛr ba deŋne. Anomanta hé swɛɛ siwi dɛ charɛ he liire le he wechɔga ta.
66003020	Hɛ́ɛ no! N chegɛ doonyoa dɛɛ lɔ gbera. Naate waa no n taa dɛ ba yaa mɛ la, mɛɛ jo o bee n ne o pɛ nɔn di kwa.
66003021	"Naate waa won yo le la, mɛɛ geloo n ne o ka so n kookara ta, gɛ n faa yoa le dɛ ka so n Mɛɛ be o kookara ta la.
66003022	Nomɛlbwa waa dɔ deŋne la, ó no waa Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa dɛ bol asɔre tena be la."
66004001	Anɔ bwa habɔɔ la, n nao kɛŋɔ doonyoa bɛl pilo ta Korowii bwɛɛ la ta, dɛ no taa bɛl n faa noo kɛŋɔ bɛla la. Taa la ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, "Teeh ba bonɔ ń bagle waa aa dɛ ba ɛɛ anɔ nɔ habɔɔ."
66004002	Bug la ta Korowii Domadɛɛge la den ir n nɛ, asɛ n na kɛŋɔ kookara bɛl chegɛ nyundua, nomɛl so o ta.
66004003	Naate waa soge o ta la dɛ nyɛgle al-al kɛŋɔ bwedɛɛga answɛɛma aa dɛ nyɛgle. Dɛ bwaala deŋgare bɛl bar o kookara la, dɛ do kɛŋɔ bwe-lwɛɛne ane aa dɛ nyɛgle.
