66004004	N na kookane fifraanɛ dɛ anaarɛ a bar o kookara la cheme. Nomonome fifraanɛ dɛ banaarɛ do laalapoŋa dɛ pi suugaswɛm koogbɛrɛre dɛ so a ta.
66004005	Dɛ kookara la waa lɔ baah ta la bɔr dɛ gbɔgre kɛŋɔ bwaala aa dɛ nyɛgle dɛɛ jigri dɛɛ kɔgre la. Kandere anuanɛ ge chegɛ kookara la sie dɛɛ hɔ. Korowii Domare anuanɛ laanee.
66004006	Kookara la sie la ɛo kɛ nejen aa chɔa dɛ do gereŋ la. Hweera kwaa anaarɛ ane chegɔ bar kookara la, bɛlbwa chegɛ o bampera beŋkpoŋ ta. A dɔ sibie a siini bobɛlbwa ne a habɔɔne bobɛlbwa.
66004007	Hweera kwaa nɔ bɛl do kɛŋɔ nyujente, bɛl do kɛŋɔ nabal, bɛl sie bɔr do kɛŋɔ nɛn, bɛl ge do kɛŋɔ kee raa pagri o kena dɛɛ ir la ken.
66004008	Bɛlbwa dɔ kena anumɛl, dɛ dɔ sibie a bwara bobɛlbwa ne a kena lɔgre gba. A lɔ o be chɔɔ ne jwaana dɛɛ kpɛɛro aa wola gel bwa, dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Nemenɛ Korowii haa ɛ komɛlbwa Dɔɔ dɛ do le saŋ la dɛ ba le fini, dɛɛ ba le doe saŋ bɛlbwa la, he do kaih noo, he do kaih kɛrɛdɛ."
66004009	Saŋ bɛlbwa hweera kwaa anaarɛ la aa kpɔ jam dɛɛ tɛ naate waa soge kookara la ta dɛ do le saŋ bɛlbwa la, dɛɛ duuru, dɛɛ tɛo jirima la,
66004010	dɛ nomonome fifraanɛ dɛ banaarɛ la laa ba koogbɛrɛre pili bil kookara la sie dɛ guŋi naate waa soge kookara la ta dɛ do le saŋ bɛlbwa la, dɛɛ duuru ŋɔ,
66004011	"N Naa Korowii haa dɔ komɛlbwa la, he chɛ kɛŋɔ nɛra bwa tɛɛ jirima dɛ duuri, dɛ sɛh kɛŋɔ hen dɔ kpegri bwa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ henee ta komɛlbwa, he tetoora taa a che a do le."
66005001	Asɛ n nyiŋi dɛ na kɛŋɔ naate waa soge kookara la ta la kpoŋe tɔn bɛl o nɔndig ta. Tɔn la sie ne habɔɔ bwa taa ba chwerɛ, dɛ gugru, dɛ marɔ kera anuanɛ.
66005002	N na nyundua torome bokpega te bɛl wɛɛ bol waa takpeg ne ŋɔ, "Umee ń dɔ o chɛ kwaa baa kpɔa marɛ tɔn la kera anuanɛ la swee dɛ pilu wɔ?"
66005003	Dɛ nomɛlbwa toole nyundua ne harɛ nɔ ta, ne nɛra baa serewa kwaraa bini dɛ won pili tɔn la, a ba ɛ kɛŋɔ wɛɛ nyiŋi o binii.
66005004	Anomanta n wio kohona, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba ta nomɛlbwa nae ó chɛ kɛŋɔ o pili tɔn la dɛ nyiŋi o bini.
66005005	Asɛ nomonome la bɛl ŋɔ n be ŋɔ "Gel wii. Na! Naate waa le Juda dea baa yerɔ ba Nyujente, dɛ berɛ dɛɛ yerɔ Devid Naa la, o wono yo le. Anomanta wɛɛ wonoo swe kwaa baa kpɔa marɛ tɔn la nyoa kera anuanɛ la dɛ pilu."
66005006	Belaa n nyiŋi dɛ na pebie bɛl waa chegɛ baah ta, kookara la bɔr, hweera kwaa la ne nomonome la baro. O le pee baa kpoo. O le nyeglare anuanɛ dɛ dɔ sibie ge anuanɛ. Sibie la chegɔ tɛ Korowii Domare anuanɛ la waa toma a la harɛ nɔ bwa ta la.
66005007	Pebie la kaa laa tɔn la lɛ naate waa soge kookara la ta la nɔndig ta.
66005008	Waa lɛ tɔn la la, hweera kwaa anaarɛ la ne nomonome fifraanɛ dɛ banaarɛ la guŋi Pebie la sie dɛɛ duuru. Bɛlbwa ne o janjela ne o suugaswɛm log, asɛ konsɔɔhsoma baa dɛ fuah a sɔɔh do som la do ba loga la bini. Konsɔɔhsoma la chegɔ tɛ Korowii nɛra wesoŋa.
66005009	Ba go yelfale bɛl ŋɔ, "He chɛ tɔn la kpɔe dɛ swe o nyoa kwaa la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba fa kpoe, asɛ he kpɔ he chal yawɛ nɛra tɛ Korowii dɛ le wobol te bɛlbwa nɛra baa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwa,
66005010	dɛ gel ba ɛ N Naa Korowii Kora nɛra ne o Sɔfore dɛɛ tomɔ, dɛ ɛrɛ ba di kora harɛ nɔ bwa ta."
66005011	N nyiŋi dɛ no kɛ bobɛlbwa dɛ gbɔgre, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ nyundua toroma warɔ taeh dɛ ba bar kookara la ne hweera kwaa ne nomonome la bwa dɛ cheme. Ba lɔ kagboŋa kagboŋa maa wola ba nyoa jemɛ,
66005012	dɛ bwa pɛ bol takpeg ne ŋɔ, "Pebie la ba faa kpoo la, onee dɔ kpegri ne kondɔɔh ne wejema ne bokpega, onee chɛ duure ne jirima ne kpɛɛra."
66005013	Asɛ n berɛ no komɛlbwa Korowii aa taa a do nyundua, ne komɛlbwa waa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta ne mpo bini bwa, ne nɛra baa serewa kwaara bwa aa dɛ ŋɔ, "Naate waa soge kookara la ta la ne Pebie la chɛ kpɛɛra ne duure ne jirima, dɛ dɔ kpegri bwa dɛɛ la saŋ bɛlbwa."
66005014	Hweera kwaa anaarɛ la sio ŋɔ, "Aamen," asɛ nomonome la ge guŋi harɛ dɛ duuru.
66006001	Maa dɛ nyiŋi la, n na Pebie la aa swe kwaa baa kpɔa marɛ tɔn la kera anuanɛ la bini sitɔ kon la. Asɛ n no hweera kwaa anaarɛ la bɛl taa kɛŋɔ bwaala aa dɛ kɔgre la. O ŋɔ, "Ba!"
66006002	N nao kɛŋɔ jaagɔpoŋ bɛl aa lea, nɛn so o ta dɛ kpoŋe to. Ba kpɔ koogbɛrɛ tɛo, asɛ o dɔ kpegri dɛ le kaa dɛ́ ka yo laa dɛ pɔ o dɔma nɛ.
66006003	Asɛ Pebie la swe kwaa baa kpɔa marɛ tɔn la nɛɛte la. Waa sweo la, n noɔ kɛ hweera kon la waa jaa nɛɛ la aa ŋɔa, "Ba!"
66006004	Belaa jaagɔ bɛl ge le, o bwa swɛɛrɔ peihpeihpeih ken. Dɛ ba tɛ naate waa soge o ta la kpegri ŋɔ ó chɔg beŋkpoŋri ɛɛ harɛ bwa ta, ásɛ nɛra kpoo dɔŋa. Tokobijen bɛlee ba tɛo o kpɔ kaa.
66006005	Pebie la swe kwaa baa kpɔa marɛ tɔn la tooro te la, asɛ n no kɛ hweera kwaa tooro te aa ŋɔa, "Ba!" N nyiŋo, dɛ jaagɔbiŋi bɛl ge leɔ. Nɛn waa soge o ta la kpoŋe kon baa kpɔa dɛɛ kari kwaa tɔgre la bɛl.
66006006	N no taa bɛl hweera kwaa anaarɛ la baah ta kɛŋɔ, "Tɔpebir kembɔree bá kpɔ yawɛ mea lakaja del anɛ la, asɛ anɔ la a yog aa wola kpege ge, tɔpebir kembɔree dɛɛ yawɛ lakaja dela anumɛl. Kɛ noo ne sen te, gel a chɔga."
66006007	Belaa Pebie la swe kwaa baa kpɔa marɛ tɔn la naarɛ te la. Waa sweo la, n noɔ kɛŋɔ hweera kwaa naarɛ te aa ŋɔa, "Ba!"
66006008	Asɛ n nyiŋi dɛ jaagɔkɔl bɛl leɔ, asɛ nɛn so o ta baa yerɔ Seo. Bɛl ge le teŋɛ o nɛ, o ge sɔne Lala Bwɛɛ. Ba tɛɛ ba kpegri bá kpɔ laa ne lɔr ne weela ne kpɔg bini ola kpoo harɛ nɔ ta nɛra. He bɔne harɛ nɔ ta nɛra bwa bini bɔre anaarɛ naa, banɔ la baa tɛɛ ba kpegri ba kpo la ɛɛ tel bɔre anaarɛ la bini beŋkpoŋ nɛraa.
66006009	Asɛ Pebie la swe kwaa baa kpɔa marɛ tɔn la nue te la. Waa sweo la, n nyiŋi Korowii Dea bela baa dɛ ɛ saraha dɛɛ tɛ Korowii la harɛ bɔr, dɛ na lala baa koh Korowii Waa la waa ne chega baa chega tɛo waa dɛ kpoo ba la.
66006010	Ba kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Nemenɛ Korowii haa do kaih dɛ dɔ kasinteŋ, saŋ besoo hɛɛ ba nɛra baa lɔ harɛ ta nɔ waa bola dɛ pa bole dɛ bɔ ba ya kpoora nɔ kem ɔ?"
66006011	Dɛ ba tɛ bɛlbwa yapoŋ ó tɔ, dɛ ŋɔ báa onɛ tama ka tel kɛŋɔ ba bala Korowii bonɔɔna ne toli baa dɛ ba ba ge kpoora kɛŋɔ ban la nyoa aa chiga.
66006012	N berɔ na Pebie la swe kwaa baa kpɔa marɛ tɔn la numɛl te la. Waa sweo la, harɛ jigro kohona, asɛ wee bir kɛŋɔ birisie ken, asɛ korobie swɛɛ kɛŋɔ chal.
66006013	Weweela chugro lee harɛ kɛŋɔ peujen yon ta, daa nɔnhuuhne yon lee harɛ la.
66006014	Asɛ Korowii doa nyogre n siwi ta kɛŋɔ baa gugri kalaŋ la. Bwejaŋa ne ekwie ge chugri le a buge ta kaa.
66006015	Harɛ koranar ne nɛnjena, soojare nomonome, dɔɔhna, bokpega tena, ne nɛn te bɛlbwa, banɔ la baa ɛ yoma, ne banɔ la baa wola yoma ɛɛ bwa chwa ka sɔh bwe bɔɔne ne bwetala aa lɔ bwejena ta logre,
66006016	dɛɛ ŋɔ bwejena la ne bwetala la be ŋɔ, "Hé chogli tɔ ya nɛ, asɛ naate waa soge kookara la ta la bɛ yaa na, asɛ he le yaa Pebie la bandia ta,
66006017	dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba tɔpejen la telo, nɛra ɛɛ ba ba danana nee nyɔe. Anomanta umee dɛ won le a nyoa ɔ?"
66007001	Anɔ habɔɔ la, n na nyundua toroma banaarɛ baa chegɛ harɛ nyoo peu lee bɔra anaarɛ dɛ lawɛ peu, asɛ a bɛ harɛ ne mpo ne daa bɛlbwa ta ta.
66007002	Asɛ n berɛ na nyundua torome bɛl o le wee leebɔr dɛɛ ba, dɛ kpoŋe kon Korowii gbagba aa kpɔa dɛɛ do o kwaa nso la. O kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ nyundua toroma banaarɛ la baa tɛɛ ba kpegri kɛŋɔ bá chɔg harɛ ne mpo la be ŋɔ,
66007003	"Hé gel harɛ ne mpo ne daa la chɔga ka tel kɛŋɔ yaa do Korowii nso o bonɔɔna ne toli tili ta tonɛ mɔɔ."
66007004	Ba bagle nɛra baa do ba nso la nyoa n be. Ba lɔ kagboŋa lafa fifraanaarɛ dɛ banaarɛ. Israel deene fi dɛ anɛ la taa ba le.
66007005	Banɔ la baa do ba nso Juda dea la lɔ kagboŋa fi dɛ banɛ. Asɛ banɔ la waa doa le Rubin dea la ge lɔ nɛra kagboŋa fi dɛ banɛ. O do Gad dea nɛra ge kagboŋa fi dɛ banɛ nso,
66007006	dɛ do Aasa dea nɛra kagboŋa fi dɛ banɛ. Gɛɛ o do Naftale dea ge nɛra kagboŋa fi dɛ banɛ, dɛ berɛ do Manasɛ dea nɛra kagboŋa fi dɛ banɛ.
66007007	O do Semeɔn dea nɛra kagboŋa fi dɛ banɛ, dɛ do Lewi dea nɛra kagboŋa fi dɛ banɛ, dɛ do Isaaka dea nɛra kagboŋa fi dɛ banɛ.
66007008	O do Sebulɔn dea nɛra kagboŋa fi dɛ banɛ, dɛ do Josef dea nɛra kagboŋa fi dɛ banɛ, asɛ Benjamen dea ge, o do nɛra kagboŋa fi dɛ banɛ nso.
66007009	Anɔ la habɔɔ la, n nyiŋo dɛ na nɛnlaa nomɛlbwa aa wola won kur ba bela. Ba le wobol te bɛlbwa nɛra baa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwa ta. Ba bwa do yapoŋa, dɛ kpoŋe bambie daa a papooni do a ta, dɛ che kookara la ne Pebie la sie,
66007010	dɛ kpɔ takpeg dɛɛ ŋɔ, "N Naa Korowii waa soge kookara ta la ne Pebie laanee lɛ yaa oo."
66007011	Asɛ nyundua toroma la che dɛ bar nomonome la ne hweera kwaa anaarɛ la ne kookara la, dɛ guŋi dɛ kpɔ sie pi harɛ dɛ jam Korowii,
66007012	dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Aamen! Korowii chɛ kpɛɛra ne jirima ne jam ne duure. Onee dɔ wejema ne kpegri ne bokpega saŋ bɛlbwa. Aamen!"
66007013	Asɛ nomonome la bɛl pɛɛ mɛ ŋɔ, "Nɛra nɔ baa do yapoŋa nɔ, umewaa yɔ? Leperaa ba leɔ?"
66007014	Anee n ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, maa jemɛ. He ken jem ba." Asɛ o ŋɔ, "Banee ba faa lɔ wahala tenten la bini dɛ won le a nyoa la. Ba chɛgɛ ba yale Pebie la chal la ta, a le dɛ to.
66007015	Anomanta ba lɔ Korowii kookara la sie dɛɛ tomɔ chɔɔ ne jwaana kɛŋɔ o dea Sɔfore, asɛ o gbagba waa soge kookara la ta la ɛɛ tɔ ba nɛ.
66007016	Lɔr ne nyɔgre aa ban kpo kpa bwa. Wee aa ba nɛɛ lɔ cheihcheih, bɔr ge aa ba nɛɛ wɔrɔbe bambam,
66007017	dɛkalkɛŋɔ Pebie la waa lɔ kookara la baah ta la dɛ ba ba Petegre ɛɛ, dɛɛ nyiŋi ba nɛ. Wɛɛ teg baa kaa nee aa dɛ tɛ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe ta, asɛ Korowii fee ba sinii bwa ta."
66008001	Pebie la aa swe kwaa baa kpɔa marɛ tɔn la nuanɛ te la, Korowii doa bwa ɛo ken surumm dɛ bigri tama.
66008002	Asɛ n na baa kpɔ bɛle anuanɛ tɛ nyundua toroma banuanɛ ba yon dɛɛ che Korowii sie la.
66008003	Nyundua torome bɛl balɔ dɛ kpoŋe suugaswɛm kon baa kpɔa dɛɛ fuh daawiile a sɔɔh aa soma la, dɛ ka che bela baa fuah dɛɛ tɛ Korowii la. Ba kpɔ daawiile a sɔɔh aa soma la kohona tɛo ó kpɔ ja Korowii nɛra wesoŋa la ta dɛ fuah daawiile fuih bɔr baa kpɔ suugaswɛm ɛo o che kookara la sie la.
66008004	Daawiile la chuu le nyundua torome la nɔn ta dɛ ka koo Korowii nɛra wesoŋa ta dɛ kaa nyundua Korowii be.
66008005	Asɛ nyundua torome la kpɔ kon la baa kpɔa dɛɛ fuh daawiile a sɔɔh aa soma la, dɛ buh daawiile fuih bɔr nii la ane dɛ kpɔ ta harɛ. Asɛ bwaala jigri dɛɛ kɔgre, dɛɛ nyɛgle bobɛlbwa pelɔpelɔ ken, asɛ harɛ gee jigri.
66008006	Nyundua toroma banuanɛ la baa kpoŋe bɛle anuanɛ la kpɔ ba te dɛɛ ba a hoeh.
66008007	Nyundua torome waa tɔ sie la hoɔh. Waa hoah la, tombwea ne nii koo chal ta dɛ le nyundua kɛŋɔ baa kpɔa ta harɛ. Ba bɔne harɛ bini bɔre atoro naa, anɔ la aa fuah la ɛɛ tel bɔr beŋkpoŋii, a ka bɔre anɛ. Ba bɔne daa ne kpɔga bini bɔre atoro naa, anɔ la aa fuah la ɛɛ tel bɔr beŋkpoŋii, a ka anɛ.
66008008	Asɛ nyundua torome waa teŋa nɛɛ la hoh o bɛla. Waa hoah la, komɛl do kɛŋɔ bwekpegi damanta baa vigru ken, o le nyundua dɛɛ fuh, dɛ ba le mpo ta, asɛ o nee berɛ chal. Ba bɔne mpo bini bɔre atoro naa, anɔ la aa berɛ chal la ɛɛ tel bɔr beŋkpoŋii,
66008009	asɛ o bini kwaa serewe, stiimaere aa lɔ o ta la chɔg.
66008010	Nyundua torome waa teŋa tooro la ge hoɔh. Waa hoah la, asɛ weweejen le nyundua dɛ ba le harɛ, o bwa ɛɛ hɔ kɛŋɔ kapɛla ken. Waa baa le la, o le moo ne nenabɔɔne ta. Dɛ he bɔne moo ne nenabɔɔne bwa bini bɔre atoro naa, anɔ la waa le a ta la ɛɛ tel bɔr beŋkpoŋii.
66008011	Wewee la sɔne Koŋkpel. Nee waa le a ta la berɔ do kpeli, asɛ nɛra nyɔa dɛ serewe pirim, dɛkalkɛ nee la kpeli.
66008012	Nyundua torome waa teŋa naarɛ la ge hoɔh. Waa hoah la, wee ne korobie ne weweela bwa ɛo kɛŋɔ baa lɔa, a pera biri. Dɛ ba bɔne a bɛlbwa kpegri bini bɔre atoro naa, a bɛlbwa bɔr beŋkpoŋ aa won chaah kpa. Webaŋa ne jwaana gba, gɛɛ a do. Ba bɔne a bini atotoro naa, wee aa lɔ bɔr beŋkpoŋ ta webaŋa. Korobie ne weweela ge gɛɛ jwaana.
66008013	N berɛ nyiŋi dɛ na kee bɛl waa dɛ gah nyundua dɛ kpɔ takpeg dɛɛ si, "Waa dɛ ba! Waa dɛ ba! Waa ɛɛ pu nɛra baa lɔ harɛ taa. Dɛ nyundua toroma batoro la baa kaa dɛ́ hoh ba bɛle la hoɔh waa, waa ɛɛ pu harɛ ta tenaa."
66009001	Nyundua torome waa teŋa nue la hoh o bɛla, asɛ n na wewee bɛl le harɛ. Korowii tɛo Bɔnsam bɔluŋ la safoa.
66009002	Asɛ o laa bɔluŋ la pili. Waa pilu la, chuu leɔ pulll kɛŋɔ nijena chuu aa dɛ le la, asɛ wee bir, bɔr bwa ɛ jwumaa ken.
66009003	Asɛ tontombɛre le chuu la bini dɛ ba harɛ ta. Korowii tɛa kpegri a doma ɛɛ we kɛŋɔ nɔm ken,
66009004	dɛ ŋɔ a be ŋɔ a bɛ harɛ nɔ ta kpɔga kɛɛ papooni kɛɛ daa bɛlbwa chɔg, kɛ á dorome nɛra baa wola Korowii nso la dɔe ba tili ta la.
66009005	O ta an kpegri tɛɛ a dom ba dɛ kpoo ba, kɛ á dom ba dɛ wee ba gɛ nɔm aa dɛ we la, dɛ ka tel korobie anue.
66009006	Asɛ gɛ saŋ baa nyin kɛ seo ba kpoo ba, baa dɔ, asɛ seo chwa le ba be.
66009007	Tontombɛre la le jagre baa kpɔa dɛɛ la ka yo laa. A dɔ kwaane a nyuune ta aa le suugaswɛm koogbɛrɛre, asɛ a sie bɔr le nɛn.
66009008	A dɔ nyumpona kɛŋɔ haah, a nyena le nyujente nyena ken.
66009009	Kwaa tɔ a bambili kɛŋɔ laa batakaare bune aa dɛ bɔle bambile la, asɛ a kena ɛɛ gbɔgre kɛŋɔ jagre aa wara dɛ tɛgre kwaa nɛra yon vɔwɛ pɛl a ta dɛ so a bini la dɛ chwa dɛɛ kaa laa la.
66009010	A dɔ dini kɛŋɔ nɔm ken dɛɛ domɛ. A dini taa a dɔ kpegri dɛ́ domɛ nɛn dɛ weo korobie anue la.
66009011	A dɔ a kooro. O ɛ Bɔnsam torome waa dɛ nyiŋi Bɔnsam Bɔluŋ la ta. Hibru tena dɛ yerɔ Abadɔn, Grik tena gee yerɔ Apooleɔn. O sɔn la munii "Nɛn waa dɛ chɔg kwa."
66009012	Wekpega aa tɔ sie la tonɔ, dɛ ta ka a bele anɛ habɔɔ a ta ɛɛ ba bala.
66009013	Nyundua torome waa jaa numɛl la hoh o bɛla, asɛ n no taa bɛl le daawiile fuih bɔr baa kpɔ suugaswɛm ɛo o che Korowii sie dɛ dɔ loŋkoni anaarɛ la ta. Loŋkoni anaarɛ la bwa taa taa la le.
66009014	O ŋɔ nyundua torome waa jaa numɛl dɛ dɔ bɛla la be ŋɔ, "Pur Bɔnsam toroma banaarɛ la baa vɔg ba mojen Yufretis nyoa la ta."
66009015	Asɛ ba pur Bɔnsam toroma banaarɛ la Korowii faa vɔg ba dɛɛ kpa awola tɔpere la la. O do dɔŋhwere la ne tɔpere la ne korobie la ne bena la baa kpɔ pur ba bá kpoo nɛra. Ba bɔne harɛ ta nɛra bini bɔre atoro naa, banɔ la baa dɛ ba kpoora la ɛɛ tel bɔr beŋkpoŋ nɛraa.
66009016	Ba baglɔ kɛŋɔ Bɔnsam toroma la dɔ soojare kagboŋa bele kagboŋ ge bele lafraanɛ dɛ so jagre ta.
66009017	N na jagre la kɛ deera ken, a dɔɔranar so a ta, dɛ do laa batakaare bune aa dɛ bɔle bambile la, asɛ a swɛɛ kɛŋɔ chal, ane do kɛŋɔ burum asɛ ane ge swɛɛ kɛŋɔ solmen. Asɛ jagre la nyuune do kɛŋɔ nyujentena nyuune. Asɛ nii ne chuu ne jebɔrɔwe ninlao ɛɛ le a nyoo.
66009018	Ba bɔne harɛ bini nɛra bwa bini bɔre atoro naa, banɔ la nii ne chuu ne jebɔrɔwe ninlao aa dɛ le jagre la nyoo la aa kpoora la ɛɛ tel bɔr beŋkpoŋii.
66009019	Jagre la kpegri lɔ a nyoo ne a dini bwa ta. A dini la do kɛŋɔ harɛkwa, dɛ dɔ nyuune dɛɛ choge.
66009020	A gɛ waa nɔ kwaraa ta la, nɛra baa kaa baa wola sewɛ a gɛ waa la ta la ta ba liire charɛ dɛ le ba tonchɔga ta, dɛ taa tomɛ Bɔnsam toroma ne voga. Suugaswɛm ne suugapoŋa ne bwea ne daa baa kpɔa ɛ voga la aa na, aa waa no, aa won ir valɛ ge, kɛ ba dɛ toma.
66009021	Ba ta ba liire charɛ ba nɛŋkpoa ne sɔm we-ɛɛla ne jwamane ne ŋwɛɛ ta.
66010001	Anɔ bwa habɔɔ la, n berɔ na nyundua torome bokpega te bɛl, o le nyundua dɛɛ tu. O kpɔ baama tɔ kɛŋɔ yal ken. Bwaala deŋgare bar o nyu, o sie bɔr ɛɛ chaah kɛŋɔ wee, asɛ o nakpale ge do kɛŋɔ nii.
66010002	O dɔ tɔnjega bɛl waa pila do o nɔn ta, dɛ kpɔ o nadig do mpo ta, o nagal ge che baŋ,
66010003	dɛ si kpegri nɛɛ kɛŋɔ nyujente yon dɛɛ si la. Waa sia la, bwaala kɔra anuanɛ la ge sɛoh.
66010004	Bwaala kɔra la aa dɛ bol waa la la, n fe dɛ nyin n chwerɛ, dɛ berɛ no taa bɛl nyundua o ŋɔ, "Gel waa bwaala kɔra anuanɛ la aa bola la do he gbo nyu bini. Gel a chwera!"
66010005	Asɛ n berɛ na nyundua torome la n faa nao o naa bɛl do mpo ta bɛl ge che baŋ la aa tɛr o nɔndig pa nyundua,
66010006	dɛ ŋwɛɛ Korowii waa lole saŋ bɛlbwa dɛ ta nyundua ne harɛ ne kwa aa lɔ a ta bwa, dɛ ta mpo ne kwa aa lɔ o ge ta la, dɛ ŋɔ, "Aa bigri kpa.
66010007	Nyundua torome nuanɛ te la bɛla la hoeh saŋee Korowii wesɔɔhla waa bagle o bonɔɔna baa ɛ o keamere la bwa ɛɛ ba ɛɛ tonɛ."
66010008	N berɛ no taa la waa le nyundua dɛ bol waa n be la. O ŋɔ, "La ka lɛ tɔn la waa pila dɛ do nyundua torome la o naa bɛl aa lɔ mpo ta, bɛl che baŋ la nɔn ta."
66010009	N la o be dɛ ŋɔ ó kpɔ tɔnjega la tɛ mɛ. O ŋɔ, "Lɛ dɛ chwe. Wɛɛ do somee kɛŋɔ tooh ken he nyoa bini, dɛ berɛ do kpeli he tea bini o ɛɛ haŋŋ ken."
66010010	Asɛ n lɛ tɔnjega la le o nɔn ta, dɛ kpɔ chwe, o do som n nyoa bini kɛŋɔ tooh ken. Maa lilo la, o berɔ do kpeli n tea bini o ɛɛ mɛ haŋŋ ken.
66010011	Anee ba ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, "A chɛ kɛŋɔ he bagle waa aa dɛ ba nɛndamanta baa lɔ harɛre bwa ta ne wobol bwa soosiwi ne koranar ɛɛ kerekere la ja."
66011001	Ba kpɔ daa bɛl baa kpɔa dɛɛ magɛ kwaa o do kɛŋɔ daŋgbala tɛ mɛ, dɛ ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, "Korowii ŋɔ hé ir kpɔ daa nɔ ka magɛ Korowii Dea ne bela baa dɛ fuh kwaa dɛɛ tɛo la, dɛ kure nɛra baa dɛ tomɔ o bini la.
66011002	Bɛ bela waa ja Dea la ta ba tel bela mɔɔ dɛɛ jo Dea la tenten bini la te magɛ. Teŋe bela ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii kpɔ bela tɛ nɛra baa wola on tomɛ, ásɛ ba tigri o bwɛdɛɛge la ta korobie fifraanaarɛ dɛ anɛ.
66011003	O danseɛ tena banɛ lole, dɛ tɔ lwe yale. Wɛɛ tɛɛ ba kpegrii ba bagle o waa la tɔpera kagboŋ lafraanɛ fifraanumɛl."
66011004	Gɛ nɛra banɛ nɔɔ Ɔleve daa anɛ la ne kwaa anɛ baa kpɔ kandere dɛɛ chɔŋɛ a ta a che harɛ bwa Dɔɔ la sie la che tɛ la.
66011005	Dɛ ba dɔm bɛlbwa ŋɔ o ɛɛ ba wechɔga aa, nii ɛɛ le Korowii danseɛ tena la nyooree dɛ kpo naate. A gɛ seo nɔɔ nomɛlbwa waa ŋɔ o ɛɛ ba wechɔga la ɛɛ ba sewa.
66011006	Ba dɔ kpegri dɛ́ lawɛ bwaala o gel nɛɛ gɛ saŋ baa dɛ bol Korowii Waa la bwa, dɛ berɛ won gel nee berɛ chal. Ba dɔ kpegri kɛ ba kpɔ harɛchɔg waa bɛlbwa ta harɛ nɔ ta saŋ bɛlbwa baa dɛ nyin.
66011007	Dɛ danseɛ tena la bol waa la tonaa, komɛl ɛɛ le Bɔnsam Bɔluŋ la taa dɛ ba yoo ba, dɛ pɔ ba nɛɛ dɛ kpoo ba,
66011008	asɛ ba lala chɔ bwɛjen la ba faa kpo ba Dɔɔ dagagre ta la fɔgbaah. Baa wonoo dɛɛ yerɛ bela Sodom, dɛ berɛ won dɛɛ yerɛ bela Ijipt.
66011009	Wobol te bɛlbwa nɛra baa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwa ɛɛ nyiŋi ba lala laanee tɔpera atoro ne fah, baa wola sɛh ba hug ba.
66011010	Nɛra baa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta ɛɛ koh ba seo la waa ba sie lɛ ba baah sɔɔh ba. Baa chemoo dɛ lɛ sie, dɛ kɛ dɔŋa kwa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a gɛ Korowii toroma banɛ la fa kpɔ wahala ta ba nɛɛ taeh.
66011011	Asɛ tɔpera atoro ne fah habɔɔ la, hweera ɛɛ le Korowii bee dɛ jo ba nɛɛ ba dɔ mkpa dɛ ir, asɛ ɔmee lawɛ nɛra baa chega dɛɛ nyiŋ ba la taeh.
66011012	Bela la, gɛ baala banɛ la ɛɛ no takpeg bɛl nyundua o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé ir ba bonɔ!" Asɛ ba ir, bam bɛl kpɔ ba kaa nyundua asɛ ba dɔma che dɛɛ nyiŋ ba haah ken.
66011013	Bug la ta harɛ ɛɛ jigruu kohona, asɛ bwɛjen la deene chogli. Dɛ ba bɔne bwɛɛ la bini bɔre fi aa, deene aa chogli la ɛɛ tel bɔr beŋkpoŋ deenee, nɛra kagboŋa banuanɛ serewe, asɛ ɔmee lawɛ banɔ la baa kaa la, baa kpɛɛ Korowii waa lɔ nyundua la.
66011014	Wekpega aa teŋa nɛɛ la balɔ dɛ kaa. A ka tooro tena aa ba bala taraken.
66011015	Nyundua torome waa teŋa nuanɛ la hoh o bɛla. Waa hoah la, asɛ n no takpega kohona nyundua a ŋɔ, "Harɛ nɔ ta kora bwa berɛ N Naa Korowii ne o Kristo waa tomɔ la kora. Wɛɛ di koraa saŋ bɛlbwa."
66011016	Asɛ nomonome fifraanɛ dɛ banaarɛ baa soge ba kookane ta Korowii sie la ir, dɛ guŋi dɛ kpɔ sie pi harɛ dɛɛ jaamo,
66011017	dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Nemenɛ Korowii haa ɛ komɛlbwa Dɔɔ dɛ do le dɛ le saŋ la bwa ba le fini, ya dɛ jaame kɛŋɔ haa kpɔ he kpegri dɛɛ di kora komɛlbwa nɛɛ nɔ.
66011018	Nɛra baa lɔ harɛ ta baah diu, kɛ tɔpere baa nyɔ he danana nee la ge telo. He bole pae tɔpere telo, hɛɛ ba dɛ ba bol nɛra baa serewa la waa dɛ pa bole, dɛ bɔ he bonɔɔna baa ɛ he keamere ne he nɛra ne banɔ la baa dɛ ɔmɛ la kem, ba bini nɛnjena ne nɛmpɛɛne bwa, dɛ chɔg banɔ la baa dɛ chɔg harɛ la."
66011019	Asɛ Korowii Dea waa lɔ nyundua la pili, ba na daka la waa dɛ bagle kɛ Korowii ne o nɛra fɔwɛ fɔo la. Bwaala ɛɛ nyɛgle pelɔpelɔ ken, dɛɛ kɔgre, harɛ ɛɛ jigri, tombwea ɛɛ lee kohona.
66012001	N na wejena ane aa ɛ nyokpoa dɛɛ bagle waane Korowii doa. Haah bɛl kpɔ wee tɔ, dɛ kpɔ korobie ge do o nakpale lɔgre, dɛ gugri weweela fi dɛ anɛ pi o nyu, kɛŋɔ koogbɛrɛ ken.
66012002	Haah la tea beɔ, loltea lɔɔ wɛɛ ba lola dɛɛ dooge lɔŋɔre.
66012003	Nyokpowaa ane ge aa dɛ bagle waane berɔ ɛ nyundua bela ja. Kontuugi damanta bɛl waa le lɛŋɔ leɔ. O swɛɛrɔ dɛ dɔ nyuune anuanɛ dɛ nyeglare fi. Asɛ koogbɛrɛ pi o nyuune la bɛlbwa ta.
66012004	Asɛ o kpɔ o din gbaa weweela ta harɛ. Dɛ he bɔne a bini bɔre atoro naa, a bini beŋkpoŋii o gbaa. O baa che haah la waa dɛ ba lola la sie dɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ dɛ o lolaa, ó kpɔ o bie la lile.
66012005	Haah la lolɛ bibaa waa dɛ ba kpegri kpɔe dɛɛ nyiŋi harɛ nɔ ta nɛra bwa nɛɛ a ŋwɛnɛ ta. Waa lolɔ la, ba lao kee kaa Korowii be o do o kookara la bɔr.
66012006	Asɛ haah la ge chwa jo pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo harɛ, bela Korowii aa ɛ bɔr tɛo ŋɔ bá nyiŋu tɔpera kagboŋ lafraanɛ fifraanumɛl bwa la.
66012007	Asɛ laa chole Korowii doa. Maekel waa ɛ nyundua toroma la bwa nomoa la ne o dɔm kaa pu kontuugi damanta la ne o ge bala ba yo,
66012008	asɛ Maekel ne o dɔm pɔ ba nɛ. Belaa ba ta bɔr dɔe dɛ so Korowii doa kpa,
66012009	asɛ Korowii kpɔ kontuugi damanta waa ɛ harɛkon la yaa jemɛ o waa mumpar bwa, baa yerɔ Baradeɛre Te ne Bɔnsam, wɛɛ negre nɛra bwa baa nyogre la, ne o bala bwa ta harɛ.
66012010	N berɔ no takpeg bɛl Korowii doa o ŋɔ, "Taraken N Naa Korowii lɛɛ waa dɛ ba dɛ ba lɛ nɛra la telo. O kpegri ne o kora dii saŋ telo. Taraken o Kristo waa tomɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la lɛ kpegri dɛɛ di, dɛkalkɛŋɔ naate waa chɔg yabala dɛɛ tɛ Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa la, Korowii kpɔɔ ta.
66012011	Ba chegɛ Pebie la chal la ne Korowii Waa baa bola la ta dɛ pɔ o nɛ. Ba ta gelɛ ba mkpa waa swɛɛ ba siwi, ba sɛh seo kwara.
66012012	Anomanta Korowii doa tena, hé gel he sie lɛ. He banɔ la haa lɔ harɛ ta ne mpo ta ge la, hé bwɛɛlɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Baradeɛre Te la tuo ba he be. O baah diu kɛrɛdɛ, O jemɔ kɛ o tɔpere aa kanɛ kpa."
66012013	Korowii aa kpɔ kontuugi damanta la ta harɛ la, o iro dɛɛ ti haah la waa lolɛ bibaa la.
66012014	Anee ba tɛ haah la kee kena anɛ o kpɔ dɛ ir kaa pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo harɛ, bela baa ɛa tɛo dɛ́ nyiŋu bene atoro ne fah la, asɛ kontuugi damanta la bɛ won ɛo wobɛlbwa.
66012015	Kontuugi damanta la aa ti haah la la, o pili o nyoa dɛ uge nee a ɛ kɛŋɔ nepale dɛ́ fee palɛ haah la kaa.
66012016	Kɛ harɛ cha haah la, dɛ pere, dɛ kpɔ nee la bwa nyɔ.
66012017	Asɛ kontuugi damanta la baah di haah la nɛɛ kohona, o kpɔ ka tɔ haah la naanar baa kaa dɛɛ no Korowii Waa dɛɛ teŋɛ Yeesu danseɛ waa baa dɛ di la ta la nɛ, dɛ ka che mpo nyoa.
66013001	A habɔɔ la, n na olchɔge bɛl wɛɛ le mpo ta. O dɔ nyuune anuanɛ dɛ nyeglare fi. Koogbɛrɛ pi o nyeglare la bɛlbwa ta, ba chwerɛ sɔnchɔge ge dawɛ nyuune la bɛlbwa ta, a ɛ chɛga tɛ Korowii.
66013002	Olchɔge la maa nao la le noniete, o nakpale ge le sisire nakpale, asɛ o nyoa ge le nyujente nyoa. Asɛ kontuugi damanta la kpɔ o kpegri ne o kora ne o nomonome kohona waa dɔa la bwa tɛ olchɔge la.
66013003	Olchɔge la nyuune la bɛl ɛo kɛŋɔ ba faa pirao o sewɛ dɛ ir asɛ bol la tonɛ. O waa ɛ nɛra bwa nyokpoa ba teŋɛ o nɛ,
66013004	dɛ koh tɛɛ kontuugi damanta la aa tɛ olchɔge la kpegri la waa dɛɛ duu o ne olchɔge la bwa kɛ Korowii ken, dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Umee dɔŋee olchɔge nɔ nɔ? Umee dɛ won puu yo laa lɔ?"
66013005	Korowii ta on ŋwɛnɛ tɔe. O gelɔ wɛɛ bol wejena ne nɛnhɛlwa, dɛ gel o dɔ kpegri dɛ won ɛa korobie fifraanaarɛ dɛ anɛ.
66013006	O pili nyoa dɛ bol Korowii nɛnhɛlwa, dɛ chɔg o ne bela waa lole ne nɛra baa lɔ o be bwa sɔn.
66013007	Korowii tɛo ŋwɛnɛ o yo o nɛra dɛ pɔ ba nɛ, dɛ gel o dɔ kpegri wobol te bɛlbwa nɛra baa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwa nɛ.
66013008	Harɛ nɔ ta nɛra baa wola ba sɔna chwerɛ Pebie la baa kpoo la Mkpa Tɔn la bini harɛ mumpar bwa la, ba bwa ɛɛ duu olchɔge laanee kɛŋɔ Korowii ken.
66013009	Nomɛlbwa waa dɔ deŋna la, ó no.
66013010	Dɛ Korowii ŋɔ bá lawɛ nomɛlbwa laa ta naa, baa lawɔɔ. Dɛ nomɛlbwa kweh kere dɛ kpɔ kpo nɛn aa, kere nee baa ba o ge kpoe. Anɔ dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ a chɛ kɛ Korowii nɛra dɔ bambile dɛ lawɛ waa baa dɛ yaradaa la bini kiŋkiŋ.
66013011	Belaa n berɛ na olchɔge bɛl kɛŋɔ onɔ la, o ɛgɛ dɛɛ le harɛ bini. O dɔ nyeglare anɛ kɛŋɔ pebale ken, o taa do kɛŋɔ kontuugi damanta taa ken.
66013012	Logle olchɔge la kpɔ o kpegri bwa tɛo, o che o naa ta dɛɛ ɛ wejena, dɛ gel nɛra bwa baa lɔ harɛ ta la ɛɛ duu logle olchɔge la ba faa pirao o sewɛ dɛ berɛ ir o bol la tonɛ la.
66013013	O wono dɛɛ ɛ wejena ne nyokpowa, dɛ gel nii le nyundua lee harɛ, nɛra na.
66013014	Waa chegɛ logle olchɔge la naa ta dɛɛ ɛ wejena la nomanta, o wono negre nɛra baa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta dɛ ŋɔ bá ma komɛl kɛŋɔ olchɔge la ba faa kpɔ kere pirao o sewɛ dɛ ir la.
66013015	Baa mao tonɛ la, Korowii tɛ olchɔge la waa teŋa nɛɛ la ŋwɛnɛ o tɛ kon la baa mao la hweera o won dɛɛ bol wa. Olchɔge nɛɛte la ŋɔ bá kpoo nɛra baa wola sɛh dɛ tomɛ kon la baa mao la bwa.
66013016	O gelɔ ba do nomɛlbwa, nɛmpɛɛne ne nɛnjena, dɔɔhna ne nyaara, yoma ne nɛra baa wola yoma ɛɛ, nso o nɔndig ta kɛɛ o tile ta.
66013017	Dɛ nomɛlbwa ta nso la dɔe yaa, o ta ŋwɛnɛ dɔe kɛŋɔ o yawɛ kon kɛɛ o yog komɛlbwa. Nso la ɛ namba waa chega tɛ olchɔge la sɔn.
66013018	Dɛ he dɔ wejema aa, no. Nomɛlbwa waa dɔ liire dɛ won jemɛ olchɔge la namba la mun la, ó lii. Onee 666, o ɛ nɛn sɔn.
66014001	Belaa n nyiŋi dɛ na Pebie la chega bwejen Saayɔn doa. Asɛ nɛra kagboŋa lafa fifraanaarɛ dɛ banaarɛ baa chwerɛ o ne o Mɛɛ la sɔna ba tili ta la che o be.
66014002	Asɛ n no gbɔgra nyundua kɛŋɔ ne aa pala dɛɛ kpɔ bwea baah la, a berɛ do kɛŋɔ bwaala aa kɔra kohona la. Dɛ o dɛ si kɛŋɔ baa dɛ lɔ janjela la.
66014003	Nɛra la chegɛ Korowii kookara ne hweera kwaa anaarɛ la ne nomonome la be dɛɛ go yelfale bɛl, nomɛlbwa aa wola won hweli yel la, nemenɛ nɛra kagboŋa lafa fifraanaarɛ dɛ banaarɛ Korowii aa lɛɛ ba harɛ nɔ ta nɛra bwa bini la gbo.
66014004	Gɛ nɛra nɔ do kɛŋɔ baala baa wola haah jemɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba lawɛ ba te dɛ do kaih. Ba dɛ teŋɛ Pebie la nɛɛ bobɛlbwa waa dɛ la. Banee nɛnlogla Korowii aa lɛɛ ba nɛra waa dɛ ba ba lɛɛ la bwa bini, dɛ kpɔ ba tɛ o te ne Pebie la.
66014005	Ba ta nyosone teŋe bwa. Wechɔga bɛlbwa ge toole ba nɛ.
66014006	Belaa n na nyundua torome bɛl waa ira kpɔ nyundua dɛ kpoŋe Amanesoma aa wola tonɛ bwa, dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ la ka bol wobol te bɛlbwa nɛra baa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwa be.
66014007	O kpɔ takpeg dɛ ŋɔ, "Hɛ́ɛ ɔmɛ Korowii dɛɛ tɛo jirima, dɛkalkɛŋɔ tɔpere la telo kɛŋɔ o bol nomɛlbwa waa dɛ pa bole. Hɛ́ɛ duu Korowii waa ta nyundua ne harɛ, ne mpo ne neerare bwa aa lɔ harɛ ta la."
66014008	Nyundua torome nɛɛte ge iro teŋɛ onɔ la nɛɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "O pagrɔ! O pagrɔ! Babilɔn bwɛjen la waa gela pɛlchɔga ne wedoŋa dɛɛ harɛ nɔ ta bwa nɛra kɛŋɔ sen asɛ ba waa fuh Korowii baah la pagrɔ."
66014009	Tooro te ge iro teŋɛ banɛ la nɛɛ dɛ kpɔ takpeg dɛ ŋɔ, "Dɛ nomɛlbwa sɛoh dɛɛ tomɛ olchɔge la ne o chaa la baa mao la, dɛ gel ba doo nso o tile ta kɛɛ o nɔn ta naa,
66014010	onee dɛ ba Korowii danana nee a nyoa aa kpega kohona kɛŋɔ sen baa wola komɛlbwa a ta pule la nyɔe. Wɛɛ na hɔhɔrɔwa kɛrɛdɛɛ jebɔrɔwe ninlao ta, nyundua toroma ne Pebie la sie,
66014011	asɛ chuu le bela baa dɛ na hɔhɔrɔwa la dɛɛ kaa nyundua saŋ bɛlbwa. Nɛra baa dɛ tomɛ olchɔge la ne kon la baa mao la, ne nɛra baa kpɔ o sɔn do ba nso la, baa hɔhɔrɔwa la taa le bwa, dɛɛ na waa chɔɔ ne jwaana."
66014012	Anɔ dɛ bagle kɛ a chɛ kɛ Korowii nɛra baa teŋɛ o waa ta dɛɛ yarada Yeesu la lawɛ bambile dɛ che kiŋkiŋ.
66014013	N berɔ no taa bɛl nyundua o ŋɔ, "Chwerɛ waa nɔ: Le fini dɛɛ kaa, nɛra baa yarada ya Dɔɔ la dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo la, dɛ ba sewaa, ba na som." Korowii Domadɛɛge la bolɔ ŋɔ, "Kpelaa, ba onɔ. Ba le ba ba koeh ta. Ba sɔndɛɛge ɛɛ teŋɛ ba nɛɛ kaa."
66014014	Asɛ n nyiŋi dɛ na bampoŋ bɛl, nomɛl so o ta kɛŋɔ nɛn, dɛ pi suugaswɛm koogbɛrɛ, dɛ kpoŋe kerenyɛg.
66014015	Anee nyundua torome bɛl le Korowii Dea bini, dɛ kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ onɔ la waa soge bam ta la be ŋɔ, "Kpɔ he kere la dɛ komɛ. Kwaa koma saŋ telo. Harɛ ta kondikwaa beɔ ne koma."
66014016	Asɛ onɔ la waa soge bam ta la ta o kere la dɛ komɛ kwaa aa lɔ harɛ ta la.
66014017	Nyundua torome bɛl ge le Korowii Dea waa lɔ nyundua la bini, dɛ ge kpoŋe kerenyɛg.
66014018	Bɛl ge waa dɔ nii kpegri le daawiile fuih bɔr dɛ kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ kerenyɛg te la be ŋɔ, "Kpɔ he kerenyɛg la dɛ chaa harɛ ta daa baa kpɔ a nɔna dɛɛ ɛ sen la nɔna. A beɔ!"
66014019	Asɛ o ta o kerenyɛg la harɛ ta dɛ chaa a nɔna, dɛ pa do kon ba yon pa nɔna la do dɛɛ sa a ta a nee le dɛɛ do o bini la. A gɛ kon la chegɔ tɛ Korowii bandia.
66014020	Nɔna baa sa a ta la chegɔ tɛ harɛ nɔ ta nɛra. Bwɛɛ la daharaa ba sa ba nɛ, ba chal palɛ kaa kɛ kwansini lafraanɛ, a luŋri ge tel nagale anɛ.
66015001	N berɔ na wejena ane Korowii doa, a do kan dɛ bagle waane. A ɛ nyokpoa taeh. N na nyundua toroma banuanɛ ba kpoŋe hɔhɔrɔwa bele anuanɛ. Anee hɔhɔrɔwa aa ka mun ba ɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ anee dɛɛ ba ɛɛ mɔɔ Korowii baah sɔɔh.
66015002	N na bobɛl o do kɛŋɔ nejen aa chɔa dɛ do gereŋ asɛ nii do o ta. Asɛ nɛra baa pɔ olchɔge la ne kon la baa mao la nɛɛ dɛ vɛh o namba waa chega tɛ o sɔn la kpoŋe Korowii janjelare dɛ che nee la jwɛh,
66015003	dɛɛ go Korowii bonɔɔ Mosis ne Pebie la yel ŋɔ, "Oo, Nemenɛ Korowii, haa ɛ komɛlbwa Dɔɔ, he we-ɛɛla kan ga. Harɛ nɔ bwa Kooro, he ŋwɛnɛre togrɔ dɛ ɛ kasinteŋ.
66015004	Oo, N Naa Korowii, umee lole waa wola hen ɔmɔɔ? Umee wola hen sɔnee tɛɔ? He gboo do kaih ka tonɛ. Harɛ ta nɛn te bɛlbwa ɛɛ ba guŋi he siee dɛ tomɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ waa haa ɛa la togrɔ nomɛlbwa jemɛ."
66015005	Anɔ habɔɔ la, n berɔ na Korowii Dea waa lɔ nyundua la baa pilu cheg. Tɛnte Dea baa baŋro wɛɛ bagle kɛŋɔ Korowii lɔ o nɛra bini laanee.
66015006	Asɛ nyundua toroma banuanɛ baa kpoŋe hɔhɔrɔwa bele anuanɛ la le Korowii Dea la bini. Ba laala baa doa la wer dɛɛ nyɛgle. Ba kpɔ suugaswɛm krisore vɔrɔwe ba bambili.
66015007	Asɛ hweera kwaa anaarɛ la bɛl kpɔ suugaswɛm loga anuanɛ tɛɛ ba. Korowii waa lole saŋ te bɛlbwa la bwaawee su a bwa.
66015008	Korowii jirima ne o kpegri gelɔ chuu su o Dea la bini, nomɛlbwa aa wola won jo bela atane kɛŋɔ hɔhɔrɔwa bele anuanɛ nyundua toroma banuanɛ la aa kpoŋa la aa ɛa tonɛ mɔɔ.
66016001	N berɔ no takpeg bɛl o le Korowii Dea la bini dɛ ŋɔ nyundua toroma banuanɛ la be ŋɔ, "Hé kaa dɛ ka fuge Korowii bwaawee la aa lɔ loga anuanɛ bini la ta harɛ."
66016002	Nyundua torome waa tɔ sie la kaalɔ dɛ ka fuge o kwaa ta harɛ. Asɛ ŋwɛrchɔga aa dɛ we kohona lee nɛra baa dɔ olchɔge la nso dɛɛ tomɛ kon la baa mao la nɛ.
66016003	Asɛ nɛɛte ge ka fuge o kwaa do mpo ta. Asɛ mpo nee chɔg dɛ do kɛŋɔ lale chal, asɛ kwaa aa lɔ mpo ta bwa serewe.
66016004	Asɛ tooro te ge le dɛ ka fuge o kwaa do moo bɛlbwa ne neerare bwa ta, a begre chal.
66016005	Asɛ n no nyundua torome la waa chɔ neerare nyoa la kɛ waa ŋɔa, "Hen haa lole saŋ la bwa dɛ ba le fini dɛ do kaih dɛ ka tonɛ la, he waa haa bola dɛ pa nɛra bolchɔge la togrɔ,
66016006	dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba fa gelɔ he nɛra ne he keamere chal fuge. Anomanta he tɛɛ ba chal ba nyɔ. Gɛɛ ba chɛ."
66016007	Asɛ n no taa bɛl daawiile fuih bɔr, o ŋɔ, "Nemenɛ Korowii haa ɛ komɛlbwa Dɔɔ la, he waa haa ɛa dɛ tɛr ba deŋne la togrɔ dɛ ɛ kasinteŋ."
66016008	Nyundua torome naarɛ te la ge leɔ, dɛ ka fuge o kwaa ta wee ta, asɛ a tɛo kpegri wɛɛ nyaa kɛŋɔ nii ken,
66016009	dɛɛ nyaa nɛra, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o nyɛgre taeh, asɛ baa bol Korowii waa dɔ kpegri hɔhɔrɔwa la nɛɛ nɛnhɛlwa. Ba ta ba liire charɛ dɛ le ba wechɔga ta. Ba ta on jirima tɛɛ.
66016010	Onɔ la waa teŋa nue la ge leɔ dɛ ka fuge o kwaa ta olchɔge la kookara ta, asɛ bɔr bir nɛra waa dɛ di kora ba nɛɛ la bwa nɛ, baa menɛ nyoa bonyɛga nomanta,
66016011	dɛɛ chɛgre Korowii ba bonyɛga ne ŋwɛra aa lɔ ba nɛɛ la wa. Ba ta liire charɛ dɛ le ba tonchɔga ta.
66016012	Nyundua torome waa teŋa numɛl ge leɔ dɛ ka fuge o kwaa ta nejen baa dɛ yerɔ Yufretis la ta, asɛ o bwa hweeh dɛ chɔ ŋwɛnɛ tɛ koranar baa le wee leebɔr dɛɛ ba la.
66016013	N berɔ na kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ atoro a do kɛŋɔ sapone ken, bɛl le kontuugi damanta la nyoa, anɛ aa kaa la ge le olchɔge la ne keamechɔge la nyoa bini.
66016014	Bɔnsam kwaa, asɛ a won dɛɛ ɛ nyokpowa. A leɔ dɛɛ la harɛ nɔ ta koranar bwa be, dɛ́ ka lawɛ ba bwa cheme bá yo Nemenɛ Korowii laa o tɔpejen la ta.
66016015	Hɛ́ɛ no. Mɛɛ pigri heyaa kɛŋɔ ŋwɛɛ ken. Naate waa wola dom chɔ dɛ do o laala dɛ so dɛɛ kpa la na som. N balaa, waa muŋgbalee valɛ nɛra nao asɛ sihiih kpoo.
66016016	Kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ la lawɛ koranar bwa cheme bobɛl Hibru tena aa dɛ yerɛ bela Amagɛdɔn la.
66016017	Asɛ nyundua torome waa teŋa nuanɛ la ge fuge o kwaa do peu ta. N no takpeg bɛl le kookara la te la be Korowii Dea bela, o ŋɔ, "A tonɔ."
66016018	Asɛ bwaala ɛɛ nyɛgle pelɔpelɔ bobɛlbwa, dɛɛ jigri, dɛɛ kɔgre, asɛ harɛ jigri kohona. Korowii aa ta nɛwɛnyini bwa, harɛ ta gɛ jigre bwa. O jigra la ɔma.
66016019	Bwɛjen la pegri atoro, asɛ harɛ nɔ ta bwɛɛre bwa pagre. Korowii lii Babilɔnjen la wechɔga wa, dɛ gel o nyɔ o danana nee a nyoa aa kpega kohona kɛŋɔ seŋkpega la.
66016020	Ekwie aa lɔ neerare baahna ne bwejena nyogrɔ, ba nyin a bɔr kahonɛ.
66016021	Tombwejena le nyundua dɛ do tɔgre kɛŋɔ paanoo men bɔgtɔ del dɛ ba lee nɛra nɛɛ dɛ a ɔma. Asɛ nɛra koh a waa dɛ chɛgre Korowii.
66017001	Belaa nyundua toroma banuanɛ baa kpoŋe loga anuanɛ la bɛl ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, "Ba ń bagle gɛ Korowii aa dɛ ba jwamane te tenten la deŋne tɛra. O soge neerare nyoo.
66017002	O ne harɛ nɔ ta koranar bwa di sɛm. O wedoŋa la ɛo kɛŋɔ sen asɛ o kpɔ tɛ harɛ nɔ ta nɛra ba nyɔ dɛ dɛɛ."
66017003	Belaa Korowii Domadɛɛge ir n nɛ, asɛ nyundua torome la kpɔ mɛ kaa pua harɛ waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo ta, asɛ n na haah bɛl o so olchɔge bɛl nɛ. Olchɔge la swɛɛrɔ dɛ dɔ sɔnchɔga o bwa, a bwa ɛ chɛga dɛɛ yagɛ Korowii. O dɔ nyuune anuanɛ, o nyeglare ge ɛ fi.
66017004	Haah la di toli dɛ do laaladɛɛga, ane swɛɛ a sie do gimegime, ane ge swɛɛ peihpeih dɛ do wer. O do baŋa kwaa ne deŋna kwaa ne nɔnloga baa kpɔ suugaswɛm ne bwedɛɛga bwa soosiwi ɛa, dɛ kpoŋe suugaswɛm luwee, wedoŋa ne jwamane we-ɛɛla suu.
66017005	Ba chwerɛ sɔn bɛl pɛl haah la tile ta. O ɛ sɔn o mun aa sɔah. Sɔn laanee |scBABILƆNJEN, JWAMANE TENA NE HARƐ NƆ TA WEDOŊA BWA NYA|d.
66017006	N na haah la kɛ waa dɛɛra. Korowii nɛra baa teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ ba koh a waa kpoo ba la chalee o nyɔ dɛ dɛɛ. Maa nao la, n nyoa kpoo taeh.
66017007	Nyundua torome la pɛɛ mɛ ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he nyoa kpo nɔɔ? Mɛɛ pili haah nɔ ne olchɔge la waa soge o ta o dɔ nyuune anuanɛ ne nyeglare fi la waane aa sɔah binii bagle.
66017008	Olchɔge la haa nao la, o siwi fa lole. Kɛ taraken te o siwi toole kpa. O dɛ ba teehna dɛ le Bɔnsam Bɔluŋ la bini, dɛ la Korowii ka chɔgo. Nɛra baa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta Korowii aa wola ba sɔna chwerɛ do Mkpa Tɔn la bini nyundua ne harɛ mumpar bwa la, ba nyoa ɛɛ kpoo gɛ saŋ baa na olchɔge la kɛŋɔ o faa lole waa wola berɛ do le kpa dɛ berɛ le la.
66017009	Dɛ he ta wejema dɔe yaa, haa won no waa nɔ mun. Olchɔge la nyuune anuanɛ la chegɔ tɛ bwejena anuanɛ. A taa haah la so. A berɔ che tɛ koranar banuanɛ ge.
66017010	Ba bini banue toole kpa. Bɛl ta dɛ di o kora. Bɛl ge ta lole, o ta dii mɔɔ. Dɛ o baa di aa, waa kora taa bigri.
66017011	Olchɔge la o faa lole waa wola berɛ do le kpa la, o ge ɛ kooro nuatoro te dɛ ja banuanɛ la nɛ. O dɛ ba kaala Korowii ka chɔgo.
66017012	"Nyeglare fi haa naa la chegɔ tɛ koranar fi baa wola kora dii mɔɔ. Ba tɔpere telaa, baa di koraa dɔŋhwere beŋkpoŋ gbo. Ba ne olchɔge la bwaa dɛɛ ba pɛɛ di kora.
66017013	Koranar la bwa ɛɛ ɛ liire beŋkpoŋii dɛ kpɔ ba kpegri bwa tɛ olchɔge la.
66017014	Ba ne Pebie la ɛɛ yo laalee, asɛ Pebie la ne nɛra waa lee ba dɛ kpɔ ba teŋɛ o nɛɛ ba waa dɔ kasinteŋ la pɔ ba nɛɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ onee dɔɔranar bwa Dɔɔ dɛ ɛ koranar bwa Kooro."
66017015	Nyundua torome la ŋɔ n be ŋɔ "Neerare la haa naa kɛŋɔ jwamane te soge a nyoo la chegɔ tɛ wobol te bɛlbwa nɛra baa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwa.
66017016	Nyeglare fi la haa naa a che tɛ koranar fi la ne olchɔge la ɛɛ hah jwamane te laanee, dɛ foo o bwara komɛlbwa, dɛ gelo dakpaŋ gɛ. Baa chwe o olii, asɛ dɛ fuh o kabora,
66017017	dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowiirii kpɔ gɛ do ba bambile bini kɛŋɔ bá ɛ waa waa dɛ nyin, dɛ gel ba ɛ liire beŋkpoŋ dɛ kpɔ ba kpegri tɛ olchɔge la ó di ka tel kɛŋɔ waa Korowii aa bola la aa ɛa.
66017018	Haah la haa nao la chegɔ tɛ bwɛjen la waa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta kora bwa la."
66018001	A habɔɔ la, n na nyundua torome bɛl o le nyundua dɛɛ tu. O dɔ kpegri kɛrɛdɛ. O jirima nomanta harɛ bwa chaahnɔ.
66018002	O nyɛgɔ kohona ŋɔ, "O pagrɔ oo, o pagrɔ! Babilɔnjen la pagrɔ, dɛ berɛ kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ ne Bɔnsam kwaa te bɛlbwa ne jumbisale baa haah la dobɔr,
66018003	dɛkalkɛŋɔ o gelɔ harɛ ta nɛra bwa wedoŋa ne ba pɛlchɔga dɛɛ ba kɛŋɔ sen, asɛ ba waa fuh Korowii baah. Harɛ nɔ ta koranar ne o bɔ jwamane. O kondɔɔh kwaa nyina kohona nomanta, harɛ nɔ ta bonadiire chegɛ o nɛɛ dɛ dɛg."
66018004	N berɔ no taa bɛl o le nyundua dɛ ŋɔ, "N nɛra, hé le o be. Maa nyin kɛ he ne o pɛ dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga, dɛ pɛ na wahala maa dɛ ba gela o na la.
66018005	O wechɔga daŋɔ tel Korowii doa. Korowii kpaŋro bil.
66018006	O chɔgra, hé ɛo gɛ o faa ɛa la. Hé bɔɔ o tonchɔga la kem kera anɛ. Sen la o yon ɛ tɛ nɛra ba nyɔ dɛɛ dɛɛ la, hé ge ɛ ane tɛo a do kpegri gwaa gɛ kera anɛ ó ge nyɔ.
66018007	Gɛ o faa kpɔ o te ɛ nɛnjen dɛɛ di o nyu ga la, hé gel o na hɔhɔrɔwa dɛ di suna ge kɛrɛdɛ. O dɛ lii o nyu bini ŋɔ onee haŋkooro, o jaa ta sewɛ, o tea bini aa chɔg bwa.
66018008	Anomanta tɔpebeŋkpoŋii wahala ne weela ne tebinichɔg ne lɔr ɛɛ ba o kpoe, asɛ nii fuuh, dɛkalkɛŋɔ N Naa Korowii waa dɛ ba o waa bola dɛ pa bole laanee dɔ kpegri bwa."
66018009	Harɛ nɔ ta koranar ba ne waa dɛ bɔ jwamane dɛɛ di ba bwara la, baa ba na o chuu kɛ o dɛ fuh la, baa wiu dɛɛ dooge lɔŋɔre.
66018010	Baa che bojaŋee, dɛkalkɛŋɔ baa ɔmɛ o hɔhɔrɔwa waa dɛ na laanee dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Akwe! Akwe! Bwɛjen Babilɔn la o tena faa dɛ di kpegri ga la, waa puu kerabeŋkpoŋ o pagre."
66018011	Asɛ harɛ nɔ ta bonadiire ɛɛ wiu dɛɛ dooge lɔŋɔre, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛn toole dɛ́ yawɛ ba kwaa kpa.
66018012	Nɛn toole dɛ́ yawɛ ba suugaswɛm, suugapoŋa, ne bwedɛɛga a yog aa kpega, ne yadɛɛga bwa soosiwi, ne dasɔɔhsoma a yog aa kpega bwa soosiwi, ne kwaa baa kpɔ bala nyena dɛ ɛ, ne kwaa baa kpɔ dadɛɛga a yog aa kpega dɛ sɛh, ne anɔ la baa kpɔ ayaawa ne bune dɛ logɛ, ne anɔ la baa kpɔ bwedɛɛga ane soosiwi dɛ ɛ la,
66018013	ne konsɔɔhsoma bwa soosiwi, anɔ la baa dɛ fuh, ne anɔ la baa dɛ fɔgle, ne sen, ne noo, ne mendɛɛga, ne mea, ne nae, ne peera, ne jagre, ne kwaa ba yon vɔwɛ pɛl jagre dɛ so a bini aa tɛgra la. Ba yog nɛra ge kɛŋɔ kondɛɛra ken.
66018014	Bonadiire la ɛɛ bol bwɛjen Babilɔn la waa ŋɔ, "Kwaa a pɛla aa dɔe la le he nɔn ta. He kondikondɛɛga ne kondɛɛga fuoh. Haa an na kpa bwa."
66018015	Banɔ la ba faa yog a gɛ kwaa dɛ dɔ suuga a ta la ɛɛ che bojaŋee, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba dɛ ɔme hɔhɔrɔwa aa puu la, dɛɛ wiu dɛɛ dooge lɔŋɔre,
66018016	dɛɛ wi ŋɔ, "Akwe! Akwe! Waa pu bwɛjen la o nɛra faa dɛ do laaladɛɛga a sie aa swɛɛra dɛ do gimegime ne answɛɛma peihpeih, dɛɛ do baŋa kwaa ne deŋna kwaa ne nɔnloga baa kpɔ suugaswɛm ne bwedɛɛga bwa soosiwi ɛa la,
66018017	dɛkalkɛŋɔ o kwaa waa dɔa ga la bwa fuoh dɔŋhwere beŋkpoŋ." Asɛ nɛra baa dɛ kah stiimaere, ne nɛra baa jo a bini dɛɛ la bobɛla, ne nɛra baa dɛ ɛ toma a bini, ne nɛra baa dɛ ɛ toma bwa soosiwi mpo ta che bojaŋ,
66018018	dɛ na gɛ waa dɛ fuh chuu ɛɛ le la, dɛ kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Jo bɛ le! Bwɛjen nɔ dɔŋ toole wɛɛ fuh gɛ la."
66018019	Ba loo kuu, ba ɛ teera ta ba nyuune ta, dɛɛ wiu dɛɛ dooge lɔŋɔre, dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Akwe! Akwe! Waa pu bwɛjen kondɔɔh aa su o bwa dɛ gel nɛra baa dɔ stiimaere do mpo ta berɛ dɔɔhna la. O paŋɛ komɛlbwa dɔŋhwere beŋkpoŋ.
66018020	Korowii doa tena ne Korowii nɛra, ne Yeesu toroma, ne Korowii keamere, hé gel he sie lɛ a wa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii tɛr o deŋne wechɔga waa kpɔa ɛ heyaa la wa."
66018021	Belaa nyundua torome bokpega te bɛl gɔɔ bwe bɛl waa do kan kɛŋɔ nambwejen, dɛ kpɔ ta mpo ta, dɛ ŋɔ, "Kenii baa ba bwɛjen Babilɔn la kpɔe dɛ ta kpegri nɛɛ baa wola on na kpa bwa la.
66018022	Baa nɛra baa dɛ lɔ janjela, ne banɔ la baa dɛ hoh kaleperi ne bɛle ne komɛlbwaa na he bini kpa. Gɛɛ baa wola nɛra baa dɛ sɛh kwa, ne nɛra baa dɛ sɔh kwa, ne banɔ la baa jemɛ toma bwa soosiwi he binii na kpa. Baa nambwe ge sii no bela kpa.
66018023	Kandea bɛlbwa aa belaa chaah kpa. Baa hanfala ne ba jaranar taa no bela bwa. He bonadiire ɛ nɛnjena ba dɔŋa aa wola toole harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwa. He wono berɛ harɛ nɔ ta nɛra bwa liire ba nyogre kɛŋɔ baa kpɔ tɛgchɔga dɛɛ berɛ nɛn liire la.
66018024	Korowii keamere, ne o nɛra, ne nɛra baa kpoo ba harɛ nɔ ta bwa la ba chalee bá na bwɛɛ la ta la."
66019001	A habɔɔ la, n no waane Korowii doa kɛŋɔ nɛnlaa tenten gbɔga baa si, "Hé kpɛɛ N Naa Korowii! Onee lɛ nɛwɛnyina, on chɛ jirima, on dɔ kpegri bwa,
66019002	dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ waa bol waa dɛɛ pa bole la ɛ kasinteŋ dɛ togre. O pa hanjwamane tenten la waa ɛ wedoŋa dɛ chɔg harɛ nɔ la bolchɔge, dɛ tɛr o deŋne dɛ́ kpɔ bɔ o bonɔɔna ne toli waa kpoo ba la kem."
66019003	Ba berɔ si ja, "Hé kpɛɛ N Naa Korowii! Babilɔn chuu ɛɛ dɛɛ kaa nyundua saŋ bɛlbwaa."
66019004	Nomonome fifraanɛ dɛ banaarɛ la ne hweera kwaa anaarɛ la guŋo dɛɛ duu Korowii waa soge o kookara ta la, dɛɛ si, "Aamen. Hé kpɛɛ N Naa Korowii!"
66019005	Asɛ taa bɛl le kookara la ta dɛ ŋɔ, "He nɛra haa ɛ N Naa Korowii bonɔɔna ne o toli la, hɛ́ɛ tɛo sɔn. He bini nɛŋgwɛgra ne nɛnjena haa dɛ ɔmɔ bwa, hɛ́ɛ tɛo sɔn."
66019006	N berɔ no nɛnlaa tenten aa dɛ bol waa kɛŋɔ chuubu aa dɛ si la, a berɛ do kɛŋɔ bwaala aa dɛ kɔgre kohona la. Ba ŋɔ, "Hé kpɛɛ N Naa Korowii! Nemenɛ Korowii waa ɛ komɛlbwa Dɔɔ la dɛ di kora.
66019007	Hé gel ya sie lɛ ya hɛgre kohona. Yá tɛo sɔn, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Pebie la haah lawa telo. O haah ge kpɔ o te cheg.
66019008	Ba kpɔ yadɛɛge ompoŋ kpelkpel tɛo ó tɔ." Yadɛɛge ompoŋ la chegɔ tɛ Korowii nɛra wedɛɛga baa ɛa.
66019009	Anee nyundua torome la ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, "Chwerɛ waa nɔ bil. Nɛra baa yer ba ŋɔ bá ba di Pebie la hanfale kwaa la na som," dɛ berɛ ŋɔ, "Korowii wobolee, a ɛ kasinteŋ."
66019010	Belaa n guŋi o sie dɛ fee ŋɔ n duuru, asɛ o ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, "Bɛ gɛ ɛ. N ne hen ne he bala la baa lawɛ Yeesu waa bini la bwa ɛ o bonɔɔna. Korowiirii chɛ kɛ he duu. Yeesu waa waa bagla laanee ɛ keamere la bwa wobol."
66019011	Asɛ n na kɛŋɔ nyundua aa pila, jaagɔpoŋ bɛl le. Nɛn waa soge o ta la, ba dɛ yerɔ Kasinteŋ Te, dɛɛ yerɔ Nɛŋkaih. O dɛ bol nɛra waa kasinteŋ ne, dɛɛ yo laa a ŋwɛnɛ ta.
66019012	O sibie do kɛŋɔ ninlao ken. O pi koogbɛrɛre a warɛ pirim. O sɔn bɛl dawɛ o nɛ, nomɛlbwa aa wola sɔn la jemɛ nemenɛ o gbo.
66019013	O sɔn bɛl gee Korowii Nyoa Wobol. O tɔ yal bɛl baa kpɔa li chal.
66019014	Nyundua dɔm baa dɛ la laa do laalapoŋa aa wera dɛ so jaagɔpoŋa ta dɛ teŋɛ o nɛ.
66019015	Asɛ tokobii waa nyɛga ɛɛ le o nyoa ó kpɔ dɛɛ ba harɛ ta nɛra bwa yoi dɛ pɔ ba nɛ. Wɛɛ nyiŋi ba nɛɛ kpegri ne a ŋwɛnɛ ta, dɛ ɛɛ ba kɛŋɔ baa dɛ sa daa nɔna baa kpɔa dɛɛ ɛ sen ta a nee ɛɛ le la. Nemenɛ Korowii bandiaa a nee la.
66019016	Sɔn bɛl dawɛ o yal ne o hwii ta. Gɛ sɔn laanee |scKORANAR BWA KOORO NE DƆƆRANAR BWA DƆƆ|d.
66019017	N berɔ na nyundua torome bɛl o che wee ta, dɛ kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ jumbii aa dɛ gah nyundua bwa be ŋɔ, "Hé bwa ba cheme Korowii kondikonjena la mun.
66019018	Koranar, soojanomonome, nɛnjena, jagre ne a dɔɔranar, ne nɛra bwa, ba bini baa dɔ ba te ne yoma, nomonjena ne bechale bwa serewɔ. Anomanta hé ba di ba ola."
66019019	Belaa n na olchɔge la ne harɛ ta koranar ne ba dɔm aa kpɔ ba te dɛɛ ba dɛ́ ba yo naate waa soge jaagɔ ta la ne o dɔm.
66019020	Kɛ ba lawɛ olchɔge la ne keamechɔge la o faa dɛ ɛ wejena dɛɛ tɛ olchɔge la dɛɛ negre nɛra baa dɔ olchɔge la nso dɛɛ tomɛ kon baa mao o do kɛ olchɔge la la. Ba kpɔ ba bwa ne ba siweela ka ta bela nii ne jebɔrɔwe aa yɛɛra chɔ kɛŋɔ moo dɛɛ fuh.
66019021	Naate waa soge jaagɔ ta la kpɔ tokobinyɛg waa le o nyoa ta la kpoo olchɔge la nɛra baa kaa la, asɛ jumbii la di ba ola gɛ aa wona.
66020001	Belaa n berɛ na nyundua torome bɛl o le nyundua dɛɛ tu. Waa dɛ tu la, dɛ o kpoŋe Bɔnsam Bɔluŋ la safoa ne jɔgrɔjen bɛl.
66020002	O kaa lawɛ kontuugi damanta o faa ɛ harɛkon ya jemɛ o waa le mumpar la, baa yerɔ Baradeɛre Te kɛɛ Bɔnsam la. O kpɔ jɔgrɔre la vɔrɔwo bil bene kagboŋ,
66020003	dɛ kpɔɔ ka ta Bɔnsam Bɔluŋ la bini, dɛ laa tɔ, dɛ karɔ kiŋkiŋ o bɛ nɛra baa lɔ harɛ ta negre ka tel kɛŋɔ bene kagboŋ la aa tela. Dɛ tɔpere la telaa, baa puruu o le tama.
66020004	N na kookane, asɛ nɛra bane so a ta, asɛ Korowii tɛɛ ba ŋwɛnɛ bá won dɛɛ bol nɛra waa dɛɛ pa bole. N na lala ba faa teŋɛ Yeesu kasinteŋ waa la ta dɛ bol Korowii Waa, dɛ vɛh olchɔge la ne kon la baa mao la toma. Ba ta gelɛ ba do ba o nso la ba tili ne ba nɔɔra ta. Ba koh a waa teŋni ba nyuune. Baa ir seo ta, ba ne Kristo pɛ dɛɛ di kora bene kagboŋ.
66020005	Lala seo ta ira loglee gɛ. Banɔ la baa kaa baa wola ire la te, nemenɛ bene kagboŋ la tel mɔɔ ba ir.
66020006	Nɛra baa tɔ sie ir seo ta la na som. Korowii nɛraa ban. Seo nɛɛtena la ta kpegri dɔe ba nɛɛ kpa. Baa ɛ Korowii ne Kristo Sɔforee, asɛ ba ne o pɛ di kora bene kagboŋ.
66020007	Dɛ bene kagboŋ la telaa, baa pur Bɔnsamee dɛ yao ta.
66020008	O leɔ waa, wɛɛ ba negre nɛra baa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwaa, Gɔg tena ne Magɔg tena, dɛ pona ba ba warɛ kɛŋɔ mpo nyoa hɛŋle ken, dɛ kpɔ ba yo laa.
66020009	N na ba ba wur ba tɔ harɛ bwa, dɛ bar bwɛɛ Korowii aa dɛ nyinu o nɛra do o ta la. Asɛ nii le nyundua dɛ ba le ba nɛɛ dɛ fuh ba bwa kwaraa.
66020010	Ba lawɛ Bɔnsam waa neg ba la ge dɛ ta bela nii ne jebɔrɔwe aa yɛɛra chɔ kɛŋɔ moo la, bela olchɔge ne keamechɔge la aa lole la. Baa na hɔhɔrɔwa chɔɔ ne jwaanaa aa wola jaga dɔe.
66020011	N berɔ na kookara damanta ompoŋ bɛl. Nɛn waa soge o ta la, nyundua ne harɛ nao dɛ nyogre, ba ta an nae kpa.
66020012	Belaa n na nɛra baa serewa bwa, ba bini nomonjena ne bechale bwa, asɛ ba che kookara la sie. Ba pili tɔne ane, asɛ dɛ berɛ pili onɔ la waa ɛ Mkpa Tɔn la. Belaa Korowii che toma nɛra la aa ɛa mɔɔ dɛ serewe a do tɔne la ta la ta, dɛ bol ba waa dɛ pa bole.
66020013	Nɛra baa ka nee ta la leɔ, asɛ nɛra baa sewɛ seo bwa soosiwi la ge le, asɛ Korowii che gɛ ba faa ɛa ta dɛ bol ba waa dɛ pa bole.
66020014	Belaa ba kpɔ seo ne Lala Bwɛɛ bwa ta nidamanta aa yɛɛra chɔ kɛŋɔ moo la ta. Gɛ nii nɔɔ seo nɛɛte la.
66020015	Nomɛlbwa baa nyiŋi Mkpa Tɔn la bini dɛ nyin o sɔn kahonɛ la, dɛ ba kpɔɔ ka ta nii la ta.
66021001	Belaa n na nyundufale ne harɛfale bɛl. Dɛ nyundua ne harɛ la a faa lole la te nyogrɔ, asɛ mpo ge nyogre.
66021002	N berɔ na Korowii bwɛɛ Jerusalam onfale o le Korowii be dɛɛ ba harɛ. Korowii kwaaro kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ hanfale yon kpɔ o te dɛɛ ba o jaa be la.
66021003	Asɛ n no takpeg bɛl o le kookara la ta, dɛ ŋɔ "Hɛ́ɛ no! Taraken Korowii dobɔree nɛwɛnyini bini. O ne banee dɛ so, ba ɛ o nɛra asɛ o ge ɛ ba Korowii, ba ne o so.
66021004	Wɛɛ fee ba sinii bwaa ta baa wola wi kpa. Seo aa lee do kpa. Lokua ne wii ne bwadabii wee aa lee do kpa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ webena la bwa toole kpa."
66021005	Anee naate waa soge kookara la ta la ŋɔ, "Taraken n gelɔ wobɛlbwa berɛ anfala." Dɛ berɛ ŋɔ, "Chwerɛ gɛ waa nɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ n wobol nɔ ɛ kpela, negra toole a ta."
66021006	Asɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "A tonɔ! Menee komɛlbwa Sitɔɔ ne a Muŋkaa, menee wobɛlbwa Mumpar ne a Jaga. Dɛ nomɛlbwa dɛ wi nyɔgre aa, mɛɛ geloo o la bela mkpa nee aa bula dɛɛ le dɛ ka nyɔ ane pɛɛpɛɛ.
66021007	Naate waa wona yo le la ɛɛ dɔ kwaa nɔ bwaa. Mɛɛ ɛ o Korowiirii, asɛ o ge ɛ n bie.
66021008	Kɛ ɔmeera ne nɛra baa wola men yarada, ne nɛra baa dɛ ɛ waa maa kia, ne nɛra baa dɛ kpoo nɛra, ne nɛra baa dɛ bɔ jwamane, ne nɛra baa dɛ ɛ bebeewa, ne vogtoroma ne nyosonteŋna bwa bɔree nii ne jebɔrɔwe aa yɛɛra chɔ kɛŋɔ moo dɛɛ fuh la ta. Anee seo nɛɛtena la."
66021009	Belaa nyundua toroma banuanɛ la ba faa kpoŋe loga hɔhɔrɔwa bele anuanɛ aa ka mun la aa su a bwa la bɛl ba, dɛ ba ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, "Ba ń bagle Pebie la hanfale la."
66021010	Anee Korowii Domadɛɛge ir n nɛ, asɛ nyundua torome la kpɔ mɛ kaa bwejen bɛl doa. O kpego kɛrɛdɛ. Belaa o bag mɛ Korowii bwɛɛ Jerusalam la kɛ waa le Korowii be nyundua dɛɛ ba harɛ.
66021011	Dɛ Korowii jirima gelɔ o bwa ɛɛ nyɛgle kɛŋɔ bwedɛɛge baa dɛ yerɔ jaspa o do wer kohona dɛ do gereŋ la.
66021012	Danjwɛjen bɛl waa kpega kohona baro cheme. O doonyoone lɔ fi dɛ anɛ, asɛ nyundua toroma fi dɛ banɛ ge cheche a ta. Ba chwerɛ Israel deene fi dɛ anɛ la sɔna dawɛ doonyoone la ta.
66021013	O doonyoone la, atoro lɔ wee leebɔr pera, atoro do wee kaŋle nyundua bɔr, atoro do wee cholibɔr pera, asɛ atoro ge do wee kaŋle harɛ bɔr ge.
66021014	Bwea baa ma danjwɛɛ la chɔŋɛ a ta la lɔ fi dɛ anɛ, asɛ Pebie la toroma fi dɛ banɛ la ge sɔna dawɛ bwea la ta.
66021015	Nyundua torome waa bol waa n be la kpoŋe suugaswɛm daa baa dɛ magɛ o ne kwa, dɛɛ ba bwɛɛ la ne o doonyoone ne danjwɛɛ la maga.
66021016	Bwɛɛ la ɛ fɔɔsokwɛɛ. O pagri ne o jaŋre bwa kɛrɛdɛ. O kpɔ daa la dɛ magɛ bwɛɛ la, o jaŋre lɔ kwansini kagboŋ lafraanue. O pagri ne o jaŋre ne o nyundua kpega bwa beŋkpoŋ.
66021017	O magɛ danjwɛɛ la. O kpega del ge lɔ nagale fifraanuanɛ dɛ anɛ. Gɛ nɛwɛnyini aa dɛ magɛ kwaa la, gɛɛ o maga.
66021018	Bwɛɛ la danjwɛɛ la, bwedɛɛga baa yera jaspa la gboo ba kpɔ mao. Asɛ bwɛɛ la tenten ge, suugaswɛm tenten aa do gereŋ kɛŋɔ digii ba kpɔ mao.
66021019	Bwea fi dɛ anɛ baa ma danjwɛɛ la chɔŋɛ a ta la ɛ bwedɛɛga bwa soosiwi a yog aa kpega. A gelɔ o do wer. Bwelogle la sɔne jaspa, nɛɛte la ge sɔne safaya, asɛ tooro te la ge sɔne agat. Onɔ la waa teŋa naarɛ la ge sɔne ɛmerald.
66021020	Onɔ la waa teŋa nue la sɔne ɔnigs, numɛl te la sɔne kanɛɛleɔn, nuanɛ te la ge sɔne kwats, nuatoro te la ge bɛrel, nuanaarɛ topas, asɛ onɔ la waa teŋa fi la sɔne chalsedone, fi dɛ beŋkpoŋ te la ge sɔne tɛɛkois, asɛ fi dɛ anɛ te la ge ametes.
66021021	Doonyoone fi dɛ anɛ la ge la, bwedɛɛga baa dɛ yera pɛɛlre laanee ba kpɔ kwaa a bwa gbera, bɛlbwa di ombir. Bwɛɛ la fɔgbaah ge ɛ suugaswɛm tenten dɛ do gereŋ kɛŋɔ digi ken.
66021022	Korowii Dea baa cheme o bini dɛɛ tomɔ toole bela. Nemenɛ Korowii waa ɛ komɛlbwa Dɔɔ la ne Pebie laanee chega tɛ dea la.
66021023	A ta hiaih kɛŋɔ wee ne korobie chaah bela. Korowii jirima dɛ chaah bela, asɛ Pebie la ge ɛ kandea bela.
66021024	Harɛ nɔ ta nɛra ɛɛ ba valɛ o bochaah la taa, asɛ koranar baa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta ge kpɔ ba jirima baa dɔa la ba jo o ta.
66021025	O doonyoone yao che, aa wola tɔ saŋ bɛlbwa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ bɔr aa bela jo.
66021026	Harɛ nɔ ta nɛra ɛɛ kpɔ ba jirima baa dɔa ne ba kondɛɛga bwaa jo bela.
66021027	Kɛ komɛlbwa doŋa te bɛlbwa aa lɔ o nɛɛ la aa won jo bela, gɛɛ nomɛlbwa ge waa dɛ ɛ sihihwaa dɛɛ teŋe nyosone la bɛlbwa ge aa wola won jo bela. Nɛra baa chwerɛ ba sɔna do Pebie Mkpa Tɔn la bini la, banee dɛ won jo bela.
66022001	Belaa nyundua torome la bag mɛ nee bɛl waa pala dɛɛ le Korowii ne Pebie la kookara la ta. Nee la dɔ mkpa dɛ do gereŋ ken,
66022002	dɛ palɛ dɛɛ kpɔ bwɛɛ la fɔgbaah tenten. Mkpa daa anɛ che o baŋne anɛ bwa ta, fɔgbaah bela. Mkpa daa la dɛ nɔnɛ kera fi dɛ anɛ benanyoa, korobie bɛlbwa kera beŋkpoŋ. O papooni ge wono chah nɛra bwa weela.
66022003	Komɛlbwa toole Korowii aa taahno bwɛɛ la ta. Korowii ne Pebie la kookara la chebɔree bela, asɛ o bonɔɔna ne toli ɛɛ tomɔ,
66022004	dɛɛ nao, asɛ o sɔn ge dawɛ ba tili ta.
66022005	Bɔr aa belaa dɛɛ jo, baa kandea ne weeree hiah, dɛkalkɛŋɔ N Naa Korowii ɛɛ dɛɛ chaah ba nɛɛ, asɛ baa di koraa saŋ te bɛlbwa.
66022006	Belaa nyundua torome la ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, "Waa nɔ ɛ kpela, nyosone bɛlbwa toole a ta. N Naa Korowii o faa ir keamere nɛɛ la, onee tom mɛ ásɛ n ba bagle waa aa dɛ ba ɛɛ taraken la, ásɛ o bonɔɔna ne toli jemɛ."
66022007	Yeesu ŋɔ, "Hɛ́ɛ no! N dɛ ba taraken. Nomɛlbwa waa lawɛ waa nɔ aa lɔ tɔn nɔ bini dɛɛ bagle waa aa dɛ ba ɛɛ kerekere la bini kpoŋe la na som."
66022008	Men Jɔn, menee no waa nɔ dɛ naa. Maa noa dɛ naa la, n guŋi nyundua torome waa bag mɛ waa nɔ la sie dɛ fee ŋɔ n duuru,
66022009	asɛ o ŋɔ, "Bɛ gɛ ɛ. N gba ɛ Korowii bonɔɔ la bɛl kɛŋɔ he ne he bala keamere la ne nɛra la bwa baa dɛ no tɔn nɔ bini waa nɔ. Korowiirii chɛ kɛŋɔ he duu."
66022010	O ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, "Bɛ waa aa lɔ tɔn nɔ bini kpɔ sɔh. Ka bagla, dɛkalkɛŋɔ tɔpere la telo tonɛ kɛŋɔ waa nɔ bwa ba ɛ.
66022011	Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ wechɔga la, ó te ɛ dɛɛ la. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ wedoŋa la, ó te ɛ dɛɛ la. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga la, wɛ́ɛ ɛ o wedɛɛga, asɛ nómɛlbwa ge waa do kaih la teŋɛ dɛ do gɛ dɛɛ la."
66022012	Yeesu bolɔ ŋɔ, "Hɛ́ɛ no bonɔ! N dɛ ba taraken. N dɛ ba kembɔr maa dɛ ba nɛra tɛɛ la ne. Gɛ nomɛlbwa toma aa doa laanee mɛɛ ba on kem bɔe.
66022013	Menee komɛlbwa Sitɔɔ, menee a Muŋkaa. Menee wobɛlbwa Mumpar ne a Jaga.
66022014	"Nɛra baa chɛgɛ ba laala a do wer la na som, dɛkalkɛŋɔ banee dɛ won dɔ Mkpa Daa la nɔna dɛ di, dɛ won kpɔ doonyoone la ta ba tetoora dɛɛ jo bwɛɛ la ta.
66022015	Nɛndoŋa, ne nɛra baa dɛ ɛ bebeewa, ne jwamane tena, ne nɛra baa dɛ kpoo nɛra, ne vog toroma, ne banɔ la bwa ba sie aa dɛ lɛ nyosone teŋa ne nɛra negra la ta te, ba ka bwɛɛ la dahare.
66022016	"Menee Yeesu, men tomɛ n torome ŋɔ ó ba bagle waa nɔ ásɛ he ka bagle asɔre tena. Devid Dwee men. O Naa men. Menee Chɔɔlenwewee la waa dɛ chaah kɛrɛdɛ la."
66022017	Korowii Domadɛɛge la ne hanfale la dɛ yerɛ ŋɔ, "Ba!" Nomɛlbwa waa no gɛ waa nɔ la, ó ge ŋɔ, "Ba!" Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ wi nyɔgre la, wɛ́ɛ ba. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin nee aa dɛ tɛ mkpa la dɛ nyɔ la, wɛɛ dɔɔ nyɔ pɛɛpɛɛ.
66022018	N dɛ kah nomɛlbwa waa no waa nɔ aa lɔ tɔn nɔ bini dɛɛ bagle waa aa dɛ ba ɛɛ kerekere la kɛŋɔ dɛ nomɛlbwa kpɔ waane ja a ta naa, Korowii ɛɛ kpɔ wahala maa bagle a waa tɔn nɔ bini laanee ta o nɛ.
66022019	Dɛ nomɛlbwa laa waa nɔ bini waane tamaa bɛlbwa kpɔ a ta naa, Korowii aa on mkpa daa maa bagle o waa tɔn nɔ bini la nɔnaa tɛ ó di. Waa on bɔree tɛ o bwɛdɛɛge la maa bagle o waa la ta.
66022020	Naate waa ɛ waa nɔ bwa danseɛ la ŋɔ, "Kpelaa, n dɛ ba taraken!" Aamen. N Dɔɔ Yeesu, ba warane!
66022021	Yá Dɔɔ Yeesu cha he bwa sekwaraa haa ɛ Korowii nɛra la. Aamen
